content: Consejos para que la verificaciÃ³n por vÃ­deo salga bien:La mayorÃ­a de las videollamadas fallan, o bien por mala conexiÃ³n a internet, o bien por la mala calidad de la imagen (aparece una imagen borrosa o no hay demasiada luz, por ejemplo). Realiza la videollamada en un ambiente claro y apropiado, utiliza un mÃ³vil con buena cÃ¡mara y asegÃºrate de tener buena conexiÃ³n a internet.AsegÃºrate de ser la Ãºnica persona que aparece en la videollamada.Debes vivir en uno de los paÃ­ses donde prestamos servicio para poder abrir una cuenta con nosotros.Aceptamos documentos de identificaciÃ³n nacionales yÂ permisos de residencia, consulta la lista de documentos aceptados (pestaÃ±a nueva). (Las licencias para conducir no valen). AdemÃ¡s, el documento no puede estar daÃ±ado ni caducado.Una vez que el proceso de verificaciÃ³n estÃ© completo y tu cuenta tenga el saldo mÃ­nimo requerido (pestaÃ±a nueva), te enviaremos tu Mastercard N26. LaÂ entrega puede tardar hasta 14 dÃ­as, o hasta 30 dÃ­as si vives en alguna de las islas de EspaÃ±a, en Ceuta o en Melilla.Nuestras lÃ­neas estÃ¡n abiertas todos los dÃ­as de 07:00 a 23:00, domingos y festivos incluidos.

title: Wie kann ich mein Smartphone mit meinem Konto verknÃ¼pfen oder trennen?
content:
FÃ¼r die Nutzung deines N26 Kontos brauchst du eines der folgenden Smartphones:ãƒ» iPhone (5s oder neuer, mindestens auf iOS 11 geupdated)
ãƒ» Android (6.0 oder neuer)Die Amazon Fire und Oxygen OS Versionen sind zurzeit leider nicht mit N26 kompatibel.Beachte bitte, dass du nur ein Smartphone pro N26 Konto verknÃ¼pfen kannst.Wann muss ich mein Smartphone verknÃ¼pfen?Du musst dein Smartphone verbinden bzw. entkoppeln, wenn du ein neues Konto bei N26 einrichtest, ein neues EndgerÃ¤t nutzt oder deine Telefonnummer wechselst.Wie kann ich mein N26 Konto mit meinem Handy verbinden?Smartphone zum ersten Mal verknÃ¼pfenFolge dieser Anleitung, um dein Smartphone zum ersten Mal mit deinem Konto zu verbinden:Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein â€“ du wirst automatisch aufgefordert, deine Telefonnummer zu bestÃ¤tigen.Du erhÃ¤ltst einen 4-stelligen VerknÃ¼pfungscode per SMS (neuen Tab). Sobald du ihn eingibst, wird dein Handy automatisch verknÃ¼pft.Neues EndgerÃ¤t verknÃ¼pfenBeachte bitte, dass du nur ein Smartphone pro N26 Konto verknÃ¼pfen kannst.Falls du dein N26 Konto mit einem neuen Handy verbinden willst, musst du aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden (neuen Tab) zuerst dein altes Smartphone entkoppeln.So entkoppelst du dein altes Smartphone:Gehe auf ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto (in der mobilen App) oder Ã¼ber die Web App (neuer Tab) (neuen Tab)Tippe auf SicherheitTippe auf Smartphone entknÃ¼pfen.Falls du auf dein altes Smartphone nicht mehr zugreifen kannst:Logge dich unter ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto einTippe auf SicherheitPrÃ¼fe dein E-Mail-Postfach fÃ¼r weitere Anweisungen.Falls du dich Ã¼ber ein neues GerÃ¤t in deinem Konto anmeldest, erhÃ¤ltst du zwei Codes per SMS:Einen 6-stelligen Code zum EinloggenEinen 4-stelligen Code zum VerknÃ¼pfen deines SmartphonesDen 6-stelligen Anmeldecode brauchst du, um dich in dein Konto einzuloggen. Dann kannst du dein Smartphone mithilfe des 4-stelligen VerknÃ¼pfungscode verbinden.Beachte bitte: Wenn du deine SIM-Karte wechselst, aber dasselbe Smartphone nutzt, musst du es nicht erneut verknÃ¼pfen bzw. entkoppeln.

title: Custom Audiences
content: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called â€œLookalike-Audiencesâ€ are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.Â In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called â€˜lookalike audiencesâ€™ are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

title: Come posso effettuare l'accesso con l'autenticazione a due fattori?
content: Lâ€™Autenticazione a due fattori Ã¨ una procedura che si basa sullâ€™uso di due o piÃ¹ elementi di sicurezza. Oltre allâ€™uso della password personale, con lâ€™autenticazione a due fattori avrai bisogno di confermare lâ€™accesso tramite un dispositivo associato oppure un codice che riceverai via sms.Â Â Â Clicca qui per scoprire di piÃ¹ sullâ€™Autenticazione a due fattoriCome effettuo lâ€™accesso con lâ€™Autenticazione a due fattori?Quando eseguirai lâ€™accesso al tuo conto N26 da web app oppure da un dispositivo non associato, ti verrÃ  richiesto di confermare una notifica push sul tuo dispositivo associato. In alternativa, potrai richiedere la ricezione di un codice via sms sul numero di telefono registrato con noi per confermare lâ€™accesso al conto.Questa procedura garantisce che soltanto tu possa accedere al tuo conto N26.Quando esegui lâ€™accesso al conto N26 dal tuo dispositivo associato, lâ€™autenticazione a due fattori ha luogo automaticamente. Ãˆ sufficiente accedere utilizzando le tue credenziali.Quali sono i requisiti?Innanzitutto, dovrai aggiornare allâ€™ultima versione sia il sistema operativo del tuo telefono che lâ€™app N26. Se ancora non riesci ad accedere al conto ma hai accesso allâ€™indirizzo email associato al conto, resetta la tua password.Â Se non hai accesso al tuo indirizzo email, contattaci via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.Cosa devo fare se non ricordo la mia password?Clicca qui per sapere come impostare la tua password.Non riesco ad accedere al mio dispositivo associato. Come posso eseguire il login al mio conto?Se non puoi accedere al tuo dispositivo associato ma puoi utilizzare il numero di telefono registrato, esegui lâ€™accesso al conto N26 e richiedi un codice di autenticazione.Per fare questo:Accedi alla webapp oppure alla versione mobile di un dispositivo non associato.Quando viene richiesto di confermare lâ€™accesso dal dispositivo associato, seleziona Aiuto.Seleziona Invia Codice SMS.Quando riceverai il codice, inseriscilo nel campo dedicato.In questo modo, avrai completato lâ€™autenticazione a due fattori e sarai in grado di associare di nuovo il tuo dispositivo.Cosa devo fare se ho un nuovo numero o non posso ricevere SMS per altri motivi?Se non hai accesso al tuo numero registrato perchÃ© hai un nuovo numero oppure non sei piÃ¹ in possesso del telefono, contatta la nostra assistenza clienti via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.E se il mio telefono non supporta lâ€™ultima versione dellâ€™app N26?Se hai un dispositivo che non supporta lâ€™ultima versione dellâ€™app, non potrai eseguire lâ€™accesso al conto attraverso la versione mobile dellâ€™app tramite quel telefono. Potrai utilizzare la versione web per visualizzare informazioni relative al tuo conto. Per fare questo, dovrai confermare il tuo tentativo di accesso attraverso un codice di verifica che verrÃ  inviato via sms sul numero di telefono associato al tuo conto.Potrai continuare ad effettuare pagamenti e prelievi con la tua Mastercard. Trasferimenti e bonifici, invece, potranno essere eseguiti solo averli confermati tramite lâ€™app N26.

title: How to use EasyFlex Savings?
content: Please note: As of the 16th of September, 2022, new sign-ups to EasyFlex Savings are no longer possible for the time being. If you signed up to EasyFlex Savings before that date, this doesn't affect you and you can continue using this product as usual. With EasyFlex Savings you can earn interest on your savings whilst staying flexible. The minimum deposit is 500â‚¬. After that there are no limits on how much you can deposit or withdraw from your EasyFlex Savings. This means there is no fixed saving term and you can access your funds at any time. Transferring money from and to your EasyFlex Savings account takes up to 2 business days. Tap on Explore in the Homescreen of your App, scroll down and tap EasyFlex Savings to open it.FAQsWhat does EasyFlex Savings cost?We charge no fixed fee and nothing on the interest you earn. If you have more than 50.000â‚¬ on your N26 account, EasyFlex Savings is a great way to avoid our deposit (new tab) fee whilst earning something extra.Â How often is the interest paid?Your earned interest is paid to your EasyFlex Savings account every quarter (3 months). You can choose to withdraw it, or keep it in your EasyFlex Savings to earn even more interest.Is the interest rate fixed?No. Your interest rate may vary, depending on the partner bank. We always strive to be transparent and offer you the most competitive rates, so weâ€™ll be sure to let you know if your interest rate changes at any time.Do I need to pay income tax on the interest earned in my savings account?You must declare your earned interest as part of your personal income tax declaration to the responsible tax authority. Whether you need to pay income tax on your earned interest will depend on your personal circumstances. You will receive an annual statement from our partner bank in your in-app inbox each year, which will show you the total interest amount that you need to declare.How does N26 provide the EasyFlex Savings service?We partnered up with Raisin who are also known as WeltSparen to offer EasyFlex Savings as a completely digital service. Our partner bank for this product is the Norwegian Komplett Bank.Is my money safe in EasyFlex Savings?Yes. You are covered by the applicable Deposit Guarantee Scheme that protects your funds up to â‚¬100.000 (paid out in the Norwegian Krone equivalent).

title: How to prove my identity?
content: As a licensed bank, itâ€™s important that we know who our customers are. Thatâ€™s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. Weâ€™ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.Â If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we wonâ€™t be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.Â

title: How to get push messages?
content: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such asÂ MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as withÂ CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you arenâ€™t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether youâ€™re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: FATCA - La razÃ³n por la que pedimos cierta informaciÃ³n a nuestros clientes
content: N26, al igual que toda instituciÃ³n financiera, estÃ¡ obligado a informar al Departamento del Tesoro de los Estados Unidos y a su Servicio de Impuestos Internos (IRS, por sus siglas en inglÃ©s) de cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de quienes denominan Â«personas estadounidensesÂ», que vienen a ser tanto los ciudadanos de dicha nacionalidad como los residentes fiscales en EE.UU.FATCA es el acrÃ³nimo de Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act, o Ley de cumplimiento tributario de las cuentas extranjeras, una normativa que lucha contra el fraude fiscal. Introducido por el IRS, el propÃ³sito de FATCA es incentivar el cumplimiento total de la Ley de impuestos, previniendo que las personas estadounidenses utilicen bancos extranjeros u otras organizaciones financieras con el objetivo de declarar sus bienes y ganancias.Encuentra mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre FATCA en la web del IRS (pestaÃ±a nueva).EE.UU. cuenta con un sistema de impuestos que incluye tambiÃ©n a ciudadanos que no son residentes en EE.UU., a diferencia de la mayorÃ­a de los paÃ­ses del mundo que solo cobran impuestos a los ciudadanos residentes, pero no a los ciudadanos que viven y trabajan en el extranjero.Â Para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al IRS, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales:Â¿Eres un ciudadano o posees la Carta Verde de Estados Unidos?Â¿EstÃ¡s sujeto a pagar impuestos en Estados Unidos?Â Estar â€˜â€™sujeto a pagar impuestosâ€™â€™ en EE.UU. no significa necesariamente que tengas que pagar impuestos allÃ­. Significa que segÃºn de EE.UU. tienes que rellenar un formulario y declarar tus impuestos internacionales al IRS, incluso si no tienes que pagar los impuestos en EE.UU.Â  3. Si la respuesta es sÃ­, Â¿CuÃ¡l es tu nÃºmero de identificaciÃ³n fiscal en Estados Unidos?Este nÃºmero (pestaÃ±a nueva) puede ser tanto tu nÃºmero de la Seguridad Social en EE.UU. (SSN) o tu NÃºmero Individual de IdentificaciÃ³n Fiscal (ITIN).Â AdemÃ¡s, si tu cuenta muestra EE.UU. como lugar de nacimiento, un nÃºmero de telÃ©fono de EE.UU. o estableces una transferencia programada a EE.UU., tenemos que asumir, de acuerdo con la legislaciÃ³n FATCA, que estÃ¡s sujeto a esta normativa, a no ser que nos confirmes de forma especÃ­fica lo contrario.Â En caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu informaciÃ³n fiscal en la app de N26. Para esto, tras iniciar sesiÃ³n ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > ConfiguraciÃ³n personal > InformaciÃ³n de impuestos y actualiza tu informaciÃ³n.Â Â

title: Chi puÃ² aprire un conto N26 Business?
content: â„¹ï¸ Vale per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia e Svizzera.Come funzionano i conti N26 Business?N26 offre unâ€™ampia gamma di conti Business (nuova tabella), pensati per i possessori di partita IVA (freelance e liberi professionisti e ditte individuali), con una Mastercard associata che dÃ  diritto fino allo 0,5% di cashback mensile su tutti i pagamenti effettuati per fini commerciali.(Il cashback offerto con i conti N26 Business Ã¨ diverso dal cashback di Stato, attivabile al momento con tutte le Mastercard N26).Oltre ad N26 Business (nuova tabella), se sei interessato ad una copertura Allianz e ad altri vantaggi Premium, potrai scegliere tra N26 Business You (nuova tabella) , N26 Business Metal (nuova tabella) e N26 Business Smart (nuova tabella).Â I conti N26 Business (nuova tabella) sono riservati esclusivamente a:liberi professionisti iscritti ad un albo o ordine professionale (ad esempio architetti, avvocati, farmacisti, infermieri...)freelance, ovvero lavoratori autonomi e imprenditori individuali in possesso di una partita IVA (come designer, fotografi, elettricisti o i titolari di B&B e casa vacanza con partita IVA)ditte individuali iscritte al Registro Imprese della Camera di CommercioNon Ã¨ possibile invece intestare un conto N26 Business a:Â SocietÃ  di persone (ad es. S.n.c e S.a.s.)Â SocietÃ  di capitali (ad es. s.r.l. e S.p.A.)Â enti e soggetti dotati di personalitÃ  e soggettivitÃ  giuridica.Â Ti ricordiamo inoltre che non Ã¨ possibile passare da un conto N26 Standard o Premium ad un conto N26 Business, e viceversa. Che cosâ€™Ã¨ la partita IVA e dove posso trovarla?La Partita Iva Ã¨ un codice numerico di 11 cifre, che serve ad identificare il titolare di una data attivitÃ  professionale in modo univoco, come il codice fiscale personale.Â Per la legge italiana, chiunque svolga unâ€™attivitÃ  continuativa per piÃ¹ di 30 giorni, infatti, ha lâ€™obbligo di apertura di partita IVA. Questa puÃ² essere di due tipi: in regime fiscale ordinario o forfettario, a seconda dei ricavi e delle spese sostenute per l'attivitÃ .Lâ€™apertura della partita IVA avviene tramite la presentazione di un apposito modulo presso lâ€™Agenzia delle Entrate:Modello AA9/12 (nuova tabella) per le persone fisiche;Modello AA7/10 (nuova tabella) per le societÃ .Il modulo dovrÃ  essere presentato o inviato online tramite il portale dell'Agenzia delle Entrate (nuova tabella) entro 30 giorni dallâ€™avvio dellâ€™attivitÃ  professionale.Non appena la domanda di apertura verrÃ  approvata e completata, riceverai il Certificato di attribuzione della partita IVA contenente il relativo codice a te assegnato per posta e sullâ€™area riservata del portale dell'Agenzia delle Entrate (nuova tabella). Che cosâ€™Ã¨ il codice ATECO e dove posso trovarlo?Il codice ATECO Ã¨ una sigla alfanumerica che serve a classificare unâ€™attivitÃ  commerciale e ad assegnare a tale impresa un livello di rischio, secondo la classificazione ATECO 2007 (nuova tabella) attualmente in vigore.Il codice dovrÃ  essere inserito al momento della richiesta di apertura della partita IVA, allo scopo di comunicare allâ€™Agenzia delle Entrate la tipologia dellâ€™attivitÃ  che si andrÃ  a svolgere.Â SarÃ  possibile inoltre aggiungere diversi codici ATECO con lâ€™apertura di ulteriori partite IVA.Puoi trovare il codice ATECO sulCertificato di attribuzione della partita IVA o sulla Visura Camerale nel caso di ditte individuali.

title: Â¿CuÃ¡nto tarda una transferencia?
content: Las transferencias SEPA inmediatas entrantes a cuentas de N26 son inmediatas, siempre y cuando se envÃ­en desde un banco que admite transferencias inmediatas. No obstante, las transferencias pueden retrasarse si tienen que verificarse debido a las normativas bancarias SEPA.Las transferencias SEPA ordinarias entrantes tardan un mÃ¡ximo de 2 dÃ­as laborables. Ten en cuenta que, si se hace una transferencia justo antes de un fin de semana o de un dÃ­a festivo, el plazo obviamente se prolongarÃ¡ a un mÃ¡ximo de 3 dÃ­as laborables.Las transferencias SWIFT entrantes tardan hasta 4 dÃ­as laborables en recibirse.Â Las transferencias SEPA inmediatas salientes llegan al instante. Las transferencias SEPA ordinarias tardan hasta 2 dÃ­as laborables. Las transferencias en divisas extranjeras con nuestro socio Wise tardan hasta 4 dÃ­as laborables. No ofrecemos transferencias SWIFT salientes.Â¿QuÃ© es un Â«dÃ­a laborable bancarioÂ»?Un dÃ­a laborable bancario equivale a dos dÃ­as laborables debido a los horarios de apertura de los bancos participantes. Todo dÃ­a de la semana que no sea festivo se considera un dÃ­a laborable.Mi transferencia no ha llegado: Â¿dÃ³nde estÃ¡?Bueno... Â¿quÃ© pasa si has tenido en cuenta todo lo que te hemos indicado anteriormente y la transferencia todavÃ­a no ha llegado? En ese caso, solo el banco emisor puede iniciar una investigaciÃ³n interna.Por desgracia, desde N26 no podemos investigar las transferencias entrantes, sino solo las salientes. Pero puedes consultar esta lista de posibles motivos por los que una transferencia puede fallar.InformaciÃ³n adicionalEl sistema con el que enviamos todas nuestras transferencias SEPA se llama TARGET2 (pestaÃ±a nueva), procesan los pagos todos los dÃ­as laborables de 07:00 a 18:00 GMT y cierran los siguientes dÃ­as: 1 de enero (AÃ±o Nuevo), Viernes Santo, Lunes de Pascua, Primero de Mayo, 25 de diciembre (Navidad) y 26 de diciembre.

title: Wie sperre ich den Magnetstreifen auf meiner Karte?
content: Es gibt mehrere MÃ¶glichkeiten, eine Kartenzahlung zu tÃ¤tigen: kontaktlos (durch ein Dranhalten deiner Karte an ein Zahlungsterminal), mit Chip & PIN sowie per Magnetstreifen, bei der deine Karte durch ein LesegerÃ¤t gezogen wird. Obwohl Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen immer seltener werden, verlangen einige HÃ¤ndler immer noch, dass du mit dieser Methode bezahlst.Warum sollte ich Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen sperren?Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen machen einen relativ hohen Anteil an betrÃ¼gerischen Kartentransaktionen aus. Einige HÃ¤ndler verfÃ¼gen Ã¼ber betrÃ¼gerische Systeme, um die Daten deiner Karte zu kopieren und sie anschlieÃŸend fÃ¼r betrÃ¼gerische Transaktionen zu verwenden. Dieser Vorgang wird als "Skimming" bezeichnet. Durch die Sperrung von Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen kannst du dich vor diesem Risiko schÃ¼tzen.Wie kann ich Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen sperren/entsperren?Um Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen zu deaktivieren, gehe wie folgt vor:Â Gehe auf Karten.Â Wenn du mehrere Karten hast, wische nach rechts, bis die gewÃ¼nschte Karte erscheint.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Tippe auf Magnetstreifen.Schalte die Funktion Magnetstreifen aktivieren aus.Hier kannst du auch die Sperrung des Magnetstreifens wieder aufheben. Die von dir vorgenommenen Ã„nderungen werden sofort auf die von dir gewÃ¤hlte Karte angewendet.

title: What is a suspicious login attempt?
content: Why did I receive this email?At N26, security is our top priority. When our system detects an unusual login attempt, we alert you immediately so that steps can be taken to secure your account. If youâ€™ve received an alert and you believe someone else may have attempted to log into your account, a quick reset of your password is all thatâ€™s needed. If you recognise the login attempt shown in the alert, you can simply ignore it.How do I reset my password?You can reset your password by logging into your account via your app or web browser, navigating to My Account â†’ Settings â†’ Security. If you cannot access your account, click Forgot Password on the login screen. From there, all you have to do is enter your email address and request a password reset link.When choosing a new password, we remind you not to reuse passwords across multiple platforms; please ensure you utilise a unique password for each of your accounts. Password reuse is a primary reason behind an account compromise.When should I contact Customer Support?After receiving an email about an unusual login, you may be concerned about the security of your account. We would like to reassure you, however, that changing your password is a sufficient measure which will ensure your account remains protected. If youâ€™d like to discuss this topic with someone in the know, our Customer Support team is there for you.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of ourÂ Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isnâ€™t rewarded because the invited friend hasnâ€™t made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates theÂ Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

title: Â¿Por quÃ© me han cobrado comisiÃ³n en el cajero?
content:
Las comisiones en los cajeros se dan por diferentes motivos:La comisiÃ³n de 2â‚¬ se aplica a cada retirada de efectivo adicional siguiendo nuestra PolÃ­tica de Uso Justo. Cuando te estÃ©s quedando sin retiradas gratuitas, te lo recordaremos con un mensaje.Algunos proveedores de cajeros pueden cobrar comisiones independientes que no podemos rechazar ni revertir. El cajero automÃ¡tico deberÃ¡ mostrar la comisiÃ³n antes de completar la retirada. En tu lista de transacciones, la comisiÃ³n se suma a la cantidad de retirada. Las comisiones de N26, por otro lado, aparecen como transacciones independientes. Los clientes de EspaÃ±a pueden encontrar una soluciÃ³n aquÃ­.Usar tu Maestro para retirar efectivo en cajeros automÃ¡ticos. Se aplica una comisiÃ³n de 2â‚¬ tanto en retiros de efectivo nacionales como internacionales. La Maestro solo estÃ¡ disponible en Alemania, Austria o PaÃ­ses Bajos.Algunos cajeros automÃ¡ticos tienen sus propias comisiones. No tenemos control sobre estas comisiones, por lo que no podemos rechazarlas ni revertirlas. Antes de finalizar la retirada, se te avisarÃ¡ si se aplican comisiones adicionales o no, y tendrÃ¡s la posibilidad de cancelar la operaciÃ³n.Para evitar dichas comisiones, sobre todo cuando estÃ©s de viaje, puedes utilizar elÂ localizador de cajeros MasterCard (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â para encontrar cajeros automÃ¡ticos gratuitos cerca de ti. 
Eso sÃ­, esta bÃºsqueda avanzada solo estÃ¡ disponible en la versiÃ³n en inglÃ©s; pero te ayudamos: haz clic en Search Criteria > View More Options > Select Features-Optional > No Access Fee (within country).Puedes ver todas nuestras comisiones en la pÃ¡gina web.

title: Certificado de titularidad bancaria
content: Â¿QuÃ© es el certificado de titularidad bancaria?El certificado de titularidad bancaria, tambiÃ©n conocido como certificado de cuenta bancaria o confirmaciÃ³n de cuenta, es un documento que confirma que tu cuenta estÃ¡ registrada a tu nombre. Aparecen tu nombre y apellidos, fecha de nacimiento, el IBAN de tu cuenta y la fecha en que te diste de alta.Opcionalmente, puedes pedir que aparezca tambiÃ©n el saldo que tengas en ese momento en la cuenta y el nÃºmero de tus tarjetas activas; que aparecerÃ¡ medio oculto con asteriscos, por razones obvias de seguridad.Â¿CÃ³mo pedir el certificado de titularidad bancaria?Desde la WebApp: haz clic en el icono* de descargas (pestaÃ±a nueva) y selecciona Descargar certificado de titularidad. El PDF se genera automÃ¡ticamente.Para pedir el certificado de titularidad con saldo y nÃºmero de tarjeta: haz clic en el icono* de descargas (pestaÃ±a nueva); bajo ConfirmaciÃ³n de cuenta, selecciona si quieres aÃ±adir tu saldo actual y/o el nÃºmero de tus tarjetas activas y haz clic en Solicitar. RecibirÃ¡s el PDF en la secciÃ³n Mensajes (pestaÃ±a nueva) dentro de 24 horas.Este Ãºltimo documento incluye el sello y la firma de N26, que podrÃ­as necesitar para solicitar el NIE u otros documentos. Â  Â * El icono de descargas es el cuadrado con una flecha hacia abajo que se encuentra a la izquierda del botÃ³n de Ingresar dinero.

title: Come modificare il mio indirizzo, il numero di telefono o altri dati personali?
content: Ãˆ importante tenere i propri dati personali aggiornati (ad es., il tuo numero di telefono Ã¨ necessario per associare il tuo smartphone oppure per inviare e ricevere trasferimenti via MoneyBeam). Ecco come puoi modificare i tuoi dati:Indirizzo di spedizioneÂ oÂ informazioni fiscali: Vai a ğŸ‘¤Il mio Conto > ProfiloPassword: Vai a ğŸ‘¤Il mio Conto > SicurezzaNomeÂ eÂ sesso: Chatta con noi e invia due documenti identificativi: una copia della tua nuova carta d'identitÃ  o passaporto e un documento ufficiale che attesti il cambiamento (un certificato di matrimonio o certificato di nascita aggiornato). Possiamo anche riordinare una carta per te con il tuo nuovo nome una volta che il tuo conto Ã¨ stato aggiornato.NazionalitÃ : Chatta con noi e invia una copia della tua nuova carta d'identitÃ  o passaporto.Indirizzo e-mail: Chatta con noi per avere maggiori informazioni su come procedere.Numero di telefono: Puoi modificare queste informazioni nellâ€™app in qualsiasi momento. title: Cosâ€™Ã¨ un conto N26 Standard?
content: Il conto N26 Standard Ã¨ un conto corrente digitale sicuro e intuitivo che puoi aprire in pochi minuti direttamente dal tuo smartphone. Ãˆ incredibilmente semplice e trasparente e ti permette di ricevere, inviare e spendere soldi in tutta sicurezza. Il conto N26 Standard Ã¨ gratuito* ed Ã¨ quindi una soluzione semplice e accessibile per tutte le tue necessitÃ  finanziarie. Cosa include un conto N26 standard?Ecco tutte le caratteristiche e funzionalitÃ  offerte con N26 Standard:Conto corrente gratuito*: il nostro conto N26 Standard Ã¨ gratuito (*in caso di saldo pari o superiore a 50.000 â‚¬ potrebbero essere applicate delle commissioni di custodia).Carta virtuale: con il conto viene offerta una carta virtuale (nuova tabella) che ha un numero PAN completo e pronto per essere aggiunto ad Apple Pay o Google Pay per gli acquisti online e in negozio. Puoi trovare i dettagli della tua carta virtuale nella tua app N26, selezionando Carte > Dati della carta e inserendo il tuo PIN o effettuando il login biometrico.Mastercard N26 fisica: al costo di 10 â‚¬ aggiuntivi puoi avere una Mastercard di debito fisica N26 Standard (ti preghiamo di notare che Ã¨ necessario versare almeno 10 â‚¬ sul conto per avviare la procedura di produzione e spedizione della carta).Pagamenti e bonifici: puoi inviare e ricevere bonifici SEPA utilizzando la tua app mobile N26. Inoltre, potrai inviare bonifici istantanei ad altri clienti N26 utilizzando MoneyBeam.Ulteriori prodotti finanziari: in caso di idoneitÃ  puoi anche richiedere ulteriori prodotti finanziari, ad es., scoperto di conto, credito, risparmi, ecc.CASH26: preleva e deposita contanti utilizzando la nostra funzionalitÃ  CASH26 (nuova tabella)Supporto Clienti: puoi contattare il nostro fantastico team del Supporto Clienti utilizzando la chat integrata nellâ€™app mobile o aprendo una chat dal nostro sito web o dalla WebApp (nuova tabella).

title: Aggiornamenti relativi alla nostra assistenza clienti
content:
Gli orari della nostra assistenza rimangono invariati: siamo disponibili tutti i giorni dalle 7 alle 23, domeniche e festivi inclusi.Al momento la nostra assistenza clienti ha una disponibilitÃ  limitata: per permettere ai clienti in situazioni di emergenza di mettersi in contatto con noi, raccomandiamo di far riferimento al nostro Support Center per trovare risposte immediate a richieste non urgenti.Se hai urgentemente bisogno di bloccare la tua carta, puoi farlo tramite lâ€™app di N26 oppure chiamando la nostra assistenza telefonica automatizzata al numero +39 02 124 123 361.In questo modo saremo in grado di fornire assistenza immediata ai clienti che:non riescono ad attivare il conto, accedervi oppure richiederne la chiusura.hanno problemi con pagamenti, prelievi e bonifici.credono di essere stati vittima di frode o hanno bisogno di contestare una transazione.sono in difficoltÃ  per un pignoramento.Rimani in attesa, lasciando aperta la finestra della chat e a breve sarai messo in contatto con un agente. Ti ringraziamo per la tua comprensione.Ulteriori aggiornamenti sullâ€™operativitÃ  della nostra assistenza clienti ed eventuali tempi di attesa verranno pubblicati in questa pagina.[Aggiornato ilÂ  <15/11> alle <10:00>]

title: Was ist eine virtuelle Karte?
content: Wenn du ein N26 Standard-Konto erÃ¶ffnest, erhÃ¤ltst du kostenlos eine virtuelle Karte (vorausgesetzt, du hast ein einmaliges Mindestguthaben von 10 â‚¬, um die Karte zu aktivieren).Beim Online-Shopping ist eine Virtual Card ideal: Du kannst deine zusÃ¤tzlichen Kartendaten unbesorgt in Apps und Onlineshops angeben und Abozahlungen separat von anderen Ausgaben verwalten. Kunden von N26 Smart, YOU und Metal haben die MÃ¶glichkeit, zusÃ¤tzlich zu der kostenlosen physischen Karte, die sie zusammen mit ihrem Premium-Abo erhalten, kostenlos eine virtuelle Karte zu bestellen. Gut zu wissen: Kunden von N26 Standard haben die MÃ¶glichkeit, eine physische Karte gegen eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 10 â‚¬ zu bestellen (ohne ein Upgrade auf ein Premium-Abo vornehmen zu mÃ¼ssen).Wie kann ich meine virtuelle Karte bestellen und aktivieren?Logge dich in dein Konto ein und Ã¶ffne den Tab "Karten" in der unteren rechten Ecke.Tippe auf "Zusatzkarte erhalten".WÃ¤hle oben "Virtuell" und tippe dann unten auf "AuswÃ¤hlen".Lies dir die Allgemeinen GeschÃ¤ftsbedingungen durch, stimme ihnen zu und tippe dann auf "Virtuelle Karte erstellen".FÃ¼ge deine virtuelle Karte zu Apple Pay oder Google Pay hinzu oder Ã¼berspringe diesen Schritt.Wie verwende ich meine virtuelle Karte?Bezahlen im GeschÃ¤ft mit Apple oder Google Pay: Verbinde deine virtuelle Karte entweder mit Apple oder Google Pay, je nach GerÃ¤t.Bargeld abheben: Sobald du deine virtuelle Karte mit deinem Apple oder Google Wallet verknÃ¼pft hast, kannst du Bargeld an Geldautomaten abheben, die dies kontaktlos ermÃ¶glichen. Du kannst auch CASH26 nutzen, um Bargeld einzuzahlen oder abzuheben (DE, AT, IT, ES und GR).Online einkaufen: Alle Details zu deiner virtuellen Karte kannst du in deiner N26 App einsehen (Kartennummer, Ablaufdatum und CVV-Nummer). Und zwar folgendermaÃŸen:Logge dich in deiner mobilen App von N26 ein.WÃ¤hle â€˜Kartenâ€™.Gehe zu deiner virtuellen Karte (wenn du mehrere hast, musst du dazu ggf. nach links wischen).WÃ¤hle â€˜Kartendetailsâ€™.Du musst dann deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN eingeben oder dich biometrisch einloggen, bevor dir deine Kartendaten 60 Sekunden lang angezeigt werden.Die virtuelle Mastercard ist nur fÃ¼r N26 Standard-Konten verfÃ¼gbar, die ab Februar 2021 erÃ¶ffnet werden, und fÃ¼r alle N26 Premiumkonten ab dem 9. Oktober 2021.

title: Â¿QuÃ© tipo de cambio obtendrÃ©?
content:
Cuando usas tu tarjeta N26 para realizar transacciones en moneda extranjera, los tipos de cambios de Mastercard se aplicarÃ¡n a la cantidad total de la compra.Buenas noticias: N26 no cobra ninguna comisiÃ³n adicional por transacciones en el extranjero!Puedes consultar las tarifas de Mastercard aquÃ­: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (pestaÃ±a nueva)
TambiÃ©n puedes verificar el tipo de cambio aplicado a una transacciÃ³n anterior, tanto en la app N26 y como en la pÃ¡gina web, a travÃ©s de los detalles de la transacciÃ³n en el feed.Ten en cuenta que los tipos de cambio son dinÃ¡micos, por lo que el valor de la transacciÃ³n puede cambiar hasta que se cargue la cantidad final de la compra debido a la variaciÃ³n de la moneda.

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ from the mobile app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â (if you havenâ€™t activated your card and need toÂ top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by theÂ check digitsÂ (two numbers), then ourÂ bank codeÂ 10011001 and end with your 10-digitÂ account numberÂ (start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner ofÂ Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: How to download my personal data?
content: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. Weâ€™ve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and youâ€™re in complete control: go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. Â It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.Â As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.Â Â How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. Youâ€™ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure itâ€™s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

title: How to close my account?
content: Weâ€™re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. Weâ€™d love to keep you as a customerâ€”tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.Â If youâ€™ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, hereâ€™s what to do:Make your account balance â‚¬0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is â‚¬0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). Youâ€™ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or youâ€™re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or â€œas soon as possibleâ€Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, weâ€™ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo saber el PIN de mi tarjeta o de mi cuenta?
content: Lo primero es aclarar que, en N26, hay dos cÃ³digos PIN diferentes: el PIN de confirmaciÃ³n y el PIN de la tarjeta. Â¡Ah! Y los dos los creas tÃº.El PIN de confirmaciÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva) lo creas cuando vinculas tu mÃ³vil a la cuenta por primera vez (suele ser en cuanto la abres) y sirve para confirmar las transferencias y cualquier otra operaciÃ³n que hagas desde la app.Se puede cambiar desde Mi cuenta > Seguridad > Cambiar cÃ³digo PIN.El PIN de la tarjeta (pestaÃ±a nueva) lo creas cuando recibes y activas la tarjeta. La app te pide que elijas un PIN para la tarjeta, que sirve para sacar dinero del cajero y pagar en tiendas. Se puede cambiar desde Tarjetas > ConfiguraciÃ³n de tarjeta > Cambiar PIN. Y no olvides hacer una retirada en un cajero para que se grabe el cambio de PIN (similar a cuando la activas por primera vez).Cosas importantes:Nosotros no te enviamos ningÃºn PIN por correo ni te lo diremos nunca por email, telÃ©fono o chat. Solo tÃº conoces los cÃ³digos PIN asociados a tu cuenta y solo tÃº los deberÃ­as conocer.Por motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ningÃºn PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, direcciÃ³n u otra combinaciÃ³n con dÃ­gitos repetidos o secuencias (como, por ejemplo: 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el nÃºmero que has elegido no es vÃ¡lido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinaciÃ³n diferente.Puedes ver mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n especÃ­fica sobre cada uno de ellos en los links de arriba.

title: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
content: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

title: Deposit fee
content: From July 2022, we have decided to no longer collect this feeFor every N26 account (except N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal) opened on or after 19.10.2020, and exceeding a balance of 50.000â‚¬, a 0,5% deposit fee per year applies, as was outlined in your terms and conditions during the account sign up process.Â Please find here (new tab) the related terms and conditions.The deposit fee will be calculated by tracking the balance of your account on a daily basis, for each day of the month. Every day that your balance exceeds the threshold of 50.000â‚¬, a 0,5% per annum fee will be applied to the excess of the account balance.Â The fee will be charged directly from your account at the beginning of each month for the previous 30 days.Â If your account balance might exceed the above mentioned threshold, and you donâ€™t want to incur this fee, there are two ways that you can prevent yourself from being charged:Â Upgrade to N26 You (new tab), N26 Business You (new tab), N26 Metal (new tab)or N26 Business MetalÂ  (new tab)For our German customers, open an EasyFlex Savings account (new tab) and transfer your excess funds there (please take note of eligibility requirements)

title: Â¿Por quÃ© N26 hace controles en las transacciones?
content: Tenemos la responsabilidad de realizar controles rutinarios en cuentas y transacciones para asegurar la seguridad de tu cuenta (verÂ GwG Â§ 10 (pestaÃ±a nueva)). Estos controles se basan en transacciones individuales y los inicia nuestro sistema de forma automÃ¡tica.Como consecuencia, podemos llegar a pedirte algÃºn documento. Si recibes una solicitud de este tipo, simplemente envÃ­a los documentos necesarios vÃ­a Mensajes de N26. No habrÃ¡ excepciones ni forma de pasar por alto dichos controles. Este es un proceso estÃ¡ndar para todos los bancos que nos permite asegurar la seguridad a nuestros clientes. Tanto el proceso como el resultado son confidenciales y se tratan de forma interna, lo cual nos ayuda a garantizar la seguridad para nuestros clientes y sus transacciones.AquÃ­ tienes algunos consejos que te ahorrarÃ¡n tiempo en el proceso:El documento que necesitas se especifica en el correo que has recibido de N26. Estos documentos nos los puedes enviar escaneados, en fotos o en capturas de pantalla (siempre y cuando el documento estÃ© claramente legible). EnvÃ­a tambiÃ©n una descripciÃ³n detallada. SÃ© concreto en tus respuestas, detalles y documentos. Si tus documentos no corroboran claramente tus declaraciones o si omites detalles, tendremos que preguntar otra vez.Responde lo antes posible y dentro del plazo que se indica en el mensaje. Puedes usar el email que has recibido de N26 para responder directamente y adjuntar los documentos.El servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente de N26 no tiene mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre este tema.Debes proporcionarÂ documentos vÃ¡lidosÂ dependiendo de tu situaciÃ³n, a continuaciÃ³n puedes ver algunos ejemplos:Has recibido ayuda econÃ³mica de tu familia para algÃºn proyecto o has heredado propiedades o dinero: un contrato de concesiÃ³n o prÃ©stamo, un documento oficial de herencia o un documento oficial de la fuente del prÃ©stamo (como por ejemplo los documentos de venta de una propiedad para financiar el prÃ©stamo o los extractos bancarios de los parientes que lo otorgan. Has vendido una propiedad o acciones en el mercado de valores: el contrato que muestra el acuerdo o el documento oficial del notario respecto a la transacciÃ³n de la propiedad. Has recibido o enviado dinero para pagar facturas o algÃºn producto: documentos que demuestren el saldo disponible confirmando la procedencia del dinero o documentos que muestren el uso del dinero para dicho depÃ³sito.Has recibido el finiquito de tu antigua empresa: documentos que prueben el cese de la actividad, detallando el pago y/o un extracto bancario de tu antigua empresa.

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?Â 
You are normally a â€œtax residentâ€ and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally â€œtie-breaker rulesâ€ included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.Â 
What is your taxpayer identification number (â€œTINâ€) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.Â In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: How to make N26 my main account?
content:
We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: weâ€™ll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and weâ€™ll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.There are three ways to switch your bank accounts over to N26:Account switching service powered by finleap connect GmbHTogether with our partner finleap connect GmbH (new tab) weâ€™re offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. Itâ€™s an automated process and completely free. Log into your N26 mobile app and tap on My account > Switch to N26. Tap Start now and follow the instructions.Alternatively, you can use ourÂ form (new tab)Â and log in with your previous bank account details. Once youâ€™ve filled in all required information, itâ€™ll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.Account switching service supportYou could also inform your payment partners yourself. To do this, fill out the letter to notify your payment partners (new tab) and send it to them. You could also request theÂ termination of your bank account (new tab) with your previous bank by filling out the form and sending it to them.This service is also free. If you need help with this process, contact our Customer Support via chat.Mandatory account switching service as per ZKG (Zahlungskontengesetz)All German licensed banks are required to offer a bank account switching service as part or Â§21 ZKG (Zahlungskontengesetz). To initiate this service, please download and print theÂ account switching form (new tab) and send it to: N26 Bank GmbH
Kontowechsel
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 BerlinOnce weâ€™ve received your request, weâ€™ll process it within 7 business days. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.We charge a fee of up to â‚¬20 for this service, depending on your individual request.Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte Ã©tranger ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ©).Complete the Cerfa nÂ° 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

title: Â¿Por quÃ© me han cobrado dos veces?
content: Ofrecemos banking en tiempo real, lo que significa que puedes ver todo lo que ocurre en tu cuenta en todo momento; y esto incluye las autorizaciones. Hay dos tipos de transacciones que se dan durante una compra, tanto en tienda como online:AutorizaciÃ³n: un importe bloqueado o una reserva hecha por un comercio; ya sea el cafÃ© que te tomas por la maÃ±ana, la reserva de un hotel o un coche de alquiler (incluyendo depÃ³sitos de seguridad).PresentaciÃ³n del pago: el importe real que se deduce de tu cuenta; ese cafÃ© ya se ha cobrado del todo, o te han devuelto el depÃ³sito de seguridad tras tu estancia en el hotel, cobrÃ¡ndote solo el precio de la habitaciÃ³n.Una vez que la autorizaciÃ³n se ha confirmado, no podemos cancelarla ni revocarla. En este momento solo pueden pasar tres cosas con tu autorizaciÃ³n: que se convierta en una presentaciÃ³n, que se rechace o que caduque. En los Ãºltimos dos casos, verÃ¡s que el dinero vuelve a tu cuenta automÃ¡ticamente en un mÃ¡ximo de 12 dÃ­as.En ocasiones podrÃ­as ver ambas transacciones a la vez, la autorizaciÃ³n y la presentaciÃ³n del pago; lo que ocurre cuando el lector de tarjetas del comerciante se desconecta o tiene problemas tÃ©cnicos durante el pago. Al final, la autorizaciÃ³n acabarÃ¡ caducando y, si no caducase en 12 dÃ­as, podremos ayudarte aÂ recuperar tu dinero.Doble cargo en gasolineras y autopistasEn algunas autopistas espaÃ±olas (como Acesa) esto sucede muy a menudo debido al sistema de pagos que utilizan.TambiÃ©n es comÃºn que esto pase en algunas gasolineras espaÃ±olas, sobre todo en las mÃ¡s pequeÃ±as.Recuerda:Las cantidades bloqueadas como depÃ³sito por alquiler de coche pueden tardar hasta 30 dÃ­as en volver a tu cuenta (en vez de 12).Algunos comerciantes hacen autorizaciones de verificaciÃ³n (normalmente cantidades muy pequeÃ±as), con el objetivo de comprobar si tu tarjeta estÃ¡ activa y tiene fondos. Este dinero siempre acabarÃ¡ volviendo a tu saldo disponible.La cantidad de una autorizaciÃ³n podrÃ­a acabar siendo diferente a la de la presentaciÃ³n final porÂ varias razones.

title: What's a garnishment?
content: If you owe money to a third party, a fiscal authority or another kind of authority your account might be garnished. But what is a garnishment?A garnishment is a regulatory measure (normally effected by court) that seizes funds directly on your account as you owe them to a third party or to fiscal authorities so you cannot spend your funds in a different way.What happens in case of a garnishment?We are legally obligated to seize your account as soon as we receive a garnishment and transfer order from the creditor. Furthermore, we are obligated to transfer the garnishment amount to the creditor. We do this 4 weeks after receiving the garnishment or transfer order, unless you choose an alternative solution in this period.If we receive a garnishment we'll send you an in-app message to Messages from N26 with the following informationDateName of the creditor (and name of their legal attorney)Reference numberGarnishment amountYour account will remain seized until the entire claim has been settled. This means that you canâ€™t make any payments with your N26 account. As soon as the garnishment is lifted, weâ€™ll notify you in your â€œMessages from N26â€ mailbox. If you have any questions about garnishment, please contact your creditor or the competent enforcement court.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo revocar mi consentimiento para aparecer visible como usuario de N26?
content:
Para procesar las transferencias instantÃ¡neas a travÃ©s de MoneyBeam o utilizar los Espacios Compartidos, N26 asocia tu informaciÃ³n de contacto con otros usuarios de N26.Ser visible para los demÃ¡s usuarios de N26 te permite utilizar todas las funciones de la cuenta, como por ejemplo MoneyBeam, con la que puedes enviar dinero a tiempo real sin necesidad de introducir un IBAN y solo seleccionando un contacto de tu lista. AdemÃ¡s, tambiÃ©n puedes solicitar a un contacto que te envÃ­e dinero y este puede aceptar o rechazar tu peticiÃ³n. Tener la visibilidad activa, tambiÃ©n te permite utilizar los Espacios Compartidos con alguien que elijas de tu lista.En este artÃ­culo te explicamos como aparecer visible para otros usuarios de N26. Si aceptas aparecer visible como usuario de N26, todos los contactos guardados en tu mÃ³vil que tengan una cuenta N26, aparecerÃ¡n en la lista de contactos de la app N26. De igual modo, tÃº aparecerÃ¡s junto a tu nombre en la lista de otros usuarios de N26 que tengan tu contacto guardado. Cuando se hace un MoneyBeam, solo el emisor y el destinatario pueden ver los detalles de la otra persona (nombre, email o telÃ©fono, concepto e importe de la transferencia). Al emisor, el nombre del destinatario le aparecerÃ¡ tal y como lo tenga guardado en su mÃ³vil. Al destinatario, el nombre del emisor le aparecerÃ¡ tal y como estÃ¡ registrado en N26. 
 
Para aparecer visible como usuario de N26 ante otros usuarios, puedes hacerlo fÃ¡cilmente yendo a ğŸ‘¤ Mi cuenta > InformaciÃ³n personal > Datos personales. Una vez ahÃ­, marca la casilla que dice: â€œPermitir a mis contactos que usan N26 que me encuentren fÃ¡cilmente para realizar transferencias." Â¡Y ya estÃ¡!

title: How does N26 Business work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business is right for you:The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive (0.1% | 0.5%) cashback every month on all payments made using the card. All payment refunds received during the month will be discounted from the total payments amount in order to calculate the cashback. The refunds might be related to a payment made on the same or a previous month. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).The cashback is issued on a monthly basis, processing eligible transactions of a given month the following natural month, starting from day 15th. Please expect a 7 days delay for the cashback to be credited into your N26 Business account.As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 YOU with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Please keep the following in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Preguntas frecuentes sobre disputas de pagos con tarjeta
content:
Puedes disputar un pago realizado con tu tarjeta Mastercard de N26 e intentaremos recuperar tu dinero, ya sea por una transacciÃ³n no autorizada o por una transacciÃ³n autorizada con la que haya surgido un problema. En este otro artÃ­culo te explicamos cÃ³mo disputar una transacciÃ³n. Si tu tarjeta estuvo en tu poder en todo momento, vuelve a confirmar que no realizaste la transacciÃ³n. Si ese es el caso, puedes continuar y pedir tu tarjeta reportando la anterior como Â«robadaÂ». Si tienes una fecha de entrega estimada, puedes disputar la transacciÃ³n desde la fecha en que esperabas recibir la mercancÃ­a. Las pautas de Mastercard establecen que debes presentar la disputa dentro de un plazo de 120 dÃ­as desde la fecha de entrega estimada.Un cajero automÃ¡tico no me ha dado el dinero, Â¿quÃ© hago?Primero, intenta comunicarte con el banco propietario del cajero automÃ¡tico. Esta es la forma mÃ¡s rÃ¡pida de recuperar tu dinero. Para ayudarte, aquÃ­ tienes una guÃ­a sobre lo que puedes decir:Querido Banco {nombre del banco}:Â 
IntentÃ© retirar efectivo de un cajero automÃ¡tico propiedad de su empresa y no recibÃ­ el efectivo, pero aÃºn asÃ­ me cobraron. A continuaciÃ³n, puede encontrar la informaciÃ³n sobre la transacciÃ³n:Â

{tu nombre}Si el banco propietario del cajero automÃ¡tico no te ayuda, puedes seguir las instrucciones para iniciar una disputa. (pestaÃ±a nueva) AsegÃºrate de incluir la fecha de la transacciÃ³n, el importe y el comerciante, y tu razÃ³n para disputar esta transacciÃ³n, para permitirnos tener suficiente informaciÃ³n.Tengo un pago anterior con un comerciante, que me ha vuelto a cobrar. Â¿QuÃ© hago?Primero, comunÃ­cate con el comerciante para ver si puede ayudarte. Esta es la forma mÃ¡s rÃ¡pida de recuperar tu dinero. Para ayudarte, aquÃ­ hay una plantilla bÃ¡sica que puedes usar para plantear este problema al comerciante:Querido Banco {nombre del banco}:Â 
AutoricÃ© una transacciÃ³n a {nombre del comerciante}, pero posteriormente me ha cobrado de mÃ¡s sin mi autorizaciÃ³n. A continuaciÃ³n, puede encontrar informaciÃ³n sobre la transacciÃ³n:Â

Atentamente,Â 
{tu nombre}Si el comerciante no responde o no coopera, puedes seguir las instrucciones para iniciar una disputa. (pestaÃ±a nueva) AsegÃºrate de incluir la fecha de la transacciÃ³n, el importe y el comerciante, y tu razÃ³n para disputar esta transacciÃ³n, para permitirnos tener suficiente informaciÃ³n.El comerciante me ha dicho que habÃ­a emitido un reembolso a mi tarjeta N26, pero aÃºn no he recibido el reembolso. Â¿QuÃ© hago?Tu reembolso puede tardar hasta 15 dÃ­as naturales a partir de la fecha en que el comerciante lo emitiÃ³. Por favor, ten paciencia y espera a que pase este plazo. Si pasan los dÃ­as y aÃºn no ves ningÃºn reembolso en tu cuenta, puedes seguir las instrucciones para iniciar una disputa. identificar la transacciÃ³n.Â¿QuÃ© hace N26 para prevenir fraudes?En N26 tomamos todas las medidas posibles para proteger tu cuenta contra el fraude:Flexibilidad para elegir cuÃ¡ndo bloquear tu tarjeta, activar y desactivar pagos en el extranjero, habilitar y deshabilitar pagos online y establecer lÃ­mites de pago directamente dentro de tu app N26.Recibir notificaciones push en tiempo real que te informan de cualquier actividad que ocurra en tu cuenta.Uso de herramientas internas y prevenciÃ³n de fraudes con tarjetas para detectar y prevenir fraudes.Desarrollar sistemas para reducir el riesgo de posibles fraudes.Â¿CÃ³mo ocurre el fraude con tarjetas?Hay 3 tipos principales de fraude con tarjetas:Te roban tu tarjeta y la falsifican, por ejemplo: usas un cajero automÃ¡tico trucado que roba los datos de tu tarjeta.Roban los datos de tu tarjeta en Internet, por ejemplo:pides algo de una pÃ¡gina web fraudulenta / falsate roban los datos al hacer una compra legÃ­timahackean la pÃ¡gina donde compras onlineTe roban la tarjeta fÃ­sica y la usan para hacer compras.Â¿CÃ³mo puedo proteger mi cuenta contra el fraude?A continuaciÃ³n, se muestran algunas formas en las que puedes proteger tu cuenta contra el fraude:Utiliza cajeros automÃ¡ticos de confianza ubicados en una sucursal bancaria.Realiza pedidos solo en pÃ¡ginas web y minoristas de confianza.Cambia tus contraseÃ±as con cierta frecuencia.N26 nunca te pedirÃ¡ los detalles de tu tarjeta o de tu cuenta fuera de la app o la WebApp. No confÃ­es en los emails o SMS que parecen provenir de N26 con enlaces extraÃ±os o que te solicitan esta informaciÃ³n directamente.Cambia la configuraciÃ³n de tu tarjeta dentro de tu app N26, por ejemplo: deshabilita los pagos online, las retiradas en cajeros automÃ¡ticos o los pagos en el extranjero, y establece lÃ­mites de gasto segÃºn tus hÃ¡bitos de consumo.Evita realizar transacciones con banda magnÃ©tica si es posible, ya que no son tan seguras como las transacciones contactless o con chip.MantÃ©n tu tarjeta en un lugar seguro y no compartas fotos donde se vean los detalles de tu tarjeta.

title: Â¿QuÃ© es un intento de inicio sospechoso?
content:
Â¿Por quÃ© he recibido este email?En N26, la seguridad es nuestra mÃ¡xima prioridad. Cuando nuestro sistema detecta un intento de inicio de sesiÃ³n inusual, te avisamos de inmediato para tomar medidas a tiempo y proteger tu cuenta. Si has recibido una alerta y crees que alguien ha intentado iniciar sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta, simplemente restablece tu contraseÃ±a. Si reconoces el intento de inicio de sesiÃ³n que se muestra en la alerta, puedes ignorarlo.Â¿CÃ³mo restablecer la contraseÃ±a?Puedes restablecer tu contraseÃ±a iniciando sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta a travÃ©s de la app o el navegador de Internet, accediendo a Mi cuenta â†’ Configuraciones â†’ Seguridad.Si no puedes acceder a tu cuenta, haz clic en Â¿Has olvidado tu contraseÃ±a? en la pÃ¡gina de inicio de sesiÃ³n. AhÃ­ solo tienes que introducir tu direcciÃ³n de email y solicitar un enlace para restablecer tu contraseÃ±a.A la hora de elegir una nueva contraseÃ±a, te recordamos que no utilices contraseÃ±as que ya uses en otras plataformas. AsegÃºrate de utilizar una contraseÃ±a Ãºnica para cada una de tus cuentas. La reutilizaciÃ³n de contraseÃ±as es una de las razones principales de los problemas de seguridad en las cuentas.Â¿CuÃ¡ndo debo contactar con el Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente?Es posible que te preocupes por la seguridad de tu cuenta al recibir un email sobre un inicio de sesiÃ³n inusual. Sin embargo, te aseguramos que cambiar tu contraseÃ±a es suficiente para garantizar que la cuenta estÃ© protegida. Si quieres hablar sobre este tema con un experto, nuestro Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente estarÃ¡ encantado de atenderte.
Te informamos de que la forma mÃ¡s eficiente de contactarnos es a travÃ©s del chat de tu app N26. Estaremos encantados de responder a tus preguntas.

title: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
content: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 MetalÂ contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, youâ€™re now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and youâ€™ll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.Â RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.Â  At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and weâ€™ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of â‚¬10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you.
