title: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
content:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (â€œIRSâ€).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, weâ€™ll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?Â 
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being â€œsubject to taxâ€ in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that youâ€™re also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you donâ€™t end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (â€œSSNâ€) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the â€˜Learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜Invite new memberâ€™ button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once youâ€™ve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the â€˜Accept power of attorneyâ€™ button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the â€˜Send Inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: Have you been victim of a fraud? Contact us.
content:
Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please help us save you time and contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If youâ€™re an N26 customer and have an authorized or unauthorized card transaction which you want to dispute, please use our dedicated and complete service in the N26 mobile app. The hotline above exclusively helps in case of transfers to a suspicious account with an N26 IBAN.Did you get a SMS followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt. This is how the fraud works:You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one (new tab) The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App> My Account> Settings >Security> Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,Â  send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comIn the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab).Iâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If youâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, youâ€™ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the â€˜Cardsâ€™ tab. You can mark the reason as â€œlostâ€ or â€œstolenâ€ based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, youâ€™ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).How can I protect my account from fraud?Â Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banksÂ Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularlyÂ Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behaviour.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.Useful links:What is phishing?What to do if my account may be compromised?

title: Â¿CÃ³mo bloqueo la banda magnÃ©tica de mi tarjeta?
content: Hay muchas formas de realizar un pago con tarjeta: contactless (â€œtocandoâ€ con la tarjeta), con chip y PIN, y con la banda magnÃ©tica, donde tienes que pasar la tarjeta por un lector. Pese a que las transacciones con banda magnÃ©tica son cada vez menos habituales, algunos negocios todavÃ­a te exigen pagar utilizando este mÃ©todo.Â¿Por quÃ© deberÃ­a bloquear las transacciones con banda magnÃ©tica?Los pagos mediante banda magnÃ©tica representan un alto porcentaje de transacciones con tarjeta realizadas de un modo fraudulento. Algunos comercios tienen sistemas fraudulentos para copiar los datos de tu tarjeta, que luego utilizan para realizar transacciones fraudulentas; a este proceso se le denomina â€œcard skimmingâ€. Si bloqueas las transacciones con banda magnÃ©tica, estarÃ¡s a salvo de este peligro.Â¿CÃ³mo puedo bloquear y desbloquear las transacciones con banda magnÃ©tica?Para bloquear las transacciones con banda magnÃ©tica, debes hacer lo siguiente:Â Ve a Tarjetas.Â Si tienes varias tarjetas, desliza a la derecha hasta que encuentres la tarjeta que quieras.Pulsa ConfiguraciÃ³n.Pulsa Banda magnÃ©ticaCambia la opciÃ³n Activar banda magnÃ©tica.Â En esta misma opciÃ³n tambiÃ©n puedes volver a desbloquear la banda magnÃ©tica. Los cambios que lleves a cabo se aplicarÃ¡n de inmediato a la tarjeta que hayas escogido.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content: YourÂ N26 You (new tab)Â andÂ N26 Metal (new tab)Â membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: How to block my N26 card?
content: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go toÂ the Cards tabÂ and selectÂ Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself againstÂ unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: How to upgrade to N26 You?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 YouÂ during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's (new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. If you upgrade to N26 You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.Â Â Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rulesÂ As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.Â Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.Â Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.Â For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating â€œpermanent homeâ€ as a stronger form of attachment than â€œtemporary residenceâ€). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification numberÂ Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each countryâ€™s tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.Â Â The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authoritiesÂ As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.Â Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.Â We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.Â Our recommendationÂ Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.Â We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick â€œAdd new tax countryâ€, indicate whether youâ€™re a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if youâ€™re tax resident in more than one country), click â€œAdd new tax countryâ€ and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.Weâ€™re unable to advise you on your tax status. If youâ€™re unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.Â

title: Â¿CuÃ¡nto cuesta obtener una tarjeta de sustituciÃ³n de mi tarjeta que caduca o ha caducado?
content: Las tarjetas de sustituciÃ³n son gratuitas para todos los clientes de Smart, You o Metal.Si abriste tu cuenta antes de las siguientes fechas, tanto la nueva tarjeta nueva como el envÃ­o a tu direcciÃ³n son gratuitos en los paÃ­ses en los que N26 estÃ¡ disponible (pestaÃ±a nueva):16/02/2021(Clientes con domicilio legal en la Gran Europa)25/02/2021 (Clientes con domicilio legal en Italia o EspaÃ±a)11/03/2021 (Clientes con domicilio legal en Francia)18/03/2021 (clientes con domicilio legal en Alemania, Austria o Suiza);Si tu cuenta se creÃ³ despuÃ©s, tu tarjeta de sustituciÃ³n costarÃ¡ lo mismo que pedir una nueva tarjeta.Si actualmente resides en un paÃ­s no aceptado por N26, ponte en contacto con nuestro Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente por chat o por telÃ©fono para que podamos realizar el pedido por ti. El envÃ­o fuera de estos paÃ­ses (pestaÃ±a nueva) puede conllevar un coste adicional.Â Â¿CuÃ¡nto tardarÃ¡?Todas las tarjetas de sustituciÃ³n de tarjetas que caducan o han caducado se envÃ­an mediante un envÃ­o estÃ¡ndar. Tarda hasta 15 dÃ­as hÃ¡biles y es gratuito. En zonas rurales o de difÃ­cil acceso puede tardar mÃ¡s. Para conocer las actualizaciones en el progreso de la entrega, solo tienes que ir a la pantalla de inicio de la app del mÃ³vil de N26.Mi tarjeta caduca pronto, Â¿quÃ© debo hacer?Â¿Puedo seguir utilizando mi tarjeta cuando haya caducado?Mi tarjeta ya ha caducado, pero no he recibido una nueva

title: Â¿Por quÃ© me han cobrado mÃ¡s de lo esperado?
content: Todas las transacciones se hacen en tiempo real. Te avisaremos cada vez que haya una transacciÃ³n entrante o saliente mediante una notificaciÃ³n push.En ocasiones, una transacciÃ³n puede resultar sospechosa debido a que la cantidad final es diferente a la cantidad original. Esto puede deberse a varias razones:Un comerciante puede bloquear una cantidad superior a la del precio del servicio a modo de depÃ³sito (ocurre a menudo en las estaciones de servicio, con el alquiler de vehÃ­culos o con reservas de hotel). La diferencia entre el depÃ³sito y el precio del servicio se ingresarÃ¡ en tu cuenta cuando pase la fecha de vencimiento.Los tipos de cambio pueden dar lugar a ligeras variaciones en las transacciones en moneda extranjera.En ambos casos, no cobramos ningÃºn interÃ©s por la diferencia de las cuantÃ­as. Pero da por sentado que si una transacciÃ³n no se ha autorizado por ti, el propietario de la cuenta, te ayudaremos aÂ recuperar tu dinero.

title: Â¿Por quÃ© tengo que enviar mÃ¡s documentos?
content: Cuando hayas iniciado el proceso de verificaciÃ³n para abrir tu cuenta bancaria N26 y recibas un email que te pida informaciÃ³n adicional para continuar con tu registro, lee la siguiente informaciÃ³n que te ayudarÃ¡ con la solicitud.N26 es un banco regulado y, en determinadas circunstancias, puede que necesitemos informaciÃ³n adicional de nuestros clientes para continuar con el registro. Lo que te solicitamos es un procedimiento estÃ¡ndar que se ajusta a los requisitos legales y reglamentarios. Necesitamos que nos proporciones documentos especÃ­ficos para abrir una cuenta bancaria en N26.Somos conscientes de que esta informaciÃ³n es muy personal y la informaciÃ³n que nos envÃ­es se mantendrÃ¡ estrictamente confidencial. Y solo se utilizarÃ¡ para cumplir con nuestras obligaciones legales.Â¿QuÃ© documentos tengo que enviar?Cuando inicies el proceso de verificaciÃ³n y recibas un email que te solicita mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n, tendrÃ¡s que responder al email que recibiste con la siguiente informaciÃ³n. Te informamos de que solo tienes que enviar los documentos que enumeramos en el email. A continuaciÃ³n, te ofrecemos una lista de lo que te pedimos:Justificante de residencia: Ejemplo: Factura de gas, agua o luz (de menos de 3 meses de antigÃ¼edad). O certificado de registro.Justificante salarial: Ejemplo: Contrato laboral, nÃ³mina o declaraciÃ³n de bienes y rentas (si nos envÃ­as uno de estos dos Ãºltimos, te rogamos que taches los datos relativos a tu confesiÃ³n religiosa y tu estado civil si aparecen en ellos)Motivo por el que resides en el paÃ­s X: Ejemplo: DocumentaciÃ³n de visado, justificante de estudios, fuente de riqueza:Ejemplo: Contratos, extractos bancarios, informaciÃ³n relativa a la venta de bienes, ganancias patrimoniales o herenciasÂ¿CÃ³mo puedo enviaros esta informaciÃ³n?Te informamos de que nuestro sistema estÃ¡ diseÃ±ado por defecto para proteger la entrega de correos electrÃ³nicos mediante cifrado TLS o una conexiÃ³n superior. Es decir, que si tu servidor de correo electrÃ³nico acepta el cifrado TLS entrante o una conexiÃ³n superior, los emails que intercambies con nosotros se cifrarÃ¡n a travÃ©s de la red (de extremo a extremo). Si tu servidor de correo electrÃ³nico no admite el cifrado TLS o una conexiÃ³n superior, puede que el email que nos envÃ­es no estÃ© cifrado, por lo que te recomendamos que utilices la opciÃ³n de envÃ­o postal fÃ­sico, que es una forma mÃ¡s segura de intercambiar informaciÃ³n, a la siguiente direcciÃ³n: N26 GmbH, Sign-up document, KlosterstraÃŸe 62, 10179 Berlin.Si escoges el envÃ­o por email, consulta las instrucciones que se te indican en el email que has recibido a este respecto.Â Si decides responder por email, te rogamos que envÃ­es copias escaneadas, fotografÃ­as y/o capturas de pantalla, con una descripciÃ³n detallada de cada documento. Todo debe ser claro, legible y no superar los 15 MB en total.RecibirÃ¡s tu respuesta durante los prÃ³ximos 3 dÃ­as laborables.Importante: Enviar informaciÃ³n falsa y/o inexacta es un delito. Si lo haces, no podremos aceptar tu solicitud.

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using onlyÂ  your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?Â When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?Â Â First, youâ€™ll need to update your phoneâ€™s operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If youâ€™re unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you donâ€™t have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.What if I canâ€™t remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If youâ€™ve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, youâ€™ll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code youâ€™ve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or canâ€™t receive SMS for other reasons?If you donâ€™t have access to your registered phone number â€“ either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen â€“ please contact our customer service via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.Why canâ€™t I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesnâ€™t support the latest app version, you wonâ€™t be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which weâ€™ll send to your account's registered phone number.Youâ€™ll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box â€œAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.â€All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, youâ€™ll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,Â e.g.Â MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions withoutÂ typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visibleÂ enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 usersÂ selected from your contact list.

title: Why do I pay the church tax?
content: Weâ€™re legally required to request data relating to church tax deductions and to make the deductions where applicable. This happens every year from September 1st to October 31st.Youâ€™re entitled to appeal against the passing of information about your religious affiliation through anÂ ErklÃ¤rung zum Sperrvermerk (new tab)Â form. You can do this before June 30th each year. If you file an objection, your local tax office will request that you submit a church tax declaration yourself.Further information is available on the website of theÂ German Federal Central Office for Taxation (new tab).

title: Â¿QuÃ© es el phishing?
content:
El phishing es una herramienta sencilla y eficaz que los hackers emplean para engaÃ±ar a la gente y conseguir que les envÃ­en informaciÃ³n personal confidencial. Una vez que se hacen con ella, la utilizan para cometer distintos tipos de fraudes haciÃ©ndose pasar por sus vÃ­ctimas. Si quieres saber mÃ¡s,lee la entrada de nuestro blog sobre cÃ³mo reconocer y evitar los ataques de phishing (pestaÃ±a nueva). (pestaÃ±a nueva)CÃ³mo denunciar emails y mensajes sospechososN26 nunca te enviarÃ¡ mensajes de texto ni emails que contengan advertencias con un tiempo limitado para que inicies sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta y compartas informaciÃ³n confidencial. Nunca te enviaremos un ultimÃ¡tum ni te pediremos que te identifiques ni que verifiques tus datos fuera de nuestros canales de comunicaciÃ³n seguros.Emails sospechososSi recibes un email sospechoso, no hagas clic en ningÃºn enlace ni descargues el contenido del mensaje. Para poder investigar el caso, te pedimos que:ReenvÃ­es el email sospechoso a nuestra direcciÃ³n de correo support@n26.com;Si puedes, guarda el email sospechoso como un archivo .eml y envÃ­anoslo. La mayorÃ­a de proveedores de correo electrÃ³nico guardan los emails con este formato cuando te los descargas. Si nos envÃ­as el mensaje en este formato, podremos localizar el verdadero origen del mensaje sospechoso para denunciarlo a las autoridades pertinentes. Si no consigues guardar el email en este formato, no pasa nada. Puedes limitarte a reenviar el email sospechoso a la direcciÃ³n de correo antes mencionada.Â No nos envÃ­es capturas de pantalla, por favor, ya que no podemos utilizar esa informaciÃ³n. Por Ãºltimo, borra el correo de tu bandeja de entrada.Mensajes de texto sospechososSi recibes un mensaje de texto sospechoso, no hagas clic en ningÃºn enlace ni facilites ningÃºn tipo de informaciÃ³n.Para poder investigar el asunto, te pedimos que hagas lo siguiente:Â Haz una captura del mensaje recibido y envÃ­ala a support@n26.com.AsegÃºrate de que se vea el mensaje completo, incluido el nÃºmero de telÃ©fono desde donde se ha enviado el mensaje y la fecha y hora.Cuando te confirmemos que has recibido un SMS phishing, bloquea el nÃºmero que te lo ha enviado.Por Ãºltimo, borra el mensaje del mÃ³vil.Â Llamadas telefÃ³nicas sospechosas
Si recibes una llamada sospechosa, provenga o no de uno de nuestros nÃºmeros de telÃ©fono, no proporciones datos personales ni relativos a tu cuenta ni a la tarjeta asociada a la misma. Te recordamos que, en algunos casos, con la tÃ©cnica de Â«falseamiento del telÃ©fonoÂ», los estafadores pueden modificar el nÃºmero de telÃ©fono del remitente para que parezca idÃ©ntico al del banco.Por este motivo, si sospechas que has sido vÃ­ctima de una estafa telefÃ³nica o has proporcionado tus datos personales, contacta inmediatamente con el Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente a travÃ©s de support@n26.com.CÃ³mo denunciar un sitio web falsoPuede que en algÃºn momento te topes con un sitio web ilegal en el que se anuncien servicios de N26 de forma fraudulenta. TambiÃ©n puede que veas nuestro logo en webs supuestamente afiliadas. Puede que ofrezcan prÃ©stamos, promociones u ofertas de tiempo limitado. Ten en cuenta que el hecho de que Â«N26Â» aparezca en la URL del sitio web en cuestiÃ³n no significa que dicha web sea legÃ­tima.Si tienes la sospecha de estar en un sitio web fraudulento, te sugerimos que te tomes un momento para hacer lo siguiente:Comprueba la barra de direcciones y asegÃºrate de que en la URL aparezca lo siguiente: https://app.n26.com/login. Si no es el caso, copia la URL y denÃºnciala inmediatamente a support@n26.com.Â

title: Â¿CÃ³mo usar Bizum en N26?
content: Bizum es una plataforma de pagos integrada en la app de N26 que conecta tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono con tu cuenta bancaria y permite enviar y recibir dinero al instante entre clientes de diferentes bancos, utilizando Ãºnicamente el nÃºmero de telÃ©fono del destinatario.Â Con Bizum tambiÃ©n puedes solicitar dinero a alguien, enviando notificaciones a quien serÃ¡ el remitente. Una vez que acepte tu solicitud, recibirÃ¡s el dinero de forma inmediata.Requisitos para usar Bizum con tu cuenta N26:Tener un IBAN (pestaÃ±a nueva) espaÃ±ol (ES)Tener acceso al nÃºmero de telÃ©fono registrado en tu cuenta bancaria (pestaÃ±a nueva). Recuerda siempre mantener tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono actualizado.Â Tener tu smartphone vinculado a la app N26 (pestaÃ±a nueva). Â¿CÃ³mo activar BIZUM en N26?Â¡Es muy fÃ¡cil! Tienes que ir a la pantalla de Inicio de la app y pulsar en Â«Enviar dineroÂ» , luego haz click en Â«EmpezarÂ». TendrÃ¡s que confirmar tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono y luego habrÃ¡s completado el registro.Â Â¿QuÃ© hacer si no es posible completar el registro en Bizum porque el nÃºmero de telÃ©fono ya estÃ¡ siendo usado en otra cuenta?Esto puede suceder por diversos motivos, te recomendamos:Â Verificar que tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono estÃ© actualizado en N26.Ten en cuenta que, hasta el momento, solo es posible tener Bizum vinculado a una Ãºnica cuenta bancaria. Por lo tanto, si ya lo estÃ¡s usando en otra cuenta, tendrÃ¡s que desvincularlo o seguir los pasos de Portabilidad que explicamos mÃ¡s abajo para usar Bizum con N26.Si tu situaciÃ³n no es ninguna de las dos anteriormente mencionadas, te recomendamos que contactes con nuestro Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al cliente desde la app para mayor asistencia. Portabilidad: Â¿CÃ³mo traer tu cuenta de Bizum a N26 desde otro banco?Durante la activaciÃ³n de Bizum en N26, despuÃ©s de ingresar tus datos personales, la app identificarÃ¡ si ya estÃ¡s registrado en Bizum con otro Banco. Para poder activarlo en N26, tendrÃ¡s que introducir un cÃ³digo que te enviaremos por SMS.Â Â¿CÃ³mo funciona Bizum?Â Ve a la pantalla de Inicio y pulsa en Â«Enviar dineroÂ» o Â«Recibir dineroÂ», segÃºn lo que quieras hacer, selecciona la opciÃ³n Â«BizumÂ», introduce el telÃ©fono de tu contacto y la cantidad que quieras enviar o solicitar, Â¡y ya estÃ¡! El dinero enviado llegarÃ¡ al instante, y el solicitado, cuando se acepte la notificaciÃ³n.LÃ­mites:Â Â¿CuÃ¡ntas transacciones de Bizum puedes hacer?Â Cada cliente puede recibir un mÃ¡ximo de 60 transferencias por Bizum al mes y realizar tantos envÃ­os como quiera.Â¿CuÃ¡nto dinero se puede enviar a travÃ©s de Bizum?Â Los lÃ­mites de Bizum (pestaÃ±a nueva) son lo siguientes:El importeÂ  de cada transacciÃ³n puede ser desde 0,50 â‚¬ hasta 500 â‚¬Â Se pueden enviar o recibir hasta un mÃ¡ximo de 2.000 â‚¬ al dÃ­aSe puede enviar un mÃ¡ximo de 5.000 â‚¬ y recibir un mÃ¡ximo de 60.000 â‚¬ al mesÂ¿CÃ³mo desactivar Bizum en N26?Tienes que acceder desde la app N26 a la secciÃ³n de Â«Mi cuentaÂ» , luego hacer pulsar en Â«ConfiguraciÃ³n de BizumÂ», y por Ãºltimo en Â«DesactivarÂ». NecesitarÃ¡s el PIN de confirmaciÃ³n para completar este procedimiento.Â Â¿QuÃ© hacer si cambio mi nÃºmero de telÃ©fono?Â Primero serÃ¡ necesario que actualices tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono (pestaÃ±a nueva) desde la app N26.Â Luego, si ya habÃ­as completado el registro en Bizum, tendrÃ¡s que desactivarlo tal como mencionamos en el apartado anterior y volver a registrarte. De esta forma, el sistema actualizarÃ¡ tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono tambiÃ©n en Bizum.Â

title: How to open my N26 account?
content: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, youâ€™ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you donâ€™t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

title: Â¿Por quÃ© mi cuenta estÃ¡ bloqueada temporalmente?
content: Conforme a la legislaciÃ³n bancaria europea, N26 debe llevar a cabo inspecciones tÃ©cnicas rutinarias de las cuentas de sus clientes. Como entidad regulada, eso nos ayuda a garantizar que el dinero de tu cuenta de N26 estÃ¡ seguro y protegido.La mayorÃ­a de las veces, estas inspecciones son muy rÃ¡pidas y tÃº no te das cuenta de que se realizan. A veces pueden requerir mÃ¡s tiempo, durante el cual el acceso a tu cuenta puede estar bloqueado.Un equipo especializado en inspecciones tÃ©cnicas de este tipo supervisa el proceso y trabaja lo mÃ¡s rÃ¡pido posible para minimizar las interrupciones. Por ese motivo, nuestro equipo deAtenciÃ³n al Cliente no podrÃ¡ proporcionarte mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre tu cuenta a travÃ©s del chat ni acelerar el proceso.Te pedimos un poco de paciencia mientras finalizamos el proceso. Nuestro equipo contactarÃ¡ contigo cuando finalice la inspecciÃ³n tÃ©cnica.

title: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
content: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you donâ€™t recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?Â Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.Â Â N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchantâ€™s part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didnâ€™t receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26Â You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.Â Go to the â€˜Homeâ€™ tab, and select the transaction you want to disputeÂ Tap â€˜Get help with this transactionâ€™ and follow the steps provided.Â Important:Â If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, youâ€™ll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. Youâ€™ll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.Â Â If you select a transaction but the â€˜Get helpâ€™ button doesnâ€™t appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, youâ€™ll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If youâ€™ve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, youâ€™ll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, weâ€™ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

title: Wie erstelle und verwalte ich DauerauftrÃ¤ge?
content: Wenn du in der App oder im Online Banking eine Ãœberweisung einrichtest, hast du die Option, daraus einen Dauerauftrag zu machen.Bevor du die Ãœberweisung fertig machst, kannst du ein HÃ¤kchen bei einer Box setzen, um die Ãœberweisung als Dauerauftrag zu merken. ZunÃ¤chst gibst du den EmpfÃ¤nger, den Betrag und den Verwendungszweck ein. Setze im nÃ¤chsten Schritt das HÃ¤kchen bei: â€œAls Dauerauftrag merken?â€. Nun kannst du Start- und Enddatum und das Zahlungsintervall fÃ¼r deinen Dauerauftrag festlegen.So kannst du deine bestehenden DauerauftrÃ¤ge in der App sehen und verwalten:Gehe zur Umsatzliste (Startbildschirm).Wenn du ein iPhone benutzt, tippe auf die drei Punkte Ã¼ber deiner Umsatzliste. Wenn du Android verwendest, tippe auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand.Ein blaues Fenster Ã¶ffnet sich, in dem du "DauerauftrÃ¤ge" auswÃ¤hlen kannst.Hier kannst du deine DauerauftrÃ¤ge lÃ¶schen oder verÃ¤ndern. Um einen Dauerauftrag zu lÃ¶schen, tippe auf den gewÃ¼nschten Dauerauftrag und dann oben rechts auf das Papierkorb-Icon.â„¹ï¸ Hinweis: Wenn ein Dauerauftrag aufgrund mangelnder Kontodeckung nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt werden konnte, versuchen wir nicht, ihn erneut auszufÃ¼hren. Du kannst die Ãœberweisung dann manuell wiederholen. Der nÃ¤chste Termin des Dauerauftrags bleibt aber bestehen.

title: What are N26 Installments?
content: Eligibility requirements: N26 Installments is currently only available for customers whoâ€™ve opened their account in Germany and Spain.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction after it has been made into 3 to 6 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks. Giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.Unlike most installment products that function at point of sale, N26 Installments provides you with flexibility by allowing you to split the transaction directly in the N26 app, for any eligible transaction.N26 Installments CharacteristicsN26 Installments has the following characteristics, please note rates are dependent on your financial situation. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing from.Effective Annual interest rate: From 7.49% - 11.99% (financial situation dependent)Actual Effective cost of 3-6 month installments loan: from 1.87% to 6%. Example:If you split an eligible purchase of â‚¬100 into 3 monthly installments with an annual interest rate of 7.49%, your actual effective cost will be much lowerâ€”at 1.87%. That means you'll only be charged â‚¬1.87 interest to split that purchase with N26 Installments. And if you opt for a 6 month repayment period, the actual effective cost will be 3.75%, meaning that youâ€™ll only pay â‚¬3.75 on your installment loans.Eligible purchase amount: â‚¬20 - â‚¬1000Installments duration: Between 3 to 6 monthsMerchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!How to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the â€˜Exploreâ€™ tab and tap on N26 Installments under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting â€˜Optionsâ€™ (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™When you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™:First you will be provided with information about â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™ Then you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept both checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, youâ€™ll be reimbursed for the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. Weâ€™ll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (youâ€™ll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in fullAdditional Info:Split several purchases: You can split several past purchases, as long as their total combined amounts (and total sum of unpaid installments) are within the credit limit between â‚¬20 and â‚¬1000.Missed a payment? Weâ€™ll send you a reminder if you have any outstanding payments, and weâ€™ll also try to charge the outstanding payment again on the next day after the missed payment date. You can manually pay back your installments by tapping on â€˜Missed paymentsâ€™ in the N26 Installments section of your N26 app.Late fees: There are no late payment fees, and youâ€™ll only be charged interest on your installments payment.Pay your N26 Installments at any time: Simply head to the N26 Installments section in your N26 app, select the purchase, and tap on â€˜Repay full amountâ€™ to fully pay off the amount. There are no early repayment feesWhat happens if I donâ€™t pay my installments back? Youâ€™ll receive info cards and Secure Inbox reminders. Weâ€™ll retry to charge the missed payment until day 104. After that, weâ€™ll write-off the loan and hand over the debt to a collection agency. Schufa will also be informed.Why canâ€™t I see this offer in my app?N26 Installments is currently only available for customers whoâ€™ve opened their account in Germany and in the event of a specific amount of transactions within the last few months. If youâ€™re eligible, youâ€™ll find the product under your â€˜Exploreâ€™ tab in the N26 app. If not, please keep using your N26 account and check again in a few months to see if youâ€™re eligible.If you find N26 Installments in your app but can't see any purchases to split, your transactions in the 4 weeks might not meet the eligibility criteria to use the feature.How do we decide on your N26 Installments request and N26 Credit request?In order to swiftly and efficiently decide on your request for N26 Installments we evaluate your creditworthiness. In order to evaluate your creditworthiness, we generate an internal credit score. Within the scoring process we calculate how probable it is that you as a customer meet your payment obligations. For such calculations we process personal data such as credit agenciesâ€™ information and, in case of N26 Installment also your salary, your expenses, existing obligations, your job, duration of employment, experiences of former contractual relations, repayment of former credits as agreed upon. Your scoring is the result of a mathematical-statistical procedure. Based on the data processed and the respective outcome of the internal scoring process, we determine whether we may offer you a N26 Account or N26 Installments and establish the conditions we can offer you for those products. Therefore, our scoring process is necessary to offer you an account with us (Payment services framework agreement - N26 Account) and to manage the offer of our credit contracts to you (as N26 Installments) according to Art. 22 (2) (a) GDPR. This information should already be helping you to understand the mathematically and statistically validated decision making process we offer to swiftly and efficiently perform and reply to your request for N26 Installments. You can get in touch with us here and explain why you think that we may have not yet sufficiently considered your point of view in our decision and why we should take further necessary information into account.After you get in touch with us regarding the respective automated decision, the decision will be reviewed by one of our employees. However, this does not guarantee a different decision by N26.

title: Where is my refund?
content:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.Â For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

title: How to get a loan?
content: Applies to Germany and FranceWith N26 Credit, weâ€™ve partnered with auxmoney (in Germany) and Younited Credit (in France) to offer personal loans between â‚¬1.000 to â‚¬50.000 with repayment terms of 6 to 84 months.For Younited Credit, you will receive a referral link that will take you from the app to continue the process with Younited.Request a loan at any time directly in the app into the Explore section then N26 Financial Products : Weâ€™ll ask you a few questions about the loan and your creditworthiness (youâ€™ll need to provide additional online banking information for your main account if youâ€™ve used N26 for less than 6 months).Prove your identity: Weâ€™ll need to see your ID card or passport in Germany and possibly your proof of residence (in the form of a utility bill or similar). And if youâ€™re a non-EU citizen, youâ€™ll need to send us a photo of your residency permit.Edit your answers during the application process: Once youâ€™re happy with your loan application, send it to us in real-time and weâ€™ll make you a binding offer that you can delete or accept. Otherwise applications expire in 90 days and you wonâ€™t be able to request another loan during that time.Confirm your loan: If you accept our offer, youâ€™ll either have to sign the contract electronically through a video call or confirm via SMS message.Receive a push message as soon as the payment has been made: In Germany, the loan amount will be credited to your N26 account within 5-7 working days. In France, payouts take a week.We offer interest rates between 1.99% and 19% p.a. Apart from the interest, there are no other charges. However, if youÂ change your planÂ or are in default of your monthly payments, additional fees may apply.For more information, see the N26 CreditÂ T&Cs (new tab).

title: Du bist Opfer eines Betrugs geworden? Kontaktiere uns.
content:
Du hast per BankÃ¼berweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen BetrÃ¼ger Ã¼berwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.Â Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlieÃŸlich fÃ¼r die oben beschriebenen FÃ¤lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vortÃ¤uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du N26 Kunde bist und eine autorisierte oder unautorisierte Kartenzahlung in deiner Transaktionshistorie reklamieren willst, nutze bitte unseren dafÃ¼r vorgesehenen vollumfÃ¤nglichen Service in der App! Die obige Hotline hilft ausschlieÃŸlich bei BankÃ¼berweisungen an ein verdÃ¤chtiges Konto mit einer N26 IBAN.Hast du eine SMS mit einem verdÃ¤chtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link Ã¶ffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empfÃ¤ngst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu Ã¶ffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab)Â Die geÃ¶ffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie auÃŸerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, fÃ¼r N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verdÃ¤chtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zusÃ¤tzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu bestÃ¤tigen. BestÃ¤tige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der ZahlungsempfÃ¤nger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verdÃ¤chtigen Link geÃ¶ffnet habe?Ã„ndere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zunÃ¤chst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort Ã¤ndern. Alternativ kannst du im Loginâ€“Bildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den nÃ¤chsten Schritten.Falls du persÃ¶nliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto geschÃ¼tzt bleibt. Bitte schicke auÃŸerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (neuen Tab) (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung oder sogar eine autorisierte Zahlung anfechten willst, die du mit deiner N26 Mastercard gemacht hast, kannst du dein Geld zurÃ¼ckbekommen. Erfahre Schritt-fÃ¼r-Schritt, wie du eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren (neuen Tab) kannst.Was tun bei einer unautorisierten Zahlung?Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung in deinem Konto hast, musst du eine neue Karte bestellen, damit dein Konto sicher bleibt und um weitere unautorisierte Zahlungen zu verhindern. Logge dich in die N26 App ein, und gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Neue Karte bestellen. WÃ¤hle dabei Verloren oder Gestohlen, je nachdem was zutrifft. Wenn die Karte die ganze Zeit in deinem Besitz war, musst du noch mal bestÃ¤tigen, dass du die Zahlung nicht selbst gemacht hast. Falls nÃ¶tig, melde den Fall auch bei der Polizei. Folge diesen Schritten, um die Zahlung zu reklamieren.Wie schÃ¼tze ich mein Konto vor BetrugHier sind einige Tipps, wie du dich vor Betrug schÃ¼tzen kannst:Nutze ausschlieÃŸlich Geldautomaten von vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen BankenKaufe online nur bei vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen Shops und WebseitenÃ„ndere regelmÃ¤ÃŸig deine Online-PasswÃ¶rter und PINsVertraue keinen Nachrichten oder E-Mails, die vorgeben von N26 zu sein und dich auffordern, deine Kartennummer oder Kontodaten zu teilen, oder die verdÃ¤chtige Links enthaltenN26 wird dich auÃŸerhalb der N26 App oder Web App nie nach deiner Kartennummer oder Kontodaten fragenÃ„ndere deine Karteneinstellungen in der N26 App. Deaktiviere z.B. Online-Zahlungen, Auslandszahlungen, Bargeldabhebungen oder passe deine Zahlungslimits an dein normales Kaufverhalten an.Vermeide Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen, wenn mÃ¶glich. Stattdessen empfiehlt sich die Zahlung per Chip und PIN oder per digitales Wallet.Â Bewahre dein Karte immer in einem sicheren Ort auf
NÃ¼tzliche Links:Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintrÃ¤chtigt wurde?Was ist Phishing?

title: Â¿QuÃ© hago si pierdo la tarjeta o si mis datos se han visto expuestos?
content: Si pierdes la tarjeta o sospechas que tus datos pueden estar expuestos, puedes bloquear y desbloquear tu tarjeta (pestaÃ±a nueva) en cualquier momento a travÃ©s de la app de N26.Bloquea la tarjeta temporalmente o desactÃ­vala de forma permanente (dependiendo del caso) y pide una nueva (pestaÃ±a nueva)en la app de N26 o en la web app.Si los datos de tu tarjeta estÃ¡n expuestos, sigue estos pasos:Ve a la pestaÃ±a Â«TarjetasÂ»Pulsa Â«Ajustes de la tarjetaÂ»Desliza hacia la derecha hasta que veas la tarjeta que quieres desactivar o bloquear temporalmente.Por Ãºltimo, si deseas bloquear la tarjeta de manera definitiva, selecciona Â«Pedir una nueva tarjetaÂ»AsÃ­ estarÃ¡s seguro de que solo tÃº tienes el control de tu tarjeta y evitarÃ¡s transacciones no autorizadas. (pestaÃ±a nueva)Te aconsejamos que bloquees tu tarjeta de inmediato si detectas algo sospechoso. Siempre estÃ¡s a tiempo de desbloquearla despuÃ©s.

title: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
content: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChooseÂ RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

title: Â¿QuÃ© hacer si mi cuenta pudiera verse comprometida?
content:
Si crees que tu cuenta puede estar en peligro, primero cambia tu contraseÃ±a; despuÃ©s, hay varias medidas que puedes tomar en funciÃ³n de la situaciÃ³n:Â¿QuÃ© hago si detecto una transacciÃ³n sospechosa en mi cuenta?Si adviertes una transacciÃ³n sospechosa, consulta nuestro artÃ­culo sobre Â¿CÃ³mo disputar una transacciÃ³n?DespuÃ©s ponte en contacto con el equipo de atenciÃ³n al cliente de inmediato, ya sea directamente en la app de N26 o por email a support@n26.com (pestaÃ±a nueva).Si prefieres hablar por telÃ©fono, puedes pedÃ­rnoslo en el chat. Organizaremos una llamada a tu nÃºmero con un margen de una hora para que podamos hablar detenidamente sobre el tema. Cuando ya estÃ©s en contacto con uno de nuestros agentes, explÃ­cale a fondo la situaciÃ³n; cada detalle cuenta.
Te aseguramos que vamos a tomar todas las medidas necesarias para asistirte en esta situaciÃ³n.AdemÃ¡s de nuestras obligaciones legales para la prevenciÃ³n del fraude y con miras a mejorar continuamente nuestras defensas de seguridad, contamos con un equipo especializado que analiza cada caso de fraude individualmente. Los casos de fraude en sÃ­ suelen ser relativamente complicados y requieren un trato detallado. SegÃºn la complejidad del caso, puede tomar desde un par de dÃ­as hasta varias semanas.Por Ãºltimo, si tienes pruebas o fuertes sospechas de que han podido hackear tu cuenta, te recomendamos que tambiÃ©n pongas una denuncia en la policÃ­a.Â¿QuÃ© hago si pierdo la tarjeta o si creo que los datos de mi tarjeta estÃ¡n expuestos?Si pierdes tu tarjeta de N26, te la roban o crees que los datos de tu tarjeta estÃ¡n expuestos, bloquea la tarjeta inmediatamente en la app de N26 y pide una nueva para mantener tu dinero a salvo.Â¿QuÃ© pasa si pierdo mi dispositivo vinculado? Â¿Otras personas podrÃ¡n acceder a mi cuenta?Si pierdes o te roban el dispositivo vinculado a tu cuenta, no te preocupes, porque solo se puede acceder a la app de N26 introduciendo la contraseÃ±a correcta, tu huella digital o tu reconocimiento facial. Nuestro equipo de atenciÃ³n al cliente te ayudarÃ¡ a vincular un nuevo dispositivo a tu cuenta N26 cuando lo tengas.Â¿Se te ocurre algo que pueda mejorar la seguridad en N26?Para mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre cÃ³mo protegemos tu cuenta en caso de fraude, visita nuestro artÃ­culo del blog (pestaÃ±a nueva). Echa un vistazo tambiÃ©n a nuestra pÃ¡gina sobre la Seguridad en N26 (pestaÃ±a nueva) para ver nuestro compromiso por proteger tu dinero y tu cuenta.Nuestras lÃ­neas estÃ¡n abiertas todos los dÃ­as de 07:00 a 23:00, domingos y festivos incluidos.Si no tienes acceso a la app de tu mÃ³vil ni a la WebApp, tambiÃ©n puedes pedir que bloqueemos tu tarjeta o tu cuenta llamando al +34 910 480 660.

title: Chargeback: cos'Ã¨ e come contestare una transazione con carta
content: Nel tuo estratto conto mensile di N26 câ€™Ã¨ una transazione che non hai mai effettuato? Hai ordinato online qualcosa che non Ã¨ mai arrivato? Hai effettuato un prelievo ATM e non sono state erogate le banconote richieste? Non preoccuparti, questo articolo ti aiuterÃ  a capire come risolvere la questione.Cos'Ã¨ il chargeback?Per chargeback si intende il rimborso di un pagamento effettuato con carta relativo a una transazione erronea da parte dell'esercente. L'importo addebitato viene rimborsato non appena la controversia Ã¨ stata risolta a favore di chi ha effettuato il pagamento.N26 offre un servizio di chargeback tramite Mastercard che ti permette di contestare transazioni che non hai effettuato o per le quali qualcosa Ã¨ andato storto con l'esercente. Ad esempio, se hai ordinato dei prodotti online ma non li hai ricevuti nella data prevista, potresti avere diritto ad una procedura di chargeback e richiedere il rimborso dei tuoi soldi.Come contestare una transazione con N26?Puoi contestare una transazione dalla tua app N26 o tramite N26 Web.Vai alla schermata principale e seleziona la transazione che desideri contestare.DopodichÃ© seleziona Chiedi aiuto per questa transazione.Â Importante:Â Se la tua controversia Ã¨ legata a una transazione non autorizzata, dovrai prima bloccare e riordinare la tua carta per prevenire ulteriori frodi, poi potremo procedere con la tua richiesta. Potrai riordinare la tua carta e bloccare quella vecchia direttamente dall'app.Se selezioni una transazione ma non sei in grado di visualizzare il pulsante di Aiuto, significa che la transazione Ã¨ ancora in fase di preautorizzazione senza essere un addebito. Leggi questo articolo per saperne di piÃ¹ (nuova tabella).Â Â Solo nel caso in cui il tuo conto fosse giÃ  chiuso e non avessi piÃ¹ accesso all'app, ti preghiamo di contattare il Supporto Clienti all'indirizzo email collegato al tuo conto scrivendo a support@n26.com (nuova tabella).In questo articolo abbiamo preparato una serie di Domande frequenti sul chargeback (nuova tabella).

title: Â¿Por quÃ© hay una lista de espera para contratar una cuenta?
content: Para sentar unas bases aÃºn mÃ¡s sÃ³lidas de nuestro negocio en el futuro, trabajamos en la experiencia de nuestro servicio, las ofertas de productos y los procesos para convertirnos en un banco todavÃ­a mejor en los prÃ³ximos aÃ±os.Â Ante la abrumadora demanda de productos bancarios digitales de N26, vamos a limitar temporalmente el nÃºmero de nuevas cuentas bancarias que podemos ofrecer cada mes.Â Por ello, hemos tenido que interrumpir temporalmente la entrada de nuevos clientes en determinados mercados. Te animamos a que te inscribas en nuestra lista de espera y te contactaremos en cuanto podamos ofrecerte la cuenta que deseas contratar.Â¿Esta interrupciÃ³n afectarÃ¡ a los clientes actuales?Â Esta interrupciÃ³n temporal de las nuevas contrataciones no afectarÃ¡ a los clientes actuales de N26. Puedes esperar la misma experiencia bancaria digital de la que has disfrutado siempre en tu mÃ³vil: fluida, segura y protegida.Estamos trabajando para simplificar el proceso lo mÃ¡s rÃ¡pido posible para cualquiera que intente registrarse y esperamos poder abrir nuevas cuentas para todos los clientes muy prÃ³ximamente.Â¿CÃ³mo sabrÃ© cuÃ¡ndo puedo volver a abrir una cuenta?Si has intentado abrir una cuenta y no has podido hacerlo, la mejor forma de mantenerte informado/a es inscribirte en nuestra lista de espera. Te contactaremos en cuanto podamos ofrecerte la cuenta que desees.Como seguimos experimentando una enorme demanda de nuestros productos y queremos ofrecerles a todos los clientes de nuestra lista de espera un acceso equitativo a la experiencia bancaria de N26, les contactamos por orden de inscripciÃ³n en cuanto podamos ofrecerles una cuenta.Â Â¿Puedo abrir una cuenta N26 en mi paÃ­s?

title: Â¿Por quÃ© motivos podrÃ­an bloquear o cerrar mi cuenta de N26 y quÃ© puedo hacer al respecto?
content: â„¹ï¸ De ser necesario terminar la relaciÃ³n comercial (pestaÃ±a nueva), N26 se basarÃ¡ en lo establecido en el punto 13* de las Condiciones Generales Comerciales (pestaÃ±a nueva) que establecen el vÃ­nculo entre el cliente y el banco.Â Hay varias razones por las que N26 podrÃ­a bloquear o cerrar una cuenta. Estas se centran en parÃ¡metros operativos y decisiones de negocio basadas en polÃ­ticas de riesgo, asÃ­ como en el cumplimiento de obligaciones derivadas de las leyes; como las que previenen el blanqueo de capitales, la financiaciÃ³n del terrorismo, el fraude fiscal y el uso abusivo o fraudulento de la cuenta; por las que se podrÃ­a limitar el acceso a la cuenta y, en Ãºltima instancia, cerrarla.Entre otras circunstancias, las causas de cierre pueden ser:Â el uso inapropiado de la cuenta,Â el incumplimiento grave de alguno de los TÃ©rminos y Condiciones,Â cualquier comportamiento contrario a las normas generales de conducta previstas entre el cliente y el banco.Â TambiÃ©n se podrÃ­a limitar el acceso a la cuenta o a una parte de los fondos cuando nos veamos obligados a ello por parte de las autoridades competentes.Se ha limitado el acceso a mi cuenta, Â¿cÃ³mo puedo contactar con N26 al respecto?Para cumplir con todas las normas a las que estamos sujetos como entidad bancaria regulada, tenemos la obligaciÃ³n de realizar revisiones periÃ³dicas sobre algunas de las transacciones y cuentas de nuestros clientes. A veces, como resultado de estas revisiones podrÃ­amos limitar el acceso a tu cuenta de N26.Ten en cuenta que este proceso es totalmente legÃ­timo y busca garantizar la seguridad de nuestros clientes y sus cuentas. Si dicho proceso llegara a aplicarse, te enviarÃ­amos un email informÃ¡ndote de los pasos a seguir. Es normal que puedas tener preguntas y estamos aquÃ­ para ayudarte, por lo que es importante que te comuniques respondiendo directamente al email (pestaÃ±a nueva) en el que se te notifica del proceso, como te indicamos a continuaciÃ³n:Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu app N26.Ve a Mi cuenta > Ayuda > Mensajes de N26.Abre el mensaje en cuestiÃ³n y pulsa el botÃ³n Responder que hay al final del mensaje.Si ya no puedes acceder a tu cuenta, puedes responder directamente desde la bandeja de entrada de tu email.Me han notificado del cierre de mi cuenta, Â¿quÃ© hago?Si tienes consultas sobre el estado de tu cuenta o sobre los fondos restantes, ponte en contacto respondiendo directamente al email en el que se te notifica del cierre, siguiendo los pasos que acabamos de indicar.Te pedimos que tengas en cuenta que nuestros especialistas de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente no podrÃ¡n asistirte vÃ­a chat, ya que la informaciÃ³n que tienen al respecto es muy limitada porque, por motivos legales y de protecciÃ³n de datos, no podemos compartir cierta informaciÃ³n a travÃ©s del chat. Â * En caso de haber abierto la cuenta antes del 17/04/2019 y tener un IBAN que empieza por DE, la informaciÃ³n se establece en el punto 19 de las respectivas Condiciones Generales Comerciales (pestaÃ±a nueva).

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

content: Kein Problem, wir helfen wir gerne weiter!Â Wenn du deine Adresse bereits bestÃ¤tigt hast und seither mehr als 20 Tage vergangen sind, wende dich bitte an den Kundenservice. Dies kannst du im Support-Bereich der App erledigen.Â Wenn du deine Adresse noch nicht bestÃ¤tigt hast, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und suche nach einem Banner unter deiner abgelaufenen Karte. title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: How does N26 Business Smart work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs â‚¬4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Â¿Puedo abrir una cuenta N26 en mi paÃ­s?
content: Ofrecemos cuentas por todo el mundo: en EspaÃ±a, Alemania, Austria, Francia, Italia, Irlanda, los PaÃ­ses Bajos, BÃ©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Islandia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburgo, Noruega, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia y Suiza.Para sentar unas bases aÃºn mÃ¡s sÃ³lidas de nuestro negocio en el futuro, trabajamos en la experiencia de nuestro servicio, las ofertas de productos y los procesos.Ante la abrumadora demanda de productos bancarios digitales de N26, vamos a limitar temporalmente el nÃºmero de nuevas cuentas bancarias que podemos ofrecer cada mes.Â ACTUALIZACIÃ“N: 25 oct. 11:00Mercados abiertos para cuentas EstÃ¡ndar y Premium: Alemania, Austria, BÃ©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, EspaÃ±a, Francia, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburgo, Noruega, PaÃ­ses Bajos, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia & SuizaMercados abiertos solo para cuentas Premium: N/AMercado cerrado para todo tipo de cuentas: N/AMercados cerrados: ItaliaPuedes abrir tu cuenta si cumples con nuestrosÂ requisitos.
