Si ya tienes una cuenta abierta y te mudas a un paÃ­s en el que N26 no estÃ¡ disponible durante 18 meses o mÃ¡s, contacta con atenciÃ³n al cliente.

title: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
content:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing â€˜Direct Debitsâ€™: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you donâ€™t have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Spaceâ€™s IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your â€˜Spacesâ€™ section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the â€˜Space Settingsâ€™ and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' Â»Â Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' Â»Â Accept the T&C's Â»Â Enter your confirmation PIN Â»Â Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right â€˜cog iconâ€™)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on â€œSend moneyâ€Select â€œBank transferâ€Select the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

title: Wie erÃ¶ffne ich mein N26 Konto?
content: Du kannst ein N26 Konto in der App (auf deinem Smartphone) oder in derÂ WebApp (neuen Tab)Â erÃ¶ffnen, wenn du:mindestens 18 Jahre alt bistin einem unterstÃ¼tzten Land lebstein kompatibles Smartphone besitztein unterstÃ¼tztes Ausweisdokument hastnoch kein Konto bei uns hastdich in einer unserer unterstÃ¼tzten Sprachen verifizieren kannst (Deutsch, Englisch, Spanisch, FranzÃ¶sisch, Italienisch).So meldest du dich an:Nachdem du deine Email, persÃ¶nlichen Daten und die Lieferadresse bestÃ¤tigt hast, wÃ¤hle deinen gewÃ¼nschten Kontotypen aus. *Weise deine IdentitÃ¤t nach und verknÃ¼pfe dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto.Ab jetzt kannst du Ã¼ber SEPA oder FPS Ãœberweisungen dein Konto aufladen oder Ã¼ber CASH26 Bargeld auf dein Konto einzahlen (wenn du in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich oder Italien bist).Nach einigen Tagen erhÃ¤ltst du deine Mastercard per Post.Falls du noch mehr erfahren mÃ¶chtest, kontaktiere uns gerne.*Wenn deine BonitÃ¤t die Mindestanforderungen erfÃ¼llt, kannst du ein N26 Konto erÃ¶ffnen. Falls nicht, kÃ¶nnen wir dir mÃ¶glicherweise ein N26 Flex Konto (nur in Deutschland) anbieten. Diese Entscheidung wird automatisch berechnet. title: Â¿CÃ³mo crear un Espacio Compartido?
content:
Para crear un espacio compartido:Crea un espacio en la secciÃ³n Espacios.

title: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
content: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.Â With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as weâ€™re able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. Weâ€™re going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.Â Can I open an N26 account in my country?

title: PerchÃ© il mio conto Ã¨ temporaneamente bloccato?
content: In conformitÃ  con il quadro regolamentare europeo per le banche, N26 Ã¨ tenuta a effettuare controlli tecnici di routine sui conti dei suoi clienti. Essendo unâ€™istituzione regolamentata, questo fa sÃ¬ che i depositi contenuti sul tuo conto N26 siano al sicuro.La maggior parte delle volte questi controlli avvengono molto rapidamente, senza che tu possa vederli. A volte possono richiedere un tempo piÃ¹ lungo, durante il quale potresti temporaneamente non poter accedere al tuo conto.A supervisionare questo processo câ€™Ã¨ un team dedicato, specializzato nella conduzione di revisioni tecniche di questo tipo e che lavora diligentemente per ridurre al minimo qualsiasi interruzione. Per questo motivo, il Supporto Clienti di N26 non Ã¨ in grado di fornire ulteriori informazioni sul tuo conto tramiteÂ  chat o di accelerare il processo.Ti preghiamo di avere pazienza mentre completiamo questi passaggi. Il nostro team ti contatterÃ Â  non appena il processo di revisione tecnica sarÃ  completato.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo presentar una reclamaciÃ³n?
content: Si necesitas soporte tÃ©cnico o tienes alguna preguntaSi necesitas ayuda con tu cuenta, disputas de pagos con tarjeta, cambiar tus datos o simplemente quieres hacer una pregunta, descubre cÃ³mo contactar a N26 aquÃ­.Presentar una ReclamaciÃ³nLamentamos que desees presentar una reclamaciÃ³n. Investigaremos tu caso y nos pondremos en contacto contigo a travÃ©s del correo electrÃ³nico registrado en tu cuenta para compartir los hallazgos de la investigaciÃ³n y el resultado de tu reclamaciÃ³n.Â Nuestro equipo de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente podrÃ¡ ayudarte a remitir tu reclamaciÃ³n a travÃ©s del chat mencionado anteriormente, pero si deseas enviar tu reclamaciÃ³n a travÃ©s de tu correo electrÃ³nico podrÃ¡s hacerlos las siguientes direcciones:AtenciÃ³n en InglÃ©s: complaints@n26.com (pestaÃ±a nueva)AtenciÃ³n en Castellano: reclamaciones.es@n26.com (pestaÃ±a nueva), o si tu cuenta tiene un IBAN que comienza con (DE) a reclamaciones@n26.com (pestaÃ±a nueva)Por favor ten en cuenta que estas direcciones de correo electrÃ³nico son de uso exclusivo para la gestiÃ³n de reclamaciones y quejas. De lo contrario, nuestro departamento de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente (pestaÃ±a nueva) estÃ¡ disponible todos los dÃ­as y te ayudarÃ¡ a resolver tus dudas a la brevedad.Si deseas enviar una reclamaciÃ³n asegurate de incluir los siguientes detalles en tu correo electrÃ³nico:Una descripciÃ³n detallada de tu reclamaciÃ³n y del producto o servicio involucrado.La fecha en la que comenzÃ³ el incidente motivo de la reclamaciÃ³nToda la documentaciÃ³n suplementaria que ayude a respaldar su peticiÃ³n (ejemplo: capturas de pantalla, correos electrÃ³nicos enviados, etc.)Una descripciÃ³n de la resoluciÃ³n que espera obtener tras la reclamaciÃ³nLe pedimos que tenga en cuenta que solo podremos atender reclamaciones sobre una cuenta cuando nos contacta desde el correo electrÃ³nico registrado en su cuenta N26.Â Si la reclamaciÃ³n es enviada por un representante legal deberÃ¡ estar acompaÃ±ada del correspondiente mandato emitido por un notario.Excepcionalmente y en caso de que no tenga acceso a enviar la reclamaciÃ³n a travÃ©s de los medios telemÃ¡ticos previstos, le recomendamos que revise en los tÃ©rminos y condiciones de su cuenta o el reglamento de la sucursal para obtener mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre las opciones de envÃ­o en formato no digital. Nuestra direcciÃ³n postal alemana es:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinSobre el tratamiento de tu reclamaciÃ³n: Nos pondremos en contacto contigo a travÃ©s del correo electrÃ³nico registrado en tu cuenta y en caso de que necesitemos mÃ¡s detalles sobre la reclamaciÃ³n los solicitaremos tambiÃ©n por correo electrÃ³nico.Plazo de resoluciÃ³n de las reclamacionesTodas las reclamaciones que traten asuntos vinculados a servicios de pago, se resolverÃ¡n en un plazo mÃ¡ximo de 15 dÃ­as hÃ¡biles de acuerdo a lo determinado en las normas de PSD2 vigentes. Este plazo serÃ¡ prorrogable hasta un mes en casos excepcionales y siempre que te comuniquemos el motivo de la prÃ³rroga.Para el resto de las reclamaciones los plazos de resoluciÃ³n serÃ¡n los siguientes:Alemania y Austria - 15 dÃ­as hÃ¡bilesResto de paÃ­ses europeos - 15 dÃ­as hÃ¡bilesIrlanda - 40 dÃ­as hÃ¡bilesFrancia - 56 dÃ­asReino Unido - 56 dÃ­asÂ EspaÃ±a - 60 dÃ­asItalia - 60 dÃ­asDe no tener una respuesta por tu parte a nuestra comunicaciÃ³n relacionada con tu solicitud, procederemos a cerrarla. En caso de recibir una respuesta posterior, abriremos una nueva solicitud y te indicaremos el nuevo nÃºmero de referencia de tu reclamaciÃ³n.Si no quedas satisfecho/a con el resultado de tu reclamaciÃ³nUna vez vencido el plazo y en caso de no estar conforme con el resultado de tu reclamaciÃ³n, siempre podrÃ¡s someterla a los organismos correspondientes segÃºn los TÃ©rminos y Condiciones de tu cuenta N26:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinLegislaciÃ³n aplicableEn materia de legislaciÃ³n espaÃ±ola aplicable a la protecciÃ³n de clientela y normas de transparencia, puedes encontrar toda la informaciÃ³n necesaria en la pÃ¡gina oficial del Banco de EspaÃ±a (pestaÃ±a nueva).Reglamento:Reglamento para la defensa del Cliente de N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en EspaÃ±a. (pestaÃ±a nueva)

title: Â¿QuÃ© es una cuenta N26 EstÃ¡ndar?
content: La cuenta N26 EstÃ¡ndar es una cuenta corriente digital e intuitiva que puedes contratar en cuestiÃ³n de minutos, directamente desde tu mÃ³vil. AdemÃ¡s, puedes realizar envÃ­os instantÃ¡neos de dinero a otros clientes de N26 a travÃ©s de MoneyBeam.Productos financieros adicionales: Si cumples los requisitos, tambiÃ©n puedes solicitar productos financieros adicionales, p. ej., descubierto, crÃ©dito, ahorro, etc.CASH26: Retira e ingresa dinero en efectivo utilizando nuestra funciÃ³n CASH26 (TÃ©rminos y condiciones de DE, AT e IT).Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente: Puedes contactar con nuestro increÃ­ble Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente mediante el chat de la app o abriendo un chat desde nuestro sitio web o web app.Para abrir una cuenta N26 EstÃ¡ndar, encontrarÃ¡s las instrucciones en este artÃ­culoNuestra nueva cuenta N26 EstÃ¡ndar incluye una tarjeta de dÃ©bito virtual gratuita. Con una cuenta estÃ¡ndar activa, puedes realizar pagos online y en establecimientos. AdemÃ¡s, puedes aÃ±adir la tarjeta virtual a tu wallet de Apple o Google Pay.Puedes encontrar los datos de tu tarjeta virtual en la app N26, donde tambiÃ©n encontrarÃ¡s tu nÃºmero PAN completo y los datos de tu tarjeta virtual para realizar compras online.

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making aÂ temporary limitationÂ to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet ourÂ requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

title: How to order my extra card?
content: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: â€œAlways losing things?â€ > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs â‚¬10 for standard shipping and â‚¬25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of â‚¬10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.â„¹ï¸ The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

title: Bank documentsâ€”a guide to what's available
content: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reasonâ€”you can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and theyâ€™re perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Hereâ€™s how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening andâ€”if you wishâ€”it can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Hereâ€™s how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees youâ€™ve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. Youâ€™ll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipientâ€™s full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmationâ€”the PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (RelevÃ© d'IdentitÃ© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank informationâ€”full name, legal address, IBAN and BICâ€”specific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the â€˜Add moneyâ€™ button.

title: Warum bekomme ich keinen Kredit?
content: Bei der Beantragung eines N26 Credit fragen wir dich im Rahmen unserer PrÃ¼fung nach deiner persÃ¶nlichen und finanziellen Situation. Wenn N26 nicht deinÂ HauptkontoÂ ist, musst du dich sicher in dein Online-Bankkonto bei einer anderen Bank einloggen, um mit dem Antrag fortzufahren.FÃ¼r dein zweites Bankkonto akzeptieren wir nur Banken aus dem Land, aus dem du dich bewirbst (so kÃ¶nnen z. title: Round-Up Savings
content: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

title: Â¿CÃ³mo cambiar el PIN de la tarjeta?
content: Si no sabes cuÃ¡l es tu PIN, recuerda que en N26 no te enviamos tu cÃ³digo PIN por correo, sino que tÃº creas el PIN de tu tarjeta en el momento de activarla. Si lo has olvidado o simplemente quieres cambiarlo, puedes hacerlo fÃ¡cilmente en cuestiÃ³n de segundos desde tu app N26.Primero asegÃºrate de que tu mÃ³vil estÃ¡ vinculado a tu cuenta (pestaÃ±a nueva) y de que has activado tu tarjeta (pestaÃ±a nueva). DespuÃ©s abre tu app N26 y haz lo siguiente:Entra en la pestaÃ±a Tarjetas;ve a ConfiguraciÃ³n de la tarjeta y selecciona la tarjeta en cuestiÃ³n;selecciona Cambiar PIN;introduce el token de tu tarjeta, que es un nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos que aparece bajo tu nombre en la parte de delante de tu tarjeta (o por atrÃ¡s, en las tarjetas N26 You y Metal);elige tu nuevo PIN y confirma.Por Ãºltimo, tienes que hacer una retirada en un cajero para que se grabe el cambio (similar a cuando la activas por primera vez).PIN incorrecto o no vÃ¡lidoPor motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ningÃºn PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, direcciÃ³n u otra combinaciÃ³n con dÃ­gitos repetidos o secuencias (como por ejemplo 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el nÃºmero que has elegido no es vÃ¡lido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinaciÃ³n diferente.Si introduces un PIN incorrecto tres veces seguidas, la tarjeta se bloquearÃ¡ automÃ¡ticamente por motivos de seguridad. Si te pasa esto, abre un chat con AtenciÃ³n al Cliente desde la app para que te ayudemos.El cÃ³digo PIN de tu tarjeta no es el mismo que tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva), pero si tÃº quieres, puedes elegir el mismo PIN para ambos.Si has cambiado el PIN pero te da error al pagar, revisa el paso 6 mÃ¡s arriba.

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs â‚¬9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if youâ€™re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we donâ€™t charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if youâ€™re certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could helpÂ get your money back.

title: What does the court ruling BGH XI ZR 26/20 mean for N26 customers?
content: On April 27, 2021, the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (Bundesgerichtshof, BGH) ruled on [translation] â€œthe impermissibility of clauses that feign the consent of a customer to changes in the Terms & Conditions of a bank.â€Am I entitled to a reimbursement?On the bases of this ruling, customers with a private membership plan (N26 Standard/Smart/You/Metal), created before March 12, 2020, are entitled to reclaim the â€œGambling Feeâ€ introduced and charged by us. For those customers who are entitled to reclaim it, the fee (for the customer group in question) has no longer been charged since November 5, 2021.Customers who registered after March 12, 2020 actively consented to the â€œGambling Feeâ€ included in the Terms & Conditions, which were already updated at this time, which is why these customers are not entitled to a reimbursement of said â€œGambling Feeâ€. Customers with an N26 Business membership plan (N26 Business Standard/ Business Smart/Business You/Business Metal) are furthermore not entitled to reclaim this fee, as they do not fall under the customer group covered by the ruling (consumers).Requesting a reimbursement as a current customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to login to the N26 app and launch a verified live chat in the app or web app.Requesting a reimbursement as a former customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to send an email to support@n26.com (new tab). For a direct, simple resolution please follow these guidelines:Subject of email: â€œReimbursement pursuant to BGH XI ZR 26/20â€Send the email from your registered email address.Include your full name in the email as well as an alternative IBANAttach a clear, double-sided photo/scan of one of your ID documents, including the edges.Please include your consent to the following: â€œI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.â€œ

content: Si vives en Dinamarca, Islandia, Liechtenstein, Noruega, Polonia, Suecia o Suiza tienes la posibilidad de abrir una cuenta con nosotros. Servicio de atenciÃ³n al cliente en espaÃ±ol, inglÃ©s, alemÃ¡n, italiano o francÃ©s. Con las cuentas Business no se pueden hacerÂ transferencias en moneda extranjera (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â desde la app, sino que tendrÃ­as que visitar la pÃ¡gina deÂ Wise (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â para ello.5 retiradas gratuitas en la zona euro (1.7% de comisiÃ³n para retiradas en otra divisa.)0.1% de reembolso de tus pagos con tarjeta (con la cuenta Business) y del 0,5%Â (con la Metal Business) de forma mensual.2 espacios ademÃ¡s de la cuenta principal. Un bonus por cada amigo que se abre la cuenta con tu invitaciÃ³n de nuestra promociÃ³n ''Invita a un amigo''.Pagos ''sin contacto'' utilizando Google Pay y Apple Pay.Consejos para las transacciones entrantes y salientes:Para recargar tu cuenta con tu moneda local, te recomendamos convertirla utilizando Wise (desde la app o su website (pestaÃ±a nueva).), o a travÃ©s de tu banco local. Te recomendamos escoger tu divisa local para obtener la mejor tasa de cambio en los pagos con tu tarjeta Mastercard o en retiradas de efectivo (en caso contrario se pueden aplicar alguna comisiÃ³n). Para enviar transferencias a cuenta en Euros, usa la app para hacer una transferencia SEPA. Para cuentas que nos son en euros, utiliza Wise desde la app.**Ten en cuenta que Wise no estÃ¡ disponible para cuentas N26 Business (solo es posible realizar transferencias SEPA en euros.)

title: How to block a Direct Debit?
content: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as â€œDocuSignâ€.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ from the mobile app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â (if you havenâ€™t activated your card and need toÂ top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by theÂ check digitsÂ (two numbers), then ourÂ bank codeÂ 10011001 and end with your 10-digitÂ account numberÂ (start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner ofÂ Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: How to create a password?
content: If you forgot your password or want to change it, selectÂ Forgot?Â in the app orÂ Forgot your password? (new tab)Â in theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â during login. Weâ€™ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a â€œpassphraseâ€ rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase â€œhard to guess, easy to rememberâ€. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, youâ€™ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: How to order my extra card?
content: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: â€œAlways losing things?â€ > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs â‚¬10 for standard shipping and â‚¬25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of â‚¬10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.â„¹ï¸ The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.Â Â Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rulesÂ As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.Â Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.Â Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.Â For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating â€œpermanent homeâ€ as a stronger form of attachment than â€œtemporary residenceâ€). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification numberÂ Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each countryâ€™s tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.Â Â The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authoritiesÂ As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.Â Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.Â We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.Â Our recommendationÂ Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.Â We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick â€œAdd new tax countryâ€, indicate whether youâ€™re a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if youâ€™re tax resident in more than one country), click â€œAdd new tax countryâ€ and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.Weâ€™re unable to advise you on your tax status. If youâ€™re unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.Â

title: Warum ist mein Online-Einkauf fehlgeschlagen?
content: Manche Online-Zahlungen mÃ¼ssen per Push-Nachricht bestÃ¤tigt werden. Im Folgenden findest du eine Ãœbersicht Ã¼ber die mÃ¶glichen Ursachen fÃ¼r eine fehlgeschlagene Online-Zahlung und wie du sie beheben kannst.Du kannst nur so viel Geld ausgeben wie du auf deinem Konto hast. Zahle Geld auf dein Konto ein oder beantrage einen Dispokredit, um Ã¼ber genug Guthaben zu verfÃ¼gen.Falls du eine Online-Zahlung per Push-Nachricht bestÃ¤tigen musst, stelle sicher, dass dein Smartphone verknÃ¼pft ist. Du kannst Zahlungen nur auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t bestÃ¤tigen.Falls du die Push-Nachricht fÃ¼r die Zahlungen innerhalb von 5 Minuten nicht bestÃ¤tigen konntest, starte den Bezahlvorgang noch mal.Bitte beachten: die Push-Benachrichtigung wird nur an das verknÃ¼pfte Smartphone gesendet.ÃœberprÃ¼fe deine Karteneinstellungen. Online- und Auslandszahlungen mÃ¼ssen aktiviert sein.Stelle sicher, dass du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast. Falls du die Zahlung per WLAN nicht abschlieÃŸen kannst, benutze deine mobilen Daten und versuche es erneut.Falls du iOS benutzt, deaktiviere den Nicht-StÃ¶ren-Modus.Deaktiviere alle Adblocker in deinem Browser.Wenn du Probleme hast, mit deiner Karte zu zahlen, kannst du folgende Schritte befolgen, um eine Fehlerbehebung durchzufÃ¼hren:Geh in die Karteneinstellungen, der Karte mit der du etwas zahlen mÃ¶chtestSetzte alle Limits auf 0 EUR und deaktiviere online und AuslandszahlungenSperre deine KarteLog dich aus der app aus und anschlieÃŸend wieder einEntsperre deine KarteSetze deine Limits wieder auf die alte VerfÃ¼gungWarte 5 Minuten und versuche erneut zu zahlenSolltest du anschlieÃŸend weitere Probleme mit der Zahlung haben gibt es folgende MÃ¶glichkeiten:Ein Sicherheitsmechanismus ist angesprungen und du musst bis zu 12 Stunden warten beim gleichen HÃ¤ndler eventuell bis zu 24 Stunden, bis du deine Karte wieder verwenden kannst.Â Es besteht auch die MÃ¶glichkeit, dass die Transaktion nicht von unserer Seite zurÃ¼ckgewiesen wurde. In diesem Fall hat entweder der Zahlungspartner deine Karte abgelehnt oder konnte keine Verbindung mit unserem System herstellen.Â Um dies auszuschlieÃŸen kannst du uns gerne kontaktieren.Gut zu wissen:Â Die Maestro-Karte kann nicht fÃ¼r Online-Zahlungen verwendet werden.Â Falls der Betrag auf der Website des Anbieters von dem Betrag in der Push-Mitteilung abweicht, kann das an Kursschwankung bei der Umrechnung einer FremdwÃ¤hrung in Euro liegen.Falls du dennoch Probleme mit der Online-Zahlung hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking. (neuen Tab)

title: Wie benutzt man Spaces?
content: Um deine Spaces zu nutzen, musst du den Bereich 'Spaces' in deiner mobilen App oder Web-App von N26 aufrufen. Auf der 'Spaces'-Startseite kannst du Spaces einsehen, eingeben und erstellen.Erstelle einen Space:Tippe auf der "Spaces"-Startseite auf "Einen neuen Space erstellen".WÃ¤hle eine der untenstehenden Optionen aus:"FÃ¼r ein Ziel sparen" â€“ Gib einen Sparzielbetrag und ein Zieldatum ein (optional)."Geld teilen" â€“ ErmÃ¶glicht dir die Erstellung eines "Shared Space"."Jetzt erstellen, spÃ¤ter entscheiden" â€“ Erstelle einfach einen Space, dem du spÃ¤ter Ziele oder Regeln hinzufÃ¼gen kannst.Personalisiere anschlieÃŸend deinen Space mit einem Namen und einem Bild.Dir steht nun mit dem Space ein Unterkonto zur VerfÃ¼gung, um deine Finanzen besser kontrollieren zu kÃ¶nnen. Jetzt kannst du deine "Spaces" nutzen!Geld zwischen Spaces verschieben:Halte dein "Hauptkonto" oder einen anderen Space gedrÃ¼cktZiehe dann das Geld in den Space, in den du es verschieben mÃ¶chtest, und lass los.AnschlieÃŸend kannst du den Betrag bestÃ¤tigen, woraufhin dein Kontostand sofort aktualisiert wird.Sperre deinen Space:Du kannst einen Space jederzeit Ã¼ber deine mobile und Web-App sperren und entsperren. Du kannst kein Geld in einen oder aus einem gesperrten Space bewegen.Begib dich in den Space, den du sperren/entsperren mÃ¶chtest.Tippe auf "Verwalten".WÃ¤hle anschlieÃŸend "Spaces sperren" oder "Spaces entsperren".Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein.Der Space wird sofort gesperrt oder entsperrt.Blende den Kontostand deines Spaces aus:Du kannst den Betrag innerhalb des Spaces vom Gesamtkontostand deines Kontos ausblenden.Begib dich in den Space, fÃ¼r den du den Kontostand ausblenden mÃ¶chtest.Tippe auf das Zahnradsymbol "Einstellungen" (obere rechte Ecke).WÃ¤hle "Kontostand des Spaces ausblenden".Verwalte deine Spaces:Du kannst Regeln und Sparziele anlegen und die Funktion "Aufrundungsregel" aktivieren. Klicke in der Rubrik "Space" auf "Verwalten".Um ein Sparziel zu erstellen, wÃ¤hle "Mein Ziel erstellen" (du kannst dies auch spÃ¤ter noch bearbeiten).Gib einfach einen Zielbetrag und ein FÃ¤lligkeitsdatum ein und dann "Ziel festlegen".Um Aufrundungen zu aktivieren/deaktivieren, wÃ¤hle "Aufrundungsregel verwalten".Aktiviere "Aufrundungsregel aktivieren".Du erhÃ¤ltst die MÃ¶glichkeit, dein Kleingeld mit den Faktoren x1, x2, x3 und x5 des Betrags zu multiplizieren, der von deinen restlichen Kartentransaktionen abgezogen wird.Du kannst innerhalb eines Spaces Regeln anlegen, um automatisch Geld zwischen deinen Spaces und deinem Hauptkonto zu bewegen:Tippe auf "Eine Regel erstellen".WÃ¤hle die Spaces oder das Hauptkonto, zwischen denen du Geld Ã¼berweisen mÃ¶chtest.WÃ¤hle den Betrag, den du verschieben mÃ¶chtest.WÃ¤hle die HÃ¤ufigkeit und das Datum und bestÃ¤tige dann deine Auswahl.Du kannst diese Regel auch lÃ¶schen, indem du auf Bearbeiten und dann auf dasLÃ¶schsymbol neben der Regel tippst.

title: Account in conjunction with Â§Â§ 30 ff. ZKG
content: The account ICW Â§Â§ 30 ff. ZKG is not our N26 standard account. The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6â‚¬ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists (new tab). If you donâ€™t have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request.Â Â Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto. To request a Basiskonto:Download the request form (new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.In the request form youâ€™ll find an attached coupon for legitimation at Deutsche Post AG. Go to your nearest Deutsch Post office, in order to prove your identity with the coupon.In addition, send us the completed and signed request via post to: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto KlosterstraÃŸe 62 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandOnce weâ€™ve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, weâ€™ll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs (new tab).You then send us your signed contract via post to our address.As soon as we receive the contract weâ€™ll open a Basiskonto for you. Youâ€™ll receive a notification.Why can't I get a Basiskonto?Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. Thatâ€™s the case if you:Live outside of a supported country.Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent.Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years.Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance.You didnâ€™t meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.Â

title: Wie sperre ich die kontaktlose Bezahlfunktion meiner Karte?
content: Derzeit nur fÃ¼r iOS-Nutzer in der mobilen App verfÃ¼gbar.Â Kontaktloses Bezahlen ist sehr praktisch. Vielleicht bevorzugst du es jedoch, diese Zahlungsmethode zu deaktivieren, um unberechtigte Transaktionen mit deiner Karte zu verhindern. Deshalb kannst du jetzt gezielt NFC-Zahlungen fÃ¼r deine Karte deaktivieren:Gehe auf Karten.Wenn du mehrere Karten hast, wische nach rechts, bis die gewÃ¼nschte Karte erscheint.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Schalte die Funktion Kontaktlose Bezahlung aus.Die von dir vorgenommenen Ã„nderungen werden sofort auf die von dir gewÃ¤hlte Karte angewendet. Beachte bitte, dass sich diese Einstellungen auf deine physische Karte beziehen. Zur Verwaltung deiner Einstellungen fÃ¼r Google Pay und Apple Pay haben wir spezielle Artikel fÃ¼r dich zusammengestellt. Falls de Probleme mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlfunktion hast, lerne hier, wie du sie beheben kannst.

title: Come posso proteggere la mia identitÃ ?
content: Per proteggere ed evitare l'uso improprio dei tuoi dati personali, tieni presente che:Non ti chiederemo mai di verificare la tua identitÃ  per conto di altre persone o societÃ . CiÃ² include verifiche per contratti di affitto di appartamenti, linee di credito o offerte di lavoro (compresi i lavori con N26). Completa il processo di verifica solo se desideri aprire un conto bancario N26.Come proprietario dell'account, solo tu dovresti creare e avere accesso ai tuoi dati di accesso.Non creare mai un conto bancario N26 con un indirizzo email e una password predefiniti. Se usi le credenziali di accesso che ti sono state fornite, queste credenziali possono essere utilizzate per raggiungere le tue informazioni personali e legali. Inoltre, non accedere mai ad un account N26 che non Ã¨ il tuo.Non inviare mai i dati del tuo documento di identitÃ  a destinatari sconosciuti o non verificati.N26 puÃ² richiedere determinati documenti quando una transazione Ã¨ soggetta a un controllo di routine. Invia una documentazione valida solo agli account di posta elettronica N26 verificati.N26 non chiederÃ  mai il nome utente, la password o i codici PIN al di fuori dell'app N26. Non fornire mai queste informazioni in un sito Web o un'app esterna, anche se sembra correlata a N26.Se avessi ricevuto una richiesta sospetta da una terza parte o pensi che i tuoi dati di accesso N26 possano essere compromessi, non esitare a contattarci.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card canâ€™t be used for online purchases.

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Security.NameÂ andÂ sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: Youâ€™ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify itâ€™s really you changing your information so we canâ€™t change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ and selectÂ SettingsÂ thenÂ Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

title: What if my balance is negative?
content: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships.Â Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited.Â In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

title: Meine Karte lÃ¤uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?
content: Wenn deine N26 Mastercard abgelaufen ist oder bald ablaufen wird, erhÃ¤ltst du in diesem Artikel alle Informationen, wie du eine neue bestellst, sowie die damit verbundenen Kosten und die Versandzeiten.Â Bevor du mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte fortfahren mÃ¶chtest, empfehlen wir dir, dass deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten korrekt und auf dem neuesten Stand sind.Wenn deine Karte bald ablÃ¤uft, logge dich bitte in der App in dein N26 Konto ein, gehe zum Tab Karten und suche nach einem Banner unter der entsprechenden Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestÃ¤tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Wir senden sie dir dann zu.Â Wenn diese Nachricht nicht erscheint, mach dir keine Sorgen. Das liegt wahrscheinlich daran, dass deine Karte noch einige Zeit gÃ¼ltig ist. Zu gegebener Zeit hast du die MÃ¶glichkeit, deine Adresse zu bestÃ¤tigen.Sobald deine Karte bei dir eintrifft, musst du diese erst aktivieren, bevor du sie nutzen kannst. Vergiss nicht, deine alte Karte zu vernichten und sie gemÃ¤ÃŸ den Ã¶rtlichen Recyclingrichtlinien zu entsorgen.Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte fÃ¼r meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

title: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
content: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you donâ€™t recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?Â Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.Â Â N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchantâ€™s part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didnâ€™t receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26Â You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.Â Go to the â€˜Homeâ€™ tab, and select the transaction you want to disputeÂ Tap â€˜Get help with this transactionâ€™ and follow the steps provided.Â Important:Â If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, youâ€™ll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. Youâ€™ll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.Â Â If you select a transaction but the â€˜Get helpâ€™ button doesnâ€™t appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, youâ€™ll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If youâ€™ve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, youâ€™ll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, weâ€™ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

title: Wie verwalte ich meine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer?
content: Wenn du als N26 Nutzer sichtbar bist, kannst du alle Funktionen deiner App nutzen wie z.B. Shared Spaces oder Echtzeit-Transaktionen mit MoneyBeam oder Geldanfragen. Dazu gleicht N26 deine Kontaktdaten mit denen anderer N26 Nutzer ab.Hier erfÃ¤hrst du, wie das funktioniert und wie du deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer verwalten kannst. Alle deine Kontakte, die ein N26 Konto haben, kannst du in der in-App Kontaktliste einsehen. Ebenso wirst du in der Kontaktliste von anderen N26 Nutzern, die deine Kontaktdaten haben, angezeigt. Deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer kannst du in deiner App verwalten unter ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > PersÃ¶nliche Details > PersÃ¶nliche Daten. Hier kannst du dein HÃ¤kchen setzen bei "Anderen N26 Kunden in meinen Kontakten erlauben, mich fÃ¼r Ãœberweisungen einfach zu finden".

title: PerchÃ© devo inviare altri documenti?
content: Dopo aver avviato il processo di verifica per aprire il tuo conto corrente N26 e aver ricevuto un'email da parte nostra con la richiesta di ulteriori informazioni per procedere con la tua registrazione, leggi le informazioni sottostanti come supporto per andare avanti con la procedura.N26 Ã¨ una banca regolamentata e in alcune situazioni potremmo aver bisogno di informazioni aggiuntive dai nostri clienti per procedere con l'iscrizione. Si tratta di una richiesta standard conforme ai requisiti legali e normativi. Dovrai fornirci documenti specifici per aprire un conto corrente N26.Sappiamo che queste informazioni sono molto personali e ti assicuriamo che le informazioni che ci invii rimarranno rigorosamente riservate. Inoltre, verranno utilizzate solo per adempiere ai nostri obblighi legali.Quali documenti devo inviare?Per i titolari di un conto con IBAN ItalianoSe sei possessore di un conto corrente N26 con IBAN italiano e hai ricevuto una comunicazione da parte nostra con la richiesta di fornire documentazione aggiuntiva, ti preghiamo gentilmente di rispondere al messaggio entro la scadenza indicata. Qui di seguito, ti indichiamo i documenti che potrebbero essere necessari al fine di verificare le informazioni richieste. Ti ricordiamo che, se non risponderai alla nostra richiesta o se i documenti inviati non saranno validi o leggibili, alcune funzionalitÃ  del tuo conto potrebbero essere ristrette.Â 1. Un documento che attesti la tua residenza, come ad esempio:Certificato di residenzaDocumentazione per il vistoDocumentazione su attivitÃ  di studio in corso (iscrizione all'universitÃ  o a un corso professionale a lungo termine)Libretto di circolazione del tuo veicoloQualsiasi altro documento emesso negli ultimi 90 giorni e intestato a tuo nome che possa provare il tuo indirizzo di residenzaI residenti in Italia possono scaricare il certificato di residenza a questo indirizzo (nuova tabella) se in possesso di SPID/CIE o CNS, selezionando â†’ Certificati â†’ "Richiedi per te stesso" â†’ â€œdi Residenzaâ€ â†’ "In bollo con esenzione dal pagamento dell'imposta fino al 31/12/2022 ai sensi dell'art. 62, comma 3, del CAD"â†’ e selezionare â€œDesidero ricevere il certificato alla emailâ€ per riceverlo via email o â€œDesidero scaricare il certificatoâ€ per scaricarlo.2. Un documento che attesti il tuo indirizzo di domicilio, se differente da quello di residenza, come ad esempio:Bolletta del gas, acqua, internet o luce emessa negli utlimi 90 giorni e intestata a tuo nomeContratto di affittoQualsiasi altro documento intestato a tuo nome che possa provare il tuo indirizzo di domicilio3. Qualsiasi documento che possa certificare la principale fonte di reddito, come ad esempio:Contratto di lavoro o busta paga piÃ¹ recenteDichiarazione dei redditi (Certificazione Unica o Modello 730 o Modello Redditi Persone Fisiche)Prova della pensione di vecchiaia o del sussidio di disoccupazione (NASpI/Reddito di Cittadinanza)Ricevuta di prestazione occasionaleStato patrimoniale e reddituale (es. estratto conto bancario)Locazione immobiliare/atto di compravendita immobiliare/redditi passivi/rendite maturate sostenute da eventuali atti pubblici e/o contrattiDichiarazione rilasciata dal principale fornitore di servizi relativi a valute virtuali (VASP) utilizzato dalla data di apertura del conto4. Qualsiasi documento che possa certificare la tua principale origine dei tuoi fondi, se aggiuntiva o diversa dalla tua fonte di reddito, come ad esempio:Estratto conto bancario e/o estratto conto deposito/intermediazione titoliInformazioni su vendite di asset finanziari, plusvalenzeEreditÃ /Lascito/DonazioneTrust/Fondo PatrimonialeAltri contratti che possano certificare l'origine dei tuoi fondi5. Se hai un conto N26 business, abbiamo anche bisogno di un documento che attesti la tua partita IVA, come ad esempio:Certificato Attribuzione Partita IVAEstratto dalla Camera di Commercio / Visura Camerale (solo per ditte individuali)Una fattura emessa negli ultimi 90 giorni a nome della tua societÃ  unicaTi assicuriamo che i tuoi dati rimarranno strettamente riservati e verranno utilizzati solo nell'esecuzione delle attivitÃ  prescritte dalla legge.Come posso inviarvi queste informazioni?Prima di tutto, accedi alla tua app mobile N26, seleziona lâ€™icona Supporto > Messaggi da N26.Qui troverai la nostra comunicazione. Ti preghiamo di leggere attentamente le istruzioni riportate nel messaggio, e di selezionare Rispondi.Â Quando risponderai, dovrai inviare scansioni, fotografie e/o screenshot di ogni documento richiesto, con una descrizione dettagliata.Â Tutto deve essere chiaro e leggibile e non superare i 25 MB totali.Importante: inviare informazioni false e/o inaccurate Ã¨ un reato penale. Se le informazioni non sono veritiere o incomplete non potremo accettare la tua richiesta.

title: How to create a password?
content: If you forgot your password or want to change it, selectÂ Forgot?Â in the app orÂ Forgot your password? (new tab)Â in theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â during login. Weâ€™ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a â€œpassphraseâ€ rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase â€œhard to guess, easy to rememberâ€. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, youâ€™ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Was ist eine SicherheitsfuÃŸzeile und warum haben wir eine solche eingefÃ¼gt?
content: Eine SicherheitsfuÃŸzeile ist eine personalisierte Nachricht, die am Ende von E-Mails und digitalen Dokumenten eingefÃ¼gt wird und als Echtheitssiegel dienen soll.Durch das HinzufÃ¼gen deines vollstÃ¤ndigen Namens am Ende jeder E-Mail mÃ¶chten wir dir helfen, zwischen legitimen E-Mails von N26 und Phishing-E-Mails von BetrÃ¼gern zu unterscheiden.Â Auch wenn eine SicherheitsfuÃŸzeile nicht eindeutig beweisen kann, dass eine E-Mail von einer verifizierten Quelle stammt, trÃ¤gt sie dazu bei, das Risiko von Deceptive Pishing â€“ der hÃ¤ufigsten Art von Phishing-Angriffen â€“ zu verringern.Was ist Deceptive Phishing?Deceptive Phishing ist der illegale Versand von generischen Phishing-E-Mails an eine groÃŸe Anzahl unbekannter Personen mit dem Ziel, unter VortÃ¤uschung falscher Angaben an vertrauliche Informationen zu gelangen.Wie wird dies erreicht?Â BetrÃ¼ger kontaktieren ihre Zielpersonen unter dem Vorwand, fÃ¼r renommierte Unternehmen zu arbeiten. Den Zielpersonen wird dann mit Markenbildern, zeitkritischen Szenarien und irrefÃ¼hrender Sprache ein falsches GefÃ¼hl der Sicherheit vorgegaukelt. Sobald sie an der Angel hÃ¤ngen, versuchen die BetrÃ¼ger, ihre Opfer dahingehend zu manipulieren, dass sie auf ihre Forderungen eingehen.Wie kannst du dich schÃ¼tzen?Achte besonders auf E-Mails, die du von Banken, Kunden, Arbeitgebern usw. erhÃ¤ltst. Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, etwas zu unternehmen, handele nie aus einem Impuls heraus, sondern Ã¼berlege immer genau, bevor du handelst.Â Wenn du das GefÃ¼hl hast, dass etwas nicht stimmt, solltest du dieses GefÃ¼hl Ernst nehmen. Achte auf Rechtschreib- und Grammatikfehler, fahre mit dem Mauszeiger Ã¼ber versteckte URLs (klicke nicht darauf), Ã¼berprÃ¼fe die Absenderangaben und informiere dich genauer darÃ¼ber â€“ ein schneller Online-Check kann dir helfen, die IdentitÃ¤t eines Absenders zu verifizieren.Wenn du eine verdÃ¤chtige E-Mail, einen verdÃ¤chtigen Smartphone-Anruf und/oder eine verdÃ¤chtige SMS im Namen von N26 erhalten hast, leite dein Anliegen an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com weiter. Wenn du Fragen zu deinem Konto klÃ¤ren mÃ¶chtest, kannst du Ã¼ber unsere mobile App mit uns chatten.Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber:Wie du verdÃ¤chtige Phishing-Angriffe meldest (neuen Tab)Wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und verhindern kannst (neuen Tab)So schÃ¼tzt du dich vor Social Engineering (neuen Tab)

title: Redondeo
content: La funciÃ³n del permite a los usuarios premium redondear cada pago con tarjeta a la cifra entera inmediatamente superior y transferir la diferencia al espacio que elijan.El redondeo no te harÃ¡n incurrir en descubierto, de modo que solo se realizarÃ¡ mientras tengas saldo suficiente para cubrir el redondeo.Solo puedes tener un redondeo activo al mismo tiempo, que se transferirÃ¡ al Espacio que tÃº elijas.Puedes desactivar la funciÃ³n del en cualquier momento.Si cierras el espacio donde tengas habilitado el redondeo, la funciÃ³n se deshabilitarÃ¡ hasta que vuelvas a habilitarla desde un espacio activo.Â¿CÃ³mo utilizar el Ahorro por ?Activar el es rÃ¡pido y sencillo; solo tienes que iniciar sesiÃ³n en la app del mÃ³vil o la WebApp de N26:Ve a Â«EspaciosÂ».Selecciona el espacio en el que quieres que se ingrese el .Pulsa/haz clic en Â«Administrar --> Administrar redondeosÂ».Pulsa el botÃ³n de Â«Administrar redondeosÂ» hasta que cambie a color verde.Elige el multiplicador y pulsa/haz clic en Confirmar.Â¡Empieza a ahorrar en tu prÃ³xima compra con tu tarjeta de dÃ©bito de N26!

title: Bereavement & probate
content:
How can I inform N26 about a death?Â In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceasedâ€™s bank accounts.Â The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: sucesiones@n26.comFax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en EspaÃ±aÂ -Sucesiones-
Paseo de la Castellana 43
28046 Madrid, ESPANAN26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en EspaÃ±aÂ 
c/o N26 Bank GmbHÂ -Sucesiones-
Rungestr. 22Â 
10179 Berlin, GERMANY
Please inform us on:Â Who is the deceased?Â If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account. Please always provide us with the official version: Certificado literal de defunciÃ³n.How can we contact the beneficiaries?Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated, so we can get in contact with the beneficiaries.Â  A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?If you are facing certain proceedings (i.e. rejection of the inheritance or establishment of anÂ  inventory) or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us.Â We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings.Â Please refrain from sending us original documents via mail at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you.Â What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?Â Â Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country.Â However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en EspaÃ±a is located in Spain.Â As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be disabled. As well as any regular payments such as standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates will not be executed anymore.Further, please be aware we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax of the assets belonging to the estate. It might be necessary to complete a certain set of questions in order to release assets with N26.We also recommend getting in touch with the relevant tax authorities in your country, in order to fulfil local tax requirements (if any).Â We will notify the beneficiaries in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceasedâ€™s account with N26.I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death?Â There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.Â It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited.Â Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this.Â For any further information on a specific situation please seek professional assistance from a suitable advisory service.Â 
I am the heir or beneficiary, how can I obtain a certificate of assets (Certificado de Posiciones)?Â 
For the probate proceedings in Spain a certificate from the bank is regularly needed. The so-called â€œCertificado de Posicionesâ€ is a summary of the account status on the day of death. N26 can provide beneficiaries with this document:If you are mentioned in the deceasedâ€™s testamentÂ or you can claim your rights on the applicable succession law.Â In most cases the following documentation shall be present:Â Â A certificate from the Spanish testament register entry is needed: CertificaciÃ³n de Registro General de Actos de Ãšltima Voluntad (RGAUV)Â Â if the RGAUV-certificate is positive and a testament has been made by the deceased, we need a copy of that testamentÂ If the RGAUV-certificate is negative and no testament has been established, we require documents that prove your family relationship with the deceased. These can be for instance birth or marriage certificatesÂ For legal reasons, we may require further documentation on which the beneficiaries will be informed. N26 will communicate all necessary steps accordingly and individually.Â Please note that balance statements or regular account confirmations (downloaded from the N26 App or within the customers online banking) do not fulfil the requirements of a certificate of assets (Certificado de Posiciones).

title: How to get a bank statement?
content: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Hereâ€™s how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV. Â  * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the â€˜Add moneyâ€™ button.

title: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
content: Any app version can be used for 180 days since its release. Within this period, newer versions will be available. Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience.Â You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the AppleÂ App Store (new tab)Â or theÂ Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. These requirements are listed below:iPhone:Model 5s or newer.iOS 12 or above:(You can find your iOS version under "Settings" > "General" > "Informations").Android:Android 6.0. or above. You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

title: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
content:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing â€˜Direct Debitsâ€™: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you donâ€™t have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Spaceâ€™s IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your â€˜Spacesâ€™ section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the â€˜Space Settingsâ€™ and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' Â»Â Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' Â»Â Accept the T&C's Â»Â Enter your confirmation PIN Â»Â Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right â€˜cog iconâ€™)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on â€œSend moneyâ€Select â€œBank transferâ€Select the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

title: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
content: No problem, we got your back!Â If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.Â If you havenâ€™t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card.Â My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?

title: How to prove my identity?
content: As a licensed bank, itâ€™s important that we know who our customers are.
