Thatâ€™s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. Weâ€™ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.Â If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we wonâ€™t be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.Â

title: Come si crea uno Spazio Condiviso?
content: Per creare uno Spazio Condiviso:Crea uno Spazio nella sezione Spaces della tua app N26.Seleziona lâ€™icona +, nellâ€™angolo in alto a destra della pagina, e clicca su 'Risparmiare insieme'.Cerca e seleziona lâ€™utente N26 da invitare nella tua lista di contatti. Se l'utente N26 non appare nella tua lista di contatti, ti raccomandiamo di contattare la persona in questione e verificare che abbia dato il consenso per essere visibile ad altri utenti N26 tramite app. Per rendersi visibili bisogna entrare nella sezione: Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali> Informazioni personali.Leggi e accetta le condizioni generali del servizio e clicca su â€œRilascia la procuraâ€.Inserisci il tuo PIN di confermaConferma la notifica push sul tuo dispositivo associato per inviare lâ€™invito al partecipante.Scopri di piÃ¹Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

title: Chargeback: Wie du eine Kartenzahlung stornieren kannst
content: Du hast auf deinem monatlichen Kontoauszug von N26 eine Kartenzahlung entdeckt, die du nicht getÃ¤tigt hast? Oder hast du etwas online bestellt, aber nie erhalten? Keine Sorge! Dieser Artikel hilft dir, genau diese Probleme zu lÃ¶sen.Was bedeutet Chargeback?Â Das Chargeback-Verfahren bezeichnet eine Ausgleichsbuchung. Dabei wird der Betrag, den der HÃ¤ndler fÃ¤lschlicherweise abgebucht hat, auf die bei der Zahlung genutzte Karte zurÃ¼ckgebucht. Der Ausgleich wird geleistet, sobald der Erstattungsantrag des KÃ¤ufers erfolgreich abgewickelt wurde.Â N26 bietet das Chargeback-Verfahren Ã¼ber Mastercard an. So kannst du Transaktionen stornieren lassen, die nicht von dir getÃ¤tigt wurden oder bei denen der HÃ¤ndler etwas Falsches gebucht hat. Falls du zum Beispiel online einen Artikel bestellt, diesen aber nicht zum angegebenen Lieferdatum erhalten hast, kannst du Ã¼ber Chargeback von Mastercard dein Geld zurÃ¼ckverlangen.So funktioniert das Chargeback-Verfahren mit N26Du kannst eine Transaktion Ã¼ber die N26 Web-App oder die mobile App stornieren lassen.Gehe in den Home Bereich und wÃ¤hle die Transaktion aus, die du reklamieren mÃ¶chtest.Dann wÃ¤hle Erhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlung.Wichtig:Â Falls du das Chargeback-Verfahren aufgrund einer unautorisierten Buchung nutzen willst, musst du zuerst deine Karte sperren und eine neue Karte bestellen, um weiteren Kartenmissbrauch zu verhindern. Vorher kÃ¶nnen wir deinen Erstattungsantrag nicht bearbeiten. Du hast die MÃ¶glichkeit, deine alte Karte direkt in der App zu sperren und im Anschluss eine neue zu bestellen.Du hast eine Transaktion ausgewÃ¤hlt, die Option â€œErhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlungâ€ wird jedoch nicht angezeigt? Dann ist die Transaktion noch nicht vollstÃ¤ndig autorisiert und du musst warten, bis daraus eine Buchung wird. In diesem Artikel erfÃ¤hrst du, was Autorisierungen und Buchungen sind (neuen Tab).Falls du dein Konto bereits geschlossen und keinen Zugang zur App hast, dann schreibe unserem Support eine E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab) von deiner bei der Registrierung genutzten E-Mail-Adresse.Antworten auf hÃ¤ufig gestellte Fragen rund um das Chargeback-Verfahren haben wir in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab) fÃ¼r dich aufgelistet.Â

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (â€œIRSâ€).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, weâ€™ll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?Â 
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being â€œsubject to taxâ€ in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that youâ€™re also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you donâ€™t end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (â€œSSNâ€) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 ofÂ Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, pleaseÂ contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didnâ€™t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: Â¿CÃ³mo cancelar mi suscripciÃ³n Premium?
content:
Las suscripciones a las cuentas N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal Â tienen una duraciÃ³n inicial de un aÃ±o y se renuevan automÃ¡ticamente despuÃ©s de los primeros 12 meses. DespuÃ©s, pasan a ser indefinidas.Puedes cancelar la renovaciÃ³n automÃ¡tica en cualquier momento, durante los primeros 12 meses de suscripciÃ³n.DespuÃ©s de esta renovaciÃ³n, la suscripciÃ³n pasa a ser indefinida, pero puedes cancelarla cuando lo desees.En este artÃ­culo te explicamos la diferencia entre revocaciÃ³n, cancelaciÃ³n de la suscripciÃ³n y cancelaciÃ³n de la renovaciÃ³n de tu suscripciÃ³n. Tienes 3 opciones:Revocar el contrato de tu suscripciÃ³n durante el plazo de revocaciÃ³n de 14 dÃ­as (este es un plazo legal, puedes solicitarlo poniÃ©ndote en contacto con nosotros).Cancelar la renovaciÃ³n de tu contrato cuando quieras antes de que finalice el primer contrato de 12 meses poniÃ©ndote en contacto con nosotros a travÃ©s del chat.Cancelar el contrato de tu suscripciÃ³n cuando lo desees (puedes cancelarlo de inmediato y sin limitaciones contactando con nosotros a travÃ©s del chat).Pasar de una cuenta Premium a otra Premium Si quieres, ahora puedes cambiar de una cuenta premium a otra de categorÃ­a inferior sin necesidad de pasarte a una cuenta EstÃ¡ndar para conservar todos tus Espacios, redondeos, ingresos, tarjetas y pagos actuales.Para ello, inicia sesiÃ³n en la app del mÃ³vil, ve a Mi cuenta y abre los datos de tu SuscripciÃ³n. Seleccionando Modificar SuscripciÃ³n podrÃ¡s elegir otra suscripciÃ³n premium que se ajuste a tus necesidades.Â RevocaciÃ³nPuedes revocar el contrato de tu suscripciÃ³n durante el plazo de revocaciÃ³n de 14 dÃ­as. Este plazo comienza en cuanto se cobra la primera comisiÃ³n mensual. Solo tienes que contactarnos y te ayudaremos. Si revocas cualquiera de nuestros planes premium, podrÃ¡s volver a contratar la misma u otra categorÃ­a.Cancelar la renovaciÃ³n de tu contratoTu suscripciÃ³n premium N26 tiene un periodo inicial de 12 meses.Â  Pasados los primeros 12 meses, el contrato se renovarÃ¡ automÃ¡ticamente y pasarÃ¡ a tener un perÃ­odo indefinido, a menos que te pongas en contacto con nosotros y pidas cancelar la renovaciÃ³n.Puedes solicitarlo en cualquier momento antes de tu fecha de renovaciÃ³n de 12 meses; ademÃ¡s, te notificaremos de la renovaciÃ³n por email 8 semanas antes de que se cumplan estos 12 meses.Si decides cancelar tu renovaciÃ³n, podrÃ¡s seguir utilizando tu Mastercard N26 y todas las ventajas de tu suscripciÃ³n premium hasta que expire tu contrato. TambiÃ©n seguirÃ¡s disfrutando de tu seguro (para N26 You y N26 Metal) mientras sigas pagando la comisiÃ³n del contrato. DespuÃ©s, se te emitirÃ¡ una tarjeta virtual en la fecha del aniversario del contrato en cuanto pases a una cuenta gratuita. El saldo mÃ­nimo obligatorio es de 10 â‚¬. No hace falta que contactes con nosotros, se tramitarÃ¡ automÃ¡ticamente.Cancelar tu contrato cuando lo deseesSi quieres rescindir tu contrato una vez transcurrido el plazo de 14 dÃ­as, contÃ¡ctanos. Si escoges esta opciÃ³n con N26 You o N26 Metal, dejarÃ¡s de tener las ventajas del seguro y tus tarjetas premium Smart, You y Metal tambiÃ©n se desactivarÃ¡n.Si quieres cerrar tu cuenta de forma permanente, consulta nuestro artÃ­culo sobre Â¿CÃ³mo cerrar la cuenta?Preguntas Frecuentes sobre la cancelaciÃ³n de una cuenta premium de N26Â¿Tengo que cerrar mi cuenta para cancelar mi suscripciÃ³n premium?
No. Simplemente puedes cambiar tu suscripciÃ³n en la app N26 y tu nueva cuenta se crearÃ¡ al instante.Â¿QuÃ© pasa con mi IBAN si cancelo su suscripciÃ³n premium?
Cambiar tu suscripciÃ³n no afecta a tus datos bancarios, por lo que tu IBAN se mantendrÃ¡ sin cambios.

title: Â¿QuÃ© es una cuenta N26 Business?
content: N26 Business es una soluciÃ³n sencilla y asequible para todas tus necesidades financieras comerciales. La cuenta N26 Business es una cuenta corriente digital, segura e intuitiva que puedes contratar en cuestiÃ³n de minutos. Es sencilla, transparente y gratuita*; te permite recibir pagos de clientes, enviar dinero y pagar con seguridad, separando tus finanzas comerciales completamente de tus finanzas personales. Nuestras cuentas comerciales estÃ¡n concebidas para autÃ³nomos y profesionales independientes que trabajan por cuenta propia (es decir, que no puedes tener el nombre de una empresa en tu cuenta ni tu tarjeta). Actualmente, no se puede cambiar de una cuenta personal a una comercial, asÃ­ que decide quÃ© cuenta es mÃ¡s adecuada para ti antes de abrirla.Â¿QuÃ© incluye una cuenta N26 Business?Nuestra cuenta N26 Business incluye las siguientes ventajas y funciones:Cuenta Business gratuita*: Puedes abrir una cuenta N26 Business online de forma gratuita, sin comisiones de administraciÃ³n (*a partir de un saldo de 50 000 â‚¬, puede aplicarse una comisiÃ³n de custodia).Tarjeta virtual: La cuenta incluye una tarjeta virtual gratuita con fines exclusivamente comerciales. La tarjeta virtual tiene un nÃºmero PAN completo y puede vincularse a tu wallet de Apple o Google para realizar compras online o en establecimientos. TambiÃ©n puedes retirar dinero con Apple o Google Pay en cajeros con funciÃ³n contactless.Mastercard fÃ­sica de N26: Por 10 â‚¬ mÃ¡s, puedes recibir una Mastercard fÃ­sica de N26 EstÃ¡ndar (te advertimos de que necesitarÃ¡s un saldo mÃ­nimo de 10 â‚¬ en tu cuenta para posibilitar la fabricaciÃ³n y el envÃ­o de la tarjeta).Tarjeta Maestro: Si tambiÃ©n necesitas una tarjeta para tus gastos privados y estÃ¡s sujeto a los TÃ©rminos y condiciones de DE, AT y NL, puedes pedir una tarjeta Maestro por otros 10 â‚¬ adicionales.Pagos y transferencias: Puedes enviar y recibir transferencias SEPA empleando tu app mÃ³vil de N26. AdemÃ¡s, puedes realizar envÃ­os instantÃ¡neos de dinero a otros clientes de N26 a travÃ©s de MoneyBeam. A diferencia de otras cuentas, las transferencias en monedas extranjeras no pueden realizarse a travÃ©s de la app con N26 Business. Para eso, puedes visitar Wise (pestaÃ±a nueva).Reembolsos Business: Cada mes, recibirÃ¡s un reembolso del 0,1 % por cada pago que hayas realizado con la tarjeta.No obstante, los pagos de empresa a empresa (B2B) no son compatibles con la cuenta N26 Business.

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipientâ€,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.Youâ€™ll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent youâ€™ll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select â€œSend Moneyâ€ then choose â€œBank Transferâ€. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo retirar e ingresar dinero en efectivo con CASH26?
content: Disponible para las cuentas abiertas en EspaÃ±a, Alemania, Austria, Italia y Grecia.Lo Ãºnico que necesitas es tu mÃ³vil vinculado. Abre el mapa de CASH26 en la app y haz zoom para encontrar el establecimiento mÃ¡s cercano. Una vez en el establecimiento, crea un cÃ³digo de barras CASH26 y ensÃ©Ã±alo en la pantalla de tu mÃ³vil a la persona que haya en el mostrador, diciendo que quieres depositar o retirar dinero con nuestro socio Viacash:Â¿CÃ³mo sacar dinero sin tarjeta con CASH26?Desde la pestaÃ±a Tarjetas de tu app N26, selecciona CASH26 > Retirada.Elige la cantidad que quieres retirar (mÃ¡ximo 200Â â‚¬/retirada y 900Â â‚¬/24Â horas).Introduce tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva) y confirma la transacciÃ³n en la notificaciÃ³n push. Muestra el cÃ³digo de barras en la pantalla de tu mÃ³vil. La persona que te atienda lo escanearÃ¡ y te darÃ¡ el dinero.Â¿CÃ³mo ingresar dinero en efectivo en N26?Desde la pestaÃ±a Tarjetas de tu app N26, selecciona CASH26 > DepÃ³sito.Elige la cantidad que quieres ingresar (mÃ­nimo 50Â â‚¬).Introduce tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva) y confirma la transacciÃ³n en la notificaciÃ³n push. Muestra el cÃ³digo de barras en la pantalla de tu mÃ³vil a la persona que te atienda para que lo escanee y entrÃ©gale el dinero. Puede tardar hasta 10 minutos en verse reflejado en el saldo de tu cuenta en la app N26.Â¡Importante!El cÃ³digo de barras dura solo 10 minutos. Si no lo usas a tiempo, caducarÃ¡ y tendrÃ¡s que generar uno nuevo. Si te equivocas en la cantidad, puedes borrarlo pulsando el icono de la papelera en la esquina superior derecha (o dejar que caduque) y generar uno nuevo.No es necesario que realices ninguna compra en el establecimiento para depositar o retirar dinero.Lee este otro artÃ­culo para conocer los detalles y los lÃ­mites de CASH26.

title: Wie kann ich eine Lastschrift rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen?
content: Eine RÃ¼cklastschrift bedeutet nicht, dass dein Vertrag mit dem HÃ¤ndler gekÃ¼ndigt wurde.Du hast die MÃ¶glichkeit, eine Lastschrift in der App bis zu 8 Wochen nach der Belastung selbst rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig zu machen. Nachdem du in der App auf RÃ¼cklastschrift getippt hast, dauert es bis zu 2 Bankarbeitstage, bis Lastschriftbetrag wieder gutschrieben wird.Lastschrift in meinem Hauptkonto rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einÃ–ffne deine Umsatzliste und wÃ¤hle die entsprechende Lastschrift ausTippe auf RÃ¼cklastschriftLastschrift in einem Space mit IBAN (Unterkonto) rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen:Du kannst in der App auch eine SEPA-RÃ¼cklastschrift fÃ¼r deine Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN beantragen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einTippe auf Spaces (Unterkonten)Gehe zum Space, in dem du eine Lastschrift rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen willstWÃ¤hle die entsprechende Transaktion ausTippe auf RÃ¼cklastschrift*FÃ¼r LÃ¤nder mit einer anderen HauptwÃ¤hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner LandeswÃ¤hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des ZahlungsempfÃ¤ngers die GebÃ¼hren fÃ¼r den WÃ¤hrungsumtausch sowie den endgÃ¼ltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Das gilt fÃ¼r folgende LÃ¤nder: Bulgarien, Kroatien, Tschechien, DÃ¤nemark, Ungarn, Island, Liechtenstein, Norwegen, Polen, RumÃ¤nien, Schweden, Schweiz

title: Where can I use my Maestro card?
content: Only available for customers with our German, Austrian or Dutch terms & conditionsLetâ€™s get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro canâ€™t be used for online purchases and itâ€™s not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).You can't use it for Apple Pay or Google Pay.But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. EachÂ ATM transactionÂ using your Maestro is â‚¬2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals). You canÂ order your MaestroÂ card directly in the app.If youâ€™re having issues using your Maestro, first check that yourÂ card settingsÂ are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and weâ€™ll look into it for you.

title: Come collegare o scollegare il mio smartphone al conto?
content:
Dovrai associare uno smartphone quando crei un conto per la prima volta, se hai acquistato un nuovo dispositivo o se hai cambiato numero di telefono.Tieni presente che se cambi solo la tua SIM ma mantieni il tuo telefono, non sarÃ  necessario associare nuovamente il tuo dispositivo.Controlla i Requisiti di sistema per lâ€™app N26 (nuova tabella).Come faccio ad associare il mio smartphone al conto?Per associare un nuovo smartphone al tuo conto N26, ti servirÃ  la tua N26 Mastercard fisica. Come associare uno smartphone per la prima voltaPer collegare il tuo smartphone a un conto N26 per la prima volta:effettua l'accesso all'app N26. Ti verrÃ  chiesto in automatico di confermare il tuo numero di telefono;inserisci il codice di 4 cifre che ti invieremo via SMS (nuova tabella) per collegare il tuo telefono.Se vuoi collegare un nuovo dispositivo, devi prima scollegare il tuo vecchio smartphone per motivi di sicurezza (nuova tabella).Come dissociare il tuo vecchio dispositivoaccedi a ğŸ‘¤ Il mio conto sulla tua app N26Â clicca su Sicurezza;seleziona Dissocia il telefonoQualora non avessi accesso al tuo vecchio telefono:Accedi all tua WebAppaccedi a ğŸ‘¤ Il mio conto;clicca su Sicurezza;Seleziona Dissocia il telefonoriceverai subito un'email contenente maggiori informazioni.Come associare un nuovo dispositivo
Ricorda: puoi collegare solo uno smartphone alla volta per ogni conto. Segui i passaggi indicati sopra per scollegare il tuo vecchio telefono.Accedi alla tua app N26Verifica i tuoi dati di accesso con il codice SMS a 6 cifreSeleziona â€œAssocia ora il dispositivoâ€Apri lâ€™email di convalida che riceverai sul tuo dispositivoClicca su â€œConfermaâ€ nel messaggioSarai poi reindirizzato alla tua app, dove dovrai richiedere un nuovo codice via SMSInserisci il codice di 4 cifre che ti invieremo via SMSInserisci il tuo PIN di confermaIl tuo dispositivo Ã¨ adesso associato al conto.

title: Warum war eine Zahlung hÃ¶her als erwartet?
content: Ganz gleich, ob es sich um eine Kartenzahlung oder eine Lastschrift handelt â€“ wenn eine Zahlung hÃ¶her ausfÃ¤llt als ursprÃ¼nglich gedacht, kommt dir das erst einmal verdÃ¤chtig vor. Es gibt jedoch ein paar GrÃ¼nde, warum der tatsÃ¤chlich abgebuchte Betrag vom erwarteten Betrag abweichen kann:Â Â Es handelt sich um eine Transaktion inklusive einer KautionEs handelt sich um eine Transaktion in einer FremdwÃ¤hrungIn beiden FÃ¤llen kann es so aussehen, als sei eine Zahlung zu hoch. Sehen wir uns die beiden Szenarien genauer an:Â Du fÃ¤hrst in den Urlaub und mietest am Flughafen ein Auto. Du bezahlst die MietwagengebÃ¼hr mit deiner N26 Mastercard. Der abgebuchte Betrag fÃ¤llt jedoch hÃ¶her aus, weil die Autovermietung auch die Kaution fÃ¼r den Mietwagen autorisiert, also geblockt hat. Wenn du am Ende deines Urlaubs den Mietwagen unversehrt zurÃ¼ckbringst, erlischt die Autorisierung und der Betrag ist auf deinem Konto nach maximal 30 Tagen wieder voll verfÃ¼gbar. Mehr Ã¼ber den Unterschied zwischen Autorisierungen und tatsÃ¤chlichen Buchungen erfÃ¤hrst du hier.Du bestellst ein Produkt in einem Onlineshop und zahlst mit deiner Karte. Der Onlineshop sitzt auÃŸerhalb der Eurozone und bietet ausschlieÃŸlich Zahlungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen an, zum Beispiel Dollar oder Pfund. Je nach aktuellem Wechselkurs kann der gebuchte Betrag auf deinem Konto von der ursprÃ¼nglichen Summe abweichen. Dies lÃ¤sst sich aufgrund von Schwankungen auf dem Devisenmarkt nicht vermeiden. Mehr zu Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen erfÃ¤hrst du hier.In beiden FÃ¤llen berechnen wir keine Zinsen fÃ¼r die Differenz.Keines der beiden Szenarien trifft zu und du bist sicher, dass du zu viel bezahlt hast? Wenn die Transaktion sicher nicht von dir autorisiert wurde, kÃ¶nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zurÃ¼ckzubekommen.

title: Warum wurde meine Ãœberweisung in der N26 App noch nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt?
content: Du brauchst deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN fÃ¼r alle Transaktionen, egal obÂ MoneyBeam, DauerauftrÃ¤ge oderÂ CASH26. Deine Ãœberweisung bleibt ausstehend, bis du sie per Push-Nachricht in der App bestÃ¤tigst oder abbrichst.Deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN unterscheidet sich von deinerÂ Karten-PIN, aber du kannst fÃ¼r beide die gleiche Zahlenkombination verwenden. Sobald du deinÂ Smartphone verknÃ¼pft hast, wirst du aufgefordert, die BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN zu erstellen (die Karten-PIN legst du erst bei der Aktivierung der Karte fest).Wenn du deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird sie aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden gesperrt. Du kannst sie in der AppÂ wiederherstellen.

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.Â Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.Â 
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support canâ€™t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. Youâ€™re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)Â or Â§ 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.Â According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If youâ€™d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. Weâ€™re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you donâ€™t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We donâ€™t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

title: Kann ich ein Konto erÃ¶ffnen, wenn ich auÃŸerhalb der Eurozone wohne?
content: Wenn du in Polen, Schweden, DÃ¤nemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein, Island oder der Schweiz lebst, kannst du ein N26 Konto erÃ¶ffnen. Wir bieten dir:Die Wahl zwischen einem Standard-Konto oder N26 Business.Ein Konto in Euro, eine deutsche IBAN und Ãœberweisungen per SEPA oder MoneyBeam.Einen gÃ¼nstigen Wechselkurs mit deiner Mastercard Debitkarte.Kostenloser Versand deiner Mastercard oder Expressversand fÃ¼r 25â‚¬.Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen mit Wise (neuen Tab) (mit dem Standard-Konto).3-5 gebÃ¼hrenfreie Abhebungen am Geldautomaten (1.7% GebÃ¼hr auf Abhebungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen).0.1% Cashback auf alle Kartenzahlungen ( bei N26 Business).2 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces zu deinem HauptkontoEinen Bonus fÃ¼r alle Freunde, die du Ã¼ber unser Freundschaftswerbungsprogramm erfolgreich zu N26 einlÃ¤dst.Kontaktlose Zahlungen mit Google Pay und Apple Pay.Tipps fÃ¼r ein- und ausgehende Zahlungen:Damit du stets den gÃ¼nstigsten Wechselkurs erhÃ¤ltst, empfehlen wir dir, bei EinkÃ¤ufen und Bargeldabhebungen mit deiner Mastercard stets deine LandeswÃ¤hrung auszuwÃ¤hlen (andernfalls kÃ¶nnen zusÃ¤tzliche GebÃ¼hren anfallen).Um Geld in deiner LandeswÃ¤hrung auf dein Euro-Konto einzuzahlen, empfehlen wir dir eine SEPA-Ãœberweisung Ã¼ber die Wise-Website (neuen Tab), unser Partner fÃ¼r Geldtransfers in FremdwÃ¤hrungen. Alternativ kannst du auch Ã¼ber deine Ã¶rtliche Bank Geld Ã¼berweisen.Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen auf Euro-Konten kannst du ganz einfach Ã¼ber die Standardfunktion in der N26 App tÃ¤tigen. Ãœberweisungen auf Konten in FremdwÃ¤hrungen kannst du Ã¼ber Wise auch in der App tÃ¤tigen.**Bitte beachte: Wise ist nicht fÃ¼r N26 Business verfÃ¼gbar (nur SEPA-Ãœberweisungen in Euro).

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

title: How to change my card limits?
content: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:â‚¬1,000 for withdrawals from ATMsâ‚¬5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500â‚¬ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050â‚¬ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:â‚¬20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: Come gestire la mia visibilitÃ  come utente N26?
content: Per poterti offrire l'accesso a tutte le opzioni presenti nell'app, N26 associa i tuoi dati con altri utenti N26.Per gestire il tuo consenso ad essere visibile come utente N26, puoi andare nellâ€™app su ğŸ‘¤ Il mio conto > Profilo > Informazioni personali. Successivamente dovrai solo spuntare o rimuovere la spunta dalla casella â€œConsenti ai miei contatti che utilizzano N26 di trovarmi facilmente per effettuare bonifici.â€Gli utenti N26 che hanno deciso di rendersi visibili appariranno nella tua lista contatti. Allo stesso tempo, se ti sei reso visibile, anche tu apparirai nella lista contatti di altri utenti N26.Â PerchÃ¨ devo essere visibile ad altri utenti N26?Puoi avere accesso a tutte i nostri prodotti presenti nell'app, come ad esempio Moneybeam, che ti permette di trasferire denaro in maniera instantanea senza utilizzare un IBAN, ma solo selezionando un nome dalla tua lista dei contatti. Viceversa, puoi anche richiedere un trasferimento da uno dei tuoi contatti, il quale dovrÃ  solo accettare (o declinare) la richiesta. Renderti visibile ti permetterÃ , inoltre, di usare Spazi Condivisi, sottoconti tramite i quali potrai condividere denaro con altri utenti N26.

title: How does N26 Business work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business is right for you:The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive (0.1% | 0.5%) cashback every month on all payments made using the card. All payment refunds received during the month will be discounted from the total payments amount in order to calculate the cashback. The refunds might be related to a payment made on the same or a previous month. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).The cashback is issued on a monthly basis, processing eligible transactions of a given month the following natural month, starting from day 15th. Please expect a 7 days delay for the cashback to be credited into your N26 Business account.As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

title: Who is a Politically Exposed Person?
content:
A politically exposed person is a natural person who occupies or has ceased to occupy important public offices less than a year ago. Their family members and people with whom they have close relations should also be included in this category.Individuals who occupy or have occupied important public office are:President of the Republic, President of the Council, Minister, Vice-Minister and Undersecretary, President of the Region, Regional Councillor, Mayor of a provincial capital or metropolitan city, Mayor of a municipality with a population of not less than 15,000 inhabitants and similar offices in foreign states;Member of Parliament, Senator, Member of the European Parliament, Regional Councillor and similar offices in foreign states;Member of the central governing bodies of political parties;Judge of the Constitutional Court, magistrate of the Court of Cassation or the Court of Auditors, State Councillor, other members of the Administrative Justice Council for the Sicilian Region and similar offices in foreign states;Member of the governing bodies of central banks and independent authorities;Ambassador, chargÃ© d'affaires and equivalent offices in foreign States, senior officer of the armed forces and similar offices in foreign States;Member of the administrative, management or control bodies of companies controlled, even indirectly, by the Italian State or by a foreign State or controlled, predominantly or wholly, by the Regions, by provincial capitals and metropolitan cities and by municipalities with a total population of not less than 15,000 inhabitants;General Manager of ASL and of the hospital company, of the university hospital company and of the other bodies of the national health service.Director, deputy director and member of the management body or equivalent functions in international organizations.
Family members of politically exposed persons are:Â parents;Â spouse or person in a civil partnership or de facto cohabitation;children and their spouses and persons linked to their children in a civil partnership or de facto cohabitation.The persons with whom PEPs are known to have close relations are:natural persons linked to the politically exposed person due to the joint effective ownership of legal entities or other close business relationship;natural persons who only formally hold total control of a notoriously established entity, de facto, in the interest and for the benefit of a politically exposed person.

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the â€˜Learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜Invite new memberâ€™ button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once youâ€™ve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the â€˜Accept power of attorneyâ€™ button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the â€˜Send Inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How to get N26 Insurance?
content: The new on-demandÂ N26 InsuranceÂ allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the â€œInsuranceâ€ banner you find.Â You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.Â How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.Â Am I eligible?Â N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers canâ€™t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

title: Wie verknÃ¼pfe ich mein N26 Konto mit PayPal?
content:
Wenn du mÃ¶chtest, kannst du dein N26 Konto mit deinem PayPal-Konto verknÃ¼pfen und so von einer Reihe von Vorteilen profitieren.Du kannst in Echtzeit dein Konto aufladen sowie schnelle Zahlungen senden und empfangen â€“ und zwar auch absolut sichere Weise, ohne deine Bankdaten oder die Nummer deiner N26 Karte angeben zu mÃ¼ssen.Hier erfÃ¤hrst du, wie du dein N26 Konto mit PayPal Ã¼ber dessen Website verknÃ¼pfen kannst:Klicke oben auf der Seite auf Wallet.WÃ¤hle Karte oder Konto verknÃ¼pfen.Klicke auf Konto verknÃ¼pfen.Folge den bereitgestellten Anweisungen.
Wenn du stattdessen die mobile PayPal-App nutzt:Klicke oben rechts auf Einstellungen.WÃ¤hle Karte oder Konto verknÃ¼pfen.Klicke auf das Pluszeichen (+) und wÃ¤hle Konto aus.Gib deine Bankdaten ein und bestÃ¤tige diese.
Achte darauf, deinen Vor- und Nachnamen genau so einzugeben, wie er auf deinem N26 Konto erscheint, da sonst die VerknÃ¼pfung mit PayPal fehlschlÃ¤gt.Sobald dein N26 Konto bestÃ¤tigt ist, erhebt PayPal zwei geringe GebÃ¼hren, die dir dann innerhalb von 2â€“3 Werktagen auf dein Konto zurÃ¼ckerstattet werden.An diesem Punkt musst du einfach die HÃ¶he der zurÃ¼ckerstatteten GebÃ¼hren eintragen, dich in dein PayPal-Konto einloggen und die VerknÃ¼pfung deines N26 Kontos von deinem Wallet aus bestÃ¤tigen.

title: How long does a bank transfer take?
content: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.Â Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. Whatâ€™s a â€œbanking dayâ€?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasnâ€™t arrived â€” where is it?So what if youâ€™ve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasnâ€™t come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we canâ€™t investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

title: Why isnâ€™t my photo verification working?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Applies to all regions except GermanyFirst, geolocation must be enabled. Then review theÂ guide (new tab)Â weâ€™ve created to help you take the best pictures.Most photoÂ verificationsÂ fail due to bad picture quality.Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).Make sure youâ€™re the only person in the photo.Check your document.We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.We only accept national IDs and passports.Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesnâ€™t go through, you can just start over again.As soon as your verification is complete, weâ€™ll send you your N26 Mastercard.Â DeliveriesÂ take up to 10 days.Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.Â

title: Du bist Opfer eines Betrugs geworden? Kontaktiere uns.
content:
Du hast per BankÃ¼berweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen BetrÃ¼ger Ã¼berwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.Â Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlieÃŸlich fÃ¼r die oben beschriebenen FÃ¤lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vortÃ¤uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du N26 Kunde bist und eine autorisierte oder unautorisierte Kartenzahlung in deiner Transaktionshistorie reklamieren willst, nutze bitte unseren dafÃ¼r vorgesehenen vollumfÃ¤nglichen Service in der App! Die obige Hotline hilft ausschlieÃŸlich bei BankÃ¼berweisungen an ein verdÃ¤chtiges Konto mit einer N26 IBAN.Hast du eine SMS mit einem verdÃ¤chtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link Ã¶ffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empfÃ¤ngst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu Ã¶ffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab)Â Die geÃ¶ffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie auÃŸerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, fÃ¼r N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verdÃ¤chtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zusÃ¤tzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu bestÃ¤tigen. BestÃ¤tige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der ZahlungsempfÃ¤nger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verdÃ¤chtigen Link geÃ¶ffnet habe?Ã„ndere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zunÃ¤chst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort Ã¤ndern. Alternativ kannst du im Loginâ€“Bildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den nÃ¤chsten Schritten.Falls du persÃ¶nliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto geschÃ¼tzt bleibt. Bitte schicke auÃŸerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (neuen Tab) (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung oder sogar eine autorisierte Zahlung anfechten willst, die du mit deiner N26 Mastercard gemacht hast, kannst du dein Geld zurÃ¼ckbekommen. Erfahre Schritt-fÃ¼r-Schritt, wie du eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren (neuen Tab) kannst.Was tun bei einer unautorisierten Zahlung?Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung in deinem Konto hast, musst du eine neue Karte bestellen, damit dein Konto sicher bleibt und um weitere unautorisierte Zahlungen zu verhindern. Logge dich in die N26 App ein, und gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Neue Karte bestellen. WÃ¤hle dabei Verloren oder Gestohlen, je nachdem was zutrifft. Wenn die Karte die ganze Zeit in deinem Besitz war, musst du noch mal bestÃ¤tigen, dass du die Zahlung nicht selbst gemacht hast. Falls nÃ¶tig, melde den Fall auch bei der Polizei. Folge diesen Schritten, um die Zahlung zu reklamieren.Wie schÃ¼tze ich mein Konto vor BetrugHier sind einige Tipps, wie du dich vor Betrug schÃ¼tzen kannst:Nutze ausschlieÃŸlich Geldautomaten von vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen BankenKaufe online nur bei vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen Shops und WebseitenÃ„ndere regelmÃ¤ÃŸig deine Online-PasswÃ¶rter und PINsVertraue keinen Nachrichten oder E-Mails, die vorgeben von N26 zu sein und dich auffordern, deine Kartennummer oder Kontodaten zu teilen, oder die verdÃ¤chtige Links enthaltenN26 wird dich auÃŸerhalb der N26 App oder Web App nie nach deiner Kartennummer oder Kontodaten fragenÃ„ndere deine Karteneinstellungen in der N26 App. Deaktiviere z.B. Online-Zahlungen, Auslandszahlungen, Bargeldabhebungen oder passe deine Zahlungslimits an dein normales Kaufverhalten an.Vermeide Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen, wenn mÃ¶glich. Stattdessen empfiehlt sich die Zahlung per Chip und PIN oder per digitales Wallet.Â Bewahre dein Karte immer in einem sicheren Ort auf
NÃ¼tzliche Links:Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintrÃ¤chtigt wurde?Was ist Phishing?

title: How to block a Direct Debit?
content: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as â€œDocuSignâ€.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

title: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
content: No problem, we got your back!Â If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.Â If you havenâ€™t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card.Â My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?

title: Comment encaisser un chÃ¨que ?
content:
N26 est une banque 100 % numÃ©rique. Tous nos services s'effectuent en ligne et nous ne disposons pas d'agences bancaires. Ã€ ce titre, il n'est pas possible de dÃ©poser un chÃ¨que sur votre compte N26, et nous n'Ã©mettons pas de chÃ©quiers.
Nous proposons de nombreuses faÃ§ons d'alimenter votre compte N26 (nouvel onglet) facilement, rapidement et directement depuis votre smartphone.

title: Round-Up Savings
content: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

title: Demande de remboursement : quâ€™est-ce que câ€™est et comment contester une transaction par carte ?
content:
Votre relevÃ© bancaire mensuel N26 comporte-t-il une transaction par carte que vous nâ€™avez pas effectuÃ©e ? Vous avez passÃ© une commande en ligne, mais ne lâ€™avez jamais reÃ§ue ? Cet article vous explique comment rÃ©soudre ces problÃ¨mes.Quâ€™est-ce quâ€™une demande de remboursement ?Il s'agit de demander le remboursement dâ€™un paiement par carte en raison dâ€™une transaction erronÃ©e auprÃ¨s dâ€™un marchand. Le paiement est remboursÃ© une fois que le litige est rÃ©solu en faveur de la personne payante.N26 propose un service de demande de remboursement (nouvel onglet) avec la Mastercard, qui vous permet de contester des transactions que vous nâ€™avez pas effectuÃ©es ou si vous rencontrez un problÃ¨me de paiement avec un commerÃ§ant. Par exemple, si vous avez commandÃ© des produits en ligne et que vous ne les avez pas reÃ§us Ã  la date de livraison prÃ©vue, vous pouvez faire une demande de remboursement.Comment contester une transaction avec N26 ?Vous pouvez contester une transaction en contactant le Service Client N26 depuis votre espace client en ligne N26 ou sur lâ€™application mobile.VÃ©rifiez que la transaction a bien Ã©tÃ© dÃ©bitÃ©e et qu'il ne s'agit pas d'une autorisation : sur lâ€™Ã©cran dâ€™accueil de votre application N26, appuyez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne des trois barres en haut Ã  droite, puis sur RelevÃ©s. SÃ©lectionnez ensuite le mois correspondant Ã  la transaction que vous souhaitez contester.
Si la transaction figure dans votre relevÃ© bancaire, c'est qu'elle a dÃ©jÃ  dÃ©bitÃ©e et vous pouvez continuer Ã  lâ€™Ã©tape suivante. Si elle nâ€™y se trouve pas, c'est qu'il ne s'agit encore que d'une autorisation (nouvel onglet) et qu'il faut attendre quâ€™elle soit dÃ©bitÃ©e pour pouvoir la contester.Sur lâ€™Ã©cran dâ€™accueil, appuyez sur Mon compte > Aide > LiveChat ou TÃ©lÃ©phone (si vous disposez d'un compte N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal).Important:Â Si vous contestez une transaction Ã  cause dâ€™une transaction non autorisÃ©e, vous devrez bloquer votre carte et en recommander une pour que nous puissions traiter votre demande, ceci afin dâ€™Ã©viter les risques de fraude supplÃ©mentaire. Vous pouvez bloquer votre carte et en commander une nouvelle directement dans lâ€™application N26.Si vous avez dÃ©jÃ  clÃ´turÃ© votre compte et que vous nâ€™avez pas accÃ¨s Ã  lâ€™application N26, vous devez contacter notre Service Client (support@n26.com) depuis lâ€™adresse email que vous avez utilisÃ©e pour crÃ©er votre compte N26.Retrouvez ici les questions frÃ©quentes concernant les demandes de remboursement (nouvel onglet).

title: Warum wurde mir eine GeldautomatengebÃ¼hr berechnet?
content: GeldautomatengebÃ¼hren kÃ¶nnen aus verschiedenen GrÃ¼nden anfallen:FÃ¼r jede Auszahlung, die Ã¼ber unsere Fair Use Policy hinausgeht, erheben wir eine GebÃ¼hr von 2 â‚¬. Diese GebÃ¼hr erscheint als separate Transaktion in deiner Umsatzanzeige. Wir informieren dich per Push-Nachricht, wenn du nur noch wenige kostenlose Auszahlungen zur VerfÃ¼gung hast.Einige Betreiber von Geldautomaten erheben ihre eigenen GebÃ¼hren. In deiner Umsatzanzeige erscheint diese GebÃ¼hr in derselben Transaktion wie die Abhebung, also eingerechnet in den Abhebungsbetrag. Darauf haben wir keinen Einfluss, wir kÃ¶nnen sie weder ablehnen noch rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen. Sollten zusÃ¤tzliche GebÃ¼hren anfallen, wirst du vor dem Ende einer Auszahlung informiert und kannst die Auszahlung sofort stornieren. Kunden in Spanien kÃ¶nnen kÃ¶nnen hier eine LÃ¶sung finden.Abhebungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen kÃ¶nnen gebÃ¼hrenpflichtig sein. Beim N26 Standard und N26 Smart Konti fÃ¤llt eine GebÃ¼hr von 1,7% des ausgezahlten Betrages an. Diese GebÃ¼hr entfÃ¤llt fÃ¼r N26 You, N26 Metal, Business You- oder N26 Business Metal-Mitglieder.Nutzung deiner Maestrocard fÃ¼r Abhebungen am Geldautomaten. Hier fÃ¤llt sowohl fÃ¼r nationale als auch fÃ¼r internationale Abhebungen eine GebÃ¼hr von 2 â‚¬ an. Maestro ist nur in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich und den Niederlanden erhÃ¤ltlich.Wenn du unser N26 Flex Konto hast, kosten Abhebungen 2â‚¬. Gut zu wissen:Um gebÃ¼hrenfreie Automaten in deiner NÃ¤he zu finden, insbesondere auf Reisen, kannst du die Mastercard-Geldautomatensuche (neuen Tab) verwenden. WÃ¤hle dazu in den erweiterten Suchoptionen â€œkeine NutzungsgebÃ¼hrâ€ aus.Alle Automaten, die im Geldautomatenfinder angezeigt werden, unterstÃ¼zen Mastercard.Eine Ãœbersicht unserer Angebote und GebÃ¼hren findest du auf unserer Website (neuen Tab).

title: Wie erÃ¶ffne ich mein N26 Konto?
content: Du kannst ein N26 Konto in der App (auf deinem Smartphone) oder in derÂ WebApp (neuen Tab)Â erÃ¶ffnen, wenn du:mindestens 18 Jahre alt bistin einem unterstÃ¼tzten Land lebstein kompatibles Smartphone besitztein unterstÃ¼tztes Ausweisdokument hastnoch kein Konto bei uns hastdich in einer unserer unterstÃ¼tzten Sprachen verifizieren kannst (Deutsch, Englisch, Spanisch, FranzÃ¶sisch, Italienisch).So meldest du dich an:Nachdem du deine Email, persÃ¶nlichen Daten und die Lieferadresse bestÃ¤tigt hast, wÃ¤hle deinen gewÃ¼nschten Kontotypen aus. *Weise deine IdentitÃ¤t nach und verknÃ¼pfe dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto.Ab jetzt kannst du Ã¼ber SEPA oder FPS Ãœberweisungen dein Konto aufladen oder Ã¼ber CASH26 Bargeld auf dein Konto einzahlen (wenn du in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich oder Italien bist).Nach einigen Tagen erhÃ¤ltst du deine Mastercard per Post.Falls du noch mehr erfahren mÃ¶chtest, kontaktiere uns gerne.*Wenn deine BonitÃ¤t die Mindestanforderungen erfÃ¼llt, kannst du ein N26 Konto erÃ¶ffnen. Falls nicht, kÃ¶nnen wir dir mÃ¶glicherweise ein N26 Flex Konto (nur in Deutschland) anbieten. Diese Entscheidung wird automatisch berechnet. Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: Â¿Puede N26 cerrar mi cuenta?
content:
En resumidas cuentas: sÃ­.N26, como banco plenamente acreditado, debe llevar a cabo inspecciones tÃ©cnicas rutinarias de las cuentas de sus clientes. Como entidad regulada, esto nos ayuda a asegurar que los fondos mantenidos en las cuentas de N26 estÃ©n seguros y protegidos.A veces, los resultados de estas inspecciones rutinarias pueden obligarnos a rescindir nuestra relaciÃ³n comercial con un titular de una cuenta.Cuando este sea el caso, el titular de la cuenta serÃ¡ informado de la situaciÃ³n por email. En cada circunstancia, N26 se pondrÃ¡ en contacto contigo Ãºnicamente en la direcciÃ³n de email asociada a tu cuenta de N26. En este email se proporcionarÃ¡n instrucciones claras sobre los prÃ³ximos pasos que debes dar.Presta atenciÃ³n y comprueba que este tipo de emails provengan de N26. Solamente nos pondremos en contacto contigo en la direcciÃ³n de email asociada a tu cuenta de N26 y nunca a travÃ©s de SMS o mÃ³vil; ademÃ¡s, nunca te pediremos los detalles de tu cuenta de N26, contraseÃ±a o detalles de tu tarjeta.
Â¿CÃ³mo puede N26 cerrar mi cuenta?Podemos cerrar tu cuenta de 3 maneras: con notificaciÃ³n previa de 2 meses, de 14 dÃ­as, o de forma inmediata. Estas cancelaciones son definitivas: AtenciÃ³n al cliente no puede proporcionarte informaciÃ³n sobre el trasfondo de casos individuales ni tampoco puede cambiar la decisiÃ³n. TÃº tambiÃ©n puedes rescindir tu relaciÃ³n comercial con nosotros en cualquier momento, de forma inmediata y sin ninguna justificaciÃ³n. Antes de la rescisiÃ³n se deberÃ¡ pagar, eso sÃ­, cualquier comisiÃ³n del contrato que quede pendiente.2 meses de preavisoTenemos derecho a rescindir cualquier relaciÃ³n comercial con 2 meses de preaviso sin ninguna justificaciÃ³n (consulta la secciÃ³n 13 (1) de nuestrosÂ T&C (pestaÃ±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,Â consulta la secciÃ³n 19 (1) de nuestrosÂ T&C (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â o Â§ 675h del CÃ³digo Civil AlemÃ¡n).14 dÃ­as de preavisoTambiÃ©n podemos rescindir nuestra relaciÃ³n comercial con una notificaciÃ³n previa de 14 dÃ­as si hay una causa razonable debida al incumplimiento de las obligaciones contractuales (consulta la secciÃ³n 13 (3) de nuestrosÂ T&C (pestaÃ±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,Â consulta la secciÃ³n 19 (3) de nuestrosÂ T&C (pestaÃ±a nueva)). Dichas causas incluyen pero no se limitan a:Utilizar una cuenta personal para fines comerciales.Â SegÃºn nuestros TÃ©rminos y Condiciones de uso, una cuenta privada solo puede utilizarse para fines personales. Cualquier transferencia que estÃ© relacionada con honorarios profesionales por la prestaciÃ³n de servicios y/o la venta de productos, estÃ¡ considerada como una transacciÃ³n comercial. Si quieres utilizar tu cuenta con este propÃ³sito, por favor regÃ­strate para una cuentaÂ N26 BusinessÂ oÂ N26 Business You.Proporcionar informaciÃ³n incorrecta o insuficiente para los controles rutinarios.Â Somos un banco, por eso hacemosÂ controles rutinariosÂ de vez en cuando. Si no proporcionas la informaciÃ³n correcta o suficiente sobre la transacciÃ³n en cuestiÃ³n, tenemos derecho a cesar nuestra relaciÃ³n comercial para asÃ­ cumplir con las regulaciones financieras Alemanas.Tener un comportamiento abusivo con algÃºn miembro de N26.Â No toleramos los comportamientos abusivos contra nuestros empleados. Tanto una amenaza de daÃ±o fÃ­sico como cualquier otro tipo de abuso en general, puede considerarse un delito de acuerdo con la legislaciÃ³n alemana y se denunciarÃ¡ a las autoridades competentes sin excepciÃ³n.CancelaciÃ³n inmediataPodrÃ­amos incluso rescindir nuestra relaciÃ³n comercial inmediatamente de forma extraordinaria (consulta la secciÃ³n 13 (3) de nuestrosÂ T&C (pestaÃ±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,Â consulta la secciÃ³n 19 (3) de nuestrosÂ T&C (pestaÃ±a nueva)). Esto quiere decir en cualquier momento, sin notificaciÃ³n previa y sin un periodo de cancelaciÃ³n, en caso de que haya una causa razonable de rescisiÃ³n. Esto incluye pero no se limita a:Proporcionar extractos incorrectos a N26 sobre tu situaciÃ³n econÃ³mica, especialmente cuando solicitas un crÃ©dito.No puedes pagar tu prÃ©stamo o cualquier otra deuda que tengas con N26.No cumples las condiciones de N26 en lo referido a los prÃ©stamos (consulta la provisiÃ³n o aumento de fianzas, secciÃ³n 13 (2) de nuestrosÂ T&C (pestaÃ±a nueva)).

title: Cos'Ã¨ un footer di sicurezza e perchÃ© ne abbiamo incluso uno?
content: Una nota di sicurezza Ã¨ un messaggio personalizzato apposto alla fine delle email e dei documenti digitali che funge da sigillo di autenticitÃ .Aggiungendo il tuo nome completo alla fine di ogni email, il nostro obiettivo Ã¨ aiutarti a distinguere le email legittime inviate da N26 dalle email di phishing inviate dai truffatori.Â Anche se una nota o footer di sicurezza non puÃ² darti la certezza assoluta che un'email provenga da una fonte verificata, aiuta a mitigare il rischio di phishing ingannevole, il tipo piÃ¹ comune di attacco di phishing.Cos'Ã¨ il phishing ingannevole?Il phishing ingannevole Ã¨ la pratica illecita per cui si inviano email di phishing generiche a grandi quantitÃ  di persone sconosciute con l'obiettivo di ottenere informazioni riservate con scuse ingannevoli.Come Ã¨ possibile?Â I truffatori si mettono in contatto con i propri bersagli dicendo di lavorare per aziende molto conosciute. Le vittime hanno cosÃ¬ un falso senso di sicurezza dovuto all'immagine del marchio e vengono attirati con urgenze temporali e linguaggio ingannevole. I truffatori cercano poi di manipolare le vittime che hanno preso di mira per soddisfare le loro richieste.Come puoi proteggerti?Presta particolare attenzione alle email che ricevi da banche, clienti, datori di lavoro, ecc. Se ti viene chiesto di fare qualcosa, non agire impulsivamente: rifletti bene prima di agire.Â Se hai la sensazione che qualcosa non quadri, non ignorare il sospetto. Fai caso a errori di ortografia e grammatica, passa il cursore sopra (senza cliccare) gli URL nascosti, controlla i dettagli del mittente e fai qualche ricerca: un controllo online veloce puÃ² aiutarti a verificare lâ€™identitÃ  del mittente.Se hai ricevuto un'email, una telefonata e/o un SMS a nome di N26, inoltra i tuoi dubbi al nostro Supporto Clienti all'indirizzo support@n26.com. Se vuoi comunicarci problemi legati al tuo conto, scrivici tramite la nostra app mobile.Scopri di piÃ¹ su:Come segnalare email e messaggi sospetti (nuova tabella)Hai ricevuto un messaggio o una telefonata sospetta? (nuova tabella)Social engineering: impara a proteggerti dai tentativi di frode (nuova tabella)

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATMâ€™s nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A â‚¬2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (weâ€™ll remind you via push message when youâ€™re running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we canâ€™t reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, thereâ€™s a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A â‚¬2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2â‚¬.

title: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
content: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around â‚¬2. For the time being, weâ€™re unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, hereâ€™s a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:Â AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you couldâ€™ve been charged an ATM fee.

title: Wie kann ich meinen Kreditantrag widerrufen?
content: Der Widerruf vonÂ N26 CreditÂ Darlehen ist kostenlos und innerhalb von 14 Tagen nach Unterzeichnung eines Kreditvertrages mÃ¶glich.Wir benÃ¶tigen eine schriftliche BestÃ¤tigung deiner Widerrufsanfrage, daher ist es am besten, wenn du mit uns chattest. Ab hier kÃ¼mmern wir uns darum; wir benachrichtigen dich per E-Mail, wenn der Vertrag aufgehoben wurde.Bitte stelle sicher, dass der volle Betrag deines Guthabens auf deinem Konto verfÃ¼gbar ist, bis der Widerruf abgeschlossen ist.Wenn dein Guthaben von einem unserer Partner ausgezahlt wird, wende dich bitte direkt an diesen. Wir arbeiten mit auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Deutschland und Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in Frankreich zusammen.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).Â Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the â€œOwnerâ€, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:Â Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.Â Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.Â Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Ownerâ€™s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, theyâ€™ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.Â N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How to change my card limits?
content: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:â‚¬1,000 for withdrawals from ATMsâ‚¬5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500â‚¬ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050â‚¬ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:â‚¬20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around â‚¬2. For the time being, weâ€™re unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, hereâ€™s a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:Â AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you couldâ€™ve been charged an ATM fee.

title: Wie melde ich mein N26 Konto fÃ¼r meine Steuerzahlungen in Frankreich an?
content: (gilt fÃ¼r alle in Frankreich ansÃ¤ssigen Kunden)Nach dem allgemeinen FranzÃ¶sischen Steuergesetzbuch sind alle in Frankreich ansÃ¤ssigen Personen verpflichtet, all ihre Bankkonten anzugeben, die sie innerhalb des Jahres der EinkommenserklÃ¤rung erÃ¶ffnet, genutzt oder geschlossen haben. title: How to reorder a card?
content: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10â‚¬N26 Metal cards: 45â‚¬Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30â‚¬N26 Metal: 65â‚¬Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

title: Wie kann ich mein Konto schlieÃŸen?
content: Du willst dein N26 Girokonto kÃ¼ndigen? Das finden wir natÃ¼rlich schade. Wenn dein Kontostand negativ ist, musst du Geld auf dein Konto laden (neuen Tab). KÃ¼ndige dein N26 Girokonto erst, wenn dein Gesamtsaldo null ist â€“ das macht den Prozess sehr viel einfacher.Klicke hier (neuen Tab), um die online KontokÃ¼ndigung anzufangen (neuen Tab). Du musst dich anmelden, um deine IdentitÃ¤t zu verifizieren. Die Anwendung leitet dich dann durch die KontoschlieÃŸung.ZerstÃ¶re deine Bankkarte â€“ zum Beispiel, indem du sie mit einer Schere zerschneidest. Du solltest den Chip sowie den Magnetstreifen zerstÃ¶ren. Entsorge die Teile separat.Probleme mit der KontoschlieÃŸung?Wenn du eine italienische IBAN hast oder dich nicht einloggen kannst, sende uns bitte eine E-Mail an (neuen Tab)support@n26.com (neuen Tab) â€“ direkt von der E-Mail-Adresse, die du bei der Registration fÃ¼r dein N26 Konto verwendet hast. HÃ¤nge der E-Mail dieses KÃ¼ndigungsschreiben (neuen Tab) an. Im Formular mÃ¼ssen folgende Informationen beinhaltet sein:Einen Antrag fÃ¼r die SchlieÃŸung des N26 Kontos zu einem bestimmten Datum oder â€œso bald wie mÃ¶glichâ€,dein Name,deine N26 IBAN,solltest du noch Geld auf dem Konto haben: eine andere IBAN aus dem SEPA-Raum, auf den wir dein Restguthaben Ã¼berweisen kÃ¶nnen.

title: Come proteggere il mio conto?
content: La sicurezza del tuo conto e il tuo dati personali sono la nostra prioritÃ . Se ritieni che i tuoi dati di accesso di N26 possano essere compromessi o che qualcuno stia provando a contattarci per tuo conto, Ã¨ fondamentale cambiare immediatamente la password del tuo conto N26.Per fare ciÃ², effettua il log in nella tuo app e vai a Il mio conto > Sicurezza > Modifica la password di accesso. Per favore scegli una password sicura e non condividerne mai i dettagli con nessuno. In quanto titolare del conto, dovresti essere l'unico a creare e ad avere accesso ai tuoi dati. Per ulteriori consigli su come proteggere il tuo conto, ti invitiamo a leggere l'articolo "Come proteggere la mia identitÃ ?".Se ritieni che il tuo conto sia stato compromesso o manomesso, per favore contattaci immediatamente. Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

title: Â¿QuÃ© es IBAN para Espacios?
content: Con nuestra funciÃ³n IBAN para Espacios, tus Espacios serÃ¡n mÃ¡s Ãºtiles todavÃ­a.
