Los Espacios compartidos no pueden tener un IBAN asignado.Varios Espacios con IBAN: Puedes crear hasta 10 Espacios, cada uno de ellos con su IBAN particular, para ejercer un control aÃºn mayor sobre tus finanzas. Te advertimos de que, cuando hayas creado 3 Espacios, se activarÃ¡ un plazo de 24 horas durante el cual no podrÃ¡s asignarle un nuevo IBAN Ãºnico a un Espacio.Recibir transferencias: Puedes recibir transferencias directamente en un Espacio con un IBAN asignado.Enviar transferencias: Puedes hacer transferencias directamente desde un Espacio con un IBAN asignado.Pagar domiciliaciones bancarias: Puedes utilizar el IBAN Ãºnico de tu Espacio para abonar domiciliaciones bancarias directamente desde tu Espacio. Si no tienes fondos suficientes para sufragar el importe de la domiciliaciÃ³n bancaria, la transferencia se rechazarÃ¡ y se cobrarÃ¡ una comisiÃ³n en tu cuenta principal.Ver los datos del IBAN de tus Espacios: Puedes ver el IBAN de cada Espacio y, despuÃ©s, puedes utilizarlo para recibir transferencias de crÃ©dito y abonar domiciliaciones bancarias. Para ello, solo tienes que iniciar sesiÃ³n en la app del mÃ³vil o la web app, ir a la secciÃ³n Â«EspaciosÂ» y seleccionar el Espacio del que quieres consultar el IBAN. Si accedes a los Â«Ajustes del EspacioÂ», podrÃ¡s ver el IBAN y el BIC en la parte superior de la pantalla.CÃ³mo aÃ±adirle un IBAN a un Espacio:Puedes aÃ±adirles un IBAN (pestaÃ±a nueva) a tus Espacios siguiendo estos pasos:Inicia sesiÃ³n en la app del mÃ³vil de N26Pulsa Â«EspaciosÂ» para acceder al menÃº de EspaciosSelecciona el Espacio al que quieres asignar un IBAN ÃºnicoPulsa el Â«sÃ­mbolo de la ruedaÂ» de la parte superior derecha de la pantalla para ir a los Â«Ajustes del EspacioÂ»Sigue las pautas que te indica la app:Selecciona Â«Crear IBANÂ» >Lee la informaciÃ³n y pulsa Â«AÃ±adir IBAN a...Â» >Acepta los T&C >Introduce tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n >Pulsa Â«AceptarÂ» en la Ãºltima pantalla.CÃ³mo eliminar el IBAN de un Espacio:Para eliminar el IBAN (pestaÃ±a nueva) de un Espacio tendrÃ¡s que eliminar el propio Espacio y traspasar el saldo restante (de haberlo) a tu cuenta principal o a otro Espacio. Para eliminar un Espacio con IBAN, haz lo siguiente:Inicia sesiÃ³n en la app del mÃ³vil de N26Pulsa Â«EspaciosÂ»Selecciona el Espacio con IBAN que quieres eliminar (recuerda que, al hacerlo, eliminarÃ¡s el Espacio por completo y deberÃ¡s traspasar el saldo restante)Ve a Â«Ajustes del EspacioÂ» (haz clic en el Â«icono de la ruedaÂ» de la parte superior derecha)En Â«AdministrarÂ», tendrÃ¡s la opciÃ³n Â«Vaciar y eliminar espacioÂ»PÃºlsala y confirma que deseas eliminar el EspacioSelecciona tu cuenta principal u otro Espacio para traspasar el saldo restantePor Ãºltimo, pulsa Â«EliminarÂ» en la pantalla para confirmar.Puedes enviar transferencias SEPA desde los Espacios a los que hayas asignado un IBAN. Para ello, te rogamos que sigas las siguientes pautas:Ve al Espacio desde el que quieres efectuar una transferencia y pulsa Â«Enviar dineroÂ»Selecciona Â«Transferencia bancariaÂ»Selecciona el contacto al que deseas enviar dineroConfirma el importe que quieres enviar e introduce una referencia (opcional)Introduce tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n y pulsa Confirmar para finalizar la transferencia

title: CRR Disclosure Report
content: What is it ?The Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) is an EU law. Among others, it states an obligation for credit institutions to publish a disclosure report on an annual basis (Art. 433 CRR).Â Â Why is the Disclosure Report not published in our Support Center or somewhere else on our website?N26 Bank GmbH is not obliged to publish the CRR report on our website. Art. 434 (new tab) CRR only requires an â€œappropriate mediumâ€ and therefore leaves the decision up to each credit institution.N26 Bank GmbH publishes its CRR in www.bundesanzeiger.de (new tab)

title: Â¿Por quÃ© no he recibido la recompensa de la invitaciÃ³n?
content: Ten en cuenta que para recibir tu recompensa, tu amigo debe realizar una primera transacciÃ³n con su tarjeta (comprar en una tienda, retirar efectivo en un cajero automÃ¡tico o realizar un pago online, PayPal no incluido) por un valor igual o superior al de la recompensa de la invitaciÃ³n. Recuerda que la cantidad de la recompensa puede tardar hasta 60 dÃ­as en depositarse en tu cuenta.Â Una vez que la persona invitada haya cumplido con todos los requisitos de nuestro programaÂ Invita a un amigo, procesaremos tu recompensa. Puedes revisar el estado de tu recompensa siempre que quieras tanto en la app como en laÂ WebApp (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â al iniciar sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta.En la mayorÃ­a de los casos, si no recibes la recompensa suele ser porque tu amigo/a no ha realizado todavÃ­a una transacciÃ³n con la cantidad mÃ­nima requerida con su Mastercard Una transacciÃ³n que, como mÃ­nimo, iguale el valor de la recompensa o lo supere. AsegÃºrate de informar a tu amigo/a acerca de estos requisitos para que puedas recibir tu recompensa.Ten en cuenta que el proceso de recompensa puede tardar hasta 60 dÃ­as.N26 se reserva el derecho a retener la recompensa en caso de detectar una actividad sospechosa en violaciÃ³n de losÂ TÃ©rminos y Condiciones (pestaÃ±a nueva).

title: Comment fonctionnent les â€œMessagesâ€ ?
content:

Depuis votre espace en ligne, vous en Ãªtes Ã©galement informÃ© grÃ¢ce Ã  une banniÃ¨re informative qui sâ€™affiche au dessus de la liste de vos transactions.Pour communiquer, nous dÃ©marrons une conversation depuis votre boÃ®te de rÃ©ception Messages, et nous vous demanderons de rÃ©pondre directement dans cette conversation.Cette fonction est disponible dans notre application mobile, en cliquant sur l'icÃ´ne Aide en haut Ã  droite. title: Â¿CuÃ¡nto cuesta una cuenta N26?

title: How to change my debit card PIN?
content: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change itâ€”you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that youâ€™ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose â€˜Cardsâ€™ from the bottom right-handTap â€˜Card Settingsâ€™ and select the relevant cardSelect â€˜Reset PINâ€™Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transactionâ€”in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequencesâ€”such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isnâ€™t accepted, simply try again a different combination.Â If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that youâ€™ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.Weâ€™ve made aÂ video (new tab)Â to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If youâ€™ve lost your iPhone and arenâ€™t able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card wonâ€™t be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If youâ€™re using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if youâ€™re using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.Youâ€™ll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if youÂ reorder a card. Youâ€™ll then receive a tracking link by email. If youâ€™re not home during the delivery and your mailbox canâ€™t be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, itâ€™ll be returned to us. Weâ€™ll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. Itâ€™s currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.Itâ€™s not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once itâ€™s been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasnâ€™t arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you canâ€™t be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card: 30â‚¬Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30â‚¬N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card 65â‚¬

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in â‚¬ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we donâ€™t currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.Youâ€™ll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

title: Wie kann ich mich ausweisen?
content: Als Bank mÃ¼ssen wir wissen, wer du bist. Deshalb musst du uns ein zulÃ¤ssiges Ausweisdokument vorzeigen, wenn du ein Konto erÃ¶ffnen oder bestimmte Produkte nutzen mÃ¶chtest.Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine IdentitÃ¤t Ã¼ber andere Personen oder Unternehmen nachzuweisen. Wir haben einige Tipps gesammelt, um deine IdentitÃ¤t zu schÃ¼tzen.Du kannst uns deinen Ausweis mit zwei verschiedenen Methoden zeigen: Foto oder Video. Welches der beiden Verfahren gewÃ¤hlt wird, hÃ¤ngt von deiner NationalitÃ¤t, deinem Ausweisdokument und dem Land deines Wohnsitzes ab:Ich lebe in Deutschland (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Spanien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Italien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in einem anderen Land (neuen Tab)Als voll lizenzierte und regulierte Bank muss sich N26 bei der Verifizierung der IdentitÃ¤t aller potenziellen Kunden an strenge Branchenstandards und Richtlinien halten. Da diese je nach NationalitÃ¤t variieren, kÃ¶nnen wir den wichtigen Schritt der IdentitÃ¤tsprÃ¼fung nur mit bestimmten Arten von Ausweisdokumenten fÃ¼r bestimmte NationalitÃ¤ten durchfÃ¼hren.Wenn deine Ausweisdokumente derzeit nicht von uns akzeptiert werden, heiÃŸt das, dass wir dir aktuell kein Konto bei uns anbieten kÃ¶nnen. Wir fÃ¼gen jedoch laufend neue Ausweisdokumente zu dieser Liste hinzu. Es lohnt sich also, regelmÃ¤ÃŸig einen Blick darauf zu werfen, ob dein Ausweisdokument bereits hinzugefÃ¼gt wurde.Falls dein Wohnsitz in Deutschland liegt und du die Foto- oder Videoverifizierung aufgrund einer Behinderung nicht abschlieÃŸen kannst, beginne bitte mit der Registrierung deiner Daten und kontaktiere dann unseren Kundensupport. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: How to make N26 my main account?
content: We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: weâ€™ll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and weâ€™ll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.This is how you can make N26 your main account:Account switching service powered by finleap connect GmbHTogether with our partner finleap connect GmbH (new tab) weâ€™re offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. Itâ€™s an automated process and completely free. Log into your N26 mobile app and tap on My account > Switch to N26. Tap Start now and follow the instructions.Alternatively, you can use ourÂ form (new tab)Â and log in with your previous bank account details. Once youâ€™ve filled in all required information, itâ€™ll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo pedir mi tarjeta con envÃ­o express?
content: El envÃ­o express es una buena opciÃ³n si necesitas la tarjeta con urgencia, o bien si el correo postal ha fallado por alguna razÃ³n.TendrÃ¡s la opciÃ³n de elegir envÃ­o express al momento de seleccionar el mÃ©todo de envÃ­o. TambiÃ©n recibirÃ¡s un enlace de seguimiento por correo electrÃ³nico. Si no estÃ¡s en casa durante la entrega y no te es posible acceder a tu buzÃ³n, la tarjeta serÃ¡ depositada en un punto de entrega cercano (podrÃ¡s encontrarlo siguiendo el enlace que te proporcionaremos). La tarjeta permanecerÃ¡ en el nuevo punto de entrega durante un tiempo limitado y despuÃ©s serÃ¡ devuelta a N26. Te informaremos vÃ­a email si esto Ãºltimo ocurre.Ten en cuenta que:Tu nueva N26 Mastercard estarÃ¡ allÃ­ en un plazo de 3-5 dÃ­as hÃ¡biles.Las entregas se hacen entre las 08:00 y las 12:00 de la maÃ±ana. Los envÃ­os pueden realizarse mediante DHL Express a todos los paÃ­ses en los que trabajamos dentro de Europa. No es posible realizar envÃ­os a otros paÃ­ses.No es posible cancelar o cambiar el envÃ­o express una vez que ya lo has elegido como modo de envÃ­o.Para cerrar una cuenta, deberÃ¡s pagar el envÃ­o express de tu tarjeta en caso de que lo hayas solicitado.Si tu tarjeta no ha llegado en un plazo de 3-5 dÃ­as laborables tras realizar el pedido, por favor, revisa el enlace de seguimiento de tu pedido para estar al corriente. TambiÃ©n puedes usar el enlace de seguimiento para informar a DHL directamente sobre los detalles de la direcciÃ³n de entrega, o para cambiar la direcciÃ³n si sabes que no vas a poder estar ahÃ­ en el momento de la entrega.Â¿CuÃ¡nto cuesta el envÃ­o exprÃ©s?Tarjetas N26 Standard, Smart y You:Primera tarjeta al abrir tu cuenta: 25 â‚¬Solicitar una nueva tarjeta: 30 â‚¬Tarjeta extra N26 You: 30 â‚¬Tarjetas de Metal N26:Primera tarjeta al abrir tu cuenta: 25 â‚¬Solicitar una nueva tarjeta 65 â‚¬

title: What are the benefits of N26 Smart?
content: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra Virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces (new tab): 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces (new tab): Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.You can compare N26 Smart with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these (new tab) in mind when considering N26 Smart:The N26 Smart Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay. Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Smart fee in order to receive the card.

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app youâ€™ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upperÂ right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.â„¹ï¸ Â Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: How to use Bizum with N26?
content: Bizum is a payment platform integrated into the N26 app that connects your phone number with your bank account. It allows you to send and receive moneyinstantly between customers of different banks, using only the recipient's phone number.With Bizum you can also request money from someone, sending notifications to the sender. Once your request is accepted, you will receive the money immediately.Requirements to use Bizum with your N26 account:Have a Spanish IBAN (new tab) (ES)Have access to the phone number registered in your bank account (new tab). Always remember to keep your phone number up to date.Have your smartphone paired to the N26 app (new tab).How to activate Bizum on N26?Super easy! Go to the Home app screen and click on â€œSend moneyâ€, then click on â€œGet startedâ€. You will have to confirm your phone number and then you will have completed the registration.What to do if it is not possible to complete the registration in Bizum because the phone number is already in use in another account?This can happen for various reasons, we recommend:Check that your phone number is up to date on N26.Keep in mind that, so far, it is only possible to have Bizum linked only to one bank account. Therefore, if you are already using it on another account, you will have to unlink it from there or follow the Portability steps explained below to use Bizum on N26.If your situation is not one of the two mentioned above, we recommend that you contact our Customer Service from the app for further assistance.Portability: How to bring your Bizum account to N26 from another bank?During the activation of Bizum in N26, after entering your personal data, the app will identify if you are already registered in Bizum with another Bank. In order to activate it on N26, you will have to enter a code that we will send you by text message.How does Bizum work?Go to the Home screen and click on â€˜Send moneyâ€™ or â€˜Receive moneyâ€™, depending on what you want to do; enter your friendâ€™s phone number and the amount. The money you send will arrive instantly, and the requested money will enter your account as soon as the notification is accepted.Limits:How many Bizum transactions can you make?You can receive a maximum of 60 transfers by Bizum per month and make as many shipments as they want.How much money can be sent through Bizum?Bizum's limits are as follows:The amount of each transaction can be from â‚¬0.50 to â‚¬500.You can send or receive up to a maximum of â‚¬2,000 per dayYou can send a maximum of â‚¬5,000 and receive a maximum of â‚¬60,000 per month.How to deactivate Bizum on N26?You have to go to the â€œMy accountâ€ section from the N26 app, then click on â€œBizum settingsâ€, and finally on â€œDe-activateâ€. You will need the confirmation PIN to complete this procedure.What to do if I change my phone number?You will first need to update your phone number (new tab) from the N26 app.Â Then, if you had already completed the registration in Bizum, then you will have to deactivate it as mentioned above and register again. In this way, the system will update your phone number in Bizum as well.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. Weâ€™ll ask you to confirm your payment viaÂ push messageÂ during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didnâ€™t set it up yet, youâ€™ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If youâ€™re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals donâ€™t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in â‚¬ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we donâ€™t currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.Youâ€™ll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

title: Wie Ã¼berweise ich in FremdwÃ¤hrungen?
content: Wir arbeiten mit Wise zusammen, um einfache Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen (neuen Tab) zu ermÃ¶glichen. Wise bietet Echtzeit-Wechselkurse ohne versteckte GebÃ¼hren.Um eine Ãœberweisung mit Wise durchzufÃ¼hren, logge dich zunÃ¤chst in deiner mobilen App ein:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.WÃ¤hle AuslandsÃ¼berweisung.FÃ¼ge einen neuen EmpfÃ¤nger hinzu oder wÃ¤hle einen bestehenden Kontakt aus. Wenn du einen neuen Kontakt hinzufÃ¼gst, kannst du die gewÃ¼nschte WÃ¤hrung auswÃ¤hlen, indem du auf die Europa-Flagge in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms tippst. Gib den Betrag und die Bankverbindung des EmpfÃ¤ngers an.SchlieÃŸe die Ãœberweisung mit deiner BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ab.Wenn wir deine gewÃ¼nschte WÃ¤hrung noch nicht anbieten, besuche bitte die Wise Website (neuen Tab)fÃ¼r eine noch grÃ¶ÃŸere Auswahl. Damit kannst du dich einloggen und die Ãœberweisung abschlieÃŸen. Andernfalls wirst du nicht die E-Mail von Wise fÃ¼r die ZurÃ¼cksetzung deines Passworts erhalten.Bitte beachte auch, dass mit dem N26 Business, Business You und N26 Business Metal Konto in der App weder Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen, noch Ãœberweisungen an Unternehmen mÃ¶glich sind.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? title: Â¿CÃ³mo proteger mi cuenta?
content: La seguridad de tu cuenta y tu informaciÃ³n personal es nuestra mÃ¡xima prioridad.Si alguna vez tienes la sensaciÃ³n de que los credenciales de acceso a tu cuenta N26 pueden estar comprometidos, o de que alguien estÃ¡ intentando hacerse pasar por ti, es crucial que cambies la contraseÃ±a de tu cuenta N26 inmediatamente.Para hacerlo, inicia sesiÃ³n en la app y ve a Mi cuenta > Seguridad > Cambiar contraseÃ±a de inicio de sesiÃ³n. Por favor, crea una contraseÃ±a segura y no reveles tus credenciales a nadie.Como titular de la cuenta, tÃº y solo tÃº deberÃ­as conocer tus credenciales de inicio de sesiÃ³n. Te recomendamos que visites nuestro artÃ­culo Â¿CÃ³mo proteger mi identidad? para ver consejos sobre la protecciÃ³n de tu identidad.Si crees que tu cuenta puede estar comprometida o que se ha alterado algo, por favor, ponte en contacto con nosotros inmediatamente.Si no tienes acceso a la app de tu mÃ³vil ni a la WebApp, tambiÃ©n puedes pedir que bloqueemos tu tarjeta o tu cuenta llamando al +34 910 480 660.

title: Why do I need to update my personal information?
content: Starting from mid-August 2022, we will contact our customers residing in Italy and holders of an N26 account with Italian Iban, with the aim of verifying and keeping their personal information up to date.As a bank, we are required by law to keep our customers' personal information correct and up-to-date, with the aim of preventing the use of the financial system for the purposes of money laundering and terrorist financing.This process involves the periodic verification and updating of personal data and the compilation of a due diligence questionnaire, which includes additional financial information about our customers.What information do I need to update?When you receive our communication regarding this, by logging in to your N26 app, you will be immediately directed to the process of updating your personal information.Before proceeding, make sure you have updated the app to the latest version available. The operation can only be done through the app associated with your smartphone (it will not be displayed when you log in from the WebApp).First of all, you will be asked to verify and confirm your personal data:Name and surnamePlace and date of birthNationalityGenderTax informationIn the next step, you will then need to validate your legal address and your shipping address, if different.As a last step, you will be asked to fill in the due diligence questionnaire, in order to ensure the integration and updating of relevant information required by banking legislation. This is a quick procedure, the operation will only take you a few minutes.Remember, the update and the questionnaire must be completed even if your information has remained unchanged.Please note that, in accordance with the legislation in force, the updating of your data and the questionnaire must be completed even if your information has remained unchanged.Furthermore, the processing of your data is subject to the European regulation on data protection and privacy (GDPR). You can find more information on our privacy policy (new tab).What is the due diligence questionnaire?The anti-money laundering legislation referred to in Legislative Decree 231/2007 requires the bank to regularly collect updated information on its customers, with the aim of preventing the use of the financial system for the purposes of money laundering and terrorist financing. and as a condition for maintaining relationships and transactions between customers and the bank.For this reason, we will submit a short questionnaire, within your N26 app, where we will ask you to answer a series of questions regarding your net worth, your current employment, the origin of the funds in your account and the use you make of your N26 account.We will check the data you have entered and, if necessary, we will contact you at a later time. For this, please make sure you have your app updated to the latest version available and always monitor incoming communications in the "Messages from N26" from the "Support" section of your app.What happens if I don't complete the procedure as required?We suggest you to complete the transaction as soon as possible, so that you can continue to have full access to all the features of your N26 account.In the event that the information is not updated within a reasonable period, N26 will be obliged to refrain from continuing the contractual relationship with the customer (Article 42 of Legislative Decree 231/2007).After the first 30 days, you will still be able to complete the questionnaire, but we will be forced to temporarily limit certain features of your account (e.g. incoming payments, such as salary) until you have met this regulatory requirement.

title: What to do if my card is lost or itâ€™s been compromised?
content: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.Â Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).Â You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

title: Deposit fee
content: From July 2022, we have decided to no longer collect this feeFor every N26 account (except N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal) opened on or after 19.10.2020, and exceeding a balance of 50.000â‚¬, a 0,5% deposit fee per year applies, as was outlined in your terms and conditions during the account sign up process.Â Please find here (new tab) the related terms and conditions.The deposit fee will be calculated by tracking the balance of your account on a daily basis, for each day of the month. Every day that your balance exceeds the threshold of 50.000â‚¬, a 0,5% per annum fee will be applied to the excess of the account balance.Â The fee will be charged directly from your account at the beginning of each month for the previous 30 days.Â If your account balance might exceed the above mentioned threshold, and you donâ€™t want to incur this fee, there are two ways that you can prevent yourself from being charged:Â Upgrade to N26 You (new tab), N26 Business You (new tab), N26 Metal (new tab)or N26 Business MetalÂ  (new tab)For our German customers, open an EasyFlex Savings account (new tab) and transfer your excess funds there (please take note of eligibility requirements)

title: Come posso richiedere un'assicurazione N26?
content: La nuova Assicurazione N26 on-demand consente a tutti i clienti N26 di ottenere una copertura per smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch e altri dispositivi elettronici contro furti, rapine, danni accidentali o causati da liquidi. Puoi acquistare l'assicurazione direttamente dalla tua app N26 e disdirla quando vuoi.Come funziona?Se desideri sottoscrivere un'Assicurazione N26 on-demand per dispositivi elettronici, ti basta effettuare il login nell'app N26, andare su Esplora e cliccare sul banner con su scritto "Assicurazione".DopodichÃ© ti verrÃ  chiesto di inserire alcuni dettagli relativi al tuo dispositivo, selezionare la fatturazione mensile o annuale e confermare la richiesta. La copertura per il tuo smartphone sarÃ  attiva dal giorno seguente all'acquisto della polizza e puÃ² essere disdetta in qualsiasi momento dalla tua app mobile N26 o tramite WebApp.Come posso richiedere un risarcimento?Una volta iniziata la procedura di indennizzo nell'app N26 verrai reindirizzato per registrare la richiesta sul portale online di Simplesurance (nuova tabella). Accedi con il tuo numero del certificato e il PIN che puoi trovare nel certificato dell'assicurazione ricevuto nei Messaggi da N26.Ti preghiamo di notare che ogni cliente puÃ² presentare al massimo 2 richieste di risarcimento all'anno. Dopo il secondo reclamo andato a buon fine, l'assicurazione scade automaticamente.Per ulteriori informazioni, fai sempre riferimento al documento con i Termini e Condizioni che verrÃ  inviato ai tuoi Messaggi nell'app subito dopo aver acquistato la tua polizza. Inoltre, puoi sempre contattarci all'indirizzo support@simplesurance.de per qualsiasi domanda riguardo la tua polizza o la tua richiesta di indennizzo.Sono idoneo?L'Assicurazione N26 Ã¨ disponibile per tutti i clienti. I clienti N26 Metal non possono sottoscrivere un'assicurazione per il cellulare, tuttavia questa Ã¨ giÃ  inclusa nella loro sottoscrizione N26 Metal. Assicurati di aver installato l'ultima versione dell'app N26. Attualmente, l'Assicurazione N26 Ã¨ disponibile per i clienti N26 in Austria, Belgio, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Lettonia, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Paesi Passi, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna e Germania.Questa polizza non copre i dispositivi acquistati al di fuori dell'Europa.

title: Warum funktioniert meine Video-Verifizierung nicht?
content: Einige Tipps fÃ¼r eine erfolgreiche Video-Verifizierung:Die meisten Anrufe scheitern aufgrund einer schwachen Internetverbindung oder schlechter BildqualitÃ¤t (z.B. zu verschwommen oder unterbelichtet). Bitte fÃ¼hre den Anruf in einer hellen Umgebung durch, verwende ein Smartphone mit einer guten Kamera und stelle sicher, dass du eine schnelle Internetverbindung hast.Bitte gehe sicher, dass du die einzige Person im Video bist.Du musst in einem unserer unterstÃ¼tzten LÃ¤nder leben, um ein Konto bei uns erÃ¶ffnen zu kÃ¶nnen.Wir akzeptieren nur nationale Ausweise und ReisepÃ¤sse (FÃ¼hrerscheine oder Aufenthaltsgenehmigungen sind nicht zulÃ¤ssig). Stelle auÃŸerdem sicher, dass dein Ausweisdokument unbeschÃ¤digt ist.Sobald deine IdentitÃ¤tsprÃ¼fung abgeschlossen ist, benÃ¶tigst du noch einen Mindestbetrag auf deinem Konto, damit deine Karte automatisch produziert und geliefert wird. Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: Rapport CRR
content: De quoi sâ€™agit-il ?Le rÃ¨glement sur les exigences de fonds propres (CRR, Capital Requirements Regulation) est un texte europÃ©en. Il prÃ©voit notamment lâ€™obligation pour les Ã©tablissements de crÃ©dit de publier un rapport annuel (art. 433 du CRR).Pourquoi le rapport nâ€™est-il pas publiÃ© dans notre Support Center ou ailleurs sur notre site internet ?N26 Bank GmbH nâ€™est pas obligÃ©e de publier le rapport CRR sur son site internet. Lâ€™art. 434 CRR (nouvel onglet) exige uniquement des Ã©tablissements de crÃ©dit un Â« support appropriÃ© Â» de leur choix.N26 Bank GmbH publie son rapport CRR sur www.bundesanzeiger.de (nouvel onglet).

title: How to close my account?
content: Weâ€™re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. Weâ€™d love to keep you as a customerâ€”tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.Â If youâ€™ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, hereâ€™s what to do:Make your account balance â‚¬0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is â‚¬0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). Youâ€™ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or youâ€™re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or â€œas soon as possibleâ€Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, weâ€™ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

title: Â¿QuÃ© es Tarjetas para Espacios?
content: Con nuestra nueva funciÃ³n Tarjetas para Espacios, tus subcuentas individuales adquirirÃ¡n una nueva funcionalidad que te permitirÃ¡ vincular tu Mastercard de N26 a uno de tus Espacios y gastar directamente desde ahÃ­.Â¿CÃ³mo funciona?Tarjetas para Espacios les permite a los clientes de N26 que tengan una suscripciÃ³n premium (N26 Smart, You o Metal) vincular su tarjeta Mastercard fÃ­sica o virtual a un Espacio y utilizar los fondos deÂ la subcuenta para gastos personales. A continuaciÃ³n, te ofrecemos un resumen de las funciones disponibles para vincular tu Mastercard de N26 a un Espacio:Â PodrÃ¡s vincular tu tarjeta Mastercard a uno de tus Espacios y de nuevo a tu cuenta principal con un solo clicPuedes vincular mÃ¡s de una tarjeta a un Espacio o a varios EspaciosSi vinculas una tarjeta fÃ­sica a un Espacio, esto te permitirÃ¡ utilizar Apple y Google Pay automÃ¡ticamente con esa tarjetaEsta funciÃ³n todavÃ­a no estÃ¡ disponible para los Espacios CompartidosÂ¿CÃ³mo puedo vincular mi tarjeta a un Espacio?PodrÃ¡s vincular tus tarjetas virtuales y fÃ­sicas actuales al Espacio que elijas.Hay 3 formas de hacerlo:En la pestaÃ±a Tarjetas encontrarÃ¡s, debajo de cada tarjeta, un botÃ³n para seleccionar el Espacio que hayas escogido.En ConfiguraciÃ³n de la tarjeta tambiÃ©n puedes seleccionar el espacio que hayas escogido y vincularlo a tu tarjeta.En cada configuraciÃ³n de un Espacio, podrÃ¡s seleccionar la tarjeta que quieras vincular a ese Espacio concreto.Cuando quieras volver a vincular tu tarjeta a tu cuenta principal o a otro Espacio, solo tienes que seleccionar Cuenta principal u otro Espacio en el menÃº desplegable.

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs â‚¬9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if youâ€™re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Was ist meine PIN?
content: Das Wichtigste zuerst: Bei N26 gibt es zwei verschiedene PIN-Codes â€“ deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN und deine Karten-PIN. Gut zu wissen: Du kannst beide PINs selbst erstellen.Mit deiner BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) bestÃ¤tigst du alle Aktionen, die du in der App machst â€“ zum Beispiel Ãœberweisungen, PasswortÃ¤nderungen, CASH26 etc. Du erstellst die BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN in der App, wenn du dein Konto zum ersten Mal mit deinem Smartphone verknÃ¼pfst.Du kannst sie hier Ã¤ndern: Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscode.Deine Karten-PIN (neuen Tab) brauchst du beim Geldabheben oder wenn du in einem GeschÃ¤ft mit Karte zahlen willst. Du erstellst deine Karten-PIN in der App, gleich nachdem du deine N26 Karte erhalten und aktiviert hast. Du kannst sie hier Ã¤ndern: Karten > Einstellungen > PIN zurÃ¼cksetzen. Falls du in Frankreich, Spanien, Irland, Griechenland, Finnland oder Estland lebst, musst du Bargeld abheben, um deine neue PIN zu bestÃ¤tigen.Wichtig:Wir senden dir niemals eine PIN per Post oder Ã¼ber einen unserer KommunikationskanÃ¤le. Nur du selbst solltest deine PINs kennen.Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden akzeptieren wir keine PINs, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder einer Kombination aus Wiederholungen oder Zahlenreihen (z. B. 1994, 1331 oder 1234) zusammensetzen. Falls deine gewÃ¼nschte Nummer nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Weitere Informationen Ã¼ber diese PINs findest du in den entsprechenden Support Center Artikeln, die wir oben fÃ¼r dich verlinkt haben.

title: Â¿QuÃ© es un pie de pÃ¡gina de seguridad y por quÃ© hemos incluido uno?
content: Un pie de pÃ¡gina de seguridad es un mensaje personalizado que se aÃ±ade al final de los emails y documentos digitales, con la finalidad de actuar como sello de autenticidad.Al aÃ±adir tu nombre completo al final de cada correo, nuestro objetivo es ayudarte a diferenciar entre los emails autÃ©nticos enviados por N26 y los emails de phishing enviados por estafadores.Â Aunque un pie de pÃ¡gina de seguridad no puede demostrar con certeza que un email procede de una fuente verificada, ayuda a reducir el riesgo de phishing engaÃ±oso, el tipo mÃ¡s comÃºn de ataque de phishing.Â¿QuÃ© es el phishing engaÃ±oso?El phishing engaÃ±oso es una prÃ¡ctica ilegal que consiste en enviar correos genÃ©ricos de phishing a grandes cantidades de personas desconocidas, con el objetivo de obtener informaciÃ³n confidencial haciÃ©ndose pasar por otras personas.Â¿CÃ³mo lo consiguen?Â Los estafadores contactan con sus vÃ­ctimas fingiendo trabajar para empresas conocidas. Proporcionan a las vÃ­ctimas una falsa sensaciÃ³n de seguridad con la imagen de la marca y lenguaje engaÃ±oso, fingiendo que se ha producido una situaciÃ³n urgente. Una vez captadas, los estafadores intentan manipular a sus vÃ­ctimas para que satisfagan sus exigencias.Â¿CÃ³mo puedes protegerte?Presta mucha atenciÃ³n a los emails que recibes de bancos, clientes, empleadores, etc. Si te piden que hagas algo, nunca actÃºes de forma impulsiva; piensa bien antes de hacer nada.Â Si sospechas que hay algo que no cuadra, hazle caso a tu instinto. FÃ­jate en si hay faltas de ortografÃ­a y gramÃ¡tica, pasa el ratÃ³n por encima de las URL ocultas (sin hacer clic en ellas), comprueba los datos del remitente e investiga: una verificaciÃ³n rÃ¡pida online te ayudarÃ¡ a verificar la identidad del remitente.Si has recibido un email, llamada telefÃ³nica o SMS sospechosos en nombre de N26, comunÃ­cale tus sospechas a nuestro Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente a travÃ©s de support@n26.com. Si quieres hablar de problemas relacionados con tu cuenta, chatea con nosotros a travÃ©s de la app del mÃ³vil.ObtÃ©n mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre:CÃ³mo denunciar las sospechas de ataques de phishing (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â¿CÃ³mo mantener seguros mis datos bancarios online? (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â¿Has recibido un mensaje sospechoso? (pestaÃ±a nueva)

title: Pourquoi dois-je envoyer des documents supplÃ©mentaires ?
content: Une fois que vous avez commencÃ© le processus de vÃ©rification pour ouvrir votre compte bancaire N26 et que vous recevez un email de notre part vous demandant des informations supplÃ©mentaires pour donner suite Ã  votre demande dâ€™ouverture de compte, veuillez lire les informations ci-dessous.N26 est une banque agrÃ©Ã©e. Dans certains cas, nous avons besoin dâ€™informations supplÃ©mentaires de nos clients pour donner suite Ã  la demande dâ€™ouverture de compte. Il sâ€™agit dâ€™une demande standard conforme aux exigences lÃ©gales et rÃ©glementaires. Nous vous demanderons de nous fournir des documents spÃ©cifiques pour ouvrir un compte bancaire N26.Nous sommes conscients que ces informations revÃªtent un caractÃ¨re trÃ¨s personnel. Les informations que vous nous communiquez resteront donc strictement confidentielles. Ces informations ne seront utilisÃ©es que pour remplir nos obligations lÃ©gales.Quels documents dois-je envoyer ?AprÃ¨s avoir entamÃ© le processus de vÃ©rification et reÃ§u un email de notre part vous demandant des informations supplÃ©mentaires, vous devrez rÃ©pondre Ã  lâ€™email que nous vous avons envoyÃ© en fournissant les informations ci-dessous. Vous ne devrez envoyer que les documents mentionnÃ©s dans lâ€™email. Voici une liste des documents que nous pouvons vous demander :Justificatif de domicile : Exemple : Facture de gaz, dâ€™eau ou dâ€™Ã©lectricitÃ© (datant de moins de 3 mois). Ou certificat dâ€™immatriculation.Justificatif de revenus : Exemple : Un contrat de travail, un bulletin de paie ou une dÃ©claration de patrimoine et de revenus (si vous nous envoyez lâ€™un de ces deux derniers documents, veuillez noircir toutes les donnÃ©es relatives Ã  vos convictions religieuses et Ã  votre situation familiale, le cas Ã©chÃ©ant)Raison pour laquelle vous rÃ©sidez dans le pays X : Exemple : Visa, certificat de scolaritÃ©, source de richesse :Exemple : Contrats, relevÃ©s bancaires, informations sur la cession dâ€™actifs, les plus-values ou les successionsComment puis-je vous communiquer ces informations ?Notre systÃ¨me est conÃ§u, par dÃ©faut, pour sÃ©curiser lâ€™Ã©change dâ€™emails grÃ¢ce au chiffrement TLS ou au niveau de sÃ©curitÃ© de connexion plus Ã©levÃ©. Ainsi, si votre serveur de messagerie Ã©lectronique prend en charge un chiffrement TLS entrant ou un niveau de sÃ©curitÃ© de connexion plus Ã©levÃ©, les emails Ã©changÃ©s avec nous sont chiffrÃ©s sur le rÃ©seau (de bout en bout). Si votre serveur de messagerie Ã©lectronique ne prend pas en charge le chiffrement TLS ou un niveau de sÃ©curitÃ© de connexion plus Ã©levÃ©, lâ€™email que vous nous envoyez peut ne pas Ãªtre chiffrÃ©. Câ€™est pourquoi nous vous conseillons dâ€™utiliser lâ€™option de livraison par courrier physique, qui sera un moyen plus sÃ»r de partager des informations, Ã  lâ€™adresse suivanteÂ : N26 GmbH, Document pour lâ€™ouverture dâ€™un compte, KlosterstraÃŸe 62, 10179 Berlin.Si vous choisissez la rÃ©ception par email, veuillez consulter les instructions fournies dans lâ€™email que vous avez reÃ§u Ã  ce sujet.Â Si vous dÃ©cidez de rÃ©pondre par email, veuillez Ã©galement joindre des copies scannÃ©es, des photographies et/ou des captures dâ€™Ã©cran, avec une description dÃ©taillÃ©e de chaque document. Tous les documents doivent Ãªtre clairs et lisibles et leur taille totale ne peut dÃ©passer 15Â Mo.Nous vous rÃ©pondrons dans un dÃ©lai de 3Â jours ouvrables.ImportantÂ : La communication dâ€™informations fausses et/ou inexactes constitue une infraction pÃ©nale. Dans ce cas, nous ne pourrons pas accepter votre demande.

title: Wann kommt meine Karte?
content: Die Standardlieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos, wenn es sich um deine erste Karte nach der KontoerÃ¶ffnung (auÃŸer bei N26 Standard*) oder einem Upgrade zu einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft handelt. Bei entlegeneren Lieferadressen kann es lÃ¤nger dauern. Um Ã¼ber die Kartenlieferung auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe ganz einfach zum Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App. Falls die Karte nicht zugestellt werden kann und an uns zurÃ¼ckgeschickt wird, informieren wir dich per E-Mail.Die Express-Lieferung dauert bis zu 3 Werktage. ZusÃ¤tzlich zum Banner im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App, kannst du den Fortschritt der Kartenlieferung mit dem Tracking-Link verfolgen, den wir dir per E-Mail schicken. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber die Express-Lieferung.Bitte warte, bis der geschÃ¤tzte Lieferzeitraum verstrichen ist, bevor du etwas tust. Die erste Karte nach der KontoerÃ¶ffnung oder einem Upgrade zu einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft ist immer kostenlos. FÃ¼r folgende Karten kann eine ErsatzgebÃ¼hr gelten.Wie kann ich sicherstellen, dass meine Karte unterwegs ist?Du musst deine Verifizierung abschlieÃŸen, damit deine KontoerÃ¶ffnung abgeschlossen wird. Stelle sicher, dass du dich verifiziert hast, indem du dich in die N26 App einloggst. Sobald die Verifizierung abgeschlossen ist, wird dein Konto erÃ¶ffnet und du kannst deine N26 Karte erhalten.ÃœberprÃ¼fe deine Lieferanschrift. Falls deine Lieferanschrift Fehler hatte, berichtige sie bitte direkt (neuen Tab) in der mobilen N26 App unter: ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > PersÃ¶nliche Details > Adressen > Lieferadresse. Beachte folgende Hinweise:Es muss eine Wohnadresse sein (Unternehmen werden nicht akzeptiert)Dein Name muss auf dem Briefkasten stehen. Falls ein anderer Name darauf steht, fÃ¼ge diesen unter ZusÃ¤tzliche Informationen zur Adresse hinzu.Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.Falls erforderlich, gib deine Haus-, Etagen- und TÃ¼rnummer unter ZusÃ¤tzliche Informationen zur Adresse an.Falls Adresse Sonderzeichen beinhaltet, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner App.Falls du zeitnah umziehst, zieh die Express-Lieferung in ErwÃ¤gung und gib die kÃ¼nftige Wohnadresse an.Falls es sich um deine erste N26 Karte handelt, kontaktiere uns bitte via Live Chat direkt aus der mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking. Falls du schon mal eine aktivierte Karte hattest, bestelle bitte eine neue direkt in der N26 App.Deine erste Karte fÃ¼r dein N26 Smart, You oder Metal Konto ist kostenlos. Beim N26 Standard Konto erhÃ¤ltst du eine kostenlose digitale Karte (es sei denn, du entscheidest dich dafÃ¼r, eine physische Karte fÃ¼r 10Â â‚¬ zu bestellen). Deine Karte wird produziert und versendet, sofern dein Kontostand nach Abbuchung der ersten monatlichen GebÃ¼hr mindestens 0Â â‚¬ betrÃ¤gt. Wenn du ein Upgrade auf eine Premium-Mitgliedschaft abgeschlossen hast, wird die erste MonatsgebÃ¼hr sofort abgebucht. Hast du dich direkt bei der Anmeldung fÃ¼r eine Premium-Mitgliedschaft entschieden, wird die erste MonatsgebÃ¼hr abgebucht, sobald du genug Geld zur Begleichung der GebÃ¼hr aufs Konto geladen hast, spÃ¤testens jedoch 15Â Tage, nachdem du deine IdentitÃ¤t nachgewiesen hast. Wenn die erste MonatsgebÃ¼hr abgebucht wurde und dein Konto einen negativen Kontostand aufweist, musst du dein Konto aufladen, um die Produktion und den Versand deiner Karte zu veranlassen.Du wirst in der App unter "Nachrichten" und durch einen Banner auf dem Home Bildschirm Ã¼ber den Lieferstatus informiert. Bitte beachte:Das einmalige Mindestguthaben ist keine GebÃ¼hr, sondern eine notwendige Voraussetzung, um die Produktion und Auslieferung deiner Karte zu veranlassen.Bei Expressversand wird eine GebÃ¼hr in HÃ¶he von 25Â â‚¬ von deinem Konto abgebucht, sobald die Karte versendet wird. Bitte sorge fÃ¼r einen ausreichenden Kontostand, um diese GebÃ¼hr(en)zu decken.Wie kann ich schon mit meiner Karte bezahlen, bevor sie physisch bei mir ankommt?Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. Auf diese Weise kannst du mit deinem Handy bei Anbietern bezahlen, die diese Zahlungsmethode unterstÃ¼tzen. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber die digitalen NutzungsmÃ¶glichkeiten deiner N26 Karte.Warum habe ich meine Karte nicht im geschÃ¤tzten Lieferzeitraum erhalten?ÃœberprÃ¼fe den geschÃ¤tzten Lieferzeitraum im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App oder in deinem Online-Banking. Falls der angegebene Zeitraum verstrichen ist, kontaktiere uns bitte via Live Chat direkt aus deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online-Banking (neuen Tab).

title: Warum habe ich meinen VerknÃ¼pfungscode nicht per SMS erhalten?
content: FÃ¼r iOS-Nutzer, die unsere Pairing-SMS nicht erhalten, ist evtl. eine SMS-Filter-Funktion aktiviert. Um unsere Nachricht in iMessage wiederzufinden, gehen Sie oben links auf die Option "Filter" und wÃ¤hlen Sie den Ordner Unbekannte Absender aus.Du brauchst einen VerknÃ¼pfungscode, um dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto zu verknÃ¼pfen. Falls du die SMS mit dem Code nicht erhÃ¤ltst, kannst du einen neuen bis zu fÃ¼nf Mal in der App anfordern. Bitte warte 30 Sekunden, bevor du es nochmal versuchst. Wenn du bereits alle fÃ¼nf Codes angefordert hast und die VerknÃ¼pfung noch immer nicht funktioniert, werden weitere Anfragen aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden fÃ¼r 24 Stunden blockiert. Wenn das geschieht, kannst du entweder warten, oder unseren Customer Support per Chat kontaktieren - wir helfen dir gerne weiter. Wenn deine LÃ¤ndervorwahl auÃŸerhalb der EU liegt, ist es wahrscheinlich dass du die SMS mit dem Code nicht bekommst und du uns kontaktieren musst.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn ich meinen Dispo oder mein Darlehen nicht zurÃ¼ckzahlen kann?
content: Wir bieten RÃ¼ckzahlungsplÃ¤ne an, wenn du deinenÂ DispoÂ oder dein Darlehen mitÂ N26 CreditÂ nicht zurÃ¼ckzahlen kannst. Das kann passieren, wenn dein Dispo storniert wurde oder du mehr als zwei Monate gebraucht hast, um deinen negativen Saldo auszugleichen.So geht es: Chatte mit uns und schlage einen detaillierten Plan vor, wie du deinen Dispokredit oder dein Darlehen in Raten zurÃ¼ckzahlen willst, z. B. jeden Monat einen bestimmten Betrag, bis dein Darlehen abbezahlt ist. Es ist nicht mÃ¶glich, einfach den Gesamtbetrag zu einem spÃ¤teren Zeitpunkt zurÃ¼ckzuzahlen.Bitte beachte, dass wir dir keinen RÃ¼ckzahlungsplan anbieten kÃ¶nnen, wenn dein Konto bereits geschlossen ist.Wir werden dann entweder akzeptieren, ablehnen oder einen alternativen Plan vorschlagen. Es liegt dann an dir, diesem zuzustimmen.Ãœbrigens: Dein Konto wird geschlossen, wenn es Ã¼ber einen lÃ¤ngeren Zeitraum im Soll ist. Alle KÃ¼ndigungsdaten sind endgÃ¼ltig, es sei denn, du zahlst dein Darlehen vor diesem Datum zurÃ¼ck. Wenn nicht, wird der Fall an ein InkassobÃ¼ro weitergeleitet.Obiges gilt nur fÃ¼r Kredite mit N26. FÃ¼r Kredite von auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) oder Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) wende dich bitte direkt an den jeweiligen Partner.

title: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
content: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel itâ€”this can be done at any time (see below). Weâ€™ll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesnâ€™t affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, youâ€™ll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 monthâ€™s time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and youâ€™ll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after youâ€™ve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we havenâ€™t received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after youâ€™ve proved your identity, weâ€™ll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option youâ€™ve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee.Â You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, weâ€™ll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

title: Garnishment: What can I do?
content:
Has your account been frozen due to a garnishment order? In this article youâ€™ll learn what you can do to settle your outstanding debt and unfreeze your account if it is garnished. First, please carefully read the message we sent you under â€œMessages from N26â€ in your N26 app. After that, you have three options:Option 1: Settle the debt from your N26 accountProvided you have sufficient funds in your N26 account, you can pay the garnishment amount with a transfer order. Please note that the transfer order must also cover all interest and fees associated with the garnishment. We can only release your account when this is done.Â This is what you have to do:Download the transfer order form (new tab)Print out the formÂ Fill out the transfer order completely and sign itÂ Email us a scan or photo to support@n26.com (new tab). Please use the email address you have on file with us for this.You can also send us the copy directly from your â€œMessages from N26â€ mailbox as a reply to our original message. Please note that the attachment in your mailbox canâ€™t be larger than 25 MB.Your messages will be securely encrypted during transmission. If you still prefer to send us the form by mail, you can send it to the following address:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 BerlinIt can take approximately 5 business days to process your transfer order. Please donâ€™t contact us regarding the current processing status, to avoid unnecessarily prolonging the processing time. Weâ€™ll inform you as soon as you can fully access your account by sending a message to your â€œMessages from N26â€ mailbox.Option 2: Settle the claim from another bank accountYou donâ€™t have sufficient funds in your N26 bank account to settle the garnishment claim and unlock your account? You can, of course, settle the claim from another bank account after consulting with your creditor. Your creditor must inform us after the transfer has been received that the garnishment has been lifted. They can inform us either by fax at (030) 364 285 089 or by mail to the following address:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 BerlinPlease note:We only accept and process information to remove the garnishment that we receive directly from your creditor. Unfortunately, we canâ€™t accept information or documents from you.If you want to tell us something about your garnishment, you can send us a message from your â€œMessages from N26â€ mailbox. However, please donâ€™t send us any further information, to avoid unnecessarily prolonging the processing time.If your account is still frozen despite the payment, it can be for two reasons: the creditor hasnâ€™t sent us the necessary documents yet or the processing period of approximately 5 business days hasnâ€™t passed yet.If you agree with the creditor on an instalment and they send us a suspension notice, this is unfortunately not enough to unfreeze your account.Option 3: Convert your account to a P-account.Are you wondering what else you can do if your account is garnished? There is a third option: converting your account into a P-account. This is a garnishment protection account â€“ a normal bank account in which a certain monthly amount remains unaffected by garnishment, and you have free access to this amount.Please note that the application for and operation of a garnishment protection account will be reported to Schufa AG. In this case, we must cancel any existing overdraft facility or other credit. You can find out how to apply for a P-account and what else you should pay attention to here.Â Account garnishment: How do we proceed?Â If you donâ€™t use any of the above options within the next 4 weeks, in case of garnishment we have to pay out any remaining balance on your account to your creditor up to the amount of the claim. After that, we can unlock your account again.

title: Warum sind einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen fÃ¼r mich nicht verfÃ¼gbar?
content: Wir arbeiten mit vielen Partnern zusammen. Bestimmte Produkte und Dienstleistungen setzen voraus, dass du auch deren Anforderungen erfÃ¼llst. Die hÃ¤ufigsten GrÃ¼nde, warum du fÃ¼r bestimmte Produkte nicht in Frage kommst:Abgelaufene oder nicht unterstÃ¼tzte Ausweispapiere (z. B. bestimmte PÃ¤sse, denen Sicherheitsmerkmale fehlen).Du bist in den Vereinigten StaatenÂ steuerpflichtig. In diesem Fall kannst du bestimmte Anlage- oder Sparprodukte nicht nutzen. Wenn dies nicht der Fall ist, kontaktiere unseren Kundenservice per Chat, damit wir deine Kontodaten einsehen kÃ¶nnen. MÃ¶glicherweise musst du deine Telefonnummer wechseln, wenn sie mit einer nordamerikanischen Vorwahl beginnt (+1).

title: Where to find your Tax ID
content: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If youâ€™re from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TINâ€™s are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben Ã¼ber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If youâ€™re a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des ProcÃ©dures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authoritiesâ€™ database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TINâ€™s are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TINâ€™s are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If youâ€™ve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

title: PerchÃ© non ho ricevuto il mio codice di associazione?
content: Gli utenti iOS che non ricevono il nostro SMS per associare il dispositivo, potrebbero avere abilitato il filtro SMS. Per trovare il nostro messaggio in iMessage, vai all'opzione Filtri in alto a sinistra e seleziona la cartella Mittenti sconosciuti.Il codice di associazione Ã¨ richiesto perÂ collegare il tuo smartphone. Se per qualsiasi motivo non hai ricevuto il tuo codice di associazione tramite SMS, puoi richiederlo fino a cinque volte tramite l'app. Aspetta gentilmente 30 secondi prima di richiederne uno nuovo.Se hai giÃ  richiesto tutti e cinque i codici e l'operazione non Ã¨ ancora riuscita, i tuoi tentativi verranno bloccati, per ragioni di sicurezza, per le successive 24 ore. Se ciÃ² accade, puoi decidere di aspettare, oppure contattare il nostro servizio clienti che sarÃ  felice di aiutarti. Se il tuo codice postale Ã¨ al di fuori dell'UE, Ã¨ probabile che dovrai contattarci per ricevere un codice di associazione.

title: Shared Spaces - Was ist eine Kontovollmacht?
content:
Shared Spaces sind keine Gemeinschaftskonten im klassischen Sinn. Sie funktionieren durch die Erteilung einer Kontovollmacht.Die Person, die die anderen Teilnehmer dazu berechtigt, in dessen Namen zu handeln, wird â€œBesitzerâ€ genannt. Diese Person ist und bleibt der alleinige Kontoinhaber. Der Besitzer muss ein N26 Premium-Kunde sein, das heiÃŸt N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You nutzen.Teilnehmer eines Shared Space sind nicht Kontoinhaber des Shared Space. Durch die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht erhalten alle Teilnehmer das Recht, im Namen des Besitzers Ã¼ber die Gelder innerhalb des Shared Spaces zu verfÃ¼gen.Das bedeutet, dass diejenige Person, die den Shared Space erstellt hat, dessen alleiniger Inhaber ist. Der Besitzer eines Shared Space
ist Besitzer des gesamten Guthabens auf dem Shared Space.kann Ã¼ber die Gelder des Shared Space jederzeit verfÃ¼gen.kann andere Teilnehmer einladen, indem er ihnen eine Kontovollmacht erteilt.kann die Kontovollmacht eines Teilnehmers jederzeit widerrufen.kann einen Shared Space schlieÃŸen, nachdem alle Teilnehmer entfernt worden sind (in diesem Fall werden alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space dem Hauptkonto des Besitzers gutgeschrieben).
Die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht hat zur Folge, dass der jeweilige Teilnehmer vollen Zugriff auf das gesamte Guthaben des Shared Space hat. Das bedeutet, dass auch die Teilnehmer eines Shared Spaces Ã¼ber alle dort verbuchten Gelder frei verfÃ¼gen kÃ¶nnen.Die N26 Bank GmbH kann nicht haftbar gemacht werden fÃ¼r Zahlungen, die von einer Kontovollmacht gedeckt sind.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzufÃ¼gen oder davon entfernen?

title: Spiccioli
content: Con la funzione â€œâ€, i clienti Premium possono far arrotondare tutte le transazioni con carta alla cifra tonda in euro piÃ¹ prossima, mettendo ogni volta da parte la differenza in uno spazio a scelta.Gli arrotondamenti non ti faranno andare in scoperto. Se il tuo saldo non Ã¨ sufficiente a coprire lâ€™arrotondamento, questo non verrÃ  effettuato.Puoi avere solo un arrotondamento attivo alla volta quando trasferisci il denaro in uno spazio di tua preferenza.Puoi disattivare la funzione â€œâ€ in qualsiasi momento.Se chiudi uno spazio per cui sono abilitati gli arrotondamenti, la funzione â€œRound-Upâ€ verrÃ  disattivata fino a quando non la riattiverai.Come utilizzare ?Abilitare gli arrotondamenti Ã¨ facile e veloce. Basta accedere nell'app mobile N26 o nella WebApp (nuova tabella):Vai a Spaces.Seleziona lo spazio separato dal conto principale su cui vuoi attivare gli arrotondamenti.Seleziona Gestisci > Gestisci regole per arrotondare i pagamenti.Sposta la levetta sul verde per impostare le regole per arrotondare i pagamenti.Seleziona il tuo moltiplicatore, poi Conferma.Inizia a risparmiare giÃ  dal tuo prossimo acquisto con la carta di debito N26!

title: Warum ist N26 sicher?
content: Zum Schutz deines Kontos verwenden wir eine dreistufige Sicherheitsarchitektur:Sichere Anmeldung:Â Die Zugangsdaten der mobilen App und derÂ WebApp (neuen Tab)Â bestehen aus einem Benutzernamen und einem Passwort oder einer Fingerabdruck-/Gesichtserkennung (abhÃ¤ngig von deinem Smartphone).
