Bitte wÃ¤hle einÂ sicheres PasswortÂ und gib deine Zugangsdaten nicht an Dritte weiter.BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN:Â Dies ist einÂ 4-stelliger Code, den du jedes Mal benÃ¶tigst, wenn du eine Ãœberweisung durchfÃ¼hrst oder dein Smartphone verknÃ¼pfst/trennst. Du richtest diese PIN erstmalig ein, wenn du dein Smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem Konto verknÃ¼pft hast. Danach kannst du sie in der App selbst Ã¤ndern.Push-Nachrichten:Â FÃ¼r jede eingehende und ausgehende Zahlung wird eine Push-Nachricht an dein verknÃ¼pftes Smartphone gesendet. Sie dient auch zur BestÃ¤tigung und zum Abschluss deiner Transaktionen. AuÃŸerdem haben wirÂ 3D SecureÂ eingerichtet, um dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug zu schÃ¼tzen.Jedes Mal, wenn du uns kontaktierst, werden wir dir einige Sicherheitsfragen stellen um sicherzugehen, dass wir wirklich mit dir sprechen. Aber wir werden dich nie nach deiner Kartennummer, deinem Card Verification Code (CVV), Passwort und deiner Karten- oder BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN fragen.Wir haben weitere Schritte eingefÃ¼hrt, um deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu schÃ¼tzen: Wir speichern so wenige Informationen Ã¼ber dich wie mÃ¶glich; nur so lange wie wir rechtlich dazu verpflichtet sind und lÃ¶schen diese Daten, sobald sie fÃ¼r das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung nicht mehr benÃ¶tigt werden. Du kannst deineÂ persÃ¶nlichen DatenÂ bis zu 6 Monate nach deiner KontoschlieÃŸung herunterladen. Mehr Informationen dazu findest du in unsererÂ DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung (neuen Tab).

title: Bank documentsâ€”a guide to what's available
content: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reasonâ€”you can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and theyâ€™re perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Hereâ€™s how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening andâ€”if you wishâ€”it can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Hereâ€™s how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees youâ€™ve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. Youâ€™ll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipientâ€™s full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmationâ€”the PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (RelevÃ© d'IdentitÃ© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank informationâ€”full name, legal address, IBAN and BICâ€”specific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the â€˜Add moneyâ€™ button.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo dar mi opiniÃ³n o sugerir un nuevo producto?
content: Enviamos encuestas con bastante frecuencia para saber tu opiniÃ³n, y la participaciÃ³n siempre es voluntaria y anÃ³nima. Para preguntas individuales o sugerencias puedes enviarnos tu opiniÃ³n aÂ ideas@n26.com (pestaÃ±a nueva). Te estaremos agradecidos si puedes dedicar un par de minutos para ayudarnos a mejorar aÃºn mÃ¡s.Y si alguna vez te sientes insatisfecho con nuestros productos o servicios, tambiÃ©n puedes presentar una queja.

title: Warum habe ich meinen Freundschaftsbonus noch nicht erhalten?
content: Sobald deine Freunde alle Voraussetzungen desÂ FreundschaftswerbungsprogrammsÂ erfÃ¼llt haben, bestÃ¤tigen wir deinen Bonus. Du kannst den Status in deiner mobilen App oderÂ WebApp (neuen Tab)Â einsehen.In den meisten FÃ¤llen hast du den Werbebonus noch nicht erhalten, weil noch keine Zahlung mit der Mastercard Transaktionen in HÃ¶he von mindestens dem Wert der PrÃ¤mie Bei eine PrÃ¤mie von 15 â‚¬ muss die Kartentransaktion z. B. 15 â‚¬ oder hÃ¶her sein. Stelle sicher, dass du deine Freunde Ã¼ber diese Voraussetzung informierst.Es kann bis zu 60 Tage dauern, bis der Bonus ausgezahlt wird.N26 behÃ¤lt sich das Recht vor, den Empfehlungsbonus im Fall eines VerstoÃŸes gegen unsereÂ AGB (neuen Tab) einzubehalten.

title: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
content: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you.Â This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipientâ€,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.Youâ€™ll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent youâ€™ll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select â€œSend Moneyâ€ then choose â€œBank Transferâ€. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

title: How to download my Statement of Fees
content: The Statement of FeesÂ is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),Â then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and youâ€™ll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

title: PSD2 - un Open Banking seguro
content: Â¿QuÃ© es la PSD2?La Segunda Directiva de Servicios de Pago (PSD2, por sus siglas en inglÃ©s) es una directiva europea actualizada que te permite acceder a la informaciÃ³n de tu cuenta e iniciar pagos de forma segura a travÃ©s de terceros proveedores regulados.Â Esto significa que puedes permitir que terceros proveedores accedan a la informaciÃ³n de tu cuenta a travÃ©s de una interfaz creada para conseguir lo siguiente:Habilitar un servicio de informaciÃ³n sobre cuentas (AIS, por sus siglas en inglÃ©s) para extraer los datos de tus cuentas bancarias y luego agruparlos y gestionarlos desde un mismo sitio a travÃ©s de terceros proveedores;Â Pagar de forma segura en cualquier caja o pÃ¡gina web que tenga Servicio de IniciaciÃ³n de Pagos (SIP).Del intercambio de datos se encarga nuestro socio Token.io.Â¿CÃ³mo funciona?Al utilizar un servicio de pago provisto por terceros como un servicio de informaciÃ³n de cuentas o un servicio de iniciaciÃ³n de pagos, Token.io te redirigirÃ¡ a la app de N26 para que confirmes la solicitud de acceso.En nuestra PolÃ­tica de Privacidad (pestaÃ±a nueva) te informamos sobre la finalidad, las partes involucradas y las bases legales del procesamiento de datos necesario para cumplir con nuestras obligaciones de acuerdo con los nuevos cambios de la directiva europea de servicios de pago.Preguntas frecuentesÂ¿Por quÃ© no puedo asociar mi cuenta con cualquier tercero proveedor?Â Si un tercero proveedor no ha adoptado nuestra interfaz dedicada, este tendrÃ¡ que hacerlo directamente con nuestro socio Token.io.Â Â¿CÃ³mo puedo revocar una autorizaciÃ³n de acceso que concedÃ­ a un tercero proveedor con anterioridad?Â En este caso, tienes que contactar directamente con el proveedor correspondiente y solicitar la revocaciÃ³n del permiso que le habÃ­as concedido.Â * Esta informaciÃ³n aplica a todos los paÃ­ses del Espacio EconÃ³mico Europeo.

title: Chargeback: Wie du eine Kartenzahlung stornieren kannst
content: Du hast auf deinem monatlichen Kontoauszug von N26 eine Kartenzahlung entdeckt, die du nicht getÃ¤tigt hast? Oder hast du etwas online bestellt, aber nie erhalten? Keine Sorge! Dieser Artikel hilft dir, genau diese Probleme zu lÃ¶sen.Was bedeutet Chargeback?Â Das Chargeback-Verfahren bezeichnet eine Ausgleichsbuchung. Dabei wird der Betrag, den der HÃ¤ndler fÃ¤lschlicherweise abgebucht hat, auf die bei der Zahlung genutzte Karte zurÃ¼ckgebucht. Der Ausgleich wird geleistet, sobald der Erstattungsantrag des KÃ¤ufers erfolgreich abgewickelt wurde.Â N26 bietet das Chargeback-Verfahren Ã¼ber Mastercard an. So kannst du Transaktionen stornieren lassen, die nicht von dir getÃ¤tigt wurden oder bei denen der HÃ¤ndler etwas Falsches gebucht hat. Falls du zum Beispiel online einen Artikel bestellt, diesen aber nicht zum angegebenen Lieferdatum erhalten hast, kannst du Ã¼ber Chargeback von Mastercard dein Geld zurÃ¼ckverlangen.So funktioniert das Chargeback-Verfahren mit N26Du kannst eine Transaktion Ã¼ber die N26 Web-App oder die mobile App stornieren lassen.Gehe in den Home Bereich und wÃ¤hle die Transaktion aus, die du reklamieren mÃ¶chtest.Dann wÃ¤hle Erhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlung.Wichtig:Â Falls du das Chargeback-Verfahren aufgrund einer unautorisierten Buchung nutzen willst, musst du zuerst deine Karte sperren und eine neue Karte bestellen, um weiteren Kartenmissbrauch zu verhindern. Vorher kÃ¶nnen wir deinen Erstattungsantrag nicht bearbeiten. Du hast die MÃ¶glichkeit, deine alte Karte direkt in der App zu sperren und im Anschluss eine neue zu bestellen.Du hast eine Transaktion ausgewÃ¤hlt, die Option â€œErhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlungâ€ wird jedoch nicht angezeigt? Dann ist die Transaktion noch nicht vollstÃ¤ndig autorisiert und du musst warten, bis daraus eine Buchung wird. In diesem Artikel erfÃ¤hrst du, was Autorisierungen und Buchungen sind (neuen Tab).Falls du dein Konto bereits geschlossen und keinen Zugang zur App hast, dann schreibe unserem Support eine E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab) von deiner bei der Registrierung genutzten E-Mail-Adresse.Antworten auf hÃ¤ufig gestellte Fragen rund um das Chargeback-Verfahren haben wir in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab) fÃ¼r dich aufgelistet.Â

title: Warum wurde mir eine LastschriftgebÃ¼hr berechnet?
content: Wenn eine Lastschrift aufgrund unzureichender Deckung* deines Kontos zurÃ¼ckgeht, wird gemÃ¤ÃŸ unseren Allgemeinen GeschÃ¤ftsbedingungen (neuen Tab) eine GebÃ¼hr von 3 â‚¬ erhoben. Wenn dein Kontostand durch diese GebÃ¼hr in das Soll fÃ¤llt, werden auch Ãœberziehungszinsen in HÃ¶he von 8.9% fÃ¤llig. Du kannst diese GebÃ¼hren vermeiden, indem du sicher stellst, dass du genÃ¼gend Geld auf deinem Konto hast, um eingehende Lastschriften bis 18 Uhr am selben Werktag abzudecken.Da SEPA-Ãœberweisungen mehr als einen Tag dauern kÃ¶nnen, empfehlen wir dir, den fÃ¤lligen Betrag mit MoneyBeam (zwischen N26 Konten) oder CASH26 (wenn du in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Spanien, Griechenland oder Italien wohnst) zu Ã¼berweisen. Bei beiden Methoden wird der Betrag sofort deinem Konto gutgeschrieben. Und wenn du eine Lastschrift nicht anerkennst, kannst du sie in der App rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen.IBANs fÃ¼r Spaces (Unterkonten): Hast du einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen, jedoch nicht genug Guthaben, um eine ausgehende Lastschrift zu decken, wird die LastschriftÃ¼berweisung abgewiesen und dir eine GebÃ¼hr in HÃ¶he von 3 â‚¬ berechnet. Bitte beachte, dass es ist nicht mÃ¶glich ist, deinen Space zu Ã¼berziehen.*FÃ¼r LÃ¤nder mit einer anderen HauptwÃ¤hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner LandeswÃ¤hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des ZahlungsempfÃ¤ngers die GebÃ¼hren fÃ¼r den WÃ¤hrungsumtausch sowie den endgÃ¼ltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Siehe die folgende Liste:BulgarienKroatienTschechienDÃ¤nemarkUngarnIslandLiechtensteinNorwegenPolenRumÃ¤nienSchwedenSchweiz

title: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
content: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you donâ€™t recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?Â Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.Â Â N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchantâ€™s part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didnâ€™t receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26Â You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.Â Go to the â€˜Homeâ€™ tab, and select the transaction you want to disputeÂ Tap â€˜Get help with this transactionâ€™ and follow the steps provided.Â Important:Â If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, youâ€™ll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. Youâ€™ll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.Â Â If you select a transaction but the â€˜Get helpâ€™ button doesnâ€™t appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, youâ€™ll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If youâ€™ve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, youâ€™ll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, weâ€™ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

title: CRS - PerchÃ© richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
content: Secondo il Common Reporting Standard (CRS),Â  N26, in quanto istituto finanziario, Ã¨ obbligato a fornire informazioni alle autoritÃ  fiscali dellâ€™Unione Europea sui conti di utenti che hanno la residenza fiscale in altro paese.Il CRS Ã¨ stato implementato dallâ€™OCSE e disciplina le modalitÃ  attraverso le quali deve avvenire la scambio automatico delle informazioni fiscali (AEOI). Lo scopo del CRS Ã¨ quello di permettere alle autoritÃ  fiscali di avere una chiara comprensione delle risorse finanziarie dei residenti depositate allâ€™estero in modo da poter combattere lâ€™evasione fiscale. Oltre 90 paesi hanno aderito allâ€™iniziativa di condividere informazioni sulle risorse finanziarie e sulle entrate dei residenti in conformitÃ  con il CRS.Â Per determinare se un conto debba essere riportato alle autoritÃ  fiscali per adempiere alle finalitÃ  del CRS, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:Â Â Residenza fiscale:Di norma, si Ã¨ soggetti a tasse nel paese in cui si ha la residenza e le tasse vengono calcolate su tutte le entrate percepite. Se hai la residenza in piÃ¹ di un paese, normalmente esistono degli accordi bilaterali tra i paesi che aiutano a determinare in quale paese Ã¨ necessario pagare le tasse. PuÃ² succedere di essere soggetti a tasse in piÃ¹ di un paese nellâ€™arco dellâ€™anno. In tal caso, Ã¨ necessario fornire tutte le informazioni rilevanti (residenze fiscali e relativo numero di identificazione fiscale) alle autoritÃ  fiscali.Â Â Numero di identificazione fiscale (TIN)Â Lâ€™emissione e il formato del numero di identificazione fiscale (TIN) differisce a seconda del paese. La Commissione Europea offre indicazioni chiare sul TIN da riportare.Â Nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di N26. BasterÃ  eseguire lâ€™accesso > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni fiscali.Â

title: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
content: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (â€œtappingâ€ your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:Â Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen.

title: Todesfall & Nachlassabwicklung
content:
Wie kann ich N26 Ã¼ber einen Todesfall informieren?Â Im Trauerfall mÃ¼ssen sich die Nachkommen mit vielen bÃ¼rokratischen Aufgaben auseinandersetzen. Eine davon ist die Abwicklung der Bankkonten des oder der Verstorbenen.Der einfachste Weg, uns zu kontaktieren, ist per E-Mail. Alternativ ist es natÃ¼rlichÂ  mÃ¶glich, eine Anfrage per Brief oder (ggf. per Fax) zu stellen:E-Mail: nachlass@n26.comÂ Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbHÂ - NachlassbearbeitungÂ 
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 Berlin, GERMANYWir benÃ¶tigen diese Informationen:Â Wer ist der Verstorbene?Â FÃ¼ge bitte mÃ¶glichst eine Sterbeurkunde bei, da wir nur so ein zugehÃ¶riges Bankkonto sicher identifizieren kÃ¶nnen.Â Wie kÃ¶nnen wir die Erben oder Hinterbliebenen kontaktieren? Vor allem die Angabe einer E-Mail-Adresse und/oder Postanschrift erleichtert uns die Kontaktaufnahmen. Ein telefonischer RÃ¼ckruf ist grundsÃ¤tzlich nicht mÃ¶glich.Gibt es weitere Informationen, die wir bereits wissen sollten?Â Wenn bereits ein besonderes Verfahren anhÃ¤ngig ist (z.B. die Ausschlagung der Erbschaft) oder dazu bereits Unterlagen vorliegen, kann es hilfreich sein, die Informationen bereits mit uns zu teilen.Â Wir werden uns mit dir oder den BegÃ¼nstigten in Verbindung setzen und Ã¼ber das weitere Vorgehen informieren.Â Bitte sieh davon ab, uns Originaldokumente per Post zuzusenden. Wann immer wir ein Original benÃ¶tigen, werden wir diese explizit anfragen.Â Was passiert mit einem N26 Konto, wenn der Kontoinhaber stirbt?Â Â Aufgrund regionaler Unterschiede kann die Vorgehensweise je nach Land variieren.Sobald wir vom Tod eines unserer Kunden erfahren, werden die zugehÃ¶rigen Karten und das Online-Banking sowie jeglicher Zugang zur App gesperrt.Bitte beachte, dass DauerauftrÃ¤ge oder SEPA-Lastschriftmandate auf dem Konto in der Regel auch nach dem Tod des Kontoinhabers weiter bestehen. Erben oder Berechtigte mÃ¼ssen diese widerrufen oder lÃ¶schen lassen.DarÃ¼ber hinaus sind alle deutschen Banken grundsÃ¤tzlich gesetzlich verpflichtet, das in Deutschland fÃ¼r die Erbschaftsteuer zustÃ¤ndige Finanzamt Ã¼ber das zum Nachlass gehÃ¶rende VermÃ¶gen zu informieren.Wir teilen den BegÃ¼nstigten in jedem Fall mit, welche Unterlagen sie vorlegen mÃ¼ssen, um das Konto des Verstorbenen bei N26 schlieÃŸen und Guthaben Ã¼berweisen zu kÃ¶nnen.Â Ich bin Kunde, kann ich fÃ¼r den Fall meines Todes vorsorgen?Â Es gibt verschiedene MÃ¶glichkeiten, wie du sicherstellen kannst, dass dein VermÃ¶gen im Todesfall nach deinen WÃ¼nschen verteilt wird. Das Testament ist eine der gÃ¤ngigsten MÃ¶glichkeitenJedem, der sich intensiver mit der Erstellung eines Testaments beschÃ¤ftigt, raten wir, sich von einem Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater beraten zu lassen. Das gilt vor allem dann, wenn grÃ¶ÃŸere VermÃ¶genswerte vererbt werden sollen.Â Unser Kundenservice oder die Experten unserer Nachlass- und Rechtsabteilung kÃ¶nnen dir hierzu jedoch keine Beratung anbieten.Vollmacht fÃ¼r den Todesfall:Â Wenn du deinen Wohnsitz in Deutschland hast, endet eine von dirÂ  ausgestellte Vollmacht (auch eine Bankvollmacht) nicht automatisch mit deinem Tod. Die Vollmacht bietet daher eine gute VorsorgemÃ¶glichkeit.Â Es ist ratsam, bereits zu Lebzeiten eine solche Vollmacht zu erteilen. Sie kann die Abwicklung von Nachlasskonten erheblich erleichtern.Allerdings sollte die Vollmachtsurkunde im Original bei der Bank vorhanden sein. N26 bietet hierfÃ¼r ein eigenes Formular an. Wende dich dazu gern an unseren Kundenservice.Â Achtung: In den meisten LÃ¤ndern ist eine solche Vollmacht gesetzlich nicht vorgesehen. Daher wird dieser Service nur fÃ¼r Verbraucher und Kunden mit Wohnsitz in Deutschland angeboten!FÃ¼r nÃ¤here Informationen zu deiner konkreten Situation wende dich bitte an einen Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater oder an eine andere geeignete Beratungsstelle.

title: CRR Disclosure Report
content: What is it ?The Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) is an EU law. Among others, it states an obligation for credit institutions to publish a disclosure report on an annual basis (Art. 433 CRR).Â Â Why is the Disclosure Report not published in our Support Center or somewhere else on our website?N26 Bank GmbH is not obliged to publish the CRR report on our website. Art. 434 (new tab) CRR only requires an â€œappropriate mediumâ€ and therefore leaves the decision up to each credit institution.N26 Bank GmbH publishes its CRR in www.bundesanzeiger.de (new tab)

title: Why is N26 secure?
content: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.Â Your login details of both the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab)Â consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose aÂ secure passwordÂ and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.Â ThisÂ 4-digit codeÂ is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can thenÂ change itÂ in the app yourself after that.Push messages.Â For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to yourÂ connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also addedÂ 3D SecureÂ to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us weâ€™ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But weâ€™ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.Weâ€™ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You canÂ download your personal dataÂ up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in ourÂ Privacy Policy (new tab).

title: How to use Moneybeam?
content: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to beÂ visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam:Â Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is â‚¬1000 per transaction and â‚¬5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).Â Â Â To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about ourÂ friend referral program.

title: Cosa fare se il mio IBAN N26 non Ã¨ accettato?
content: Lâ€™IBAN include il codice paese DE, due cifre di controllo, le otto cifre del codice sort della banca e le dieci cifre del tuo numero di conto. Per esempio: DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.I paesi aderenti dellâ€™area SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area - Area unica dei pagamenti in euro) hanno concordato il sistema IBAN per semplificare i pagamenti nazionali e internazionali e ridurre il rischio di errore nelle comunicazione e nellâ€™elaborazione delle transazioni.I commercianti e i datori di lavoro che non accettano i codici IBAN di altri Stati membri dellâ€™Area Economica Europea violano la legge europea del 1Â° febbraio 2016 (Articolo 9 del Regolamento UE 260/2012 (nuova tabella)).Se hai subito discriminazioni sulla base dellâ€™IBAN, contatta direttamente l'autoritÃ  nazionale (nuova tabella) competente del tuo PaeseÂ  (nuova tabella)e denuncia lâ€™episodio. Fornisci i tuoi contatti, il nome del commerciante o dell'azienda che non ha accettato lâ€™IBAN e una breve descrizione dellâ€™accaduto (incluso uno screenshot del rifiuto o altra documentazione rilevante).Nel caso in cui il tuo IBAN non sia accettato da operatori di telefonia, internet o pay tv, puoi inviare un reclamo a ConciliaWeb (nuova tabella), la piattaforma dell'AutoritÃ  per le garanzie nelle comunicazioni. (Solo per clienti residenti in Italia, in possesso di Carta di IdentitÃ  Elettronica o SPID (nuova tabella)).

title: 2 Months N26 Smart Free Trial
content:
Eligibility: All EU marketsEver wanted to try out our N26 Smart account, but not sure if itâ€™s for you? Well now you can enjoy 2 whole months for free - And â€˜try before you buyâ€™ - to see if our Smart account works for you, with no commitment!If you want to take part in our N26 Smart free trial, you will have access to our premium banking features included with our Smart account. And see the value by getting more out of your everyday banking.What is included in our Smart free trial?60 day free trial: Eligible N26 customers can take advantage of our 60 day Smart free trial.Cancel at any point: At any point during your free trial, youâ€™ll be able to cancel and still enjoy the benefits for the full 60 days (you will be automatically downgraded back to Standard after 60 days)Continue with Smart: If you decide our N26 Smart account is for you, then you can take no action to continue with our Smart account and pay the monthly fee of 4,90â‚¬. If you change your mind after the free trial is over, you can always downgrade back to Standard.Enjoy the benefits of our Smart account: You can use the following benefits during your 60 day Smart free trial:Spaces (up to 10)Up to 10 Shared SpacesIBAN for Spaces (DE customers only) Up to 5 free ATM withdrawals/ monthRound-ups SavingsEnjoy partner offers and discountsPhone supportHow to access the Smart free trial?If you have been invited to a Free Trial of our Smart membership, you will be able to access it by following the instructions below. From the push notification: Tap on the push notificationWhen the N26 app opens, your invitation explaining the free trial offer will open automatically. Click on â€œcontinueâ€ to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, please read and accept the Terms and Conditions, thenClick â€œConfirm Purchaseâ€ : you are officially part of the trial now, and will see a success message! From the N26 app: Open the N26 appYou will see the Smart Free Trial offer entrypoint at the top of your home screen. Tap on â€œLearn Moreâ€ This will open the invitation screen explaining the free trial offer in detail. Click on â€œcontinueâ€ to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, read and accept the Terms and Conditions, then
Click â€œConfirm Purchaseâ€ : you are officially part of the trial now! Note: If you received an email inviting you to start the trial, we recommend opening it from your phone and clicking the â€œStart free trialâ€ button. This will automatically open the N26 app and load the invitation page. Otherwise, login to your N26 mobile app and follow the app flow above.

title: Quels sont les documents demandÃ©s pour la vÃ©rification de mon identitÃ© ?
content: En tant quâ€™Ã©tablissement bancaire, nous devons vÃ©rifier votre identitÃ©. Câ€™est pourquoi nous procÃ©dons Ã  une vÃ©rification dâ€™identitÃ© Ã  partir de votre passeport ou dâ€™une piÃ¨ce dâ€™identitÃ©, acceptÃ©s par nos services lorsque vous ouvrez un compte ou que vous utilisez certains produits.Nous ne vous demanderons jamais de prouverÂ votre identitÃ© au nom de particuliers ou autres entitÃ©s.Nous avons aussi publiÃ© desÂ astuces pour vous aider Ã  protÃ©ger votre identitÃ©.La vÃ©rification de votre identitÃ© se fait soit par appelÂ vidÃ©o, soit Ã  partir deÂ photos, selon le document dâ€™identitÃ© avec lequel vous ouvrez votre compte.DÃ¨s que vous aurez indiquÃ© votre nationalitÃ© et le type de document d'identitÃ© (passeport ou carte dâ€™identitÃ©) que vous souhaitez utiliser, nous vous indiquerons la solution la plus adaptÃ©e Ã  votre cas.En cliquant ici, vous pouvez afficher la liste des documents d'identitÃ© acceptÃ©s pour la vÃ©rification de votre identitÃ© :Je vis en Allemagne (nouvel onglet)Je vis en Espagne (nouvel onglet)Je vis en Italie (nouvel onglet)Je vis dans un autre pays (nouvel onglet)En tant que banque agrÃ©Ã©e et rÃ©glementÃ©e, N26 doit respecter les normes et directives rigoureuses lors de la vÃ©rification de lâ€™identitÃ© de tous les clients potentiels. Celles-ci varient selon les pays, câ€™est pourquoi nous ne pouvons procÃ©der Ã  la vÃ©rification de lâ€™identitÃ© quâ€™Ã  partir de piÃ¨ces dâ€™identitÃ© spÃ©cifiques en fonction de la nationalitÃ© de la personne concernÃ©e.Si votre piÃ¨ce dâ€™identitÃ© n'est pas prise en charge, nous ne serons pas en mesure de vous proposer un compte pour le moment. Toutefois, nous ajoutons constamment de nouvelles piÃ¨ces dâ€™identitÃ© Ã  cette liste. Nous vous conseillons de vÃ©rifier rÃ©guliÃ¨rement si vous Ãªtes dÃ©sormais Ã©ligible Ã  l'ouverture d'un compte.Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 7:00 Ã  23:00 h.

title: Wie schÃ¼tzt N26 mein Geld?
content: Gesetzliche EinlagensicherungDieÂ  (neuen Tab)EntschÃ¤digungseinsrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH (neuen Tab) schÃ¼tzt alle EinlagenÂ bis zu 100.000 â‚¬Â in den Mitgliedsstaaten der EuropÃ¤ischen Union. Als Inhaber einer Banklizenz ist N26 gesetzlich verpflichtet, Mitglied einer Einlagensicherung zu sein. N26 ist Mitglied der EntschÃ¤digungseinrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH.Wie erkennt und Ã¼berwacht N26 Betrugsversuche?N26 verfÃ¼gt Ã¼ber ein Spezialteam, das sich auf die Ãœberwachung und Identifizierung verdÃ¤chtiger Transaktionen auf unserer Plattform konzentriert. Mithilfe fortschrittlicher statistischer Modelle und Algorithmen sowie Verhaltensanalyse sorgt unser Team dafÃ¼r, dass dein Geld stets in sicheren HÃ¤nden ist.Was unternimmt N26, wenn betrÃ¼gerisches Verhalten bei einem Kunden festgestellt wird?Wenn unser Expertenteam UnregelmÃ¤ÃŸigkeiten aufdeckt, ergreifen wir alle gesetzlich vorgeschriebenen MaÃŸnahmen zur Schadensbegrenzung. Dazu zÃ¤hlen mitunter die SchlieÃŸung der Konten und die Meldung derselben an die BehÃ¶rden. Falls verdÃ¤chtige Transaktionen auf GeldwÃ¤sche, Terrorismusfinanzierung oder eine andere Straftat hinweisen, meldet N26 diese AktivitÃ¤ten unverzÃ¼glich der deutschen Zentralstelle fÃ¼r Finanztransaktionsuntersuchungen (â€œFinancial Transaction Investigation Unitâ€; FIU) oder lokalen AufsichtsbehÃ¶rden.Wie hat N26 in die Sicherheit der Bank investiert?Ende 2019 haben wir unser Trust-and-Safety-Team zusammengestellt. Dessen Mitglieder sind im Bereich der IT-Sicherheit tÃ¤tig und fÃ¼r den Schutz der Nutzer sowie deren Daten gegen CyberkriminalitÃ¤t verantwortlich. DarÃ¼ber hinaus hat N26 die GrÃ¶ÃŸe des eigenen AML-Teams und der Einheit fÃ¼r FinanzkriminalitÃ¤t verdoppelt sowie TransaktionsÃ¼berwachungsprozesse und -plattformen etabliert. Diese MaÃŸnahmen ermÃ¶glichen es uns, schÃ¤dliche AktivitÃ¤ten auf Grundlage historischer Daten aufzudecken und zu verhindern. So kÃ¶nnen wir Kriminellen immer einige Schritte voraus sein. Wir investieren stark in Technologie und KI. Neben Verhaltensanalyse setzen wir auch auf fortschrittliche statistische Modelle und Algorithmen.

title: Come salvare i dati del destinatario di un bonifico?
content: Ogni volta che effettui un bonifico tramite app a favore di un nuovo contatto (dalla schermata della Home scegli la scheda Invia denaro, Bonifico bancario, quindi "aggiungi nuovo destinatario"), alcuni dettagli come il nome del destinatario e l'IBAN vengono automaticamente salvati nell'elenco dei contatti per i bonifici futuri.Â Puoi anche cancellare i contatti:iOS: clicca sui tre puntini a sinistra per cancellare il contatto.Android: clicca sui tre puntini a sinistra per cancellare il contatto.Ricorda che la cancellazione di un contatto non implica l'eliminazione della relativa cronologia.

title: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
content: We offer repayment plans if you canâ€™t repay yourÂ overdraftÂ or loan withÂ N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.Please note we can't offer you a repayment plan if your account is already closed.Hereâ€™s how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how youâ€™re going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We donâ€™t accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. Itâ€™s then up to you to confirm it.By the way: your account will be closed if itâ€™s negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

title: What are Instant transfers?
content: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipientâ€™s bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you wonâ€™t have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49â‚¬Spain - 1,99â‚¬Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99â‚¬The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000â‚¬ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000â‚¬ per day). If youâ€™re using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If youâ€™re paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiverâ€™s details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

title: What are the benefits of N26 Smart?
content: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra Virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces (new tab): 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces (new tab): Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.You can compare N26 Smart with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these (new tab) in mind when considering N26 Smart:The N26 Smart Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay. Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Smart fee in order to receive the card.

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sortÂ your transactionsÂ and display our findings inÂ InsightsÂ (top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, weâ€™ll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesnâ€™t fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: Weâ€™ve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

title: How do contactless payments work?
content: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If youâ€™re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to â‚¬50 donâ€™t require a card PIN. For amounts over â‚¬50 or cumulative transactions above 150â‚¬ youâ€™ll need to enter your card PIN.Â Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front wonâ€™t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (includingÂ CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.Thereâ€™s always a â‚¬2 fee if you use yourÂ MaestroÂ card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2â‚¬. Check ourÂ pricing listsÂ if youâ€™ve beenÂ charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: Cosa fa N26 con le mie informazioni finanziarie?
content: Questo materiale Ã¨ stato preparato esclusivamente per fini informativi e non intende fornire e non dovrebbe essere utilizzato per consulenze fiscali, legali o contabili.N26 raccoglie le tue informazioni principalmente per due motivi: per soddisfare i requisiti di conoscenza del cliente e per la segnalazione obbligatoria alle amministrazioni fiscali competenti.Â Obbligo di identificare i nostri clienti in base alle cosiddette norme "Know Your Customer".Come qualsiasi istituto finanziario, ai sensi delle leggi fiscali applicabili, siamo tenuti a raccogliere da te informazioni rilevanti in materia fiscale al fine di identificarti. Questi includono principalmente il tuo nome, indirizzo di residenza, paese o paesi di residenza fiscale, codice fiscale o equivalente, nonchÃ© luogo e data di nascita.Di seguito troverai le informazioni generali relative alle definizioni di residenza fiscale e numero di identificazione fiscale.Residenza fiscaleIn linea generale, un individuo ha un solo Paese di residenza (indirizzo di residenza). Tuttavia, un individuo puÃ² risiedere a fini fiscali in due o piÃ¹ Paesi. Questo perchÃ© i Paesi utilizzano criteri diversi (forme di vincolo) per determinare la residenza fiscale. Questi criteri possono includere, ma non solo, la presenza fisica prolungata, la nazionalitÃ , la proprietÃ  di beni, ecc. Se esiste un trattato fiscale tra i Paesi, le disposizioni decisive normalmente contenute in tale trattato assegneranno la residenza fiscale a uno dei Paesi in questione.Ad esempio, se hai una abitazione permanente nel Paese A e una residenza temporanea nel Paese B, le disposizioni decisive previste dal trattato fiscale tra i Paesi A e B possono stabilire che sei residente fiscale nel Paese A, dove hai una abitazione permanente, piuttosto che nel Paese B, dove hai una residenza temporanea (trattando la "abitazione permanente" come una forma di vincolo piÃ¹ forte della "residenza temporanea"). Lâ€™analisi per determinare la residenza fiscale si basa sui fatti e, in caso di dubbi, devi chiarirlo con lâ€™amministrazione fiscale e/o il tuo consulente fiscale.Codice fiscale:Il numero di identificazione del contribuente (codice fiscale) Ã¨ una combinazione unica di lettere o numeri assegnata dal Paese di residenza fiscale. Il TIN ti identifica ai fini dellâ€™applicazione delle leggi fiscali del tuo paese di residenza fiscale. I TIN sono utili anche per identificare i contribuenti che investono in altri Paesi. Le specifiche del TIN (cioÃ¨ il numero di lettere, i numeri e la loro sequenza) sono stabilite dalle amministrazioni fiscali di ciascun paese. Sebbene la maggior parte dei paesi emettano i TIN, alcuni non lo fanno.Â Il portale dello scambio automatico dell'OCSE (nuova tabella) fornisce informazioni utili sui TIN (in particolare, dove trovarli e le loro specifiche) rilasciati da molti Paesi che partecipano allo scambio automatico di informazioni in materia fiscale. In caso di dubbio sul tuo TIN, perÃ², ti consigliamo di consultare il tuo consulente fiscale o lâ€™amministrazione fiscale.Obbligo di comunicare alle autoritÃ  fiscali competenti le informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti di alcuni clienti.Come qualsiasi istituto finanziario siamo tenuti a segnalare regolarmente le informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti all'amministrazione fiscale responsabile. A seconda del tuo IBAN, l'amministrazione fiscale di destinazione potrebbe essere quella tedesca, italiana, spagnola o francese.Le segnalazioni piÃ¹ importanti sono quelle previste dal Common Reporting Standard (nuova tabella) (CRS) e dal Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (nuova tabella) (FATCA). Se sei residente fiscale in un Paese che applica il CRS e/o negli Stati Uniti, l'autoritÃ  fiscale ricevente scambia le informazioni ricevute da N26 con il tuo Paese di residenza fiscale nell'ambito delle procedure di scambio automatico di informazioni previste dal CRS e dal FATCA.Per permettere a N26 di adempiere ai suoi obblighi di segnalazione, in particolare quelli per quanto riguarda il CRS e il FATCA, dobbiamo raccogliere informazioni fiscalmente rilevantiaccurate e aggiornate (i cosiddetti dati di autocertificazione). I dati dell'autocertificazione comprendono il nome, l'indirizzo di residenza, paese o paesi di residenza fiscale, il codice fiscale, il luogo e la data di nascita. Se sei residente fiscale negli Stati Uniti (U.S. Person), dovresti fornire anche il tuo TIN statunitense (nuova tabella). A questo link (nuova tabella) Ã¨ possibile trovare maggiori informazioni sul FATCA e su ciÃ² che Ã¨ necessario fare per determinare se si Ã¨ un soggetto statunitense (U.S. Person) e quindi se si deve fornire il proprio TIN statunitense.Siamo tenuti a effettuare controlli regolari per assicurarci che le tue informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti memorizzate nel nostro sistema siano corrette (cosiddetta "due diligence continua"). Se la due diligence dovesse rivelare inesattezza, ti contatteremo per ottenere informazioni accurate e aggiornate.La nostra raccomandazioneTieni presente che siamo tenuti, in ultima istanza, ad applicare misure restrittive sul tuo conto nel caso in cui non fossimo in grado di ottenere informazioni accurate e aggiornate ai fini CRS e FATCA sopra descritti entro le scadenze applicabili.Ti consigliamo di controllare e aggiornare regolarmente le tue informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti. Non dimenticare che non farlo puÃ² avere anche conseguenze dirette nei tuoi confronti, come ad esempio l'applicazione di sanzioni da parte dell'amministrazione fiscale. Per verificare e aggiornare le tue informazioni nella tua app N26:Vai a Dettagli del conto > Profilo > Informazioni fiscaliClicca su "Aggiungi nuovo Paese fiscale", indica se sei un soggetto statunitense (U.S. Person) e segui le istruzioni.Per aggiungere un ulteriore Paese fiscale (se sei residente fiscale in piÃ¹ di un paese), clicca su "Aggiungi nuovo Paese fiscale" e segui le istruzioniRimuovere il Paese fiscale esistente Ã¨ possibile solo dopo aver aggiunto un nuovo Paese fiscaleInformazione importantePuoi sempre controllare le informazioni fiscali che abbiamo attualmente su di te andando su: Dettagli del conto > Profilo > Informazioni fiscaliIn ogni caso i tuoi dati personali verranno conservati in sicurezza e utilizzati esclusivamente per adempiere a requisiti CRS, FATCA e simili.Non possiamo darti consigli sulla tua situazione fiscale. In caso di dubbi, Ã¨ bene discutere la questione con un consulente fiscale e/o con l'amministrazione fiscale.

title: How to use Spaces?
content: To start using your Spaces, youâ€™ll want to go to the â€˜Spacesâ€™ section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the â€˜Spacesâ€™ homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap â€˜Create a new spaceâ€™ in the â€˜Spacesâ€™ homepageSelect one of the below options:â€˜Saving for a goalâ€™ - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).â€˜Sharing moneyâ€™ - Allows you to create a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.â€˜Create now, decide laterâ€™ - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now letâ€™s start using â€˜Spacesâ€™!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your â€˜Main Accountâ€™ or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the â€˜manageâ€™Then press â€˜Lock Spaceâ€™ or â€˜Unlock Spaceâ€™Enter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the â€˜Settingsâ€™ cog (top-right corner)Select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap â€˜Manageâ€™:To create a savings goal, select â€˜Create my goalâ€™ (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then â€˜Set goalâ€™To enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select â€˜Manage Round-UpsToggle â€˜Enable Round-Upsâ€™You will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap â€˜Create a ruleâ€™Choose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

title: How to use Google Pay?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. Weâ€™ll ask you to confirm your payment viaÂ push messageÂ during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didnâ€™t set it up yet, youâ€™ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If youâ€™re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals donâ€™t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: Est-ce que je peux commander un chÃ©quier ?
content: En tant que banque mobile, tous les services que propose N26 s'effectuent de faÃ§on numÃ©rique depuis votre mobile ou sur votre espace client en ligne.Â Pour cette raison, N26 n'Ã©met pas de chÃ©quiers car nous proposons d'autres moyens pratiques de rÃ©aliser vos transactions en toute simplicitÃ©, sans avoir Ã  vous dÃ©placer en agence.Vous pouvez alimenter votre compte et effectuer des paiements :Par virement bancairePar MoneyBeam (les virements instantanÃ©s entre comptes N26)Par carte bancaireEn domiciliant votre salaire en fournissant votre RIB Ã  votre employeur

title: Come posso restituire un bonifico SEPA al mandante?
content: A partire dal 17 marzo 2020, i clienti di altre banche potrebbero richiedere il riaccredito di bonifici SEPA inviati ai conti di clienti N26.Tramite la propria banca, il mandante di un bonifico SEPA puÃ², quindi, richiedere al beneficiario la restituzione dellâ€™importo inviato. Questa richiesta apparirÃ  sotto forma di notifica push sul dispositivo associato del cliente N26.Â CosÃ¬ come avviene con la conferma di un bonifico in uscita tramite lâ€™app di N26, visualizzerai lâ€™opzione di rifiutare oppure accettare di restituire lâ€™importo. La richiesta verrÃ  automaticamente rifiutata se ignorata per 15 giorni.Se, invece, la richiesta viene accettata, lâ€™importo verrÃ  inviato al mandante. Considera, inoltre, che una volta accettata la richiesta, non sarÃ  possibile modificare la propria scelta. Se sul conto principale non Ã¨ presente un saldo sufficiente, non si potrÃ  accettare la richiesta.Â

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on â€˜Sharing Moneyâ€™Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ will pop-up. Tap â€œsignâ€Check both â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ and â€œPower of attorneyâ€, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

title: Â¿Por quÃ© es seguro N26?
content: Para proteger tu cuenta utilizamos una arquitectura de seguridad de 3 capas:Inicio de sesiÃ³n seguro.Â Al iniciar sesiÃ³n con la aplicaciÃ³n o con laÂ Web App (pestaÃ±a nueva), se requiere introducir el usuario y la contraseÃ±a o reconocimiento dactilar o facial (dependiendo de tu smartphone). Por favor, elige unaÂ contraseÃ±a seguraÂ y no reveles tus datos a nadie.PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.Â Se trata de unÂ cÃ³digo de 4 dÃ­gitosÂ que necesitarÃ¡s cada vez que hagas una transferencia o quieras vincular o desvincular tu mÃ³vil. Este lo estableces cuando hayas conectado tu smartphone a tu cuenta por primera vez. PodrÃ¡sÂ modificarloÂ tÃº mismo desde la app cuando quieras.Mensajes push.Â Para cualquier pago entrante o saliente, un mensaje push aparecerÃ¡ en elÂ smartphone que estÃ© vinculado, al igual que para confirmar y finalizar una transacciÃ³n. TambiÃ©n implementamosÂ 3D SecureÂ para protegerte contra el fraude en compras online.Cada vez que contactes con nosotros te haremos una serie de preguntas de seguridad para asegurarnos de que eres tÃº. Pero, por supuesto, nunca te preguntaremos el nÃºmero de tu tarjeta, el cÃ³digo de verificaciÃ³n (CVV), la contraseÃ±a ni los PIN de confirmaciÃ³n o de la tarjeta.TambiÃ©n hemos tomado medidas para proteger tu informaciÃ³n: almacenamosÂ la mÃ­nima informaciÃ³n imprescindible sobre ti, solo durante el tiempo mÃ­nimo al que estamos obligados por ley, y la borramos cuando deja de ser necesaria para nuestros productos o servicios. PuedesÂ descargar tu informaciÃ³n personalÂ hasta 6 meses despuÃ©s del cierre de tu cuenta. EncontrarÃ¡s mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n en nuestraÂ PolÃ­tica de Privacidad (pestaÃ±a nueva).

title: Du bist Opfer eines Betrugs geworden? Kontaktiere uns.
content:
Du hast per BankÃ¼berweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen BetrÃ¼ger Ã¼berwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.Â Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlieÃŸlich fÃ¼r die oben beschriebenen FÃ¤lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vortÃ¤uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du N26 Kunde bist und eine autorisierte oder unautorisierte Kartenzahlung in deiner Transaktionshistorie reklamieren willst, nutze bitte unseren dafÃ¼r vorgesehenen vollumfÃ¤nglichen Service in der App! Die obige Hotline hilft ausschlieÃŸlich bei BankÃ¼berweisungen an ein verdÃ¤chtiges Konto mit einer N26 IBAN.Hast du eine SMS mit einem verdÃ¤chtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link Ã¶ffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empfÃ¤ngst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu Ã¶ffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab)Â Die geÃ¶ffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie auÃŸerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, fÃ¼r N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verdÃ¤chtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zusÃ¤tzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu bestÃ¤tigen. BestÃ¤tige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der ZahlungsempfÃ¤nger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verdÃ¤chtigen Link geÃ¶ffnet habe?Ã„ndere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zunÃ¤chst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort Ã¤ndern. Alternativ kannst du im Loginâ€“Bildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den nÃ¤chsten Schritten.Falls du persÃ¶nliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto geschÃ¼tzt bleibt. Bitte schicke auÃŸerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (neuen Tab) (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung oder sogar eine autorisierte Zahlung anfechten willst, die du mit deiner N26 Mastercard gemacht hast, kannst du dein Geld zurÃ¼ckbekommen. Erfahre Schritt-fÃ¼r-Schritt, wie du eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren (neuen Tab) kannst.Was tun bei einer unautorisierten Zahlung?Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung in deinem Konto hast, musst du eine neue Karte bestellen, damit dein Konto sicher bleibt und um weitere unautorisierte Zahlungen zu verhindern. Logge dich in die N26 App ein, und gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Neue Karte bestellen. WÃ¤hle dabei Verloren oder Gestohlen, je nachdem was zutrifft. Wenn die Karte die ganze Zeit in deinem Besitz war, musst du noch mal bestÃ¤tigen, dass du die Zahlung nicht selbst gemacht hast. Falls nÃ¶tig, melde den Fall auch bei der Polizei. Folge diesen Schritten, um die Zahlung zu reklamieren.Wie schÃ¼tze ich mein Konto vor BetrugHier sind einige Tipps, wie du dich vor Betrug schÃ¼tzen kannst:Nutze ausschlieÃŸlich Geldautomaten von vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen BankenKaufe online nur bei vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen Shops und WebseitenÃ„ndere regelmÃ¤ÃŸig deine Online-PasswÃ¶rter und PINsVertraue keinen Nachrichten oder E-Mails, die vorgeben von N26 zu sein und dich auffordern, deine Kartennummer oder Kontodaten zu teilen, oder die verdÃ¤chtige Links enthaltenN26 wird dich auÃŸerhalb der N26 App oder Web App nie nach deiner Kartennummer oder Kontodaten fragenÃ„ndere deine Karteneinstellungen in der N26 App. Deaktiviere z.B. Online-Zahlungen, Auslandszahlungen, Bargeldabhebungen oder passe deine Zahlungslimits an dein normales Kaufverhalten an.Vermeide Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen, wenn mÃ¶glich. Stattdessen empfiehlt sich die Zahlung per Chip und PIN oder per digitales Wallet.Â Bewahre dein Karte immer in einem sicheren Ort auf
NÃ¼tzliche Links:Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintrÃ¤chtigt wurde?Was ist Phishing?

title: Hai ricevuto un messaggio o una telefonata sospetta?
content: Nel pieno della pandemia globale, EasyJet ha rivelato che le informazioni personali e i dettagli di viaggio di 9 milioni di clienti erano stati rubati in un cyberattacco altamente sofisticato. Nella prima metÃ  del 2021, i dati personali di piÃ¹ di 530 milioni di utenti Facebook provenienti da oltre 100 paesi sono stati messi in vendita online. Alcuni giorni dopo, altri 500 milioni di utenti LinkedIn hanno visto le loro informazioni personali apparire sul Dark Web. Questi dati includevano informazioni come nomi, date di nascita, numeri di telefono e indirizzi email.Cosa c'entra questo con N26? Nonostante ciÃ² non abbia alcun impatto diretto su N26, o sulla sicurezza del tuo conto bancario, i cyber-criminali possono utilizzare le informazioni ottenute da attacchi rivolti ad altre aziende per perpetrare attacchi di phishing su larga scala.Il phishing Ã¨ una tecnica utilizzata per ottenere dati sensibili, che possono poi essere utilizzati per scopi fraudolenti. Prendendo le sembianze di entitÃ  fidate, i truffatori sono in grado di manipolare le persone affinchÃ© condividano i loro dati personali. Lo fanno prendendo di mira le proprie vittime attraverso i canali di comunicazione digitale che tutti noi usiamo quotidianamente, come email, SMS, telefonate e social media.In quanto banca digitale che sta crescendo in popolaritÃ , i clienti di N26 in passato sono stati presi di mira da campagne di phishing, durante le quali i truffatori inviavano messaggi spesso contenenti link a siti web che assomigliano molto alla WebApp di N26. Anche se all'apparenza possono sembrare convincenti, questi siti web sono fraudolenti e in nessun modo collegati a N26. In alcuni casi, gli aggressori possono falsificare il nostro short code inviato tramite SMS, il che puÃ² far apparire i loro messaggi nello stesso thread di SMS inviati in precedenza da N26. Lo stesso discorso vale per le telefonate, in quanto i truffatori sono in grado di camuffare il numero di telefono del mittente e di renderlo uguale a quello della banca.Se pensi di essere stato vittima di una truffa online o telefonica, o avessi semplicemente il sospetto che i tuoi dati personali siano compromessi, contatta subito il nostro Supporto Clienti a support@n26.com.Cosa sta facendo N26 a questo proposito? Il nostro personale addetto alla sicurezza monitora continuamente i futuri attacchi, in modo da poter assicurare che qualsiasi sito web fraudolento venga disattivato il piÃ¹ rapidamente possibile, e facendo sÃ¬ che noi come azienda possiamo proteggere il tuo conto.Mentre noi continuiamo a prendere precauzioni per proteggere i tuoi conti e le tue informazioni personali, anche tu puoi fare molte cose per proteggerti. Ecco alcune cose da tenere a mente se hai ricevuto un messaggio sospetto:Se hai ricevuto un SMS da qualcuno che sostiene di rappresentare N26, ricorda sempre che noi non ti contatteremo mai attraverso questi canali.Se hai ricevuto una telefonata sospetta da un presunto rappresentante di N26, ricorda che noi non ti chiederemo mai di fornirci i dati di accesso del tuo conto o i dettagli della tua carta. I messaggi di testo che ti invitano a chiamare un numero sono sempre di natura fraudolenta. Non cliccare su nessun link e non fornire nessun dato personale. Non ti daremo mai istruzioni per fare qualcosa tramite SMS.Se hai dubbi sulle informazioni che sono state condivise con te, o sospetti di essere stato condotto su un sito fraudolento, procedi con cautela. Se ti Ã¨ stato chiesto di chiamare un numero, o di inviare un messaggio a un indirizzo email, cerca le informazioni di contatto e vedi se corrisponde a un'azienda legittima.Se non sei sicuro, fai uno screenshot del messaggio e mettiti in contatto con il nostro staff del Supporto Clienti tramite l'opzione di chat nella tua app N26, o invialo a support@n26.com. Siamo sempre qui per aiutarti!

title: Can I have my pension credited to my N26 account?
content:
N26 Bank AG - Sign-ups before 26/03/2020 with German IBANHaving your pension credited to your N26 account is very simple.
This is what you need to do:Fill out online and sign the form provided by INPS;After filling out and signing the form, please send it to support@n26.com via email (please remember to use your registered email account to send the form). We will fill out the rest of the form and send it back to you in a few days.
Please note that you might find references to Citibank N.A in the form. Citibank N.A is an intermediary bank that credits INPS pensions to bank accounts located abroad. N26 Bank AG, Italian Branch - Sign-ups after and including 26/03/2020 with Italian IBANUnfortunately, at the moment it is not possible to receive pension to the N26 account for customers with an Italian IBAN. We will update all our customers and provide additional details and instructions as soon as the service is available.In case you encounter payment delays please contact our Customer Support via chat.

title: Received a suspicious message?
content:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. Theyâ€™re able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank thatâ€™s growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if youâ€™ve received an unexpected message:If youâ€™ve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If youâ€™ve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If youâ€™re ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. Weâ€™re always here to help!

title: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
content: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above â‚¬150 will be charged with a 12.50â‚¬ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than â‚¬150.The maximum fee is â‚¬100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

title: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
content: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: Â¿CÃ³mo cambiar los lÃ­mites de mi tarjeta?
content: Puedes configurar los lÃ­mites de tu tarjeta en la app mÃ³vil de N26 o en tu banca online.
