Cada modificaciÃ³n que lleves a cabo se aplicarÃ¡ inmediatamente a la tarjeta seleccionada.Para cambiarlos en la app mÃ³vil:Inicia sesiÃ³n y ve a TarjetasDesliza hacia un lado hasta que encuentres la tarjeta que quieras modificarPulsa Ajustes de la tarjetaPulsa LÃ­mites diariosPara cambiarlos en tu banca online:Inicia sesiÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva) y ve a Mi cuentaEn el tÃ­tulo Tarjetas, haz clic en la tarjeta que quieras modificarLÃ­mites de la tarjetaEl lÃ­mite diario hace referencia a las Ãºltimas 24 horas (no al dÃ­a natural) y estÃ¡ fijado en:1.000 â‚¬ para retiradas en cajeros5.000 â‚¬ para pagos en comercios u onlineEl lÃ­mite semanal hace referencia a la semana natural y estÃ¡ fijado en:2.500â‚¬ para retiradas en cajerosEl lÃ­mite mensual hace referencia al mes natural y estÃ¡ fijado en:20.000 â‚¬ para pagos en comercios u onlineÂ¿Prefieres verlo en vÃ­deo? title: How to use Google Pay?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. Weâ€™ll ask you to confirm your payment viaÂ push messageÂ during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didnâ€™t set it up yet, youâ€™ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If youâ€™re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals donâ€™t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card canâ€™t be used for online purchases.

title: N26 Cashless - Competition for Italian customers
content:
What is it?N26 Cashless is a new promotion designed for N26 customers residing in Italy whose purpose is to encourage the use of the N26 debit card for digital payments.The competition will be active from March 1st to June 30th, 2021.Who can participate?
Registration for N26 Cashless is open and automatic for all N26 customers residing in Italy (except N26 Business customers) and who have given their consent to marketing communications.In order to participate in the promotion and prize draw, customers must:Have an open and active N26 accountNot have incurred in foreclosures, seizures or other limitations of the current accountThe mentioned conditions are valid for the entire duration of the competition and failure to comply may lead to exclusion from the final prize draw.How does it work?
N26 customers enrolled in the program will reach the threshold to participate in the final prize draws by making transactions with their Mastercard associated with the N26 account via POS (either contactless, or with chip and pin) or with Apple Pay and Google Pay.Online payments and ATM withdrawals are excluded from the transaction count.What are the prizes?Based on the number of transactions carried out during the period of validity of the competition (1st March - 30th June 2021), participants will be able to access the draws for 3 prizes:At least 20 transactions > 20â‚¬ Amazon gift card At least 50 transactions > 50â‚¬ Amazon gift card At least 90 transactions > 90â‚¬ Amazon gift card If participants make a number of transactions that correspond to different thresholds, they participate in the drawing of prizes for both thresholds reached.(For example, if you carry out 60 payments during the duration of the competition, you participate in the draw for both 20â‚¬ and 50â‚¬ Amazon voucher.)The prize draw will take place by August 31, 2021.In the event of a win, customers will receive an official communication within their "Messages" inbox of â€‹â€‹the N26 App.Prize competition valid from 01/03/2021 to 30/06/2021. Prize money 4,160 â‚¬ F.C. VAT. To consult the complete rules, visit www.n26.com (new tab). Amazon.co.uk Gift Card is not a sponsor of this promotion. Restrictions applied. More details on amazon.it/gc-legal (new tab).

title: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
content: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

title: What to do if my card is lost or itâ€™s been compromised?
content: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.Â Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).Â You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

title: Come noleggiare unâ€™auto con la tua carta N26
content:
Generalmente, per poter noleggiare unâ€™auto Ã¨ obbligatorio che il guidatore principale sia in possesso di una carta di credito. Tuttavia, considerato il crescente utilizzo di altre tipologie di carte da parte dei consumatori, alcune compagnie di autonoleggio hanno introdotto la possibilitÃ  di noleggiare auto anche con le carte di debito.
Con la tua carta Mastercard N26, quindi, sarai in grado di noleggiare auto presso un numero sempre crescente di compagnie. Qui di seguito troverai i nomi di alcune delle agenzie alle quali potrai rivolgerti:AlamoAvisCentauroEnterpriseEuropcarFireflyJoy rentLocautoMaggioreSicilyByCarThrifty car rentalPrima di noleggiare un veicolo, ti suggeriamo di contattare la compagnia di tuo interesse: le condizioni per il noleggio sono a discrezione delle singole agenzie, quindi i requisiti possono variare a livello locale e nazionale.Ricorda, inoltre, di verificare se lâ€™agenzia accetta carte di debito non solo al momento della prenotazione, ma anche al momento del ritiro del veicolo. In aggiunta, a volte puÃ² essere richiesto che la carta abbia i dati in rilievo.
Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:nel caso in cui venga addebitato un importo imprevisto o ingiustificato, sarÃ  necessario contattare ed, eventualmente, avviare una contestazione direttamente con lâ€™agenzia in questione. Nel caso la contestazione abbia un esito negativo, possiamo offrire la nostra assistenza per avviare una nuova contestazione tramite Mastercard.sulla carta di debito verrÃ  addebitato (e non autorizzato, come avviene per le carte di credito) il deposito cauzionale, il cui importo varia a seconda delle tipologia di auto e dallâ€™agenzia. La cauzione sarÃ , poi, riaccreditato sul tuo conto dopo la restituzione dellâ€™auto e la verifica delle sue condizioni.

content: La protection des donnÃ©es personnelles et financiÃ¨res de nos clients est lâ€™une de nos prioritÃ©s absolues, câ€™est pourquoi nous fournissons un outil sÃ»r pour traiter ces demandes. Notre formulaire web N26 pour les demandes relatives au RGPD permet Ã  tous les clients et anciens clients N26 (dont le compte est dÃ©sormais clÃ´turÃ©) et Ã  leurs reprÃ©sentants autorisÃ©s de (nouvel onglet)Le droit dâ€™opposition, en vertu de lâ€™article 21 du RGPD (nouvel onglet)Vous devriez recevoir une rÃ©ponse de notre Ã©quipe dans un dÃ©lai de 30 jours calendaires.Lorsque vous votre adresse emailEn tant quâ€™ancien client N26 ou reprÃ©sentant autorisÃ©, dois-je fournir dâ€™autres informations?Les anciens clients et leurs reprÃ©sentants autorisÃ©s sont tenus de tÃ©lÃ©charger des documents supplÃ©mentaires afin de confirmer leur identitÃ© et de sâ€™assurer que le destinataire des donnÃ©es est rÃ©ellement habilitÃ© Ã  les recevoir.Voici les documents requis:Anciens clients: copie de la piÃ¨ce dâ€™identitÃ© / du passeportReprÃ©sentants autorisÃ©s : copie de la piÃ¨ce dâ€™identitÃ© / du passeport et une procuration signÃ©eUne fois le formulaire rempli dans son intÃ©gralitÃ©, cliquez sur Soumettre pour envoyer votre demande.Pourquoi une vÃ©rification manuelle de la carte dâ€™identitÃ© / du passeport est-elle nÃ©cessaire pour les anciens clients ou les reprÃ©sentants autorisÃ©s de N26?Essentiellement, nous demandons une copie de la piÃ¨ce d'identitÃ© pour valider l'identitÃ© et pour nous assurer que les donnÃ©es personnelles, y compris les informations financiÃ¨res, ne tombent pas entre de mauvaises mains. Un examen manuel de l'identitÃ© est effectuÃ© lorsqu'il est nÃ©cessaire de vÃ©rifier l'identitÃ© d'une personne, et qu'il ne nous est pas possible de le faire conformÃ©ment Ã  notre cadre de vÃ©rification standardisÃ©. Ã‰tant donnÃ© que l'identitÃ© des anciens clients et reprÃ©sentants autorisÃ©s n'est pas vÃ©rifiable via leurs interactions avec notre Espace client en ligne ou notre application, nous devons Ãªtre en mesure de vÃ©rifier leur identitÃ© en utilisant d'autres moyens.Vous avez des questions Ã  ce sujet ?N'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  contacter notre service client Ã  l'adresse suivante : support@n26.com (nouvel onglet).

title: RelevÃ© dâ€™identitÃ© bancaire
content: Quâ€™est-ce que le relevÃ© dâ€™identitÃ© bancaire, ou RIB ?Le relevÃ© dâ€™identitÃ© bancaire, Ã©galement appelÃ© RIB, est un document qui confirme que votre compte est enregistrÃ© Ã  votre nom. Il contient votre nom et prÃ©nom, votre adresse, lâ€™IBAN et le BIC de votre compte et la date dâ€™ouverture de votre compte.ParallÃ¨lement, vous pouvez demander une attestation de domiciliation bancaire qui peut contenir, sur demande, le solde de votre compte N26 et les coordonnÃ©es de vos cartes actives, qui seront Ã  moitiÃ© cachÃ©es par des astÃ©risques pour des raisons de sÃ©curitÃ©.Comment obtenir un RIB ?Depuis lâ€™espace client en ligne N26 (PDF) : cliquez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne de tÃ©lÃ©chargement (nouvel onglet)* et sÃ©lectionnez lâ€™option TÃ©lÃ©chargez votre RIB. Vous recevrez le PDF dans la section Messages de N26 (nouvel onglet) dans un dÃ©lai de 24 heures.Pour obtenir votre RIB officiel selon les rÃ©gulations de la Banque de France, cliquez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne de tÃ©lÃ©chargement* depuis lâ€™espace client en ligne N26, faites dÃ©filer vers le bas jusquâ€™Ã  RIB et cliquez sur Demander.* Lâ€™icÃ´ne de tÃ©lÃ©chargement est le carrÃ© avec une flÃ¨che vers le bas, situÃ© Ã  gauche du bouton Â« Recevoir Â».

title: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
content: Wenn du dein Passwort vergessen hast oder es Ã¤ndern mÃ¶chtest, wÃ¤hle in der App beim LoginÂ Vergessen?Â oderÂ Passwort vergessen? (neuen Tab)Â in derÂ WebApp (neuen Tab). Wir senden dir einen Link an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse, damit du ein neues Passwort erstellen kannst. Stelle sicher, dass dein neues Passwort unseren Anforderungen entspricht:Wir haben keine spezifischen Anforderungen fÃ¼r unsere PasswÃ¶rter. Wir berechnen die StÃ¤rke in Echtzeit und akzeptieren nur PasswÃ¶rter, die unser Algorithmus als stabil erkennt.Wir empfehlen, dass du anstatt eines Passworts eher eine Passphrase (einen Satz) verwendest, im Sinne von â€œschwer zu erraten, einfach zu erinnernâ€.Wenn unser System dein Passwort nicht akzeptiert, fÃ¼ge weitere Buchstaben hinzu, verwende eine Kombination von Sonderzeichen und Zahlen und achte darauf, dass du zwischen GroÃŸ- und Kleinschreibung variierst.Wenn du dein Passwort sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird dein Kontozugriff vorÃ¼bergehend gesperrt. Nach 30 Minuten kannst du es erneut versuchen.Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: How can I download the confirmation for a SEPA transfer?
content: If you have sent a bank transfer from your N26 account and need confirmation of the sending or receipt, you can download the PDF file with the transaction data from your mobile app or WebApp. That's how:Log into your N26 appFrom the list of transactions, select the bank transfer for which you want to download the confirmationClick on "Download transfer confirmation"As soon as you choose this option, the document will automatically be downloaded to your smartphone or pc.What data will I find in the transfer confirmation?In the confirmation of the transfer you will find the bank details of the sender and recipient of the transfer, including the amount of the transaction and the date on which it was made.

title: How do contactless payments work?
content: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If youâ€™re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to â‚¬50 donâ€™t require a card PIN. For amounts over â‚¬50 or cumulative transactions above 150â‚¬ youâ€™ll need to enter your card PIN.Â Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front wonâ€™t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.Â In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.Â One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a â€œtrusted beneficiaryâ€ so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

content: AdmissibilitÃ©: tous les marchÃ©s EU Testez N26 Smart pendant 2 moisVous avez toujours souhaitÃ© tester notre compte N26 Smart ? Vous pouvez dÃ©sormais profiter deux mois dâ€™essai gratuit sans engagement !Notre essai gratuit N26 Smart vous donnera accÃ¨s Ã  nos transactions premium incluses dans notre compte N26 Smart et vous permettra de dÃ©couvrir les avantages de vos transactions quotidiennes.Quâ€™inclut notre essai gratuit N26 Smart ?Essai gratuit de 60 jours : Si vous Ãªtes un nouveau client N26 Standard, profitez de notre essai gratuit de 60 jours pour dÃ©couvrir N26 Smart.Annulez en tout moment : Pendant votre essai gratuit, il vous est possible dâ€™annuler en tout moment et de profiter des avantages pendant 60 jours (vous serez automatiquement rÃ©trogradÃ© Ã  un compte N26 Standard aprÃ¨s 60 jours).Continuez Ã  utiliser N26 Smart : Pour continuer Ã  utiliser notre compte N26 Smart, il vous suffit de payer les frais mensuels de 4,90 â‚¬. Si vous changez dâ€™avis aprÃ¨s la fin de lâ€™essai gratuit, il vous est toujours possible de repasser Ã  un compte N26 Standard.Profitez des avantages de notre compte N26 Smart : Pendant vos 60 jours dâ€™essai gratuit de N26 Smart, vous pourrez profiter des avantages suivants :Espaces (jusquâ€™Ã  10)Jusquâ€™Ã  10 Espaces PartagÃ©sIBAN pour les EspacesJusquâ€™Ã  5 retraits au distributeur automatique de billets gratuits par moisArrondissement des Ã©pargnesProfitez des offres et des rÃ©ductions des partenairesAssistance tÃ©lÃ©phoniqueImportant :Si vous continuez Ã  utiliser notre compte N26 Smart, des frais de 4,90 â‚¬ seront prÃ©levÃ©s le lendemain de votre essai gratuit. Cependant, il vous est possible de repasser Ã  un compte N26 Standard en tout moment.De plus, aprÃ¨s le passage Ã  un compte N26 Smart, vous pourrez recommander sans frais (une seule fois) une nouvelle carte virtuelle en couleur et conserver votre carte transparente. Veuillez noter que votre carte virtuelle sera dÃ©sactivÃ©e.Comment profiter de lâ€™essai gratuit de N26 Smart ?Si vous avez Ã©tÃ© invitÃ© Ã  un essai gratuit de notre adhÃ©sion N26 Smart, vous pourrez en profiter en suivant les instructions ci-dessous. title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in â‚¬ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we donâ€™t currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.Youâ€™ll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app youâ€™ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upperÂ right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.â„¹ï¸ Â Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content: If your balance canâ€™t cover a direct debit* when itâ€™s due, itâ€™ll bounce and youâ€™ll be charged aÂ â‚¬3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. Itâ€™s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether youâ€™re eligible for anÂ OverdraftÂ directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9.

title: What are Cards for Spaces?
content: With our new Cards for Spaces feature, your individual subaccounts acquire a brand new functionality that allows you to link your N26 Mastercard to one of your Spaces and spend directly from there.How does it work?Cards for Spaces allows N26 customers with a Premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) to link their physical or virtual Mastercard to a Space and use the funds inÂ the subaccount for personal expenses. Below you can find an overview of the features available with attaching your N26 Mastercard to a Space:Â You will be able to link your Mastercard to one of your Spaces and back to your Main Account in one clickYou can link more than one card to a Space or to different SpacesIf you link a physical card to a Space, this will automatically allow you to use Apple and Google Pay with that cardThe feature is not available for Shared Spaces yetHow can I link my card to a Space?You will be able to link your existing virtual and physical cards to your chosen Space.There are 3 ways to do it:In the Cards tab, you can find under each card the button to select your chosen Space.In Card settings, you can also select your chosen space and link it to your card.In each Space settings, you will be able to select the card to link to that specific Space.Whenever you want to relink your card to your main account or to another Space, just select â€˜Main accountâ€™ or the other Space in the dropdown menu.

title: How does Spaces work?
content: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as youâ€™d like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, youâ€™ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

title: How to invite friends to join N26?
content: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content: Youâ€™ll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whetherÂ MoneyBeam, standing orders, orÂ CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you eitherÂ ConfirmÂ orÂ CancelÂ it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from yourÂ card PINÂ but you can use the same number for both. Youâ€™ll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN afterÂ connecting your smartphoneÂ (whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN byÂ changing itÂ in the app.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo funciona Apple Pay?
content: Disponible en EspaÃ±a, Alemania, Austria, BÃ©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburgo, Noruega, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia, SuizaApple Pay te permite realizar pagos con tu telÃ©fono mÃ³vil y asÃ­ no tener que llevar tu tarjeta Mastercard a todas partes.Hemos creado unÂ vÃ­deo (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â para ayudarte a configurar tu Mastercard N26 con Apple Pay.AquÃ­ tienes algunos consejos a tener en cuenta:La regiÃ³n de tu iPhone coincide con el paÃ­s al que fue enviada tu primera tarjeta Mastercard (puedes chequear tu regiÃ³n entrando en Ajustes, despuÃ©s en General y finalmente en Idioma y RegiÃ³n de tu iPhone).Si has perdido tu iPhone y no eres capaz de encontrarlo utilizando Encontrar Mi iPhone, siempre puedes acceder a tu iCloud y eliminar todos los dispositivos con Apple Pay mediante un ordenador, ya sea Mac o PC. AdemÃ¡s, deberÃ­as encender el Modo Perdido para bloquear tu Mastercard en Apple Pay. Los pagos con tu tarjeta fÃ­sica seguirÃ¡n funcionando.Si tu Mastercard N26 desaparece inesperadamente de Apple Wallet, puede que sea porque has cerrado tu sesiÃ³n de iCloud, desactivado el CÃ³digo de Acceso o el Touch ID, restablecido los ajustes de fÃ¡brica a travÃ©s de iTunes, o eliminado todo el contenido y configuraciÃ³n de tu dispositivo. En cualquier caso, siempre puedes volver a aÃ±adir tu tarjeta. Ten en cuenta que tu tarjeta no se eliminarÃ¡ si actualizas el sistema operativo, restableces la configuraciÃ³n personal o apagas el modo Encontrar Mi iPhone.Para compras en tienda o bien online, deberÃ¡s autorizar tus pagos vÃ­a Touch ID o utilizando el CÃ³digo de Acceso. Si estÃ¡s utilizando Apple Watch, las autorizaciones se realizarÃ¡n haciendo doble clic en el botÃ³n lateral. Si estÃ¡s utilizando un Mac, la autorizaciÃ³n se realizarÃ¡ mediante el Touch ID que hay en la Touch Bar que encontrarÃ¡s en el extremo superior derecho del teclado.AsegÃºrate de que tu dispositivo cumple los requisitos tÃ©cnicos necesarios visitando Apple Support (pestaÃ±a nueva).Si eres un usuario de N26 Metal o N26 Business You, podrÃ­a pasar que la imagen de tu tarjeta que se muestra en el Apple Wallet diga N26 You (para los clientes de Metal) y N26 Business (para los clientes de Business You). Ya estamos trabajando para resolver esto, pero de momento puedes estar tranquilo que esto no afecta a la usabilidad de Apple Pay ni a tu membresÃ­a premium.

title: Wird meine Lastschrift abgebucht, wenn ich kein Geld auf dem Konto habe?
content: Wenn dein Guthaben nicht ausreicht, um eine fÃ¤llige Lastschrift zu decken*, wird sie zurÃ¼ckgegeben und dir wird eineÂ GebÃ¼hr von 3 â‚¬Â berechnet. Wenn dein Kontostand dadurch in's Minus gerÃ¤t, werden Ãœberziehungszinsen in der HÃ¶he von 8.9% erhoben. Eine Lastschrift kann nicht verzÃ¶gert werden.Um diese GebÃ¼hr zu vermeiden, kannst du direkt in der App prÃ¼fen, ob dir einÂ DispokreditÂ zur VerfÃ¼gung steht.IBANs fÃ¼r Spaces (Unterkonten): Hast du einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen, jedoch nicht genug Guthaben, um eine ausgehende Lastschrift zu decken, wird die LastschriftÃ¼berweisung abgewiesen und dir eine GebÃ¼hr in HÃ¶he von 3 â‚¬ berechnet. Bitte beachte, dass es ist nicht mÃ¶glich ist, deinen Space zu Ã¼berziehen.*FÃ¼r LÃ¤nder mit einer anderen HauptwÃ¤hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner LandeswÃ¤hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des ZahlungsempfÃ¤ngers die GebÃ¼hren fÃ¼r den WÃ¤hrungsumtausch sowie den endgÃ¼ltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Siehe die folgende Liste:BulgarienKroatienTschechienDÃ¤nemarkUngarnIslandLiechtensteinNorwegenPolenRumÃ¤nienSchwedenSchweizDu willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Was ist MoneyBeam?
content: Durch einen MoneyBeam kannst du deinen Kontakten in Echtzeit Geld senden, ohne dass du dazu ihre Bankverbindung eingeben musst. Du kannst auch einen MoneyBeam von deinen Kontakten anfragen, um Geld zu erhalten. Um MoneyBeam nutzen zu kÃ¶nnen, mÃ¼ssen du und deine Kontakte als N26 Nutzer sichtbar sein.Um einen MoneyBeam zu senden:Â Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeamWÃ¤hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder fÃ¼ge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einGib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein und bestÃ¤tige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erhÃ¤ltst.Â Um einen MoneyBeam anzufragen:Tippe auf Geld erhalten > MoneyBeam anfragenWÃ¤hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder fÃ¼ge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einSobald der Kontakt deine Anfrage bestÃ¤tigt, erhÃ¤ltst du deinen angefragten BetragDas Limit fÃ¼r MoneyBeams liegt bei 1000â‚¬ pro Transaktion und 5000â‚¬ pro 24 Stunden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Ein GIF als zusÃ¤tzlichen Verwendungszweck hinzufÃ¼gen:Wenn du MoneyBeam nutzt, kannst du GIFs als zusÃ¤tzlichen Text beim Verwendungszweck versenden. Sobald der MoneyBeam abgeschlossen ist, wird dem EmpfÃ¤nger auf dem Startbildschirm ein Film-Emoji als PrÃ¤fix auf der eingehenden Ãœberweisung angezeigt, sodass er weiÃŸ, dass an die Ãœberweisung ein GIF angehÃ¤ngt ist. Der EmpfÃ¤nger kann das GIF zusammen mit dem Verwendungszweck in den Ãœberweisungsdaten einsehen.Die GIFs werden dir direkt von Giphy, Inc. zur VerfÃ¼gung gestellt und nicht von N26. Bitte beachte, dass Giphy ein US-amerikanisches Unternehmen ist, das deine personenbezogenen Daten in den USA verarbeitet. Informationen darÃ¼ber, wie Giphy deine personenbezogenen Daten verarbeitet, findest du in der Datenschutzrichtlinie von Giphy (neuen Tab).Â Â Um einen MoneyBeam mit einem GIF zu senden:Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeam.WÃ¤hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder fÃ¼ge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einWÃ¤hle GIF hinzufÃ¼gen und suche nach dem GIF, das du hinzufÃ¼gen mÃ¶chtest, entweder per Suchfeld oder einfach scrollend.Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein und bestÃ¤tige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erhÃ¤ltst.

title: Where is my refund?
content:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.Â For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

title: Quelles sont mes limites de dÃ©penses ?
content: Paiements par carte en magasin et en lignePlafond quotidienÂ : 5Â 000Â â‚¬Plafond mensuelÂ : 20Â 000Â â‚¬Retraits au distributeur automatique de billetsUn plafond quotidien de 1Â 000Â â‚¬ sâ€™applique aux pays suivantsÂ : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, GrÃ¨ce, Irlande, Italie, Islande, Lettonie, Liechtenstein, Lituanie, Luxembourg, NorvÃ¨ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, SlovÃ©nie, SuÃ¨de et Suisse.Un plafond quotidien de 400Â â‚¬ sâ€™applique aux pays suivantsÂ : Togo, Congo, BÃ©nin, CÃ´te dâ€™Ivoire, Kenya, Cameroun, Nigeria, SÃ©nÃ©gal, AlgÃ©rie, RÃ©publique centrafricaine, Gambie, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisie et Ouganda.Le plafond hebdomadaire de 2Â 500Â â‚¬ sâ€™applique Ã  tous les pays (sauf France).Un plafond hebdomadaire de 1 050 â‚¬ s'applique en FranceVirementsPlafond journalier pour les virements MoneyBeamÂ : 1Â 000Â â‚¬Virements SEPA entrantsÂ : IllimitÃ©Â Virements SEPA sortantsÂ : IllimitÃ©Virements SEPA instantanÃ©s entrantsÂ : 100Â 000Â â‚¬ par virementVirements SEPA instantanÃ©s sortants : 2 000 â‚¬ par virementCash26Le montant maximum est de 200Â â‚¬ par retrait et de 900Â â‚¬ par 24Â heures. title: How do contactless payments work?
content: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If youâ€™re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to â‚¬50 donâ€™t require a card PIN. For amounts over â‚¬50 or cumulative transactions above 150â‚¬ youâ€™ll need to enter your card PIN.Â Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front wonâ€™t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

title: How to keep my banking data safe online?
content: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using onlyÂ  your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?Â When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?Â Â First, youâ€™ll need to update your phoneâ€™s operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If youâ€™re unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you donâ€™t have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.What if I canâ€™t remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If youâ€™ve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, youâ€™ll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code youâ€™ve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or canâ€™t receive SMS for other reasons?If you donâ€™t have access to your registered phone number â€“ either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen â€“ please contact our customer service via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.Why canâ€™t I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesnâ€™t support the latest app version, you wonâ€™t be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which weâ€™ll send to your account's registered phone number.Youâ€™ll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
content: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel itâ€”this can be done at any time (see below). Weâ€™ll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesnâ€™t affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, youâ€™ll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 monthâ€™s time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and youâ€™ll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after youâ€™ve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we havenâ€™t received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after youâ€™ve proved your identity, weâ€™ll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option youâ€™ve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee.Â You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, weâ€™ll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

title: Posso aprire un conto N26 nel mio paese?
content: Offriamo i nostri conti in: Germania, Austria, Irlanda, Francia, Spagna, Italia, Paesi Bassi, Belgio, Portogallo, Finlandia, Lussemburgo, Slovenia, Estonia, Grecia, Slovacchia, Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, Norvegia, Liechtenstein, Islanda, e Svizzera.Per solidificare ancora di piÃ¹ le fondamenta della nostra attivitÃ  in futuro, ci stiamo concentrando su come migliorare ancora di piÃ¹ i nostri servizi, prodotti e processi.A causa della richiesta esponenziale di prodotti bancari digitali N26, dovremo mettere dei limiti temporanei al numero di nuovi conti bancari che possiamo offrire ogni mese.Â Aggiornamento al 14 ott. 12:00Mercati aperti per conti Standard e Premium: Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Spagna, Grecia, Irlanda, Islanda, Lichtenstein, Lussemburgo, Norvegia, Paesi Bassi, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Svezia & SvizzeraMercati aperti solo per Premium accounts: N/AMercati chiusi per tutti i tipi di conto: N/AMercati chiusi: ItaliaTi ricordiamo infine che puoi aprire il tuo conto N26 solo se soddisfi i nostriÂ requisiti. I nostri prodotti e servizi variano a seconda del paese. In caso tu abbia giÃ  un conto con noi e decidi di trasferirti in un paese non supportato per 18 o piÃ¹ mesi, contatta il nostro servizio clienti.

Folge uns auf Social Media #N26 und unserem Blog (neuen Tab), um als erster zu erfahren, wann sich das Ã¤ndert.Â Erfahre hier, wie du mit N26 Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen machen kannst.Erfahre hier, wie lange eine eingehende SWIFT-Ãœberweisung dauert.Â Was kostet eine SWIFT-Ãœberweisung?Eine Ãœberweisung, die hÃ¶her als 150â‚¬ ist, kostet 12,50â‚¬ + 0,1% des eingehenden Betrags.Auf eingehende BetrÃ¤ge unter 150â‚¬ wird keine GebÃ¼hr erhoben.Die hÃ¶chstmÃ¶gliche GebÃ¼hr pro Ãœberweisung liegt bei 100â‚¬.FÃ¼r wen gilt diese GebÃ¼hr?Wenn du dein Konto vor dem 07.07.2021 angemeldet hast und eine DE IBAN hast, gilt die GebÃ¼hr fÃ¼r das N26 Business Standard, Business Smart und Business You Konto. title: Was sind â€œNachrichtenâ€?
content: Die Sicherheit deiner Daten hat fÃ¼r uns hÃ¶chste PrioritÃ¤t. Deshalb haben wir einen Posteingang direkt in deiner N26 App erstellt, an den wir Nachrichten schicken kÃ¶nnen. Alle Inhalte, die personenbezogene Daten enthalten, werden an Nachrichten geschickt. Deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse benutzen wir weiterhin fÃ¼r allgemeine Informationen. Was sind personenbezogene Daten?Personenbezogene Daten sind solche Daten, die dich identifizierbar machen oder anhand derer man dich identifizieren kÃ¶nnte. Dazu zÃ¤hlen deine Kontodaten, deine Adresse (E-Mail oder postalisch), Ausweisdokumente, Meldebescheinigung, aber auch Mitteilungen Ã¼ber anfallende Dispokreditzinsen oder Ã¼ber DauerauftrÃ¤ge.Wie funktioniertâ€™s?Wenn wir dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken, erhÃ¤ltst du eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t und eine E-Mail an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn du dich in die WebApp einloggst, wirst du ebenfalls durch eine Info-Karte Ã¼ber neue Nachrichten informiert.Wir werden dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken und bitten dich, direkt von dort zu antworten.Diese Funktion ist in unserer mobilen App verfÃ¼gbar, indem du oben rechts auf das Support-Symbol klickst.Â Stelle sicher, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast.Du kannst keine E-Mail-Unterhaltung starten, aber du kannst antworten, sobald wir dir die erste Nachricht geschickt haben. Wenn es darum geht, uns ein Dokument zu schicken, wÃ¤hle Datei anhÃ¤ngen. Bitte stelle sicher, dass die gesamte GrÃ¶ÃŸe der AnhÃ¤nge pro Nachricht nicht grÃ¶ÃŸer ist als 25 MB.Nachrichten ersetzt nicht unseren Live Chat und du kannst uns weiterhin per E-Mail von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren. Wie du als erstes mit uns in Kontakt treten kannst, erfÃ¤hrst du in unserem Artikel: Wie kontaktiere ich N26? Falls wir dich fÃ¼r dein Anliegen verifizieren mÃ¼ssen, bitten wir dich, einen Chat mit uns zu starten.

title: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
content:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?Â N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European businessÂ and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.Â Â What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.Â In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos BankÂ® sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.Â How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 accountÂ 
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 AllpointÂ® ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.Â 
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.Â Â I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasnâ€™t been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you donâ€™t have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000â‚¬,Â and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500â‚¬. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you canâ€™t withdraw your daily limit at once.

title: Comment obtenir un relevÃ© bancaire
content: Le relevÃ© bancaire est un document qui contient le solde total de votre compte N26 et toutes les opÃ©rations entrantes et sortantes (virements, prÃ©lÃ¨vements, paiements par carte, etc.). Il contient Ã©galement le nom et le prÃ©nom du titulaire du compte, lâ€™IBAN et le BIC.Depuis lâ€™application mobile N26 (au format PDF) : appuyez sur les trois traits en haut Ã  droite de lâ€™Ã©cran d'accueil, puis sur RelevÃ©s.Vous pouvez Ã©galement obtenir un relevÃ© bancaire dâ€™un de vos sous-comptes Espaces : allez dans Espaces, choisissez un espace, appuyez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne des paramÃ¨tres dans le coin en haut Ã  droite et sÃ©lectionnez RelevÃ©s.Sur votre ordinateur depuis lâ€™espace client en ligne N26 (au format PDF) : cliquez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne de tÃ©lÃ©chargement (nouvel onglet)* et sÃ©lectionnez le mois en question dans la section RelevÃ©s de compte.Sur votre ordinateur depuis lâ€™espace client en ligne N26 (au format CSV): cliquez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne de tÃ©lÃ©chargement (nouvel onglet)* de fichiers au format CSV, sÃ©lectionnez les dates de dÃ©but et de fin souhaitÃ©es et cliquez sur TÃ©lÃ©charger en .csv.
