title: Come usare Apple Pay?
content: Disponibile in Italia, Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Irlanda, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia, SvizzeraApple Pay ti permette di effettuare pagamenti tramite il tuo dispositivo per non essere costretto ad avere la tua Mastercard sempre con te.Questo video (nuova tabella)Â ti mostrerÃ  come aggiungere la tua Mastercard N26 al tuo Apple Wallet. Se il pagamento non va a buon fine, ecco alcune informazioni da considerare:Lâ€™area del tuo iPhone corrisponde al Paese in cui Ã¨ stata inviata la Mastercard (Ã¨ possibile controllare lâ€™area selezionando Impostazioni, Generale e Lingua e Area geografica nel telefono).Se hai perso il tuo iPhone e non riesci a ritrovarlo, con Trova il mio iPhone, e puoi sempre accedere al tuo iCloud e rimuovere tutti i dispositivi Apple Pay dal browser Web di un Mac o PC. Inoltre, Ã¨ necessario attivare laÂ ModalitÃ  smarrito per bloccare la Mastercard per Apple Pay. I pagamenti con la carta fisica saranno comunque possibili.Se la Mastercard N26 viene inaspettatamente rimossa dall'Apple Wallet, potrebbe essere dovuto al fatto che ti sei disconnesso da iCloud, hai spento Passcode o Touch ID, hai resettato il dispositivo riportandolo alle impostazioni di fabbrica tramite iTunes o hai eliminato tutti i contenuti e le impostazioni dal dispositivo. In tutti i casi, Ã¨ sufficiente aggiungere di nuovo la carta. Tieni presente che la carta non viene rimossa se aggiorni il sistema operativo, se reimposti le impostazioni personali del dispositivo o se spegni Trova il mio iPhone.Per gli acquisti in negozio o online devi autorizzare il pagamento tramite Touch ID o il Passcode. Se utilizzi un Apple Watch, le autorizzazioni avvengono facendo doppio clic sul pulsante laterale. Se utilizzi un Mac, autorizza il pagamento con Touch ID o tramite la Touch Bar nell'angolo in alto a destra della tastiera.Se sei un cliente N26 Metal o N26 Business You, puÃ² accadere che l'immagine della carta visualizzata nel tuo Apple Wallet venga visualizzata come una carta N26 You (per clienti Metal) o come carta N26 Business (per clienti Business You). Stiamo lavorando per risolvere questo problema. Ti assicuriamo che ciÃ² non altera l'utilizzo di Apple Pay o la tua iscrizione premium.Assicurati che il tuo dispositivo soddisfi i requisiti tecnici visitando il Supporto Apple (nuova tabella).iPhone 6 o successivo, iPhone SE: disponibile in apps, negozi e sul webApple Watch associato con iPhone 5 o succesivo: disponibile in apps e negoziiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: disponibile in apps e sul webMacs introdotti nel 2012 o dopo (Macs al di fuori del MacBook Pro con Touch Bar e Touch ID necessitano di un iPhone o Apple Watch: disponibile sul web

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customersâ€™ data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

title: Pourquoi le distributeur automatique a enregistrÃ© mon retrait sans dÃ©livrer mon argent ?
content: Lorsque vous effectuez un retrait en distributeur automatique, il arrive parfois quâ€™il ne vous dÃ©livre pas votre argent mais que le montant du retrait soit dÃ©duit du solde de votre compte.Dans un premier temps, vÃ©rifiez lesÂ plafonds de votre carteÂ en allant dans la rubrique ğŸ‘¤Â Mon compteÂ puis dans la sectionÂ ParamÃ¨tres de votre carteÂ de votre application mobile. VÃ©rifiez que les retraits en distributeurs automatiques soient activÃ©s.Si nous ne pouvons pas toujours connaÃ®tre la raison de lâ€™Ã©chec, nous pouvons vous aider Ã  rÃ©cupÃ©rer le montant de votre retrait. Ce dernier a Ã©tÃ© dÃ©duit du solde de votre compte car le distributeur automatique a Ã©mis une empreinte de paiement (le montant du retrait est temporairement bloquÃ©). Comme lâ€™opÃ©ration nâ€™a pas fonctionnÃ©, cette empreinte de paiement expirera en quelques heures ou dans un dÃ©lai maximal de 12 jours ouvrÃ©s. Le montant sera alors Ã  nouveau disponible sur votre compte.Si le montant correspondant Ã  votre retrait apparaÃ®t toujours sur votre compte au bout de 12 jours ouvrÃ©s, cela veut dire que le montant a bien Ã©tÃ© dÃ©duit de votre compte. Nous vous invitons Ã  remplir unÂ formulaire de contestation. Nous ferons alors les dÃ©marches nÃ©cessaires pour rÃ©gler ce litige.En attendant, nous vous invitons Ã  effectuer un retrait dâ€™espÃ¨ces dans un autre distributeur automatique.Je nâ€™ai pas pu retirer dâ€™argent au distributeur. Que dois-je faire?Vous avez voulu retirer de lâ€™argent au DAB mais cela nâ€™a pas fonctionnÃ© ? Le montant que vous avez voulu retirer apparaÃ®t sur votre compte comme une simple autorisation, dans un premier temps. Si la transaction a Ã©chouÃ©, lâ€™autorisation correspondant au montant qui apparaÃ®t dans votre liste de transaction expireraÂ  et il sera re-crÃ©ditÃ© sur votre compte dans un dÃ©lai maximum de 12 jours ouvrÃ©s.Â Si lâ€™autorisation nâ€™expire pas et que vous voyez quâ€™elle apparaÃ®t sur votre relevÃ© de compte, nous vous invitons Ã  remplir un formulaire de contestation (nouvel onglet), afin de demander un remboursement.Â

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipientâ€,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.Youâ€™ll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent youâ€™ll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select â€œSend Moneyâ€ then choose â€œBank Transferâ€. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your accountâ€™s security (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.Â As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.Â This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message youâ€™ll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.Â Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.Â Our Customer Support doesnâ€™t have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: Posso scaricare lâ€™app N26 sul mio smartphone?
content: Qualsiasi versione di unâ€™app puÃ² essere utilizzata per 180 giorni dal suo rilascio. Durante questo periodo vengono rilasciate nuove versioni. Ti preghiamo di aggiornare sempre lâ€™app alla versione piÃ¹ recente, cosÃ¬ da poter godere della migliore esperienza cliente possibile. Lâ€™app N26 Ã¨ scaricabile dallâ€™App Store (nuova tabella)Â Apple o dalÂ Google Play Store (nuova tabella).Ti preghiamo di notare che tutti i telefoni devono soddisfare alcuni requisiti minimi per garantire il corretto funzionamento. Tali requisiti sono elencati qui di seguito:iPhone:modello 5s o piÃ¹ recenteiOS 12 o superioreTrovi la tua versione di iOS in "Impostazioni" > "Generali" > "Info"Android:Android 6.0 e superiore I requisiti minimi per Android sono (la versione Android Ã¨ visibile in Impostazioni > Info sul telefono):Supporto nativo dei Servizi Google

title: Wie kann ich mit N26 spenden?
content: N26 hat sich immer an der Seite humanitÃ¤rer Organisationen im Kampf gegen Hunger und Ungerechtigkeit engagiert. Ab jetzt gestaltet sich das Spenden von deinem N26 Konto aus noch einfacher.Â Du kannst jetzt eine Spende an eine von uns ausgewÃ¤hlte Liste von gemeinnÃ¼tzigen Organisationen senden, direkt von deiner N26 App aus. Der Gesamtbetrag wird per BankÃ¼berweisung an die ausgewÃ¤hlte gemeinnÃ¼tzige Organisation gesendet.Um eine Spende an eine WohltÃ¤tigkeitsorganisation zu senden, fÃ¼hre bitte folgende Schritte aus:Tippe auf dem Home Bildschirm deiner App auf Geld sendenWÃ¤hle Spenden und dann Weiter ausWÃ¤hle eine gemeinnÃ¼tzige Organisation aus der Liste ausÂ WÃ¤hle Weiter aus, um zu spendenGib den Spendenbetrag ein und bestÃ¤tige die Transaktion mit deiner PINBitte beachte: In vielen FÃ¤llen reicht ein Zahlungsnachweis aus, um den Steuerabzug deiner Spenden im Rahmen deiner persÃ¶nlichen EinkommenserklÃ¤rung geltend machen zu kÃ¶nnen. Solltest du jedoch eine formelle Spendenbescheinigung von der WohltÃ¤tigkeitsorganisation benÃ¶tigen, bitten wir dich, dich direkt mit dieser in Verbindung zu setzen (mit deinem Zahlungsnachweis), da Spendenbescheinigungen nur von WohltÃ¤tigkeitsorganisationen und nicht von N26 ausgestellt werden dÃ¼rfen.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Donâ€™t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you donâ€™t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while youâ€™re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We wonâ€™t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.Â

title: Kann ich in meinem Land ein N26 Konto erÃ¶ffnen?
content: Wir bieten unsere Konten in folgenden LÃ¤ndern an: in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Irland, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, den Niederlanden, Belgien, Portugal, Finnland, Luxemburg, Slowenien, Estland, Griechenland, der Slowakei, der Schweiz, Polen, Schweden, DÃ¤nemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein und Island.Um in Zukunft eine noch stÃ¤rkere Grundlage fÃ¼r unser GeschÃ¤ft zu schaffen, konzentrieren wir uns auf unser Serviceerlebnis, Produktangebote und unsere Prozesse.Angesichts der Ã¼berwÃ¤ltigenden Nachfrage nach den digitalen Banking-Produkten von N26 werden wir die Anzahl der neuen Bankkonten, die wir jeden Monat anbieten kÃ¶nnen,Â vorÃ¼bergehend limitieren.Â UPDATE: 25th Okt. 11:00 UhrMÃ¤rkte geÃ¶ffnet fÃ¼r Standard und Premium: Belgique, Danemark, Deutschland, Estonie, Finlande, Frankreich, GrÃ¨ce, Irlande, Islande, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, NorvÃ¨ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, SlovÃ©nie, Spanien, Ã–sterreich, Suisse & SuÃ¨deMÃ¤rkte geÃ¶ffnet nur fÃ¼r Premiumkonten: N/AMÃ¤rkte geschlossen fÃ¼r alle Kontotypen: N/AMÃ¤rkte geschlossen: ItalienDu kannst dein Konto erÃ¶ffnen, wenn du in einem dieser LÃ¤nder wohnst und die Voraussetzungen erfÃ¼llst. Unsere Produkte und Dienstleistungen variieren je nach Land. Solltest du bereits ein Konto bei uns haben und wirst fÃ¼r 18 Monate oder lÃ¤nger in ein nicht unterstÃ¼tztes Land ziehen, kontaktiere bitte unseren Customer Support.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintrÃ¤chtigt wurde?
content:
Betrugshotline - Kontaktiere uns.Du hast per BankÃ¼berweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen BetrÃ¼ger Ã¼berwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.Â Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlieÃŸlich fÃ¼r die oben beschriebenen FÃ¤lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vortÃ¤uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du denkst, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, Ã¤ndereÂ als ErstesÂ dein Passwort.Â DanachÂ kannst du je nach Situation verschiedene MaÃŸnahmen ergreifen:Was sollte ich tun, wenn mir eine Transaktion auf meinem Konto verdÃ¤chtig vorkommt?Wenn du eine verdÃ¤chtige Transaktion bemerkst, erfahre mehr dazu in unserem Artikel: Wie reklamiere ich eine Transaktion?"
Danach solltest du sofort unser Kundenserviceteam kontaktieren, entweder direkt Ã¼ber die N26 App oder per E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).Wenn du lieber telefonieren mÃ¶chtest, sage uns das einfach im Chat. Wir rufen dich innerhalb einer Stunde zurÃ¼ck und besprechen die Situation mit dir. Bitte erklÃ¤re uns alles genau, jedes Detail kann wichtig sein.Du kannst sicher sein, dass wir alles tun, um dir in dieser Situation zu helfen.Um unsere SicherheitsmaÃŸnahmen auch Ã¼ber unsere gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen hinaus zu verbessern, haben wir ein engagiertes Team, das jeden Betrugsfall genau analysiert.Die einzelnen FÃ¤lle sind oft sehr komplex, darum dauert eine Analyse oft einige Tage, manchmal mehrere Wochen.Falls du sicher bist, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, empfehlen wir dir auÃŸerdem, sofort eine Strafanzeige zu erstatten,Was sollte ich tun, wenn ich meine Karte verloren habe oder denke, dass meine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden?Wenn du deine N26 Karte verloren hast, sie dir gestohlen wurde oder du denkst, dass deine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden, solltest du deine Karte sofort in deiner N26 App sperren und eine neue beantragen, damit dein Geld sicher bleibt.Was passiert, wenn ich mein gekoppeltes GerÃ¤t verloren habe? KÃ¶nnte in diesem Fall jemand auf mein Konto zugreifen?Wenn du dein gekoppeltes GerÃ¤t verloren hast oder es dir gestohlen wurde, kannst du dich darauf verlassen, dass man auf deine N26 App nur unter Eingabe des richtigen Passworts oder mit Fingerabdruck- oder Gesichtserkennung zugreifen kann. Wenn du ein neues GerÃ¤t hast, hilft dir unser Kundenserviceteam gerne dabei, es mit deinem N26 Konto zu koppeln.Was ist, wenn ich eine Idee habe, um die Sicherheit bei N26 zu verbessern?Mehr darÃ¼ber, wie wir dein Konto im Betrugsfall schÃ¼tzen, erfÃ¤hrst du in unserem Blog (neuen Tab) und in unserem Artikel Ã¼ber Sicherheit bei N26 (neuen Tab).Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr , auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATMâ€™s nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A â‚¬2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (weâ€™ll remind you via push message when youâ€™re running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we canâ€™t reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, thereâ€™s a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A â‚¬2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2â‚¬.

title: How to activate my card?
content: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! Youâ€™ll have to activate your card whether itâ€™s your first N26 card, a replacement card, or youâ€™ve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card youâ€™re activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction â€” in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail â€” for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card â€” you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then youâ€™ll still be able to activate that new card.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. Weâ€™ll ask you to confirm your payment viaÂ push messageÂ during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didnâ€™t set it up yet, youâ€™ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If youâ€™re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals donâ€™t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: Comment puis-je protÃ©ger mon identitÃ© ?
content: Pour vous protÃ©ger et prÃ©venir lâ€™usurpation de votre identitÃ©, veuillez noter que :N26 ne vous contactera jamais pour obtenir des informationsÂ relatives Ã  votre identitÃ©Â pour une tierce partie, un individu ou une entreprise. Nous ne vous contacterons donc pas pour obtenir des informations pour vÃ©rifier un contrat de location, des lignes de crÃ©dit ou une offre dâ€™emploi (y compris pour une offre dâ€™emploi chez N26). ProcÃ©dez seulement Ã  la vÃ©rification de votre identitÃ© si vous souhaitez ouvrir un compte courant N26 Ã  votre nom.En tant que dÃ©tenteur du compte, vous devez Ãªtre la seule personne Ã  crÃ©er et connaÃ®tre vos identifiants de connexion. Ne crÃ©ez jamais un compte N26 avec des identifiants qui vous ont Ã©tÃ© communiquÃ©s. Si vous utilisez des identifiants qui vous ont Ã©tÃ© donnÃ©s par une tierce partie, ils peuvent Ãªtre utilisÃ©s pour accÃ©der Ã  vos informations personnelles et lÃ©gales. Par ailleurs, ne vous connectez jamais Ã  un compte N26 qui nâ€™est pas le vÃ´tre.Nâ€™envoyez jamais votre piÃ¨ce dâ€™identitÃ© ou votre passeport Ã  des inconnus ou Ã  des destinataires non vÃ©rifiÃ©s.N26 peut vous demander certains documents lorsquâ€™une de vos transactions fait lâ€™objet dâ€™un contrÃ´le de routine. Veuillez seulement nous faire parvenir des documents valides aux adresses email officielles de N26.N26 ne vous demandera jamais votre nom dâ€™utilisateur, votre mot de passe, votre code PIN ou votre code de virement en dehors de lâ€™application N26. Ne partagez ces informations avec aucun site tiers ou application tierce, mÃªme si elles ont lâ€™air dâ€™Ãªtre liÃ©es Ã  N26.Si vous avez le moindre doute, si vous recevez une demande suspicieuse dâ€™une tierce partie ou pensez que vos identifiants N26 aient pu Ãªtre compromis, nâ€™hÃ©sitez pas Ã  nous contacter.

title: Wie mache ich N26 zu meinem Hauptkonto?
content:
Wir kÃ¶nnen dir helfen, N26 zu deinem Hauptkonto zu machen, indem wir dein tÃ¤gliches BankgeschÃ¤ft von einem anderen Konto Ã¼bernehmen: Wir informieren alle Zahlungspartner, die wiederkehrende Lastschriften (z. B. fÃ¼r deine monatlichen Abonnements oder Rechnungen) berechnen oder Geld auf dein Konto Ã¼berweisen (z. B. deinen Arbeitgeber), und wir erklÃ¤ren dir, wie du DauerauftrÃ¤ge einrichtest oder RestbetrÃ¤ge Ã¼berweist.Es gibt drei MÃ¶glichkeiten, deine Bankkonten auf N26 umzustellen:Kontenwechselservice powered by finleap connect GmbHGemeinsam mit unserem Partner finleap connect GmbH (neuen Tab) bieten wir dir eine Plattform, auf der du deine Bankkonten einfach online wechseln kannst. Das ist ein automatisierter Prozess und vÃ¶llig kostenfrei.Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein und gehe zu Mein Konto > Zu N26 wechseln. Deine Zahlungspartner benÃ¶tigen mÃ¶glicherweise zusÃ¤tzliche Zeit, um deine Bankverbindung fÃ¼r zukÃ¼nftige Transaktionen zu Ã¤ndern.Kontenwechsel durch unseren Service SupportDu kannst deine Zahlungspartner auch selbst informieren. Damit kannst du auch die KÃ¼ndigung deines Bankkontos bei deiner vorherigen Bank beantragen.Auch dieser Service ist kostenlos. Wenn du Hilfe bei diesem Prozess benÃ¶tigst, kontaktiere unseren Kundenservice per Chat.Verpflichtende Kontoumstellung nach ZKG (Zahlungskontengesetz)Alle in Deutschland zugelassenen Banken sind verpflichtet, im Rahmen des Â§21 ZKG (Zahlungskontengesetz) einen Kontowechsel anzubieten. Um diesen Dienst zu starten, lade bitte dasÂ Formular zum Kontenwechsel (neuen Tab)Â herunter, drucke es aus und sende es an: N26 Bank GmbH

title: Le paiement en plusieurs fois n'est pas passÃ© mais mon compte a Ã©tÃ© dÃ©bitÃ©
content: Avant d'accorder un crÃ©dit, un organisme de crÃ©dit procÃ¨de Ã  une vÃ©rification de votre solvabilitÃ©. Pour cela, une empreinte bancaire est rÃ©alisÃ©e sur votre carte bancaire, gÃ©nÃ©ralement Ã©quivalente Ã  la premiÃ¨re mensualitÃ© du crÃ©dit demandÃ©.Le paiement en plusieurs fois n'Ã©tant malheureusement pas possible avec une carte de dÃ©bit N26 auprÃ¨s d'organismes de crÃ©dit tiers, le crÃ©dit peut vous Ãªtre refusÃ© bien que vous ayez Ã©tÃ© informÃ© qu'une transaction a Ã©tÃ© effectuÃ©e sur votre compte.La somme en question n'est en rÃ©alitÃ© pas dÃ©bitÃ©e de votre compte mÃªme si elle apparaÃ®t comme telle sur la liste de vos transactions dans l'application N26. Il s'agit d'une empreinte qui expirera dans un dÃ©lai de 12 jours maximum. La somme bloquÃ©e vous sera alors restituÃ©e automatiquement.Si ce n'est pas le cas, n'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  contacter notre Service Client.

title: Why do I need to send additional documents?
content: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS â†’ Certificates â†’ "Request for yourself" â†’ flag "of Residence" â†’ "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" â†’ and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description.Â Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customersâ€™ data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

title: Deposit fee
content: From July 2022, we have decided to no longer collect this feeFor every N26 account (except N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal) opened on or after 19.10.2020, and exceeding a balance of 50.000â‚¬, a 0,5% deposit fee per year applies, as was outlined in your terms and conditions during the account sign up process.Â Please find here (new tab) the related terms and conditions.The deposit fee will be calculated by tracking the balance of your account on a daily basis, for each day of the month. Every day that your balance exceeds the threshold of 50.000â‚¬, a 0,5% per annum fee will be applied to the excess of the account balance.Â The fee will be charged directly from your account at the beginning of each month for the previous 30 days.Â If your account balance might exceed the above mentioned threshold, and you donâ€™t want to incur this fee, there are two ways that you can prevent yourself from being charged:Â Upgrade to N26 You (new tab), N26 Business You (new tab), N26 Metal (new tab)or N26 Business MetalÂ  (new tab)For our German customers, open an EasyFlex Savings account (new tab) and transfer your excess funds there (please take note of eligibility requirements)

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipient), some details like the recipientâ€™s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.Â You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesnâ€™t delete your transaction history with them

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content: If your balance canâ€™t cover a direct debit* when itâ€™s due, itâ€™ll bounce and youâ€™ll be charged aÂ â‚¬3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. Itâ€™s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether youâ€™re eligible for anÂ OverdraftÂ directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9.

title: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!Â If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.Â If you havenâ€™t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card.Â

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content: Tips for a successful videoÂ verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of ourÂ supported countriesÂ to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driverâ€™s licenses or residence permits canâ€™t be used). Also, the document shouldnâ€™t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'llÂ need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and deliveryÂ of your card.Â Please note that this is not a fee: yourÂ first cardÂ after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. DeliveriesÂ take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: How to use my card digitally?
content: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

title: How to change my phone number?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to:Â ğŸ‘¤Â My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

title: DÃ©cÃ¨s et succession
content:
Comment puis-je signaler un dÃ©cÃ¨s Ã  N26Â ?Â En cas de dÃ©cÃ¨s, les descendants doivent sâ€™acquitter de nombreuses tÃ¢ches administratives. Lâ€™une dâ€™entre elles est le rÃ¨glement du solde des comptes bancaires du dÃ©funt.Â Le moyen le plus simple de contacter N26 Ã  ce sujet est par email. Il est Ã©galement possible dâ€™envoyer une demande par courrier ou par fax (le cas Ã©chÃ©ant)Â :
EmailÂ : service.succession@n26.comFaxÂ : +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH -Service Succession-
Rungestr. 22Â 
10179 Berlin, ALLEMAGNEVeuillez nous communiquer les informations suivantesÂ :Â Qui est le dÃ©funtÂ ?Â Si possible, veuillez joindre un certificat de dÃ©cÃ¨s, car câ€™est la maniÃ¨re la plus fiable dâ€™identifier tout compte bancaire associÃ©.Â Comment contacter les bÃ©nÃ©ficiairesÂ ?Nous vous prions de bien vouloir indiquer le nom, lâ€™adresse et lâ€™adresse email de la personne Ã  contacter, afin que nous puissions contacter les bÃ©nÃ©ficiaires. Malheureusement, un rappel nâ€™est pas possible.Y a-t-il quelque chose que nous devrions dÃ©jÃ  savoirÂ ?Si vous Ãªtes confrontÃ© Ã  des procÃ©dures ou si vous disposez de documents spÃ©cifiques, il peut Ãªtre utile de nous les transmettre.Â Nous vous contacterons, vous ou les bÃ©nÃ©ficiaires, pour vous informer de la suite de la procÃ©dure.Â Nous sommes parfois sollicitÃ©s par un notaire chargÃ© de la succession. Dans ce cas, nous fournirons au notaire toutes les informations nÃ©cessaires pour vous faciliter la tÃ¢che. Nous vous recommandons de communiquer nos coordonnÃ©es Ã  tout notaire chargÃ© de la succession.Â Veuillez ne pas nous envoyer de documents originaux par courrier pour le moment. Si nous avons besoin dâ€™un original, nous vous en informerons, vous ou votre notaire.Â Quâ€™advient-il dâ€™un compte N26 si le titulaire du compte dÃ©cÃ¨deÂ ?En raison de diffÃ©rences rÃ©gionales entre les lois et les rÃ©glementations, la procÃ©dure peut varier dâ€™un pays Ã  lâ€™autre.Â Cependant, tout compte ouvert auprÃ¨s de N26 Bank GmbH est situÃ© en Allemagne.Â En ce qui concerne les relations entre la banque du dÃ©funt et les bÃ©nÃ©ficiaires, dâ€™autres exigences lÃ©gales peuvent sâ€™appliquer dans votre pays dâ€™origine.DÃ¨s que nous apprenons le dÃ©cÃ¨s de lâ€™un de nos clients, les cartes et les transactions en ligne associÃ©es ainsi que tout accÃ¨s Ã  lâ€™application seront bloquÃ©s.Les ordres de virement permanent ou les mandats de prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique SEPA subsistent gÃ©nÃ©ralement aprÃ¨s le dÃ©cÃ¨s du titulaire du compte. Les hÃ©ritiers ou reprÃ©sentants autorisÃ©s doivent les rÃ©voquer ou les supprimer.Â De plus, nous sommes en principe lÃ©galement tenus dâ€™informer les autoritÃ©s fiscales allemandes responsables des droits de succession des biens de la succession.Dans tous les cas, nous indiquerons aux bÃ©nÃ©ficiaires ou Ã  leur notaire les documents Ã  fournir pour rÃ©gler le solde du compte N26 du dÃ©funt.
En tant que client, puis-je prendre des mesures de prÃ©caution en cas de dÃ©cÃ¨sÂ ?Â Il existe diffÃ©rents moyens de sâ€™assurer que vos biens seront rÃ©partis selon vos souhaits.Â 
Câ€™est pourquoi il est vivement recommandÃ© de demander lâ€™assistance juridique dâ€™un avocat, dâ€™un notaire ou dâ€™un conseiller fiscal pour toute personne souhaitant rÃ©diger un testament. Cela vaut en particulier pour la transmission dâ€™un patrimoine important.Â Notre Service Client ou les experts de notre service dâ€™homologation ne peuvent pas vous donner davantage de conseils Ã  ce sujet.Â Pour plus dâ€™informations sur une situation particuliÃ¨re, veuillez vous adresser Ã  un service de conseil spÃ©cialisÃ©.Â

title: Wie kann ich Push-Nachrichten erhalten?
content: Wir senden dir Push-Mitteilungen, um Ãœberweisungen abzuschlieÃŸen (z. B.Â MoneyBeam) oder einen Service zu bestÃ¤tigen (wie beiÂ CASH26). Wenn du diese Push-Nachrichten nicht erhÃ¤ltst, Ã¼berprÃ¼fe zunÃ¤chst, ob die Benachrichtigungen sowohl fÃ¼r dein Smartphone als auch fÃ¼r die App aktiviert sind. Dann kannst du abhÃ¤ngig von deinem Smartphone einige unserer VorschlÃ¤ge zur Fehlerbehebung ausprobieren:iOSLÃ¶sche die App und starte dein Smartphone neu. Lade die neueste Version der App aus dem Apple App Store herunter, installiere sie undÂ verknÃ¼pfe dein SmartphoneÂ wieder.ÃœberprÃ¼fe, ob du in der App eingeloggt bist.Die Benachrichtigungsoption fÃ¼r die App muss in den allgemeinen Einstellungen deines Smartphones aktiviert sein.AndroidLÃ¶sche die App und starte dein Smartphone neu. content:
Es gibt verschiedene MÃ¶glichkeiten, dich mit unserem Kundenservice in Verbindung zu setzen. Die beste MÃ¶glichkeit ist, einen sicheren Chat zu Ã¶ffnen, wÃ¤hrend du in der App eingeloggt bist. title: How to keep my banking data safe online?
content: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

title: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
content: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, weâ€™ll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesnâ€™t charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under theirÂ Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipientâ€™s name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipientâ€™s name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments arenâ€™t active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: What is CASH26?
content: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 appâ€“â€“no debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-storeâ€“â€“itâ€™s that simple. Plus, you donâ€™t have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adamâ€™s, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, youâ€™ll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.Â If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of â‚¬2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.

title: Where to find your Tax ID
content: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If youâ€™re from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TINâ€™s are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben Ã¼ber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If youâ€™re a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des ProcÃ©dures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authoritiesâ€™ database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TINâ€™s are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TINâ€™s are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If youâ€™ve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.Weâ€™ve made aÂ video (new tab)Â to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If youâ€™ve lost your iPhone and arenâ€™t able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card wonâ€™t be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If youâ€™re using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if youâ€™re using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: Warum wurde meine Ãœberweisung in der N26 App noch nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt?
content: Du brauchst deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN fÃ¼r alle Transaktionen, egal obÂ MoneyBeam, DauerauftrÃ¤ge oderÂ CASH26. Deine Ãœberweisung bleibt ausstehend, bis du sie per Push-Nachricht in der App bestÃ¤tigst oder abbrichst.Deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN unterscheidet sich von deinerÂ Karten-PIN, aber du kannst fÃ¼r beide die gleiche Zahlenkombination verwenden. Sobald du deinÂ Smartphone verknÃ¼pft hast, wirst du aufgefordert, die BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN zu erstellen (die Karten-PIN legst du erst bei der Aktivierung der Karte fest).Wenn du deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird sie aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden gesperrt. Du kannst sie in der AppÂ wiederherstellen.

title: How to block my N26 card?
content: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go toÂ the Cards tabÂ and selectÂ Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself againstÂ unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: How do contactless payments work?
content: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If youâ€™re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to â‚¬50 donâ€™t require a card PIN. For amounts over â‚¬50 or cumulative transactions above 150â‚¬ youâ€™ll need to enter your card PIN.Â Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front wonâ€™t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

title: Adresse de rÃ©sidence et impÃ´ts en France
content:
Si vous vivez actuellement en France, vous Ãªtes probablement un rÃ©sident fiscal franÃ§ais.Â En rÃ¨gle gÃ©nÃ©rale, votre rÃ©sidence fiscale est le pays/la juridiction dans lequel/laquelle vous vivez.Â Dans certains cas, vous pouvez Ãªtre rÃ©sident fiscal dans plusieurs pays/juridictions Ã  la fois ou ne pas Ãªtre rÃ©sident fiscal franÃ§ais.Pour en savoir plus sur la rÃ©sidence fiscale, veuillez consulter votre conseiller fiscal ou le portail de lâ€™Ã©change automatique dâ€™informations de lâ€™OCDE (nouvel onglet).
Si votre rÃ©sidence fiscale se situe hors de France, nous pouvons Ãªtre lÃ©galement tenus de transmettre certaines informations concernant vos comptes financiers Ã  la Direction des finances publiques. Celle-ci peut Ã©changer ces informations avec les autoritÃ©s fiscales dâ€™une ou plusieurs autres juridictions en vertu dâ€™accords intergouvernementaux pour lâ€™Ã©change dâ€™informations sur vos comptes financiers ou du droit local.Â 
En tant quâ€™Ã©tablissement financier, nous ne sommes pas autorisÃ©s Ã  fournir des conseils fiscaux.Â Votre conseiller fiscal sera peut-Ãªtre en mesure de vous aider Ã  rÃ©pondre Ã  des questions spÃ©cifiques liÃ©es Ã  votre rÃ©sidence fiscale. Vous trouverez Ã©galement plus dâ€™informations, notamment une liste des juridictions qui ont signÃ© des accords dâ€™Ã©change automatique dâ€™informations, ainsi que des dÃ©tails sur les informations demandÃ©es, sur le portail de lâ€™Ã©change automatique dâ€™informations de lâ€™OCDE (nouvel onglet).
Le dÃ©cret nÂ° 2016-1683 du 5Â dÃ©cembreÂ 2016, basÃ© sur la Norme commune de dÃ©claration (Â«Â NCDÂ Â») de lâ€™OCDE, exige que N26 France collecte et dÃ©clare Ã  la Direction des finances publiques certaines informations sur un titulaire de compte dont la rÃ©sidence fiscale se situe hors de France.Â Chaque juridiction a ses propres rÃ¨gles pour dÃ©finir la rÃ©sidence fiscale, et les juridictions ont fourni des informations sur la maniÃ¨re de dÃ©terminer si vous Ãªtes rÃ©sident dans la juridiction concernÃ©e sur le site internet suivantÂ : Portail de lâ€™Ã©change automatique dâ€™informations de lâ€™OCDE.Â  (nouvel onglet)

title: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
content: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.Â With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as weâ€™re able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. Weâ€™re going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.Â Can I open an N26 account in my country?

title: Â¿CÃ³mo declarar mi cuenta N26 para los impuestos en Francia?
content: (aplica a los residentes en Francia)De acuerdo con el CÃ³digo de Impuesto General FrancÃ©s, todos los residentes franceses estarÃ¡n obligados a declarar cualquier cuenta bancaria que hayan abierto, usado o cerrado el Ãºltimo aÃ±o sobre el aÃ±o en el que hayan recibido ingresos, esto incluye tu cuenta en N26. Para hacerlo:En tu declaraciÃ³n de impuestos, marca la casilla de Cuenta Extranjera abierta, usada o cerrada (8UU) (Compte Ã©tranger ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ©).Completa elÂ formulario Cerfa nÂ° 3916 (pestaÃ±a nueva) y aÃ±Ã¡delo a tu declaraciÃ³n de impuestos.Puedes encontrar mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre cÃ³mo declarar tu cuenta N26 (pestaÃ±a nueva) en nuestro blog.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo funciona Espacios?
content: Espacios es una funcionalidad de las cuentas premium que te permite definir objetivos, crear y personalizar espacios y transferir dinero entre ellos al instante. Espacios estÃ¡ disponible en la app y en laÂ WebApp (pestaÃ±a nueva).AdemÃ¡s de tu cuenta (o espacio) principal, puedes crear y eliminar tantos espacios adicionales como desees, pero el nÃºmero de espacios que puedes tener activos simultÃ¡neamente dependerÃ¡ de tu tipo de cuenta: hasta 10 espacios adicionales con N26 You, N26 Smart y N26 Metal.Los extractos bancarios de tu cuenta principal incluirÃ¡n todas las transacciones enviadas a un espacio o recibidas del mismo. Puedes descargar dichos extractos desde la pÃ¡gina de confirmaciÃ³n.Ãšnicamente tu cuenta principal podrÃ­a tener un saldo negativo (si tienes disponibilidad de unÂ descubierto). Los saldos de tus Espacios no pueden ser negativos, de modo que solo puedes transferir lo que estÃ¡ disponible en un espacio en particular.Solo puedes usar el saldo de tu cuenta principal para las transacciones con tarjeta, por lo que deberÃ­as transferir fondos hacia tu cuenta principal antes de realizar una compra, si fuera necesario.Para mover el dinero entre espacios, mantÃ©n pulsado sobre un espacio, arrÃ¡stralo y suÃ©ltalo sobre otro. Una vez elijas la cantidad y confirmes, el balance se actualizarÃ¡ inmediatamente.Puedes bloquear y desbloquear los espacios siempre que quieras desde la app, para ello sÃ³lo necesitas tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n. Aunque tengas un espacio bloqueado, seguirÃ¡s teniendo la posibilidad de transferirle dinero. Si lo que necesitas es retirar dinero de ese espacio, primero tendrÃ¡s que desbloquearlo. Si quieres, tambiÃ©n puedes ocultar del balance principal la cantidad que tienes en el espacio. Para ello, entra en el espacio, pincha en los 3 puntos de la esquina superior derecha y despuÃ©s sobre ''Ocultar el espacio del saldo''.Ahora puedes bloquear transferencias desde un espacio especÃ­fico. Simplemente vaya a la configuraciÃ³n del espacio, toque Bloquear transferencias a la cuenta principal u otros espacios e ingrese su PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.Ahora tambiÃ©n puedes eliminar un espacio, incluso con una tarjeta vinculada a Ã©l, desde la configuraciÃ³n del espacio.Hace poco hemos aÃ±adido una nueva funciÃ³n para Espacios que se llama Reglas.RedondeoLa funciÃ³n del Redondeo permite a los usuarios premium redondear cada pago con tarjeta a la cifra entera inmediatamente superior y transferir la diferencia al espacio que elijan.El redondeo no te harÃ¡n incurrir en descubierto, de modo que solo se realizarÃ¡ mientras tengas saldo suficiente para cubrir el redondeo.Solo puedes tener un redondeo activo al mismo tiempo, que se transferirÃ¡ al Espacio que tÃº elijas.Puedes desactivar la funciÃ³n del Redondeo en cualquier momento.Si cierras el espacio donde tengas habilitado el redondeo, la funciÃ³n se deshabilitarÃ¡ hasta que vuelvas a habilitarla desde un espacio activo.
