title: Pourquoi ne puis-je pas obtenir de crÃ©dit ?
content: Lors de votre demande de crÃ©dit, nous vous posons une sÃ©rie de questions sur votre situation personnelle et financiÃ¨re. Il vous sera probablement demandÃ© de vous connecter Ã  votre autre compte bancaire directement depuis lâ€™application N26 pour continuer votre demande (obligatoire en Allemagne, si votre compte N26 n'est pas votre compte principal).Cet autre compte doit exclusivement Ãªtre un compte que vous dÃ©tenez auprÃ¨s dâ€™une banque du pays depuis lequel vous faites votre demande de crÃ©dit. Si vous faites votre demande en France, le compte secondaire pris en compte dans lâ€™Ã©valuation de votre demande de crÃ©dit devra ainsi Ãªtre dans une banque franÃ§aise, en Allemagne le compte secondaire devra Ãªtre allemand.(Pour lâ€™Allemagne) Nous contrÃ´lons Ã©galement votre score de crÃ©dit actuel auprÃ¨s de l'organisme Schufa, mÃªme si nous possÃ©dons dÃ©jÃ  des informations vous concernant qui nous ont dÃ©jÃ  Ã©tÃ© fournies par Schufa. Notre demande dâ€™informations auprÃ¨s de cet organisme n'exerce aucune influence sur votre score lui-mÃªme. Votre score de crÃ©dit nâ€™est pas lâ€™unique critÃ¨re de notre Ã©valuation, nous vÃ©rifions aussi vos revenus mensuels sans compter les aides sociales (chÃ´mage, allocations familiales, etc).Une fois la demande de crÃ©dit envoyÃ©e via lâ€™application, vous ne pourrez pas modifier votre demande pendant 90 jours, et ce, mÃªme si votre situation Ã©volue entre temps. Il vous faudra donc attendre la suppression de votre premiÃ¨re requÃªte pour faire une nouvelle demande de crÃ©dit.Votre Ã©ligibilitÃ© Ã  lâ€™obtention dâ€™un crÃ©dit est Ã©tudiÃ©e par un systÃ¨me automatique intÃ©grÃ© Ã  notre application.

title: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
content:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: Comment Ãªtre visible auprÃ¨s des autres utilisateurs N26 ?
content: Pour pouvoir utiliser toutes les fonctionnalitÃ©s de votre application, vous et vos contacts devez Ãªtre visibles en tant quâ€™utilisateur N26.Â  Lorsque vous nous autorisez Ã  le faire, nous accÃ©dons Ã  votre rÃ©pertoire pour identifier vos contacts qui utilisent Ã©galement N26.Pour modifier votre visibilitÃ© en tant que client N26 auprÃ¨s de vos contacts, vous pouvez Ã  tout moment activer ou dÃ©sactiver cette option depuis votre application N26. Pour cela, rendez-vous dans la rubrique Mon compte > Information personelles > CoordonnÃ©es. Vous pouvez ensuite cocher ou dÃ©cocher la case â€œjâ€™accepte dâ€™Ãªtre facilement identifiable par mes contacts qui utilisent N26 pour recevoir des virements."Parmi tous vos contacts, ceux qui sont Ã©galement clients N26 seront visibles dans votre liste de contacts de lâ€™application N26. De la mÃªme faÃ§on, vous apparaitrez dans leur liste de contacts, vous identifiant comme Ã©tant client N26. Pourquoi Ãªtre visible auprÃ¨s des autres utilisateurs N26 ?Vous pouvez notamment effectuer des transactions en temps rÃ©el sans saisir dâ€™IBAN grÃ¢ce Ã  Moneybeam, en sÃ©lectionnant seulement le nom du destinataire dans votre liste de contacts. Vous pouvez Ã©galement demander de l'argent aux personnes de votre liste de contacts qui n'ont plus qu'Ã  accepter (ou refuser) votre demande.De plus, en Ã©tant visible auprÃ¨s des autres utilisateurs vous pouvez utiliser les Espaces PartagÃ©s. Cette fonctionnalitÃ© vous permet de partager des espaces avec d'autres utilisateurs N26 sÃ©lectionnÃ©s dans votre liste de contacts.

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app youâ€™ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upperÂ right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.â„¹ï¸ Â Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Deposit fee
content: From July 2022, we have decided to no longer collect this feeFor every N26 account (except N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal) opened on or after 19.10.2020, and exceeding a balance of 50.000â‚¬, a 0,5% deposit fee per year applies, as was outlined in your terms and conditions during the account sign up process.Â Please find here (new tab) the related terms and conditions.The deposit fee will be calculated by tracking the balance of your account on a daily basis, for each day of the month. Every day that your balance exceeds the threshold of 50.000â‚¬, a 0,5% per annum fee will be applied to the excess of the account balance.Â The fee will be charged directly from your account at the beginning of each month for the previous 30 days.Â If your account balance might exceed the above mentioned threshold, and you donâ€™t want to incur this fee, there are two ways that you can prevent yourself from being charged:Â Upgrade to N26 You (new tab), N26 Business You (new tab), N26 Metal (new tab)or N26 Business MetalÂ  (new tab)For our German customers, open an EasyFlex Savings account (new tab) and transfer your excess funds there (please take note of eligibility requirements)

title: Custom Audiences
content: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called â€œLookalike-Audiencesâ€ are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.Â In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called â€˜lookalike audiencesâ€™ are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of theÂ delivery and accept the N26 MetalÂ T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering yourÂ Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If youâ€™re already a N26 You member, you donâ€™t have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: How to close my account?
content: Weâ€™re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. Weâ€™d love to keep you as a customerâ€”tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.Â If youâ€™ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, hereâ€™s what to do:Make your account balance â‚¬0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is â‚¬0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). Youâ€™ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or youâ€™re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or â€œas soon as possibleâ€Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, weâ€™ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

title: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
content: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: PSD2 - sicheres Open Banking
content: WofÃ¼r steht PSD2?Die Zweite Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (â€œPSD2â€) ist eine Ã¼berarbeitete europÃ¤ische Richtlinie und ermÃ¶glicht dir, Ã¼ber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher auf deine Kontodaten zuzugreifen und Zahlungen Ã¼ber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher durchzufÃ¼hren.Das bedeutet, dass du regulierten Drittanbietern Ã¼ber eine dedizierte Schnittstelle Zugang zu deinem Konto erlauben kannst:Du kannst Ã¼ber einen Kontoinformationsdienst (KID) Daten verschiedener Bankkonten an einem Ort zusammenfÃ¼hren und sie Ã¼ber regulierte Drittanbieter verwalten;Du kannst bei einem Einkauf auf einer Website einen ZahlungsauslÃ¶sedienst (ZAD) nutzen.Der sichere Datenaustausch erfolgt im Hintergrund Ã¼ber unseren Partner Token.io.Wie funktioniert's?Nutzt Du einen regulierten Drittanbieter, wie einen Kontoinformationsdienst oder einen ZahlungauslÃ¶sedienst, wirst Du Ã¼ber Token.io zur N26 App weitergeleitet, um die jeweilige Zugriffsanfrage zu bestÃ¤tigen.Â In unserer DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung (neuen Tab) informieren wir Dich Ã¼ber die Zwecke, die involvierten Parteien und die rechtlichen Grundlagen fÃ¼r die notwendige Datenverarbeitung, um unsere Verpflichtungen im Rahmen der Ã¼berarbeiteten Zweiten Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie zu erfÃ¼llen.FAQsWarum kann ich keinen Drittanbieter mit meinem Konto verlinken?Wenn der Drittanbieter keine Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vorgenommen hat, muss er zunÃ¤chst Ã¼ber unseren Partner Token.io die Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vornehmen.Wie kann ich eine ZugriffsbestÃ¤tigung, die ich einem regulierten Drittanbieter gewÃ¤hrt habe, widerrufen?Um eine ZugangsbestÃ¤tigung zu widerrufen, die Du einem regulierten Drittanbieter gewÃ¤hrt hast, musst Du Dich direkt an den regulierten Drittanbieter wenden.*gilt fÃ¼r alle LÃ¤nder im EWR.

title: When will my card arrive?
content: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10â‚¬).Â Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0â‚¬ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25â‚¬ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

title: Wie zahle ich Geld auf mein Konto ein?
content: Sobald du dich erfolgreich verifiziert hast, kannst du auf verschiedene Weisen Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen:CASH26 (verfÃ¼gbar in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland): Zahle Bargeld Ã¼ber unsere PartnergeschÃ¤fte direkt auf dein Konto ein. MoneyBeam: Erhalte sofort Geld von anderen N26 Nutzern.Debitkarte: Du kannst Geld von einem anderen Bankkonto auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du die Karteninformationen in der App hinterlegst. title: How to open my N26 account?
content: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, youâ€™ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you donâ€™t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

title: How to prove my identity?
content: As a licensed bank, itâ€™s important that we know who our customers are. Thatâ€™s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. Weâ€™ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.Â If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we wonâ€™t be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.Â

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).Â In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.Â In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:Â A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasnâ€™t been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you donâ€™t have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000â‚¬,Â and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500â‚¬. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you canâ€™t withdraw your daily limit at once.

title: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
content:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercardâ€™s exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesnâ€™t charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercardâ€™s rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

title: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
content: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.Â Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.Â

title: Dove trovare il codice di identificazione fiscale
content: Il tuo Codice di Identificazione Fiscale (TIN, dall'inglese Tax Identification Number) Ã¨ univoco, e rilasciato dall'autoritÃ  fiscale al momento della registrazione nel paese in cui tu, come individuo, sei un contribuente.Dove trovare il TIN puÃ² variare a seconda del paese in cui sei soggetto alla tassazione. Ti preghiamo di notare che il TIN di ogni paese puÃ² essere diverso. Ad esempio, se sei nel Regno Unito puoi pensare al tuo TIN come al tuo National Insurance Number (NIN). per i cittadini tedeschi:Se sei residente in Germania e sei registrato presso le autoritÃ  fiscali locali, ti verrÃ  fornito un TIN a 11 cifre ovvero Steueridentifikationsnummer. Non confondere questo con il tuo Codice Fiscale a 9 cifre, o Steuernummer.I TIN non sono riportati nei documenti di riconoscimento ufficiali, ma puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:La lettera che hai ricevuto dall'Ufficio Federale Centrale delle Imposte per il rilascio del tuo TIN o IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben Ã¼ber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Calcolo dei redditiDichiarazione dei redditi da lavoro dipendenteScopri di piÃ¹ su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella). per i cittadini francesi:Se sei residente in Francia e sei obbligato a dichiarare le tasse lÃ¬, le autoritÃ  fiscali francesi emetteranno un TIN a 13 cifre o SPI (Simplification des ProcÃ©dures d'Imposition) una volta che ti sarai registrato nel database delle autoritÃ  fiscali. Questi numeri iniziano con 0, 1, 2 o 3.Puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:Sul tuo modello di dichiarazione dei redditi prestampatoInoltre, puoi trovarlo sui tuoi avvisi fiscali e di imposta sulla proprietÃ Scopri di piÃ¹ su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella). per i cittadini italiani:Se sei residente in Italia, il TIN o Codice fiscale (composto da 16 caratteri) Ã¨ valido solo se registrato nell'Anagrafe tributaria italiana gestita dall'Agenzia delle Entrate. Se non hai un TIN, dovrai presentare la richiesta in qualsiasi ufficio dell'Agenzia delle Entrate.I TIN non sono riportati nei documenti di riconoscimento ufficiali, ma puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:Il TIN Ã¨ presente sulla tua tessera sanitaria personale (Tessera sanitaria/Codice Fiscale).Puoi trovare il tuo TIN anche sulla tua carta TIN.Scopri di piÃ¹ su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella). per i cittadini spagnoli:Se sei residente in Spagna, il tuo TIN Ã¨ unico a fini fiscali e doganali. Il tuo TIN spagnolo Ã¨ composto da nove caratteri (l'ultimo carattere Ã¨ una lettera ai fini di controllo). I TIN vengono emessi dal Ministero dell'Interno e possono variare a seconda che tu sia una persona fisica con cittadinanza spagnola o meno.A seconda delle tue circostanze, puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:Carta d'identitÃ  personaleCarta d'identitÃ  elettronicaCarta di residenza per stranieriNuova patente (dal 2004)Carta di identificazione fiscaleTessera previdenzialeScopri di piÃ¹ su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella).Informazione importante:Il formato del codice fiscale che puÃ² essere inserito nell'app N26 dipende dal paese in cui ti trovi. CiÃ² significa che se risiedi in Germania devi inserire il tuo TIN tedesco.Puoi controllare le informazioni fiscali che hai salvato sul tuo conto andando su:Il mio conto > Profilo > Informazioni fiscali.Se hai inserito il paese in cui sei soggetto d'imposta ma non il tuo numero d'identificazione fiscale, rimuovi il paese dalla lista che ti viene mostrata nell'applicazione, inserisci nuovamente il paese e inserisci nuovamente il tuo numero d'identificazione fiscale.Scopri di piÃ¹ su come utilizziamo le tue informazioni fiscali qui (nuova tabella).

title: Why was I charged twice?
content: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means youâ€™re able to see whatâ€™s going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once youâ€™ve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we canâ€™t cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.Â Sometimes youâ€™ll see both payments at the same timeâ€“the authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesnâ€™t expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).Â Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

Unser Kundenservice ist tÃ¤glich fÃ¼r dich da und kann dein Problem schnell lÃ¶sen.Wenn du eine Beschwerde einreichst, benÃ¶tigen wir folgende Informationen von dir:Das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung, mit dem bzw. mit derÂ  du nicht zufrieden bistEine Beschreibung des Sachverhalts und wann das Problem aufgetreten istDu kannst auch Unterlagen einreichen, die im Zusammenhang mit deiner Beschwerde stehenÂ Das gewÃ¼nschte Ergebnis der BeschwerdeWir kÃ¶nnen kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur an die E-Mail-Adresse Ã¼bermitteln, die mit deinem N26-Konto verknÃ¼pft ist.Â Wird die Beschwerde durch einen Vertreter eingereicht, muss ihr auch ein spezielles notariell beglaubigtes Vollmachtsformular beigefÃ¼gt sein.Bitte kontaktiere uns via App oder per E-Mail, da wir dir nicht helfen kÃ¶nnen, wenn du unser BÃ¼ro aufsuchst. Falls du uns nicht via App oder per E-Mail kontaktieren kannst, schicke uns bitte eine schriftliche Beschwerde (per Brief) an folgende Adresse:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWir bestÃ¤tigen dir den Erhalt deiner Beschwerde per E-Mail und prÃ¼fen anschlieÃŸend den Sachverhalt. Sofern wir weitere Informationen von dir benÃ¶tigen, wird sich unser Complaint Management Team direkt per E-Mail an dich wenden und dir erklÃ¤ren, welche Informationen wir zusÃ¤tzlich brauchen. Sobald unser Team dein Anliegen geprÃ¼ft hat, teilen wir dir per E-Mail eine endgÃ¼ltige Entscheidung mit.Bearbeitungszeit einer BeschwerdeAlle Beschwerden, die Zahlungsdienste wie Ãœberweisungen und Kartentransaktionen betreffen, werden innerhalb von 15 Werktagen gemÃ¤ÃŸ der EuropÃ¤ischen Richtlinie Ã¼ber Zahlungsdienste II (PSD2) gelÃ¶st. Falls wir mehr Zeit bei der Bearbeitung deiner Beschwerde benÃ¶tigen, dann werden wir dich darÃ¼ber informieren. Wir mÃ¼ssen dich innerhalb von 35 Werktagen Ã¼ber unsere Entscheidung informieren.FÃ¼r alle anderen Beschwerden gelten unterschiedliche Fristen. Diese sind abhÃ¤ngig von den AGB jenes Landes, in dem du dein N26-Konto erÃ¶ffnet hast.Â Deutschland und Ã–sterreich - 15 WerktageAndere europÃ¤ische LÃ¤nder - 15 WerktageIrland - 40 WerktageFrankreich - 56 KalendertageVereinigtes KÃ¶nigreich - 56 KalendertageSpanien - 60 KalendertageItalien - 60 KalendertageWenn wir keine Antwort von dir erhalten, schlieÃŸen wir mÃ¶glicherweise deine Beschwerde. Wenn du dich zu einem spÃ¤teren Zeitpunkt wieder meldest, erstellen wir einen neuen Fall und teilen dir die neue Referenznummer fÃ¼r deine Beschwerde mit.Wenn du mit dem Ausgang deiner Beschwerde unzufrieden bistSolltest du mit der von uns angebotenen LÃ¶sung nicht zufrieden sein, hast du die MÃ¶glichkeit, dich an eine unabhÃ¤ngige dritte Instanz zu wenden. Es stehen dir beispielsweise folgende Schlichtungsstellen zur VerfÃ¼gung:die Schlichtungsstelle der Deutschen Bundesbankdie Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin)Eine vollstÃ¤ndige Liste von Streitbeilegungs- und Schlichtungsstellen findest du in unserem Imprint (neuen Tab).

title: N26 supporta i bonifici SWIFT?
content: SÃ¬, ma per il momento solo bonifici SWIFT in entrata.I bonifici SWIFT in uscita non sono ancora possibili. Seguici sui social media #N26 e sul nostro Blog (nuova tabella) per essere tra i primi a sapere se ci saranno dei cambiamenti.Scopri qui come effettuare bonifici in valuta estera con N26.Scopri qui quanto tempo occorre per un bonifico SWIFT in entrata.Quanto costa un bonifico SWIFT?Per i bonifici in entrata superiori a 150 â‚¬ verrÃ  applicata una commissione di 12,50 â‚¬ + lo 0,1% dellâ€™importo ricevuto.Non si applicano commissioni ai bonifici in entrata inferiori a 150 â‚¬.La commissione massima Ã¨ di 100 â‚¬ per transazione.A chi viene applicata la commissione?Se hai aperto un conto prima del 07/07/2021 e hai un IBAN tedesco, la commissione viene applicata a te se hai un conto N26 Business Standard, Business Smart o Business You. (CiÃ² significa che non viene applicata a N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal e N26 Business Metal.)Se hai aperto un conto prima del 07/07/2021 e hai un IBAN spagnolo, la commissione viene applicata se hai un conto N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You o N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You. (CiÃ² significa che non viene applicata ai conti N26 Metal o N26 Business Metal.)Se hai aperto un conto dopo il 07/07/2021, la commissione viene applicata indipendentemente dal tuo IBAN se hai un conto N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You o N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You. (CiÃ² significa che non viene applicata ai conti N26 Metal o N26 Business Metal.)

title: What is a Virtual Card?
content: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account youâ€™ll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10â‚¬ to activate the card).Â An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10â‚¬ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on â€˜Get an additional cardâ€™.Select â€˜Virtualâ€™ at the top, then tap â€˜Chooseâ€™ at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap â€˜Generate virtual cardâ€™.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect â€˜cardsâ€™Locate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select â€˜card detailsâ€™You will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

title: Wie funktioniert Google Pay?
content: VerfÃ¼gbar in Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Finnland, Irland, Norwegen, Polen, Slowakei, Schweden, Schweiz, Ã–sterreich, Estland, Griechenland, Lettland, Litauen, Niederlande, Portugal.Mit Google Pay kannst du mit deinem Smartphone bezahlen und musst so deine Mastercard nicht stÃ¤ndig bei dir tragen.Google Pay ist in allen Shops, die kontaktlose Zahlungen (NFC) unterstÃ¼tzen, sowie in Online-Shops verfÃ¼gbar. Halte einfach dein Smartphone in die NÃ¤he des kontaktlosen Terminals und deine Zahlung wird automatisch verarbeitet. Wenn du online bezahlst, wÃ¤hle Google Pay als Zahlungsmethode aus. Wir werden dich beim Abschluss des Bezahlvorgangs perÂ Push-NachrichtÂ auffordern, deine Zahlung zu bestÃ¤tigen.So geht's:Um deine N26 Mastercard zu deinem Google Wallet hinzuzufÃ¼gen, lade die Google Pay App herunter und wÃ¤hle HinzufÃ¼gen, um deine Kartendaten einzugeben. Du brauchst Android 5.0 (Lollipop) oder hÃ¶her sowie ein NFC-fÃ¤higes Smartphone.Logge dich in die N26 App ein un gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Zu Google Pay hinzufÃ¼gen. Du wirst dann zur Google Pay App weitergeleitet. Einige Tipps:Google Pay erfordert eine Bildschirmsperre. Falls du diese noch nicht eingerichtet hast, wirst du dazu aufgefordert, bevor du deine Mastercard zur Google Pay App hinzufÃ¼gst.Falls dein Smartphone mit einer SchutzhÃ¼lle versehen ist, musst du diese zum Bezahlen eventuell entfernen. Manche Zahlungsterminals erkennen dein Smartphone mÃ¶glicherweise nicht, wenn die SchutzhÃ¼lle zu dick ist.Wenn das Zahlungsterminal dich dazu auffordert, deine Karte (erneut) vorzuzeigen, dann hast du dein Smartphone mÃ¶glicherweise zu schnell wieder weggenommen oder nicht nah genug an das Terminal gehalten. Versuche es einfach erneut.

title: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
content: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 MetalÂ contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, youâ€™re now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and youâ€™ll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.Â RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.Â  At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and weâ€™ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of â‚¬10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

title: Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?
content: Gli Spazi Condivisi rappresentano un modo nuovo e facile per utenti N26 di condividere denaro. Questi Spazi possono essere utili per suddividere il costo delle utenze, per pianificare una vacanza oppure per organizzare lâ€™acquisto di un regalo di compleanno per un amico o parente.Spazi Condivisi Ã¨ unâ€™opzione disponibile per gli utenti N26 premium (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You e N26 Business Metal), i quali possono creare uno Spazio e invitare altri utenti a prenderne parte.Tutti gli utenti N26 possono essere invitati a partecipare ad uno Spazio.Il proprietario dello Spazio diventa proprietario del denaro depositato.Il proprietario dello Spazio puÃ² invitare fino a 10 partecipanti oppure decidere di rimuoverli.IBAN italiano e Spazi CondivisiSpazi Condivisi Ã¨ un nuovo, semplice, modo per i clienti N26 di condividere le spese e mettere soldi da parte insieme. Questi spazi separati dal conto principale possono essere utilizzati per qualsiasi scopo, dal pagamento delle bollette alla pianificazione delle vacanza fino all'acquisto di un regalo di compleanno per un amico o un familiare.Puoi utilizzare gli Spazi Condivisi con il tuo IBAN italiano: basta seguire i passaggi sull'app N26 per Spazi Condivisi e invitare i tuoi amici stretti e parenti a iniziare a utilizzare questa funzionalitÃ .Spazi Condivisi Ã¨ disponibile per i clienti N26 premium (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You e N26 Business Metal) che possono sia creare Spazi Condivisi che invitare altri partecipanti nei loro spazi.I partecipanti devono avere un conto N26, il tipo di sottoscrizione non Ã¨ rilevante.I clienti N26 Standard e N26 Business Standard possono partecipare a due Spazi Condivisi al massimo.Il proprietario dello spazio condiviso Ã¨ anche il proprietario del denaro che vi Ã¨ depositato.Il proprietario puÃ² invitare fino a 10 partecipanti e rimuoverli dal suo spazio separato dal conto principale in qualsiasi momento.Come creare Spazi Condivisi:Per creare degli Spazi Condivisi segui questi passaggi (se hai giÃ  una conto premium con N26):Apri la tua app N26 e vai nella sezione Spaces nella barra di navigazione in basso. Tocca l'icona + e clicca su 'Risparmiare insieme'.Leggi le informazioni contenute in Scopri di piÃ¹ e clicca su Continua.Dai un nome al tuo spazio condiviso. Cerca e seleziona dalla lista dei contatti i clienti N26 che desideri invitare. Se la persona che vuoi invitare ha un conto N26 ma non appare sulla lista dei contatti, ti consigliamo di chiedergli se ha dato il consenso per essere visibile ad altri clienti N26 tramite l'app nella sezione il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni personali.Se necessario, inserisci il loro nome completo come dovrebbe apparire sulla lista.DopodichÃ© dovrai leggere e firmare i Termini e condizioni:ApparirÃ  il pop-up "Firma Elettronica Avanzata". Tocca "Firma".Spunta entrambe le voci "Firma Elettronica Avanzata" e "Procura", poi conferma.Inserisci il PIN di conferma e dai l'ok.A questo punto puoi inviare l'invito ai tuoi contatti N26. Potrai iniziare subito ad aggiungere denaro o a gestire lo spazio condiviso per includere piÃ¹ persone.

title: Was ist das N26 Webformular fÃ¼r DSGVO-Anfragen?
content: Der Schutz der personenbezogenen und finanziellen Daten unserer NutzerInnen genieÃŸt bei uns oberste PrioritÃ¤t. Daher stellen wir unser N26 Webformular zur VerfÃ¼gung, das es allen N26 NutzerInnen, ehemaligen N26 NutzerInnen (deren Konto inzwischen geschlossen ist) und ihren BevollmÃ¤chtigten ermÃ¶glicht, uns auf einem sicheren Weg zu kontaktieren, wenn sie Fragen zu ihren personenbezogenen Daten haben.Wie funktioniert das?Das Webformular (neuen Tab) sollte verwendet werden, wenn N26 NutzerInnen oder ehemalige N26 NutzerInnen ihre Rechte gemÃ¤ÃŸ der Datenschutzgrundverordnung ("DSGVO") selbst oder durch eine bevollmÃ¤chtigte Person ausÃ¼ben mÃ¶chten.Du kannst insbesondere folgende Rechte wahrnehmen:Recht auf Zugriff der betroffenen Person nach Art. 15 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Recht auf LÃ¶schung ("Recht auf Vergessenwerden") gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 17 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Recht auf Widerspruch nach Art. 21 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Du kannst innerhalb von maximal 30 Kalendertagen mit einer Antwort von unserem zustÃ¤ndigen Team rechnen.Wenn du das Webformular ausfÃ¼llst, wirst du aufgefordert, Folgendes einzugeben:Dein WohnsitzlandDeinen N26 Status (NutzerIn, ehemalige/r NutzerIn, BevollmÃ¤chtigte/r)Deinen AntragstypName, Nachname und E-Mail AdresseMuss ich als ehemalige/r N26 NutzerIn oder als BevollmÃ¤chtigte/r noch etwas angeben?Ehemalige NutzerInnen und ihre BevollmÃ¤chtigten mÃ¼ssen weitere Unterlagen hochladen, um ihre IdentitÃ¤t nachzuweisen und sicherzustellen, dass der EmpfÃ¤nger der Daten tatsÃ¤chlich dazu berechtigt ist.Folgende Unterlagen sind erforderlich:Ehemalige NutzerInnen: Kopie des Personalausweises / ReisepassesBevollmÃ¤chtigte VertreterInnen: Kopie des Personalausweises / Reisepasses und eine unterschriebene BevollmÃ¤chtigungÂ Sobald das Formular vollstÃ¤ndig ausgefÃ¼llt ist, klicke auf Senden und sende deine Anfrage ab.Warum ist fÃ¼r ehemalige N26 KundInnen und BevollmÃ¤chtigte eine manuelle ÃœberprÃ¼fung des Personalausweises bzw. Reisepasses notwendig?Wir fragen eine Kopie des Personalausweises bzw. Reisepasses an, um die IdentitÃ¤t zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen und sicherzustellen, dass personenbezogene Daten und finanzielle Informationen nicht in falsche HÃ¤nde gelangen. Eine solche manuelle ÃœberprÃ¼fung ist erforderlich, wenn die IdentitÃ¤t einer Person Ã¼berprÃ¼ft werden muss und unser standardisiertes Verfahren zur IdentitÃ¤tsprÃ¼fung nicht angewendet werden kann. Da die Identifizierung von ehemaligen KundInnen und BevollmÃ¤chtigten nicht in der App oder der Web-App vorgenommen werden kann, da sie keinen Zugang darauf haben, mÃ¼ssen wir hier auf eine manuelle ÃœberprÃ¼fung zurÃ¼ckgreifen.Â Fragen oder Bedenken hierzu?Unser Kundenservice hilft dir gerne weiter. Schreibe uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).

title: Received a suspicious message?
content:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. Theyâ€™re able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank thatâ€™s growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if youâ€™ve received an unexpected message:If youâ€™ve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If youâ€™ve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If youâ€™re ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. Weâ€™re always here to help!

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.Â In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.Â One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a â€œtrusted beneficiaryâ€ so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
content:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?Â N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European businessÂ and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.Â Â What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.Â In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos BankÂ® sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.Â How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 accountÂ 
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 AllpointÂ® ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.Â 
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.Â Â I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)
