title: FATCA - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin de certaines informations de votre part ?
content:
En tant quâ€™Ã©tablissement de crÃ©dit, N26 est tenue de communiquer directement au DÃ©partement du TrÃ©sor des Etats-Unis et Ã  lâ€™Internal Revenue Service (IRS) des informations sur les comptes dÃ©tenus par les contribuables amÃ©ricains ou par des entitÃ©s Ã©trangÃ¨res dans lesquelles les contribuables amÃ©ricains dÃ©tiennent une participation substantielle selon le FATCA.Â FATCA signifie Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act et est une lÃ©gislation conÃ§ue pour prÃ©venir l'Ã©vasion fiscale. Introduit par l'IRS, l'objectif du FATCA est d'encourager une meilleure conformitÃ© fiscale en empÃªchant les personnes amÃ©ricaines d'utiliser des banques Ã©trangÃ¨res et d'autres organisations financiÃ¨res afin d'Ã©viter l'imposition amÃ©ricaine sur leurs revenus et leurs actifs. Vous pouvez trouver plus d'informations sur le FATCA sur le site Web de l'IRS : www.irs.gov (nouvel onglet)En effet, contrairement Ã  la plupart des autres pays, le systÃ¨me fiscal amÃ©ricain prÃ©lÃ¨ve l'impÃ´t sur le revenu des personnes rÃ©sidant sur le territoire national, mais Ã©galement des citoyens amÃ©ricains vivant Ã  lâ€™Ã©tranger. Ã€ lâ€™inverse, dans une majoritÃ© de pays, seules les personnes rÃ©sidant sur le territoire national sont soumises aux impÃ´ts du pays de rÃ©sidence. Les expatriÃ©s en sont donc exemptÃ©s.Dans le cadre du FATCA, et pour que nous puissions dÃ©terminer avec prÃ©cision si votre compte doit faire lâ€™objet dâ€™une dÃ©claration auprÃ¨s du fisc amÃ©ricain, nous vous demanderons de nous communiquer les informations suivantes :Si vous Ãªtes citoyen des Ã‰tats-Unis (binationaux compris) ou si vous Ãªtes titulaire dâ€™une carte verte en cours de validitÃ©
Si vous Ãªtes imposable aux Ã‰tats-Unis
ÃŠtre Â«assujetti Ã  l'impÃ´tÂ» aux Ã‰tats-Unis ne signifie pas nÃ©cessairement que vous payez l'impÃ´t sur le revenu des particuliers aux Ã‰tats-Unis. Cela signifie que la loi fiscale amÃ©ricaine vous oblige Ã  produire une dÃ©claration de revenus et Ã  dÃ©clarer vos revenus (mondiaux) Ã  l'IRS, mÃªme si vous ne payez aucun impÃ´t amÃ©ricain.
Votre numÃ©ro dâ€™identification fiscale amÃ©ricain (nouvel onglet) (si vous Ãªtes effectivement imposable aux Ã‰tats-Unis)
Vous pouvez dans ce cas nous fournir votre numÃ©ro de sÃ©curitÃ© sociale amÃ©ricain (SSN en anglais) ou votre NumÃ©ro individuel de contribuable amÃ©ricain (ITIN en anglais).De plus, si votre compte indique un lieu de naissance amÃ©ricain ou un numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone amÃ©ricain ou si vous mettez en place un ordre de virement permanent aux Ã‰tats-Unis, la lÃ©gislation FATCA nous oblige Ã  supposer que vous Ãªtes soumis au FATCA, jusqu'Ã  ce que vous nous prouviez le contraire.Si votre situation fiscale vient Ã  changer, vous pourrez Ã  tout moment modifier les informations concernÃ©es depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > ParamÃ¨tres > ParamÃ¨tres personnels > Informations fiscales.

title: Bankdokumente â€“ Diese Belege sind verfÃ¼gbar
content:
N26 heiÃŸt nicht ohne Grund die mobile Bank â€“ du kannstÂ  deinen Kontoauszug, deine Bankdaten und andere Bankdokumente automatisch herunterladen. Bei den folgenden Bankdokumenten handelt es sich um offizielle Dokumente, die ohne Unterschrift gÃ¼ltig sind:Dein Kontoauszug ist ein Dokument, auf dem du deinen aktuellen Kontostand sowie eingehende und ausgehende Transaktionen auf deinem N26 Konto einsehen kannst. Auch dein vollstÃ¤ndiger Name, deine IBAN und deine BIC stehen auf dem Bankdokument. So kannst du es herunterladen.Deine Bankdaten (oder: KontobestÃ¤tigung) belegen, dass dein Bankkonto unter deinem Namen registriert ist. Dieses Bankdokument beinhaltet deinen vollen Namen, dein Geburtsdatum, deine IBAN und BIC, das Datum der KontoerÃ¶ffnung und â€“ falls gewÃ¼nscht â€“ deinen aktuellen Kontostand und deine Kartennummer (die beiden letzten Angaben sind in der Regel nicht zu sehen). So kannst du deine Bankdaten anfordern.Die GebÃ¼hrenabrechnung ist ein Dokument, auf dem alle von N26 erhobenen GebÃ¼hren des letzten Jahres aufgelistet sind.In der Web-App: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*, tippe auf Entgeltaufstellung, wÃ¤hle je nach Bedarf 6 Monate oder 12 Monate und klicke im Anschluss auf Anfrage. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden erhÃ¤ltst du eine PDF in deinem Posteingang unter Nachrichten von N26.Der Ãœberweisungsbeleg bestÃ¤tigt, dass du eine Zahlung von deinem N26 Konto getÃ¤tigt hast. Darin enthalten sind dein vollstÃ¤ndiger Name, deine (im N26 Konto registrierte) Adresse, deine IBAN und BIC, der Ãœberweisungsbetrag, das Datum, der Verwendungszweck sowie der vollstÃ¤ndige Name, die IBAN und die BIC des EmpfÃ¤ngers.In der mobilen und der WebApp: Gehe im Home-Bereich auf die Ãœberweisung und wÃ¤hle ÃœberweisungsbestÃ¤tigung herunterladen. Die PDF wird automatisch erstellt.Die KartenzahlungsbestÃ¤tigung wird genutzt, um eine Zahlung mit deiner N26 Mastercard zu bestÃ¤tigen. Du kannst den Kontoauszug des entsprechenden Monats vorweisen.RIB (RelevÃ© d'IdentitÃ© Bancaire in FranzÃ¶sisch) ist ein Bankdokument speziell fÃ¼r franzÃ¶sische BehÃ¶rden. Es enthÃ¤lt die wichtigsten Bankdaten, wie deinen vollstÃ¤ndigen Namen, deine Adresse sowie IBAN und BIC.In der WebApp: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab) Symbol*, scrolle runter bis RIB - RelevÃ© dâ€™IdentitÃ© Bancaire und klicke auf den Anfrage Button. Â  
* Das Download Symbol ist ein Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil. Es befindet sich links vom â€˜Geld erhaltenâ€™ Button.

title: When will my card arrive?
content: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10â‚¬).Â Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0â‚¬ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25â‚¬ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

title: Bank informationâ€”your N26 account ownership certificate
content: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the â€˜Add Moneyâ€™ button.

title: Chi sono le Persone Politicamente Esposte?
content:
Le Persone Politicamente Esposte sono persone fisiche che occupano o hanno cessato di occupare da meno di un anno importanti cariche pubbliche. Sono da includere in questa categoria anche i loro familiari e le persone con le quali intrattengono stretti legami dâ€™affari.Per persone fisiche che occupano o hanno cessato di occupare da meno di un anno importanti cariche pubbliche si intendono:Presidente della Repubblica, Presidente del Consiglio, Ministro, Vice-Ministro e Sottosegretario, Presidente di Regione, Assessore regionale, Sindaco di capoluogo di provincia o cittÃ  metropolitana, Sindaco di comune con popolazione non inferiore a 15.000 abitanti e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Deputato, senatore, parlamentare europeo, consigliere regionale e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Membro degli organi direttivi centrali di partiti politici;Giudice della Corte Costituzionale, magistrato della Corte di Cassazione o della Corte dei conti, consigliere di Stato, altri componenti del Consiglio di Giustizia Amministrativa per la Regione siciliana e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Membro degli organi direttivi delle banche centrali e delle autoritÃ  indipendenti;Ambasciatore, incaricato d'affari e cariche equivalenti in Stati esteri, ufficiale di grado apicale delle forze armate e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Componente degli organi di amministrazione, direzione o controllo delle imprese controllate, anche indirettamente, dallo Stato italiano o da uno Stato estero o controllate, in misura prevalente o totalitaria, dalle Regioni, da comuni capoluoghi di provincia e citta' metropolitane e da comuni con popolazione complessivamente non inferiore a 15.000 abitanti;Direttore generale di ASL e di azienda ospedaliera, di azienda ospedaliera universitaria e degli altri enti del servizio sanitario nazionale.Direttore, vicedirettore e membro dell'organo di gestione o soggetto svolgenti funzioni equivalenti in organizzazioni internazionali;Vengono identificati come familiari di persone politicamente esposte:Â i genitori;Â il coniuge o la persona legata in unione civile o convivenza di fatto;i figli e i loro coniugi e le persone legate ai figli in unione civile o convivenza di fatto.
I soggetti con i quali le PEP intrattengono notoriamente stretti rapporti sono:le persone fisiche legate alla persona politicamente esposta per via della titolaritÃ  effettiva congiunta di enti giuridici o di altro stretto rapporto di affari;le persone fisiche che detengono solo formalmente il controllo totalitario di un'entitÃ  notoriamente costituita, di fatto, nell'interesse e a beneficio di una persona politicamente esposta.

title: How do I return a SEPA transfer to its sender?
content: From the 17th March, customers from other banks can requestâ€”at their bank institutionâ€”the return of a SEPA transfer from an N26 customer.The sender of a SEPA transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving N26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. This request appears to N26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. Similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the N26 app, youâ€™ll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall.If you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. Once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. If you donâ€™t have sufficient funds in your Main Account, youâ€™ll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

title: What to do if my account may be compromised?
content:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).Â If youâ€™d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. Weâ€™ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that weâ€™ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if Iâ€™ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.Â What if Iâ€™ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.Â Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: What's an insolvency and what can I do?
content: An insolvency is a situation in which the debtor is unable to fulfil his financial obligation to the creditor(s). How this is going to affect your N26 account depends on whether you have a p-account and whether we received an insolvency application or insolvency opening. FAQWhy is my account seized although I have a clearance (unseizing) from my insolvency manager?Your account is seized because we received a garnishment. If the garnishment is issued by one of the insolvency creditors, the insolvency manager has to inform us accordingly. In this case we will unseize your account. If, however, the garnishment is based on a claim which emerged only after the insolvency proceedings, the seizure will be maintained. Since we cannot be sure if the garnishment is valid or not, your account will be seized again until we've received a written confirmation to release your account from your insolvency manager.The insolvency manager ordered for my account to be released/ the insolvency proceedings are over. Why does my account remain seized?In order to release the account we require written confirmation from the insolvency manager directly. It can take a few days until they send it to us and we receive it. Until then your account remains seized. If you have a p-account, you can use your funds to the extent of your monthly allowance.Is it possible to convert my p-account back to my normal account whilst I have an active insolvency?You can revert your p-account to a normal bank account at any time. We recommend that you make sure we have a written confirmation to release your account from the insolvency manager.Is it possible to pay out a new garnishment whilst I have active insolvency proceedings?In that case you can only issue a transfer order for the new garnishment in agreement with the insolvency manager.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (includingÂ CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.Thereâ€™s always a â‚¬2 fee if you use yourÂ MaestroÂ card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2â‚¬. Check ourÂ pricing listsÂ if youâ€™ve beenÂ charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: Bereavement & probate
content:
How can I inform N26 about a death?Â In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceasedâ€™s bank accounts.Â The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: service.succession@n26.comFax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH -Service Succession-
Rungestr. 22Â 
10179 Berlin, GERMANY
Please inform us on:Â Who is the deceased?Â If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account.Â How can we contact the beneficiaries?Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated, so we can get in contact with the beneficiaries.Â  A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?If you are facing certain proceedings or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us.Â We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings.Â Occasionally weâ€™re inquired by a notary in charge of the succession. In this case we will provide the notary with all necessary information for your convenience. We recommend providing any notary in charge with our address details.Â Please refrain from sending us original documents via mail at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you or your notary in charge.Â What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?Â Â Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country.Â However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH is located in Germany.Â When it comes to the relationship between the deceasedâ€™s bank and the beneficiaries, other legal requirements may be applicable than usually in your home country.As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be blocked.Please note that standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates on the account generally continue to exist after the death of the account holder. Heirs or authorised representatives must have these revoked or deleted.Â Further, we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax in Germany of the assets belonging to the estate.We will notify the beneficiaries or their notary in charge in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceasedâ€™s account with N26.
I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death?Â There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.Â It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited.Â Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this.Â For any further information on a specific situation please seek professional assistance from a suitable advisory service.Â

title: Transferencias inmediatas con MoneyBeam
content: Haciendo un MoneyBeam, puedes enviarles dinero a tus contactos en tiempo real y sin necesidad de introducir tus datos bancarios. TambiÃ©n puedes pedirles un MoneyBeam a tus contactos para recibir dinero de ellos. Para poder utilizar MoneyBeam, tÃº y tus contactos tenÃ©is que ser visibles como usuarios de N26.Para enviar un MoneyBeam:Â Pulsa Enviar dinero > MoneyBeamSelecciona a un contacto de tu lista o agrÃ©galo introduciendo su nÃºmero de telÃ©fono o direcciÃ³n de email.Indica el importe y el concepto de la transacciÃ³nIndica tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n y confirma el mensaje push que recibirÃ¡s.Â Para solicitar un MoneyBeam:Pulsa Recibir dinero > Solicitar MoneyBeamSelecciona a un contacto de tu lista o agrÃ©galo introduciendo su nÃºmero de telÃ©fono o direcciÃ³n de email.Indica el importe y el concepto de la transacciÃ³nCuando tu contacto confirme tu solicitud, recibirÃ¡s el importe solicitado.El lÃ­mite de los MoneyBeams es de 1000 â‚¬ por transacciÃ³n y de 5000â‚¬ cada 24 horas.AÃ±ade un GIF como referencia adicional:Puedes enviar GIF como texto de referencia adicional cuando utilices MoneyBeam. Cuando se complete el MoneyBeam, el beneficiario podrÃ¡ ver un emoji animado como prefijo de la transferencia recibida en la pantalla de inicio para informarle de que la transferencia tiene un GIF adjunto. El beneficiario puede ver el gif en los datos de la transferencia junto con el texto de referencia.Giphy, Inc. te proporciona los GIF directamente, y no N26. Ten en cuenta que Giphy es una empresa estadounidense que puede tratar tus datos personales en EE. UU. EncontrarÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre cÃ³mo trata Giphy tus datos personales cuando adjuntas y envÃ­as GIF en la PolÃ­tica de Privacidad de Giphy (pestaÃ±a nueva).Â Â Para enviar un MoneyBeam con un GIF:Selecciona Enviar dinero y, a continuaciÃ³n, MoneyBeam.Selecciona a un contacto de tu lista o aÃ±ade uno introduciendo su nÃºmero de mÃ³vil y su direcciÃ³n de email.Introduce un importe y una referencia.Selecciona AÃ±adir GIF y busca o desliza el GIF que quieres aÃ±adirIntroduce tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n y confirma la notificaciÃ³n push que recibirÃ¡s.

title: Was ist eine Insolvenz und was kann ich tun?
content: Eine Insolvenz bezeichnet die Situation eines Schuldners, der nicht mehr in der Lage ist, seine Zahlungsverpflichtungen gegenÃ¼ber einem GlÃ¤ubiger zu erfÃ¼llen. Das hat Folgen fÃ¼r dein N26 Konto, die vom Status deines Kontos und vom Stadium des Insolvenzverfahrens abhÃ¤ngen. Dein Konto kann ein P-Konto sein (oder nicht) und das Insolvenzverfahren kann im Stadium des Antragsverfahrens oder ErÃ¶ffnungsverfahrens sein. FAQWarum wurde mein Konto gesperrt, obwohl ich eine Freigabe vom Insolvenzverwalter habe?Dein Konto ist gesperrt, weil uns ein PfÃ¤ndungs- und Ãœberweisungsbeschluss fÃ¼r dein Konto zugestellt wurde. Kommt die PfÃ¤ndung von einem deiner InsolvenzglÃ¤ubiger, dann muss uns der Insolvenzverwalter darÃ¼ber in Kenntnis setzen und die Sperre wird aufgehoben. Wenn es sich um eine Forderung handelt, die erst nach nach Beendigung des Insolvenzverfahrens entstanden ist, dann ist die PfÃ¤ndungsmaÃŸnahme zulÃ¤ssig und die Sperre bleibt aufrechterhalten. Da wir wir nicht sicher sind, ob die neue PfÃ¤ndungsmaÃŸnahme gÃ¼ltig ist oder aufgrund des Insolvenzverfahrens zurÃ¼ckzuweisen ist, bleibt dein Konto wieder gesperrt, bis wir vom Insolvenzverwalter eine schriftliche FreigabeerklÃ¤rung fÃ¼r dein Konto erhalten haben.Â Der Insolvenzverwalter hat die Freigabe des Kontos angeordnet/ das Insolvenzverfahren ist beendet. Warum bleibt mein Konto gesperrt?Â Â Um die Sperre aufzuheben, benÃ¶tigen wir ein offizielles Schreiben von dem Insolvenzverwalter. Es kann sein, dass es einige Tage dauert, bis der Insolvenzverwalter uns dieses Schreiben zusendet und es bei uns eingeht. Bis dahin bleibt dein KontoÂ gesperrt. Falls du ein P-Konto hast, kannst du Ã¼ber dein Guthaben im Rahmen des PfÃ¤ndungsfreibetrages verfÃ¼gen.Ist es mÃ¶glich, bei aktiver Insolvenz mein P-Konto in mein normales Konto umzuwandeln?Du kannst jederzeit den PfÃ¤ndungsschutz von deinem Konto entfernen. Wir empfehlen dir zuvor sicher zu stellen, dass uns eine Freigabe deines Insolvenzverwalters fÃ¼r dein Konto vorliegt.Ist es mÃ¶glich, eine neue PfÃ¤ndung in einem aktiven Insolvenzverfahren auszuzahlen?Die AusfÃ¼hrung des Ãœberweisungsauftrages kann nur mit Zustimmung des Insolvenzverwalters erfolgen.Â

title: How to get N26 Insurance?
content: The new on-demandÂ N26 InsuranceÂ allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the â€œInsuranceâ€ banner you find.Â You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.Â How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.Â Am I eligible?Â N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers canâ€™t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on â€˜Sharing Moneyâ€™Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ will pop-up. Tap â€œsignâ€Check both â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ and â€œPower of attorneyâ€, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

title: How to revoke my loan application?
content: N26 CreditÂ revocations are free and are possible within 14 days of signing a loan agreement.Weâ€™ll need written confirmation of your withdrawal request so itâ€™s best to chat with us about this. Weâ€™ll take it from there and let you know via email when itâ€™s done.Please make sure that the full amount of your credit is available on your account until the revocation is complete.If your credit is paid out by one of our partners, please contact them directly. We partner with auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Germany and Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in France.

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (â€œIRSâ€).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, weâ€™ll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?Â 
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being â€œsubject to taxâ€ in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that youâ€™re also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you donâ€™t end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (â€œSSNâ€) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
content: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs â‚¬9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if youâ€™re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Marketing Communication Settings
content: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

title: Come richiedere il rimborso di un addebito diretto?
content: Il rimborso di un addebito diretto non annulla il contratto che hai con l'esercente.Puoi richiedere un rimborso per l'addebito diretto SEPA direttamente nell'app fino a 8 settimane dopo l'addebito. Le addebito diretto sarÃ  accreditato sul tuo conto entro 2 giorni bancari.Richiesta di rimborso per un addebito diretto sul mio conto principale:Effettua l'accesso nell'app mobile N26Apri l'elenco delle transazioni e seleziona l'addebito diretto in questioneSeleziona RimborsoRichiesta di rimborso per l'addebito diretto nel mio spazio IBAN (sottoconto):Puoi anche richiedere il rimborso per un addebito diretto nel tuo Spaces per cui Ã¨ stato assegnato un IBAN:Effettua l'accesso nell'app mobile N26Premi SpacesVai allo spazio per cui desideri rimborsare un addebito direttoSeleziona la transazione di addebito diretto in questioneSeleziona Rimborso**Solo per i paesi fuori dall'Eurozona: Se stai impostando un addebito diretto nella tua valuta nazionale, sarÃ  la banca ricevente a dettare il tasso del cambio e l'importo finale che verrÃ  riscosso da noi. Di seguito puoi trovare l'elenco dei paesi:BulgariaCroaziaRepubblica CecaDanimarcaUngheriaIslandaLiechtensteinNorvegiaPoloniaRomaniaSveziaSvizzera

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipient), some details like the recipientâ€™s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.Â You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesnâ€™t delete your transaction history with them

title: How to protect my account?
content: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, itâ€™s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: Mi tarjeta ya ha caducado, pero no he recibido una nueva
content: Â¡No te preocupes, nosotros te ayudamos!Â Si ya has confirmado tu direcciÃ³n y han transcurrido mÃ¡s de 20 dÃ­as, contacta con el Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente. title: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: Why canâ€™t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content: To carry out real-time transactions such asÂ MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphoneâ€™s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someoneâ€™s contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you donâ€™t see your friendâ€™s name on MoneyBeam but you know theyâ€™re an N26 user, they most likely havenâ€™t made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored donâ€™t match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

title: What is a N26 Flex account?
content: Our N26 Flex account is neither an N26 Standard or premium membership account. We offer you the Flex account if your SCHUFA credit score isn't sufficient for you to open an N26 Standard account. You cannot select the N26 Flex account yourself. It will be visible to you before you open your account and the decision of offering you the Flex account is taken automatically based on your SCHUFA credit score, which we receive from SCHUFA when you try to open your account with us. If you think we have not considered your correct SCHUFA credit score and want to have a human review of this automated decision, you can get in touch with us by email to support@n26.com from the email address you signed up with requesting a review of the decision before accepting the N26 Flex account offer. Please note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account sign-up process.Once you reach out to us, we can let you know if your SCHUFA credit score was the reason for offering you the Flex account. You can then contact SCHUFA regarding your SCHUFA credit score, in case you want to confirm with SCHUFA if your credit score correctly reflects your creditworthiness.We will only be able to offer you an N26 standard (new tab) account or a premium membership (new tab) account once your SCHUFA credit score is updated to a higher score. You can then try again and see if we can offer you an N26 standard (new tab) account or a premium membership (new tab) account.If you want to have a human review of this automated decision, please reach out to support@n26.com from the email address you signed up with requesting a review of the decision before accepting the N26 Flex account offer. Please note:The N26 Flex account has a monthly fee of â‚¬6. You will be informed about the monthly fee before opening your account and we will debit this fee directly from your account. The first fee will be debited once your account balance reaches at least â‚¬6 or after 15 days, whichever happens first, and then monthly after thatThe N26 Flex account cannot be combined with an N26 Business, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal, N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal account.Cash withdrawals at ATMs or one of our 9,000 CASH26 (new tab) partner stores each cost â‚¬2. Both withdrawal types are debited immediately.

title: Wie kann ich mein Konto schlieÃŸen?
content: Du willst dein N26 Girokonto kÃ¼ndigen? Das finden wir natÃ¼rlich schade. Hier erfÃ¤hrst du, mit welchen einfachen Schritten du dein N26 Bankkonto schlieÃŸen kannst.Â Wenn du ein Premiumkonto hast, kannst du auch einfach auf ein Standard Konto wechseln, statt dein Konto komplett zu kÃ¼ndigen (neuen Tab).Wenn du dir aber sicher bist, dass du dein N26 Girokonto komplett kÃ¼ndigen mÃ¶chtest, folge bitte diesen Schritten:Wenn du noch Geld auf deinem Girokonto hast, solltest du es zuerst auf ein anderes Konto Ã¼berweisen. Wenn dein Kontostand negativ ist, musst du Geld auf dein Konto laden (neuen Tab). KÃ¼ndige dein N26 Girokonto erst, wenn dein Gesamtsaldo null ist â€“ das macht den Prozess sehr viel einfacher.Klicke hier (neuen Tab), um die online KontokÃ¼ndigung anzufangen (neuen Tab). Du musst dich anmelden, um deine IdentitÃ¤t zu verifizieren. Die Anwendung leitet dich dann durch die KontoschlieÃŸung.ZerstÃ¶re deine Bankkarte â€“ zum Beispiel, indem du sie mit einer Schere zerschneidest. Du solltest den Chip sowie den Magnetstreifen zerstÃ¶ren. Entsorge die Teile separat.Probleme mit der KontoschlieÃŸung?Wenn du eine italienische IBAN hast oder dich nicht einloggen kannst, sende uns bitte eine E-Mail an (neuen Tab)support@n26.com (neuen Tab) â€“ direkt von der E-Mail-Adresse, die du bei der Registration fÃ¼r dein N26 Konto verwendet hast. HÃ¤nge der E-Mail dieses KÃ¼ndigungsschreiben (neuen Tab) an. Im Formular mÃ¼ssen folgende Informationen beinhaltet sein:Einen Antrag fÃ¼r die SchlieÃŸung des N26 Kontos zu einem bestimmten Datum oder â€œso bald wie mÃ¶glichâ€,dein Name,deine N26 IBAN,solltest du noch Geld auf dem Konto haben: eine andere IBAN aus dem SEPA-Raum, auf den wir dein Restguthaben Ã¼berweisen kÃ¶nnen.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.Â In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.Â One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a â€œtrusted beneficiaryâ€ so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
content: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 MetalÂ contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, youâ€™re now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and youâ€™ll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.Â RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.Â  At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and weâ€™ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of â‚¬10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

title: How to repay my loan early?
content: You can always repay yourÂ N26 CreditÂ loan early. Keep in mind that an early repayment fee of up to 1% applies. If your remaining credit period is less than 12 months, the fee is up to 0.5% of the prematurely repaid amount.Contact us via chat to request an early repayment and weâ€™ll provide you with an exact calculation of the early repayment fee.*The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.
