Wenn du unser N26 Flex Konto hast, gilt fÃ¼r alle Abhebungen eine GebÃ¼hr von 2â‚¬. Sieh dir unsere Preislisten an, wenn dir eine GeldautomatengebÃ¼hr berechnet wurde.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content: We collaborate with many partners. Thatâ€™s why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldnâ€™t be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).Youâ€™re taxable in the United States. If so, you wonâ€™t be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: Come si usa Spaces?
content: Per iniziare a usare i tuoi spazi separati dal conto principale, dovrai entrare nella sezione "Spaces" dell'app mobile N26 o su N26 web. Nella schermata principale di "Spaces" puoi visualizzare, inserire e creare gli Spaces.Creare uno spazio:Vai su "Crea un nuovo spazio" nella schermata principale di "Spaces".Seleziona una delle opzioni sottostanti:"Risparmia per un obiettivo" - Inserisci l'importo dell'obiettivo di risparmio e la data in cui vuoi raggiungerlo (opzionale)."Condividi denaro" - Permette di creare uno "Spazio condiviso"."Crea ora, decidi dopo" - Crea in modo semplice e veloce uno spazio a cui puoi aggiungere obiettivi o regole in un secondo momento.E ora puoi personalizzare il tuo spazio con un nome e un'immagine.Ecco che adesso hai uno spazio separato dal tuo conto principale per controllare meglio le tue finanze! Ora cominciamo a usare "Spaces"!Spostare denaro tra gli spazi:Clicca su "Conto principale" o su un altro spazio separato da esso.Trascina e rilascia la somma di denaro nello spazio desiderato.Ora puoi confermare l'importo e il saldo verrÃ  aggiornato immediatamente.Blocca il tuo spazio:Puoi bloccare e sbloccare uno spazio in qualsiasi momento dalla tua app mobile e web. Non Ã¨ possibile spostare denaro dentro o fuori uno spazio bloccato.Vai nello spazio che desideri bloccare/sbloccare.Seleziona il pulsante "Gestisci".Clicca su "Blocca spazio" o su "Sblocca spazio".Inserisci il PIN di conferma.Lo spazio verrÃ  bloccato o sbloccato immediatamente.Nascondi il saldo del tuo spazio:Potrai nascondere l'importo dello spazio dal saldo totale del tuo conto.Entra nello spazio di cui vuoi nascondere il saldo.Vai sulla rotella "Impostazioni" (in alto a destra).Seleziona "Nascondi il saldo dello spazio"Gestisci i tuoi spazi separati:Puoi creare regole, obiettivi di risparmio e attivare la funzionalitÃ  Spiccioli. All'interno dello spazio vai su "Gestisci":Per creare un obiettivo di risparmio, seleziona "Crea il mio obiettivo" (puoi modificarlo anche in seguito).Basta inserire un importo e una data di scadenza e poi cliccare su "Imposta obiettivo".Per abilitare/disabilitare gli arrotondamenti seleziona "Gestisci Spiccioli".Muovi la levetta "Abilita Spiccioli".Hai la possibilitÃ  di moltiplicare il tuo resto per x1, x2, x3 e x5; l'importo corrispondente verrÃ  separato dalle altre transazioni della tua carta.All'interno di uno spazio, puoi impostare delle regole per spostare automaticamente il denaro tra i tuoi spazi e il conto principale:Vai su "Crea una Regola".Scegli gli spazi o il conto principale tra cui desideri trasferire il denaro.Seleziona l'importo che vuoi spostare.Scegli la frequenza e la data, quindi conferma.Puoi anche cancellare questa regola selezionando modifica e poi l'icona di cancellazione accanto alla regola.

title: Come posso far accreditare la pensione sul mio conto N26?
content:
N26 Bank AG - Conti aperti prima del 26/03/2020 con IBAN tedesco:Far accreditare la tua pensione sul tuo conto N26 Ã¨ molto semplice. 
Ecco cosa devi fare:Compila online e firma lâ€™apposito modulo fornito da INPS (nuova tabella);Invia il modulo compilato e firmato via email a support@n26.com (ricorda di inviare lâ€™email dallâ€™indirizzo email associato al tuo conto N26).Provvederemo a compilare la parte spettante alla banca e ti spediremo nuovamente il modulo via email entro pochi giorni.
 
Nel modulo potresti trovare riferimenti a Citibank N.A., lâ€™istituto che provvede all'accredito delle pensioni INPS allâ€™estero.N26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana - Conti aperti dal 26/03/2020 con IBAN italianoAl momento non Ã¨ possibile accreditare la pensione sul conto N26 per i clienti con IBAN italiano. SarÃ  nostra premura aggiornare tutti i nostri clienti e fornire tutti i dettagli e le istruzioni in merito non appena il servizio sarÃ¡ disponibile.
 
Nel caso dovessi riscontrare dei ritardi nel pagamento ti chiediamo gentilmente di contattare il nostro Supporto Clienti via chat.

title: Comment utiliser MoneyBeam?
content: GrÃ¢ce Ã  MoneyBeam, vous pouvez transfÃ©rer de lâ€™argent Ã  vos contacts en temps rÃ©el sans devoir saisir de coordonnÃ©es bancaires. Avec MoneyBeam, vous pouvez Ã©galement demander de lâ€™argent Ã  vos contacts. Pour utiliser MoneyBeam, vous et vos contacts doivent Ãªtre visibles en tant que clients N26.Pour envoyer de lâ€™argent avec MoneyBeam :Â Cliquez sur Envoyer > Envoyer un MoneyBeamChoisissez un contact dans votre liste ou ajoutez-en un en indiquant son numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone et son adresse email.Saisissez le montant et lâ€™usage.Tapez votre code de validation et confirmez la notification push que vous recevez.Â Pour recevoir de lâ€™argent avec MoneyBeam :Cliquez sur Recevoir > Demander un MoneyBeamChoisissez un contact dans votre liste ou ajoutez-en un en indiquant son numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone et son adresse email.Saisissez le montant et lâ€™usage.DÃ¨s que le contact confirme la demande, vous recevrez le montant demandÃ©.La limite de paiement avec MoneyBeam est de 1000 â‚¬ par transaction et de 5000 â‚¬ sur une durÃ©e de 24 h.Vous souhaitez parler de nous Ã  vos amis tout en gagnant de lâ€™argent ? DÃ©couvrez notre programme de parrainage.Ajoutez un GIF comme rÃ©fÃ©rence supplÃ©mentaire :Vous pouvez envoyer des GIF comme rÃ©fÃ©rence supplÃ©mentaire lorsque vous utilisez MoneyBeam. Une fois le MoneyBeam terminÃ©, le bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire pourra voir un Ã©moji de film sur lâ€™Ã©cran dâ€™accueil, lui indiquant que le virement reÃ§u inclut un GIF. Le bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire peut visualiser le GIF dans les dÃ©tails du virement, ainsi que le texte de rÃ©fÃ©rence.Les GIF vous sont fournis directement par Giphy, Inc. et non par N26. Giphy est une sociÃ©tÃ© amÃ©ricaine qui peut traiter vos donnÃ©es personnelles aux Ã‰tats-Unis. Pour en savoir plus sur la maniÃ¨re dont Giphy traite vos donnÃ©es personnelles lorsque vous joignez et envoyez des GIF, consultez la Politique de confidentialitÃ© de Giph (nouvel onglet)y.Â Â Pour envoyer un MoneyBeam avec un GIF :Cliquez sur Envoyer, puis Envoyer un MoneyBeam.Choisissez un contact dans votre liste ou ajoutez-en un en indiquant son numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone et son adresse email.Saisissez le montant et lâ€™usage.SÃ©lectionnez Joindre un GIF, puis recherchez ou faites dÃ©filer le GIF que vous souhaitez joindre.Tapez votre code de validation et confirmez la notification push que vous recevez.

title: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
content: Was ist starke Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA)?SCA verbessert die Sicherheit aller N26 Kundenkonten, indem sie Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einfÃ¼hrt. Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login Ã¼ber zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. Wahrscheinlich bist du damit vertraut, zum Login nur dein persÃ¶nliches Passwort einzugeben. Um die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abzuschlieÃŸen, musst du zusÃ¤tzlich deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t oder durch einen SMS-Code bestÃ¤tigen.Wenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t in dein N26 Konto einloggst, wirst du aufgefordert, deinen Login-Versuch durch eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t zu bestÃ¤tigen. Alternativ kannst du einen SMS-Code anfordern, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.Wenn du dich vom verknÃ¼pften Handy in deine N26 App einloggst, findet die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung schon automatisch statt, sodass sich der Login-Prozess bei deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t nicht verÃ¤ndert.Mehr Informationen darÃ¼ber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?Warum wird Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung eingefÃ¼hrt?SCA wird im Rahmen der Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie PSD2 eingefÃ¼hrt, die fÃ¼r alle europÃ¤ischen Banken gilt. Mit PSD2 wird die Sicherheit der Daten und Kundenkonten erhÃ¶ht.Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber PSD2 in unserem Blogpost (neuen Tab).

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ from the mobile app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â (if you havenâ€™t activated your card and need toÂ top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by theÂ check digitsÂ (two numbers), then ourÂ bank codeÂ 10011001 and end with your 10-digitÂ account numberÂ (start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner ofÂ Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your accountâ€™s security (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.Â As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.Â This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message youâ€™ll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.Â Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.Â Our Customer Support doesnâ€™t have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: Wie zahle ich Geld auf mein Konto ein?
content: Sobald du dich erfolgreich verifiziert hast, kannst du auf verschiedene Weisen Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen:CASH26 (verfÃ¼gbar in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland): Zahle Bargeld Ã¼ber unsere PartnergeschÃ¤fte direkt auf dein Konto ein. MoneyBeam: Erhalte sofort Geld von anderen N26 Nutzern.Debitkarte: Du kannst Geld von einem anderen Bankkonto auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du die Karteninformationen in der App hinterlegst. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. AnschlieÃŸende Einzahlungen kosten 3 % des Einzahlungsbetrags. Du kannst jeweils BetrÃ¤ge zwischen 20 â‚¬ und 450 â‚¬ pro Monat auf dein Konto einzahlen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren kÃ¶nnen.Apple Pay oder Google Pay (neuen Tab): Lade Geld auf dein N26 Konto, indem du Apple Pay (fÃ¼r iOS-GerÃ¤te) oder GPay (fÃ¼r Android-GerÃ¤te) verwendest. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. AnschlieÃŸende Einzahlungen kosten 3 % des Einzahlungsbetrags. Du kannst jeweils BetrÃ¤ge zwischen 20 â‚¬ und 450 â‚¬ auf dein N26 Konto Ã¼berweisen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren kÃ¶nnen.SEPA-Ãœberweisung: Die Ãœberweisung muss in Euro und innerhalb des SEPA-Raums erfolgen. (Insbesondere, wenn du ein N26 Business Konto hast - wir akzeptieren keine Firmennamen.)Eine eingehende Ãœberweisung wird in Echtzeit gebucht, wenn sie als EchtzeitÃ¼berweisung getÃ¤tigt wurde, andernfalls benÃ¶tigt eine Ãœberweisung einen Bankarbeitstag bzw. zwei Werktage. FÃ¼r normale eingehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen besteht kein Limit.In Frankreich muss die erste Zahlung auf dein N26 Konto von einem Konto erfolgen, das dir gehÃ¶rt. (In allen anderen LÃ¤ndern ist es nicht nÃ¶tig, dass das andere Bankkonto dir gehÃ¶rt.)6. iDEAL: (nur in den Niederlanden) fÃ¼r Kunden mit niederlÃ¤ndischen AGB verfÃ¼gbar und mit einem iDEAL Konto. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Weitere Einzahlungen kosten 1,5 % des eingezahlten Betrags. 7. GiroPay (sofort): Nur in Deutschland verfÃ¼gbar fÃ¼r Kunden, die den deutschen AGB unterliegen und die Ã¼ber ein GiroPay-Konto verfÃ¼gen.8. EPS (sofort): Nur in Ã–sterreich verfÃ¼gbar fÃ¼r Kunden, die den Ã¶sterreichischen AGB unterliegen und die Ã¼ber ein EPS-Konto verfÃ¼gen.9. Bancontact (sofort): Nur in Belgien verfÃ¼gbar fÃ¼r Kunden, die den belgischen AGB unterliegen und die Ã¼ber ein Bancontact-Konto verfÃ¼gen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to create a password?
content: If you forgot your password or want to change it, selectÂ Forgot?Â in the app orÂ Forgot your password? (new tab)Â in theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â during login. Weâ€™ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a â€œpassphraseâ€ rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase â€œhard to guess, easy to rememberâ€. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, youâ€™ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using onlyÂ  your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?Â When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?Â Â First, youâ€™ll need to update your phoneâ€™s operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If youâ€™re unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you donâ€™t have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.What if I canâ€™t remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If youâ€™ve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, youâ€™ll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code youâ€™ve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or canâ€™t receive SMS for other reasons?If you donâ€™t have access to your registered phone number â€“ either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen â€“ please contact our customer service via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.Why canâ€™t I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesnâ€™t support the latest app version, you wonâ€™t be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which weâ€™ll send to your account's registered phone number.Youâ€™ll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: Wie funktioniert Google Pay?
content: VerfÃ¼gbar in Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Finnland, Irland, Norwegen, Polen, Slowakei, Schweden, Schweiz, Ã–sterreich, Estland, Griechenland, Lettland, Litauen, Niederlande, Portugal.Mit Google Pay kannst du mit deinem Smartphone bezahlen und musst so deine Mastercard nicht stÃ¤ndig bei dir tragen.Google Pay ist in allen Shops, die kontaktlose Zahlungen (NFC) unterstÃ¼tzen, sowie in Online-Shops verfÃ¼gbar. Halte einfach dein Smartphone in die NÃ¤he des kontaktlosen Terminals und deine Zahlung wird automatisch verarbeitet. Wenn du online bezahlst, wÃ¤hle Google Pay als Zahlungsmethode aus. Wir werden dich beim Abschluss des Bezahlvorgangs perÂ Push-NachrichtÂ auffordern, deine Zahlung zu bestÃ¤tigen.So geht's:Um deine N26 Mastercard zu deinem Google Wallet hinzuzufÃ¼gen, lade die Google Pay App herunter und wÃ¤hle HinzufÃ¼gen, um deine Kartendaten einzugeben. Du brauchst Android 5.0 (Lollipop) oder hÃ¶her sowie ein NFC-fÃ¤higes Smartphone.Logge dich in die N26 App ein un gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Zu Google Pay hinzufÃ¼gen. Du wirst dann zur Google Pay App weitergeleitet. Einige Tipps:Google Pay erfordert eine Bildschirmsperre. Falls du diese noch nicht eingerichtet hast, wirst du dazu aufgefordert, bevor du deine Mastercard zur Google Pay App hinzufÃ¼gst.Falls dein Smartphone mit einer SchutzhÃ¼lle versehen ist, musst du diese zum Bezahlen eventuell entfernen. Manche Zahlungsterminals erkennen dein Smartphone mÃ¶glicherweise nicht, wenn die SchutzhÃ¼lle zu dick ist.Wenn das Zahlungsterminal dich dazu auffordert, deine Karte (erneut) vorzuzeigen, dann hast du dein Smartphone mÃ¶glicherweise zu schnell wieder weggenommen oder nicht nah genug an das Terminal gehalten. Versuche es einfach erneut.

title: J'ai Ã©tÃ© dÃ©bitÃ© d'un montant excessif Ã  la station service
content:
N26 fonctionne en temps rÃ©el. Vous recevez ainsi des notifications push vous informant dÃ¨s quâ€™une transaction apparaÃ®t sur votre compte.Lorsque vous effectuez une transaction dans une station essence, il se peut que le montant qui semble Ãªtre dÃ©bitÃ© de votre compte (celui qui apparaÃ®t dans la notification push) ne corresponde pas au montant affichÃ© Ã  la pompe Ã  essence.Â 
Cela arrive lorsque la station service Ã©met une empreinte bancaire sur votre carte de dÃ©bit N26, c'est Ã  dire qu'elle bloque le montant maximal qu'elle peut dÃ©livrer (gÃ©nÃ©ralement entre 100 et 150 â‚¬) en guise de caution afin de s'assurer que vous disposez bien des fonds sur votre compte pour rÃ©gler la transaction finale.Â Cette somme n'est en rÃ©alitÃ© pas dÃ©bitÃ©e de votre compte mÃªme si elle apparaÃ®t comme telle sur la liste de vos transactions dans l'application N26, oÃ¹ elle sera marquÃ©e comme Ã©tant "En attente".Â La diffÃ©rence entre l'empreinte et le montant rÃ©el de la transaction rÃ©apparaÃ®t normalement sur votre relevÃ© bancaire dans les heures qui suivent la transaction (gÃ©nÃ©ralement sous 48h). Si la diffÃ©rence ne vous est pas remboursÃ©e passÃ© ce dÃ©lai, n'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  contacter notre Service Client.Si la transaction Ã©choue et qu'elle apparaÃ®t sur la liste de vos transactions dans l'application N26, il s'agit d'une empreinte qui expirera dans un dÃ©lai de 12 jours maximum. La somme bloquÃ©e vous sera alors restituÃ©e automatiquement.

title: Was ist N26 Business?
content: VerfÃ¼gbar in Ã–sterreich, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Slowakei Spanien, Schweden und der Schweiz.Es ist aktuell noch nicht mÃ¶glich, zwischen verschiedenen Konten zu wechseln, daher musst du entscheiden, ob N26 Business das Richtige fÃ¼r dich ist:Das N26 Business Konto ist fÃ¼rÂ SelbstÃ¤ndige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur fÃ¼r den geschÃ¤ftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt.Â Du erhÃ¤ltst jeden Monat (0,1 % | 0,5 %) Cashback auf alle mit deiner Karte getÃ¤tigten Zahlungen. Alle wÃ¤hrend des Monats erhaltenen ZahlungsrÃ¼ckerstattungen werden vom Gesamtzahlungsbetrag abgezogen, um den Cashback zu berechnen.Â Die RÃ¼ckerstattungen beziehen sich mÃ¶glicherweise auf eine Zahlung im selben oder im Vormonat. Der Vorgang beginnt am 15. des Folgemonats sowie aller darauffolgenden Monate und es dauert bis zu 7 Tage, bis dies auf deinem Kontoauszug erscheint.Es ist derzeit nicht mÃ¶glich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu fÃ¼hren. Wenn du also auch eine Karte fÃ¼r private Ausgaben benÃ¶tigst, empfehlen wir dir, eineÂ MaestrocardÂ zu ordern (erhÃ¤ltlich in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich und den Niederlanden).Der Cashback wird monatlich ausgestellt, die dafÃ¼r berechtigten Transaktionen eines bestimmten Monats werden im darauffolgenden Monat verarbeitet, beginnend am 15. Tag. Bitte rechne damit, dass es bis zu 7 Tage dauern kann, bis die Cashback-Gutschrift in deinem N26 Business Konto erscheint.Wie beim N26 Bankkonto ist das KontoÂ gebÃ¼hrenfreiÂ und wir decken bestimmte Bargeldabhebungen im Rahmen unsererÂ Fair Use PolicyÂ ab. Im Gegensatz zu anderen Konten sind Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen mit N26 Business nicht aus der App mÃ¶glich. Das kannst du Ã¼berÂ TransferWise (neuen Tab)Â machen.Firmenlastschriften (Business to Business oder B2B) sind mit dem N26 Business Konto nicht mÃ¶glich.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).Â Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the â€œOwnerâ€, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:Â Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.Â Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.Â Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Ownerâ€™s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, theyâ€™ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.Â N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How to apply for an overdraft?
content:
Available in Germany and AustriaYou can apply for an overdraft only in the N26 mobile app. Youâ€™ll know whether you qualify in real-time with no paperwork needed. You can apply for an N26 Overdraft as follows:Login the N26 mobile app.From the Homescreen, tap on the Explore-tab.Scroll down to Financial Products.Swipe to the side and tap on N26 Overdraft and follow the steps shown in the app.There you can also change the limits of your overdraft, view the interest youâ€™ve accumulated or cancel your overdraft at any time. We offer an 10.15% p.a. interest rate deduct the interest from your account at the end of every quarter.When you apply for N26 Overdraft, we look at information on your personal and financial situation. We then decide automatically on your eligibility for N26 Overdraft and the limit
amount we can offer you, based on a mathematical-statistical method and our risk appetite
practiced at each moment in time. In this regard:We take into account several factors and assess the personal data we have about
you to make our decision on your N26 Overdraft application, as better detailed in our
Privacy PolicyIf you want to challenge the automated decision on your eligibility or on the limits for
your N26 Overdraft and want to have a human review of this automated decision,
you can get in touch with us by contacting our Customer Support team, either via live
chat through your N26 mobile app, web app or via the N26 Support Center. Kindly
note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered
to your N26 account or from your Secure Inbox in your app.If you decide to activate your N26 Overdraft, we will report this to SCHUFA.Why didn't I get an overdraft?As mentioned above, we apply a mathematical-statistical method in order to assess and decide if we can offer you an overdraft. The result is determined automatically in real-time.If you followed the steps above and didnâ€™t get an overdraft, it means we probably canâ€™t offer you an overdraft at the moment. The latter might particularly be the case if you have an active garnishment or previously did not fulfil your financial obligations. Making your N26 account your main account (new tab) also has a positive effect on your eligibility.If you live in Germany, when deciding on your N26 Overdraft eligibility and limits we look at
your SCHUFA Score, which can be up to 3 years old. If itâ€™s older, we will request your most
recent SCHUFA Score after you have gone through our N26 Overdraft application flow. This
might appear on your SCHUFA report, but does not affect your SCHUFA score and will only
be visible to you. In this case, you may not be offered a N26 Overdraft. If you live in Austria,
we look at your CRIF Score.If you canâ€™t get an overdraft, you can try again at a later point in time. In any case, if you are
not eligible for a N26 Overdraft, we will notify you as soon as you become eligible. If you
want to challenge the automated decision on your eligibility, please see above how to get in
touch with us.If you have further questions, please open a live chat directly in the N26 mobile app or your
Online Banking.You can find more information in our Overdraft Terms & Conditions (new tab).Why canâ€™t I get a higher overdraft?As mentioned above, we apply a mathematical-statistical method model in order to determine the amount limit we can offer you for an overdraft. The result is determined automatically in real-time and depends on the personal and financial information we have about you and our risk appetite at each moment in time.We will notify you as soon as we may grant you a higher limit for your N26 Overdraft. If you want to challenge the automated decision on the limit we can offer you, please see above how to get in touch with us. In this case, please reach out to us before accepting the overdraft limit we offered you.Why was my Overdraft limit reduced or cancelled?We routinely review the overdrafts we offer to ensure sustainable overdraft protection for all our customers. This change is not necessarily permanent, and you may be able to request an increase in your overdraft limit in the future. If you need further information, please reach out to our Customer Support Team.Can my overdraft limit change? / Why did my limit get reduced?We routinely review the overdraft limits we offer to ensure adequate protection for our customers. We may reduce or cancel limits if:We make a change to our credit policyYou repeatedly forget to repay your overdraft for more than 90 daysYou repeatedly repay your overdraft lateYour credit score decreases significantlyYou use your overdraft for fraudulent or illegal activityIf changes are implemented that affect you, we will naturally ensure that you are informed.What happens if I cancel my Overdraft whilst having a negative account balance?Your overdraft balance and interest becomes due immediatelyYou lose the ability to borrow money when your account balance is 0To reenable, you will have to apply for overdraft again, reactivation is not always guaranteedAfter cancellation, you will have to repay your overdraft immediately to avoid any additional fees towards N26 caused by delay in repayment. You will also start receiving reminders to top up.Â Can I request a limit increase?While we donâ€™t currently offer credit limit increases, weâ€™re working to make this possible in the future.What can I do if I canâ€™t pay back the money before the deadline?Limit change does not affect your current outstanding balance. You can continue to pay back the outstanding balance at least once every 90 days, as long as your usage is below your maximum limit.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).Â In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.Â In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:Â A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?Â 
You are normally a â€œtax residentâ€ and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally â€œtie-breaker rulesâ€ included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.Â 
What is your taxpayer identification number (â€œTINâ€) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.Â In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: How to file a complaint?
content: Looking for support or have question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWeâ€™re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will thoroughly investigate your complaint and provide our findings and final response via email.Â Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)German beschwerden@n26.com (new tab)French litiges@n26.com (new tab)Spanish reclamaciones.es@n26.com (new tab), or reclamaciones@n26.com (new tab) if you have a German (DE) IBANItalian reclami@n26.com (new tab) or through a certified email message (PEC) to reclami@pec.n26.com (new tab)Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our Customer Support (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.Â If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWeâ€™ll contact you via email to confirm that weâ€™ve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Â Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business DaysÂ Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar DaysÂ United Kingdom - 56 Calendar DaysÂ Spain - 60 Calendar DaysÂ Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties, such as:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht â€“ BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab) page.

title: Comment protÃ©ger mon compte?
content: La sÃ©curitÃ© de votre compte et de vos donnÃ©es personnelles est notre prioritÃ©. Si vous pensez que vos identifiants de connexion N26 ont pu Ãªtre dÃ©couverts ou que quelquâ€™un essaie de se connecter au Livechat Ã  votre place, il est indispensable de changer immÃ©diatement votre mot de passe.Pour ce faire, connectez-vous Ã  votre application N26 et rendez-vous dans la section Mon compte > SÃ©curitÃ© > Changer le mot de passe de connexion. Veuillez choisir un mot de passe fiable et ne divulguer vos identifiants de connexion Ã  personne.En tant que titulaire du compte, vos identifiants de connexion ne doivent Ãªtre choisis et connus que par vous. Nous vous invitons Ã  consulter notre article Comment puis-je protÃ©ger mon identitÃ© ? pour obtenir plus de dÃ©tails sur la faÃ§on dont vous pouvez assurer votre sÃ©curitÃ© numÃ©rique.Si vous pensez que votre compte Ã  Ã©tÃ© compromis ou que vous avez pu Ãªtre victime dâ€™une fraude Â de quelque faÃ§on que ce soit, veuillez nous contacter immÃ©diatement.Si vous nâ€™avez pas accÃ¨s Ã  votre application mobile N26, ou si vous ne pouvez pas vous connecter Ã  votre espace client en ligne, vous pouvez Ã©galement demander Ã  bloquer votre carte bancaire ou les transactions sortantes de votre compte en nous appelant au +33 1 88 45 02 39.

title: Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ ist?
content: Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, kann dein Kontostand negativ sein, solange du dich innerhalb deines Ãœberziehungsrahmen bewegst.Ansonsten kann dein Kontostand negativ werden, wenn N26-GebÃ¼hren zu bezahlen sind wie z.B. fÃ¼r unsere Express-Lieferung oder unsere Premium-Mitgliedschaften.Â AuÃŸerdem kann dein Kontostand negativ werden, wenn Offline-Kartenzahlungen eingehen und abgebucht werden mÃ¼ssen. Dies sind z.B. Zahlungen auf Flugzeugen oder Schiffen, die zum Zeitpunkt der Zahlungsautorisierung nicht deinem Kontostand gegenÃ¼bergestellt werden kÃ¶nnen, aber trotzdem abgebucht werden mÃ¼ssen.Â GemÃ¤ÃŸ unserer AGB hast du dich verpflichtet, dein Konto auszugleichen. Du erhÃ¤ltst eine Erinnerung per E-Mail und wir bitten dich, dein Konto so schnell wie mÃ¶glich auszugleichen. Solange dein Kontostand negativ ist, kannst du keine weiteren Zahlungen oder Abhebungen tÃ¤tigen.Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ bleibt?Dein Konto bleibt weitere 60 Tage aktiv, nachdem es negativ geworden ist. In diesem Zeitraum:Bekommst du zwei Erinnerungen.Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, wird dieser nach der zweiten Erinnerung gekÃ¼ndigt und du musst den Betrag sofort zurÃ¼ckzahlen (oder du kannst einen RÃ¼ckzahlungsplan beantragen).Wenn du ein N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You Konto hast, werden alle Leistungen nach 60 Tagen gekÃ¼ndigt und dein Konto in ein Standardkonto umgewandelt.Wenn du nach diesen 60 Tagen nicht handelst, kann dein Konto geschlossen werden.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo bloquear mi tarjeta?
content: Puedes bloquear y desbloquear tus tarjetas cuando quieras desde la app, ve aÂ TarjetasÂ y seleccionaÂ ConfiguraciÃ³n de tarjetas. Una vez dentro puedes decidir si quieres limitarla temporalmente o deshabilitar las retiradas de efectivo en cajero, los pagos online o bloquear completamente la tarjeta.Tienes el control absoluto sobre tu tarjeta y puedes protegerte anteÂ transacciones no autorizadas. DeberÃ­as bloquear la tarjeta inmediatamente si algo te resulta sospechoso. Siempre puedes desbloquearla mÃ¡s tarde.Si no tienes acceso a la app de tu mÃ³vil ni a la WebApp, tambiÃ©n puedes pedir que bloqueemos tu tarjeta o tu cuenta llamando al +34 910 480 660.

title: Was tun bei einer KontopfÃ¤ndung?
content:
Dein Konto wurde aufgrund eines PfÃ¤ndungsbeschlusses gesperrt? In diesem Artikel erfÃ¤hrst du, was du bei einer KontopfÃ¤ndung tun kannst, um deine ausstehenden Schulden zu begleichen und dein Konto zu entsperren. Lies dir bitte als Erstes die Nachricht, die wir dir unter â€œNachrichten von N26â€ in deiner N26 App geschickt haben, sorgfÃ¤ltig durch. Danach hast du drei Optionen:Option 1: Begleiche die Forderung von deinem N26 KontoSofern du genug Guthaben auf deinem N26 Konto hast, kannst du den PfÃ¤ndungsbetrag mit einem Ãœberweisungsauftrag bezahlen. Bitte beachte, dass der Ãœberweisungsauftrag auch alle Zinsen und GebÃ¼hren abdecken muss, die mit der PfÃ¤ndung einhergehen. Nur dann kÃ¶nnen wir dein Konto freischalten.Â So gehst du vor:Lade das Formular fÃ¼r den Ãœberweisungsauftrag (neuen Tab) herunterDrucke das Formular ausÂ FÃ¼lle den Ãœberweisungsauftrag vollstÃ¤ndig aus und unterschreibe ihnÂ Sende uns einen Scan oder ein Foto per E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab). Nutze dafÃ¼r bitte deine bei uns hinterlegte E-Mail-Adresse.Du kannst uns die Kopie auch direkt von deinem Postfach â€œNachrichten von N26â€ als Antwort auf unsere ursprÃ¼ngliche Nachricht schicken. Bitte beachte, dass der Anhang in deinem Postfach nicht grÃ¶ÃŸer als 25 MB sein darf.Deine Nachrichten werden bei der Ãœbertragung sicher verschlÃ¼sselt. Falls du uns das Formular dennoch lieber per Post schicken willst, kannst du die folgende Adresse nutzen:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 BerlinDie Bearbeitung des Ãœberweisungsauftrags kann etwa 5 Werktage dauern. Um die Bearbeitungszeit nicht unnÃ¶tig zu verlÃ¤ngern, sieh bitte von einer Kontaktaufnahme bezÃ¼glich des aktuellen Bearbeitungsstatus ab. Sobald du wieder frei Ã¼ber dein Konto verfÃ¼gen kannst, informieren wir dich mit einer Nachricht an dein Postfach â€œNachrichten von N26â€.Option 2: Begleiche die Forderung von einem anderen BankkontoDu hast nicht genug Guthaben auf deinem N26 Girokonto, um die Forderungen aus der PfÃ¤ndung zu begleichen und dein Konto freizuschalten? NatÃ¼rlich kannst du die Forderung nach RÃ¼cksprache mit deinem GlÃ¤ubiger auch von einem anderen Bankkonto ausgleichen. Dein GlÃ¤ubiger muss uns nach Ãœberweisungseingang darÃ¼ber informieren, dass die PfÃ¤ndung aufgehoben wurde. Er kann uns entweder per Fax unter (030) 364 285 089 oder per Post an die folgende Adresse informieren:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 BerlinBitte beachte:Wir akzeptieren und bearbeiten fÃ¼r die PfÃ¤ndungsaufhebung ausschlieÃŸlich Informationen, die wir direkt von deinem GlÃ¤ubiger erhalten. Informationen oder Unterlagen von dir kÃ¶nnen wir leider nicht akzeptieren.Wenn du uns etwas zu deiner PfÃ¤ndung mitteilen mÃ¶chtest, kannst du uns eine Nachricht von deinem Postfach â€œNachrichten von N26â€ schicken. Bitte sieh jedoch davon ab, uns weitere Informationen zu schicken, um die Bearbeitungszeit nicht unnÃ¶tig zu verlÃ¤ngern.Falls dein Konto trotz der Zahlung noch immer gesperrt ist, kann das zwei GrÃ¼nde haben: der GlÃ¤ubiger hat uns die nÃ¶tigen Unterlagen noch nicht zugeschickt oder die Bearbeitungsfrist von etwa 5 Werktagen ist noch nicht verstrichen.Falls du dich mit dem GlÃ¤ubiger auf eine Ratenzahlung einigst und er uns eine sogenannte Ruhendstellung schickt, ist diese leider nicht ausreichend, um dein Konto zu entsperren.Option 3: Wandle dein Konto in ein P-Konto umDu fragst dich, was du bei einer KontopfÃ¤ndung noch tun kannst? Es gibt eine dritte Option: die Umwandlung deines Kontos in ein sogenanntes P-Konto. Dabei handelt es sich um ein PfÃ¤ndungsschutzkonto â€“ ein normales Girokonto, auf dem ein bestimmter Monatsbetrag von einer PfÃ¤ndung unberÃ¼hrt bleibt und Ã¼ber den du frei verfÃ¼gen kannst.Bitte beachte, dass die Beantragung und FÃ¼hrung eines PfÃ¤ndungsschutzkontos der Schufa AG gemeldet wird. Einen eventuell bestehenden Dispositionskredit oder anderen Kredit mÃ¼ssen wir in diesem Falle kÃ¼ndigen. Wie du ein P-Konto beantragen kannst und worauf du dabei noch achten solltest, erfÃ¤hrst du hier (neuen Tab).Â KontopfÃ¤ndung: Was tun wir?Â Solltest du innerhalb der nÃ¤chsten 4 Wochen keine der oben genannten Optionen nutzen, sind wir bei einer PfÃ¤ndung verpflichtet, jedes eventuell noch bestehende Guthaben auf deinem Konto bis zur ForderungshÃ¶he an deinen GlÃ¤ubiger auszuzahlen. Danach kÃ¶nnen wir dein Konto wieder freischalten.

title: How to download my Statement of Fees
content: The Statement of FeesÂ is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),Â then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and youâ€™ll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

title: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
content: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.Â Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.Â

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content: To get the most out of â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the â€˜ownerâ€™ or the person who created the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™ can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as â€˜visibleâ€™ to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the ownerâ€™s contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ add participant flow.Youâ€™ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up â€¦ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the â€˜learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜invite new memberâ€™ button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the â€œlegal screenâ€ so be sure to read all the information within the â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&Câ€™s then tap â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ button.Tap â€˜Send inviteâ€™ on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the â€˜send inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the â€˜Participantsâ€™ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participantâ€™s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

title: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
content: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you donâ€™t recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?Â Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.Â Â N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchantâ€™s part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didnâ€™t receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26Â You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.Â Go to the â€˜Homeâ€™ tab, and select the transaction you want to disputeÂ Tap â€˜Get help with this transactionâ€™ and follow the steps provided.Â Important:Â If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, youâ€™ll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. Youâ€™ll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.Â Â If you select a transaction but the â€˜Get helpâ€™ button doesnâ€™t appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, youâ€™ll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If youâ€™ve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, youâ€™ll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, weâ€™ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

title: Wie Ã¤ndere ich meine Kartenlimits?

Jede Ã„nderung, die du vornimmst, wird sofort auf deine ausgesuchte Karte angewendet.Um sie in der mobilen App zu Ã¤ndern:Logge dich ein und gehe zu KartenStreiche zur Seite, bis die gewÃ¼nschte Karte erscheintTippe auf KarteneinstellungenTippe auf TageslimitsUm sie in deinem Online Banking zu Ã¤ndern:Logge dich ein (neuen Tab) und gehe zu Mein KontoKlick unter der Ãœberschrift Karten auf deine gewÃ¼nschte KarteKartenlimitsDas Tageslimit bezieht sich auf die zurÃ¼ckliegenden 24 Stunden (nicht auf den Kalendertag) und liegt bei:1.000â‚¬ fÃ¼r Abhebungen am Geldautomaten5.000â‚¬ fÃ¼r Zahlungen in GeschÃ¤ften oder onlineDas Monatslimit bezieht sich auf den Kalendermonat und liegt bei:20.000â‚¬ fÃ¼r Zahlungen in GeschÃ¤ften oder onlineLieber Videos statt Text?
