content: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (includingÂ CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.Thereâ€™s always a â‚¬2 fee if you use yourÂ MaestroÂ card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2â‚¬. Check ourÂ pricing listsÂ if youâ€™ve beenÂ charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: What's a garnishment and what can I do in Spain?
content: What is a garnishment?A garnishment is an order coming from a Court or from Public entities, directed to seize the funds from the customer's account to satisfy a debt owed by a debtor (customer) to a creditor. As a consequence, N26 has the legal obligation to retain the balances in your account to be later transferred to the creditor (public entity or to the account specified by the court).Creditors can be the Tax Office, the Social Security or any public administration office and the Courts as a result of a judicial process.When we block the balance in your account as a result of the garnishment, you will receive a message in your secure inbox with the following information:CreditorÂ Garnishment numberÂ Balance to be garnishedÂ Balance withheldWhat can I do in this situation?We recommend that you contact the creditor in the first instance in order to reach a payment agreement or to have the garnishment lifted if they consider it appropriate. N26 cannot take any action in this regard as we are legally obligated to apply the fundsâ€™ seizure and transfer it if we do not receive a release order within the time determined by law.Salary and stateâ€™s aid protectionIf you receive your salary in your N26 account, a special protection must be applied over a certain percentage depending on your income. However, you will have to report this situation to the creditor who will notify N26 about the lifting of the corresponding balances.How long does it take for N26 to transfer the seized funds to the creditor?The transfer of the funds is executed at different times depending on the type of creditor who has ordered the garnishment. Normally it is 20 days (Courts or Spanish Tax Office) and 10 days for liens coming from Social Security. The amount will be transferred directly to the entity or the court that issued the order. These funds cannot be transferred to third parties or the debtor in any case (the only exception is if the garnishment is lifted before the payout time frame).

title: Received a suspicious message?
content:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. Theyâ€™re able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank thatâ€™s growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if youâ€™ve received an unexpected message:If youâ€™ve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If youâ€™ve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If youâ€™re ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. Weâ€™re always here to help!

title: How to top up my account?
content: Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways. To do so, simply go to the N26 app and select 'Add Money' to see the available options:1. SEPA Transfer (Up to 2 business days):The transfer must be in EUR and within the SEPA zone.You will need to provide your IBAN and your name as it is written on the ID you used to create your account.If you have a Business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names.Since 1st July 2020 a limit of 100.000â‚¬ for incoming SEPA instant transfers applies.No limit applies to normal incoming SEPA transfers2. Debit or Credit Card (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details from the sending account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.3. Apple Pay or Google Pay (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the Apple Pay or Google Pay account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.4. Moneybeam (instant):You can receive money from other N26 users.5. CASH26 (instant):Available in Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain and Greece.Deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.6. iDEAL (instant):Available only in the Netherlands for customer with Dutch T&C and with a iDEAL accountThe first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 1.5 % of the deposit amount.7. GiroPay (instant):Only available in Germany for customers with German Terms and Conditions and a Giropay account.8. EPS (instant):Only available in Austria for customers with Austrian Terms and Conditions and an EPS account.9. Bancontact (instant):Only available in Belgium for customers with Belgian Terms and Conditions and a Bancontact account.Important reminder for SEPA Transfers:If you deposit money into your N26 account via SEPA transfer, please make sure that the recipient name corresponds to your name as it is entered on the identification document that you used for your verification when opening the account.(Especially if you have an N26 Business account - we do not accept company names.) An incoming transfer is booked in real time, as if it was made as a real time transfer, otherwise a transfer takes 1-2 working days. From July 1st, 2020, there will be a limit of â‚¬ 100,000 for incoming real-time transfers. In France, the first payment must be made to your N26 account from an account that you own. (In all other countries it is not necessary that the other bank account belongs to you.)

title: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
content:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercardâ€™s exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesnâ€™t charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercardâ€™s rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

title: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
content: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel itâ€”this can be done at any time (see below). Weâ€™ll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesnâ€™t affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, youâ€™ll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 monthâ€™s time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and youâ€™ll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after youâ€™ve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we havenâ€™t received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after youâ€™ve proved your identity, weâ€™ll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option youâ€™ve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee.Â You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, weâ€™ll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

title: Pubblico personalizzato
content: Trattamento dei dati nell'ambito di Facebook Custom AudiencesCustom Audiences ci consente di creare segmenti di â€œpubblico personalizzatoâ€ e â€œpubblico simileâ€. Il â€œpubblico personalizzatoâ€ Ã¨ composto da clienti N26 e utenti Internet, per la visualizzazione di contenuti personalizzati, o di soli utenti Internet, cosÃ¬ da escludere gli utenti che sono clienti N26 da alcuni dei nostri annunci. Il â€œpubblico simileâ€ ci consente di definire un gruppo target pertinente per il quale gli annunci pubblicitari visualizzati siano di maggiore interesse rispetto ad altri utenti di Facebook. Il cosiddetto "pubblico simile" assomiglia di piÃ¹ ai nostri clienti rispetto all'utente medio di Facebook. Le finalitÃ  di utilizzo della funzionalitÃ  sono quelle di non mostrare annunci non pertinenti agli utenti che sono giÃ  clienti N26. Per beneficiare di quanto descritto sopra, forniamo a Facebook una versione con hash dell'indirizzo e-mail N26. Il cosiddetto "hashing" Ã¨ una forma di pseudonimizzazione che crittografa l'indirizzo e-mail in modo che non sia piÃ¹ possibile utilizzarlo per identificare gli utenti. Facebook abbina il suddetto indirizzo e-mail al potenziale indirizzo e-mail di Facebook. Dopo la fase di abbinamento, indipendentemente dall'esito, tutti gli indirizzi e-mail con hash vengono eliminati da Facebook entro 6-8 ore. Facebook non condivide questi dati con terze parti o con altri inserzionisti, nÃ© concede loro accesso a tali dati. Sono disponibili ulteriori informazioni nella nuova scheda Facebook Custom Audiences (nuova tabella). Facebook Ireland Limited trasferisce i dati a Facebook Inc., USA. Ai sensi del Regolamento UE 2016/679 ("GDPR"), gli USA sono classificati come Paese sprovvisto di un livello adeguato di protezione dei dati personali; ciÃ² implica, tra l'altro, la possibilitÃ  per le agenzie governative statunitensi di accedere ai dati dell'utente senza che siano disponibili contromisure efficaci.Ãˆ possibile revocare il proprio consenso al trattamento dei dati ai sensi dell'art. 6 comma 1 lett. a del GDPR in qualsiasi momento, tramite l'app Web e l'app N26. Elaborazione dei dati nell'ambito di Google Customer MatchCustomer Match ci consente di creare segmenti di â€œpubblico personalizzatoâ€ e â€œpubblico simileâ€. Il â€œpubblico personalizzatoâ€ Ã¨ costituito da clienti N26 e utenti Internet per visualizzare contenuti personalizzati, o da soli utenti Internet per escludere gli attuali clienti N26 da alcuni dei nostri annunci nella rete di ricerca di Google, nella scheda Shopping, Gmail, YouTube e Google Display Network in quanto non vogliamo mostrare loro annunci pubblicitari irrilevanti. Il â€œpubblico simileâ€ ci consente di definire un gruppo target pertinente per il quale gli annunci pubblicitari visualizzati siano di maggiore interesse rispetto ad altri utenti di Google. Il cosiddetto "pubblico simile" assomiglia di piÃ¹ ai nostri clienti rispetto all'utente medio di Google.Per beneficiare di quanto sopra, forniamo a Google una versione con hash dell'indirizzo e-mail N26. Il cosiddetto "hashing" Ã¨ una forma di pseudonimizzazione che crittografa l'indirizzo e-mail in modo che non sia piÃ¹ possibile utilizzarlo per identificare gli utenti. Google abbina il suddetto indirizzo e-mail al potenziale indirizzo e-mail dell'account Google. Se l'indirizzo e-mail non corrisponde, Google puÃ² comunque utilizzarlo come parte di un controllo di conformitÃ  alle norme, ma non potrÃ  utilizzarlo in altro modo per Customer Match o qualsiasi altro prodotto Google. I dati vengono conservati da Google per non piÃ¹ di 48 ore al fine di creare i segmenti di pubblico di Customer Match e, una volta decorso tale termine, vengono tempestivamente cancellati Google non condivide questi dati con terze parti o con altri inserzionisti, nÃ© concede accesso a tali dati. Per maggiori informazioni, consultare l'articolo di supporto nella nuova scheda How Google uses Customer Match data (nuova tabella).Google Ireland Limited trasferisce i dati a Google LLC, USA. Ai sensi del Regolamento UE 2016/679 ("GDPR"), gli USA sono classificati come Paese sprovvisto di un livello adeguato di protezione dei dati personali; ciÃ² implica, tra l'altro, la possibilitÃ  per le agenzie governative statunitensi di accedere ai dati dell'utente senza che siano disponibili contromisure efficaci.Ãˆ possibile revocare il proprio consenso al trattamento dei dati ai sensi dell'art. 6 comma 1 lett. a del GDPR in qualsiasi momento, tramite l'app Web e l'app N26.

title: Quanto costa un conto N26?
content: Il conto N26 Ã¨ gratuito.*A seconda della regione, potrebbero essere applicati costi aggiuntivi:Prezzi in Germania (nuova tabella)Prezzi in Austria (nuova tabella)Prezzi in Francia (nuova tabella)Prezzi in Spagna (nuova tabella)Prezzi in Italia (nuova tabella)Prezzi nel resto dâ€™Europa (nuova tabella)*Se soddisfi i nostriÂ requisiti minimi (nuova tabella). Se non possiamo offrirti un conto N26, potresti aprire un contoÂ N26 Flex.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box â€œAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.â€All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, youâ€™ll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,Â e.g.Â MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions withoutÂ typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visibleÂ enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 usersÂ selected from your contact list.

title: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: Coordinate bancarie: certificato di titolaritÃ  di conto corrente
content: Che cos'Ã¨ il certificato di titolaritÃ  di conto corrente?Un certificato di titolaritÃ  di conto corrente, noto anche come attestazione bancaria o conferma del conto, Ã¨ un documento che dichiara che il tuo conto Ã¨ registrato a tuo nome. Questa dichiarazione contiene tutte le tue coordinate bancarie, ovvero il tuo nome e cognome, la data di nascita, l'IBAN del tuo conto e la data in cui hai creato il conto.Come opzione, puoi richiedere di visualizzare il saldo del tuo conto corrente e il numero delle tue carte attive, che saranno parzialmente nascosti da asterischi, per ovvie ragioni di sicurezza.Come richiedere il certificato di titolaritÃ  di conto corrente?Da N26 Web: clicca sull'icona di download (nuova tabella)* e seleziona Scarica informazioni bancarie. Il PDF viene creato automaticamente.Per richiedere il certificato di titolaritÃ  con il saldo e il numero della carta: clicca sull'icona di download (nuova tabella)* sotto Conferma del conto, seleziona se vuoi aggiungere il tuo saldo attuale e/o il numero delle tue carte attive e clicca su Richiedi. Riceverai il PDF nella sezione Messaggi di N26 entro 24 ore.* L'icona di download Ã¨ il quadrato con una freccia che punta verso il basso, posizionato a sinistra del pulsante 'Trasferire denaro sul conto'.

title: How to top up my account?
content: Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways. To do so, simply go to the N26 app and select 'Add Money' to see the available options:1. SEPA Transfer (Up to 2 business days):The transfer must be in EUR and within the SEPA zone.You will need to provide your IBAN and your name as it is written on the ID you used to create your account.If you have a Business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names.Since 1st July 2020 a limit of 100.000â‚¬ for incoming SEPA instant transfers applies.No limit applies to normal incoming SEPA transfers2. Debit or Credit Card (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details from the sending account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.3. Apple Pay or Google Pay (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the Apple Pay or Google Pay account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.4. Moneybeam (instant):You can receive money from other N26 users.5. CASH26 (instant):Available in Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain and Greece.Deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.6. iDEAL (instant):Available only in the Netherlands for customer with Dutch T&C and with a iDEAL accountThe first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 1.5 % of the deposit amount.7. GiroPay (instant):Only available in Germany for customers with German Terms and Conditions and a Giropay account.8. EPS (instant):Only available in Austria for customers with Austrian Terms and Conditions and an EPS account.9. Bancontact (instant):Only available in Belgium for customers with Belgian Terms and Conditions and a Bancontact account.Important reminder for SEPA Transfers:If you deposit money into your N26 account via SEPA transfer, please make sure that the recipient name corresponds to your name as it is entered on the identification document that you used for your verification when opening the account.(Especially if you have an N26 Business account - we do not accept company names.) An incoming transfer is booked in real time, as if it was made as a real time transfer, otherwise a transfer takes 1-2 working days. From July 1st, 2020, there will be a limit of â‚¬ 100,000 for incoming real-time transfers. In France, the first payment must be made to your N26 account from an account that you own. (In all other countries it is not necessary that the other bank account belongs to you.)

title: How to get N26 Insurance?
content: The new on-demandÂ N26 InsuranceÂ allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the â€œInsuranceâ€ banner you find.Â You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.Â How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.Â Am I eligible?Â N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers canâ€™t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

title: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
content: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around â‚¬2. For the time being, weâ€™re unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, hereâ€™s a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:Â AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you couldâ€™ve been charged an ATM fee.

title: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
content: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: How to download my Statement of Fees
content: The Statement of FeesÂ is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),Â then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and youâ€™ll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

title: Wie kann ich Feedback geben oder ein neues Produkt vorschlagen?
content: Wir bei N26 mÃ¶chten Banking einfach, transparent und flexibel machen. Deshalb freuen wir uns jederzeit Ã¼ber Kundenfeedback, um N26 weiterzuentwickeln. Du vermisst ein bestimmtes Feature in der App und fragst dich â€œWie kann ich Feedback gebenâ€? Schreib uns einfach eine E-Mail an ideas@n26.com (neuen Tab)! Ãœber diese Adresse sammeln wir alle VerbesserungsvorschlÃ¤ge, Ideen und WÃ¼nsche.Je nach Nachfrage berÃ¼cksichtigen wir deine VorschlÃ¤ge in der Produktentwicklung. In der Vergangenheit haben wir auf diese Weise schon einige neue Features eingefÃ¼hrt â€“ Feedback geben lohnt sich also!Â Ãœbrigens fÃ¼hren wir regelmÃ¤ÃŸige Umfragen durch, an denen du anonym teilnehmen kannst. Und solltest du mal unzufrieden sein, kannst du uns auch eine Beschwerde schicken. Ganz gleich, wie du Feedback geben willst â€“ wir sind dankbar, dass du dir die Zeit nimmst!Â Â

title: How to get push messages?
content: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such asÂ MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as withÂ CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you arenâ€™t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether youâ€™re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Security.NameÂ andÂ sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: Youâ€™ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify itâ€™s really you changing your information so we canâ€™t change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ and selectÂ SettingsÂ thenÂ Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content: Tips for a successful videoÂ verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of ourÂ supported countriesÂ to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driverâ€™s licenses or residence permits canâ€™t be used). Also, the document shouldnâ€™t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'llÂ need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and deliveryÂ of your card.Â Please note that this is not a fee: yourÂ first cardÂ after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. DeliveriesÂ take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Wie lange dauert eine Ãœberweisung?
content: Eingehende SEPA-EchtzeitÃ¼berweisungen auf N26 Konten erfolgen in Echtzeit, solange sie von einer Bank stammen, die EchtzeitÃ¼berweisungen unterstÃ¼tzt. Ãœberweisungen kÃ¶nnen jedoch manchmal verzÃ¶gert werden, wenn sie aufgrund von SEPA-Banking-Vorschriften Ã¼berprÃ¼ft werden mÃ¼ssen.GewÃ¶hnliche SEPA-Ãœberweisungen gehen innerhalb von hÃ¶chstens zwei Werktagen ein. Bitte beachte, dass sich der Zeitrahmen auf maximal dreiÂ Werktage verlÃ¤ngert, wenn die Ãœberweisung kurz vor einem Wochenende oder Feiertag vorgenommen wird.Eingehende SWIFT-Ãœberweisungen dauern bis zu vier Werktage, bis sie eintreffen.Ausgehende SEPA-EchtzeitÃ¼berweisungen erfolgen in Echtzeit. GewÃ¶hnliche ausgehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen dauern bis zu zwei Werktage. Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen mit unserem Partner Wise dauern bis zu vier Werktage. Ausgehende SWIFT-Ãœberweisungen werden nicht unterstÃ¼tzt.Was ist ein "Bankarbeitstag"?Ein Bankarbeitstag entspricht aufgrund der Ã–ffnungszeiten der beteiligten Banken zwei Werktagen. Jeder Tag unter der Woche, der kein Feiertag ist, gilt als Werktag.Warum ist meine Ãœberweisung nicht angekommen?Was passiert, wenn alles Obenstehende berÃ¼cksichtigt wurde und die Ãœberweisung immer noch nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt wurde? In solchen FÃ¤llen kann nur die auftraggebende Bank eine interne Nachforschung einleiten.Leider kÃ¶nnen wir bei N26 keine eingehenden Ãœberweisungen untersuchen, nur ausgehende Ãœberweisungen. Dessen ungeachtet findest du hier eine Liste der mÃ¶glichen GrÃ¼nde, warum eine Ãœberweisung fehlschlagen kÃ¶nnte.Weitere InformationenAll unsere SEPA-Ãœberweisungen werden Ã¼ber ein System namens TARGET2 (neuen Tab) abgewickelt. Dieses System bearbeitet Bankzahlungen werktags von 7:00 Uhr bis 18:00 Uhr europÃ¤ischer Standardzeit. An den folgenden Tagen macht TARGET2 Urlaub: 1. Januar (Neujahr), Karfreitag, Ostermontag, 1. Mai (Tag der Arbeit), 25. Dezember (1. Weihnachtsfeiertag) und 26. Dezember (2. Weihnachtsfeiertag).

title: Wie verwalte ich meine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer?
content: Wenn du als N26 Nutzer sichtbar bist, kannst du alle Funktionen deiner App nutzen wie z.B. Shared Spaces oder Echtzeit-Transaktionen mit MoneyBeam oder Geldanfragen. Dazu gleicht N26 deine Kontaktdaten mit denen anderer N26 Nutzer ab.Hier erfÃ¤hrst du, wie das funktioniert und wie du deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer verwalten kannst. Alle deine Kontakte, die ein N26 Konto haben, kannst du in der in-App Kontaktliste einsehen. Ebenso wirst du in der Kontaktliste von anderen N26 Nutzern, die deine Kontaktdaten haben, angezeigt. Deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer kannst du in deiner App verwalten unter ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > PersÃ¶nliche Details > PersÃ¶nliche Daten. Hier kannst du dein HÃ¤kchen setzen bei "Anderen N26 Kunden in meinen Kontakten erlauben, mich fÃ¼r Ãœberweisungen einfach zu finden".

title: CRS - La razÃ³n por la que pedimos cierta informaciÃ³n a nuestros clientes
content: N26, al igual que toda instituciÃ³n financiera, estÃ¡ obligado a remitir informaciÃ³n a las Administraciones Tributarias sobre cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de los residentes fiscales en otro paÃ­s.LaÂ Normativa CRSÂ (Common Reporting Standard o EstÃ¡ndar ComÃºn de Reporte) es un sistema de intercambio automÃ¡tico de informaciÃ³n tributaria entre los paÃ­ses adheridos, elaborado por la OCDE (OrganizaciÃ³n para la CooperaciÃ³n y el Desarrollo EconÃ³micos).Para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al IRS, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales:Â¿En quÃ© paÃ­s o paÃ­ses declaras impuestos?Â Â Tienes tu residencia fiscal en un paÃ­s extranjero y por lo tanto declaras impuestos en este paÃ­s, donde tienes tu residencia personal. Si vives en mÃ¡s de un paÃ­s, hay reglas para la determinaciÃ³n de la residencia incluidas en los convenios fiscales y las leyes tributarias del paÃ­s relevante, que nos ayudarÃ¡n a determinar tu residencia fiscal. Puede que hayas tenido tu residencia fiscal en mÃ¡s de un paÃ­s a lo largo de un aÃ±o, en ese caso, vamos a necesitar conocer tu nÃºmero de identificaciÃ³n fiscal de cada uno de estos paÃ­ses para poder enviar tu informaciÃ³n a las autoridades correspondientes.Â 2. Â¿CuÃ¡l es tu nÃºmero de identificaciÃ³n fiscal (TIN) de cada paÃ­s?La emisiÃ³n y el formato del NÃºmero de IdentificaciÃ³n Fiscal (TIN) depende cada paÃ­s. En los paÃ­ses de la UniÃ³n Europea, la ComisiÃ³n Europea ha publicado una guÃ­a con los documentos de cada paÃ­s (pestaÃ±a nueva), lo que puede ayudarte a identificar cuÃ¡l es el tuyo.Â En caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu informaciÃ³n fiscal en la app de N26. Para esto, tras iniciar sesiÃ³n ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > ConfiguraciÃ³n personal > InformaciÃ³n de impuestos y actualiza tu informaciÃ³n.Â Â

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ to your account. If you didnâ€™t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons youâ€™ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, itâ€™s likely that youâ€™ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

Sobald du die AGB durchgelesen und verstanden hast, tippe auf das KÃ¤stchen "Kontovollmacht erteilen".Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein.BestÃ¤tige auf deinem verknÃ¼pften Smartphone die Push-Nachricht "Kontovollmacht akzeptieren".Du brauchst genÃ¼gend freie Spaces, um eine Einladung zu einem Shared Space annehmen zu kÃ¶nnen. Sonst kannst du nur weitermachen, wenn du einen anderen Space lÃ¶schst.Es ist auch nicht mÃ¶glich, einen Space mit demselben Namen oder Bild wie dem des Shared Spaces zu verwenden. Du kannst Einladungen nur annehmen, wenn du den Namen oder das Bild des anderen Spaces Ã¤nderst.So verlÃ¤sst du einen Space:Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-Ãœbersicht.Tippe in den Einstellungen auf "Shared Space verlassen".BestÃ¤tige die Mitteilung auf der nÃ¤chsten Seite und tippe auf "Space verlassen":Shared Spaces lassen sich durch die N26 App oder WebApp erstellen und bearbeiten.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie erstelle ich einen Shared Space?

title: How to change my debit card PIN?
content: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change itâ€”you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that youâ€™ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose â€˜Cardsâ€™ from the bottom right-handTap â€˜Card Settingsâ€™ and select the relevant cardSelect â€˜Reset PINâ€™Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transactionâ€”in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequencesâ€”such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isnâ€™t accepted, simply try again a different combination.Â If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that youâ€™ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Security.NameÂ andÂ sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: Youâ€™ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify itâ€™s really you changing your information so we canâ€™t change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ and selectÂ SettingsÂ thenÂ Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

title: What to do if my card is lost or itâ€™s been compromised?
content: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.Â Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).Â You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

title: How can I download the confirmation for a SEPA transfer?
content: If you have sent a bank transfer from your N26 account and need confirmation of the sending or receipt, you can download the PDF file with the transaction data from your mobile app or WebApp. That's how:Log into your N26 appFrom the list of transactions, select the bank transfer for which you want to download the confirmationClick on "Download transfer confirmation"As soon as you choose this option, the document will automatically be downloaded to your smartphone or pc.What data will I find in the transfer confirmation?In the confirmation of the transfer you will find the bank details of the sender and recipient of the transfer, including the amount of the transaction and the date on which it was made.

title: Pourquoi mon compte est-il temporairement bloquÃ© ?
content: ConformÃ©ment Ã  la rÃ©glementation bancaire europÃ©enne, N26 doit effectuer des contrÃ´les de routine sur les transactions afin dâ€™assurer la sÃ©curitÃ© des comptes de clients. En tant quâ€™institution rÃ©glementÃ©e, cela nous permet de protÃ©ger les fonds de votre compte N26.GÃ©nÃ©ralement, ces contrÃ´les sont effectuÃ©s trÃ¨s rapidement, sans mÃªme que vous vous en aperceviez. Parfois, cela peut prendre plus de temps et votre compte peut alors Ãªtre temporairement indisponible.Ce processus est supervisÃ© par une Ã©quipe spÃ©cialisÃ©e dans la conduite de contrÃ´les de cette nature, qui travaille assidÃ»ment pour limiter les dÃ©sagrÃ©ments. Pour cette raison, notre Service Client N26 nâ€™est pas en mesure de fournir des informations supplÃ©mentaires concernant votre compte sur le Livechat, ni dâ€™accÃ©lÃ©rer la procÃ©dure.Veuillez faire preuve de patience pendant que nous effectuons ces dÃ©marches. title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the â€˜Learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜Invite new memberâ€™ button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once youâ€™ve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the â€˜Accept power of attorneyâ€™ button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the â€˜Send Inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).Â Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the â€œOwnerâ€, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:Â Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.Â Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.Â Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Ownerâ€™s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, theyâ€™ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.Â N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: Quanto tempo occorre per inviare denaro con Wise?
content:
Una volta creato un trasferimento Wise, visualizzerai la data stimata per il trasferimento. Prima di inviare il bonifico, assicurati sempre che i dati del beneficiario siano corretti.Se il trasferimento Wise non va a buon fine, ti invieremo un messaggio push al riguardo. Lâ€™importo ritornerÃ  sul tuo conto pochi giorni dopo.Non Ã¨ possibile annullare personalmente un bonifico, ma se avrai bisogno di farlo potrai metterti in contatto con il supporto Wise, che lo farÃ  per te. Tieni presente che il trasferimento puÃ² essere annullato solo fino a quando Wise non ha movimentato i tuoi fondi. Una volta che il denaro Ã¨ stato inviato al destinatario, non Ã¨ piÃ¹ possibile cancellare il bonifico.
 
I dettagli del destinatario possono essere modificati solo prima che Wise elabori il tuo bonifico e trasferisca il denaro. Dopo che i tuoi soldi sono stati spostati, i dettagli del destinatario non possono piÃ¹ essere modificati. Se avessi bisogno di assistenza, ti consigliamo di metterti in contatto con il supporto di Wise.Wise non addebita alcuna commissione extra in caso di pagamento restituito e nemmeno noi. Tuttavia, alcune banche partecipanti addebitano commissioni, nel qual caso Wise detrarrÃ  tale importo dal denaro restituito conformemente alle relativeÂ Condizioni di utilizzo (nuova tabella).Ragioni comuni del mancato trasferimento:Errore nei dettagli del trasferimento (ad es. quando si inseriscono il nome del destinatario o le informazioni del conto).Caratteri speciali o troppi caratteri nel nome del destinatario o nel campo di riferimento.Limiti raggiunti o pagamenti online non attivi nelle impostazioni della carta.Non sono possibili trasferimenti in valuta estera con il conto N26 Business or N26 Business You o se il destinatario Ã¨ un conto business.

Falls du jemals den Verdacht hast, dass deine N26 Login-Daten nicht mehr sicher sind oder dass jemand einen Chat in deinem Namen erÃ¶ffnet, ist es Ã¤uÃŸerst wichtig, dass du sofort dein N26 Anmeldepasswort Ã¤nderst. title: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
content:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select â€˜Forgot Passwordâ€™ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

title: Bin ich in den USA steuerpflichtig?
content: Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir gemÃ¤ÃŸ FATCA verpflichtet, dem â€œInternal Revenue Serviceâ€ (IRS) alle Konten zu melden, die von Personen gefÃ¼hrt werden, die in den USA steuerpflichtig sind. Dieses Gesetz wurde vom amerikanischen Finanzministerium verabschiedet, um eine bessere Einhaltung von Steuervorschriften zu erreichen. So soll verhindert werden, dass amerikanische StaatsangehÃ¶rige auslÃ¤ndische Banken und andere Finanzinstitute dazu verwenden, Steuern auf ihr Einkommen und Kapital zu vermeiden.Â Mehr Informationen zu FATCA findest du hier. (neuen Tab)Laut FATCA ist ein amerikanischer StaatsangehÃ¶riger unter anderem so definiert:StaatsangehÃ¶riger der USA (auch bei doppelter StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit)Einwohner der USA, beispielsweise Inhaber einer gÃ¼ltigen U.S. Greencard oder Person, die den â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ erfÃ¼llt (siehe unten).Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, ob du ein amerikanischer StaatsangehÃ¶riger bist, wende dich bitte an einen Steuerberater.â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ bedeutet:Du warst im aktuellen Kalenderjahr 183 oder mehr Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.ODERDu warst innerhalb der letzten 3 Kalenderjahre 183 Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.(31 Tage oder mehr im aktuellen Kalenderjahr) + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im letzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 3 + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im vorletzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 6.DarÃ¼ber hinaus auch, wenn dein Konto die diese Angaben enthÃ¤lt:US-amerikanische StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit oder Wohnsitz in den USAGeburtsort in den USAPostanschrift oder Postfach in den USAUS-amerikanische RufnummerDauerauftrÃ¤ge an eine US-amerikanischen Adresse oder ein Konto, das in den USA verwaltet wirdFÃ¼r den Fall, dass wir folgende Dokumente nicht von dir erhalten, sind wir weiterhin dazu verpflichtet, dich als US StaatsangehÃ¶rigen anzusehen:Ein W-8BEN Formular oder eine Ã¤hnliche EigenerklÃ¤rung undeinen nicht US-amerikanischen Pass oder einen anderen regierungsamtlichen Ausweis, der deine StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit oder NationalitÃ¤t eines anderen Landes als den USA nachweist.Falls du in den USA geboren bist, eine Kopie der BestÃ¤tigung Ã¼ber den Verlust deiner StaatsbÃ¼rgerschaft.

title: Que faire si jâ€™ai perdu ma carte ou si les donnÃ©es de ma carte ont Ã©tÃ© compromises ?
content: Si vous avez perdu votre carte ou si vous pensez que vos donnÃ©es ont Ã©tÃ© compromises, vous pouvez la verrouiller et la dÃ©verrouiller Ã  tout moment depuis l'application N26.Verrouillez la carte temporairement ou dÃ©sactivez-la dÃ©finitivement en recommandant une nouvelle carte dans l'application N26 ou l'espace client en ligne (nouvel onglet).Si vos donnÃ©es ont Ã©tÃ© compromises, veuillez suivre les Ã©tapes suivantes :AccÃ©dez Ã  lâ€™onglet "Cartes"Faites dÃ©filer vers la droite avec votre doigt jusqu'Ã  ce que vous trouviez la carte que vous souhaitez dÃ©sactiver ou verrouiller temporairement.SÃ©lectionnez "ParamÃ¨tres de la carte"Enfin, si vous souhaitez bloquer dÃ©finitivement votre carte, sÃ©lectionnez "Commander une nouvelle carte".De cette faÃ§on, vous avez le contrÃ´le total de votre carte et vous pouvez vous protÃ©ger contre les transactions non-autorisÃ©es.Si vous avez le moindre soupÃ§on, vous devez immÃ©diatement verrouiller votre carte. Vous pourrez toujours la dÃ©verrouiller par la suite.

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all depositsÂ up to â‚¬100.000Â held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?Â N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

title: Warum ist der Zugriff auf mein Konto vorÃ¼bergehend gesperrt?
content: GemÃ¤ÃŸ den europÃ¤ischen Bankvorschriften muss N26 routinemÃ¤ÃŸige technische ÃœberprÃ¼fungen von Kundenkonten durchfÃ¼hren. Als reguliertes Institut kÃ¶nnen wir so sicherzustellen, dass das Geld auf deinem N26 Konto sicher und geschÃ¼tzt bleibt.In den meisten FÃ¤llen erfolgen diese PrÃ¼fungen innerhalb kÃ¼rzester Zeit, ohne dass du davon etwas mitbekommst. Gelegentlich kann dies aber auch lÃ¤nger dauern, sodass du vorÃ¼bergehend keinen Zugriff auf dein Konto hast.Dieser Prozess wird von einem eigens dafÃ¼r zustÃ¤ndigen Team Ã¼berwacht, das auf die DurchfÃ¼hrung solcher technischen ÃœberprÃ¼fungen spezialisiert ist und alles daran setzt, Unterbrechungen mÃ¶glichst kurz zu halten. Aus diesem Grund ist es unserem Kundenservice-Team von N26 nicht mÃ¶glich, weitere AuskÃ¼nfte zu deinem Konto per Live-Chat zu erteilen oder den Vorgang zu beschleunigen.Wir bitten dich um etwas Geduld, wÃ¤hrend wir den Vorgang abschlieÃŸen. Unser Team wird sich bei dir melden, sobald der technische ÃœberprÃ¼fungsprozess abgeschlossen ist.

title: When will my card arrive?
content: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10â‚¬).Â Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0â‚¬ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25â‚¬ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making aÂ temporary limitationÂ to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet ourÂ requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

title: Relazione informativa CRR
content: Di cosa si tratta?La Direttiva sui requisiti patrimoniali (CRR, Capital Requirements Regulation) Ã¨ una direttiva UE. Tra le altre cose, stabilisce l'obbligo per gli istituti di credito di pubblicare una relazione informativa su base annuale (art. 433 del CRR).PerchÃ© la relazione informativa non Ã¨ stata pubblicata nel nostro Support Center o su qualche altra pagina del sito web?N26 Bank GmbH non Ã¨ obbligata a pubblicare la relazione CRR sul proprio sito web. L'art. 434 del CRR (nuova tabella) prevede che la pubblicazione avvenga esclusivamente su un "mezzo di comunicazione appropriato", delegando dunque la decisione a ciascun istituto di credito.N26 Bank GmbH pubblica il suo CRR su www.bundesanzeiger.de (nuova tabella).

title: How to protect my account?
content: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, itâ€™s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: Bereavement & probate
content:
How can I inform N26 about a death?Â In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceasedâ€™s bank accounts.Â The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: servizio.successioni@n26.comPEC: successioni@pec.n26.comÂ Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank AG, Succursale ItalianaÂ  -Servizio Successioni-
Via Filippo Sassetti 32Â - 20124 Milano (MI), ITALIAN26 Bank AG, Succursale ItalianaÂ 
c/o N26 Bank AGÂ -Servizio Successioni-
Klosterstr. 62Â - 10179 Berlin, GERMANY
Please inform us on:Â Who is the deceased?Â If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account.Â How can we contact the beneficiaries?Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated, so we can get in contact with the beneficiaries.Â  A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?Â If you are facing certain proceedings (i.e. rejection of the inheritance or establishment of anÂ  inventory) or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us.Â We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings.Â Please refrain from sending us original documents via post at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you.Â What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?Â Â Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country.Â However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH, Succursale Italiana is located in Italy.Â As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be disabled. As well as any regular payments such as standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates will not be executed anymore.Further, please be aware we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax of the assets belonging to the estate. It might be necessary to complete a certain set of questions in order to release assets with N26.We recommend getting in touch with the relevant tax authorities in your country, in order to fulfil local tax requirements (if any).Â We will notify the beneficiaries in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceasedâ€™s account with N26.I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death?Â There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited.Â Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this.Â For any further information on a specific situation please seek professional assistance from a suitable advisory service.Â

content: Disponible en EspaÃ±a, Alemania, Austria, BÃ©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Los PaÃ­ses Bajos, Noruega, Portugal, Polonia, Suecia. title: Wie lade ich Freunde zu N26 ein?
content: Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald du dein Konto vollstÃ¤ndig erÃ¶ffnet hast. So funktioniert's:Logge dich in die App ein.Tippe auf Entdecken.Unter Mach mehr aus deinem N26 Konto findest du den Bereich Lade Freunde ein.Tippe auf deinen persÃ¶nlichen Empfehlungscode, um ihn zu kopieren und wÃ¤hle aus auf welchem Weg du den Code teilen mÃ¶chtest.Du kannst bei Bedarf eine Nachricht an deinen Freund hinzufÃ¼gen oder die Vorgabe nutzen.Tippe auf Senden!Erfahre mehr darÃ¼ber, wie du Geld verdienen kannst, indem duÂ N26 deinen Freunden empfiehlst (verfÃ¼gbar in ausgewÃ¤hlten LÃ¤ndern).

title: How to keep my banking data safe online?
content: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

content: Ã‰ligibilitÃ© : Disponibles sur iOS pour tous les marchÃ©s de lâ€™UE.
