title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.Â Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.Â 
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support canâ€™t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. Youâ€™re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)Â or Â§ 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.Â According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If youâ€™d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. Weâ€™re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you donâ€™t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We donâ€™t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

title: Pourquoi je ne peux pas accÃ©der Ã  certains services ou produits ?
content: Nous collaborons avec diffÃ©rents partenaires afin de proposer des services financiers innovants supplÃ©mentaires. Certains de nos partenaires, tout comme N26, doivent vÃ©rifier votre identitÃ©, câ€™est pourquoi nous leur fournissons les informations Ã  notre disposition concernant votre identitÃ©, Ã  condition que vous nous ayez prÃ©alablement donnÃ© votre accord.Voici les raisons les plus frÃ©quentes pour lesquelles vous ne pouvez pas accÃ©der Ã  certains produits ou fonctionnalitÃ©s :Vos documents dâ€™identitÃ© ont expirÃ© ou ne sont pas acceptÃ©s (câ€™est par exemple le cas pour certains passeports qui ne disposent pas de tous les Ã©lÃ©ments de sÃ©curitÃ© nÃ©cessaires).Vous ÃªtesÂ imposable (nouvel onglet)Â aux Etats-Unis. Dans ce cas lÃ  vous ne pourrez pas utiliser nos produits dâ€™investissement ou dâ€™Ã©pargne. Si vous nâ€™Ãªtes pas imposable aux Etats-Unis, il est possible que vous deviez changer votre numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone sâ€™il commence par le code pays nord-amÃ©ricain (+1). Si le problÃ¨me persiste, veuillez contacter notre Service Client depuis le Livechat de votre application afin que nous puissions vous aider.Le produit ou service en question n'est pas encore disponible dans votre pays.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo recibir mensajes push?
content: Te mandamos mensajes push para finalizar transferencias (como por ejemploÂ MoneyBeam) o para confirmar servicios (comoÂ CASH26). Si no estÃ¡s recibiendo estos mensajes, primero verifica que las notificaciones estÃ¡n activadas tanto en tu mÃ³vil como en la app. DespuÃ©s prueba nuestras soluciones dependiendo del telÃ©fono que tengas:iOSElimina la aplicaciÃ³n y reinicia tu smartphone. DescÃ¡rgate e instala la Ãºltima versiÃ³n de la app en la App Store de Apple yÂ conecta tu smartphoneÂ de nuevo.Verifica si ha iniciado sesiÃ³n en tu app N26AsegÃºrate de que los mensajes estÃ©n activados en los ajustes generales para esta app en concreto.AndroidElimina la aplicaciÃ³n y reinicia tu smartphone. Descarga e instala la Ãºltima versiÃ³n de la app N26 en la Google Play Store yÂ conecta tu smartphone de nuevo.Ve aÂ Mi cuentaÂ y activa las notificaciones pulsandoÂ ConfiguraciÃ³n de la appÂ y luegoÂ Notificaciones.Huawei y Xiaomi: entra enÂ Ajustes, despuÃ©sÂ Ajustes AvanzadosÂ y finalmente enÂ Ajustes de BaterÃ­a. Elige la app N26 como una app protegida.OnePlus: Selecciona la opciÃ³n de optimizar la baterÃ­a y despuÃ©s la app N26; finalmente no desactiva tal optimizaciÃ³n.Oppo: deshabilita las opciones de optimizaciÃ³n de la baterÃ­a para la app y bloquÃ©alo en elÂ Resumen de apps recientes.

title: What are N26 Installments?
content: Eligibility requirements: Only available to customers who have opened their account in Italy with a German (DE) IBAN.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction directly in the app after it has been made into 3 to 6 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks, giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.N26 Installments Characteristics:Please see below for N26 Installments characteristics. Please note, interest rates are dependent on the credit risk assessment made by N26. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing from.Effective Annual Interest Rate: From 7.99% to 13.99% (credit risk scoring dependent)Eligible Purchase Amount: From â‚¬20 - â‚¬200N26 Installments Duration: The N26 Installments duration is from 3 to 6 months, with the first installment taken out immediately after confirmation and the option of early loan repayment (the interest rate is charged monthly).Merchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!Additional Information:Split purchases into installments within your N26 appGo back in time up to 4 weeks to split past purchasesFull early repayment of the loan Direct debit of monthly installments Pay missed payments manuallyAutomated reminder one day before due dateAutomated reminders when missing a payment How to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the â€˜Exploreâ€™ tab and tap on 'N26 Installments' under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting â€˜Optionsâ€™ (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™When you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using N26 Installments:First you will be provided with information about N26 InstallmentsThen you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept all checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, youâ€™ll be credited an amount equal to the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. Weâ€™ll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (youâ€™ll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your loan with N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in full

title: Â¿CÃ³mo dividir gastos compartidos con MoneyBeam?
content: Elegibilidad: todos los mercados de la UE, disponible para iOS. La funciÃ³n estarÃ¡ disponible para Android en las prÃ³ximas semanas.Dividir la cuentaCon nuestra funciÃ³n Â«Dividir la cuentaÂ», puedes dividir gastos compartidos entre amigos y familiares en tu app N26. Dividir la cuenta en un restaurante o poner tu parte para un regalo de cumpleaÃ±os: puedes utilizarla para cualquier compra en la que compartas gastos con otras personas. Incluso puedes dividir los gastos domÃ©sticos, como las facturas de consumos o la compra de artÃ­culos para el hogar.Por cada transacciÃ³n con tarjeta que realices, tienes la opciÃ³n de dividir la factura a partes iguales o introducir importes personalizados para cada persona que contribuye a la compra en grupo. Puedes dividir gastos con cualquiera, sea o no cliente de N26.CÃ³mo utilizar Â«Dividir la cuentaÂ»Primero debes utilizar tu tarjeta de N26 para realizar una compra; a continuaciÃ³n, cuando quieras dividir la factura, sigue estos pasos:DespuÃ©s de realizar la compra, abre la app N26Busca la transacciÃ³n en la pestaÃ±a Â«InicioÂ», pulsa sobre ella y selecciona Â«Dividir facturaÂ»AÃ±ade a las personas con las que vas a dividir el gasto (si no son clientes de N26, tendrÃ¡s que introducir su nombre)Cuando lo tengas todo listo, pulsa el botÃ³n verde de la parte inferior de la pantalla para confirmar los importes divididosLas personas que no sean clientes de N26 recibirÃ¡n un mensaje con tus datos bancarios para que envÃ­en la cantidad acordadaPor Ãºltimo, pulsa Â«ConfirmarÂ» para enviar el resto de solicitudes a las personas que sÃ­ sean clientes de N26, que recibirÃ¡n una solicitud a travÃ©s de MoneyBeamImportante:Solicitudes a clientes de N26: Funcionan como una solicitud de MoneyBeam normal.Solicitudes a personas que no sean clientes de N26: RecibirÃ¡s una plantilla estandarizada con los datos de tu IBAN, que podrÃ¡s editar. Esta puede enviarse a travÃ©s de otra plataforma de mensajerÃ­a de tu dispositivo (p. ej., email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Te advertimos de que estas solicitudes no pueden rastrearse en la app.Ver la cantidad que falta por pagar: Los clientes de N26 y tÃº podrÃ©is ver la cantidad total a dividir y cuÃ¡nto falta por pagar del total de la factura. Si el importe total de la compra no es igual al importe dividido, verÃ¡s un mensaje de advertencia (no obstante, tendrÃ¡s la opciÃ³n de continuar de todos modos).MÃ¡ximo de 20 solicitudes de MoneyBeam abiertas: Puedes tener hasta 20 solicitudes de MoneyBeam abiertas al mismo tiempo y un mÃ¡ximo de 3 solicitudes abiertas con un solo contacto. Si has alcanzado el lÃ­mite, verÃ¡s un mensaje que te lo indicarÃ¡.

title: What does the court ruling BGH XI ZR 26/20 mean for N26 customers?
content: On April 27, 2021, the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (Bundesgerichtshof, BGH) ruled on [translation] â€œthe impermissibility of clauses that feign the consent of a customer to changes in the Terms & Conditions of a bank.â€Am I entitled to a reimbursement?On the bases of this ruling, customers with a private membership plan (N26 Standard/Smart/You/Metal), created before March 12, 2020, are entitled to reclaim the â€œGambling Feeâ€ introduced and charged by us. For those customers who are entitled to reclaim it, the fee (for the customer group in question) has no longer been charged since November 5, 2021.Customers who registered after March 12, 2020 actively consented to the â€œGambling Feeâ€ included in the Terms & Conditions, which were already updated at this time, which is why these customers are not entitled to a reimbursement of said â€œGambling Feeâ€. Customers with an N26 Business membership plan (N26 Business Standard/ Business Smart/Business You/Business Metal) are furthermore not entitled to reclaim this fee, as they do not fall under the customer group covered by the ruling (consumers).Requesting a reimbursement as a current customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to login to the N26 app and launch a verified live chat in the app or web app.Requesting a reimbursement as a former customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to send an email to support@n26.com (new tab). For a direct, simple resolution please follow these guidelines:Subject of email: â€œReimbursement pursuant to BGH XI ZR 26/20â€Send the email from your registered email address.Include your full name in the email as well as an alternative IBANAttach a clear, double-sided photo/scan of one of your ID documents, including the edges.Please include your consent to the following: â€œI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.â€œ

title: How to contact N26?
content:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Donâ€™t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you donâ€™t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while youâ€™re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We wonâ€™t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.Â

title: How to download my Statement of Fees
content: The Statement of FeesÂ is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),Â then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and youâ€™ll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

title: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
content: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, weâ€™ll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesnâ€™t charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under theirÂ Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipientâ€™s name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipientâ€™s name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments arenâ€™t active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.Â Your login details of both the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab)Â consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose aÂ secure passwordÂ and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.Â ThisÂ 4-digit codeÂ is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can thenÂ change itÂ in the app yourself after that.Push messages.Â For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to yourÂ connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also addedÂ 3D SecureÂ to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us weâ€™ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But weâ€™ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.Weâ€™ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You canÂ download your personal dataÂ up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in ourÂ Privacy Policy (new tab).

title: Â¿Por quÃ© no he recibido el cÃ³digo de sincronizaciÃ³n por SMS?
content: Para los clientes de iOS que no reciban nuestros SMS de vinculaciÃ³n: puede que tengas activada la funciÃ³n que filtra nuestros SMS. Para encontrar nuestro mensaje en iMessage, ve a Filtros en la parte superior izquierda y selecciona Remitentes desconocidos.Para vincular tu smartphone con tu cuenta se requiere un cÃ³digo de sincronizaciÃ³n. Si no has recibido el SMS con el cÃ³digo de sincronizaciÃ³n por alguna razÃ³n, puedes volver a solicitarlo desde la app hasta 5 veces (espera al menos 30 segundos entre una y otra).Si ya lo has solicitado las 5 veces y sigues sin recibirlo, la app no te dejarÃ¡ solicitar otro en 24 horas por motivos de seguridad. Si eso pasa, puedes elegir entre esperar las 24 horas o contactar con nuestro servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente por chat para que te ayudemos.Si tu prefijo internacional pertenece a un paÃ­s de fuera de la UE, es probable que necesites contactarnos para recibirlo.

title: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
content: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (â€œtappingâ€ your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:Â Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen.

title: Where can I use my Maestro card?
content: Only available for customers with our German, Austrian or Dutch terms & conditionsLetâ€™s get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro canâ€™t be used for online purchases and itâ€™s not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).You can't use it for Apple Pay or Google Pay.But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. EachÂ ATM transactionÂ using your Maestro is â‚¬2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals). You canÂ order your MaestroÂ card directly in the app.If youâ€™re having issues using your Maestro, first check that yourÂ card settingsÂ are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and weâ€™ll look into it for you.

title: Was ist MoneyBeam?
content: Durch einen MoneyBeam kannst du deinen Kontakten in Echtzeit Geld senden, ohne dass du dazu ihre Bankverbindung eingeben musst. Du kannst auch einen MoneyBeam von deinen Kontakten anfragen, um Geld zu erhalten. Um MoneyBeam nutzen zu kÃ¶nnen, mÃ¼ssen du und deine Kontakte als N26 Nutzer sichtbar sein.Um einen MoneyBeam zu senden:Â Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeamWÃ¤hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder fÃ¼ge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einGib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein und bestÃ¤tige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erhÃ¤ltst.Â Um einen MoneyBeam anzufragen:Tippe auf Geld erhalten > MoneyBeam anfragenWÃ¤hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder fÃ¼ge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einSobald der Kontakt deine Anfrage bestÃ¤tigt, erhÃ¤ltst du deinen angefragten BetragDas Limit fÃ¼r MoneyBeams liegt bei 1000â‚¬ pro Transaktion und 5000â‚¬ pro 24 Stunden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Ein GIF als zusÃ¤tzlichen Verwendungszweck hinzufÃ¼gen:Wenn du MoneyBeam nutzt, kannst du GIFs als zusÃ¤tzlichen Text beim Verwendungszweck versenden. Sobald der MoneyBeam abgeschlossen ist, wird dem EmpfÃ¤nger auf dem Startbildschirm ein Film-Emoji als PrÃ¤fix auf der eingehenden Ãœberweisung angezeigt, sodass er weiÃŸ, dass an die Ãœberweisung ein GIF angehÃ¤ngt ist. Der EmpfÃ¤nger kann das GIF zusammen mit dem Verwendungszweck in den Ãœberweisungsdaten einsehen.Die GIFs werden dir direkt von Giphy, Inc. zur VerfÃ¼gung gestellt und nicht von N26. Bitte beachte, dass Giphy ein US-amerikanisches Unternehmen ist, das deine personenbezogenen Daten in den USA verarbeitet. Informationen darÃ¼ber, wie Giphy deine personenbezogenen Daten verarbeitet, findest du in der Datenschutzrichtlinie von Giphy (neuen Tab).Â Â Um einen MoneyBeam mit einem GIF zu senden:Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeam.WÃ¤hle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder fÃ¼ge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einWÃ¤hle GIF hinzufÃ¼gen und suche nach dem GIF, das du hinzufÃ¼gen mÃ¶chtest, entweder per Suchfeld oder einfach scrollend.Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein und bestÃ¤tige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erhÃ¤ltst.

title: How to deposit and withdraw cash with CASH26
content: Available for accounts opened in Germany, Austria, Spain, Italy, and Greece.Withdrawing and depositing cash in retail stores with CASH26 is easyâ€“â€“all you need is your smartphone! Simply open the CASH26 map in your N26 app and zoom in to find the nearest participating store. Once youâ€™re there, generate a CASH26 barcode from your N26 app, and show it to the cashier to make your deposit or withdrawal right at the counter.Â Use CASH26 to withdraw money without a debit cardÂ With CASH26, you can withdraw money from your bank account in minutes using just your phoneâ€”thereâ€™s no need to have your N26 card on hand. Simply head to the Cards tab in your N26 app, then tap CASH26 > Withdrawal and choose the amount you want to withdraw. Next, enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Your N26 app will generate a barcode to show the cashier, who will scan it and hand over your cash. Simple as that! You can withdraw up to â‚¬200 each time, with a maximum withdrawal limit of â‚¬900 within 24 hours.Â How to deposit cash into your N26 account with CASH26Open your app and go to the Cards tab, then tap CASH26 > Deposit. Next, choose the amount you want to deposit, with a minimum of â‚¬50. Enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Once youâ€™re ready, show your CASH26 barcode to the cashier to scan, and hand them the cash. Your CASH26 deposit will be credited to your N26 account within 10 minutes.Â Hereâ€™s what else you need to know when using CASH26Your CASH26 barcode is only valid for 10 minutes. If you donâ€™t make your deposit or withdrawal in time, the code will expire and youâ€™ll need to generate a new one.Â If you enter the wrong amount by mistake, you can delete it by tapping the trash can icon in the upper right corner of your screen. Or, simply let the barcode expire and then generate a new one.You donâ€™t need to purchase anything in the partner store in order to make deposits or withdrawals with CASH26.Â N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.For more information on limits and other details, check out this article (new tab).Â

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content: To get the most out of â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the â€˜ownerâ€™ or the person who created the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™ can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as â€˜visibleâ€™ to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the ownerâ€™s contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ add participant flow.Youâ€™ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up â€¦ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the â€˜learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜invite new memberâ€™ button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the â€œlegal screenâ€ so be sure to read all the information within the â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&Câ€™s then tap â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ button.Tap â€˜Send inviteâ€™ on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the â€˜send inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the â€˜Participantsâ€™ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participantâ€™s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

title: Have you been victim of a fraud? Contact us.
content:
Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please help us save you time and contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If youâ€™re an N26 customer and have an authorized or unauthorized card transaction which you want to dispute, please use our dedicated and complete service in the N26 mobile app. The hotline above exclusively helps in case of transfers to a suspicious account with an N26 IBAN.Did you get a SMS followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt. This is how the fraud works:You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one (new tab) The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App> My Account> Settings >Security> Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,Â  send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comIn the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab).Iâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If youâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, youâ€™ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the â€˜Cardsâ€™ tab. You can mark the reason as â€œlostâ€ or â€œstolenâ€ based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, youâ€™ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).How can I protect my account from fraud?Â Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banksÂ Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularlyÂ Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behaviour.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.Useful links:What is phishing?What to do if my account may be compromised?

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).Â In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.Â In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:Â A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: Geld abheben und einzahlen mit CASH26 â€“ So gehtâ€™s
content: FÃ¼r Konten verfÃ¼gbar, die in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland erÃ¶ffnet wurden.Dein verknÃ¼pftes Smartphone ist alles, was du brauchst. Der Kassierer bzw. die Kassiererin wird den Code einscannen und dir das Bargeld aushÃ¤ndigen.Â Wie kann ich Geld auf mein N26 Konto einzahlen mit CASH26?Gehe in deiner N26 App auf den â€œKartenâ€-Tab und wÃ¤hle CASH26 > Bargeld einzahlen.WÃ¤hle den Betrag, den du einzahlen willst (mindestens 50 â‚¬).Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) ein und bestÃ¤tige die Transaktion im Popup-Fenster.Â Zeige den Strichcode auf deinem Smartphone-Bildschirm an der Kasse vor und Ã¼berreiche das Bargeld.Es kann es bis zu 10 Minuten dauern, bis das eingezahlte Bargeld in deinem Kontostand in der N26 App zu sehen ist.Wichtig!Der Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang gÃ¼ltig. Er verliert seine GÃ¼ltigkeit, wenn du ihn nicht rechtzeitig nutzt. In diesem Fall musst du einen neuen Strichcode erstellen.Â Falls du einen falschen Betrag eingibst, kannst du ihn lÃ¶schen, indem du auf das Papierkorb Symbol oben rechts tippst (oder den Code ablaufen lÃ¤sst) und dann einen neuen Barcode erstellst.Â Du musst im GeschÃ¤ft nichts kaufen, wenn du Bargeld einzahlen oder Geld abheben willst.Mehr Ã¼ber CASH26 sowie Einzahl- und Abhebelimits erfÃ¤hrst du in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab).

title: How to file a complaint?
content: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWeâ€™re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will thoroughly investigate your and provide our findings and final response via email.Â Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)French litiges@n26.com (new tab)Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our Customer Support (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.Â If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWeâ€™ll contact you via email to confirm that weâ€™ve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint handling times All complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business DaysÂ Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar DaysÂ United Kingdom - 56 Calendar DaysÂ Spain - 60 Calendar DaysÂ Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our decision relating to a complaint about an N26 bank account and/or N26 services, you may wish to consider further advice from independent consumer arbitration services*.Â Â *Please note that these services cannot perform any actions on N26 accounts and will only offer the possibility of an out-of-court dispute resolution in German. The arbitration procedure is not a fast-track procedure and can take up to 6 months.Schlichtungsstelle bei der Deutschen Bundesbank (Arbitration Body via the German Federal Bank) Link (new tab).Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht â€“ BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority) Link (new tab).For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab).

title: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
content:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing â€˜Direct Debitsâ€™: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you donâ€™t have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Spaceâ€™s IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your â€˜Spacesâ€™ section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the â€˜Space Settingsâ€™ and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' Â»Â Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' Â»Â Accept the T&C's Â»Â Enter your confirmation PIN Â»Â Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right â€˜cog iconâ€™)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on â€œSend moneyâ€Select â€œBank transferâ€Select the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

title: 2 Months N26 Smart Free Trial
content:
Eligibility: All EU marketsEver wanted to try out our N26 Smart account, but not sure if itâ€™s for you? Well now you can enjoy 2 whole months for free - And â€˜try before you buyâ€™ - to see if our Smart account works for you, with no commitment!If you want to take part in our N26 Smart free trial, you will have access to our premium banking features included with our Smart account. And see the value by getting more out of your everyday banking.What is included in our Smart free trial?60 day free trial: Eligible N26 customers can take advantage of our 60 day Smart free trial.Cancel at any point: At any point during your free trial, youâ€™ll be able to cancel and still enjoy the benefits for the full 60 days (you will be automatically downgraded back to Standard after 60 days)Continue with Smart: If you decide our N26 Smart account is for you, then you can take no action to continue with our Smart account and pay the monthly fee of 4,90â‚¬. If you change your mind after the free trial is over, you can always downgrade back to Standard.Enjoy the benefits of our Smart account: You can use the following benefits during your 60 day Smart free trial:Spaces (up to 10)Up to 10 Shared SpacesIBAN for Spaces (DE customers only) Up to 5 free ATM withdrawals/ monthRound-ups SavingsEnjoy partner offers and discountsPhone supportHow to access the Smart free trial?If you have been invited to a Free Trial of our Smart membership, you will be able to access it by following the instructions below. From the push notification: Tap on the push notificationWhen the N26 app opens, your invitation explaining the free trial offer will open automatically. Click on â€œcontinueâ€ to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, please read and accept the Terms and Conditions, thenClick â€œConfirm Purchaseâ€ : you are officially part of the trial now, and will see a success message! From the N26 app: Open the N26 appYou will see the Smart Free Trial offer entrypoint at the top of your home screen. Tap on â€œLearn Moreâ€ This will open the invitation screen explaining the free trial offer in detail. Click on â€œcontinueâ€ to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, read and accept the Terms and Conditions, then
Click â€œConfirm Purchaseâ€ : you are officially part of the trial now! Note: If you received an email inviting you to start the trial, we recommend opening it from your phone and clicking the â€œStart free trialâ€ button. This will automatically open the N26 app and load the invitation page. Otherwise, login to your N26 mobile app and follow the app flow above.

content: 3D Secure te protege de fraudes en pagos online y se activa automÃ¡ticamente cuando activas tu tarjeta en la app. No requiere contraseÃ±as adicionales.Cuando hagas un pago onlineÂ utilizando tu Mastercard, 3D Secure confirma la transacciÃ³n en 5 minutos mediante un mensaje push en la aplicaciÃ³n. Si no ves la transacciÃ³n, prueba algunos de estosÂ consejos para solucionarlo.Importante: el mensaje push solo se enviarÃ¡ al smartphone vinculado.Si haces una compra desde tu telÃ©fono, verÃ¡s una transacciÃ³n pendiente en la app. Pulsa en el icono de la campana y aparecerÃ¡ un mensaje push en tu pantalla para que confirmes y finalices tu compra.
