title: Comment clÃ´turer mon compte ?
content: Si vous dÃ©cidez de fermer votre compte bancaire N26, nous tenons d'abord Ã  vous dire que nous aurions aimÃ© pouvoir continuer Ã  vous compter parmi nos clients.Â  Nous allons maintenant vous accompagner dans la clÃ´ture de votre compte bancaire N26.Si vous possÃ©dez un compte premium, peut-Ãªtre souhaitez-vous plutÃ´t passer Ã  un compte N26 Standard gratuit et sans aucun engagement ? Pour en savoir plus, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).Â  (nouvel onglet)Pour fermer dÃ©finitivement votre compte N26, voici la marche Ã  suivre : Si le solde de votre compte est positif, effectuez un virement de la somme restante vers un autre compte avant dâ€™initier la clÃ´ture de votre compte. Si le solde de votre compte est nÃ©gatif, veuillez alimenter votre compte N26 (nouvel onglet). Votre solde doit Ãªtre Ã  0 pour faciliter la fermeture de votre compte N26. N'oubliez pas de vÃ©rifier le solde de vos sous-comptes Espaces si vous utilisez cette fonctionnalitÃ©.Â Appuyez ici pour lancer la procÃ©dure de clÃ´ture du compte en ligne (nouvel onglet). Vous devrez vous connecter pour vÃ©rifier votre identitÃ©, ensuite lâ€™application vous guidera dans la clÃ´ture de votre compte N26.DÃ©truisez votre carte en la coupant Ã  lâ€™aide de ciseaux. DÃ©coupez la puce et la bande magnÃ©tique, puis jetez les morceaux sÃ©parÃ©ment.Vous ne parvenez toujours pas Ã  clÃ´turer votre compte ?Si vous avez un IBAN italien ou si vous ne pouvez pas vous connecter Ã  votre compte et quâ€™une erreur sâ€™affiche lors du processus de clÃ´ture de votre compte en ligne, contactez-nous par email Ã  l'adresse (nouvel onglet)support@n26.com (nouvel onglet) en utilisant lâ€™adresse e-mail liÃ©e Ã  votre compte. Veuillez joindre Ã  cet email le formulaire de clÃ´ture de compte (nouvel onglet) contenant les informations suivantes :La demande de clÃ´ture de votre compte Ã  une date prÃ©cise ou Â« dÃ¨s que possible Â» ;Votre nom ;L'IBAN de votre compte N26 ;L'IBAN du compte vers lequel vous souhaitez transfÃ©rer le solde restant de votre compte si celui-ci est positif. Il doit s'agir d'un compte bancaire de la zone euro.

title: Wie behalte ich meine tÃ¤glichen Ausgaben im Blick?
content: Wir sortieren deineÂ TransaktionenÂ automatisch und zeigen unsere Ergebnisse in der Insights an (obere rechte Ecke der mobilen App), anhand folgender Kriterien:Kategorien. Wir sammeln Informationen Ã¼ber EinzelhÃ¤ndler und ZahlungsgrÃ¼nde, um unsere Kategorisierung zu verbessern (z. B. Geldautomaten, Lebensmittel oder Bekleidung). Wenn du zum Beispiel einen Moneybeam mit dem Verwendungszweck Mittagessen versendest, werden wir ihn in die Kategorie Kneipen und Restaurants einordnen. Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass eine Kategorie nicht passt, kannst du sie einfach Ã¤ndern, indem du die Transaktion auswÃ¤hlst und eine andere Kategorie aus der Dropdown-Liste auswÃ¤hlst.Hashtags. Wir haben auch Standard-Hashtags fÃ¼r Transaktionszeiten (#Wochenende), Transaktionsarten (#BÃ¼cher) oder Kauforte (#Berlin) hinzugefÃ¼gt. Du kannst deine Transaktionen weiter sortieren, indem du deine eigenen Hashtags hinzufÃ¼gst: Tippe auf eine Transaktion und dann auf das Bleistiftsymbol, um Tags hinzuzufÃ¼gen (z. B. #Portugal_Trip oder #jeden_Monat) oder um unerwÃ¼nschte Tags zu entfernen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Frequently asked questions about the p-account
content:
What does a p-account cost?The conversion to a p-account is free of charge and doesn't entail additional monthly fees. Already existing fees, such as account usage and premium subscription fees, will still apply.How can I increase my monthly allowance?In order to increase the basic allowance of your p-account, weâ€™ll need a completed certificate from an authority or appropriate body under Â§ 850k (5) Code of Civil Procedure. This also applies to a one-time increase (e.g. for forwarding a rent deposit loan). You can get this certificate issued from the following authorities:Your employerThe institution making payment of the child benefits (Familienkasse)A nonprofit debtor and insolvency advisory bodyThe job centerLawyersPlease send us the original certificate by post to:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 Berlin GermanyHow can I convert my p-account back to my normal account?In order to convert your p-account back to your normal account you can send us an email from your registered email address to support@n26.com with the following information:Your first name and surnameYour N26 IBANConfirm that you want to convert your p-account to your normal account.In case you still have an active garnishment, please be aware that your account will be seized immediately and your funds transferred to the creditor.What is the legal p-account allowance?The legal p-account allowance is â‚¬1.340.If you donâ€™t spend your entire allowance, your unspent allowance will automatically be transferred to the next month for up to 3 months in total.If you receive funds on your N26 account in a given month, your unspent allowance from the previous month will be added on top of the new funds (but max. 1340â‚¬). So if you have a monthly income of 1340â‚¬ or higher and you donâ€™t spend all of it, your allowance can accumulate to up to 3 x 1340â‚¬ = 4020â‚¬.If you donâ€™t receive any funds on your N26 account in a given month, your allowance is equal to the unspent allowance from the previous month. If youâ€™ve spent your entire allowance and donâ€™t receive any funds in the next month you wonâ€™t have any allowance left.You can check your current allowance at any time in the N26 app under: My Account > P-Account status

title: Round-Up Savings
content: Mit der Funktion â€Round-up Savingsâ€œ kÃ¶nnen Premiumkunden jede von ihnen getÃ¤tigte Kartentransaktion auf den nÃ¤chsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung fÃ¼hrt nicht zu einer Ãœberziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du Ã¼ber kein ausreichendes Guthaben verfÃ¼gen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt.Du kannst immer nur eine â€Round-upâ€œ-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl Ã¼berweisen.Du kannst die Funktion â€Round-upâ€œ jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schlieÃŸt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die â€Round-upâ€œ-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.Wie kann ich die "Aufrundungsregel" nutzen?Die Aktivierung der "Aufrundungsregel" geht schnell und einfach. Logge dich dazu einfach in die mobile App oder Web-App von N26 ein:Gehe zum Bereich "Spaces".WÃ¤hle den Space, auf den die Differenz zum aufgerundeten Betrag (das Restgeld) flieÃŸen soll.Tippe/Klicke auf "Verwalten" --> "Aufrundungsregel verwalten".Schalte die Funktion "Aufrundungsregel verwalten" auf grÃ¼n.WÃ¤hle den Multiplikator und tippe/klicke anschlieÃŸend auf "BestÃ¤tigen".Spare direkt bei deinem nÃ¤chsten Einkauf mit deiner N26 Debitkarte!

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (includingÂ CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.Thereâ€™s always a â‚¬2 fee if you use yourÂ MaestroÂ card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2â‚¬. Check ourÂ pricing listsÂ if youâ€™ve beenÂ charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. Itâ€™s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via aÂ push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of theÂ troubleshooting tipsÂ we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, youâ€™ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchantâ€™s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

title: Wie investiert N26 mein Geld?
content: Wir streben an, die Einlagen unserer Kunden auch fÃ¼r Kredite an unsere Kunden zur VerfÃ¼gung zu stellen (sofern diese Ã¼ber eine entsprechende BonitÃ¤t verfÃ¼gen). FÃ¼r die nicht im KundengeschÃ¤ft benÃ¶tigte LiquiditÃ¤t ist unsere Anlagestrategie risikoarm.Wir legen das Geld unserer Kunden kurzfristig bei der Deutschen Bundesbank und bei anderen europÃ¤ischen Banken im Euroraum mit ausschlieÃŸlich guten Risikoklassen an. Daneben refinanzieren wir Ã¶ffentlich-rechtliche Kunden hauptsÃ¤chlich in Deutschland (StÃ¤dte und Gemeinden) und investieren in Euro-Staatsanleihen.Wir sind kein Handelsbuchinstitut. Das heiÃŸt, wir betreiben keinen Handel zur kurzfristigen Gewinnerzielung.Und wir tÃ¤tigen auch keine SpekulationsgeschÃ¤fte, weder auf Nahrungsmittel, Devisen, Bitcoins, noch auf andere Anlageklassen.

title: Cos'Ã¨ CASH26?
content: Disponibile per i conti aperti in Spagna, Germania, Austria, Italia e Grecia.CASH26 Ã¨ una funzione integrata nell'app N26 che ti permette di depositare contanti sul tuo conto N26 e prelevare denaro con il tuo smartphone, senza carta e senza sportello.Tutto quello che devi fare Ã¨ recarti in uno degliÂ oltre 2000 punti venditaÂ CASH26 in tutta Italia (tra cui Carrefour Iper, Market, Express, PENNY, PAM e Panorama), generare un codice a barre CASH26 e mostrarlo alla persona alla cassa dallo schermo del tuo smartphone collegato.Â Leggi questo articolo per sapere come prelevare e depositare contanti sul conto con CASH26.FunzionalitÃ  CASH26Depositare contantiIl codice a barre ha una durata di soli 10 minuti; se non lo usi in tempo, scadrÃ  e dovrai generarne uno nuovo.Quando depositi il denaro, sarÃ  disponibile immediatamente, anche se potrebbero volerci fino a 10 minuti prima che sia visibile nel saldo del tuo conto nell'app N26.Quanto denaro in contanti posso depositare con CASH26?L'importo minimo Ã¨ di 50 â‚¬ per deposito e quello massimo Ã¨ di 999 â‚¬ ogni 24 ore.A prescindere dalla somma, si applica una commissione dell'1,5% sull'importo totale.Prelevare contanti con lo smartphoneNon appena viene generato il codice a barre CASH26, l'importo selezionato viene detratto immediatamente dal saldo del conto.Â Se cambi idea e cancelli il codice prima di usarlo, oppure se lo lasci scadere dopo 10 minuti, il denaro tornerÃ  immediatamente nel tuo conto.Quanto denaro in contanti posso prelevare con CASH26?Il limite massimo Ã¨ di 200 â‚¬ per ogni prelievo e di 900 â‚¬ ogni 24 ore. Non c'Ã¨ un importo minimo di prelievo. Puoi anche prelevare soltanto un centesimo.I prelievi con CASH26 sono privi di commissioni e senza spese aggiuntive.

title: How to reorder a card?
content: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10â‚¬N26 Metal cards: 45â‚¬Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30â‚¬N26 Metal: 65â‚¬Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

title: What is a N26 Standard Account?
content: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of â‚¬50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional â‚¬10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least â‚¬10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

title: Come posso scaricare la ricevuta di un bonifico SEPA?
content: Se hai inviato un bonifico dal tuo conto N26 e necessiti di una conferma dellâ€™avvenuto invio o ricezione, puoi scaricare il file PDF con i dati della transazione dalla tua app mobile o WebApp. Ecco come:Â Accedi alla tua app N26Dalla lista delle transazioni, seleziona il bonifico per il quale desideri scaricare la confermaClicca su â€œScarica il PDF del bonificoâ€Non appena sceglierai questa opzione, la ricevuta verrÃ  automaticamente scaricata sul tuo smartphone o pc.Quali dati sono presenti nella ricevuta PDF del bonifico?Nella ricevuta del bonifico troverai i dati bancari del mittente e del ricevente del trasferimento, comprensivi dellâ€™importo della transazione e la data in cui Ã¨ stata effettuata.Ti ricordiamo inoltre, che nella ricevuta non troverai nÃ¨ il CRO (Codice Riferimento Operazione) nÃ¨ il TRN (Transaction Reference Number).

title: What you need to know about the Italian IBAN
content: IMPORTANT - Currently new customers signing up in Italy will receive an Italian IBAN. For our existing customers in Italy with a German IBAN, as soon as we have information to share on how and when you can obtain an Italian IBAN, we will get back in touch. Why didnâ€™t N26 offer an Italian IBAN from the beginning?Theoretically, having a German IBAN in Italy shouldnâ€™t be an issue under EU law which states that all EU IBANs should be accepted, regardless if itâ€™s from a different country than your country of residence. However, weâ€™ve been listening to our customers and know that this isnâ€™t always the case. To make things easier, weâ€™ve now decided to offer our Italian customers their own local Italian IBAN.Can I receive my salary/social/unemployment benefit/pension?You can indeed receive incoming transfers in Euros to the Italian IBAN associated with your N26 account.Can I create Direct Debits?Yes, you can. Simply provide the relevant company with your N26 IBAN to set up Direct Debits.Can I create Standing orders?Yes, you can. Standing orders can be set up in the N26 app via the "Transfers" section.When trying to send a transfer to my N26 Italian IBAN, the sending bank said the account details aren't recognised. What is the issue?It's possible that the sending bank doesn't yet have our new Italian BIC in their system. Please contact the sending bank so they can update their database and process your transfer.Can I deposit cash on my N26 account?Our customers in Italy can use CASH26 to withdraw and deposit cash through our partner stores. You can see how this works by visiting our Support Center here.Does anything change in terms of the fees or cost related to using the account (price list)?Offering an Italian IBAN won't change the costs associated with your account. You can check the price list with all relevant information here (new tab).Is it true that if I open an account now, I wonâ€™t have to pay the stamp duty?A stamp duty of â‚¬34.20 is due on accounts with an annual average balance exceeding â‚¬5,000 (subject to subsequent changes to the law). It is paid by the Bank on bank statements until June 30th, 2022. Unless the promotion is extended, the annual stamp duty will be paid by the customer from July 1st, 2022. It will be charged on the customer's account by direct debit. Customers will not not need to provide any kind of declaration.

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: â‚¬5,000Monthly limit: â‚¬20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of â‚¬1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of â‚¬400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of â‚¬2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of â‚¬1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: â‚¬1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limitÂ Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: Wie kann ich den Nachweis Ã¼ber die Herkunft der Gelder fÃ¼r mein Konto erbringen?
content: Als voll lizenzierte Bank muss N26 routinemÃ¤ÃŸige technische PrÃ¼fungen der Kundenkonten durchfÃ¼hren. Als reguliertes Institut kÃ¶nnen wir so sicherstellen, dass das Geld auf N26 Konten sicher und geschÃ¼tzt bleibt.Mitunter kann es vorkommen, dass wir uns aufgrund der Ergebnisse dieser RoutineprÃ¼fungen an einen Kontoinhaber wenden mÃ¼ssen, um einen Nachweis Ã¼ber die Herkunft der Gelder auf dem Konto zu erhalten, dies ist eine Praxis im Einklang mit den deutschen Bankvorschriften.Wenn dies der Fall ist, werden wir dich ausschlieÃŸlich Ã¼ber die E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren, die mit deinem N26 Konto verknÃ¼pft ist. In dieser E-Mail erhÃ¤ltst du klare Anweisungen, wie du diese Dokumente einreichen kannst, z. B. Scans oder Fotos von Quittungen, Gehaltsabrechnungen, Rechnungen oder Zahlungsaufforderungen.Sei stets aufmerksam und vergewissere dich, dass solche E-Mails von N26 kommen â€“ wir werden dich nie nach deinen N26 Kontodaten, deinem Passwort oder anderen Daten fragen, die du im Rahmen deines Verifizierungsprozesses mitgeteilt hast.

title: How to order my Maestro card?
content: Only applies to Germany, Austria and the NetherlandsYou need our German, Austrian or Dutch Terms & Conditions to order aÂ Maestro (new tab) card. Just login to your account and go to:Cards Tap: Get an additional Card Then tap: Maestro Then tap Choose to order the card The Maestro card is free of charge only for N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal customers, while it costs 10â‚¬ for N26 Standard customers. Maestro is a widely adopted payment system which allows you to make payments using a Maestro card in stores. All our Mastercards as well as our Maestro cards are debit cards.For more information about the delivery timeline please go to our dedicated article.

title: Quâ€™est-ce que le hameÃ§onnage?
content: Le hameÃ§onnage est une mÃ©thode simple et efficace que les hackers utilisent pour obtenir vos informations confidentielles. Une fois ces informations obtenues, ils peuvent les utiliser pour usurper lâ€™identitÃ© de leurs victimes et perpÃ©trer diffÃ©rents types de fraudes en leur nom. Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus, veuillez cliquer (nouvel onglet) ici (nouvel onglet) pour lire notre article de blog sur la maniÃ¨re de reconnaÃ®tre et dâ€™Ã©viter les attaques de hameÃ§onnage.Comment signaler des emails et des messages suspectsN26 ne vous enverra jamais de messages dâ€™avertissements urgents par SMS ou emails vous demandant de vous connecter Ã  votre compte et de partager des donnÃ©es utilisateur confidentielles. Nous ne vous enverrons jamais dâ€™ultimatum, et nous ne vous demanderons jamais de vous authentifier ou de vÃ©rifier vos donnÃ©es en dehors de nos canaux de communications sÃ©curisÃ©s.Emails suspectsSi vous recevez un email suspect, ne cliquez sur aucun lien et ne tÃ©lÃ©chargez aucune piÃ¨ce jointe.Afin de nous aider dans notre enquÃªte, nous vous prions :de nous transfÃ©rer simplement lâ€™email suspect Ã  lâ€™adresse support@n26.com ;OUdâ€™enregistrer, si possible, lâ€™email suspect en tant que fichier Â« eml Â» et de nous lâ€™envoyer. Avec la plupart des fournisseurs de services de messagerie, les emails sont automatiquement enregistrÃ©s dans ce format lorsquâ€™ils sont tÃ©lÃ©chargÃ©s. En nous envoyant lâ€™email suspect dans ce format, vous nous permettez de dÃ©terminer la vÃ©ritable origine du message et de le signaler aux organisations compÃ©tentes. Si vous rencontrez des difficultÃ©s pour enregistrer lâ€™email Ã  ce format, pas de problÃ¨mes. Dans ce cas, envoyez-nous simplement la conversation de lâ€™email suspect Ã  lâ€™adresse indiquÃ©e ci-dessus.Â Veuillez ne pas nous envoyer de captures dâ€™Ã©cran, car nous ne pouvons pas utiliser ce type dâ€™informations. Supprimez lâ€™email de votre boÃ®te mail.SMS suspectsSi vous recevez un SMS suspect, ne cliquez sur aucun lien et ne donnez aucune information demandÃ©e.Afin de nous aider dans notre enquÃªte, nous vous demandons de suivre les Ã©tapes suivantes :Prenez une capture dâ€™Ã©cran du message que vous avez reÃ§u et envoyez-la Ã  : support@n26.com.Assurez-vous que le message complet est entiÃ¨rement visible, en incluant le numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone de lâ€™expÃ©diteur et la date/lâ€™heure de lâ€™envoi.Si nous vous confirmons que le SMS reÃ§u constitue effectivement une tentative dâ€™hameÃ§onnage, bloquez le numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone.Supprimez le message de votre tÃ©lÃ©phone mobile.Appels tÃ©lÃ©phoniques suspectsSi vous recevez un appel suspect, quâ€™il provienne ou non de lâ€™un de nos numÃ©ros de tÃ©lÃ©phone, ne fournissez aucune donnÃ©e personnelle ou relative Ã  votre compte ou Ã  la carte associÃ©e. Dans certains cas, grÃ¢ce Ã  lâ€™usurpation du numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone, les escrocs sont capables de masquer le numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone de lâ€™expÃ©diteur, le faisant passer pour celui de la banque.Pour cette raison, si vous pensez avoir Ã©tÃ© victime dâ€™une escroquerie tÃ©lÃ©phonique ou avoir fourni vos donnÃ©es personnelles, veuillez contacter immÃ©diatement notre service client Ã  lâ€™adresse support@n26.com.Comment signaler un site internet frauduleuxIl peut arriver que vous tombiez sur un site internet se faisant passer pour N26 afin de promouvoir et de vendre des services frauduleux. Parfois, des sites prÃ©tendument affiliÃ©s Ã  N26 utilisent Ã©galement notre logo. Ils vous offriront peut-Ãªtre un crÃ©dit ou des offres promotionnelles limitÃ©es dans le temps. Il est important de bien noter que ce nâ€™est pas parce quâ€™un site contient Â« N26 Â» dans son adresse URL quâ€™il est forcÃ©ment lÃ©gitime.Si vous avez lâ€™impression dâ€™Ãªtre sur un site frauduleux, arrÃªtez votre activitÃ© sur le site et faites la chose suivante :VÃ©rifiez la barre dâ€™adresse et assurez-vous que lâ€™adresse URL est bien: https://app.n26.com/login. Si ce nâ€™est pas le cas, copiez lâ€™URL et signalez-le immÃ©diatement Ã : support@n26.com.

title: What if my balance is negative?
content: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships.Â Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited.Â In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

title: Round-Up Savings
content: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

title: How to download my personal data?
content: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. Weâ€™ve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and youâ€™re in complete control: go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. Â It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.Â As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.Â Â How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. Youâ€™ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure itâ€™s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

title: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
content: We offer repayment plans if you canâ€™t repay yourÂ overdraftÂ or loan withÂ N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.Please note we can't offer you a repayment plan if your account is already closed.Hereâ€™s how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how youâ€™re going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We donâ€™t accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. Itâ€™s then up to you to confirm it.By the way: your account will be closed if itâ€™s negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

title: Come chiudere il conto?
content: Hai deciso di chiudere il tuo conto N26? Continua a leggere questo articolo per scoprire come procedere.Â Se hai un conto premium, potrai scegliere se chiudere definitivamente il tuo conto o semplicemente cancellare la tua sottoscrizione (nuova tabella) e passare a N26 Standard.Ecco come fare per chiudere definitivamente il tuo conto:Se non hai un IBAN italianoSe hai un saldo positivo, trasferisci i fondi rimanenti su un altro conto prima di iniziare il processo di chiusura. Se hai un saldo negativo, per prima cosa dovrai trasferire (nuova tabella) il denaro mancante sul conto N26 in modo da portare il tuo saldo a 0.Clicca qui per avviare il processo elettronico di chiusura del conto (nuova tabella). Dovrai effettuare l'accesso alla tua app N26 per verificare la tua identitÃ , dopodichÃ© l'applicazione ti guiderÃ  attraverso il processo di chiusura del tuo conto.Distruggi la tua carta, per esempio tagliandola con delle forbici. Ãˆ necessario tagliare il chip e la banda magnetica, e poi smaltire i pezzi separatamente.Se hai un IBAN italianoNel caso in cui tu abbia un IBAN italiano o se non riesci a effettuare l'accesso al tuo conto, puoi inviarci unâ€™email allâ€™indirizzo support@n26.com (nuova tabella) dal tuo indirizzo email registrato, allegando questo modulo di cancellazione (nuova tabella) contenente le seguenti informazioni:una dichiarazione in cui richiedi la chiusura del tuo conto. Potrai indicare una data specifica o specificare che desideri che la chiusura avvenga "il piÃ¹ presto possibile";il tuo nome;il tuo IBAN N26;un altro IBAN all'interno dellâ€™area SEPA (Area unica di pagamenti in euro) per trasferire il tuo saldo residuo nel caso in cui sia positivo (sia che si tratti di denaro presente in uno spazio o sul tuo conto principale).

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. Itâ€™s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via aÂ push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of theÂ troubleshooting tipsÂ we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, youâ€™ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchantâ€™s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

title: Comment ouvrir un compte N26 ?
content:
Ouvrir un compte N26 est simple et ne prend que quelques minutes. Pour Ãªtre Ã©ligible Ã  un compte N26, vous devez :avoir au moins 18 ansÃªtre rÃ©sident permanent de l'un des pays oÃ¹ N26 est prÃ©sentavoir unÂ tÃ©lÃ©phone portable compatiblepossÃ©der unÂ document dâ€™identitÃ© acceptÃ© par nos servicesne pas avoir un compte N26parler l'une des langues parlÃ©es par notre Service Client : franÃ§ais, anglais, allemand, espagnol ou italien.Voici comment se dÃ©roule lâ€™ouverture dâ€™un compte N26 :Inscrivez-vous en renseignant les informations personnelles demandÃ©es et votre adresse email, puis choisissez un mot de passe. Ensuite, vous devrez choisir le compte que vous souhaitez ouvrir*.AprÃ¨s avoir validÃ© votre adresse email, vous pourrez procÃ©der Ã  laÂ vÃ©rification de votre identitÃ©Â directement depuis votre application N26 etÂ synchroniser votre smartphone.DÃ¨s que la vÃ©rification de votre identitÃ© est validÃ©e, vous pouvez alimenter votre compte N26 par virement SEPA, en utilisant CASH26 (si vous Ãªtes client en Allemagne, Autriche et en Italie) ou en demandant de l'argent Ã  un ami (par Moneybeam).
Si vous ouvrez un compte en France, votre premier virement pour alimenter votre compte doit Ãªtre effectuÃ© depuis un autre compte ouvert Ã  votre nom et domiciliÃ© dans la zone SEPA.AprÃ¨s quelques jours, selon le mode de livraison choisi, vous recevrez votre Mastercard N26Â par courrier. Si vous souhaitez obtenir plus de renseignements, contactez-nous. Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 07:00 Ã  23:00 h.*Uniquement si vous remplissez toutes lesÂ conditions d'Ã©ligibilitÃ© Ã  l'ouverture d'un compte (nouvel onglet). Si ce n'est pas le cas, nous ne pourrons pas vous offrir de compte pour le moment. La dÃ©cision est prise par un systÃ¨me automatique.

title: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
content:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.Iâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If youâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, youâ€™ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the â€˜Cardsâ€™ tab. You can mark the reason as â€œlostâ€ or â€œstolenâ€ based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, youâ€™ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).Â Â How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Hereâ€™s a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, youâ€™ll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods donâ€™t arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercardâ€™s chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery dateÂ 
In this scenario, Mastercardâ€™s chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place.Â You received a delivery, but it doesnâ€™t correspond with what you orderedÂ 
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didnâ€™t receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Hereâ€™s some guidance on what to say:Dear XX,Â I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction:Â Amount: â‚¬{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank.Â If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can helpâ€“â€“this is the fastest way to get your money back. Hereâ€™s a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them:Â Dear XX,Â I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below:Â Merchant name: {insert merchant name}Â Amount of original, authorized transaction: â‚¬{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: â‚¬{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward.Â The merchant told me that theyâ€™ve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still havenâ€™t received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction.Â How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. Thatâ€™s why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limitsâ€“â€“all right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a â€˜Discreet Mode (new tab)â€™ option to securely access your account in public.Â Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so youâ€™re always aware of whatâ€™s happening on your account. Plus, weâ€™re always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud.Â How does card fraud occur?Â A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM thatâ€™s been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if:Â You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchaseÂ Your online shopping account is hackedÂ Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud?Â Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banksÂ Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularlyÂ Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

title: Warum war eine Zahlung hÃ¶her als erwartet?
content: Ganz gleich, ob es sich um eine Kartenzahlung oder eine Lastschrift handelt â€“ wenn eine Zahlung hÃ¶her ausfÃ¤llt als ursprÃ¼nglich gedacht, kommt dir das erst einmal verdÃ¤chtig vor. Es gibt jedoch ein paar GrÃ¼nde, warum der tatsÃ¤chlich abgebuchte Betrag vom erwarteten Betrag abweichen kann:Â Â Es handelt sich um eine Transaktion inklusive einer KautionEs handelt sich um eine Transaktion in einer FremdwÃ¤hrungIn beiden FÃ¤llen kann es so aussehen, als sei eine Zahlung zu hoch. Sehen wir uns die beiden Szenarien genauer an:Â Du fÃ¤hrst in den Urlaub und mietest am Flughafen ein Auto. Du bezahlst die MietwagengebÃ¼hr mit deiner N26 Mastercard. Der abgebuchte Betrag fÃ¤llt jedoch hÃ¶her aus, weil die Autovermietung auch die Kaution fÃ¼r den Mietwagen autorisiert, also geblockt hat. Wenn du am Ende deines Urlaubs den Mietwagen unversehrt zurÃ¼ckbringst, erlischt die Autorisierung und der Betrag ist auf deinem Konto nach maximal 30 Tagen wieder voll verfÃ¼gbar. Mehr Ã¼ber den Unterschied zwischen Autorisierungen und tatsÃ¤chlichen Buchungen erfÃ¤hrst du hier.Du bestellst ein Produkt in einem Onlineshop und zahlst mit deiner Karte. Der Onlineshop sitzt auÃŸerhalb der Eurozone und bietet ausschlieÃŸlich Zahlungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen an, zum Beispiel Dollar oder Pfund. Je nach aktuellem Wechselkurs kann der gebuchte Betrag auf deinem Konto von der ursprÃ¼nglichen Summe abweichen. Dies lÃ¤sst sich aufgrund von Schwankungen auf dem Devisenmarkt nicht vermeiden. Mehr zu Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen erfÃ¤hrst du hier.In beiden FÃ¤llen berechnen wir keine Zinsen fÃ¼r die Differenz.Keines der beiden Szenarien trifft zu und du bist sicher, dass du zu viel bezahlt hast? Wenn die Transaktion sicher nicht von dir autorisiert wurde, kÃ¶nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zurÃ¼ckzubekommen.

title: Â¿DÃ³nde invierte N26 mi dinero?
content: Como regla general, nos esforzamos para que los depÃ³sitos de nuestros clientes sean otorgados en forma de prÃ©stamo a nuestros propios clientes (siempre y cuando dispongan de una solvencia apropiada). En cuanto a la liquidez que no se utiliza para los clientes, nuestra estrategia de inversiÃ³n es de bajo riesgo.Invertimos el dinero de nuestros clientes con el Deutsche Bundesbank (Banco Federal AlemÃ¡n) y otros bancos europeos dentro de la eurozona, Ãºnicamente con un buen tipo de riesgo y a corto plazo. AdemÃ¡s, refinanciamos colectivos de derecho pÃºblico principalmente en Alemania (ciudades y municipios) e invertimos en bonos de estado en euros.No somos una instituciÃ³n de trading y por lo tanto no comerciamos para obtener beneficios a corto plazo.No nos involucramos en la especulaciÃ³n; ni con comida, divisas extranjeras, bitcoins u otras clases de activos.

title: What's a p-account?
content: A p-account is a legal protection against garnishments which can be applied to any account type that we offer. If you have a German IBAN you are generally entitled to convert your N26 account to a p-account. This means that in case you have an active garnishment, you'll have a monthly allowance of normally â‚¬1.340 which remains accessible to you and inaccessible to the creditor on a per month basis. An active alimony garnishment can decrease that amount. Please note, however, that we need to report the conversion of your account into p-account to SCHUFA AG.You may decide to convert your N26 account to a p-account in case your N26 account has been garnished. Please note that in this case we are obligated by law to seize your account. You will simultaneously receive a detailed in-app message from us to your Messages with N26 with all information regarding your garnishment and the options available to you. We encourage you to read it carefully so you are also informed about your other options, before making a decision.Find out more about how to get a p-account.

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making aÂ temporary limitationÂ to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet ourÂ requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

title: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
content:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select â€˜Forgot Passwordâ€™ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

title: Ablaufen und Ersatz von Karten: HÃ¤ufig gestellte Fragen
content: Wenn deine N26 Mastercard abgelaufen ist oder bald ablaufen wird, erhÃ¤ltst du in diesem Artikel alle Informationen, wie du eine neue bestellst, sowie die damit verbundenen Kosten und die Versandzeiten.Â Bevor du mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte fortfahren mÃ¶chtest, empfehlen wir dir, dass deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten korrekt und auf dem neuesten Stand sind.Meine Karte lÃ¤uft bald ab. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestÃ¤tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Wir senden sie dir dann zu.Â Wenn diese Nachricht nicht erscheint, mach dir keine Sorgen. Auf diese Weise kannst du verhindern, dass deine zukÃ¼nftigen Zahlungen abgelehnt werden.Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Nein, das Ablaufdatum auf deiner Karte hat eine wichtige Funktion. Du kannst deine Karte nach Ablauf des letzten GÃ¼ltigkeitsmonats nicht weiter verwenden. Der Versand auÃŸerhalb dieser LÃ¤nder (neuen Tab) kann mit zusÃ¤tzlichen Kosten verbunden sein.Â Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten fÃ¼r ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In lÃ¤ndlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch lÃ¤nger dauern. Um Ã¼ber den aktuellen Lieferstatus auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe einfach auf den Home Bildschirm deiner mobilen App von N26.Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.Kein Problem, wir helfen wir gerne weiter!Â Wenn du deine Adresse bereits bestÃ¤tigt hast und seither mehr als 20 Tage vergangen sind, wende dich bitte an den Kundenservice. Dies kannst du im Support-Bereich der App erledigen.Â Wenn du deine Adresse noch nicht bestÃ¤tigt hast, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und suche nach einem Banner unter deiner abgelaufenen Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestÃ¤tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen.Â
