title: Why canâ€™t I get a loan?
content: Applies to Germany and FranceWhen applying for N26 Credit, we ask about your personal and financial situation during our assessment. If N26 isnâ€™t your main account, youâ€™ll need to securely log into your online bank account at another bank to continue with the application.For second bank accounts, we only accept banks from the country where youâ€™re applying from (for example, French customers can only add a French bank account and German customers can only add a German bank account).Weâ€™ll also look at your current SCHUFA credit score. This search will appear on your SCHUFA report but is only visible to you and won't negatively impact your score. However, your score isnâ€™t the only factor: we also require information about your monthly income, excluding any payments from public authorities (such as unemployment or child benefits).Once youâ€™ve sent an application to us, youâ€™re unable to change your answers for 90 days (even if your creditworthiness improves). Youâ€™ll have to wait until then to apply for another loan.The decision is then calculated through an automated process. We cannot perform manual checks.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

title: Combien de temps met un virement bancaire ?
content: Les virements SEPA instantanÃ©s entrants vers des comptes N26 sont instantanÃ©s, Ã  condition quâ€™ils soient envoyÃ©s par une banque qui prenne en charge les virements instantanÃ©s. Cependant, les virements peuvent parfois Ãªtre retardÃ©s sâ€™ils doivent Ãªtre vÃ©rifiÃ©s en raison des rÃ©glementations bancaires SEPA.Les virements SEPA ordinaires entrants sont effectuÃ©s sous 2 jours ouvrÃ©s maximum. Si un virement est effectuÃ© juste avant un weekend ou jour fÃ©riÃ©, le dÃ©lai de traitement sera prolongÃ© de 3Â jours ouvrÃ©s maximum.Les virements SWIFT entrants prennent jusquâ€™Ã  4 jours ouvrÃ©s pour arriver.Â Les virements instantanÃ©s SEPA sortants sont envoyÃ©s de maniÃ¨re instantanÃ©e. Les virements SEPA sortants ordinaires prennent jusquâ€™Ã  2 jours ouvrÃ©s. Les virements en devises Ã©trangÃ¨res sortants avec notre partenaire Wise peuvent prendre jusquâ€™Ã  4 jours ouvrÃ©s. Les virements SWIFT sortants ne sont pas pris en charge.Quâ€™est-ce quâ€™un Â«Â jour ouvrableÂ Â»Â ?Un jour ouvrable correspond Ã  deux jours ouvrÃ©s en raison des heures dâ€™ouverture des banques impliquÃ©es. Nâ€™importe quel jour de la semaine qui nâ€™est pas un jour fÃ©riÃ© est considÃ©rÃ© comme un jour ouvrable.Mon virement nâ€™est pas arrivÃ© â€“ oÃ¹ est-ilÂ ?Si vous avez pris en compte les informations prÃ©cÃ©dentes et le virement nâ€™a toujours pas Ã©tÃ© effectuÃ©Â ? Dans ce cas, seule la banque Ã©mettrice peut lancer une investigation interne.Malheureusement, chez N26, nous ne pouvons pas enquÃªter sur les virements entrants, uniquement sur les virements sortants. Mais vous pouvez toujours consulter cette liste de raisons potentielles pour lesquelles un virement pourrait Ã©chouer.Informations complÃ©mentairesLe systÃ¨me avec lequel nous envoyons tous nos virements SEPA sâ€™appelle TARGET2 (nouvel onglet), il traite les paiements tous les jours ouvrÃ©s de 07:00 Ã  18:00 GMT et est fermÃ© les jours suivants: 1er janvier (Jour de lâ€™an), Vendredi saint, lundi de PÃ¢ques, 1er mai, 25 dÃ©cembre (NoÃ«l) et 26 dÃ©cembre.

title: What to do if my card is lost or itâ€™s been compromised?
content: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.Â Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).Â You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

title: Â¿CuÃ¡ndo llega mi tarjeta?
content: Dependiendo del destino,Â el envÃ­o puede tardar hasta 15 dÃ­as laborables. El perÃ­odo de entrega varÃ­a en las islas de EspaÃ±a, Francia e Italia. Si el envÃ­o falla y nos devuelven la tarjeta, te lo comunicaremos por email.Tu primera tarjeta es gratuita con N26 Smart, You y Metal. Con N26 EstÃ¡ndar tendrÃ¡s una tarjeta virtual gratuita (a no ser que decidas pedir una fÃ­sica por 10 â‚¬). Tu tarjeta se fabricarÃ¡ y enviarÃ¡ si el saldo de tu cuenta es de 0 â‚¬ o mÃ¡s despuÃ©s de cobrarte la primera comisiÃ³n mensual. Cuando te pasas a un contrato premium, la primera comisiÃ³n se cobra de inmediato. Si te has suscrito a un contrato premium directamente, la primera comisiÃ³n se cobrarÃ¡ en cuanto recargues tu cuenta para cubrir la comisiÃ³n, a mÃ¡s tardar, 15 dÃ­as despuÃ©s de verificar tu identidad. Si se ha cobrado la primera comisiÃ³n y tienes un saldo negativo, tendrÃ¡s que recargar tu cuenta para activar la fabricaciÃ³n y el envÃ­o de tu tarjeta.Se te notificarÃ¡ en los Mensajes de la app y a travÃ©s de un banner en la pantalla de inicio, que te mostrarÃ¡ el estado de la entrega. Nota:El saldo mÃ­nimo extraordinario no es una comisiÃ³n, sino un requisito necesario para activar la producciÃ³n y el envÃ­o de tu tarjeta.Puede solicitar su tarjeta con envÃ­o exprÃ©s.Mi direcciÃ³n no es correcta. ParaÂ cambiar la direcciÃ³n de envÃ­o (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â entra en elÂ ğŸ‘¤ Mi Cuenta > InformaciÃ³n personal > DirecciÃ³n > DirecciÃ³n de envio. Actualiza tu informaciÃ³n y pide una tarjeta nueva, en caso de que ya hayas tenido una tarjeta activa anteriormente. Si esta es tu primera tarjeta, entonces contacta con nosotros por chat y te pediremos una nueva.Han pasado mÃ¡s de 10 dÃ­as desde que verifiquÃ© mi identidad. Verifica la direcciÃ³n de envÃ­o. Si es correcta, por favor contÃ¡ctanos vÃ­a chat para que podamos pedirte una nueva tarjeta.Necesito mi tarjeta de inmediato. Si el envÃ­o de tu tarjeta falla por segunda vez, o bien si necesitas utilizarla con urgencia, quizÃ¡ quieras plantearte pedir elÂ envÃ­o express.Consejos para un envÃ­o con Ã©xito:Si tu direcciÃ³n contiene caracteres especiales, contÃ¡ctanos mediante el chat de la app.Solo enviamos las tarjetas a direcciones residenciales (no se admiten direcciones comerciales).En la direcciÃ³n de entrega, no utilices espacios cuando escribas el cÃ³digo postal.AsegÃºrate de que no falta informaciÃ³n esencial (por ejemplo, el nombre en tu buzÃ³n si vives en Alemania o el nÃºmero de edificio, nÃºmero de escalera y cÃ³digo de la puerta, si corresponde). Si te vas a quedar temporalmente en algÃºn lugar (con un amigo o en un Airbnb), asegÃºrate de incluir el nombre en el buzÃ³n que pertenece al inquilino principal del departamento.Si te vas a mudar a algÃºn lugar y esta es tu primera tarjeta, asegÃºrate de seleccionar el paÃ­s y la direcciÃ³n a donde te mudarÃ¡s y deseas recibir tu tarjeta N26.

title: Cos'Ã¨ il modulo online N26 per le richieste GDPR?
content:
Tenere al sicuro i dati personali e finanziari dei nostri clienti Ã¨ una delle nostre prioritÃ , motivo per il quale ti mettiamo a disposizione uno strumento sicuro per processare le richieste correlate ai dati personali. Il nostro modulo online N26 per le richieste GDPR permette ai clienti ed ex clienti N26 (i quali conti sono attualmente chiusi) e ai loro rappresentanti autorizzati con richieste relative ai dati personali, di contattare N26 in maniera sicura.Come funziona?Il modulo online (nuova tabella) viene utilizzato quando un cliente N26 o un ex cliente N26 vuole esercitare, in prima persona o attraverso un rappresentante autorizzato, dei diritti previsti dal Regolamento generale sulla protezione dei dati (GDPR).In particolare, potrai esercitare i seguenti diritti:Â Diritto di accesso dell'interessato ai sensi dell'art. 15 GDPR (nuova tabella)Â Diritto alla cancellazione ("diritto all'oblio"), ai sensi dell'art. 17 GDPR (nuova tabella)Â Diritto di opposizione ai sensi dell'art. 21 GDPR (nuova tabella)Puoi aspettarti di ricevere una risposta dal Team di N26 entro 30 giorni lavorativi.Quando compili il modulo, ti verrÃ  chiesto di indicare:Nome, cognome e indirizzo emailIl tuo paese di residenzaIl tuo status attuale (cliente, ex cliente, rappresentante autorizzato di un cliente/ex cliente)Il tipo di richiestaDevo fornire altri documenti se sono un ex cliente N26 o un rappresentante autorizzato?Agli ex clienti e ai loro rappresentanti autorizzati viene richiesto di caricare ulteriori documenti per legittimare la loro identitÃ  e assicurare che il destinatario dei dati abbia il diritto di riceverli.Ecco quali sono i documenti necessari:Ex clienti: copia del documento dâ€™identitÃ  o passaportoRappresentanti autorizzati: copia del documento dâ€™identitÃ  o passaporto e una procura (generale) firmataÂ Una volta compilati tutti i campi del modulo, clicca su Invia per farci pervenire la tua richiesta.PerchÃ© Ã¨ necessario il controllo della carta di identitÃ  o del passaporto degli ex clienti di N26 o dei rappresentanti autorizzati?Richiediamo una copia della carta di identitÃ  o del passaporto per verificare lâ€™identitÃ  e garantire che le informazioni personali, comprese quelle finanziarie, non finiscano nelle mani sbagliate.
Il controllo manuale dei documenti viene eseguito quando Ã¨ necessario verificare lâ€™identitÃ  di una persona e non siamo in grado di farlo con il nostro sistema di verifica standard tramite lâ€™app N26. Questa verifica Ã¨ necessaria al fine di identificare gli ex clienti e gli eventuali loro rappresentanti autorizzati che non hanno piÃ¹ accesso allâ€™app N26.Domande o dubbi su questo argomento?Puoi contattare il nostro servizio clienti tramite support@n26.com (nuova tabella).

title: Devo pagare le tasse negli Stati Uniti?
content: In quanto banca autorizzata, siamo obbligati a riportare allâ€™IRS informazioni sui conti tenuti dai contribuenti statunitensi secondo le disposizioni FATCA, una legislazione delineata dal US Department of Treasury e dal US Internal Revenue Service con lo scopo di incoraggiare lâ€™adempimento fiscale ed di impedire che i soggetti statunitensi si rivolgano a banche estere o altri enti creditizi per evitare la tassazione statunitense sulle loro entrate e sul loro patrimonio.Troverai maggiori informazioni sulla normativa FATCA (nuova tabella)qui (nuova tabella).Nellâ€™ambito FATCA, vengono definiti soggetti statunitensi, ad esempio:i cittadini degli Stati Uniti (inclusi i possessori di doppia cittadinanza)i residenti negli Stati Uniti (ad es. i possessori di un valido permesso di soggiorno per gli USA oppure le persone che superano il â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ - maggiori informazioni qui di seguito)Se non sai se sei un soggetto statunitense, ti suggeriamo di rivolgerti ad un consulente fiscale.Il â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ prevede che:tu sia stato fisicamente presente negli USA per almeno 183 giorni nellâ€™anno solare in corsoOPPUREtu sia stato fisicamente presente negli USA per almeno 183 giorni negli ultimi 3 anni solari, da calcolare nel seguente modo:(almeno 31 giorni nellâ€™anno solare in corso) + (il numero di giorni di presenza fisica negli USA lâ€™anno scorso) diviso per 3 + (il numero di giorni di presenza fisica negli USA lâ€™anno precedente) diviso per 6.Inoltre, se il tuo conto presenta almeno uno dei seguenti dati:cittadinanza statunitense o residenza statunitenseluogo di nascita statunitenseindirizzo postale o indirizzo di residenza statunitense, incluse le caselle postalinumero di telefono statunitensebonifici ricorrenti verso un indirizzo o un conto statunitensesaremo obbligati a considerarti un soggetto statunitense a meno che non tu fornisca i seguenti documenti:un moduloÂ  W-8BEN o un'autocertificazione di simile valore eun passaporto non statunitense o un altro documento identificativo emesso da un altro governo, che riporti il possesso di una cittadinanza o nazionalitÃ  diversa da quella statunitensenel caso fossi nato negli USA, una copia del tuo Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ to your account. If you didnâ€™t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons youâ€™ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, itâ€™s likely that youâ€™ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: How to activate my card?
content: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! Youâ€™ll have to activate your card whether itâ€™s your first N26 card, a replacement card, or youâ€™ve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card youâ€™re activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction â€” in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail â€” for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card â€” you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then youâ€™ll still be able to activate that new card.

title: How to file a complaint?
content: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWeâ€™re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and will thoroughly investigate it. We'll provide our findings and final response via email.Â Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via live chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:German beschwerden@n26.com (new tab)English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Please note: These inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our customer support team (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve your issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.Â If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.Â If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWeâ€™ll contact you via email to confirm that weâ€™ve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different time frames apply based on the country of your account Terms & Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business DaysÂ Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar DaysÂ United Kingdom - 56 Calendar DaysÂ Spain - 60 Calendar DaysÂ Italy - 60 Calendar DaysÂ We may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties, such as:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht â€“ BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab) page.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content: If your balance canâ€™t cover a direct debit* when itâ€™s due, itâ€™ll bounce and youâ€™ll be charged aÂ â‚¬3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. Itâ€™s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether youâ€™re eligible for anÂ OverdraftÂ directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9.

title: Was ist CASH26?
content: FÃ¼r Konten verfÃ¼gbar, die in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland erÃ¶ffnet wurden.CASH26 ist ein integriertes Feature in deiner N26 App, mit dem du Ã¼ber dein Smartphone Geld von deinem N26 Konto abheben und einzahlen kannst â€“ komplett ohne Karte und Geldautomat.Geh einfach in eines unserer Ã¼ber 12.100 PartnergeschÃ¤fte in Deutschland (inkl. REWE, Penny und dm) und 2.600 PartnergeschÃ¤fte in Ã–sterreich (inkl. dm, Billa, Billa Plus, und PENNY), erstelle einen CASH26 Strichcode auf deinem verknÃ¼pften Smartphone und zeige ihn an der Kasse vor.Wie du Geld mit CASH26 einzahlen bzw. Ã¼ber CASH26 Geld abheben kannst, erfÃ¤hrst du in diesem Artikel.Wie funktioniert CASH26?CASH26 EinzahlungDer Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang gÃ¼ltig. Falls du ihn nicht innerhalb dieser Zeit nutzt, verfÃ¤llt er und du musst einen neuen erstellen.Â Wenn du Geld Ã¼ber CASH26 einzahlst, kannst du sofort darauf zugreifen. Es kann jedoch sein, dass der Betrag erst bis zu 10 Minuten spÃ¤ter in deinem Kontostand erscheint.Wie viel Geld kann ich einzahlen?Der Mindestbetrag fÃ¼r eine CASH26 Einzahlung ist 50 â‚¬. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden kannst du bis zu 999 â‚¬ einzahlen.Es fÃ¤llt eine TransaktionsgebÃ¼hr von 1,5 % des Einzahlbetrags an â€“ ganz gleich, wie viel oder wenig Geld du einzahlst.ZusÃ¤tzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit fÃ¼r Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in HÃ¶he von 999â‚¬ pro 24 Stunden.Mit CASH26 Geld abhebenSobald du den CASH26 Strichcode erstellst hast, wird der Betrag, den du abheben willst, von deinem Kontostand abgezogen.Falls du dich umentscheidest und den Code vor der Nutzung lÃ¶schst oder ihn nach 10 Minuten verfallen lÃ¤sst, wird der Betrag deinem Kontostand sofort wieder gutgeschrieben.Wie viel Geld kann man abheben?Das Abhebelimit betrÃ¤gt 200 â‚¬ pro Transaktion sowie 900 â‚¬ innerhalb von 24 Stunden. Es gibt jedoch keinen Mindestbetrag â€“ du kannst auch nur einen Cent mit CASH26 abheben, wenn du magst.Abhebungen mit CASH26 sind fÃ¼r alle unsere Konten kostenlos, auÃŸer fÃ¼r das N26 Flex Konto. Bei diesem entfÃ¤llt auf jede Abhebung eine GebÃ¼hr von 2â‚¬. ZusÃ¤tzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit fÃ¼r Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in HÃ¶he von 999â‚¬ pro 24 Stunden.

title: 2 Months N26 Smart Free Trial
content:
Eligibility: All EU marketsEver wanted to try out our N26 Smart account, but not sure if itâ€™s for you? Well now you can enjoy 2 whole months for free - And â€˜try before you buyâ€™ - to see if our Smart account works for you, with no commitment!If you want to take part in our N26 Smart free trial, you will have access to our premium banking features included with our Smart account. And see the value by getting more out of your everyday banking.What is included in our Smart free trial?60 day free trial: Eligible N26 customers can take advantage of our 60 day Smart free trial.Cancel at any point: At any point during your free trial, youâ€™ll be able to cancel and still enjoy the benefits for the full 60 days (you will be automatically downgraded back to Standard after 60 days)Continue with Smart: If you decide our N26 Smart account is for you, then you can take no action to continue with our Smart account and pay the monthly fee of 4,90â‚¬. If you change your mind after the free trial is over, you can always downgrade back to Standard.Enjoy the benefits of our Smart account: You can use the following benefits during your 60 day Smart free trial:Spaces (up to 10)Up to 10 Shared SpacesIBAN for Spaces (DE customers only) Up to 5 free ATM withdrawals/ monthRound-ups SavingsEnjoy partner offers and discountsPhone supportHow to access the Smart free trial?If you have been invited to a Free Trial of our Smart membership, you will be able to access it by following the instructions below. From the push notification: Tap on the push notificationWhen the N26 app opens, your invitation explaining the free trial offer will open automatically. Click on â€œcontinueâ€ to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, please read and accept the Terms and Conditions, thenClick â€œConfirm Purchaseâ€ : you are officially part of the trial now, and will see a success message! From the N26 app: Open the N26 appYou will see the Smart Free Trial offer entrypoint at the top of your home screen. Tap on â€œLearn Moreâ€ This will open the invitation screen explaining the free trial offer in detail. Click on â€œcontinueâ€ to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, read and accept the Terms and Conditions, then
Click â€œConfirm Purchaseâ€ : you are officially part of the trial now! Note: If you received an email inviting you to start the trial, we recommend opening it from your phone and clicking the â€œStart free trialâ€ button. This will automatically open the N26 app and load the invitation page. Otherwise, login to your N26 mobile app and follow the app flow above.

title: Come passare a N26 Smart?
content: Valido per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Lettonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Polonia, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia.Puoi scegliere N26 Smart quando effettui la registrazione iniziale, oppure, se hai giÃ  un conto corrente N26 standard, puoi effettuare il passaggio tramite lâ€™app mobile.Per passare a N26 Smart direttamente dallâ€™app mobile, entra nella sezione Esplora e seleziona Ottieni N26 Smart. Ordinando una nuova carta, potrai scegliere uno tra i nostri cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.DopodichÃ©, scegli il metodo di consegna (nuova tabella) che preferisci e accetta i Termini e Condizioni di N26 Smart. Fatto: la tua carta Ã¨ giÃ  in arrivo!La consegna standard richiede fino a 10 giorni lavorativi mentre con la consegna express (nuova tabella) bastano solo 3 giorni lavorativi.Il canone di 4,90â‚¬ verrÃ  detratto direttamente dal tuo conto ogni mese nello stesso giorno in cui hai effettuato il passaggio.Puoi ordinare una carta N26 Smart aggiuntiva direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10â‚¬.

title: Wie kann ich mich ausweisen?
content: Als Bank mÃ¼ssen wir wissen, wer du bist. Deshalb musst du uns ein zulÃ¤ssiges Ausweisdokument vorzeigen, wenn du ein Konto erÃ¶ffnen oder bestimmte Produkte nutzen mÃ¶chtest.Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine IdentitÃ¤t Ã¼ber andere Personen oder Unternehmen nachzuweisen. Wir haben einige Tipps gesammelt, um deine IdentitÃ¤t zu schÃ¼tzen.Du kannst uns deinen Ausweis mit zwei verschiedenen Methoden zeigen: Foto oder Video. Welches der beiden Verfahren gewÃ¤hlt wird, hÃ¤ngt von deiner NationalitÃ¤t, deinem Ausweisdokument und dem Land deines Wohnsitzes ab:Ich lebe in Deutschland (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Spanien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Italien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in einem anderen Land (neuen Tab)Als voll lizenzierte und regulierte Bank muss sich N26 bei der Verifizierung der IdentitÃ¤t aller potenziellen Kunden an strenge Branchenstandards und Richtlinien halten. Da diese je nach NationalitÃ¤t variieren, kÃ¶nnen wir den wichtigen Schritt der IdentitÃ¤tsprÃ¼fung nur mit bestimmten Arten von Ausweisdokumenten fÃ¼r bestimmte NationalitÃ¤ten durchfÃ¼hren.Wenn deine Ausweisdokumente derzeit nicht von uns akzeptiert werden, heiÃŸt das, dass wir dir aktuell kein Konto bei uns anbieten kÃ¶nnen. Wir fÃ¼gen jedoch laufend neue Ausweisdokumente zu dieser Liste hinzu. Es lohnt sich also, regelmÃ¤ÃŸig einen Blick darauf zu werfen, ob dein Ausweisdokument bereits hinzugefÃ¼gt wurde.Falls dein Wohnsitz in Deutschland liegt und du die Foto- oder Videoverifizierung aufgrund einer Behinderung nicht abschlieÃŸen kannst, beginne bitte mit der Registrierung deiner Daten und kontaktiere dann unseren Kundensupport. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: How to invite friends to join N26?
content: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Amber, Black and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. title: PerchÃ© c'Ã¨ una lista d'attesa per aprire un conto?
content: Per solidificare ancora di piÃ¹ le fondamenta della nostra attivitÃ  in futuro, ci stiamo concentrando su come migliorare ancora di piÃ¹ l'esperienza di servizio con noi, le offerte e i processi, per continuare ad essere la tua prima scelta negli anni a venire.Â A causa della richiesta esponenziale di prodotti bancari digitali N26, dovremo mettere dei limiti temporanei al numero di nuovi conti bancari che possiamo offrire ogni mese.Â Â Per questo motivo abbiamo dovuto temporaneamente mettere in pausa la possibilitÃ  di aprire un conto per i nuovi clienti in alcuni mercati. Ti invitiamo ad iscriverti alla nostra lista d'attesa e ti ricontatteremo non appena potremo offrirti il conto che desideri.Questa pausa avrÃ  un impatto sui clienti esistenti?Questa pausa temporanea per l'apertura di nuovi conti non inciderÃ  in alcun modo sui clienti N26 esistenti e puoi aspettarti la stessa esperienza di banking digitale fluida, protetta e sicura sullo smartphone che conosci e ami di sempre.Stiamo lavorando sodo per rendere la procedura quanto piÃ¹ semplice possibile per chi cerca di aprire un conto e speriamo di poter dare la possibilitÃ  d'iscriversi a tutti i clienti interessati molto presto.Come saprÃ² quando avrÃ² di nuovo la possibilitÃ  di aprire un conto?Se hai provato ad aprire un conto ma non sei riuscito a farlo, il miglior modo per rimanere aggiornato Ã¨ iscriversi alla nostra lista dâ€™attesa. Ti ricontatteremo non appena potremo metterti disposizione il conto che desideri.Continuiamo a vedere una domanda enorme per il nostro prodotto e vogliamo assicurarci di poter offrire a tutti i clienti sulla nostra lista d'attesa un accesso equo all'esperienza bancaria N26 contattandoli in base al principio "primo arrivato, primo servito" non appena possiamo offrire di nuovo un conto.Â Posso aprire un conto N26 nel mio paese?

title: How to block my N26 card?
content: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go toÂ the Cards tabÂ and selectÂ Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself againstÂ unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: How long does a bank transfer take?
content: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.Â Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. Whatâ€™s a â€œbanking dayâ€?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasnâ€™t arrived â€” where is it?So what if youâ€™ve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasnâ€™t come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we canâ€™t investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

content:

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content: If your balance canâ€™t cover a direct debit* when itâ€™s due, itâ€™ll bounce and youâ€™ll be charged aÂ â‚¬3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. Itâ€™s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether youâ€™re eligible for anÂ OverdraftÂ directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9.

title: What to do if my account may be compromised?
content:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).Â If youâ€™d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. Weâ€™ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that weâ€™ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if Iâ€™ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.Â What if Iâ€™ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.Â Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: How does N26 Business Metal work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs â‚¬16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate.Â Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Â Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Comment crÃ©er et modifier un virement permanent ?
content: Lorsque vous effectuez un virement sortant depuis l'application mobile N26 ou depuis votre espace client en ligne, vous avez la possibilitÃ© d'en faire un virement permanent.AprÃ¨s avoir entrÃ© les informations nÃ©cessaires pour effectuer votre virement et avant de le valider, vous avez la possibilitÃ© de cocher la case "Virement permanent ?".Vous pourrez alors choisir la frÃ©quence ainsi que lâ€™intervalle de temps pendant lequel vous souhaitez effectuer votre virement permanent.Pour visualiser vos virements dÃ©jÃ  planifiÃ©s dans l'application mobile N26 :AccÃ©dez Ã  votre liste de transactions sur l'Ã©cran principal.Cliquez sur les trois traits en haut Ã  droite de votre Ã©cran et sÃ©lectionnez Virements Permanents.Vous aurez alors accÃ¨s Ã  tous les dÃ©tails de vos virements permanents.Vous pouvez Ã©galement annuler et/ou modifier les dÃ©tails de vos virements permanents. Pour annuler un virement permanent, il vous suffit de cliquer sur le virement concernÃ© puis sur lâ€™icÃ´ne â€˜corbeilleâ€™ en haut Ã  droite de votre Ã©cran.â„¹ï¸ Veuillez noter qu'en cas d'Ã©chec d'un virement permanent en raison de fonds insuffisants, nous ne tenterons pas dâ€™effectuer Ã  nouveau le virement - vous devrez le faire manuellement.
