title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (â€œPSD2â€) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, youâ€™ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.Â *applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: Warum wurde mir etwas doppelt berechnet?
content: Wir bieten dir Banking in Echtzeit. Das bedeutet, dass du immer siehst, was in deinem Konto passiert. Es gibt zwei Transaktionsarten, die bei einem Kauf in einem GeschÃ¤ft oder im Internet stattfinden:Autorisierungen: Ein Betrag, der von einem EinzelhÃ¤ndler oder VerkÃ¤ufer blockiert oder reserviert wird. Das kann alles MÃ¶gliche sein â€“ von der morgendlichen Tasse Kaffee bis hin zu Hotel- oder Mietwagenbuchungen (einschlieÃŸlich Kautionen).Buchungen: Der tatsÃ¤chliche Betrag, der von deinem Konto abgeht. Die Tasse Kaffee wurde endgÃ¼ltig von deinem Konto abgebucht, du hast deine Kaution nach dem Auschecken im Hotel zurÃ¼ckerhalten oder das Auto unversehrt zurÃ¼ckgegeben.Sobald eine Autorisierung bestÃ¤tigt wird, kÃ¶nnen wir sie nicht mehr stornieren oder rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen. Danach passiert eins dieser drei Dinge: Die Autorisierung wird zu einer Buchung, sie wird abgelehnt oder sie verfÃ¤llt (und kehrt nach spÃ¤testens 12 Tagen automatisch auf dein Konto zurÃ¼ck. Bei Kautionen fÃ¼r Autovermietungen kann es bis zu 30 Werktage dauern.)Â Bitte beachte:Manchmal siehst du sowohl die Autorisierung als auch die endgÃ¼ltige Buchung, wenn es am Zahlungsterminal technische Probleme gibt oder die Verbindung wÃ¤hrend des Vorgangs unterbrochen wurde. Aber keine Sorge â€“ am Ende erlischt die Autorisierung. Wenn das nach 12 Tagen noch nicht passiert ist, helfen wir dir dabei, dein Geld zurÃ¼ckzubekommen (neuen Tab).Autorisierungen fÃ¼r Verifizierungen sind in der Regel sehr kleine BetrÃ¤ge, mit denen geprÃ¼ft wird, ob deine Karte aktiv ist (z.B. im Google Play Store). Dieses Geld wird auf dein Konto zurÃ¼ckÃ¼berwiesen.Die HÃ¶he einer Autorisierung kann aus verschiedenen GrÃ¼nden (neuen Tab) von der endgÃ¼ltigen Buchung abweichen.

title: Why do I need to send additional documents?
content: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS â†’ Certificates â†’ "Request for yourself" â†’ flag "of Residence" â†’ "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" â†’ and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description.Â Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

title: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
content: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around â‚¬2. For the time being, weâ€™re unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, hereâ€™s a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:Â AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you couldâ€™ve been charged an ATM fee.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasnâ€™t been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you donâ€™t have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000â‚¬,Â and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500â‚¬. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you canâ€™t withdraw your daily limit at once.

title: Todesfall & Verlassenschaft
content:
Wie wird N26 Ã¼ber einen Todesfall informiert?Â Im Trauerfall mÃ¼ssen sich die Nachkommen mit vielen bÃ¼rokratischen Aufgaben auseinandersetzen. Eine davon ist die Abwicklung der Bankkonten des oder der Verstorbenen.In Ã–sterreich wird in der Regel ein Notar als GerichtskommissÃ¤r bestellt.Â Der KommissÃ¤r oder die KommissÃ¤rin erreicht uns postalisch, per Fax oder per E-Mail. (Bitte mit Scan oder PDF eines entsprechenden Anschreibens im Anhang):E-Mail: verlassenschaft@n26.comÂ Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbHÂ - NachlassbearbeitungÂ 
RungestraÃŸe 22Â 
10179 Berlin, GERMANYWenn mÃ¶glich, bitten wir um eine Sterbeurkunde oder ein vergleichbares Dokument, da wir nur so ein zugehÃ¶riges Bankkonto sicher identifizieren kÃ¶nnen.Â Was passiert mit einem N26-Konto, wenn der Kontoinhaber stirbt?Â Â Aufgrund regionaler Unterschiede kann die Vorgehensweise je nach Land variieren.Sobald wir vom Tod eines Kunden erfahren, werden die zugehÃ¶rigen Karten und das Online-Banking sowie jeglicher Zugang zur App gesperrt.Bitte beachte, dass DauerauftrÃ¤ge oder SEPA-Lastschriftmandate auf dem Konto in der Regel auch nach dem Tod des Kontoinhabers weiter bestehen. Erben oder Berechtigte mÃ¼ssen diese widerrufen oder lÃ¶schen lassen.DarÃ¼ber hinaus sind alle deutschen Banken grundsÃ¤tzlich gesetzlich verpflichtet, das in Deutschland fÃ¼r die Erbschaftsteuer zustÃ¤ndige Finanzamt Ã¼ber das zum Nachlass gehÃ¶rende VermÃ¶gen zu informieren.Wir teilen den BegÃ¼nstigten in jedem Fall mit, welche Unterlagen sie vorlegen mÃ¼ssen, um das Konto des Verstorbenen bei N26 schlieÃŸen und Guthaben Ã¼berweisen zu kÃ¶nnen.Â Ich bin Kunde, kann ich fÃ¼r den Fall meines Todes vorsorgen?Â 
Es gibt verschiedene MÃ¶glichkeiten, wie du sicherstellen kannst, dass dein VermÃ¶gen im Todesfall nach deinen WÃ¼nschen verteilt wird. Das Testament ist eine der gÃ¤ngigsten MÃ¶glichkeiten.Es ist jedem, der sich intensiver mit der Erstellung eines Testaments beschÃ¤ftigt, dringend anzuraten, sich von einem Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater beraten zu lassen. Dies gilt insbesondere, wenn grÃ¶ÃŸere VermÃ¶genswerte vererbt werden sollen.Â Unser Kundenservice oder die Experten unserer Nachlass- und Rechtsabteilung kÃ¶nnen dir hierzu jedoch keine Beratung anbieten.Â FÃ¼r nÃ¤here Informationen zu deiner konkreten Situation wende dich bitte an einen Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater oder an eine andere geeignete Beratungsstelle.Â

title: Comment fonctionnent les paiements sans contact ?
content: Les paiements sans contact de votre carte fonctionnent via une antenne NFC (communication en champ proche). Si vous rencontrez des problÃ¨mes avec vos paiements sans contact, voici quelques solutions :VÃ©rifiez si les paiements sans contact sont autorisÃ©s dans les paramÃ¨tres de votre carte.Si votre carte est nouvelle, veuillez retirer de lâ€™argent au distributeur automatique de billets ou effectuer un paiement en tapant votre code PIN. Ensuite, vous pourrez effectuer des paiements sans contact.Les paiements sans contact de votre carte (NFC) de moins de 50 â‚¬ peuvent Ãªtre effectuÃ©s sans code PIN. Pour les paiements de plus de 50 â‚¬ ou des transactions cumulÃ©es supÃ©rieures Ã  150 â‚¬ vous devez saisir le code PIN de votre carte.Demandez au commerÃ§ant si le terminal est compatible avec les paiements sans contact.Les cartes N26 Metal ont leur antenne NFC au verso de la carte. Veuillez vous assurer de prÃ©senter le verso de la carte devant le terminal pour utiliser lâ€™antenne NFC (en utilisant le recto, cela ne fonctionnera pas).VÃ©rifiez que vous prÃ©sentez votre carte directement du cÃ´tÃ© compatible avec lâ€™antenne NFC face au terminal de paiement. Si vous retirez votre carte trop vite ou si vous ne la prÃ©sentez pas assez proche du terminal, rÃ©essayez.Si le paiement sans contact ne fonctionne pas, veuillez toujours insÃ©rer votre carte et taper votre code PIN pour finaliser le paiement.

title: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
content:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.Â How does it work?Â The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?Â Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of AttorneyÂ Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a personâ€™s identity, and itâ€™s not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.Â As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.Â Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

title: Wie Ã¼berweise ich in FremdwÃ¤hrungen?
content: Wir arbeiten mit Wise zusammen, um einfache Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen (neuen Tab) zu ermÃ¶glichen. Wise bietet Echtzeit-Wechselkurse ohne versteckte GebÃ¼hren.Um eine Ãœberweisung mit Wise durchzufÃ¼hren, logge dich zunÃ¤chst in deiner mobilen App ein:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.WÃ¤hle AuslandsÃ¼berweisung.FÃ¼ge einen neuen EmpfÃ¤nger hinzu oder wÃ¤hle einen bestehenden Kontakt aus. Wenn du einen neuen Kontakt hinzufÃ¼gst, kannst du die gewÃ¼nschte WÃ¤hrung auswÃ¤hlen, indem du auf die Europa-Flagge in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms tippst. Gib den Betrag und die Bankverbindung des EmpfÃ¤ngers an.SchlieÃŸe die Ãœberweisung mit deiner BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ab.Wenn wir deine gewÃ¼nschte WÃ¤hrung noch nicht anbieten, besuche bitte die Wise Website (neuen Tab)fÃ¼r eine noch grÃ¶ÃŸere Auswahl. Du kannst dich mit deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse einloggen, indem du auf Passwort vergessen? klickst. Du wirst eine E-Mail von Wise erhalten, mit der du dein Passwort erstellen kannst. Damit kannst du dich einloggen und die Ãœberweisung abschlieÃŸen. Bitte beachte, dass du zuerst dein Wise-Konto mithilfe der N26 App erstellen musst, indem du versuchst, den Anweisungen in der N26 App fÃ¼r FremdwÃ¤hrungsÃ¼berweisungen zu folgen. Andernfalls wirst du nicht die E-Mail von Wise fÃ¼r die ZurÃ¼cksetzung deines Passworts erhalten.Bitte beachte auch, dass mit dem N26 Business, Business You und N26 Business Metal Konto in der App weder Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen, noch Ãœberweisungen an Unternehmen mÃ¶glich sind.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Wise unterstÃ¼tzt Ãœberweisungen nur in der HauptwÃ¤hrung eines Landes. Das bedeutet zum Beispiel, dass nach Indien keine USD-Transaktionen ausgefÃ¼hrt werden kÃ¶nnen.

title: Come utilizzare MoneyBeam?
content: Grazie a MoneyBeam, puoi inviare denaro ai tuoi contatti in tempo reale senza dover inserire le loro coordinate bancarie. Puoi anche richiedere un MoneyBeam ai tuoi contatti per ricevere del denaro. Per utilizzare MoneyBeam, tu e i tuoi contatti dovete essere visibili come utenti di N26.Per inviare un MoneyBeam:Vai su Inviare denaro > MoneyBeamSeleziona un contatto dalla tua lista o aggiungine uno inserendo il suo numero di telefono e il suo indirizzo emailInserisci un importo e una causaleImmetti il tuo PIN di conferma e conferma il messaggio push che riceveraiÂ Per richiedere un MoneyBeam:Vai su Ricevere denaro > Richiedere MoneyBeamSeleziona un contatto dalla tua lista o aggiungine uno inserendo il suo numero di telefono e il suo indirizzo emailInserisci un importo e una causaleNon appena il contatto confermerÃ  la tua richiesta, riceverai l'importo richiestoIl limite per MoneyBeams Ã¨ di â‚¬ 1000 per transazione e di â‚¬ 5000 ogni 24 ore.Aggiungi una GIF come riferimento aggiuntivo:Puoi inviare GIF quando utilizzi MoneyBeam. Una volta che il MoneyBeam Ã¨ completato, il beneficiario potrÃ  vedere nella schermata Home unâ€™emoji come prefisso sul bonifico ricevuto, indicando cosÃ¬ che al bonifico Ã¨ stata allegata una GIF. Il beneficiario potrÃ  visualizzare la GIF nei dettagli del bonifico insieme al testo di riferimento.Le GIF ti vengono fornite direttamente da Giphy, Inc. e non da N26. Ti preghiamo di notare che Giphy Ã¨ un'azienda con sede negli Stati Uniti che puÃ² trattare i tuoi dati personali. Puoi trovare informazioni su come Giphy tratta i tuoi dati personali quando alleghi e invii GIF nell'Informativa sulla privacy di Giphy (nuova tabella).Â Â Per inviare un MoneyBeam con una GIF:Seleziona Invia denaro e poi MoneyBeam.Seleziona un contatto dalla tua lista o aggiungilo inserendo il suo numero di telefono e l'indirizzo email.Inserisci un importo e un riferimento.Seleziona Allega GIF e cerca o scorri la GIF che vuoi allegare.Inserisci il tuo PIN di conferma e conferma la notifica (push) che riceverai.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

title: Wie behalte ich meine tÃ¤glichen Ausgaben im Blick?
content: Wir sortieren deineÂ TransaktionenÂ automatisch und zeigen unsere Ergebnisse in der Insights an (obere rechte Ecke der mobilen App), anhand folgender Kriterien:Kategorien. Wir sammeln Informationen Ã¼ber EinzelhÃ¤ndler und ZahlungsgrÃ¼nde, um unsere Kategorisierung zu verbessern (z. B. Geldautomaten, Lebensmittel oder Bekleidung). Wenn du zum Beispiel einen Moneybeam mit dem Verwendungszweck Mittagessen versendest, werden wir ihn in die Kategorie Kneipen und Restaurants einordnen. Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass eine Kategorie nicht passt, kannst du sie einfach Ã¤ndern, indem du die Transaktion auswÃ¤hlst und eine andere Kategorie aus der Dropdown-Liste auswÃ¤hlst.Hashtags. Wir haben auch Standard-Hashtags fÃ¼r Transaktionszeiten (#Wochenende), Transaktionsarten (#BÃ¼cher) oder Kauforte (#Berlin) hinzugefÃ¼gt. Du kannst deine Transaktionen weiter sortieren, indem du deine eigenen Hashtags hinzufÃ¼gst: Tippe auf eine Transaktion und dann auf das Bleistiftsymbol, um Tags hinzuzufÃ¼gen (z. B. #Portugal_Trip oder #jeden_Monat) oder um unerwÃ¼nschte Tags zu entfernen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, youâ€™ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you donâ€™t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app youâ€™ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upperÂ right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.â„¹ï¸ Â Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Wie schÃ¼tzt N26 mein Geld?
content: Gesetzliche EinlagensicherungDieÂ  (neuen Tab)EntschÃ¤digungseinsrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH (neuen Tab) schÃ¼tzt alle EinlagenÂ bis zu 100.000 â‚¬Â in den Mitgliedsstaaten der EuropÃ¤ischen Union. Als Inhaber einer Banklizenz ist N26 gesetzlich verpflichtet, Mitglied einer Einlagensicherung zu sein. N26 ist Mitglied der EntschÃ¤digungseinrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH.Wie erkennt und Ã¼berwacht N26 Betrugsversuche?N26 verfÃ¼gt Ã¼ber ein Spezialteam, das sich auf die Ãœberwachung und Identifizierung verdÃ¤chtiger Transaktionen auf unserer Plattform konzentriert. Mithilfe fortschrittlicher statistischer Modelle und Algorithmen sowie Verhaltensanalyse sorgt unser Team dafÃ¼r, dass dein Geld stets in sicheren HÃ¤nden ist.Was unternimmt N26, wenn betrÃ¼gerisches Verhalten bei einem Kunden festgestellt wird?Wenn unser Expertenteam UnregelmÃ¤ÃŸigkeiten aufdeckt, ergreifen wir alle gesetzlich vorgeschriebenen MaÃŸnahmen zur Schadensbegrenzung. Dazu zÃ¤hlen mitunter die SchlieÃŸung der Konten und die Meldung derselben an die BehÃ¶rden. Falls verdÃ¤chtige Transaktionen auf GeldwÃ¤sche, Terrorismusfinanzierung oder eine andere Straftat hinweisen, meldet N26 diese AktivitÃ¤ten unverzÃ¼glich der deutschen Zentralstelle fÃ¼r Finanztransaktionsuntersuchungen (â€œFinancial Transaction Investigation Unitâ€; FIU) oder lokalen AufsichtsbehÃ¶rden.Wie hat N26 in die Sicherheit der Bank investiert?Ende 2019 haben wir unser Trust-and-Safety-Team zusammengestellt. Dessen Mitglieder sind im Bereich der IT-Sicherheit tÃ¤tig und fÃ¼r den Schutz der Nutzer sowie deren Daten gegen CyberkriminalitÃ¤t verantwortlich. DarÃ¼ber hinaus hat N26 die GrÃ¶ÃŸe des eigenen AML-Teams und der Einheit fÃ¼r FinanzkriminalitÃ¤t verdoppelt sowie TransaktionsÃ¼berwachungsprozesse und -plattformen etabliert. Diese MaÃŸnahmen ermÃ¶glichen es uns, schÃ¤dliche AktivitÃ¤ten auf Grundlage historischer Daten aufzudecken und zu verhindern. So kÃ¶nnen wir Kriminellen immer einige Schritte voraus sein. Wir investieren stark in Technologie und KI. Neben Verhaltensanalyse setzen wir auch auf fortschrittliche statistische Modelle und Algorithmen.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content: Tips for a successful videoÂ verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of ourÂ supported countriesÂ to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driverâ€™s licenses or residence permits canâ€™t be used). Also, the document shouldnâ€™t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'llÂ need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and deliveryÂ of your card.Â Please note that this is not a fee: yourÂ first cardÂ after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. DeliveriesÂ take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. Itâ€™s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via aÂ push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of theÂ troubleshooting tipsÂ we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, youâ€™ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchantâ€™s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content: To get the most out of â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the â€˜ownerâ€™ or the person who created the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™ can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as â€˜visibleâ€™ to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the ownerâ€™s contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ add participant flow.Youâ€™ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up â€¦ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the â€˜learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜invite new memberâ€™ button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the â€œlegal screenâ€ so be sure to read all the information within the â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&Câ€™s then tap â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ button.Tap â€˜Send inviteâ€™ on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the â€˜send inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the â€˜Participantsâ€™ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participantâ€™s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

title: Wie kann ich meinen Kredit vorzeitig zurÃ¼ckzahlen?
content: Du kannst deinÂ N26 CreditÂ Darlehen immer vorzeitig zurÃ¼ckzahlen. Beachte, dass eine VorfÃ¤lligkeitsentschÃ¤digung von bis zu 1 % anfÃ¤llt. Wenn deine verbleibende Kreditlaufzeit weniger als 12 Monate betrÃ¤gt, liegt die EntschÃ¤digung bei bis zu 0,5 % des vorzeitig zurÃ¼ckgezahlten Betrages.Kontaktiere uns per Chat, um eine vorzeitige RÃ¼ckzahlung zu beantragen; wir werden dir eine genaue Berechnung der VorfÃ¤lligkeitsentschÃ¤digung zukommen lassen.*Dies gilt nur fÃ¼r Darlehen mit N26. FÃ¼r auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) oder Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99), kontaktiere den jeweiligen Partner bitte direkt.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo puedo cambiar mi nÃºmero de telÃ©fono?
content: Mantener tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono actualizado es esencial porque lo necesitas paraÂ vincular tu mÃ³vilÂ o para enviar y recibir transferencias inmediatas porÂ MoneyBeam (pestaÃ±a nueva). Puedes actualizarlo directamente desde la app N26:Ve aÂ ğŸ‘¤Â  Mi Cuenta > InformaciÃ³n personal > Datos personalesEso sÃ­, este cambio mediante el proceso automÃ¡tico solo es posible desde tu mÃ³vil vinculado y con autenticaciÃ³n biomÃ©trica (por reconocimiento facial o huella dactilar).

title: How can I prevent fraud via SMS?
content: Did you get a text message followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt.How does the scam work?You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official oneÂ https://app.n26.com/login (new tab)The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App > My Account > Settings > Security > Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,Â  send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comDo I need to confirm a transaction to be able to receive a refund?Absolutely not! We would never instruct you to authorise a transaction that you did not initiate. Never confirm transactions if you do not recognise a recipient's name or IBAN in the case of debit transfers; an email or phone number in the case of a MoneyBeam payment; and a merchant's name in the case of a card transaction.How to recognise N26 official communications?We will never send you links via SMS: never trust an SMS from us that contains a link!Â N26 usually sends verification codes via "AUTHMSG"; these codes will always originate from this sender. These codes are used to access the App or to associate the device with the account. Never share your OTP (One Time Password) codes with anyone!Our primary means of communication are live chat, email and our premium customer phone line.We do not call our customers, unless (in very specific cases) a call has been requested by a customer themselves.Therefore, if after clicking on a link, youâ€™re informed that you will be contacted shortly by an N26 agent due to an unsuccessful operation, be wary of impending phone calls!How do scammers find out my personal information?In todayâ€™s day and age, itâ€™s likely that your personal data is publicly available online. Think social media platforms, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc. Itâ€™s often the case that sensitive data is left unsecured. Scammers exploit people's vulnerability by collecting information and using it to their advantage.

title: Wie erstelle und verwalte ich DauerauftrÃ¤ge?
content: Wenn du in der App oder im Online Banking eine Ãœberweisung einrichtest, hast du die Option, daraus einen Dauerauftrag zu machen.Bevor du die Ãœberweisung fertig machst, kannst du ein HÃ¤kchen bei einer Box setzen, um die Ãœberweisung als Dauerauftrag zu merken. ZunÃ¤chst gibst du den EmpfÃ¤nger, den Betrag und den Verwendungszweck ein. Setze im nÃ¤chsten Schritt das HÃ¤kchen bei: â€œAls Dauerauftrag merken?â€. Nun kannst du Start- und Enddatum und das Zahlungsintervall fÃ¼r deinen Dauerauftrag festlegen.So kannst du deine bestehenden DauerauftrÃ¤ge in der App sehen und verwalten:Gehe zur Umsatzliste (Startbildschirm).Wenn du ein iPhone benutzt, tippe auf die drei Punkte Ã¼ber deiner Umsatzliste. Wenn du Android verwendest, tippe auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand.Ein blaues Fenster Ã¶ffnet sich, in dem du "DauerauftrÃ¤ge" auswÃ¤hlen kannst.Hier kannst du deine DauerauftrÃ¤ge lÃ¶schen oder verÃ¤ndern. Um einen Dauerauftrag zu lÃ¶schen, tippe auf den gewÃ¼nschten Dauerauftrag und dann oben rechts auf das Papierkorb-Icon.â„¹ï¸ Hinweis: Wenn ein Dauerauftrag aufgrund mangelnder Kontodeckung nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt werden konnte, versuchen wir nicht, ihn erneut auszufÃ¼hren. Du kannst die Ãœberweisung dann manuell wiederholen. Der nÃ¤chste Termin des Dauerauftrags bleibt aber bestehen.

title: How to change my debit card PIN?
content: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change itâ€”you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that youâ€™ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose â€˜Cardsâ€™ from the bottom right-handTap â€˜Card Settingsâ€™ and select the relevant cardSelect â€˜Reset PINâ€™Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transactionâ€”in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequencesâ€”such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isnâ€™t accepted, simply try again a different combination.Â If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that youâ€™ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

title: How to get push messages?
content: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such asÂ MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as withÂ CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you arenâ€™t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether youâ€™re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
content: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: CRS - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir benÃ¶tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut gemÃ¤ÃŸ des Common Reporting Standard (CRS) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden in der EuropÃ¤ischen Union Informationen Ã¼ber Kundenkonten zur VerfÃ¼gung zu stellen, deren Inhaber in anderen LÃ¤ndern steuerpflichtig sind.Der CRS wurde von der OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler Standard fÃ¼r den automatischen Austausch von Informationen (AEOI). Das Ziel des CRS ist es, zur BekÃ¤mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden den Bestand im Ausland befindlicher VermÃ¶genswerte tranparenter macht. Mehr als 90 LÃ¤nder haben sich erklÃ¤rt, im Rahmen des CRS Informationen ihrer Einwohner Ã¼ber ihre VermÃ¶genswerte und Einkommen zu teilen.Damit wir feststellen kÃ¶nnen, ob ein Konto den steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden zwecks CRS mitzuteilen ist, mÃ¼ssen wir dich fragen:In welchem Land du als steuerpflichtige Person giltst:
Normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige Person desjenigen Landes, in dem deine Wohnadresse liegt. Wenn du mehrere Wohnadressen in verschiedenen LÃ¤ndern hast, greifen fÃ¼r gewÃ¶hnlich bestimmte Entscheidungsregeln, die in den Steuerabkommen und Steuergesetzen der betreffenden LÃ¤nder festgehalten sind. Es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren LÃ¤ndern steuerpflichtig bist. Wenn dieser Fall gegeben ist, mÃ¼ssen wir wissen, um welche LÃ¤nder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden Identifikationsnummern als Steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden zuverlÃ¤ssige Informationen zur VerfÃ¼gung stellen kÃ¶nnen.
Wie deine Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (â€œTINâ€) lautet:
Die Zuteilung und das Format der TIN variiert zwischen den LÃ¤ndern. Die EU hat eine Anleitung (neuen Tab) zur Identifikation der TINs ihrer Mitgliedstaaten verÃ¶ffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) TIN(s) in den verschiedenen LÃ¤ndern identifizieren kannst.Falls sich deine Lebenslage verÃ¤ndert, kannst deine Steuerinformationen in der N26 App jederzeit anpassen. Logge dich dafÃ¼r einfach in deine N26 App ein, und gehe zum Bereich: Mein Konto > Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

title: When will my card arrive?
content: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10â‚¬).Â Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0â‚¬ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25â‚¬ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

title: Kann N26 mein Konto schlieÃŸen?
content: Kurz gesagt: ja.Wir kÃ¶nnen dein Konto auf drei Arten schlieÃŸen (mit einer KÃ¼ndigungsfrist von 2 Monaten, 14 Tagen oder sofort). Diese KÃ¼ndigungen sind endgÃ¼ltig: Unser Kundenservice kann keine Informationen Ã¼ber den Hintergrund einzelner KÃ¼ndigungen geben und die Entscheidung auch nicht rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen. Du kannst deine GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehungen zu uns auch jederzeit, sofort und ohne Angabe von GrÃ¼nden, beenden. Jegliche ausstehenden VertragsgebÃ¼hren mÃ¼ssen vor dem Beendigungszeitpunkt beglichen werden.2 Monate KÃ¼ndigungsfristWir sind berechtigt, jede GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehung mit einer Frist von 2 Monaten ohne Angabe von GrÃ¼nden zu kÃ¼ndigen (siehe Â§ 19 Abs. 1 unsererÂ AGB (neuen Tab)Â oder Â§ 675h BGB).14 Tage KÃ¼ndigungsfristWir kÃ¶nnen jede GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehung auch mit einer Frist von 14 Tagen kÃ¼ndigen (siehe Â§ 19 Abs. 3 unsererÂ AGB (neuen Tab)), wenn aufgrund der Verletzung vertraglicher Pflichten hinreichende GrÃ¼nde hierzu vorliegen. Solche GrÃ¼nde sind:Nutzung eines Privatkontos fÃ¼r geschÃ¤ftliche ZweckeÂ Nach unseren AGB darf ein Privatkonto nur fÃ¼r den persÃ¶nlichen Gebrauch genutzt werden. Alle Ãœberweisungen, die sich auf Honorare fÃ¼r erbrachte Dienstleistungen und/oder verkaufte Produkte beziehen, gelten als GeschÃ¤ftstransaktionen. Wenn du dein Konto fÃ¼r diesen Zweck nutzen mÃ¶chtest, erÃ¶ffne bitte einÂ N26 BusinessÂ oderÂ N26 Business You Konto.Bereitstellung falscher oder unzureichender Informationen fÃ¼r eine routinemÃ¤ÃŸige HintergrundprÃ¼fung.Â Wir sind eine Bank, deshalbÂ Ã¼berprÃ¼fen wir manche Transaktionen. Wenn du keine korrekten und/oder ausreichenden Angaben zu der betreffenden Transaktion machst, haben wir das Recht, die GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehung zu kÃ¼ndigen, da wir deutschen Finanzvorschriften entsprechen mÃ¼ssen. -MissbrÃ¤uchliches Verhalten gegenÃ¼ber N26-Mitarbeitern.Â Wir tolerieren kein missbrÃ¤uchliches Verhalten gegenÃ¼ber unseren Mitarbeitern. Die Androhung von KÃ¶rperverletzung oder allgemeines missbrÃ¤uchliches Verhalten ist nach deutschem Recht strafbar und wird ausnahmslos der zustÃ¤ndigen BehÃ¶rde gemeldet.Fristlose KÃ¼ndigungWir kÃ¶nnen jede GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehung auch auÃŸerordentlich kÃ¼ndigen (siehe Â§ 19 Abs. 3 unsererÂ AGB (neuen Tab)). Das bedeutet: jederzeit, ohne VorankÃ¼ndigung und ohne KÃ¼ndigungsfrist bei Vorliegen eines wichtigen Grundes fÃ¼r eine solche KÃ¼ndigung. Solche GrÃ¼nde sind:Falsche Angaben gegenÃ¼ber N26 Ã¼ber deine finanzielle Situation, insbesondere bei der Beantragung eines KreditsDu kannst ein Darlehen oder eine Verschuldung gegenÃ¼ber N26 nicht zurÃ¼ckzahlenNichterfÃ¼llung der Forderungen von N26 bezÃ¼glich deines Darlehens (siehe Bestellung oder VerstÃ¤rkung von Sicherheiten, Â§ 13 (2) unserer AGB (neuen Tab)).

title: What is a N26 Business Account?
content: N26 Business is a simple and affordable solution for all your daily financial business needs. The N26 Business account is a safe and intuitive digital business current account that you can sign up to in minutes. It is beautifully simple, transparent and free*; allowing you to receive payments from clients, send money and spend confidently while keeping your business finances completely separate from your personal ones.Our business accounts are designed for self-employed and freelancers doing business under their own name (meaning you canâ€™t have our company name on your account or card). It is currently not possible to switch from personal to business accounts, so make sure that this account is right for you before opening.What are the benefits of a N26 Business Account?Our N26 Business account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* business account: N26 Business is free to open online with no account management fees (*after a balance of â‚¬50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card intended for business use only. The virtual card has a full PAN number and is ready to add to your Apple or Google wallets for online and in-store purchases. You can also use contactless-enabled ATMs to withdraw money with Apple or Google pay.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional â‚¬10, you can receive a physical N26 Mastercard for business use (please note, you will need to have at least â‚¬10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Maestro card: If you also need a card for private expenses then customers with DE, AT and NL T&Câ€™s, can order a Maestro card for an additional â‚¬10.Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.What are the maximum limits for N26 Business accounts?The maximum daily payment limits for the N26 Business Mastercard (total amount within 24 hours) are:Â ATM withdrawals: â‚¬2,500	In-store or online payments: â‚¬5,000Â The monthly limit for payments is â‚¬20,000.Â You can set your limits (new tab) for ATM withdrawals and payments directly in the Cards section of the app.On top of this, if you open an N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands, you can apply for a Maestro card for your personal expensesÂ The maximum daily limits (within 24 hours) for bank transfers are:Â MoneyBeam to N26 customers: â‚¬1,000Instant transfers: â‚¬100,000Outgoing transfers: No limitsÂ N26 Business doesn't support transfers in foreign currencies (new tab) made from the app but directly from the Wise (new tab) website.Â Please note that business-to-business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

title: Comment fonctionne le compte N26 Business Metal ?
content: Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Irlande, Islande, Islande, Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, NorvÃ¨ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, SlovÃ©nie et SuÃ¨de.N26 Business Metal coÃ»te 16,90 â‚¬ par mois et est conÃ§u pour les auto-entrepreneurs et les indÃ©pendants qui exercent leur activitÃ© en nom propre. Le nom de votre sociÃ©tÃ© ne peut donc pas figurer sur votre compte ou votre carte.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (nouvel onglet): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Pour lâ€™instant, il nâ€™est pas possible de passer dâ€™une offre de compte personnel Ã  un compte Business (ou vice versa). Il est donc important de savoir si le compte N26 Business Metal correspond Ã  vos besoins (nouvel onglet).Le compte N26 Business Metal est conÃ§u spÃ©cialement pour les auto-entrepreneurs et non pour les entreprises ou autres personnes morales. Ce compte permet de gÃ©rer vos dÃ©penses professionnelles avec un compte bancaire et une carte de dÃ©bit Ã  votre nom.Le compte a un coÃ»t de 16,90 â‚¬ par mois. Ce compte premium inclut : des garanties d'assurance et d'assistance N26 Business Metal fournies par Allianz, qui couvrent vos voyages professionnels et vos outils de travail, mais ce compte vous permet Ã©galement de retirer de lâ€™argent en devises Ã©trangÃ¨res sans frais supplÃ©mentaires, aussi souvent que vous le souhaitez.La carte N26 Business Metal est une Mastercard conÃ§ue exclusivement pour une utilisation professionnelle. Vous bÃ©nÃ©ficiez de 0,5 % de cashback sur tous vos achats effectuÃ©s avec votre carte N26 Business. Le montant du cashback est calculÃ© de faÃ§on mensuelle, le 15 de chaque mois. Il faut alors compter jusquâ€™Ã  7 jours avant que le montant du cashback apparaisse sur votre relevÃ© de compte.Nâ€™Ã©tant pas possible dâ€™avoir deux compte N26 en mÃªme temps, nous vous conseillons de commander une Maestro (disponible en Autriche et en Allemagne) pour vos dÃ©penses privÃ©s.Votre compte N26 Business Metal ne vous permet pas dâ€™effectuer de virements en devises Ã©trangÃ¨res.Pour le moment, les prÃ©lÃ¨vements interentreprises ou B2B ne sont pas possibles avec un compte N26 Business Metal. Vous pouvez choisir cette offre Ã  lâ€™ouverture de votre compte ou directement depuis votre application si vous Ãªtes dÃ©jÃ  client N26 Business*Allianz Global Assistance Europe, dÃ©nomination commerciale AWP P&C S.A. - Filiale hollandaise membre du Groupe Allianz.

title: Ma piÃ¨ce d'identitÃ© n'est pas acceptÃ©e et je n'arrive pas Ã  ouvrir un compte N26
content:
Un Ã©tablissement bancaire doit vÃ©rifier votre identitÃ© avant de vous permettre d'ouvrir un compte bancaire. Selon votre pays de rÃ©sidence et votre nationalitÃ©, diffÃ©rentes piÃ¨ces d'identitÃ© peuvent Ãªtre acceptÃ©es dans le cadre de cette procÃ©dure de vÃ©rification.Â

title: Bankdaten â€“ Deine N26 KontobestÃ¤tigung
content: Was ist eine KontobestÃ¤tigung?Eine KontobestÃ¤tigung â€“ auch Bankbescheinigung genannt â€“ ist ein Dokument, das dich als InhaberIn deines Bankkontos ausweist. Auf der KontobestÃ¤tigung sind dein Vor- und Zuname, dein Geburtsdatum und deine Bankdaten wie die IBAN und das Datum der KontoerÃ¶ffnung zu sehen.Auf Wunsch kann deine BankbestÃ¤tigung auch deinen aktuellen Kontostand und die Nummern deiner aktiven Karten auflisten. Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden werden diese Bankdaten teilweise mit Sternchen verdeckt.Wie beantrage ich meine KontobestÃ¤tigung?Klicke in der Web-App auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol* und wÃ¤hle Bankdaten herunterladen. Eine PDF-Datei wird automatisch erstellt.Â Wenn du eine KontobestÃ¤tigung inklusive deines aktuellen Kontostands und deiner Kartennummer(n) erhalten willst, klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*. Unter KontobestÃ¤tigung kannst du auswÃ¤hlen, ob du deinen aktuellen Kontostand und/oder die Kartennummer(n) deiner aktiven Karte(n) mit anzeigen lassen willst. Klicke dann auf Anfrage. Die PDF wird innerhalb von 24 Stunden unter Nachrichten von N26 (neuen Tab) in deiner App erscheinen.* Das Download-Symbol ist das Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil, links neben dem â€˜Button â€œGeld erhaltenâ€.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (includingÂ CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.Thereâ€™s always a â‚¬2 fee if you use yourÂ MaestroÂ card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2â‚¬. Check ourÂ pricing listsÂ if youâ€™ve beenÂ charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: Was sind Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen?
content: Alle N26 Kunden haben nun die MÃ¶glichkeit, Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen zu verwenden. Im Gegensatz zu den Ã¼blichen SEPA-Ãœberweisungen, die innerhalb von zwei Werktagen bearbeitet werden, werden Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen innerhalb von Sekunden Ã¼bermittelt und empfangen.Eine Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen kann von Vorteil sein, wenn du eine dringende Ãœberweisung tÃ¤tigen musst (sie dauert etwa 10 Sekunden). FÃ¼r unsere Standardkunden, die Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen nutzen, fÃ¤llt jedoch eine GebÃ¼hr an, die vor der BestÃ¤tigung der Ãœberweisung angezeigt wird. Wenn die Ãœberweisung also bis zu 2 Tage warten kann, dann ist eine normale SEPA-Ãœberweisung wahrscheinlich besser geeignet. FÃ¼r unsere Premiumkunden ist die Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen gebÃ¼hrenfrei.Obwohl diese Ãœberweisungen in Echtzeit durchgefÃ¼hrt werden, kÃ¶nnen sie sich aufgrund von Bearbeitungszeiten, Embargos usw. verzÃ¶gern (genau wie regulÃ¤re Ãœberweisungen). Bei wichtigen Zahlungen, wie z. B. Einzahlungen oder Anzahlungen sollte man deshalb am besten im Voraus zahlen, um externe finanzielle Verluste aufgrund von VerzÃ¶gerungen zu vermeiden.Wie funktioniert das?Logge dich in die N26 App ein und tippe auf Geld senden > BankÃ¼berweisung.Gib als nÃ¤chstes den Namen und die IBAN des EmpfÃ¤ngers ein sowie ggf. einen Verwendungszweck.Tippe auf Ãœberweisung und wÃ¤hle zwischen EchtzeitÃ¼berweisung und StandardÃ¼berweisung.Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein.BestÃ¤tige die Ãœberweisung in der App.Die EchtzeitÃ¼berweisung wird innerhalb von ca. 10 Sekunden verarbeitet und beim EmpfÃ¤nger eingehen.Bitte beachte: Wenn die Bank des EmpfÃ¤ngers nicht am SCT-Echtzeitverfahren teilnimmt, hast du nicht die MÃ¶glichkeit, eine EchtzeitÃ¼berweisung durchzufÃ¼hren. Wichtige Informationen:**FÃ¼r die Nutzung von Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen wird bei N26 Standard eine GebÃ¼hr erhoben. Die GebÃ¼hr wird direkt im Anschluss als separate Transaktion verrechnet und die GebÃ¼hr fÃ¤llt je nach Land unterschiedlich aus:Deutschland und Ã–sterreich â€“ 0,49 â‚¬Spanien â€“ 1,99 â‚¬Italien, Frankreich und Rest Europas â€“ 0,99 â‚¬Der HÃ¶chstbetrag, den du mit per Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen versenden kannst, betrÃ¤gt 2.000 â‚¬ fÃ¼nfmal pro Tag bei einem TageshÃ¶chstbetrag von 10.000 â‚¬.Wenn du eine Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen fÃ¼r eine wichtige Zahlung (Einzahlung, BuÃŸgeld, Anzahlung) verwenden mÃ¶chtest, solltest du die Zahlung eventuell im Voraus vornehmen, um eine VerzÃ¶gerung durch eine mÃ¶gliche Ablehnung oder Sperrung zu vermeiden.Wenn du Waren oder Dienstleistungen per Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen bezahlst, achte immer darauf, dass du die EmpfÃ¤ngerdaten und -legitimationen Ã¼berprÃ¼fst, bevor du die Transaktion bestÃ¤tigst. Es empfiehlt sich immer, vor BetrÃ¼gereien auf der Hut zu sein.Bitte beachte: Derzeit nehmen nicht alle Banken am Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen teil. Wenn die EmpfÃ¤ngerbank nicht daran teilnimmt, hast du nicht die MÃ¶glichkeit, deine Ãœberweisung in Echtzeit durchzufÃ¼hren.

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ to your account. If you didnâ€™t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons youâ€™ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, itâ€™s likely that youâ€™ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card canâ€™t be used for online purchases.

title: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
content: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around â‚¬2. For the time being, weâ€™re unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, hereâ€™s a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:Â AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you couldâ€™ve been charged an ATM fee.

title: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
content: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (â€œtappingâ€ your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:Â Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen.

title: Why was I charged a Gambling Fee?
content: The Gambling Fee to the amount of 3% applies to all private customers who registered for an account after March 12, 2020, or who have a Business membership plan (regardless of the date on which said plan took effect).Customers with such a membership plan are charged the Gambling Fee when making use of the services of the following gambling providers:LotteriesSports bettingOnline casinosHorse racingOther gambling activitiesPlease note that this includes both incoming and outgoing applicable Mastercard transactions. The 3% Gambling Fee is charged after the applicable transaction is processed. For example: if you win or convert your remaining chips back to money, the merchant will send the balance in another transaction where the 3% Gambling Fee will be charged again.Good to know:The 3% Gambling Fee appears on your transaction list and balance statement, linked to the original and any subsequent transaction from the gambling merchant.The fee we have charged is related to Mastercard transactions youâ€™ve processed at certain relevant merchants (no matter which country you place the bet) and canâ€™t be refunded.Â Some of our customers will not have to pay the Gambling Fee, as a result of the ruling of the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (BGH XI ZR 26/20).

title: What are Cards for Spaces?
content: With our new Cards for Spaces feature, your individual subaccounts acquire a brand new functionality that allows you to link your N26 Mastercard to one of your Spaces and spend directly from there.How does it work?Cards for Spaces allows N26 customers with a Premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) to link their physical or virtual Mastercard to a Space and use the funds inÂ the subaccount for personal expenses. Below you can find an overview of the features available with attaching your N26 Mastercard to a Space:Â You will be able to link your Mastercard to one of your Spaces and back to your Main Account in one clickYou can link more than one card to a Space or to different SpacesIf you link a physical card to a Space, this will automatically allow you to use Apple and Google Pay with that cardThe feature is not available for Shared Spaces yetHow can I link my card to a Space?You will be able to link your existing virtual and physical cards to your chosen Space.There are 3 ways to do it:In the Cards tab, you can find under each card the button to select your chosen Space.In Card settings, you can also select your chosen space and link it to your card.In each Space settings, you will be able to select the card to link to that specific Space.Whenever you want to relink your card to your main account or to another Space, just select â€˜Main accountâ€™ or the other Space in the dropdown menu.

title: Where is my refund?
content:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.Â For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

title: Come attivare la carta?
content: Attiva la tua Mastercard N26 direttamente dall'app e inizia subito ad utilizzarla! Dovrai attivare la nuova carta sia che si tratti della tua prima carta N26, di una carta sostitutiva o che tu abbia effettuato il passaggio a una carta N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal.Una volta ricevuta per posta la tua carta, assicurati che il tuo smartphone sia associato al tuo conto, poi:Apri la tua app N26Vai alla sezione "Carte" nel menÃ¹ in basso e trova la carta che vuoi attivareTocca "Impostazioni" e poi "Attiva"Inserisci il numero di 10 cifre che trovi sulla parte anteriore o posteriore della tua carta e scegli il tuo codice PINPer attivare la carta su N26 Web, seleziona "Attiva carta" dalla schermata principale.Ricorda, per abilitare i pagamenti contactless (NFC) e utilizzare la carta per i tuoi acquisti online, dovrai prima effettuare una transazione con chip e codice PIN presso un negozio o uno sportello ATM.Se ricevi per posta piÃ¹ carte, perchÃ© ad esempio la consegna Ã¨ stata ritardata e ne hai richiesta piÃ¹ di una, puoi attivare solo la carta piÃ¹ recente. Tuttavia, se hai un conto premium e hai richiesto una carta aggiuntiva, potrai comunque attivare quella nuova carta.

title: Pourquoi la vÃ©rification de mon identitÃ© par photo ne fonctionne pas ?
content: â„¹ï¸Â S'applique Ã  tous les pays sauf Ã  l'AllemagneAvant toute chose, vÃ©rifiez que lâ€™option de gÃ©olocalisation est bien activÃ©e sur votre smartphone.
