title: How to upgrade to N26 You?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 YouÂ during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's (new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. If you upgrade to N26 You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: How to protect my identity?
content: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.Â Â Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rulesÂ As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.Â Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.Â Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.Â For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating â€œpermanent homeâ€ as a stronger form of attachment than â€œtemporary residenceâ€). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification numberÂ Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each countryâ€™s tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.Â Â The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authoritiesÂ As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.Â Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.Â We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.Â Our recommendationÂ Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.Â We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick â€œAdd new tax countryâ€, indicate whether youâ€™re a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if youâ€™re tax resident in more than one country), click â€œAdd new tax countryâ€ and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.Weâ€™re unable to advise you on your tax status. If youâ€™re unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.Â

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: â‚¬5,000Monthly limit: â‚¬20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of â‚¬1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of â‚¬400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of â‚¬2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of â‚¬1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: â‚¬1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limitÂ Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: Why isnâ€™t my photo verification working?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Applies to all regions except GermanyFirst, geolocation must be enabled. Then review theÂ guide (new tab)Â weâ€™ve created to help you take the best pictures.Most photoÂ verificationsÂ fail due to bad picture quality.Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).Make sure youâ€™re the only person in the photo.Check your document.We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.We only accept national IDs and passports.Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesnâ€™t go through, you can just start over again.As soon as your verification is complete, weâ€™ll send you your N26 Mastercard.Â DeliveriesÂ take up to 10 days.Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.Â

title: Mi tarjeta caduca pronto, Â¿quÃ© debo hacer?
content: Si tu Mastercard de N26 ha caducado o va a caducar prÃ³ximamente, en este artÃ­culo encontrarÃ¡s toda la informaciÃ³n sobre cÃ³mo pedir una nueva, los costes asociados y los plazos de envÃ­o.Â Antes de pedir una nueva tarjeta, te recomendamos que compruebes que todos tus datos personales son correctos y estÃ¡n actualizados.Si tu tarjeta caduca pronto, inicia sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta N26 en la app, ve a la pestaÃ±a Tarjetas y busca un banner debajo de la tarjeta correspondiente. Sigue los pasos para confirmar dÃ³nde quieres recibir tu tarjeta de sustituciÃ³n y te la enviaremos.Â Si no ves ese mensaje, no te preocupes. Seguro que tu tarjeta todavÃ­a tiene tiempo de validez, asÃ­ que cuando llegue el momento adecuado tendrÃ¡s la opciÃ³n de confirmar tu direcciÃ³n.Cuando llegue tu tarjeta, tendrÃ¡s que activarla antes de poder utilizarla. No olvides destruir tu tarjeta antigua y tirarla siguiendo las normas locales de reciclaje.Â¿Puedo seguir utilizando mi tarjeta cuando haya caducado?Â¿CuÃ¡nto cuesta obtener una tarjeta de sustituciÃ³n de mi tarjeta que caduca o ha caducado?Mi tarjeta ya ha caducado, pero no he recibido una nueva

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content: If your balance canâ€™t cover a direct debit* when itâ€™s due, itâ€™ll bounce and youâ€™ll be charged aÂ â‚¬3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. Itâ€™s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether youâ€™re eligible for anÂ OverdraftÂ directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9.

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ from the mobile app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â (if you havenâ€™t activated your card and need toÂ top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by theÂ check digitsÂ (two numbers), then ourÂ bank codeÂ 10011001 and end with your 10-digitÂ account numberÂ (start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner ofÂ Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: What is CASH26?
content: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 appâ€“â€“no debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-storeâ€“â€“itâ€™s that simple. Plus, you donâ€™t have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adamâ€™s, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, youâ€™ll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.Â If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of â‚¬2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (includingÂ CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of â‚¬2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.Thereâ€™s always a â‚¬2 fee if you use yourÂ MaestroÂ card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2â‚¬. Check ourÂ pricing listsÂ if youâ€™ve beenÂ charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: Quâ€™est-ce quâ€™un message de sÃ©curitÃ© en pied de page et pourquoi en avons-nous intÃ©grÃ© un ?
content: Un message de sÃ©curitÃ© en pied de page est un message personnalisÃ© ajoutÃ© au bas des emails et des documents numÃ©riques, qui sert de sceau dâ€™authenticitÃ©.En ajoutant votre nom complet au bas de chaque email, notre objectif est de vous aider Ã  distinguer les emails lÃ©gitimes envoyÃ©s par N26 des emails de phishing envoyÃ©s par des fraudeurs.Â Un message de sÃ©curitÃ© en pied de page ne peut prouver avec certitude quâ€™un email provient dâ€™une source vÃ©rifiÃ©e. Il permet nÃ©anmoins de rÃ©duire le risque de phishing, le type dâ€™attaque par hameÃ§onnage le plus courant.Quâ€™est-ce que le phishingÂ ?Le phishing est une pratique illÃ©gale qui consiste Ã  envoyer des emails gÃ©nÃ©riques Ã  un grand nombre de personnes inconnues, dans le but dâ€™obtenir des informations confidentielles sous de faux prÃ©textes.Comment y parvenirÂ ?Â Les fraudeurs contactent leurs cibles en leur faisant croire quâ€™ils travaillent pour des entreprises connues. Ils leur font ensuite croire quâ€™ils sont en sÃ©curitÃ© grÃ¢ce Ã  des images de marque, des situations dâ€™urgence et des propos trompeurs. Une fois les cibles appÃ¢tÃ©es, les fraudeurs essaient de les manipuler pour quâ€™elles se plient Ã  leurs exigences.Comment vous protÃ©gerÂ ?Faites trÃ¨s attention aux emails que vous recevez de banques, de clients, dâ€™employeurs, etc. Si vous Ãªtes invitÃ© Ã  faire quelque chose, nâ€™agissez jamais par impulsion, mais rÃ©flÃ©chissez bien avant dâ€™agir.Â Si vous soupÃ§onnez un problÃ¨me, ne lâ€™ignorez pas. Observez les fautes dâ€™orthographe et de grammaire, survolez les URL cachÃ©es (ne cliquez pas dessus), vÃ©rifiez les coordonnÃ©es de lâ€™expÃ©diteur et faites des recherches. Un contrÃ´le rapide en ligne peut vous aider Ã  vÃ©rifier lâ€™identitÃ© de lâ€™expÃ©diteur.Si vous avez reÃ§u un email, un appel tÃ©lÃ©phonique et/ou un SMS suspect au nom de N26, contactez notre Service Client Ã  lâ€™adresse support@n26.com. Pour discuter de problÃ¨mes liÃ©s Ã  votre compte, veuillez nous contacter par Livechat depuis lâ€™application mobile.En savoir plus surÂ :Comment signaler des suspicions dâ€™attaques de phishing (nouvel onglet)Comment reconnaÃ®tre et Ã©viter les attaques de phishing (nouvel onglet)Comment se protÃ©ger de lâ€™ingÃ©nierie sociale (nouvel onglet)

title: Why do I need to send additional documents?
content: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS â†’ Certificates â†’ "Request for yourself" â†’ flag "of Residence" â†’ "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" â†’ and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description.Â Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

title: Comment N26 gÃ¨re mes informations fiscales ?
content: Ce document a Ã©tÃ© rÃ©digÃ© Ã  titre informatif uniquement. Il nâ€™a pas Ã©tÃ© pensÃ© pour fournir des conseils fiscaux, juridiques ou comptables. De ce fait, nous nâ€™en garantissons pas la fiabilitÃ©.N26 collecte vos informations fiscales pour deux raisons principales : afin de rÃ©pondre aux exigences de Â« Know Your Customer Â» (connaissance du client) et pour la dÃ©claration obligatoire auprÃ¨s des administrations fiscales responsables.Â Obligation dâ€™identification de nos clients selon les rÃ¨gles appelÃ©es Â« Know Your Customer Â»Comme toute institution financiÃ¨re,, en vertu de la lÃ©gislation fiscale applicable, nous sommes tenus de recueillir des informations fiscales pertinentes afin de vous identifier Ã  des fins fiscales. Il sâ€™agit principalement de votre nom, adresse de rÃ©sidence, pays de rÃ©sidence fiscale (quâ€™il y en ait un ou plusieurs), numÃ©ro dâ€™identification fiscale ou Ã©quivalent, ainsi que de votre lieu et date de naissance. Vous trouverez ci-dessous des informations gÃ©nÃ©rales sur les dÃ©finitions de la rÃ©sidence fiscale et du numÃ©ro dâ€™identification fiscale.RÃ©sidence fiscaleEn rÃ¨gle gÃ©nÃ©rale, un particulier nâ€™a quâ€™un seul pays de rÃ©sidence (adresse de rÃ©sidence). Cependant, une personne peut rÃ©sider Ã  des fins fiscales dans deux ou plusieurs pays diffÃ©rents. En effet, les pays utilisent diffÃ©rents critÃ¨res (formes de rattachement) pour dÃ©terminer la rÃ©sidence fiscale. Ces critÃ¨res peuvent inclure, sans y Ãªtre limitÃ©s, la prÃ©sence physique prolongÃ©e, la nationalitÃ©, la propriÃ©tÃ© de biens, etc. En cas de convention fiscale entre les pays, les rÃ¨gles dÃ©cisives contenues dans cette convention attribueront la rÃ©sidence fiscale Ã  lâ€™un des pays concernÃ©s.Par exemple, si vous avez un foyer dâ€™habitationÂ permanent (nouvel onglet) dans le pays A et une rÃ©sidence temporaire dans le pays B, les rÃ¨gles dÃ©cisives de la convention fiscale conclue entre le pays A et le pays B peuvent indiquer que vous Ãªtes rÃ©sident fiscal dans le pays A oÃ¹ vous avez un foyer dâ€™habitation permanent plutÃ´t que dans le pays B oÃ¹ vous avez une rÃ©sidence temporaire (traitant le Â« foyer dâ€™habitation permanent Â» comme une forme de rattachement plus forte que la Â« rÃ©sidence temporaire Â»). La maniÃ¨re de dÃ©terminer la rÃ©sidence fiscale repose sur des faits ; en cas de doute, vous devez donc le prÃ©ciser auprÃ¨s de votre administration fiscale et/ou votre conseiller fiscal.Le portail dâ€™Ã©change automatique de lâ€™OCDE fournit des informations utiles sur les NIF (notamment oÃ¹ les trouver et leurs spÃ©cifications) Ã©mis par de nombreux pays participant Ã  lâ€™Ã©change automatique dâ€™informations en matiÃ¨re fiscale. Cependant, en cas de doutes sur votre NIF, nous vous conseillons de consulter votre conseiller fiscal ou votre administration fiscale.Obligation de dÃ©claration des informations fiscales pertinentes de certains clients aux autoritÃ©s fiscales responsablesComme toute institution financiÃ¨re,, nous sommes tenus de dÃ©clarer rÃ©guliÃ¨rement certaines informations fiscales pertinentes Ã  lâ€™administration fiscale responsable. Selon votre IBAN, lâ€™administration fiscale destinataire peut Ãªtre celle de lâ€™Allemagne, de lâ€™Italie, de lâ€™Espagne ou de la France.Les dÃ©clarations en vertu de la Norme commune de dÃ©claration (nouvel onglet) (NCD) et du Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (nouvel onglet) (FATCA, Loi sur le respect des impÃ´ts sur les comptes Ã©trangers) doivent tout particuliÃ¨rement Ãªtre mentionnÃ©es. Si vous Ãªtes rÃ©sident fiscal dans un pays appliquant la NCD et/ou aux Ã‰tats-Unis, lâ€™administration fiscale destinataire communique les informations reÃ§ues de la part de N26 Ã  votre pays de rÃ©sidence fiscale dans le cadre de lâ€™Ã©change automatique dâ€™informations en vertu de la NCD et du FATCA.Pour que N26 puisse sâ€™acquitter de ses obligations dâ€™information, en particulier celles en matiÃ¨re de NCD et de FATCA, nous avons besoin de recueillir des informations fiscalesÂ  correctes et Ã  jour (donnÃ©es dâ€™autocertification). Les donnÃ©es dâ€™autocertification comprennent le nom, lâ€™adresse de rÃ©sidence, pays de rÃ©sidence fiscale (quâ€™il y en ait un ou plusieurs), le NIF, ainsi que le lieu et la date de naissance. Si vous Ãªtes rÃ©sident fiscal amÃ©ricain (ressortissant des Ã‰tats-Unis), vous devez Ã©galement fournir votre NIF amÃ©ricain (nouvel onglet). Veuillez suivre ce lien (nouvel onglet) pour en savoir plus sur le FATCA et ce que vous devez faire pour dÃ©terminer si vous Ãªtes une Personne amÃ©ricaine, et si par consÃ©quent vous devez nous fournir votre NIF amÃ©ricain.Nous sommes tenus dâ€™effectuer des contrÃ´les rÃ©guliers pour nous assurer que vos informations fiscales pertinentes stockÃ©es dans notre systÃ¨me sont correctes (en procÃ©dant Ã  ce que lâ€™on appelle la Â« diligence raisonnable permanente Â»). Si la diligence raisonnable requise rÃ©vÃ¨le des inexactitudes, nous vous contacterons pour obtenir des informations correctes et Ã  jour.Notre recommandationVeuillez noter que nous sommes tenus, en dernier recours, dâ€™appliquer des mesures restrictives Ã  votre compte si nous ne sommes pas en mesure dâ€™obtenir dans les dÃ©lais applicables des informations correctes et Ã  jour aux fins de la NCD et du FATCA dÃ©crits ci-dessus.Nous vous recommandons de vÃ©rifier et de mettre Ã  jour rÃ©guliÃ¨rement vos informations fiscales pertinentes. Nâ€™oubliez pas que si vous ne le faites pas, cela peut Ã©galement avoir des consÃ©quences directes pour vous. Par exemple, lâ€™administration fiscale peut directement vous imposer des sanctions. Pour vÃ©rifier et mettre Ã  jour vos informations depuis votre application N26 :AccÃ©dez Ã  DÃ©tails duÂ compte > Informations personnelles > Informations fiscalesAppuyez sur Â« Ajouter un nouveau pays dâ€™imposition Â», indiquez si vous Ãªtes une Personne amÃ©ricaine et suivez les instructions donnÃ©esPour ajouter un pays dâ€™imposition supplÃ©mentaire (si vous Ãªtes rÃ©sident fiscal dans plusieurs pays), cliquez sur Â« Ajouter un nouveau pays dâ€™imposition Â» et suivez les instructionsLa suppression du pays dâ€™imposition existant nâ€™est possible quâ€™aprÃ¨s avoir ajoutÃ© un nouveau pays dâ€™impositionInformations importantesVous pouvez toujours vÃ©rifier les informations fiscales dont nous disposons actuellement en accÃ©dant Ã  : DÃ©tails du Mon compte > Informations personnelles > Informations fiscales.Dans tous les cas, vos donnÃ©es Ã  caractÃ¨re personnel seront stockÃ©es de maniÃ¨re sÃ©curisÃ©e et uniquement utilisÃ©es pour nous acquitter des exigences de la NCD, du FATCA ou dâ€™autres exigences similaires.Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de vous donner des conseils sur votre statut fiscal. En cas de doute, veuillez en discuter avec un conseiller fiscal et/ou lâ€™administration fiscale.

title: How to make a donation with N26?
content: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier.Â You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the listÂ Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

title: Round-Up Savings
content: Mit der Funktion â€Round-up Savingsâ€œ kÃ¶nnen Premiumkunden jede von ihnen getÃ¤tigte Kartentransaktion auf den nÃ¤chsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung fÃ¼hrt nicht zu einer Ãœberziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du Ã¼ber kein ausreichendes Guthaben verfÃ¼gen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt.Du kannst immer nur eine â€Round-upâ€œ-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl Ã¼berweisen.Du kannst die Funktion â€Round-upâ€œ jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schlieÃŸt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die â€Round-upâ€œ-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.Wie kann ich die "Aufrundungsregel" nutzen?Die Aktivierung der "Aufrundungsregel" geht schnell und einfach. Logge dich dazu einfach in die mobile App oder Web-App von N26 ein:Gehe zum Bereich "Spaces".WÃ¤hle den Space, auf den die Differenz zum aufgerundeten Betrag (das Restgeld) flieÃŸen soll.Tippe/Klicke auf "Verwalten" --> "Aufrundungsregel verwalten".Schalte die Funktion "Aufrundungsregel verwalten" auf grÃ¼n.WÃ¤hle den Multiplikator und tippe/klicke anschlieÃŸend auf "BestÃ¤tigen".Spare direkt bei deinem nÃ¤chsten Einkauf mit deiner N26 Debitkarte!

title: Come verifico la mia identitÃ ?
content: In qualitÃ  di banca, abbiamo bisogno di sapere chi sei. Ecco perchÃ© devi dimostrare la tua identitÃ  con un documento supportato quando apri un conto con noi o richiedi alcuni prodotti. Non ti chiederemoÂ maiÂ di dimostrare la tua identitÃ  per conto di altre persone o aziende. Abbiamo raccolto deiÂ suggerimenti per aiutarti a proteggere la tua identitÃ .Puoi mostrarci il tuo documento dâ€™identitÃ  in due modi:Â foto oÂ video. Il modo in cui puoi dimostrare la tua identitÃ  dipende dalla tua nazionalitÃ , dal tuo paese di residenza e dal tipo di documento dâ€™identitÃ  che utilizzi:Vivo in Germania (nuova tabella)Vivo in Spagna (nuova tabella)Vivo in Italia (nuova tabella)Vivo in un altro paese (nuova tabella)In quanto banca regolamentata e in possesso di piena licenza bancaria, N26 Ã¨ tenuta ad aderire a rigorosi standard e linee guida per quanto riguarda la verifica di tutti i potenziali clienti. Questi variano a seconda della nazionalitÃ , motivo per cui possiamo eseguire il passaggio principale di verifica dell'identitÃ  solo con determinate tipologie di documenti per alcune nazionalitÃ .Se i tuoi documenti d'identitÃ  non sono in un formato attualmente supportato, significa che non possiamo offrirti un conto al momento. Considera che la lista con i documenti accettati viene aggiornata continuamente, per cui ti consigliamo di controllare di tanto in tanto se Ã¨ stato aggiunto anche il tuo.La chat Ã¨ disponibile dal lunedÃ¬ alla domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: What is a Virtual Card?
content: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account youâ€™ll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10â‚¬ to activate the card).Â An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10â‚¬ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on â€˜Get an additional cardâ€™.Select â€˜Virtualâ€™ at the top, then tap â€˜Chooseâ€™ at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap â€˜Generate virtual cardâ€™.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect â€˜cardsâ€™Locate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select â€˜card detailsâ€™You will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

title: Can I order a checkbook?
content: Because weâ€™re a mobile bank, all of our services are digitalâ€”accessible via our app or online. Thatâ€™s why N26 doesnâ€™t issue checkbooks. Instead, we offer lots of other convenient ways to transfer money without having to visit a branch.Here are a few ways you can transfer funds to your account or make payments:By bank transferVia MoneyBeam (instant payments between N26 accounts)With a bank cardVia direct deposit (by providing your RIB to your employer)

title: Marketing Communication Settings
content: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

title: Wie kann ich mein Smartphone mit meinem Konto verknÃ¼pfen oder trennen?
content:
FÃ¼r die Nutzung deines N26 Kontos brauchst du eines der folgenden Smartphones:ãƒ» iPhone (5s oder neuer, mindestens auf iOS 11 geupdated)
ãƒ» Android (6.0 oder neuer)Die Amazon Fire und Oxygen OS Versionen sind zurzeit leider nicht mit N26 kompatibel.Beachte bitte, dass du nur ein Smartphone pro N26 Konto verknÃ¼pfen kannst.Wann muss ich mein Smartphone verknÃ¼pfen?Du musst dein Smartphone verbinden bzw. entkoppeln, wenn du ein neues Konto bei N26 einrichtest, ein neues EndgerÃ¤t nutzt oder deine Telefonnummer wechselst.Wie kann ich mein N26 Konto mit meinem Handy verbinden?Smartphone zum ersten Mal verknÃ¼pfenFolge dieser Anleitung, um dein Smartphone zum ersten Mal mit deinem Konto zu verbinden:Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein â€“ du wirst automatisch aufgefordert, deine Telefonnummer zu bestÃ¤tigen.Du erhÃ¤ltst einen 4-stelligen VerknÃ¼pfungscode per SMS (neuen Tab). Sobald du ihn eingibst, wird dein Handy automatisch verknÃ¼pft.Neues EndgerÃ¤t verknÃ¼pfenBeachte bitte, dass du nur ein Smartphone pro N26 Konto verknÃ¼pfen kannst.Falls du dein N26 Konto mit einem neuen Handy verbinden willst, musst du aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden (neuen Tab) zuerst dein altes Smartphone entkoppeln.So entkoppelst du dein altes Smartphone:Gehe auf ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto (in der mobilen App) oder Ã¼ber die Web App (neuer Tab) (neuen Tab)Tippe auf SicherheitTippe auf Smartphone entknÃ¼pfen.Falls du auf dein altes Smartphone nicht mehr zugreifen kannst:Logge dich unter ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto einTippe auf SicherheitPrÃ¼fe dein E-Mail-Postfach fÃ¼r weitere Anweisungen.Falls du dich Ã¼ber ein neues GerÃ¤t in deinem Konto anmeldest, erhÃ¤ltst du zwei Codes per SMS:Einen 6-stelligen Code zum EinloggenEinen 4-stelligen Code zum VerknÃ¼pfen deines SmartphonesDen 6-stelligen Anmeldecode brauchst du, um dich in dein Konto einzuloggen. Dann kannst du dein Smartphone mithilfe des 4-stelligen VerknÃ¼pfungscode verbinden.Beachte bitte: Wenn du deine SIM-Karte wechselst, aber dasselbe Smartphone nutzt, musst du es nicht erneut verknÃ¼pfen bzw. entkoppeln.

title: Why canâ€™t I get a loan?
content: Applies to Germany and FranceWhen applying for N26 Credit, we ask about your personal and financial situation during our assessment. If N26 isnâ€™t your main account, youâ€™ll need to securely log into your online bank account at another bank to continue with the application.For second bank accounts, we only accept banks from the country where youâ€™re applying from (for example, French customers can only add a French bank account and German customers can only add a German bank account).Weâ€™ll also look at your current SCHUFA credit score. This search will appear on your SCHUFA report but is only visible to you and won't negatively impact your score. However, your score isnâ€™t the only factor: we also require information about your monthly income, excluding any payments from public authorities (such as unemployment or child benefits).Once youâ€™ve sent an application to us, youâ€™re unable to change your answers for 90 days (even if your creditworthiness improves). Youâ€™ll have to wait until then to apply for another loan.The decision is then calculated through an automated process. We cannot perform manual checks.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

title: What is a Virtual Card?
content: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account youâ€™ll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10â‚¬ to activate the card).Â An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10â‚¬ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on â€˜Get an additional cardâ€™.Select â€˜Virtualâ€™ at the top, then tap â€˜Chooseâ€™ at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap â€˜Generate virtual cardâ€™.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect â€˜cardsâ€™Locate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select â€˜card detailsâ€™You will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

title: How does N26 Business Metal work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs â‚¬16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate.Â Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Â Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
content:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.Â How does it work?Â The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?Â Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of AttorneyÂ Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a personâ€™s identity, and itâ€™s not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.Â As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.Â Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

title: How to change my card limits?
content: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:â‚¬1,000 for withdrawals from ATMsâ‚¬5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500â‚¬ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050â‚¬ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:â‚¬20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: Custom Audiences
content: Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Facebook ermÃ¶glicht es uns benutzerdefinierte und Lookalike Zielgruppen zu erstellen. Diese sog. â€Lookalike-Audiencesâ€œ sind unseren Kunden Ã¤hnlicher als der durchschnittliche Facebook Nutzer.Â Um die oben beschrieben Vorteile nutzen zu kÃ¶nnen, stellen wir Facebook eine â€œgehashteâ€ Version deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse zur VerfÃ¼gung. Das sog. â€œHashingâ€ ist eine Form der Pseudonymisierung durch die deine Email-Adresse verschlÃ¼sselt wird, sodass du anhand dieser gehashten E-Mail-Adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden kannst. Facebook teilt diese Daten nicht mit Dritten oder anderen Werbetreibenden oder gewÃ¤hrt diesen Zugang zu deinen Daten. Diese und weitere Informationen kannst du den AGB von Facebook (neuen Tab) entnehmen.Â Facebook Ireland Limited Ã¼bermittelt Daten an Facebook Inc., USA. Die USA ist ein Land, das im Sinne der EU-Verordnung 2016/679 (â€DSGVOâ€œ) keinen angemessenen Schutz personenbezogener Daten bietet; das bedeutet unter anderem, dass staatliche Stellen in den USA gegebenenfalls berechtigt sind, auf deine Daten zuzugreifen, ohne dass wirksame Rechtsbehelfe verfÃ¼gbar sind.Sie kÃ¶nnen Ihre Einwilligung in diese Datenverarbeitung gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 6 Abs. 1 Buchst. a DSGVO in der N26 Web App und der mobilen App jederzeit widerrufen.Â Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Google Customer MatchCustomer Match ermÃ¶glicht es uns benutzerdefinierte und Lookalike Zielgruppen zu erstellen. Benutzerdefinierte Zielgruppen bestehen aus N26 Kunden und Internetnutzern, denen personalisierte Inhalte angezeigt werden, oder nur aus Internetnutzern, um dich als bestehenden N26 Kunden von bestimmten Werbungen von uns Ã¼ber das Google Search Network, den Shopping Tab, Gmail, YouTube und Google Display Network auszuschlieÃŸen. Wir mÃ¶chten dir keine irrelevante Werbung anzeigen. Mithilfe von Lookalike Audiences kÃ¶nnen wir eine relevante Zielgruppe definieren, fÃ¼r welche die angezeigte Werbung interessanter ist als fÃ¼r andere Google Nutzer. Diese sog. â€Lookalike-Audiencesâ€œ sind unseren Kunden Ã¤hnlicher als der durchschnittliche Google Nutzer.Um die oben beschriebenen Vorteile nutzen zu kÃ¶nnen, stellen wir Google eine gehashte Version Ihrer N26-E-Mail-Adresse zur VerfÃ¼gung. Das sog. â€Hashingâ€œ ist eine Form der Pseudonymisierung, bei der Ihre E-Mail-Adresse so verschlÃ¼sselt wird, dass Sie Ã¼ber diese gehashte E-Mail-Adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden kÃ¶nnen. Google gleicht diese E-Mail-Adresse dann mit der potenziellen E-Mail-Adresse Ihres Google-Kontos ab. Wenn diese E-Mail-Adresse nicht Ã¼bereinstimmt, kann Google sie dennoch fÃ¼r die ÃœberprÃ¼fung der Einhaltung der Richtlinien verwenden. DarÃ¼ber hinaus verwendet Google sie jedoch nicht fÃ¼r den Customer Match oder andere Google-Produkte. Die Daten werden von Google nicht lÃ¤nger als 48 Stunden gespeichert, um die Zielgruppen zum Customer Match zu erstellen, und danach umgehend gelÃ¶scht. Google gibt diese Daten weder an Dritte noch an andere Werbetreibende weiter und gewÃ¤hrt auch keinen Zugriff darauf. Diese und weitere Informationen finden Sie im Support-Artikel â€Verwendung von Daten zum Customer Match durch Google (neuen Tab)â€œ.Google Ireland Limited Ã¼bermittelt Daten an Google LLC, USA. Die USA ist ein Land, das im Sinne der EU-Verordnung 2016/679 (â€DSGVOâ€œ) keinen angemessenen Schutz personenbezogener Daten bietet; das bedeutet unter anderem, dass staatliche Stellen in den USA gegebenenfalls berechtigt sind, auf deine Daten zuzugreifen, ohne dass wirksame Rechtsbehelfe verfÃ¼gbar sind.Sie kÃ¶nnen Ihre Einwilligung in diese Datenverarbeitung gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 6 Abs. 1 Buchst. a DSGVO in der N26 Web App und der mobilen App jederzeit widerrufen.

title: How to block a Direct Debit?
content: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as â€œDocuSignâ€.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

title: Espaces PartagÃ©s - Quâ€™est-ce quâ€™une procuration ?
content: Le fondement juridique dâ€™Espaces PartagÃ©s repose sur la procuration (Kontovollmacht en Allemand).Â Contrairement aux comptes joints classiques, les participants dâ€™un espace partagÃ© nâ€™ont pas les mÃªmes pouvoirs sur lâ€™espace que son administrateur. AprÃ¨s avoir reÃ§u une procuration, les participants obtiennent le droit dâ€™agir au nom de lâ€™administrateur de lâ€™espace pour effectuer des virements vers/depuis lâ€™espace partagÃ© concernÃ©.La personne qui autorise un participant dâ€™agir en son nom est appelÃ© lâ€™â€administrateurâ€ de lâ€™espace. Ce dernier est le seul propriÃ©taire de lâ€™espace partagÃ©. Lâ€™administrateur doit Ãªtre un client N26 Premium, et donc possÃ©der un compte N26 You, N26 Metal ou N26 Business You.Cela signifie que la personne ayant crÃ©Ã© lâ€™espace partagÃ© est son dÃ©tenteur lÃ©gal. Lâ€™administrateur de lâ€™espace partagÃ© :possÃ¨de tous les fonds disponibles dans lâ€™espace partagÃ©peut effectuer des virements librement vers et depuis lâ€™espace partagÃ©, Ã  tout momentpeut inviter des amis Ã  rejoindre un espace partagÃ© en leur donnant une procurationpeut rÃ©silier la procuration dâ€™un participant Ã  tout momentpeut aussi clÃ´turer un espace partagÃ© aprÃ¨s avoir retirÃ© un participant (tous les fonds de lâ€™espace partagÃ© seront alors virÃ©s vers le compte principal de lâ€™administrateur)En obtenant une procuration, les participants qui acceptent lâ€™invitation de lâ€™administrateur auront accÃ¨s Ã  tous les fonds disponibles dans lâ€™espace partagÃ©. Cela signifie que chaque bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire peut aussi effectuer des virements librement vers et en dehors de lâ€™espace partagÃ©.N26 Bank GmbH ne peut Ãªtre tenue responsable des paiements effectuÃ©s dans le cadre de la procuration.Pour en savoir plus sur les Espaces partagÃ©s, visitez notre article Que sont les Espaces PartagÃ©s ?.DÃ©couvrez Ã©galement comment ajouter/supprimer des participants dans un espace partagÃ©.

title: Wie funktioniert 3D Secure?
content: 3D Secure schÃ¼tzt dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug. Die Funktion wird automatisch aktiviert, wenn du deine Karte in der App aktivierst. Du brauchst keine zusÃ¤tzlichen PasswÃ¶rter.Wenn du eineÂ Online-ZahlungÂ mit deiner Mastercard vornimmst, bestÃ¤tigt 3D Secure die Transaktion innerhalb von 5 Minuten durch eine Push-Nachricht. Wenn du die Transaktion nicht siehst, versuche es mit unserenÂ Tipps zur Fehlerbehebung.Bitte beachten: die Push-Benachrichtigung wird nur an das verknÃ¼pfte Smartphone gesendet.Wenn du einen Kauf Ã¼ber dein Smartphone tÃ¤tigst, siehst du die ausstehende Transaktion in der App. Tippe auf das Glockensymbol, dann wird eine Push-Meldung angezeigt, mit der du deinen Kauf bestÃ¤tigen und abschlieÃŸen kannst. Danach gehst du zurÃ¼ck zur Website des HÃ¤ndlers. Du solltest innerhalb weniger Augenblicke eine BestÃ¤tigung fÃ¼r deinen erfolgreichen Einkauf sehen.

title: Wie kann ich meine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN Ã¤ndern?
content: Schritt-fÃ¼r-Schritt Anleitung:iPhoneAndroidSchritt 1Ã–ffne die N26 App und tippe oben rechts auf Mein Konto Schritt 2Scrolle herunter und tippe auf SicherheitSchritt 3Tippe auf Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscodeSchritt 4Gib deine Tokennummer ein: die 10-stellige Nummer auf der RÃ¼ckseite deiner KarteSchritt 5Erstelle und bestÃ¤tige deine neue BestÃ¤tigungs-PINSchritt 1Ã–ffne die N26 App und tippe oben rechts auf Mein Konto Schritt 2Scrolle herunter und tippe auf SicherheitSchritt 3Tippe auf Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscodeSchritt 4Gib deine Tokennummer ein: die 10-stellige Nummer auf der RÃ¼ckseite deiner KarteSchritt 5Erstelle und bestÃ¤tige deine neue BestÃ¤tigungs-PINMit der BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN bestÃ¤tigst du Ãœberweisungen und andere Transaktionen, die du in der App tÃ¤tigst. Bei der VerknÃ¼pfung deines Smartphones (neuen Tab) mit deinem Konto legst du die BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN selbst fest. Falls du deinen PIN-Code Ã¤ndern willst oder vergessen hast, kannst du jederzeit einen neuen in deiner App festlegen:Gehe auf ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > Sicherheit.Tippe auf Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscode.Gib den Token ein (die 10-stellige Nummer auf der Vorderseite deiner Karte, gleich unter deinem Namen; bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der RÃ¼ckseite).Erstelle und bestÃ¤tige deine neue BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN.Falls du sechsmal in Folge eine falsche BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN eintrÃ¤gst, musst du sie vor dem nÃ¤chsten Versuch neu festlegen.Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden akzeptieren wir keine PINs, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder Zahlenkombinationen mit Wiederholungen oder Zahlenreihen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) zusammensetzen. Falls deine gewÃ¼nschte PIN nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Bedenke bitte, dass deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN nicht dasselbe wie deine Karten-PIN (neuen Tab) ist. Falls du willst, kannst du aber fÃ¼r beide PINs dieselbe Zahlenkombination wÃ¤hlen.

content:

title: Quanto costa la sostituzione della mia carta scaduta o in scadenza?
content: La carta sostitutiva Ã¨ gratuita per tutti i clienti possessori di un conto N26 Smart, You e Metal.Se hai aperto il tuo conto prima delle seguenti date, sia la nuova carta che la spedizione al tuo indirizzo sono gratuiti nei paesi in cui N26 Ã¨ disponibile (nuova tabella):16/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale nella Grande Europa)25/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Italia o Spagna)11/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Francia)18/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Germania, Austria o Svizzera)Se il tuo conto Ã¨ stato creato in seguito, la tua carta sostitutiva avrÃ  lo stesso costo di una carta nuova.Se attualmente ti trovi in un Paese non supportato da N26, contatta il nostro Supporto Clienti tramite chat o telefono, cosÃ¬ possiamo effettuare lâ€™ordine per te. La consegna al di fuori di questi Paesi (nuova tabella) potrebbe comportare un costo aggiuntivo.Â Quanto tempo ci vorrÃ ?Tutte le carte sostitutive delle carte scadute o in scadenza vengono spedite tramite consegna Standard. Richiede fino a 15 giorni lavorativi ed Ã¨ gratuita. Nelle zone rurali o difficili da raggiungere potrebbe volerci piÃ¹ tempo. title: Dove investe i miei soldi N26?
content: Ci sforziamo di fornire ai nostri clienti depositi per i prestiti (a condizione che abbiano un appropriato rating di credito). Per la liquiditÃ  non richiesta nel business dei clienti, la nostra strategia di investimento Ã¨ a basso rischio.Investiamo i soldi dei nostri clienti in breve tempo con la Deutsche Bundesbank e altre banche europee nell'area dell'euro, solamente con buone classi di rischio. E rifinanziamo i clienti di diritto pubblico principalmente in Germania (cittÃ  e comuni) e investendo in titoli di stato in euro.Non siamo un istituto di trading book. CioÃ¨: non scambiamo per profitto a breve termine.E non ci occupiamo di speculazioni, sia sul cibo, sui cambi, su bitcoin o su altre classi di attivitÃ .

title: Was ist eine PfÃ¤ndung?
content: Wenn du einem Dritten, dem Finanzamt oder einer sonstigen BehÃ¶rde Geld schuldest, kann es zu einer PfÃ¤ndung kommen. Doch was bedeutet â€œPfÃ¤ndungâ€ genau?Bei der PfÃ¤ndung â€“ auch PfÃ¤ndungs- oder Ãœberweisungsbeschluss genannt â€“ handelt es sich um eine staatliche MaÃŸnahme, bei der durch einen Gerichtsvollzieher oder ein Gericht das verfÃ¼gbare Geld auf deinem Konto beschlagnahmt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass du dein Geld nicht anderweitig ausgibst und die Schulden bei deinem GlÃ¤ubiger beglichen werden.Was passiert bei einer PfÃ¤ndung?Wir sind gesetzlich dazu verpflichtet, dein Konto sofort zu sperren, wenn uns ein PfÃ¤ndungs- und Ãœberweisungsbeschluss zugestellt wird. DarÃ¼ber hinaus mÃ¼ssen wir den PfÃ¤ndungsbetrag an den GlÃ¤ubiger auszahlen. Dies tun wir 4 Wochen nach Zustellung des PfÃ¤ndungs- und Ãœberweisungsbeschlusses, sofern du keine anderen MaÃŸnahmen ergreifst.Â Wenn wir eine PfÃ¤ndung fÃ¼r dein Konto erhalten, schicken wir dir eine Nachricht unter â€œNachrichten von N26â€ in deiner N26 App. Die Nachricht enthÃ¤lt folgende Informationen:DatumÂ Name des GlÃ¤ubigers (und Name des rechtlichen Vertreters)AktenzeichenBetragBis die gesamte Forderung beglichen ist, bleibt dein Konto gesperrt. Das heiÃŸt, du kannst keine Zahlungen mit deinem N26 Konto ausfÃ¼hren. Sobald die PfÃ¤ndung aufgehoben ist, benachrichtigen wir dich in deinem Postfach â€œNachrichten von N26â€. Solltest du Fragen zur PfÃ¤ndung haben, setze dich bitte mit deinem GlÃ¤ubiger oder dem zustÃ¤ndigen Vollstreckungsgericht in Verbindung.

title: How to get a loan?
content: Applies to Germany and FranceWith N26 Credit, weâ€™ve partnered with auxmoney (in Germany) and Younited Credit (in France) to offer personal loans between â‚¬1.000 to â‚¬50.000 with repayment terms of 6 to 84 months.For Younited Credit, you will receive a referral link that will take you from the app to continue the process with Younited.Request a loan at any time directly in the app into the Explore section then N26 Financial Products : Weâ€™ll ask you a few questions about the loan and your creditworthiness (youâ€™ll need to provide additional online banking information for your main account if youâ€™ve used N26 for less than 6 months).Prove your identity: Weâ€™ll need to see your ID card or passport in Germany and possibly your proof of residence (in the form of a utility bill or similar). And if youâ€™re a non-EU citizen, youâ€™ll need to send us a photo of your residency permit.Edit your answers during the application process: Once youâ€™re happy with your loan application, send it to us in real-time and weâ€™ll make you a binding offer that you can delete or accept. Otherwise applications expire in 90 days and you wonâ€™t be able to request another loan during that time.Confirm your loan: If you accept our offer, youâ€™ll either have to sign the contract electronically through a video call or confirm via SMS message.Receive a push message as soon as the payment has been made: In Germany, the loan amount will be credited to your N26 account within 5-7 working days. In France, payouts take a week.We offer interest rates between 1.99% and 19% p.a. Apart from the interest, there are no other charges. However, if youÂ change your planÂ or are in default of your monthly payments, additional fees may apply.For more information, see the N26 CreditÂ T&Cs (new tab).

title: What is my PIN number?
content:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codesâ€”your Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun factâ€”you create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. Youâ€™re the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

title: Warum hat mir ein Geldautomat kein Bargeld ausgezahlt?
content: Es kann passieren: Ein Geldautomat zahlt dir kein Bargeld aus und in einigen FÃ¤llen wird dein Konto trotzdem belastet. ÃœberprÃ¼fe zunÃ¤chst die folgenden Punkte:Stelle in deinen Karteneinstellungen sicher, dass Bargeldabhebungen aktiviert sind. Deine Karteneinstellungen findest du im Aktionen-Tab.ÃœberprÃ¼fe, dass dein individuell einstellbares Limit fÃ¼r Bargeldabhebungen mindestens so hoch ist, wie der Betrag, den du abheben wolltest.Beachte, dass du nur soviel Geld abheben kannst, wie du Guthaben auf deinem Konto hast. Zahle Geld auf dein Konto ein oder beantrag einen Dispokredit, um Ã¼ber genug Guthaben zu verfÃ¼gen.Das maximal einstellbare Tageslimit liegt bei 1000â‚¬ pro 24 Stunden. Dennoch haben viele Automaten ihre eigene Limits, sodass es vorkommen kann, dass du an einem Automaten nicht dein ganzes Tageslimit auf einmal abheben kannst.AuÃŸerdem gilt ein Limit von 2500â‚¬ pro Kalenderwoche.Ich habe kein Geld erhalten, aber mein Konto wurde trotzdem belastetDer Betrag, der in der App von deinem Guthaben abgezogen wurde, ist zunÃ¤chst nur eine Autorisierung, d.h. eine Reservierung des Betrags. Da die Transaktion nicht erfolgreich war, verfÃ¤llt der reservierte Betrag normalerweise nach wenigen Stunden - maximal 12 Werktagen - und wird deinem Konto dann automatisch wieder gutgeschrieben. Nur wenn der Betrag tatsÃ¤chlich abgebucht wird, kÃ¶nnen wir ihn reklamieren, also zurÃ¼ckfordern. Der Betrag wurde erst abgebucht, wenn er auf deinen herunterladbaren KontoauszÃ¼gen erscheint, (nicht nur in der Umsatzanzeige in der App).Das bedeutet: Wenn der Betrag auf deinen herunterladbaren KontoauszÃ¼gen erscheint und/oder nach 12 Werktagen noch nicht deinem Konto wieder gutgeschrieben wurde, kannst du den Betrag reklamieren, wobei wir dir selbstverstÃ¤ndlich gerne helfen.Unterdessen empfehlen wir, mit CASH26 oder bei einem Geldautomaten eines anderen Geldinstituts Geld abzuheben.

Ensuite, vos frais mensuels seront prÃ©levÃ©s Ã  la date de votre adhÃ©sion. Si vous avez ouvert votre compte Ã  la fin du mois, cela signifie que les deux premiers frais mensuels seront prÃ©levÃ©s le mois suivant.Pensez Ã  alimenter votre compte aprÃ¨s avoir terminÃ© lâ€™ouverture de votre compte premium : pour recevoir votre carte, le solde de votre compte doit vous permettre de rÃ©gler les frais mensuels de votre adhÃ©sio N26 Smart.Vous pouvez dÃ©sormais payer vos frais mensuels pour les comptes Premium Ã  lâ€™avance pour les 6 mois ou lâ€™annÃ©e suivant le contrat. Si vous choisissez lâ€™option de paiement anticipÃ©, vous profiterez dâ€™une rÃ©duction sur les frais mensuels de tenue de votre compte Premium (Smart / You / Metal), proportionnelle Ã  la pÃ©riode de facturation souhaitÃ©e.

title: Pourquoi est-ce que je ne vois pas certains utilisateurs de N26 sur MoneyBeam ?
content: Pour vous permettre dâ€™effectuer des virements en temps rÃ©el grÃ¢ce Ã Â MoneyBeam, N26 accÃ¨de Ã  votre liste de contacts pour identifier ceux qui sont Ã©galement clients N26, dâ€™aprÃ¨s leur numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone ou leur adresse email.Si vous ne voyez pas lâ€™un de vos amis sur MoneyBeam, mais que vous savez quâ€™il est client N26, câ€™est probablement parce quâ€™il a dÃ©cidÃ© de ne pas Ãªtre visible. Si câ€™est le cas, votre contact ne recevra pas le virement immÃ©diatement (lâ€™argent reviendra sur votre compte au bout dâ€™une semaine).Pour Ã©viter de vous retrouver dans cette situation, vÃ©rifiez auprÃ¨s de votre ami quel numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone ou quelle adresse email est liÃ©e Ã  son compte N26.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content: We collaborate with many partners. Thatâ€™s why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldnâ€™t be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).Youâ€™re taxable in the United States. If so, you wonâ€™t be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.
