title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ from the mobile app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â (if you havenâ€™t activated your card and need toÂ top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by theÂ check digitsÂ (two numbers), then ourÂ bank codeÂ 10011001 and end with your 10-digitÂ account numberÂ (start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner ofÂ Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: How does Spaces work?
content: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as youâ€™d like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, youâ€™ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

title: PerchÃ© non riesco a vedere gli altri utenti N26 su MoneyBeam?
content: Per eseguire un trasferimento MoneyBeam, N26 dovrÃ  accedere alla tua rubrica e individuare altri utenti N26 in base al numero di telefono o indirizzo e-mail salvati.Â In alternativa, puoi inserire i dati di un utente N26 manualmente.Se non vedi il nome del tuo amico, ma sai che Ã¨ un utente N26, molto probabilmente non si Ã¨ reso visibile. Ãˆ facoltÃ  degli utenti decidere se revocare il proprio consenso ad essere identificabile come utente N26.Â I trasferimenti MoneyBeam possono avere un esito negativo quando in rubrica vengono salvati svariati numeri di telefono o indirizzi e-mail per uno stesso utente N26. Per evitare che questa accada, accertati di avere lâ€™indirizzo e-mail o il numero di telefono corretti.Â

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

title: Cosa fare se hai perso la tua carta o i suoi dati sono stati compromessi?
content: Se hai smarrito la tua carta o sospetti che sia finita nelle mani sbagliate, puoi bloccarla e sbloccarla (nuova tabella) in qualsiasi momento dall'app N26.Puoi bloccare la carta temporaneamente o disabilitarla in modo permanente (a seconda del caso) e (nuova tabella) ordinarne una nuova (nuova tabella) tramite l'app N26 o la web app.Â Se sospetti che l'utilizzo della tua carta non sia piÃ¹ sicuro, effettua i seguenti passaggi:Vai alla scheda â€˜Carteâ€™Clicca su 'Impostazioni della carta'Scorri verso destra e seleziona la carta che vuoi disabilitare temporaneamente o bloccare.Infine, se vuoi bloccarla definitivamente, seleziona 'Ordina una nuova carta'In questo modo hai il pieno controllo sulla tua carta e puoi tutelarti contro le transazioni non autorizzate. (nuova tabella)Se noti qualcosa di sospetto, ti consigliamo di bloccare immediatamente la carta. Potrai sempre sbloccarla in un secondo momento.

title: Dovâ€™Ã¨ il mio rimborso?
content: Nella maggior parte dei casi, il tuo rimborso sarÃ  visibile nellâ€™app lo stesso giorno della transazione originale e non in quello del rimborso. Per trovarlo, scorri lâ€™elenco delle transazioni o scarica i tuoi precedenti estratti conto.Per visualizzare e scaricare il tuo estratto conto in PDF:dalla Webapp (nuova tabella): clicca sullâ€™icona con la freccia nellâ€™angolo in alto a destra, e accedi alla sezione Download dove puoi scaricare tutti i documenti relativi al tuo contodalla app mobile:Â - iOS, seleziona i tre puntini alla destra del tuo saldo sulla schermata principale. Un menu a comparsa ti darÃ  modo di accedere al tuo estratto conto.- Android, troverai lâ€™opzione sotto Statistiche (seleziona i tre puntini nellâ€™angolo in alto a destra).Gli importi bloccati come deposito per il noleggio auto possono richiedere fino a 30 giorni per tornare sul tuo conto, mentre il rimborso di un pagamento con carta verrÃ  automaticamente accreditato sul tuo conto entro un massimo di 14 giorni.

title: What is a N26 Standard Account?
content: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of â‚¬50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional â‚¬10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least â‚¬10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

content:

title: Quâ€™est-ce quâ€™une connexion inhabituelle Ã  mon compte N26 ?
content: Pourquoi ai-je reÃ§u cet email ?Chez N26, la sÃ©curitÃ© est notre prioritÃ© absolue. Lorsque notre systÃ¨me dÃ©tecte une tentative de connexion inhabituelle, nous vous en informons immÃ©diatement afin que des mesures puissent Ãªtre prises pour sÃ©curiser votre compte. Si vous avez reÃ§u une alerte et que vous pensez que quelquâ€™un a essayÃ© de se connecter Ã  votre compte, il vous suffit de rÃ©initialiser rapidement votre mot de passe. Si vous reconnaissez la tentative de connexion indiquÃ©e dans lâ€™alerte, vous pouvez simplement lâ€™ignorer.Comment rÃ©initialiser mon mot de passe ?Pour rÃ©initialiser votre mot de passe, connectez-vous Ã  votre compte depuis votre application ou votre navigateur internet, puis accÃ©dez Ã  Mon compte â†’ ParamÃ¨tres â†’ SÃ©curitÃ©.Si vous ne pouvez pas accÃ©der Ã  votre compte, cliquez sur Mot de passe oubliÃ© sur lâ€™Ã©cran de connexion. Ensuite, il vous suffit de saisir votre adresse email et de demander un lien de rÃ©initialisation du mot de passe.Lorsque vous choisissez un nouveau mot de passe, nous vous rappelons que vous devez absolument Ã©viter de rÃ©utiliser les mÃªmes mots de passe sur plusieurs plateformes. Veillez Ã  utiliser un mot de passe unique pour chacun de vos comptes. Rassurez-vous, le changement de mot de passe suffit pour garantir la sÃ©curitÃ© de votre compte. Si vous souhaitez en discuter, notre Service Client est lÃ  pour vous.

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.Youâ€™ll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if youÂ reorder a card. Youâ€™ll then receive a tracking link by email. If youâ€™re not home during the delivery and your mailbox canâ€™t be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, itâ€™ll be returned to us. Weâ€™ll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. Itâ€™s currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.Itâ€™s not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once itâ€™s been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasnâ€™t arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you canâ€™t be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card: 30â‚¬Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30â‚¬N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card 65â‚¬

title: Wie sperre ich die kontaktlose Bezahlfunktion meiner Karte?
content: Derzeit nur fÃ¼r iOS-Nutzer in der mobilen App verfÃ¼gbar.Â Kontaktloses Bezahlen ist sehr praktisch. Vielleicht bevorzugst du es jedoch, diese Zahlungsmethode zu deaktivieren, um unberechtigte Transaktionen mit deiner Karte zu verhindern. Deshalb kannst du jetzt gezielt NFC-Zahlungen fÃ¼r deine Karte deaktivieren:Gehe auf Karten.Wenn du mehrere Karten hast, wische nach rechts, bis die gewÃ¼nschte Karte erscheint.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Schalte die Funktion Kontaktlose Bezahlung aus.Die von dir vorgenommenen Ã„nderungen werden sofort auf die von dir gewÃ¤hlte Karte angewendet. Beachte bitte, dass sich diese Einstellungen auf deine physische Karte beziehen. Zur Verwaltung deiner Einstellungen fÃ¼r Google Pay und Apple Pay haben wir spezielle Artikel fÃ¼r dich zusammengestellt. Falls de Probleme mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlfunktion hast, lerne hier, wie du sie beheben kannst.

title: Come ricevere i messaggi push?
content: Ti inviamo messaggi push per finalizzare i trasferimenti (comeÂ MoneyBeam) o per confermare un servizio (come nel caso diÂ CASH26). Se non ricevi questi messaggi, verifica innanzitutto che le notifiche siano abilitate sia per il telefono che per l'app. Quindi prova alcuni dei nostri suggerimenti per la risoluzione dei problemi, a seconda dello smartphone:iOSElimina l'app N26 e riavvia lo smartphone. Scarica e installa l'ultima versione dell'app dall'App Store Apple e riassocia lo smartphone.Controlla di aver effettuato lâ€™accesso allâ€™app N26.Assicurati che la messaggistica per l'app sia stata attivata nelle impostazioni generali dello smartphone.AndroidElimina l'app N26 e riavvia lo smartphone. Scarica e installa l'ultima versione dell'app dal Google Play Store Google e riassocia lo smartphone.Vai nelle Impostazioni conto e attiva le notifiche cliccando su Impostazioni App e poi Notifiche.Huawei e Xiaomi: vai in Impostazioni, Impostazioni avanzate e Impostazioni batteria. Imposta N26 come app protetta.OnePlus: seleziona lâ€™ottimizzazione della batteria, poi l'app N26 e Non ottimizzare.Oppo: disattiva l'ottimizzazione della batteria per l'app e bloccala in Panoramica app recenti.

title: Marketing Communication Settings
content: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

title: How to deposit and withdraw cash with CASH26
content: Available for accounts opened in Germany, Austria, Spain, Italy, and Greece.Withdrawing and depositing cash in retail stores with CASH26 is easyâ€“â€“all you need is your smartphone! Simply open the CASH26 map in your N26 app and zoom in to find the nearest participating store. Once youâ€™re there, generate a CASH26 barcode from your N26 app, and show it to the cashier to make your deposit or withdrawal right at the counter.Â Use CASH26 to withdraw money without a debit cardÂ With CASH26, you can withdraw money from your bank account in minutes using just your phoneâ€”thereâ€™s no need to have your N26 card on hand. Simply head to the Cards tab in your N26 app, then tap CASH26 > Withdrawal and choose the amount you want to withdraw. Next, enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Your N26 app will generate a barcode to show the cashier, who will scan it and hand over your cash. Simple as that! You can withdraw up to â‚¬200 each time, with a maximum withdrawal limit of â‚¬900 within 24 hours.Â How to deposit cash into your N26 account with CASH26Open your app and go to the Cards tab, then tap CASH26 > Deposit. Next, choose the amount you want to deposit, with a minimum of â‚¬50. Enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Once youâ€™re ready, show your CASH26 barcode to the cashier to scan, and hand them the cash. Your CASH26 deposit will be credited to your N26 account within 10 minutes.Â Hereâ€™s what else you need to know when using CASH26Your CASH26 barcode is only valid for 10 minutes. If you donâ€™t make your deposit or withdrawal in time, the code will expire and youâ€™ll need to generate a new one.Â If you enter the wrong amount by mistake, you can delete it by tapping the trash can icon in the upper right corner of your screen. Or, simply let the barcode expire and then generate a new one.You donâ€™t need to purchase anything in the partner store in order to make deposits or withdrawals with CASH26.Â N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.For more information on limits and other details, check out this article (new tab).Â

title: How to protect my identity?
content: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.
