title: Comment effectuer un virement SEPA?
content:
Vous pouvez effectuer des virements vers tous les pays faisant partie de la zone SEPA, si la banque rÃ©ceptrice accepte les virements en euros.Vous pouvez effectuer un virement sortant depuis votre application mobile N26 ou depuis sa version web app.n26.com (nouvel onglet). Pour cela : Rendez-vous dans la rubrique Envoyer en haut Ã  gauche de lâ€™Ã©cran dâ€™accueilAppuyez sur Envoyer, puis sÃ©lectionnez Virement bancaireChoisissez Ajouter un destinataire et saisissez les coordonnÃ©es bancaires du bÃ©nÃ©ficiaireEntrez le montant de votre virement VÃ©rifiez lâ€™Ã©cran de confirmation (qui rÃ©sume votre virement) Depuis cet Ã©cran, vous pouvez Ã©galement planifier la date dâ€™envoi de votre virement Confirmez avec votre code de validation. Vous devez ensuite confirmer ou annuler votre virement par notification push depuis lâ€™application mobile de votre smartphone synchronisÃ©. Nous ne pouvons pas bloquer un virement sortant ou modifier les coordonnÃ©es bancaires du destinataire aprÃ¨s que le virement a Ã©tÃ© validÃ© depuis lâ€™application mobile N26.Si vous ne pouvez pas confirmer votre virement depuis votre application, veuillez vÃ©rifier les points suivants :Assurez-vous dâ€™avoir une connexion internet stable. Assurez-vous dâ€™avoir activÃ© les notifications depuis les paramÃ¨tres de votre smartphone. Assurez-vous dâ€™utiliser un appareil synchronisÃ©.Une fois votre virement effectuÃ©, vous pouvez tÃ©lÃ©charger une confirmation de virement au format PDF. Pour cela :Rendez-vous sur votre liste de transactions (Ã©cran dâ€™accueil de votre application) Trouvez et sÃ©lectionnez le virement.Faites dÃ©filer votre Ã©cran vers le bas et sÃ©lectionnez Confirmation de virement.
Vous pouvez Ã©galement effectuer des virements SEPA sortants directement depuis les Espaces auxquels des IBAN sont associÃ©s. Il vous suffit dâ€™accÃ©der Ã  lâ€™Espace auquel est associÃ© un IBAN, dâ€™appuyer sur Â« Envoyer Â», puis de sÃ©lectionner Â« Virement bancaire Â». Ce virement fonctionnera alors comme un paiement sortant normal.

title: FATCA - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir benÃ¶tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut dazu verpflichtet, dem United States Department of Treasury sowie dem Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Informationen Ã¼ber Kundenkonten von U.S. Steuerzahlern oder auslÃ¤ndischen EntitÃ¤ten zur VerfÃ¼gung zu stellen, die laut FATCA fÃ¼r U.S. Steuerzahler von erheblichem Interesse sind.FATCA steht fÃ¼r Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act und ist ein Gesetz zur BekÃ¤mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung. EingefÃ¼hrt vom IRS erreicht FATCA bessere steuerliche Entsprechungen, indem er U.S. Steuerzahler daran hindert, auslÃ¤ndische Banken oder Finanzinstitute dafÃ¼r zu nutzen, ihre VermÃ¶genswerte und Einkommen der Besteuerung zu entziehen. Mehr Ã¼ber FATCA oder den IRS erfÃ¤hrst du auf: www.irs.gov.Anders als die meisten LÃ¤nder haben die Vereinigten Staaten ein Steuersystem, das auch diejenigen US-StaatsbÃ¼rger erfasst, deren Wohnsitz nicht in den Vereinigten Staaten liegt. Die meisten anderen LÃ¤nder besteuern die weltweiten Einkommen ihrer BÃ¼rger nur insofern, als letztere ihren Wohnsitz im Inland haben bzw. besteuern nicht diejenigen BÃ¼rger, die permanent im Ausland leben und arbeiten.Um zuverlÃ¤ssig festzustellen, ob dein Kundenkonto dem IRS mitzuteilen ist, mÃ¼ssen wir dir die folgenden 3 Fragen stellen:Hast du (auch) die US-amerikanische StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit oder besitzt du eine Green Card?
Bist du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig?
In den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig zu sein, heiÃŸt nicht ohne Weiteres, dass du dort eine persÃ¶nliche Einkommensteuer zahlen musst. Es bedeutet zunÃ¤chst nur, dass du laut amerikanischem Recht verpflichtet bist, eine SteuererklÃ¤rung abgeben musst und dein (weltweites) Einkommen dem IRS angeben musst - selbst wenn du schlieÃŸlich keine Steuern in den Vereinigten Staaten zahlen musst.
Falls ja, wie lautet deine US-amerikanische Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (US-TIN)?
Als US-TIN kannst du entweder deine US-Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) oder deine US-Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (ITIN) benutzen.Bitte beachte: Falls in deinem Konto eine amerikanische Telefonnummer oder ein amerikanischer Geburtsort registriert ist oder du einen Dauerauftrag in die USA erstellst, haben wir nach FATCA davon auszugehen, dass die in FATCA festgelegten Bestimmungen fÃ¼r dich Geltung haben, bis du uns das Gegenteil bestÃ¤tigst.Falls sich deine Lage verÃ¤ndert, kannst du deine Steuerdaten jederzeit in deiner N26 App aktualisieren. Logge dich dazu einfach in deine N26 App ein und gehe zu: 
Mein Konto > Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

title: How to activate my card?
content: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! Youâ€™ll have to activate your card whether itâ€™s your first N26 card, a replacement card, or youâ€™ve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card youâ€™re activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction â€” in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail â€” for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card â€” you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then youâ€™ll still be able to activate that new card.

title: Konto gemÃ¤ÃŸ Â§Â§ 30 ff. ZKG
content: Das Konto gemÃ¤ÃŸ Â§Â§ 39 ff. ZKG ist kein N26 Standardkonto. Das Zahlungskontengesetz (ZKG) gibt allen Verbrauchern, die sich rechtmÃ¤ÃŸig in der EuropÃ¤ischen Union aufhalten, das Recht, ein Basiszahlungskonto zu fÃ¼hren. Dies gilt fÃ¼r Personen, die in einem unterstÃ¼tzten Land leben.Unser Basiskonto hat eine monatliche GebÃ¼hr von 6â‚¬. Alle anderen GebÃ¼hren findest du in unseren Preislisten (neuen Tab). Wenn du noch kein Bankkonto bei N26 oder einem anderen Finanzinstitut in Deutschland hast, kannst du ein Basiskonto beantragen. Unter bestimmten UmstÃ¤nden kann N26 deine Anfrage ablehnen.Bitte beachte, dass einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen wie N26 Dispo, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, oder N26 Metal fÃ¼r das N26 Basiskonto nicht verfÃ¼gbar sind. Um ein Basiskonto zu beantragen:Lade das Antragsformular (neuen Tab) herunter, fÃ¼lle es aus und unterschreibe es von Hand.Dem Antrag ist ein Coupon zur Legitimation bei der Deutschen Post AG beigefÃ¼gt. Gehe zur nÃ¤chstgelegenen Postfiliale, um damit deine IdentitÃ¤t nachzuweisen.Sende uns zusÃ¤tzlich den ausgefÃ¼llten und unterschriebenen Antrag postalisch zu: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto KlosterstraÃŸe 62 - 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandSobald wir dein Formular erhalten und festgestellt haben, ob wir ein Basiskonto fÃ¼r dich erÃ¶ffnen kÃ¶nnen, senden wir dir eine E-Mail mit dem Vertrag und den AGB (neuen Tab).Den unterschriebenen Vertrag sendest du dann ebenfalls an unsere Adresse.Â Sobald wir den Vertrag erhalten haben, werden wir dein N26 Basiskonto Ã¶ffnen. Du erhÃ¤ltst dann eine Benachrichtigung.Warum bekomme ich kein Basiskonto?Unter bestimmten UmstÃ¤nden kann N26 deinen Antrag auf ein Basiskonto ablehnen. Das ist der Fall, wenn:du auÃŸerhalb eines von uns unterstÃ¼tzten Landes lebst.du bereits ein N26 Bankkonto oder ein anderes Bankkonto in Deutschland hast und es in vollem Umfang nutzen kannst.du innerhalb der letzten 3 Jahre wegen einer Straftat gegen die Bank, ihre Mitarbeiter oder ihre Kunden verurteilt wurdest.du bereits in der Vergangenheit ein Basiskonto bei N26 unterhalten hast, das wegen Ãœberziehung oder unzulÃ¤ssiger Nutzung geschlossen wurde.du die Mindestanforderungen gemÃ¤ÃŸ des GeldwÃ¤sche- und Kreditwesengesetzes nicht erfÃ¼llst.

title: Shared Spaces - Was ist eine Kontovollmacht?
content:
Shared Spaces sind keine Gemeinschaftskonten im klassischen Sinn. Sie funktionieren durch die Erteilung einer Kontovollmacht.Die Person, die die anderen Teilnehmer dazu berechtigt, in dessen Namen zu handeln, wird â€œBesitzerâ€ genannt. Diese Person ist und bleibt der alleinige Kontoinhaber. Der Besitzer muss ein N26 Premium-Kunde sein, das heiÃŸt N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You nutzen.Teilnehmer eines Shared Space sind nicht Kontoinhaber des Shared Space. Durch die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht erhalten alle Teilnehmer das Recht, im Namen des Besitzers Ã¼ber die Gelder innerhalb des Shared Spaces zu verfÃ¼gen.Das bedeutet, dass diejenige Person, die den Shared Space erstellt hat, dessen alleiniger Inhaber ist. Der Besitzer eines Shared Space
ist Besitzer des gesamten Guthabens auf dem Shared Space.kann Ã¼ber die Gelder des Shared Space jederzeit verfÃ¼gen.kann andere Teilnehmer einladen, indem er ihnen eine Kontovollmacht erteilt.kann die Kontovollmacht eines Teilnehmers jederzeit widerrufen.kann einen Shared Space schlieÃŸen, nachdem alle Teilnehmer entfernt worden sind (in diesem Fall werden alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space dem Hauptkonto des Besitzers gutgeschrieben).
Die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht hat zur Folge, dass der jeweilige Teilnehmer vollen Zugriff auf das gesamte Guthaben des Shared Space hat. Das bedeutet, dass auch die Teilnehmer eines Shared Spaces Ã¼ber alle dort verbuchten Gelder frei verfÃ¼gen kÃ¶nnen.Die N26 Bank GmbH kann nicht haftbar gemacht werden fÃ¼r Zahlungen, die von einer Kontovollmacht gedeckt sind.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzufÃ¼gen oder davon entfernen?

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content: Youâ€™ll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whetherÂ MoneyBeam, standing orders, orÂ CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you eitherÂ ConfirmÂ orÂ CancelÂ it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from yourÂ card PINÂ but you can use the same number for both. Youâ€™ll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN afterÂ connecting your smartphoneÂ (whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN byÂ changing itÂ in the app.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. Youâ€™ll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency MechanismÂ As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26â€™s public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen APIÂ  & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as â€œpendingâ€ will be classified as â€œbookedâ€ transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 Weâ€™ve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

title: Why canâ€™t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content: To carry out real-time transactions such asÂ MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphoneâ€™s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someoneâ€™s contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you donâ€™t see your friendâ€™s name on MoneyBeam but you know theyâ€™re an N26 user, they most likely havenâ€™t made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored donâ€™t match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

title: Warum kann ich keine anderen N26 MoneyBeam Nutzer sehen?
content: Um Echtzeit-Transaktionen wieÂ MoneyBeamsÂ durchzufÃ¼hren, Ã¼berprÃ¼ft N26 die Kontaktliste deines Smartphones und findet andere N26 Nutzer anhand der gespeicherten Telefonnummer oder E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn jemand erkannt wurde, siehst du das an dem blauen Punkt neben seinem Namen.Wenn du die Namen deiner Freunde in der MoneyBeam-Liste nicht siehst, aber weiÃŸt, dass sie N26 Nutzer sind, haben sie sich hÃ¶chstwahrscheinlich nicht sichtbar gemacht. Du kannst auch wÃ¤hlen, ob du selbst dich fÃ¼r andere N26 Nutzer sichtbar oder unsichtbar machen mÃ¶chtest.Wenn ein MoneyBeam zwischen N26 Nutzern scheitert, liegt es wahrscheinlich daran, dass bei einem oder beiden Nutzern mehrere Telefonnummern oder E-Mail-Adressen im Profil in der Kontaktliste gespeichert sind. Stelle sicher, dass du die aktuelle E-Mail-Adresse und Telefonnummer deiner Freunde in deinem Handy abgespeichert hast, um ihnen MoneyBeams zu senden. Wenn die in deinem Handy gespeicherten Kontaktdaten nicht stimmen, kannst du keinen MoneyBeam senden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box â€œAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.â€All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, youâ€™ll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,Â e.g.Â MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions withoutÂ typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visibleÂ enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 usersÂ selected from your contact list.

title: Wie kann ich meine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN Ã¤ndern?
content: Schritt-fÃ¼r-Schritt Anleitung:iPhoneAndroidSchritt 1Ã–ffne die N26 App und tippe oben rechts auf Mein Konto Schritt 2Scrolle herunter und tippe auf SicherheitSchritt 3Tippe auf Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscodeSchritt 4Gib deine Tokennummer ein: die 10-stellige Nummer auf der RÃ¼ckseite deiner KarteSchritt 5Erstelle und bestÃ¤tige deine neue BestÃ¤tigungs-PINSchritt 1Ã–ffne die N26 App und tippe oben rechts auf Mein Konto Schritt 2Scrolle herunter und tippe auf SicherheitSchritt 3Tippe auf Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscodeSchritt 4Gib deine Tokennummer ein: die 10-stellige Nummer auf der RÃ¼ckseite deiner KarteSchritt 5Erstelle und bestÃ¤tige deine neue BestÃ¤tigungs-PINMit der BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN bestÃ¤tigst du Ãœberweisungen und andere Transaktionen, die du in der App tÃ¤tigst. Bei der VerknÃ¼pfung deines Smartphones (neuen Tab) mit deinem Konto legst du die BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN selbst fest. Falls du deinen PIN-Code Ã¤ndern willst oder vergessen hast, kannst du jederzeit einen neuen in deiner App festlegen:Gehe auf ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > Sicherheit.Tippe auf Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscode.Gib den Token ein (die 10-stellige Nummer auf der Vorderseite deiner Karte, gleich unter deinem Namen; bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der RÃ¼ckseite).Erstelle und bestÃ¤tige deine neue BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN.Falls du sechsmal in Folge eine falsche BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN eintrÃ¤gst, musst du sie vor dem nÃ¤chsten Versuch neu festlegen.Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden akzeptieren wir keine PINs, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder Zahlenkombinationen mit Wiederholungen oder Zahlenreihen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) zusammensetzen. Falls deine gewÃ¼nschte PIN nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Bedenke bitte, dass deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN nicht dasselbe wie deine Karten-PIN (neuen Tab) ist. Falls du willst, kannst du aber fÃ¼r beide PINs dieselbe Zahlenkombination wÃ¤hlen.

title: Comment modifier les plafonds de ma carte ?
content: Vous pouvez modifier les plafonds de votre carte depuis lâ€™application mobile N26 ou bien depuis votre espace client en ligne. Chaque modification effectuÃ©e est immÃ©diatement prise en compte pour la carte sÃ©lectionnÃ©e.Pour modifier vos plafonds depuis lâ€™application mobile :Connectez-vous et allez dans CartesFaites dÃ©filer les cartes avec votre doigt sur lâ€™Ã©cran puis choisissez celle oÃ¹ vous souhaitez effectuer des modificationsCliquez sur ParamÃ¨tres de la carteCliquez sur Limites quotidiennesPour modifier vos plafonds depuis votre espace client :Connectez-vous (nouvel onglet) et accÃ©dez Ã  Mon compteCliquez sur la carte de votre choix dans la section CartesPlafondsLes limites quotidiennesÂ sont valables pendant 24 heures et non un jour civil, elles sont dÃ©finis ainsi :1 000 â‚¬ pour les retraits au distributeur automatique de billets5 000 â‚¬ pour les paiements en ligne et magasins confondusLa limite mensuelleÂ est valable surÂ sur le mois fixe (et non une pÃ©riode de 30 jours) et est dÃ©finie ainsi :20 000 â‚¬ pour les paiements en ligne et magasins confondus

title: What are Instant transfers?
content: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipientâ€™s bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you wonâ€™t have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49â‚¬Spain - 1,99â‚¬Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99â‚¬The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000â‚¬ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000â‚¬ per day). If youâ€™re using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If youâ€™re paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiverâ€™s details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the â€˜Learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜Invite new memberâ€™ button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once youâ€™ve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the â€˜Accept power of attorneyâ€™ button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the â€˜Send Inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: Come ricevere la mia carta piÃ¹ velocemente con la consegna express?
content: La consegna express Ã¨ un'ottima soluzione se hai bisogno di ricevere la tua carta in tempi brevi o se per qualche motivo la prima consegna non Ã¨ andata a buon fine.Ti verrÃ  data la possibilitÃ  di selezionare la consegna express quando scegli un metodo di consegna per la tua prima carta o se riordini una carta. Riceverai, quindi, un link di tracciamento via email. Se non sei a casa al momento della consegna e la cassetta della posta non Ã¨ accessibile, la carta verrÃ  lasciata presso un punto di ritiro nelle vicinanze (puoi trovarlo tramite il link di tracciabilitÃ ). La carta sarÃ  custodita nel punto di ritiro per un periodo di tempo limitato, dopodichÃ© verrÃ  restituita a N26. In tal caso, ti contatteremo via e-mail.Se selezioni la spedizione express, ricorda che:La tua nuova Mastercard N26 ti arriverÃ  entro 3 - 5 giorni lavorativi. Le consegne possono avvenire tramite DHL Express in tutti i paesi supportati in Europa. Al momento non si effettuano consegne in altri Paesi.Non Ã¨ possibile annullare o modificare una consegna express dopo che Ã¨ stata selezionata come metodo di consegna.Per chiudere un conto, si dovrÃ  pagare la consegna express della carta.Se la carta non Ã¨ arrivata entro 3-5 giorni lavorativi dall'ordine, controlla il link di tracciabilitÃ  per aggiornamenti. Puoi utilizzare il link anche per informare direttamente DHL sui dettagli dellâ€™indirizzo di consegna o per reindirizzare la spedizione se non puoi essere presente al momento della consegna.Quanto costa la consegna express?N26 Standard, Smart e You: Prima carta richiesta all'apertura del conto: 25â‚¬Carta riordinata: 30â‚¬Carta extra N26 You: 30â‚¬N26 Metal:Prima carta richiesta all'apertura del conto: 25â‚¬Carta riordinata: 65â‚¬

title: What is CASH26?
content: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 appâ€“â€“no debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-storeâ€“â€“itâ€™s that simple. Plus, you donâ€™t have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adamâ€™s, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, youâ€™ll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.Â If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of â‚¬2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.

title: PSD2 - sicheres Open Banking
content: WofÃ¼r steht PSD2?Die Zweite Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (â€œPSD2â€) ist eine Ã¼berarbeitete europÃ¤ische Richtlinie und ermÃ¶glicht dir, Ã¼ber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher auf deine Kontodaten zuzugreifen und Zahlungen Ã¼ber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher durchzufÃ¼hren.Das bedeutet, dass du regulierten Drittanbietern Ã¼ber eine dedizierte Schnittstelle Zugang zu deinem Konto erlauben kannst:Du kannst Ã¼ber einen Kontoinformationsdienst (KID) Daten verschiedener Bankkonten an einem Ort zusammenfÃ¼hren und sie Ã¼ber regulierte Drittanbieter verwalten;Du kannst bei einem Einkauf auf einer Website einen ZahlungsauslÃ¶sedienst (ZAD) nutzen.Der sichere Datenaustausch erfolgt im Hintergrund Ã¼ber unseren Partner Token.io.Wie funktioniert's?Nutzt Du einen regulierten Drittanbieter, wie einen Kontoinformationsdienst oder einen ZahlungauslÃ¶sedienst, wirst Du Ã¼ber Token.io zur N26 App weitergeleitet, um die jeweilige Zugriffsanfrage zu bestÃ¤tigen.Â In unserer DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung (neuen Tab) informieren wir Dich Ã¼ber die Zwecke, die involvierten Parteien und die rechtlichen Grundlagen fÃ¼r die notwendige Datenverarbeitung, um unsere Verpflichtungen im Rahmen der Ã¼berarbeiteten Zweiten Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie zu erfÃ¼llen.FAQsWarum kann ich keinen Drittanbieter mit meinem Konto verlinken?Wenn der Drittanbieter keine Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vorgenommen hat, muss er zunÃ¤chst Ã¼ber unseren Partner Token.io die Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vornehmen.Wie kann ich eine ZugriffsbestÃ¤tigung, die ich einem regulierten Drittanbieter gewÃ¤hrt habe, widerrufen?Um eine ZugangsbestÃ¤tigung zu widerrufen, die Du einem regulierten Drittanbieter gewÃ¤hrt hast, musst Du Dich direkt an den regulierten Drittanbieter wenden.*gilt fÃ¼r alle LÃ¤nder im EWR.

title: Wie verwendet N26 meine Steuerinformationen?
content: Die folgenden Angaben wurden nur zu Informationszwecken erstellt und dienen nicht der steuerlichen, rechtlichen oder buchhalterischen Beratung und sollten auch nicht als solche verstanden werden.N26 sammelt deine Daten hauptsÃ¤chlich aus zwei GrÃ¼nden: um die "Know Your Customer"-Anforderungen zu erfÃ¼llen und um die Meldepflicht gegenÃ¼ber den zustÃ¤ndigen SteuerbehÃ¶rden zu erfÃ¼llen.Â Verpflichtung zur Identifizierung unserer Kunden nach den sogenannten "Know your customer"-RegelnWie jedes Finanzinstitut sind wir nach den geltenden Steuergesetzen verpflichtet, steuerlich relevante Informationen von dir zu sammeln, um dich fÃ¼r steuerliche Zwecke zu identifizieren. Dazu gehÃ¶ren vor allem dein Name, deine Wohnsitzadresse, das Land oder die LÃ¤nder, in denen du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist (Steuerwohnsitz / Steuerwohnsitze), deine Steueridentifikationsnummer oder deren Ã„quivalent sowie dein Geburtsort und -datum.Im Folgenden sind allgemeine Informationen zu den Definitionen von Steuerwohnsitz und Steueridentifikationsnummer aufgefÃ¼hrt.SteuerwohnsitzIn der Regel hat man einen Wohnsitz, in dem Land , in dem man wohnt (Wohnsitzadresse). Man kann jedoch in zwei oder mehr LÃ¤ndern steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig sein (Steuerwohnsitz haben). Das liegt daran, dass die LÃ¤nder zur Bestimmung des steuerlichen Wohnsitzes unterschiedliche Kriterien (Formen der Bindung) verwenden. Zu diesen Kriterien gehÃ¶ren u. a. eine lÃ¤ngere physische Anwesenheit, die StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit, der Besitz von Eigentum usw. Wenn es ein Steuerabkommen zwischen den LÃ¤ndern gibt, wird der steuerliche Wohnsitz aufgrund der in einem solchen Abkommen normalerweise enthaltenen Kollisionsnormeneinem der beteiligten LÃ¤nder zugewiesen.Wenn du beispielsweise eine stÃ¤ndige WohnstÃ¤tte in Land A und einen vorÃ¼bergehenden Wohnsitz in Land B hast, kann es sein, dass die Regeln des Steuerabkommens zwischen Land A und B vorsehen, dass du in Land A steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist, wo du eine stÃ¤ndige WohnstÃ¤tte hast, und nicht in Land B, wo du einen vorÃ¼bergehenden Wohnsitz hast (wobei "stÃ¤ndige WohnstÃ¤tte" eine stÃ¤rkere Form der Bindung darstellt als "vorÃ¼bergehender Wohnsitz"). Wenn du dir unsicher bist, wo du steueransÃ¤ssig bist, musst du das mit deiner Steuerverwaltung und/oder deinem Steuerberater klÃ¤ren.SteueridentifikationsnummerDie Steueridentifikationsnummer (Steuer-IdNr.) ist eine eindeutige Kombination aus Buchstaben oder Zahlen, die dir von dem Land, in dem du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist, zugewiesen wird. Die Steuer-IdNr. identifiziert dich fÃ¼r Zwecke der Steuerverwaltung in dem Land, in dem du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist. Die Steuer-IdNr. ist auch nÃ¼tzlich, um Steuerpflichtige zu identifizieren, die in anderen LÃ¤ndern investieren. Die Spezifikationen fÃ¼r die Steuer-IdNr. (d. h. die Anzahl der Buchstaben, Zahlen und ihre Reihenfolge) werden von den Steuerverwaltungen der einzelnen LÃ¤nder festgelegt. WÃ¤hrend die meisten LÃ¤nder Steuer-IdNr. vergeben, gibt es einige, die keine Steuer-IdNr. vergeben. Auf dem Portal fÃ¼r den automatischen Informationsaustausch der OECD (neuen Tab) findest du nÃ¼tzliche Informationen zu den Steuer-IdNrn. (vor allem, wo du sie findest und und ihre Spezifikationen). Bei Zweifeln Ã¼ber deine Steuer-IdNr. empfehlen wir dir jedoch, deinen Steuerberater oder deine Steuerverwaltung zu konsultieren.Verpflichtung zur Meldung steuerlich relevanter Informationen bestimmter Kunden an die zustÃ¤ndigen SteuerbehÃ¶rdenWie jedes Finanzinstitut sind auch wir verpflichtet, steuerlich relevante Informationen regelmÃ¤ÃŸig an die zustÃ¤ndige SteuerbehÃ¶rde zu melden. AbhÃ¤ngig von deiner IBAN kann die empfangende SteuerbehÃ¶rde in Deutschland, Italien, Spanien oder Frankreich liegen.Besonders erwÃ¤hnenswert sind die Berichte nach dem Common Reporting Standard (neuen Tab) (CRS) und dem Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (neuen Tab) (FATCA). Falls du steuerlich in einem Land ansÃ¤ssig bist, das CRS anwendet und/oder wenn du in den USA steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist, tauscht die empfangende SteuerbehÃ¶rde die von N26 erhaltenen Informationen im Rahmen des automatischen Informationsaustauschs gemÃ¤ÃŸ CRS und FATCA mit dem Land aus, in dem du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist.Damit N26 seinen Meldepflichten, insbesondere in Bezug auf CRS und FATCA, nachkommen kann, mÃ¼ssen wir genaue und aktuelle steuerrelevante Informationen von dir sammeln (sogenannte Selbstauskunftsdaten). Zu diesen Daten gehÃ¶ren Name, Wohnsitzadresse, das Land oder die LÃ¤nder, in denen du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist, Steuer-IdNr. sowie Geburtsort und -datum. Wenn du in den USA steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist (Person der Vereinigten Staaten), solltest du auch deine US-Steuer-IdNr (neuen Tab).Â angeben. Bitte folge diesem Link (neuen Tab), um mehr Ã¼ber FATCA zu erfahren und was du gegebenenfalls unternehmen musst, um herauszufinden, ob du eine Person der Vereinigten Staaten bist und uns daher deine US-Steuer-IdNr. mitteilen solltest.Wir sind verpflichtet, regelmÃ¤ÃŸig zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen, ob deine in unserem System gespeicherten steuerlich relevanten Informationen korrekt sind (sogenannte laufende Due Diligence). Sollten sich im Rahmen der Due Diligence Ungenauigkeiten ergeben, setzen wir uns mit dir in Verbindung, um genaue und aktuelle Informationen zu erhalten.Unsere EmpfehlungBeachte bitte, dass wir als allerletztes Mittel restriktive MaÃŸnahmen fÃ¼r dein Konto ergreifen mÃ¼ssen, sollten wir nicht in der Lage sein, genaue und aktuelle Informationen fÃ¼r die oben beschriebenen Zwecke fÃ¼r CRS und FATCA innerhalb der geltenden Fristen zu erhalten.Wir raten dir, deine steuerlich relevanten Informationen regelmÃ¤ÃŸig zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen und zu aktualisieren. Bitte bedenke, dass eine Nichtbeachtung auch unmittelbare Folgen fÃ¼r dich haben kann, wie z. B. die VerhÃ¤ngung von BuÃŸgeldern durch die SteuerbehÃ¶rde. Um deine Informationen zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen und zu aktualisieren, schaue in deine N26 App:Gehe zu Kontodetails > PersÃ¶nliche Details > SteuerinformationenWÃ¤hle Neues Steuerland hinzufÃ¼gen. Gib an, ob du eine Person der Vereinigten Staaten bist und folge den AnweisungenUm ein weiteres Steuerland hinzuzufÃ¼gen (wenn du in mehr als einem Land steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist), klicke auf "Neues Steuerland hinzufÃ¼gen" und folge den AnweisungenDas bestehende Steuerland kann erst entfernt werden, nachdem du ein neues Steuerland hinzugefÃ¼gt hastWichtige InformationenDu kannst die Steuerinformationen, die wir aktuell von dir erfasst haben, jederzeit Ã¼berprÃ¼fen. DafÃ¼r gehst du auf: Kontodetails > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Steuerinformationen.Deine personenbezogenen Daten werden in jedem Fall sicher gespeichert und nur zur ErfÃ¼llung von CRS, FATCA und Ã¤hnlichen Anforderungen verwendet.Wir kÃ¶nnen dir keine Auskunft Ã¼ber deinen Steuerstatus geben. Wenn du dir nicht sicher bist, bespreche die Angelegenheit mit einem Steuerberater und/oder der SteuerbehÃ¶rde.

title: How to deposit and withdraw cash with CASH26
content: Available for accounts opened in Germany, Austria, Spain, Italy, and Greece.Withdrawing and depositing cash in retail stores with CASH26 is easyâ€“â€“all you need is your smartphone! Simply open the CASH26 map in your N26 app and zoom in to find the nearest participating store. Once youâ€™re there, generate a CASH26 barcode from your N26 app, and show it to the cashier to make your deposit or withdrawal right at the counter.Â Use CASH26 to withdraw money without a debit cardÂ With CASH26, you can withdraw money from your bank account in minutes using just your phoneâ€”thereâ€™s no need to have your N26 card on hand. Simply head to the Cards tab in your N26 app, then tap CASH26 > Withdrawal and choose the amount you want to withdraw. Next, enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Your N26 app will generate a barcode to show the cashier, who will scan it and hand over your cash. Simple as that! You can withdraw up to â‚¬200 each time, with a maximum withdrawal limit of â‚¬900 within 24 hours.Â How to deposit cash into your N26 account with CASH26Open your app and go to the Cards tab, then tap CASH26 > Deposit. Next, choose the amount you want to deposit, with a minimum of â‚¬50. Enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Once youâ€™re ready, show your CASH26 barcode to the cashier to scan, and hand them the cash. Your CASH26 deposit will be credited to your N26 account within 10 minutes.Â Hereâ€™s what else you need to know when using CASH26Your CASH26 barcode is only valid for 10 minutes. If you donâ€™t make your deposit or withdrawal in time, the code will expire and youâ€™ll need to generate a new one.Â If you enter the wrong amount by mistake, you can delete it by tapping the trash can icon in the upper right corner of your screen. Or, simply let the barcode expire and then generate a new one.You donâ€™t need to purchase anything in the partner store in order to make deposits or withdrawals with CASH26.Â N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.For more information on limits and other details, check out this article (new tab).Â

title: Wie melde ich mein N26 Konto fÃ¼r meine Steuerzahlungen in Frankreich an?
content: (gilt fÃ¼r alle in Frankreich ansÃ¤ssigen Kunden)Nach dem allgemeinen FranzÃ¶sischen Steuergesetzbuch sind alle in Frankreich ansÃ¤ssigen Personen verpflichtet, all ihre Bankkonten anzugeben, die sie innerhalb des Jahres der EinkommenserklÃ¤rung erÃ¶ffnet, genutzt oder geschlossen haben. Dazu gehÃ¶rt auch dein N26 Bankkonto. So funktioniertâ€™s:Markiere in deiner SteuererklÃ¤rung das KÃ¤stchen AuslÃ¤ndisches Konto erÃ¶ffnet, genutzt oder geschlossen (8UU) (Compte Ã©tranger ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ©).FÃ¼lle das Cerfa nÂ° 3917 Formular (neuen Tab) aus und fÃ¼ge es deiner SteuererklÃ¤rung bei.Erfahre mehr zu diesem Thema in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab) auf unserem Blog

title: Custom Audiences
content: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called â€œLookalike-Audiencesâ€ are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.Â In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called â€˜lookalike audiencesâ€™ are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

title: Warum konnte mein Wise-Konto nicht verknÃ¼pft werden?
content: Der hÃ¤ufigste Grund dafÃ¼r, dass Kunden ihr Wise-Konto nicht mit ihrem N26 Konto verknÃ¼pfen kÃ¶nnen, ist, dass sie ihre persÃ¶nlichen Informationen auf ihrem Wise-Konto nicht vollstÃ¤ndig angegeben haben.Falls du ein Konto direkt bei Wise erÃ¶ffnet hast und dieselbe E-Mail-Adresse benutzt hast wie fÃ¼r dein N26 Konto, jedoch deine persÃ¶nlichen Informationen nicht vollstÃ¤ndig ausgefÃ¼llt hast, kÃ¶nnen wir dein Konto nicht mit N26 verknÃ¼pfen.Bitte logge dich unter (neuen Tab)https://wise.com/d (neuen Tab)e in dein Wise-Konto ein oder benutze ihre App und stelle sicher, dass du deinen vollen Namen, Adresse, Geburtsdatum und Handynummer vollstÃ¤ndig angegeben hast.Falls du dein Passwort fÃ¼r dein Wise-Konto vergessen hast, gehe zu (neuen Tab)https://wise.com/de (neuen Tab) und wÃ¤hle â€˜Passwort vergessenâ€™, um es zurÃ¼ckzusetzen und auf dein Konto zuzugreifen.Falls du dich nicht erinnern kannst, ob du ein Konto bei Wise erÃ¶ffnet hast, solltest du trotzdem versuchen dich einzuloggen, indem du dein Passwort zurÃ¼cksetzt. Es kÃ¶nnte sein, dass es von einem anderen Partner erÃ¶ffnet wurde oder einfach eine Weile her ist.

title: Why isnâ€™t my photo verification working?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Applies to all regions except GermanyFirst, geolocation must be enabled. Then review theÂ guide (new tab)Â weâ€™ve created to help you take the best pictures.Most photoÂ verificationsÂ fail due to bad picture quality.Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).Make sure youâ€™re the only person in the photo.Check your document.We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.We only accept national IDs and passports.Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesnâ€™t go through, you can just start over again.As soon as your verification is complete, weâ€™ll send you your N26 Mastercard.Â DeliveriesÂ take up to 10 days.Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.Â

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content: To get the most out of â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the â€˜ownerâ€™ or the person who created the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™ can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as â€˜visibleâ€™ to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the ownerâ€™s contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ add participant flow.Youâ€™ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up â€¦ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the â€˜learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜invite new memberâ€™ button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the â€œlegal screenâ€ so be sure to read all the information within the â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&Câ€™s then tap â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ button.Tap â€˜Send inviteâ€™ on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the â€˜send inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the â€˜Participantsâ€™ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participantâ€™s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

title: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
content:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?Â N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European businessÂ and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.Â Â What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.Â In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos BankÂ® sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.Â How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 accountÂ 
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 AllpointÂ® ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.Â 
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.Â Â I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

title: Comment bloquer un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique ?
content: Si vous attendez un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique Ã  venir, vous avez la possibilitÃ© de le bloquer en suivant les Ã©tapes dÃ©crites dans cet article. Cependant, avant de remplir et de nous envoyer le formulaire de blocage de prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique, veuillez lire les informations suivantes :Identifiant crÃ©ancier SEPA (ICS) et rÃ©fÃ©rence unique de mandat (RUM) : vous devrez spÃ©cifier lâ€™ICS et la RUM. Pour trouver ces informations, allez dans lâ€™application et vÃ©rifiez les dÃ©tails de la transaction du prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique prÃ©cÃ©dent ou contactez le commerÃ§ant (notez que lâ€™IBAN et le nom du commerÃ§ant ne suffisent pas).Les piÃ¨ces jointes ne doivent pas dÃ©passer 25 MB : lorsque vous enverrez le formulaire requis, veillez Ã  ce que le total de vos piÃ¨ces jointes ne dÃ©passe pas 25 MB.Signature du document : si cela est possible, il est prÃ©fÃ©rable de signer manuscritement le formulaire avant de nous lâ€™envoyer. Cependant, nous acceptons Ã©galement les signatures suivantes :Signature Ã©lectronique : elle doit Ãªtre identique Ã  celle du document que vous avez utilisÃ© pour ouvrir votre compte N26.Signature numÃ©rique : une signature numÃ©rique ne sera validÃ©e que si nous pouvons la vÃ©rifier. Il est possible de crÃ©er une signature numÃ©rique Ã  lâ€™aide de fournisseurs tels que Â« DocuSign Â».Enfin, il est important de noter que lâ€™annulation dâ€™un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique ne fait que bloquer les paiements mais nâ€™annule en aucun cas le contrat que vous avez passÃ© avec le commerÃ§ant.Que dois-je faire pour bloquer un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique ?Veuillez suivre les Ã©tapes ci-dessous, remplir le formulaire et contacter notre Service Client via le Livechat ou par tÃ©lÃ©phone :TÃ©lÃ©chargez et remplissez ce formulaire (nouvel onglet).Remplissez le formulaire en prÃ©cisant ce que vous souhaitez bloquer (identifiant crÃ©ancier SEPA, rÃ©fÃ©rence unique de mandat ou blocage complet). Notez que certaines de ces informations figurent dans les prÃ©lÃ¨vements automatiques prÃ©cÃ©dents effectuÃ©s par le commerÃ§ant en question, que vous pouvez consulter dans votre liste de transactions.Apposez votre signature (manuscrite, Ã©lectronique ou numÃ©rique).Vous devez ensuite contacter notre Service Client via le Livechat (pour une vÃ©rification sans difficultÃ©s) ou par tÃ©lÃ©phone. Nos spÃ©cialistes vous aideront Ã  mener Ã  bien ce processus. Si vous remplissez le formulaire Ã  lâ€™avance, vous accÃ©lÃ©rerez le processus !

title: How does N26 Business Smart work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs â‚¬4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
content:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercardâ€™s exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesnâ€™t charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercardâ€™s rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customersâ€™ data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

title: What are â€œMessagesâ€ ?
content:
The security of your personal data is our priority. Thatâ€™s why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. Weâ€™ll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, youâ€™ll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, youâ€™ll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.Weâ€™ll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You canâ€™t initiate a conversation, but youâ€™ll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesnâ€™t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, weâ€™ll ask you to open a chat with us.

title: Â¿Por quÃ© ha fallado mi compra online?
content: Consejos y sugerencias para una transacciÃ³n exitosa:Si no puedes confirmar la transacciÃ³n en 5 minutos mediante la notificaciÃ³n push, deberÃ¡s empezar de nuevo el proceso de pago en la pÃ¡gina web del comerciante.Si no recibes el mensaje push, asegÃºrate de que tu smartphone estÃ© vinculado y los mensajes push activados en los ajustes. Importante: el mensaje push solo se enviarÃ¡ al smartphone vinculado.Comprueba tambiÃ©n que los pagos mÃ³viles y los pagos en el extranjero estÃ¡n activados en los ajustes de tu tarjeta.Necesitas una buena conexiÃ³n a internet. Prueba cambiando de WiFi a 3G/4G o viceversa.Si utilizas un dispositivo iOS, asegÃºrate de que el modo No Molestar estÃ¡ desactivado.Si la cantidad que muestra la pÃ¡gina del comerciante es diferente de la que se muestra en el mensaje push, se puede deber al tipo de cambio de una divisa a euros.AsegÃºrate tambiÃ©n de desactivar los adblokers que se ejecuten en tu navegador.

title: Commissione sui depositi superiori a 50.000 â‚¬
content: A partire da Luglio 2022, non addebiteremo piÃ¹ questa quotaPer ogni conto (eccetto N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal e N26 Business Metal) aperto a partire dal 19/10/2020 si applica una commissione per la tenuta del conto in caso di saldo superiore a 50.000â‚¬, come indicato nei Termini e condizioni durante il processo di apertura del conto.Clicca qui (nuova tabella) per i relativi Termini e Condizioni.La commissione Ã¨ pari allo 0,5% per anno e viene calcolata su base mensile esclusivamente sull'importo che supera la soglia di saldo di 50.000â‚¬ e tenendo in considerazione solo i giorni in cui nel mese di riferimento questo limite Ã¨ stato superato.La commissione sarÃ  addebitata direttamente sul tuo conto allâ€™inizio di ogni mese per i 30 giorni precedenti.Se il saldo del tuo conto dovesse superare la soglia di cui sopra, e non vuoi incorrere in questa commissione, ci sono due modi per evitare che ti venga addebitata:Passa a un conto Premium N26 You (nuova tabella), N26 Business You (nuova tabella), N26 Metal (nuova tabella) o N26 Business Metal (nuova tabella). Se sei un cliente residente in Germania, apri un conto EasyFlex Savings (nuova tabella) e trasferisci i tuoi fondi in eccesso lÃ¬ (prendi nota dei requisiti di idoneitÃ )

title: Wo finde ich meine IBAN oder Kontonummer?
content: Deine IBAN und deinen BIC benÃ¶tigst du, um SEPA-Ãœberweisungen auf dein Konto zu erhalten oder per Lastschrift zu bezahlen. Eine IBAN besteht aus mehreren Elementen: Alle unsere IBANs beginnen mit DE, ES oder IT, gefolgt von der zweistelligen PrÃ¼fziffer, unserer Bankleitzahl (10011001), und schlieÃŸlich deiner 10-stelligen Kontonummer (beginnend mit 26). Die IBAN wird bei der KontoerÃ¶ffnung erstellt und zugewiesen und kann nicht geÃ¤ndert werden.Deine IBAN und deinen BIC findest du an 3 Orten:In deiner mobilen N26 App und deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab) unter: ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto. Tippe bzw. klicke auf das Kopieren-Symbol, um die IBAN zu kopieren.Im Online Banking (neuen Tab) kannst du deine Bankverbindung als PDF herunterladen. Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter Bankdaten auf Bankdaten herunterladen.Auf deinen herunterladbaren KontoauszÃ¼gen: Tippe im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App auf das BurgermenÃ¼ oben rechts und wÃ¤hle KontoauszÃ¼ge. Oder in deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab): Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter KontoauszÃ¼ge auf einen gewÃ¼nschten Monat.Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial (neuen Tab)auf unserem N26 Support YouTube (neuen Tab) Kanal an.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your accountâ€™s security (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.Â As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.Â This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message youâ€™ll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.Â Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.Â Our Customer Support doesnâ€™t have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: What is my PIN number?
content:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codesâ€”your Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun factâ€”you create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. Youâ€™re the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

title: What to do if my account may be compromised?
content:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).Â If youâ€™d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. Weâ€™ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that weâ€™ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if Iâ€™ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.Â What if Iâ€™ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.Â Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

content:
VerfÃ¼gbar in Ã–sterreich, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Irland, Italy, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Spanien, Schweden.N26 You ist Ã¼ber die Erstanmeldung eines Kontos oder Ã¼ber ein Upgrade in der App verfÃ¼gbar, wenn du bereits ein Standard-Konto hast. Um dich zu N26 You upgraden, logge dich einfach in die App ein, tippe auf den "Entdecken" am unteren Bildschirmrand und wÃ¤hle dann "Entdecke N26 You".Â Du kannst zwischen 5 neuen Farben wÃ¤hlen: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.WÃ¤hle dann deine bevorzugteÂ VersandmethodeÂ aus, akzeptiere die N26 YouÂ AGB (neuen Tab)Â und schon ist deine neue Karte zu dir unterwegs!Standardlieferungen dauern bis zu zehn Werktage, Expresslieferungen drei Werktage.Der Mitgliedsbeitrag von 9,90 â‚¬ wird jeden Monat am Tag des Upgrades direkt von deinem Konto abgebucht.Du kannst eine zusÃ¤tzlich N26 You Karte fÃ¼r eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 14â‚¬ in deiner N26 App bestellen.

title: Come posso bloccare la banda magnetica della mia carta?
content: Ci sono diversi modi per effettuare un pagamento con carta: contactless ("poggiando" la tua carta), tramite chip con PIN e tramite banda magnetica, ovvero, passando la carta nella fessura del lettore. Le transazioni tramite banda magnetica sono sempre meno diffuse, ma alcuni esercenti richiedono ancora questo metodo di pagamento.PerchÃ© dovrei bloccare le transazioni con banda magnetica?Un numero piuttosto consistente di transazioni fraudolente avviene proprio strisciando la banda magnetica della carta. Alcuni esercenti dispongono di sistemi illegali per copiare le informazioni della tua carta, che poi usano per effettuare transazioni fraudolente. Questo processo Ã¨ noto come "skimming". Bloccando le transazioni tramite banda magnetica puoi proteggerti da un simile rischio.Come faccio a bloccare/sbloccare le transazioni tramite banda magnetica?Per bloccare le transazioni tramite banda magnetica:Â Vai su Carte.Â Se possiedi piÃ¹ carte, scorri verso destra finchÃ© non compare la carta interessata.Vai su Impostazioni carta.Vai su banda magnetica.Disattiva Attiva banda magnetica.Qui puoi anche riabilitare l'uso della banda magnetica. Le modifiche vengono applicate istantaneamente per la carta selezionata.Â

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customersâ€™ data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).
