title: Kann N26 mein Konto schlieÃŸen?
content: Kurz gesagt: ja.Wir kÃ¶nnen dein Konto auf drei Arten schlieÃŸen (mit einer KÃ¼ndigungsfrist von 2 Monaten, 14 Tagen oder sofort). Diese KÃ¼ndigungen sind endgÃ¼ltig: Unser Kundenservice kann keine Informationen Ã¼ber den Hintergrund einzelner KÃ¼ndigungen geben und die Entscheidung auch nicht rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen. Du kannst deine GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehungen zu uns auch jederzeit, sofort und ohne Angabe von GrÃ¼nden, beenden. Jegliche ausstehenden VertragsgebÃ¼hren mÃ¼ssen vor dem Beendigungszeitpunkt beglichen werden.2 Monate KÃ¼ndigungsfristWir sind berechtigt, jede GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehung mit einer Frist von 2 Monaten ohne Angabe von GrÃ¼nden zu kÃ¼ndigen (siehe Â§ 19 Abs. 1 unsererÂ AGB (neuen Tab)Â oder Â§ 675h BGB).14 Tage KÃ¼ndigungsfristWir kÃ¶nnen jede GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehung auch mit einer Frist von 14 Tagen kÃ¼ndigen (siehe Â§ 19 Abs. 3 unsererÂ AGB (neuen Tab)), wenn aufgrund der Verletzung vertraglicher Pflichten hinreichende GrÃ¼nde hierzu vorliegen. Solche GrÃ¼nde sind:Nutzung eines Privatkontos fÃ¼r geschÃ¤ftliche ZweckeÂ Nach unseren AGB darf ein Privatkonto nur fÃ¼r den persÃ¶nlichen Gebrauch genutzt werden. Alle Ãœberweisungen, die sich auf Honorare fÃ¼r erbrachte Dienstleistungen und/oder verkaufte Produkte beziehen, gelten als GeschÃ¤ftstransaktionen. Wenn du dein Konto fÃ¼r diesen Zweck nutzen mÃ¶chtest, erÃ¶ffne bitte einÂ N26 BusinessÂ oderÂ N26 Business You Konto.Bereitstellung falscher oder unzureichender Informationen fÃ¼r eine routinemÃ¤ÃŸige HintergrundprÃ¼fung.Â Wir sind eine Bank, deshalbÂ Ã¼berprÃ¼fen wir manche Transaktionen. Wenn du keine korrekten und/oder ausreichenden Angaben zu der betreffenden Transaktion machst, haben wir das Recht, die GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehung zu kÃ¼ndigen, da wir deutschen Finanzvorschriften entsprechen mÃ¼ssen. -MissbrÃ¤uchliches Verhalten gegenÃ¼ber N26-Mitarbeitern.Â Wir tolerieren kein missbrÃ¤uchliches Verhalten gegenÃ¼ber unseren Mitarbeitern. Die Androhung von KÃ¶rperverletzung oder allgemeines missbrÃ¤uchliches Verhalten ist nach deutschem Recht strafbar und wird ausnahmslos der zustÃ¤ndigen BehÃ¶rde gemeldet.Fristlose KÃ¼ndigungWir kÃ¶nnen jede GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehung auch auÃŸerordentlich kÃ¼ndigen (siehe Â§ 19 Abs. 3 unsererÂ AGB (neuen Tab)). Das bedeutet: jederzeit, ohne VorankÃ¼ndigung und ohne KÃ¼ndigungsfrist bei Vorliegen eines wichtigen Grundes fÃ¼r eine solche KÃ¼ndigung. Solche GrÃ¼nde sind:Falsche Angaben gegenÃ¼ber N26 Ã¼ber deine finanzielle Situation, insbesondere bei der Beantragung eines KreditsDu kannst ein Darlehen oder eine Verschuldung gegenÃ¼ber N26 nicht zurÃ¼ckzahlenNichterfÃ¼llung der Forderungen von N26 bezÃ¼glich deines Darlehens (siehe Bestellung oder VerstÃ¤rkung von Sicherheiten, Â§ 13 (2) unserer AGB (neuen Tab)).

title: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
content: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChooseÂ RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

title: PSD2 - Authentification Forte du Client
content: Comment fonctionne lâ€™Authentification Forte du Client (SCA) ?Lâ€™Authentification Forte du Client (SCA) constitue une protection supplÃ©mentaire pour tous les clients N26 en Ã©tablissant une authentification Ã  deux facteurs. GrÃ¢ce Ã  lâ€™authentification Ã  deux facteurs, nous ajoutons une nouvelle mesure de sÃ©curitÃ© lorsque vous vous connectez Ã  votre compte N26. Vous Ãªtes probablement habituÃ© Ã  utiliser uniquement votre mot de passe pour vous connecter Ã  votre compte, avec l'authentification Ã  deux facteurs, vous aurez maintenant besoin soit d'une confirmation depuis votre appareil synchronisÃ© soit d'un code SMS pour vous connecter Ã  votre compte.Lorsque vous vous connectez Ã  votre compte N26 Ã  partir dâ€™un navigateur Web ou d'un appareil non synchronisÃ© Ã  votre compte, vous serez invitÃ© Ã  confirmer votre connexion depuis une notification envoyÃ©e sur votre tÃ©lÃ©phone synchronisÃ© ou vous devrez saisir un code envoyÃ© par SMS au numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone liÃ© Ã  votre compte. AprÃ¨s avoir confirmÃ© votre connexion, vous pourrez alors vous connecter Ã  votre compte N26. Lorsque vous vous connectez Ã  votre compte N26 Ã  partir de votre appareil synchronisÃ©, l'authentification Ã  deux facteurs est dÃ©jÃ  automatiquement activÃ©e. Par consÃ©quent, il vous suffit de saisir votre identifiant et votre mot de passe pour vous connecter depuis votre appareil synchronisÃ©.Pourquoi le SCA est-il introduit ?Le SCA est introduit dans le cadre de la deuxiÃ¨me Directive europÃ©enne sur les services de paiement (PSD2) qui s'applique Ã  toutes les banques europÃ©ennes. L'objectif de cette directive est d'amÃ©liorer la sÃ©curitÃ© et la confidentialitÃ© des comptes et des donnÃ©es des clients. Pour en savoir plus, vous pouvez consulter l'article de notre blog consacrÃ© Ã  PSD2. (nouvel onglet)

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.Youâ€™ll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if youÂ reorder a card. Youâ€™ll then receive a tracking link by email. If youâ€™re not home during the delivery and your mailbox canâ€™t be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, itâ€™ll be returned to us. Weâ€™ll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. Itâ€™s currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.Itâ€™s not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once itâ€™s been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasnâ€™t arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you canâ€™t be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card: 30â‚¬Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30â‚¬N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card 65â‚¬

title: How to activate my card?
content: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! Youâ€™ll have to activate your card whether itâ€™s your first N26 card, a replacement card, or youâ€™ve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card youâ€™re activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction â€” in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail â€” for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card â€” you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then youâ€™ll still be able to activate that new card.

title: My ID wasnâ€™t accepted and I canâ€™t open an account with N26
content: As a fully-licensed bank, weâ€™re required to verify your identity before allowing you to open an account. Depending on your country of residence and nationality, different forms of identification may be accepted during the verification process.Â You can find our list of accepted IDs for the identity verification here (new tab) if you live in France.If you live outside of France, hereâ€™s the list of IDs you can submit to verify your identity:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in another country (new tab)If your ID isnâ€™t supported, we wonâ€™t be able to open a bank account for you.Â

title: What is a suspicious login attempt?
content: Why did I receive this email?At N26, security is our top priority. When our system detects an unusual login attempt, we alert you immediately so that steps can be taken to secure your account. If youâ€™ve received an alert and you believe someone else may have attempted to log into your account, a quick reset of your password is all thatâ€™s needed. If you recognise the login attempt shown in the alert, you can simply ignore it.How do I reset my password?You can reset your password by logging into your account via your app or web browser, navigating to My Account â†’ Settings â†’ Security. If you cannot access your account, click Forgot Password on the login screen. From there, all you have to do is enter your email address and request a password reset link.When choosing a new password, we remind you not to reuse passwords across multiple platforms; please ensure you utilise a unique password for each of your accounts. Password reuse is a primary reason behind an account compromise.When should I contact Customer Support?After receiving an email about an unusual login, you may be concerned about the security of your account. We would like to reassure you, however, that changing your password is a sufficient measure which will ensure your account remains protected. If youâ€™d like to discuss this topic with someone in the know, our Customer Support team is there for you.

title: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
content:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest â€œSplit the billâ€ feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where youâ€™re sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on â€˜Homeâ€™ tab, tap it and choose â€˜Split the billâ€™Add the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, youâ€™ll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap â€˜Confirmâ€™ to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests canâ€™t be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

title: Come posso pagare bollettini e ricariche telefoniche dalla mia app?
content: A partire dal 1 Settembre potrai pagare bollettini postali, PagoPA, MAV/RAV, il bollo auto ed effettuare ricariche telefoniche direttamente dallâ€™app mobile con la carta di debito N26.Questo servizio Ã¨ fornito in collaborazione con PayTipper SpA, un istituto di pagamento che dal 2019 Ã¨ partner del gruppo Enel X.Come effettuare pagamenti verso terze parti nellâ€™app mobile:Â Accedi allâ€™app N26 e seleziona â€œDal mio conto"Clicca su â€œAltri pagamentiâ€Nel menÃ¹ dovrai selezionare il pagamento che desideri effettuare (Ricarica telefonica, PagoPA, Bollettini postali, MAV o RAV, Bollo auto)Sarai poi reindirizzato al sito del fornitore del servizio dove potrai effettuare il pagamentoIl servizio non Ã¨ fornito direttamente da N26 ma da terze parti. Per questo, utilizzando questo metodo di pagamento, sarai soggetto al trattamento dei dati personali, termini e condizioni ed eventuali commissioni non dipendenti da N26. In alcuni casi il servizio potrebbe essere offerto solo in italiano.Se hai bisogno di assistenza per un pagamento o vuoi richiedere il rinvio della ricevuta, dovrai contattare direttamente lâ€™assistenza clienti del fornitore del servizio che hai scelto.Â Clicca qui per metterti in contatto con PayTipper (nuova tabella)Di seguito puoi trovare i contatti dellâ€™assistenza clienti per i principali operatori telefonici (fai riferimento ai rispettivi siti web per orari di apertura ed eventuali costi del servizio):Vodafone: 190Tim: 187Wind Tre: 159Iliad: 177Kena Mobile: 181Ho.Mobile: 19.21.21

title: CRS - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin dâ€™informations de votre part ?
content:
N26 suit la norme dâ€™Ã©change automatique de renseignements (CRS en anglais), comme tout Ã©tablissement de crÃ©dit. Nous sommes donc tenus de communiquer directement aux autoritÃ©s fiscales de l'Union EuropÃ©enne les informations des comptes financiers dÃ©tenus par nos clients rÃ©sidents fiscaux dans d'autres pays.CRS signifie Common Reporting Standard ou Echange Automatique de Renseignements.
Le CRS a Ã©tÃ© Ã©laborÃ© par l'Organisation de coopÃ©ration et de dÃ©veloppement Ã©conomiques (OCDE). C'est une norme mondiale de dÃ©claration pour l'Ã©change automatique d'informations (AEOI). 
L'objectif du CRS est de permettre aux autoritÃ©s d'avoir une meilleure comprÃ©hension des actifs financiers dÃ©tenus Ã  l'Ã©tranger par leurs rÃ©sidents pour lutter contre la fraude fiscale. 
Plus de 90 pays ont acceptÃ© de partager des informations sur les actifs et les revenus des rÃ©sidents en conformitÃ© avec le CRS.Afin que nous puissions dÃ©terminer avec prÃ©cision si un compte doit Ãªtre dÃ©clarÃ© aux autoritÃ©s fiscales pour le CRS, nous devons vous demander :1. Le(s) pays dans le(s)quel(s) vous Ãªtes imposable Vous Ãªtes normalement Â«rÃ©sident fiscalÂ» et donc soumis Ã  l'impÃ´t sur vos revenus dans le pays oÃ¹ vous avez un logement. Si vous rÃ©sidez dans plus d'un pays, il existe normalement des Â«rÃ¨gles de dÃ©partageÂ» incluses dans les conventions de double imposition et dans les lois fiscales des pays concernÃ©s qui vous aident Ã  dÃ©terminer oÃ¹ vous Ãªtes rÃ©sident fiscal. Il se peut que vous soyez rÃ©sident fiscal dans plus d'un pays au cours d'une annÃ©e. Dans ce cas, nous aurions besoin de connaÃ®tre chaque pays et chaque numÃ©ro d'identification fiscale afin de communiquer les informations exactes aux autoritÃ©s fiscales compÃ©tentes.2. Votre numÃ©ro dâ€™identification fiscale (NIF) pour chaque pays auquel vous Ãªtes fiscalement rattachÃ©.
Lâ€™attribution et le format dâ€™un NIF diffÃ¨rent dâ€™un pays Ã  lâ€™autre. Si vous rÃ©sidez au sein de lâ€™Union EuropÃ©enne, vous pourrez trouver le vÃ´tre en consultant ce guide (nouvel onglet) mis Ã  disposition par la Commission EuropÃ©enne.Si votre situation fiscale vient Ã  changer, vous pourrez Ã  tout moment modifier les informations concernÃ©es depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > ParamÃ¨tres > ParamÃ¨tres personnels > Informations fiscales.

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: Scadenza e sostituzione delle carte: domande frequenti
content: Se la tua Mastercard N26 Ã¨ scaduta o scadrÃ  a breve, in questo articolo troverai tutte le informazioni su come ordinarne una nuova, i relativi costi e tempi di spedizione. Prima di procedere con il riordino di una nuova carta, ti consigliamo di verificare che tutti i tuoi dati personali siano aggiornati e corretti.La mia carta sta per scadere, cosa devo fare?Se la tua carta sta per scadere, accedi al tuo conto N26 nell'app, vai alla sezione Carte e cerca un banner sotto la carta corrispondente. Segui i passaggi per confermare dove vorresti ricevere la tua carta sostitutiva e te la invieremo.Â Se questo messaggio non compare, non preoccuparti. Probabilmente Ã¨ perchÃ© la tua carta sarÃ  valida ancora per un periodo; quando sarÃ  il momento giusto vedrai lâ€™opzione per confermare il tuo indirizzo.Una volta ricevuta la tua carta, prima di poterla utilizzare la dovrai attivare. Non dimenticare di distruggere la tua vecchia carta e di buttarla via secondo le linee guida locali per il riciclo.Attenzione: una volta ricevuta e attivata la tua nuova Mastercard, ricordati di aggiornare le tue informazioni di pagamento per tutti i tuoi abbonamenti e i pagamenti ricorrenti. In questo modo eviterai che i tuoi pagamenti futuri vengano rifiutati.Posso continuare a usare la mia carta dopo che Ã¨ scaduta?No, la data di scadenza della tua carta ha una funzione importante e non potrai piÃ¹ utilizzarla dopo il mese di scadenza. Riceverai una nuova carta con un numero diverso e una nuova data di scadenza.Quanto costa la sostituzione della mia carta scaduta o in scadenza?La carta sostitutiva Ã¨ gratuita per tutti i clienti possessori di un conto N26 Smart, You e Metal.Se hai aperto il tuo conto prima delle seguenti date, sia la nuova carta che la spedizione al tuo indirizzo sono gratuiti nei paesi in cui N26 Ã¨ disponibile (nuova tabella):16/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale nella Grande Europa)25/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Italia o Spagna)11/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Francia)18/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Germania, Austria o Svizzera)Se il tuo conto Ã¨ stato creato in seguito, la tua carta sostitutiva avrÃ  lo stesso costo di una carta nuova.Se attualmente ti trovi in un Paese non supportato da N26, contatta il nostro Supporto Clienti tramite chat o telefono, cosÃ¬ possiamo effettuare lâ€™ordine per te. La consegna al di fuori di questi Paesi (nuova tabella) potrebbe comportare un costo aggiuntivo.Â Quanto tempo ci vorrÃ ?Tutte le carte sostitutive delle carte scadute o in scadenza vengono spedite tramite consegna Standard. Richiede fino a 15 giorni lavorativi ed Ã¨ gratuita. Nelle zone rurali o difficili da raggiungere potrebbe volerci piÃ¹ tempo. Per rimanere aggiornato sui progressi nella consegna, vai alla schermata Home della tua app mobile N26.La mia carta Ã¨ giÃ  scaduta ma non ho mai ricevuto una sostituzioneNessun problema, ci pensiamo noi!Â Se hai giÃ  confermato il tuo indirizzo e sono passati piÃ¹ di 20 giorni, ti preghiamo di contattare il Supporto Clienti. Puoi farlo nella sezione Supporto nell'app.Â Se non hai ancora confermato il tuo indirizzo, effettua l'accesso al tuo conto N26 nell'app e cerca un banner sotto la tua carta scaduta. Segui i passaggi per confermare dove vorresti ricevere la tua carta sostitutiva.Â

title: How does Spaces work?
content: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as youâ€™d like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, youâ€™ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

Dans tous les cas, vous pourrez toujours accÃ©der au Livechat du Service Client et bÃ©nÃ©ficier dâ€™une assistance pour vos demandes. title: How to download my Statement of Fees
content: The Statement of FeesÂ is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab),Â then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and youâ€™ll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

title: Warum wurde mir eine GeldautomatengebÃ¼hr berechnet?
content: GeldautomatengebÃ¼hren kÃ¶nnen aus verschiedenen GrÃ¼nden anfallen:FÃ¼r jede Auszahlung, die Ã¼ber unsere Fair Use Policy hinausgeht, erheben wir eine GebÃ¼hr von 2 â‚¬. Diese GebÃ¼hr erscheint als separate Transaktion in deiner Umsatzanzeige. Wir informieren dich per Push-Nachricht, wenn du nur noch wenige kostenlose Auszahlungen zur VerfÃ¼gung hast.Einige Betreiber von Geldautomaten erheben ihre eigenen GebÃ¼hren. In deiner Umsatzanzeige erscheint diese GebÃ¼hr in derselben Transaktion wie die Abhebung, also eingerechnet in den Abhebungsbetrag. Darauf haben wir keinen Einfluss, wir kÃ¶nnen sie weder ablehnen noch rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen. Sollten zusÃ¤tzliche GebÃ¼hren anfallen, wirst du vor dem Ende einer Auszahlung informiert und kannst die Auszahlung sofort stornieren. Kunden in Spanien kÃ¶nnen kÃ¶nnen hier eine LÃ¶sung finden.Abhebungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen kÃ¶nnen gebÃ¼hrenpflichtig sein. Beim N26 Standard und N26 Smart Konti fÃ¤llt eine GebÃ¼hr von 1,7% des ausgezahlten Betrages an. Diese GebÃ¼hr entfÃ¤llt fÃ¼r N26 You, N26 Metal, Business You- oder N26 Business Metal-Mitglieder.Nutzung deiner Maestrocard fÃ¼r Abhebungen am Geldautomaten. Hier fÃ¤llt sowohl fÃ¼r nationale als auch fÃ¼r internationale Abhebungen eine GebÃ¼hr von 2 â‚¬ an. Maestro ist nur in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich und den Niederlanden erhÃ¤ltlich.Wenn du unser N26 Flex Konto hast, kosten Abhebungen 2â‚¬. Gut zu wissen:Um gebÃ¼hrenfreie Automaten in deiner NÃ¤he zu finden, insbesondere auf Reisen, kannst du die Mastercard-Geldautomatensuche (neuen Tab) verwenden. WÃ¤hle dazu in den erweiterten Suchoptionen â€œkeine NutzungsgebÃ¼hrâ€ aus.Alle Automaten, die im Geldautomatenfinder angezeigt werden, unterstÃ¼zen Mastercard.Eine Ãœbersicht unserer Angebote und GebÃ¼hren findest du auf unserer Website (neuen Tab).

title: How to download my personal data?
content: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. Weâ€™ve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and youâ€™re in complete control: go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. Â It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.Â As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.Â Â How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. Youâ€™ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure itâ€™s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

title: How to change my card limits?
content: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:â‚¬1,000 for withdrawals from ATMsâ‚¬5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500â‚¬ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050â‚¬ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:â‚¬20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: Wie erstelle ich eine SEPA-Ãœberweisung?
content: Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen kannst du in jedes Land innerhalb des SEPA Raums ausfÃ¼hren.Â Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen kannst du sowohl in der N26 App als auch in deinem Online Banking erstellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.WÃ¤hle BankÃ¼berweisungen und dann Neuer Kontakt.Gib den legalen Namen und die IBAN des EmpfÃ¤ngers ein und wÃ¤hle Weiter.Gib den Betrag ein und wÃ¤hle Weiter.Gib bei Bedarf einen Verwendungszweck ein und wÃ¤hle Weiter.ÃœberprÃ¼fe die Zusammenfassung deiner Ãœberweisung. title: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
content:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Donâ€™t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you donâ€™t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while youâ€™re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We wonâ€™t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.Â

title: Wo kann ich meine Maestro Card einsetzen?
content: Nur verfÃ¼gbar fÃ¼r Kunden mit unseren deutschen, Ã¶sterreichischen oder niederlÃ¤ndischen AGB.Deine Maestro kann nicht fÃ¼r Online-EinkÃ¤ufe verwendet werden und ist nicht in das deutsche Electronic Cash- (EC-) oder Girocard-System eingebunden.Du kannst sie nicht fÃ¼r Apple Pay or Google Pay verwenden.Aber du kannst deine Karte an Geldautomaten oder GeschÃ¤ften verwenden, die das Maestro-Symbol tragen. JedeÂ Abhebung am GeldautomatenÂ mit der Maestrocard kostet 2 â‚¬ (bei FremdwÃ¤hrungen zuzÃ¼glich einer GebÃ¼hr von 1,7% auf den abgehobenen Betrag).Du kannstÂ deine Maestro CardÂ direkt in der App bestellen.Wenn du Probleme mit deiner Maestrocard hast, prÃ¼fe zuerst, ob deineÂ KarteneinstellungenÂ aktiviert sind. Wenn nichts blockiert ist, kontaktiere den Kundendienst per Chat und wir werden uns darum kÃ¼mmern.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? content:
Du wolltest schon immer mal unser N26 Smart Konto ausprobieren, bist dir aber nicht sicher, ob es etwas fÃ¼r dich ist? Jetzt kannst du 2 Monate lang kostenlos und unverbindlich testen, ob unser Smart Konto zu dir passt!Wenn du es ausprobierst, erhÃ¤ltst du Zugang zu allen Premium-Banking-Funktionen, die in unserem Smart Konto enthalten sind. Entdecke, wie du mehr aus deinen tÃ¤glichen BankgeschÃ¤ften herausholst.Was ist in der kostenlosen Testphase fÃ¼r Smart enthalten?60 Tage kostenlos testen: Wenn du ein Neukunde von N26 Standard bist, kannst du von unserem 60-tÃ¤gigen kostenlosen Test von Smart profitieren.Jederzeit stornieren: Du kannst wÃ¤hrend deiner kostenlosen Testphase jederzeit stornieren und trotzdem die Vorteile Ã¼ber die vollen 60 Tage hinweg genieÃŸen (nach 60 Tagen wirst du automatisch wieder auf Standard zurÃ¼ckgestuft).Bei Smart bleiben: Wenn du dich fÃ¼r unser N26 Smart Konto entscheidest, dann brauchst du nichts weiter zu unternehmen. Die monatliche GebÃ¼hr in HÃ¶he von 4,90 â‚¬ wird automatisch abgebucht. Wenn du deine Meinung Ã¤nderst, kannst du nach dem Ende der kostenlosen Testphase jederzeit wieder auf Standard zurÃ¼ckstufen.Profitiere von den Vorteilen unseres Smart Kontos: WÃ¤hrend deines 60-tÃ¤gigen kostenlosen Tests von Smart stehen dir folgende Vorteile zur VerfÃ¼gung:Spaces (bis zu 10)Bis zu 10 Shared SpacesIBAN fÃ¼r Spacesbis zu 5 kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten pro MonatRound-up SavingsPartnerangebote und RabatteTelefonischer Support
Wichtig:Wenn du bei deinem N26 Smart Konto bleibst, wird die GebÃ¼hr in HÃ¶he von 4,90 â‚¬ am ersten Tag nach der kostenlosen Testphase abgebucht. Ein Downgrade ist aber trotzdem jederzeit mÃ¶glich.ZusÃ¤tzlich erhÃ¤ltst du nach dem Upgrade ein Angebot, deine digitale Karte einmalig kostenlos als bunte Karte nachzubestellen. Gleichzeitig behÃ¤ltst du deine transparente Karte. Bitte beachte, dass deine digitale Karte dann deaktiviert wird.Wie erhalte ich Zugriff auf die kostenlose Smart-Probemitgliedschaft?Wenn du eine Einladung fÃ¼r eine kostenlose Testversion unserer Smart-Mitgliedschaft erhalten hast, kannst du auf diese zugreifen, indem du folgende Anweisungen befolgst.Von der Push-Nachricht aus: Tippe auf die Push-Nachricht.Wenn sich die N26 App Ã¶ffnet, erscheint automatisch deine Einladung, in der das kostenlose Probemitgliedschaft erlÃ¤utert wird. Klicke auf "BestÃ¤tigen", um fortzufahren.Dir wird dann eine Zusammenfassung des Angebots angezeigt. Bitte lies dir die Allgemeinen GeschÃ¤ftsbedingungen durch und stimme diesen zu.Klicke anschlieÃŸend auf "Kauf bestÃ¤tigen": Du hast nun offiziell eine Probemitgliedschaft abgeschlossen. Eine Nachricht bestÃ¤tigt dir, dass der Abschluss erfolgreich war! Von der N26 App aus: Ã–ffne die N26 App.Der Zugangspunkt fÃ¼r die kostenlose N26 Smart-Probemitgliedschaft wird dir oben auf deinem Home Bildschirm angezeigt. Tippe auf "Mehr erfahren". Daraufhin erscheint ein Fenster mit der Einladung, in der das kostenlose Testangebot im Detail erklÃ¤rt wird. Klicke auf "BestÃ¤tigen", um fortzufahren.Dir wird dann eine Zusammenfassung des Angebots angezeigt. Bitte lies dir die Allgemeinen GeschÃ¤ftsbedingungen durch und stimme diesen zu.Klicke auf "Kauf bestÃ¤tigen": Du hast nun offiziell eine Probemitgliedschaft abgeschlossen! Anmerkung: Wenn du eine E-Mail mit einer Einladung fÃ¼r eine Probemitgliedschaft erhalten hast, empfehlen wir dir, diese von deinem Smartphone aus zu Ã¶ffnen und auf die SchaltflÃ¤che "Kostenlose Probemitgliedschaft starten" zu klicken. Dadurch wird automatisch die N26 App geÃ¶ffnet und die Einladungsseite aufgerufen. Alternativ kannst du dich in die mobile App von N26 einloggen und den obigen Schritten fÃ¼r den Zugriff von der App aus folgen.

title: Come bloccare un addebito diretto?
content: Prima di inviarci il modulo per bloccare un addebito diretto, ti preghiamo di notare quanto segue:Identificativo del creditore e riferimento del mandato: dovrai specificare sia lâ€™identificativo del creditore che il codice di riferimento del mandato. Puoi ottenere queste informazioni nei dettagli della transazione dell'ultimo addebito diretto nell'app o contattando l'esercente (attenzione, non bastano l'IBAN e il nome dell'esercente).Allegati inferiori a 25 MB: quando rispondi con il modulo necessario, ti preghiamo di assicurarti che complessivamente i tuoi allegati non superino i 25 MB.Firma del documento: se puoi, apponi la tua firma autografa al modulo che ci invii. Tuttavia, accettiamo anche:Firma elettronica: deve essere la stessa del documento che hai usato per aprire il tuo conto N26.Firma digitale: se apponi sul documento una firma digitale che possiamo verificare, la firma Ã¨ considerata valida. Le firme digitali possono essere create tramite operatori come "DocuSign".Infine, Ã¨ importante notare che cancellando un addebito diretto impedisci solo i pagamenti, ma non estingui il contratto che hai con l'esercente.Come blocco un addebito diretto?Ti invitiamo a seguire gli step descritti in seguito, compilare il modulo e metterti in contatto con il nostro team del Supporto Clienti tramite chat o telefono.Per favore, scarica e compila questo modulo (nuova tabella).Compila il modulo e specifica cosa intendi bloccare, ad es., identificativo del creditore, codice di riferimento del mandato e blocco totale. Puoi trovare queste informazioni negli addebiti diretti precedenti per lo stesso esercente nel tuo elenco delle transazioni.Assicurati di includere una firma (autografa, elettronica o digitale).DopodichÃ© dovrai metterti in contatto con il nostro team del Supporto Clienti tramite live chat (per essere verificato direttamente) o telefonicamente, cosÃ¬ i nostri agenti potranno aiutarti a portare a termine la procedura. Compila il modulo anticipatamente per accelerare la procedura!

title: How do contactless payments work?
content: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If youâ€™re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to â‚¬50 donâ€™t require a card PIN. For amounts over â‚¬50 or cumulative transactions above 150â‚¬ youâ€™ll need to enter your card PIN.Â Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front wonâ€™t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

title: CRR Disclosure Report
content: What is it ?The Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) is an EU law. Among others, it states an obligation for credit institutions to publish a disclosure report on an annual basis (Art. 433 CRR).Â Â Why is the Disclosure Report not published in our Support Center or somewhere else on our website?N26 Bank GmbH is not obliged to publish the CRR report on our website. Art. 434 (new tab) CRR only requires an â€œappropriate mediumâ€ and therefore leaves the decision up to each credit institution.N26 Bank GmbH publishes its CRR in www.bundesanzeiger.de (new tab)

title: Was sind Shared Spaces?
content: Mit Shared Spaces kannst du ganz einfach Geld mit anderen N26 Nutzern teilen und es gemeinsam nutzen. Ob ihr einen gemeinsamen Urlaub plant, Rechnungen teilen wollt oder ein Geburtstagsgeschenk fÃ¼r eure Liebsten organisieren mÃ¶chtet - mit diesen Unterkonten ist es mÃ¶glich.Premium-Kunden (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You oder N26 Business Metal) kÃ¶nnen einen Shared Space erstellen und andere Teilnehmer dazu einladen.Alle N26 Nutzer kÃ¶nnen teilnehmen, unabhÃ¤ngig von ihren Kontotypen.Dem Besitzer gehÃ¶ren alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space.Der Besitzer kann bis zu 10 Teilnehmer zu einem Space einladen und entfernen.Wie auch bei unseren anderen Spaces, haben Shared Spaces keine eigene IBAN oder Bankkarte.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of ourÂ Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isnâ€™t rewarded because the invited friend hasnâ€™t made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates theÂ Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

title: How to download my personal data?
content: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. Weâ€™ve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and youâ€™re in complete control: go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. Â It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.Â As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.Â Â How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. Youâ€™ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure itâ€™s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

title: What to do if my card is lost or itâ€™s been compromised?
content: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.Â Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).Â You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

title: What are â€œMessagesâ€ ?
content:
The security of your personal data is our priority. Thatâ€™s why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. Weâ€™ll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, youâ€™ll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, youâ€™ll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.Weâ€™ll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You canâ€™t initiate a conversation, but youâ€™ll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesnâ€™t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, weâ€™ll ask you to open a chat with us.

title: Come posso ordinare una carta aggiuntiva?
content: Clicca qui, se vuoi sostituire la tua carta invece di ordinarne una aggiuntiva.Come posso ordinare una carta aggiuntiva:Accedi al tuo conto N26Vai su: EsploraSeleziona: Carta aggiuntiva > MastercardScegli il colore e il tipo di spedizione che preferisciConferma lâ€™operazione e effettua il pagamentoLa carta aggiuntiva ha un costo di 10â‚¬ con consegna standard e di 25â‚¬ con consegna express. Per attivare la produzione e la consegna della carta, dovrai versare un importo minimo una tantum di 10â‚¬ sul tuo conto. Maggiori informazioni sono presenti qui.â„¹ï¸ La carta aggiuntiva Ã¨ disponibile per i clienti con una membership premium (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) nei seguenti paesi: Germania, Francia, Italia, Spagna, Austria, Danimarca, Islanda, Liechtenstein, Norvegia, Polonia, Svezia, Belgio, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Lettonia, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Paesi Bassi.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

title: Come posso tenere traccia delle mie spese quotidiane?
content: LeÂ transazioniÂ vengono ordinate automaticamente e i risultati visualizzati in Statistiche (angolo in alto a destra dell'app mobile) in ordine di:Categorie: Raccogliamo informazioni sui rivenditori e sulle causali di pagamento al fine di migliorare la categorizzazione (come ad es. bancomat, cibo e generi alimentari, shopping). Se, ad esempio, mandi un Moneybeam con il testo di riferimento Pranzo, verrÃ  inserito nella categoria Bar e ristoranti. Se secondo te una categoria non Ã¨ adatta, puoi modificarla semplicemente selezionando la transazione e scegliendo una categoria dall'elenco a discesa.Hashtag: Abbiamo anche aggiunto degli hashtag standard per gli orari delle transazioni (#weekend), i tipi di transazioni (#libri), o i luoghi degli acquisti (#berlino). Puoi ordinare ulteriormente le transazioni aggiungendo degli hashtag personali: tocca una transazione e poi l'icona della matita per aggiungere un tag (ad esempio #viaggio_portogallo #ognimese) o rimuoverne uno.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking sÃ©curisÃ©
content:
Quâ€™est-ce que la Directive DSP2?La 2Ã¨me Directive sur les Services de Paiement 2 (Â« DSP2 Â») est une directive europÃ©enne rÃ©visÃ©e qui vous permet dâ€™accÃ©der aux informations de votre compte ainsi que dâ€™effectuer des paiements de maniÃ¨re sÃ»re et sÃ©curisÃ©e par l'intermÃ©diaire de prestataires de services de paiement rÃ©gulÃ©s.Cela signifie que vous pouvez autoriser des prestataires de services rÃ©gulÃ©s Ã  accÃ©der directement aux donnÃ©es de votre compte grÃ¢ce Ã  une interface dÃ©diÃ©e :Â Vous pouvez permettre Ã  un service d'information sur les comptes (SIC) de regrouper les donnÃ©es de vos diffÃ©rents comptes bancaires, puis de regrouper ces comptes au mÃªme endroit (via une application comme un agrÃ©gateur de comptes par exemple);Vous pouvez payer en toute sÃ©curitÃ© en ligne sur tous les sites internet qui proposent des services d'initiation de paiement (SIP).L'Ã©change de donnÃ©es se fait en arriÃ¨re-plan via notre partenaire Token.io.Comment cela fonctionne ?Si vous commencez Ã  utiliser un service de paiement tiers comme un service dâ€™information sur les comptes ou un service d'initiation de paiement, vous serez redirigÃ©s vers lâ€™application N26 via Token.io pour confirmer votre demande.Notre politique de confidentialitÃ© (nouvel onglet) vous informe des objectifs, des parties prenantes et du cadre lÃ©gal concernant le traitement des donnÃ©es nÃ©cessaire au respect de nos obligations dans le cadre de la Directive EuropÃ©enne rÃ©visÃ©e sur les Services de Paiement. FAQPourquoi est-ce je nâ€™arrive pas Ã  lier un prestataire de service Ã  mon compte?
Si un prestataire de service nâ€™est pas intÃ©grÃ© avec notre interface, le prestataire devra mettre en place une telle intÃ©gration avec notre partenaire Token.io.Â Comment rÃ©voquer lâ€™autorisation dâ€™accÃ©der aux informations de mon compte donnÃ©e Ã  un prestataire de service?
Vous pouvez simplement contacter le prestataire de service en question pour rÃ©voquer lâ€™autorisation que vous leur avez donnÃ©e.*sâ€™applique Ã  tous les pays de lâ€™EEA.

title: Geld abheben und einzahlen mit CASH26 â€“ So gehtâ€™s
content: FÃ¼r Konten verfÃ¼gbar, die in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland erÃ¶ffnet wurden.Dein verknÃ¼pftes Smartphone ist alles, was du brauchst. Ã–ffne die CASH26 Karte in deiner App und nutze die Zoom-Funktion, um ein teilnehmendes GeschÃ¤ft in deiner NÃ¤he zu finden. Der Kassierer bzw. die Kassiererin wird den Code einscannen und dir das Bargeld aushÃ¤ndigen.Â Wie kann ich Geld auf mein N26 Konto einzahlen mit CASH26?Gehe in deiner N26 App auf den â€œKartenâ€-Tab und wÃ¤hle CASH26 > Bargeld einzahlen.WÃ¤hle den Betrag, den du einzahlen willst (mindestens 50 â‚¬).Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) ein und bestÃ¤tige die Transaktion im Popup-Fenster.Â Zeige den Strichcode auf deinem Smartphone-Bildschirm an der Kasse vor und Ã¼berreiche das Bargeld.Es kann es bis zu 10 Minuten dauern, bis das eingezahlte Bargeld in deinem Kontostand in der N26 App zu sehen ist.Wichtig!Der Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang gÃ¼ltig. In diesem Fall musst du einen neuen Strichcode erstellen.Â Falls du einen falschen Betrag eingibst, kannst du ihn lÃ¶schen, indem du auf das Papierkorb Symbol oben rechts tippst (oder den Code ablaufen lÃ¤sst) und dann einen neuen Barcode erstellst.Â Du musst im GeschÃ¤ft nichts kaufen, wenn du Bargeld einzahlen oder Geld abheben willst.Mehr Ã¼ber CASH26 sowie Einzahl- und Abhebelimits erfÃ¤hrst du in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab).

title: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
content: We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback toÂ ideas@n26.com (new tab). Weâ€™re always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can alsoÂ file a complaint.

There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us

title: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasnâ€™t been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you donâ€™t have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000â‚¬,Â and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500â‚¬. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you canâ€™t withdraw your daily limit at once.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).Â Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the â€œOwnerâ€, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:Â Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.Â Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.Â Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Ownerâ€™s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, theyâ€™ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.Â N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How to use my card digitally?
content: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn meine IBAN nicht akzeptiert wird?
content: Deine IBAN enthÃ¤lt die DE-LÃ¤nderkennzahl, eine zweistellige PrÃ¼fnummer, die achtstellige Bankleitzahl und deine zehnstellige Kontonummer. Zum Beispiel:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Die teilnehmenden LÃ¤nder des SEPA-Raums (Single Euro Payments Area) haben sich auf das IBAN-System geeinigt, um nationale und internationale Zahlungen zu vereinfachen und das Fehlerrisiko bei der Kommunikation und Abwicklung von Transaktionen zu reduzieren.HÃ¤ndler oder Arbeitgeber, die IBANs aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten des EuropÃ¤ischen Wirtschaftsraums nicht akzeptieren, verstoÃŸen ab 1. Februar 2016 gegen europÃ¤isches Recht (Artikel 9 derÂ Verordnung Nr. 260/2012 (neuen Tab)).Wenn du jemals von einer IBAN-Diskriminierung betroffen bist, wende dich bitte direkt an deineÂ zustÃ¤ndige nationale BehÃ¶rde (neuen Tab)Â und informiere diese Ã¼ber den Vorfall. Gib deine Kontaktdaten sowie den Namen des HÃ¤ndlers oder Unternehmens an, der deine IBAN nicht akzeptiert hat, und lege eine kurze Beschreibung des Vorfalls bei (einschlieÃŸlich eines Screenshot der Ablehnung oder einen anderen Kommunikationsbeleg).
