title: Wie kann ich mit N26 spenden?
content: N26 hat sich immer an der Seite humanitÃ¤rer Organisationen im Kampf gegen Hunger und Ungerechtigkeit engagiert. Ab jetzt gestaltet sich das Spenden von deinem N26 Konto aus noch einfacher.Â Du kannst jetzt eine Spende an eine von uns ausgewÃ¤hlte Liste von gemeinnÃ¼tzigen Organisationen senden, direkt von deiner N26 App aus. Der Gesamtbetrag wird per BankÃ¼berweisung an die ausgewÃ¤hlte gemeinnÃ¼tzige Organisation gesendet.Um eine Spende an eine WohltÃ¤tigkeitsorganisation zu senden, fÃ¼hre bitte folgende Schritte aus:Tippe auf dem Home Bildschirm deiner App auf Geld sendenWÃ¤hle Spenden und dann Weiter ausWÃ¤hle eine gemeinnÃ¼tzige Organisation aus der Liste ausÂ WÃ¤hle Weiter aus, um zu spendenGib den Spendenbetrag ein und bestÃ¤tige die Transaktion mit deiner PINBitte beachte: In vielen FÃ¤llen reicht ein Zahlungsnachweis aus, um den Steuerabzug deiner Spenden im Rahmen deiner persÃ¶nlichen EinkommenserklÃ¤rung geltend machen zu kÃ¶nnen. Solltest du jedoch eine formelle Spendenbescheinigung von der WohltÃ¤tigkeitsorganisation benÃ¶tigen, bitten wir dich, dich direkt mit dieser in Verbindung zu setzen (mit deinem Zahlungsnachweis), da Spendenbescheinigungen nur von WohltÃ¤tigkeitsorganisationen und nicht von N26 ausgestellt werden dÃ¼rfen.

title: Wie verwende ich Apple Pay?
content: VerfÃ¼gbar in Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, der Slowakei, Deutschland, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Norwegen, Ã–sterreich, Polen, Portugal, Schweden Slowenien, Spanien, in der SchweizApple Pay ermÃ¶glicht dir, mit dem Smartphone zu bezahlen, so dass du deine Mastercard nicht Ã¼berallhin mitnehmen musst.Wir haben einÂ Video (neuen Tab)Â erstellt, das dir hilft, deine N26 Mastercard mit Apple Pay einzurichten. Hier sind einige Tipps, die du beachten solltest, wenn deine Zahlung nicht funktioniert:Deine iPhone-Region muss dem Land entsprechen, in das deine Mastercard zuerst geliefert wurde (du kannst deine Region Ã¼berprÃ¼fen, indem du Einstellungen/Allgemein/Sprache und Region auf deinem Handy auswÃ¤hlst).Wenn du dein iPhone verloren hast und es nicht mehr Ã¼ber die FunktionÂ Mein iPhone finden wiederfindest, kannst du jederzeit auf deine iCloud zugreifen und alle Apple Pay-GerÃ¤te Ã¼ber den Webbrowser auf einem Mac oder PC entfernen. ZusÃ¤tzlich solltest du denÂ Verloren-Modusaktivieren, um deine Mastercard fÃ¼r Apple Pay zu sperren. Zahlungen mit deiner physischen Karte sind weiterhin mÃ¶glich.Wenn deine N26 Mastercard unerwartet aus dem Apple Wallet entfernt wird, kann dies daran liegen, dass du dich von deiner iCloud abgemeldet, den Passcode oder die Touch-ID deaktiviert, dein GerÃ¤t Ã¼ber iTunes auf die Werkseinstellungen zurÃ¼ckgesetzt oder alle Inhalte und Einstellungen von deinem GerÃ¤t gelÃ¶scht hast. In allen FÃ¤llen kannst du deine Karte einfach wieder hinzufÃ¼gen. Beachte, dass die Karte nicht entfernt wird, wenn du dein Betriebssystem aktualisierst, deine persÃ¶nlichen GerÃ¤teeinstellungen zurÃ¼cksetzt oderÂ Mein iPhone finden deaktivierst.FÃ¼r EinkÃ¤ufe in GeschÃ¤ften oder online musst du deine Zahlung per Touch ID oder mit deinem Passwort autorisieren. Wenn du Apple Watch verwendest, erfolgen Autorisierungen durch einen Doppelklick auf die seitliche Taste. Und wenn du deinen Mac verwendest, autorisiere deine Zahlung mit der Touch ID Ã¼ber die Touch Bar in der oberen rechten Ecke deiner Tastatur.Stelle sicher, dass dein GerÃ¤t die technischen Anforderungen erfÃ¼llt, indem du denÂ Apple Support (neuen Tab)besuchst: iPhone 6 oder neuer, iPhone SE: verfÃ¼gbar in Apps, GeschÃ¤ften und onlineApple Watch verknÃ¼pft mit iPhone 5 oder neuer: verfÃ¼gbar in Apps und GeschÃ¤fteniPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: verfÃ¼gbar in Apps und onlineMacs ab 2012 (andere Macs als das MacBook Pro mit Touch Bar und Touch ID erfordern ein iPhone oder Apple Watch): verfÃ¼gbar online

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on â€˜Sharing Moneyâ€™Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ will pop-up. Tap â€œsignâ€Check both â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ and â€œPower of attorneyâ€, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Donâ€™t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you donâ€™t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while youâ€™re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We wonâ€™t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.Â

title: What if my balance is negative?
content: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships.Â Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited.Â In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

title: Comment suivre mes dÃ©penses quotidiennes ?
content: Toutes lesÂ transactionsÂ que vous effectuez sont automatiquement classÃ©es et nous vous permettons dâ€™accÃ©der aux gestion de vos dÃ©penses (accessibles depuis le symbole en haut Ã  droite de lâ€™Ã©cran de votre application mobile).Vos transactions sont classÃ©es grÃ¢ce aux :CatÃ©gories.Â Nous utilisons les informations transmises par les marchands et le libellÃ© des transactions pour amÃ©liorer la classification de vos transactions (Retrait, Shopping, Logement & Chargesâ€¦). Si vous rÃ©alisez par exemple une transactionÂ MoneyBeamÂ avec le libellÃ©Â Repas de midi, celle-ci sera automatiquement affectÃ©e Ã  la catÃ©gorieÂ Bars et restaurants. Vous pouvez Ã  tout moment ajuster la catÃ©gorie correspondant Ã  une transaction. Pour cela, sÃ©lectionnez la transaction et choisissez ensuite la catÃ©gorie qui lui correspond parmi les suggestions proposÃ©es.Hashtags.Â Des hashtags par dÃ©faut sont associÃ©s Ã  vos transaction selon le moment oÃ¹ elles ont Ã©tÃ© effectuÃ©es (#weekend), selon le type de produit achetÃ© (#books) ou le lieu de lâ€™achat (#berlin). Vous pouvez crÃ©er vos propres hashtags : il vous suffit de sÃ©lectionner une transaction, puis dâ€™appuyer sur le pinceau pour personnaliser votre hashtag (#cadeau_anniv ou #touslesmois) ou supprimer ceux que vous nâ€™utilisez pas.Vous souhaitez parler de nous Ã  vos amis ? Recevez 15 â‚¬ Ã  chaque fois que lâ€™un dâ€™entre eux nous rejoint. DÃ©couvrez notreÂ programme de parrainage.

title: Comment inviter un ami Ã  rejoindre N26 ?
content: Depuis le 1erÂ octobre, nous sommes en train d'amÃ©liorer notre programme de parrainage N26. C'est pour cette raison que nous avons supprimÃ© ces informations de lâ€™application avant dâ€™effectuer ces changements. Les invitations et les adhÃ©sions effectuÃ©es avant le 1erÂ octobre donneront toujours le droit Ã  des primes. Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de communiquer une date prÃ©cise pour la reprise des parrainages.

title: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
content:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest â€œSplit the billâ€ feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where youâ€™re sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on â€˜Homeâ€™ tab, tap it and choose â€˜Split the billâ€™Add the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, youâ€™ll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap â€˜Confirmâ€™ to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests canâ€™t be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs â‚¬9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if youâ€™re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we donâ€™t charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if youâ€™re certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could helpÂ get your money back.

title: Come funziona 3D Secure?
content: 3D Secure ti protegge dalle frodi online con carta. Si attiva automaticamente quando attivi la tua carta nellâ€™app. Non servono password aggiuntive.Ogni volta che effettui unÂ pagamento onlineÂ con la tua Mastercard, 3D Secure ti conferma la transazione entro 5 minuti tramite unÂ messaggio push. Se non vedi la transazione, prova alcuniÂ suggerimenti per la risoluzione dei problemiÂ che abbiamo raccolto.Ricorda: la notifica push sarÃ  inviata solo allo smartphone collegato al conto.Se effettui un acquisto utilizzando lo smartphone, nellâ€™app verrÃ  visualizzata una transazione in sospeso. Tocca lâ€™icona della campana per visualizzare il messaggio push per confermare e finalizzare lâ€™acquisto. Poi torna al sito web dellâ€™esercente. Dovresti vedere una conferma dellâ€™avvenuto acquisto entro pochi secondi.

title: How to get a bank statement?
content: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Hereâ€™s how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV. Â  * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the â€˜Add moneyâ€™ button.

title: Come i miei soldi sono protetti ad N26
content: LoÂ  (nuova tabella)Schema di Compensazione delle banche private tedesche (nuova tabella) assicura tutti i depositiÂ fino a 100.000 â‚¬Â posseduti negli Stati membri dell'Unione Europea. In qualitÃ  di titolare di una licenza bancaria, N26 Bank Ã¨ legalmente tenuta ad essere membro di uno Schema di Compensazione. N26 Ã¨ un membro dello Schema di Compensazione delle banche private tedesche.In che modo N26 rileva e monitora le frodi?N26 dispone di un team di specialisti il cui lavoro si concentra sul monitoraggio e lâ€™identificazione di transazioni sospette sulla nostra piattaforma. Con lâ€™aiuto di modelli statistici e algoritmi avanzati, assieme ad analisi comportamentali, il nostro team di specialisti fa in modo che i tuoi soldi siano sempre in buone mani.Quali iniziative intraprende N26 quando rileva azioni fraudolente nelle attivitÃ  dei propri clienti?Non appena il nostro team di esperti rileva unâ€™attivitÃ  irregolare, prendiamo tutte le misure previste dalla legge per ridurne lâ€™impatto e prevenire ulteriori danni. CiÃ² implica anche chiudere e denunciare alle autoritÃ  i conti bancari sui quali si verificano attivitÃ  illegali. Se delle transazioni sospette fanno pensare a un riciclaggio di denaro, finanziamenti a organizzazioni terroristiche o qualsiasi altro atto criminale, N26 segnala immediatamente tali attivitÃ  allâ€™UnitÃ  di intelligence finanziaria tedesca (Financial Transaction Investigation Unit, FIU) o alle autoritÃ  locali di vigilanza.Quali sono i modi in cui N26 ha investito sulla sicurezza?Alla fine del 2019 abbiamo creato il nostro team dedicato ai temi Trust e Sicurezza. Questo team lavora con il team dedicato alla Sicurezza informatica e il loro operato consiste nel garantire la sicurezza degli utenti, dei loro conti e dei loro dati, proteggendoli dai criminali informatici. Inoltre, N26 ha raddoppiato la dimensione della propria UnitÃ  Antiriciclaggio (AML) e dellâ€™UnitÃ  contro i crimini finanziari, creando procedure per il monitoraggio delle transazioni e delle piattaforme. In questo modo possiamo rilevare e prevenire le attivitÃ  illegali basandoci sullo storico dei dati, che in ultima istanza ci permette di essere sempre diversi passi avanti rispetto ai malfattori. Investiamo significativamente nella tecnologia e nellâ€™intelligenza artificiale per implementare modelli e algoritmi avanzati, assieme ad analisi comportamentali.

title: 2 Months N26 Smart Free Trial
content:
Eligibility: All EU marketsEver wanted to try out our N26 Smart account, but not sure if itâ€™s for you? Well now you can enjoy 2 whole months for free - And â€˜try before you buyâ€™ - to see if our Smart account works for you, with no commitment!If you want to take part in our N26 Smart free trial, you will have access to our premium banking features included with our Smart account. And see the value by getting more out of your everyday banking.What is included in our Smart free trial?60 day free trial: Eligible N26 customers can take advantage of our 60 day Smart free trial.Cancel at any point: At any point during your free trial, youâ€™ll be able to cancel and still enjoy the benefits for the full 60 days (you will be automatically downgraded back to Standard after 60 days)Continue with Smart: If you decide our N26 Smart account is for you, then you can take no action to continue with our Smart account and pay the monthly fee of 4,90â‚¬. If you change your mind after the free trial is over, you can always downgrade back to Standard.Enjoy the benefits of our Smart account: You can use the following benefits during your 60 day Smart free trial:Spaces (up to 10)Up to 10 Shared SpacesIBAN for Spaces (DE customers only) Up to 5 free ATM withdrawals/ monthRound-ups SavingsEnjoy partner offers and discountsPhone supportHow to access the Smart free trial?If you have been invited to a Free Trial of our Smart membership, you will be able to access it by following the instructions below. Tap on â€œLearn Moreâ€ This will open the invitation screen explaining the free trial offer in detail. Click â€œConfirm Purchaseâ€ : you are officially part of the trial now! Note: If you received an email inviting you to start the trial, we recommend opening it from your phone and clicking the â€œStart free trialâ€ button. This will automatically open the N26 app and load the invitation page. Otherwise, login to your N26 mobile app and follow the app flow above.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte Ã©tranger ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ©).Complete the Cerfa nÂ° 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

title: How to request the average annual balance
content:
In the beginning of January 2022, you will receive your average annual balance for 2021 in your (new tab)Messages (new tab). You do not need to submit a request. Same thing for the average annual balance of the years 2020 and 2019.If you need your average annual balance for a year prior to 2019, please contact our Customer Service team via chat.Why do I need it?The average annual balance is used to fill out the ISEE form, report your N26 bank account with a German IBAN to the Italian tax authorities when this balance is greater than 5.000â‚¬, prove your creditworthiness, and access programs or receive special benefits from the Italian government based on your financial situation.You can request the ISEE form by filling out the DSU form, which is essential for accessing some of the tax breaks offered by the Italian government.The value of the average annual balance, which is self-certified by the bank account holder without the need for paper documentation, must be entered in the FC.2 section of the ISEE form, under â€œbank and postal accounts and depositsâ€. You should enter the type of financial asset held and the bank account balance into this field.How do I calculate it?The average annual balance is the amount obtained by dividing the sum of the daily balances of the current account by 365, regardless of the effective duration of the calendar year (leap years), and of the number of days in which the account has been active or had a positive balance, as defined by the italian Tax Authority (new tab) and in the instructions (new tab) for completing the Single Tax Declaration 2020 of the Ministry of Labor and Social Policies.FAQs on Average annual balanceIf I have an account with a German IBAN and my average balance is over â‚¬ 5,000, do I have to declare it to the tax authority?Yes, you will have to fill in the Rw part of the tax return and pay VAT, a fixed amount tax of â‚¬ 34.20. Click here (new tab) for more information on this.I would like to receive a PDF document with the value of my average annual balance. Is it possible?We remind you that there are no legal provisions that require banks to provide this type of certification.
We have decided to send the average annual balance as a private message, in order to make this data easily accessible and downloadable by all customers.
However, your bank statement is sufficient as official proof in the event of an explicit request by the authorities, therefore we are unable to provide any document signed by the bank in PDF or similar format.

title: How to change my phone number?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to:Â ğŸ‘¤Â My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

title: Bankdokumente â€“ Diese Belege sind verfÃ¼gbar
content:
N26 heiÃŸt nicht ohne Grund die mobile Bank â€“ du kannstÂ  deinen Kontoauszug, deine Bankdaten und andere Bankdokumente automatisch herunterladen. Bei den folgenden Bankdokumenten handelt es sich um offizielle Dokumente, die ohne Unterschrift gÃ¼ltig sind:Dein Kontoauszug ist ein Dokument, auf dem du deinen aktuellen Kontostand sowie eingehende und ausgehende Transaktionen auf deinem N26 Konto einsehen kannst. Auch dein vollstÃ¤ndiger Name, deine IBAN und deine BIC stehen auf dem Bankdokument. So kannst du es herunterladen.Deine Bankdaten (oder: KontobestÃ¤tigung) belegen, dass dein Bankkonto unter deinem Namen registriert ist. Dieses Bankdokument beinhaltet deinen vollen Namen, dein Geburtsdatum, deine IBAN und BIC, das Datum der KontoerÃ¶ffnung und â€“ falls gewÃ¼nscht â€“ deinen aktuellen Kontostand und deine Kartennummer (die beiden letzten Angaben sind in der Regel nicht zu sehen). So kannst du deine Bankdaten anfordern.Die GebÃ¼hrenabrechnung ist ein Dokument, auf dem alle von N26 erhobenen GebÃ¼hren des letzten Jahres aufgelistet sind.In der Web-App: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*, tippe auf Entgeltaufstellung, wÃ¤hle je nach Bedarf 6 Monate oder 12 Monate und klicke im Anschluss auf Anfrage. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden erhÃ¤ltst du eine PDF in deinem Posteingang unter Nachrichten von N26.Der Ãœberweisungsbeleg bestÃ¤tigt, dass du eine Zahlung von deinem N26 Konto getÃ¤tigt hast. Darin enthalten sind dein vollstÃ¤ndiger Name, deine (im N26 Konto registrierte) Adresse, deine IBAN und BIC, der Ãœberweisungsbetrag, das Datum, der Verwendungszweck sowie der vollstÃ¤ndige Name, die IBAN und die BIC des EmpfÃ¤ngers.In der mobilen und der WebApp: Gehe im Home-Bereich auf die Ãœberweisung und wÃ¤hle ÃœberweisungsbestÃ¤tigung herunterladen. Die PDF wird automatisch erstellt.Die KartenzahlungsbestÃ¤tigung wird genutzt, um eine Zahlung mit deiner N26 Mastercard zu bestÃ¤tigen. Du kannst den Kontoauszug des entsprechenden Monats vorweisen.RIB (RelevÃ© d'IdentitÃ© Bancaire in FranzÃ¶sisch) ist ein Bankdokument speziell fÃ¼r franzÃ¶sische BehÃ¶rden. Es enthÃ¤lt die wichtigsten Bankdaten, wie deinen vollstÃ¤ndigen Namen, deine Adresse sowie IBAN und BIC.In der WebApp: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab) Symbol*, scrolle runter bis RIB - RelevÃ© dâ€™IdentitÃ© Bancaire und klicke auf den Anfrage Button. Â  
* Das Download Symbol ist ein Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil. Es befindet sich links vom â€˜Geld erhaltenâ€™ Button.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo ganar dinero al invitar a mis amigos a N26?
content: Ten en cuenta que para recibir tu recompensa, tu amigo debe realizar una primera transacciÃ³n con su tarjeta (comprar en una tienda, retirar efectivo en un cajero automÃ¡tico o realizar un pago online, PayPal no incluido) por un valor igual o superior al de la recompensa de la invitaciÃ³n. Recuerda que la cantidad de la recompensa puede tardar hasta 60 dÃ­as en depositarse en tu cuenta.Â Puedes empezar a invitar amigos en cuanto tienes acceso a tu cuenta.Para saber la recompensa que recibes por cada invitaciÃ³n, simplemente ve a la secciÃ³n Invitar amigos :Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu cuentaDesde la pantalla principal, pulsa en Explorar (tu app) o sobre el icono ğŸ‘¤ Mi Cuenta (WebApp) situado en la esquina superior derecha y despuÃ©s en Pulsa enÂ Invitar AmigosPulsa enÂ CÃ³digo de invitaciÃ³nÂ para copiarlo y selecciona una de las opciones disponibles para compartirlo.Escribe un mensaje a tu amigo o envÃ­a el mensaje predeterminado.PulsaÂ Enviar.Para que tÃº recibas la recompensa, tu amigo debe cumplir los siguientes requisitos:Registrarse siguiendo tu enlace o cÃ³digo de invitaciÃ³n.Hacer una transacciÃ³n con la tarjeta Mastercard por un valor igual o superior al bono de recompensa. Una transacciÃ³n elegible puede ser una compra en un establecimiento, una retirada en un cajero o un pago online (excepto por PayPal).VerÃ¡s el bono en tu cuenta N26 en un plazo de 60 dÃ­as. Puedes consultar el estado de tu invitaciÃ³n en la app o la Web App.En total, puedes recibir hasta un mÃ¡ximo de â‚¬1500 invitando amigos.Si tu recompensa no te ha llegado todavÃ­a, tambiÃ©n hemos recolectado lasÂ posibles razones.*El enlace no caduca y se puede usar infinitas veces. Los cÃ³digos y enlaces de invitaciÃ³n se deben utilizar solo para fines personales y no comerciales. Esto significa que puedes compartir tu enlace de invitaciÃ³n con tus contactos personales a travÃ©s de las redes sociales, siempre y cuando tÃº seas el/la propietario/a principal del contenido. N26 tiene derecho a cancelar el programa de invitaciÃ³n en cualquier momento.Por el momento, pueden recibir recompensas por invitar a amigos los clientes con cuentas en uno de los paÃ­ses siguientes: Alemania, Austria, EspaÃ±a.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo cambiar mi PIN de confirmaciÃ³n?
content: Instrucciones paso a paso:iPhoneAndroidPaso 1Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu aplicaciÃ³n N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2DesplÃ¡zate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaciÃ³nPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³nPaso 1Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu aplicaciÃ³n N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2DesplÃ¡zate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaciÃ³nPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³nEl PIN de confirmaciÃ³n es el que usas para confirmar las transferencias o cualquier otra operaciÃ³n que hagas desde la app. Si no sabes cuÃ¡l es, quizÃ¡ te ayude a recordarlo que tÃº creas tu propio PIN de confirmaciÃ³nÂ cuando vinculas tu mÃ³vil (pestaÃ±a nueva) por primera vez.Si lo has olvidado o quieres cambiarlo, puedes hacerlo cuando quieras desde la app:Ve a ğŸ‘¤ Mi cuenta y luego Seguridad.SeleccionaÂ Cambiar PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (es un nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos que aparece bajo tu nombre en la parte de delante de tu tarjeta; o por atrÃ¡s, en las tarjetas N26 Smart, You y Metal).Crea y confirma tu nuevo PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.Si introduces el PIN de confirmaciÃ³n errÃ³neamente 6 veces seguidas, tendrÃ¡s que restablecerlo antes de volver a intentarlo.Por motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ningÃºn PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, direcciÃ³n u otra combinaciÃ³n con dÃ­gitos repetidos o secuencias (como por ejemplo 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el nÃºmero que has elegido no es vÃ¡lido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinaciÃ³n diferente.Recuerda que tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n no es el mismo que el cÃ³digo PIN de tu tarjeta; (pestaÃ±a nueva) pero, si tÃº quieres, puedes elegir el mismo PIN para ambos.

title: Come contattare N26?
content:
Ci sono diversi modi per contattare il nostro Supporto Clienti, ma l'opzione migliore Ã¨ sempre aprire una chat sicura quando effettui l'accesso all'app. Questo ci permetterÃ  di verificare la tua identitÃ  e fornirti informazioni e supporto specifici.La nostra chat Ã¨ disponibile tutti i giorni dalle 07:00 alle 23:00, anche la domenica e nei giorni festivi.Come contattarci tramite appCome chattare con noiApri una chat di assistenzaLa chat inizierÃ  non appena effettui l'accesso.Come chiamarci
(solo per conti Premium)Possiamo metterti in contatto con il nostro Supporto Clienti solo se ci chiami al numero registrato nel tuo conto. Se devi registrare un nuovo numero di telefono, segui i passaggi descritti in questa pagina: Come cambiare il mio numero di telefono.Attenzione: per contattarci al telefono devi possedere un conto N26 premium (You, Smart o Metal).Supporto telefonico (solo premium)Non hai accesso all'app?Non sei ancora cliente di N26?Se non hai un conto con noi ma hai domande di carattere generale sui nostri prodotti e servizi, puoi aprire una chat visitatore qui sotto oppure inviarci un email a support@n26.com (il tempo di attesa per l'e-mail potrebbe essere piÃ¹ lungo).Hai perso lâ€™accesso al tuo conto?Il tuo telefono Ã¨ smarrito o si Ã¨ rotto? Stai riscontrando problemi per effettuare l'accesso nell'app e accedere al tuo conto? Siamo spiacenti di sapere questo problema e ti aiuteremo a risolverlo se aprirai una chat visitatore qui sotto o se ci invierai un'e-mail a support@n26.com (il tempo di attesa per l'e-mail potrebbe essere piÃ¹ lungo).Devi modificare i tuoi dati personali? Segui le istruzioni riportate in questa pagina.
Come posso cambiare il mio numero di telefono, l'indirizzo o altri dati personali?Attenzione: per la tua sicurezza possiamo aiutarti con domande relative ai dati personali solo se apri una chat di assistenza una volta effettuato l'accesso all'app.Apri una chat visitatoreNota bene: non siamo in grado di assisterti se ti presenterai di persona nei nostri uffici. Ti preghiamo di utilizzare solo i nostri canali designati per contattarci.

title: How to change my debit card PIN?
content: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change itâ€”you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that youâ€™ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose â€˜Cardsâ€™ from the bottom right-handTap â€˜Card Settingsâ€™ and select the relevant cardSelect â€˜Reset PINâ€™Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transactionâ€”in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequencesâ€”such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isnâ€™t accepted, simply try again a different combination.Â If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that youâ€™ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. Itâ€™s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via aÂ push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of theÂ troubleshooting tipsÂ we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, youâ€™ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchantâ€™s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

title: Come posso creare Regole per i miei Spaces?
content: Nellâ€™ambito dei tuoi Spaces puoi decidere le tue Regole: puoi preimpostare trasferimenti periodici verso i tuoi Spaces e risparmiare tempo e denaro in modo molto semplice.Se vuoi impostare una Regola dalla webapp, effettua un bonifico con Spaces e poi seleziona â€œRipeti questa operazioneâ€. Per cancellare una regola, clicca sui 3 puntini indicanti le impostazioni. Da lÃ¬, vedrai tutte le regole attive. Clicca sullâ€™icona del cestino per cancellare la regola. Se vuoi modificare una regola esistente, puoi semplicemente eliminarla dalle impostazioni dello Space in cui lâ€™hai creata e crearne una nuova.Â Dai dispositivi Android effettua un bonifico e seleziona â€œRipeti questa operazioneâ€. In alternativa, dalla sezione Spaces, seleziona i tre puntini e poi â€œcrea regolaâ€. Da questo punto, segui i passaggi successivi fino a confermare le informazioni inserite.Dai dispositivi iOS, entra nella sezione Spaces e seleziona â€œcrea regolaâ€. BasterÃ  inserire le informazioni richieste e confermare.Â Ti informiamo, inoltre, che le regole per i tuoi Spaces ed eventuali ordini di bonifici verranno elaborati allo stesso orario (0100 UTC) se impostate per lo stesso giorno. Accertati di avere fondi sufficienti per coprire queste transazioni ed evitare che non vengano eseguite.Â Se non riesci a coprire lâ€™importo richiesto, basterÃ  impostare le transazioni in date differenti in base alle tue prioritÃ .

title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (â€œPSD2â€) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, youâ€™ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.Â *applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: Â¿QuÃ© es un embargo y quÃ© puedo hacer?
content: Â¿CÃ³mo funciona un embargo?Un embargo es una orden judicial emitida por una entidad estatal o una Corte donde se informa a la entidad bancaria que tienes una deuda por pagar. Como consecuencia, N26 tiene la obligaciÃ³n de retener los fondos en tu cuenta para posteriormente transferirlos al acreedor (entidad pÃºblica o cuenta especificada por el juzgado).Los acreedores pueden ser la Agencia Tributaria, la Seguridad Social o cualquier oficina de la administraciÃ³n pÃºblica y las Cortes como resultado de un proceso judicial.Cuando bloqueamos el saldo en tu cuenta como consecuencia del embargo, recibirÃ¡s un mensaje con la siguiente informaciÃ³n:AcreedorNÃºmero del embargoÂ Saldo a embargarSaldo embargado en tu cuentaÂ¿QuÃ© puedo hacer en esta situaciÃ³n?En primer lugar, te recomendamos comunicarte con el acreedor para llegar a un acuerdo de pago o para que levanten el embargo si lo consideran pertinente. N26 no puede tomar ninguna acciÃ³n al respecto, ya que estamos obligados legalmente a efectuar el embargo y transferir los fondos, salvo que recibamos una orden de levantamiento de embargo en el tiempo determinado por la ley.Puedes realizar el pago mediante otra cuenta o a travÃ©s de tu cuenta N26, aunque el dinero no se liberarÃ¡ hasta que el acreedor no confirme la recepciÃ³n del pago.ProtecciÃ³n de salarios y de subsidios estatalesSi recibes tu salario en tu cuenta N26, se debe aplicar una protecciÃ³n especial sobre un porcentaje dependiendo de tus ingresos.Sin embargo, normalmente hay que informar de esta situaciÃ³n al acreedor, quien notificarÃ¡ a N26 el levantamiento de los fondos correspondientes.Â¿En cuÃ¡nto tiempo transfiere N26 los fondos embargados al acreedor?La transferencia de los fondos se ejecuta en tiempos diferentes dependiendo del tipo de acreedor que ha ordenado el embargo. Normalmente son 20 dÃ­as (Cortes o Hacienda) y 10 dÃ­as para embargos provenientes de la Seguridad Social. Los fondos se transfieren directamente a la entidad o al juzgado que ha emitido la orden; no se pueden transferir a terceros ni al deudor en ningÃºn caso (salvo si se levanta el embargo).

title: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
content: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you donâ€™t recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?Â Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.Â Â N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchantâ€™s part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didnâ€™t receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26Â You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.Â Go to the â€˜Homeâ€™ tab, and select the transaction you want to disputeÂ Tap â€˜Get help with this transactionâ€™ and follow the steps provided.Â Important:Â If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, youâ€™ll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. Youâ€™ll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.Â Â If you select a transaction but the â€˜Get helpâ€™ button doesnâ€™t appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, youâ€™ll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If youâ€™ve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, youâ€™ll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, weâ€™ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

title: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
content:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?Â N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European businessÂ and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.Â Â What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.Â In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos BankÂ® sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.Â How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 accountÂ 
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 AllpointÂ® ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.Â 
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.Â Â I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. Itâ€™s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via aÂ push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of theÂ troubleshooting tipsÂ we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, youâ€™ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchantâ€™s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

title: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
content: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above â‚¬150 will be charged with a 12.50â‚¬ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than â‚¬150.The maximum fee is â‚¬100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

title: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
content: Any app version can be used for 180 days since its release. Within this period, newer versions will be available. Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience.Â You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the AppleÂ App Store (new tab)Â or theÂ Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. These requirements are listed below:iPhone:Model 5s or newer.iOS 12 or above:(You can find your iOS version under "Settings" > "General" > "Informations").Android:Android 6.0. or above. You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

title: Received a suspicious message?
content:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. Theyâ€™re able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank thatâ€™s growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if youâ€™ve received an unexpected message:If youâ€™ve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If youâ€™ve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If youâ€™re ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. Weâ€™re always here to help!

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sortÂ your transactionsÂ and display our findings inÂ InsightsÂ (top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, weâ€™ll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesnâ€™t fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: Weâ€™ve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

title: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
content:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: Il mio addebito diretto andrÃ  a buon fine se non ho fondi sufficienti?
content: Se il saldo non copre lâ€™addebito diretto alla scadenza, questa operazione verrÃ  annullata e ti verrÃ  addebitata una commissione diÂ â‚¬ 3. Se hai il saldo in negativo, ti verrÃ  addebitata una tassa per lo scoperto pari allâ€™8,9%. Non Ã¨ possibile ritardare un addebito diretto.Per evitare che succeda in futuro, puoi ricaricare il tuo conto (nuova tabella) o verificare immediatamente se sei idoneo a uno scoperto di conto bancario N26 nellâ€™app (disponibile in Germania e Austria).*Solo per i paesi fuori dall'Eurozona: Se stai impostando un addebito diretto nella tua valuta nazionale, sarÃ  la banca ricevente a dettare il tasso del cambio e l'importo finale che verrÃ  riscosso da noi. Di seguito puoi trovare l'elenco dei paesi:BulgariaCroaziaRepubblica CecaDanimarcaUngheriaIslandaLiechtensteinNorvegiaPoloniaRomaniaSveziaSvizzera

title: Warum konnte mein Wise-Konto nicht verknÃ¼pft werden?
content: Der hÃ¤ufigste Grund dafÃ¼r, dass Kunden ihr Wise-Konto nicht mit ihrem N26 Konto verknÃ¼pfen kÃ¶nnen, ist, dass sie ihre persÃ¶nlichen Informationen auf ihrem Wise-Konto nicht vollstÃ¤ndig angegeben haben.Falls du ein Konto direkt bei Wise erÃ¶ffnet hast und dieselbe E-Mail-Adresse benutzt hast wie fÃ¼r dein N26 Konto, jedoch deine persÃ¶nlichen Informationen nicht vollstÃ¤ndig ausgefÃ¼llt hast, kÃ¶nnen wir dein Konto nicht mit N26 verknÃ¼pfen.Bitte logge dich unter (neuen Tab)https://wise.com/d (neuen Tab)e in dein Wise-Konto ein oder benutze ihre App und stelle sicher, dass du deinen vollen Namen, Adresse, Geburtsdatum und Handynummer vollstÃ¤ndig angegeben hast.Falls du dein Passwort fÃ¼r dein Wise-Konto vergessen hast, gehe zu (neuen Tab)https://wise.com/de (neuen Tab) und wÃ¤hle â€˜Passwort vergessenâ€™, um es zurÃ¼ckzusetzen und auf dein Konto zuzugreifen.Falls du dich nicht erinnern kannst, ob du ein Konto bei Wise erÃ¶ffnet hast, solltest du trotzdem versuchen dich einzuloggen, indem du dein Passwort zurÃ¼cksetzt. Es kÃ¶nnte sein, dass es von einem anderen Partner erÃ¶ffnet wurde oder einfach eine Weile her ist.

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: Was ist N26 Business?
content: VerfÃ¼gbar in Ã–sterreich, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Slowakei Spanien, Schweden und der Schweiz.Es ist aktuell noch nicht mÃ¶glich, zwischen verschiedenen Konten zu wechseln, daher musst du entscheiden, ob N26 Business das Richtige fÃ¼r dich ist:Das N26 Business Konto ist fÃ¼rÂ SelbstÃ¤ndige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur fÃ¼r den geschÃ¤ftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt.Â Du erhÃ¤ltst jeden Monat (0,1 % | 0,5 %) Cashback auf alle mit deiner Karte getÃ¤tigten Zahlungen. Alle wÃ¤hrend des Monats erhaltenen ZahlungsrÃ¼ckerstattungen werden vom Gesamtzahlungsbetrag abgezogen, um den Cashback zu berechnen.Â Die RÃ¼ckerstattungen beziehen sich mÃ¶glicherweise auf eine Zahlung im selben oder im Vormonat. Der Vorgang beginnt am 15. des Folgemonats sowie aller darauffolgenden Monate und es dauert bis zu 7 Tage, bis dies auf deinem Kontoauszug erscheint.Es ist derzeit nicht mÃ¶glich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu fÃ¼hren. Wenn du also auch eine Karte fÃ¼r private Ausgaben benÃ¶tigst, empfehlen wir dir, eineÂ MaestrocardÂ zu ordern (erhÃ¤ltlich in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich und den Niederlanden).Der Cashback wird monatlich ausgestellt, die dafÃ¼r berechtigten Transaktionen eines bestimmten Monats werden im darauffolgenden Monat verarbeitet, beginnend am 15. Tag. Bitte rechne damit, dass es bis zu 7 Tage dauern kann, bis die Cashback-Gutschrift in deinem N26 Business Konto erscheint.Wie beim N26 Bankkonto ist das KontoÂ gebÃ¼hrenfreiÂ und wir decken bestimmte Bargeldabhebungen im Rahmen unsererÂ Fair Use PolicyÂ ab. title: Comment puis-je fournir une preuve de lâ€™origine des fonds pour mon compte ?
content: En tant que banque entiÃ¨rement agrÃ©Ã©e, N26 doit effectuer des contrÃ´les de routine sur les comptes utilisateurs. En tant quâ€™institution rÃ©glementÃ©e, cela nous permet de protÃ©ger les fonds des comptes N26.Parfois, les rÃ©sultats de ces contrÃ´les de routine peuvent demander que nous contactions un titulaire de compte pour demander une preuve de lâ€™origine des fonds sur le compte, ce qui est une pratique conforme Ã  la rÃ©glementation bancaire allemande.Dans tous les cas, nous ne vous contacterons toujours quâ€™Ã  lâ€™adresse email associÃ©e Ã  votre compte N26. Cet email vous fournira des instructions claires sur la maniÃ¨re dâ€™envoyer ces documents, qui peuvent Ãªtre des numÃ©risations ou des photos de reÃ§us, de fiches de paie, de factures ou dâ€™instructions de paiement.Soyez toujours vigilant et vÃ©rifiez que cet email provient bien de N26. Nous ne demanderons jamais les coordonnÃ©es de votre compte N26, votre mot de passe ou toute information communiquÃ©e dans le cadre du processus de vÃ©rification.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content: YourÂ N26 You (new tab)Â andÂ N26 Metal (new tab)Â membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: How to get push messages?
content: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such asÂ MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as withÂ CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you arenâ€™t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether youâ€™re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: Come si fa un bonifico SEPA?
content: Puoi inviare bonifici verso tutti i paesi dell'area SEPA (se la banca ricevente accetta trasferimenti in euro).I bonifici in uscita possono essere effettuati tramite la versione mobile e web dellâ€™app N26 in questo modo:Dalla schermata principale, vai nella sezione Dal mio conto.Â Seleziona Dal mio conto, Bonifico bancario e poi Aggiungi nuovo beneficiario.Â Inserisci il nome e l'IBAN del beneficiario e seleziona Continua.Inserisci l'importo e seleziona Avanti.Aggiungi un messaggio se necessario, oppure seleziona Salta.Controlla i dati del bonifico nellâ€™apposita schermata.Nella stessa schermata puoi scegliere la data in cui vuoi che il bonifico venga inviato oppure salvarlo come ordine permanente.Seleziona Invia e conferma con il tuo PIN di Conferma.Dovrai, infine, confermare o annullare il bonifico tramite notifica push dal tuo dispositivo associato.Una volta che il bonifico viene confermato nella app, non possiamo piÃ¹ annullarlo o cambiare i dettagli del beneficiario.Se non riesci a confermare lâ€™invio del bonifico tramite app, dovresti accertarti di quanto segue:hai una connessione internet stabilehai abilitato le notifiche push sul tuo dispositivo (le notifiche si abilitano dalle impostazioni del dispositivo e non dallâ€™app N26)Â stai usando il dispositivo associato Dopo aver inviato il bonifico, potrai scaricare il PDF relativo alla transazione in questo modo:Â Vai alla tua lista di transazioni.Individua e seleziona il bonifico.Â Scorri verso il basso, fino a Informazioni sul bonifico e seleziona Conferma di trasferimentoPuoi inviare bonifici SEPA direttamente dai tuoi spazi separati dal conto principale con un IBAN assegnato. Basta andare nello Space con l'IBAN assegnato, selezionare "Invia denaro" e poi "Bonifico bancario". FunzionerÃ  come un normale pagamento in uscita.

title: Wie speichere ich die Daten eines ÃœberweisungsempfÃ¤ngers?
content: Jedes Mal, wenn du eine Ãœberweisung an einen neuen EmpfÃ¤nger in der App erstellst (klicke im Startbildschirm auf den Tab Geld senden, anschlieÃŸend auf BankÃ¼berweisung und schlieÃŸlich auf Einen neuen EmpfÃ¤nger hinzufÃ¼gen), werden einige Daten wie der Name des EmpfÃ¤ngers und die IBAN automatisch in deiner Kontaktliste fÃ¼r zukÃ¼nftige Ãœberweisungen gespeichert. Du kannst auch Kontakte lÃ¶schen oder deinen Transaktionsverlauf mit ihnen einsehen:iOS: Tippe auf die drei Punkte links, um den Kontakt zu lÃ¶schen.Android: Tippe auf die drei Punkte rechts, um den Kontakt zu lÃ¶schen.Beachte, dass das LÃ¶schen eines Kontakteintrags den zugehÃ¶rigen Transaktionsverlauf nicht lÃ¶scht.

title: PSD2 - un Open Banking sicuro
content: Cosâ€™Ã¨ la PSD2?La Direttiva sui Servizi di Pagamento 2 (Â«PSD2Â») Ã¨ la nuova direttiva europeaÂ  che ti consente di accedere alle informazioni sul tuo conto e di effettuare la disposizione di ordini di pagamento tramiteÂ  terze parti autorizzate in modo sicuro e protetto.QuestoÂ  significa che puoi autorizzareÂ  terze parti ad accedere alle informazioni del tuo conto tramite unâ€™interfaccia dedicata.Puoi abilitare un servizio dâ€™informazioni sui conti t (AIS) per riunire i dati relativi aiÂ  tuoi conti bancari che possiedi e gestirli attraverso fornitori terzi certificati;Puoi pagare in modo sicuro suÂ  qualsiasi sito che offre servizi di pagamento (PIS).Lo scambio di dati avviene tramite ilÂ  nostro partner - Token.io.Come funziona?Se decidi di utilizzareÂ  un servizio di pagamento come il servizio di informazione sui conti oppure il servizio di disposizione di ordini di pagamento, verrai reindirizzato all'app di N26 tramite Token.io per confermare la richiesta di accesso.Nella nostra Informativa sulla privacy (nuova tabella) ti informiamo sulle finalitÃ , le parti coinvolte e le basi giuridiche del trattamento dei dati necessari per adempiere ai nostri obblighi nel quadro della nuova direttiva europea sui servizi di pagamento.Domande frequentiÂ PerchÃ© non riesco a collegare terze parti al mio conto?Se una terza parte non ha effettuato l'integrazione con la nostra interfaccia dedicata, dovrÃ  farloÂ  attraverso il nostro partner Token.io.Â Come posso revocare il consenso conferito ad una singola terza parte?Dovrai contattare la terza parte in questione direttamente e richiedere la revoca del consenso.*si applica a tutti i paesi EEA.

title: Â¿QuÃ© son los Espacios Compartidos?
content: Con los Espacios Compartidos ahora puedes compartir dinero de forma rÃ¡pida y fÃ¡cil. Estos espacios se pueden usar para lo que sea, tanto para compartir facturas como para planear vacaciones u organizar el cumpleaÃ±os de un amigo o familiar.Los Espacios Compartidos estÃ¡n disponibles para los usuarios con plan premium (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You y N26 Business Metal), los cuales pueden crear e invitar a otros a su Espacio.Puede participar en un espacio cualquier usuario de N26, tenga la cuenta que tenga. El administrador del espacio es el dueÃ±o legal del dinero de ese espacio. El administrador puede invitar hasta 10 participantes y puede eliminarlos siempre que quiera. Como todos los Espacios, los Espacios Compartidos no tienen un IBAN o tarjeta asociada a ellos.

title: Wie kann ich meine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN Ã¤ndern?
content: Schritt-fÃ¼r-Schritt Anleitung:iPhoneAndroidSchritt 1Ã–ffne die N26 App und tippe oben rechts auf Mein Konto Schritt 2Scrolle herunter und tippe auf SicherheitSchritt 3Tippe auf Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscodeSchritt 4Gib deine Tokennummer ein: die 10-stellige Nummer auf der RÃ¼ckseite deiner KarteSchritt 5Erstelle und bestÃ¤tige deine neue BestÃ¤tigungs-PINSchritt 1Ã–ffne die N26 App und tippe oben rechts auf Mein Konto Schritt 2Scrolle herunter und tippe auf SicherheitSchritt 3Tippe auf Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscodeSchritt 4Gib deine Tokennummer ein: die 10-stellige Nummer auf der RÃ¼ckseite deiner KarteSchritt 5Erstelle und bestÃ¤tige deine neue BestÃ¤tigungs-PINMit der BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN bestÃ¤tigst du Ãœberweisungen und andere Transaktionen, die du in der App tÃ¤tigst. Bei der VerknÃ¼pfung deines Smartphones (neuen Tab) mit deinem Konto legst du die BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN selbst fest. Falls du deinen PIN-Code Ã¤ndern willst oder vergessen hast, kannst du jederzeit einen neuen in deiner App festlegen:Gehe auf ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > Sicherheit.Tippe auf Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscode.Gib den Token ein (die 10-stellige Nummer auf der Vorderseite deiner Karte, gleich unter deinem Namen; bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der RÃ¼ckseite).Erstelle und bestÃ¤tige deine neue BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN.Falls du sechsmal in Folge eine falsche BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN eintrÃ¤gst, musst du sie vor dem nÃ¤chsten Versuch neu festlegen.Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden akzeptieren wir keine PINs, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder Zahlenkombinationen mit Wiederholungen oder Zahlenreihen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) zusammensetzen. Falls deine gewÃ¼nschte PIN nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Bedenke bitte, dass deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN nicht dasselbe wie deine Karten-PIN (neuen Tab) ist. Falls du willst, kannst du aber fÃ¼r beide PINs dieselbe Zahlenkombination wÃ¤hlen.

title: How to close my account?
content: Weâ€™re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. Weâ€™d love to keep you as a customerâ€”tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.Â If youâ€™ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, hereâ€™s what to do:Make your account balance â‚¬0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is â‚¬0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). Youâ€™ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or youâ€™re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or â€œas soon as possibleâ€Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, weâ€™ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

title: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
content: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.Â Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.Â

title: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
content:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?Â N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European businessÂ and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.Â Â What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.Â In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos BankÂ® sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.Â How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 accountÂ 
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 AllpointÂ® ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
