Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.Â 
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.Â Â I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

title: Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintrÃ¤chtigt wurde?
content:
Betrugshotline - Kontaktiere uns.Du hast per BankÃ¼berweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen BetrÃ¼ger Ã¼berwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.Â Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlieÃŸlich fÃ¼r die oben beschriebenen FÃ¤lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vortÃ¤uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du denkst, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, Ã¤ndereÂ als ErstesÂ dein Passwort.Â DanachÂ kannst du je nach Situation verschiedene MaÃŸnahmen ergreifen:Was sollte ich tun, wenn mir eine Transaktion auf meinem Konto verdÃ¤chtig vorkommt?Wenn du eine verdÃ¤chtige Transaktion bemerkst, erfahre mehr dazu in unserem Artikel: Wie reklamiere ich eine Transaktion?"
Danach solltest du sofort unser Kundenserviceteam kontaktieren, entweder direkt Ã¼ber die N26 App oder per E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).Wenn du lieber telefonieren mÃ¶chtest, sage uns das einfach im Chat. Wir rufen dich innerhalb einer Stunde zurÃ¼ck und besprechen die Situation mit dir. Bitte erklÃ¤re uns alles genau, jedes Detail kann wichtig sein.Du kannst sicher sein, dass wir alles tun, um dir in dieser Situation zu helfen.Um unsere SicherheitsmaÃŸnahmen auch Ã¼ber unsere gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen hinaus zu verbessern, haben wir ein engagiertes Team, das jeden Betrugsfall genau analysiert.Die einzelnen FÃ¤lle sind oft sehr komplex, darum dauert eine Analyse oft einige Tage, manchmal mehrere Wochen.Falls du sicher bist, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, empfehlen wir dir auÃŸerdem, sofort eine Strafanzeige zu erstatten,Was sollte ich tun, wenn ich meine Karte verloren habe oder denke, dass meine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden?Wenn du deine N26 Karte verloren hast, sie dir gestohlen wurde oder du denkst, dass deine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden, solltest du deine Karte sofort in deiner N26 App sperren und eine neue beantragen, damit dein Geld sicher bleibt.Was passiert, wenn ich mein gekoppeltes GerÃ¤t verloren habe? KÃ¶nnte in diesem Fall jemand auf mein Konto zugreifen?Wenn du dein gekoppeltes GerÃ¤t verloren hast oder es dir gestohlen wurde, kannst du dich darauf verlassen, dass man auf deine N26 App nur unter Eingabe des richtigen Passworts oder mit Fingerabdruck- oder Gesichtserkennung zugreifen kann. Wenn du ein neues GerÃ¤t hast, hilft dir unser Kundenserviceteam gerne dabei, es mit deinem N26 Konto zu koppeln.Was ist, wenn ich eine Idee habe, um die Sicherheit bei N26 zu verbessern?Mehr darÃ¼ber, wie wir dein Konto im Betrugsfall schÃ¼tzen, erfÃ¤hrst du in unserem Blog (neuen Tab) und in unserem Artikel Ã¼ber Sicherheit bei N26 (neuen Tab).Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr , auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. Itâ€™s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via aÂ push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of theÂ troubleshooting tipsÂ we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, youâ€™ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchantâ€™s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

title: Comment dÃ©clarer son compte N26 aux impÃ´ts franÃ§ais ?
content: (Sâ€™applique aux rÃ©sidents franÃ§ais)ConformÃ©ment au Code gÃ©nÃ©ral des impÃ´ts, vous Ãªtes tenu de dÃ©clarer tout compte bancaire ouvert Ã  lâ€™Ã©tranger si vous l'avez ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ© au cours de l'annÃ©e pour laquelle vous dÃ©clarez vos revenus. Cela sâ€™applique donc pour votre compte N26.Cela signifie que si vous avez ouvert votre compte N26 en dÃ©cembre 2019, vous devez dÃ©clarer votre compte lors de votre dÃ©claration de revenus gagnÃ©s en 2019, en 2020. De la mÃªme faÃ§on, si vous avez ouvert votre compte en mars 2020, vous devrez le dÃ©clarer avec vos revenus de 2020, en 2021.Pour ce faire :Au moment de remplir les informations relatives Ã  vos â€œrevenus et chargesâ€ demandÃ©es lors de lâ€™Ã‰tape 3, rendez-vous dans la rubrique Divers. Vous devrez cocher la case â€œComptes Ã  lâ€™Ã©tranger, reprise de rÃ©ductions ou de crÃ©dit dâ€™impÃ´tâ€.Dans la fenÃªtre "DÃ©clarations annexesâ€ qui apparaÃ®t, cochez la case correspondant au formulaire NÂ°3916 â€œDÃ©claration par un rÃ©sident dâ€™un compte ouvert, dÃ©tenu, utilisÃ© ou clos Ã  lâ€™Ã©trangerâ€.Ensuite, accÃ©dez au formulaire en cliquant sur â€œAnnexe nÂ°3916â€, accessible en haut Ã  gauche de votre Ã©cran de tÃ©lÃ©dÃ©claration.En cliquant sur lâ€™Annexe, indiquez dâ€™abord combien de comptes vous souhaitez dÃ©clarer. Indiquez â€œ1â€ si votre compte N26 est le seul compte Ã  lâ€™Ã©tranger que vous avez ouvert, utilisÃ© ou clos en 2020.Remplissez le formulaire en indiquant les informations ci-dessous pour votre compte N26.Retrouvez une aide dÃ©taillÃ©e, Ã©tape par Ã©tape, en lisant l'article de notre blog (nouvel onglet) prÃ©vu Ã  cet effet.

title: Comment demander le remboursement d'un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique ?
content: Le remboursement dâ€™un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique nâ€™annule pas le contrat conclu avec le commerÃ§ant.Vous pouvez demander le remboursement dâ€™un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique SEPA dans votre application N26 dans les 8 semaines suivant le dÃ©bit. Le prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique sera crÃ©ditÃ© sur votre compte N26 sous deux jours ouvrables.Demander le remboursement dâ€™un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique sur mon compte courant :Connectez-vous Ã  lâ€™application mobile N26Ouvrez votre liste de transactions et sÃ©lectionnez le prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique en question.SÃ©lectionnez RemboursementDemandez le remboursement dâ€™un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique dans mon Espace avec IBAN (sous-compte) :Vous pouvez Ã©galement demander le remboursement dâ€™un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique dans vos Espaces associÃ©s Ã  un IBAN :Connectez-vous Ã  lâ€™application mobile N26Appuyez sur EspacesAccÃ©dez Ã  lâ€™Espace dans lequel vous souhaitez recevoir le remboursement dâ€™un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatiqueSÃ©lectionnez la transaction de prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique dans votre liste de transactionsSÃ©lectionnez Remboursement**Bon Ã  savoir pour les pays en dehors de la zone euro : si vous mettez en place un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique avec un marchand et quâ€™il est facturÃ© dans la devise locale de votre pays, le taux de change appliquÃ© (et donc le montant final dÃ©bitÃ© sur votre compte N26) est dÃ©fini et collectÃ© par la banque qui reÃ§oit votre paiement. Voici la liste des pays concernÃ©s : BulgarieCroatieDanemarkHongrieIslandeLiechtensteinNorvÃ¨gePologneRÃ©publique TchÃ¨queRoumanieSuÃ¨deSuisse

title: What is my PIN number?
content:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codesâ€”your Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun factâ€”you create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. Youâ€™re the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

title: Wie bestelle ich eine extra Karte?
content: Klicke hier, wenn du deine Karte ersetzen willst, anstatt eine zusÃ¤tzliche Karte zu bestellen.So kannst du eine extra Karte bestellen:Logge dich in dein N26 Konto einGehe zu: EntdeckenÂ WÃ¤hle: Zusatzkarte > MastercardWÃ¤hle deine bevorzugte Farbe und VersandartTippe: BestÃ¤tigen und BezahlenDie Zusatzkarte kostet 10â‚¬ per Standardversand und 25â‚¬ per Expresslieferung. Um die Produktion und Lieferung der Karte auszulÃ¶sen, benÃ¶tigst du auÃŸerdem einen einmaligen Mindestbetrag in HÃ¶he von 10â‚¬ auf deinem Konto. Mehr dazu erfÃ¤hrst du hier.â„¹ï¸ Die Zusatzkarte ist verfÃ¼gbar fÃ¼r Kunden mit einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in den folgenden LÃ¤ndern: Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Ã–sterreich, DÃ¤nemark, Island, Liechtenstein, Norwegen, Polen, Schweden, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Griechenland, Irland, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Niederlande.

title: Come ricaricare il mio conto?
content: Dopo aver aperto il tuo conto N26, puoi ricevere accrediti fin da subito nei seguenti modi:Bonifici SEPA.Â Invia bonifici SEPA in EURO oppure imposta bonifici ricorrenti verso il tuo conto per essere sicuro che il tuo saldo sia sempre positivo oppure, in casi piÃ¹ urgenti, puoi ricevere bonifici istantanei*. Il tempo di accredito Ã¨ fino a 2 giorni lavorativi.Accredito stipendio. Fai trasferire le tue entrate fisse sul tuo conto N26 tramite bonifico SEPA. Ti basterÃ  fornire l'IBAN al mandante.Â Carta di debito, credito o prepagata. Puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto inserendo nell'app N26 i dettagli della carta associata ad un tuo altro conto. Il servizio di accredito istantaneo del Conto consente di ricaricare un importo compreso tra 20 â‚¬ e 450 â‚¬ al mese. Il primo deposito Ã¨ gratuito, sui depositi successivi sarÃ  applicata una commissione dell' 3 %. Le carte di credito American Express non sono accettate. Apple Pay o Google Pay (nuova tabella). Puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto utilizzando Apple Pay (per dispositivi iOS) o GPay (per dispositivi Android). Puoi scegliere di depositare tra 20 â‚¬ e 450 â‚¬. Il primo deposito Ã¨ gratuito, sui depositi successivi sarÃ  applicata una commissione dell' 3 %. Le carte prepagate cosÃ¬ come le carte di credito American Express non sono accettate. CASH26. (valido per Italia, Spagna, Grecia, Germania e Austria). Con CASH26 puoi versare contanti sul tuo conto N26 semplicemente recandoti presso i supermercati convenzionati.MoneyBeam. Con MoneyBeam puoi ricevere denaro da altri utenti N26 in tempo reale.iDEAL (valido solo nei Paesi Bassi). Per clienti con Termini e Condizioni olandesi e un account iDEAL. Il primo deposito Ã¨ gratuito. Sui seguenti depositi sarÃ  addebitata una commissione pari all'1,5% dell'importo del deposito.GiroPay (istantaneo): Disponibile solo in Germania per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni tedeschi un conto Giropay.EPS (istantaneo): Disponibile solo in Austria per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni austriaci e un conto EPS.Bancontact (istantaneo): Disponibile solo in Belgio per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni belgi e un conto Bancontact.*Per ricevere un bonifico istantaneo Ã¨ necessario che il mittente selezioni questa tipologia di bonifico e che la banca emittente la supporti. Altrimenti verrÃ  accreditato entro 2 giorni lavorativi. Il limite massimo per bonifici SEPA istantanei in entrata Ã¨ di 100.000 â‚¬. Non viene applicato alcun limite ai normali bonifici SEPA in entrata.

title: Why canâ€™t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content: To carry out real-time transactions such asÂ MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphoneâ€™s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someoneâ€™s contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you donâ€™t see your friendâ€™s name on MoneyBeam but you know theyâ€™re an N26 user, they most likely havenâ€™t made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored donâ€™t match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on â€˜Sharing Moneyâ€™Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ will pop-up. Tap â€œsignâ€Check both â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ and â€œPower of attorneyâ€, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

title: How to invite friends to join N26?
content: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

title: Come funziona Spaces?
content: Spaces Ã¨ una funzionalitÃ  per conti Premium che ti permette di creare diversi spazi nel tuo conto principale, per mettere da parte del denaro. Puoi personalizzare ogni spazio a tuo piacimento e trasferire denaro dal tuo conto principale allo spazio, in tempo reale. Spaces Ã¨ disponibile via app eÂ WebApp (nuova tabella)Â in tutti i paesi.Oltre al tuo conto corrente principale, puoi creare degli spazi aggiuntivi tutte le volte che vuoi, ma ricorda che il numero di spazi attivi che puoi avere dipende dalla tipologia di conto che possiedi: fino a 10 spazi per i conti N26 You, N26 Smart e N26 Metal.Inoltre, lâ€™estratto conto del tuo conto principale, includerÃ  anche le transazioni inviate a uno spazio specifico e quelle ricevute da esso.Solo il tuo spazio principale (conto corrente principale) puÃ² avere un saldo negativo, nel caso in cui lo scoperto di conto sia disponibile per te. Tutti gli altri spazi non possono avere un saldo negativo, puoi trasferire negli spazi soltanto un ammontare di denaro effettivamente disponibile.Per effettuare una qualsiasi transazione con la tua Mastercard, potrai usare soltanto il saldo disponibile nel tuo conto principale. Ti suggeriamo quindi di trasferire nel tuo conto principale denaro sufficiente per effettuare la transazione, prima che questa avvenga.Sposta denaro da uno space all'altro tenendo premuto sul tuo account principale e trascinandolo nel tuo space. Una volta confermato lâ€™ammontare, il tuo saldo attuale verrÃ  aggiornato subito dopo.Puoi bloccare e sbloccare uno space in qualsiasi momento dal tuo dispositivo mobile e dalla tua app web. Dovrai solo confermare l'operazione con il tuo PIN di conferma. Se uno space Ã¨ bloccato, sarai comunque in grado di trasferire denaro verso di esso. Se devi prelevare denaro da uno space bloccato, dovrai prima sbloccarlo.Puoi anche aprire i dettagli della transazione dalla lista movimenti Spaces, esattamente come nel tuo conto principale.Puoi tenere nascosto il saldo presente in uno Space al saldo totale sul conto. Per fare questo, entra nello Space, seleziona i tre puntini in alto a destra e poi "nascondi il saldo dello spazio".Adesso puoi anche bloccare i trasferimenti da uno Space. Vai alle impostazioni dello Space e seleziona Blocca i trasferimenti al conto principale o ad altri Spazi e inserisci il tuo PIN di Conferma per convalidare l'opzione.Potrai anche cancellare definitivamente uno Space, sempre dal menÃ¹ Impostazioni dello Space stesso.Spaces include una opzione chiamata Regole, con le quali potrai gestire il tuo tempo e il tuo denaro in maniera molto semplice.Round-Up Savings:Con la funzione â€œRound-Up Savingsâ€, i clienti Premium possono far arrotondare tutte le transazioni con carta alla cifra tonda in euro piÃ¹ prossima, mettendo ogni volta da parte la differenza in uno spazio a scelta.Gli arrotondamenti non ti faranno andare in scoperto. Se il tuo saldo non Ã¨ sufficiente a coprire lâ€™arrotondamento, questo non verrÃ  effettuato.Puoi avere solo un arrotondamento attivo alla volta quando trasferisci il denaro in uno spazio di tua preferenza.Puoi disattivare la funzione â€œRound-Upâ€ in qualsiasi momento.Se chiudi uno spazio per cui sono abilitati gli arrotondamenti, la funzione â€œRound-Upâ€ verrÃ  disattivata fino a quando non la riattiverai.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:ãƒ» iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
ãƒ» Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.Â Rememberâ€”you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile appâ€”youâ€™ll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRememberâ€”you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, youâ€™ll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).Â To unpair your old smartphone:Go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to ğŸ‘¤ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo cerrar la cuenta?
content: Si por alguna extraÃ±a razÃ³n decidieras cerrar tu cuenta de N26, lo respetamos; y aunque te echaremos de menos, aquÃ­ puedes ver que hasta darse de baja tambiÃ©n es fÃ¡cil.Si tienes un plan premium, primero piensa si quieres realmente cerrar la cuenta o, mejor, si prefieres simplemente cancelar la suscripciÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva) y quedarte con el plan EstÃ¡ndar gratis.Para cerrar la cuenta por completo, haz lo siguiente:Si tienes saldo positivo, transfiere tus fondos restantes a otra cuenta antes de iniciar el proceso. Si tienes saldo negativo, ingresa (pestaÃ±a nueva) el dinero que falte en la cuenta N26. El objetivo es dejar tu balance a 0 para que todo vaya mucho mÃ¡s rÃ¡pido.Haz clic aquÃ­ para seguir los pasos del proceso electrÃ³nico de cierre de cuenta (pestaÃ±a nueva). TendrÃ¡s que iniciar sesiÃ³n para verificar tu identidad y, despuÃ©s, la app te guiarÃ¡ por el proceso para dar de baja tu cuenta.Destruye tu tarjeta cortÃ¡ndola con unas tijeras (por ejemplo). Hay que cortar el chip y la banda magnÃ©tica, y despuÃ©s deshacerse de los trozos por separado.ImportanteSolo si no puedes iniciar sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta y, por lo tanto, el enlace del proceso electrÃ³nico te da error, puedes enviarnos un email a (pestaÃ±a nueva)support@n26.com (pestaÃ±a nueva) desde tu direcciÃ³n de email registrada, adjuntando este formulario de cancelaciÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva), que requiere:La declaraciÃ³n donde solicitas el cierre de tu cuenta en una fecha determinada o Â«lo antes posibleÂ»;tu nombre;tu IBAN de N26;un IBAN diferente dentro de la zona SEPA (euro) para transferir tu saldo restante en caso de que sea positivo (tanto en Espacios como en tu cuenta principal).

title: Why was I charged twice?
content: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means youâ€™re able to see whatâ€™s going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once youâ€™ve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we canâ€™t cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.Â Sometimes youâ€™ll see both payments at the same timeâ€“the authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesnâ€™t expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).Â Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

title: Was sind Spaces?
content:
Setze dir Ziele, erstelle, personalisiere und Ã¼berweise Geld zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces in Echtzeit. Spaces ist in deiner App undÂ WebApp (neuen Tab)Â verfÃ¼gbar.Neben deinem Hauptkonto (oder primÃ¤ren Space) kannst du beliebig oft zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces anlegen und lÃ¶schen, wobei die Anzahl der verfÃ¼gbaren aktiven Spaces von deinem Kontotyp abhÃ¤ngt: bis zu 10 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces mit N26 You, N26 Smart und N26 Metal.Die KontoauszÃ¼ge deines Hauptkontos enthalten alle Transaktionen, die an die verschiedenen Spaces Ã¼berwiesen oder empfangen wurden. Die KontoauszÃ¼ge kannst du online herunterladen.Nur dein Hauptkonto kann sich im Minus befinden (wenn du einenÂ DispokreditÂ hast). In allen anderen Spaces kann dein Kontostand nicht negativ sein. Du kannst also zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces nur BetrÃ¤ge Ã¼berweisen, die dort jeweils auch verfÃ¼gbar sind.Du kannst nur das Guthaben von deinem Hauptkonto fÃ¼r Kartenzahlungen verwenden. Beachte also, dass du eventuell erst Geld Ã¼berweisen musst, bevor du einen Kauf tÃ¤tigen kannst.Verschiebe Geld von einem zum anderen Space, indem du dein Hauptkonto gedrÃ¼ckt hÃ¤ltst und es per Drag and Drop in den anderen Space ziehst.Du kannst einen Space jederzeit sperren und wieder entsperren, direkt aus deiner App oder dem Online Banking. Dazu musst du nur deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN eingeben. Wenn ein Space gesperrt ist, kannst du noch immer Geld darauf Ã¼berweisen. Wenn du aber Geld von einem gesperrten Space entnehmen mÃ¶chtest, musst du ihn zuerst entsperren.Du kannst den Betrag in einem Space verstecken, sodass er nicht in dein Gesamt-Saldo eingerechnet wird. Gehe dafÃ¼r zum gewÃ¼nschten Space, tippe auf die drei Punkte und dann auf "Space-Saldo verstecken".Du kannst jetzt Zahlungen von einem Space sperren. Gehe einfach zu den Einstellungen des entsprechenden Space und tippe auf Zahlungen an mein Hauptkonto oder anderen Space sperren. BestÃ¤tige dann mit deiner BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN.Du kannst jetzt einen Space auch lÃ¶schen, wenn eine Karte damit verknÃ¼pft ist. Gehe dazu in die Einstellungen von deinem Space.Spaces enthÃ¤lt eine Funktion, die â€œRegelnâ€ heiÃŸt. Diese Funktion hilft dir dabei, dein Geld und deine Zeit effektiver zu verwalten.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Round-up Savings:Mit der Funktion â€Round-up Savingsâ€œ kÃ¶nnen Premiumkunden jede von ihnen getÃ¤tigte Kartentransaktion auf den nÃ¤chsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung fÃ¼hrt nicht zu einer Ãœberziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du Ã¼ber kein ausreichendes Guthaben verfÃ¼gen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt.Du kannst immer nur eine â€Round-upâ€œ-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl Ã¼berweisen.Du kannst die Funktion â€Round-upâ€œ jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schlieÃŸt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die â€Round-upâ€œ-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.IBANs fÃ¼r Spaces:Premiumkunden (N26 Smart, You und Metal), die ihr Konto in Deutschland erÃ¶ffnet haben und Ã¼ber eine deutsche IBAN verfÃ¼gen, kÃ¶nnen ihrem Space bzw. ihren Spaces nun eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen. Sobald einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen wurde, kÃ¶nnen Ã¼ber den Space bestimmte Ãœberweisungen empfangen und Lastschriften getÃ¤tigt werden. Im Folgenden findest du eine Zusammenfassung, wie du deine Spaces fÃ¼r eine noch bessere Ãœbersicht Ã¼ber deine eingehenden und ausgehenden Ãœberweisungen nutzen kannst: Ãœberweisungen empfangen: Sobald du dem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen hast, kannst du die individuelle IBAN angeben, um Ãœberweisungen zu empfangen.Ausgehende Zahlungen per Lastschrift tÃ¤tigen: Mit Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN kannst du Zahlungen per Lastschrift tÃ¤tigen.Mehrere Spaces mit IBANs: Du kannst bis zu 10 Spaces mit einer individuellen IBAN erstellen, um noch mehr Kontrolle Ã¼ber deine eingehenden und ausgehenden GeldflÃ¼sse zu haben. Du hast insgesamt 10 IBANs zur VerfÃ¼gung.Unseren speziellen Artikel mit weiteren Informationen zu IBANs fÃ¼r Spaces findest du hier.

title: Custom Audiences
content: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called â€œLookalike-Audiencesâ€ are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.Â In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called â€˜lookalike audiencesâ€™ are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

title: Comment faire un don avec N26 ?
content:
N26 a toujours Ã©tÃ© impliquÃ© dans la lutte contre la faim et les inÃ©galitÃ©s aux cÃ´tÃ©s dâ€™organisations humanitaires. Il sera dÃ©sormais encore plus facile de faire un don depuis votre compte N26.Â Vous pouvez dÃ©sormais envoyer un don Ã  une liste dâ€™organisations caritatives que nous avons sÃ©lectionnÃ©es, directement depuis votre application N26. Le montant total sera envoyÃ© par virement bancaire Ã  lâ€™organisation caritative sÃ©lectionnÃ©e.Pour envoyer un don Ã  une organisation caritative, veuillez suivre les Ã©tapes suivantesÂ :Depuis lâ€™Ã©cran dâ€™accueil de votre application, appuyez sur Envoyer.SÃ©lectionnez Don et ContinuerChoisissez une organisation caritative dans la listeÂ SÃ©lectionnez Continuer pour faire un don.Saisissez le montant de votre don, puis confirmez la transaction avec votre code PIN.
Dans de nombreux cas, une preuve de paiement est suffisante pour demander lâ€™abattement fiscal de votre don dans votre dÃ©claration dâ€™impÃ´ts sur le revenu. Cependant, si vous avez besoin dâ€™un reÃ§u officiel de don de lâ€™organisation caritative, nous vous prions de la contacter directement (avec votre preuve de paiement), car seules les organisations caritatives peuvent dÃ©livrer des reÃ§us de don et non N26.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content: Tips for a successful videoÂ verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of ourÂ supported countriesÂ to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driverâ€™s licenses or residence permits canâ€™t be used). Also, the document shouldnâ€™t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'llÂ need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and deliveryÂ of your card.Â Please note that this is not a fee: yourÂ first cardÂ after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. DeliveriesÂ take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. Weâ€™ll ask you to confirm your payment viaÂ push messageÂ during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didnâ€™t set it up yet, youâ€™ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If youâ€™re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals donâ€™t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: CRS - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir benÃ¶tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut gemÃ¤ÃŸ des Common Reporting Standard (CRS) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden in der EuropÃ¤ischen Union Informationen Ã¼ber Kundenkonten zur VerfÃ¼gung zu stellen, deren Inhaber in anderen LÃ¤ndern steuerpflichtig sind.Der CRS wurde von der OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler Standard fÃ¼r den automatischen Austausch von Informationen (AEOI). Das Ziel des CRS ist es, zur BekÃ¤mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden den Bestand im Ausland befindlicher VermÃ¶genswerte tranparenter macht. Mehr als 90 LÃ¤nder haben sich erklÃ¤rt, im Rahmen des CRS Informationen ihrer Einwohner Ã¼ber ihre VermÃ¶genswerte und Einkommen zu teilen.Damit wir feststellen kÃ¶nnen, ob ein Konto den steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden zwecks CRS mitzuteilen ist, mÃ¼ssen wir dich fragen:In welchem Land du als steuerpflichtige Person giltst:
Normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige Person desjenigen Landes, in dem deine Wohnadresse liegt. Wenn du mehrere Wohnadressen in verschiedenen LÃ¤ndern hast, greifen fÃ¼r gewÃ¶hnlich bestimmte Entscheidungsregeln, die in den Steuerabkommen und Steuergesetzen der betreffenden LÃ¤nder festgehalten sind. Es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren LÃ¤ndern steuerpflichtig bist. Wenn dieser Fall gegeben ist, mÃ¼ssen wir wissen, um welche LÃ¤nder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden Identifikationsnummern als Steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden zuverlÃ¤ssige Informationen zur VerfÃ¼gung stellen kÃ¶nnen.
Wie deine Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (â€œTINâ€) lautet:
Die Zuteilung und das Format der TIN variiert zwischen den LÃ¤ndern. Die EU hat eine Anleitung (neuen Tab) zur Identifikation der TINs ihrer Mitgliedstaaten verÃ¶ffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) TIN(s) in den verschiedenen LÃ¤ndern identifizieren kannst.Falls sich deine Lebenslage verÃ¤ndert, kannst deine Steuerinformationen in der N26 App jederzeit anpassen. Logge dich dafÃ¼r einfach in deine N26 App ein, und gehe zum Bereich: Mein Konto > Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

title: How to file a complaint?
content: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWeâ€™re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will thoroughly investigate your complaint and provide our findings and final response via email.Â Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Italian reclami@n26.com (new tab)It is also possible to write through a certified email message (PEC) to reclami@pec.n26.com (new tab).Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our Customer Support (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarized power of attorney form.Please only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.Â If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinComplaints filed in a manner other than those above, or sent to addresses other than those listed, will be considered received from the date they are delivered to the Complaints Office.If your complaint is upheld, we will inform you of the steps that we have taken and/or plan to implement, with the expected timeframes. If your complaint is not upheld, we will provide you with a clear illustration of the reasons for the rejection and, in addition, indications on the possibility of using alternative means for resolving the dispute.Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. Otherwise, non-payment related complaints will be resolved within 60 calendar days.For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business DaysÂ Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar DaysÂ United Kingdom - 56 Calendar DaysÂ Spain - 60 Calendar DaysÂ Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties.Â Customers who reside in Italy can also contact the following:Arbitro Bancario FinanziarioConciliatore Bancario FinanziarioAlternatively, you can go before a different arbitration or mediation body as long as they are enrolled in the appropriate register kept by the Italian Ministry of Justice. The full list of mediation bodies is available at: www.giustizia.itCustomers outside of Italy can also contact the following:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht â€“ BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab) page.Annual reportsRendiconto sull'attivitÃ  di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2019 (new tab)Rendiconto sullâ€™attivitÃ  di gestione dei reclami per lâ€™anno 2020 (new tab)Rendiconto sull'attivitÃ  di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2021 (new tab)

title: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
content: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above â‚¬150 will be charged with a 12.50â‚¬ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than â‚¬150.The maximum fee is â‚¬100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

title: How to make N26 my main account?
content: N26 offers you a series of services and benefits designed specifically for our customers in Italy. If you decide to use your N26 account as your main account to receive your salary and carry out your daily banking operations, simply provide your bank details to your employer.What services does N26 offer?As soon as you have opened your account, you can immediately start depositing and withdrawing cash with CASH26 (new tab) from over 1000 partner points of sale throughout Italy. Just open the N26 app, find the nearest CASH26 store on the map, create a barcode and show it to the person at the checkout.Youâ€™ll be able to top up your account by bank transfer, even instantaneous, from another current account, or by debit, credit or prepaid card or by crediting your salary.With your N26 account you will also have the possibility to set direct debits for your subscriptions for free, from the gym to streaming services, to debit your utilities (water, electricity, gas, telephony) and pay postal bills, PagoPA, MAV / RAV, car tax and make phone top-ups directly from your mobile app. Click here (new tab) to find out more.With your N26 Premium Mastercard you can also withdraw cash for free and without limits from all ATMs in Europe (up to 3 free withdrawals per month in Europe with N26 Standard).We also remind you that the tax on the account due in the event of an average stock exceeding â‚¬ 5,000 (on an annual basis and subject to subsequent changes in the law) and equal to â‚¬ 34.20, will be borne by N26 until 30/06/2022.What other benefits does N26 offer?From your N26 app, available for iOS and Android, you can make SEPA transfers for free and receive or make instant SEPA transfers, free of charge if you have an N26 premium account (N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal) and for â‚¬ 0.99 if you have a N26 Standard account. In addition, you can set up standing orders for free both in the SEPA area and in foreign currencies and receive or make international transfers (SWIFT).Also remember that by opening your N26 account, you can immediately start using the Mastercard card associated with it and connect it to Apple or Google Pay. With N26 Standard you will immediately have a free virtual Mastercard that you can use for your online purchases and contactless payments. The additional physical card can be requested at any time without any monthly fee.With an N26 Premium account, you will also be able to create separate Spaces (new tab) from your main account to set aside money and share (new tab) it with other N26 customers to manage joint expenses.What to do if my IBAN is not accepted?We remind you that the IBAN of your N26 account, according to the European law of 1 February 2016, Article 9 of EU Regulation 260/2012 (new tab), must be accepted by every member state of the European Economic Area. If your employer or a merchant refuses to accept your IBAN, click here (new tab) for more information on how to report the incident.

title: Â¿Has recibido un mensaje sospechoso?
content: Durante el punto Ã¡lgido de la pandemia global, EasyJet hizo pÃºblico el robo de los datos personales y de vuelo de 9 millones de clientes en un sofisticado ciberataque. Durante el primer trimestre de 2021, los datos personales de mÃ¡s de 530 millones de usuarios de Facebook de mÃ¡s de 100 paÃ­ses salieron a subasta en internet. Unos dÃ­as despuÃ©s, los datos personales de otros 500 millones de usuarios de LinkedIn aparecieron en la Dark Web. Entre estos datos habÃ­a nombres, fechas de nacimiento, nÃºmeros de telÃ©fono y direcciones de email.Â¿QuÃ© tiene que ver todo esto con N26? Aunque esto no afecta directamente a N26 ni a la seguridad de tu cuenta bancaria, los ciberdelincuentes pueden utilizar informaciÃ³n obtenida de sus ataques a otras empresas para llevar a cabo ataques de phishing a gran escala.El phishing es una tÃ©cnica empleada para obtener datos sensibles que pueden utilizarse con fines fraudulentos. Los estafadores se hacen pasar por empresas de renombre para convencer a sus vÃ­ctimas de que compartan sus datos personales. Lo consiguen dirigiÃ©ndose a ellas a travÃ©s de los medios de comunicaciÃ³n digital que todos utilizamos a diario, por ejemplo: email, SMS, llamadas de telÃ©fono y redes sociales.Como nuestro banco digital es cada vez mÃ¡s popular, los clientes de N26 estÃ¡n sufriendo campaÃ±as de phishing. Durante ellas, los atacantes envÃ­an mensajes que suelen contener enlaces a sitios web que se parecen mucho a la WebApp de N26. Aunque a primera vista puedan parecer convincentes, estos sitios web son maliciosos y no tienen ninguna relaciÃ³n con N26. En algunos casos, los atacantes falsifican un cÃ³digo abreviado para enviar sus SMS, por lo que sus mensajes pueden aparecer en el mismo hilo que los mensajes que N26 te ha enviado anteriormente. Te rogamos que prestes mucha atenciÃ³n y que nos contactes de inmediato si detectas algo que se salga de lo comÃºn.Â¿QuÃ© hace N26 para combatir este problema? Nuestro personal de seguridad realiza un seguimiento constante para prevenir los ataques y garantizar que los sitios web fraudulentos se desactiven lo antes posible. De este modo, nuestra entidad mantiene tu cuenta segura.Mientras nosotros seguimos tomando precauciones para proteger tus cuentas y tus datos personales, tÃº tambiÃ©n puedes adoptar medidas para protegerte. Esto es lo que debes hacer si recibes un mensaje inesperado:Si recibes un SMS de alguien que hable en nombre de N26, recuerda que nosotros nunca te contactarÃ­amos a travÃ©s de ese canal.Los mensajes de texto que te pidan hacer algo siempre son maliciosos. No hagas clic en ningÃºn enlace ni indiques ningÃºn dato personal. Nosotros nunca te pedimos que hagas nada por medio de un SMS.Si tienes alguna duda sobre la informaciÃ³n que te comunican o sospechas que te han dirigido a un sitio fraudulento, actÃºa con cautela. Si te piden que llames a un nÃºmero o que envÃ­es un correo a una direcciÃ³n de email, busca los datos de contacto para ver si coinciden con los de una empresa real.Si no sales de dudas, haz una captura de pantalla del mensaje y contacta con nuestro Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente a travÃ©s del chat de la app N26, o envÃ­ala a support@n26.com. Â¡Estaremos encantados de ayudarte!

title: Wie aktiviere ich meine Karte?
content: Deine N26 Karte kam heute mit der Post? Bevor du sie nutzen kannst, musst du deine Karte aktivieren. Die Aktivierung deiner N26 Karte ist in wenigen Schritten erledigt. Stelle vorher jedoch sicher, dass du dein Smartphone bereits mit deinem Konto verknÃ¼pft hast.Um deine Karte in der N26 App zu aktivieren, fÃ¼hre folgende Schritte vom Startbildschirm aus:Gehe zum "Karten"-Tab.WÃ¤hle "Einstellungen" und wische so lange nach rechts, bis die Karte erscheint, die du aktivieren mÃ¶chtest.Tippe auf "Aktivieren".Gib den Token â€“ die 10-stellige Nummer auf deiner Karte â€“ ein. Du findest den Token auf der Vorderseite unter deinem Namen. Bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der RÃ¼ckseite.Um deine Karte in der Web-App zu aktivieren, klicke einfach im Startbildschirm auf "Karte aktivieren".Du willst eine neue Karte bestellen, weil deine alte verloren gegangen, gestohlen oder beschÃ¤digt worden ist? Oder hast du dir ein Upgrade auf N26 Smart, You oder Metal geholt? In allen FÃ¤llen musst du die oben genannten Schritte zur Aktivierung deiner neuen Karte wiederholen.Â Damit du mit deiner Karte online oder in GeschÃ¤ften kontaktlos (via NFC) bezahlen kannst, musst du sie an einem Geldautomaten oder in einem GeschÃ¤ft vollstÃ¤ndig aktivieren. HierfÃ¼r muss die Karte in ein KartenlesegerÃ¤t oder einen Geldautomaten eingesteckt werden und die Transaktion durch Eingabe der Karten-PIN erfolgen.Falls du mehrere Karten derselben Art hast (zum Beispiel, weil sich die Lieferung verzÃ¶gert hat und du mehr als eine Karte bestellt hast), kannst du nur die neueste Karte aktivieren. Alle Ã¤lteren Karten werden deaktiviert, wenn du eine neue bestellst. Das trifft nicht auf Zusatzkarten fÃ¼r Premiumkonten zu.

title: Comment faire une remarque ou suggÃ©rer une nouvelle idÃ©e de produit ?
content: Nous envoyons frÃ©quemment des sondages Ã  nos utilisateurs pour avoir leurs retours. Les rÃ©ponses sont Ã©videmment anonymes. Vous pouvez Ã  tout moment nous faire des retours et des suggestions en envoyant un email Ã Â ideas@n26.com (nouvel onglet). Câ€™est grÃ¢ce Ã  vous que nous nous amÃ©liorons. Nous travaillons au quotidien pour vous proposer le meilleur produit et la meilleure expÃ©rience possible.Si vous nâ€™Ãªtes pas satisfaits de lâ€™un de nos produits ou services, vous pouvez faire uneÂ rÃ©clamation.

title: Cosâ€™Ã¨ una carta virtuale?
content: Se apri un conto N26 Standard avrai una carta virtuale gratuitamente (a condizione che tu abbia un saldo minimo una tantum di 10 â‚¬ per attivare la carta).Una carta virtuale aggiuntiva Ã¨ ideale per effettuare pagamenti online: puoi utilizzare e condividere i dati della tua carta extra senza ansia e separare i pagamenti ricorrenti, come i tuoi abbonamenti, dalle spese quotidiane.I clienti N26 Smart, YOU e Metal hanno la possibilitÃ  di ordinare una carta virtuale gratuitamente, oltre alla carta fisica gratuita che ricevono con la loro sottoscrizione premium. Buone da sapere: i clienti N26 Standard hanno la possibilitÃ  di ordinare una carta fisica pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 â‚¬ (senza dover passare a una sottoscrizione premium).Come ordinare e attivare la mia carta virtuale?Effettua lâ€™accesso e apri la scheda Carte nellâ€™angolo in basso a destra.Tocca 'Ottieni una carta aggiuntiva'.Seleziona 'Virtuale' in alto, poi tocca 'Seleziona' in fondo.Leggi e accetta i termini e le condizioni, poi tocca 'Genera carta virtuale'.Aggiungi la tua carta virtuale a Apple Pay o Google Pay o salta questo passaggio.Come uso la mia carta virtuale?Pagare nei negozi fisici usando Apple o Google Pay: collega la tua carta virtuale ad Apple o Google Pay a seconda del tuo dispositivo.Prelevare contanti: una volta che hai collegato la tua carta virtuale al tuo wallet Apple o Google, puoi prelevare contanti dagli sportelli ATM che hanno la funzionalitÃ  contactless. Puoi anche utilizzare CASH26 per depositare o prelevare contanti (DE, AT, IT, ES e GR).Effettuare acquisti online: puoi vedere i dettagli della tua carta virtuale nellâ€™app (numero di carta, data di scadenza e numero CVV). Per vedere questi dettagli:Effettua il log-in nellâ€™app mobile N26Seleziona 'Carte'Trova la tua carta virtuale (scorri verso sinistra per trovare la tua carta virtuale se ne hai piÃ¹ di una)Seleziona 'Dati della carta'DopodichÃ© dovrai inserire il tuo PIN di conferma o effettuare un login biometrico per vedere le tue carte virtuali per 60 secondi.La Mastercard virtuale Ã¨ disponibile solo per i conti N26 Standard aperti a partire dal febbraio 2021 e per tutti i conti N26 Premium a partire dal 9 ottobre 2021.

title: Who can sign up for N26 Business?
content:
â„¹ï¸ Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.Â How do N26 Business accounts work?Â N26 offers a wide range of Business accounts (new tab), designed for freelancers and the self-employed, with a Mastercard linked to their account, entitling them to up to 0.5% monthly cashback on all their business payments.(The cashback offered by N26 Business accounts is not the Government Cashback, which can currently be activated for all N26 Mastercards.)If you are interested in Allianz coverage or other Premium perks, besides the N26 Business (new tab) account, you can also opt for N26 Business You (new tab) , N26 Business Metal (new tab), or N26 Business Smart (new tab). Â N26 Business (new tab) accounts are reserved exclusively for:freelancers enrolled in a professional register or order (such as architects, lawyers, pharmacists, and nurses)other freelancers, i.e. the self-employed and individual entrepreneurs with a VAT number (such as designers, photographers, electricians, or owners of B&Bs and holiday homes with VAT numbers).sole proprietorships registered in the Business Register of the Chamber of CommerceHowever, it is not possible to sign up for an N26 Business in the name of a partnership (e.g., GPs and LPs), capital company (e.g., LLCs and INCs), or another entity, including subjects with legal status and liability.Â What is the VAT number and where can I find it?The VAT number is an 11-digit numeric code, which is used to uniquely identify the owner of a given professional activity, such as the personal tax code.
Under Italian law, anyone who carries out a continuous activity for more than 30 days, in fact, has the obligation to register for VAT. This can be of two types: ordinary or flat-rate tax regime, depending on the revenues and expenses incurred for the activity.
The opening of the VAT number takes place by submitting a specific form to the Revenue Agency:Model AA9 / 12 (new tab) for individuals;Model AA7 / 10 (new tab) for companies.The form must be submitted or sent online via the Tax Agency portal (new tab) within 30 days of starting the professional activity.
As soon as the opening application is approved and completed, you will receive the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number containing the relevant code assigned to you by post and in the reserved area of â€‹â€‹the Tax Agency portal (new tab) .What is the ATECO code and where can I find it?The ATECO code is an alphanumeric abbreviation used to classify a commercial activity and to assign a risk level to that company, according to the ATECO 2007 classification (new tab)currently in force.
The code must be entered at the time of the request to open the VAT number, in order to communicate to the Tax Agency the type of activity that will be carried out.
It will also be possible to add different ATECO codes with the opening of additional VAT numbers.
You can find the ATECO code on the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number or on the Chamber of Commerce registration in the case of sole proprietorships.

title: What are â€œMessagesâ€ ?
content:
The security of your personal data is our priority. Thatâ€™s why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. Weâ€™ll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, youâ€™ll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, youâ€™ll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.Weâ€™ll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You canâ€™t initiate a conversation, but youâ€™ll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesnâ€™t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, weâ€™ll ask you to open a chat with us.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of ourÂ Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isnâ€™t rewarded because the invited friend hasnâ€™t made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates theÂ Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

title: How to create a password?
content: If you forgot your password or want to change it, selectÂ Forgot?Â in the app orÂ Forgot your password? (new tab)Â in theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â during login. Weâ€™ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a â€œpassphraseâ€ rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase â€œhard to guess, easy to rememberâ€. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, youâ€™ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
