title: Was sind Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen?
content: Alle N26 Kunden haben nun die MÃ¶glichkeit, Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen zu verwenden. Im Gegensatz zu den Ã¼blichen SEPA-Ãœberweisungen, die innerhalb von zwei Werktagen bearbeitet werden, werden Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen innerhalb von Sekunden Ã¼bermittelt und empfangen.Eine Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen kann von Vorteil sein, wenn du eine dringende Ãœberweisung tÃ¤tigen musst (sie dauert etwa 10 Sekunden). FÃ¼r unsere Standardkunden, die Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen nutzen, fÃ¤llt jedoch eine GebÃ¼hr an, die vor der BestÃ¤tigung der Ãœberweisung angezeigt wird. Wenn die Ãœberweisung also bis zu 2 Tage warten kann, dann ist eine normale SEPA-Ãœberweisung wahrscheinlich besser geeignet. FÃ¼r unsere Premiumkunden ist die Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen gebÃ¼hrenfrei.Obwohl diese Ãœberweisungen in Echtzeit durchgefÃ¼hrt werden, kÃ¶nnen sie sich aufgrund von Bearbeitungszeiten, Embargos usw. verzÃ¶gern (genau wie regulÃ¤re Ãœberweisungen). Bei wichtigen Zahlungen, wie z. B. Einzahlungen oder Anzahlungen sollte man deshalb am besten im Voraus zahlen, um externe finanzielle Verluste aufgrund von VerzÃ¶gerungen zu vermeiden.Wie funktioniert das?Logge dich in die N26 App ein und tippe auf Geld senden > BankÃ¼berweisung.Gib als nÃ¤chstes den Namen und die IBAN des EmpfÃ¤ngers ein sowie ggf. einen Verwendungszweck.Tippe auf Ãœberweisung und wÃ¤hle zwischen EchtzeitÃ¼berweisung und StandardÃ¼berweisung.Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein.BestÃ¤tige die Ãœberweisung in der App.Die EchtzeitÃ¼berweisung wird innerhalb von ca. 10 Sekunden verarbeitet und beim EmpfÃ¤nger eingehen.Bitte beachte: Wenn die Bank des EmpfÃ¤ngers nicht am SCT-Echtzeitverfahren teilnimmt, hast du nicht die MÃ¶glichkeit, eine EchtzeitÃ¼berweisung durchzufÃ¼hren. Wichtige Informationen:**FÃ¼r die Nutzung von Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen wird bei N26 Standard eine GebÃ¼hr erhoben. Die GebÃ¼hr wird direkt im Anschluss als separate Transaktion verrechnet und die GebÃ¼hr fÃ¤llt je nach Land unterschiedlich aus:Deutschland und Ã–sterreich â€“ 0,49 â‚¬Spanien â€“ 1,99 â‚¬Italien, Frankreich und Rest Europas â€“ 0,99 â‚¬Der HÃ¶chstbetrag, den du mit per Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen versenden kannst, betrÃ¤gt 2.000 â‚¬ fÃ¼nfmal pro Tag bei einem TageshÃ¶chstbetrag von 10.000 â‚¬.Wenn du eine Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen fÃ¼r eine wichtige Zahlung (Einzahlung, BuÃŸgeld, Anzahlung) verwenden mÃ¶chtest, solltest du die Zahlung eventuell im Voraus vornehmen, um eine VerzÃ¶gerung durch eine mÃ¶gliche Ablehnung oder Sperrung zu vermeiden.Wenn du Waren oder Dienstleistungen per Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen bezahlst, achte immer darauf, dass du die EmpfÃ¤ngerdaten und -legitimationen Ã¼berprÃ¼fst, bevor du die Transaktion bestÃ¤tigst. Es empfiehlt sich immer, vor BetrÃ¼gereien auf der Hut zu sein.Bitte beachte: Derzeit nehmen nicht alle Banken am Echtzeit-Ãœberweisungen teil. Wenn die EmpfÃ¤ngerbank nicht daran teilnimmt, hast du nicht die MÃ¶glichkeit, deine Ãœberweisung in Echtzeit durchzufÃ¼hren.

title: How N26 Crypto works
content:
In Austria, N26 Crypto is powered by Bitpanda GmbH (FN423018k) as digital asset servicing provider, registered with the Austrian Financial Market Authority and located at Stella-Klein-LÃ¶w-Weg 17, 1020 Vienna, Austria.The following statements do not constitute investment advice or any other advice on financial services, financial instruments, financial products or digital assets. They are intended to provide general information. The following statements do not constitute an offer to conclude a contract for the purchase or sale of financial instruments and financial products or an invitation to submit such an offer and to buy or sell any particular digital asset.Cryptocurrencies are subject to high fluctuations in value. A decline in value or a complete loss are possible at any time. The loss of access to data and passwords can also lead to a complete loss.Manage and monitor both cash and crypto in one placeâ€”from your N26 app. No need to download a new app or make a new account to start trading crypto, just scroll down from your bank account to check it out.Try N26 Crypto in your N26 app by following these steps:Tap the Finances tab and scroll to TradingSelect Get started with crypto and browse the coinsIf youâ€™re ready, hit Buy and sign up in just a minuteTada â€” enjoy being a digital currency owner!Crypto may seem like a tough nut to crackâ€”but, as always, weâ€™ve got your back. Whether youâ€™re wondering about the basics â€” like what is crypto? (new tab) and Is cryptocurrency safe? (new tab) Things to be aware of.
5 Things to Know Before You Start Trading Crypto | N26 (new tab)N26 Crypto FeesÂ Buying crypto doesnâ€™t need to be costly. You only need â‚¬1 to get started and with N26 Crypto, youâ€™ll pay 1.5% in fees on Bitcoin and 2.5% on other cryptocurrencies.With a Metal account, you get a discount on trading fees â€” pay 1% for Bitcoin and 2% for other coins. Metal plans also come with a Mastercard made of stainless steel, comprehensive travel and tech insurance, and dedicated customer support via phone 7 days a week.The N26 Metal crypto fee discounts only apply to trading amounts up to â‚¬5,000 (including fees on purchasing and excluding fees on selling crypto) per calendar month. Above this amount, regular fees apply: 1.5% on Bitcoin and 2.5% on all other coins.Please note that fees are always rounded up to the nearest full centâ€”to a maximum of one centâ€”which may lead to a slight increase of the fee percentage shown in an order preview).The fees and cryptocurrency prices shown on the N26 app for every transaction and including a possible spread are not determined by N26 but provided by Bitpanda. N26's liability is expressly excluded for any claim or damage arising from the formation of the prices of the assets offered by Bitpanda.N26 Crypto Limitshe following limits apply to trading crypto on N26:A â‚¬50,000 limit on daily transactions by Personal customersA â‚¬100,000 limit on daily transactions by Business customers200 trades within 24 hours, per userUsers can only place buy and sell orders with a minimum of â‚¬1. This applies to all coins.If you have some questions burning a hole in your pocket, view our Crypto page withÂ FAQs.Good to know before getting startedIn order to be able to buy and sell Crypto you have to have a correct, registered and valid Tax ID. In case you donâ€™t know where to find your Tax ID or how to register it in your app, please visit our Support Page (new tab).

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Amber, Black and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 Metal with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these in mind when consideringÂ N26 Metal (new tab):If youâ€™re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!Â If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.Â If you havenâ€™t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card.Â

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.Â In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.Â One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a â€œtrusted beneficiaryâ€ so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: How does N26 Business Metal work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs â‚¬16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate.Â Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Â Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: PerchÃ© il bancomat non ha erogato i contanti?
content: PuÃ² succedere: vai ad un ATM, lâ€™importo richiesto viene detratto dal tuo saldo, ma la macchina non eroga i contanti.Per prima cosa controlla iÂ limiti della tua cartaÂ accedendo al Mio Account e selezionando Impostazioni Carte. Assicurati che i prelievi ATM siano attivi.Anche se non sappiamo dirti con certezza perchÃ© Ã¨ successo, possiamo sicuramente aiutarti a recuperare i tuoi soldi. Lâ€™importo che Ã¨ stato detratto dal saldo Ã¨ solo unâ€™autorizzazione (una prenotazione o un importo stornato). Dato che la transazione non Ã¨ andata a buon fine, lâ€™importo prenotato scadrÃ  entro poche ore o al massimo 12 giorni lavorativi e sarÃ  riaccreditato al tuo saldo.Se lâ€™importo prenotato non scadesse dopo 12 giorni lavorativi, per favore completa ilÂ modulo di contestazione. Faremo del nostro meglio per recuperare i tuoi soldi.Nel frattempo ti consigliamo di provare un altro ATM di un altro operatore. Raramente accade due volte di seguito.Non sono riuscito a ritirare dal bancomat il denaro richiesto. Come posso fare?Anche in questo caso possiamo aiutarti a recuperare i tuoi soldi. Lâ€™importo che hai richiesto al momento del prelievo adesso comparirÃ  sotto forma di autorizzazione sul tuo conto. Visto che, anche in questa circostanza, la transazione non Ã¨ andata a buon fine, lâ€™importo prenotato scadrÃ  entro massimo 12 giorni lavorativi e sarÃ  riaccreditato sul tuo conto.Nel caso in cui lâ€™autorizzazione non scadesse e la trovassi addebitata nel tuo estratto conto, per favore compila il modulo di contestazione (nuova tabella). Ti ricordiamo infine che il limite massimo di prelievo giornaliero Ã¨ di 1000â‚¬ e il limite di prelievo settimanale Ã¨ di 2500â‚¬.

title: How to get N26 Insurance?
content: The new on-demandÂ N26 InsuranceÂ allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the â€œInsuranceâ€ banner you find.Â You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.Â How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.Â Am I eligible?Â N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers canâ€™t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (â€œIRSâ€).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, weâ€™ll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?Â 
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being â€œsubject to taxâ€ in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that youâ€™re also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you donâ€™t end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (â€œSSNâ€) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: Pagos por adelantado de las cuentas premium N26
content: El contrato de tu suscripciÃ³n es vÃ¡lido por un aÃ±o, despuÃ©s se renovarÃ¡ automÃ¡ticamente de forma indefinida hasta que lo canceles; esto se puede hacer en cualquier momento (ver mÃ¡s abajo). Te avisaremos 2 meses antes de la fecha de renovaciÃ³n indefinida de tu contrato.Â¿CuÃ¡les son las opciones de pago?Puedes elegir si quieres pagar tu suscripciÃ³n mes a mes, cada 6 meses o todo el aÃ±o de golpe (con las Ãºltimas dos opciones recibes un descuento). La opciÃ³n que elijas no afecta a la duraciÃ³n del contrato, que serÃ¡ siempre de un aÃ±o.Por ejemplo: si eliges pagar cada 6 meses, harÃ¡s el primer pago al inicio del contrato y, 6 meses despuÃ©s, harÃ¡s el segundo pago por los 6 meses restantes del contrato de 12 meses.Â¿CuÃ¡ndo y cÃ³mo se paga?Tu suscripciÃ³n se activarÃ¡ en cuanto realices el primer pago y obtendrÃ¡s acceso a todas las ventajas premium. Puedes hacer el primer pago con tarjeta de dÃ©bito o de crÃ©dito, con Google Pay o con Apple Pay; lo que te darÃ¡ acceso inmediato a las ventajas premium en cuanto completes la verificaciÃ³n de tu identidad. TambiÃ©n puedes pagar aÃ±adiendo dinero a tu cuenta de N26, y el importe se cobrarÃ¡ automÃ¡ticamente.Si no hemos recibido el primer pago dentro de 15 dÃ­as desde que completas la verificaciÃ³n de tu identidad, el importe se cobrarÃ¡ automÃ¡ticamente de tu cuenta N26 y obtendrÃ¡s acceso a las ventajas premium. DespuÃ©s del primer pago, todos los demÃ¡s siempre se cobrarÃ¡n automÃ¡ticamente de tu cuenta N26, dependiendo de la opciÃ³n que hayas elegido.Â¿CÃ³mo se cancela la suscripciÃ³n?SuspensiÃ³n de la renovaciÃ³n automÃ¡tica: puedes detener la renovaciÃ³n automÃ¡tica de tu suscripciÃ³n en cualquier momento antes de que finalice el primer contrato de 12 meses poniÃ©ndote en contacto con nosotros a travÃ©s del chat. Si decides detener tu renovaciÃ³n, podrÃ¡s seguir usando tu Mastercard N26 y todas las ventajas de tu suscripciÃ³n premium hasta que esta caduque. Eso significa que mantendrÃ¡s la cobertura de tu seguro (para cuentas N26 You y N26 Metal) mientras pagues la cuota de tu suscripciÃ³n.CancelaciÃ³n inmediata: puedes cancelar tu suscripciÃ³n de inmediato en cualquier momento poniÃ©ndote en contacto con nosotros. Si eliges esta opciÃ³n, tu tarjeta N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal se desactivarÃ¡ y emitiremos una tarjeta virtual cuando pases a N26 EstÃ¡ndar. Si eliges esta opciÃ³n y eres cliente de N26 You o N26 Metal, la cobertura de tu seguro tambiÃ©n se suspenderÃ¡ de forma inmediata.RevocaciÃ³n: puedes revocar tu suscripciÃ³n dentro de un perÃ­odo de 14 dÃ­as desde el momento en el que se te cobra la primera cuota mensual. Desactivaremos tu Mastercard N26 y emitiremos una tarjeta virtual para usar con tu cuenta N26 EstÃ¡ndar.Â¿Puedo recibir un reembolso?Si cancelas tu suscripciÃ³n dentro del periodo de revocaciÃ³n de 14 dÃ­as (contactando con AtenciÃ³n al Cliente a travÃ©s de tu app N26), te reembolsaremos el pago inicial. Si cancelas tu suscripciÃ³n pasado el periodo de revocaciÃ³n de 14 dÃ­as, te reembolsaremos los meses restantes que hayas pagado por adelantado.Sin embargo, ten en cuenta que si has pagado un precio reducido (por elegir el pago anual o cada 6 meses), te reembolsaremos los meses restantes, pero cobrando el precio completo por los meses que ya hayas disfrutado. Es decir, que solo recibes el descuento si completas el aÃ±o entero del contrato.

content: Si votre Mastercard N26 a expirÃ© ou arrive Ã  expiration, vous trouverez dans cet article toutes les informations sur la commande dâ€™une nouvelle carte, les coÃ»ts associÃ©s et les dÃ©lais de livraison.Â Avant de commander une nouvelle carte, nous vous recommandons de vÃ©rifier que vos donnÃ©es personnelles sont correctes et Ã  jour. title: PÃºblicos personalizados
content: Tratamiento de datos en el marco de Custom Audiences de FacebookCustom Audiences nos permite crear audiencias personalizadas y parecidas. Las audiencias personalizadas se componen de clientes de N26 y usuarios de Internet para mostrarles contenido personalizado, o solo de usuarios de Internet para excluirte, como cliente existente de N26, de algunos de nuestros anuncios. No queremos mostrarte anuncios que sean irrelevantes, dado que ya eres cliente de N26. Las audiencias parecidas nos permiten definir un grupo objetivo relevante para el cual los anuncios mostrados tengan un mayor interÃ©s que para otros usuarios de Facebook. Estas denominadas "audiencias parecidas" son mÃ¡s similares a nuestros clientes que el usuario promedio de Facebook.Para beneficiarte de las ventajas descritas con anterioridad, le proporcionamos a Facebook una versiÃ³n con hash de tu direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico de N26. El llamado "hashing" es una forma de seudonimizaciÃ³n que codifica tu direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico para que no se te pueda identificar con esta direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico con hash. Posteriormente, Facebook compara esta direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico con tu posible direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico de Facebook. DespuÃ©s de realizar la comparaciÃ³n, independientemente de si es positiva o no, Facebook elimina cualquier direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico con hash en un plazo de 6 a 8 horas. Facebook no comparte estos datos con terceros u otros anunciantes ni otorga acceso a los mismos. Puedes encontrar esta y otra informaciÃ³n en los tÃ©rminos de Custom Audiences de Facebook (pestaÃ±a nueva).Facebook Ireland Limited transfiere datos a Facebook Inc., EE. UU. EE. UU. es un paÃ­s que, segÃºn los tÃ©rminos del Reglamento de la UE 2016/679 ("RGPD"), no proporciona un nivel adecuado de protecciÃ³n de los datos personales; esto implica, entre otras cosas, que las agencias gubernamentales de los EE. UU. pueden tener derecho a acceder a tus datos sin que existan recursos efectivos disponibles.Puedes revocar tu consentimiento a este tratamiento de datos, de acuerdo con el Art. 6 apartado 1 letra a del RGPD, en la aplicaciÃ³n web y la aplicaciÃ³n de N26 en cualquier momento . Tratamiento de datos en el marco de Customer Match de GoogleCustomer Match nos permite crear audiencias personalizadas y parecidas. Las audiencias personalizadas se componen de clientes de N26 y usuarios de Internet para mostrarles contenido personalizado, o solo de usuarios de Internet para excluirte, como cliente existente de N26, de algunos de nuestros anuncios en la Red de bÃºsqueda de Google, la pestaÃ±a Compras, Gmail, YouTube y la Red de Display de Google. No queremos mostrarte anuncios que sean irrelevantes. Las audiencias parecidas nos permiten definir un grupo objetivo relevante para el cual los anuncios mostrados tengan un mayor interÃ©s que para otros usuarios de Google. Estas denominadas "audiencias parecidas" son mÃ¡s similares a nuestros clientes que el usuario promedio de Google.Para beneficiarte de las ventajas descritas con anterioridad, le proporcionamos a Google una versiÃ³n con hash de tu direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico de N26. El llamado "hashing" es una forma de seudonimizaciÃ³n que codifica tu direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico para que no se te pueda identificar con esta direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico con hash. Luego, Google compara esta direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico con tu posible direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico de la cuenta de Google. Si esta direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico no coincide, Google aÃºn puede utilizarla como parte de una verificaciÃ³n de cumplimiento de polÃ­ticas, pero Google no la utilizarÃ¡ de ninguna otra manera para Customer Match ni ningÃºn otro producto de Google. Google no retiene los datos durante mÃ¡s de 48 horas para crear las audiencias de Customer Match y, a continuaciÃ³n, los elimina de inmediato. Google no comparte estos datos con terceros u otros anunciantes ni otorga acceso a los mismos. Puedes encontrar esta y otra informaciÃ³n en el artÃ­culo de ayuda CÃ³mo utiliza Google los datos de Customer Match (pestaÃ±a nueva).Google Ireland Limited transfiere datos a Google LLC, EE. UU. EE. UU. es un paÃ­s que, segÃºn los tÃ©rminos del Reglamento de la UE 2016/679 ("RGPD"), no proporciona un nivel adecuado de protecciÃ³n de los datos personales; esto implica, entre otras cosas, que las agencias gubernamentales de los EE. UU. pueden tener derecho a acceder a tus datos sin que existan recursos efectivos disponibles.Puedes revocar tu consentimiento a este tratamiento de datos, de acuerdo con el Art. 6 apartado 1 letra a del RGPD, en la aplicaciÃ³n web y la aplicaciÃ³n de N26 en cualquier momento.

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sortÂ your transactionsÂ and display our findings inÂ InsightsÂ (top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, weâ€™ll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesnâ€™t fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: Weâ€™ve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

title: Comment fonctionne 3D Secure ?
content: 3D Secure est une technologie de sÃ©curisation des paiements en ligne visant Ã  limiter lâ€™utilisation frauduleuse des cartes bancaires sur internet. Tous les e-commerÃ§ants qui utilisent cette technologie affichent le logo Â« Mastercard SecureCode Â» sur leurs sites.Lorsque vous faites un paiement en ligne, depuis votre tÃ©lÃ©phone, une tablette ou un ordinateur, vous avez 5 minutes pour confirmer la transaction en cliquant sur laÂ notificationÂ que vous recevez sur votre tÃ©lÃ©phone.Attention : la notification push ne sera envoyÃ©e qu'au smartphone synchronisÃ© au compte.Si vous ne confirmez pas immÃ©diatement cette transaction, vous pouvez Ã©galement la retrouver dans la liste de vos transactions. Elle apparaÃ®tra en attente sur votre application. Une petit cloche vous indique que vous devez la confirmer. Vous pourrez alors appuyer sur cette transaction et la valider.Si vous ne voyez pas cette transaction dans votre liste, vous pouvez consulter lâ€™article relatif aux raisons pour lesquellesÂ un paiement en ligne peut Ã©chouer.

title: How to keep my banking data safe online?
content: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

title: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
content: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

title: Information about the flex p-account
content: A flex p-account allowance is based on incoming funds from certain entities, usually public institutions and/or your employer. Consequently, your monthly allowance is liable to change every calendar month.Whenever your salary is above the basic monthly allowance of 1.340â‚¬, your salary amount becomes the new allowance for the remainder of the month. Whenever the salary is below the amount of the basic allowance (1.340â‚¬) then your allowance remains as it is, and does not decrease.Until you receive your salary, your P-account allowance will be the basic one. All adjustments are made within 1-2 working days after you've received your salary.

title: Â¿N26 admite transferencias SWIFT?
content: SÃ­, pero de momento solo transferencias SWIFT entrantes.TodavÃ­a no pueden realizarse transferencias SWIFT salientes. Sigue las redes sociales de #N26 y nuestro Blog (pestaÃ±a nueva) para estar entre los primeros en saberlo cuando esto cambie.Te explicamos cÃ³mo hacer transferencias en divisas extranjeras con N26.Descubre cuÃ¡nto tiempo tarda una transferencia SWIFT entrante.Â¿CuÃ¡nto cuesta una transferencia SWIFT?A las transferencias entrantes de mÃ¡s de 150Â â‚¬ se les aplicarÃ¡ una comisiÃ³n de 12,50Â â‚¬ mÃ¡s el 0,1 % del importe recibido.A las transferencias entrantes de menos de 150Â â‚¬ no se les aplican comisiones.La comisiÃ³n mÃ¡xima es de 100Â â‚¬ por transacciÃ³n.Â¿A quiÃ©n se le aplica esta comisiÃ³n?Si contrataste la cuenta antes del 07/07/2021 y tienes un IBAN alemÃ¡n, la comisiÃ³n se te aplicarÃ¡ si tienes una cuenta N26 Business EstÃ¡ndar, Business Smart o Business You. (Es decir, que no se aplica a N26 EstÃ¡ndar, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal y N26 Business Metal.)Si contrataste la cuenta antes del 07/07/2021 y tienes un IBAN espaÃ±ol, la comisiÃ³n se te aplicarÃ¡ si tienes una cuenta N26 Business EstÃ¡ndar, Business Smart, Business You o N26 EstÃ¡ndar, N26 Smart o N26 You. (Es decir, que no se aplica a las cuentas N26 Metal ni N26 Business Metal.)Si contrataste una cuenta despuÃ©s del 07/07/2021, la comisiÃ³n se te aplicarÃ¡ independientemente de tu IBAN si tienes una cuenta N26 Business EstÃ¡ndar, Business Smart, Business You o N26 EstÃ¡ndar, N26 Smart o N26 You. (Es decir, que no se aplica a las cuentas N26 Metal ni N26 Business Metal.)

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.Â In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.Â One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a â€œtrusted beneficiaryâ€ so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: Â¿Debo declarar mi cuenta de N26 en EspaÃ±a?
content: A la hora de hacer la declaraciÃ³n de la renta en EspaÃ±a (pestaÃ±a nueva), la Agencia Tributaria ofrece mecanismos para que puedan declarar sus bienes en el extranjero aquellas personas que estÃ©n legalmente obligadas a hacerlo.En el caso de tu cuenta de N26, depende del tipo de IBAN que tengas:Si tu cuenta de N26 tiene un IBAN espaÃ±ol (que empieza por ES), tu cuenta bancaria estÃ¡ en EspaÃ±a a todos los efectos y no es necesario declararla.Si tu cuenta de N26 tiene un IBAN alemÃ¡n (es decir, empieza por DE), entonces el depÃ³sito de tu dinero estÃ¡ en Alemania y, por lo tanto, estarÃ­as sujeto a esta obligaciÃ³n tributaria siempre y cuando tu caso concreto estÃ© dentro de los requisitos establecidos legalmente.Para saber si tu situaciÃ³n corresponde a uno de estos requisitos, te recomendamos que recurras a un profesional en la materia para recibir el debido asesoramiento, ya que nosotros no estamos habilitados para ejercer como consejeros tributarios.Puedes consultar mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n al respecto en el sitio web oficial de la Agencia Tributaria (pestaÃ±a nueva).

title: Â¿QuÃ© ventajas ofrece N26 Smart?
content: Tarjeta Mastercard fÃ­sica de N26 gratuita: Elige entre cinco nuevos colores cuando pidas la tarjeta: pomelo, ocÃ©ano, arena, aguamarina y grafito.Tarjeta virtual adicional: Â¡Pide una tarjeta virtual adicional gratis en la app!Tarjeta fÃ­sica adicional: Pide una tarjeta fÃ­sica N26 You adicional por una comisiÃ³n Ãºnica de 10 â‚¬ a travÃ©s de la app N26.Espacios: 10 Espacios (subcuentas) adicionales para organizar tus finanzas.Espacios Compartidos: Invita a amigos a tus Espacios (subcuentas) para que compartan y administren dinero contigo.Asistencia telefÃ³nica especial: Contacta con nuestra lÃ­nea de atenciÃ³n al cliente si tienes alguna pregunta.Â Si te estÃ¡s planteando contratar N26 Smart (pestaÃ±a nueva), ten en cuenta lo siguiente:La nueva tarjeta Mastercard N26 Smart no tiene relieve: los datos de la tarjeta, incluido el nÃºmero, el cÃ³digo CVV y el â€œtokenâ€ de 10 dÃ­gitos estÃ¡n impresos al dorso.Si te pasas a N26 Smart, la comisiÃ³n mensual de 4,90Â â‚¬ se cobrarÃ¡ directamente de tu cuenta N26 cada mes, a partir de la fecha de contrataciÃ³n. Si eres nuevo cliente, la primera comisiÃ³n se te cobrarÃ¡ 15 dÃ­as despuÃ©s de que verifiques tu identidad (pestaÃ±a nueva). A partir de esa fecha, la comisiÃ³n mensual se te cobrarÃ¡ en la fecha del contrato. Es decir, que si abriste tu cuenta a final de mes, las dos primeras comisiones mensuales se te cobrarÃ¡n el mes siguiente.A partir de ahora, puedes decidir si quieres pagar la comisiÃ³n premium cada mes o de antemano durante los prÃ³ximos 6 meses o 1 aÃ±o del contrato. Si escoges la opciÃ³n de prepago, obtendrÃ¡s un descuento del precio mensual de tu cuenta premium (Smart/You/Metal), que serÃ¡ proporcional al periodo de facturaciÃ³n que quieras abonar.Cuando contrates la cuenta, encontrarÃ¡s las opciones de facturaciÃ³n con prepago y los costes relacionados en la app N26.

title: PerchÃ© ho un addebito doppio?
content: Nel momento in cui effettui pagamenti con carta avvengono due principali tipologie di transazioni:La preautorizzazione, che Ã¨ una transazione che prevede il blocco di un certo importo da parte di un venditore di prodotti o servizi per verificare la validitÃ  della carta o la presenza di fondi sul conto dei clienti. Le pre-autorizzazioni sono molto frequenti per confermare prenotazioni alberghiere oppure il noleggio di auto.L'addebito, che Ã¨ la transazione con la quale l'importo viene effettivamente detratto dal conto.Nel momento in cui viene effettuata una preautorizzazione, questa puÃ² diventare un addebito sul conto, puÃ² essere respinta oppure scadere. Nell'ultimo caso, l'importo ritorna automaticamente sul tuo conto entro i successivi 12 giorni. Gli importi preautorizzati nel caso di noleggio auto possono richiedere fino a 30 giorni prima di essere nuovamente disponibili sul conto.Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:Talvolta sul conto appaiono sia l'autorizzazione che l'addebito. Questo accade, ad esempio, nel caso di pagamento offline, quindi non in tempo reale, oppure a causa di problemi tecnici al terminale di pagamento. Anche in questi casi, l'autorizzazione scadrÃ  nei tempi indicati. Nel caso non dovesse succedere, contattaci via chat e ti aiuteremo a recuperare l'importo (nuova tabella).L'importo della preautorizzazione puÃ² essere diverso da quello dell'addebito finale del conto per diversi motivi (nuova tabella).

title: N26 Cashless - Competition for Italian customers
content:
What is it?N26 Cashless is a new promotion designed for N26 customers residing in Italy whose purpose is to encourage the use of the N26 debit card for digital payments.The competition will be active from March 1st to June 30th, 2021.Who can participate?
Registration for N26 Cashless is open and automatic for all N26 customers residing in Italy (except N26 Business customers) and who have given their consent to marketing communications.In order to participate in the promotion and prize draw, customers must:Have an open and active N26 accountNot have incurred in foreclosures, seizures or other limitations of the current accountThe mentioned conditions are valid for the entire duration of the competition and failure to comply may lead to exclusion from the final prize draw.How does it work?
N26 customers enrolled in the program will reach the threshold to participate in the final prize draws by making transactions with their Mastercard associated with the N26 account via POS (either contactless, or with chip and pin) or with Apple Pay and Google Pay.Online payments and ATM withdrawals are excluded from the transaction count.What are the prizes?Based on the number of transactions carried out during the period of validity of the competition (1st March - 30th June 2021), participants will be able to access the draws for 3 prizes:At least 20 transactions > 20â‚¬ Amazon gift card At least 50 transactions > 50â‚¬ Amazon gift card At least 90 transactions > 90â‚¬ Amazon gift card If participants make a number of transactions that correspond to different thresholds, they participate in the drawing of prizes for both thresholds reached.(For example, if you carry out 60 payments during the duration of the competition, you participate in the draw for both 20â‚¬ and 50â‚¬ Amazon voucher.)The prize draw will take place by August 31, 2021.In the event of a win, customers will receive an official communication within their "Messages" inbox of â€‹â€‹the N26 App.Prize competition valid from 01/03/2021 to 30/06/2021. Prize money 4,160 â‚¬ F.C. VAT. To consult the complete rules, visit www.n26.com (new tab). Amazon.co.uk Gift Card is not a sponsor of this promotion. Restrictions applied. More details on amazon.it/gc-legal (new tab).

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all depositsÂ up to â‚¬100.000Â held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?Â N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

content:

Wenn Du eine solche Anfrage erhÃ¤ltst, sende uns die angeforderten Unterlagen bitte via Nachrichten von N26. Es gibt keine Ausnahmen fÃ¼r solche ÃœberprÃ¼fungen, und sie kÃ¶nnen auch nicht umgangen werden.Â Dabei handelt es sich um Standardprozesse wie sie bei Banken Ã¼blich sind, um die Sicherheit unserer Kundenkonten zu gewÃ¤hrleisten.Der genaue PrÃ¼fvorgang und das Ergebnis werden vertraulich behandelt und nur intern verarbeitet. Hier findest du einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:Hier sind einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:In der E-Mail, die du von uns erhÃ¤ltst, werden wir dir genau erklÃ¤ren, welches spezifische Dokument wir von dir benÃ¶tigen. Du kannst uns eingescannte Dokumente, Bilder oder Screenshots zusenden (vorausgesetzt, der Originalinhalt des Dokuments ist deutlich lesbar). Nachdem wir deine Unterlagen erhalten haben, lassen wir dich wissen, ob sie fÃ¼r die ÃœberprÃ¼fung ausreichend sind. In einigen FÃ¤llen kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach weiteren Details fragen werden, was zu VerzÃ¶gerungen fÃ¼hren kann.Antworte so frÃ¼h wie mÃ¶glich, also vor der genannten Frist, direkt auf die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast und sende deine Unterlagen mit.Â Unserem Kundendienst liegen zu diesem Thema keine weiteren Informationen vor.Du musst die je nach deiner Situation gÃ¼ltigen Dokumente vorlegen. 
Einige Beispiele:Du hast finanzielle Hilfe von deiner Familie erhalten, um Projekte abzuschlieÃŸen oder hast GrundstÃ¼cke oder Geld von Verwandten geerbt.Ein GewÃ¤hrungs-/Darlehensvertrag, ein offizielles Erbschaftsdokument oder ein offizielles Dokument Ã¼ber die Herkunft des Darlehens (z.B. Verkaufsunterlagen einer verÃ¤uÃŸerten Immobilie zur Finanzierung des Darlehens oder KontoauszÃ¼ge von Verwandten, von denen das Geld stammt).Du hast eine Immobilie verÃ¤uÃŸert oder deine Aktien an der BÃ¶rse verkauft.Den Vertrag Ã¼ber die vereinbarten GeschÃ¤fte oder notarielle Beurkundung des EigentumsÃ¼bergangs.Du hast Geld erhalten oder gesendet, um Rechnungen zu bezahlen oder ein Produkt zu kaufen.KontoauszÃ¼ge Ã¼ber die Herkunft des Geldes oder Dokumente, die die Verwendung des Geldes und seinen Zweck belegen.Du hast eine Abfindung von deinem vorherigen Arbeitgeber erhalten.Dokumente, die das Ende deines ArbeitsverhÃ¤ltnisses belegen, mit einer ZahlungsbegrÃ¼ndung und/oder einem Kontoauszug deines frÃ¼heren Arbeitgebers.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

Nous organiserons un appel dans lâ€™heure qui suit pour discuter de la situation avec vous. Une fois en relation avec un de nos agents, expliquez la situation en dÃ©tails. Toute information sera importante pour nos services. Soyez assurÃ© que nous prendrons toutes les mesures nÃ©cessaires pour vous aider.En plus de nos obligations lÃ©gales en matiÃ¨re de prÃ©vention contre la fraude, et afin d'amÃ©liorer sans cesse nos mesures de sÃ©curitÃ©, nous avons dÃ©diÃ© une Ã©quipe qui analyse chaque cas de fraude.Les cas de fraudes sont souvent compliquÃ©s et doivent Ãªtre Ã©tudiÃ©s dans les dÃ©tails. Cela peut prendre quelques jours, ou mÃªme quelques semaines pour les cas les plus compliquÃ©s.Enfin, si vous avez des preuves ou des raisons sÃ©rieuses de penser que votre compte a pu Ãªtre piratÃ©, nous vous conseillons de dÃ©poser plainte auprÃ¨s des autoritÃ©s compÃ©tentes.Que faire si je perds ma carte, ou si je pense que les donnÃ©es de celle-ci ont Ã©tÃ© piratÃ©es ?Si votre carte N26 a Ã©tÃ© perdue ou volÃ©e et que vous craignez que ses donnÃ©es nâ€™aient Ã©tÃ© piratÃ©es, vous devriez la bloquer immÃ©diatement depuis votre application N26 afin que votre compte ne soit pas dÃ©bitÃ©. Notre Ã©quipe du Service Client saura vous assister si vous souhaitez associer un nouvel appareil Ã  votre compte N26.Et si jâ€™ai des idÃ©es pour amÃ©liorer la sÃ©curitÃ© chez N26 ?Pour en savoir plus sur la faÃ§on dont nous protÃ©geons votre compte, visitez notre page sur la sÃ©curitÃ© chez N26 (nouvel onglet).Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 07:00 Ã  23:00 h.Si vous nâ€™avez pas accÃ¨s Ã  votre application mobile N26, ou si vous ne pouvez pas vous connecter Ã  votre espace client en ligne, vous pouvez Ã©galement demander Ã  bloquer votre carte bancaire ou les transactions sortantes de votre compte en nous appelant au +33 1 88 45 02 39.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo hacer transferencias en moneda extranjera?
content:
Nos hemos asociado con Wise para que las transferencias en moneda extranjera resulten sencillas. Wise ofrece tipos de cambio real y sin comisiones ocultas.Para realizar una transferencia en moneda extranjera, entra en la app N26 con tu mÃ³vil:Desde la pantalla principal, pulsa sobre la pestaÃ±a de ''Enviar dinero''.Selecciona "Transferencia en moneda extranjera".Introduce la cantidad que quieres enviar. Introduce los datos bancarios del receptor, y confirma la transferencia.Finaliza confirmando con tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.Si laÂ divisa (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â que necesitas no aparece en la app, entonces visita la pÃ¡gina de Wise (pestaÃ±a nueva) para tener todas las opciones posibles. 
Puedes crear tu cuenta Wise utilizando el email de tu cuenta N26 para realizar la transferencia desde allÃ­:Pon el email registrado de N26.Escribe una contraseÃ±a cualquiera e intenta entrar.DarÃ¡ error; pulsa en Â¿Has olvidado tu contraseÃ±a?RecibirÃ¡s un email con los pasos para restablecerla.Ten en cuenta que las transferencias internacionales en moneda extranjera no pueden llevarse a cabo desde la aplicaciÃ³n si tienes una cuenta N26 Business o Business You, o si el destinatario es una cuenta Business.Wise aplica sus propias comisiones segÃºn el tipo de transferencia, pero lo verÃ¡s todo antes de confirmarla.Â¿Quieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 â‚¬ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26.Â InfÃ³rmate mÃ¡s sobre este tema (pestaÃ±a nueva).Wise solo admite transferencias en la moneda principal de un paÃ­s. Esto significa, por ejemplo, que no se puede procesar ninguna transacciÃ³n en USD en India.

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content: Direct debits returned to your account due toÂ insufficient funds* are charged a â‚¬3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9) in accordance with ourÂ Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,Â overdraftÂ interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you donâ€™t recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. You can check the list of countries below:BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland

title: How to change my phone number?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to:Â ğŸ‘¤Â My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

title: How to reorder a card?
content: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10â‚¬N26 Metal cards: 45â‚¬Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30â‚¬N26 Metal: 65â‚¬Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo iniciar sesiÃ³n en la cuenta con la autenticaciÃ³n de dos factores?
content: Â Los dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n es un proceso de autenticaciÃ³n basado en el uso de dos o mÃ¡s elementos de seguridad. title: How to make a donation with N26?
content: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier.Â You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the listÂ Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?Â 
You are normally a â€œtax residentâ€ and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally â€œtie-breaker rulesâ€ included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.Â 
What is your taxpayer identification number (â€œTINâ€) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.Â In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: Why was I charged twice?
content: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means youâ€™re able to see whatâ€™s going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once youâ€™ve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we canâ€™t cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.Â Sometimes youâ€™ll see both payments at the same timeâ€“the authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesnâ€™t expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).Â Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content: Tips for a successful videoÂ verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of ourÂ supported countriesÂ to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driverâ€™s licenses or residence permits canâ€™t be used). Also, the document shouldnâ€™t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'llÂ need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and deliveryÂ of your card.Â Please note that this is not a fee: yourÂ first cardÂ after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. DeliveriesÂ take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).Â Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the â€œOwnerâ€, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:Â Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.Â Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.Â Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Ownerâ€™s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, theyâ€™ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.Â N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?
