title: Que sont les IBAN pour les Espaces ?
content: GrÃ¢ce Ã  notre fonctionnalitÃ© IBAN pour les Espaces, vos Espaces individuels sont encore plus pratiques. Les Espaces ne peuvent pas Ãªtre utilisÃ©s pour les virements entrants ou les prÃ©lÃ¨vements automatiques. Une fois que vous avez associÃ© un IBAN Ã  un Espace, celui-ci peut Ãªtre utilisÃ© pour recevoir des virements entrants et payer par prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique.Comment Ã§a marche?Les IBAN pour les Espaces permettent aux clients disposant dâ€™une adhÃ©sion N26 premium (N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal), qui ont ouvert leur compte N26 en Allemagne et qui disposent dâ€™un IBAN allemand, dâ€™associer un IBAN unique Ã  un Espace. Ce dernier peut ainsi Ãªtre utilisÃ© pour certains virements entrants et sortants.Vous trouverez ci-dessous un aperÃ§u des fonctionnalitÃ©s permettant dâ€™associer un IBAN Ã  votre ou vos Espaces :Ajouter un IBAN Ã  vos Espaces : Vous pouvez associer un IBAN unique Ã  un Espace existant ou crÃ©er un nouvel Espace. Les Espaces PartagÃ©s ne peuvent Ãªtre associÃ©s Ã  un IBAN.Espaces multiples avec IBAN : Vous pouvez crÃ©er jusquâ€™Ã  10 Espaces, chacun avec son propre IBAN, ce qui vous permet de contrÃ´ler encore mieux vos finances. Une fois quâ€™un IBAN a Ã©tÃ© associÃ© Ã  3 Espaces, un dÃ©lai de 24 heures sâ€™applique jusquâ€™Ã  ce quâ€™un nouvel IBAN unique puisse Ãªtre associÃ© Ã  un Espace.Recevoir des virements bancaires : Vous pouvez recevoir des virements directement dans lâ€™Espace auquel un IBAN est associÃ©.Effectuer des virements bancaires : Vous pouvez effectuer des virements directement depuis lâ€™Espace auquel un IBAN est associÃ©.Payer par prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique : Vous pouvez utiliser lâ€™IBAN unique de votre Espace pour le paiement par prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique rÃ©current, directement depuis votre Espace. Si vos fonds sont insuffisants pour couvrir le montant du prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique, le virement sera rejetÃ© et des frais seront prÃ©levÃ©s sur votre compte courant.Consultez les dÃ©tails de lâ€™IBAN de vos Espaces : Vous pouvez utiliser chaque IBAN de vos Espaces pour recevoir des virements et payer par prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique. Pour ce faire, il vous suffit de vous connecter Ã  lâ€™application mobile ou lâ€™espace client en ligne, dâ€™accÃ©der Ã  la rubrique Â« Espaces Â» et de sÃ©lectionner lâ€™Espace pour lequel vous souhaitez consulter les dÃ©tails de lâ€™IBAN. AccÃ©dez aux Â« ParamÃ¨tres de lâ€™espace Â» pour consulter lâ€™IBAN et le BIC en haut de lâ€™Ã©cran.Comment ajouter un IBAN Ã  un Espace :Pour ajouter un IBAN Ã  vos Espaces, veuillez suivre les Ã©tapes suivantes :Connectez-vous Ã  lâ€™application mobile N26Appuyez sur Â« Espaces Â» pour accÃ©der au menu EspacesSÃ©lectionnez lâ€™Espace auquel vous souhaitez associer un IBAN uniqueAppuyez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne en forme de roue dentÃ©e en haut Ã  droite de lâ€™Ã©cran pour accÃ©der aux Â« ParamÃ¨tres de lâ€™espace Â».Naviguez dans lâ€™application :SÃ©lectionnez Â« CrÃ©er un IBAN Â»Lisez les informations et appuyez sur Â« Ajouter un IBAN Ã  ... Â»Acceptez les Conditions GÃ©nÃ©rales dâ€™UtilisationSaisissez votre code de validationAppuyez sur Â« Dâ€™accord Â» sur lâ€™Ã©cran final.Comment supprimer un IBAN dâ€™un Espace :Pour supprimer un IBAN dâ€™un Espace, vous devez supprimer lâ€™Espace lui-mÃªme et transfÃ©rer les fonds restants sur votre compte courant ou sur un autre Espace. Pour supprimer un Espace associÃ© Ã  un IBAN, veuillez procÃ©der comme suit :Connectez-vous Ã  lâ€™application mobile N26Appuyez sur Â« Espaces Â»SÃ©lectionnez lâ€™Espace associÃ© Ã  un IBAN que vous souhaitez supprimer (cela supprimera complÃ¨tement lâ€™Espace et lâ€™argent devra Ãªtre transfÃ©rÃ©)AccÃ©dez aux Â« ParamÃ¨tres de lâ€™espace Â» (cliquez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne en forme de roue dentÃ©e en haut Ã  droite)Sous Â« GÃ©rer Â», vous trouverez lâ€™option Â« Vider et supprimer lâ€™espace Â»Appuyez sur cette option et confirmez que vous souhaitez supprimer lâ€™EspaceSÃ©lectionnez votre compte courant ou un autre Espace pour y transfÃ©rer le solde restantEnfin, appuyez sur Â« Supprimer Â» pour confirmer.Vous pouvez effectuer des virements SEPA sortants depuis vos Espaces auxquels est associÃ© un IBAN. Pour ce faire, veuillez suivre les Ã©tapes suivantes :Rendez-vous dans lâ€™Espace Ã  partir duquel vous souhaitez effectuer un virement, puis appuyez sur Â« Envoyer Â».SÃ©lectionnez Â« Virement bancaire Â».SÃ©lectionnez le contact auquel vous souhaitez envoyer de lâ€™argent.Confirmez le montant que vous souhaitez envoyer et saisissez une rÃ©fÃ©rence (facultatif).Saisissez votre code de validation, puis confirmez le virement.

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all depositsÂ up to â‚¬100.000Â held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?Â N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

title: Was ist N26 Business Metal?
content: VerfÃ¼gbar in Ã–sterreich, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Schweden.N26 Business Metal 16,90 â‚¬ pro Monat und ist fÃ¼r SelbststÃ¤ndige und Freiberufler gedacht, die in eigenem Namen tÃ¤tig sind. Das bedeutet, dass auf dem Konto oder der Karte kein Firmenname stehen kann.Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: WÃ¤hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fÃ¼nf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.ZusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte!ZusÃ¤tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle Ã¼ber deine N26 App eine zusÃ¤tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 Metal Mastercard online sowie in GeschÃ¤ften, vermeide versteckte BankgebÃ¼hren und profitiere von gebÃ¼hrenfreien AuslandsÃ¼berweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst darÃ¼ber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit gebÃ¼hrenfrei Bargeld in jeder WÃ¤hrung abheben.Partnerangebote (neuen Tab): Profitiere von Premium-Partnerangeboten und Rabatten von renommierten MarkenVersicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an persÃ¶nlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: RÃ¼ckerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, fÃ¼r Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer FlugverspÃ¤tung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer VerspÃ¤tung des aufgegebenen GepÃ¤cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten fÃ¼r medizinische RÃ¼cktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erhÃ¤ltst eine Versicherung fÃ¼r Such- und RettungsmaÃŸnahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei UnfÃ¤llen wÃ¤hrend einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz fÃ¼r SchÃ¤den oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Es ist noch nicht mÃ¶glich, zwischen Privat- und GeschÃ¤ftskonten zu wechseln. Umso wichtiger ist es, zu wissen, ob N26 Business Metal das Richtige fÃ¼r dich (neuen Tab) ist:Das N26 Business Metal Konto ist fÃ¼r SelbstÃ¤ndige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.Das Konto kostet 16,90 â‚¬ pro Monat. Das Premium-Konto beinhaltet: Ein Allianz-Versicherungspaket sowie gebÃ¼hrenfreie Abhebungen an Geldautomaten in FremdwÃ¤hrungen.Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur fÃ¼r den geschÃ¤ftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt. Du erhÃ¤ltst monatlich 0,5% Cashback auf alle mit der Karte getÃ¤tigten Zahlungen. Der Vorgang erfolgt am 15. des Folgemonats sowie aller darauffolgenden Monate und es dauert bis zu 7 Tage, bis er auf deinem Kontoauszug erscheint.Es ist derzeit nicht mÃ¶glich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu fÃ¼hren. Wenn du also auch eine Karte fÃ¼r private Ausgaben benÃ¶tigst, empfehlen wir dir, eine Maestrocard zu bestellen (erhÃ¤ltlich in Deutschland und Ã–sterreich).Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrung sind mit N26 Business Metal nicht mÃ¶glich.Du kannst direkt bei der Anmeldung Business Metal auswÃ¤hlen oder von einem existierenden N26 Business Konto upgraden.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und gehÃ¶rt zur Allianz Group.

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipientâ€,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.Youâ€™ll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent youâ€™ll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select â€œSend Moneyâ€ then choose â€œBank Transferâ€. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

title: Du bist Opfer eines Betrugs geworden? Kontaktiere uns.
content:
Du hast per BankÃ¼berweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen BetrÃ¼ger Ã¼berwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00.Â Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschlieÃŸlich fÃ¼r die oben beschriebenen FÃ¤lle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vortÃ¤uschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du N26 Kunde bist und eine autorisierte oder unautorisierte Kartenzahlung in deiner Transaktionshistorie reklamieren willst, nutze bitte unseren dafÃ¼r vorgesehenen vollumfÃ¤nglichen Service in der App! Die obige Hotline hilft ausschlieÃŸlich bei BankÃ¼berweisungen an ein verdÃ¤chtiges Konto mit einer N26 IBAN.Hast du eine SMS mit einem verdÃ¤chtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link Ã¶ffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empfÃ¤ngst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu Ã¶ffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab)Â Die geÃ¶ffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie auÃŸerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, fÃ¼r N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verdÃ¤chtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zusÃ¤tzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu bestÃ¤tigen. BestÃ¤tige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der ZahlungsempfÃ¤nger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verdÃ¤chtigen Link geÃ¶ffnet habe?Ã„ndere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zunÃ¤chst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort Ã¤ndern. Alternativ kannst du im Loginâ€“Bildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den nÃ¤chsten Schritten.Falls du persÃ¶nliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto geschÃ¼tzt bleibt. Bitte schicke auÃŸerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (neuen Tab) (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung oder sogar eine autorisierte Zahlung anfechten willst, die du mit deiner N26 Mastercard gemacht hast, kannst du dein Geld zurÃ¼ckbekommen. Erfahre Schritt-fÃ¼r-Schritt, wie du eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren (neuen Tab) kannst.Was tun bei einer unautorisierten Zahlung?Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung in deinem Konto hast, musst du eine neue Karte bestellen, damit dein Konto sicher bleibt und um weitere unautorisierte Zahlungen zu verhindern. Logge dich in die N26 App ein, und gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Neue Karte bestellen. WÃ¤hle dabei Verloren oder Gestohlen, je nachdem was zutrifft. Wenn die Karte die ganze Zeit in deinem Besitz war, musst du noch mal bestÃ¤tigen, dass du die Zahlung nicht selbst gemacht hast. Falls nÃ¶tig, melde den Fall auch bei der Polizei. Folge diesen Schritten, um die Zahlung zu reklamieren.Wie schÃ¼tze ich mein Konto vor BetrugHier sind einige Tipps, wie du dich vor Betrug schÃ¼tzen kannst:Nutze ausschlieÃŸlich Geldautomaten von vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen BankenKaufe online nur bei vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen Shops und WebseitenÃ„ndere regelmÃ¤ÃŸig deine Online-PasswÃ¶rter und PINsVertraue keinen Nachrichten oder E-Mails, die vorgeben von N26 zu sein und dich auffordern, deine Kartennummer oder Kontodaten zu teilen, oder die verdÃ¤chtige Links enthaltenN26 wird dich auÃŸerhalb der N26 App oder Web App nie nach deiner Kartennummer oder Kontodaten fragenÃ„ndere deine Karteneinstellungen in der N26 App. Deaktiviere z.B. Online-Zahlungen, Auslandszahlungen, Bargeldabhebungen oder passe deine Zahlungslimits an dein normales Kaufverhalten an.Vermeide Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen, wenn mÃ¶glich. Stattdessen empfiehlt sich die Zahlung per Chip und PIN oder per digitales Wallet.Â Bewahre dein Karte immer in einem sicheren Ort auf
NÃ¼tzliche Links:Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintrÃ¤chtigt wurde?Was ist Phishing?

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.Youâ€™ll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if youÂ reorder a card. Youâ€™ll then receive a tracking link by email. If youâ€™re not home during the delivery and your mailbox canâ€™t be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, itâ€™ll be returned to us. Weâ€™ll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. Itâ€™s currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.Itâ€™s not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once itâ€™s been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasnâ€™t arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you canâ€™t be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card: 30â‚¬Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30â‚¬N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card 65â‚¬

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: â‚¬5,000Monthly limit: â‚¬20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of â‚¬1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of â‚¬400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of â‚¬2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of â‚¬1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: â‚¬1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limitÂ Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.Â Your login details of both the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab)Â consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose aÂ secure passwordÂ and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.Â ThisÂ 4-digit codeÂ is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can thenÂ change itÂ in the app yourself after that.Push messages.Â For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to yourÂ connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also addedÂ 3D SecureÂ to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us weâ€™ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But weâ€™ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.Weâ€™ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You canÂ download your personal dataÂ up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in ourÂ Privacy Policy (new tab).

title: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
content: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters.Â Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved?Â Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If youâ€™re asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action.Â If you have a feeling that something is off, donâ€™t ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (donâ€™t click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a senderâ€™s identity.If youâ€™ve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If youâ€™d like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of theÂ delivery and accept the N26 MetalÂ T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering yourÂ Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If youâ€™re already a N26 You member, you donâ€™t have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: How does Spaces work?
content: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as youâ€™d like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, youâ€™ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

title: OÃ¹ est mon remboursement par carte ?
content:
Dans la majoritÃ© des cas, votre remboursement sera visible sur lâ€™application N26 le jour mÃªme de la transaction initiale, et non le jour du remboursement. Faites dÃ©filer vers le bas votre liste de transactions ou bien tÃ©lÃ©chargez vos relevÃ©s bancaires prÃ©cÃ©dents pour le trouver.Vous pouvez consulter et tÃ©lÃ©charger vos relevÃ©s de compte sur l'application mobile : depuis l'Ã©cran d'accueil, cliquez sur les 3 traits en haut Ã  droite et sÃ©lectionnez RelevÃ©s.Vous pouvez trouver vos relevÃ©s sur votre espace personnel en ligne (app.n26.com). Sur la pageÂ Transactions, cliquez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne nuage Ã  cÃ´tÃ© du symbole â€œ+â€. Vous verrez ensuite la sectionÂ RelevÃ©s de compte.Pour la location dâ€™une voiture, le montant bloquÃ© en dÃ©pÃ´t de garantie peut prendre jusquâ€™Ã  30 jours Ã  revenir sur votre compte.
En ce qui concerne le remboursement dâ€™un paiement par carte, ce dÃ©lai est de 14 jours maximum.

title: How can I credit my salary on my N26 account?
content: Having your salary credited to your N26 account is easy, simply provide your N26 IBAN to your employer, whoâ€™ll transfer the amount to your account via SEPA transfer.SEPA transfers are the official payment method of the SEPA area, which includes most of the European countries. In case your employer refuses to credit your salary through SEPA transfer because you have a German IBAN and not an Italian one, please check the "What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted" article on our Support Center.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo cambiar mi PIN de confirmaciÃ³n?
content: Instrucciones paso a paso:iPhoneAndroidPaso 1Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu aplicaciÃ³n N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2DesplÃ¡zate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaciÃ³nPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³nPaso 1Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu aplicaciÃ³n N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2DesplÃ¡zate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaciÃ³nPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³nEl PIN de confirmaciÃ³n es el que usas para confirmar las transferencias o cualquier otra operaciÃ³n que hagas desde la app. Si no sabes cuÃ¡l es, quizÃ¡ te ayude a recordarlo que tÃº creas tu propio PIN de confirmaciÃ³nÂ cuando vinculas tu mÃ³vil (pestaÃ±a nueva) por primera vez.Si lo has olvidado o quieres cambiarlo, puedes hacerlo cuando quieras desde la app:Ve a ğŸ‘¤ Mi cuenta y luego Seguridad.SeleccionaÂ Cambiar PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (es un nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos que aparece bajo tu nombre en la parte de delante de tu tarjeta; o por atrÃ¡s, en las tarjetas N26 Smart, You y Metal).Crea y confirma tu nuevo PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.Si introduces el PIN de confirmaciÃ³n errÃ³neamente 6 veces seguidas, tendrÃ¡s que restablecerlo antes de volver a intentarlo.Por motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ningÃºn PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, direcciÃ³n u otra combinaciÃ³n con dÃ­gitos repetidos o secuencias (como por ejemplo 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el nÃºmero que has elegido no es vÃ¡lido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinaciÃ³n diferente.Recuerda que tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n no es el mismo que el cÃ³digo PIN de tu tarjeta; (pestaÃ±a nueva) pero, si tÃº quieres, puedes elegir el mismo PIN para ambos.

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?Â 
You are normally a â€œtax residentâ€ and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally â€œtie-breaker rulesâ€ included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.Â 
What is your taxpayer identification number (â€œTINâ€) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.Â In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
content: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you.Â This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

title: Wie kann ich eine Lastschrift sperren?
content: Bevor du uns das Formular fÃ¼r die Sperrung des Lastschrifteinzugs schickst, beachte bitte Folgendes:GlÃ¤ubiger-ID und Mandatsreferenz: Du musst sowohl die GlÃ¤ubiger-ID als auch die Mandatsreferenz angeben. Wir akzeptieren allerdings auch:Elektronische Unterschrift: Diese muss mit dem Dokument Ã¼bereinstimmen, das du zur ErÃ¶ffnung deines N26 Kontos verwendet hast.Digitale Unterschrift: Wenn du das Dokument mit einer digitalen Unterschrift versehen hast, die von uns verifiziert werden kann, dann wird die Unterschrift als gÃ¼ltig angesehen. Dort helfen unsere Spezialisten dir dabei, den Vorgang abzuschlieÃŸen. Du kannst den Vorgang beschleunigen, indem du das Formular schon vorab ausfÃ¼llst!

title: What is a N26 Standard Account?
content: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of â‚¬50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional â‚¬10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least â‚¬10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

title: Warum wurde mir eine GlÃ¼cksspielgebÃ¼hr berechnet?
content: Die GlÃ¼cksspiel-GebÃ¼hr in HÃ¶he von 3% gilt fÃ¼r alle Privatkunden, die sich zur KontoerÃ¶ffnung nach dem 12. MÃ¤rz 2020 angemeldet haben oder ein Business-Konto (unabhÃ¤ngig vom Datum der KontoerÃ¶ffnung) besitzen.FÃ¼r Kunden, die ein solches Konto besitzen, wird die GlÃ¼cksspiel-GebÃ¼hr im Zusammenhang mit folgenden GlÃ¼cksspielanbietern fÃ¤llig:LotterienSportwettenOnline-CasinosPferderennenSonstiges GlÃ¼cksspielBitte beachte, dass dies sowohl fÃ¼r eingehende als auch ausgehende Transaktionen mit deiner Mastercard gilt. Die GlÃ¼cksspiel-GebÃ¼hr in HÃ¶he von 3 % wird nach der Abwicklung der entsprechenden Transaktion abgebucht. Wenn du zum Beispiel gewinnst oder deine verbleibenden Chips wieder in Geld umwandelst, Ã¼berweist der HÃ¤ndler den entsprechenden Betrag in einer anderen Transaktion, bei der die GlÃ¼cksspiel-GebÃ¼hr in HÃ¶he von 3% erneut abgebucht wird.Gut zu wissen:Die GlÃ¼cksspiel-GebÃ¼hr in HÃ¶he von 3 % erscheint auf deiner Transaktionsliste und deinem Kontoauszug und bezieht sich jeweils auf die ursprÃ¼ngliche Transaktion sowie jede nachfolgende Transaktion des GlÃ¼cksspielanbieters.Die von uns erhobene GebÃ¼hr bezieht sich auf Transaktionen mit deiner Mastercard, die du bei bestimmten relevanten HÃ¤ndlern getÃ¤tigt hast (unabhÃ¤ngig vom Land, in dem du deinen Tippschein abgegeben hast) und kann nicht zurÃ¼ckerstattet werden.Â FÃ¼r einige unserer Kunden wird die GlÃ¼cksspiel-GebÃ¼hr unter Zugrundelegung des Urteils vom BGH XI ZR 26/20 nicht mehr erhoben.

title: Alcune cose da sapere sullâ€™IBAN italiano
content:
IMPORTANTE - Tutti i clienti che aprono un conto N26 a partire dal 26 marzo 2020 riceveranno automaticamente un IBAN italiano. I clienti che hanno aperto il conto prima di questa data e sono in possesso di un IBAN tedesco verranno contattati una volta che il servizio sarÃ  disponibile.Â 
PerchÃ© non Ã¨ stato offerto un IBAN italiano fin dallâ€™inizio?Secondo la normativa UE, tutti gli Stati membri devono garantire che i titolari di conti bancari non subiscano discriminazioni per ragioni di natura geografica. Questo significa che i gestori delle utenze, oppure i datori di lavoro sono tenuti ad accettare codici IBAN di conti aperti presso banche con sede in qualunque paese membro dellâ€™UE. Tuttavia, abbiamo ascoltato i nostri clienti e sappiamo che questo non sempre accade. Per questo motivo abbiamo deciso di offrire ai nostri clienti italiani un IBAN locale.Posso ricevere l'accredito del mio stipendio?Certo! Puoi ricevere accrediti in Euro sul tuo conto N26 fornendo l'IBAN al tuo datore di lavoro.Posso ricevere l'accredito della mia pensione o del mio sussidio?Al momento non Ã¨ possibile accreditare la pensione sul conto N26 per i clienti con IBAN italiano. Aggiorneremo tutti i nostri clienti e forniremo loro tutti i dettagli in merito non appena il servizio sarÃ¡ disponibile. Nel caso dovessi riscontrare dei ritardi nel pagamento, contatta il nostro Supporto Clienti tramite chat.Posso ricevere addebiti diretti?Certo! BasterÃ  fornire l'IBAN del tuo conto N26 al beneficiario.Posso impostare ordini permanenti?Certo! Puoi creare ordini permanenti tramite l'app di N26, nella sezione Bonifico bancario.Nellâ€™effettuare un bonifico verso il mio conto N26, la banca ricevente non riconosce i dettagli bancari. PerchÃ©?Molto probabilmente la banca emittente non ha ancora integrato il nostro BIC italiano nel suo sistema. Contatta la banca in questione in modo che possa aggiornare i dati in suo possesso ed elaborare il tuo bonifico.Posso depositare contanti sul mio conto N26 con IBAN italiano?I nostri clienti residenti in Italia possono usare CASH26 per prelevare e depositare contanti tramite i negozi convenzionati. Ci saranno variazioni relativi ai costi del conto?Avere un IBAN italiano non comporterÃ  particolari variazioni dei costi associati al conto. Puoi controllare i nostri fogli informativi qui. (nuova tabella) Ã‰ vero che se apro un conto adesso, non pago il bollo?L' imposta di bollo sullâ€™estratto conto Ã¨ dovuta in caso di giacenza media superiore a 5000 â‚¬ (su base annua e salvo successive modifiche di legge) in misura pari a 34,20â‚¬. Lâ€™ imposta Ã¨ a carico di N26 fino al 30/06/2022. Salvo estensione della promozione, sarÃ  a carico del cliente dopo il 30/06/2022. In tal caso l'imposta verrÃ  addebitata sul conto del cliente tramite addebito diretto (il cliente non dovrÃ  fornire ulteriori documenti in merito).Per maggiori informazioni, leggi l'articolo (nuova tabella) sul nostro blog.

title: Puis-je ouvrir un compte N26 si je rÃ©side hors de la zone euro ?
content: Si vous rÃ©sidez en Pologne, SuÃ¨de, Suisse, Danemark, NorvÃ¨ge, Liechtenstein et en Islande, vous pouvez ouvrir un compte bancaire avec N26.
