title: Â¿CÃ³mo puedo vincular mi cuenta de N26 a PayPal?
content: Si quieres, puedes vincular tu cuenta de N26 a tu cuenta de PayPal y disfrutar de una serie de ventajas.PodrÃ¡s ingresar dinero en tu cuenta bancaria al instante, enviar y recibir pagos rÃ¡pidos con total seguridad y sin necesidad de utilizar tus datos bancarios ni el nÃºmero de tu tarjeta de N26.Te explicamos cÃ³mo conectar tu cuenta de N26 desde la versiÃ³n web de PayPal:Haz clic en Wallet, en la parte superior de la pÃ¡gina.Selecciona Vincular tarjeta o cuenta bancaria.Haz clic en Vincular cuenta bancaria.Sigue las instrucciones que se te indican.Si utilizas la app del mÃ³vil de PayPal:Haz clic en Configuraciones, en la esquina superior derecha.Selecciona Vincular tarjeta o cuenta bancaria.Haz clic en + y selecciona Cuenta bancaria.Introduce tus datos bancarios y confirma.Recuerda introducir tu nombre y apellido exactamente como figuran en tu cuenta de N26; de lo contrario, la conexiÃ³n con PayPal no se producirÃ¡.En cuanto se confirme tu cuenta de N26, PayPal te cobrarÃ¡ dos pequeÃ±os cargos que se reembolsarÃ¡n en tu cuenta en un plazo de 2-3 dÃ­as laborables.En ese momento, solo tienes que anotar los cargos recibidos, iniciar sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta de PayPal y confirmar la conexiÃ³n de tu cuenta de N26 desde tu Wallet.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.Â Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap â€œAdd moneyâ€Select â€œCard transferâ€Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per top-up, for a maximum of 450â‚¬ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap â€œAdd moneyâ€Select â€œApple Payâ€ or â€œGoogle Payâ€Choose an amountÂ Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: Was genau sind Karten fÃ¼r Spaces?
content:
Mit unserer neuen Funktion Karten fÃ¼r Spaces kannst du deine individuellen Unterkonten mit einer eigenen N26-Karte verknÃ¼pfen, sodass Zahlungen von dem verknÃ¼pften Space-Unterkonto abgerechnet werden.
Wie funktioniert das?Mit Karten fÃ¼r Spaces kÃ¶nnen N26 Nutzer mit einem Premiumabo (N26 Smart, You oder Metal) ihre physische oder digitale N26-Karte mit einem Space-Unterkonto verknÃ¼pfen und das Guthaben auf dem Unterkonto fÃ¼r persÃ¶nliche Ausgaben nutzen. Im Folgenden erhÃ¤ltst du einen Ãœberblick Ã¼ber die vielen MÃ¶glichkeiten, deine N26-Karte mit deinen Spaces zu verknÃ¼pfen:Â Du kannst deine N26-Karte mit einem deiner Spaces und wieder mit deinem Hauptkonto verknÃ¼pfen.Du kannst mehrere Karten mit einem Space oder mit verschiedenen Spaces verknÃ¼pfenWenn du eine physische N26 Mastercard mit einem Space verknÃ¼pfst, kannst du mit dieser Karte automatisch Apple und Google Pay nutzen. (Dies gilt nicht fÃ¼r Maestro-Karten.)Die Funktion steht noch nicht fÃ¼r Shared Spaces zur VerfÃ¼gung.Wie verknÃ¼pfe ich meine Karte mit einem Space?Du kannst deine bestehenden digitalen und physischen Karten mit deinem gewÃ¤hlten Space verknÃ¼pfen.DafÃ¼r gibt es 3 MÃ¶glichkeiten:Im Tab Karten siehst du unter jeder Karte die SchaltflÃ¤che, mit der du den gewÃ¼nschten Space auswÃ¤hlen kannst.In den Karteneinstellungen kannst du auch den gewÃ¼nschten Space auswÃ¤hlen und diesen mit deiner Karte verknÃ¼pfen.In den Einstellungen jedes Spaces kannst du die Karte auswÃ¤hlen, die mit dem jeweiligen Space verknÃ¼pft werden soll.Immer wenn du deine Karte mit deinem Hauptkonto oder einem anderen Space verknÃ¼pfen mÃ¶chtest, wÃ¤hlst du einfach "Hauptkonto" oder den anderen Space im Dropdown-MenÃ¼ aus.

title: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
content: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: Vous avez reÃ§u un message suspect ?
content:
En pleine pandÃ©mie mondiale, EasyJet a rÃ©vÃ©lÃ© que les donnÃ©es personnelles et les dÃ©tails de voyage de 9 millions de clients avaient Ã©tÃ© volÃ©s lors dâ€™une cyberattaque trÃ¨s sophistiquÃ©e. Au premier semestre 2021, les donnÃ©es personnelles de plus de 530 millions dâ€™utilisateurs de Facebook, de plus de 100 pays, ont Ã©tÃ© mises en vente en ligne. Quelques jours aprÃ¨s, 500 millions dâ€™utilisateurs de LinkedIn ont vu leurs donnÃ©es personnelles apparaÃ®tre sur des rÃ©seaux clandestins en ligne. Ces donnÃ©es comprenaient notamment des noms, des dates de naissance, des numÃ©ros de tÃ©lÃ©phone et des adresses email.Quel est le rapport avec N26 ? Bien quâ€™il nâ€™y ait pas dâ€™impact direct sur N26 ou sur la sÃ©curitÃ© de votre compte bancaire, les cybercriminels peuvent utiliser des informations, obtenues lors dâ€™attaques visant dâ€™autres entreprises, pour perpÃ©trer des attaques dâ€™hameÃ§onnage Ã  grande Ã©chelle.Lâ€™hameÃ§onnage est une technique utilisÃ©e pour obtenir des informations sensibles qui peuvent Ãªtre utilisÃ©es Ã  des fins frauduleuses. En se faisant passer pour des entitÃ©s de confiance, les escrocs parviennent Ã  manipuler les gens pour les amener Ã  partager leurs donnÃ©es personnelles. Ils y parviennent en ciblant les gens par le biais de canaux de communication numÃ©riques que nous utilisons tous au quotidien, tels que les emails, les SMS, les appels tÃ©lÃ©phoniques et les rÃ©seaux sociaux.En tant que banque digitale de plus en plus populaire, les clients de N26 ont Ã©tÃ© ciblÃ©s par des campagnes dâ€™hameÃ§onnage, au cours desquelles les pirates envoient des messages contenant souvent un lien vers des sites internet qui ressemblent beaucoup Ã  lâ€™espace client en ligne de N26. Bien quâ€™ils puissent Ãªtre crÃ©dibles Ã  premiÃ¨re vue, ces sites internet sont malveillants et ne sont en aucun cas liÃ©s Ã  N26. Dans certains cas, les pirates peuvent usurper notre code court envoyÃ© par SMS. Leurs messages peuvent alors apparaÃ®tre dans le mÃªme fil de discussion que les messages envoyÃ©s prÃ©cÃ©demment par N26. Nous vous demandons de rester vigilant et de nous contacter immÃ©diatement en cas de situation inhabituelle.Quelles sont les mesures prises par N26 Ã  ce sujet ? Pour garantir la sÃ©curitÃ© de votre compte, notre Ã©quipe de sÃ©curitÃ© surveille en permanence les attaques futures, afin de sâ€™assurer que les sites internet frauduleux sont dÃ©sactivÃ©s le plus rapidement possible.
Nous continuons Ã  prendre des prÃ©cautions pour protÃ©ger vos comptes et vos donnÃ©es personnelles. Toutefois, nous vous invitons Ã  prendre des mesures de sÃ©curitÃ© pour vous protÃ©ger. Si vous avez reÃ§u un message inhabituel, voici quelques Ã©lÃ©ments Ã  prendre en compte :Si vous avez reÃ§u un SMS dâ€™un prÃ©tendu reprÃ©sentant de N26, gardez toujours Ã  lâ€™esprit que nous ne vous contacterons jamais par ce moyen.Les SMS contenant un appel Ã  lâ€™action sont toujours malveillants. Nâ€™appuyez sur aucun lien et ne fournissez aucune donnÃ©e personnelle. Nous ne vous demanderons jamais de faire quoi que ce soit par SMS.Si vous avez des doutes sur les informations qui vous ont Ã©tÃ© communiquÃ©es ou si vous pensez avoir Ã©tÃ© redirigÃ© vers un site frauduleux, faites preuve de prudence. Si vous Ãªtes invitÃ© Ã  appeler un numÃ©ro ou Ã  envoyer un email Ã  une adresse email, vÃ©rifiez quâ€™il sâ€™agit bien des coordonnÃ©es dâ€™une entreprise lÃ©gitime.En cas de doute, faites une capture dâ€™Ã©cran du message et contactez notre Service Client via le Livechat de votre application N26, ou envoyez-la Ã  support@n26.com. Nous sommes toujours lÃ  pour vous aider !

title: Warum funktioniert meine Video-Verifizierung nicht?
content: Einige Tipps fÃ¼r eine erfolgreiche Video-Verifizierung:Die meisten Anrufe scheitern aufgrund einer schwachen Internetverbindung oder schlechter BildqualitÃ¤t (z.B. zu verschwommen oder unterbelichtet). Bitte fÃ¼hre den Anruf in einer hellen Umgebung durch, verwende ein Smartphone mit einer guten Kamera und stelle sicher, dass du eine schnelle Internetverbindung hast.Bitte gehe sicher, dass du die einzige Person im Video bist.Du musst in einem unserer unterstÃ¼tzten LÃ¤nder leben, um ein Konto bei uns erÃ¶ffnen zu kÃ¶nnen.Wir akzeptieren nur nationale Ausweise und ReisepÃ¤sse (FÃ¼hrerscheine oder Aufenthaltsgenehmigungen sind nicht zulÃ¤ssig). Stelle auÃŸerdem sicher, dass dein Ausweisdokument unbeschÃ¤digt ist.Sobald deine IdentitÃ¤tsprÃ¼fung abgeschlossen ist, benÃ¶tigst du noch einen Mindestbetrag auf deinem Konto, damit deine Karte automatisch produziert und geliefert wird. Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: How to download my personal data?
content: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. Weâ€™ve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and youâ€™re in complete control: go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. Â It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.Â As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.Â Â How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. Youâ€™ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure itâ€™s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content: If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you mayÂ open an account with us. We offer:The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.Accounts in â‚¬, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.Free shipping of your Mastercard or â‚¬25 for express.Foreign currency transfers with Wise (with the standard account).3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals in â‚¬ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).2 Spaces in addition to the main account.A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using Wise (on their website (new tab)) or using your local bank.For outgoing transfers to â‚¬ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-â‚¬ accounts, use Wise in the app.**Please note: Wise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: Les prÃ©lÃ¨vements automatiques SEPA peuvent-ils Ãªtre acceptÃ©s si le solde de mon compte est insuffisant ?
content:
Si votre compte ne dispose pas des fonds suffisants lors dâ€™un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique, nous devons refuser celui-ci. Nous vous facturons alors les frais de gestion correspondants, conformÃ©ment Ã  nos tarifs.Pour chaque prÃ©lÃ¨vement refusÃ©, nous vous facturons une somme forfaitaire deÂ 3 â‚¬. En outre, en cas de dÃ©couvert exceptionnel, nous appliquons un taux d'intÃ©rÃªt sur le dÃ©couvert de 8,9 %.Il nâ€™est pas possible de retarder un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique.Ã€ l'avenir, vous pouvez vÃ©rifier si vous Ãªtes Ã©ligible Ã  unÂ dÃ©couvert autorisÃ©Â sur votre application mobile (disponible uniquement en Allemagne et en Autriche).Bon Ã  savoir pour les pays en dehors de la zone euro : Si vous mettez en place un prÃ©lÃ¨vement automatique avec un marchand et quâ€™il est facturÃ© dans la devise locale de votre pays, le taux de change appliquÃ© (et donc le montant final dÃ©bitÃ© sur votre compte N26) est dÃ©fini et collectÃ© par la banque qui reÃ§oit votre paiement. 
Voici la liste des pays concernÃ©s : BulgarieCroatieDanemarkHongrieIslandeLiechtensteinNorvÃ¨gePologneRÃ©publique TchÃ¨queRoumanieSuÃ¨deSuisse

title: PSD2 - AutenticaciÃ³n Reforzada de Clientes
content:
Â¿QuÃ© es la AutenticaciÃ³n Reforzada de Clientes (SCA)? SCA actÃºa como capa de seguridad adicional para los clientes de N26, ya que proporciona dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n. Esta autenticaciÃ³n se basa en el uso de dos o mÃ¡s elemento de seguridad. Probablemente estÃ¡s familiarizado con el inicio de sesiÃ³n utilizando tu contraseÃ±a, pero con los dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n, vas a necesitar la confirmaciÃ³n desde el dispositivo vinculado o un cÃ³digo por SMS. Cuando inicies sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta de N26 desde la web app o un dispositivo no vinculado, recibirÃ¡s un notificaciÃ³n emergente en tu dispositivo vinculado o puedes solicitar un cÃ³digo SMS a tu nÃºmero registrado. Esto asegurarÃ¡ que solo tÃº puedes entrar en tu cuenta. Cuando inicies sesiÃ³n desde tu dispositivo vinculado, los dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n ya estÃ¡n funcionando, por lo tanto este proceso sigue siendo igual.
Â¿Por quÃ© se va a introducir la SCA?SCA se introduce como parte de la Directiva de Servicios de Pagos Europeos al que los bancos europeos deben acogerse. El objetivo de PSD2 es aumentar la seguridad de nuestros clientes, sus cuentas e informaciÃ³n. Puedes leer mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n acerca de esto en nuestro artÃ­culo sobre PSD2.

title: Bankdaten â€“ Deine N26 KontobestÃ¤tigung
content: Was ist eine KontobestÃ¤tigung?Eine KontobestÃ¤tigung â€“ auch Bankbescheinigung genannt â€“ ist ein Dokument, das dich als InhaberIn deines Bankkontos ausweist. Auf der KontobestÃ¤tigung sind dein Vor- und Zuname, dein Geburtsdatum und deine Bankdaten wie die IBAN und das Datum der KontoerÃ¶ffnung zu sehen.Auf Wunsch kann deine BankbestÃ¤tigung auch deinen aktuellen Kontostand und die Nummern deiner aktiven Karten auflisten. Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden werden diese Bankdaten teilweise mit Sternchen verdeckt.Wie beantrage ich meine KontobestÃ¤tigung?Klicke in der Web-App auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol* und wÃ¤hle Bankdaten herunterladen. Eine PDF-Datei wird automatisch erstellt.Â Wenn du eine KontobestÃ¤tigung inklusive deines aktuellen Kontostands und deiner Kartennummer(n) erhalten willst, klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*. Unter KontobestÃ¤tigung kannst du auswÃ¤hlen, ob du deinen aktuellen Kontostand und/oder die Kartennummer(n) deiner aktiven Karte(n) mit anzeigen lassen willst. Klicke dann auf Anfrage. Die PDF wird innerhalb von 24 Stunden unter Nachrichten von N26 (neuen Tab) in deiner App erscheinen.* Das Download-Symbol ist das Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil, links neben dem â€˜Button â€œGeld erhaltenâ€.

title: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
content: Was ist starke Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA)?SCA verbessert die Sicherheit aller N26 Kundenkonten, indem sie Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einfÃ¼hrt. Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login Ã¼ber zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. Wahrscheinlich bist du damit vertraut, zum Login nur dein persÃ¶nliches Passwort einzugeben. Um die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abzuschlieÃŸen, musst du zusÃ¤tzlich deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t oder durch einen SMS-Code bestÃ¤tigen.Wenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t in dein N26 Konto einloggst, wirst du aufgefordert, deinen Login-Versuch durch eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t zu bestÃ¤tigen. Alternativ kannst du einen SMS-Code anfordern, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.Wenn du dich vom verknÃ¼pften Handy in deine N26 App einloggst, findet die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung schon automatisch statt, sodass sich der Login-Prozess bei deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t nicht verÃ¤ndert.Mehr Informationen darÃ¼ber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?Warum wird Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung eingefÃ¼hrt?SCA wird im Rahmen der Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie PSD2 eingefÃ¼hrt, die fÃ¼r alle europÃ¤ischen Banken gilt. Mit PSD2 wird die Sicherheit der Daten und Kundenkonten erhÃ¶ht.Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber PSD2 in unserem Blogpost (neuen Tab).

title: Spazi Condivisi - Il beneficiario fidato
content: Il beneficiario fidato di uno Spazio Condiviso puÃ²:Trasferire denaro dai propri Spazi (inclusi gli Spazi Condivisi di cui Ã¨ partecipante) a uno Spazio Condiviso.Accedere e liberamente trasferire fondi presenti su uno Spazio Condiviso.Abbandonare uno Spazio Condiviso in qualunque momento.I trasferimenti tra un beneficiario fidato e uno Spazio Condiviso non hanno bisogno di essere autenticati tramite notifiche Pin e Push. I beneficiari possono facilmente trascinare denaro tramite app (mobile e web), cosÃ¬ come con gli Spazi non condivisi.PerchÃ© un proprietario o un partecipante deve essere identificato come beneficiario fidato?Le leggi bancarie europee regolano le modalitÃ  secondo cui un trasferimento bancario possa essere autorizzato.Nellâ€™ambito di queste leggi, la SCA (Strong Customer Authentication) definisce i requisiti per rendere i pagamenti online piÃ¹ sicuri.Unâ€™eccezione ai requisiti SCA puÃ² avvenire se un partecipante di uno Spazio Condiviso viene classificato come â€beneficiario fidatoâ€.Scopri di piÃ¹Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

title: Wie benutze ich meine Karte digital?
content: Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. Auf diese Weise kannst du mit deinem Handy bei Anbietern bezahlen, die diese Zahlungsmethode unterstÃ¼tzen:Logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein.Gehe zu Karten.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen und wÃ¤hle aus der Liste deiner Karten diejenige Karte aus, auf die du wartest.Tippe auf Zu Google Wallet hinzufÃ¼gen bzw. Zu Apple Pay hinzufÃ¼gen.Wie kann ich meine Karteninformationen in der N26 App sehen?Wenn du deine Karteninformationen benÃ¶tigst, aber deine N26 Karte momentan nicht dabei hast, kein Problem! N26 ermÃ¶glicht dir, deine kompletten Karteninformationen in der mobilen N26 App einzusehen, sofern deine Karte aktiviert und dein Handy verknÃ¼pft ist. Es ist ganz einfach:Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein.Tippe im Homescreen auf Karten.WÃ¤hle aus der Liste deiner Karte diejenige Karte aus, die du sehen willst.Tippe auf Karteninformationen.BestÃ¤tige mit deinem Fingerabdruck, deiner Face-ID oder deiner Handy-PIN.Deine kompletten Karteninformationen kannst du jetzt fÃ¼r 1 Minute sehen. Bitte beachte, dass du wÃ¤hrenddessen keine Screenshots machen kannst.

title: PSD2 - Autenticazione Forte del Cliente
content: Cosâ€™Ã¨ lâ€™Autenticazione Forte del Cliente (SCA)?Lâ€™Autenticazione Forte del Cliente (SCA) Ã¨ uno strumento che garantisce un ulteriore livello di sicurezza ai titolari di conto N26 attraverso lâ€™autenticazione a due fattori. Questa procedura si basa sullâ€™uso di due o piÃ¹ elementi di sicurezza. Hai giÃ  familiaritÃ  con la procedura di accesso al conto attraverso lâ€™inserimento della password personale. Con lâ€™autenticazione a due fattori avrai bisogno di confermare lâ€™accesso tramite un dispositivo associato (nuova tabella) oppure un codice che riceverai via sms.Â Â Â Quando eseguirai lâ€™accesso al tuo conto N26 dalla Webapp (nuova tabella) oppure da un dispositivo non associato, ti verrÃ  richiesto di confermare una notifica push sul tuo dispositivo associato. In alternativa, potrai richiedere la ricezione di un codice via sms sul numero di telefono registrato con noi e confermare lâ€™accesso al conto.Questa procedura garantisce che soltanto tu possa accedere al tuo conto N26.Quando esegui lâ€™accesso al conto N26 dal tuo dispositivo associato, lâ€™autenticazione a due fattori ha luogo automaticamente. SarÃ  sufficiente accedere utilizzando le tue credenziali.PerchÃ© si usa la SCA?La SCA Ã¨ una misura di sicurezza che rientra nella nuova direttiva sui pagamenti (nuova tabella)(PSD2)e si applica a tutte le banche europee. Lâ€™obiettivo del PSD2 Ã¨ rafforzare la tutela dei dati del clienti e la sicurezza dei loro conti. Domande frequenti.Non riesco ad accedere al mio conto. Come posso risolvere?Innanzitutto, aggiorna il sistema operativo del tuo smartphone allâ€™ultima versione disponibile.Â Se ancora non riesci ad accedere al conto ma hai accesso allâ€™indirizzo email associato al conto, resetta la tua password.Â Se non hai accesso al tuo indirizzo email, contattaci via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.Non riesco ad accedere al mio dispositivo associato. Come posso eseguire il login al mio conto?Se non puoi accedere al tuo smartphone associato ma puoi utilizzare il numero di telefono registrato, esegui lâ€™accesso al conto N26 e richiedi un codice di autenticazione. Ecco come:Esegui l'accesso dalla Webapp (nuova tabella);Seleziona Aiuto quando ti viene richiesto di confermare l'accesso tramite dispositivo associatoSeleziona Invia Codice SmsRicevuto il codice, inseriscilo nella Webapp.Una volta confermato l'accesso con il codice, avrai completato lâ€™autenticazione a due fattori e potrai associare il tuo nuovo dispositivo al tuo conto.Se non hai accesso al tuo numero registrato perchÃ© hai un nuovo numero oppure non sei piÃ¹ in possesso del telefono, contatta la nostra assistenza clienti via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.Cosa posso fare se il mio telefono non supporta lâ€™ultima versione dellâ€™app N26?Se hai un dispositivo che non supporta lâ€™ultima versione dellâ€™app, non potrai eseguire lâ€™accesso al conto attraverso la versione mobile dellâ€™app.Potrai utilizzare la versione web per visualizzare informazioni relative al tuo conto. Per accedere sarÃ  necessario confermare il tuo tentativo di accesso con un codice di verifica inviato via sms sul numero di telefono associato al tuo conto.Potrai continuare ad effettuare pagamenti e prelievi con la tua Mastercard. I bonifici potranno essere eseguiti solo dopo essere stati confermati tramite app.

title: What to do if my account may be compromised?
content:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).Â If youâ€™d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. Weâ€™ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that weâ€™ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if Iâ€™ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.Â What if Iâ€™ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.Â Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: How to create a password?
content: If you forgot your password or want to change it, selectÂ Forgot?Â in the app orÂ Forgot your password? (new tab)Â in theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â during login. Weâ€™ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a â€œpassphraseâ€ rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase â€œhard to guess, easy to rememberâ€. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, youâ€™ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: How to order my extra card?
content: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: â€œAlways losing things?â€ > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs â‚¬10 for standard shipping and â‚¬25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of â‚¬10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.â„¹ï¸ The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

title: What is Phishing?
content: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If youâ€™d like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. Weâ€™ll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an â€˜emlâ€™ file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above.Â Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we canâ€™t use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following:Â Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone.Â Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the â€œphone spoofingâ€ technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website thatâ€™s being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps theyâ€™re offering limited-time promotional deals. Itâ€™s important to note that just because â€œN26â€ is part of the URL, this doesnâ€™t necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect youâ€™re on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesnâ€™t, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.Â

title: Cosâ€™Ã¨ il phishing?
content: Il phishing Ã¨ un metodo semplice ed efficace che gli hacker utilizzano per indurre le persone a fornire dati sensibili. Una volta ottenute queste informazioni, possono utilizzarle per mettere in atto diversi tipi di frode assumendo lâ€™identitÃ  delle loro vittime. Se vuoi saperne di piÃ¹, clicca (nuova tabella) qui (nuova tabella) e leggi lâ€™articolo del nostro blog su come riconoscere ed evitare gli attacchi di phishing.Come segnalare email e messaggi sospettiNoi di N26 non ti invieremo mai messaggi SMS o email dai toni allarmanti che richiedono una tua azione immediata, per esempio accedere al tuo conto e condividere dati riservati. Non ti daremo mai un ultimatum, nÃ© ti chiederemo di autenticarti o di verificare i tuoi dati al di fuori dei nostri canali di comunicazione sicuri.Email sospetteSe ricevi unâ€™email sospetta, non cliccare su nessun link e non scaricare assolutamente gli allegati.Per aiutarci a segnalare ogni tentativo di truffa alle autoritÃ  competenti ti chiediamo di inoltrarci semplicemente lo scambio di email allâ€™indirizzo support@n26.com .Se possibile, ti chiederemo di salvare lâ€™email sospetta come file â€˜emlâ€™ e inviarcela. Con la maggior parte dei servizi di posta elettronica, le email vengono salvate automaticamente in questo formato, una volta scaricate. Mandandoci il messaggio in questo formato ci permetti di identificare la vera origine del messaggio sospetto e di riportarlo alle autoritÃ  competenti. Tuttavia, se non riesci a salvare lâ€™email in questo formato, non preoccuparti: inoltraci semplicemente lo scambio di email allâ€™indirizzo sopra menzionato. DopodichÃ©, cancella lâ€™email dalla tua posta in arrivo.Ricorda: se ci invii soltanto uno screenshot del messaggio, purtroppo non saremo in grado di intervenire.Â Messaggi di testo sospettiSe ricevi un SMS, non cliccare su nessun link e non fornire dati di nessun genere.Per aiutarci ad andare in fondo alla questione, ti chiediamo di fare quanto segue:Â fai uno screenshot del messaggio ricevuto e invialo a support@n26.comassicurati che lâ€™intero messaggio sia visibile, compreso il numero di telefono del mittente e la data/ora;dopo aver ricevuto una conferma da parte nostra che si tratta di un messaggio di phishing, blocca il numero di telefono;cancella il messaggio dal tuo cellulare.Â Telefonate sospetteSe ricevi una chiamata sospetta, che provenga o meno da un nostro numero di telefono, non fornire nessun dato personale, nÃ¨ relativo al tuo conto o alla carta ad esso associata.Ti ricordiamo che in alcuni casi, con la tecnica del â€œphone spoofingâ€, i truffatori sono in grado di camuffare il numero telefonico del mittente, facendolo apparire uguale a quello della banca.Per questo, se hai il sospetto di essere stato vittima di una truffa telefonica o hai fornito i tuoi dati personali, contatta subito il nostro supporto clienti a support@n26.com.Come segnalare un sito web contraffattoPrima o poi potresti ritrovarti su un sito web non legittimo, utilizzato impropriamente per sponsorizzare falsi servizi a nome di N26. Non Ã¨ da escludere che tu veda addirittura il nostro logo su alcune presunte pagine affiliate. In alcune di queste pagine potrebbero esserti offerti dei crediti o delle promozioni limitate nel tempo. Ti preghiamo di prestare la massima attenzione,Â  perchÃ© anche se â€œN26â€ appare nellâ€™indirizzo del sito, non vuol dire necessariamente che il sito web sia legittimo o nostro partner.Se sospetti di trovarti su un sito web fraudolento, ti consigliamo di seguire attentamente questi passaggi: :controlla la barra degli indirizzi e assicurati che lâ€™URL sia https://app.n26.com/login. In caso contrario, ti preghiamo di copiare lâ€™URL e riportalo immediatamente a support@n26.com.

title: Comment fonctionne Espaces ?
content: Espaces est une fonctionnalitÃ© des comptes premium qui vous permet de crÃ©er des sous-comptes pour mettre votre argent de cÃ´tÃ©, selon vos projets ou vos besoins. Vous pouvez personnaliser vos sous-comptes et dÃ©placer instantanÃ©ment votre argent depuis votre compte courant vers un de vos sous-comptes, et vice-versa, depuis lâ€™application mobile etÂ internet (nouvel onglet).En plus de votre compte courant (ou espace principal), vous pouvez crÃ©er et supprimer des espaces aussi souvent que vous le souhaitez selon ces limites : jusquâ€™Ã  10 espaces supplÃ©mentaires pour les utilisateurs N26 You, N26 Smart et N26 Metal.Les relevÃ©s de votre compte courant incluront Ã©galement les transactions entrantes ou sortantes depuis/vers vos sous-comptes.Vous avez accÃ¨s Ã  la liste de transactions de chacun de vos espaces tout comme celle de votre compte principal.Vous pouvez uniquement utiliser le solde de votre compte courant pour payer avec votre Mastercard N26. Si vous souhaitez utiliser lâ€™argent disponible sur lâ€™un de vos sous-comptes, vous devez dâ€™abord le transfÃ©rer vers votre compte courant.Seul votre compte principal peut Ãªtre Ã Â dÃ©couvertÂ (dans les pays Ã©ligibles). Le solde de vos sous-comptes ne peut pas Ãªtre nÃ©gatif. Vous pouvez seulement transfÃ©rer lâ€™argent qui est disponible sur votre sous-compte.Le virement se fait en maintenant la pression et en dÃ©plaÃ§ant le doigt vers le sous-compte de destination. Une fois le montant confirmÃ© avec votre code de validation, le solde du compte est instantanÃ©ment mis Ã  jour.Vous pouvez verrouiller ou dÃ©verrouiller un sous-compte directement depuis votre application mobile ou web. Il vous faudra pour cela utiliser votre code de validation. Si un sous-compte est verrouillÃ©, vous pouvez toujours ajouter de l'argent sur celui-ci. Si vous avez besoin de retirer de l'argent depuis un sous-compte verrouillÃ©, il faudra dans un premier temps le dÃ©verrouiller.Vous pouvez masquer le solde de votre espace du solde total de votre compte. Il vous suffit dâ€™aller dans votre espace, puis de cliquer sur les trois points en haut Ã  droite de votre application et de sÃ©lectionner â€œMasquer le solde de lâ€™espaceâ€.Vous pouvez dÃ©sormais bloquer les virements depuis un Espace en particulier. Rendez-vous dans les paramÃ¨tres de cet Espace, cliquez sur 'Bloquer les virements vers le compte courant ou les autres espaces' et entrez votre code PIN de validation.Vous pouvez aussi maintenant supprimer un Espace, mÃªme avec une carte associÃ©e, depuis les paramÃ¨tres de cet Espace.Nous avons rÃ©cemment mis en place une nouvelle fonctionnalitÃ© : les rÃ¨gles automatiques. Cette fonctionnalitÃ© dâ€™Espaces vous permet de mettre en place des virements automatiques entre votre compte principal et vos espaces.Ã‰pargner avec Â« Les Arrondis Â»La fonctionnalitÃ© Â« Arrondis Â» permet aux clients premium dâ€™arrondir Ã  lâ€™euro supÃ©rieur toutes les transactions par carte. La diffÃ©rence est automatiquement versÃ©e sur le sous-compte de leur choix.Les arrondis Ã  lâ€™euro supÃ©rieur ne vous mettront pas Ã  dÃ©couvert. Si le solde de votre compte nâ€™est pas suffisant pour couvrir lâ€™arrondi, celui-ci nâ€™aura pas lieu.Vous ne pouvez activer la fonctionnalitÃ© Â« ArrondisÂ» quâ€™une seule fois dans un des sous-comptes de votre choix, et non plusieurs fois en mÃªme temps.Vous pouvez annuler cette fonctionnalitÃ© Ã  tout moment.Si vous clÃ´turez un sous-compte dans lequel sont versÃ©es les sommes arrondies, la fonctionnalitÃ© sera automatiquement dÃ©sactivÃ©e jusquâ€™Ã  ce que vous lâ€™activiez de nouveau.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content: YourÂ N26 You (new tab)Â andÂ N26 Metal (new tab)Â membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: Come cambiare il mio PIN di conferma?
content: Istruzioni passo per passo:iPhoneAndroidPasso 1Accedi alla tua app N26 e vai a Il mio conto, nell'angolo in altro a destraPasso 2Scorri in basso e seleziona SicurezzaPasso 3Vai su Cambia PIN di ConfermaPasso 4Inserisci il token della tua carta: il numero di 10 cifre presente sulla tua cartaPasso 5Crea e salva il tuo PIN di ConfermaPasso 1Accedi alla tua app N26 e vai a Il mio conto, nell'angolo in altro a destraPasso 2Scorri in basso e seleziona SicurezzaPasso 3Vai su Cambia PIN di ConfermaPasso 4Inserisci il token della tua carta: il numero di 10 cifre presente sulla tua cartaPasso 5Crea e salva il tuo PIN di ConfermaIl PIN di conferma Ã¨ quello che usi per confermare i bonifici o qualsiasi altra operazione che esegui dall'app. Se non sai quale sia, il tuo PIN di conferma Ã¨ quello che crei quando associ il tuo smartphone (nuova tabella) per la prima volta.Se l'hai dimenticato o lo vuoi cambiare, puoi farlo quando vuoi tramite l'app:Accedi a ğŸ‘¤ Il mio conto, poi Sicurezza.Seleziona Cambiare il PIN di conferma.Inserisci il token della tua carta (si tratta di un numero di 10 cifre che appare sotto il tuo nome sul fronte della tua carta; o sul retro, sulle carte N26 Smart, You e Metal).Crea e conferma il tuo nuovo PIN di conferma.Se inserisci il PIN di conferma in modo errato per 6 volte di seguito, dovrai ripristinarlo prima di riprovare.Per ragioni di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN che contengano elementi della tua data di nascita, indirizzo o altre combinazioni con cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1111, 1234 o 4321). Se il numero scelto non Ã¨ valido, ti preghiamo di riprovare con una combinazione diversa.Ricorda che il tuo PIN di conferma non Ã¨ lo stesso del codice PIN della tua carta, (nuova tabella) ma se vuoi puoi scegliere lo stesso PIN per entrambi.

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making aÂ temporary limitationÂ to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet ourÂ requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

title: Wie kann ich eine N26 Versicherung abschlieÃŸen?
content: Mit der neuen On-Demand-Versicherung von N26 kÃ¶nnen alle unsere Kunden ihr Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop, Smartwatch und andere elektronische GerÃ¤te gegen Diebstahl, Einbruch, Raub, versehentliche SchÃ¤den und WasserschÃ¤den versichern lassen. Du kannst die Versicherung direkt in deiner N26 App oder Web-App (neuen Tab) abschlieÃŸen und jederzeit auf Wunsch wieder kÃ¼ndigen â€“ ganz ohne lÃ¤stigen Papierkram.Wie funktioniert N26 Versicherung?Wenn du die Versicherung abschlieÃŸen mÃ¶chtest, melde dich einfach in deiner N26 App oder Web-App an, gehe auf Entdecken und klicke auf das dort angezeigte Banner "Versicherung".Du wirst anschlieÃŸend aufgefordert, ein paar Details zu deinem EndgerÃ¤t einzugeben. WÃ¤hle die monatliche oder jÃ¤hrliche Zahlungsoption aus und bestÃ¤tige die Anfrage. Nach Abschluss der Versicherungspolice ist die Versicherung fÃ¼r dein Smartphone ab dem Folgetag aktiv und du kannst sie jederzeit Ã¼ber deine N26 App oder deine Web-App (neuen Tab) kÃ¼ndigen.Wie kann ich einen Versicherungsanspruch geltend machen?Du kannst einen Versicherungsanspruch Ã¼ber das Onlineportal von Simplesurance (neuen Tab) geltend machen. Dazu musst du dich mit deiner Zertifikatsnummer und Zertifikats-PIN anmelden. Diese findest du auf deinem Versicherungszertifikat, das du via Nachrichten von N26 erhalten hast.Jeder Kunde ist berechtigt, maximal zwei AnsprÃ¼che pro Jahr einzureichen. DarÃ¼ber hinaus kannst du dich jederzeit an support@simplesurance.de wenden, wenn du Informationen zu deinem Versicherungsschein oder einem gemeldeten Schadensfall benÃ¶tigst.Bin ich dazu berechtigt?Die N26 Versicherung ist fÃ¼r alle unsere Kunden verfÃ¼gbar. N26 Metal Kunden kÃ¶nnen lediglich nicht ihr Handy versichern, da sie bereits im Rahmen ihrer Metal-Mitgliedschaft eine Handyversicherung haben. Bitte vergewissere dich, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast. N26 Versicherung ist derzeit fÃ¼r Kunden in Ã–sterreich, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Deutschland erhÃ¤ltlich.Diese Versicherung gilt nicht fÃ¼r GerÃ¤te, die auÃŸerhalb Europas gekauft werden.

title: Where can I use my Maestro card?
content: Only available for customers with our German, Austrian or Dutch terms & conditionsLetâ€™s get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro canâ€™t be used for online purchases and itâ€™s not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).You can't use it for Apple Pay or Google Pay.But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. EachÂ ATM transactionÂ using your Maestro is â‚¬2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals). You canÂ order your MaestroÂ card directly in the app.If youâ€™re having issues using your Maestro, first check that yourÂ card settingsÂ are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and weâ€™ll look into it for you.

title: Come prelevare e depositare contanti con CASH26
content:
Disponibile per i conti aperti in Spagna, Germania, Austria, Italia e Grecia.L'unica cosa di cui hai bisogno Ã¨ avere il tuo smartphone collegato. Apri la mappa di CASH26 nell'app e ingrandiscila per trovare il negozio piÃ¹ vicino. Una volta in negozio, crea un codice a barre CASH26 e mostralo alla persona alla cassa dallo schermo del tuo smartphone:Come prelevare contanti senza carta con CASH26?Vai alla alla sezione Carte della tua app N26 e seleziona CASH26 > Prelievo.Scegli l'importo che desideri prelevare (massimo 200 â‚¬ a prelievo e 900 â‚¬ ogni 24 ore).Inserisci il tuo PIN di conferma (nuova tabella) e conferma la transazione nella notifica.Â Mostra il codice a barre sullo schermo del tuo smartphone. Un addetto lo scansionerÃ  e ti consegnerÃ  i contanti.Come depositare contanti sul mio conto N26?Vai alla sezione Carte della tua app N26 e, seleziona CASH26 > Deposito.Scegli l'importo che desideri depositare (minimo 50Â â‚¬).Inserisci il tuo PIN di conferma (nuova tabella) e conferma la transazione nella notifica.Â Mostra il codice a barre sullo schermo del tuo smartphone alla persona alla cassa in modo che possa scansionarlo e consegna i contanti. Possono volerci fino a 10 minuti prima che il deposito sia visibile nel saldo del tuo conto nell'app N26.Importante!Il codice a barre ha una durata di soli 10 minuti. Se non lo usi in tempo, scadrÃ  e dovrai generarne uno nuovo.Â Se sbagli l'importo, puoi cancellarlo facendo clic sull'icona del cestino in alto a destra (o lasciarlo scadere) e generarne uno nuovo.Non Ã¨ necessario fare acquisti in negozio per depositare o prelevare denaro.I clienti con IBAN Italiano posso prelevare e depositare contanti per un massimo di 2000â‚¬ a settimana.
Leggi questo articolo (nuova tabella) per saperne di piÃ¹ sui dettagli e i limiti di CASH26.Domande frequenti su CASH26
PerchÃ© non trovo punti CASH26 sulla mappa?Prima di tutto, verifica di aver accettato e attivato la geolocalizzazione della tua app N26. Se non vedessi ancora punti CASH26 vicino a te sulla mappa, probabilmente significa che non ce ne sono ancora nella tua zona. Ti consigliamo di riprovare presto, in quanto lavoriamo costantemente per aggiungere nuovi punti vendita convenzionati.Posso depositare un assegno sul mio conto?No, non accettiamo assegni. Ci sono tuttavia molti altri metodi per ricaricare il tuo conto come i bonifici SEPA, lâ€™accredito dello stipendio, le carte di debito e credito, e molto altro ancora. Dai unâ€™occhiata a "Come ricaricare il mio conto N26 (nuova tabella)" per saperne di piÃ¹.
Posso depositare o prelevare contanti in tabaccheria o al bancomat?No, non Ã¨ ancora possibile depositare e prelevare contanti in tabaccheria nÃ¨ negli sportelli ATM, ma puoi farlo in uno dei nostri punti vendita CASH26 che sono piÃ¹ di 1900 in tutta Italia.Puoi controllare il punto CASH26 piÃ¹ vicino a te nella sezione Carte > CASH26 della tua app.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.Â Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap â€œAdd moneyâ€Select â€œCard transferâ€Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per top-up, for a maximum of 450â‚¬ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap â€œAdd moneyâ€Select â€œApple Payâ€ or â€œGoogle Payâ€Choose an amountÂ Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipient), some details like the recipientâ€™s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.Â You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesnâ€™t delete your transaction history with them

title: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
content: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (â€œtappingâ€ your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:Â Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content: YourÂ N26 You (new tab)Â andÂ N26 Metal (new tab)Â membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

title: Was ist eine SicherheitsfuÃŸzeile und warum haben wir eine solche eingefÃ¼gt?
content: Eine SicherheitsfuÃŸzeile ist eine personalisierte Nachricht, die am Ende von E-Mails und digitalen Dokumenten eingefÃ¼gt wird und als Echtheitssiegel dienen soll.Durch das HinzufÃ¼gen deines vollstÃ¤ndigen Namens am Ende jeder E-Mail mÃ¶chten wir dir helfen, zwischen legitimen E-Mails von N26 und Phishing-E-Mails von BetrÃ¼gern zu unterscheiden.Â Auch wenn eine SicherheitsfuÃŸzeile nicht eindeutig beweisen kann, dass eine E-Mail von einer verifizierten Quelle stammt, trÃ¤gt sie dazu bei, das Risiko von Deceptive Pishing â€“ der hÃ¤ufigsten Art von Phishing-Angriffen â€“ zu verringern.Was ist Deceptive Phishing?Deceptive Phishing ist der illegale Versand von generischen Phishing-E-Mails an eine groÃŸe Anzahl unbekannter Personen mit dem Ziel, unter VortÃ¤uschung falscher Angaben an vertrauliche Informationen zu gelangen.Wie wird dies erreicht?Â BetrÃ¼ger kontaktieren ihre Zielpersonen unter dem Vorwand, fÃ¼r renommierte Unternehmen zu arbeiten. Den Zielpersonen wird dann mit Markenbildern, zeitkritischen Szenarien und irrefÃ¼hrender Sprache ein falsches GefÃ¼hl der Sicherheit vorgegaukelt. Sobald sie an der Angel hÃ¤ngen, versuchen die BetrÃ¼ger, ihre Opfer dahingehend zu manipulieren, dass sie auf ihre Forderungen eingehen.Wie kannst du dich schÃ¼tzen?Achte besonders auf E-Mails, die du von Banken, Kunden, Arbeitgebern usw. erhÃ¤ltst. Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, etwas zu unternehmen, handele nie aus einem Impuls heraus, sondern Ã¼berlege immer genau, bevor du handelst.Â Wenn du das GefÃ¼hl hast, dass etwas nicht stimmt, solltest du dieses GefÃ¼hl Ernst nehmen. Achte auf Rechtschreib- und Grammatikfehler, fahre mit dem Mauszeiger Ã¼ber versteckte URLs (klicke nicht darauf), Ã¼berprÃ¼fe die Absenderangaben und informiere dich genauer darÃ¼ber â€“ ein schneller Online-Check kann dir helfen, die IdentitÃ¤t eines Absenders zu verifizieren.Wenn du eine verdÃ¤chtige E-Mail, einen verdÃ¤chtigen Smartphone-Anruf und/oder eine verdÃ¤chtige SMS im Namen von N26 erhalten hast, leite dein Anliegen an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com weiter. Wenn du Fragen zu deinem Konto klÃ¤ren mÃ¶chtest, kannst du Ã¼ber unsere mobile App mit uns chatten.Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber:Wie du verdÃ¤chtige Phishing-Angriffe meldest (neuen Tab)Wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und verhindern kannst (neuen Tab)So schÃ¼tzt du dich vor Social Engineering (neuen Tab)

title: Wie kann ich meine IdentitÃ¤t schÃ¼tzen?
content: Um deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu schÃ¼tzen und deren Missbrauch zu vermeiden, beachte bitte Folgendes:Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine IdentitÃ¤t im Namen anderer Personen oder Unternehmen zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen. Dazu gehÃ¶ren ÃœberprÃ¼fungen fÃ¼r WohnungsmietvertrÃ¤ge, Kreditvergaben oder Stellenangebote (einschlieÃŸlich Stellen bei N26). FÃ¼hre den Verifizierungsprozess nur durch, wenn du ein N26 Bankkonto fÃ¼r dich selbst erÃ¶ffnen mÃ¶chtest.Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du allein deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen kÃ¶nnen.Â Erstelle niemals ein N26 Bankkonto mit einer vordefinierten E-Mail-Adresse und einem vordefinierten Passwort. Wenn du von anderen Stellen erhaltene Anmeldedaten verwendest, kÃ¶nnen diese dazu verwendet werden, um an deine persÃ¶nlichen und rechtlichen Informationen zu gelangen. Logge dich auch nie in ein N26 Konto ein, das nicht deines ist.Sende deinen Ausweis oder Reisepass nicht an unbekannte oder nicht Ã¼berprÃ¼fte EmpfÃ¤nger.Es kann sein, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen, wenn deine Transaktion einer RoutineprÃ¼fungÂ unterzogen wird.Â Sende nur gÃ¼ltige Unterlagen an verifizierte N26 E-Mailadressen.Wir werden dich auÃŸerhalb der N26 App niemals nach deinem Benutzernamen, Passwort oder PIN-Code fragen.Â Stelle diese Informationen niemals auf einer externen Website oder App zur VerfÃ¼gung, auch wenn sie N26 Ã¤hnelt.Solltest du jemals Zweifel haben, eine verdÃ¤chtige Anfrage von einem Dritten erhalten, oder vermuten, dass dein N26 Login missbraucht worden sein kÃ¶nnte, zÃ¶gere bitte nicht damit, uns zu kontaktieren.

title: Posso aprire un conto se vivo al di fuori della zona euro?
content: Se vivi in Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, Norvegia, Liechtenstein, Svizzera o Islanda puoi aprire un conto (nuova tabella) con noi. Per bonifici verso conti non in euro, puoi usare Wise nellâ€™app.Nota: Wise non Ã¨ disponibile per conti N26 Business (sono permessi bonifici SEPA in euro)Â  Â  Â  Â  Â
