title: Come posso creare e modificare bonifici periodici?
content: Quando effettui un bonifico dall'app mobile N26 o dalla Webapp (nuova tabella), hai la possibilitÃ  di creare un bonifico periodico.Ogni volta che completerai un bonifico in uscita, ti verrÃ  offerta l'opzione di "Salvare come bonifico programmato". Se selezionerai questa opzione, potrai inviare il bonifico allo stesso beneficiario periodicamente. Nella schermata successiva, inoltre, potrai scegliere la frequenza dell'invio, la data di inizio e di fine dell'operazione. Ecco come puoi visualizzare e impostare i bonifici periodici nell'app mobile N26:Accedi all'app N26 e apri la tua lista dei movimentiClicca sui tre puntini in alto a destra per Android, o sulle tre lineette orizzontali i per iOS.Seleziona "Prossimi pagamenti"Qui potrai controllare i bonifici periodici esistenti o crearne uno nuovo In questo menu Ã¨ possibile annullare e / o modificare i dettagli di tali transazioni. Per cancellare un bonifico periodico, trascinalo semplicemente fino all'icona del cestino. â„¹ï¸ Â Ricorda che, nel caso in cui un trasferimento periodico fallisca per insufficienza di fondi, non effettueremo nuovamente il bonifico, ma dovrai effettuare il bonifico manualmente.

title: Was sind Shared Spaces?
content: Mit Shared Spaces kannst du ganz einfach Geld mit anderen N26 Nutzern teilen und es gemeinsam nutzen. Ob ihr einen gemeinsamen Urlaub plant, Rechnungen teilen wollt oder ein Geburtstagsgeschenk fÃ¼r eure Liebsten organisieren mÃ¶chtet - mit diesen Unterkonten ist es mÃ¶glich.Premium-Kunden (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You oder N26 Business Metal) kÃ¶nnen einen Shared Space erstellen und andere Teilnehmer dazu einladen.Alle N26 Nutzer kÃ¶nnen teilnehmen, unabhÃ¤ngig von ihren Kontotypen.Dem Besitzer gehÃ¶ren alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space.Der Besitzer kann bis zu 10 Teilnehmer zu einem Space einladen und entfernen.Wie auch bei unseren anderen Spaces, haben Shared Spaces keine eigene IBAN oder Bankkarte.

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of theÂ delivery and accept the N26 MetalÂ T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering yourÂ Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If youâ€™re already a N26 You member, you donâ€™t have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipientâ€,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.Youâ€™ll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent youâ€™ll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select â€œSend Moneyâ€ then choose â€œBank Transferâ€. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content: If your balance canâ€™t cover a direct debit* when itâ€™s due, itâ€™ll bounce and youâ€™ll be charged aÂ â‚¬3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. Itâ€™s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether youâ€™re eligible for anÂ OverdraftÂ directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9.

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipient), some details like the recipientâ€™s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.Â You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesnâ€™t delete your transaction history with them

title: Come ottenere il mio PIN?
content: Innanzitutto, bisogna sapere che con N26 si hanno due codici PIN diversi: uno Ã¨ il PIN di conferma e l'altro il PIN della carta. Ricorda: sei tu a creare entrambi.Il PIN di conferma (nuova tabella) deve essere inserito per confermare tutte le azioni eseguite all'interno dell'app, ad esempio bonifici, modifiche della password, CASH26, ecc. Crei questo PIN nell'app quando associ il tuo smartphone per la prima volta.Puoi modificarlo andando su Il mio conto > Sicurezza > Cambia il PIN di conferma.Il PIN della carta (nuova tabella) viene utilizzato per effettuare prelievi o pagare con la carta nei negozi. Puoi impostarlo tramite l'app non appena ricevi e attivi la tua carta N26.Puoi modificarlo andando su Carte > Impostazioni della carta > Reimposta il PIN. Dopo aver impostato il tuo nuovo codice PIN, dovrai prima effettuare un prelievo ATM affinchÃ© la modifica del PIN venga registrata (come quando attivi la tua carta per la prima volta).Importante:Non ti invieremo mai un PIN tramite posta o in nessuno dei nostri canali di comunicazione. Sei la sola persona che dovrebbe conoscere i tuoi PIN.Per ragioni di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN che contengano elementi della tua data di nascita, indirizzo o altre combinazioni con cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1994, 1331 o 1234). Se il numero scelto non Ã¨ valido, ti preghiamo di riprovare con una combinazione diversa.Per ulteriori dettagli su questi PIN, dai un'occhiata agli altri articoli del Support Center sull'argomento tramite i link sopra indicati.

title: How long does a bank transfer take?
content: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.Â Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. Whatâ€™s a â€œbanking dayâ€?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasnâ€™t arrived â€” where is it?So what if youâ€™ve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasnâ€™t come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we canâ€™t investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

title: Was ist N26 Business Metal?
content: VerfÃ¼gbar in Ã–sterreich, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Schweden.N26 Business Metal 16,90 â‚¬ pro Monat und ist fÃ¼r SelbststÃ¤ndige und Freiberufler gedacht, die in eigenem Namen tÃ¤tig sind. Das bedeutet, dass auf dem Konto oder der Karte kein Firmenname stehen kann.Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: WÃ¤hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fÃ¼nf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.ZusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte!ZusÃ¤tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle Ã¼ber deine N26 App eine zusÃ¤tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 Metal Mastercard online sowie in GeschÃ¤ften, vermeide versteckte BankgebÃ¼hren und profitiere von gebÃ¼hrenfreien AuslandsÃ¼berweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst darÃ¼ber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit gebÃ¼hrenfrei Bargeld in jeder WÃ¤hrung abheben.Partnerangebote (neuen Tab): Profitiere von Premium-Partnerangeboten und Rabatten von renommierten MarkenVersicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an persÃ¶nlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: RÃ¼ckerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, fÃ¼r Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer FlugverspÃ¤tung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer VerspÃ¤tung des aufgegebenen GepÃ¤cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten fÃ¼r medizinische RÃ¼cktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erhÃ¤ltst eine Versicherung fÃ¼r Such- und RettungsmaÃŸnahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei UnfÃ¤llen wÃ¤hrend einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz fÃ¼r SchÃ¤den oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Es ist noch nicht mÃ¶glich, zwischen Privat- und GeschÃ¤ftskonten zu wechseln. Umso wichtiger ist es, zu wissen, ob N26 Business Metal das Richtige fÃ¼r dich (neuen Tab) ist:Das N26 Business Metal Konto ist fÃ¼r SelbstÃ¤ndige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.Das Konto kostet 16,90 â‚¬ pro Monat. Das Premium-Konto beinhaltet: Ein Allianz-Versicherungspaket sowie gebÃ¼hrenfreie Abhebungen an Geldautomaten in FremdwÃ¤hrungen.Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur fÃ¼r den geschÃ¤ftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt. Du erhÃ¤ltst monatlich 0,5% Cashback auf alle mit der Karte getÃ¤tigten Zahlungen. Der Vorgang erfolgt am 15. des Folgemonats sowie aller darauffolgenden Monate und es dauert bis zu 7 Tage, bis er auf deinem Kontoauszug erscheint.Es ist derzeit nicht mÃ¶glich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu fÃ¼hren. Wenn du also auch eine Karte fÃ¼r private Ausgaben benÃ¶tigst, empfehlen wir dir, eine Maestrocard zu bestellen (erhÃ¤ltlich in Deutschland und Ã–sterreich).Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrung sind mit N26 Business Metal nicht mÃ¶glich.Du kannst direkt bei der Anmeldung Business Metal auswÃ¤hlen oder von einem existierenden N26 Business Konto upgraden.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und gehÃ¶rt zur Allianz Group.

title: Bank documentsâ€”a guide to what's available
content: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reasonâ€”you can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and theyâ€™re perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Hereâ€™s how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening andâ€”if you wishâ€”it can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Hereâ€™s how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees youâ€™ve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. Youâ€™ll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipientâ€™s full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmationâ€”the PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (RelevÃ© d'IdentitÃ© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank informationâ€”full name, legal address, IBAN and BICâ€”specific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the â€˜Add moneyâ€™ button.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATMâ€™s nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A â‚¬2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (weâ€™ll remind you via push message when youâ€™re running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we canâ€™t reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, thereâ€™s a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A â‚¬2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2â‚¬.

title: How to file a complaint?
content: Looking for Support or have a Question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a ComplaintWeâ€™re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will investigate your complaint in full, and provide our findings and final response via email. Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Spanish reclamaciones.es@n26.com (new tab), or reclamaciones@n26.com (new tab) if you have a German (DE) IBAN.Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our customer support team (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.Â If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarized power of attorney form.In exceptional cases where you do not have access to send an email, we recommend reviewing your account terms and conditions or List of Prices to find the appropriate address for written correspondence. Our German postal address is:Â N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWeâ€™ll contact you via email to confirm that weâ€™ve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint Handling TimesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within one month. For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business DaysÂ Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar DaysÂ United Kingdom - 56 Calendar DaysÂ Spain - 60 Calendar DaysÂ Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties.Â Customers with a Spanish (ES) IBAN can also contact the following:Banco de EspaÃ±a - Departamento de Conducta de Mercado y Reclamaciones located on Calle AlcalÃ¡ 48, 28014 MadridCustomers with a German (DE) IBAN can also contact the following:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht â€“ BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)Applicable LegislationThe applicable Spanish legislation related to customer rights and transparency regulations is available on the official website of the Bank of Spain (new tab).Rulebook:Reglamento para la defensa del Cliente de N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en EspaÃ±a. (new tab)

title: How to rent a car with your N26 card?
content:
In order to rent a car, the main driver is normally required to be a credit card holder, but recently an increasing number of car rental companies have been accepting debit cards due to their growing usage.As a result, our N26 debit card enables you to rent cars at a great number of companies. Here youâ€™ll find some of the agencies that currently accept debit cards:
AlamoAvisCentaurEnterpriseEuropcarFireflyJoy rentLocautoGreaterSicilyByCarThrifty car rentalBefore renting a vehicle, we suggest you contact the company: conditions for the rental depend on the single agencies so requirements may vary locally and nationally.We also recommend checking if the agency accepts debit cards when you reserve the car as well as when you collect it, and whether they require the card to have embossed numbers.Please also consider that:in case an unexpected or unjustified amount is charged, youâ€™ll first need to contact and possibly start a dispute with the agency. Only if the dispute has a negative outcome, weâ€™ll be able to offer our assistance to start a new dispute via Mastercard.the security deposit will be charged (and not authorized, as with credit cards). The deposit will then be credited back to your account after returning the car and if no damage is reported.

title: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
content: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (â€œtappingâ€ your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:Â Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen.

title: Kann ich die N26 App auf mein Smartphone herunterladen?
content: Jede App-Version kann ab VerÃ¶ffentlichung 180 Tage lang verwendet werden. Innerhalb dieses Zeitraums werden neuere Versionen zur VerfÃ¼gung gestellt. Bitte fÃ¼hre immer ein Upgrade auf die jeweils neueste Version durch, um stets von einem optimalen Kundenerlebnis zu profitieren. Die neueste Version der N26 App kannst du im AppleÂ App Store (neuen Tab)Â oder imÂ Google Play Store (neuen Tab)Â herunterladen.Bitte beachte, dass es fÃ¼r alle Smartphones Mindestanforderungen gibt, um eine ordnungsgemÃ¤ÃŸe Nutzung zu gewÃ¤hrleisten. Diese Anforderungen sind unten aufgelistet:iPhone:Modell 5s und neueriOS 12 und hÃ¶herDeine iOS-Version kannst du unter Einstellungen > Allgemein > InfoAndroid:Android 6.0 oder hÃ¶her. Du findest deine Android-Version unter Einstellungen > Ãœber dein GerÃ¤tNative UnterstÃ¼tzung fÃ¼r Google ServicesDu willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen?
