title: PerchÃ© devo aggiornare le mie informazioni personali?
content:
A partire dalla metÃ  di agosto 2022, contatteremo i nostri clienti residenti in Italia e possessori di un conto N26 con Iban italiano, con lo scopo di verificare e mantenere aggiornati le loro informazioni personali.In qualitÃ  di banca, siamo tenuti per legge a mantenere le informazioni personali dei nostri clienti corrette e aggiornate, con l'obiettivo di prevenire l'utilizzo del sistema finanziario a fini di riciclaggio del denaro e finanziamento del terrorismo.Â Questo processo prevede la verifica e lâ€™aggiornamento periodico dei dati personali e la compilazione di un questionario di adeguata verifica, che include informazioni aggiuntive di carattere finanziario sui nostri clienti.Â Quali informazioni devo aggiornare?Quando riceverai la nostra comunicazione in merito, effettuando il Login alla tua app N26, verrai immediatamente indirizzato al processo di aggiornamento delle tue informazioni personali.Â Prima di procedere, assicurati di aver aggiornato lâ€™app allâ€™ultima versione disponibile. Lâ€™operazione puÃ² essere effettuata solo tramite lâ€™app associata al tuo smartphone (non verrÃ  visualizzata al tuo accesso dalla WebApp).Come primo passaggio ti verrÃ  chiesto di verificare e confermare i tuoi dati personali:Nome e cognomeLuogo e data di nascitaNazionalitÃ Sesso anagraficoCodice FiscaleNel passaggio successivo, dovrai quindi convalidare il tuo indirizzo di residenza e il tuo indirizzo di domicilio, se diverso.Â Come ultimo passaggio, ti verrÃ  richiesta la compilazione del questionario di adeguata verifica, al fine di assicurare lâ€™integrazione e lâ€™aggiornamento di informazioni rilevanti richieste dalla normativa bancaria. Si tratta di una procedura veloce, lâ€™operazione ti richiederÃ  solo qualche minuto.Ti ricordiamo che, ai sensi della normativa in vigore, l'aggiornamento dei tuoi dati e il questionario dovranno essere completati anche se le tue informazioni sono rimaste invariate.Il trattamento dei tuoi dati, inoltre, Ã¨ soggetto al regolamento europeo in materia di protezione dei dati e della privacy (GDPR). Puoi trovare piÃ¹ informazioni sulla nostra politica di privacy. (nuova tabella)Cosâ€™Ã¨ il questionario di adeguata verifica?La normativa antiriciclaggio di cui al D.Lgs 231/2007 prevede che la banca sia tenuta a raccogliere regolarmente informazioni aggiornate sui propri clienti, con l'obiettivo di prevenire l'utilizzo del sistema finanziario a fini di riciclaggio e finanziamento del terrorismo.Â  e quale condizione per mantenere i rapporti e le operazioni tra i clienti e la banca.Per questo, ti sottoporremo un breve questionario,Â  allâ€™interno della tua app N26, dove ti chiederemo di rispondere ad una serie di domande riguardanti il tuo stato patrimoniale, il tuo attuale impiego, lâ€™origine dei fondi presenti sul tuo conto, il tuo reddito netto e lâ€™uso che fai del tuo conto N26.Â Verificheremo i dati da te inseriti e, se necessario, ti contatteremo in un secondo momento. Per questo, assicurati di avere la tua app aggiornata allâ€™ultima versione disponibile e di monitorare sempre le comunicazioni in arrivo nei "Messaggi da N26" dalla sezione "Supporto" della tua app.Cosa succede se non completo la procedura come richiesto?Ti invitiamo a compilare al piÃ¹ presto lâ€™operazione, cosÃ¬ da poter continuare ad avere pieno accesso a tutte le funzionalitÃ  del tuo conto N26.Â Nel caso in cui le informazioni non vengano aggiornate entro un congruo termine N26 sarÃ  obbligata ad astenersi dal proseguire il rapporto contrattuale con il cliente (art. 42 D.Lgs. 231/2007).
Dopo i primi 30 giorni, sarai ancora in grado di completare il questionario, ma saremo costretti a limitare temporaneamente alcune funzionalitÃ  del tuo conto (ad esempio i pagamenti in entrata, come lo stipendio) fino a quando non avrai soddisfatto questo requisito normativo.Â

title: Cos'Ã¨ N26 Business?
content: Il conto N26 Business Ã¨ un conto corrente business digitale, sicuro e intuitivo, che puoi aprire in pochi minuti. Ãˆ incredibilmente semplice, trasparente e gratuito* e ti permette di ricevere pagamenti dai clienti, inviare denaro e spenderlo in piena sicurezza tenendo le finanze della tua attivitÃ  completamente separate da quelle personali.Â I nostri conti Business sono riservati esclusivamente per:liberi professionisti iscritti ad un albo o ordine professionale (ad esempio architetti, avvocati, farmacisti, infermieri...),Â freelance, ovvero lavoratori autonomi e imprenditori individuali in possesso di una partita IVA (come designer, fotografi, elettricisti o i titolari di B&B e casa vacanza con partita IVA).ditte individuali iscritte al Registro Imprese della Camera di Commercio.Cosa include un conto N26 Business?Ecco tutte le caratteristiche e funzionalitÃ  offerte con N26 Business:Conto Business gratuito*: N26 Business Ã¨ gratuito, senza commissioni di gestione del conto (*in caso di saldo pari o superiore a 50.000 â‚¬ potrebbe essere applicata una commissione sulla custodia).Carta virtuale: il conto include una carta virtuale (nuova tabella) Mastercard gratuita, concepita esclusivamente per uso commerciale. La carta virtuale ha un numero PAN completo pronto per essere aggiunto ad Apple Pay o Google Pay per gli acquisti online e in negozio. Puoi anche utilizzare gli sportelli bancomat con funzionalitÃ  contactless per prelevare contanti con Apple Pay o Google Pay.Mastercard N26 fisica: al costo di 10â‚¬ aggiuntivi puoi avere una carta di debito fisica N26 per uso commerciale (ti ricordiamo che Ã¨ necessario che il saldo del tuo conto sia di almeno 10â‚¬ per avviare la produzione e spedizione della carta).Carta Maestro: se hai bisogno di una carta anche per le tue spese private e apri il tuo N26 Business in Germania, Austria o nei Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una cartaÂ Maestro al costo di 10â‚¬.Pagamenti e bonifici: puoi inviare e ricevere bonifici SEPA utilizzando la tua app mobile N26. Inoltre, potrai inviare bonifici istantanei ad altri clienti N26 utilizzando MoneyBeam. A differenza di altri conti, N26 Business non consente di effettuare bonifici in valuta estera direttamente dallâ€™app. Per eseguirli, vai su Wise (nuova tabella).Cashback aziendale: ogni mese riceverai lo 0,1% di cashback su tutti i pagamenti effettuati con la carta. Il conto N26 Business non supporta i pagamenti business to business (B2B).Quali sono i limiti di utilizzo dei conti N26 Business?I limiti massimi giornalieri delle Mastercard N26 Business (importo totale entro le 24 ore) per i pagamenti con carta sono:Prelievi bancomat: 2.500â‚¬Â Pagamenti in negozio o online: 5.000â‚¬Il limite mensile per i pagamenti con carta Ã¨ di 20.000â‚¬ .Puoi impostare i tuoi limiti (nuova tabella) di prelievo bancomat e di pagamento direttamente nell'app selezionando Carte.Ricorda: se apri il tuo conto N26 Business You o N26 Business Metal in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una carta Maestro per le tue spese personali.Â I limiti massimi giornalieri (nell'arco di 24 ore) per i bonifici bancari sono:MoneyBeam a clienti N26: 1.000 â‚¬Bonifici istantanei: 100.000 â‚¬Bonifici in uscita: Nessun limiteI bonifici in valuta estera (nuova tabella) non sono possibili con N26 Business dalla app ma direttamente dal sito di Wise (nuova tabella).I pagamenti B2B (transazioni tra imprese industriali e commerciali) non sono supportati.Link utili:Chi puÃ² aprire un conto N26 Business?

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 ofÂ Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, pleaseÂ contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didnâ€™t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
content: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above â‚¬150 will be charged with a 12.50â‚¬ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than â‚¬150.The maximum fee is â‚¬100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

title: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
content: We offer repayment plans if you canâ€™t repay yourÂ overdraftÂ or loan withÂ N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.Please note we can't offer you a repayment plan if your account is already closed.Hereâ€™s how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how youâ€™re going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We donâ€™t accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. Itâ€™s then up to you to confirm it.By the way: your account will be closed if itâ€™s negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

title: How to change my phone number?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to:Â ğŸ‘¤Â My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your accountâ€™s security (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.Â As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.Â This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message youâ€™ll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.Â Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.Â Our Customer Support doesnâ€™t have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ > Security.NameÂ andÂ sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: Youâ€™ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify itâ€™s really you changing your information so we canâ€™t change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ and selectÂ SettingsÂ thenÂ Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

title: How to close my account?
content: Weâ€™re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. Weâ€™d love to keep you as a customerâ€”tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.Â If youâ€™ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, hereâ€™s what to do:Make your account balance â‚¬0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is â‚¬0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). Youâ€™ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or youâ€™re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or â€œas soon as possibleâ€Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, weâ€™ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

title: How to use my card digitally?
content: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

title: Wie funktionieren kontaktlose Zahlungen?
content: Die kontaktlose Bezahlung mit deiner Karte erfolgt per Nahfeldkommunikation (NFC). Bei Problemen mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlung solltest du Folgendes beachten:ÃœberprÃ¼fe, ob in deinen Karteneinstellungen die kontaktlose Bezahlung aktiviert ist.Wenn deine Karte neu ist, musst du sie zuvor einmal an einem Geldautomaten oder an einem Zahlungsterminal mit Chip & PIN benutzt haben. Erst danach kannst du sie auch fÃ¼r die kontaktlose Bezahlung verwenden.Bei kontaktlosen Zahlungen mit deiner Karte (NFC) bis zu 50 â‚¬ ist keine Karten-PIN erforderlich. Bei Zahlungen Ã¼ber 50 â‚¬ oder kumulativen Zahlungen Ã¼ber 150â‚¬ musst du deine Karten-PIN eingeben.Frage den HÃ¤ndler, ob das Zahlungsterminal die kontaktlose Bezahlung auch tatsÃ¤chlich unterstÃ¼tzt.Bei N26 Metal Karten befindet sich die NFC-Funktion nur auf der RÃ¼ckseite der Karte. Achte darauf, dass du die RÃ¼ckseite der Karte an das Terminal hÃ¤ltst, um kontaktlos zu zahlen (mit der Vorderseite funktioniert es nicht).Du musst deine Karte direkt an die NFC-kompatible OberflÃ¤che des Zahlungsterminals halten. Wenn du deine Karte zu schnell weggezogen oder sie nicht nahe genug an die OberflÃ¤che gehalten hast, versuche es einfach noch einmal.Wenn die kontaktlose Bezahlung nicht funktioniert, versuche bitte immer die Zahlung mit Chip & PIN abzuschlieÃŸen.

title: Wie investiert N26 mein Geld?
content: Wir streben an, die Einlagen unserer Kunden auch fÃ¼r Kredite an unsere Kunden zur VerfÃ¼gung zu stellen (sofern diese Ã¼ber eine entsprechende BonitÃ¤t verfÃ¼gen). FÃ¼r die nicht im KundengeschÃ¤ft benÃ¶tigte LiquiditÃ¤t ist unsere Anlagestrategie risikoarm.Wir legen das Geld unserer Kunden kurzfristig bei der Deutschen Bundesbank und bei anderen europÃ¤ischen Banken im Euroraum mit ausschlieÃŸlich guten Risikoklassen an. Daneben refinanzieren wir Ã¶ffentlich-rechtliche Kunden hauptsÃ¤chlich in Deutschland (StÃ¤dte und Gemeinden) und investieren in Euro-Staatsanleihen.Wir sind kein Handelsbuchinstitut. Das heiÃŸt, wir betreiben keinen Handel zur kurzfristigen Gewinnerzielung.Und wir tÃ¤tigen auch keine SpekulationsgeschÃ¤fte, weder auf Nahrungsmittel, Devisen, Bitcoins, noch auf andere Anlageklassen.

title: Wie funktioniert 3D Secure?
content: 3D Secure schÃ¼tzt dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug. Die Funktion wird automatisch aktiviert, wenn du deine Karte in der App aktivierst. Du brauchst keine zusÃ¤tzlichen PasswÃ¶rter.Wenn du eineÂ Online-ZahlungÂ mit deiner Mastercard vornimmst, bestÃ¤tigt 3D Secure die Transaktion innerhalb von 5 Minuten durch eine Push-Nachricht. Wenn du die Transaktion nicht siehst, versuche es mit unserenÂ Tipps zur Fehlerbehebung.Bitte beachten: die Push-Benachrichtigung wird nur an das verknÃ¼pfte Smartphone gesendet.Wenn du einen Kauf Ã¼ber dein Smartphone tÃ¤tigst, siehst du die ausstehende Transaktion in der App. Tippe auf das Glockensymbol, dann wird eine Push-Meldung angezeigt, mit der du deinen Kauf bestÃ¤tigen und abschlieÃŸen kannst. Danach gehst du zurÃ¼ck zur Website des HÃ¤ndlers. Du solltest innerhalb weniger Augenblicke eine BestÃ¤tigung fÃ¼r deinen erfolgreichen Einkauf sehen.

title: Warum gibt es eine Warteliste fÃ¼r die Anmeldung?
content: Um in Zukunft eine noch stÃ¤rkere Grundlage fÃ¼r unser GeschÃ¤ft zu schaffen, konzentrieren wir uns auf unser Serviceerlebnis, Produktangebote und unsere Prozesse.Angesichts der Ã¼berwÃ¤ltigenden Nachfrage nach den digitalen Banking-Produkten von N26 werden wir die Anzahl der neuen Bankkonten, die wir jeden Monat anbieten kÃ¶nnen, vorÃ¼bergehend limitieren.Â Darum mÃ¼ssen wir die Aufnahme von neuen Nutzern in bestimmten MÃ¤rkten vorÃ¼bergehend aussetzen. Wir bitten dich, dich in unsere Warteliste anzumelden. Wir werden uns bei dir melden, sobald wir dir das Konto deiner Wahl anbieten kÃ¶nnen.Wird sich diese Pause auf bestehende Nutzer auswirken?Diese vorÃ¼bergehende Pause bei Neuanmeldungen hat keinerlei Auswirkungen auf bestehende N26 Nutzer â€“ und als Nutzer kannst du auf deinem Smartphone dasselbe nahtlose, sichere und geschÃ¼tzte digitale Banking-Erlebnis erwarten, das du kennen und lieben gelernt hast.Wir arbeiten mit Hochdruck daran, den Anmeldeprozess fÃ¼r alle Nutzer so reibungslos wie mÃ¶glich zu gestalten und gehen davon aus, dass wir bald neue Konten fÃ¼r alle Nutzer erÃ¶ffnen kÃ¶nnen.Wie erfahre ich, wann es fÃ¼r mich wieder mÃ¶glich sein wird, ein Konto zu erÃ¶ffnen?Wenn du versucht hast, ein Konto zu erÃ¶ffnen und dies nicht mÃ¶glich war, ist es am besten, wenn du dich auf unserer Warteliste eintrÃ¤gst. Wir melden uns bei dir, sobald wir dir das Konto deiner Wahl zur VerfÃ¼gung stellen kÃ¶nnen.Da wir nach wie vor eine enorme Nachfrage nach unserem Produkt erleben, wollen wir sicherstellen, dass wir allen Nutzern in unserer Warteliste einen fairen Zugang zum N26 Banking-Erlebnis bieten kÃ¶nnen. Deshalb setzen wir uns in der Reihenfolge der Warteliste mit den Nutzern in Verbindung, sobald wir ihnen ein Konto anbieten kÃ¶nnen.Â Kann ich in meinem Land ein N26 Konto erÃ¶ffnen?

title: Wie kann ich eine N26 Versicherung abschlieÃŸen?
content: Mit der neuen On-Demand-Versicherung von N26 kÃ¶nnen alle unsere Kunden ihr Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop, Smartwatch und andere elektronische GerÃ¤te gegen Diebstahl, Einbruch, Raub, versehentliche SchÃ¤den und WasserschÃ¤den versichern lassen. Du kannst die Versicherung direkt in deiner N26 App oder Web-App (neuen Tab) abschlieÃŸen und jederzeit auf Wunsch wieder kÃ¼ndigen â€“ ganz ohne lÃ¤stigen Papierkram.Wie funktioniert N26 Versicherung?Wenn du die Versicherung abschlieÃŸen mÃ¶chtest, melde dich einfach in deiner N26 App oder Web-App an, gehe auf Entdecken und klicke auf das dort angezeigte Banner "Versicherung".Du wirst anschlieÃŸend aufgefordert, ein paar Details zu deinem EndgerÃ¤t einzugeben. WÃ¤hle die monatliche oder jÃ¤hrliche Zahlungsoption aus und bestÃ¤tige die Anfrage. Nach Abschluss der Versicherungspolice ist die Versicherung fÃ¼r dein Smartphone ab dem Folgetag aktiv und du kannst sie jederzeit Ã¼ber deine N26 App oder deine Web-App (neuen Tab) kÃ¼ndigen.Wie kann ich einen Versicherungsanspruch geltend machen?Du kannst einen Versicherungsanspruch Ã¼ber das Onlineportal von Simplesurance (neuen Tab) geltend machen. Dazu musst du dich mit deiner Zertifikatsnummer und Zertifikats-PIN anmelden. Diese findest du auf deinem Versicherungszertifikat, das du via Nachrichten von N26 erhalten hast.Jeder Kunde ist berechtigt, maximal zwei AnsprÃ¼che pro Jahr einzureichen. Nach der zweiten Inanspruchnahme der Versicherungsleistung erlischt die Versicherung automatisch. Weitere Informationen findest du in den Allgemeinen GeschÃ¤ftsbedingungen, die dir direkt nach dem Versicherungsabschluss an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse geschickt werden. DarÃ¼ber hinaus kannst du dich jederzeit an support@simplesurance.de wenden, wenn du Informationen zu deinem Versicherungsschein oder einem gemeldeten Schadensfall benÃ¶tigst.Bin ich dazu berechtigt?Die N26 Versicherung ist fÃ¼r alle unsere Kunden verfÃ¼gbar. N26 Metal Kunden kÃ¶nnen lediglich nicht ihr Handy versichern, da sie bereits im Rahmen ihrer Metal-Mitgliedschaft eine Handyversicherung haben. Bitte vergewissere dich, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast. N26 Versicherung ist derzeit fÃ¼r Kunden in Ã–sterreich, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Deutschland erhÃ¤ltlich.Diese Versicherung gilt nicht fÃ¼r GerÃ¤te, die auÃŸerhalb Europas gekauft werden.

title: How to use Spaces?
content: To start using your Spaces, youâ€™ll want to go to the â€˜Spacesâ€™ section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the â€˜Spacesâ€™ homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap â€˜Create a new spaceâ€™ in the â€˜Spacesâ€™ homepageSelect one of the below options:â€˜Saving for a goalâ€™ - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).â€˜Sharing moneyâ€™ - Allows you to create a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.â€˜Create now, decide laterâ€™ - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now letâ€™s start using â€˜Spacesâ€™!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your â€˜Main Accountâ€™ or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the â€˜manageâ€™Then press â€˜Lock Spaceâ€™ or â€˜Unlock Spaceâ€™Enter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the â€˜Settingsâ€™ cog (top-right corner)Select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap â€˜Manageâ€™:To create a savings goal, select â€˜Create my goalâ€™ (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then â€˜Set goalâ€™To enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select â€˜Manage Round-UpsToggle â€˜Enable Round-Upsâ€™You will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap â€˜Create a ruleâ€™Choose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

title: Â¿QuÃ© pasa si rechazan mi IBAN de N26?
content: Si abriste la cuenta en EspaÃ±a despuÃ©s del 17 de abril de 2019, tu IBAN es espaÃ±ol. Dicho IBAN tiene el cÃ³digo de paÃ­s ES, un cÃ³digo de control de 2 dÃ­gitos, luego los 10 dÃ­gitos del cÃ³digo de entidad financiera, despuÃ©s 2 dÃ­gitos de control y, por Ãºltimo, los 10 dÃ­gitos de tu nÃºmero de cuenta. Por ejemplo:Â ES XX 1563 2626 XX 326XXXXXXX.En cambio, si la abriste antes del 17 de abril de 2019, o despuÃ©s de esa fecha pero fuera de EspaÃ±a, tu IBAN es alemÃ¡n. Este tiene el cÃ³digo de paÃ­s DE, un cÃ³digo de control de 2 dÃ­gitos, el cÃ³digo bancario de 8 dÃ­gitos y, por Ãºltimo, los 10 dÃ­gitos de tu nÃºmero de cuenta. Por ejemplo:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Los paÃ­ses que estÃ¡n en la zona SEPA (Zona Ãšnica de pagos en Euros) han acordado el sistema de IBAN para simplificar los pagos tanto nacionales como internacionales, y para reducir el riesgo de error en la comunicaciÃ³n y en el procesamiento de transacciones.Los comerciantes y empresas que no aceptan el IBAN de otros estados miembros del Espacio EconÃ³mico Europeo (EEE), estÃ¡n violando la legislaciÃ³n europea desde el 1 de febrero de 2016 (ArtÃ­culo 9 delÂ Reglamento No. 260/2012 (pestaÃ±a nueva)).Si te ves afectado por una discriminaciÃ³n de IBAN, te pedimos que te pongas en contacto con lasÂ  (pestaÃ±a nueva)autoridades competentes (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â directamente y des parte del incidente. Facilita tu informaciÃ³n de contacto, el nombre de la empresa o del comerciante que no acepte el IBAN y una descripciÃ³n del incidente (incluyendo capturas de pantalla del rechazo o cualquier otra documentaciÃ³n de tu comunicaciÃ³n con ellos).

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.Youâ€™ll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if youÂ reorder a card. Youâ€™ll then receive a tracking link by email. If youâ€™re not home during the delivery and your mailbox canâ€™t be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, itâ€™ll be returned to us. Weâ€™ll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. Itâ€™s currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.Itâ€™s not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once itâ€™s been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasnâ€™t arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you canâ€™t be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card: 30â‚¬Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30â‚¬N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25â‚¬Reordering your card 65â‚¬

title: Was ist CASH26?
content: FÃ¼r Konten verfÃ¼gbar, die in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland erÃ¶ffnet wurden.CASH26 ist ein integriertes Feature in deiner N26 App, mit dem du Ã¼ber dein Smartphone Geld von deinem N26 Konto abheben und einzahlen kannst â€“ komplett ohne Karte und Geldautomat.Geh einfach in eines unserer Ã¼ber 12.100 PartnergeschÃ¤fte in Deutschland (inkl. REWE, Penny und dm) und 2.600 PartnergeschÃ¤fte in Ã–sterreich (inkl. dm, Billa, Billa Plus, und PENNY), erstelle einen CASH26 Strichcode auf deinem verknÃ¼pften Smartphone und zeige ihn an der Kasse vor.Wie du Geld mit CASH26 einzahlen bzw. Ã¼ber CASH26 Geld abheben kannst, erfÃ¤hrst du in diesem Artikel.Wie funktioniert CASH26?CASH26 EinzahlungDer Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang gÃ¼ltig. Falls du ihn nicht innerhalb dieser Zeit nutzt, verfÃ¤llt er und du musst einen neuen erstellen.Â Wenn du Geld Ã¼ber CASH26 einzahlst, kannst du sofort darauf zugreifen. Es kann jedoch sein, dass der Betrag erst bis zu 10 Minuten spÃ¤ter in deinem Kontostand erscheint.Wie viel Geld kann ich einzahlen?Der Mindestbetrag fÃ¼r eine CASH26 Einzahlung ist 50 â‚¬. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden kannst du bis zu 999 â‚¬ einzahlen.Es fÃ¤llt eine TransaktionsgebÃ¼hr von 1,5 % des Einzahlbetrags an â€“ ganz gleich, wie viel oder wenig Geld du einzahlst.ZusÃ¤tzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit fÃ¼r Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in HÃ¶he von 999â‚¬ pro 24 Stunden.Mit CASH26 Geld abhebenSobald du den CASH26 Strichcode erstellst hast, wird der Betrag, den du abheben willst, von deinem Kontostand abgezogen.Falls du dich umentscheidest und den Code vor der Nutzung lÃ¶schst oder ihn nach 10 Minuten verfallen lÃ¤sst, wird der Betrag deinem Kontostand sofort wieder gutgeschrieben.Wie viel Geld kann man abheben?Das Abhebelimit betrÃ¤gt 200 â‚¬ pro Transaktion sowie 900 â‚¬ innerhalb von 24 Stunden. Es gibt jedoch keinen Mindestbetrag â€“ du kannst auch nur einen Cent mit CASH26 abheben, wenn du magst.Abhebungen mit CASH26 sind fÃ¼r alle unsere Konten kostenlos, auÃŸer fÃ¼r das N26 Flex Konto. Bei diesem entfÃ¤llt auf jede Abhebung eine GebÃ¼hr von 2â‚¬. ZusÃ¤tzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit fÃ¼r Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in HÃ¶he von 999â‚¬ pro 24 Stunden.

title: Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?
content:
Come aggiungere un partecipante ad uno Spazio Condiviso:Accedi allo Space e clicca sull'icona con il + in altro a destraSeleziona la persona che vuoi aggiungere dalla tua lista di contatti.Accetta le condizioni del servizio e conferma cliccando su 'Rilascia la procura'.
Come rimuovere un partecipante da uno Spazio Condiviso:Accedi allo Space e clicca sui 3 puntini in alto a destra.Dalla lista dei â€˜Participantiâ€™, tocca sulla freccia che si trova sulla destra del nome del partecipante che vuoi rimuovere. Seleziona â€˜Revoca procura generaleâ€™.Conferma la notifica che appare in basso cliccando di nuovo 'Revoca procura generale'.Come partecipare ad uno Spazio Condiviso:Nella schermata dello Space, tocca lo Space con l'icona "In attesa" e l'icona dello Spazio Condiviso.Leggi le istruzioni su Spazi Condivisi e prosegui alla schermata della Procura.Una volta che hai letto e compreso le informazioni sulla Procura legale, spunta la casella e tocca il pulsante 'Concedi procura'.Inserisci il tuo PIN di Conferma.Conferma la notifica push â€˜Accetta Procura Legaleâ€™ tramite il tuo smartphone associato.Dovrai avere abbastanza Space liberi per poter accettare l'invito ad uno Spazio Condiviso. Se non ne hai, potrai procedere solo se cancelli altri Space(s) per fare spazio ad un altro.Inoltre, non potrai avere Space aperti con lo stesso nome o immagine dello Spazio Condiviso. Potrai accettare l'invito ad uno Spazio Condiviso solo una volta cambiato il nome/immagine dell'altro Space. Come lasciare uno Spazio Condiviso:Nella schermata dello Space, clicca sul menÃ¹ indicato dai 3 puntini in alto a destra.Nelle impostazioni, tocca su â€˜Abbandona Spazio Condivisoâ€™.Conferma la notifica che appare sullo schermo, e clicca di nuovo â€˜Abbandona Spazio Condivisoâ€™.Uno Spazio Condiviso puÃ² essere creato e modificato sia nell'app mobile N26 sia nella Webapp (nuova tabella).Questa funzione Ã¨ al momento disponibile solo per conti Premium con IBAN Tedesco e Spagnolo. Scopri di piÃ¹Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?Come si crea uno Spazio Condiviso?

title: Que faire face au rejet de votre IBAN N26 ?
content: Votre IBAN N26 se compose du code du pays (DE), d'une clÃ© de contrÃ´le Ã  2 chiffres, du code banque (8 chiffres) et de votre numÃ©ro de compte (10 chiffres). Il se prÃ©sente ainsi : DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Les pays membres de l'espace SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area ou Espace unique de paiement en Euros) se sont mis d'accord pour utiliser un systÃ¨me basÃ© sur l'IBAN afin de faciliter les paiements nationaux et internationaux et de limiter le risque d'erreurs dans la communication et le traitement des transactions.Les commerÃ§ants et employeurs qui n'acceptent pas tous les IBAN des pays de lâ€™Espace Ã©conomique europÃ©en violent en rÃ©alitÃ© la loi europÃ©enne du 1er FÃ©vrier 2016 (art. 9 deÂ la directive europÃ©enne nÂ°260/2012 (nouvel onglet)).Dans le cas oÃ¹ vous seriez victime de ce que l'on appelle une Â« discrimination Ã  l'IBAN Â», nous vous prions de contacter votre autoritÃ© nationale compÃ©tente (nouvel onglet)Â en l'informant de la situation. Nous vous recommandons de toujours indiquer votre nom complet, vos coordonnÃ©es (email, numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone, adresseâ€¦), le nom du commerÃ§ant ou de lâ€™employeur qui refuse votre IBAN, une brÃ¨ve description du problÃ¨me et si possible, des captures dâ€™Ã©crans prouvant que votre IBAN a bien Ã©tÃ© refusÃ©.

title: Puis-je continuer Ã  utiliser ma carte aprÃ¨s son expirationÂ ?
content: Non, la date dâ€™expiration figurant sur votre carte remplit une fonction importante et vous ne pourrez plus lâ€™utiliser aprÃ¨s le mois dâ€™expiration. Vous recevrez une nouvelle carte avec un numÃ©ro diffÃ©rent, ainsi quâ€™une nouvelle date dâ€™expiration.Ma carte arrive Ã  expiration, que dois-je faireÂ ?Combien coÃ»te le remplacement de ma carte arrivant Ã  expiration ou pÃ©rimÃ©eÂ ?Ma carte est dÃ©jÃ  pÃ©rimÃ©e mais je nâ€™ai jamais reÃ§u de carte de remplacement

title: Received a suspicious message?
content:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. Theyâ€™re able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank thatâ€™s growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if youâ€™ve received an unexpected message:If youâ€™ve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If youâ€™ve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If youâ€™re ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. Weâ€™re always here to help!

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 YOU with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Please keep the following in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Comment protÃ©ger mes donnÃ©es bancaires en ligne ?
content: Que vous fassiez des achats, des transactions bancaires ou que vous gÃ©riez votre boÃ®te de rÃ©ception, voici quelques astuces pour garantir une sÃ©curitÃ© optimale et protÃ©ger vos donnÃ©es personnelles dans cette Ã¨re numÃ©rique.Mettez rÃ©guliÃ¨rement Ã  jour votre application N26 et votre systÃ¨me dâ€™exploitation mobile, pour recevoir les derniÃ¨res corrections et ajustements des systÃ¨mes de sÃ©curitÃ©.Utilisez l'analyse dâ€™empreinte digitale ou la reconnaissance faciale pour vous connecter.CrÃ©ez des mots de passe forts et robustes en privilÃ©giant les combinaisons de lettres, de chiffres et de symboles ainsi que majuscules et minuscules et nâ€™utilisez jamais le mÃªme mot de passe pour diffÃ©rents comptes.Ne publiez jamais dâ€™informations personnelles sensibles en ligne sur les rÃ©seaux sociaux.Faites attention aux connexions Wi-Fi partagÃ©es ou publiques, choisissez toujours des connexions sÃ©curisÃ©es WPA2 plutÃ´t que WEP, et utilisez un VPN si possible.Choisissez des fournisseurs d'e-mail sÃ©curisÃ©s avec des filtres de courrier indÃ©sirable et authentification Ã  deux facteurs, tels que Gmail, Yahoo ou dâ€™autres fournisseurs de rÃ©fÃ©rence.MÃ©fiez-vous des offres trop belles pour Ãªtre vraies. Ce sont probablement des arnaques.Faites vos achats uniquement sur des sites internet dignes de confiance de marchands connus et reconnus par les autoritÃ©s.VÃ©rifiez que les sites internet sont sÃ©curisÃ©s, cherchez le cadenas Ã  cÃ´tÃ© de lâ€™adresse URL et examinez les identifiants en un simple clic.Activez la gÃ©olocalisation sur votre application N26, pour nous permettre d'identifier les transactions irrÃ©guliÃ¨res que n'avez certainement pas effectuÃ©es.Si vous pensez que les dÃ©tails de votre compte ou de votre carte ont Ã©tÃ© compromis, modifiez votre mot de passe et rÃ©fÃ©rez-vous Ã  notre article Que faire si jâ€™ai lâ€™impression que mon compte a Ã©tÃ© piratÃ© ?

title: How to order my Maestro card?
content: Only applies to Germany, Austria and the NetherlandsYou need our German, Austrian or Dutch Terms & Conditions to order aÂ Maestro (new tab) card. Just login to your account and go to:Cards Tap: Get an additional Card Then tap: Maestro Then tap Choose to order the card The Maestro card is free of charge only for N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal customers, while it costs 10â‚¬ for N26 Standard customers. Maestro is a widely adopted payment system which allows you to make payments using a Maestro card in stores. All our Mastercards as well as our Maestro cards are debit cards.For more information about the delivery timeline please go to our dedicated article.

title: Ablaufen und Ersatz von Karten: HÃ¤ufig gestellte Fragen
content: Wenn deine N26 Mastercard abgelaufen ist oder bald ablaufen wird, erhÃ¤ltst du in diesem Artikel alle Informationen, wie du eine neue bestellst, sowie die damit verbundenen Kosten und die Versandzeiten.Â Bevor du mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte fortfahren mÃ¶chtest, empfehlen wir dir, dass deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten korrekt und auf dem neuesten Stand sind.Meine Karte lÃ¤uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Wenn deine Karte bald ablÃ¤uft, logge dich bitte in der App in dein N26 Konto ein, gehe zum Tab Karten und suche nach einem Banner unter der entsprechenden Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestÃ¤tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Wir senden sie dir dann zu.Â Wenn diese Nachricht nicht erscheint, mach dir keine Sorgen. Das liegt wahrscheinlich daran, dass deine Karte noch einige Zeit gÃ¼ltig ist. Zu gegebener Zeit hast du die MÃ¶glichkeit, deine Adresse zu bestÃ¤tigen.Sobald deine Karte bei dir eintrifft, musst du diese erst aktivieren, bevor du sie nutzen kannst. Vergiss nicht, deine alte Karte zu vernichten und sie gemÃ¤ÃŸ den Ã¶rtlichen Recyclingrichtlinien zu entsorgen.Bitte beachte: Wenn du deine neue Mastercard erhalten und aktiviert hast, musst du deine Zahlungsdaten fÃ¼r alle deine Abos und wiederkehrenden Zahlungen aktualisieren. Auf diese Weise kannst du verhindern, dass deine zukÃ¼nftigen Zahlungen abgelehnt werden.Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Nein, das Ablaufdatum auf deiner Karte hat eine wichtige Funktion. Du kannst deine Karte nach Ablauf des letzten GÃ¼ltigkeitsmonats nicht weiter verwenden. Du erhÃ¤ltst eine neue Karte mit einer anderen Nummer sowie einem neuen Ablaufdatum.Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte fÃ¼r meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Ersatzkarten sind fÃ¼r alle Smart, You oder Metal Kunden kostenlos erhÃ¤ltlich.Wenn du dein Konto vor den folgenden Daten erÃ¶ffnet hast, sind sowohl die neue Karte als auch der Versand an deine Adresse in den LÃ¤ndern, in denen N26 verfÃ¼gbar ist (neuen Tab), kostenlos:16.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz im europÃ¤ischen Raum)25.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Italien oder Spanien)11.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Frankreich)18.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich oder der Schweiz)Wenn dein Konto nach dem entsprechenden Datum erstellt wurde, kostet deine Ersatzkarte genauso viel wie die Bestellung einer neuen Karte.Wenn du derzeit in einem Land ansÃ¤ssig bist, das nicht von N26 unterstÃ¼tzt wird, wende dich bitte per Chat oder Telefon an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Bestellung fÃ¼r dich vornehmen kÃ¶nnen. Der Versand auÃŸerhalb dieser LÃ¤nder (neuen Tab) kann mit zusÃ¤tzlichen Kosten verbunden sein.Â Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten fÃ¼r ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In lÃ¤ndlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch lÃ¤nger dauern. Um Ã¼ber den aktuellen Lieferstatus auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe einfach auf den Home Bildschirm deiner mobilen App von N26.Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.Kein Problem, wir helfen wir gerne weiter!Â Wenn du deine Adresse bereits bestÃ¤tigt hast und seither mehr als 20 Tage vergangen sind, wende dich bitte an den Kundenservice. Dies kannst du im Support-Bereich der App erledigen.Â Wenn du deine Adresse noch nicht bestÃ¤tigt hast, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und suche nach einem Banner unter deiner abgelaufenen Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestÃ¤tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen.Â

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sortÂ your transactionsÂ and display our findings inÂ InsightsÂ (top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, weâ€™ll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesnâ€™t fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: Weâ€™ve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

title: How can I download the confirmation for a SEPA transfer?
content: If you have sent a bank transfer from your N26 account and need confirmation of the sending or receipt, you can download the PDF file with the transaction data from your mobile app or WebApp. That's how:Log into your N26 appFrom the list of transactions, select the bank transfer for which you want to download the confirmationClick on "Download transfer confirmation"As soon as you choose this option, the document will automatically be downloaded to your smartphone or pc.What data will I find in the transfer confirmation?In the confirmation of the transfer you will find the bank details of the sender and recipient of the transfer, including the amount of the transaction and the date on which it was made.

title: Pourquoi des frais ont Ã©tÃ© prÃ©levÃ©s lors dâ€™un retrait en distributeur automatique ?
content: Voici les raisons pour lesquelles des frais sont parfois prÃ©levÃ©s lors dâ€™un retrait en distributeur automatique :2 euros par retrait peuvent Ãªtre prÃ©levÃ©s si vous avez Ã©puisÃ© lesÂ 5 retraits gratuitsÂ dont vous bÃ©nÃ©ficiez chaque mois, dâ€™aprÃ¨s notre Politique en matiÃ¨re de retraits en Distributeurs Automatiques de Billets (DAB).Certains types de distributeurs peuvent facturer des frais, indÃ©pendamment, sans que nous puissions les rejeter ou les rembourser. Dans ce cas, le DAB doit afficher la somme de ces frais avant que vous finalisiez votre retrait. Dans la liste de vos transactions, ces frais sont ajoutÃ©s au montant de votre retrait. Les frais dÃ©bitÃ©s par N26 apparaissent sÃ©parÃ©ment dans la liste. Nos clients en Espagne peuvent trouver plus dâ€™informations iciDes commissions peuvent Ãªtre prÃ©levÃ©es lors de retraits en DAB en devises Ã©trangÃ¨res.Â Avec les comptes N26 Standard, N26 Business et N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, une commission de 1.7 % du montant de votre retrait en devises est prÃ©levÃ©. Cela ne concerne pas les dÃ©tenteurs de comptes N26 You / Business You ou N26 Metal / Business Metal.Des frais peuvent sâ€™appliquer si vous retirez de lâ€™argent avec votre carte Maestro.Â Pour les cartes Maestro, uniquement disponibles en Allemagne, en Autriche et aux Pays-Bas, 2 euros sont prÃ©levÃ©s sur tous les retraits (en euros et en devises Ã©trangÃ¨res).Pour savoir oÃ¹ se trouvent les distributeurs les plus proches de vous, vous pouvez consulter la carte des DAB Ã  proximitÃ©, disponible depuis votre application mobile.Vous pouvez consulter un aperÃ§u deÂ nos tarifs sur notre site web (nouvel onglet).

title: Wie bestelle ich eine neue Karte?
content: Falls du zurzeit auf eine Karte wartest, warte bitte den geschÃ¤tzten Lieferzeitraum ab, die im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App angezeigt wird.Wenn du eine neue Karte bestellen musst, Ã¼berprÃ¼fe zunÃ¤chst deine Lieferanschrift unter: ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > PersÃ¶nliche Details > Adressen > Lieferadresse. Bitte beachte:Es muss eine Wohnadresse sein (Unternehmen werden nicht akzeptiert)Dein Name muss auf dem Briefkasten stehen. Falls ein anderer Name darauf steht, fÃ¼ge diesen unter ZusÃ¤tzliche Informationen zur Adresse hinzu.Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.Falls zutreffend, gib deine Haus-, Etagen- und TÃ¼rnummer unter ZusÃ¤tzliche Informationen zur Adresse an.Falls Adresse Sonderzeichen beinhaltet, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner App.Falls du zeitnah umziehst, zieh die Express-Lieferung in ErwÃ¤gung und gib die kÃ¼nftige Wohnadresse an.Falls deine erste N26 Karte innerhalb des geschÃ¤tzten Lieferzeitraums nicht angekommen ist, Ã¶ffne bitte einen Live Chat direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking.Falls du schon mal eine aktivierte Karte hattest, kannst du deine neue Karte so in der App bestellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Karten unten rechts.WÃ¤hle aus der Liste deiner Karten diejenige Karte aus, die du nachbestellen willst.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Tippe auf Neue Karte bestellen.Wie kann ich schon mit meiner Karte bezahlen, bevor sie physisch bei mir ankommt?Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. Auf diese Weise kannst du mit deinem Handy bei Anbietern bezahlen, die diese Zahlungsmethode unterstÃ¼tzen. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber die digitalen NutzungsmÃ¶glichkeiten deiner N26 Karte.Wie viel kostet eine neue Karte?Standardlieferung:N26 Standard & N26 You: 10â‚¬N26 Metal: 45â‚¬Express-Lieferung:N26 Standard & N26 You: 30â‚¬N26 Metal: 65â‚¬Bitte beachte: Falls du auf deine erste N26 Karte wartest und deine Lieferanschrift von Anfang an richtig war, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online-Banking.Â

title: Come fare un reclamo?
content: Ti serve supporto tecnico oppure hai una domanda?Se hai bisogno di assistenza con il tuo conto, con una controversie sui pagamenti con carta, con la modifica dei tuoi dati o semplicemente vuoi porre una domanda, scopri Come contattare N26 qui.Come presentare un reclamo?Un reclamo puÃ² essere presentatoÂ  inviando una email, a seconda della tua lingua di preferenza, a:reclami@n26.com (nuova tabella) - in italianocomplaints@n26.com (nuova tabella) - in inglesePuoiÂ  inviare un reclamo anche attraverso un messaggio di posta elettronica certificata (PEC) a:reclami@pec.n26.com (nuova tabella) (in italiano o in inglese)Ti preghiamo di contattarci solo tramite la nostra app o via email, poichÃ© non siamo in grado di servire i clienti di persona. Se non puoi contattarci tramite app o email, invia un reclamo scritto (in forma di lettera) all'indirizzo postale centrale:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinTi ricordiamo di considerare questi recapiti solo nel caso tu voglia presentare un reclamo. Per assistenza tecnica ti invitiamo a rivolgerti invece al nostro Servizio Clienti che ti aiuterÃ  a risolvere il tuo problema velocemente. Il nostro Servizio Clienti Ã¨ disponibile tutti i giorni dalle 07:00 alle 23:00, comprese le domeniche e i festivi.Quando presenti un reclamo, includi sempre:una descrizione dettagliata del tuo reclamoil prodotto o il servizio di cui non sei soddisfattola data in cui il problema si e presentatopuoi anche allegare qualsiasi documentazione di supporto relativa al tuo reclamo (ad es. Screenshots, email, ecc.)la tua richiestaTi ricordiamo che possiamo gestire le richieste relative al tuo conto corrente esclusivamente se ci contatti dall'indirizzo email associato al tuo conto N26.Qualora il reclamo venga presentato per mezzo di un rappresentante Ã¨ necessario che sia accompagnato da apposita procura autenticata.Ti invieremo unâ€™e-mail per confermare la ricezione. Nel caso in cui avessimo bisogno di ulteriori informazioni, il nostro Ufficio Reclami ti contatterÃ  direttamente via e-mail.Una volta che il nostro Ufficio Reclami avrÃ  effettuato le dovute indagini sul tuo caso, ti comunicheremo la nostra decisione finale tramite email. Se il reclamo Ã¨ ritenuto fondato, N26 ti comunicherÃ  le iniziative che si impegna ad assumere ed i relativi tempi di realizzazione. Se il reclamo Ã¨ ritenuto infondato, N26 provvederÃ  a fornirti unâ€™illustrazione chiara delle motivazioni del rigetto ed, inoltre, indicazioni sulla possibilitÃ  di ricorrere a strumenti alternativi per la risoluzione della controversia.Ti preghiamo di notare che i reclami presentati con modalitÃ  diverse da quelle sopra esposte oppure inviati a indirizzi diversi da quelli indicati, si considereranno pervenuti nel momento in cui saranno recapitati allâ€™Ufficio Reclami.Â Tempistiche per la gestione dei reclamiN26 si impegna a rispondere entro 15 giorni lavorativi per i reclami relativi ai servizi di pagamento come bonifici, disposizioni permanenti di pagamenti, addebiti su carte di debito e altro, in applicazione alla Direttiva europea sui servizi di pagamento (nuova tabella) (PSD2). Nel caso in cui non sia possibile per noi rispettare il termine di 15 giorni, N26 invierÃ  una risposta interlocutoria indicando le ragioni del ritardo e il termine entro il quale verrÃ  fornita la risposta definitiva, in ogni caso entro il termine massimo di 35 giorni lavorativi.I reclami relativi ad operazioni e servizi bancari e finanziari (diversi dai servizi di pagamento) saranno risolti entro 60 giorni solari.Se hai aperto un conto correnteÂ  in un paese diverso dallâ€™Italia, i termini relativi alla gestione dei reclami non relativi a servizi di pagamento sono i seguenti:Germania e Austria - 15 giorni lavorativiAltri paesi europei - 15 giorni lavorativiIrlanda - 40 giorni lavorativiFrancia - 56 giorni solariRegno Unito - 56 giorni solariSpagna - 60 giorni solariSe non riceviamo una tua risposta, potremmo chiudere il tuo reclamo. Se ci contatterai di nuovo in un secondo momento, apriremo un nuovo file e forniremo un nuovo numero di riferimento del reclamo.Non sei soddisfatto della risoluzione proposta?Nel caso in cui non riuscissimo a trovare una soluzione soddisfacente, potrai rivolgerti a diversi sistemi di risoluzione alternativa delle controversie. Se possiedi un conto corrente N26 con termini e condizioni italiani Ã¨ possibile:presentare un ricorso allâ€™Arbitro Bancario FinanziarioÂ rivolgersi al Conciliatore Bancario FinanziarioI sistemi di risoluzione alternativa delle controversie intervengono nel momento in cui il cliente non riceve risposta oppure se la risoluzione proposta Ã¨ ritenuta insoddisfacente. In alternativa, potrai ricorrere ad un altro organismo specializzato iscritto nellâ€™apposito registro tenuto dal Ministero della Giustizia. Lâ€™elenco degli organismi di mediazione Ã¨ disponibile sul sito www.giustizia.it (nuova tabella).Se hai aperto un conto corrente N26 fuori dallâ€™Italia Ã¨ possibile contattare uno dei seguenti organi arbitrali:la Banca Federale Tedesca (Deutsche Bundesbank)lâ€™AutoritÃ  federale tedesca di vigilanza finanziaria (Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht - BaFin).Per una lista completa degli enti di risoluzione delle controversie, consulta la nostra pagina Imprint (nuova tabella).Reportistica annualeRendiconto sull'attivitÃ  di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2019 (nuova tabella)Rendiconto sullâ€™attivitÃ  di gestione dei reclami per lâ€™anno 2020 (nuova tabella)Rendiconto sull'attivitÃ  di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2021 (nuova tabella)

title: What is Phishing?
content: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If youâ€™d like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. Weâ€™ll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an â€˜emlâ€™ file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above.Â Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we canâ€™t use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following:Â Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone.Â Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the â€œphone spoofingâ€ technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website thatâ€™s being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps theyâ€™re offering limited-time promotional deals. Itâ€™s important to note that just because â€œN26â€ is part of the URL, this doesnâ€™t necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect youâ€™re on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesnâ€™t, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.Â

title: Dove posso prelevare contanti gratuitamente?
content: Con la tua Mastercard N26 avrai a disposizione un determinato numero di prelievi ATM gratuiti conformemente alla nostra Fair Use Policy. Puoi anche utilizzare lâ€™ATM Locator Mastercard (nuova tabella) per trovare gli sportelli ATM dove poter prelevare gratuitamente.I prelievi tramite CASH26 sono sempre gratuiti nei negozi aderenti.*Per i clienti in Spagna: alcuni operatori di ATM in Spagna potrebbero applicare una commissione indipendente di circa 2â‚¬. content: VertrauenswÃ¼rdige EmpfÃ¤nger eines Shared Spaces kÃ¶nnen:Geld von ihren eigenen Spaces (inklusive anderer Shared Spaces, in denen sie Teilnehmer sind) zu einem Shared Space Ã¼berweisen.Jederzeit frei auf das Guthaben eines Shared Spaces zugreifen.Einen Shared Space jederzeit verlassen.Ãœberweisungen zwischen vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen EmpfÃ¤ngern und einem Shared Space mÃ¼ssen nicht mit einer PIN und Push-Nachricht autorisiert werden. title: Come fare una richiesta di risarcimento?
content: Lâ€™iscrizione aÂ N26 You (nuova tabella)Â eÂ N26 Metal (nuova tabella)Â comprende unâ€™ampia gamma di prestazioni assicurative, coperte dal nostro partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*Per segnalare un reclamo, accedi alla tua app, vai su ğŸ‘¤Il mio conto > Il tuo conto > Copertura assicurativa Allianz.Li troverai:Una guida per presentare la richiesta di risarcimento (ad es. ritardo del volo o del bagaglio, furto del telefono cellulare, estensione della garanzia o cancellazione del viaggio)Le informazioni del tuo conto N26, incluso il numero di polizza AllianzLâ€™opzione per contattare Allianz direttamente in caso di emergenza medicaPer le emergenze, tieni a portata di mano le seguenti informazioni:Lâ€™indirizzo completo e il numero di telefono del luogo in cui ti troviI nomi di tutti i contatti ufficiali (dottori, ospedali e/o polizia)Una descrizione precisa della situazione*Allianz Global Assistance Europe Ã¨ un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

title: So lÃ¤dst Du Geld auf dein Konto per Karte, Apple Pay und Google Pay
content:
Du kannst jetzt Geld auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du eine Debitkarte, Kreditkarte, Apple Pay oder Google Pay verwendest. So kannst du schnell und einfach Ãœberweisungen auf dein N26 Konto tÃ¤tigen:Geld mit einer Debit- oder Kreditkarte hinzufÃ¼genÃ–ffne deine N26 App und tippe im Homescreen auf Geld erhalten.Tippe auf Mit Karte aufladen.WÃ¤hle einen Betrag und gib deine Karteninformationen ein (Name auf der Karte, Kartennummer, Ablaufdatum und CVV-Code). Deine Karteninformationen speichern wir nicht.Folge den Anweisungen, um die Ãœberweisung zu bestÃ¤tigen.Das Geld ist sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verfÃ¼gbar.Mit Instant Account Funding kannst du minimum 20 EUR und maximal 450 EUR bei jeder wiederkehrenden Transaktion und maximal 450 â‚¬ insgesamt pro Monat auf dein Konto einzahlen.Geld mit Apple Pay oder Google Pay hinzufÃ¼genÃ–ffne deine N26 App und tippe im Homescreen auf Geld erhalten.WÃ¤hle dann Apple Pay bzw. Google Pay.Gib einen Betrag ein.Folge den Anweisungen, um die Ãœberweisung zu bestÃ¤tigen.Das Geld ist sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verfÃ¼gbar.Akzeptierte Karten: Visa und Mastercard-Karten, die eine 16-stellige Kartennummer haben. Prepaid-Karten werden nicht akzeptiert. In diesem Blog Post (neuen Tab)(Englisch) erfÃ¤hrst du mehr Ã¼ber den Unterschied zwischen Debit-, Kredit- und Prepaidkarten.Kosten:Â 
Diese Methode ist zwar die schnellste und einfachste, um Geld auf dein N26 Konto zu laden â€“ fÃ¼r uns ist es allerdings teurer, Geld sofort auf deinem Konto verfÃ¼gbar zu machen. Andere Methoden fÃ¼r das Aufladen deines Kontos sind gÃ¼nstiger.Â Das erste Mal Aufladen ist immer kostenlos. Danach berechnen wir jedes Mal eine GebÃ¼hr von 3 %. Denn wenn du Geld von einer anderen Bankkarte oder dem Wallet auf dein Konto lÃ¤dst, wird es nicht direkt auf dein N26 Konto Ã¼bertragen â€“ die GebÃ¼hr deckt die Kosten ab, die aufkommen, weil wir das Geld trotzdem sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verfÃ¼gbar machen.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:ãƒ» iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
ãƒ» Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.Â Rememberâ€”you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile appâ€”youâ€™ll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRememberâ€”you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, youâ€™ll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).Â To unpair your old smartphone:Go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to ğŸ‘¤ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content: We collaborate with many partners. Thatâ€™s why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldnâ€™t be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).Youâ€™re taxable in the United States. If so, you wonâ€™t be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.
