title: Round-Up Savings
content: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

title: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
content:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select â€˜Forgot Passwordâ€™ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo descargar mi informaciÃ³n personal?
content: La RegulaciÃ³n General de ProtecciÃ³n de Datos (RGPD) es una nueva regulaciÃ³n europea sobre la protecciÃ³n de datos y la privacidad que entrÃ³ en vigor el 25 de mayo de 2018. Como respuesta a esta ley, hemos aÃ±adido la opciÃ³n de exportar tu informaciÃ³n en laÂ Web App (pestaÃ±a nueva): entra enÂ ğŸ‘¤ Mi Cuenta, despuÃ©s enÂ ConfiguraciÃ³n PersonalÂ y finalmente haz clic enÂ Tus datos personales.Como banco mÃ³vil que somos, entendemos la importancia de la seguridad de los datos. Debes saber que almacenamos el mÃ­nimo de datos posibles, solo aquellos que estamos obligados a tener por ley. AdemÃ¡s, eliminamos los datos una vez que dejan de ser necesarios para nuestros productos o servicios.El artÃ­culo 20 de la RGPD afirma que tienes derecho a la portabilidad de tus datos y te permite cambiar de proveedor de servicios en caso de que quieras abrir una cuenta bancaria con otro banco. Por ello y de acuerdo con este artÃ­culo tenemos que enviarte estos datos en un formato legible por mÃ¡quina. Ten en cuenta que este archivo estÃ¡ destinado a la portabilidad de datos y puede que tu ordenador no pueda leer archivos en formato JSON. En caso de que puedas abrir el archivo, es posible que sea difÃ­cil de entender ya que no estÃ¡ pensando para que las personas lo puedan comprender, si no una mÃ¡quina. Como somos un banco online, entendemos la importancia de la protecciÃ³n de datos. Por ello, tomamos medidas de seguridad extra antes de que puedas descargar tus datos. Hacemos esto para asegurarnos de que el titular de la cuenta es la persona que estÃ¡ solicitando los datos.CÃ³mo descargar tus datosPuedes solicitar la descarga de datos personales tanto de tu cuenta actual como de una cuenta que hayas cerrado. La informaciÃ³n viene en un formato de lectura electrÃ³nica para que puedas compartirla con terceros si lo deseas.Clientes actualesPor favor inicie sesiÃ³n enÂ esta pÃ¡gina (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â utilizando la misma informaciÃ³n de acceso a su cuenta de N26.TendrÃ¡s que crear una contraseÃ±a temporal para cuando te enviemos el documento a tu email. Este link estarÃ¡ activo 24 horas desde que recibes el email. Recuerda que si la contraseÃ±a se introduce errÃ³neamente 5 veces, el link caducarÃ¡ y tendrÃ¡s que realizar otra solicitud.Antiguos clientesPuedes descargar tus datos aÃºn despuÃ©s de haber cerrado tu cuenta. Para solicitar esta informaciÃ³n completa elÂ formulario (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â y asegÃºrate de que los datos coinciden con los de tu antigua cuenta. NecesitarÃ¡s:nombre, apellido, nÃºmero de identidad y fecha de expiraciÃ³n del documento que proporcionaste al abrir la cuenta (DNI o pasaporte)email registrado en tu cuentafecha (mes y aÃ±o) en la que creaste y cerraste la cuenta (revisa el email que recibiste al confirmar tu direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico en el proceso de registro)Por motivos de seguridad, tenemos que asegurarnos de que realmente eres tÃº quien estÃ¡ descargando los datos; si algÃºn campo estÃ¡ incorrecto o incompleto, tu peticiÃ³n no serÃ¡ aceptada.TendrÃ¡s que crear una contraseÃ±a temporal para cuando te enviemos el documento a tu email. Este link estarÃ¡ activo 24 horas desde que recibes el email. Recuerda que si la contraseÃ±a se introduce errÃ³neamente 5 veces, el link caducarÃ¡ y tendrÃ¡s que realizar otra solicitud.Si quieres mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre la recopilaciÃ³n, el uso y el procesamiento de tus datos personales, visita nuestraÂ PolÃ­tica de Privacidad (pestaÃ±a nueva).

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app youâ€™ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upperÂ right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.â„¹ï¸ Â Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Wie lade ich Freunde zu N26 ein?
content: Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald du dein Konto vollstÃ¤ndig erÃ¶ffnet hast. title: Wie kann ich meine Karten-PIN Ã¤ndern?

Falls du deine PIN vergessen hast oder deine Karten-PIN Ã¤ndern willst, kannst du das in wenigen Schritten direkt in der N26 App tun.Stelle bitte sicher, dass dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto verknÃ¼pft und deine Karte aktiviert ist. HierfÃ¼r muss die Karte in ein KartenlesegerÃ¤t oder einen Geldautomaten eingesteckt werden und die Transaktion durch Eingabe der Karten-PIN erfolgen.UngÃ¼ltige oder falsche PINAus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden akzeptieren wir keine PIN, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder Zahlenkombinationen mit Wiederholungen oder Sequenzen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) zusammensetzt. Falls deine gewÃ¼nschte PIN nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Falls du dreimal hintereinander die falsche PIN eingibst, wird deine Karte aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden automatisch gesperrt. Nimm in diesem Fall Kontakt zu unserem Kundenservice in der App auf. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Deine Karten-PIN ist nicht dasselbe wie deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN. Wenn du willst, kannst du aber dieselbe Zahlenkombination fÃ¼r beide PINs nutzen.Wenn du nach dem Ã„ndern deiner PIN Probleme bei Kartenzahlungen hast, kann das daran liegen, dass du sie noch nicht mit dem Chip oder am Geldautomaten aktiviert hast (siehe Schritt 6 weiter oben).

title: Why isnâ€™t my photo verification working?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Applies to all regions except GermanyFirst, geolocation must be enabled. Then review theÂ guide (new tab)Â weâ€™ve created to help you take the best pictures.Most photoÂ verificationsÂ fail due to bad picture quality.Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).Make sure youâ€™re the only person in the photo.Check your document.We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.We only accept national IDs and passports.Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesnâ€™t go through, you can just start over again.As soon as your verification is complete, weâ€™ll send you your N26 Mastercard.Â DeliveriesÂ take up to 10 days.Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.Â

title: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
content: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you.Â This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

title: Was ist meine PIN?
content: Das Wichtigste zuerst: Bei N26 gibt es zwei verschiedene PIN-Codes â€“ deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN und deine Karten-PIN. Gut zu wissen: Du kannst beide PINs selbst erstellen.Mit deiner BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) bestÃ¤tigst du alle Aktionen, die du in der App machst â€“ zum Beispiel Ãœberweisungen, PasswortÃ¤nderungen, CASH26 etc. Du erstellst die BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN in der App, wenn du dein Konto zum ersten Mal mit deinem Smartphone verknÃ¼pfst.Du kannst sie hier Ã¤ndern: Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Ã„ndere deinen BestÃ¤tigungscode.Deine Karten-PIN (neuen Tab) brauchst du beim Geldabheben oder wenn du in einem GeschÃ¤ft mit Karte zahlen willst. Du erstellst deine Karten-PIN in der App, gleich nachdem du deine N26 Karte erhalten und aktiviert hast. Du kannst sie hier Ã¤ndern: Karten > Einstellungen > PIN zurÃ¼cksetzen. Falls du in Frankreich, Spanien, Irland, Griechenland, Finnland oder Estland lebst, musst du Bargeld abheben, um deine neue PIN zu bestÃ¤tigen.Wichtig:Wir senden dir niemals eine PIN per Post oder Ã¼ber einen unserer KommunikationskanÃ¤le. Nur du selbst solltest deine PINs kennen.Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden akzeptieren wir keine PINs, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder einer Kombination aus Wiederholungen oder Zahlenreihen (z. B. 1994, 1331 oder 1234) zusammensetzen. Falls deine gewÃ¼nschte Nummer nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Weitere Informationen Ã¼ber diese PINs findest du in den entsprechenden Support Center Artikeln, die wir oben fÃ¼r dich verlinkt haben.

title: Comment N26 investit mon argent ?
content: En rÃ¨gle gÃ©nÃ©rale, nous aspirons Ã  mettre les dÃ©pÃ´ts de nos clients Ã  disposition pour les crÃ©dits pour nos utilisateurs, Ã  condition qu'ils aient une solvabilitÃ© appropriÃ©e.Â Concernant les liquiditÃ©s non-utilisÃ©es pour les opÃ©rations envers les clients, N26 poursuit une stratÃ©gie d'investissement Ã  faible risque. Nous plaÃ§ons lâ€™argent de nos clients auprÃ¨s de la Deutsche Bundesbank et auprÃ¨s dâ€™autres banques europÃ©ennes de la zone euro uniquement dont la catÃ©gorie de risque est faible et la maturitÃ© courte. De plus, nous refinanÃ§ons des prÃªts aux collectivitÃ©s publiques en Allemagne (villes et communes) et nous investissons dans des obligations d'Etat en euros.Nous ne sommes pas un Ã©tablissement de trading et donc n'investissons pas pour rÃ©aliser des profits Ã  court terme.Â Nous ne spÃ©culons ni sur les matiÃ¨res premiÃ¨res, ni sur les devises, ni sur les bitcoins ou toutes autres classes dâ€™actifs.

title: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
content: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.Â Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.Â

title: Come contattare N26?
content:
Ci sono diversi modi per contattare il nostro Supporto Clienti, ma l'opzione migliore Ã¨ sempre aprire una chat sicura quando effettui l'accesso all'app. Questo ci permetterÃ  di verificare la tua identitÃ  e fornirti informazioni e supporto specifici.La nostra chat Ã¨ disponibile tutti i giorni dalle 07:00 alle 23:00, anche la domenica e nei giorni festivi.Come contattarci tramite appCome chattare con noiApri una chat di assistenzaLa chat inizierÃ  non appena effettui l'accesso.Come chiamarci
(solo per conti Premium)Possiamo metterti in contatto con il nostro Supporto Clienti solo se ci chiami al numero registrato nel tuo conto. Se devi registrare un nuovo numero di telefono, segui i passaggi descritti in questa pagina: Come cambiare il mio numero di telefono.Attenzione: per contattarci al telefono devi possedere un conto N26 premium (You, Smart o Metal).Supporto telefonico (solo premium)Non hai accesso all'app?Non sei ancora cliente di N26?Se non hai un conto con noi ma hai domande di carattere generale sui nostri prodotti e servizi, puoi aprire una chat visitatore qui sotto oppure inviarci un email a support@n26.com (il tempo di attesa per l'e-mail potrebbe essere piÃ¹ lungo).Hai perso lâ€™accesso al tuo conto?Il tuo telefono Ã¨ smarrito o si Ã¨ rotto? Stai riscontrando problemi per effettuare l'accesso nell'app e accedere al tuo conto? Siamo spiacenti di sapere questo problema e ti aiuteremo a risolverlo se aprirai una chat visitatore qui sotto o se ci invierai un'e-mail a support@n26.com (il tempo di attesa per l'e-mail potrebbe essere piÃ¹ lungo).Devi modificare i tuoi dati personali? Segui le istruzioni riportate in questa pagina.
Come posso cambiare il mio numero di telefono, l'indirizzo o altri dati personali?Attenzione: per la tua sicurezza possiamo aiutarti con domande relative ai dati personali solo se apri una chat di assistenza una volta effettuato l'accesso all'app.Apri una chat visitatoreNota bene: non siamo in grado di assisterti se ti presenterai di persona nei nostri uffici. Ti preghiamo di utilizzare solo i nostri canali designati per contattarci.

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: â‚¬5,000Monthly limit: â‚¬20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of â‚¬1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of â‚¬400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of â‚¬2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of â‚¬1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: â‚¬1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limitÂ Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: How to prove my identity?
content: As a licensed bank, itâ€™s important that we know who our customers are. Thatâ€™s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. Weâ€™ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.Â If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we wonâ€™t be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.Â

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of ourÂ Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isnâ€™t rewarded because the invited friend hasnâ€™t made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates theÂ Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

title: How to block my N26 card?
content: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go toÂ the Cards tabÂ and selectÂ Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself againstÂ unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

content: Si ya estÃ¡s esperando una tarjeta, te rogamos que esperes hasta que haya expirado el plazo de entrega estimado. Los envÃ­os estÃ¡ndar tardan hasta 10 dÃ­as laborables. Debe tratarse de un domicilio particular (no se aceptan direcciones comerciales).Introduce tu cÃ³digo postal sin espacios.Si procede, aÃ±ade el nÃºmero de edificio, el nÃºmero de escalera y el cÃ³digo de puerta a la informaciÃ³n adicional de la direcciÃ³n en la app mÃ³vil.Si tu direcciÃ³n contiene caracteres especiales, ponte en contacto con nuestro servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente desde la app.Si vas a mudarte prÃ³ximamente, plantÃ©ate contratar un envÃ­o express y no olvides seleccionar el paÃ­s y la direcciÃ³n a la que vas a mudarte.DespuÃ©s de eso:Ve a la Â«Pantalla de inicioÂ» y, a continuaciÃ³n, a Â«TarjetasÂ».Pulsa Â«ConfiguraciÃ³n de la tarjetaÂ».De tu lista de tarjetas, busca la tarjeta que quieras volver a pedir.Por Ãºltimo, selecciona Â«Pedir una tarjeta nuevaÂ».CostesLa primera Mastercard que recibes es gratuita con N26Â Smart, You y Metal. title: How to use Moneybeam?
content: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to beÂ visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam:Â Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is â‚¬1000 per transaction and â‚¬5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).Â Â Â To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about ourÂ friend referral program.

title: CÃ³mo ingresar dinero en N26
content:
Hay varias formas de aÃ±adir dinero a tu cuenta (pestaÃ±a nueva) de N26 y cada una tiene lo suyo. Te lo resumimos yendo al grano:Por MoneyBeam: es nuestro sistema de transferencias inmediatas entre usuarios de N26. Puedes pedÃ­rselo a un contacto con el botÃ³n de Solicitar dinero.Transferencia SEPA: puedes recibir transferencias en euros y desde cualquiera de los paÃ­ses de la zona SEPA. Solo necesitas el IBAN de tu cuenta y tu nombre completo, tal y como aparece en el documento de identidad que utilizaste para abrir la cuenta (incluso con una cuenta Business). 
La transferencia serÃ¡ inmediata siempre y cuando proceda de un banco que emite transferencias SEPA inmediatas. Si no, se procesarÃ¡ como una transferencia SEPA normal, que puede tardar hasta 2 dÃ­as laborables. Ten en cuenta que, si se hace una transferencia justo antes de un fin de semana o un dÃ­a festivo, el plazo obviamente se prolongarÃ¡. A partir del 1 de julio de 2020, habrÃ¡ un lÃ­mite de 100.000 â‚¬ para las transferencias entrantes inmediatas. Las transferencias SEPA normales entrantes no tienen lÃ­mite.Con tarjeta de dÃ©bito o crÃ©dito, Apple Pay o Google Pay (pestaÃ±a nueva): se introducen los detalles de otra tarjeta* o de tu cuenta de Apple o Google Pay desde la app de N26 y el dinero aparece inmediatamente. Puedes ingresar de 20 a 450Â â‚¬ al mes y la primera vez es gratis; a partir de ahÃ­, hay una comisiÃ³n del dell' 3 %.En efectivo a travÃ©s de CASH26 (pestaÃ±a nueva): disponible en mÃ¡s de 500 establecimientos por toda EspaÃ±a y en todos los de Alemania, Austria, Italia y Grecia.iDEAL (inmediata): Disponible solo en PaÃ­ses Bajos para clientes con TÃ©rminos y Condiciones neerlandeses y con cuenta en iDEAL. El primer depÃ³sito es gratis. Los siguientes depÃ³sitos cobran una comisiÃ³n del 1,5 % del importe del depÃ³sito.GiroPay (inmediata):Disponible solo en Alemania para clientes con TÃ©rminos y Condiciones alemanes y con cuenta en GiroPay.EPS (inmediata): Disponible solo en Austria para clientes con TÃ©rminos y Condiciones austriacos y con cuenta en EPS.Bancontact (inmediata): Disponible solo en BÃ©lgica para clientes con TÃ©rminos y Condiciones belgas y con cuenta en Bancontact.* No se aceptan tarjetas de crÃ©dito American Express.

title: Wie kann ich mein Konto schÃ¼tzen?
content: Die Sicherheit deines Kontos und deiner Daten hat bei uns hÃ¶chste PrioritÃ¤t. Falls du jemals den Verdacht hast, dass deine N26 Login-Daten nicht mehr sicher sind oder dass jemand einen Chat in deinem Namen erÃ¶ffnet, ist es Ã¤uÃŸerst wichtig, dass du sofort dein N26 Anmeldepasswort Ã¤nderst. Logge dich dafÃ¼r in die App ein und gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort Ã¤ndern. Bitte wÃ¤hle ein sicheres Passwort aus und halte es geheim.Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du alleine deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen kÃ¶nnen. Mehr Informationen darÃ¼ber, wie du deine IdentitÃ¤t schÃ¼tzen kannst, findest du in unserem Artikel â€œWie kann ich meine IdentitÃ¤t schÃ¼tzen?â€.Wenn du glaubst, dass dein Konto in irgendeiner Form gefÃ¤hrdet ist oder unerlaubte Ã„nderungen vorgenommen wurden, kontaktiere uns bitte umgehend.Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

title: How to change my card limits?
content: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:â‚¬1,000 for withdrawals from ATMsâ‚¬5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500â‚¬ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050â‚¬ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:â‚¬20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: How to change my card limits?
content: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:â‚¬1,000 for withdrawals from ATMsâ‚¬5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500â‚¬ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050â‚¬ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:â‚¬20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: How to use Spaces?
content: To start using your Spaces, youâ€™ll want to go to the â€˜Spacesâ€™ section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the â€˜Spacesâ€™ homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap â€˜Create a new spaceâ€™ in the â€˜Spacesâ€™ homepageSelect one of the below options:â€˜Saving for a goalâ€™ - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).â€˜Sharing moneyâ€™ - Allows you to create a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.â€˜Create now, decide laterâ€™ - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now letâ€™s start using â€˜Spacesâ€™!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your â€˜Main Accountâ€™ or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the â€˜manageâ€™Then press â€˜Lock Spaceâ€™ or â€˜Unlock Spaceâ€™Enter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the â€˜Settingsâ€™ cog (top-right corner)Select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap â€˜Manageâ€™:To create a savings goal, select â€˜Create my goalâ€™ (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then â€˜Set goalâ€™To enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select â€˜Manage Round-UpsToggle â€˜Enable Round-Upsâ€™You will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap â€˜Create a ruleâ€™Choose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:ãƒ» iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
ãƒ» Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.Â Rememberâ€”you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile appâ€”youâ€™ll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRememberâ€”you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, youâ€™ll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).Â To unpair your old smartphone:Go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to ğŸ‘¤ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

title: How to top up my account?
content: Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways. To do so, simply go to the N26 app and select 'Add Money' to see the available options:1. SEPA Transfer (Up to 2 business days):The transfer must be in EUR and within the SEPA zone.You will need to provide your IBAN and your name as it is written on the ID you used to create your account.If you have a Business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names.Since 1st July 2020 a limit of 100.000â‚¬ for incoming SEPA instant transfers applies.No limit applies to normal incoming SEPA transfers2. Debit or Credit Card (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details from the sending account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.3. Apple Pay or Google Pay (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the Apple Pay or Google Pay account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.4. Moneybeam (instant):You can receive money from other N26 users.5. CASH26 (instant):Available in Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain and Greece.Deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.6. iDEAL (instant):Available only in the Netherlands for customer with Dutch T&C and with a iDEAL accountThe first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 1.5 % of the deposit amount.7. GiroPay (instant):Only available in Germany for customers with German Terms and Conditions and a Giropay account.8. EPS (instant):Only available in Austria for customers with Austrian Terms and Conditions and an EPS account.9. Bancontact (instant):Only available in Belgium for customers with Belgian Terms and Conditions and a Bancontact account.Important reminder for SEPA Transfers:If you deposit money into your N26 account via SEPA transfer, please make sure that the recipient name corresponds to your name as it is entered on the identification document that you used for your verification when opening the account.(Especially if you have an N26 Business account - we do not accept company names.) An incoming transfer is booked in real time, as if it was made as a real time transfer, otherwise a transfer takes 1-2 working days. From July 1st, 2020, there will be a limit of â‚¬ 100,000 for incoming real-time transfers. In France, the first payment must be made to your N26 account from an account that you own. (In all other countries it is not necessary that the other bank account belongs to you.)

title: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
content:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.Â How does it work?Â The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?Â Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of AttorneyÂ Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a personâ€™s identity, and itâ€™s not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.Â As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.Â Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

content: Nur verfÃ¼gbar fÃ¼r Kunden mit unseren deutschen, Ã¶sterreichischen oder niederlÃ¤ndischen AGB.Deine Maestro kann nicht fÃ¼r Online-EinkÃ¤ufe verwendet werden und ist nicht in das deutsche Electronic Cash- (EC-) oder Girocard-System eingebunden.Du kannst sie nicht fÃ¼r Apple Pay or Google Pay verwenden.Aber du kannst deine Karte an Geldautomaten oder GeschÃ¤ften verwenden, die das Maestro-Symbol tragen. JedeÂ Abhebung am GeldautomatenÂ mit der Maestrocard kostet 2 â‚¬ (bei FremdwÃ¤hrungen zuzÃ¼glich einer GebÃ¼hr von 1,7% auf den abgehobenen Betrag).Du kannstÂ deine Maestro CardÂ direkt in der App bestellen.Wenn du Probleme mit deiner Maestrocard hast, prÃ¼fe zuerst, ob deineÂ KarteneinstellungenÂ aktiviert sind. title: Comment mon argent est-il protÃ©gÃ© chez N26 ?
content: Protection des dÃ©pÃ´tsLe Fonds de Protection des DÃ©pÃ´ts allemand (nouvel onglet) protÃ¨ge tous les dÃ©pÃ´ts jusquâ€™Ã  100 000 â‚¬ dÃ©tenus dans les Ã‰tats membres de l'Union europÃ©enne.Â Â En tant que titulaire d'une licence bancaire, N26 Bank est obligÃ© de proposer une protection des dÃ©pÃ´ts. N26 est membre du Fonds de protection des dÃ©pÃ´ts allemand.Â Comment N26 dÃ©tecte-t-elle et surveille-t-elle les fraudes ?N26 a une Ã©quipe spÃ©cialisÃ©e axÃ©e sur la surveillance et lâ€™identification des transactions suspectes sur notre plateforme. En utilisant des modÃ¨les statistiques, dâ€™algorithmes avancÃ©s et d'analyses du comportement humain, notre Ã©quipe dâ€™experts s'assure que votre argent est toujours entre de bonnes mains.Que fait N26 en cas de dÃ©tection de comportement frauduleux dans sa base de clients ?Lorsque notre Ã©quipe dâ€™experts dÃ©tecte une activitÃ© irrÃ©guliÃ¨re, nous prenons toutes les mesures dâ€™attÃ©nuation, conformÃ©ment aux lois rÃ©glementaires, pour empÃªcher des dÃ©gÃ¢ts supplÃ©mentaires dont la fermeture et le signalement aux autoritÃ©s des comptes incriminÃ©s. Lorsque des transactions suspectes indiquent des cas de blanchiment dâ€™argent, de financement dâ€™activitÃ© terroriste, ou de toute autre activitÃ© criminelle, N26 signale immÃ©diatement ces activitÃ©s Ã  lâ€™unitÃ© dâ€™investigation des transactions financiÃ¨res allemande (Financial Transaction Investigation Unit, FIU) ou aux entitÃ©s de supervision locales.Quels sont les investissements de N26 en matiÃ¨re de sÃ©curitÃ© ?Fin 2019, nous avons crÃ©Ã© lâ€™Ã©quipe Trust and Safety. Elle travaille avec lâ€™Ã©quipe de sÃ©curitÃ© informatique et son travail consiste Ã  protÃ©ger les utilisateurs, leurs comptes ainsi que leurs donnÃ©es des cybercriminels. De plus, N26 a doublÃ© la taille de son effectif LCB (Lutte contre le blanchiment des capitaux), et a mis en place des processus et des plateformes de surveillance des transactions. Cela nous a permis de dÃ©tecter et dâ€™empÃªcher des activitÃ©s malveillantes en nous basant sur des donnÃ©es historiques. Nous avons ainsi pu conserver une longueur dâ€™avance sur les personnes malveillantes. Nous investissons Ã©normÃ©ment dans la technologie et dans lâ€™intelligence artificielle pour exÃ©cuter des modÃ¨les statistiques et des algorithmes avancÃ©s, accompagnÃ©s dâ€™une analyse comportementale.

title: Wie kÃ¼ndige ich meine N26 Premium-Mitgliedschaft?
content:
N26 Smart, N26 You oder N26 Metal VertrÃ¤ge haben zunÃ¤chst eine Laufzeit von einem Jahr mit einer automatischen VerlÃ¤ngerung nach den ersten 12 Monaten und werden dann auf eine unbefristete Vertragslaufzeit geschlossen.Du kannst dich jederzeit dazu entscheiden, diese automatische Erneuerung wÃ¤hrend der ersten 12 Monate deines Vertrags zu unterbinden.Nach dieser Erneuerung wird der Vertrag auf unbefristete Zeit geschlossen. Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft jedoch jederzeit kÃ¼ndigen.In diesem Artikel erfÃ¤hrst du den Unterschied zwischen Widerruf, KÃ¼ndigung der Mitgliedschaft und Unterbindung der Erneuerung deiner Mitgliedschaft. Du hast 3 Optionen:Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der 14-tÃ¤gigen Widerrufsfrist widerrufen (dies ist eine gesetzliche Frist; von deinem Widerrufsrecht kannst du Gebrauch machen, indem du uns kontaktierst).Du kannst die Erneuerung deiner Mitgliedschaft jederzeit vor Ablauf der ersten 12-monatigen Vertragslaufzeit unterbinden, indem du uns per Chat kontaktierst.Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft jederzeit kÃ¼ndigen (und zwar sofort und ohne EinschrÃ¤nkungen, indem du uns per Chat kontaktierst).Umstellung von einem Premiumkonto auf ein anderes PremiumkontoWenn du mÃ¶chtest, kannst du dein Konto jetzt auf ein anderes Premiumkonto umstellen, ohne auf ein Standardkonto wechseln zu mÃ¼ssen. So behÃ¤ltst du all deine Spaces, deine Aufrundungsregeln, deinen Einkommensverteiler sowie deine bestehenden Karten und Zahlungen.Logge dich dazu in deiner mobilen App ein, gehe zu "Mein Konto" und Ã¶ffne deine Mitgliedschaftsdaten. WÃ¤hle "Mitgliedschaft Ã¤ndern". Dann kannst du eine andere Premium-Mitgliedschaft wÃ¤hlen, die besser zu deinen BedÃ¼rfnissen passt.Â WiderrufDu kannst deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der gesetzlichen 14-tÃ¤gigen Widerrufsfrist widerrufen. Dieser Zeitraum beginnt, sobald die erste monatliche GebÃ¼hr abgebucht wird. Kontaktiere uns einfach, damit wir dir weiterhelfen kÃ¶nnen. Wenn du eine unserer Premium-Mitgliedschaften widerrufst, kannst du spÃ¤ter wieder auf die gleiche oder eine andere Mitgliedschaft upgraden.Die VerlÃ¤ngerung deiner Mitgliedschaft beendenDeine N26 Premium-Mitgliedschaft hat zunÃ¤chst eine Vertragslaufzeit von 12 Monaten.Â  Nach Ablauf der ersten 12 Monate verlÃ¤ngert sich die Mitgliedschaft automatisch und wird auf eine unbefristete Vertragslaufzeit umgestellt.Wir benachrichtigen dich 8 Wochen im Voraus per E-Mail Ã¼ber die VerlÃ¤ngerung der Mitgliedschaft. Du kannst die automatisch VerlÃ¤ngerung wÃ¤hrend der ersten 12 Monate beenden.Wenn du dich dafÃ¼r entscheidest, die VerlÃ¤ngerung zu beenden, kannst du deine N26 Mastercard und alle deine Premium-Mitgliedschaftsvorteile bis zum Ablauf deiner Mitgliedschaft weiterhin nutzen. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Versicherungsschutz so lange behÃ¤ltst (bei N26 You und N26 Metal), wie du deine MitgliedschaftsgebÃ¼hr zahlen musst. Danach wird dir am Stichtag der VertragsverlÃ¤ngerung unmittelbar nach dem Downgrade eine digitale Karte ausgestellt. Dazu muss dein Kontostand mindestens 10 â‚¬ betragen. Du brauchst uns deswegen nicht extra zu kontaktieren, da die Angelegenheit automatisch bearbeitet wird.KÃ¼ndigung deiner Mitgliedschaft jederzeitWenn du deine Mitgliedschaft nach Ablauf der 14-tÃ¤gigen Widerrufsfrist kÃ¼ndigen mÃ¶chtest, kontaktiere uns bitte. Wenn du diese Option bei N26 You oder N26 Metal wÃ¤hlst, werden deine Versicherungsleistungen eingestellt und deine Smart, You und Metal Premiumkarten deaktiviert.Wenn du dein Konto endgÃ¼ltig schlieÃŸen mÃ¶chtest, lies dir unseren Artikel Wie schlieÃŸe ich mein N26 Konto? durch.FAQs zur KÃ¼ndigung der N26 Premium-MitgliedschaftMuss ich mein Konto schlieÃŸen, um meine Premium-Mitgliedschaft zu kÃ¼ndigen?
Nein, du kannst einfach in der N26 App dein Abo Ã¤ndern und dein neues Konto wird sofort eingerichtet.Was passiert mit meiner IBAN, wenn ich meine Premium-Mitgliedschaft kÃ¼ndige?
Die Ã„nderung deines Abos hat keine Auswirkungen auf deine Bankdaten, sodass deine IBAN unverÃ¤ndert bleibt.

title: Come posso effettuare bonifici in valute estere?
content: Collaboriamo con Wise (nuova tabella) per rendere piÃ¹ facili e veloci i bonifici in valuta estera. Wise offre tassi di cambio in tempo reale e nessuna commissione nascosta. Ecco come puoi effettuare un bonifico in valuta estera:Accedi alla tua app N26 e clicca su Dal mio contoSeleziona Bonifici in valuta estera. Inserisci l'importo che desideri inviare in Euro. Questo si convertirÃ  automaticamente nella valuta estera che scegli. Clicca su Continua, seleziona un beneficiario dalla tua lista di contatti o Aggiungi un nuovo destinatario.Controlla i dati bancari del beneficiario e invia il bonifico con il tuo PIN di conferma.Se al momento non trovassi laÂ valuta straniera (nuova tabella)Â che stai cercando, visitaÂ Wise (nuova tabella)Â per ulteriori informazioni. Puoi accedere a Wise utilizzando i dati di accesso del tuo conto N26 e selezionando 'Hai dimenticato la password?'. Riceverai un'email da Wise per reimpostare la tua password. Una volta completato questo passaggio, potrai utilizzare questo profilo per tutte le tue operazioni. AffinchÃ© questo processo funzioni, Ã¨ necessario creare prima un profilo Wise tramite l'app N26 e seguire i passaggi per effettuare il bonifico in valuta estera all'interno dell'app, altrimenti non riceverai l'email da Wise per reimpostare la tua password.Ricorda che i bonifici in valuta estera non sono possibili con il conto N26 Business, N26 Business You o N26 Business Metal, nÃ© lo sono i bonifici verso conti aziendali.Wise applica commissioni che verranno indicate prima di confermare il bonifico. Wise supporta i bonifici solo nella valuta principale di un paese. CiÃ² significa, ad esempio, che non possono essere elaborate transazioni in USD verso l'India.

title: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
content: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above â‚¬150 will be charged with a 12.50â‚¬ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than â‚¬150.The maximum fee is â‚¬100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

title: Where to find your Tax ID
content: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If youâ€™re from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TINâ€™s are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben Ã¼ber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If youâ€™re a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des ProcÃ©dures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authoritiesâ€™ database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TINâ€™s are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TINâ€™s are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If youâ€™ve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

title: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
content: Wenn du dein Passwort vergessen hast oder es Ã¤ndern mÃ¶chtest, wÃ¤hle in der App beim LoginÂ Vergessen?Â oderÂ Passwort vergessen? (neuen Tab)Â in derÂ WebApp (neuen Tab). Wir senden dir einen Link an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse, damit du ein neues Passwort erstellen kannst. Stelle sicher, dass dein neues Passwort unseren Anforderungen entspricht:Wir haben keine spezifischen Anforderungen fÃ¼r unsere PasswÃ¶rter. Wir berechnen die StÃ¤rke in Echtzeit und akzeptieren nur PasswÃ¶rter, die unser Algorithmus als stabil erkennt.Wir empfehlen, dass du anstatt eines Passworts eher eine Passphrase (einen Satz) verwendest, im Sinne von â€œschwer zu erraten, einfach zu erinnernâ€.Wenn unser System dein Passwort nicht akzeptiert, fÃ¼ge weitere Buchstaben hinzu, verwende eine Kombination von Sonderzeichen und Zahlen und achte darauf, dass du zwischen GroÃŸ- und Kleinschreibung variierst.Wenn du dein Passwort sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird dein Kontozugriff vorÃ¼bergehend gesperrt. Nach 30 Minuten kannst du es erneut versuchen.Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: PerchÃ© i pagamenti contactless non funzionano?
content: I pagamenti contactless della tua carta funzionano tramite near field communication (NFC). Se hai riscontrato dei problemi con i pagamenti contactless, ricorda quanto segue:Accertati di aver abilitato i pagamenti contactless nelle impostazioni della tua carta.Se la tua carta Ã¨ nuova, assicurati di averla prima utilizzata presso uno sportello ATM o con chip e PIN. Solo in seguito potrai effettuare anche i pagamenti contactless.I pagamenti contactless della tua carta (NFC) fino a 50â‚¬ non richiedono il PIN della carta. Per importi superiori a 50â‚¬ o per transazioni cumulative superiori a 150â‚¬ dovrai invece inserire il PIN della carta.Chiedi al rivenditore se il terminale Ã¨ abilitato per i pagamenti contactless.L'NFC delle carte N26 Metal si trova solo sul retro della carta. Assicurati di poggiare il retro della carta sul terminale per utilizzare l'NFC (poggiando il lato frontale, non funziona).Assicurati di collocare la tua carta direttamente sulla superficie del terminale compatibile con l'NFC. Se rimuovi la tua carta troppo velocemente o non l'avvicini abbastanza, puoi semplicemente riprovare.Se il pagamento contactless non funziona, prova sempre a pagare con il metodo chip e PIN.

title: Bereavement & probate
content:
How can I inform N26 about a death?Â In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceasedâ€™s bank accounts.Â The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: bereavement.service@n26.comÂ Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbHÂ - Nachlassbearbeitung
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 Berlin, GERMANYPlease inform us on:Â Who is the deceased?Â If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account.Â How can we contact the beneficiaries? Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated.Â  A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?Â If you are facing certain proceedings (i.e. rejection of the inheritance) or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us.Â We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings.Â Please refrain from sending us original documents via mail at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you.Â What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?Â Â Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country.Â However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH is located in Germany.Â When it comes to the relationship between the deceasedâ€™s bank and the beneficiaries, other legal requirements may be applicable than usually in your home country.As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be blocked.Please note that standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates on the account regularly continue to exist after the death of the account holder. Heirs or authorised representatives must have these revoked or deleted.Further, we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax in Germany of the assets belonging to the estate.We will notify the beneficiaries in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceasedâ€™s account with N26.I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death?Â There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.Â It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited.Â Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this.Â For any further information on a specific situation please seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor or any suitable advisory service.
