title: What are Instant transfers?
content: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipientâ€™s bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you wonâ€™t have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49â‚¬Spain - 1,99â‚¬Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99â‚¬The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000â‚¬ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000â‚¬ per day). If youâ€™re using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If youâ€™re paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiverâ€™s details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

title: Â¿QuÃ© es una disputa y cÃ³mo disputar un pago con tarjeta?
content: Â¿Hay alguna transacciÃ³n con tarjeta en tu extracto mensual de N26 que no hayas hecho tÃº? Â¿Pediste algo por internet, pero no te llegÃ³? Sigue leyendo para saber cÃ³mo solucionarlo.Â¿QuÃ© es una disputa?Una disputa es una reclamaciÃ³n de devoluciÃ³n de dinero por un pago con tarjeta, debido a que un comerciante ha efectuado lo que se considera una transacciÃ³n errÃ³nea. El cargo se devuelve cuando la disputa se resuelve en favor del comprador.N26 te permite disputar una transacciÃ³n a travÃ©s de Mastercard para recuperar el dinero de un pago con tarjeta que no hayas realizado tÃº, o en el que han surgido problemas con el comerciante. Por ejemplo, si pediste productos online y no los recibiste en la fecha de entrega indicada, puedes disputar el pago y reclamar la devoluciÃ³n de tu dinero.Â¿CÃ³mo disputar un pago con tarjeta?Puedes disputar una transacciÃ³n desde la app N26 o la WebApp:Ve a la pestaÃ±a de inicio y busca la transacciÃ³n que quieres disputar;pulsa sobre ella para abrir los detalles;selecciona Obtener ayuda con esta transacciÃ³n y sigue los pasos.Importante:Â Si tu disputa es sobre una transacciÃ³n no autorizada (o sea, que no la has hecho tÃº), para que podamos tramitar tu solicitud tendrÃ¡s que bloquear tu tarjeta y pedir una nueva para evitar mÃ¡s fraudes. PodrÃ¡s pedir una tarjeta nueva y bloquear la antigua siguiendo los pasos que se te indican en la app.Si al seleccionar un pago en la app no aparece el botÃ³n para iniciar la disputa, es porque dicha transacciÃ³n todavÃ­a es una autorizaciÃ³n y hay que esperar a que se presente el pago. En este artÃ­culo te explicamos quÃ© es eso de una autorizaciÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva).Si has cerrado tu cuenta y no tienes acceso a la app, tendrÃ¡s que enviar un email a support@n26.com (pestaÃ±a nueva) desde la direcciÃ³n de email con la que te registraste.En este artÃ­culo hemos recopilado algunas preguntas frecuentes sobre cÃ³mo disputar pagos (pestaÃ±a nueva).

title: When will my card arrive?
content: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10â‚¬).Â Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0â‚¬ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25â‚¬ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

title: Comment changer le code PIN de ma carte N26 ?
content: Vous devez choisir un code PIN au moment d'activer votre carte N26. Nous ne dÃ©finissons jamais le code PIN de votre carte. Vous pouvez facilement choisir et modifier votre code PIN dans votre application N26.Pour dÃ©finir le code PIN de votre carte, utilisez l'appareil associÃ© Ã  votre compte N26, puis :Ouvrez l'application N26SÃ©lectionnez la rubrique Cartes et faites dÃ©filer l'Ã©cran jusquâ€™Ã  ce que vous trouviez la carte correspondanteSÃ©lectionnez ParamÃ¨tres puis RÃ©initialiser le code PIN.Saisissez les 10 numÃ©ros du token qui figurent au recto (carte Standard) ou au verso (cartes Smart, You et Metal) de votre carte N26.Choisissez votre nouveau code PIN et confirmez la modification.Avant de pouvoir effectuer des achats sans contact avec votre nouvelle carte, vous devrez effectuer un paiement ou un retrait en distributeur en utilisant le nouveau code PIN sÃ©lectionnÃ©. PIN incorrect ou non validePour des raisons de sÃ©curitÃ©, les codes PIN composÃ©s des Ã©lÃ©ments de votre date de naissance, de votre adresse, de rÃ©pÃ©titions de chiffres ou de suites de chiffres (par exemple, 1994, 1111, 1234 ou 4321) ne sont pas acceptÃ©s. Si le code que vous avez choisi est refusÃ©, nous vous invitons Ã  essayer une combinaison de chiffres diffÃ©rente.Pour des raisons de sÃ©curitÃ©, si vous saisissez un code PIN incorrect trois fois de suite, votre carte sera automatiquement bloquÃ©e. Il vous faudra alors contacter le Service Client depuis le Livechat dans l'application N26 afin de la dÃ©bloquer.Le code PIN de votre carte N26 et votre code de validation (nouvel onglet) sont deux choses diffÃ©rentes. Cependant, vous pouvez choisir la mÃªme combinaison de chiffres pour ces deux codes.Si vous avez modifiÃ© votre code PIN, mais que vous rencontrez un problÃ¨me lors du paiement, il est possible que vous nâ€™ayez pas effectuÃ© de retrait en distributeur.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content: Youâ€™ll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whetherÂ MoneyBeam, standing orders, orÂ CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you eitherÂ ConfirmÂ orÂ CancelÂ it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from yourÂ card PINÂ but you can use the same number for both. Youâ€™ll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN afterÂ connecting your smartphoneÂ (whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN byÂ changing itÂ in the app.

title: Warum muss ich weitere Unterlagen schicken?
content: Sobald du den Verifizierungsprozess zur ErÃ¶ffnung deines N26 Girokontos gestartet hast und du eine E-Mail von uns erhÃ¤ltst, in der wir weitere Informationen anfordern, um mit deiner Anmeldung fortzufahren, lies bitte die folgenden Informationen durch, um dir bei deiner Beantragung zu helfen.N26 ist eine beaufsichtigte Bank. In bestimmten Situationen benÃ¶tigen wir zusÃ¤tzliche Informationen von unseren Kunden, um mit deren Anmeldung fortfahren zu kÃ¶nnen. Es handelt sich dabei um eine Standardanforderung, die mit den gesetzlichen und regulatorischen Anforderungen in Einklang steht. Wir benÃ¶tigen von dir fÃ¼r die ErÃ¶ffnung eines N26 Girokontos spezifische Unterlagen.Wir sind uns bewusst, dass diese Informationen sehr persÃ¶nlich sind und sichern dir zu, dass die Informationen, die du uns schickst, strikt vertraulich behandelt werden. Wir werden sie nur zur ErfÃ¼llung unserer gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen verwenden.Welche Unterlagen muss ich schicken?Nachdem du den Verifizierungsprozess gestartet und eine E-Mail von uns erhalten hast, in der wir dich um weitere Informationen bitten, musst du auf die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast, mit den unten stehenden Informationen antworten. Bitte beachte, dass du nur die Unterlagen schicken musst, die wir in der E-Mail aufgefÃ¼hrt haben. Im Folgenden findest du einfach eine Liste mit den Informationen, die wir anfordern kÃ¶nnen:â€‹Wohnsitznachweis: Beispiel: Gas, Wasser oder Stromrechnung (weniger als 3 Monate alt). Oder eine Meldebescheinigung.Gehaltsnachweis: Beispiel: Einen Arbeitsvertrag, eine Gehaltsabrechnung oder eine VermÃ¶gens- und EinkommenserklÃ¤rung (falls du uns eine der beiden letztgenannten Ã¼bermittelst, schwÃ¤rze bitte alle Angaben zu deinem religiÃ¶sen Bekenntnis und deinem Familienstand, falls sie darin enthalten sind)Grund, warum du im Land X lebst: Beispiel: Visa-Dokumenten, Studiennachweis, VermÃ¶gensquelle:Beispiel: VertrÃ¤ge, KontoauszÃ¼ge, Informationen zur VerÃ¤uÃŸerung von VermÃ¶genswerten, Kapitalgewinne oder ErbeWie schicke ich euch diese Informationen?Bitte beachte, dass unser System standardmÃ¤ÃŸig dazu ausgelegt ist, die Zusendung per E-Mail mittels TLS-VerschlÃ¼sselung oder besser zu schÃ¼tzen. Wenn dein E-Mail-Server eine eingehende TLS-VerschlÃ¼sselung oder eine bessere Verbindung akzeptiert, werden die E-Mails, die du mit uns getauscht hast, Ã¼ber das Netzwerk verschlÃ¼sselt (Ende-zu-Ende). Wenn dein E-Mail-Server keine TLS-VerschlÃ¼sselung oder bessere Verbindung unterstÃ¼tzt, wird die E-Mail, die du uns versendest, mÃ¶glicherweise nicht verschlÃ¼sselt. Daher empfehlen wir dir, die physische Postversandoption zu verwenden, die eine sichere MÃ¶glichkeit darstellt, Informationen mit der folgenden Adresse auszutauschen: N26 GmbH, Sign-up document, KlosterstraÃŸe 62, 10179 Berlin.WÃ¼nschst du eine Zusendung per E-Mail, lies bitte die Anweisungen in der diesbezÃ¼glichen E-Mail durch, die du von uns erhalten hast.Â Wenn du dich dafÃ¼r entscheidest, per E-Mail zu antworten, schicke bitte auch gescannte Kopien, Fotos und/oder Screenshots mit detaillierten Beschreibung des jeweiligen Dokuments. Alles muss klar und lesbar sein und darf nicht grÃ¶ÃŸer als 15 MB sein.Du solltest innerhalb der nÃ¤chsten 3 Werktage eine RÃ¼ckmeldung von uns erhalten.Wichtig: Das Versenden falscher und/oder unzutreffender Informationen ist eine Straftat. In einem solchen Fall kÃ¶nnen wir deinen Antrag nicht annehmen.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.Â Â Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rulesÂ As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.Â Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.Â Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.Â For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating â€œpermanent homeâ€ as a stronger form of attachment than â€œtemporary residenceâ€). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification numberÂ Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each countryâ€™s tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.Â Â The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authoritiesÂ As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.Â Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.Â We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.Â Our recommendationÂ Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.Â We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick â€œAdd new tax countryâ€, indicate whether youâ€™re a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if youâ€™re tax resident in more than one country), click â€œAdd new tax countryâ€ and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.Weâ€™re unable to advise you on your tax status. If youâ€™re unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.Â

title: What is my PIN number?
content:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codesâ€”your Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun factâ€”you create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. Youâ€™re the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

title: Espacios Compartidos - Â¿QuÃ© es un poder notarial?
content: El modelo legal que cumplen los Espacios Compartidos se llama Poder notarial (Kontovollmacht in German).Â Un espacio compartido no es lo mismo que una cuenta compartida en el sentido tradicional, donde cada persona es propietaria parcialmente del dinero de la cuenta. En el caso del espacio compartido, cuando los participantes reciben el poder notarial, obtienen el derecho de actuar en nombre del administrador, como por ejemplo para recibir y realizar transferencias.Â La persona que autoriza a las demÃ¡s a actuar en su nombre es el administrador y es el Ãºnico propietario de la cuenta. El administrador tiene que ser un usuario con cuenta de N26 premium (N26 You, N26 Metal o N26 Business You).Esto significa, que el creador del espacio compartido es su dueÃ±o legal.Â El dueÃ±o del espacio compartido:Â - Tiene posesiÃ³n de todos los fondos dentro del espacio.Â - Puede transferir fondos a la cuenta o desde la cuenta siempre que los necesite.Â - Puede invitar a otros usuarios a su espacio compartido dÃ¡ndoles poder notarial.- Puede revocar el poder notarial del resto de los participantes siempre que quiera.- Puede cerrar el espacio compartido (todos los fondos se transferirÃ¡n a la cuenta principal del administrador).Cuando se le concede poder notarial a una persona, esta tendrÃ¡ acceso a todo el dinero del espacio compartido. Esto significa que cada participante enviar y recibir dinero en ese espacio compartido.Â N26 Bank GmbH no se hace responsable de los pagos cubiertos por el poder notarial.MÃ¡s sobre Espacios CompartidosÂ¿QuÃ© son los Espacios Compartidos?Â¿CÃ³mo crear un Espacios Compartido?

title: Â¿Por quÃ© no me ha dado dinero el cajero automÃ¡tico?
content: A veces pasa. Vas al cajero automÃ¡tico, la cantidad solicitada se descuenta de tu saldo, pero el cajero no te da el efectivo.Lo primero que debes hacer es comprobar los lÃ­mites de tu tarjeta entrando en Tarjetas y seleccionando ConfiguraciÃ³n de Tarjeta. AsegÃºrate de que las retiradas de efectivo en cajeros estÃ¡n activadas.Aunque no podamos decir con certeza de quÃ© se trata, sÃ­ que podemos ayudarte a recuperar tu dinero. La cantidad que se ha restado de tu saldo disponible no es mÃ¡s que una autorizaciÃ³n (una reserva o cantidad bloqueada). Como la transacciÃ³n no finalizÃ³ con Ã©xito, la autorizaciÃ³n caducarÃ¡ en unas horas o en un mÃ¡ximo de 12 dÃ­as hÃ¡biles y el dinero volverÃ¡ a tu cuenta.Si en 12 dÃ­as el dinero no ha sido desbloqueado, por favor rellena elÂ formulario de disputaÂ y nosotros haremos todo lo que estÃ© en nuestras manos para recuperar tu dinero.Mientras tanto, te sugerimos que pruebes con otro cajero automÃ¡tico de un operador diferente. Rara vez se da esta situaciÃ³n dos veces seguidas.No he podido retirar el dinero que he sacado del cajero. Â¿QuÃ© puedo hacer?En este caso tambiÃ©n podemos ayudarte a recuperar el dinero. El importe que has solicitado en el momento de la retirada aparecerÃ¡ en forma de autorizaciÃ³n en tu cuenta. Como en esta ocasiÃ³n la transacciÃ³n tampoco se ha completado, el importe solicitado expirarÃ¡ en un plazo mÃ¡ximo de 12 dÃ­as laborables y serÃ¡ reembolsado en tu cuenta.En caso de que la autorizaciÃ³n no expirase y vieras en tu extracto bancario que ha sido cargada, te rogamos que rellenes el formulario de impugnaciÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva). Haremos cuanto estÃ© en nuestra mano para recuperar tu dinero.

title: Pourquoi N26 effectue des contrÃ´les sur les transactions ?
content: Nous sommes tenus de procÃ©der Ã  des contrÃ´les de routine sur les transactions afin dâ€™assurer la sÃ©curitÃ© des comptes de nos clients (voirÂ GwG Â§ 10 (nouvel onglet)). Ces contrÃ´les sont dÃ©clenchÃ©s de faÃ§on automatique par nos systÃ¨mes.Pour cette raison, il est possible que nous vous demandions des informations complÃ©mentaires concernant lâ€™origine ou la provenance des fonds. Si vous recevez une telle demande de notre part, il vous suffit de nous envoyer les documents demandÃ©s par le biais de la fonction Messages de N26 de votre compte. Nous ne faisons aucune exception lors de ces contrÃ´les et vous devez envoyer les documents demandÃ©s. Si vous ne le faites pas ou refusez de nous donner plus dâ€™informations, votre compte peut Ãªtre saisi et clÃ´turÃ©.Il sâ€™agit dâ€™une procÃ©dure bancaire standard mis en place pour assurer la sÃ©curitÃ© de nos clients. Cette procÃ©dure et son rÃ©sultat sont confidentiels et exclusivement gÃ©rÃ©s en interne.Voici quelques conseils pour accÃ©lÃ©rer la procÃ©dure :Le document que vous nous fournissez doit exactement correspondre Ã  celui que nous vous avons demandÃ© par email. Vous pouvez nous envoyer ces justificatifs scannÃ©s, en photo, ou des captures dâ€™Ã©crans (du moment que lâ€™original du document est lisible). Veuillez Ã©galement ajouter une description dÃ©taillÃ©e de chaque document.Veuillez Ãªtre prÃ©cis dans vos rÃ©ponses. Elles doivent Ãªtre dÃ©taillÃ©es et les documents doivent correspondre. Si les documents ne prouvent pas vos dÃ©clarations ou sâ€™il ne sont pas suffisamment dÃ©taillÃ©s, il est possible que nous vous recontactions pour obtenir plus de dÃ©tails.Veuillez rÃ©pondre le plus tÃ´t possible, avant la date mentionnÃ©e dans l'email que nous vous avons envoyÃ© Ã  ce sujet. Veuillez utiliser lâ€™email qui est associÃ© Ã  votre compte N26 pour nous transmettre votre rÃ©ponse et vos documents.Notre Service Client ne dispose dâ€™aucune information complÃ©mentaire Ã  propos de ce type de procÃ©dure.Vous devez nous faire parvenir desÂ documents valides, qui dÃ©pendent de votre situation :Si vous avez reÃ§u une aide financiÃ¨re dâ€™un membre de votre famille pour rÃ©aliser un projet ou vous avez hÃ©ritÃ© de biens ou dâ€™argent dâ€™un proche qui est dÃ©cÃ©dÃ© : Un contrat de prÃªt ou de subvention, un acte notariÃ© ou un certificat prouvant lâ€™hÃ©ritage, un document officiel prouvant la provenance du prÃªt (lâ€™acte de vente dâ€™un bien immobilier qui a permis de financer ce prÃªt ou les relevÃ©s bancaires de la personne qui vous prÃªte de lâ€™argent par exemple).Si vous avez vendu un bien ou vos parts sur le marchÃ© des actions : Un contrat prouvant la transaction ou un acte notariÃ© prouvant la vente.Si vous avez reÃ§u de lâ€™argent pour payer vos factures ou acheter un produit : Les relevÃ©s de compte prouvant lâ€™origine de cette transaction, les documents montrant que cet argent a Ã©tÃ© utilisÃ© et comment, dans le cas oÃ¹ vous avez dÃ©jÃ  reÃ§u le virement qui fait lâ€™objet dâ€™un contrÃ´le.Si vous avez reÃ§u le solde de tout compte de votre ancien employeur : Les documents prouvant que votre contrat de travail a pris fin, dÃ©taillant le paiement de votre solde de tout compte et/ou un relevÃ© de compte bancaire de votre employeur.

title: Wie bekomme ich einen Kredit?
content: Mit N26 Credit haben wir eine Partnerschaft mit auxmoney (in Deutschland) und Younited Credit (in Frankreich) geschlossen, um Privatkredite zwischen 1.000 und 50.000 â‚¬ mit einer Laufzeit von 6 bis 84 Monaten anzubieten. FÃ¼r Younited Credit erhÃ¤ltst du einen Referral-Link, der dich von der App zu Younited Credit weiterleitet, um den Prozess dort weiterzufÃ¼hren.Beantrage jederzeit ein Darlehen direkt in der App im Bereich Entdecken und dann unter N26 Finanzprodukte.Â Wir stellen dir einige Fragen zum Darlehen und zu deinerÂ KreditwÃ¼rdigkeitÂ (du musst zusÃ¤tzliche Onlinebanking-Informationen angeben, wenn du N26 weniger als 6 Monate genutzt hast).Weise deine IdentitÃ¤t nach.Â Wir benÃ¶tigen deinen Personalausweis oder Reisepass in Deutschland und eventuell deinen Wohnsitznachweis (in Form einer Stromrechnung o. Ã¤.). Als Nicht-EU-BÃ¼rger musst du uns ein Foto deiner Aufenthaltsgenehmigung schicken.Bearbeite deine Antworten wÃ¤hrend des Antragsprozesses.Â Wenn du mit deinem Kreditantrag zufrieden bist, sende ihn in Echtzeit an uns und wir machen dir ein verbindliches Angebot, das du lÃ¶schen oder annehmen kannst. Andernfalls verfallen die AntrÃ¤ge in 90 Tagen und du kannst wÃ¤hrend dieser Zeit keinen weiteren Kredit beantragen.BestÃ¤tige deinen Kredit.Â Wenn du unser Angebot annimmst, musst du den Vertrag entweder elektronisch per Videoanruf unterzeichnen oder per SMS bestÃ¤tigen.Du erhÃ¤ltst eine Push-Nachricht, sobald die Auszahlung erfolgt ist.Â In Deutschland wird der Kreditbetrag in 5-7 Werktagen deinem N26 Konto gutgeschrieben. In Frankreich dauert die Auszahlung eine Woche.Wir bieten ZinssÃ¤tze zwischen 1,99% und 19% p. a. an. AuÃŸer den Zinsen fallen keine weiteren Kosten an. Wenn du jedochÂ deinen Plan Ã¤nderstÂ oder mit deinen monatlichen Zahlungen in Verzug bist, kÃ¶nnen zusÃ¤tzliche GebÃ¼hren anfallen.Weitere Informationen findest du in denÂ AGB (neuen Tab)Â zu N26 Credit.

title: Comment tÃ©lÃ©charger mon RelevÃ© de frais ?
content: Dans le cadre de la nouvelle Directive europÃ©enne sur les comptes de paiement, nous avons mis en place un RelevÃ© de Frais qui permet de visualiser facilement lâ€™historique des frais liÃ©s Ã  lâ€™utilisation de votre compte.Le RelevÃ© de Frais est disponible Ã  tout moment pour lâ€™ensemble de nos clients.Si vous dÃ©tenez un compte N26, connectez-vous Ã  votre compte depuis votre espace client en ligne (nouvel onglet) puis cliquez sur lâ€™icÃ´ne en forme de nuage en haut Ã  droite de votre Ã©cran. Vous pourrez ensuite demander le tÃ©lÃ©chargement de votre â€˜RelevÃ© de Fraisâ€™ en sÃ©lectionnant â€˜Demanderâ€™.Vous recevrez ensuite un email Ã  lâ€™adresse liÃ©e Ã  votre compte (cela peut prendre quelques minutes) vous indiquant les instructions Ã  suivre pour tÃ©lÃ©charger votre â€˜RelevÃ© de Fraisâ€™.Si vous ne possÃ©dez plus de compte N26, vous pouvez tÃ©lÃ©charger ce relevÃ© dans les 6 mois suivant la clÃ´ture de votre compte en remplissant ce formulaire (nouvel onglet).Vous aurez besoin des informations suivantes :Votre nom et prÃ©nom ainsi que le numÃ©ro et la date dâ€™expiration du document dâ€™identitÃ© (carte dâ€™identitÃ© ou passeport) que vous avez utilisÃ© lors de la vÃ©rification de votre identitÃ©Lâ€™adresse email liÃ©e Ã  votre compte N26Les dates (mois et annÃ©e) de crÃ©ation et de clÃ´ture de votre compte (veuillez vÃ©rifier lâ€™email vous confirmant la vÃ©rification de votre identitÃ© pour obtenir la date dâ€™ouverture de votre compte).Vous devrez crÃ©er un mot de passe temporaire que vous pourrez saisir en cliquant sur le lien que nous vous enverrons sur lâ€™adresse mail liÃ©e Ã  votre compte. Ce lien sera uniquement valide pendant 24 heures. Veuillez noter que si vous entrez cinq fois un mot de passe incorrect, le lien deviendra invalide et vous devrez crÃ©er une nouvelle demande pour obtenir votre relevÃ©.*Pour les comptes N26 Business, les montants de cashback ne seront pas affichÃ©s.

title: Wie lade ich meine persÃ¶nlichen Daten herunter?
content: Die Datenschutzgrundverordnung (DSGVO) ist eine europÃ¤ische Verordnung zum Schutz personenbezogener Daten, die am 25. Mai 2018 in Kraft getreten ist. Wir haben daraufhin eine Funktion zum Datenexport in der WebApp (neuen Tab) hinzugefÃ¼gt, um dein Recht auf DatenÃ¼bertragbarkeit gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 20 DSGVO zu gewÃ¤hrleisten. Die Beschaffung der von dir bereitgestellten persÃ¶nlichen Daten ist transparent und einfach und somit besitzt du die vollstÃ¤ndige Kontrolle: Gehe zu ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto und PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen und klicke auf Deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten.Das Recht auf DatenÃ¼bertragbarkeit gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 20 DSGVO umfasst personenbezogene Daten, die du uns bereitgestellt hast. Art. 20 DSGVO soll dir ermÃ¶glichen, ohne groÃŸen Aufwand den Dienstleister zu wechseln fÃ¼r den Fall, dass du die von dir bereitgestellten Daten nutzen mÃ¶chtest, um ein Konto bei einer anderen Bank zu erÃ¶ffnen. Aus diesem Grund verpflichtet uns Art. 20 DSGVO dazu, dir diese Daten in einem maschinenlesbaren Format bereitzustellen. Dabei ist zu beachten, dass die Datei lediglich fÃ¼r Zwecke der DatenÃ¼bertragbarkeit zu nutzen ist und dein Computer die JSON Datei mÃ¶glicherweise nicht lesen kann. Falls du die JSON Datei Ã¶ffnen kannst, kÃ¶nnen ihre Inhalte dennoch schwierig zu verstehen sein, da die Datei fÃ¼r Maschinenlesbarkeit konzipiert ist und nicht fÃ¼r die unmittelbare Verarbeitung durch Menschen. Die Datei, die wir ausstellen, ist lediglich zur Ãœbertragung an andere Banken bestimmt.Als mobile Bank sind wir uns der Wichtigkeit der Sicherheit deiner Daten bewusst. Daher haben wir zusÃ¤tzliche SicherheitsmaÃŸnahmen installiert bevor du deine Daten herunterladen kannst. Diese MaÃŸnahmen sind im folgenden Absatz beschrieben. Wir tun dies, um sicherzustellen, dass du, der Kontoinhaber, auch derjenige bist, der die Daten herunterlÃ¤dt.Â So lÃ¤dst du deine Daten herunterDu kannst beantragen, die von dir fÃ¼r ein laufendes oder vorheriges Konto bereitgestellten personenbezogenen Daten, herunterzuladen. Du erhÃ¤ltst das Dokument in einem maschinenlesbaren Format, sodass du es mit einem Dritten teilen kannst.Bestehende KundenBitte frage deine Daten Ã¼ber unser Webformular (neuen Tab) an.Du wirst aufgefordert, ein temporÃ¤res Passwort fÃ¼r den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist nur fÃ¼r 24 Stunden gÃ¼ltig, ab dem Zeitpunkt, an dem du die E-Mail erhalten hast. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ungÃ¼ltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.Ehemalige KundenDu kannst von dir bereitgestellte personenbezogene Daten auch nach deiner KontoschlieÃŸung herunterladen. FÃ¼lle einfach das Datenanforderungsformular (neuen Tab) aus und vergewissere dich, dass deine angegebenen Informationen mit deinen vorherigen Kontoinformationen exakt Ã¼bereinstimmen. Welche persÃ¶nlichen Informationen du benÃ¶tigst:Vor- und Nachname, Lichtbildausweis (Identifikationsnummer und Ablaufdatum des Dokuments mit dem du dein Konto bestÃ¤tigt hast (Personalausweis oder Reisepass)Die registrierte E-Mail-Adresse des KontosDatum (Monat und Jahr) an dem du dein Konto erstellt und abgeschlossen hast (sieh in deiner BestÃ¤tigungsemail nach).Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden sind wir verpflichtet sicherzustellen, dass die Daten heruntergeladen wurden: Wenn du ein Feld leer lÃ¤sst oder falsch ausgefÃ¼llt hast, kann deine Anfrage nicht abgeschlossen werden.Du wirst aufgefordert, ein temporÃ¤res Passwort fÃ¼r den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist aber nur fÃ¼r 24 Stunden gÃ¼ltig. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ungÃ¼ltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.FÃ¼r weitere Informationen Ã¼ber die Erfassung, Verwendung oder Verarbeitung deiner persÃ¶nlichen Daten, schau dir bitte unsere DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung (neuen Tab)an.

title: Come funziona Google Pay?
content: Italia, Germania, Francia, Spagna, Belgio, Danimarca, Finlandia, Irlanda, Norvegia, Polonia, Slovacchia, Svezia, Svizzera, Austria, Estonia, Grecia, Lettonia, Lituania, Paesi Bassi, Portogallo.Google Pay Ã¨ un metodo di pagamento che ti consente di pagare con il tuo smartphone per non dover portare sempre con te la Mastercard.Google Pay Ã¨ disponibile in tutti i negozi che supportano i pagamenti contactless (NFC) e nei negozi online. Tieni lo smartphone vicino al terminale contactless per effettuare automaticamente il pagamento. Per i pagamenti online, scegli Google Pay come metodo di pagamento. Ti verrÃ  chiesto tramiteÂ messaggio pushÂ di confermare il pagamento al completamento della transazione.Come iniziare:Per aggiungere la Mastercard N26, scarica lâ€™applicazione di Google Pay sul tuo smartphone (l'app richiede un sistema operativo Android 5.0 o successivo e la compatibilitÃ  NFC).Accedi alla tua app mobile N26, seleziona Carte > Impostazioni della Carta > Aggiungi a Google Pay. Sarai poi reindirizzato all'app di Google Pay per la registrazione dei tuoi dati. Ecco alcuni consigli da tenere a mente:Google Pay richiede il blocco dello schermo. Se non l'hai ancora configurato, ti verrÃ  chiesto di farlo prima di aggiungere la Mastercard allâ€™applicazione Google Pay.Se proteggi il tuo smartphone con una custodia, potrebbe essere necessario rimuoverla per pagare. Alcuni terminali di pagamento non riconoscono il telefono se la custodia Ã¨ troppo grande.Se il terminale di pagamento ti chiede di mostrare (di nuovo) la carta, Ã¨ possibile che tu abbia allontanato lo smartphone troppo velocemente o che non fosse abbastanza vicino. Riprova facendo piÃ¹ attenzione.

title: Frais de dÃ©pÃ´t
content: Ã€ partir de juillet 2022, nous avons dÃ©cidÃ© de ne plus facturer ces fraisSi vous avez ouvert votre compte N26 Ã  partir du 19 octobre 2020 et que celui-ci a un solde supÃ©rieur Ã  50 000 â‚¬, des frais de dÃ©pÃ´t de 0,5 % par an seront facturÃ©s, conformÃ©ment aux Conditions gÃ©nÃ©rales. Ils ne s'appliquent pas aux clients qui disposent dâ€™un compte premium N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal ou N26 Business Metal.Â  (nouvel onglet)Vous trouverez ici (nouvel onglet) plus dâ€™informations sur nos tarifs.Les frais de dÃ©pÃ´t sont calculÃ©s en fonction du solde quotidien de votre compte sur un mois. Chaque jour oÃ¹ votre solde de compte dÃ©passe le plafond de 50 000 â‚¬, une commission de 0,5 % est prÃ©levÃ©e sur l'excÃ©dent.Ces frais seront directement prÃ©levÃ©s sur votre compte N26 au dÃ©but de chaque mois pour les 30 jours prÃ©cÃ©dents.Â Si le solde de votre compte N26 risque de dÃ©passer le plafond susmentionnÃ© et que vous ne souhaitez pas payer les frais de dÃ©pÃ´t, vous pouvez passer au compte N26 You (nouvel onglet), N26 Business You (nouvel onglet), N26 Metal (nouvel onglet) ou N26 Business Metal (nouvel onglet).Nos clients en Allemagne peuvent ouvrir un compte EasyFlex Savings (nouvel onglet) puis effectuer un virement pour que leur solde de compte ne dÃ©passe pas le plafond fixÃ©. Pour plus d'informations, veuillez consulter les conditions dâ€™Ã©ligibilitÃ©.

title: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
content: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.Â Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.Â

title: Wie verknÃ¼pfe ich mein N26 Konto mit PayPal?
content:
Wenn du mÃ¶chtest, kannst du dein N26 Konto mit deinem PayPal-Konto verknÃ¼pfen und so von einer Reihe von Vorteilen profitieren.Du kannst in Echtzeit dein Konto aufladen sowie schnelle Zahlungen senden und empfangen â€“ und zwar auch absolut sichere Weise, ohne deine Bankdaten oder die Nummer deiner N26 Karte angeben zu mÃ¼ssen.Hier erfÃ¤hrst du, wie du dein N26 Konto mit PayPal Ã¼ber dessen Website verknÃ¼pfen kannst:Klicke oben auf der Seite auf Wallet.WÃ¤hle Karte oder Konto verknÃ¼pfen.Klicke auf Konto verknÃ¼pfen.Folge den bereitgestellten Anweisungen.
Wenn du stattdessen die mobile PayPal-App nutzt:Klicke oben rechts auf Einstellungen.WÃ¤hle Karte oder Konto verknÃ¼pfen.Klicke auf das Pluszeichen (+) und wÃ¤hle Konto aus.Gib deine Bankdaten ein und bestÃ¤tige diese.
Achte darauf, deinen Vor- und Nachnamen genau so einzugeben, wie er auf deinem N26 Konto erscheint, da sonst die VerknÃ¼pfung mit PayPal fehlschlÃ¤gt.Sobald dein N26 Konto bestÃ¤tigt ist, erhebt PayPal zwei geringe GebÃ¼hren, die dir dann innerhalb von 2â€“3 Werktagen auf dein Konto zurÃ¼ckerstattet werden.An diesem Punkt musst du einfach die HÃ¶he der zurÃ¼ckerstatteten GebÃ¼hren eintragen, dich in dein PayPal-Konto einloggen und die VerknÃ¼pfung deines N26 Kontos von deinem Wallet aus bestÃ¤tigen.

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content: If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you mayÂ open an account with us. We offer:The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.Accounts in â‚¬, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.Free shipping of your Mastercard or â‚¬25 for express.Foreign currency transfers with Wise (with the standard account).3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals in â‚¬ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).2 Spaces in addition to the main account.A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using Wise (on their website (new tab)) or using your local bank.For outgoing transfers to â‚¬ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-â‚¬ accounts, use Wise in the app.**Please note: Wise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: Wie kann ich meine Karten-PIN Ã¤ndern?
content: Du kennst deinen PIN-Code nicht? Bei N26 erhÃ¤ltst du keine PINs per Post oder E-Mail. Du legst deine eigene PIN fest, wenn du deine Karte in der App aktivierst. Falls du deine PIN vergessen hast oder deine Karten-PIN Ã¤ndern willst, kannst du das in wenigen Schritten direkt in der N26 App tun.Stelle bitte sicher, dass dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto verknÃ¼pft und deine Karte aktiviert ist. Dann Ã¶ffne die N26 App und folge dieser Schritt-fÃ¼r-Schritt-Anleitung:Ã–ffne den â€œKartenâ€-Tab.Tippe auf â€œEinstellungenâ€ und wÃ¤hle die entsprechende Karte.Tippe auf â€œPIN zurÃ¼cksetzenâ€.Gib den Token â€“ die 10-stellige Nummer auf deiner Karte â€“ ein. Du findest den Token auf der Vorderseite unter deinem Namen. Bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der RÃ¼ckseite.WÃ¤hle einen neuen PIN-Code und bestÃ¤tige ihn.Damit du mit deiner Karte online oder in GeschÃ¤ften kontaktlos (via NFC) bezahlen kannst, musst du sie an einem Geldautomaten oder in einem GeschÃ¤ft vollstÃ¤ndig aktivieren. HierfÃ¼r muss die Karte in ein KartenlesegerÃ¤t oder einen Geldautomaten eingesteckt werden und die Transaktion durch Eingabe der Karten-PIN erfolgen.UngÃ¼ltige oder falsche PINAus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden akzeptieren wir keine PIN, die sich aus deinem Geburtsdatum, deiner Adresse oder Zahlenkombinationen mit Wiederholungen oder Sequenzen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) zusammensetzt. Falls deine gewÃ¼nschte PIN nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche bitte eine andere Kombination.Falls du dreimal hintereinander die falsche PIN eingibst, wird deine Karte aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden automatisch gesperrt. Nimm in diesem Fall Kontakt zu unserem Kundenservice in der App auf. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Deine Karten-PIN ist nicht dasselbe wie deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN. Wenn du willst, kannst du aber dieselbe Zahlenkombination fÃ¼r beide PINs nutzen.Wenn du nach dem Ã„ndern deiner PIN Probleme bei Kartenzahlungen hast, kann das daran liegen, dass du sie noch nicht mit dem Chip oder am Geldautomaten aktiviert hast (siehe Schritt 6 weiter oben).

title: Account in conjunction with Â§Â§ 30 ff. ZKG
content: The account ICW Â§Â§ 30 ff. ZKG is not our N26 standard account. The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6â‚¬ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists (new tab). If you donâ€™t have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request.Â Â Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto. To request a Basiskonto:Download the request form (new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.In the request form youâ€™ll find an attached coupon for legitimation at Deutsche Post AG. Go to your nearest Deutsch Post office, in order to prove your identity with the coupon.In addition, send us the completed and signed request via post to: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto KlosterstraÃŸe 62 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandOnce weâ€™ve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, weâ€™ll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs (new tab).You then send us your signed contract via post to our address.As soon as we receive the contract weâ€™ll open a Basiskonto for you. Youâ€™ll receive a notification.Why can't I get a Basiskonto?Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. Thatâ€™s the case if you:Live outside of a supported country.Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent.Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years.Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance.You didnâ€™t meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.Â

title: How does Spaces work?
content: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as youâ€™d like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, youâ€™ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

title: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
content: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 ofÂ Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, pleaseÂ contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didnâ€™t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
content:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing â€˜Direct Debitsâ€™: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you donâ€™t have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Spaceâ€™s IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your â€˜Spacesâ€™ section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the â€˜Space Settingsâ€™ and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' Â»Â Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' Â»Â Accept the T&C's Â»Â Enter your confirmation PIN Â»Â Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right â€˜cog iconâ€™)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on â€œSend moneyâ€Select â€œBank transferâ€Select the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

title: Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte fÃ¼r meine abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?
content: Ersatzkarten sind fÃ¼r alle Smart, You oder Metal Kunden kostenlos erhÃ¤ltlich.Wenn du dein Konto vor den folgenden Daten erÃ¶ffnet hast, sind sowohl die neue Karte als auch der Versand an deine Adresse in den LÃ¤ndern, in denen N26 verfÃ¼gbar ist (neuen Tab), kostenlos:16.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz im europÃ¤ischen Raum)25.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Italien oder Spanien)11.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Frankreich)18.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich oder der Schweiz)Wenn dein Konto nach dem entsprechenden Datum erstellt wurde, kostet deine Ersatzkarte genauso viel wie die Bestellung einer neuen Karte.Wenn du derzeit in einem Land ansÃ¤ssig bist, das nicht von N26 unterstÃ¼tzt wird, wende dich bitte per Chat oder Telefon an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Bestellung fÃ¼r dich vornehmen kÃ¶nnen. Der Versand auÃŸerhalb dieser LÃ¤nder (neuen Tab) kann mit zusÃ¤tzlichen Kosten verbunden sein.Â Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten fÃ¼r ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In lÃ¤ndlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch lÃ¤nger dauern. Um Ã¼ber den aktuellen Lieferstatus auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe einfach auf den Home Bildschirm deiner mobilen App von N26.Meine Karte lÃ¤uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

title: Come posso usare la mia carta digitalmente?
content: Anche prima che la tua carta arrivi per posta, puoi iniziare a usarla tramite il tuo wallet digitale Apple Pay (nuova tabella) o Google Pay (nuova tabella). In questo modo puoi effettuare acquisti con il tuo smartphone presso i commercianti che supportano questo metodo di pagamento. Scopri come:Accedi al tuo conto N26Clicca su CarteVai su Impostazioni della cartaDalla lista delle tue carte, seleziona quella che stai aspettandoSeleziona Apple Pay o Google Pay nel menu sottostanteQuesta funzione non Ã¨ disponibile se riordini la tua carta o esegui l'aggiornamento a una sottoscrizione premium senza bloccare la tua carta attuale. In questo caso, la tua carta attuale continuerÃ  a funzionare con Apple Pay o Google Pay finchÃ© non attiverai la nuova carta. (nuova tabella)Dove posso trovare i dati della mia carta nell'app N26?Se hai bisogno dei dettagli della tua carta ma al momento non la porti con te, non preoccuparti. N26 ti consente di visualizzare i dettagli completi della tua carta nell'app mobile, a condizione che la tua carta sia attiva (nuova tabella) e che il dispositivo che utilizzi sia associato al tuo conto. (nuova tabella) Ecco come:Accedi al tuo conto N26Clicca su CarteVai su Impostazioni della cartaDalla lista delle tue carte, seleziona quella che vuoi utilizzareClicca su Dettagli della cartaConferma la richiesta con il face id, l'impronta o il pin di sblocco del tuo smartphoneAdesso sarai in grado di visualizzare i dati completi della tua carta per 1 minuto. Ricorda che non ti sarÃ  possibile acquisire screenshot mentre vengono visualizzati i dettagli della tua carta.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

title: Comment crÃ©er un nouveau mot de passe ?
content: Si vous avez oubliÃ© votre mot de passe au moment de vous connecter Ã  votre compte ou souhaitez le modifier, cliquez surÂ OubliÃ© ?Â sur lâ€™application mobile ou sur Mot de passe oubliÃ© ? (nouvel onglet) sur notreÂ application web (nouvel onglet).Nous vous enverrons alors un lien par email, pour vous permettre de crÃ©er un nouveau mot de passe. Veuillez vÃ©rifier que votre mot de passe corresponde Ã  nos exigences de sÃ©curitÃ©:Au moins 7 caractÃ¨resAu moins 1 chiffreAu moins une majusculeVotre mot de passe ne doit contenir aucun Ã©lÃ©ment de votre nom ou de votre date de naissance.Si vous entrez un mot de passe erronÃ© 6 fois de suite, la connexion Ã  votre compte sera temporairement bloquÃ©e. Vous pourrez Ã  nouveau essayer de vous connecter au bout de 30 minutes.Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 07:00 Ã  23:00 h.

title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (â€œPSD2â€) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, youâ€™ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.Â *applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: Come funziona N26 Business Smart?
content: Valido per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia e Svizzera.N26 Business Smart costa 4,90 â‚¬ al mese ed Ã¨ pensato per lavoratori autonomi e freelance che hanno unâ€™azienda a proprio nome. CiÃ² significa che il conto non sarÃ  in nome della tua azienda e la tua azienda non comparirÃ  sulla carta.Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratis: ordinando la carta, scegli tra cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nellâ€™app!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU aggiuntiva fisica direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) a condividere e gestire insieme i fondi.Supporto telefonico dedicata: contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti in caso di domande.Â Ancora non Ã¨ possibile passare da conti privati a conti business, quindi Ã¨ importante sapere se N26 Business Metal fa al caso tuo (nuova tabella).Il conto N26 Business Smart Ã¨ stato pensato per i lavoratori autonomi e i freelance la cui attivitÃ  Ã¨ a proprio nome. CiÃ² significa che non potrai intestare questo conto a nome della tua azienda.Il canone di 4,90â‚¬ verrÃ  detratto direttamente dal tuo conto ogni mese nello stesso giorno in cui hai effettuato il passaggio. Se sei un nuovo cliente, il primo canone ti verrÃ  detratto 15 giorni dopo la verifica della tua identitÃ  (nuova tabella). Da quel momento in poi, il canone verrÃ  addebitato sul tuo conto ogni mese nello stesso giorno in cui hai effettuato la registrazione. CiÃ² significa che se hai aperto il tuo conto a fine mese, i primi due canoni mensili ti verranno addebitati il mese successivo.La Mastercard N26 Business Smart Ã¨ destinata esclusivamente allâ€™uso commerciale. Ogni mese riceverai lo 0,1% di cashback su tutti i pagamenti effettuati con la carta. Attualmente non Ã¨ possibile avere contemporaneamente due conti N26 separati. Il processo inizierÃ  il 15 del mese seguente e ogni mese successivo. Passeranno fino a 7 giorni prima che questo appaia nel tuo saldo.Se hai bisogno di unâ€™altra carta per le spese private, ti consigliamo di ordinare una Maestro (disponibile in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi).A differenza di altri conti, N26 Business Smart non consente di effettuare (nuova tabella) bonifici in valuta estera (nuova tabella) direttamente dallâ€™app. Per eseguirli, vai su (nuova tabella) Wise (nuova tabella).l conti N26 Business non supportano i pagamenti business to business (B2B).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe Ã¨ un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

title: Comment puis-je associer mon compte N26 Ã  PayPal ?
content:
Si vous le souhaitez, vous pouvez associer votre compte N26 Ã  votre compte PayPal et profiter de nombreux avantages.Vous pourrez alimenter instantanÃ©ment votre compte bancaire, effectuer et recevoir des paiements rapides en toute sÃ©curitÃ©, sans avoir Ã  utiliser vos coordonnÃ©es bancaires ou votre numÃ©ro de carte N26.Voici comment associer votre compte N26 depuis la version web de PayPalÂ :Cliquez sur Wallet en haut de la page.SÃ©lectionnez Lier une carte ou un compte bancaire.Cliquez sur Lier un compte bancaire.Suivez les instructions fournies.

title: Caducidad y sustituciÃ³n de las tarjetas: Preguntas frecuentes
content: Si tu Mastercard de N26 ha caducado o va a caducar prÃ³ximamente, en este artÃ­culo encontrarÃ¡s toda la informaciÃ³n sobre cÃ³mo pedir una nueva, los costes asociados y los plazos de envÃ­o.Â Antes de pedir una nueva tarjeta, te recomendamos que compruebes que todos tus datos personales son correctos y estÃ¡n actualizados.Mi tarjeta caduca pronto, Â¿quÃ© debo hacer?Si tu tarjeta caduca pronto, inicia sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta N26 en la app, ve a la pestaÃ±a Tarjetas y busca un banner debajo de la tarjeta correspondiente. Sigue los pasos para confirmar dÃ³nde quieres recibir tu tarjeta de sustituciÃ³n y te la enviaremos.Â Si no ves ese mensaje, no te preocupes. Seguro que tu tarjeta todavÃ­a tiene tiempo de validez, asÃ­ que cuando llegue el momento adecuado tendrÃ¡s la opciÃ³n de confirmar tu direcciÃ³n.Cuando llegue tu tarjeta, tendrÃ¡s que activarla antes de poder utilizarla. No olvides destruir tu tarjeta antigua y tirarla siguiendo las normas locales de reciclaje.Nota: cuando hayas recibido y activado tu nueva Mastercard, recuerda actualizar tus datos de pago para todas tus suscripciones y transferencias programadas. De esta forma, evitarÃ¡s que se rechacen tus pagos en el futuro.Â¿Puedo seguir utilizando mi tarjeta cuando haya caducado?No, la fecha de caducidad de tu tarjeta cumple una funciÃ³n importante y no podrÃ¡s utilizarla cuando finalice el mes de caducidad. RecibirÃ¡s una nueva tarjeta con un nÃºmero diferente y una nueva fecha de caducidad.Â¿CuÃ¡nto cuesta obtener una tarjeta de sustituciÃ³n de mi tarjeta que caduca o ha caducado?Las tarjetas de sustituciÃ³n son gratuitas para todos los clientes de Smart, You o Metal.Si abriste tu cuenta antes de las siguientes fechas, tanto la nueva tarjeta nueva como el envÃ­o a tu direcciÃ³n son gratuitos en los paÃ­ses en los que N26 estÃ¡ disponible (pestaÃ±a nueva):16/02/2021(Clientes con domicilio legal en la Gran Europa)25/02/2021 (Clientes con domicilio legal en Italia o EspaÃ±a)11/03/2021 (Clientes con domicilio legal en Francia)18/03/2021 (clientes con domicilio legal en Alemania, Austria o Suiza);Si tu cuenta se creÃ³ despuÃ©s, tu tarjeta de sustituciÃ³n costarÃ¡ lo mismo que pedir una nueva tarjeta.Si actualmente resides en un paÃ­s no aceptado por N26, ponte en contacto con nuestro Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente por chat o por telÃ©fono para que podamos realizar el pedido por ti. El envÃ­o fuera de estos paÃ­ses (pestaÃ±a nueva) puede conllevar un coste adicional.Â Â¿CuÃ¡nto tardarÃ¡?Todas las tarjetas de sustituciÃ³n de tarjetas que caducan o han caducado se envÃ­an mediante un envÃ­o estÃ¡ndar. Tarda hasta 15 dÃ­as hÃ¡biles y es gratuito. En zonas rurales o de difÃ­cil acceso puede tardar mÃ¡s. Para conocer las actualizaciones en el progreso de la entrega, solo tienes que ir a la pantalla de inicio de la app del mÃ³vil de N26.Mi tarjeta ya ha caducado, pero no he recibido una nuevaÂ¡No te preocupes, nosotros te ayudamos!Â Si ya has confirmado tu direcciÃ³n y han transcurrido mÃ¡s de 20 dÃ­as, contacta con el Servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente. Puedes hacerlo en la secciÃ³n de Ayuda de la app.Â Si todavÃ­a no has confirmado tu direcciÃ³n, inicia sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta de N26 en la app y busca un banner debajo de tu tarjeta caducada. Sigue los pasos para confirmar dÃ³nde quieres recibir tu tarjeta de sustituciÃ³n.Â

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in â‚¬ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we donâ€™t currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.Youâ€™ll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

content: Pour garantir lâ€™accÃ¨s complet Ã  votre compte N26, il est important que vos donnÃ©es personnelles soient actualisÃ©es.Si votre document dâ€™identitÃ© a Ã©tÃ© mis Ã  jour ou si votre numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone a changÃ©, il est primordial que ces informations soient corrigÃ©es.
