title: Pourquoi mon achat en ligne a-t-il Ã©chouÃ© ?
content: Votre application N26 vous guidera dans le processus de paiement en ligne.Voici quelques raisons pour lesquelles votre paiement en ligne a Ã©chouÃ© :Si vous nâ€™avez pas pu confirmer votre achat dans les 5 minutes imparties : dans ce cas, veuillez simplement recommencer votre achat.Assurez-vous que vous avez autorisÃ© les transactions en ligne depuis les paramÃ¨tres de votre carte dans votre application mobile N26.Si vous ne recevez pas de notification push, veuillez vous assurer que votre smartphone est bien synchronisÃ©,Â que les notifications push sont activÃ©es et que vous avez une bonne connexion Wi-Fi ou mobile. De plus, si vous utilisez un appareil iOS, assurez-vous de ne pas avoir activÃ© le mode Â« Ne pas dÃ©ranger Â».Attention : la notification push ne sera envoyÃ©e qu'au smartphone synchronisÃ© au compte.Assurez-vous de dÃ©sactiver les bloqueurs de publicitÃ© lorsque vous faites un achat sur internet et que votre connexion internet est suffisamment puissante.Veuillez noter par ailleurs que votre carte Maestro N26 (disponible uniquement en Allemagne, Autriche et aux Pays-Bas) ne peut pas Ãªtre utilisÃ©e pour des achats en ligne.

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.Â Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.Â 
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support canâ€™t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. Youâ€™re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)Â or Â§ 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.Â According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If youâ€™d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. Weâ€™re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you donâ€™t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We donâ€™t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

title: Â¿CÃ³mo dar parte de un siniestro al seguro?
content: Tu cuentaÂ N26 You (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â oÂ N26 Metal (pestaÃ±a nueva)Â incluye un amplio abanico de beneficios de seguro, cubiertos por nuestro socio Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*Para dar parte y hacer una reclamaciÃ³n, entra en la app N26 y despuÃ©s, ve aÂ ğŸ‘¤ Mi Cuenta > Tu cuenta > Copertura assicurativa Allianz.AhÃ­ encontrarÃ¡s:Una guÃ­a de cÃ³mo realizar una reclamaciÃ³n (retraso en el vuelo o de equipaje, robo de mÃ³vil, garantÃ­a extendida o cancelaciÃ³n de viaje, por ejemplo).La informaciÃ³n de tu cuenta N26, incluido tu nÃºmero de pÃ³liza de AllianzLa opciÃ³n de contactar Allianz directamente en caso de emergencia mÃ©dica.Para las emergencias, te recomendamos que tengas preparada la siguiente informaciÃ³n:El nÃºmero de telÃ©fono y la direcciÃ³n de tu localizaciÃ³n actual.Nombres de todos los contactos oficiales (doctores, hospitales y/o policÃ­a).Una descripciÃ³n exacta de la situaciÃ³n.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe es un nombre comercial de AWP P & C S.A. - sucursal holandesa y miembro del Grupo Allianz.

title: Spazi Condivisi - Che cos'Ã¨ una Procura?
content: Il modello legale utilizzato per Spazi Condivisi si chiama Procura.I partecipanti di uno Spazio Condiviso non hanno pari proprietÃ  del conto come un conto condiviso nel senso bancario tradizionale. Dopo aver ricevuto la Procura i partecipanti ottengono il diritto di agire a nome dell'amministratore, per tutto ciÃ² che riguarda il trasferimento dei fondi entro lo Spazio Condiviso. La persona che autorizza l'altro ad agire per suo conto Ã¨ denominata "Amministratore", questa persona Ã¨ ilÂ titolare delle somme depositate sullo Spazio Condiviso. L'amministratore deve essere un titolare di un conto N26 Premium, ad esempioÂ N26 Smart,Â N26 You, N26 Metal eÂ N26 Business Smart,Â N26 Business YouÂ e N26 Business Metal.CiÃ² significa che chiunque abbia creato lo Spazio Condiviso ne Ã¨ il suo proprietario legale. L'amministratore di uno Spazio Condiviso:Â - E' il proprietario di tutti i fondi presenti nello Spazio Condiviso.- PuÃ² trasferire fondi liberamente dentro e fuori dal conto in qualsiasi momento.- PuÃ² invitare partecipanti al proprio Spazio Condiviso garantendo loro la Procura. - PuÃ² revocare la Procura di un partecipante in qualsiasi momento.- PuÃ² anche chiudere uno Spazio Condiviso dopo aver rimosso un partecipante (tutti i fondi di quello Spazio Condiviso saranno trasferiti nel conto principale del proprietario). Rilasciando la Procura ad una persona, quest'ultima avrÃ  accesso ad ogni fondo presente nello Spazio Condiviso. Questo significa che ogni partecipante potrÃ  trasferire fondi liberamente dentro e fuori dal conto in qualsiasi momento.N26 Bank GmbH non puÃ² essere ritenuta responsabile per i pagamenti coperti dalla Procura.Scopri di piÃ¹Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

title: How can I prevent fraud via SMS?
content: Did you get a text message followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt.How does the scam work?You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official oneÂ https://app.n26.com/login (new tab)The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App > My Account > Settings > Security > Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,Â  send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comDo I need to confirm a transaction to be able to receive a refund?Absolutely not! We would never instruct you to authorise a transaction that you did not initiate. Never confirm transactions if you do not recognise a recipient's name or IBAN in the case of debit transfers; an email or phone number in the case of a MoneyBeam payment; and a merchant's name in the case of a card transaction.How to recognise N26 official communications?We will never send you links via SMS: never trust an SMS from us that contains a link!Â N26 usually sends verification codes via "AUTHMSG"; these codes will always originate from this sender. These codes are used to access the App or to associate the device with the account. Never share your OTP (One Time Password) codes with anyone!Our primary means of communication are live chat, email and our premium customer phone line.We do not call our customers, unless (in very specific cases) a call has been requested by a customer themselves.Therefore, if after clicking on a link, youâ€™re informed that you will be contacted shortly by an N26 agent due to an unsuccessful operation, be wary of impending phone calls!How do scammers find out my personal information?In todayâ€™s day and age, itâ€™s likely that your personal data is publicly available online. Think social media platforms, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc. Itâ€™s often the case that sensitive data is left unsecured. Scammers exploit people's vulnerability by collecting information and using it to their advantage.

title: Wie lade ich meine Entgeltaufstellung herunter?
content: Die Entgeltaufstellung ist Teil der europÃ¤ischen Zahlungskonten-Direktive, mit der Bankkunden die MÃ¶glichkeit haben, eine Ãœbersicht Ã¼ber ihre vergangenen GebÃ¼hren zu erhalten.Eine Entgeltaufstellung steht all unseren Kunden jederzeit zur VerfÃ¼gung.Wenn du aktuell ein Konto bei uns hast, logge dich in die WebApp (neuen Tab) ein, klicke auf das Download-Symbol und scrolle nach unten zu "Entgeltaufstellung".Wenn du ehemaliger N26 Kunde bist, kannst du deine Entgeltaufstellung bis zu 6 Monate nach deiner KontoschlieÃŸung Ã¼ber dieses Formular (neuen Tab) herunterladen.DafÃ¼r wirst du folgende Informationen benÃ¶tigen:Deinen Vor- und Nachnamen, deine Ausweisnummer und das Ablaufdatum des Ausweisdokuments (Personalausweis oder Pass), mit dem du dich registriert hast.Deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse.Das Datum (Monat und Jahr) deiner KontoerÃ¶ffnung und KontoschlieÃŸung, das du den jeweiligen BestÃ¤tigungsemails entnehmen kannst.Wir werden dich fragen, ein temporÃ¤res Passwort zu erstellen, das du benutzen kannst, um auf den Link zuzugreifen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse schicken. Der Link gilt nur fÃ¼r 24 Stunden. Bitte beachte, dass der Link und das Passwort ungÃ¼ltig werden, wenn dieses fÃ¼nf mal falsch eingegeben wurde. In diesem Fall muss eine neue Exportanfrage gestellt werden.*Â  FÃ¼r Business Konten werden Cashback-BetrÃ¤ge nicht angezeigt.

title: Where is my refund?
content:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.Â For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

title: What is my PIN number?
content:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codesâ€”your Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun factâ€”you create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. Youâ€™re the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.Â Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap â€œAdd moneyâ€Select â€œCard transferâ€Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per top-up, for a maximum of 450â‚¬ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap â€œAdd moneyâ€Select â€œApple Payâ€ or â€œGoogle Payâ€Choose an amountÂ Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
content: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
content: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel itâ€”this can be done at any time (see below). Weâ€™ll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesnâ€™t affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, youâ€™ll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 monthâ€™s time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and youâ€™ll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after youâ€™ve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we havenâ€™t received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after youâ€™ve proved your identity, weâ€™ll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option youâ€™ve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee.Â You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, weâ€™ll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).Â In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.Â In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:Â A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: Bank documentsâ€”a guide to what's available
content: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reasonâ€”you can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and theyâ€™re perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Hereâ€™s how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening andâ€”if you wishâ€”it can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Hereâ€™s how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees youâ€™ve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. Youâ€™ll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipientâ€™s full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmationâ€”the PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (RelevÃ© d'IdentitÃ© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank informationâ€”full name, legal address, IBAN and BICâ€”specific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the â€˜Add moneyâ€™ button.

title: Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ ist?
content: Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, kann dein Kontostand negativ sein, solange du dich innerhalb deines Ãœberziehungsrahmen bewegst.Ansonsten kann dein Kontostand negativ werden, wenn N26-GebÃ¼hren zu bezahlen sind wie z.B. fÃ¼r unsere Express-Lieferung oder unsere Premium-Mitgliedschaften.Â AuÃŸerdem kann dein Kontostand negativ werden, wenn Offline-Kartenzahlungen eingehen und abgebucht werden mÃ¼ssen. Dies sind z.B. Zahlungen auf Flugzeugen oder Schiffen, die zum Zeitpunkt der Zahlungsautorisierung nicht deinem Kontostand gegenÃ¼bergestellt werden kÃ¶nnen, aber trotzdem abgebucht werden mÃ¼ssen.Â GemÃ¤ÃŸ unserer AGB hast du dich verpflichtet, dein Konto auszugleichen. Du erhÃ¤ltst eine Erinnerung per E-Mail und wir bitten dich, dein Konto so schnell wie mÃ¶glich auszugleichen. Solange dein Kontostand negativ ist, kannst du keine weiteren Zahlungen oder Abhebungen tÃ¤tigen.Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ bleibt?Dein Konto bleibt weitere 60 Tage aktiv, nachdem es negativ geworden ist. In diesem Zeitraum:Bekommst du zwei Erinnerungen.Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, wird dieser nach der zweiten Erinnerung gekÃ¼ndigt und du musst den Betrag sofort zurÃ¼ckzahlen (oder du kannst einen RÃ¼ckzahlungsplan beantragen).Wenn du ein N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You Konto hast, werden alle Leistungen nach 60 Tagen gekÃ¼ndigt und dein Konto in ein Standardkonto umgewandelt.Wenn du nach diesen 60 Tagen nicht handelst, kann dein Konto geschlossen werden.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Donâ€™t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you donâ€™t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while youâ€™re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We wonâ€™t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.Â

title: Alimenter mon compte par carte, Apple Pay et Google Pay
content: Vous pouvez dÃ¨s Ã  prÃ©sent alimenter votre compte en utilisant une carte de dÃ©bit ou de crÃ©dit mais aussi Apple ou Google Pay. Câ€™est la maniÃ¨re la plus rapide et simple dâ€™alimenter votre compte N26.Alimenter votre compte avec une carte de dÃ©bit ou de crÃ©ditOuvrez l'application N26 et cliquez sur "Recevoir".SÃ©lectionnez â€œCarte de dÃ©bitâ€Choisissez un montant, entrez le nom qui figure sur la carte, le numÃ©ro de carte, la date dâ€™expiration et le cryptogramme visuel (nous ne conservons jamais ces donnÃ©es)Suivez les Ã©tapes afin de confirmer le paiementLâ€™argent est disponible instantanÃ©ment sur votre compteLe montant avec lequel vous pouvez alimenter votre compte Ã  chaque transaction rÃ©currente est de 20 â‚¬ au minimum et de 450 â‚¬ au maximum par transaction, avec un plafond maximum de 450 â‚¬ par mois.Alimenter votre compte avec Apple ou Google PayDepuis votre application N26, rendez-vous dans la section â€œCartesâ€Â Cliquez simplement sur â€œRecevoirâ€ et sÃ©lectionnez â€œApple Payâ€ ou â€œGoogle Payâ€Saisissez le montantSuivez les Ã©tapes afin de confirmer le paiementLâ€™argent est disponible instantanÃ©ment sur votre compteCartes acceptÃ©es : les cartes Visa et Mastercard dotÃ©es d'un numÃ©ro de carte Ã  16 chiffres. Veuillez noter que les cartes prÃ©payÃ©es ne sont pas acceptÃ©es.Pour en savoir plus sur les diffÃ©rences entre cartes de dÃ©bit, crÃ©dit et prÃ©payÃ©es, vous pouvez consulter cet article (nouvel onglet).Frais :La premiÃ¨re de ces transactions est toujours gratuite, mais les suivantes sont facturÃ©es Ã  hauteur de 3 % du montant total du dÃ©pÃ´t.Bien que ces options soient les plus simples et rapides pour alimenter instantanÃ©ment votre compte N26, le traitement de ces transactions nous est plus coÃ»teux que celui des autres options proposÃ©es.Lorsque vous alimentez votre compte avec une carte bancaire ou un compte Apple Pay ou Google Pay, votre argent nâ€™est pas reÃ§u instantanÃ©ment par N26. Les frais couvrent donc les coÃ»ts supplÃ©mentaires associÃ©s Ã  lâ€™avance de la somme sur votre compte.

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we donâ€™t charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if youâ€™re certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could helpÂ get your money back.

title: FATCA - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir benÃ¶tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut dazu verpflichtet, dem United States Department of Treasury sowie dem Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Informationen Ã¼ber Kundenkonten von U.S. Steuerzahlern oder auslÃ¤ndischen EntitÃ¤ten zur VerfÃ¼gung zu stellen, die laut FATCA fÃ¼r U.S. Steuerzahler von erheblichem Interesse sind.FATCA steht fÃ¼r Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act und ist ein Gesetz zur BekÃ¤mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung. EingefÃ¼hrt vom IRS erreicht FATCA bessere steuerliche Entsprechungen, indem er U.S. Steuerzahler daran hindert, auslÃ¤ndische Banken oder Finanzinstitute dafÃ¼r zu nutzen, ihre VermÃ¶genswerte und Einkommen der Besteuerung zu entziehen. Mehr Ã¼ber FATCA oder den IRS erfÃ¤hrst du auf: www.irs.gov.Anders als die meisten LÃ¤nder haben die Vereinigten Staaten ein Steuersystem, das auch diejenigen US-StaatsbÃ¼rger erfasst, deren Wohnsitz nicht in den Vereinigten Staaten liegt. Die meisten anderen LÃ¤nder besteuern die weltweiten Einkommen ihrer BÃ¼rger nur insofern, als letztere ihren Wohnsitz im Inland haben bzw. besteuern nicht diejenigen BÃ¼rger, die permanent im Ausland leben und arbeiten.Um zuverlÃ¤ssig festzustellen, ob dein Kundenkonto dem IRS mitzuteilen ist, mÃ¼ssen wir dir die folgenden 3 Fragen stellen:Hast du (auch) die US-amerikanische StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit oder besitzt du eine Green Card?
Bist du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig?
In den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig zu sein, heiÃŸt nicht ohne Weiteres, dass du dort eine persÃ¶nliche Einkommensteuer zahlen musst. Es bedeutet zunÃ¤chst nur, dass du laut amerikanischem Recht verpflichtet bist, eine SteuererklÃ¤rung abgeben musst und dein (weltweites) Einkommen dem IRS angeben musst - selbst wenn du schlieÃŸlich keine Steuern in den Vereinigten Staaten zahlen musst.
Falls ja, wie lautet deine US-amerikanische Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (US-TIN)?
Als US-TIN kannst du entweder deine US-Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) oder deine US-Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (ITIN) benutzen.Bitte beachte: Falls in deinem Konto eine amerikanische Telefonnummer oder ein amerikanischer Geburtsort registriert ist oder du einen Dauerauftrag in die USA erstellst, haben wir nach FATCA davon auszugehen, dass die in FATCA festgelegten Bestimmungen fÃ¼r dich Geltung haben, bis du uns das Gegenteil bestÃ¤tigst.Falls sich deine Lage verÃ¤ndert, kannst du deine Steuerdaten jederzeit in deiner N26 App aktualisieren. Logge dich dazu einfach in deine N26 App ein und gehe zu: 
Mein Konto > Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

title: Comment rejoindre, ajouter ou retirer des participants dâ€™un espace partagÃ© ?
content: Si vous avez Ã©tÃ© invitÃ© Ã  rejoindre un espace partagÃ©, voici comment faire :Â Â Depuis la rubrique Espaces, appuyez sur lâ€™espace signalÃ© â€œEn attenteâ€, puis surÂ  lâ€™icÃ´ne qui sâ€™affiche. Prenez connaissance des informations relatives Ã  Espaces PartagÃ©s, puis lisez lâ€™Ã©cran suivant Ã  propos de la procuration. Une fois que vous avez pris connaissance et compris toutes les informations relatives Ã  la Procuration, cochez la case et appuyez sur le bouton â€œAccepter la procurationâ€. Entrez votre code de validation.Ouvrez la notification â€œAccepter la procurationâ€ reÃ§u sur votre tÃ©lÃ©phone synchronisÃ© pour confirmer votre dÃ©cision.Vous pouvez rejoindre un espace partagÃ© si vous avez encore des espaces non utilisÃ©s. Pour rappel, les clients N26 Standard peuvent utiliser jusquâ€™Ã  2 espaces et les utilisateurs de comptes premium ont la possibilitÃ© dâ€™en utiliser jusquâ€™Ã  9 simultanÃ©ment.Â  Si vous utilisez dÃ©jÃ  le nombre maximum dâ€™espaces que vous offre votre compte, il vous faudra en supprimer un pour rejoindre un espace partagÃ©.Â Lorsque vous souhaitez rejoindreÂ  un espace partagÃ©, veuillez noter que vous devrez modifier la photo ou/et le nom de votre espace individuel dans le cas oÃ¹ ces paramÃ¨tres seraient identiques avant de pouvoir accepter lâ€™invitation.Â Si vous avez souhaitez quitter un espace partagÃ©, voici comment faire :Â Â Depuis la rubrique Espaces, appuyez sur lâ€™espace partagÃ© que vous souhaitez quitter puis sur les trois points en haut Ã  droite de votre Ã©cran pour ouvrir le menu. Dans la section â€œGÃ©rerâ€ appuyez sur â€œQuitter lâ€™espace partagÃ©â€.Ouvrez la notification â€œQuitter lâ€™espace partagÃ©â€ reÃ§u sur votre tÃ©lÃ©phone synchronisÃ© pour confirmer votre dÃ©cision.Si vous Ãªtes lâ€™administrateur dâ€™un espace partagÃ©, vous pouvez retirer un participant de de cette faÃ§on :Â Depuis lâ€™aperÃ§u de lâ€™espace, appuyez sur les trois points pour ouvrir le menuAppuyez sur la flÃ¨che qui se situe Ã  droite du nom du participant que vous souhaitez retirer (IOS) ou directement sur le nom du participant si vous utilisez un appareil Android.Â Appuyez sur â€œRÃ©voquer la procurationâ€.Confirmez la notification sur l'Ã©cran suivant et appuyez sur " RÃ©voquer procuration ".Â Un espace partagÃ© peut Ãªtre crÃ©Ã© ou modifiÃ© depuis lâ€™application mobile N26 ou votre espace client en ligne sur https://app.n26.com/login (nouvel onglet).Pour en savoir plus sur les Espaces partagÃ©s, visitez notre article Que sont les Espaces PartagÃ©s ?.DÃ©couvrez Ã©galement Comment crÃ©er un Espace partagÃ© ?

title: Wie lange dauert eine Ãœberweisung?
content: Eingehende SEPA-EchtzeitÃ¼berweisungen auf N26 Konten erfolgen in Echtzeit, solange sie von einer Bank stammen, die EchtzeitÃ¼berweisungen unterstÃ¼tzt. Ãœberweisungen kÃ¶nnen jedoch manchmal verzÃ¶gert werden, wenn sie aufgrund von SEPA-Banking-Vorschriften Ã¼berprÃ¼ft werden mÃ¼ssen.GewÃ¶hnliche SEPA-Ãœberweisungen gehen innerhalb von hÃ¶chstens zwei Werktagen ein. Bitte beachte, dass sich der Zeitrahmen auf maximal dreiÂ Werktage verlÃ¤ngert, wenn die Ãœberweisung kurz vor einem Wochenende oder Feiertag vorgenommen wird.Eingehende SWIFT-Ãœberweisungen dauern bis zu vier Werktage, bis sie eintreffen.Ausgehende SEPA-EchtzeitÃ¼berweisungen erfolgen in Echtzeit. GewÃ¶hnliche ausgehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen dauern bis zu zwei Werktage. Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen mit unserem Partner Wise dauern bis zu vier Werktage. Ausgehende SWIFT-Ãœberweisungen werden nicht unterstÃ¼tzt.Was ist ein "Bankarbeitstag"?Ein Bankarbeitstag entspricht aufgrund der Ã–ffnungszeiten der beteiligten Banken zwei Werktagen. Jeder Tag unter der Woche, der kein Feiertag ist, gilt als Werktag.Warum ist meine Ãœberweisung nicht angekommen?Was passiert, wenn alles Obenstehende berÃ¼cksichtigt wurde und die Ãœberweisung immer noch nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt wurde? In solchen FÃ¤llen kann nur die auftraggebende Bank eine interne Nachforschung einleiten.Leider kÃ¶nnen wir bei N26 keine eingehenden Ãœberweisungen untersuchen, nur ausgehende Ãœberweisungen. Dessen ungeachtet findest du hier eine Liste der mÃ¶glichen GrÃ¼nde, warum eine Ãœberweisung fehlschlagen kÃ¶nnte.Weitere InformationenAll unsere SEPA-Ãœberweisungen werden Ã¼ber ein System namens TARGET2 (neuen Tab) abgewickelt. Dieses System bearbeitet Bankzahlungen werktags von 7:00 Uhr bis 18:00 Uhr europÃ¤ischer Standardzeit. An den folgenden Tagen macht TARGET2 Urlaub: 1. Januar (Neujahr), Karfreitag, Ostermontag, 1. Mai (Tag der Arbeit), 25. Dezember (1. Weihnachtsfeiertag) und 26. Dezember (2. Weihnachtsfeiertag).

title: Come passare a N26 You?
content: Disponibile in Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Lettonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Polonia, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia.Puoi scegliere N26 YouÂ durante la registrazione oppure effettuando un upgrade tramite app se hai giÃ  un conto corrente N26 standard. Per effettuare l'upgrade a N26 You tramite app:effettua il login nella app, vai in Esplora e seleziona Passa a N26 You.scegli uno dei nostri cinque nuovi colori di carta: rabarbaro, oceano, sabbia, acquamarina, antracite. seleziona ilÂ metodo di consegnaÂ che preferisci e accetta iÂ Termini e Condizioni (nuova tabella)Â di N26 You. A questo punto, la tua nuova carta arriverÃ  a breve.Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:Le consegne standard richiedono fino a 10 giorni lavorativi, mentre le consegne express fino a 3 giorni lavorativi.Il costo mensile di â‚¬9,90 sarÃ  addebitato direttamente sul tuo conto ogni mese alla data dellâ€™upgrade.Puoi acquistare una seconda Mastercard N26 You direttamente tramite la app di N26 per un costo di â‚¬14, una tantum.

title: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!Â If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.Â If you havenâ€™t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card.Â
