title: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
content: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.Â With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as weâ€™re able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. Weâ€™re going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.Â Can I open an N26 account in my country?

title: Impostazioni per le comunicazioni di marketing
content: In quanto cliente N26, puoi attivare o disattivare le nostre Comunicazioni di marketing allâ€™interno dellâ€™app mobile e via Web, avendo cosÃ¬ la possibilitÃ  di scegliere se desideri ricevere offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalitÃ  N26, nonchÃ© aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni. Puoi accedere alle nell'app mobile e WebApp di N26 come segue:Il mio contoImpostazioni dell'appComunicazioni di marketingQui sotto troverai una spiegazione per ogni comunicazione di marketing e su cosa significhi la sua attivazione in modo da poter gestire al meglio le impostazioni che desideri. Puoi trovare le informazioni sul relativo trattamento dei dati nell'Informativa sulla privacy di N26.Notifiche push:Attivando le notifiche push, riceverai offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalitÃ  N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni tramite notifiche in tempo reale. Disattivando le notifiche push, non riceverai piÃ¹ i contenuti di cui sopra con questa modalitÃ . Ti preghiamo di notare che abilitare/disabilitare questa opzione ha effetto solo sui contenuti relativi a offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalitÃ  N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni, ma non influisce su altri contenuti che puoi ricevere tramite notifiche push. Pertanto, anche disattivando questa funzione, riceverai comunque notifiche push contenenti informazioni rilevanti per il tuo utilizzo del conto corrente N26 (ad es. transazioni recenti, nuove funzionalitÃ  del tuo conto corrente). Aggiornamenti nell'app:Attivando gli aggiornamenti nell'app, riceverai offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalitÃ  N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni tramite gli aggiornamenti all'interno dell'app, che sono piccoli banner visualizzati automaticamente all'interno del feed delle transazioni. Disattivando gli aggiornamenti nell'app, non riceverai piÃ¹ i contenuti di cui sopra con questa modalitÃ . Ti preghiamo di notare che abilitare/disabilitare questa opzione ha un effetto solo su contenuti relativi a offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalitÃ  N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni, ma non ha influisce su altri contenuti che puoi ricevere tramite aggiornamenti nell'app. Pertanto, anche disattivando questa funzione, riceverai comunque aggiornamenti nell'app contenenti informazioni rilevanti per il tuo utilizzo del conto corrente N26 (ad es. transazioni recenti, nuove funzionalitÃ  del tuo conto corrente). Email:Attivando le comunicazioni via email, riceverai offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalitÃ  N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni tramite email. Disabilitando le comunicazioni via email, non riceverai piÃ¹ i contenuti sopra menzionati con questa modalitÃ . Ti preghiamo di notare che abilitare/disabilitare questa opzione ha un effetto solo su contenuti relativi a offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalitÃ  N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni, ma non ha influisce su altri contenuti che puoi ricevere tramite email. Pertanto, anche disattivando questa funzione, riceverai comunque email contenenti informazioni rilevanti per il tuo utilizzo del conto corrente N26 (ad es. transazioni recenti, nuove funzionalitÃ  del tuo conto corrente). Chat di assistenza:Attivando la chat di assistenza, riceverai offerte personalizzate per prodotti e funzionalitÃ  N26, aggiornamenti sulle offerte dei partner N26 e altre raccomandazioni tramite la chat di assistenza, ad esempio verso la fine di una conversazione con il Supporto Clienti N26. Disattivando le comunicazioni tramite chat di assistenza, non riceverai piÃ¹ i contenuti sopra menzionati tramite chat. Ti preghiamo di notare che Questa modifica non ha alcun impatto sulla tua accessibilitÃ  al Supporto Clienti di N26, inclusa la chat di assistenza di N26. In ogni caso, potrai comunque accedere alla chat di assistenza del Supporto Clienti e ricevere supporto per le tue richieste. Marketing partner:Attivando l'opzione Marketing partner, accetti che N26 possa inviare il tuo indirizzo email cifrato ai suoi Marketing partner (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) al fine di escluderti dalle pubblicitÃ  di N26 e aiutare N26 a definire meglio i suoi gruppi target. Se disattivi questa opzione, N26 non invierÃ  il tuo indirizzo email ai suoi Marketing partner e potresti ricevere annunci pubblicitari di N26 non rilevanti per te. Per maggiori informazioni sui Marketing partner, fai riferimento a questo articolo.

title: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
content:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercardâ€™s exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesnâ€™t charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercardâ€™s rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

title: Â¿QuÃ© es â€œMensajesâ€?
content:
La seguridad de tus datos personales es nuestra prioridad, por ello, hemos creado un buzÃ³n dentro de la app que te va a permitir compartir cualquier comunicaciÃ³n. Cualquier contenido que incluya datos personales lo vamos a comunicar a travÃ©s de Mensajes. De todas formas, seguiremos comunicando a tu email la informaciÃ³n general. Â¿QuÃ© son los datos personales?Los datos personales hacen referencia a cualquier informaciÃ³n que se refiere a ti como persona y te identifica o podrÃ­a identificarte. PodrÃ­an ser los detalles de tu cuenta, tu direcciÃ³n (de email o postal), el documento de identidad, una prueba de residencia, pero tambiÃ©n puede ser una notificaciÃ³n sobre los intereses acumulados de un descubierto o tu transferencia mensual programada. Â¿CÃ³mo funciona?Cuando enviamos un mensaje a Mensajes, recibes una notificaciÃ³n emergente en tu telÃ©fono vinculado y un email a tu direcciÃ³n de correo registrada en la cuenta. Cuando te conectes a la WebApp, recibirÃ¡s un panel con el mensaje. Te enviaremos un mensaje que puedes encontrar en Mensajes y te pediremos que lo contestes directamente desde ahÃ­.Esta funciÃ³n estÃ¡ disponible en nuestra app mÃ³vil, haciendo clic en el icono de Ayuda, en la esquina superior derecha. Asegurate de que tienes la Ãºltima versiÃ³n de la app. 
No es posible iniciar una conversaciÃ³n pero puedes responder cuando te enviemos un mensaje. Si tienes que enviarnos un documento, selecciona la opciÃ³n Adjuntar archivo. Recuerda que el tamaÃ±o total de los archivos no debe exceder los 25MB. Mensajes no reemplaza al chat y por supuesto tambiÃ©n puedes seguir enviÃ¡ndonos emails. Si necesitas contactarnos visita la pÃ¡gina de nuestro Centro de Ayuda: Â¿CÃ³mo contactar N26?. Si tenemos que verificarte te pediremos que abras un chat con nosotros.

title: Wie verdiene ich Geld, indem ich Freunde zu N26 einlade?
content: Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald dein Konto vollstÃ¤ndig erÃ¶ffnet ist.Um zu erfahren welchen Betrag du fÃ¼r die Empfehlung deines Freundes erhalten kannst, schaust du einfach in der App unter "Freunde einladen":Logge dich in die App einAuf der Startseite gehst du zu â€œEntdeckenâ€ (App) oder â€œMein Kontoâ€Â (Web-App (neuen Tab))Gehe zu â€œFreunde einladenâ€Tippe auf deinen persÃ¶nlichen Empfehlungscode, um ihn zu kopieren und wÃ¤hle aus auf welchem Weg du den Code teilen mÃ¶chtestDu kannst bei Bedarf eine Nachricht an deinen Freund hinzufÃ¼gen oder die Vorgabe nutzenÂ Tippe auf â€œSendenâ€!Damit du den Bonus erhÃ¤ltst, mÃ¼ssen deine Freunde auch alle unsere Voraussetzungen erfÃ¼llen:Die Anmeldung Ã¼ber deinen Empfehlungslink oder persÃ¶nlichen Code abschlieÃŸen.Abschluss der ersten Transaktion mit der Mastercard in mindestens der HÃ¶he des Bonuses der Weiterempfehlung. Die Transaktion kann ein Kauf in einem GeschÃ¤ft, eine Abhebung am Geldautomaten oder eine Online-Zahlung sein (auÃŸer PayPal).Wenn deine Freunde alle Voraussetzungen erfÃ¼llt haben, wird der Bonus innerhalb von 60 Tagen ausgezahlt. Du kannst den Status jederzeit in deiner mobilen App oder WebApp einsehen.Ingesamt kannst du bis zu 1500â‚¬ erhalten, wenn du Freunde einlÃ¤dstFalls dein Werbebonus noch nicht ausgezahlt wurde, haben wir auch einigeÂ GrÃ¼ndeÂ dafÃ¼r gesammelt.*Der Link verfÃ¤llt nicht und kann jederzeit verwendet werden. PersÃ¶nliche Einladungscodes und Links sollten nur fÃ¼r persÃ¶nliche und nichtkommerzielle Zwecke verwendet werden. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Einladungslink Ã¼ber Social Media mit persÃ¶nlichen Kontakten teilen kannst, solange du der HaupteigentÃ¼mer bist. N26 hat das Recht, das Empfehlungsprogramm jederzeit zu beenden.Weitere Informationen findest du in denÂ AGB (neuen Tab)Â des Freundschaftswerbungsprogramms.

title: What are Instant transfers?
content: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipientâ€™s bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you wonâ€™t have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49â‚¬Spain - 1,99â‚¬Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99â‚¬The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000â‚¬ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000â‚¬ per day). If youâ€™re using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If youâ€™re paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiverâ€™s details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

title: Wie erstelle ich eine SEPA-Ãœberweisung?
content: Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen kannst du in jedes Land innerhalb des SEPA Raums ausfÃ¼hren.Â Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen kannst du sowohl in der N26 App als auch in deinem Online Banking erstellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.WÃ¤hle BankÃ¼berweisungen und dann Neuer Kontakt.Gib den legalen Namen und die IBAN des EmpfÃ¤ngers ein und wÃ¤hle Weiter.Gib den Betrag ein und wÃ¤hle Weiter.Gib bei Bedarf einen Verwendungszweck ein und wÃ¤hle Weiter.ÃœberprÃ¼fe die Zusammenfassung deiner Ãœberweisung. Hier kannst du auch entscheiden, ob es eine TerminÃ¼berweisung werden soll oder ein DauerauftragKlicke Absenden und bestÃ¤tige mit deiner BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN.Zum Schluss erhÃ¤ltst du in deinem verknÃ¼pften Handy eine Push-Mitteilung, um die Ãœberweisung zu bestÃ¤tigen.Â Sobald die Ãœberweisung bestÃ¤tigt wurde, kÃ¶nnen wir sie nicht rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen oder die Daten des ÃœberweisungsempfÃ¤ngers Ã¤ndern.Falls du die Ãœberweisung nicht bestÃ¤tigen kannst, Ã¼berprÃ¼fe bitte, dass:Du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast.In den Einstellungen deines Handys Push-Mitteilungen aktiviert sind.Du dein verknÃ¼pftes Handy verwendest.Sobald deine Ãœberweisung gesendet wurde, kannst du in der App eine ÃœberweisungsbestÃ¤tigung als PDF herunterladen:Gehe in deine Umsatzliste.Finde deine Ãœberweisung und tippe auf diese.Scrolle nach unten zu den Informationen zur Transaktion tippe auf ÃœberweisungsbestÃ¤tigung.Du kannst ausgehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen auch direkt aus deinen Spaces mit zugewiesenen IBANs vornehmen. Gehe dafÃ¼r einfach in den Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN, wÃ¤hle "Geld senden" und dann "BankÃ¼berweisung". Das wird dann wie eine normale ausgehende Zahlung gehandhabt.

title: How to get push messages?
content: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such asÂ MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as withÂ CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you arenâ€™t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether youâ€™re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: How to use Spaces?
content: To start using your Spaces, youâ€™ll want to go to the â€˜Spacesâ€™ section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the â€˜Spacesâ€™ homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap â€˜Create a new spaceâ€™ in the â€˜Spacesâ€™ homepageSelect one of the below options:â€˜Saving for a goalâ€™ - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).â€˜Sharing moneyâ€™ - Allows you to create a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.â€˜Create now, decide laterâ€™ - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now letâ€™s start using â€˜Spacesâ€™!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your â€˜Main Accountâ€™ or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the â€˜manageâ€™Then press â€˜Lock Spaceâ€™ or â€˜Unlock Spaceâ€™Enter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the â€˜Settingsâ€™ cog (top-right corner)Select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap â€˜Manageâ€™:To create a savings goal, select â€˜Create my goalâ€™ (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then â€˜Set goalâ€™To enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select â€˜Manage Round-UpsToggle â€˜Enable Round-Upsâ€™You will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap â€˜Create a ruleâ€™Choose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

title: Documentos bancarios
content: Como no podÃ­a ser de otra manera, en N26 puedes descargar tu extracto bancario, certificado de titularidad bancaria y mÃ¡s documentos de forma automÃ¡tica. Todos estos documentos son oficiales y perfectamente vÃ¡lidos sin firma:Extracto bancario: es un documento en el que se refleja tu saldo total y todas las transacciones entrantes y salientes de tu cuenta N26, ademÃ¡s de tu nombre y apellidos, IBAN y BIC. AquÃ­ te explicamos cÃ³mo descargarlo.Certificado de titularidad bancaria: es un documento que confirma que tu cuenta estÃ¡ registrada a tu nombre. Incluye tu nombre y apellidos, fecha de nacimiento, el IBAN de la cuenta, la fecha en que te diste de alta y, opcionalmente, tu saldo actual y nÃºmero de tarjeta. AquÃ­ te mostramos cÃ³mo solicitarlo.Estado de comisiones: es un documento en el que puedes ver detalladamente todas las comisiones que te hemos cobrado como banco durante el Ãºltimo aÃ±o.Desde la WebApp: haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pestaÃ±a nueva), bajo Estado de Comisiones, selecciona si lo quieres de los Ãºltimos 6 o 12 meses y haz clic en Solicitar. RecibirÃ¡s el PDF en la secciÃ³n Mensajes dentro de 24 horas.Justificante de pago por transferencia bancaria: es un documento que prueba que has hecho una transferencia. Incluye tu nombre y apellidos, tu direcciÃ³n registrada en N26, el IBAN y BIC de tu cuenta, el importe, fecha y concepto de la transferencia, nombre y apellidos del beneficiario, su IBAN y su BIC.Desde la app del mÃ³vil o la WebApp: en la pantalla de Inicio, elige la transferencia en cuestiÃ³n y selecciona ConfirmaciÃ³n de transferencia. El PDF se genera automÃ¡ticamente.Justificante de pago con tarjeta: sirve para demostrar o probar que has hecho un pago con tu tarjeta. Puedes hacerlo presentando el extracto bancario del mes en cuestiÃ³n.RIB (RelevÃ© d'IdentitÃ© Bancaire en francÃ©s): es un documento especÃ­fico para las autoridades francesas donde se recoge tu informaciÃ³n bancaria bÃ¡sica; nombre y apellidos, direcciÃ³n legal, IBAN y BIC.Desde la WebApp: haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pestaÃ±a nueva), baja hasta el apartado RIB y haz clic en Solicitar. Â * El icono de descargas es el cuadrado con una flecha hacia abajo que se encuentra a la izquierda del botÃ³n de Ingresar dinero.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. Youâ€™ll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency MechanismÂ As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26â€™s public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen APIÂ  & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as â€œpendingâ€ will be classified as â€œbookedâ€ transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 Weâ€™ve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

title: How to order my extra card?
content: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: â€œAlways losing things?â€ > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs â‚¬10 for standard shipping and â‚¬25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of â‚¬10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.â„¹ï¸ The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

title: How can I pay bills and top-up my phone from the app?
content: Starting from the 1st of September, it will be possible for all the customers with Italian Terms and Conditions to pay postal bills, PagoPA, MAV / RAV, car tax and top-up their phone directly from their mobile app with the N26 debit card.This service is provided in collaboration with PayTipper SpA, a payment institution that has been a partner of the Enel X group since 2019.How to make payments to 3rd parties within the N26 mobile app:Log in to the N26 app and click on "Send money"Select "Other payments"In the menu, select the payment you want to make (Phone top-up, PagoPA, Postal bulletins, MAV or RAV, Car tax)You will then be redirected to the website of that service provider and will be able to perform the paymentThe service is not provided directly by N26 but by the 3rd party service providers. For this reason, by using this payment method, you will be subject to the processing of personal data, terms and conditions and any possible commissions not dependent on N26. In some cases the service might be offered only in Italian.If you need assistance with a payment or would like to receive a payment receipt, please get in contact with the customer support of the service provider you have chosen. Click here to get in touch with PayTipper (new tab)Below you can find customer support contacts for the main Italian network providers (please refer to the respective websites for opening hours and service costs):Vodafone: 190Tim: 187Wind Tre: 159Iliad: 177Kena Mobile: 181Ho.Mobile: 19.21.21

title: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
content: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, weâ€™ll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesnâ€™t charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under theirÂ Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipientâ€™s name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipientâ€™s name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments arenâ€™t active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo hacer la declaraciÃ³n de la renta y pagar impuestos con N26?
content: N26 es el primer neobanco espaÃ±ol que permite a sus clientes efectuar el pago de liquidaciones y deudas a travÃ©s de la Agencia Tributaria (AEAT) desde la propia app. Esto significa que puedes usar tu cuenta N26 para hacer la declaraciÃ³n de la renta y pagar impuestos como el IVA y el IRPF, entre muchos otros.Â¿QuÃ© impuestos puedo pagar con mi cuenta N26?Lo primero a tener en cuenta es que este proceso solo aplica a los ejercicios del aÃ±o 2019 en adelante. A pesar de que N26 sigue sin ser una entidad colaboradora de la Agencia Tributaria, puedes pagar la inmensa mayorÃ­a de impuestos. De los mÃ¡s de 700 tributos de la AEAT, puedes pagar todos excepto los modelos: 576, 602, 696, 770, 771, 003, 060, 061, 069, 790, 990, 791 y 991.Por desgracia, todavÃ­a no es posible pagar los impuestos de la Seguridad Social, como la cuota de autÃ³nomos, ni recibir prestaciones, como el paro o la jubilaciÃ³n.Â¿CÃ³mo puedo pagar impuestos de la AEAT con N26?Este proceso es igual tanto para clientes con IBAN espaÃ±ol (que empieza por ES) como para clientes con IBAN alemÃ¡n o italiano (que empieza por DE o IT, respectivamente):Clica en el siguiente link (pestaÃ±a nueva)para acceder a la pÃ¡gina de la AEAT donde podrÃ¡s rellenar tus datosSigue las instrucciones para cumplimentar el formulario del impuesto y, al elegir la modalidad de pago, selecciona Reconocimiento de deuda y pago por transferencia.En este punto, la AEAT te mostrarÃ¡ los datos bancarios para hacer la transferencia desde N26: IBAN, BIC/SWIFT, importe, concepto y fecha lÃ­mite de recepciÃ³n.Vuelve a tu app N26 y selecciona Enviar dinero > Transferencia bancaria.Introduce los datos bancarios de la AEAT y asegÃºrate de aÃ±adir el cÃ³digo indicado como concepto de la transferencia.Selecciona si quieres enviar una transferencia ordinaria o una transferencia inmediata (gratis para clientes premium o 1,99Â â‚¬ para cuentas EstÃ¡ndar).Ten en cuenta que una transferencia ordinaria tardarÃ¡ entre 24 y 48 horas laborables en llegar a la cuenta de destino y saldar la deuda. De modo que si tienes un plazo muy justo, te recomendamos seleccionar la transferencia inmediata.Encuentra aqui una breve explicaciÃ³n visual sobre como pagar impuestos o hacer tu declaraciÃ³n desde la AEAT.Renta 2021 - Opciones de pago (pestaÃ±a nueva)

title: What is CASH26?
content: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 appâ€“â€“no debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-storeâ€“â€“itâ€™s that simple. Plus, you donâ€™t have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adamâ€™s, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, youâ€™ll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.Â If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of â‚¬2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.

title: Quâ€™est-ce quâ€™un compte N26 Standard ?
content: Le compte N26 Standard est un compte courant numÃ©rique sÃ»r et intuitif que vous pouvez ouvrir en quelques minutes, directement depuis votre smartphone. Il est dâ€™une grande simplicitÃ© et transparence, vous permettant de recevoir, dâ€™envoyer et de dÃ©penser de lâ€™argent en toute confiance. Le compte N26 Standard est gratuit*, vous offrant une solution simple et abordable pour tous vos besoins financiers.Â Que comprend un compte N26 Standard ?Notre compte N26 Standard prÃ©sente les avantages et fonctionnalitÃ©s suivants :Compte courant gratuit* : Notre compte N26 Standard est gratuit (*si le solde du compte est de 50 000 â‚¬ ou plus, des droits de garde peuvent Ãªtre prÃ©levÃ©s).Carte virtuelle N26 : Lâ€™ouverture du compte N26 vous donne droit Ã  une carte virtuelle gratuite qui comporte un numÃ©ro PAN complet et qui peut Ãªtre ajoutÃ©e Ã  Apple ou Google Pay pour les achats en ligne et en magasin.Carte physique N26 Mastercard : Pour 10 â‚¬ supplÃ©mentaires, vous pouvez recevoir une carte de dÃ©bit physique N26 Standard (veuillez noter que vous devez disposer dâ€™au moins 10 â‚¬ sur votre compte pour la fabrication et lâ€™envoi de la carte).Paiements et virements : Vous pouvez effectuer et recevoir des virements SEPA en utilisant votre application mobile N26. Vous pouvez Ã©galement envoyer de lâ€™argent instantanÃ©ment Ã  dâ€™autres clients N26 en utilisant Moneybeam.Autres services financiers : Si vous Ãªtes Ã©ligible, vous pouvez Ã©galement demander dâ€™autres services financiers, tels que les dÃ©couverts autorisÃ©s, N26 CrÃ©dit, N26 Ã‰pargne, etc.CASH26 : Effectuez des retraits et dÃ©pÃ´ts en utilisant notre fonctionnalitÃ© CASH26 (Conditions gÃ©nÃ©rales dâ€™utilisation DE, AT et IT).Service Client : Vous pouvez contacter notre incroyable Ã©quipe de service client en utilisant le livechat de lâ€™application ou en dÃ©marrant un chat depuis notre site internet ou votre espace client N26. Notre nouveau compte N26 Standard vous donne droit Ã  une carte de dÃ©bit virtuelle gratuite. Un compte N26 Standard actif vous permet dâ€™effectuer des paiements en ligne et en magasin. En outre, vous pouvez ajouter votre carte virtuelle Ã  votre portefeuille Apple ou Google Pay.Vous trouverez les dÃ©tails de votre carte virtuelle et votre numÃ©ro PAN complet dans votre application N26 pour effectuer des achats en ligne.

title: Wie bestelle ich eine extra Karte?
content: Klicke hier, wenn du deine Karte ersetzen willst, anstatt eine zusÃ¤tzliche Karte zu bestellen.So kannst du eine extra Karte bestellen:Logge dich in dein N26 Konto einGehe zu: EntdeckenÂ WÃ¤hle: Zusatzkarte > MastercardWÃ¤hle deine bevorzugte Farbe und VersandartTippe: BestÃ¤tigen und BezahlenDie Zusatzkarte kostet 10â‚¬ per Standardversand und 25â‚¬ per Expresslieferung. title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app youâ€™ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upperÂ right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.â„¹ï¸ Â Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Warum zahle ich Kirchensteuer?
content: Wir sind gesetzlich verpflichtet, Daten Ã¼ber kirchensteuerliche AbzÃ¼ge anzufordern und diese gegebenenfalls vorzunehmen. Dies wird jedes Jahr vom 1. September bis zum 31. Oktober durchgefÃ¼hrt.Du hast das Recht, gegen die Weitergabe von Informationen Ã¼ber deine ReligionszugehÃ¶rigkeit durch das FormularÂ â€ErklÃ¤rung zum Sperrvermerkâ€œ (neuen Tab)Â Berufung einzulegen. Du kannst dies vor dem 30. Juni eines jeden Jahres tun. title: Comment fonctionne le compte N26 Business ?
content:
Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, GrÃ¨ce, Irlande, Islande Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, NorvÃ¨ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, SlovÃ©nie, Suisse et SuÃ¨de.Le compte N26 Business est conÃ§u spÃ©cialementÂ pour les auto-entrepreneurs et non pour les entreprises ou autres personnes morales. Le compte et la carte ne peuvent donc pas porter le nom de votre activitÃ©.Pour le moment, il nâ€™est pas possible de passer dâ€™un compte Business Ã  un compte Standard, You ou Metal (ou vice versa). Dâ€™emblÃ©e, il est donc important de savoir si ce type de compte rÃ©pond Ã  vos besoins quotidiens.Le compte N26 BusinessCe compte est gratuitÂ et vous bÃ©nÃ©ficiez, selon votre pays, dâ€™un certain nombre de retraits mensuels gratuits en distributeurs dâ€™aprÃ¨s notreÂ Politique dâ€™Utilisation Ã‰quitable.Le compte N26 Business vous permet de :recevoir, en votre nom, les paiements de vos clients.rÃ©gler vos dÃ©penses professionnelles (dÃ©placements ou fournitures) ou votre loyer professionnel, toujours en votre nom. bÃ©nÃ©ficier de toutes les fonctionnalitÃ©s et avantages offerts par le compte N26 Standard. Vous recevez chaque mois 0,1 % de remise en argent ou cashback sur vos paiements effectuÃ©s avec cette carte. Le montant du cashback est calculÃ© de faÃ§on mensuelle, le 15 de chaque mois.
