title: Marketing Communication Settings
content: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

title: Was ist Phishing?
content: Phishing ist eine einfache und wirksame Methode, mit der Hacker Menschen dazu bringen, sensible persÃ¶nliche Daten preiszugeben. Sobald sie an diese Informationen gelangt sind, kÃ¶nnen sie diese fÃ¼r verschiedene BetrÃ¼gereien nutzen, indem sie im Namen ihrer Opfer auftreten. (neuen Tab) Hier (neuen Tab) kannst du mehr darÃ¼ber erfahren. In unserem Blogbeitrag erklÃ¤ren wir dir, wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und dich davor schÃ¼tzen kannst.Wie du verdÃ¤chtige E-Mails und Textnachrichten meldestN26 versendet niemals Textnachrichten oder E-Mails, die dringliche Warnungen enthalten und dich dazu auffordern, dich in dein Konto einzuloggen und persÃ¶nliche Daten herauszugeben. Wir stellen dir niemals ein Ultimatum, noch bitten wir dich je darum, dich auÃŸerhalb unserer sicheren KommunikationskanÃ¤le zu authentifizieren oder deine Daten zu verifizieren.VerdÃ¤chtige E-MailsKlicke keine Links an und lade keine AnhÃ¤nge herunter, wenn du eine verdÃ¤chtige E-Mail erhÃ¤ltst. Um uns bei unseren Nachforschungen zu helfen, bitten wir dich:die verdÃ¤chtigen E-Mails unter support@n26.com an uns weiterzuleitenODERdie verdÃ¤chtige E-Mail wenn mÃ¶glich als â€emlâ€œ-Datei zu speichern und an uns zu senden. Die meisten E-Mail-Anbieter speichern die Datei automatisch in diesem Format, wenn du sie herunterlÃ¤dst. Wenn du uns die verdÃ¤chtige E-Mail in diesem Format zusendest, kÃ¶nnen wir den wahren Ursprung der Nachricht ermitteln und den Vorfall den zustÃ¤ndigen BehÃ¶rden melden. Wenn du Schwierigkeiten hast, die E-Mail in diesem Format zu speichern: kein Problem. Leite dann die verdÃ¤chtigen E-Mails einfach an die obige Adresse weiter.Â Bitte sende uns keine Screenshots, da wir damit nichts anfangen kÃ¶nnen. LÃ¶sche danach die E-Mail aus deinem Postfach.VerdÃ¤chtige TextnachrichtenKlicke keine Links an und gib keine Daten ein, wenn du eine verdÃ¤chtige Textnachricht erhÃ¤ltst.Um uns bei unseren Nachforschungen zu helfen, bitten wir dich:Â einen Screenshot der erhaltenen Nachricht zu machen und an support@n26.com zu senden;achte bitte darauf, dass die komplette Nachricht, einschlieÃŸlich Telefonnummer des Absenders und Datum/Uhrzeit, sichtbar ist;blockiere die Telefonnummer, wenn du eine BestÃ¤tigung von uns erhÃ¤ltst, dass es sich um eine Phishing-Nachricht handelt;lÃ¶sche die Nachricht von deinem Mobiltelefon.Â VerdÃ¤chtige TelefonanrufeWenn du einen verdÃ¤chtigen Anruf erhÃ¤ltst, unabhÃ¤ngig davon, ob dieser von einer unserer Telefonnummern ausgeht oder nicht, gib keine personenbezogenen Daten an, die sich auf dein Konto oder die damit verbundene Karte beziehen. Wir weisen darauf hin, dass BetrÃ¼ger in einigen FÃ¤llen mit der "Spoofing"-Technologie die Telefonnummer des Absenders verschleiern kÃ¶nnen, so dass diese so aussieht wie die Telefonnummer der Bank.Wenn du also den Verdacht hast, dass du einem Telefonbetrug zum Opfer gefallen bist oder deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten weitergegeben hast, wende dich bitte umgehend an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com.Wie du eine gefÃ¤lschte Website meldestMÃ¶glicherweise findest du dich irgendwann einmal auf einer fragwÃ¼rdigen Website wieder, die vorgibt, im Namen von N26 fÃ¼r Dienstleistungen zu werben. Oder du siehst unser Logo auf vermeintlichen Partnerseiten. MÃ¶glicherweise bieten sie Kredite an oder zeitlich begrenzte Werbeangebote. Bitte behalte Folgendes im Hinterkopf: Die Tatsache, dass â€N26â€œ Bestandteil einer URL ist, bedeutet nicht unbedingt, dass die Webseite seriÃ¶s ist.Wenn du vermutest, dass du dich auf einer betrÃ¼gerischen Webseite befindest, solltest du einen Moment innehalten und Folgendes tun:ÃœberprÃ¼fe die Adresszeile und vergewissere dich, dass die URL https://app.n26.com/login lautet. Ist das nicht der Fall, kopiere die URL bitte und melde sie sogleich hier: support@n26.com.Â

title: Kann ich meine Karte mit Expressversand schneller bekommen?
content: Die Expresslieferung ist eine gute Wahl, wenn du deine Karte schnell benÃ¶tigst. Wenn du deine erste Karte bestellst oder eine neue Karte bestellst, steht auch die Option Expressversand zur VerfÃ¼gung. Die Karte ist nicht nur schneller bei dir, du erhÃ¤ltst auch noch einen Tracking-Link per E-Mail. Wenn du bei der Zustellung nicht zu Hause bist und dein Postfach nicht erreichbar ist, wird die Karte an einen Zugangspunkt in deiner NÃ¤he geliefert (den du Ã¼ber den Tracking-Link findest). Die Karte bleibt nur fÃ¼r eine begrenzte Zeit dort, danach wird sie an uns zurÃ¼ckgesandt. Wir informieren dich in diesem Fall per E-Mail.Wenn du die Expresslieferung wÃ¤hlst, beachte bitte:Deine N26 Standard-, N26 You- oder N26 Metal-Karte wird innerhalb von drei Werktagen ausgeliefert. Die Zustellung erfolgt zwischen 8 und 12 Uhr.Lieferungen kÃ¶nnen per DHL Express in alle von uns unterstÃ¼tzten LÃ¤nder innerhalb Europas erfolgen. Lieferungen in andere LÃ¤nder sind derzeit nicht mÃ¶glich.Wenn Expresslieferung als Versandart ausgewÃ¤hlt wurde, kann die Lieferung nicht storniert oder geÃ¤ndert werden.Falls du die Expresslieferung gewÃ¤hlt hast und dein Konto nun schlieÃŸen willst, wird die GebÃ¼hr fÃ¼r die Expresslieferung dennoch fÃ¤llig.Wenn deine Karte nicht innerhalb von 3-5 Werktagen nach deiner Bestellung eingetroffen ist, Ã¼berprÃ¼fe bitte den Tracking-Link auf mÃ¶gliche Updates. Du kannst den Tracking-Link auch verwenden, um DHL direkt Ã¼ber die Details deiner Lieferadresse zu informieren oder die Sendung umzuleiten, wenn du zum Zeitpunkt der Lieferung nicht zuhause bist.Bei N26 Standard und N26 You kostet eine neue Karte 10â‚¬ inklusive Standardversand oder 30â‚¬, wenn du dich fÃ¼r eine Expresslieferung entscheidest. Wie viel kostet die Expresslieferung?N26 Standard, N26 Smart & N26 YOU-Karten:Erste Karte bei KontoerÃ¶ffnung: 25â‚¬Bestellung einer neuen Karte: 30â‚¬N26-YOU-Zusatzkarte: 30â‚¬N26 Metal-Karten:Erste Karte bei KontoerÃ¶ffnung: 25â‚¬Bestellung einer neuen Karte: 65â‚¬

title: Come bloccare la mia carta N26?
content: Puoi bloccare e sbloccare le tue carte in qualsiasi momento nellâ€™app. Accedi, seleziona CarteÂ e poiÂ Impostazioni della carta. Qui puoi decidere se vuoi limitare temporaneamente o disattivare i prelievi bancomat, i pagamenti online o allâ€™estero, o bloccare del tutto la carta di debito.In questo modo hai il pieno controllo della tua carta e puoi proteggerti daÂ transazioni non autorizzate. In caso di sospetto, blocca immediatamente la carta. Puoi sempre sbloccarla successivamente.Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

title: How to change my phone number?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to:Â ğŸ‘¤Â My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all depositsÂ up to â‚¬100.000Â held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?Â N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

title: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
content: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.Â With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as weâ€™re able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. Weâ€™re going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.Â Can I open an N26 account in my country?

title: Comment passer au compte bancaire N26 Smart ?
content: â„¹ï¸ N26 Smart est disponible dans les pays suivants : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, GrÃ¨ce, Irlande, Islande, Italie, Lettonie, Liechtenstein, Lituanie, Luxembourg, NorvÃ¨ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, SlovÃ©nie, SuÃ¨de.Vous pouvez souscrire au compte premium N26 Smart :lors de lâ€™ouverture de votre comptesi vous avez dÃ©jÃ  un compte bancaire N26 Standard :accÃ©dez simplement Ã  lâ€™onglet DÃ©couvrir.SÃ©lectionnez N26 Smart.Lors de votre commande, vous pouvez choisir lâ€™une des cinq couleurs disponibles pour votre carte bancaire : Rhubarbe, OcÃ©an, Sable, Menthe et Ardoise.Ensuite, indiquez la mÃ©thode de livraison de votre choix, acceptez les Conditions gÃ©nÃ©rales de N26 Smart et votre nouvelle carte sera en route.Bon Ã  savoir :La livraison standard a un dÃ©lai de 15 jours ouvrÃ©s maximum.La (nouvel onglet) livraison express vous permet de recevoir votre carte N26 sous 3 jours ouvrÃ©s.Les frais dâ€™adhÃ©sion de 4,90 â‚¬ sont prÃ©levÃ©s directement de votre compte N26 chaque mois, en fonction de la date de votre souscription Ã  N26 Smart.Vous pouvez commander une carte supplÃ©mentaire N26 Smart directement depuis lâ€™application N26, moyennant un paiement unique de 10 â‚¬.

title: Comment bloquer la bande magnÃ©tique de ma carte ?
content: Â Il y a diffÃ©rentes maniÃ¨res de payer par carte bancaire : sans contact (en approchant votre carte du terminal), avec le code PIN, avec la bande magnÃ©tique de votre carte en glissant votre carte dans un lecteur. MÃªme si les transactions effectuÃ©es avec la bande magnÃ©tique sont de moins en moins communes, certains commerÃ§ants vous demandent encore de payer avec ce mode de paiement.Pourquoi devrais-je bloquer mes transactions avec bande magnÃ©tique ?Les paiements avec bande magnÃ©tique reprÃ©sentent une grande partie des fraudes Ã  la carte bancaire. Certains commerÃ§ants ont des systÃ¨mes frauduleux qui copient les informations de votre carte pour ensuite les utiliser afin dâ€™effectuer des transactions frauduleuses, ce processus est appelÃ© Â« clonage de carte Â». En bloquant les transactions avec bande magnÃ©tique, vous pouvez vous protÃ©ger de ces risques de fraudes.Comment puis-je bloquer/dÃ©bloquer mes transactions avec bande magnÃ©tique ?Pour bloquer vos transactions avec bande magnÃ©tique :Â AccÃ©dez Ã  Cartes.Â Si vous avez plusieurs cartes, il vous suffit de balayer Ã  droite avec votre doigt sur lâ€™Ã©cran jusquâ€™Ã  ce que vous trouviez la carte que vous souhaitez.SÃ©lectionnez ParamÃ¨tres de la carte.Cliquez sur bande magnÃ©tique.Basculer lâ€™option Activer la bande magnÃ©tique.Ici, vous pouvez aussi dÃ©sactiver la bande magnÃ©tique. Les changements effectuÃ©s sont directement appliquÃ©s sur la carte que vous avez choisie.

title: How to reorder a card?
content: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10â‚¬N26 Metal cards: 45â‚¬Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30â‚¬N26 Metal: 65â‚¬Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

title: Round-Up Savings
content: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

title: How to make a donation with N26?
content: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier.Â You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the listÂ Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in â‚¬ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we donâ€™t currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.Youâ€™ll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

title: How does N26 Business Smart work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs â‚¬4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content: We collaborate with many partners. Thatâ€™s why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldnâ€™t be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).Youâ€™re taxable in the United States. If so, you wonâ€™t be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: Wo kann ich kostenlos Bargeld abheben?
content: Mit deiner N26-Mastercard hast du eine bestimmte Anzahl kostenloser Abhebungen am Geldautomaten gemÃ¤ÃŸ unserer Fair-Use-Policy.AuÃŸerdem kannst du den Mastercard ATM Locator (neuen Tab) benutzen, um kostenlose Geldautomaten zu finden.Abhebungen via CASH26 sind immer kostenlos in teilnehmenden PartnergeschÃ¤ften.*Kunden in Spanien: Einige Geldautomatenbetreiber in Spanien erheben eine unabhÃ¤ngige GebÃ¼hr von ca. 2â‚¬. Diese GebÃ¼hr kÃ¶nnen wir nicht verhindern, aber wir erstatten sie zurÃ¼ck, wenn du in im per Chat in deiner App kontaktierst. In der Zwischenzeit kannst du bei den folgenden Banken kostenfrei Geld abheben:AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Hier findest du weitere GrÃ¼nde, warum Ihnen eine GeldautomatengebÃ¼hr berechnet werden kÃ¶nnte.

title: Was genau sind Karten fÃ¼r Spaces?
content:
Mit unserer neuen Funktion Karten fÃ¼r Spaces kannst du deine individuellen Unterkonten mit einer eigenen N26-Karte verknÃ¼pfen, sodass Zahlungen von dem verknÃ¼pften Space-Unterkonto abgerechnet werden.
Wie funktioniert das?Mit Karten fÃ¼r Spaces kÃ¶nnen N26 Nutzer mit einem Premiumabo (N26 Smart, You oder Metal) ihre physische oder digitale N26-Karte mit einem Space-Unterkonto verknÃ¼pfen und das Guthaben auf dem Unterkonto fÃ¼r persÃ¶nliche Ausgaben nutzen. Im Folgenden erhÃ¤ltst du einen Ãœberblick Ã¼ber die vielen MÃ¶glichkeiten, deine N26-Karte mit deinen Spaces zu verknÃ¼pfen:Â Du kannst deine N26-Karte mit einem deiner Spaces und wieder mit deinem Hauptkonto verknÃ¼pfen.Du kannst mehrere Karten mit einem Space oder mit verschiedenen Spaces verknÃ¼pfenWenn du eine physische N26 Mastercard mit einem Space verknÃ¼pfst, kannst du mit dieser Karte automatisch Apple und Google Pay nutzen. (Dies gilt nicht fÃ¼r Maestro-Karten.)Die Funktion steht noch nicht fÃ¼r Shared Spaces zur VerfÃ¼gung.Wie verknÃ¼pfe ich meine Karte mit einem Space?Du kannst deine bestehenden digitalen und physischen Karten mit deinem gewÃ¤hlten Space verknÃ¼pfen.DafÃ¼r gibt es 3 MÃ¶glichkeiten:Im Tab Karten siehst du unter jeder Karte die SchaltflÃ¤che, mit der du den gewÃ¼nschten Space auswÃ¤hlen kannst.In den Karteneinstellungen kannst du auch den gewÃ¼nschten Space auswÃ¤hlen und diesen mit deiner Karte verknÃ¼pfen.In den Einstellungen jedes Spaces kannst du die Karte auswÃ¤hlen, die mit dem jeweiligen Space verknÃ¼pft werden soll.Immer wenn du deine Karte mit deinem Hauptkonto oder einem anderen Space verknÃ¼pfen mÃ¶chtest, wÃ¤hlst du einfach "Hauptkonto" oder den anderen Space im Dropdown-MenÃ¼ aus.

title: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
content: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 MetalÂ contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, youâ€™re now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and youâ€™ll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.Â RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.Â  At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and weâ€™ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of â‚¬10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

title: Was sind â€œNachrichtenâ€?
content: Die Sicherheit deiner Daten hat fÃ¼r uns hÃ¶chste PrioritÃ¤t. Deshalb haben wir einen Posteingang direkt in deiner N26 App erstellt, an den wir Nachrichten schicken kÃ¶nnen. Alle Inhalte, die personenbezogene Daten enthalten, werden an Nachrichten geschickt. Deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse benutzen wir weiterhin fÃ¼r allgemeine Informationen. Was sind personenbezogene Daten?Personenbezogene Daten sind solche Daten, die dich identifizierbar machen oder anhand derer man dich identifizieren kÃ¶nnte. Dazu zÃ¤hlen deine Kontodaten, deine Adresse (E-Mail oder postalisch), Ausweisdokumente, Meldebescheinigung, aber auch Mitteilungen Ã¼ber anfallende Dispokreditzinsen oder Ã¼ber DauerauftrÃ¤ge.Wie funktioniertâ€™s?Wenn wir dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken, erhÃ¤ltst du eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t und eine E-Mail an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn du dich in die WebApp einloggst, wirst du ebenfalls durch eine Info-Karte Ã¼ber neue Nachrichten informiert.Wir werden dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken und bitten dich, direkt von dort zu antworten.Diese Funktion ist in unserer mobilen App verfÃ¼gbar, indem du oben rechts auf das Support-Symbol klickst.Â Stelle sicher, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast.Du kannst keine E-Mail-Unterhaltung starten, aber du kannst antworten, sobald wir dir die erste Nachricht geschickt haben. Wenn es darum geht, uns ein Dokument zu schicken, wÃ¤hle Datei anhÃ¤ngen. Bitte stelle sicher, dass die gesamte GrÃ¶ÃŸe der AnhÃ¤nge pro Nachricht nicht grÃ¶ÃŸer ist als 25 MB.Nachrichten ersetzt nicht unseren Live Chat und du kannst uns weiterhin per E-Mail von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren. Wie du als erstes mit uns in Kontakt treten kannst, erfÃ¤hrst du in unserem Artikel: Wie kontaktiere ich N26? Falls wir dich fÃ¼r dein Anliegen verifizieren mÃ¼ssen, bitten wir dich, einen Chat mit uns zu starten.

title: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
content:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercardâ€™s exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesnâ€™t charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercardâ€™s rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. Youâ€™ll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency MechanismÂ As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26â€™s public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen APIÂ  & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as â€œpendingâ€ will be classified as â€œbookedâ€ transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 Weâ€™ve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte Ã©tranger ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ©).Complete the Cerfa nÂ° 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

content: Tarjeta Mastercard fÃ­sica de N26 gratuita: Elige entre cinco nuevos colores cuando pidas la tarjeta: pomelo, ocÃ©ano, arena, aguamarina y grafito.Tarjeta virtual adicional: Â¡Pide una tarjeta virtual adicional gratis en la app!Tarjeta fÃ­sica adicional: Pide una tarjeta fÃ­sica N26 You adicional por una comisiÃ³n Ãºnica de 10 â‚¬ a travÃ©s de la app N26.Espacios: 10 Espacios (subcuentas) adicionales para organizar tus finanzas.Espacios Compartidos: Invita a amigos a tus Espacios (subcuentas) para que compartan y administren dinero contigo.Asistencia telefÃ³nica especial: Contacta con nuestra lÃ­nea de atenciÃ³n al cliente si tienes alguna pregunta.Â Retiradas en cajeros gratuitas en todo el mundo: Paga con tu Mastercard de N26 You online y en establecimientos, evita comisiones ocultas y disfruta de cero comisiones por transacciones en el extranjero en todo el mundo. TambiÃ©n puedes retirar dinero en efectivo de forma gratuita en cualquier divisa en cajeros de todo el mundo.Paquete de seguros de Allianz Global Assistance*: Un seguro que incluye un amplio abanico de prestaciones personales y financieras, como:Seguro de viaje: IndemnizaciÃ³n de gastos mÃ©dicos en el extranjero, por cancelaciones de viaje tras una emergencia mÃ©dica, gastos ocasionados por un retraso de mÃ¡s de 4 horas, gastos en caso de retraso de mÃ¡s de 6 horas del equipaje facturado y gastos de repatriaciÃ³n mÃ©dica.Salvamento en nieve y montaÃ±a: Cubre los gastos de bÃºsqueda, salvamento, primer transporte y gastos mÃ©dicos en caso de accidente durante un viaje de montaÃ±a.Compartir vehÃ­culos, bicicletas y scooters: Cobertura por daÃ±os o robo de vehÃ­culos alquilados a empresas de vehÃ­culos compartidos.Â¡Puedes comparar N26 YOU (pestaÃ±a nueva) con nuestros otros planes para ver cuÃ¡l es la que mejor se ajusta a ti!Si estÃ¡s pensando en suscribirte aÂ N26 You (pestaÃ±a nueva), recuerda:La tarjeta N26 You Mastercard no tiene grabado en relieve: los detalles de la tarjeta, incluÃ­do el nÃºmero, el cÃ³digo CVV y el token de 10 dÃ­gitos estÃ¡n impresos en negro.Si te pasas a N26 You tendrÃ¡s una mensualidad de 9,90â‚¬ y serÃ¡ deducida directamente del saldo de tu cuenta en N26 cada mes empezando el dÃ­a que te suscribas. Si eres un nuevo cliente, la primera mensualidad serÃ¡ debitada 15 dÃ­as despuÃ©s de queÂ verifiques tu identidad. A partir de ahÃ­ se te cobrarÃ¡ la comisiÃ³n mensualmente el dÃ­a que te suscribiste.A partir de ahora, puedes decidir si quieres pagar la comisiÃ³n premium cada mes o de antemano durante los prÃ³ximos 6 meses o 1 aÃ±o del contrato. Si escoges la opciÃ³n de prepago, obtendrÃ¡s un descuento del precio mensual de tu cuenta premium (Smart/You/Metal), que serÃ¡ proporcional al periodo de facturaciÃ³n que quieras abonar.Cuando contrates la cuenta, encontrarÃ¡s las opciones de facturaciÃ³n con prepago y los costes relacionados en la app N26.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe nombre comercial de AWP P&C S.A. - Sucursal holandesa y miembro de Allianz Group.

title: Do I have to declare my N26 account in Spain?
content: Â The Agencia Tributaria offers assistance to those who need to declare their taxes and assets in a foreign country.Â Â Â In regards to your N26 account, this will depend on the type of IBAN you have:Â If you have a Spanish IBAN (starting with ES), your account is Spanish and you donâ€™t need to declare it. If you have a German IBAN (starting with DE), your account and money is situated in Germany. In this case you would be obligated to declare it, following specific legal requirements.Â To know if one of the above scenarios applies to your N26 account, Iâ€™d recommend that you inquire with a professional in regards to this matter as weâ€™re not eligible to give tax advice.Â Â Read more information about this in the official website of the Agencia Tributaria (new tab).

title: Wie kann ich zu Metal upgraden?
content: VerfÃ¼gbar in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Irland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Polen, Schweden, DÃ¤nemark, Norwegen, Island, Liechtenstein.Wenn du bereits ein N26 Standard-Konto hast, oder ein N26 Smart /Â N26 You Mitglied bist, kannst du in der App auf N26 Metal upgraden: Um dich zu upgraden, logge dich einfach in die App ein, tippe auf den "Entdecken" am unteren Bildschirmrand und wÃ¤hle dann "Entdecke N26 Metal".Â Du kannst zwischen einer Karte in Quarzrosa, Platingrau oder Carbonschwarz wÃ¤hlen.Nachdem du deine bevorzugteÂ VersandmethodeÂ und die Farbe (Quarzrosa, Platingrau oder Carbonschwarz) ausgewÃ¤hlt hast, musst du nur noch die N26 MetalÂ AGB (neuen Tab)Â akzeptieren und den Auftrag mit deinerÂ BestÃ¤tigungs-PINÂ abschlieÃŸen. Schon ist deine Karte auf dem Weg!Standardlieferungen dauern bis zu 15 Werktage.Der Mitgliedsbeitrag von 16,90 â‚¬ wird jeden Monat von deinem Konto abgebucht, gezÃ¤hlt ab dem Tag deines Upgrades.Alle KÃ¤ufe und Reisen, die du mit deiner N26 You Mastercard bezahlt hast, bleiben versichert.Wenn du bereits N26 You Mitglied bist, musst du die You-GebÃ¼hren nicht zusÃ¤tzlich zahlen.Du kannst eine zusÃ¤tzlich N26 You-Karte fÃ¼r eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 10â‚¬ in deiner N26 App bestellen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to reorder a card?
content: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10â‚¬N26 Metal cards: 45â‚¬Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30â‚¬N26 Metal: 65â‚¬Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

title: Comment fonctionne le compte N26 Business You ?
content: Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Irlande, Islande, Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, NorvÃ¨ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, SlovÃ©nie et SuÃ¨de.N26 Business You coÃ»te 9,90 â‚¬ par mois et est conÃ§u pour les auto-entrepreneurs et les indÃ©pendants qui exercent leur activitÃ© en nom propre. title: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
content:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).Â In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.Â In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:Â A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content: If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you mayÂ open an account with us. We offer:The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.Accounts in â‚¬, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.Free shipping of your Mastercard or â‚¬25 for express.Foreign currency transfers with Wise (with the standard account).3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals in â‚¬ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).2 Spaces in addition to the main account.A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using Wise (on their website (new tab)) or using your local bank.For outgoing transfers to â‚¬ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-â‚¬ accounts, use Wise in the app.**Please note: Wise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card canâ€™t be used for online purchases.

title: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
content: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters.Â Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved?Â Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If youâ€™re asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action.Â If you have a feeling that something is off, donâ€™t ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (donâ€™t click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a senderâ€™s identity.If youâ€™ve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If youâ€™d like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

title: How to protect my account?
content: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, itâ€™s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

Il premio puÃ² richiedere fino a 60 giorni per essere accreditato sul tuo conto.Una volta che il tuo amico ha completato tutti i criteri di ammissibilitÃ  del nostroÂ Programma Invita un amico, verificheremo la tua ricompensa. Puoi sempre accedere al tuo conto nell'app oÂ WebApp (nuova tabella)Â per verificare lo stato della tua ricompensa.Nella maggior parte dei casi il bonus non viene accreditato perchÃ© l'amico invitato non ha effettuato una prima transazione Mastercard Transazioni almeno del valore della ricompensa o superiori. title: Bank informationâ€”your N26 account ownership certificate
content: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the â€˜Add Moneyâ€™ button.
