title: How to open my N26 account?
content: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, youâ€™ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you donâ€™t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on â€˜Sharing Moneyâ€™Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ will pop-up. Tap â€œsignâ€Check both â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ and â€œPower of attorneyâ€, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

title: Lutto e successione
content:
Come faccio a informare N26 in caso di decesso?Â In caso di decesso, gli eredi si trovano ad affrontare molte sfide burocratiche. Una di queste Ã¨ la risoluzione dei conti correnti del defunto.Â Il modo piÃ¹ semplice per contattare N26 a riguardo Ã¨ via email. In alternativa, Ã¨ possibile inviare la richiesta per lettera o (se applicabile, via fax):Email: servizio.successioni@n26.comPEC: successioni@pec.n26.comÂ Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank AG, Succursale ItalianaÂ  
-Servizio Successioni-
Via Filippo Sassetti 32,Â 20124 Milano (MI) ITALIAN26 Bank AG, Succursale ItalianaÂ 
c/o N26 Bank AGÂ -Servizio Successioni-
Klosterstr. 62,Â 10179 Berlin - GERMANYTi preghiamo di informarci su:Â Chi Ã¨ il defunto?Â Se possibile, allegare un certificato di morte poichÃ© questo Ã¨ il modo piÃ¹ affidabile per identificare qualsiasi conto corrente associato.Â Come possiamo contattare i beneficiari?Ti chiediamo di fornire il nome completo, indirizzo di spedizione e indirizzo email di chi si occuperÃ  di comunicare con noi. Non sarÃ  possibile organizzare una chiamata.C'Ã¨ qualcosa che dovremmo sapere in anticipo?Â Se stai affrontando determinate procedure (ad es., rifiuto dell'ereditÃ  o compilazione di un inventario) o hai giÃ  documenti specifici a disposizione, puÃ² essere utile condividerli con noi.Â Ricontatteremo te o i beneficiari per informazioni relative alle procedure successive.Â Ti preghiamo di non inviarci i documenti originali per posta in questa fase. Ti informeremo se ci occorrono gli originali in ogni singolo caso.Â Cosa succede a un conto N26 se il titolare del conto viene a mancare?A causa delle differenze locali tra le leggi e i regolamenti, la procedura puÃ² variare a seconda del Paese.Â Tuttavia, tutti i conti con N26 Bank GmbH, Succursale Italiana sono in Italia.Â Non appena veniamo informati del decesso di uno dei nostri clienti, le carte associate, l'online banking e qualsiasi accesso all'app verrÃ  disabilitato. Allo stesso modo tutti i pagamenti regolari come bonifici periodici o bonifici SEPA per gli addebiti diretti, non verranno piÃ¹ eseguiti.Ti preghiamo inoltre di notare che, in linea di principio, siamo tenuti legalmente a informare l'autoritÃ  fiscale responsabile dell'imposta di successione dei beni appartenenti all'ereditÃ . Potresti dover rispondere ad alcune domande per svincolare i beni con N26.Ti consigliamo di metterti in contatto con le autoritÃ  fiscali competenti nel tuo Paese per adempiere ai requisiti fiscali locali (se ne esistono).In ogni caso, comunicheremo ai beneficiari quali documenti esatti devono fornire per regolare il conto del defunto con N26.Sono un cliente, posso prendere misure precauzionali in caso di decesso?Â Ci sono diversi modi per assicurarti che i tuoi beni siano distribuiti secondo le tue esigenze.Â Per questo motivo, consigliamo caldamente a chiunque sia coinvolto piÃ¹ intensamente nella redazione di un testamento, di chiedere assistenza legale a un avvocato, notaio o un consulente fiscale. Questo vale soprattutto nel caso in cui nell'ereditÃ  siano inclusi beni piÃ¹ importanti.Â Il nostro Supporto Clienti o gli esperti del nostro reparto successioni non possono offrirti ulteriori consigli su questo argomento.Per ulteriori informazioni su situazioni specifiche, ti preghiamo di chiedere l'assistenza professionale di un servizio di consulenza adeguato.Â

title: Wie verhindere ich Betrug via SMS?
content: Hast du eine SMS mit einem verdÃ¤chtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link Ã¶ffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch, machmal Smishing (neuen Tab) genannt. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empfÃ¤ngst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu Ã¶ffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab)Â Die geÃ¶ffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie auÃŸerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, fÃ¼r N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verdÃ¤chtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zusÃ¤tzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu bestÃ¤tigen. BestÃ¤tige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der ZahlungsempfÃ¤nger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verdÃ¤chtigen Link geÃ¶ffnet habe?Ã„ndere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zunÃ¤chst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort Ã¤ndern. Alternativ kannst du im Loginâ€“Bildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den nÃ¤chsten Schritten.Falls du persÃ¶nliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto geschÃ¼tzt bleibt. Bitte schicke auÃŸerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Muss ich in der App eine Zahlung bestÃ¤tigen, um eine RÃ¼ckerstattung zu erhalten?Nein! Wir werden dich nie auffordern eine Zahlung zu bestÃ¤tigen, die du nicht getÃ¤tigt hast. Wenn du den Namen oder die IBAN des EmpfÃ¤ngers nicht kennst, bestÃ¤tigt die Zahlung niemals. Das gilt auch fÃ¼r die E-Mail-Adresse oder Telefonnumer bei MoneyBeams und den Firmennamen bei Kartenzahlungen.Wie erkenne ich offizielle Nachrichten von N26?Wir werden dir nie einen Link per SMS schicken! Wir schicken nur Verifizierungscodes via AUTHMS, die nur von dir angefordert werden kÃ¶nnen. Mit diesen Codes bzw. EinmalpasswÃ¶rtern (OTP) kannst du dich in die App einloggen oder dein GerÃ¤t verknÃ¼pfen. Teile deine OTP mit niemandem!Unsere meistgenutzten KommunikationskanÃ¤le sind Chat, E-Mail und unsere Hotline fÃ¼r Premium-Kunden.Â Wir rufen unsere Kunden nicht an, auÃŸer ein Kunde bittet um einen RÃ¼ckruf. Falls du also Nachricht erhÃ¤ltst, dass wir dich demnÃ¤chst anrufen, nachdem du auf einen verdÃ¤chtigen Link geklickt hast, solltest skeptisch sein! Hier findest du weiter Informationen dazu, wie N26 mit dir kommuniziert. (neuen Tab)Wie finden BetrÃ¼ger meine persÃ¶nlichen Daten heraus?Heutzutage sind deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten wahrscheinlich online in sozialen Medien wie Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc zu finden. HÃ¤ufig werden sensible Daten nicht ausreichend gesichert. BetrÃ¼ger nutzen das zu ihrem Vorteil.

title: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
content: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you donâ€™t recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback?Â Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.Â Â N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchantâ€™s part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didnâ€™t receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26Â You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp.Â Go to the â€˜Homeâ€™ tab, and select the transaction you want to disputeÂ Tap â€˜Get help with this transactionâ€™ and follow the steps provided.Â Important:Â If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, youâ€™ll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. Youâ€™ll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.Â Â If you select a transaction but the â€˜Get helpâ€™ button doesnâ€™t appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, youâ€™ll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If youâ€™ve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, youâ€™ll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, weâ€™ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

title: What are â€œMessagesâ€ ?
content:
The security of your personal data is our priority. Thatâ€™s why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. Weâ€™ll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, youâ€™ll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, youâ€™ll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.Weâ€™ll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You canâ€™t initiate a conversation, but youâ€™ll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesnâ€™t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, weâ€™ll ask you to open a chat with us.

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipient), some details like the recipientâ€™s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.Â You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesnâ€™t delete your transaction history with them

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content: To get the most out of â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the â€˜ownerâ€™ or the person who created the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™ can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as â€˜visibleâ€™ to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the ownerâ€™s contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ add participant flow.Youâ€™ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up â€¦ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the â€˜learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜invite new memberâ€™ button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the â€œlegal screenâ€ so be sure to read all the information within the â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&Câ€™s then tap â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ button.Tap â€˜Send inviteâ€™ on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the â€˜send inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the â€˜Participantsâ€™ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participantâ€™s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

title: Wie viel kann ich maximal ausgeben?
content: Kartenzahlungen in GeschÃ¤ften und onlineDas Tageslimit liegt bei 5.000â‚¬Das Monatslimit liegt 20.000â‚¬Abhebungen mit der KarteDas Tageslimit i.H.v. 1.000â‚¬ gilt in: Ã–sterreich, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Griechenland, Island, Irland, Italien, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Spanien, Slowakei, Slowenien, Schweden und der Schweiz.Â Das Tageslimit i.H.v. 400â‚¬ gilt in Togo, Kongo, Benin, ElfenbeinkÃ¼ste, Kenia, Kamerun, Nigeria, Senegal, Algerien, Zentralafrikanische Republik, Gambia, Ghana, Ruanda, Tunesien und UgandaDas Wochenlimit liegt in allen EU LÃ¤ndern bei 2.500â‚¬. Das Wochenlimit liegt in Frankreich bei 1.050â‚¬.ÃœberweisungenDas Tageslimit fÃ¼r MoneyBeams liegt bei 1.000â‚¬Ausgehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen: Kein LimitEingehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen: Kein LimitEingehende SEPA-EchtzeitÃ¼berwiesung: 100.000â‚¬ pro ÃœberweisungAusgehende SEPA-EchtzeitÃ¼berwiesung: 2.000â‚¬ pro ÃœberweisungCash26Das Abhebelimit betrÃ¤gt 200 â‚¬ pro Transaktion sowie 900 â‚¬ innerhalb von 24 Stunden. Es gibt jedoch keinen Mindestbetrag â€“ du kannst auch nur einen Cent mit CASH26 abheben, wenn du magst.Der Mindestbetrag fÃ¼r eine CASH26 Einzahlung ist 50 â‚¬. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden kannst du bis zu 999 â‚¬ einzahlen.ZusÃ¤tzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit fÃ¼r Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in HÃ¶he von 999â‚¬ pro 24 Stunden.

title: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!Â If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.Â If you havenâ€™t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card.Â

title: Come mantenere al sicuro i miei dati bancari online?
content: Ecco alcuni consigli utili per stare sempre al sicuro ogni volta che sei online, che sia per lo shopping, il banking o semplicemente per gestire la tua corrispondenza:Tieni la tua app N26 e il sistema operativo del tuo cellulare sempre aggiornati in modo da evitare che possano verificarsi bug;Utilizza metodi di autenticazione biometrici come la scansione dellâ€™impronta digitale o il riconoscimento facciale per effettuare l'accesso;Crea delle password complesse contenenti lettere, numeri e simboli ed evita di usare la stessa password per accedere a diversi conti;Non pubblicare mai informazioni personali sensibili online o sui social media;Fai attenzione quando utilizzi una rete WiFi pubblica o una connessione condivisa e scegli sempre connessioni WPA2 sicure invece di connessioni WEP.Prediligi fornitori di servizi email con filtri per la sicurezza e per lo spam e che dispongono di un sistema di autenticazione a due fattori, come Gmail e Yahoo!;Stai in guardia di fronte a offerte troppo belle per essere vere: probabilmente Ã¨ proprio cosÃ¬!Effettua acquisti solo presso siti web affidabili di venditori riconosciuti;Assicurati che i siti web siano sicuri, controlla che ci sia il simbolo di un lucchetto accanto allâ€™URL e verifica le credenziali con un semplice clic;Consenti la geolocalizzazione sulla tua app N26, cosÃ¬ possiamo individuare transazioni irregolari non effettuate da te.Se sospetti che il tuo conto o i dettagli della tua carta siano stati compromessi, cambia subito la tua password e fai riferimento al nostro articolo Cosa fare se il mio account viene hackerato?

title: How to use Moneybeam?
content: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to beÂ visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam:Â Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is â‚¬1000 per transaction and â‚¬5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).Â Â Â To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about ourÂ friend referral program.

title: I wasnâ€™t approved for my loan, but my account was still debited
content: Before approving a loan, credit agencies will perform a check to verify your creditworthiness. To do this, an authorization hold is often charged to your cardâ€” generally equivalent to the first monthly installment of the requested loan.Because installment payments from third-party credit organizations arenâ€™t possible with an N26 debit card, you may be rejected for your loan despite the transaction showing up on your account.The good news is that the amount in question wonâ€™t actually be debited to your card, despite appearing on your transaction list in the N26 app. The charge will expire within 12 days and the amount on the hold will be automatically refunded.If you donâ€™t receive the money back, please contact our Customer Support as soon as possible.

title: Wie bestelle ich eine neue Karte?
content: Falls du zurzeit auf eine Karte wartest, warte bitte den geschÃ¤tzten Lieferzeitraum ab, die im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App angezeigt wird.Wenn du eine neue Karte bestellen musst, Ã¼berprÃ¼fe zunÃ¤chst deine Lieferanschrift unter: ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > PersÃ¶nliche Details > Adressen > Lieferadresse. Bitte beachte:Es muss eine Wohnadresse sein (Unternehmen werden nicht akzeptiert)Dein Name muss auf dem Briefkasten stehen. Falls ein anderer Name darauf steht, fÃ¼ge diesen unter ZusÃ¤tzliche Informationen zur Adresse hinzu.Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.Falls zutreffend, gib deine Haus-, Etagen- und TÃ¼rnummer unter ZusÃ¤tzliche Informationen zur Adresse an.Falls Adresse Sonderzeichen beinhaltet, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner App.Falls du zeitnah umziehst, zieh die Express-Lieferung in ErwÃ¤gung und gib die kÃ¼nftige Wohnadresse an.Falls deine erste N26 Karte innerhalb des geschÃ¤tzten Lieferzeitraums nicht angekommen ist, Ã¶ffne bitte einen Live Chat direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking.Falls du schon mal eine aktivierte Karte hattest, kannst du deine neue Karte so in der App bestellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Karten unten rechts.WÃ¤hle aus der Liste deiner Karten diejenige Karte aus, die du nachbestellen willst.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Tippe auf Neue Karte bestellen.Wie kann ich schon mit meiner Karte bezahlen, bevor sie physisch bei mir ankommt?Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. Auf diese Weise kannst du mit deinem Handy bei Anbietern bezahlen, die diese Zahlungsmethode unterstÃ¼tzen. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber die digitalen NutzungsmÃ¶glichkeiten deiner N26 Karte.Wie viel kostet eine neue Karte?Standardlieferung:N26 Standard & N26 You: 10â‚¬N26 Metal: 45â‚¬Express-Lieferung:N26 Standard & N26 You: 30â‚¬N26 Metal: 65â‚¬Bitte beachte: Falls du auf deine erste N26 Karte wartest und deine Lieferanschrift von Anfang an richtig war, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online-Banking.Â

title: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
content:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select â€˜Forgot Passwordâ€™ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card canâ€™t be used for online purchases.

title: Wo finde ich meine IBAN oder Kontonummer?
content: Deine IBAN und deinen BIC benÃ¶tigst du, um SEPA-Ãœberweisungen auf dein Konto zu erhalten oder per Lastschrift zu bezahlen. Eine IBAN besteht aus mehreren Elementen: Alle unsere IBANs beginnen mit DE, ES oder IT, gefolgt von der zweistelligen PrÃ¼fziffer, unserer Bankleitzahl (10011001), und schlieÃŸlich deiner 10-stelligen Kontonummer (beginnend mit 26). Die IBAN wird bei der KontoerÃ¶ffnung erstellt und zugewiesen und kann nicht geÃ¤ndert werden.Deine IBAN und deinen BIC findest du an 3 Orten:In deiner mobilen N26 App und deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab) unter: ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto. Tippe bzw. klicke auf das Kopieren-Symbol, um die IBAN zu kopieren.Im Online Banking (neuen Tab) kannst du deine Bankverbindung als PDF herunterladen. Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter Bankdaten auf Bankdaten herunterladen.Auf deinen herunterladbaren KontoauszÃ¼gen: Tippe im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App auf das BurgermenÃ¼ oben rechts und wÃ¤hle KontoauszÃ¼ge. Oder in deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab): Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter KontoauszÃ¼ge auf einen gewÃ¼nschten Monat.Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial (neuen Tab)auf unserem N26 Support YouTube (neuen Tab) Kanal an.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Comment rembourser mon crÃ©dit avant la date prÃ©vue ?
content: Vous pouvez tout Ã  fait rembourser votreÂ crÃ©ditÂ par anticipation, câ€™est Ã  dire avant la date initialement prÃ©vue.Nous vous rappelons que 1 % de frais sâ€™applique Ã  tout remboursement anticipÃ©. En revanche, si la pÃ©riode de remboursement restante est de moins de 12 mois, les frais de remboursement anticipÃ© seront de 0,5 %.Pour demander un remboursement par anticipation, contactez-nous par Livechat et nous vous communiquerons le calcul prÃ©cis de votre paiement anticipant incluant les frais mentionnÃ©s ci-dessus.*Les informations ci-dessus sont uniquement valables pour les crÃ©dits fournis par N26. Si votre crÃ©dit est fourni par lâ€™un de nos partenaires, veuillez les contacter directement : Auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) en Allemagne et Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) en France.

title: Que faire si je ne peux pas rembourser mon crÃ©dit ou mon dÃ©couvert ?
content: Si vous ne pouvez pas payer votreÂ crÃ©dit N26Â ou votreÂ dÃ©couvertÂ (uniquement disponible en Allemagne et en Autriche), nous pouvons vous proposer diffÃ©rents plans de remboursement. Cela peut arriver si votre autorisation de dÃ©couvert autorisÃ© a Ã©tÃ© annulÃ©e ou si vous avez besoin de plus de deux mois pour rembourser la somme que vous nous devez.Veuillez noter que nous ne pouvons pas vous proposer de plan de remboursement si votre compte N26 est dÃ©jÃ  clÃ´turÃ©.Voici la marche Ã  suivre : contactez-nous par Livechat avec une proposition prÃ©cise de votre plan de remboursement. title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making aÂ temporary limitationÂ to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet ourÂ requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

title: What are N26 Installments?
content: Eligibility requirements: N26 Installments for France is currently only available for customers whoâ€™ve opened their account in France, and who have a DE IBAN.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction directly in the app after it has been made into 3 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks. Giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.N26 Installments Characteristics:Please see below for N26 Installments characteristics. Please note there is a fixed fee depending on the loan value. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing froPricing: This will be an interest rate of 7.49% of 10.49%. And will be charged with your first instalment amount. Eligible purchase amount: From â‚¬20 - â‚¬199N26 Installments Duration: The installments duration is 3 months minimum and maximum, with the option of early loan repayment.Merchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!Additional Information:Split purchases into installments within your N26 appGo back in time up to 4 weeks to split past purchasesFull early repayment of the loan Direct debit of monthly installments Pay missed payments manuallyAutomated reminder one day before due dateAutomated reminders when missing a payment Automated cancellation of the loan when >105 days in arrearsHow to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the â€˜Exploreâ€™ tab and tap on N26 Installments under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting â€˜Optionsâ€™ (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™When you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™:First you will be provided with information about â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™Then you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept both checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, youâ€™ll be reimbursed for the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. Weâ€™ll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (youâ€™ll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in full

title: How to make a donation with N26?
content: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier.Â You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the listÂ Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

title: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back!Â If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.Â If you havenâ€™t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card.Â

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on â€˜Sharing Moneyâ€™Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ will pop-up. Tap â€œsignâ€Check both â€œAdvanced electronic signatureâ€ and â€œPower of attorneyâ€, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

title: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
content: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters.Â Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved?Â Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If youâ€™re asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action.Â If you have a feeling that something is off, donâ€™t ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (donâ€™t click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a senderâ€™s identity.If youâ€™ve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If youâ€™d like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

title: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Smart?
content: Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: WÃ¤hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fÃ¼nf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.ZusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte!ZusÃ¤tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle Ã¼ber deine N26 App eine zusÃ¤tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Du kannst N26 Smart mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Wenn du mit N26 Smart liebÃ¤ugelst, beachte bitte unsere AGB (neuen Tab) sowie folgendes:Deine N26 Smart Mastercard hat keine PrÃ¤gung: Die Kartendetails, einschlieÃŸlich der Nummer, des CVV-Codes und des 10-stelligen Tokens sind auf der RÃ¼ckseite aufgedruckt.Wenn du von N26 Standard zu N26 Smart upgradest, wird die monatliche GebÃ¼hr von 4,90 â‚¬ wird beginnend mit dem Datum deines Upgrades jeden Monat direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste GebÃ¼hr 15 Tage nach der Verifizierung deiner IdentitÃ¤t eingezogen. Danach wird dir deine monatliche GebÃ¼hr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet. Wenn du also dein Konto gegen Monatsende erÃ¶ffnet hast, werden die ersten zwei MonatsgebÃ¼hren im Folgemonat abgebucht.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine PremiumgebÃ¼hr monatlich oder im Voraus fÃ¼r die nÃ¤chsten 6 Monate oder fÃ¼r 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. title: Quanto ci mette un bonifico ad arrivare?
content: I bonifici istantanei SEPA in entrata verso conti N26 avvengono in maniera istantanea, purchÃ© il bonifico provenga da una banca che supporta i bonifici istantanei. Tuttavia, talvolta i bonifici possono avere ritardi se devono essere verificati a causa delle direttive bancarie SEPA.I bonifici SEPA normali in entrata arrivano entro al massimo 2 giorni lavorativi. Ricorda che se un bonifico viene effettuato poco prima di un fine settimana o un giorno festivo, il periodo di tempo sarÃ  esteso fino a un massimo di 3 giorni lavorativi.La ricezione di bonifici SWIFT in entrata richiede fino a 4 giorni lavorativi.Â I bonifici SEPA istantanei in uscita arrivano all'istante. I normali bonifici SEPA in uscita richiedono fino a 2 giorni lavorativi. Per i bonifici in valuta straniera con il nostro partner Wise occorrono fino a 4 giorni lavorativi. I bonifici SWIFT in uscita non sono supportati.Cos'Ã¨ un "giorno bancario"?Un giorno bancario corrisponde a due giorni lavorativi a causa dell'orario di ufficio delle banche coinvolte. Ogni giorno settimanale che non sia un giorno festivo Ã¨ considerato giorno lavorativo.Il mio bonifico non Ã¨ arrivato: dov'Ã¨?Pur tenendo in considerazione quanto detto sopra, il bonifico non Ã¨ ancora arrivato? In questi casi, solo la banca emittente puÃ² aprire un'indagine interna.Sfortunatamente, noi di N26 non possiamo indagare sui bonifici in entrata, ma solo su quelli in uscita. Ma puoi comunque consultare questa lista di possibili motivi per cui un bonifico potrebbe non andare a buon fine.Informazioni aggiuntiveIl sistema con cui inviamo tutti i nostri bonifici SEPA si chiama TARGET2 (nuova tabella), elabora i pagamenti ogni giorno lavorativo dalle 7.00 alle 18.00 ed Ã¨ chiuso nei seguenti giorni: 1Â° gennaio (Capodanno), VenerdÃ¬ Santo, LunedÃ¬ dellâ€™Angelo, 1 maggio, 25 dicembre (Natale) e 26 dicembre.

title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (â€œPSD2â€) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, youâ€™ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.Â *applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: How to get a bank statement?
content: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Hereâ€™s how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV. Â  * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the â€˜Add moneyâ€™ button.

title: Wie funktionieren kontaktlose Zahlungen?
content: Die kontaktlose Bezahlung mit deiner Karte erfolgt per Nahfeldkommunikation (NFC). Bei Problemen mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlung solltest du Folgendes beachten:ÃœberprÃ¼fe, ob in deinen Karteneinstellungen die kontaktlose Bezahlung aktiviert ist.Wenn deine Karte neu ist, musst du sie zuvor einmal an einem Geldautomaten oder an einem Zahlungsterminal mit Chip & PIN benutzt haben. Erst danach kannst du sie auch fÃ¼r die kontaktlose Bezahlung verwenden.Bei kontaktlosen Zahlungen mit deiner Karte (NFC) bis zu 50 â‚¬ ist keine Karten-PIN erforderlich. Bei Zahlungen Ã¼ber 50 â‚¬ oder kumulativen Zahlungen Ã¼ber 150â‚¬ musst du deine Karten-PIN eingeben.Frage den HÃ¤ndler, ob das Zahlungsterminal die kontaktlose Bezahlung auch tatsÃ¤chlich unterstÃ¼tzt.Bei N26 Metal Karten befindet sich die NFC-Funktion nur auf der RÃ¼ckseite der Karte. Achte darauf, dass du die RÃ¼ckseite der Karte an das Terminal hÃ¤ltst, um kontaktlos zu zahlen (mit der Vorderseite funktioniert es nicht).Du musst deine Karte direkt an die NFC-kompatible OberflÃ¤che des Zahlungsterminals halten. Wenn du deine Karte zu schnell weggezogen oder sie nicht nahe genug an die OberflÃ¤che gehalten hast, versuche es einfach noch einmal.Wenn die kontaktlose Bezahlung nicht funktioniert, versuche bitte immer die Zahlung mit Chip & PIN abzuschlieÃŸen.

title: Was ist ein P-Konto?
content: Ein PfÃ¤ndungsschutzkonto (P-Konto) ist ein Girokonto, mit dem du im Falle einer KontopfÃ¤ndung monatlich Ã¼ber einen pfÃ¤ndungsfreien Betrag verfÃ¼gst. Der PfÃ¤ndungsschutz kann auf alle von uns angebotenen Kontotypen angewandt werden â€“ und mit einer deutschen IBAN bist du grundsÃ¤tzlich dazu berechtigt, dein Konto in ein P-Konto umzuwandeln. Du verfÃ¼gst dadurch im Falle einer PfÃ¤ndung Ã¼ber einen monatlichen P-Konto-Freibetrag in HÃ¶he von â‚¬1.340, jedoch kann dieser Betrag durch eine aktive UnterhaltspfÃ¤ndung geringer ausfallen. Der P-Konto-Freibetrag steht dir zur VerfÃ¼gung und wird nicht an den GlÃ¤ubiger Ã¼berwiesen. Bitte beachte, dass wir die Umwandlung in ein P-Konto der Schufa Holding AG melden.Wenn wir fÃ¼r dein N26 Konto eine PfÃ¤ndung erhalten, kannst du dich dazu entscheiden, es in ein P-Konto umzuwandeln. Nach Erhalt einer PfÃ¤ndung sind wir gesetzlich dazu verpflichtet, dein Konto zu pfÃ¤nden. Gleichzeitig senden wir dir eine Nachricht mit allen Informationen zur PfÃ¤ndung an dein sicheres Postfach in deiner N26 App. Bitte lies dir diese Nachricht durch, damit du Ã¼ber alle Optionen informiert bist, bevor du dich fÃ¼r eine entscheidest.Wie du ein P-Konto bekommst, erfÃ¤hrst du hier.

title: Wie schÃ¼tze ich meine Bankdaten online?
content:
Ob beim Shopping, Banking oder Verwalten deines Postfachs: Hier findest du einige Tipps, wie du dich und deine Daten im digitalen Raum schÃ¼tzen kannst.Aktualisiere stets deine N26 App und das Betriebssystem deines Smartphones, um immer die aktuellsten Sicherheitsfeatures zu haben.Verwende zum Einloggen den Fingerabdrucksensor oder die Gesichtserkennung.
Nutze starke PasswÃ¶rter mit Buchstaben, Zahlen sowie Symbolen â€“ und verwende niemals dasselbe Passwort fÃ¼r mehrere Konten.VerÃ¶ffentliche in den sozialen Medien unter keinen UmstÃ¤nden sensible persÃ¶nliche Informationen.Sei vorsichtig, wenn du Ã¶ffentliche oder geteilte WLAN-Verbindungen nutzt â€“ entscheide dich stets fÃ¼r sichere WPA2- anstatt WEP-Netzwerke und verwende wann immer mÃ¶glich ein VPN.Nutze E-Mail-Provider wie Gmail und Yahoo!, die Ã¼ber SicherheitsmaÃŸnahmen verfÃ¼gen, Spamfilter einsetzen und Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung anbieten.Nimm dich vor Angeboten in Acht, die zu gut sind, um wahr zu sein â€“ oft handelt es sich um Betrug.Kaufe nur auf vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen Webseiten bekannter HÃ¤ndler ein.ÃœberprÃ¼fe die Sicherheit von Webseiten â€“ halte Ausschau nach dem Schloss neben der URL. Klicke darauf, um dir die Zertifikatsinformationen anzusehen.Aktiviere die Standortverfolgung in deiner N26 App, damit wir verdÃ¤chtige Transaktionen erkennen kÃ¶nnen, die mÃ¶glicherweise nicht du getÃ¤tigt hast.Falls du denkst, dass sich jemand unbefugten Zugriff auf dein Konto oder deine Kartendaten verschafft hat, Ã¤ndere bitte umgehend dein Passwort, und erfahre mehr dazu in unserem Artikel: Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeintrÃ¤chtigt wurde?"

title: OÃ¹ trouver votre numÃ©ro d'identification fiscale
content:
Votre numÃ©ro dâ€™identification fiscale (NIF) est unique. Il est dÃ©livrÃ© par lâ€™administration fiscale lors de votre inscription dans votre pays de rÃ©sidence fiscale.
 
Votre NIF peut figurer sur diffÃ©rents documents selon votre pays de rÃ©sidence fiscale. Le NIF de chaque pays peut varier. Par exemple, si vous rÃ©sidez au Royaume-Uni, vous pouvez considÃ©rer votre NIF comme votre NumÃ©ro de sÃ©curitÃ© sociale (NIN).NIF pour les rÃ©sidents allemands :Si vous rÃ©sidez en Allemagne et que vous vous Ãªtes inscrit auprÃ¨s de lâ€™administration fiscale locale, vous recevrez un NIF ou Steueridentifikationsnummer Ã  11 chiffres. Ne le confondez pas avec votre numÃ©ro fiscal ou Steuernummer Ã  9 chiffres.
 
Le NIF ne figure pas sur les piÃ¨ces dâ€™identitÃ©, mais vous le trouverez sur les documents suivants :La lettre que vous avez reÃ§ue de lâ€™Office central fÃ©dÃ©ral des impÃ´ts dÃ©livrant votre NIF ou IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben Ã¼ber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Avis dâ€™impositionDÃ©claration dâ€™impÃ´t sur le revenuPour en savoir plus sur la localisation de votre NIF, ou si vous devez en demander un, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).NIF pour les rÃ©sidents franÃ§ais :Si vous rÃ©sidez en France et que vous Ãªtes tenu dâ€™y dÃ©clarer vos impÃ´ts, lâ€™administration fiscale franÃ§aise vous dÃ©livrera un NIF Ã  13 chiffres ou SPI une fois que vous vous serez inscrit auprÃ¨s de celle-ci. Ces chiffres commencent par 0, 1, 2 ou 3.
 
Votre NIF figure sur les documents suivants :DÃ©claration de revenus prÃ©imprimÃ©eAvis dâ€™impÃ´tsPour en savoir plus sur la localisation de votre NIF, ou si vous devez en demander un, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).NIF pour les rÃ©sidents italiens :Si vous rÃ©sidez en Italie, le NIF ou Codice fiscale (composÃ© de 16 caractÃ¨res) nâ€™est valable que si vous Ãªtes inscrit au Registre des impÃ´ts italien gÃ©rÃ© par lâ€™Agence italienne du revenu (Agenzia delle Entrate). Si vous nâ€™avez pas de NIF, vous devez en faire la demande Ã  nâ€™importe quel bureau de lâ€™Agence italienne du revenu.
 
Le NIF ne figure pas sur les piÃ¨ces dâ€™identitÃ©, mais vous le trouverez sur les documents suivants :Carte dâ€™assurance maladie personnelle (numÃ©ro dâ€™identification fiscale, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale)Carte dâ€™identification fiscalePour en savoir plus sur la localisation de votre NIF, ou si vous devez en demander un, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).NIF pour les rÃ©sidents espagnols :Si vous rÃ©sidez en Espagne, votre NIF est unique pour des raisons fiscales et douaniÃ¨res. Votre NIF espagnol se compose de neuf caractÃ¨res (le dernier caractÃ¨re Ã©tant une lettre de contrÃ´le). Les NIF sont dÃ©livrÃ©s par le ministÃ¨re de lâ€™IntÃ©rieur et peuvent varier selon votre nationalitÃ©.
 
Selon votre situation, vous trouverez votre NIF sur les documents suivants :Carte dâ€™identitÃ© personnelleCarte dâ€™identitÃ© Ã©lectroniqueCarte de rÃ©sident pour les Ã©trangersNouveau permis de conduire (depuis 2004)Carte dâ€™identification fiscaleCarte vitalePour en savoir plus sur la localisation de votre NIF, ou si vous devez en demander un, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).Informations importantes :Le format du NIF autorisÃ© Ã  Ãªtre saisi dans votre application N26 dÃ©pend de votre pays de rÃ©sidence. Autrement dit, si vous rÃ©sidez en Allemagne, vous devez saisir votre NIF allemand.Pour vÃ©rifier les informations fiscales que vous avez enregistrÃ©es sur votre compte, accÃ©dez Ã  :Mon Compte > Informations personnelles > Informations fiscales.Si vous avez dÃ©jÃ  renseignÃ© votre pays de rÃ©sidence fiscale mais pas votre identifiant fiscal, il vous suffit de supprimer le pays actuellement renseignÃ© dans lâ€™application et de lâ€™ajouter Ã  nouveau. Vous pourrez alors renseigner votre identifiant fiscal.Pour en savoir plus sur la gestion de vos informations fiscales, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 ofÂ Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, pleaseÂ contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didnâ€™t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: Domande frequenti sulle contestazioni di pagamento con carta
How to get a bank statement?
content: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Hereâ€™s how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV. Â  * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the â€˜Add moneyâ€™ button.

title: Â¿QuÃ© hace N26 con mi informaciÃ³n fiscal?
content: Este material ha sido preparado con fines exclusivamente informativos y no constituye, ni debe utilizarse como un asesoramiento fiscal, legal o contable.N26 recoge tus datos principalmente por dos motivos: para cumplir con las reglas de Â«Conozca a su clienteÂ» y por la obligaciÃ³n de comunicar a la agencia tributaria responsable.Â ObligaciÃ³n de identificar a nuestros clientes siguiendo las denominadas reglas Â«Conoce a tu clienteÂ»Como otras instituciones financieras, estamos obligados a recabar informaciÃ³n fiscal relevante para identificarte a efectos fiscales. Esta informaciÃ³n incluye principalmente tu nombre,Â  direcciÃ³n de residencia, paÃ­s o paÃ­ses de domicilio fiscal, nÃºmero de identificaciÃ³n fiscal o su equivalente, asÃ­ como el lugar y la fecha de tu nacimiento.A continuaciÃ³n encontrarÃ¡s informaciÃ³n general sobre las definiciones de domicilio fiscal y el nÃºmero de identificaciÃ³n fiscal.Domicilio fiscalPor lo general, una persona solo tiene un paÃ­s de residencia (residencia en el paÃ­s de vivienda o domicilio). Sin embargo, una persona puede residir en dos o mÃ¡s paÃ­ses a efectos fiscales. Esto se debe a que diferentes paÃ­ses aplican distintos criterios (formas de vinculaciÃ³n) para determinar la residencia (o domicilio) a efectos fiscales. Estos criterios pueden incluir, entre otros, la presencia fÃ­sica prolongada, la nacionalidad, la titularidad de la vivienda, etc. Si existe un convenio fiscal entre los paÃ­ses, las reglas en materia de arbitraje que suelen contener dicho convenio asignarÃ¡n un domicilio fiscal a uno de los paÃ­ses involucrados.Por ejemplo, si tienes un vivienda permanente en el paÃ­s A y una residencia temporal en el paÃ­s B, las reglas en materia de resoluciÃ³n de conflictos del convenio para evitar la doble imposiciÃ³n concluido entre el paÃ­s A y B podrÃ¡n estipular que eres residente fiscal en el paÃ­s A en el que tienes una vivienda permanente en lugar de en el paÃ­s B, en el que tienes una residencia temporal (la Â«vivienda permanenteÂ» se considera como una forma de vinculaciÃ³n mÃ¡s fuerte que la Â«residencia temporalÂ»). El anÃ¡lisis para determinar el domicilio fiscal se basa en hechos y, si tienes dudas, tendrÃ¡s que aclararlo con la tu agencia tributaria y/o asesor fiscal.NÃºmero de IdentificaciÃ³n Fiscal:El NÃºmero de IdentificaciÃ³n Fiscal (NIF) es una combinaciÃ³n Ãºnica de letras o nÃºmeros que te ha asignado tu paÃ­s de domicilio fiscal. El NIF te identifica a efectos de aplicar las leyes fiscales de tu paÃ­s de domicilio fiscal. Los NIF tambiÃ©n son Ãºtiles para identificar a los contribuyentes que invierten en otros paÃ­ses. Las especificaciones del NIF (es decir, el nÃºmero de letras, nÃºmeros y su secuencia) son establecidas por la agencia tributaria de cada paÃ­s. Aunque la mayorÃ­a de paÃ­ses emiten un NIF, hay algunos que no.Â El portal de intercambio automÃ¡tico de la OCDE (pestaÃ±a nueva) proporciona informaciÃ³n Ãºtil sobre los NIF (especialmente dÃ³nde encontrarlos y sus especificaciones) emitidos por muchos paÃ­ses que participan en el intercambio automÃ¡tico de informaciÃ³n fiscal. Pero si tienes alguna duda sobre tu NIF, lo mÃ¡s recomendable es que consultes con tu asesor fiscal o con tu agencia tributaria.ObligaciÃ³n de comunicar a las autoridades tributarias competentesÂ  informaciÃ³n fiscal relevante de determinados clientesComo otras instituciones financieras, estamos obligados a comunicar periÃ³dicamente informaciÃ³n fiscal a la agencia tributaria responsable. Dependiendo de tu IBAN, la agencia tributaria receptora puede ser la de Alemania, Italia, EspaÃ±a o Francia.Cabe destacar los informes que se llevan a cabo en virtud del EstÃ¡ndar ComÃºn de ComunicaciÃ³n (pestaÃ±a nueva) (ECR) y la Ley de Cumplimiento Tributario de Cuentas Extranjeras (pestaÃ±a nueva) (FATCA). Si eres residente fiscal en un paÃ­s que aplica el ECR y/o de los EE. UU., la agencia tributaria beneficiaria intercambiarÃ¡ la informaciÃ³n recibida de N26 con tu paÃ­s de domicilio fiscal como parte de los procedimientos de intercambio automÃ¡tico de informaciÃ³n en virtud del ECR y la FATCA.Para que N26 cumpla con sus obligaciones de comunicaciÃ³n, especialmente en lo que respecta al ECR y la FATCA, necesitamos recopilarÂ  informaciÃ³n fiscal correcta y actualizada (la llamada informaciÃ³n de autocertificaciÃ³n). La informaciÃ³n de autocertificaciÃ³n incluye nombre, domicilio, paÃ­s o paÃ­ses de domicilio fiscal, NIF y lugar y fecha de nacimiento. Si eres residente fiscal en EE. UU. (persona estadounidense), tambiÃ©n debes proporcionar tu NIF estadounidense (pestaÃ±a nueva). A continuaciÃ³n, haz clic en este enlace (pestaÃ±a nueva) para leer mÃ¡s sobre la FATCA y quÃ© debes hacer para determinar si eres una persona estadounidense. En el caso que si, debes proporcionarnos tu NIF estadounidense.Estamos obligados a realizar inspecciones periÃ³dicas para garantizar que la informaciÃ³n fiscal relevante almacenada en nuestro sistema es correcta (la denominada diligencia debida continua). Si la diligencia debida detecta inexactitudes, nos ponemos en contacto contigo para pedirte informaciÃ³n exacta y actualizada.Nuestra recomendaciÃ³nTe informamos de que estamos obligados a aplicar medidas restrictivas en tu cuenta, como Ãºltimo recurso, si no recibimos informaciÃ³n exacta y actualizada para los fines del ECR y de la FATCA descritos anteriormente en los plazos aplicables.Te recomendamos que consultes y actualices tu informaciÃ³n fiscal relevante de forma periÃ³dica. No olvides que no hacerlo tambiÃ©n puede afectarte directamente. Por ejemplo, la agencia tributaria podrÃ­a imponer sanciones directamente. Para consultar y actualizar tus datos en tu app N26:Ve a InformaciÃ³n de la cuenta > InformaciÃ³n personal > InformaciÃ³n fiscalHaz clic en Â«AÃ±adir nuevo paÃ­s fiscalÂ», indica si eres Persona estadounidense y sigue las instrucciones.Para aÃ±adir un paÃ­s fiscal adicional (si eres residente fiscal en mÃ¡s de un paÃ­s), haz clic en Â«AÃ±adir nuevo paÃ­s fiscalÂ» y sigue las instrucciones.Solo puedes eliminar el paÃ­s fiscal actual tras aÃ±adir uno nuevo.InformaciÃ³n importantePuedes consultar la informaciÃ³n fiscal que tenemos actualmente accediendo a: InformaciÃ³n de la cuenta > InformaciÃ³n personal > InformaciÃ³n fiscalEn todo caso, tus datos personales se almacenarÃ¡n de forma segura y solo se utilizarÃ¡n para cumplir los requisitos del ECR, FATCA y similares.No podemos asesorarte sobre tu situaciÃ³n fiscal. Si tienes dudas, te rogamos que consultes con un asesor fiscal o con tu agencia tributaria.

title: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
content: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around â‚¬2. For the time being, weâ€™re unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, hereâ€™s a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use:Â AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you couldâ€™ve been charged an ATM fee.

title: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
content:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.Iâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If youâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, youâ€™ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the â€˜Cardsâ€™ tab. You can mark the reason as â€œlostâ€ or â€œstolenâ€ based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, youâ€™ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).Â Â How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Hereâ€™s a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, youâ€™ll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods donâ€™t arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercardâ€™s chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery dateÂ 
In this scenario, Mastercardâ€™s chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place.Â You received a delivery, but it doesnâ€™t correspond with what you orderedÂ 
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didnâ€™t receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Hereâ€™s some guidance on what to say:Dear XX,Â I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction:Â Amount: â‚¬{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank.Â If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can helpâ€“â€“this is the fastest way to get your money back. Hereâ€™s a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them:Â Dear XX,Â I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below:Â Merchant name: {insert merchant name}Â Amount of original, authorized transaction: â‚¬{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: â‚¬{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward.Â The merchant told me that theyâ€™ve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund.
