What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still havenâ€™t received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction.Â How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. Thatâ€™s why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limitsâ€“â€“all right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a â€˜Discreet Mode (new tab)â€™ option to securely access your account in public.Â Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so youâ€™re always aware of whatâ€™s happening on your account. Plus, weâ€™re always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud.Â How does card fraud occur?Â A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM thatâ€™s been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if:Â You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchaseÂ Your online shopping account is hackedÂ Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud?Â Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banksÂ Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularlyÂ Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: How to top up my account?
content: Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways. To do so, simply go to the N26 app and select 'Add Money' to see the available options:1. SEPA Transfer (Up to 2 business days):The transfer must be in EUR and within the SEPA zone.You will need to provide your IBAN and your name as it is written on the ID you used to create your account.If you have a Business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names.Since 1st July 2020 a limit of 100.000â‚¬ for incoming SEPA instant transfers applies.No limit applies to normal incoming SEPA transfers2. Debit or Credit Card (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details from the sending account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.3. Apple Pay or Google Pay (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the Apple Pay or Google Pay account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.4. Moneybeam (instant):You can receive money from other N26 users.5. CASH26 (instant):Available in Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain and Greece.Deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.6. iDEAL (instant):Available only in the Netherlands for customer with Dutch T&C and with a iDEAL accountThe first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 1.5 % of the deposit amount.7. GiroPay (instant):Only available in Germany for customers with German Terms and Conditions and a Giropay account.8. EPS (instant):Only available in Austria for customers with Austrian Terms and Conditions and an EPS account.9. Bancontact (instant):Only available in Belgium for customers with Belgian Terms and Conditions and a Bancontact account.Important reminder for SEPA Transfers:If you deposit money into your N26 account via SEPA transfer, please make sure that the recipient name corresponds to your name as it is entered on the identification document that you used for your verification when opening the account.(Especially if you have an N26 Business account - we do not accept company names.) An incoming transfer is booked in real time, as if it was made as a real time transfer, otherwise a transfer takes 1-2 working days. From July 1st, 2020, there will be a limit of â‚¬ 100,000 for incoming real-time transfers. In France, the first payment must be made to your N26 account from an account that you own. (In all other countries it is not necessary that the other bank account belongs to you.)

title: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
content: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel itâ€”this can be done at any time (see below). Weâ€™ll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesnâ€™t affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, youâ€™ll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 monthâ€™s time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and youâ€™ll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after youâ€™ve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we havenâ€™t received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after youâ€™ve proved your identity, weâ€™ll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option youâ€™ve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee.Â You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, weâ€™ll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

title: Kann ich ein Konto erÃ¶ffnen, wenn ich auÃŸerhalb der Eurozone wohne?
content: Wenn du in Polen, Schweden, DÃ¤nemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein, Island oder der Schweiz lebst, kannst du ein N26 Konto erÃ¶ffnen. Wir bieten dir:Die Wahl zwischen einem Standard-Konto oder N26 Business.Ein Konto in Euro, eine deutsche IBAN und Ãœberweisungen per SEPA oder MoneyBeam.Einen gÃ¼nstigen Wechselkurs mit deiner Mastercard Debitkarte.Kostenloser Versand deiner Mastercard oder Expressversand fÃ¼r 25â‚¬.Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen mit Wise (neuen Tab) (mit dem Standard-Konto).3-5 gebÃ¼hrenfreie Abhebungen am Geldautomaten (1.7% GebÃ¼hr auf Abhebungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen).0.1% Cashback auf alle Kartenzahlungen ( bei N26 Business).2 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces zu deinem HauptkontoEinen Bonus fÃ¼r alle Freunde, die du Ã¼ber unser Freundschaftswerbungsprogramm erfolgreich zu N26 einlÃ¤dst.Kontaktlose Zahlungen mit Google Pay und Apple Pay.Tipps fÃ¼r ein- und ausgehende Zahlungen:Damit du stets den gÃ¼nstigsten Wechselkurs erhÃ¤ltst, empfehlen wir dir, bei EinkÃ¤ufen und Bargeldabhebungen mit deiner Mastercard stets deine LandeswÃ¤hrung auszuwÃ¤hlen (andernfalls kÃ¶nnen zusÃ¤tzliche GebÃ¼hren anfallen).Um Geld in deiner LandeswÃ¤hrung auf dein Euro-Konto einzuzahlen, empfehlen wir dir eine SEPA-Ãœberweisung Ã¼ber die Wise-Website (neuen Tab), unser Partner fÃ¼r Geldtransfers in FremdwÃ¤hrungen. Alternativ kannst du auch Ã¼ber deine Ã¶rtliche Bank Geld Ã¼berweisen.Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen auf Euro-Konten kannst du ganz einfach Ã¼ber die Standardfunktion in der N26 App tÃ¤tigen. Ãœberweisungen auf Konten in FremdwÃ¤hrungen kannst du Ã¼ber Wise auch in der App tÃ¤tigen.**Bitte beachte: Wise ist nicht fÃ¼r N26 Business verfÃ¼gbar (nur SEPA-Ãœberweisungen in Euro).

title: Â¿QuÃ© es CASH26?
content: Disponible para las cuentas abiertas en EspaÃ±a, Alemania, Austria, Italia y Grecia.CASH26 es una funcionalidad integrada en la app N26 que te permite ingresar dinero en efectivo en tu cuenta N26 y sacar dinero con el mÃ³vil, sin tarjeta y sin cajero automÃ¡tico.Solo tienes que dirigirte a uno de los mÃ¡s de 1255 establecimientos CASH26 repartidos por toda EspaÃ±a (BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa), generar un cÃ³digo de barras CASH26 y enseÃ±Ã¡rselo en la pantalla de tu mÃ³vil vinculado a la persona que haya en el mostrador, diciendo que quieres depositar o retirar dinero con nuestro socio Viacash.Â Ingresar dinero en efectivoEl cÃ³digo de barras dura solo 10 minutos; si no lo usas a tiempo, caducarÃ¡ y tendrÃ¡s que generar uno nuevo.Cuando deposites el dinero, podrÃ¡s disponer de Ã©l inmediatamente, aunque puede tardar hasta 10 minutos en verse reflejado en el saldo de tu cuenta en la app N26.Â¿QuÃ© cantidad se puede ingresar en efectivo con CASH26?El mÃ­nimo es de 50Â â‚¬ por depÃ³sito y el mÃ¡ximo es de 999Â â‚¬ cada 24 horas.Sea cual sea la cantidad, se cobra una comisiÃ³n del 1,5Â % sobre el importe total.TambiÃ©n hay un lÃ­mite combinado de retiradas e ingresos de 999 â‚¬ cada 24 horas.Sacar dinero con el mÃ³vilEn cuanto generas el cÃ³digo de barras CASH26, la cantidad seleccionada se deduce del saldo de tu cuenta inmediatamente.Â Si cambias de opiniÃ³n y borras el cÃ³digo antes de usarlo, o si dejas que caduque a los 10 minutos, el dinero volverÃ¡ inmediatamente al saldo de tu cuenta.Â¿CuÃ¡nto dinero se puede retirar en efectivo con CASH26?El mÃ¡ximo es de 200Â â‚¬ por cada retirada y de 900Â â‚¬ cada 24 horas. No hay ningÃºn mÃ­nimo de retirada, como si quieres sacar un cÃ©ntimo.TambiÃ©n hay un lÃ­mite combinado de retiradas e ingresos de 999 â‚¬ cada 24 horas.Las retiradas con CASH26 no tienen comisiÃ³n, son gratis.Lee este otro artÃ­culo para aprender cÃ³mo retirar e ingresar dinero en efectivo con CASH26.

title: How to make N26 my main account?
content: We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: weâ€™ll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and weâ€™ll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.There are three ways to switch your bank accounts over to N26:Account switching service powered by finleap connect GmbHTogether with our partner finleap connect GmbH (new tab) weâ€™re offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. Itâ€™s an automated process and completely free.Log into your N26 mobile app and tap on My account > Switch to N26. Tap Start now and follow the instructions.Alternatively, you can use thisÂ form (new tab)Â and log in with your previous bank account details. Once youâ€™ve filled in all required information, itâ€™ll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.Account switching service supportYou could also inform your payment partners yourself. To do this, fill out the letter to notify your payment partners (new tab) and send it to them. You could also request theÂ termination of your bank account (new tab) with your previous bank by filling out the form and sending it to them.This service is also free. If you need help with this process, contact our Customer Support via chat.

title: How to prove my identity?
content: As a licensed bank, itâ€™s important that we know who our customers are. Thatâ€™s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. Weâ€™ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities.Â If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we wonâ€™t be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.Â

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ to your account. If you didnâ€™t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons youâ€™ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, itâ€™s likely that youâ€™ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: Do I have to declare my N26 account in Spain?
content: Â The Agencia Tributaria offers assistance to those who need to declare their taxes and assets in a foreign country.Â Â Â In regards to your N26 account, this will depend on the type of IBAN you have:Â If you have a Spanish IBAN (starting with ES), your account is Spanish and you donâ€™t need to declare it. If you have a German IBAN (starting with DE), your account and money is situated in Germany. In this case you would be obligated to declare it, following specific legal requirements.Â To know if one of the above scenarios applies to your N26 account, Iâ€™d recommend that you inquire with a professional in regards to this matter as weâ€™re not eligible to give tax advice.Â Â Read more information about this in the official website of the Agencia Tributaria (new tab).

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we donâ€™t charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if youâ€™re certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could helpÂ get your money back.

title: How to get push messages?
content: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such asÂ MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as withÂ CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you arenâ€™t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether youâ€™re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sortÂ your transactionsÂ and display our findings inÂ InsightsÂ (top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, weâ€™ll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesnâ€™t fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: Weâ€™ve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

title: How to use Moneybeam?
content: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to beÂ visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam:Â Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is â‚¬1000 per transaction and â‚¬5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).Â Â Â To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about ourÂ friend referral program.

title: Wie verwendet N26 meine Steuerinformationen?
content: Die folgenden Angaben wurden nur zu Informationszwecken erstellt und dienen nicht der steuerlichen, rechtlichen oder buchhalterischen Beratung und sollten auch nicht als solche verstanden werden.N26 sammelt deine Daten hauptsÃ¤chlich aus zwei GrÃ¼nden: um die "Know Your Customer"-Anforderungen zu erfÃ¼llen und um die Meldepflicht gegenÃ¼ber den zustÃ¤ndigen SteuerbehÃ¶rden zu erfÃ¼llen.Â Verpflichtung zur Identifizierung unserer Kunden nach den sogenannten "Know your customer"-RegelnWie jedes Finanzinstitut sind wir nach den geltenden Steuergesetzen verpflichtet, steuerlich relevante Informationen von dir zu sammeln, um dich fÃ¼r steuerliche Zwecke zu identifizieren. Dazu gehÃ¶ren vor allem dein Name, deine Wohnsitzadresse, das Land oder die LÃ¤nder, in denen du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist (Steuerwohnsitz / Steuerwohnsitze), deine Steueridentifikationsnummer oder deren Ã„quivalent sowie dein Geburtsort und -datum.Im Folgenden sind allgemeine Informationen zu den Definitionen von Steuerwohnsitz und Steueridentifikationsnummer aufgefÃ¼hrt.SteuerwohnsitzIn der Regel hat man einen Wohnsitz, in dem Land , in dem man wohnt (Wohnsitzadresse). Man kann jedoch in zwei oder mehr LÃ¤ndern steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig sein (Steuerwohnsitz haben). Das liegt daran, dass die LÃ¤nder zur Bestimmung des steuerlichen Wohnsitzes unterschiedliche Kriterien (Formen der Bindung) verwenden. Zu diesen Kriterien gehÃ¶ren u. a. eine lÃ¤ngere physische Anwesenheit, die StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit, der Besitz von Eigentum usw. Wenn es ein Steuerabkommen zwischen den LÃ¤ndern gibt, wird der steuerliche Wohnsitz aufgrund der in einem solchen Abkommen normalerweise enthaltenen Kollisionsnormeneinem der beteiligten LÃ¤nder zugewiesen.Wenn du beispielsweise eine stÃ¤ndige WohnstÃ¤tte in Land A und einen vorÃ¼bergehenden Wohnsitz in Land B hast, kann es sein, dass die Regeln des Steuerabkommens zwischen Land A und B vorsehen, dass du in Land A steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist, wo du eine stÃ¤ndige WohnstÃ¤tte hast, und nicht in Land B, wo du einen vorÃ¼bergehenden Wohnsitz hast (wobei "stÃ¤ndige WohnstÃ¤tte" eine stÃ¤rkere Form der Bindung darstellt als "vorÃ¼bergehender Wohnsitz"). Wenn du dir unsicher bist, wo du steueransÃ¤ssig bist, musst du das mit deiner Steuerverwaltung und/oder deinem Steuerberater klÃ¤ren.SteueridentifikationsnummerDie Steueridentifikationsnummer (Steuer-IdNr.) ist eine eindeutige Kombination aus Buchstaben oder Zahlen, die dir von dem Land, in dem du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist, zugewiesen wird. Die Steuer-IdNr. identifiziert dich fÃ¼r Zwecke der Steuerverwaltung in dem Land, in dem du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist. Die Steuer-IdNr. ist auch nÃ¼tzlich, um Steuerpflichtige zu identifizieren, die in anderen LÃ¤ndern investieren. Die Spezifikationen fÃ¼r die Steuer-IdNr. (d. h. die Anzahl der Buchstaben, Zahlen und ihre Reihenfolge) werden von den Steuerverwaltungen der einzelnen LÃ¤nder festgelegt. WÃ¤hrend die meisten LÃ¤nder Steuer-IdNr. vergeben, gibt es einige, die keine Steuer-IdNr. vergeben. Auf dem Portal fÃ¼r den automatischen Informationsaustausch der OECD (neuen Tab) findest du nÃ¼tzliche Informationen zu den Steuer-IdNrn. (vor allem, wo du sie findest und und ihre Spezifikationen). Bei Zweifeln Ã¼ber deine Steuer-IdNr. empfehlen wir dir jedoch, deinen Steuerberater oder deine Steuerverwaltung zu konsultieren.Verpflichtung zur Meldung steuerlich relevanter Informationen bestimmter Kunden an die zustÃ¤ndigen SteuerbehÃ¶rdenWie jedes Finanzinstitut sind auch wir verpflichtet, steuerlich relevante Informationen regelmÃ¤ÃŸig an die zustÃ¤ndige SteuerbehÃ¶rde zu melden. AbhÃ¤ngig von deiner IBAN kann die empfangende SteuerbehÃ¶rde in Deutschland, Italien, Spanien oder Frankreich liegen.Besonders erwÃ¤hnenswert sind die Berichte nach dem Common Reporting Standard (neuen Tab) (CRS) und dem Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (neuen Tab) (FATCA). Falls du steuerlich in einem Land ansÃ¤ssig bist, das CRS anwendet und/oder wenn du in den USA steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist, tauscht die empfangende SteuerbehÃ¶rde die von N26 erhaltenen Informationen im Rahmen des automatischen Informationsaustauschs gemÃ¤ÃŸ CRS und FATCA mit dem Land aus, in dem du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist.Damit N26 seinen Meldepflichten, insbesondere in Bezug auf CRS und FATCA, nachkommen kann, mÃ¼ssen wir genaue und aktuelle steuerrelevante Informationen von dir sammeln (sogenannte Selbstauskunftsdaten). Zu diesen Daten gehÃ¶ren Name, Wohnsitzadresse, das Land oder die LÃ¤nder, in denen du steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist, Steuer-IdNr. sowie Geburtsort und -datum. Wenn du in den USA steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist (Person der Vereinigten Staaten), solltest du auch deine US-Steuer-IdNr (neuen Tab).Â angeben. Bitte folge diesem Link (neuen Tab), um mehr Ã¼ber FATCA zu erfahren und was du gegebenenfalls unternehmen musst, um herauszufinden, ob du eine Person der Vereinigten Staaten bist und uns daher deine US-Steuer-IdNr. mitteilen solltest.Wir sind verpflichtet, regelmÃ¤ÃŸig zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen, ob deine in unserem System gespeicherten steuerlich relevanten Informationen korrekt sind (sogenannte laufende Due Diligence). Sollten sich im Rahmen der Due Diligence Ungenauigkeiten ergeben, setzen wir uns mit dir in Verbindung, um genaue und aktuelle Informationen zu erhalten.Unsere EmpfehlungBeachte bitte, dass wir als allerletztes Mittel restriktive MaÃŸnahmen fÃ¼r dein Konto ergreifen mÃ¼ssen, sollten wir nicht in der Lage sein, genaue und aktuelle Informationen fÃ¼r die oben beschriebenen Zwecke fÃ¼r CRS und FATCA innerhalb der geltenden Fristen zu erhalten.Wir raten dir, deine steuerlich relevanten Informationen regelmÃ¤ÃŸig zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen und zu aktualisieren. Bitte bedenke, dass eine Nichtbeachtung auch unmittelbare Folgen fÃ¼r dich haben kann, wie z. B. die VerhÃ¤ngung von BuÃŸgeldern durch die SteuerbehÃ¶rde. Um deine Informationen zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen und zu aktualisieren, schaue in deine N26 App:Gehe zu Kontodetails > PersÃ¶nliche Details > SteuerinformationenWÃ¤hle Neues Steuerland hinzufÃ¼gen. Gib an, ob du eine Person der Vereinigten Staaten bist und folge den AnweisungenUm ein weiteres Steuerland hinzuzufÃ¼gen (wenn du in mehr als einem Land steuerlich ansÃ¤ssig bist), klicke auf "Neues Steuerland hinzufÃ¼gen" und folge den AnweisungenDas bestehende Steuerland kann erst entfernt werden, nachdem du ein neues Steuerland hinzugefÃ¼gt hastWichtige InformationenDu kannst die Steuerinformationen, die wir aktuell von dir erfasst haben, jederzeit Ã¼berprÃ¼fen. DafÃ¼r gehst du auf: Kontodetails > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Steuerinformationen.Deine personenbezogenen Daten werden in jedem Fall sicher gespeichert und nur zur ErfÃ¼llung von CRS, FATCA und Ã¤hnlichen Anforderungen verwendet.Wir kÃ¶nnen dir keine Auskunft Ã¼ber deinen Steuerstatus geben. Wenn du dir nicht sicher bist, bespreche die Angelegenheit mit einem Steuerberater und/oder der SteuerbehÃ¶rde.

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content: Direct debits returned to your account due toÂ insufficient funds* are charged a â‚¬3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9) in accordance with ourÂ Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,Â overdraftÂ interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you donâ€™t recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. You can check the list of countries below:BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland

title: Wie bekomme ich ein P-Konto?
content: Befolge bitte diese Schritte, um ein P-Konto zu beantragen:Â FÃ¼lle dieses Formular (neuen Tab) aus und unterschreibe esSchicke das Formular von deiner bei uns registrierten E-Mail-Adresse an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).Alternativ kannst du uns das Formular auch direkt Ã¼ber die App zukommen lassen. Antworte dazu einfach auf die Nachricht, in der wir dich Ã¼ber die PfÃ¤ndung informiert haben.Bitte beachte:Wir melden der Schufa Holding AG die Umwandlung in ein P-Konto.Wenn du dich fÃ¼r ein P-Konto entscheidest, mÃ¼ssen wir bei Aktivierung des PfÃ¤ndungsschutzes (d. h. bei einer aktiven PfÃ¤ndung) deinen Dispokredit und Kredit kÃ¼ndigen.Du darfst nur ein P-Konto haben. Mehrere P-Konten (auch bei anderen Banken) zu nutzen ist nicht erlaubt und kann zu einer auÃŸerordentlichen, fristlosen KÃ¼ndigung deines N26 Kontos fÃ¼hren.

title: Warum kann ich keine anderen N26 MoneyBeam Nutzer sehen?
content: Um Echtzeit-Transaktionen wieÂ MoneyBeamsÂ durchzufÃ¼hren, Ã¼berprÃ¼ft N26 die Kontaktliste deines Smartphones und findet andere N26 Nutzer anhand der gespeicherten Telefonnummer oder E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn jemand erkannt wurde, siehst du das an dem blauen Punkt neben seinem Namen.Wenn du die Namen deiner Freunde in der MoneyBeam-Liste nicht siehst, aber weiÃŸt, dass sie N26 Nutzer sind, haben sie sich hÃ¶chstwahrscheinlich nicht sichtbar gemacht. Du kannst auch wÃ¤hlen, ob du selbst dich fÃ¼r andere N26 Nutzer sichtbar oder unsichtbar machen mÃ¶chtest.Wenn ein MoneyBeam zwischen N26 Nutzern scheitert, liegt es wahrscheinlich daran, dass bei einem oder beiden Nutzern mehrere Telefonnummern oder E-Mail-Adressen im Profil in der Kontaktliste gespeichert sind. Stelle sicher, dass du die aktuelle E-Mail-Adresse und Telefonnummer deiner Freunde in deinem Handy abgespeichert hast, um ihnen MoneyBeams zu senden. Wenn die in deinem Handy gespeicherten Kontaktdaten nicht stimmen, kannst du keinen MoneyBeam senden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: What if my balance is negative?
content: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships.Â Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited.Â In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

title: Kann ich die N26 App auf mein Smartphone herunterladen?
content: Jede App-Version kann ab VerÃ¶ffentlichung 180 Tage lang verwendet werden. Innerhalb dieses Zeitraums werden neuere Versionen zur VerfÃ¼gung gestellt. Bitte fÃ¼hre immer ein Upgrade auf die jeweils neueste Version durch, um stets von einem optimalen Kundenerlebnis zu profitieren. Die neueste Version der N26 App kannst du im AppleÂ App Store (neuen Tab)Â oder imÂ Google Play Store (neuen Tab)Â herunterladen.Bitte beachte, dass es fÃ¼r alle Smartphones Mindestanforderungen gibt, um eine ordnungsgemÃ¤ÃŸe Nutzung zu gewÃ¤hrleisten. Diese Anforderungen sind unten aufgelistet:iPhone:Modell 5s und neueriOS 12 und hÃ¶herDeine iOS-Version kannst du unter Einstellungen > Allgemein > InfoAndroid:Android 6.0 oder hÃ¶her. Du findest deine Android-Version unter Einstellungen > Ãœber dein GerÃ¤tNative UnterstÃ¼tzung fÃ¼r Google ServicesDu willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm (neuen Tab).

title: Why was I charged a Gambling Fee?
content: The Gambling Fee to the amount of 3% applies to all private customers who registered for an account after March 12, 2020, or who have a Business membership plan (regardless of the date on which said plan took effect).Customers with such a membership plan are charged the Gambling Fee when making use of the services of the following gambling providers:LotteriesSports bettingOnline casinosHorse racingOther gambling activitiesPlease note that this includes both incoming and outgoing applicable Mastercard transactions. The 3% Gambling Fee is charged after the applicable transaction is processed. For example: if you win or convert your remaining chips back to money, the merchant will send the balance in another transaction where the 3% Gambling Fee will be charged again.Good to know:The 3% Gambling Fee appears on your transaction list and balance statement, linked to the original and any subsequent transaction from the gambling merchant.The fee we have charged is related to Mastercard transactions youâ€™ve processed at certain relevant merchants (no matter which country you place the bet) and canâ€™t be refunded.Â Some of our customers will not have to pay the Gambling Fee, as a result of the ruling of the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (BGH XI ZR 26/20).

title: Come creare una password?
content: Se hai dimenticato la password oppure vuoi cambiarla, seleziona Dimenticata? nella versione mobile dell'app o Password dimenticata? nellaÂ WebApp (nuova tabella)Â nella fase di accesso. Ti invieremo un link allâ€™indirizzo e-mail registrato per creare una nuova password. La password non deve rispondere a requisiti specifici ma ne verrÃ  valutata la sicurezza nel momento in cui viene creata: verranno accettate le password considerate sicure dal nostro algoritmo.Raccomandiamo l'utilizzo di una combinazione di parole piuttosto che l'uso di un'unica parola: segui la logica del "difficile da indovinare ma facile da ricordare".Se la tua password non viene accettata dal nostro sistema, puoi inserire caratteri speciali, numeri oppure una combinazione di lettere maiuscole e minuscole.Se inserisci una password errata per sei volte consecutive, l'accesso al conto verrÃ  temporaneamente bloccato. In tal caso, prova a collegarti nuovamente dopo 30 minuti.La chat Ã¨ disponibile da lunedÃ¬ a domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: What to do if my account may be compromised?
content:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).Â If youâ€™d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. Weâ€™ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that weâ€™ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if Iâ€™ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.Â What if Iâ€™ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.Â Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: Mastercard Travel Rewards - France
content: Mastercard Travel Rewards vous permet d'Ã©conomiser pendant que vous voyagez. Avec des centaines de remises sous forme de cashback dans 17 pays, vous pouvez obtenir un remboursement automatique sur vos sorties culturelles, vos achats, les restaurants, les hÃ´tels et plus encore lorsque vous payez avec votre Mastercard N26 Ã  l'Ã©tranger.OÃ¹ puis-je trouver les offres ?Lorsque vous vous connectez Ã  votre application N26, appuyez simplement sur la rubrique DÃ©couvrir pour accÃ©der Ã  toutes les offres en cours. Attention : pour le moment, le programme Mastercard Travel Rewards n'est disponible que pour les clients N26 rÃ©sidant en France et faisant leurs achats Ã  l'Ã©tranger.Cliquez ici (nouvel onglet) pour consulter la liste des commerÃ§ants participant Ã  ce programme.Comment puis-je bÃ©nÃ©ficier de ces remises ?Si vous souhaitez bÃ©nÃ©ficier des offres proposÃ©es par Mastercard Travel Rewards, il vous suffit de payer avec votre carte N26 dans les commerces participants Ã  l'Ã©tranger. Vous recevrez ensuite le remboursement correspondant Ã  l'offre sur votre compte N26 dans un dÃ©lai de 30 jours suivant la date d'achat.Veuillez noter : Mastercard Travel Rewards est uniquement disponible pour les titulaires de comptes N26 Smart, You et Metal.

title: What is a N26 Business Account?
content: N26 Business is a simple and affordable solution for all your daily financial business needs. The N26 Business account is a safe and intuitive digital business current account that you can sign up to in minutes. It is beautifully simple, transparent and free*; allowing you to receive payments from clients, send money and spend confidently while keeping your business finances completely separate from your personal ones.Our business accounts are designed for self-employed and freelancers doing business under their own name (meaning you canâ€™t have our company name on your account or card). It is currently not possible to switch from personal to business accounts, so make sure that this account is right for you before opening.What are the benefits of a N26 Business Account?Our N26 Business account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* business account: N26 Business is free to open online with no account management fees (*after a balance of â‚¬50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card intended for business use only. The virtual card has a full PAN number and is ready to add to your Apple or Google wallets for online and in-store purchases. You can also use contactless-enabled ATMs to withdraw money with Apple or Google pay.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional â‚¬10, you can receive a physical N26 Mastercard for business use (please note, you will need to have at least â‚¬10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Maestro card: If you also need a card for private expenses then customers with DE, AT and NL T&Câ€™s, can order a Maestro card for an additional â‚¬10.Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.What are the maximum limits for N26 Business accounts?The maximum daily payment limits for the N26 Business Mastercard (total amount within 24 hours) are:Â ATM withdrawals: â‚¬2,500	In-store or online payments: â‚¬5,000Â The monthly limit for payments is â‚¬20,000.Â You can set your limits (new tab) for ATM withdrawals and payments directly in the Cards section of the app.On top of this, if you open an N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands, you can apply for a Maestro card for your personal expensesÂ The maximum daily limits (within 24 hours) for bank transfers are:Â MoneyBeam to N26 customers: â‚¬1,000Instant transfers: â‚¬100,000Outgoing transfers: No limitsÂ N26 Business doesn't support transfers in foreign currencies (new tab) made from the app but directly from the Wise (new tab) website.Â Please note that business-to-business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

title: How to file a complaint?
content: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWeâ€™re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and will thoroughly investigate it. We'll provide our findings and final response via email.Â Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via live chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:German beschwerden@n26.com (new tab)English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Please note: These inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our customer support team (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve your issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.Â If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person.Â If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWeâ€™ll contact you via email to confirm that weâ€™ve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different time frames apply based on the country of your account Terms & Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business DaysÂ Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar DaysÂ United Kingdom - 56 Calendar DaysÂ Spain - 60 Calendar DaysÂ Italy - 60 Calendar DaysÂ We may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties, such as:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht â€“ BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab) page.

title: How to block contactless payments on my card?
content: Currently only available for iOS users on the mobile app.Contactless payments are really practical. But you might prefer to deactivate this payment method to prevent unauthorised transactions on your card. This is why you can now deactivate contactless payments on your card specifically:Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Toggle Contactless payments.The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen. Keep in mind that these settings refer to your physical card. You can read our dedicated articles to manage your Google Pay and Apple Pay settings. If youâ€™re experiencing difficulties with contactless card payments, please read the following article to learn how to make them work.

title: How do contactless payments work?
content: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If youâ€™re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to â‚¬50 donâ€™t require a card PIN. For amounts over â‚¬50 or cumulative transactions above 150â‚¬ youâ€™ll need to enter your card PIN.Â Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front wonâ€™t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

title: What are â€œMessagesâ€ ?
content:
The security of your personal data is our priority. Thatâ€™s why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. Weâ€™ll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, youâ€™ll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, youâ€™ll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.Weâ€™ll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You canâ€™t initiate a conversation, but youâ€™ll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesnâ€™t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, weâ€™ll ask you to open a chat with us.

title: Â¿QuÃ© es una tarjeta virtual?
content: Si contratas una cuenta N26 EstÃ¡ndar, obtendrÃ¡s una tarjeta virtual gratis (siempre y cuando tengas un saldo mÃ­nimo extraordinario de 10 â‚¬ para activar la tarjeta).Â Una tarjeta virtual adicional es ideal para tus compras online, lo que te da un extra de tranquilidad al compartir los detalles de tu tarjeta en internet. TambiÃ©n es perfecta para mantener tus suscripciones y pagos recurrentes separados de tus compras del dÃ­a a dÃ­a.Los clientes de N26 Smart, YOU y Metal tienen la opciÃ³n de pedir una tarjeta virtual gratis ademÃ¡s de la tarjeta fÃ­sica gratuita que reciben junto con su contrato premium. Recuerda: Los clientes de N26 EstÃ¡ndar tienen la opciÃ³n de pedir una tarjeta fÃ­sica por una comisiÃ³n Ãºnica de 10 â‚¬ (sin necesidad de contratar una cuenta premium).Â¿CÃ³mo pedir y activar mi tarjeta virtual?Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta y abre la pestaÃ±a Tarjetas, en la esquina inferior derecha.Pulsa Â«Obtener una tarjeta adicionalÂ».Selecciona Â«VirtualÂ» en la parte superior y pulsa Â«ElegirÂ» en la parte inferior.Lee y acepta los tÃ©rminos y condiciones y pulsa Â«Generar tarjeta virtualÂ».AÃ±ade tu tarjeta virtual a Apple Pay o Google Pay u omite este paso.Â¿CÃ³mo uso mi tarjeta virtual?Pagar en un establecimiento empleando Apple o Google Pay: Vincula tu tarjeta virtual a tu Apple o Google Pay, dependiendo de tu dispositivo.Retirar dinero en efectivo: Cuando hayas vinculado la tarjeta virtual a tu wallet de Apple o Google, podrÃ¡s retirar dinero en efectivo en cajeros que tengan funciÃ³n contactless. TambiÃ©n puedes utilizar CASH26 para ingresar o retirar dinero en efectivo (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR).Realizar compras online: Puedes consultar los datos de tu tarjeta virtual en la app (nÃºmero de tarjeta, fecha de caducidad y nÃºmero CVV). Para consultar estos datos:Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu app mÃ³vil de N26Selecciona Â«TarjetasÂ»Busca tu tarjeta virtual (desliza hacia la izquierda para buscar tu tarjeta virtual si tienes mÃ¡s de una)Selecciona Â«InformaciÃ³n de la tarjetaÂ»TendrÃ¡s que introducir el PIN de confirmaciÃ³n o utilizar el inicio de sesiÃ³n biomÃ©trico para ver los datos de tus tarjetas virtuales durante 60 segundosLa Mastercard virtual solo estÃ¡ disponible para cuentas N26 EstÃ¡ndar abiertas a partir de febrero de 2021 y para todas las cuentas premium de N26 a partir del 9 de octubre de 2021.

title: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
content:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.Â How does it work?Â The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?Â Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of AttorneyÂ Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a personâ€™s identity, and itâ€™s not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.Â As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.Â Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

title: Comment N26 protÃ¨ge mon compte ?
content: MÃªme si nous souhaitons vous offrir une expÃ©rience bancaire simple et mobile sur votre smartphone, nous ne faisons aucun compromis sur la sÃ©curitÃ©. Notre architecture de sÃ©curitÃ© en trois Ã©tapes nous permet de sÃ©curiser votre compte et votre argent :Connexion sÃ©curisÃ©e. Les donnÃ©es nÃ©cessaires pour se connecter, c'est-Ã -dire le nom d'utilisateur, le mot de passe ou l'empreinte digitale ou le systÃ¨me de reconnaissance faciale (selon le type de smartphone) sont identiques pour l'application mobile N26 et votre espace personnel sur notre site internet (nouvel onglet). Veillez Ã  dÃ©finir un mot de passe sÃ»r et Ã  ne partager vos donnÃ©es de connexion avec personne.Code de validation. Il s'agit d'un code Ã  4 chiffres Ã  dÃ©finir soi-mÃªme aprÃ¨s la premiÃ¨re synchronisation de votre smartphone avec votre compte. Il doit Ãªtre saisi Ã  chaque fois que vous rÃ©alisez une transaction depuis votre application N26 ou depuis votre espace personnel sur notre site internet.Push notification. Il s'agit d'une notification sÃ©curisÃ©e envoyÃ©e sur le smartphone associÃ© Ã  votre compte. Si cette notification est envoyÃ©e pour une validation de transaction via 3D Secure, vous devez vous connecter Ã  lâ€™application pour confirmer la transaction.Ã€ chacun de vos contacts, nous vous poserons quelques questions afin de nous assurer que vous Ãªtes bien le bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire du compte.En aucun cas nous ne vous demanderons votre numÃ©ro de carte (16 chiffres), votre cryptogramme de sÃ©curitÃ© (CVV), votre mot de passe, votre code de validation ou code PIN de carte.Â Vous Ãªtes lâ€™unique personne qui doit connaÃ®tre ces informations et N26 ne vous demandera jamais de les communiquer.Par ailleurs, nous assurons Ã©galement la sÃ©curitÃ© de votre compte en conservant un minimum de donnÃ©es vous concernant. Nous le faisons uniquement pendant la durÃ©e qui nous est imposÃ©e par la loi. Nous supprimons toutes vos donnÃ©es dÃ¨s lors quâ€™elles ne sont plus nÃ©cessaires pour les produits ou services que nous vous offrons.Pour trouver plus dâ€™information concernant la protection de vos donnÃ©es, nous vous invitons Ã  lire notreÂ Politique de confidentialitÃ© (nouvel onglet).

title: What is Phishing?
content: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If youâ€™d like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. Weâ€™ll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an â€˜emlâ€™ file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above.Â Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we canâ€™t use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following:Â Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone.Â Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the â€œphone spoofingâ€ technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website thatâ€™s being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps theyâ€™re offering limited-time promotional deals. Itâ€™s important to note that just because â€œN26â€ is part of the URL, this doesnâ€™t necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect youâ€™re on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesnâ€™t, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.Â

title: Paiement anticipÃ© de votre abonnement Premium
content: Votre contrat d'adhÃ©sion est valable pour un an, aprÃ¨s quoi il sera automatiquement renouvelÃ© pour une pÃ©riode indÃ©finie jusqu'Ã  ce que vous dÃ©cidiez de l'annuler. Vous pouvez le faire Ã  tout moment (voir ci-dessous). Nous vous informerons 2 mois avant la date de fin de votre contrat que celui-ci sera dÃ©sormais renouvelÃ© indÃ©finiment.Quelles sont mes options de facturation ?Vous pouvez choisir de rÃ©gler vos cotisations tous les mois ou en plusieurs mensualitÃ©s anticipÃ©es (6 ou 12 mois, par exemple) afin de profiter d'une rÃ©duction. Cela n'affectera pas la durÃ©e de votre contrat annuel.Si par exemple vous choisissez de payer 6 mensualitÃ©s d'avance en un seul paiement, vous effectuerez un paiement pour les 6 premiers mois de votre contrat annuel au dÃ©but de votre adhÃ©sion, et un deuxiÃ¨me paiement 6 mois plus tard, pour la deuxiÃ¨me moitiÃ© de votre contrat annuel.Quand et comment puis-je payer ?Votre adhÃ©sion sera activÃ©e et vous accÃ©derez Ã  tous vos avantages Premium dÃ¨s que vous aurez rÃ©glÃ© la premiÃ¨re cotisation de votre adhÃ©sion. Vous pouvez effectuer votre premier paiement avec une carte de crÃ©dit ou de dÃ©bit ou avec Apple Pay ou Google Wallet. Vous accÃ©derez alors Ã  vos avantages Premium dÃ¨s l'instant oÃ¹ vous aurez vÃ©rifiÃ© votre identitÃ©. Sinon, vous pouvez choisir d'alimenter votre compte et nous dÃ©duirons automatiquement de votre solde le montant de la premiÃ¨re cotisation de vos frais dâ€™adhÃ©sion.Si nous ne recevons pas le premier paiement de votre adhÃ©sion (c'est Ã  dire votre premiÃ¨re mensualitÃ© ou les cotisations payÃ©es en avance) dans les 15 jours qui suivent votre vÃ©rification d'identitÃ©, nous dÃ©duirons la somme correspondante de votre compte N26 et vous donnerons accÃ¨s Ã  lâ€™ensemble des avantages Premium Ã  ce moment-lÃ . Par la suite, vos cotisations seront prÃ©levÃ©es automatiquement sur votre compte selon le mode de facturation que vous avez choisi.Comment annuler mon adhÃ©sion Ã  N26 ?Mettre fin au renouvellement de l'adhÃ©sion : vous pouvez arrÃªter le renouvellement automatique de votre adhÃ©sion Ã  tout moment avant la fin de votre contrat d'adhÃ©sion de 12 mois en nous contactant sur le LiveChat. Si vous mettez fin au renouvellement, vous pourrez continuer Ã  utiliser votre carte N26 et profiter des avantages de votre adhÃ©sion jusqu'Ã  l'expiration de votre contrat d'adhÃ©sion. Pour les comptes N26 You et N26 Metal, cela signifie que vous continuerez Ã  profiter des couvertures d'assurance tant que vous vous acquitterez de vos frais d'adhÃ©sion.Annulation immÃ©diate : vous pouvez mettre fin Ã  votre adhÃ©sion Ã  tout moment en nous contactant. Si vous choisissez cette option, votre carte Premium N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal sera dÃ©sactivÃ©e et nous Ã©mettrons pour vous une carte virtuelle au moment oÃ¹ vous passerez Ã  un compte gratuit N26 Standard. Les clients N26 You et N26 Metal perdent immÃ©diatement leur couverture d'assurance.Â RÃ©vocation : vous pouvez rÃ©voquer votre adhÃ©sion pendant une pÃ©riode de 14 jours suivant le prÃ©lÃ¨vement de vos premiers frais mensuels. Il vous suffit de nous contacter et nous vous assisterons. Nous dÃ©sactiverons alors votre Mastercard N26 et Ã©mettrons une carte virtuelle associÃ©e Ã  votre compte N26 Standard.Est-ce que je peux me faire rembourser ?Si vous annulez votre adhÃ©sion durant la pÃ©riode de rÃ©tractation de 14 jours, nous vous remboursons intÃ©gralement le montant que vous avez versÃ© initialement.Â Si vous rÃ©siliez votre adhÃ©sion au-delÃ  de la pÃ©riode de rÃ©tractation de 14 jours, nous vous rembourserons toute mensualitÃ© restante que vous auriez payÃ©e en avance.En revanche, si vous avez bÃ©nÃ©ficiÃ© d'une rÃ©duction pour les mensualitÃ©s payÃ©es en avance, nous vous rembourserons les mensualitÃ©s restantes mais la rÃ©duction dont vous avez bÃ©nÃ©ficiÃ© sera dÃ©duite du montant de votre remboursement. En effet, vous ne pouvez bÃ©nÃ©ficier de la rÃ©duction que si vous maintenez votre adhÃ©sion durant toute la pÃ©riode payÃ©e en avance.

title: How does N26 Business work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business is right for you:The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive (0.1% | 0.5%) cashback every month on all payments made using the card. All payment refunds received during the month will be discounted from the total payments amount in order to calculate the cashback. The refunds might be related to a payment made on the same or a previous month. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).The cashback is issued on a monthly basis, processing eligible transactions of a given month the following natural month, starting from day 15th. Please expect a 7 days delay for the cashback to be credited into your N26 Business account.As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.Â Your login details of both the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab)Â consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose aÂ secure passwordÂ and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.Â ThisÂ 4-digit codeÂ is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can thenÂ change itÂ in the app yourself after that.Push messages.Â For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to yourÂ connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also addedÂ 3D SecureÂ to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us weâ€™ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But weâ€™ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.Weâ€™ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You canÂ download your personal dataÂ up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in ourÂ Privacy Policy (new tab).

title: What is a N26 Standard Account?
content: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of â‚¬50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional â‚¬10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least â‚¬10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo descargar el extracto bancario?
content: El extracto bancario es un documento en el que se refleja el saldo total de tu cuenta y todas las transacciones entrantes y salientes (transferencias, domiciliaciones, pagos con tarjeta, etc.). TambiÃ©n aparecen el nombre y apellidos del titular de la cuenta, el IBAN y el BIC.Desde la app del mÃ³vil (PDF): en la pantalla de Inicio, pulsa en las 3 barritas de la esquina superior derecha y selecciona Extractos.TambiÃ©n puedes descargar el extracto de un espacio concreto: ve a Espacios, elige un espacio, pulsa en el icono de configuraciÃ³n en la esquina superior derecha y selecciona Extractos.Desde la WebApp (PDF): haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pestaÃ±a nueva) y selecciona el mes en cuestiÃ³n bajo Extractos bancarios.Desde la WebApp (CSV): haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pestaÃ±a nueva), bajo CSV, selecciona las fechas de inicio y fin que necesites y haz clic en Descargar CSV.* El icono de descargas es el cuadrado con una flecha hacia abajo que se encuentra a la izquierda del botÃ³n de Ingresar dinero.

title: Con quale frequenza posso prelevare contanti gratuitamente?
content: Il numero di prelievi gratuiti di contanti con la tua Mastercard dipende dal tipo di conto che possiedi e dai Termini e condizioni del tuo Paese di riferimento (quello in cui Ã¨ stata originariamente spedita la carta).Per i possessori di conti N26 Standard (nuova tabella):3 prelievi ATM gratuiti al mese, in ogni paese (prelievi sempre gratuiti utilizzandoÂ CASH26)Per i possessori di tutti gli altri conti N26 Premium (nuova tabella):Germania: 5 prelievi ATM gratuiti al mese in Germania (prelievi sempre gratuiti utilizzandoÂ CASH26)Austria e Italia: Prelievi gratuiti illimitati (compresoÂ CASH26)*Francia, Spagna, Paesi Bassi e resto d'Europa: 5 prelievi ATM gratuiti al mese nel Paese di residenza e nell'EurozonaSvizzera: Da 3 a 5* prelievi gratuiti al mese nella zona europea e 1,7% di commissione sui prelievi localiSi applica sempre una commissione di 2 â‚¬ se si utilizza la cartaÂ MaestroÂ per prelevare contanti (disponibile solo in Germania, Austria e nei Paesi Bassi). Se hai il nostro conto N26 Flex, ogni prelievo costa 2 â‚¬. Controlla i nostriÂ listini prezziÂ se ti Ã¨ stata addebitata una commissione per unÂ prelievo da uno sportello bancomat.*I clienti con IBAN Italiano posso prelevare e depositare contanti con CASH26 per un massimo di 2000â‚¬ a settimana.

title: How to block my N26 card?
content: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go toÂ the Cards tabÂ and selectÂ Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself againstÂ unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: Cos'Ã¨ N26 Rate?
content: Requisiti d'idoneitÃ : N26 Rate Ã¨ attualmente disponibile solo per i clienti che hanno aperto un conto con IBAN tedesco.N26 Rate ti permette di suddividere una transazione da 3 fino a 6 rate mensili dello stesso importo direttamente nell'app. Se hai effettuato un acquisto importante e vorresti ammortizzarne il costo nel tempo, puoi utilizzare N26 Rate. Puoi suddividere in questo modo le transazioni idonee che hai effettuato nelle ultime 4 settimane. Avrai cosÃ¬ maggior controllo delle tue spese e potrai gestire il tuo budget mensile come preferisci.Caratteristiche di N26 Rate:Leggi qui sotto le caratteristiche di N26 Rate. Ti preghiamo di notare che i tassi di interesse dipendono dalla valutazione di rischio di credito effettuata da N26. Inoltre, il servizio puÃ² essere utilizzato solo con transazioni considerate idonee per la suddivisione, il che dipende sia dal tipo di transazione che dall'esercente presso cui l'hai effettuata.Tasso annuo effettivo globale (TAEG): dal 7,99% al 13,99% (a seconda della valutazione di rischio di credito)Importo: tra 20 â‚¬ e 200 â‚¬Durata di N26 Rate: la durata del finanziamento N26 Rate Ã¨ compresa tra 3 e 6 mesi, con addebito della prima rata il giorno della sottoscrizione e l'opzione di rimborso anticipato (la rata viene addebitata mensilmente).IdoneitÃ  dell'esercente / della transazione: N26 Rate Ã¨ offerto per un'ampia gamma di acquisti in diverse categorie, inclusa l'elettronica, l'arredamento, biglietti aerei e ferroviari, moda e addirittura pagamenti effettuati presso il tuo negozio di quartiere preferito!Ulteriori informazioni:Suddividi in rate gli acquisti attraverso il finanziamento nella tua app N26Torna indietro fino a 4 settimane per suddividere gli acquisti passatiPossibilitÃ  di rimborso anticipato del finanziamento Addebito diretto in rate mensili Pagamento manuale dei pagamenti saltatiPromemoria automatico un giorno prima della scadenzaPromemoria
