automatico quando salti un pagamentoCome usare N26 Rate?Dopo aver portato a termine una transazione, se Ã¨ idonea, puoi accedere a N26 Rate in diversi modi:Vedrai una scheda pratica nel tuo feed delle transazioniScorri fino alla fine della scheda 'Esplora' e tocca N26 Rate sotto Prodotti finanziari.Una volta che il finanziamento Ã¨ stato creato, puoi vedere la sezione con le rate seguendo questi passaggi:Seleziona 'Opzioni' (i tre puntini in alto nel feed delle transazioni)Vai su 'N26 Rate'Dopo aver selezionato una transazione idonea che vuoi rateizzare, verrai guidato attraverso gli step sottostanti per confermare l'utilizzo di N26 Rate:Per prima cosa ti verranno fornite informazioni su N26 RatePoi vedrai l'analisi dettagliata del Tasso Annuo Effettivo Globale (TAEG) applicabile, lâ€™importo totale da restituire e in fondo allo schermo troverai uno slider che ti permette di scegliere la durata (anche le rate mensili verranno mostrate sullo schermo)In seguito vedrai la schermata finale, dove ti sarÃ  richiesto di prendere visione e sottoscrivere la documentazione contrattuale per confermare lâ€™operazione.Dopo aver confermato un finanziamento con N26 Rate ti verrÃ  accreditato l'importo corrispondente al tuo acquisto direttamente sul tuo conto principale. Addebiteremo contemporaneamente l'importo corrispondente alla prima rata. I pagamenti delle rate restanti ti verranno addebitati automaticamente sul conto principale a scadenza regolare ogni mese (riceverai un promemoria 1 giorno prima della scadenza del pagamento).Come gestisco N26 Rate?Puoi gestire il tuo finanziamento con N26 Rate navigando nella sezione corrispondente dell'app e selezionando il menu delle opzioni (i 3 puntini in alto a destra nel feed delle transazioni) e poi andando su N26 Rate. DopodichÃ© potrai vedere:Il saldo totale dei finanziamenti da restituireLe rate dei finanziamentiDettagli sulle ratePiano di rimborsoL'opzione per rimborsare l'intero importo

title: Why do I need to send additional documents?
content: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS â†’ Certificates â†’ "Request for yourself" â†’ flag "of Residence" â†’ "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" â†’ and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description.Â Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ to your account. If you didnâ€™t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons youâ€™ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, itâ€™s likely that youâ€™ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: What is a N26 Standard Account?
content: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of â‚¬50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional â‚¬10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least â‚¬10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

title: How long does a bank transfer take?
content: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive.Â Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. Whatâ€™s a â€œbanking dayâ€?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasnâ€™t arrived â€” where is it?So what if youâ€™ve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasnâ€™t come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we canâ€™t investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

FÃ¼r die dedizierte PSD2-Schnittstelle (API) von N26 muss ein QWAC-Zertifikat von einer qualifizierten Zertifizierungsstelle ausgestellt werdenNotfallmechanismusIm Rahmen seiner gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen gemÃ¤ÃŸ der PSD2 hat N26 einen Notfallmechanismus implementiert, der Folgendes vorsieht:ZuverlÃ¤ssige Identifizierung eines Drittanbieters Ã¼ber den Besitz eines gÃ¼ltigen QWAC-Zertifikats (Qualifiziertes Zertifikat fÃ¼r die Website-Authentifizierung).Sicherer und autorisierter Zugriff auf ein KontoDrittanbieter kÃ¶nnen Ã¼ber die folgenden URLs auf unseren Notfallmechanismus zugreifen:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deDer Zugriff auf die obigen URLs und der Aufbau der TLS-Verbindung erfordern die Nutzung eines qualifizierten Zertifikats.DokumentationTPPs finden die folgende Dokumentation im Ã¶ffentlichen GitHub-Repository von N26 (neuen Tab):AISP- und PISP-Dokumentation fÃ¼r die dedizierte SchnittstelleGreifen Sie auf die Dokumentation fÃ¼r Sandbox zuAISP- und PISP-Dokumentation fÃ¼r die Fallback-SchnittstelleOffene API- und Sandbox-PostbotensammlungHÃ¤ufig gestellte FragenWir empfehlen TPPs, sich auf das Repository zu beziehen, um die neuesten Informationen zu technischer Dokumentation und Spezifikation zu erhalten.FÃ¼r Anfragen und Support im Zusammenhang mit N26 Open Banking verwenden Sie bitte dieses Formular (neuen Tab).Daten zur VerfÃ¼gbarkeit und Leistung der SchnittstelleIn den folgenden Berichten werden die VerfÃ¼gbarkeit und Leistung unserer dedizierten PSD2-Schnittstelle mit dem PSU-Interface verglichen:Q3 2019 (neuen Tab) / Q4 2019 (neuen Tab)

Januar 2022 werden die folgenden Parameter zu den Transaktionsinformationen hinzugefÃ¼gt, die wir ab dem 25. title: Comment se connecter avec lâ€™authentification Ã  deux facteurs ?
content:
Lâ€™authentification Ã  deux facteurs est une procÃ©dure dâ€™identification qui constitue une protection supplÃ©mentaire en Ã©tablissant une authentification Ã  deux ou plusieurs facteurs pour vous connecter Ã  votre compte.
En plus dâ€™utiliser votre mot de passe, vous aurez maintenant besoin soit d'une confirmation depuis votre appareil synchronisÃ© soit d'un code SMS pour vous connecter Ã  votre compte.
 
DÃ©couvrez Ã©galement comment fonctionne lâ€™Authentification Forte du Client (SCA).Comment me connecter avec lâ€™authentification Ã  deux facteurs ?Lorsque vous vous connectez Ã  votre compte N26 Ã  partir dâ€™un navigateur Web ou d'un appareil non synchronisÃ© Ã  votre compte, vous serez invitÃ© Ã  confirmer votre connexion depuis une notification envoyÃ©e sur votre tÃ©lÃ©phone synchronisÃ© ou vous devrez saisir un code envoyÃ© par SMS au numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone liÃ© Ã  votre compte. AprÃ¨s avoir confirmÃ© votre connexion, vous pourrez alors vous connecter Ã  votre compte N26.
Lorsque vous vous connectez Ã  votre compte N26 Ã  partir de votre appareil synchronisÃ©, l'authentification Ã  deux facteurs est dÃ©jÃ  automatiquement activÃ©e. Par consÃ©quent, il vous suffit de saisir votre identifiant et votre mot de passe pour vous connecter depuis votre appareil synchronisÃ©.Quelles sont les conditions requises ?Dans un premier temps, veuillez tÃ©lÃ©charger la derniÃ¨re mise Ã  jour de l'application (minimum version 3.31) et essayer de vous connecter depuis votre appareil synchronisÃ©.
Si vous ne pouvez toujours pas vous connecter Ã  votre compte mais que vous avez toujours accÃ¨s Ã  l'adresse e-mail liÃ©e Ã  votre compte N26, veuillez essayer de rÃ©initialiser votre mot de passe.
Si vous n'avez pas accÃ¨s Ã  l'adresse e-mail liÃ©e Ã  votre compte N26, veuillez contacter notre service client depuis le Livechat pour que nous puissions vous aider.Que dois-je faire si je ne me souviens plus de mon mot de passe ?Vous trouverez plus dâ€™informations sur lâ€™article Comment crÃ©er un nouveau mot de passe ? de notre Support Center.Je n'ai plus accÃ¨s Ã  mon appareil synchronisÃ©. Comment puis-je me connecter Ã  nouveau Ã  mon compte ?Si vous n'avez plus accÃ¨s Ã  votre appareil synchronisÃ© mais que vous avez toujours accÃ¨s au numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone liÃ© Ã  votre compte N26, veuillez vous connecter Ã  votre compte N26 et demander un code d'authentification :Connectez-vous Ã  votre compte depuis votre espace client en ligne ou un appareil non synchronisÃ©SÃ©lectionnez Aide au moment oÃ¹ l'on vous demande de confirmer votre connexion depuis votre appareil synchronisÃ©Choisissez Recevoir un code par SMSDÃ¨s que vous aurez reÃ§u le code par SMS, rentrez-le dans l'espace indiquÃ©AprÃ¨s avoir confirmÃ© votre connexion grÃ¢ce au code d'authentification, vous aurez donc terminÃ© lâ€™authentification Ã  deux facteurs et vous pourrez synchroniser votre nouvel appareil Ã  votre compte.Que dois-je faire si j'ai un nouveau numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone ou si je ne suis pas en mesure de recevoir des SMS ?Si vous n'avez pas accÃ¨s au numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone liÃ© Ã  votre compte - soit parce que vous avez un nouveau numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone, soit parce que votre tÃ©lÃ©phone a Ã©tÃ© perdu ou volÃ© - veuillez contacter notre Service client depuis le Livechat pour que nous puissions vous aider.Et si mon tÃ©lÃ©phone nâ€™est pas compatible avec la derniÃ¨re version de lâ€™application ? Si vous possÃ©dez un tÃ©lÃ©phone qui nâ€™est pas compatible avec la derniÃ¨re version de lâ€™application, vous ne pourrez malheureusement plus accÃ©der Ã  votre compte N26 depuis votre application mobile sur ce tÃ©lÃ©phone.
Vous devrez confirmer votre connexion via le code SMS que nous enverrons au numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone liÃ© Ã  votre compte N26 pour vous connecter Ã  votre compte depuis votre espace client en ligne.
Vous pourrez effectuer vos transactions habituelles avec votre Mastercard, cependant veuillez noter que vous ne pourrez effectuer aucun virement tant que vous ne pourrez pas le confirmer dans l'application N26 depuis votre appareil synchronisÃ©.

title: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
content: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come.Â With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as weâ€™re able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. Weâ€™re going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account.Â Can I open an N26 account in my country?

title: Wie kontaktiere ich N26?
content:
Es gibt verschiedene MÃ¶glichkeiten, dich mit unserem Kundenservice in Verbindung zu setzen. Die beste MÃ¶glichkeit ist, einen sicheren Chat zu Ã¶ffnen, wÃ¤hrend du in der App eingeloggt bist. So kÃ¶nnen wir deine IdentitÃ¤t verifizieren und dir spezielle Informationen und UnterstÃ¼tzung anbieten.Im Chat erreichst du uns tÃ¤glich von 07:00â€“23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.So kontaktierst du uns Ã¼ber die AppWie du mit uns chatten kannstÃ–ffne einen Kundendienst-ChatDer Chat wird erÃ¶ffnet, sobald du dich eingeloggt hastWie du uns anrufen kannst
(nur fÃ¼r Premiumkonten)Wir kÃ¶nnen dich nur mit unserem Kundenservice in Kontakt bringen, wenn du uns unter der in deinem Konto registrierten Nummer anrufst. Wenn du eine neue Rufnummer registrieren mÃ¶chtest, befolge die Schritte auf dieser Seite: Wie Ã¤ndere ich meine Rufnummer?Bitte beachte: Um uns telefonisch zu kontaktieren, brauchst du ein N26 Premiumkonto (You, Smart oder Metal).UnterstÃ¼tzung per Telefon (nur Premium)Du hast keinen Zugriff auf die App?Du bist noch kein N26 nutzer?Wenn du noch kein Konto bei uns hast, jedoch allgemeine Fragen zu unseren Produkten und Dienstleistungen hast, kannst du entweder unten einen Besucher-Chat erÃ¶ffnen oder uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com schicken (die Wartezeit fÃ¼r E-Mails ist zurzeit lÃ¤nger als Ã¼blich).Du hast keinen zugriff mehr auf dein konto?Du hast dein Smartphone verloren oder ist es kaputt? Hast du Probleme, dich in die App einzuloggen und auf dein Konto zuzugreifen? Das tut uns leid und wir unterstÃ¼tzen dich bei der LÃ¶sung deines Problems, wenn du unten einen Besucher-Chat Ã¶ffnest oder uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com schickst (die Wartezeit fÃ¼r E-Mails ist zurzeit lÃ¤nger als Ã¼blich).Du mÃ¶chtest deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten Ã¤ndern? Befolge die Anweisungen auf dieser Seite:
Wie Ã¤ndere ich meine Rufnummer, Adresse oder andere persÃ¶nliche Daten?Bitte beachte: Zu deiner Sicherheit kÃ¶nnen wir dir bei Fragen zu personenbezogenen Daten nur helfen, wenn du einen Kundenservice-Chat startest, wÃ¤hrend du in der App eingeloggt bist.Ã–ffne einen Besucher-ChatBitte beachte: Wir werden dir nicht helfen kÃ¶nnen, falls du unseren Standort besuchst. Bitte kontaktiere uns nur auf den genannten KanÃ¤len. Vielen Dank fÃ¼r dein VerstÃ¤ndnis.

title: What are N26 Installments?
content: Eligibility requirements: N26 Installments is currently only available for customers whoâ€™ve opened their account in Spain, and who have a ES or DE IBAN.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction directly in the app after it has been made into 3 to 6 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks. Giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.N26 Installments Characteristics:Please see below for N26 Installments characteristics. Please note, rates are dependent on your financial situation. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing from.Effective Annual interest rate: From 7.49% to 13.99% (financial situation dependent)Eligible purchase amount: From â‚¬20 - â‚¬200N26 Installments Duration: The N26 Installments duration is from 3 to 6 months, with the option of early loan repayment (the interest rate is charged monthly).Merchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!Additional Information:Split purchases into installments within your N26 appGo back in time up to 4 weeks to split past purchasesFull early repayment of the loan Direct debit of monthly installments Pay missed payments manuallyAutomated reminder one day before due dateAutomated reminders when missing a payment Automated cancellation of the loan when >105 days in arrearsHow to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the â€˜Exploreâ€™ tab and tap on N26 Installments under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting â€˜Optionsâ€™ (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™When you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™:First you will be provided with information about â€˜N26 Installmentsâ€™Then you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept both checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, youâ€™ll be reimbursed for the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. Weâ€™ll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (youâ€™ll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in fullHow do we decide on your N26 Installment request?In order to swiftly and efficiently decide on your request for N26 Installments we evaluate your creditworthiness. In order to evaluate your creditworthiness, we generate an internal credit score. Within the scoring process we calculate how probable it is that you as a customer meet your payment obligations. For such calculations we process your personal data: your salary, your expenses, existing obligations, experiences of former contractual relations, repayment of former credits as agreed upon. Your scoring is the result of a mathematical-statistical procedure. Based on the data processed and the respective outcome of the internal scoring process, we determine whether we may offer you a N26 Account or N26 Installments and establish the conditions we can offer you for those products. Therefore, our scoring process is necessary to offer you an account with us (Payment services framework agreement - N26 Account) and to manage the offer of our credit contracts to you (as N26 Installments) according to Art. 22 (2) (a) and Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR. This information should already be helping you to understand the mathematically and statistically validated decision making process we offer to swiftly and efficiently perform and reply to your request for N26 Installments. You can get in touch with us here and explain why you think that we may have not yet sufficiently considered your point of view in our decision and why we should take further necessary information into account.After you get in touch with us regarding the respective automated decision, the decision will be reviewed by one of our employees. However, this does not guarantee a different decision by N26.

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte fÃ¼r meine abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?
content: Ersatzkarten sind fÃ¼r alle Smart, You oder Metal Kunden kostenlos erhÃ¤ltlich.Wenn du dein Konto vor den folgenden Daten erÃ¶ffnet hast, sind sowohl die neue Karte als auch der Versand an deine Adresse in den LÃ¤ndern, in denen N26 verfÃ¼gbar ist (neuen Tab), kostenlos:16.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz im europÃ¤ischen Raum)25.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Italien oder Spanien)11.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Frankreich)18.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich oder der Schweiz)Wenn dein Konto nach dem entsprechenden Datum erstellt wurde, kostet deine Ersatzkarte genauso viel wie die Bestellung einer neuen Karte.Wenn du derzeit in einem Land ansÃ¤ssig bist, das nicht von N26 unterstÃ¼tzt wird, wende dich bitte per Chat oder Telefon an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Bestellung fÃ¼r dich vornehmen kÃ¶nnen. Der Versand auÃŸerhalb dieser LÃ¤nder (neuen Tab) kann mit zusÃ¤tzlichen Kosten verbunden sein.Â Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten fÃ¼r ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In lÃ¤ndlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch lÃ¤nger dauern. Um Ã¼ber den aktuellen Lieferstatus auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe einfach auf den Home Bildschirm deiner mobilen App von N26.Meine Karte lÃ¤uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

title: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
content:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select â€˜Forgot Passwordâ€™ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

title: Wie kann ich die BestÃ¤tigung einer SEPA-Ãœberweisung herunterladen?
content: Wenn du eine Ãœberweisung getÃ¤tigt hast und eine BestÃ¤tigung der Ãœberweisung benÃ¶tigst, kannst du diese als PDF-Datei inklusive der Transaktionsdaten in deiner mobilen App oder Web-App herunterladen. Das geht so:Logge dich in deiner N26 App einWÃ¤hle aus der Transaktionsliste die BankÃ¼berweisung aus, fÃ¼r die du die BestÃ¤tigung herunterladen mÃ¶chtest.Klicke auf "ÃœberweisungsbestÃ¤tigung herunterladen".Nachdem du diese Option auswÃ¤hlst, wird das Dokument automatisch auf dein Smartphone oder PC heruntergeladen.Welche Daten werde ich in der ÃœberweisungsbestÃ¤tigung finden?In der ÃœberweisungsbestÃ¤tigung findest du die Bankverbindung des Ãœberweisenden und des BegÃ¼nstigten der Ãœberweisung, einschlieÃŸlich des Transaktionsbetrags und des Datums, an dem die Ãœberweisung stattgefunden hat.

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATMâ€™s nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A â‚¬2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (weâ€™ll remind you via push message when youâ€™re running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we canâ€™t reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, thereâ€™s a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A â‚¬2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2â‚¬.

title: Come posso collegare il mio conto N26 a PayPal?
content:
Se vuoi, puoi collegare il tuo conto N26 al tuo account PayPal, e avere cosÃ¬ accesso a una serie di vantaggi.Â Potrai ricaricare istantaneamente il tuo conto corrente, inviare e ricevere pagamenti rapidi in tutta sicurezza e senza il bisogno di usare i tuoi dati bancari o il numero della tua carta N26.Ecco come collegare il tuo conto N26 dalla versione web di PayPal:Clicca su Portafoglio nella parte superiore della pagina.Seleziona Collega una carta o un conto bancarioClicca Collega un conto bancario.Segui le istruzioni fornite.
Se invece utilizzi lâ€™app mobile di PayPal:Clicca su Impostazioni in alto a destraSeleziona Collega una carta o un conto bancarioClicca sul + e seleziona Conto bancarioInserisci i tuoi dati bancari e confermaÂ 
Ricorda di immettere il tuo nome e cognome esattamente come riportato sul tuo conto N26, altrimenti il collegamento con PayPal non andrÃ  a buon fine.Non appena il tuo conto N26 sarÃ  confermato, PayPal effettuerÃ  due addebiti di piccolo importo che saranno poi rimborsati sul tuo conto nel giro di 2-3 giorni lavorativi.Â A questo punto dovrai semplicemente prendere nota degli addebiti ricevuti, accedere al tuo account PayPal e confermare il collegamento del tuo conto N26 dal tuo Portafoglio.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of ourÂ Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isnâ€™t rewarded because the invited friend hasnâ€™t made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates theÂ Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

title: FATCA - PerchÃ© richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
content: Come previsto dalla normativa FATCA, N26 ha lâ€™obbligo di fornire informazioni finanziarie al Dipartimento del Tesoro e allâ€™Internal Revenue Service (IRS) degli Stati Uniti sui conti di contribuenti statunitensi e di societÃ  estere in cui contribuenti statunitensi detengono interessi considerevoli.La normativa FATCA (Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act) Ã¨ stata introdotta dallâ€™IRS con lo scopo di prevenire lâ€™evasione fiscale di contribuenti statunitensi mediante lâ€™apertura di conti presso istituti finanziari esteri.Â Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni sulla normativa FATCA sul sito www.irs.gov (nuova tabella)Â A differenza della maggior parte dei paesi del mondo, il sistema fiscale statunitense prevede la tassazione dei propri cittadini anche nei casi in cui abbiano la residenza fiscale allâ€™estero.Â Â Per stabilire se il tuo conto deve essere riportato allâ€™IRS, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:1. Sei (anche) un cittadino statunitense o titolare di una Green Card (permesso di soggiorno permanente) per gli Stati Uniti?2. Sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti? Essere â€œsoggetto a tasseâ€ negli Stati Uniti non significa necessariamente pagare imposte sul reddito negli Stati Uniti. Implica, piuttosto, che le normative fiscali richiedono la compilazione della dichiarazione dei redditi (inerente tutti i redditi percepiti al di fuori degli Stati Uniti) da presentare allâ€™IRS.Â  3. Se sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti, qual Ã¨ il tuo Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)?Puoi fornire il tuo Social Security Number (SSN) statunitense oppure il tuo Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN).Â Ti informiamo, inoltre, che se il tuo conto presenta un luogo di nascita statunitense, un numero di telefono statunitense oppure se hai impostato un ordine permanente verso gli Stati Uniti, secondo la normativa FATCA, verrai considerato un soggetto ai sensi del FATCA fino a quando non verrÃ  dimostrato il contrario.Â Nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di N26. BasterÃ  eseguire lâ€™accesso > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni fiscali.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:ãƒ» iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
ãƒ» Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time.Â Rememberâ€”you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile appâ€”youâ€™ll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRememberâ€”you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, youâ€™ll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab).Â To unpair your old smartphone:Go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to ğŸ‘¤ My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

title: Why was I charged twice?
content: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means youâ€™re able to see whatâ€™s going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once youâ€™ve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we canâ€™t cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.Â Sometimes youâ€™ll see both payments at the same timeâ€“the authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesnâ€™t expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).Â Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

title: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
content: Any app version can be used for 180 days since its release. Within this period, newer versions will be available. Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience.Â You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the AppleÂ App Store (new tab)Â or theÂ Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. These requirements are listed below:iPhone:Model 5s or newer.iOS 12 or above:(You can find your iOS version under "Settings" > "General" > "Informations").Android:Android 6.0. or above. You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Amber, Black and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 Metal with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these in mind when consideringÂ N26 Metal (new tab):If youâ€™re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: How to invite friends to join N26?
content: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

title: How do I return a SEPA transfer to its sender?
content: From the 17th March, customers from other banks can requestâ€”at their bank institutionâ€”the return of a SEPA transfer from an N26 customer.The sender of a SEPA transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving N26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. This request appears to N26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. Similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the N26 app, youâ€™ll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall.If you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. Once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. If you donâ€™t have sufficient funds in your Main Account, youâ€™ll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

title: Come evitare le truffe via SMS
content:
Hai ricevuto un messaggio SMS seguito da un link molto sospetto?Se sÃ¬, NON cliccare su quel link! Questo Ã¨ un messaggio di phishing.Come funziona la truffa?Ricevi un SMS dai toni allarmanti che ti invita ad aprire un link.Lâ€™SMS contiene un link con un URL diverso da quello ufficiale di N26 https://app.n26.com/login (nuova tabella)La pagina che si apre cliccando su quel link fraudolento ha unaÂ  grafica simile a quella usata da N26 e richiede la condivisione di alcuni dati personali, come 
la password dell'e-mail, la password, il numero della carta, il CVC, il codice PIN o i codici arrivati via SMS.. Non fornire mai questi dati fuori dall' App o dalla WebApp di N26!Dopo lâ€™SMS, un finto operatore chiama la vittima e prova a convincerla a svolgere alcune operazioni sospette, come fornire ulteriori dati relativi al conto o accedere allâ€™App di N26 per autorizzare delle transazioni non richieste. Ricorda: non confermare mai un pagamento allâ€™interno dellâ€™App di N26 se non riconosci il beneficiario o lâ€™esercente!Cosa fare se hai cliccato su un link sospetto?In questo caso, cambia immediatamente la tua password di accesso al conto.Puoi farlo accedendo alla App > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Sicurezza > Modifica la password di accesso. Oppure, durante il Login, puoi cliccare su Reimposta la password.Â Ti invieremo unâ€™email con la procedura da seguire.Se hai fornito i tuoi dati personali tramite quel link, contattaci via chat dalla tua App N26. I nostri operatori ti assisteranno nel ripristino delle credenziali dia sicurezza del tuo conto. Se puoi, inviaci lo screenshot dellâ€™SMS a support@n26.comDevo confermare una transazione attraverso lâ€™App di N26 per poter ricevere il rimborso?Assolutamente no! Non ti chiederemo mai di autorizzare una transazione attraverso lâ€™App di N26 se non sei stato tu a disporla. Non confermare mai delle transazioni se non riconosci il nome o lâ€™IBAN del destinatario nel caso di un bonifico, lâ€™email o il numero di telefono nel caso di un MoneyBeam, il nome dellâ€™esercente nel caso di una transazione con carta. Ti ricordiamo che la conferma delle transazioni avviene attraverso apposita notifica ricevuta allâ€™interno dellâ€™App di N26.Riconosci le comunicazioni ufficiali di N26?N26 non invia mai link allâ€™interno dei propri SMS, non fidarti se il messaggio che ricevi ne contiene uno!I messaggi di N26 arrivano solitamente dal mittente â€œAUTHMSGâ€, compresi i codici di verifica e di associazione OTP (One Time Password).I principali mezzi di comunicazione usati da N26 sono la live chat, le email e le chiamate in entrata da parte dei nostri clienti Premium.Â Non telefoniamo mai ai nostri clienti, a meno che non sia stato il cliente stesso a richiedere la telefonata.Come fanno i truffatori a conoscere i miei dati?Pensa ai tuoi profili social, come Facebook o Instagram: alcuni tuoi dati personali sono sicuramente online. Nome e cognome, data di nascita, indirizzo email, numero di telefono, sono tutti dati che utilizziamo per identificarci, ad esempio, nella creazione di account su internet. I truffatori sanno sfruttare la vulnerabilitÃ  delle persone per raccogliere queste informazioni tramite tattiche di social engineering.

title: How to protect my account?
content: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, itâ€™s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: Where to find your Tax ID
content: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If youâ€™re from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TINâ€™s are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben Ã¼ber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If youâ€™re a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des ProcÃ©dures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authoritiesâ€™ database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TINâ€™s are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TINâ€™s are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If youâ€™ve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

title: Custom Audiences
content: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called â€œLookalike-Audiencesâ€ are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.Â In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called â€˜lookalike audiencesâ€™ are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.Â Your login details of both the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab)Â consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose aÂ secure passwordÂ and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.Â ThisÂ 4-digit codeÂ is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can thenÂ change itÂ in the app yourself after that.Push messages.Â For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to yourÂ connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also addedÂ 3D SecureÂ to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us weâ€™ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But weâ€™ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.Weâ€™ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You canÂ download your personal dataÂ up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in ourÂ Privacy Policy (new tab).

title: Hast du eine verdÃ¤chtige Nachricht erhalten?
content: Auf dem HÃ¶hepunkt der Pandemie enthÃ¼llte EasyJet, dass die persÃ¶nlichen Daten und Reiseinformationen von 9 Millionen Kunden durch einen Ã¤uÃŸerst raffinierten Cyberangriff gestohlen worden waren. In der ersten HÃ¤lfte des Jahres 2021 wurden die persÃ¶nlichen Daten von mehr als 530 Millionen Facebook-Nutzern aus Ã¼ber 100 LÃ¤ndern online zum Kauf angeboten. Ein paar Tage spÃ¤ter tauchten die persÃ¶nlichen Daten von weiteren 500 Millionen LinkedIn-Nutzern im Darknet auf. Diese Daten umfassten Informationen wie Namen, Geburtsdaten, Telefonnummern und E-Mail-Adressen.Was hat das mit N26 zu tun? Auch wenn N26 oder die Sicherheit deines Girokontos nicht direkt davon betroffen sind, kÃ¶nnen Cyberkriminelle mithilfe von Informationen, die sie durch Angriffe auf andere Unternehmen erlangt haben, groÃŸ angelegte Phishing-Angriffe verÃ¼ben.Phishing ist eine Methode, um an sensible Informationen zu gelangen, die dann fÃ¼r betrÃ¼gerische Zwecke verwendet werden kÃ¶nnen. Indem sie sich als vertrauenswÃ¼rdige Unternehmen tarnen, kÃ¶nnen BetrÃ¼ger Menschen mit List dazu bringen, ihre persÃ¶nlichen Daten preiszugeben. Dies gelingt ihnen, indem sie Menschen Ã¼ber digitale KommunikationskanÃ¤le, die wir alle tÃ¤glich nutzen, ins Visier nehmen, wie z. B. per E-Mail, SMS, Telefonanruf und Ã¼ber soziale Netzwerke.Als digitale Bank, die zunehmend an Bekanntheit gewinnt, sind N26 Kunden bereits Ziel von Phishing-Kampagnen geworden. Dabei versenden Angreifer Nachrichten, die hÃ¤ufig einen Link zu Websites enthalten, die der Web-App von N26 zum Verwechseln Ã¤hnlich sehen. Auch wenn sie auf den ersten Blick tÃ¤uschend echt wirken, sind diese Websites bÃ¶swillig und stehen in keiner Weise mit N26 in Verbindung. In einigen FÃ¤llen fÃ¤lschen Angreifer unseren SMS-Kurzcode, was dazu fÃ¼hren kann, dass ihre Nachrichten im gleichen Thread erscheinen wie zuvor von N26 versandte Nachrichten. Wir bitten dich, achtsam zu bleiben und uns sofort zu kontaktieren, wenn dir etwas merkwÃ¼rdig vorkommt.Was unternimmt N26 in diesem Fall? Unser Sicherheitspersonal hÃ¤lt kontinuierlich Ausschau nach mÃ¶glichen Angriffen, um sicherzustellen, dass alle betrÃ¼gerischen Websites so schnell wie mÃ¶glich deaktiviert werden und wir als Unternehmen die Sicherheit deines Kontos gewÃ¤hrleisten kÃ¶nnen.WÃ¤hrend wir weiterhin VorsichtsmaÃŸnahmen ergreifen, um deine Konten und persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu schÃ¼tzen, kannst du auch selbst einiges dafÃ¼r tun. Diese Dinge solltest du beachten, wenn du eine unerwartete Nachricht erhalten hast:Hast du eine SMS von jemandem erhalten, der behauptet, im Namen von N26 zu handeln, solltest du immer daran denken, dass wir niemals Ã¼ber solche KanÃ¤le Kontakt mit dir aufnehmen werden.Hinter Textnachrichten mit einer Handlungsaufforderung steckt immer eine bÃ¶swillige Absicht. Klicke auf keinen Fall auf Links und gib keine persÃ¶nlichen Daten preis. Wir werden dich niemals per SMS dazu auffordern, etwas zu tun.Solltest du Zweifel an Informationen haben, die dir mitgeteilt wurden, oder vermutest du, dass du auf eine betrÃ¼gerische Seite gefÃ¼hrt worden bist, ist Vorsicht geboten. Wenn du aufgefordert wurdest, eine bestimmte Telefonnummer anzurufen oder eine Nachricht an eine bestimmte E-Mail-Adresse zu senden, dann solltest du die Kontaktdaten recherchieren und prÃ¼fen, ob es sich um ein seriÃ¶ses Unternehmen handelt.Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, mache einen Screenshot von der Nachricht und kontaktiere unsere Kundenservice-Mitarbeiter Ã¼ber die Chat-Option in deiner N26 App oder per E-Mail an support@n26.com. Wir stehen dir jederzeit mit Rat und Tat zur Seite!

title: Wie kann ich gemeinsame Ausgaben mit MoneyBeam aufteilen?
content: Teilnahmeberechtigung: Alle EU-MÃ¤rkte mit iOS verfÃ¼gbar. In den kommenden Wochen ist das Feature auch fÃ¼r Android verfÃ¼gbar.Rechnungen teilenMit unserer neuesten Funktion "Rechnungen teilen" kannst du Ã¼ber deine N26 App ganz einfach gemeinsame Ausgaben unter Freunden und mit der Familie aufteilen. Teile die Rechnung in einem Restaurant auf oder beteilige dich an einem Geburtstagsgeschenk â€“ die Funktion ist fÃ¼r alle EinkÃ¤ufe geeignet, bei denen die Kosten unter mehreren Personen aufgeteilt werden sollen. Du kannst sogar die Kosten fÃ¼r deine Haushaltsausgaben aufteilen, wie z. B. eine Stromrechnung oder GegenstÃ¤nde fÃ¼r dein Zuhause.FÃ¼r jede durchgefÃ¼hrte Kartentransaktion kannst du die Rechnung gleichmÃ¤ÃŸig aufteilen oder individuelle BetrÃ¤ge fÃ¼r jede Person eingeben, die an dem Gruppeneinkauf beteiligt ist. Du kannst die Kosten unter beliebigen Personen aufteilen, egal, ob sie N26 Kunden sind oder nicht.Wie man "Rechnungen teilen" verwendetDu musst fÃ¼r den Kauf zuerst deine N26 Karte verwenden. Wenn du dann die Rechnung aufteilen mÃ¶chtest, gehe nach den folgenden Schritten vor:Ã–ffne nach deinem Kauf deine N26 AppSuche im "Start"-Tab nach der Transaktion, tippe sie an und wÃ¤hle "Rechnung aufteilen" aus.FÃ¼ge die Personen hinzu, mit denen du die Kosten aufteilen mÃ¶chtest (bei Personen, die nicht Kunden bei N26 sind, musst du ihren Namen angeben).Wenn alles fertig ist, tippe auf den grÃ¼nen Button am unteren Rand des Bildschirms, um die aufgeteilten BetrÃ¤ge zu bestÃ¤tigen.Personen, die nicht Kunden bei N26 sind, erhalten eine Nachricht mit deiner Bankverbindung, um dir den vereinbarten Betrag zu Ã¼berweisen.Tippe abschlieÃŸend auf "BestÃ¤tigen", um die verbleibenden Anfragen an andere N26 Kunden zu senden, die dann eine Anfrage Ã¼ber MoneyBeam erhalten werden.Wichtig:Anfragen an N26 Kunden: Dies funktioniert genauso wie eine normale Anfrage bei MoneyBeam.Anfragen an Personen, die nicht Kunden bei N26 sind: Du erhÃ¤ltst eine Standardvorlage mit deinen IBAN-Daten, die du bearbeiten kannst. Diese kann dann Ã¼ber jede andere Messaging-Plattform auf deinem GerÃ¤t versendet werden (z. B. E-Mail, WhatsApp, Signal, usw.). Bitte bedenke, dass diese Anfragen nicht in der App nachverfolgt werden kÃ¶nnen.Verbleibenden Zahlungsbetrag anzeigen: N26 Kunden und auch du selbst kÃ¶nnen den aufzuteilenden Gesamtbetrag einsehen und wie viel von der Gesamtrechnung noch zu zahlen ist. Wenn der Gesamtkaufbetrag nicht mit dem aufgeteilten Betrag Ã¼bereinstimmt, dann erscheint eine Warnmeldung (du kannst aber trotzdem weitermachen).Maximal 20 offene MoneyBeam-Anfragen: Du kannst bis zu 20 offene MoneyBeam-Anfragen gleichzeitig und maximal 3 offene Anfragen mit einem einzigen Kontakt nutzen. Wenn dein Limit erreicht ist, wird dir eine Nachricht zur ErklÃ¤rung angezeigt.

title: Wie benutze ich EasyFlex Savings?
content: Bitte beachte: Seit dem 16. September 2022 sind keine neuen Anmeldungen bei EasyFlex Savings mehr mÃ¶glich. Falls du dich vor diesem Datum angemeldet hast, bist du davon nicht betroffen uns kannst das Produkt wie gewohnt nutzen.Mit EasyFlex Savings kannst du Zinsen verdienen und dabei vÃ¶llig flexibel bleiben. Der Mindestbetrag fÃ¼r die erste Einzahlung liegt bei 500â‚¬. Danach kannst jederzeit beliebig viel Geld von deinem EasyFlex Savings-Depot abheben oder darauf einzahlen. Das bedeutet: Es gibt keine Festgeld-Laufzeiten, sondern du kannst jederzeit auf dein Geld zugreifen. Abhebungen von- und Einzahlungen auf dein EasyFlex Savings-Depot dauern bis zu 2 Werktage. Tippe im Homescreen deiner App auf Entdecken, scrolle herunter und wÃ¤hle dann EasyFlex Savings, um es zu Ã¶ffnen. FAQsWas kostet EasyFlex Savings?Es gibt keine festen GebÃ¼hren und auch von deinen Zinsen berechnen wir nichts. Falls du mehr als 50.000â‚¬ auf deinem N26 Konto hast, ist EasyFlex Savings eine gute MÃ¶glichkeit, unser Verwahrentgelt (neuen Tab) zu vermeiden und dabei etwas zu verdienen.Wie oft werden die Zinsen ausbezahlt?Deine verdienten Zinsen werden dir jedes Quartal (alle 3 Monate) auf dein EasyFlex Savings-Depot ausgezahlt. Du kannst den Betrag abheben oder ihn in deinem EasyFlex Savings-Depot lassen, um noch mehr Zinsen zu verdienen.Gibt es einen festen Zinssatz?Nein. Der Zinssatz variiert und hÃ¤ngt von unserer Partnerbank ab. Wir sind jederzeit bestrebt, transparent zu sein und die hÃ¶chstmÃ¶glichen ZinssÃ¤tze anzubieten.Muss ich auf meine verdienten Zinsen Einkommensteuer zahlen?Du musst deine verdienten Zinsen in deiner persÃ¶nlichen EinkommensteuererklÃ¤rung an die zustÃ¤ndige SteuerbehÃ¶rde erklÃ¤ren. Ob du Einkommensteuer auf deine verdienten Zinsen zahlen musst, hÃ¤ngt von deiner persÃ¶nlichen Situation ab. Du erhÃ¤ltst eine jÃ¤hrliche ErklÃ¤rung von unserer Partnerbank in deinen Nachrichten von N26 in deiner App mit den gesamten Zinsen, die du versteuern musst.Wie bietet N26 das Easy Flex Savings als Service an?Wir sind eine Partnerschaft mit Raisin, auch bekannt als WeltSparen, eingegangen, um EasyFlex Savings als komplett digitalen Service anzubieten. Unsere Partnerbank fÃ¼r dieses Produkt ist die norwegische Komplett Bank.Ist mein Geld sicher in EasyFlex Savings?Ja. Dein Geld ist durch die deutsche Einlagensicherung geschÃ¼tzt, durch die dein Gelde in HÃ¶he von bis zu 100.000â‚¬ abgesichert ist (ausgezahlt im Ã„quivalent in norwegischen Kronen).

title: PerchÃ© la verifica video non funziona?
content: Alcuni consigli per fare laÂ verificaÂ video con successo:La maggior parte delle videochiamate non riesce a causa della connessione Internet scarsa o della cattiva qualitÃ  dellâ€™immagine (ad es. troppo sfocata o scarsa illuminazione). Fai la chiamata in un ambiente luminoso, utilizza un telefono con una buona fotocamera e assicurati di avere una connessione Internet veloce.Assicurati di essere lâ€™unica persona nel video.Per aprire un conto con noi devi vivere in uno dei paesi supportati.Possiamo accettare solo carte dâ€™identitÃ  nazionali e passaporti (non si possono usare permessi di soggiorno). Inoltre, il documento non deve essere danneggiato.Una volta completata la verifica e ricaricato il conto (nuova tabella), ti invieremo la tua Mastercard N26. LeÂ consegneÂ richiedono da 4 a 14 giorni.La chat Ã¨ disponibile da LunedÃ¬ alla Domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: Pourquoi y a-t-il une liste dâ€™attente pour ouvrir un compte ?
content: Afin de construire des fondations encore plus solides pour lâ€™avenir de notre entreprise, nous mettons en ce moment lâ€™accent sur l'expÃ©rience client, nos offres de produits et nos processus internes. Tout cela pour devenir une banque encore meilleure pour vous dans les annÃ©es Ã  venir.Â Compte tenu de la forte demande concernant les services bancaires numÃ©riques de N26, nous limitons de faÃ§on temporaire le nombre de nouveaux comptes que nous proposons chaque mois.Â Nous avons donc mis en place une liste d'attente. Nous vous encourageons Ã  vous y inscrire, car nous vous contacterons aussitÃ´t que nous pourrons vous proposer le compte de votre choix.Je suis client N26, qu'est-ce qui change pour moi ?Rien du tout. En tant que client N26, vous pouvez continuer Ã  profiter en toute sÃ©curitÃ© de l'expÃ©rience bancaire simple et intuitive que vous connaissez et apprÃ©ciez au quotidien, aussi bien sur votre smartphone que sur votre espace client en ligne. Â Nous faisons notre maximum pour faciliter le processus dâ€™ouverture de compte pour les nouveaux clients et espÃ©rons pouvoir bientÃ´t les accueillir.Je ne suis pas encore client, quand est-ce que je pourrai ouvrir mon compte N26 ?Si vous avez essayÃ© dâ€™ouvrir un compte N26 mais que vous nâ€™avez pas pu le faire, la meilleure faÃ§on de vous tenir au courant est de vous inscrire sur notre liste dâ€™attente. Nous pourrons alors vous contacter trÃ¨s rapidement dÃ¨s l'instant oÃ¹ vous aurez la possibilitÃ© d'ouvrir le compte de votre choix.En raison de la trÃ¨s forte demande pour nos services, nous voulons assurer Ã  chacune des personnes inscrites sur notre liste d'attente un accÃ¨s Ã©quitable Ã  l'expÃ©rience bancaire N26. C'est pour cette raison que nous traitons les demandes d'ouverture de compte dans l'ordre dans lequel nous les recevons.Puis-je ouvrir un compte N26 ?

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then â€œadd a new recipient), some details like the recipientâ€™s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers.Â You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesnâ€™t delete your transaction history with them

title: Â¿QuÃ© pasa si tengo un saldo negativo?
content: Tu saldo puede ser negativo si tienes que abonar comisiones de N26, por ejemplo, por nuestras entregas exprÃ©s o por nuestros contratos premium.Â En el resto de los casos, tu saldo puede ser negativo si entran pagos offline con tarjeta y deben contabilizarse. Se trata, por ejemplo, de pagos en vuelos o barcos que, en el momento de la autorizaciÃ³n de pago, no pueden deducirse del saldo de tu cuenta, pero que de todos modos deben cargarse.Conforme a nuestros TÃ©rminos y condiciones, estÃ¡s obligado a liquidar tu saldo negativo. RecibirÃ¡s un recordatorio por email y te pediremos que liquides tu saldo negativo lo antes posible. Mientras tu saldo sea negativo, no podrÃ¡s efectuar mÃ¡s pagos ni realizar retiradas en cajeros.Â¿QuÃ© pasa si mi saldo sigue siendo negativo?Tu cuenta seguirÃ¡ activa durante 60 dÃ­as a partir de la fecha en la que el saldo entre en nÃºmeros rojos. Durante este plazo:RecibirÃ¡s dos recordatorios.Si tienes una cuenta N26 You, N26 Metal o N26 Business You, se cancelarÃ¡n todos los servicios 60 dÃ­as despuÃ©s y tu cuenta se convertirÃ¡ en una cuenta estÃ¡ndarSi transcurridos estos 60 dÃ­as no has hecho nada, podremos proceder al cierre de tu cuenta.

title: What is CASH26?
content: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 appâ€“â€“no debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-storeâ€“â€“itâ€™s that simple. Plus, you donâ€™t have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adamâ€™s, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, youâ€™ll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately.Â If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of â‚¬2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using onlyÂ  your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication?Â When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?Â Â First, youâ€™ll need to update your phoneâ€™s operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If youâ€™re unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you donâ€™t have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.What if I canâ€™t remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If youâ€™ve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, youâ€™ll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code youâ€™ve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or canâ€™t receive SMS for other reasons?If you donâ€™t have access to your registered phone number â€“ either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen â€“ please contact our customer service via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.Why canâ€™t I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesnâ€™t support the latest app version, you wonâ€™t be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which weâ€™ll send to your account's registered phone number.Youâ€™ll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo aÃ±adir y eliminar participantes en un espacio compartido?
content:
CÃ³mo aÃ±adir a un participante a un espacio compartido:Accede al "Espacio" y haz clic en el icono "Compartir" en la parte superior derecha.Selecciona a la persona que deseas agregar de tu lista de contactos.Acepta las condiciones del servicio y confirma haciendo clic en 
"Otorgar poder especial".CÃ³mo eliminar a un participante de un espacio compartido:En la secciÃ³n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el menÃº en los tres puntos de la esquina superior derecha. iOS: desde la lista de participantes, pulsa sobre la flecha que estÃ¡ al lado del nombre que quieres eliminar. Android: Pincha en el nombre del participante.Pulsa en â€˜revocar poder notarialâ€™.Confirma la notificaciÃ³n en la siguiente pantalla y pincha sobre â€˜revocar poder notarialâ€™.Para unirte a un espacio compartido:En la secciÃ³n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el espacio ''Pendiente'' y el icono de compartir espacio.
