Lee el resumen del espacio compartido y despuÃ©s lee la pantalla del poder notarial. Cuando lo hayas leÃ­do, marca la casilla verde y pulsa sobre ''Otorgar poder notarial''.Introduce tu PIN de confirmation.Confirma la notificaciÃ³n ''Aceptar poder notarial'' que te llegarÃ¡ a tu dispositivo vinculado.Necesitas tener algÃºn espacio sin utilizar para aceptar la invitaciÃ³n a un espacio compartido. En caso contrario, tendrÃ¡s que eliminar alguno para liberar espacio. No debes tener ningÃºn espacio con el mismo nombre o imagen que el espacio compartido. Solo puedes aceptar la invitaciÃ³n para unirte a un espacio compartido cuando hayas cambiado el nombre o al imagen del otro espacio. Para salirte de un espacio compartido:En la secciÃ³n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el menÃº en los tres puntos de la esquina superior derecha. Dentro de la configuraciÃ³n pulsa en ''Abandonar espacio compartido.''Confirma la notificaciÃ³n en la siguiente pantalla y pincha en ''Abandonar espacio compartido.''Se puede crear y modificar un espacio compartido desde la app de N26 y la web app. MÃ¡s sobre Espacios CompartidosÂ¿QuÃ© son los Espacios Compartidos?Â¿CÃ³mo crear un Espacios Compartido?

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab).Â In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.Â In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:Â A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
content:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing â€˜Direct Debitsâ€™: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you donâ€™t have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Spaceâ€™s IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your â€˜Spacesâ€™ section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the â€˜Space Settingsâ€™ and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' Â»Â Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' Â»Â Accept the T&C's Â»Â Enter your confirmation PIN Â»Â Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right â€˜cog iconâ€™)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on â€œSend moneyâ€Select â€œBank transferâ€Select the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

title: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 You?
content: Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: WÃ¤hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fÃ¼nf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.ZusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte!ZusÃ¤tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle Ã¼ber deine N26 App eine zusÃ¤tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 You Mastercard online sowie in GeschÃ¤ften, vermeide versteckte BankgebÃ¼hren und profitiere von gebÃ¼hrenfreien AuslandsÃ¼berweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst darÃ¼ber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit gebÃ¼hrenfrei Bargeld in jeder WÃ¤hrung abheben.Versicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an persÃ¶nlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: RÃ¼ckerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, fÃ¼r Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer FlugverspÃ¤tung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer VerspÃ¤tung des aufgegebenen GepÃ¤cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten fÃ¼r medizinische RÃ¼cktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erhÃ¤ltst eine Versicherung fÃ¼r Such- und RettungsmaÃŸnahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei UnfÃ¤llen wÃ¤hrend einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz fÃ¼r SchÃ¤den oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Du kannst N26 YOU mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Wenn du dich fÃ¼rÂ N26 You (neuen Tab) interessierst, denke daran:Die N26 You Mastercard hat keine PrÃ¤gung: Die Kartendetails, einschlieÃŸlich der Nummer, des CVV Codes und des zehnstelligen Tokens sind auf der RÃ¼ckseite aufgedruckt.Wenn du auf N26 You upgradest, wird die monatliche GebÃ¼hr von 9,90 â‚¬ jeden Monat ab dem Datum deines Upgrades direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du ein Neukunde bist, wird die erste GebÃ¼hr 15 Tage nach deinerÂ IdentitÃ¤tsÃ¼berprÃ¼fungÂ eingezogen. Danach wird die MitgliedschaftsgebÃ¼hr monatlich von deinem Konto abgebucht, gezÃ¤hlt ab dem Tag deines Upgrades. Wenn du dein Konto also zum Monatsende erÃ¶ffnest, wird die GebÃ¼hr im darauf folgenden Monat zwei Mal abgebucht. Du kannst eine zusÃ¤tzlich N26 You Karte fÃ¼r eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 10â‚¬ in deiner N26 App bestellen.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine PremiumgebÃ¼hr monatlich oder im Voraus fÃ¼r die nÃ¤chsten 6 Monate oder fÃ¼r 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich fÃ¼r die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig fÃ¼r den von dir gewÃ¼nschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt.Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Abrechnungsoptionen (monatlich, halbjÃ¤hrlich oder jÃ¤hrlich) und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und gehÃ¶rt zur Allianz Group.

title: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
content: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: Why canâ€™t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content: To carry out real-time transactions such asÂ MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphoneâ€™s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someoneâ€™s contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you donâ€™t see your friendâ€™s name on MoneyBeam but you know theyâ€™re an N26 user, they most likely havenâ€™t made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored donâ€™t match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

title: Wie kann ich Push-Nachrichten erhalten?
content: Wir senden dir Push-Mitteilungen, um Ãœberweisungen abzuschlieÃŸen (z. B.Â MoneyBeam) oder einen Service zu bestÃ¤tigen (wie beiÂ CASH26). Wenn du diese Push-Nachrichten nicht erhÃ¤ltst, Ã¼berprÃ¼fe zunÃ¤chst, ob die Benachrichtigungen sowohl fÃ¼r dein Smartphone als auch fÃ¼r die App aktiviert sind. Dann kannst du abhÃ¤ngig von deinem Smartphone einige unserer VorschlÃ¤ge zur Fehlerbehebung ausprobieren:iOSLÃ¶sche die App und starte dein Smartphone neu. Lade die neueste Version der App aus dem Apple App Store herunter, installiere sie undÂ verknÃ¼pfe dein SmartphoneÂ wieder.ÃœberprÃ¼fe, ob du in der App eingeloggt bist.Die Benachrichtigungsoption fÃ¼r die App muss in den allgemeinen Einstellungen deines Smartphones aktiviert sein.AndroidLÃ¶sche die App und starte dein Smartphone neu. Lade die neueste Version der App aus dem Google Play Store herunter, installiere sie undÂ verknÃ¼pfe dein SmartphoneÂ wieder.Gehe zuÂ EinstellungenÂ undÂ OptionenÂ und setze imÂ App ManagerÂ ein HÃ¤kchen beiÂ Benachrichtigungen anzeigen.Huawei und Xiaomi: Gehe zuÂ Einstellungen, dann zuÂ Erweiterte EinstellungenÂ undÂ AkkueinstellungenÂ und setze N26 als geschÃ¼tzte App.OnePlus: WÃ¤hle dieÂ Akkuoptimierung, Ã¶ffne dann die N26 App undÂ nicht optimieren.Oppo: Deaktiviere dieÂ AkkuoptimierungÂ fÃ¼r die App und sperre sie in derÂ Recent apps overview.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, youâ€™ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you donâ€™t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content: Direct debits returned to your account due toÂ insufficient funds* are charged a â‚¬3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9) in accordance with ourÂ Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,Â overdraftÂ interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you donâ€™t recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. You can check the list of countries below:BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland

title: Mastercard travel rewards - France
content: Mastercard Travel Rewards allows you to save while you travel. With hundreds of cashback deals across 17 countries, you can get automatic cashback on arts, culture, shopping, restaurants, hotels, and more when you pay with your N26 Mastercard overseas.Where can I find the deals?When you login to your N26 app, just tap the Explore tab to access all the current offers and deals available. Please note: at the moment the Mastercard Travel Rewards is available only for N26 customers residing in France and shopping abroad.Click here (new tab) for the list of merchants taking part to this program. How can I get these discounts?If you want to benefit from the deals offered by Mastercard Travel Rewards, all you have to do is pay with your N26 card at participating stores abroad. You will then receive a cashback in your N26 account within 30 days from the purchase date.Please note: Mastercard Travel Rewards is only available for N26 Smart, You and Metal account holders.

title: How much does an N26 account cost?
content: An N26 bank account is free (new tab).*Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:Pricing in Germany (new tab)Pricing in Austria (new tab)Pricing in France (new tab)Pricing in Spain (new tab)Pricing in Italy (new tab)Pricing in the rest of Europe (new tab)*If weâ€™re not able to offer you an N26 account based on ourÂ minimum requirements (new tab), you may be able to open anÂ N26 Flex account.

title: How to block contactless payments on my card?
content: Currently only available for iOS users on the mobile app.Contactless payments are really practical. But you might prefer to deactivate this payment method to prevent unauthorised transactions on your card. This is why you can now deactivate contactless payments on your card specifically:Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Toggle Contactless payments.The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen. Keep in mind that these settings refer to your physical card. You can read our dedicated articles to manage your Google Pay and Apple Pay settings. If youâ€™re experiencing difficulties with contactless card payments, please read the following article to learn how to make them work.

title: How do I cash a check?
content:
N26 is a 100% digital bankâ€”all of our services are performed online and we have no bank branches. This means itâ€™s not possible to deposit a check into your N26 account, and we donâ€™t issue checkbooks.
However, we offer a number of ways to top up your N26 account (new tab) easily, quickly, and directly from your smartphone.

title: Who can sign up for N26 Business?
content:
â„¹ï¸ Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.Â How do N26 Business accounts work?Â N26 offers a wide range of Business accounts (new tab), designed for freelancers and the self-employed, with a Mastercard linked to their account, entitling them to up to 0.5% monthly cashback on all their business payments.(The cashback offered by N26 Business accounts is not the Government Cashback, which can currently be activated for all N26 Mastercards.)If you are interested in Allianz coverage or other Premium perks, besides the N26 Business (new tab) account, you can also opt for N26 Business You (new tab) , N26 Business Metal (new tab), or N26 Business Smart (new tab). Â N26 Business (new tab) accounts are reserved exclusively for:freelancers enrolled in a professional register or order (such as architects, lawyers, pharmacists, and nurses)other freelancers, i.e. the self-employed and individual entrepreneurs with a VAT number (such as designers, photographers, electricians, or owners of B&Bs and holiday homes with VAT numbers).sole proprietorships registered in the Business Register of the Chamber of CommerceHowever, it is not possible to sign up for an N26 Business in the name of a partnership (e.g., GPs and LPs), capital company (e.g., LLCs and INCs), or another entity, including subjects with legal status and liability.Â What is the VAT number and where can I find it?The VAT number is an 11-digit numeric code, which is used to uniquely identify the owner of a given professional activity, such as the personal tax code.
Under Italian law, anyone who carries out a continuous activity for more than 30 days, in fact, has the obligation to register for VAT. This can be of two types: ordinary or flat-rate tax regime, depending on the revenues and expenses incurred for the activity.
The opening of the VAT number takes place by submitting a specific form to the Revenue Agency:Model AA9 / 12 (new tab) for individuals;Model AA7 / 10 (new tab) for companies.The form must be submitted or sent online via the Tax Agency portal (new tab) within 30 days of starting the professional activity.
As soon as the opening application is approved and completed, you will receive the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number containing the relevant code assigned to you by post and in the reserved area of â€‹â€‹the Tax Agency portal (new tab) .What is the ATECO code and where can I find it?The ATECO code is an alphanumeric abbreviation used to classify a commercial activity and to assign a risk level to that company, according to the ATECO 2007 classification (new tab)currently in force.
The code must be entered at the time of the request to open the VAT number, in order to communicate to the Tax Agency the type of activity that will be carried out.
It will also be possible to add different ATECO codes with the opening of additional VAT numbers.
You can find the ATECO code on the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number or on the Chamber of Commerce registration in the case of sole proprietorships.

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 ofÂ Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, pleaseÂ contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didnâ€™t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
content: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

title: Wie kann ich Feedback geben oder ein neues Produkt vorschlagen?
content: Wir bei N26 mÃ¶chten Banking einfach, transparent und flexibel machen. Deshalb freuen wir uns jederzeit Ã¼ber Kundenfeedback, um N26 weiterzuentwickeln. Du vermisst ein bestimmtes Feature in der App und fragst dich â€œWie kann ich Feedback gebenâ€? Schreib uns einfach eine E-Mail an ideas@n26.com (neuen Tab)! Ãœber diese Adresse sammeln wir alle VerbesserungsvorschlÃ¤ge, Ideen und WÃ¼nsche.Je nach Nachfrage berÃ¼cksichtigen wir deine VorschlÃ¤ge in der Produktentwicklung. In der Vergangenheit haben wir auf diese Weise schon einige neue Features eingefÃ¼hrt â€“ Feedback geben lohnt sich also!Â Ãœbrigens fÃ¼hren wir regelmÃ¤ÃŸige Umfragen durch, an denen du anonym teilnehmen kannst. Und solltest du mal unzufrieden sein, kannst du uns auch eine Beschwerde schicken. Ganz gleich, wie du Feedback geben willst â€“ wir sind dankbar, dass du dir die Zeit nimmst!Â Â

title: La mia carta Ã¨ giÃ  scaduta ma non ho mai ricevuto una sostituzione
content: Nessun problema, ci pensiamo noi!Â Se hai giÃ  confermato il tuo indirizzo e sono passati piÃ¹ di 20 giorni, ti preghiamo di contattare il Supporto Clienti. Puoi farlo nella sezione Supporto nell'app.Â Se non hai ancora confermato il tuo indirizzo, effettua l'accesso al tuo conto N26 nell'app e cerca un banner sotto la tua carta scaduta. Segui i passaggi per confermare dove vorresti ricevere la tua carta sostitutiva.Â La mia carta sta per scadere, cosa devo fare?Posso continuare a usare la mia carta dopo che Ã¨ scaduta?Quanto costa la sostituzione della mia carta scaduta o in scadenza?

title: Comment tÃ©lÃ©charger des donnÃ©es personnelles ?
content: Le RÃ¨glement GÃ©nÃ©ral sur la Protection des DonnÃ©es (RGPD) est un rÃ¨glement europÃ©en sur la protection et la confidentialitÃ© des donnÃ©es, entrÃ© en vigueur le 25 mai 2018. Pour rÃ©pondre Ã  ces nouvelles exigences, nous vous offrons dÃ©sormais la possibilitÃ© de tÃ©lÃ©charger vos donnÃ©es personnelles depuis notreÂ application web (nouvel onglet), rubriqueÂ ğŸ‘¤ Mon compteÂ puisÂ Informations personnelles.En tant que banque mobile, nous mesurons toute lâ€™importance de la sÃ©curitÃ© des donnÃ©es. Nous conservons un minimum de donnÃ©es vous concernant et seulement pendant la durÃ©e qui nous est imposÃ©e par la loi. Nous supprimons toutes vos donnÃ©es dÃ¨s lors quâ€™elles ne sont plus nÃ©cessaires pour les produits ou services que nous vous offrons.Lâ€™article 20 du RGPD vous octroie le droit Ã  la portabilitÃ© des donnÃ©es. Comme tout ce que nous proposons, le tÃ©lÃ©chargement de vos donnÃ©es personnelles est simple et transparent, vous avez le contrÃ´le.Le fichier que vous obtenez est uniquement destinÃ© Ã  la portabilitÃ© de vos donnÃ©es et, dans une majoritÃ© des cas, ne sera pas lisible par votre ordinateur compte tenu de son format JSON. Ce format Ã©tant crÃ©Ã© pour Ãªtre lu par une machine et non par un humain, vous ne serez pas en mesure dâ€™en dÃ©chiffrer les informations. Ce fichier JSON est uniquement destinÃ© Ã  Ãªtre transmis Ã  une autre institution.Comment tÃ©lÃ©charger vos donnÃ©esVous pouvez demander Ã  tÃ©lÃ©charger les donnÃ©es personnelles que vous avez fournies pour votre compte actuel ou un ancien compte jusquâ€™Ã  6 mois aprÃ¨s sa date de clÃ´ture. Ces donnÃ©es vous seront transmises dans un format Ã©lectronique que vous pourrez partager avec une tierce partie si vous le souhaitez.Client actuelVeuillez faire uneÂ demande en ligne (nouvel onglet) pour tÃ©lÃ©charger vos donnÃ©es personnelles.Il vous sera demandÃ© de crÃ©er un mot de passe temporaire pour utiliser le lien qui vous sera envoyÃ© Ã  lâ€™adresse email associÃ©e Ã  votre compte.Â Ce lien est valide pour seulement 24 heures Ã  partir du moment oÃ¹ vous recevez lâ€™email en question. Veuillez noter que si vous entrez un mot de passe erronÃ© Ã  5 reprises, le lien sera dÃ©sactivÃ© et vous devrez faire une nouvelle demande de tÃ©lÃ©chargement de vos donnÃ©es.Ancien clientVous pouvez consulter vos donnÃ©esÂ y comprisÂ aprÃ¨s la fermeture de votre compte. Pour tÃ©lÃ©charger vos donnÃ©es, veuillez complÃ©ter leÂ formulaire (nouvel onglet) en ligne de demande de donnÃ©es et vous assurer que les informations renseignÃ©es correspondent bien Ã  celles que vous aviez donnÃ©es pour votre ancien compte. Voici ce que vous devez renseigner :votre nom et prÃ©nom, le numÃ©ro et la date dâ€™expiration de la piÃ¨ce d'identitÃ© que vous aviez utilisÃ© pour ouvrir votre compte (Carte dâ€™IdentitÃ© ou Passeport),l'adresse email associÃ©e Ã  ce compteles dates (mois et annÃ©e) auxquelles vous avez ouvert et clÃ´turÃ© votre compte (pour retrouver la date d'ouverture de votre compte, rÃ©fÃ©rez-vous Ã  la date de rÃ©ception de l'email de confirmation de votre adresse email).Pour des raisons de sÃ©curitÃ©, nous devons nous assurer que vous Ãªtes bien la personne qui tÃ©lÃ©charge vos donnÃ©es : si lâ€™un des champs mentionnÃ©s ci-dessus est erronÃ© ou manquant, nous ne pourrons satisfaire votre demande.Il vous sera demandÃ© de crÃ©er un mot de passe temporaire pour utiliser le lien qui vous sera envoyÃ© par email. Ce lien est valide pour seulement 24 heures Ã  partir du moment oÃ¹ vous recevez lâ€™email en question. Ce lien est seulement valide pour une durÃ©e de 24 heures. Veuillez noter que si vous entrez un mot de passe erronÃ© Ã  5 reprises, le lien sera dÃ©sactivÃ© et vous devrez faire une nouvelle demande de tÃ©lÃ©chargement de vos donnÃ©es.Si vous souhaitez plus dâ€™informations Ã  propos du recueil, de lâ€™usage et du traitement de vos donnÃ©es personnelles, veuillez consulter la derniÃ¨re version de notreÂ Politique de ConfidentialitÃ© (nouvel onglet).

title: Why do I pay the church tax?
content: Weâ€™re legally required to request data relating to church tax deductions and to make the deductions where applicable. This happens every year from September 1st to October 31st.Youâ€™re entitled to appeal against the passing of information about your religious affiliation through anÂ ErklÃ¤rung zum Sperrvermerk (new tab)Â form. You can do this before June 30th each year. If you file an objection, your local tax office will request that you submit a church tax declaration yourself.Further information is available on the website of theÂ German Federal Central Office for Taxation (new tab).

title: How does N26 Business Metal work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs â‚¬16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate.Â Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Â Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Come scaricare i miei dati personali?
content: Il General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) Ã¨ un regolamento europeo in materia di protezione dei dati e della privacy entrato in vigore il 25 maggio 2018. In seguito all'introduzione di questo regolamento, abbiamo aggiunto unâ€™opzione nella nostraÂ webapp (nuova tabella)che ti permette di scaricare i tuoi dati con una procedura molto semplice: Il mio conto > Impostazioni personali > Dati personaliIl diritto alla portabilitÃ  dei dati secondo l'articolo 20 GDPR fa riferimento a dati precedentemente forniti e permette agli utenti di trasferire i propri dati ad un altro fornitore di servizi. Il GDPR richiede che i dati trasmessi con questa finalitÃ  siano in un formato leggibile elettronicamente (JSON file). Il tuo dispositivo potrebbe non supportare tale formato e, nel caso lo supportasse, ti preghiamo di notare che i dati sono salvati in modo da essere leggibili solo elettronicamente. In qualitÃ  di banca mobile, la sicurezza dei dati Ã¨ una nostra prioritÃ . Prima di permettere ai nostri clienti di scaricare i propri dati, verifichiamo l'autenticitÃ  dell'identitÃ  di chi effettua la richiesta di scaricare tali dati. Come scaricare i tuoi dati?Puoi richiedere di scaricare i dati personali che hai fornito per un conto N26 attualmente aperto oppure per un conto N26 giÃ  chiuso. I dati saranno forniti in un formato leggibile elettronicamente in modo da poterli trasferire a terze parti di tua scelta.Per clienti attualiAccedi alÂ modulo (nuova tabella)Â con i dati del tuo conto attuale.Da qui, Ã¨ necessario creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che invieremo allâ€™indirizzo e-mail registrato. Il link sarÃ  valido per 24 ore dal momento in cui riceverai l'email. Se viene inserita una password errata 5 volte consecutive, il link non sarÃ  piÃ¹ valido e sarÃ  necessario inviare una nuova richiesta di esportazione.Per ex clientiPuoi scaricare i tuoi dati personali anche dopo la data di chiusura del tuo conto. Per richiedere tali informazioni, completa ilÂ modulo (nuova tabella)Â di richiesta dati assicurandoti che le informazioni fornite corrispondano esattamente a quelle di accesso al tuo conto N26. Ti verranno richieste le seguenti informazioni:nome e cognome, numero e data di scadenza del documento dâ€™identitÃ  (documento identificativo nazionale o passaporto) utilizzato per la verifica il contoindirizzo e-mail del conto registratodata (mese e anno) di apertura e di chiusura del conto (controlla la tua posta elettronica)Ti preghiamo di notare che se un campo Ã¨ errato o incompleto, la richiesta non andrÃ  a buon fine.Da qui, sarÃ  necessario creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che invieremo allâ€™indirizzo e-mail registrato. Il link sarÃ  valido per 24 ore dal momento in cui hai ricevuto l'email. Se viene inserita una password errata 5 volte consecutive, il link non sarÃ  piÃ¹ valido e sarÃ  necessario inviare una nuova richiesta di esportazione.Per ulteriori informazioni riguardanti la raccolta, lâ€™utilizzo e il trattamento dei dati personali leggi la nostraÂ Informativa sulla privacy (nuova tabella)Â aggiornata (DEU (nuova tabella)) (EU (nuova tabella)).
