Para ello:Ve a Tarjetas.Si tienes varias tarjetas, desliza a la derecha hasta que encuentres la tarjeta que quieres.Pulsa Ajustes de la tarjeta.Desactiva Pagos contactless.Los cambios que lleves a cabo se aplicarÃ¡n de inmediato a la tarjeta que hayas escogido. Recuerda que estos ajustes se refieren a tu tarjeta fÃ­sica. Puedes consultar nuestros artÃ­culos monogrÃ¡ficos sobre cÃ³mo administrar tus ajustes de Google Pay y Apple Pay. Si estÃ¡s teniendo problemas con los pagos contactless de tu tarjeta, te rogamos que leas el siguiente artÃ­culo para saber cÃ³mo hacer que funcionen.

title: N26 peut-elle fermer mon compte ?
content:
N26 peut fermer votre compte dans des situations exceptionnelles.En tant que banque entiÃ¨rement agrÃ©Ã©e, N26 doit effectuer des contrÃ´les de routine sur les comptes utilisateurs. En tant quâ€™institution rÃ©glementÃ©e, cela nous permet de protÃ©ger les fonds des comptes N26.Parfois, les rÃ©sultats de ces contrÃ´les de routine peuvent exiger que nous mettions fin Ã  notre relation commerciale avec un titulaire de compte.Dans tous les cas, le titulaire du compte sera pleinement informÃ© de la situation par email. Dans tous les cas, N26 ne vous contactera quâ€™Ã  lâ€™adresse email associÃ©e Ã  votre compte N26. Des instructions claires sur les Ã©tapes Ã  suivre seront fournies dans cet email.Soyez toujours vigilant et vÃ©rifiez que cet email provient bien de N26. Nous ne vous contacterons toujours quâ€™Ã  lâ€™adresse email associÃ©e Ã  votre compte N26, jamais par SMS ou par tÃ©lÃ©phone portable, et nous ne vous demanderons jamais les dÃ©tails de votre compte N26, de votre mot de passe ou de vos donnÃ©es de carte.
Comment N26 peut-il fermer mon compte ?Nous pouvons Ãªtre amenÃ©s Ã  fermer votre compte de trois faÃ§ons (avec 2 mois de prÃ©avis, 14 jours ou immÃ©diatement). Ces clÃ´tures de compte sont dÃ©finitives : notre Service Client ne peut pas annuler cette dÃ©cision ni donner dâ€™informations sur les raisons des clÃ´tures de comptes. Vous pouvez Ã©galement fermer votre compte Ã  tout moment et sans raison. 2 mois de prÃ©avisNous avons le droit de mettre fin Ã  toute relation commerciale sans raison, en respectant un prÃ©avis de deux mois (voir Â§ 675h du Code Civil allemand et la section 19 paragraphe (1) de nosÂ Conditions GÃ©nÃ©rales (nouvel onglet). Vous pouvez Ã©galement mettre fin Ã  votre relation commerciale avec nous Ã  tout moment, de faÃ§on immÃ©diate et sans raison.14 jours de prÃ©avisNous pouvons Ã©galement mettre fin Ã  toute relation commerciale avec un prÃ©avis de 14 jours (voir la section 19, paragraphe 3) de nosÂ Conditions GÃ©nÃ©rales (nouvel onglet)Â si une raison pertinente est donnÃ©e Ã  cause dâ€™un non-respect des conditions contractuelles. Cela inclut mais n'est pas limitÃ© Ã  :Lâ€™utilisation dâ€™un compte personnel Ã  des fins professionnelles.Â ConformÃ©ment Ã  nos Conditions GÃ©nÃ©rales, un compte personnel doit uniquement Ãªtre utilisÃ© Ã  des fins privÃ©es. Tout virement liÃ© Ã  des activitÃ©s professionnelles de prestation de services et/ou de ventes de produits est considÃ©rÃ© comme une transaction professionnelle. Si vous nâ€™avez pas encore ouvert de compte, vous pouvez ouvrir un compte pour vos activitÃ©s professionnelles, veuillez donc ouvrir un compte N26 Business, N26 Business You ou N26 Business Metal.La communication dâ€™informations incorrectes ou insuffisantes aprÃ¨s un contrÃ´le de routine concernant votre compte ou une transaction.Â Nous sommes une banque et nous conduisons parfois des contrÃ´les de routines sur les transactions. Si vous nous transmettez des informations incorrectes et/ou insuffisantes, nous avons le droit de mettre fin Ã  notre relation commerciale afin de respecter les exigences des rÃ©gulations financiÃ¨res allemandes.Une conduite dÃ©placÃ©e envers les employÃ©s de N26.Â Nous ne tolÃ©rons aucun comportement abusif envers nos employÃ©s. Les menaces physiques ou abusives en gÃ©nÃ©ral peuvent Ãªtre considÃ©rÃ©es comme des infractions pÃ©nales conformÃ©ment aux lois allemandes et seront signalÃ©es aux autoritÃ©s concernÃ©es, sans aucune exception.ClÃ´ture de compte immÃ©diateNous pouvons Ã©galement mettre fin Ã  toute relation commerciale de faÃ§on exceptionnelle (voir la section 19, paragraphe (3) de nosÂ Conditions GÃ©nÃ©rales (nouvel onglet). Câ€™est-Ã -dire : Ã  tout moment, sans prÃ©avis, et sans dÃ©lai de rÃ©tractation, lorsquâ€™il y a une raison suffisante pour la clÃ´ture du compte :Si vous nous fournissez de fausses dÃ©clarations concernant votre situation financiÃ¨re, tout particuliÃ¨rement dans le cadre dâ€™une demande de crÃ©ditSi vous Ãªtes dans lâ€™impossibilitÃ© de rembourser votre prÃªt ou lâ€™argent que vous devez Ã  N26Si vous ne vous soumettez pas aux demandes de N26 concernant votre prÃªt (voir Constitution our renforcement de sÃ©curitÃ©, section 13 (2) de nosÂ Conditions GÃ©nÃ©rales (nouvel onglet)

title: Â¿CÃ³mo usar mi tarjeta digitalmente?
content: Ya puedes realizar compras con tu tarjeta antes de recibirla:Simplemente aÃ±ade tu tarjeta N26 a tu Apple Pay (pestaÃ±a nueva) o Google Pay (pestaÃ±a nueva) wallet para realizar compras en comercios que admitan este mÃ©todo de pago.Puedes usar tu cuenta N26 de inmediato habilitando esta funciÃ³n antes de que tu tarjeta llegue por correo, pero tambiÃ©n una vez que hayas recibido tu tarjeta y la hayas activado (pestaÃ±a nueva).Para aÃ±adir tu tarjeta a tu wallet (pestaÃ±a nueva), sigue estos pasos:Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta N26.Ve a 'Tarjetas'.Selecciona 'ConfiguraciÃ³n de la tarjeta' y desliza para seleccionar la tarjeta que deseas aÃ±adir.Selecciona 'AÃ±adir a Apple Pay' o 'AÃ±adir a Google Pay'Debes tener en cuenta:Esta funciÃ³n no estÃ¡ habilitada si pides tu tarjeta o pasas a un plan premium sin bloquear tu tarjeta actual. En estos casos, tu tarjeta actual seguirÃ¡ funcionando con 'Apple Pay' o 'Google Pay' hasta que actives tu nueva tarjeta.Â¿CÃ³mo ver los detalles completos de mi tarjeta en la app N26?Si necesitas los datos de tu tarjeta pero no la llevas contigo en este momento, no te preocupes. N26 te permite ver los detalles completos de tu tarjeta desde la app siempre que tengas una tarjeta activa y un dispositivo vinculado.Para ver tu tarjeta sigue estos pasos:Inicia sesiÃ³n en la app N26.Ve a 'Tarjetas'.Desde la lista de tarjetas, desliza hasta que veas la tarjeta que deseas usar.Pulsa 'InformaciÃ³n de la tarjeta'.Confirma con tu huella dactilar, reconocimiento facial o PIN de bloqueo del telÃ©fonoPodrÃ¡s ver los detalles completos de tu tarjeta durante 1 minuto. Ten en cuenta que no podrÃ¡s tomar capturas de pantalla mientras se muestran los detalles de tu tarjeta.

title: Come posso far accreditare lo stipendio sul mio conto N26?
content: Far accreditare il tuo stipendio sul tuo conto N26 Ã¨ molto semplice: basterÃ  fornire lâ€™IBAN al tuo datore di lavoro, il quale provvederÃ  a trasferire lâ€™importo sul tuo conto tramite bonifico SEPA.Nel caso in cui il tuo datore si rifiutasse di accreditare il tuo stipendio sul tuo conto N26 tramite bonifico SEPA perchÃ© lâ€™IBAN non ha caratteristiche italiane ma tedesche, sta violando una leggi l'articolo "cosa fare se il mio IBAN non viene accettato" del nostro Support Center per sapere cosa fare.

title: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
content:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.Â How does it work?Â The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?Â Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of AttorneyÂ Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a personâ€™s identity, and itâ€™s not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.Â As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.Â Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

title: Offenlegungsbericht nach CRR
content: Was ist das?Bei der KapitaladÃ¤quanzverordnung (CRR, Capital Requirements Regulation) handelt es sich um eine EU-Verordnung. Darin ist unter anderem geregelt, dass Kreditinstitute jÃ¤hrlich einen Offenlegungsbericht verÃ¶ffentlichen mÃ¼ssen (Artikel 433 CRR).Warum wird der Offenlegungsbericht nicht in unserem Support Center oder an einer anderen Stelle auf unserer Website verÃ¶ffentlicht?Die N26 Bank GmbH ist nicht dazu verpflichtet, den auf unserer Website zu verÃ¶ffentlichen. Artikel 434 CRR (neuen Tab) stellt Instituten frei, in welchem Medium sie ihren Offenlegungspflichten nachkommen wollen, weshalb die Entscheidung bei den einzelnen Kreditinstituten liegt.N26 Bank GmbH ihre nach CRR geforderte Offenlegung auf www.bundesanzeiger.de (neuen Tab) verÃ¶ffentlicht.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo abro una cuenta bancaria N26 Smart?
content: VÃ¡lido para EspaÃ±a, Alemania, Austria, BÃ©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, PaÃ­ses Bajos, Polonia, Portugal, Noruega, Suecia.Puedes suscribirte a N26 Smart durante tu registro inicial o cambiarte despuÃ©s a travÃ©s de la app mÃ³vil si tienes una cuenta bancaria estÃ¡ndar en N26.Si quieres pasarte a N26 Smart a travÃ©s de la app, solo tienes que ir a la pestaÃ±a Explorar y seleccionar Pasar a N26 Smart. Puedes escoger uno de estos cinco colores cuando pidas la tarjeta nueva: pomelo, ocÃ©ano, arena, aguamarina y grafito.A continuaciÃ³n, elige el tipo de envÃ­o (pestaÃ±a nueva) que prefieras, acepta los TÃ©rminos y Condiciones de N26 Smart y te enviaremos tu nueva tarjeta en cuanto haya dinero suficiente en la cuenta como para cubrir la primera mensualidad (4,90Â â‚¬).Los envÃ­os estÃ¡ndar tardan hasta 10 dÃ­as hÃ¡biles, mientras que los envÃ­os exprÃ©s (pestaÃ±a nueva) tardan 3 dÃ­as hÃ¡biles.El coste de la suscripciÃ³n (4,90Â â‚¬/mes) se cobrarÃ¡ directamente de la cuenta N26 cada mes en la fecha de contrataciÃ³n.Puedes pedir una tarjeta N26 Smart adicional por un pago Ãºnico de 10 â‚¬ a travÃ©s de la app de N26.

title: Come scaricare il Riepilogo delle spese
content: Il Riepilogo delle spese fa parte della Direttiva europea sui conti di pagamento che fornisce ai clienti di una banca la possibilitÃ  di accedere ad una panoramica delle commissioni relative ai servizi collegati al proprio conto.Il Riepilogo delle spese Ã¨ disponibile in qualsiasi momento per ognuno dei nostri clienti. Per clienti attuali, effettua l'accesso alla (nuova tabella)webapp (nuova tabella),Â poi clicca lâ€™icona di download e scorri fino a â€œRiepilogo delle speseâ€. Riceverai una email (dovrebbe impiegarci circa 5 minuti). Da li segui le istruzioni per scaricare il tuo Riepilogo delle Spese.Per ex clienti, Ã¨ possibile scaricare il Riepilogo delle speseÂ fino a 6 mesi dopo la data della chiusura del conto, attraverso il seguente modulo (nuova tabella).Avrai bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:Il tuo nome completo, il numero e la data di scadenza del tuo documento identificativo (carta d'identitÃ  o passaporto) che hai usato durante la verifica del tuo contol'indirizzo email associato al tuo contola data (mese e anno) in cui hai aperto e chiuso il tuo conto (controlla l'e-mail di verifica nella tua posta elettronica).Ti verrÃ  chiesto di creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che ti invieremo al tuo indirizzo email registrato. Questo link Ã¨ valido solo per 24 ore. Nota in oltre che, se la password verrÃ  inserita erroneamente per 5 volte, il link non sarÃ  piÃ¹ valido e dovrai effettuare una nuova richiesta.* Per conti Business - importi rimborsati non verranno mostrati.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasnâ€™t been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you donâ€™t have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000â‚¬,Â and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500â‚¬. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you canâ€™t withdraw your daily limit at once.

title: Wo bleibt meine RÃ¼ckerstattung?
content: Du wartest auf eine RÃ¼ckerstattung und fragst dich, wo sie bleibt? Vielleicht ist sie schon auf deinem Konto! In einigen FÃ¤llen wird deine RÃ¼ckerstattung nÃ¤mlich am Tag der ursprÃ¼nglichen Transaktion in der N26 App angezeigt â€“ und nicht zum Zeitpunkt der Erstattung. Scrolle im Home-Bereich deiner N26 App einfach in der Transaktionsliste nach unten oder prÃ¼fe deine KontoauszÃ¼ge, um deine RÃ¼ckerstattung zu finden. So kannst du deine (vorlÃ¤ufigen und vollstÃ¤ndigen) KontoauszÃ¼ge einsehen und als PDF herunterladen:In der Web App (neuen Tab):Klicke im Home-Bereich oben links neben dem â€œGeld erhaltenâ€ Button auf das Download-Symbol (Pfeil nach unten).Â Im Download-Bereich siehst du links eine Ãœbersicht mit deinen (vorlÃ¤ufigen) KontoauszÃ¼gen.Klicke auf den jeweiligen Monat, um deine KontoauszÃ¼ge herunterzuladen.Auf deinem Smartphone:Tippe im Home-Bereich oben neben der Lupe auf die drei vertikalen Linien.WÃ¤hle â€œKontoauszÃ¼geâ€ und tippe dann in der Liste auf den jeweiligen Monat, um deine KontoauszÃ¼ge herunterzuladenWie lange dauert eine RÃ¼ckerstattung bei N26?Wenn du die RÃ¼ckerstattung nicht finden kannst, ist sie mÃ¶glicherweise noch auf dem Weg. Eine regulÃ¤re RÃ¼ckerstattung einer Kartenzahlung dauert bis zu 12 Tage. Die Kaution fÃ¼r eine Autovermietung erhÃ¤ltst du nach maximal 30 Tagen zurÃ¼ck. Wie Kartenzahlungen genau funktionieren, kannst du in unserem Artikel nachlesen.Du hast nach 12 Tagen noch keine RÃ¼ckerstattung erhalten? Dann kannst du in deiner N26 App eine Reklamation starten. Folge dazu einfach dieser Anleitung.

title: Comment tÃ©lÃ©charger la confirmation dâ€™un virement SEPA ?
content: Si vous avez effectuÃ© un virement bancaire depuis votre compte N26 et que vous avez besoin dâ€™une confirmation de lâ€™envoi ou de la rÃ©ception, vous pouvez tÃ©lÃ©charger le fichier PDF contenant les donnÃ©es de la transaction depuis votre application mobile ou votre espace client en ligne. Pour cela :Connectez-vous Ã  lâ€™application N26Dans la liste de transactions, sÃ©lectionnez le virement bancaire pour lequel vous souhaitez tÃ©lÃ©charger la confirmation.Appuyez sur Â« TÃ©lÃ©charger une confirmation de virement Â».Une fois cette option choisie, le document sera automatiquement tÃ©lÃ©chargÃ© sur votre smartphone ou votre PC.Quelles donnÃ©es puis-je trouver dans la confirmation de virement ?Dans la confirmation de virement, vous trouverez les coordonnÃ©es bancaires de lâ€™expÃ©diteur et du bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire du virement, y compris le montant et la date de la transaction.

title: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
content:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.Iâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If youâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, youâ€™ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the â€˜Cardsâ€™ tab. You can mark the reason as â€œlostâ€ or â€œstolenâ€ based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, youâ€™ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).Â Â How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Hereâ€™s a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, youâ€™ll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods donâ€™t arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercardâ€™s chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery dateÂ 
In this scenario, Mastercardâ€™s chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place.Â You received a delivery, but it doesnâ€™t correspond with what you orderedÂ 
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didnâ€™t receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Hereâ€™s some guidance on what to say:Dear XX,Â I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction:Â Amount: â‚¬{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank.Â If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can helpâ€“â€“this is the fastest way to get your money back. Hereâ€™s a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them:Â Dear XX,Â I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below:Â Merchant name: {insert merchant name}Â Amount of original, authorized transaction: â‚¬{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: â‚¬{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward.Â The merchant told me that theyâ€™ve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still havenâ€™t received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction.Â How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. Thatâ€™s why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limitsâ€“â€“all right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a â€˜Discreet Mode (new tab)â€™ option to securely access your account in public.Â Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so youâ€™re always aware of whatâ€™s happening on your account. Plus, weâ€™re always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud.Â How does card fraud occur?Â A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM thatâ€™s been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if:Â You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchaseÂ Your online shopping account is hackedÂ Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud?Â Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banksÂ Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularlyÂ Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

title: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Smart?
content: Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: WÃ¤hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fÃ¼nf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.ZusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte!ZusÃ¤tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle Ã¼ber deine N26 App eine zusÃ¤tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Du kannst N26 Smart mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Wenn du mit N26 Smart liebÃ¤ugelst, beachte bitte unsere AGB (neuen Tab) sowie folgendes:Deine N26 Smart Mastercard hat keine PrÃ¤gung: Die Kartendetails, einschlieÃŸlich der Nummer, des CVV-Codes und des 10-stelligen Tokens sind auf der RÃ¼ckseite aufgedruckt.Wenn du von N26 Standard zu N26 Smart upgradest, wird die monatliche GebÃ¼hr von 4,90 â‚¬ wird beginnend mit dem Datum deines Upgrades jeden Monat direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste GebÃ¼hr 15 Tage nach der Verifizierung deiner IdentitÃ¤t eingezogen. Danach wird dir deine monatliche GebÃ¼hr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet. Wenn du also dein Konto gegen Monatsende erÃ¶ffnet hast, werden die ersten zwei MonatsgebÃ¼hren im Folgemonat abgebucht.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine PremiumgebÃ¼hr monatlich oder im Voraus fÃ¼r die nÃ¤chsten 6 Monate oder fÃ¼r 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich fÃ¼r die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig fÃ¼r den von dir gewÃ¼nschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt. Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Prepaid-Abrechnungsoptionen und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.

title: Why canâ€™t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content: To carry out real-time transactions such asÂ MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphoneâ€™s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someoneâ€™s contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you donâ€™t see your friendâ€™s name on MoneyBeam but you know theyâ€™re an N26 user, they most likely havenâ€™t made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored donâ€™t match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

title: PerchÃ© non posso accedere ad alcuni prodotti e servizi?
content: Collaboriamo con molti partner, pertanto, per alcuni prodotti e servizi, devi soddisfare anche i loro requisiti. I motivi piÃ¹ comuni per cui potresti non essere idoneo per determinati prodotti sono:Documenti d'identitÃ  scaduti o non supportati (ad esempio certi passaporti per la mancanza delle caratteristiche di sicurezza).Sei soggetto alle imposte negli Stati Uniti. In tal caso non potrai utilizzare determinati prodotti dâ€™investimento o di risparmio. Se non Ã¨ il tuo caso, contatta la nostra Assistenza clienti tramite chat, che verificherÃ  i dettagli del tuo conto. Potresti dover cambiare il tuo numero di telefono se inizia con un prefisso del Nord America (+1).Il prodotto o il servizio non Ã¨ ancora disponibile nel tuo Paese.

title: Come dichiarare il conto N26 nella mia dichiarazione dei redditi in Francia?
content: (si applica ai clienti residenti in Francia)Secondo il Codice generale delle imposte francese, tutti i residenti in Francia sono tenuti a dichiarare i conti bancari che hanno aperto, utilizzato o chiuso nell'anno di riferimento della dichiarazione dei redditi. Questo si applica anche al conto N26. Come procedere:nella dichiarazione dei redditi, constrassegna la casella Conto estero aperto, utilizzato o chiuso (8UU) (Compte Ã©tranger ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ©).Compila il modulo Cerfa nÂ° 3916 (nuova tabella) e allegalo alla dichiarazione dei redditi.Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni su questo articolo (nuova tabella) del nostro blog

title: Account in conjunction with Â§Â§ 30 ff. ZKG
content: The account ICW Â§Â§ 30 ff. ZKG is not our N26 standard account. The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6â‚¬ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists (new tab). If you donâ€™t have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request.Â Â Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto. To request a Basiskonto:Download the request form (new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.In the request form youâ€™ll find an attached coupon for legitimation at Deutsche Post AG. Go to your nearest Deutsch Post office, in order to prove your identity with the coupon.In addition, send us the completed and signed request via post to: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto KlosterstraÃŸe 62 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandOnce weâ€™ve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, weâ€™ll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs (new tab).You then send us your signed contract via post to our address.As soon as we receive the contract weâ€™ll open a Basiskonto for you. Youâ€™ll receive a notification.Why can't I get a Basiskonto?Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. Thatâ€™s the case if you:Live outside of a supported country.Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent.Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years.Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance.You didnâ€™t meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.Â

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26â€™s digital banking products, we will be making aÂ temporary limitationÂ to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month.Â UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet ourÂ requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

title: Quando arriverÃ  la mia carta?
content:
La consegna standard impiega fino a 15 giorni lavorativi ed Ã¨ gratuita, se si tratta della tua prima carta dopo l'apertura del conto (eccetto per N26 Standard) o l'aggiornamento ad una sottoscrizione premium.Per rimanere aggiornato sull'avanzamento della consegna, accedi alla schermata principale della tua app mobile N26.La consegna express impiega fino a 3 giorni lavorativi.
Oltre al banner nella schermata principale della tua app mobile N26, riceverai anche un'email con un link di tracciamento per rimanere aggiornato sull'andamento della spedizione della tua carta. Scopri di piÃ¹ nel nostro articolo dedicato alla consegna express (nuova tabella).Ti consigliamo di attendere che sia trascorso il tempo di consegna stimato prima di intraprendere ulteriori azioni. La tua prima carta dopo l'apertura del conto o dopo l'aggiornamento ad una sottoscrizione premium Ã¨ sempre gratuita. Per le carte che ordinerai successivamente potrebbe essere applicato un costo aggiuntivo (nuova tabella).Come assicurarti che la tua carta sia stata spedita1. Dovrai verificare la tua identitÃ  (nuova tabella) quando apri un conto N26. Assicurati di aver completato questo processo accedendo al tuo conto. Una volta completato questo passaggio, il tuo conto sarÃ  attivato e potrai ricevere la tua carta N26.2. Controlla i dettagli della spedizione: ğŸ‘¤ Il mio conto > Profilo > Indirizzi > Indirizzo di spedizione:L'indirizzo che indichi deve essere residenziale (i recapiti di attivitÃ  commerciali non sono accettati).Â Â Il tuo nome deve essere indicato sulla casella della posta: se fosse presente un nome diverso, aggiungilo alle informazioni sull'indirizzo nella tua app mobile.Â Inserisci il tuo codice di avviamento postale senza spazi.Â Se possibile, aggiungi il numero dell'edificio, il numero della tromba delle scale e il codice della porta alle informazioni aggiuntive sull'indirizzo nell'app mobile.Â Se il tuo indirizzo contiene caratteri speciali, contatta il nostro servizio clienti dall'app.Â Se ti trasferirai presto, considera l'opzione di consegna express e assicurati di selezionare il tuo nuovo indirizzo di residenza.
Nel caso in cui i tuoi dati fossero errati, aggiornali direttamente nell'app (nuova tabella) mobile.
Se quella che stai aspettando Ã¨ la tua prima carta N26, apri una chat dall'app mobile o dall'app web.
Se eri giÃ  in possesso di una carta attivata, puoi riordinarla direttamente nell'app.
3. La tua prima carta Ã¨ gratuita con N26 Smart, You e Metal. Con N26 Standard sarÃ  una carta virtuale gratuita (a meno che tu non scelga una carta fisica al costo di 10â‚¬). La tua carta verrÃ  prodotta e spedita a condizione che il saldo del tuo conto sia pari o superiore a 0 â‚¬ dopo l'addebito della commissione mensile. In caso di passaggio a un conto premium, la prima commissione verrÃ  addebitata immediatamente. Se hai aperto direttamente un conto premium, la prima commissione verrÃ  addebitata dopo aver trasferito abbastanza denaro sul tuo conto da coprire la commissione ma, al piÃ¹ tardi, 15 giorni in seguito alla convalida dell'identitÃ . Se dopo l'addebito della prima commissione il saldo del tuo conto Ã¨ negativo, dovrai trasferire denaro sul conto per avviare la produzione e la spedizione della tua carta.Ti verrÃ  inviata una notifica nell'app tramite i Messaggi e attraverso un banner nella schermata Home che mostrerÃ  i progressi nella consegna. Ti preghiamo di notare che:L'importo minimo una tantum non Ã¨ una commissione, ma un requisito necessario per avviare la produzione e la spedizione della tua carta.Per la consegna express la commissione Ã¨ di 25 â‚¬ e verrÃ  detratta dal tuo conto non appena la carta viene spedita. Assicurati che il saldo del tuo conto copra queste commissioni.Ricorda che:Il saldo minimo richiesto non Ã¨ una commissione, ma Ã¨ solo necessario per attivare la produzione e la consegna della tua carta.Â Per i titolari di conto premium: le prime quote mensili vengono addebitate il 15 Â° giorno dall'inizio della sottoscrizione e verranno addebitate sul tuo conto.Â Per la consegna express: la commissione di 20â‚¬ verrÃ  addebitata sul tuo conto non appena la carta verrÃ  spedita. Assicurati che il saldo del tuo conto sia sufficiente a coprire anche questa commissione.
Inizia a usare la tua carta anche prima che arrivi 
Anche prima che la tua carta sia consegnata per posta, potrai iniziare a usarla tramite il tuo wallet digitale Apple Pay o Google Pay. In questo modo potrai effettuare acquisti con il tuo smartphone presso i commercianti che supportano questo metodo di pagamento. 
Non hai ricevuto la tua carta entro i tempi previsti? 
Controlla la data di consegna stimata nella schermata principale dell'app N26 o dell'app Web. Se la data di consegna stimata Ã¨ stata superata, contattaci tramite live chat dall'app mobile o dall'app web.

title: How to get N26 Insurance?
content: The new on-demandÂ N26 InsuranceÂ allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the â€œInsuranceâ€ banner you find.Â You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp.Â How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim.Â Am I eligible?Â N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers canâ€™t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

title: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?
content: Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login Ã¼ber mindestens zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. ZusÃ¤tzlich zur Eingabe deines persÃ¶nlichen Passworts musst du deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch dein verknÃ¼pftes GerÃ¤t oder einen SMS-Code bestÃ¤tigen.Mehr zu diesem Thema erfÃ¤hrst du in unserem Artikel: PSD2 - Starke KundenauthentifizierungWenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t einloggst, musst du deinen Login-Versuch zusÃ¤tzlich bestÃ¤tigen. Das kannst du tun, indem du entweder eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t bestÃ¤tigst oder indem du einen SMS-Code anforderst, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.Wenn du dich von deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t in dein N26 Konto einloggst, liegt damit schon Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung vor. Das bedeutet, der Login-Prozess Ã¤ndert sich bei deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t nicht.Welche Voraussetzungen gibt es?Stell sicher, dass das Betriebssystem deines Handys auf dem neuesten Stand ist und die neueste Version der N26 App installiert ist. Falls du dich nicht mehr einloggen kannst, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, versuch bitte, dein Passwort zurÃ¼ckzusetzen. Falls du keinen Zugang mehr zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, kontaktiere uns bitte in unserem Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Was mache ich, wenn ich mein Passwort vergessen habe?Mehr Informationen darÃ¼ber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?Was mache ich, wenn mein Handy kaputt oder verloren gegangen ist?Wenn du keinen Zugang mehr zu deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten Handynummer hast, kannst du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen und zur Authentifizierung einen SMS-Code anfordern:Logge dich in die WebApp oder von einem nicht verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t einWenn du aufgefordert wirst, deinen Login-Versuch durch dein verknÃ¼pftes GerÃ¤t zu bestÃ¤tigen, wÃ¤hle HilfeWÃ¤hle SMS-Code schickenNachdem du den SMS-Code erhalten hast, gib ihn in der WebApp ein.Dadurch ist die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abgeschlossen und du kannst dein neues GerÃ¤t wieder mit deinem Konto verknÃ¼pfen.Was, wenn ich eine neue Handynummer habe oder aus anderen GrÃ¼nden keine SMS erhalte?Falls dir deine registrierte Handynummer nicht mehr zur VerfÃ¼gung steht - z.B. weil du eine neue hast oder dein Handy verloren gegangen ist oder gestohlen wurde - kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice im Live-Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Warum kann ich die neueste Version der N26 App nicht auf mein Handy herunterladen? Wenn du ein Ã¤lteres Smartphone benutzt, das die neueste Version der App nicht mehr unterstÃ¼tzt, kannst du dich mit diesem nicht mehr in die N26 App einloggen.Du kannst dennoch die WebApp benutzen, um Zugang zu deinem Konto zu erhalten. DafÃ¼r musst du deinen Login-Versuch mit einem SMS-Code bestÃ¤tigen, den wir dir an deine registrierte Handynummer schicken.Mit deiner Karte kannst du nach wie vor Geld abheben und Zahlungen tÃ¤tigen. Bitte beachte aber, dass du keine Ãœberweisungen ausfÃ¼hren und kein CASH26 mehr benutzen kannst, solange du diese in der N26 App nicht bestÃ¤tigen kannst.

title: Cosa sono i bonifici istantanei?
content: Tutti i clienti N26 ora hanno la possibilitÃ  di inviare bonifici istantanei. Al contrario dei normali bonifici SEPA, che vengono elaborati entro 2 giorni lavorativi, i bonifici istantanei vengono inviati e ricevuti nell'arco di pochi secondi.Bonifici istantanei puÃ² essere utile per inviare un bonifico urgente (occorrono circa 10 secondi), tuttavia verrÃ  applicata una commissione per i nostri clienti Standard che utilizzano questo servizio, che verrÃ  mostrata prima di confermare il bonifico. Quindi, se il pagamento puÃ² aspettare altri 2 giorni, un bonifico SEPA normale Ã¨ probabilmente la soluzione migliore. I nostri clienti premium possono usare bonifici istantanei senza commissioni.Nonostante sia istantaneo, questo tipo di bonifico puÃ² comunque subire ritardi dovuti a tempi di elaborazione, embarghi ecc. (proprio come un bonifico regolare), per cui Ã¨ sempre meglio effettuare pagamenti importanti, ad es. per cauzioni, acconti, con il giusto anticipo per evitare qualsiasi perdita finanziaria dovuta a eventuali ritardi.Come funziona?Per inviare un bonifici istantanei, basta effettuare l'accesso nella tua app mobile e selezionare Invia denaro dal mio conto > Bonifico bancario.DopodichÃ© ti verrÃ  chiesto di inserire il nome e l'IBAN del destinatario, aggiungere un messaggio.Seleziona poi Bonifico istantaneoIl bonifico verrÃ  elaborato e ricevuto entro circa 10 secondi.Attenzione: se la banca del destinatario non fa parte dello schema SCT per i pagamenti istantanei non potrai inviare questo tipo di bonifici.Informazione importante:Per i conti N26 Standard verrÃ  applicata una commissione per l'utilizzo di bonifici istantanei. La commissione viene addebitata subito dopo aver effettuato il bonifico come transazione separata e il suo importo varia a seconda del paese:Germania e Austria: 0,49 â‚¬Spagna: 1,99 â‚¬Italia, Francia e resto dellâ€™Europa: 0,99 â‚¬L'importo massimo che puoi inviare con un bonifico istantaneo Ã¨ 2.000 â‚¬, 5 volte al giorno per un massimo di 10.000 â‚¬ al giorno.Se utilizzi il bonifico istantaneo per un pagamento importante (cauzione, multa, acconto), ti consigliamo di inviare il pagamento in anticipo per evitare eventuali ritardi a causa di un possibile rifiuto o embargo.Se stai pagando per un prodotto o un servizio tramite bonifico istantaneo, assicurati che i dettagli e le credenziali del destinatario siano corretti prima di confermare la transazione. Fai sempre attenzione a possibili truffe.Ti preghiamo di notare che non tutte le banche hanno adottato lo schema per i bonifici istantanei. Se la banca del destinatario non partecipa allo schema, non ti sarÃ  possibile inviare il bonifico in maniera istantanea.

title: How can I pay bills and top-up my phone from the app?
content: Starting from the 1st of September, it will be possible for all the customers with Italian Terms and Conditions to pay postal bills, PagoPA, MAV / RAV, car tax and top-up their phone directly from their mobile app with the N26 debit card.This service is provided in collaboration with PayTipper SpA, a payment institution that has been a partner of the Enel X group since 2019.How to make payments to 3rd parties within the N26 mobile app:Log in to the N26 app and click on "Send money"Select "Other payments"In the menu, select the payment you want to make (Phone top-up, PagoPA, Postal bulletins, MAV or RAV, Car tax)You will then be redirected to the website of that service provider and will be able to perform the paymentThe service is not provided directly by N26 but by the 3rd party service providers. For this reason, by using this payment method, you will be subject to the processing of personal data, terms and conditions and any possible commissions not dependent on N26. In some cases the service might be offered only in Italian.If you need assistance with a payment or would like to receive a payment receipt, please get in contact with the customer support of the service provider you have chosen. Click here to get in touch with PayTipper (new tab)Below you can find customer support contacts for the main Italian network providers (please refer to the respective websites for opening hours and service costs):Vodafone: 190Tim: 187Wind Tre: 159Iliad: 177Kena Mobile: 181Ho.Mobile: 19.21.21

title: Come guadagnare soldi invitando amici in N26?
content: Dall'1 ottobre 2021 abbiamo iniziato a lavorare al miglioramento del nostro programma Invita un amico. Fino a che queste modifiche non saranno definitive, le informazioni a riguardo non saranno piÃ¹ disponibili sull'app. Gli inviti e le iscrizioni avvenuti prima dell'1 ottobre 2021 continueranno a essere ricompensati come prima. Attualmente non sappiamo dire con precisione quando torneremo ad offrire questa funzionalitÃ .

title: How to create a password?
content: If you forgot your password or want to change it, selectÂ Forgot?Â in the app orÂ Forgot your password? (new tab)Â in theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â during login. Weâ€™ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a â€œpassphraseâ€ rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase â€œhard to guess, easy to rememberâ€. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, youâ€™ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Residential address and taxes in France
content:
If you are currently living in France, you are most likely a French tax resident.Â In general, your tax residence is the country/jurisdiction in which you live.Â In some cases you may be a tax resident in more than one country/jurisdiction at the same time or not be a tax resident of FranceFor more information on tax residence, please consult your tax adviser or the OECD automatic exchange of information portal (new tab).If you have a tax residence outside France, we may be legally obliged to pass on certain information with respect to your financial accounts to the French tax authorities (Direction des Finances Publiques) and they may exchange this information with tax authorities of another jurisdiction or jurisdictions pursuant to intergovernmental agreements to exchange financial account information or local law.Â 
As a financial institution, we are not allowed to provide tax advice.Â Your personal tax advisor may be able to assist you in answering specific questions related to your tax residence. You can also find out more, including a list of jurisdictions that have signed agreements to automatically exchange information, along with details about the information being requested, on the OECD automatic exchange of information portal (new tab).
The Decree nÂ°2016-1683 in date of December 5th, 2016 based on the OECD Common Reporting Standard (â€œCRSâ€) requires N26 France to collect and report to the French tax authorities (Direction des Finances Publiques) certain information about an account holder whose has a tax residence outside of France.Â Each jurisdiction has its own rules for defining tax residence, and jurisdictions have provided information on how to determine if you are resident in the jurisdiction on the following website: OECD AEOI Portal (new tab).Â

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs â‚¬9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if youâ€™re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: How to use my card digitally?
content: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

title: What is a N26 Standard Account?
content: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of â‚¬50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional â‚¬10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least â‚¬10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

title: PerchÃ© N26 fa controlli sulle transazioni?
content: N26 ha la responsabilitÃ  di effettuare controlli su conti e transazioni per garantire la sicurezza del tuo conto corrente (vediÂ GwG Â§ 10 (nuova tabella)). Questi controlli vengono avviati automaticamente dal nostro sistema.In seguito a questi controlli, potremmo chiederti di fornire alcuni documenti. In tal caso, sarÃ  sufficiente inviare quanto richiesto tramite Messaggi da N26. Non ci sono eccezioni o modi per evitare questi controlli. Si tratta di una procedura bancaria di routine ed Ã¨ finalizzata a garantire la sicurezza dei nostri clienti. Procedura ed esiti di questi controlli sono confidenziali e gestiti internamente. Qui di seguito troverai alcuni suggerimenti per velocizzare la procedura:Nell'email che riceverai da N26 verrÃ  specificato quale documento occorre inviare. Accettiamo screenshot, fotografie o scansioni di documenti. Assicurati che il contenuto originale del documento sia leggibile e di allegare una descrizione dettagliata di quanto richiesto Sii preciso nelle tue risposte, nei dettagli e nei documenti. Se quanto inviato non dovesse rispondere ai nostri requisiti, potremmo richiedere ulteriori chiarimenti. In tal caso, la procedura avrÃ  una durata maggiore. Invia quanto richiesto in risposta alla nostra email il prima possibile o, comunque, entro la scadenza indicata. Il nostro servizio clienti non ha alcuna informazione aggiuntiva su questo argomento.Fornisci documentazione in corso di validitÃ .Ecco alcuni esempi:Hai ricevuto aiuto finanziario dalla tua famiglia per completare progetti o hai ereditato terreno o denaro da un familiare deceduto: puoi fornire un documento ufficiale che attesti un prestito, un finanziamento, un'ereditÃ  (es. documento di vendita di proprietÃ  per finanziare il prestito oppure l'estratto conto di un garante).Hai venduto una proprietÃ  o le tue azioni in borsa: puoi fornire la documentazione attestante il trasferimento della proprietÃ  oppure la vendita delle azioni.Hai inviato o ricevuto denaro per pagare utenze o comprare un prodotto: puoi fornire un estratto conto che attesti la provenienza del denaro oppure altra documentazione che attesti l'uso del denaro e la finalitÃ .Hai ricevuto un pagamento dal tuo precedente datore di lavoro: puoi fornire un documento che attesti la natura del pagamento e ulteriori prove sul rapporto terminato.

title: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
content: No problem, we got your back!Â If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.Â If you havenâ€™t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card.Â My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?

title: How much does an N26 account cost?
content: An N26 bank account is free (new tab).*Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:Pricing in Germany (new tab)Pricing in Austria (new tab)Pricing in France (new tab)Pricing in Spain (new tab)Pricing in Italy (new tab)Pricing in the rest of Europe (new tab)*If weâ€™re not able to offer you an N26 account based on ourÂ minimum requirements (new tab), you may be able to open anÂ N26 Flex account.

title: What is a Virtual Card?
content: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account youâ€™ll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10â‚¬ to activate the card).Â An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10â‚¬ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on â€˜Get an additional cardâ€™.Select â€˜Virtualâ€™ at the top, then tap â€˜Chooseâ€™ at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap â€˜Generate virtual cardâ€™.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect â€˜cardsâ€™Locate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select â€˜card detailsâ€™You will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

title: PerchÃ© N26 Ã¨ sicuro?
content: Per proteggere il tuo conto, utilizziamo unâ€™architettura di sicurezza a 3 livelli:Accesso sicuro.Â I dati di accesso dellâ€™app mobile e dellaÂ WebApp (nuova tabella)Â sono costituiti da un nome utente e una password o dal riconoscimento delle impronte digitali/del volto (a seconda dello smartphone). Scegli unaÂ password sicuraÂ e non rivelare i tuoi dati di accesso a nessuno.PIN di conferma.Â Questo codice a 4 cifre Ã¨ necessario ogni volta che invii un bonifico, un MoneyBeam o quando associ/disassoci il tuo smartphone. Dovrai impostarlo la prima volta dopo aver collegato lo smartphone al conto e puoiÂ modificarloÂ da solo nellâ€™app.Messaggi push.Â Per ogni pagamento in entrata e in uscita, verrÃ  inviato un messaggio push allo smartphone collegato. Viene utilizzato anche per confermare e finalizzare le tue transazioni. Abbiamo anche implementato 3D Secure per proteggerti dalle frodi online con carta.Ogni volta ci contatti ti chiederemo alcune domande di sicurezza per assicurarci che tu sia realmente l'intestatario del conto. Non ti chiederemo mai il numero della tua carta di debito, il codice di sicurezza della carta (CVV), password, o il tuo PIN della carta o di conferma.Abbiamo anche fatto progressi per proteggere i tuoi dati:Â custodiamoÂ meno informazioni possibili su di te, solo finchÃ¨ siamo legalmente obbligati, e cancelliamo i dati quando non sono piÃ¹ richiesti per un prodotto o un servizio. PuoiÂ scaricare i tuoi dati personaliÂ fino a 6 mesi dopo aver chiuso il tuo conto. Puoi trovare piÃ¹ informazioni sulla nostraÂ politica di privacy (nuova tabella).

title: Cos'Ã¨ un tentativo di login sospetto?
content: PerchÃ© ho ricevuto questa email?Per noi di N26, la sicurezza Ã¨ la massima prioritÃ . Quando il nostro sistema rileva un tentativo di login insolito, ti avvisiamo immediatamente in modo da poter intraprendere delle misure per mettere al sicuro il tuo conto. Se hai ricevuto un avviso e credi che qualcunâ€™altro abbia tentato di accedere al tuo conto, ti basterÃ  reimpostare velocemente la tua password. Se il tentativo di login mostrato nell'avviso fosse il tuo, puoi semplicemente ignorare il messaggio.Come ripristinare la password?Puoi ripristinare la tua password accedendo al tuo account tramite app o WebApp, andando poi su Il mio conto â†’ Impostazioni â†’ Sicurezza.Se non riesci ad accedere al tuo conto, clicca su Password dimenticata sulla schermata di login. A questo punto, non dovrai fare altro che inserire il tuo indirizzo email e richiedere un link di ripristino della password.Quando scegli una nuova password, ti ricordiamo di non riutilizzare le password su piÃ¹ piattaforme; ti preghiamo di assicurarti di utilizzare una password unica per ogni tuo account. Lâ€™utilizzo di una password giÃ  usata in precedenza o poco sicura puÃ² causare la violazione del tuo profilo.Quando devo contattare il Supporto Clienti?Dopo aver ricevuto un'email di notifica su un login insolito, dovresti preoccuparti della sicurezza del tuo conto. Ci teniamo a rassicurarti, tuttavia, che cambiare la tua password Ã¨ una misura sufficiente per garantire che il tuo account rimanga protetto. Se vuoi discutere di questo argomento con uno dei nostri esperti, il nostro team di Supporto Clienti Ã¨ a tua disposizione.

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 ofÂ Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, pleaseÂ contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didnâ€™t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
content: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost.Â How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement
