Comment savoir quel est mon code PIN ?
content: Tout dâ€™abord, chez N26, il existe deux codes PIN : le code de validation et le code PIN de votre carte. L'avantage, c'est que vous crÃ©ez vous-mÃªme ces deux codes.Le code de validation (nouvel onglet) est utilisÃ© pour confirmer toutes les actions effectuÃ©es dans lâ€™application N26, comme les virements, les changements de mot de passe, CASH26, etc. Une fois votre tÃ©lÃ©phone synchronisÃ©, vous pouvez dÃ©finir votre code de validation depuis lâ€™application N26.Vous pouvez le modifier Ã  tout moment depuis la rubrique Mon compte > SÃ©curitÃ© > Changer le code de validation.Le code PIN de votre carte (nouvel onglet) est celui que vous utilisez pour effectuer des retraits et faire des achats avec votre carte N26. Une fois votre carte N26 activÃ©e, vous pouvez le dÃ©finir depuis lâ€™application N26 (si vous n'avez pas encore activÃ© votre carte, rendez-vous ici (nouvel onglet)).Vous pouvez changer votre code PIN dans Cartes > ParamÃ¨tres de la carte > RÃ©initialiser le code PIN. AprÃ¨s avoir dÃ©fini votre nouveau code PIN, vous devrez d'abord effectuer un retrait Ã  un guichet automatique pour que le changement de code PIN soit enregistrÃ© (comme lorsque vous activez votre carte pour la premiÃ¨re fois).Important :Nous ne vous enverrons jamais de code PIN par voie postale ou lâ€™un de nos canaux de communication. Vous Ãªtes la seule personne Ã  devoir connaÃ®tre vos codes PIN.Pour des raisons de sÃ©curitÃ©, les codes de validation composÃ©s des Ã©lÃ©ments de votre date de naissance, de votre adresse, de rÃ©pÃ©titions de chiffres ou de suites de chiffres (par exemple, 1111, 1994, 1331, or 1234) ne sont pas acceptÃ©s. Si le code que vous avez choisi est refusÃ©, nous vous invitons Ã  essayer une combinaison de chiffres diffÃ©rente.Pour plus dâ€™informations sur ces codes PIN, consultez les articles du Support Center avec les liens ci-dessus.

title: Pour quelles raisons nâ€™ai-je pas encore reÃ§u ma prime de parrainage?
content: Une fois que votre ami aura bien rempli toutes lesÂ conditions nÃ©cessaires Ã  l'attribution de la prime de parrainage, nous vÃ©rifierons la validitÃ© de votre invitation. Vous pouvez suivre le statut de vos invitations depuis votre application N26 mobile ou sur sa version web.Dans la plupart des cas, si vous nâ€™avez pas encore reÃ§u votre prime, cela signifie que votre ami nâ€™a pas encore activÃ© ou utilisÃ© sa Mastercard Transaction dâ€™un montant Ã©gal ou supÃ©rieur Ã  celui de la rÃ©compense. Par exemple, pour une rÃ©compense de 15 â‚¬, la transaction par carte doit Ãªtre de 15 â‚¬ ou plus. Assurez-vous dâ€™avoir bien expliquÃ© ces conditions Ã  votre ami pour Ãªtre sÃ»r de recevoir votre prime.La vÃ©rification de lâ€™Ã©ligibilitÃ© de votre parrainage et le versement de votre prime peuvent Ãªtre effectuÃ©s dans un dÃ©lai de 60 jours ouvrÃ©s.N26 se rÃ©serve le droit de ne pas attribuer de prime de parrainage en cas de suspicion dâ€™activitÃ©s qui violeraient lesÂ Conditions dâ€™utilisation du programme de parrainage (nouvel onglet).

title: How to contact N26?
content:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Donâ€™t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you donâ€™t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while youâ€™re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We wonâ€™t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.Â

title: How to protect my account?
content: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, itâ€™s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
content: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you.Â This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

title: How to close my account?
content: Weâ€™re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. Weâ€™d love to keep you as a customerâ€”tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account.Â If youâ€™ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, hereâ€™s what to do:Make your account balance â‚¬0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is â‚¬0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). Youâ€™ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or youâ€™re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or â€œas soon as possibleâ€Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, weâ€™ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

title: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
content:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn ich meinen Dispo oder mein Darlehen nicht zurÃ¼ckzahlen kann?
content: Wir bieten RÃ¼ckzahlungsplÃ¤ne an, wenn du deinenÂ DispoÂ oder dein Darlehen mitÂ N26 CreditÂ nicht zurÃ¼ckzahlen kannst. Das kann passieren, wenn dein Dispo storniert wurde oder du mehr als zwei Monate gebraucht hast, um deinen negativen Saldo auszugleichen.So geht es: Chatte mit uns und schlage einen detaillierten Plan vor, wie du deinen Dispokredit oder dein Darlehen in Raten zurÃ¼ckzahlen willst, z. B. jeden Monat einen bestimmten Betrag, bis dein Darlehen abbezahlt ist. Es ist nicht mÃ¶glich, einfach den Gesamtbetrag zu einem spÃ¤teren Zeitpunkt zurÃ¼ckzuzahlen.Bitte beachte, dass wir dir keinen RÃ¼ckzahlungsplan anbieten kÃ¶nnen, wenn dein Konto bereits geschlossen ist.Wir werden dann entweder akzeptieren, ablehnen oder einen alternativen Plan vorschlagen. Es liegt dann an dir, diesem zuzustimmen.Ãœbrigens: Dein Konto wird geschlossen, wenn es Ã¼ber einen lÃ¤ngeren Zeitraum im Soll ist. Alle KÃ¼ndigungsdaten sind endgÃ¼ltig, es sei denn, du zahlst dein Darlehen vor diesem Datum zurÃ¼ck. Wenn nicht, wird der Fall an ein InkassobÃ¼ro weitergeleitet.Obiges gilt nur fÃ¼r Kredite mit N26. FÃ¼r Kredite von auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) oder Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) wende dich bitte direkt an den jeweiligen Partner.

title: Wie lege ich eine Beschwerde ein?
content: Brauchst du Hilfe oder hast du eine Frage?Â Wenn du Hilfe mit deinem Konto benÃ¶tigst, eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren willst oder persÃ¶nliche Daten aktualisieren willst, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter!Eine Beschwerde einreichenWir bedauern, dass du eine Beschwerde einreichen mÃ¶chtest. Wir werden dein Anliegen prÃ¼fen und dir unsere Ergebnisse und die endgÃ¼ltige Antwort per E-Mail Ã¼bermitteln.Unser Kundenservice kann dir beim Einreichen einer Beschwerde per Live-Chat behilflich sein. MÃ¶chtest du die Beschwerde jedoch per E-Mail einreichen, schreibe bitte an eine der folgenden E-Mail-Adressen in deiner bevorzugten Sprache:Deutsch beschwerden@n26.com (neuen Tab)Englisch complaints@n26.com (neuen Tab)Bitte beachte: Diese Adressen sind lediglich fÃ¼r die Einreichung einer Beschwerde gedacht. FÃ¼r Kundenanfragen bitten wir dich, den Kundenservice (neuen Tab) zu kontaktieren. Unser Kundenservice ist tÃ¤glich fÃ¼r dich da und kann dein Problem schnell lÃ¶sen.Wenn du eine Beschwerde einreichst, benÃ¶tigen wir folgende Informationen von dir:Das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung, mit dem bzw. mit derÂ  du nicht zufrieden bistEine Beschreibung des Sachverhalts und wann das Problem aufgetreten istDu kannst auch Unterlagen einreichen, die im Zusammenhang mit deiner Beschwerde stehenÂ Das gewÃ¼nschte Ergebnis der BeschwerdeWir kÃ¶nnen kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur an die E-Mail-Adresse Ã¼bermitteln, die mit deinem N26-Konto verknÃ¼pft ist.Â Wird die Beschwerde durch einen Vertreter eingereicht, muss ihr auch ein spezielles notariell beglaubigtes Vollmachtsformular beigefÃ¼gt sein.Bitte kontaktiere uns via App oder per E-Mail, da wir dir nicht helfen kÃ¶nnen, wenn du unser BÃ¼ro aufsuchst. Falls du uns nicht via App oder per E-Mail kontaktieren kannst, schicke uns bitte eine schriftliche Beschwerde (per Brief) an folgende Adresse:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWir bestÃ¤tigen dir den Erhalt deiner Beschwerde per E-Mail und prÃ¼fen anschlieÃŸend den Sachverhalt. Sofern wir weitere Informationen von dir benÃ¶tigen, wird sich unser Complaint Management Team direkt per E-Mail an dich wenden und dir erklÃ¤ren, welche Informationen wir zusÃ¤tzlich brauchen. Sobald unser Team dein Anliegen geprÃ¼ft hat, teilen wir dir per E-Mail eine endgÃ¼ltige Entscheidung mit.Bearbeitungszeit einer BeschwerdeAlle Beschwerden, die Zahlungsdienste wie Ãœberweisungen und Kartentransaktionen betreffen, werden innerhalb von 15 Werktagen gemÃ¤ÃŸ der EuropÃ¤ischen Richtlinie Ã¼ber Zahlungsdienste II (PSD2) gelÃ¶st. Falls wir mehr Zeit bei der Bearbeitung deiner Beschwerde benÃ¶tigen, dann werden wir dich darÃ¼ber informieren. Wir mÃ¼ssen dich innerhalb von 35 Werktagen Ã¼ber unsere Entscheidung informieren.FÃ¼r alle anderen Beschwerden gelten unterschiedliche Fristen. Diese sind abhÃ¤ngig von den AGB jenes Landes, in dem du dein N26-Konto erÃ¶ffnet hast.Â Deutschland und Ã–sterreich - 15 WerktageAndere europÃ¤ische LÃ¤nder - 15 WerktageIrland - 40 WerktageFrankreich - 56 KalendertageVereinigtes KÃ¶nigreich - 56 KalendertageSpanien - 60 KalendertageItalien - 60 KalendertageWenn wir keine Antwort von dir erhalten, schlieÃŸen wir mÃ¶glicherweise deine Beschwerde. Wenn du dich zu einem spÃ¤teren Zeitpunkt wieder meldest, erstellen wir einen neuen Fall und teilen dir die neue Referenznummer fÃ¼r deine Beschwerde mit.Wenn du mit dem Ausgang deiner Beschwerde unzufrieden bistSolltest du mit der von uns angebotenen LÃ¶sung nicht zufrieden sein, hast du die MÃ¶glichkeit, dich an eine unabhÃ¤ngige dritte Instanz zu wenden. Es stehen dir beispielsweise folgende Schlichtungsstellen zur VerfÃ¼gung:die Schlichtungsstelle der Deutschen Bundesbankdie Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin)Eine vollstÃ¤ndige Liste von Streitbeilegungs- und Schlichtungsstellen findest du in unserem Imprint (neuen Tab).

title: Wie kann ich meine Karte sperren?
content: Du kannst deine Karten jederzeit in der App sperren und entsperren. Tippe bzw. klicke im Homescreen auf Karten wÃ¤hle dann Karteneinstellungen aus. Dort kannst du entscheiden, ob du deine Abhebungen am Geldautomaten, Online- und Auslandszahlungen vorÃ¼bergehend einschrÃ¤nken, deaktivieren oder deine Karte komplett sperren mÃ¶chtest. So hast du die volle Kontrolle Ã¼ber deine Karte und kannst dich vor unberechtigten Transaktionen schÃ¼tzen. Du solltest deine Karte sofort sperren, wenn dir etwas verdÃ¤chtig vorkommt. Du kannst sie spÃ¤ter jederzeit wieder entsperren. Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

title: Warum funktioniert meine Foto-Verifizierung nicht?
content: â„¹ï¸Â gilt fÃ¼r alle Regionen auÃŸer DeutschlandVergewissere dich zuerst, ob deine Ortungsdienste aktiviert sind. Dann sieh dir diese kurzeÂ Anleitung (neuen Tab) an, in der wir dir erklÃ¤ren wie du das perfekte Foto machst. Die meistenÂ Foto-VerifizierungenÂ scheitern an einer schlechten BildqualitÃ¤t.FÃ¼hre den Prozess in einer hellen Umgebung durch und verwende ein Smartphone mit einer guten Kamera.Falls du ein Android-GerÃ¤t verwendest, gehe sicher dass der Auto-Fokus richtig eingestellt ist.Schalte den Blitz aus. Nimm das Selfie auf AugenhÃ¶he auf.Stelle sicher, dass du die einzige Person auf dem Foto bist.ÃœberprÃ¼fe dein Ausweisdokument.Wir akzeptieren nur Fotos deines Originalausweises (Kopien oder Screenshots sind nicht zulÃ¤ssig).Lege deinen Ausweis auf eine ebene OberflÃ¤che und stelle sicher, dass er vollstÃ¤ndig sichtbar ist und die Ausweisdaten gut lesbar sind.Wir kÃ¶nnen nur nationale Ausweise und ReisepÃ¤sse akzeptieren (FÃ¼hrerscheine oder Aufenthaltsgenehmigungen sind nicht zulÃ¤ssig).Stelle sicher, dass dein Ausweisdokument unbeschÃ¤digt ist.Wenn du deinen Ausweis abfotografiert und das Selfie gemacht hast, aber der erste Versuch fehlschlÃ¤gt, kannst du einfach nochmal von vorne anfangen.Sobald deine IdentitÃ¤tsprÃ¼fung abgeschlossen ist, senden wir dir deine N26 Mastercard zu. Die Lieferzeit betrÃ¤gt 10 Tage.Du erreichst uns im Chat von Montag bis Sonntag von 07:00-23:00 Uhr.

title: Suis-je imposable aux Ã‰tats-Unis ?
content:
En tant que banque dÃ©tentrice dâ€™une licence bancaire, nous sommes tenus de communiquer directement Ã  l'â€Internal Revenue Serviceâ€ (IRS). Nous leurs fournissons des renseignements sur les comptes bancaires dÃ©tenus par les contribuables amÃ©ricains, conformÃ©ment au FATCA. Cette loi a Ã©tÃ© Ã©tablie par le dÃ©partement du TrÃ©sor amÃ©ricain et l'IRS pour favoriser une meilleure conformitÃ© fiscale. Elle empÃªche les ressortissants amÃ©ricains de recourir aux banques et autres organismes financiers Ã©trangers pour Ã©viter de payer lâ€™impÃ´t sur le revenu et les actifs.
Vous trouverez plus dâ€™informations Ã  propos du FATCA ici (nouvel onglet).Â 
Dans le cadre du FATCA, un ressortissant amÃ©ricain est dÃ©fini comme :Un citoyen des Etats-Unis (y compris les binationaux)Un rÃ©sident des Etats-Unis, par exemple en tant que titulaire d'une carte verte en cours de validitÃ© ou en tant que personne ayant rÃ©ussi le "Substantial Presence Test" (voir ci-dessous).
Si vous n'Ãªtes pas certain de savoir si vous Ãªtes un ressortissant des Etats-Unis, veuillez consulter un conseiller fiscal.
â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ signifie:Que vous avez Ã©tÃ© physiquement prÃ©sent aux Ã‰tats-Unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours de l'annÃ©e civile en coursOUQue vous avez Ã©tÃ© physiquement prÃ©sent aux Ã‰tats-Unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours des trois derniÃ¨res annÃ©es civiles :
(31 jours ou plus dans l'annÃ©e civile en cours) + (le nombre de jours de prÃ©sence physique aux Ã‰tats-Unis l'annÃ©e derniÃ¨re) divisÃ© par 3 + (le nombre de jours de prÃ©sence physique aux Ã‰tats-Unis l'avant-derniÃ¨re annÃ©e) divisÃ© par 6.
De plus, si votre compte prÃ©sente l'une des caractÃ©ristiques suivantes :CitoyennetÃ© ou rÃ©sidence aux Ã‰tats-UnisLieu de naissance aux Ã‰tats-UnisAdresse postale ou de rÃ©sidence aux Ã‰tats-Unis, y compris les boÃ®tes postalesNumÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone aux Ã‰tats-UnisOrdres de virements permanents ou paiements rÃ©currents Ã  un compte domiciliÃ© aux Ã‰tats-Unis
Dans ce cas nous sommes obligÃ©s de vous considÃ©rer comme ressortissant des Etats-Unis, Ã  moins que vous ne nous transmettiez les documents suivants :Â Un formulaire d'auto-certification W-8BEN ou un document similaire agrÃ©Ã©, etUn passeport ou une autre piÃ¨ce d'identitÃ© dÃ©livrÃ©e par un autre gouvernement attestant votre citoyennetÃ© ou de votre nationalitÃ© dans un pays autre que les Ã‰tats-Unis.Si vous Ãªtes nÃ© aux Ã‰tats-Unis, merci de nous transmettre une copie de votre certificat de perte de nationalitÃ©.

To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's (new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. If you upgrade to N26 You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: Come posso cambiare il mio numero di telefono?
content: Ãˆ importante tenere i propri dati personali aggiornati, come per esempio, il tuo numero di telefono, necessario per associare il tuo smartphone o per inviare e ricevere trasferimenti via MoneyBeam. Ecco come puoi aggiornarlo nella tua app:Vai a ğŸ‘¤ Il mio Conto > Profilo > Informazioni personaliPer aggiornare il tuo numero di telefono nell'app, dovrai usare lo smartphone associato al tuo conto.

title: What to do if my account may be compromised?
content:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab).Â If youâ€™d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. Weâ€™ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that weâ€™ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if Iâ€™ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe.Â What if Iâ€™ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one.Â Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: Warum ist mein Online-Einkauf fehlgeschlagen?
content: Manche Online-Zahlungen mÃ¼ssen per Push-Nachricht bestÃ¤tigt werden. Im Folgenden findest du eine Ãœbersicht Ã¼ber die mÃ¶glichen Ursachen fÃ¼r eine fehlgeschlagene Online-Zahlung und wie du sie beheben kannst.Du kannst nur so viel Geld ausgeben wie du auf deinem Konto hast. Zahle Geld auf dein Konto ein oder beantrage einen Dispokredit, um Ã¼ber genug Guthaben zu verfÃ¼gen.Falls du eine Online-Zahlung per Push-Nachricht bestÃ¤tigen musst, stelle sicher, dass dein Smartphone verknÃ¼pft ist. Du kannst Zahlungen nur auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t bestÃ¤tigen.Falls du die Push-Nachricht fÃ¼r die Zahlungen innerhalb von 5 Minuten nicht bestÃ¤tigen konntest, starte den Bezahlvorgang noch mal.Bitte beachten: die Push-Benachrichtigung wird nur an das verknÃ¼pfte Smartphone gesendet.ÃœberprÃ¼fe deine Karteneinstellungen. Online- und Auslandszahlungen mÃ¼ssen aktiviert sein.Stelle sicher, dass du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast. Falls du die Zahlung per WLAN nicht abschlieÃŸen kannst, benutze deine mobilen Daten und versuche es erneut.Falls du iOS benutzt, deaktiviere den Nicht-StÃ¶ren-Modus.Deaktiviere alle Adblocker in deinem Browser.Wenn du Probleme hast, mit deiner Karte zu zahlen, kannst du folgende Schritte befolgen, um eine Fehlerbehebung durchzufÃ¼hren:Geh in die Karteneinstellungen, der Karte mit der du etwas zahlen mÃ¶chtestSetzte alle Limits auf 0 EUR und deaktiviere online und AuslandszahlungenSperre deine KarteLog dich aus der app aus und anschlieÃŸend wieder einEntsperre deine KarteSetze deine Limits wieder auf die alte VerfÃ¼gungWarte 5 Minuten und versuche erneut zu zahlenSolltest du anschlieÃŸend weitere Probleme mit der Zahlung haben gibt es folgende MÃ¶glichkeiten:Ein Sicherheitsmechanismus ist angesprungen und du musst bis zu 12 Stunden warten beim gleichen HÃ¤ndler eventuell bis zu 24 Stunden, bis du deine Karte wieder verwenden kannst.Â Es besteht auch die MÃ¶glichkeit, dass die Transaktion nicht von unserer Seite zurÃ¼ckgewiesen wurde. In diesem Fall hat entweder der Zahlungspartner deine Karte abgelehnt oder konnte keine Verbindung mit unserem System herstellen.Â Um dies auszuschlieÃŸen kannst du uns gerne kontaktieren.Gut zu wissen:Â Die Maestro-Karte kann nicht fÃ¼r Online-Zahlungen verwendet werden.Â Falls der Betrag auf der Website des Anbieters von dem Betrag in der Push-Mitteilung abweicht, kann das an Kursschwankung bei der Umrechnung einer FremdwÃ¤hrung in Euro liegen.Falls du dennoch Probleme mit der Online-Zahlung hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking. (neuen Tab)

title: Residential address and taxes in France
content:
If you are currently living in France, you are most likely a French tax resident.Â In general, your tax residence is the country/jurisdiction in which you live.Â In some cases you may be a tax resident in more than one country/jurisdiction at the same time or not be a tax resident of FranceFor more information on tax residence, please consult your tax adviser or the OECD automatic exchange of information portal (new tab).If you have a tax residence outside France, we may be legally obliged to pass on certain information with respect to your financial accounts to the French tax authorities (Direction des Finances Publiques) and they may exchange this information with tax authorities of another jurisdiction or jurisdictions pursuant to intergovernmental agreements to exchange financial account information or local law.Â 
As a financial institution, we are not allowed to provide tax advice.Â Your personal tax advisor may be able to assist you in answering specific questions related to your tax residence. You can also find out more, including a list of jurisdictions that have signed agreements to automatically exchange information, along with details about the information being requested, on the OECD automatic exchange of information portal (new tab).
The Decree nÂ°2016-1683 in date of December 5th, 2016 based on the OECD Common Reporting Standard (â€œCRSâ€) requires N26 France to collect and report to the French tax authorities (Direction des Finances Publiques) certain information about an account holder whose has a tax residence outside of France.Â Each jurisdiction has its own rules for defining tax residence, and jurisdictions have provided information on how to determine if you are resident in the jurisdiction on the following website: OECD AEOI Portal (new tab).Â

title: Wie kann ich zu N26 You upgraden?
content:
VerfÃ¼gbar in Ã–sterreich, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Irland, Italy, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Spanien, Schweden.N26 You ist Ã¼ber die Erstanmeldung eines Kontos oder Ã¼ber ein Upgrade in der App verfÃ¼gbar, wenn du bereits ein Standard-Konto hast. Um dich zu N26 You upgraden, logge dich einfach in die App ein, tippe auf den "Entdecken" am unteren Bildschirmrand und wÃ¤hle dann "Entdecke N26 You".Â Du kannst zwischen 5 neuen Farben wÃ¤hlen: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.WÃ¤hle dann deine bevorzugteÂ VersandmethodeÂ aus, akzeptiere die N26 YouÂ AGB (neuen Tab)Â und schon ist deine neue Karte zu dir unterwegs!Standardlieferungen dauern bis zu zehn Werktage, Expresslieferungen drei Werktage.Der Mitgliedsbeitrag von 9,90 â‚¬ wird jeden Monat am Tag des Upgrades direkt von deinem Konto abgebucht.Du kannst eine zusÃ¤tzlich N26 You Karte fÃ¼r eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 14â‚¬ in deiner N26 App bestellen.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: What to do if my card is lost or itâ€™s been compromised?
content: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App.Â Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab).Â You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

title: How to protect my account?
content: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, itâ€™s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATMâ€™s nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A â‚¬2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (weâ€™ll remind you via push message when youâ€™re running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we canâ€™t reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, thereâ€™s a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A â‚¬2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2â‚¬.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. Weâ€™ll ask you to confirm your payment viaÂ push messageÂ during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didnâ€™t set it up yet, youâ€™ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If youâ€™re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals donâ€™t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: Documenti bancari: guida ai servizi disponibili
content: Con N26, puoi scaricare automaticamente il tuo estratto conto, la conferma del conto e altri documenti bancari direttamente in formato digitale. I seguenti documenti bancari sono documenti ufficiali e perfettamente validi senza una firma. Scopriamo un po' di piÃ¹ a questo proposito:Il tuo estratto conto Ã¨ un documento che indica il tuo saldo totale e ogni transazione in entrata e in uscita nel tuo conto corrente N26, incluso il tuo nome completo, l'IBAN e il BIC. Ecco come scaricarlo.Le tue coordinate bancarie si trovano sullâ€™Attestazione bancaria, un documento che conferma che il conto corrente Ã¨ registrato a tuo nome. Qui trovi il tuo nome e cognome, la data di nascita, l'IBAN e il BIC del conto, la data di apertura e, se lo desideri, puÃ² anche includere il saldo attuale del conto e il numero della carta (di solito nascosti). Ecco come richiederle.Lo stato di commissioni Ã¨ un documento che riporta tutte le commissioni bancarie che ti sono state addebitate sul conto N26 nell'ultimo anno.Su N26 Web: clicca sull'icona di download*, (nuova tabella) vai a Stato di commissioni, indica se hai bisogno di una relazione degli ultimi 6 o 12 mesi, e clicca su Richiedi. Riceverai un PDF nella tua casella di posta elettronica Messaggi da N26 entro 24 ore.La ricevuta di bonifico Ã¨ un documento che conferma che Ã¨ stato effettuato un bonifico dal tuo conto N26. Questa include il tuo nome completo, l'indirizzo (come registrato nel tuo conto N26), l'IBAN e il BIC, l'importo del bonifico, la data, il testo di riferimento e il nome completo, l'IBAN e il BIC del destinatario.Nellâ€™app mobile e su N26 Web: dalla schermata Home, scegli il bonifico e seleziona Ricevuta di bonifico. Il PDF verrÃ  generato automaticamente.La ricevuta di pagamento con carta serve per confermare che Ã¨ stato effettuato un pagamento con la tua Mastercard N26. Puoi fornire l'estratto conto del mese corrispondente.RIB (RelevÃ© d'IdentitÃ© Bancaire in francese) Ã¨ un documento che contiene le tue informazioni bancarie principali, compreso il nome completo, l'indirizzo legale, l'IBAN e il BIC specifici per le autoritÃ  francesi.Su N26 Web: clicca sull'icona di download*, (nuova tabella) scrolla in basso fino a RIB e clicca su Richiedi. Â * L'icona di download Ã¨ il quadrato con una freccia che punta verso il basso, posizionato a sinistra del pulsante 'Trasferire denaro sul conto'.

title: Bereavement & probate
content:
How can I inform N26 about a death?Â Â If possible, we ask for a death certificate or a comparable document, as this is the only way we can reliably identify an associated bank account.Â In Austria, a notary is usually appointed as court commissioner.Â The commissioner reaches us by post, fax or email (please include a scan or PDF of an appropriate cover letter in the attachment):E-Mail: verlassenschaft@n26.comÂ Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbHÂ - NachlassbearbeitungÂ 
RungestraÃŸe 22Â 
10179 Berlin, GERMANYIf possible, we ask for a death certificate or a comparable document, as this is the only way we can reliably identify an associated bank account.Â What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?Â Â Due to regional regulatory differences, the proceeding can vary depending on the country. However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH is located in Germany, so different legal requirements may be applicable than in your home country.As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be blocked.Please note that standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates on the account usually continue to exist after the death of the account holder. Heirs or authorised representatives must have these revoked or deleted.Further, all German banks are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax in Germany of the assets belonging to the estate.We will notify the beneficiaries in any case which documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceasedâ€™s account with N26.Â I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death?Â There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.Â It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited.Â Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this.Â For any further information on a specific situation please seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor or any suitable advisory service.

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: â‚¬5,000Monthly limit: â‚¬20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of â‚¬1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of â‚¬400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of â‚¬2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of â‚¬1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: â‚¬1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limitÂ Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: So lÃ¤dst Du Geld auf dein Konto per Karte, Apple Pay und Google Pay
content:
Du kannst jetzt Geld auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du eine Debitkarte, Kreditkarte, Apple Pay oder Google Pay verwendest. So kannst du schnell und einfach Ãœberweisungen auf dein N26 Konto tÃ¤tigen:Geld mit einer Debit- oder Kreditkarte hinzufÃ¼genÃ–ffne deine N26 App und tippe im Homescreen auf Geld erhalten.Tippe auf Mit Karte aufladen.WÃ¤hle einen Betrag und gib deine Karteninformationen ein (Name auf der Karte, Kartennummer, Ablaufdatum und CVV-Code). Deine Karteninformationen speichern wir nicht.Folge den Anweisungen, um die Ãœberweisung zu bestÃ¤tigen.Das Geld ist sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verfÃ¼gbar.Mit Instant Account Funding kannst du minimum 20 EUR und maximal 450 EUR bei jeder wiederkehrenden Transaktion und maximal 450 â‚¬ insgesamt pro Monat auf dein Konto einzahlen.Geld mit Apple Pay oder Google Pay hinzufÃ¼genÃ–ffne deine N26 App und tippe im Homescreen auf Geld erhalten.WÃ¤hle dann Apple Pay bzw. Google Pay.Gib einen Betrag ein.Folge den Anweisungen, um die Ãœberweisung zu bestÃ¤tigen.Das Geld ist sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verfÃ¼gbar.Akzeptierte Karten: Visa und Mastercard-Karten, die eine 16-stellige Kartennummer haben. Prepaid-Karten werden nicht akzeptiert. In diesem Blog Post (neuen Tab)(Englisch) erfÃ¤hrst du mehr Ã¼ber den Unterschied zwischen Debit-, Kredit- und Prepaidkarten.Kosten:Â 
Diese Methode ist zwar die schnellste und einfachste, um Geld auf dein N26 Konto zu laden â€“ fÃ¼r uns ist es allerdings teurer, Geld sofort auf deinem Konto verfÃ¼gbar zu machen. Andere Methoden fÃ¼r das Aufladen deines Kontos sind gÃ¼nstiger.Â Das erste Mal Aufladen ist immer kostenlos. Danach berechnen wir jedes Mal eine GebÃ¼hr von 3 %. Denn wenn du Geld von einer anderen Bankkarte oder dem Wallet auf dein Konto lÃ¤dst, wird es nicht direkt auf dein N26 Konto Ã¼bertragen â€“ die GebÃ¼hr deckt die Kosten ab, die aufkommen, weil wir das Geld trotzdem sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verfÃ¼gbar machen.

title: Devo dichiarare il mio conto N26?
content: N26 Ã¨ una banca tedesca che a partire dal 26 marzo 2020 opera in Italia attraverso una succursale italiana al fine di offrire ai propri clienti un conto corrente con IBAN italiano.Di conseguenza, se hai aperto un conto con noi dopo il 26 marzo 2020 e risiedi in Italia, il tuo conto N26 Ã¨ a tutti gli effetti un conto corrente italiano e non devi effettuare dichiarazioni particolari.Â Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:con una giacenza media sul conto pari o superiore a 5.000 â‚¬, sarai soggetto allâ€™ordinaria imposta di bollo sugli estratti conto in misura pari a 34,20â‚¬.lâ€™imposta di bollo sarÃ  a carico di N26 fino al 30/06/2022.Â se mantieni un saldo fino a 100.000 â‚¬, il tuo conto rimane protetto dal Fondo tedesco di tutela dei depositi.Â Se hai aperto un conto con noi prima del 26 marzo 2020 con indirizzo di residenza in Italia, il tuo conto Ã¨ considerato un conto estero. Lâ€™apertura di un conto allâ€™estero Ã¨ unâ€™operazione legale e consentita: dovrai semplicemente rispettare la normativa del paese di residenza e del paese in cui il conto viene aperto.Per quanto riguarda le persone fisiche residenti in Italia, i conti esteri con una giacenza media annua superiore a â‚¬5.000 devono essere dichiarati al Fisco italiano. BisognerÃ  compilare il quadro Rw della dichiarazione dei redditi e versare lâ€™Ivafe, unâ€™imposta di importo fisso pari a â‚¬34,20.Â Se il valore massimo sul conto, invece, supera i â‚¬15.000 anche per un solo giorno nel corso dellâ€™anno, oltre a versare lâ€™Ivafe, bisognerÃ  compilare il quadro Rw della dichiarazione dei redditi ai fini del monitoraggio fiscale cosÃ¬ come previsto dalla legge n.186/2014.Â Per informazioni piÃ¹ dettagliate e personalizzate ti suggeriamo di consultare un esperto in materia fiscale.Ti informiamo, inoltre, che le autoritÃ  fiscali italiane hanno la possibilitÃ  di individuare conti correnti esteri non dichiarati e di ricondurre le relative operazioni al titolare (Direttiva 2011/16/UE).

title: How to pay taxes to Agencia Tributaria in Spain with N26
content: Living in Spain and need to pay taxes to the Spanish Tax Agency (Agencia Tributaria)? N26 is the first digital bank in Spain that allows you to easily send payments to Agencia Tributariaâ€”right from your N26 app.Whether you want to clear an outstanding payment or pay your taxes such as VAT or personal income tax (IPRF), a few quick taps is all it takes to send money to Agencia Tributaria directly from your N26 bank account.Â Which taxes can I pay to the Spanish Tax Agency with my N26 account?First, itâ€™s important to note that this process only applies for the 2019 tax year and beyond. Although N26 isnâ€™t an official partner of the Spanish Tax Agency (Agencia Tributaria), you can still pay the majority of taxes in Spain from the N26 app.This includes all 700+ Agencia Tributaria (AEAT) taxes, except for the following form numbers: 003, 060, 061, 069, 576, 602, 696, 770, 771, 790, 791, 990, and 991. Unfortunately, itâ€™s not currently possible to pay your social security taxes such as the self-employment tax (cuota de autÃ³nomo), or receive social security benefitsâ€”such as the unemployment benefit or pensionsâ€”to your N26 account.How can I pay taxes in Spain with N26?You can pay taxes to the Agencia Tributaria in Spain directly from your N26 bank account, regardless of which countryâ€™s IBAN you have.Click on the following link (new tab)to access AEATâ€™s website and start filling the personal fieldsFollow the instructions to fill out your tax payment form, and select â€˜Payment of settlements and debts by bank transferâ€™ when choosing your payment method.The Agencia Tributaria (AEAT) will then share the necessary details to make a bank transfer from your N26 app. Make sure you have the following: - IBAN- BIC/SWIFT- Total amount to pay- Your unique code for the bank transfer- Payment deadlineGo back to your N26 app and tap â€˜Send Moneyâ€™, then â€˜Bank Transferâ€™.Enter the bank details you just received, and make sure to enter your unique code in the â€˜Reference messageâ€™ section.Choose between a standard bank transfer or an instant bank transferâ€”and thatâ€™s it! Please note that an instant bank transfer is free for all premium N26 customers, and costs â‚¬1.99 for N26 Standard customers in Spain. A standard bank transfer can take up to 48 hours to reach another bank accountâ€”so if youâ€™re tight on time, we recommend choosing the instant bank transfer.Here is a visual explanation of how to pay taxes, coming directly from the AEAT.Renta 2021 - Opciones de pago (new tab)

title: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
content:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing â€˜Direct Debitsâ€™: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you donâ€™t have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Spaceâ€™s IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your â€˜Spacesâ€™ section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the â€˜Space Settingsâ€™ and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' Â»Â Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' Â»Â Accept the T&C's Â»Â Enter your confirmation PIN Â»Â Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right â€˜cog iconâ€™)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on â€œSend moneyâ€Select â€œBank transferâ€Select the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

title: Was ist Phishing?
content: Phishing ist eine einfache und wirksame Methode, mit der Hacker Menschen dazu bringen, sensible persÃ¶nliche Daten preiszugeben. Sobald sie an diese Informationen gelangt sind, kÃ¶nnen sie diese fÃ¼r verschiedene BetrÃ¼gereien nutzen, indem sie im Namen ihrer Opfer auftreten. (neuen Tab) Hier (neuen Tab) kannst du mehr darÃ¼ber erfahren. In unserem Blogbeitrag erklÃ¤ren wir dir, wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und dich davor schÃ¼tzen kannst.Wie du verdÃ¤chtige E-Mails und Textnachrichten meldestN26 versendet niemals Textnachrichten oder E-Mails, die dringliche Warnungen enthalten und dich dazu auffordern, dich in dein Konto einzuloggen und persÃ¶nliche Daten herauszugeben. Wir stellen dir niemals ein Ultimatum, noch bitten wir dich je darum, dich auÃŸerhalb unserer sicheren KommunikationskanÃ¤le zu authentifizieren oder deine Daten zu verifizieren.VerdÃ¤chtige E-MailsKlicke keine Links an und lade keine AnhÃ¤nge herunter, wenn du eine verdÃ¤chtige E-Mail erhÃ¤ltst. Um uns bei unseren Nachforschungen zu helfen, bitten wir dich:die verdÃ¤chtigen E-Mails unter support@n26.com an uns weiterzuleitenODERdie verdÃ¤chtige E-Mail wenn mÃ¶glich als â€emlâ€œ-Datei zu speichern und an uns zu senden. Die meisten E-Mail-Anbieter speichern die Datei automatisch in diesem Format, wenn du sie herunterlÃ¤dst. Wenn du uns die verdÃ¤chtige E-Mail in diesem Format zusendest, kÃ¶nnen wir den wahren Ursprung der Nachricht ermitteln und den Vorfall den zustÃ¤ndigen BehÃ¶rden melden. Wenn du Schwierigkeiten hast, die E-Mail in diesem Format zu speichern: kein Problem. Leite dann die verdÃ¤chtigen E-Mails einfach an die obige Adresse weiter.Â Bitte sende uns keine Screenshots, da wir damit nichts anfangen kÃ¶nnen. LÃ¶sche danach die E-Mail aus deinem Postfach.VerdÃ¤chtige TextnachrichtenKlicke keine Links an und gib keine Daten ein, wenn du eine verdÃ¤chtige Textnachricht erhÃ¤ltst.Um uns bei unseren Nachforschungen zu helfen, bitten wir dich:Â einen Screenshot der erhaltenen Nachricht zu machen und an support@n26.com zu senden;achte bitte darauf, dass die komplette Nachricht, einschlieÃŸlich Telefonnummer des Absenders und Datum/Uhrzeit, sichtbar ist;blockiere die Telefonnummer, wenn du eine BestÃ¤tigung von uns erhÃ¤ltst, dass es sich um eine Phishing-Nachricht handelt;lÃ¶sche die Nachricht von deinem Mobiltelefon.Â VerdÃ¤chtige TelefonanrufeWenn du einen verdÃ¤chtigen Anruf erhÃ¤ltst, unabhÃ¤ngig davon, ob dieser von einer unserer Telefonnummern ausgeht oder nicht, gib keine personenbezogenen Daten an, die sich auf dein Konto oder die damit verbundene Karte beziehen. Wir weisen darauf hin, dass BetrÃ¼ger in einigen FÃ¤llen mit der "Spoofing"-Technologie die Telefonnummer des Absenders verschleiern kÃ¶nnen, so dass diese so aussieht wie die Telefonnummer der Bank.Wenn du also den Verdacht hast, dass du einem Telefonbetrug zum Opfer gefallen bist oder deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten weitergegeben hast, wende dich bitte umgehend an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com.Wie du eine gefÃ¤lschte Website meldestMÃ¶glicherweise findest du dich irgendwann einmal auf einer fragwÃ¼rdigen Website wieder, die vorgibt, im Namen von N26 fÃ¼r Dienstleistungen zu werben. Oder du siehst unser Logo auf vermeintlichen Partnerseiten. MÃ¶glicherweise bieten sie Kredite an oder zeitlich begrenzte Werbeangebote. Bitte behalte Folgendes im Hinterkopf: Die Tatsache, dass â€N26â€œ Bestandteil einer URL ist, bedeutet nicht unbedingt, dass die Webseite seriÃ¶s ist.Wenn du vermutest, dass du dich auf einer betrÃ¼gerischen Webseite befindest, solltest du einen Moment innehalten und Folgendes tun:ÃœberprÃ¼fe die Adresszeile und vergewissere dich, dass die URL https://app.n26.com/login lautet. Ist das nicht der Fall, kopiere die URL bitte und melde sie sogleich hier: support@n26.com.Â

title: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
content:
Is N26 closing all US accounts?Â N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European businessÂ and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.Â Â What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders.Â In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos BankÂ® sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted.Â How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 accountÂ 
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 AllpointÂ® ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed.Â 
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.Â Â I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

title: Comment recevoir les notifications N26 ?
content: Pour valider vos virements (comme vosÂ Moneybeam) ou confirmer un service (commeÂ CASH26) ou un paiement en ligne, nous vous envoyons une notification push.Si vous ne recevez pas ces notifications, veuillez vÃ©rifier dans un premier temps que vous avez bien activÃ© les notifications sur votre tÃ©lÃ©phone, mais aussi les notifications provenant de lâ€™application N26.Si vous ne recevez toujours pas de notifications, voici les causes Ã©ventuelles :iOSSupprimez lâ€™application et redÃ©marrez votre tÃ©lÃ©phone. TÃ©lÃ©chargez et installez la derniÃ¨re version de lâ€™application depuis lâ€™App Store Apple, et connectez-vous Ã  nouveau.VÃ©rifiez que vous Ãªtes bien connectÃ© Ã  N26 depuis lâ€™application.Assurez vous Ã  nouveau que les notifications sont bien autorisÃ©es pour N26 dans les paramÃ¨tres de votre tÃ©lÃ©phone.AndroidSupprimez lâ€™application et redÃ©marrez votre tÃ©lÃ©phone. TÃ©lÃ©chargez et installez la derniÃ¨re version de lâ€™application depuis le Play Store de Google et connectez-vous Ã  nouveau.Rendez vous dans Mon compte, puis ParamÃ¨tres, ParamÃ¨tres de lâ€™application, Notifications, cochez toutes les cases sous lâ€™icÃ´ne du tÃ©lÃ©phone et choisissez 0 â‚¬ pour les deux seuils.Pour les tÃ©lÃ©phones Huawei et Xiaomi : allez dans ParamÃ¨tres, puis ParamÃ¨tres avancÃ©s et ParamÃ¨tres batterie, et dÃ©finissez N26 comme une application protÃ©gÃ©e.Pour les tÃ©lÃ©phones OnePlus : sÃ©lectionnez optimisation de la batterie, puis lâ€™application N26 et choisissez de ne pas lâ€™optimiser.Pour les tÃ©lÃ©phones Oppo : dÃ©sactivez lâ€™optimisation de la batterie pour lâ€™application N26

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content: To get the most out of â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the â€˜ownerâ€™ or the person who created the â€˜Shared Spaceâ€™ can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as â€˜visibleâ€™ to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the ownerâ€™s contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the â€˜Shared Spacesâ€™ add participant flow.Youâ€™ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up â€¦ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the â€˜learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜invite new memberâ€™ button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the â€œlegal screenâ€ so be sure to read all the information within the â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&Câ€™s then tap â€˜Grant Power of Attorneyâ€™ button.Tap â€˜Send inviteâ€™ on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the â€˜send inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the â€˜Participantsâ€™ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participantâ€™s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

title: PSD2 - Open Banking fÃ¼r Drittanbieter
content:
HintergrundDie Zweite EU-Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (PSD2) bringt einige Ã„nderungen fÃ¼r Zahlungsdienste innerhalb der EuropÃ¤ischen Union mit sich. Ziel der PSD2 ist es, einen einheitlicheren, transparenteren und offeneren EU-Zahlungsmarkt zu schaffen und allen Marktteilnehmern Innovation, Wettbewerb und Sicherheit zu bieten.Wenn Sie als Drittanbieter Zugang zu den PSD2-Schnittstellen von N26 erhalten mÃ¶chten, mÃ¼ssen Sie von einer nationalen AufsichtsbehÃ¶rde lizenziert sein. In Deutschland ist dies die Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. AuÃŸerdem benÃ¶tigen Sie dafÃ¼r ein qualifiziertes Zertifikat fÃ¼r die Website-Authentifizierung (QWAC). Solche Zertifikate kÃ¶nnen Sie bei qualifizierten Vertrauensdiensteanbietern (QTSP (neuen Tab)) beantragen.Dedizierte SchnittstelleUnsere dedizierte Schnittstelle ist die REST API, die mit Version 1.3.6 der Implementierungsrichtlinien der Berlin Group (neuen Tab) konform ist.Autorisierungsprotokoll: oAuth 2.0 (neuen Tab).Anmerkung: Hinweis: FÃ¼r den Zugriff auf die API der Berlin Group ist ein gÃ¼ltiges QWAC-Zertifikat erforderlich. Die offizielle Liste der qualifizierten Vetrauensdiensteanbieter ist auf der Vertrauensliste der EuropÃ¤ischen Kommission auf Grundlage der eIDAS-Verordnung (neuen Tab) verfÃ¼gbar. FÃ¼r die dedizierte PSD2-Schnittstelle (API) von N26 muss ein QWAC-Zertifikat von einer qualifizierten Zertifizierungsstelle ausgestellt werdenNotfallmechanismusIm Rahmen seiner gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen gemÃ¤ÃŸ der PSD2 hat N26 einen Notfallmechanismus implementiert, der Folgendes vorsieht:ZuverlÃ¤ssige Identifizierung eines Drittanbieters Ã¼ber den Besitz eines gÃ¼ltigen QWAC-Zertifikats (Qualifiziertes Zertifikat fÃ¼r die Website-Authentifizierung).Sicherer und autorisierter Zugriff auf ein KontoDrittanbieter kÃ¶nnen Ã¼ber die folgenden URLs auf unseren Notfallmechanismus zugreifen:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deDer Zugriff auf die obigen URLs und der Aufbau der TLS-Verbindung erfordern die Nutzung eines qualifizierten Zertifikats.DokumentationTPPs finden die folgende Dokumentation im Ã¶ffentlichen GitHub-Repository von N26 (neuen Tab):AISP- und PISP-Dokumentation fÃ¼r die dedizierte SchnittstelleGreifen Sie auf die Dokumentation fÃ¼r Sandbox zuAISP- und PISP-Dokumentation fÃ¼r die Fallback-SchnittstelleOffene API- und Sandbox-PostbotensammlungHÃ¤ufig gestellte FragenWir empfehlen TPPs, sich auf das Repository zu beziehen, um die neuesten Informationen zu technischer Dokumentation und Spezifikation zu erhalten.FÃ¼r Anfragen und Support im Zusammenhang mit N26 Open Banking verwenden Sie bitte dieses Formular (neuen Tab).Daten zur VerfÃ¼gbarkeit und Leistung der SchnittstelleIn den folgenden Berichten werden die VerfÃ¼gbarkeit und Leistung unserer dedizierten PSD2-Schnittstelle mit dem PSU-Interface verglichen:Q3 2019 (neuen Tab) / Q4 2019 (neuen Tab)
Q1 2020 (neuen Tab) / Q2 2020 (neuen Tab) / Q3 2020 (neuen Tab) / Q4 2020 (neuen Tab)Aktuelle Neuigkeiten*FÃ¼r alle unten mitgeteilten API-Ã„nderungen bitten wir dich, weitere Einzelheiten in unserer API-Dokumentation und den hÃ¤ufig gestellten Fragen nachzulesen und alle erforderlichen Ã„nderungen deines Systems im Voraus vorzunehmen, um Unterbrechungen in der Nutzung unserer Schnittstelle(n) zu vermeiden.**Wenn du direkt Ã¼ber bevorstehende Ã„nderungen informiert werden mÃ¶chtest, trage dich bitte hier (neuen Tab) in unsere Mailingliste ein.26. August, 2022 SEPA und SEPA-SofortÃ¼berweisungen kÃ¶nnen jetzt initiiert werden ohne das Debtor-Konto zu spezifizieren, im vorgesehenen Interface.01. August, 2022 Die Initiierung von SEPA-SofortÃ¼berweisungen wird jetzt im Fallback-Interface unterstÃ¼tzt.29. Juli, 2022 BetragsbestÃ¤tigungsendpunkte werden jetzt im vorgesehenen Interface unterstÃ¼tzt.30. Juni, 2022 Die Initiierung von SEPA-SofortÃ¼berweisungen wird jetzt im dafÃ¼r vorgesehenen Interface unterstÃ¼tzt.17. Mai 2022 Neuer Spaces Endpunkt /api/v3/spaces ist live im AIS Fallback Interface; alter Spaces Endpunkt /api/spaces wird am 17. August 2022 deaktiviert.25. April 2022 Das Feld â€œZusÃ¤tzliche Informationenâ€ wurde zu den bereitgestellten Transaktionsinformationen im dedizierten Interface als ID hinzugefÃ¼gt, die alle Kartentransaktionen im Zusammenhang mit einem einzelnen Kauf verknÃ¼pft.24. Januar 2022 werden die folgenden Parameter zu den Transaktionsinformationen hinzugefÃ¼gt, die wir ab dem 25. April 2022 im Dedicated Interface bereitstellen: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured.Weitere Informationen findest du in der AISP-Dokumentation fÃ¼r das Dedicated Interface. Bitte fÃ¼hre alle erforderlichen Ã„nderungen vor dem 25. April 2022 durch, um eine unterbrechungsfreie Nutzung unserer Schnittstelle zu gewÃ¤hrleisten.13. Dezember 2021 Transaktionen, die zuvor als â€ausstehendâ€œ eingestuft wurden, werden ab dem 14. MÃ¤rz 2022 in der dedizierten OberflÃ¤che als â€gebuchteâ€œ Transaktionen klassifiziert.17. November 2021 /api/v2/spaces-Endpunkt in der AIS-Fallback-Schnittstelle deaktiviert03. Februar 2021 Die Token.io-Schnittstelle (gilt seit 04. November 2020 als veraltet) wird ab dem 01. MÃ¤rz 2021 vollstÃ¤ndig deaktiviert.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Donâ€™t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you donâ€™t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while youâ€™re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We wonâ€™t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.Â

title: How to set Rules for Spaces?
content: Within your Spaces, you can set your own Rules! Rules allow you to easily create automated transactions and standing orders to your Spaces to save money and organise your finances.Â If you want to set a Rule through the Web App, hereâ€™s what you need to know:Process a Spaces transfer and then enable the option to repeat the transfer.To delete a Rule, click on the 3 dots indicating the settings. Youâ€™ll see all the active rules. Clicking on the trashcan icon will delete the rule.If you need to change a rule, delete it from the settings of the Space you created the rule in, and then create a new one.If you want to set a Rule through an Android device, you have two options:From Spaces > click on the three dots > create rule > enter amount > select space > choose frequency and date > confirm 2. After setting a Space Transfer > select Repeat > choose frequency and date > confirmÂ If you want to set a Rule through an iOS device, this is what you need to do:Â Â Â Â Â From Spaces > create a new rule > choose frequency and date > confirmÂ Â Please be aware that both Spaces Rules and Standing Orders are processed at the same time of day (0100 UTC). This means if you have a Rule and Standing order set up for the same date, you will need enough funds on that day to cover both.If you have Standing Orders that are dependent on your Rules having happened first, you will need to make sure the Standing Order is set for the day after the Rule. This also means that if you want to prioritise your Standing Orders they need to be set for the day before your Rules.Please note that, if you have an activated Overdraft, a Rule will still be processed automatically even if your balance is negative.

title: How to upgrade to N26 You?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 YouÂ during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's (new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. If you upgrade to N26 You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: How to top up my account?
content: Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways. To do so, simply go to the N26 app and select 'Add Money' to see the available options:1. SEPA Transfer (Up to 2 business days):The transfer must be in EUR and within the SEPA zone.You will need to provide your IBAN and your name as it is written on the ID you used to create your account.If you have a Business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names.Since 1st July 2020 a limit of 100.000â‚¬ for incoming SEPA instant transfers applies.No limit applies to normal incoming SEPA transfers2. Debit or Credit Card (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details from the sending account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.3. Apple Pay or Google Pay (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the Apple Pay or Google Pay account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.4. Moneybeam (instant):You can receive money from other N26 users.5. CASH26 (instant):Available in Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain and Greece.Deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.6. iDEAL (instant):Available only in the Netherlands for customer with Dutch T&C and with a iDEAL accountThe first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 1.5 % of the deposit amount.7. GiroPay (instant):Only available in Germany for customers with German Terms and Conditions and a Giropay account.8. EPS (instant):Only available in Austria for customers with Austrian Terms and Conditions and an EPS account.9. Bancontact (instant):Only available in Belgium for customers with Belgian Terms and Conditions and a Bancontact account.Important reminder for SEPA Transfers:If you deposit money into your N26 account via SEPA transfer, please make sure that the recipient name corresponds to your name as it is entered on the identification document that you used for your verification when opening the account.(Especially if you have an N26 Business account - we do not accept company names.) An incoming transfer is booked in real time, as if it was made as a real time transfer, otherwise a transfer takes 1-2 working days. From July 1st, 2020, there will be a limit of â‚¬ 100,000 for incoming real-time transfers. In France, the first payment must be made to your N26 account from an account that you own. (In all other countries it is not necessary that the other bank account belongs to you.)

title: Was ist N26 Business Smart?
content: Gilt fÃ¼r Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Deutschland, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Island, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Ã–sterreich, die Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Schweden, die Schweiz, die Slowakei, Slowenien und Spanien.N26 Business Smart kostet 4,90 â‚¬ pro Monat und ist fÃ¼r SelbststÃ¤ndige und Freiberufler gedacht, die in eigenem Namen tÃ¤tig sind. Das bedeutet, dass auf dem Konto oder der Karte kein Firmenname stehen kann.Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: WÃ¤hle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fÃ¼nf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.ZusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusÃ¤tzliche virtuelle Karte!ZusÃ¤tzliche physische Karte: Bestelle Ã¼ber deine N26 App eine zusÃ¤tzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige GebÃ¼hr von 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Es ist noch nicht mÃ¶glich, zwischen Privat- und GeschÃ¤ftskonten zu wechseln. Umso wichtiger ist es, zu wissen, ob N26 Business Metal das Richtige fÃ¼r dich (neuen Tab) ist:Der Mitgliedsbeitrag von 4,90 â‚¬ wird jeden Monat am Tag des Upgrades direkt von deinem Konto abgebucht. Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste GebÃ¼hr 15 Tage nach dem Verifizierung deiner IdentitÃ¤t eingezogen. Danach wird dir deine monatliche GebÃ¼hr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet. Wenn du also dein Konto gegen Monatsende erÃ¶ffnet hast, werden die ersten zwei MonatsgebÃ¼hren im Folgemonat abgebucht.Die N26 Business Smart Mastercard ist nur fÃ¼r den geschÃ¤ftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt. Du erhÃ¤ltst jeden Monat 0,10 % Cashback auf alle mit deiner Karte getÃ¤tigten Zahlungen. Der Vorgang erfolgt am 15. des Folgemonats sowie aller darauffolgenden Monate und es dauert bis zu 7 Tage, bis er auf deinem Kontoauszug erscheint.Es ist derzeit nicht mÃ¶glich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu fÃ¼hren. Wenn du also auch fÃ¼r private Ausgaben eine Karte benÃ¶tigst, empfehlen wir dir, eine Maestro-Karte zu bestellen (erhÃ¤ltlich in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich und den Niederlanden).DarÃ¼ber hinaus sind bestimmte Bargeldabhebungen im Rahmen unserer Fair Use Policy abgesichert. Im Gegensatz zu anderen Konten sind Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen mit N26 Business Smart innerhalb der App nicht mÃ¶glich. NÃ¤here Informationen dazu findest du hier: Wise (neuen Tab).Firmenlastschriften (Business-to-Business bzw.
