title: Les virements instantanÃ©s, quâ€™est-ce que câ€™est ?
content:
Tous les clients N26 peuvent dÃ©sormais effectuer des virements instantanÃ©s. Contrairement aux virements SEPA ordinaires qui sont traitÃ©s dans un dÃ©lai de deux jours ouvrables, les virements instantanÃ©s sont envoyÃ©s et reÃ§us en quelques secondes. Le virement instantanÃ© vous permet dâ€™envoyer ou de recevoir de lâ€™argent de faÃ§on presque immÃ©diate, en environ 10 secondes.Â Les virements instantanÃ©s sont sans frais pour les clients N26 dÃ©tenant un compte premium. Ils sont facturÃ©s pour les clients N26 Standard**. Les tarifs sont dÃ©taillÃ©s en bas de cet article, selon le pays oÃ¹ vous rÃ©sidez.Effectuer un virement instantanÃ© ne veut pas dire quâ€™il ne peut pas se produire un retard imprÃ©vu dans son traitement, câ€™est pourquoi nous vous invitons Ã  prÃ©voir vos virements importants (loyer, cautionsâ€¦) suffisamment en avance, avant dâ€™Ã©viter tout dÃ©sagrÃ©ment.Â Comment faire un virement instantanÃ© ?Pour effectuer un virement instantanÃ©, il vous suffit de vous connecter Ã  votre application mobile N26 :Â SÃ©lectionner Envoyer > Virement bancaireVous serez alors invitÃ© Ã  saisir le nom du bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire et son IBAN, Ã  ajouter un message (facultatif) et Ã  confirmer la transactionEnsuite, vous pourrez choisir lâ€™option Virement instantanÃ©Confirmez la transaction, et câ€™est envoyÃ© !Lâ€™envoi du virement prend environ 10 secondes.Â Veuillez noter que :Â Si vous Ãªtes un client N26 premium et que la banque du bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire accepte les virements instantanÃ©s, votre virement bancaire sera directement envoyÃ© de faÃ§on instantanÃ©e et sans frais (dans la limite des montants autorisÃ©s chaque jour).Â Pour effectuer un virement instantanÃ©, la banque du bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire doit Ãªtre compatible avec le programme de traitement des virements instantanÃ©s (SCT Inst).
Informations concernant les virements instantanÃ©s :FacturationLes virements instantanÃ©s sont sans frais pour les clients dÃ©tenteurs dâ€™un compte premium N26.**Une commission est facturÃ©e aux clients N26 Standard qui envoient un virement instantanÃ©. Cette commission est prÃ©levÃ©e immÃ©diatement aprÃ¨s chaque virement instantanÃ© et diffÃ¨re selon le pays oÃ¹ vous avez ouvert votre compte :France, Italie et reste de lâ€™Europe - 0,99 â‚¬Allemagne et Autriche - 0,49 â‚¬Espagne- 1,99 â‚¬Limites dâ€™utilisation des virements instantanÃ©sVous pouvez effectuer jusquâ€™Ã  5 virements instantanÃ©s par jour dâ€™un montant de 2 000 â‚¬ maximum chacun, soit un montant maximum de 10 000 â‚¬ par jour.Si vous utilisez un virement instantanÃ© pour un paiement important (dÃ©pÃ´t, amende, acompte), pensez Ã  effectuer le paiement Ã  lâ€™avance. Vous Ã©viterez ainsi tout retard liÃ© Ã  son Ã©ventuel rejet ou interdiction.Si vous payez un bien ou un service par virement instantanÃ©, veillez toujours Ã  bien vÃ©rifier les coordonnÃ©es bancaires et le nom du bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire avant de confirmer la transaction. Nous vous invitons Ã©galement Ã  toujours vous mÃ©fier de potentielles fraudes avant dâ€™effectuer une telle transaction.Veuillez noter : Seules certaines banques proposent actuellement les virements instantanÃ©s. Vous pourrez effectuer un virement instantanÃ© Ã  partir de votre compte N26 uniquement si la banque du bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire propose ce service.

title: Informationen zum Flex P-Konto
content: Der Freibetrag eines Flex P-Kontos ist abhÃ¤ngig vom Geldeingang, also in der Regel von Ãœberweisungen vom Arbeitgeber oder von Ã¶ffentlichen Institutionen (wie z. B. Corona-Hilfe vom Finanzamt oder Arbeitslosengeld von der Agentur fÃ¼r Arbeit). Aus diesem Grund ist der P-Konto-Freibetrag flexibel und kann sich somit von Monat zu Monat Ã¤ndern.Â Wann immer das monatliche Einkommen den Grundfreibetrag von 1.340 â‚¬ Ã¼berschreitet, erhÃ¶ht sich der PfÃ¤ndungsfreibetrag dem Einkommen entsprechend fÃ¼r den Rest des Monat. Wann immer das monatliche Einkommen den Grundfreibetrag von 1.340 â‚¬ unterschreitet, bleibt der PfÃ¤ndungsfreibetrag gleich â€“ er wird also nicht verringert.Bis du dein Gehalt erhÃ¤ltst, entspricht dein Freibetrag dem Grundfreibetrag. Alle Ã„nderungen werden innerhalb von 2 Werktagen nach Erhalt deines Gehalts vorgenommen.

title: Wie viel kann ich maximal ausgeben?
content: Kartenzahlungen in GeschÃ¤ften und onlineDas Tageslimit liegt bei 5.000â‚¬Das Monatslimit liegt 20.000â‚¬Abhebungen mit der KarteDas Tageslimit i.H.v. 1.000â‚¬ gilt in: Ã–sterreich, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Griechenland, Island, Irland, Italien, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Spanien, Slowakei, Slowenien, Schweden und der Schweiz.Â Das Tageslimit i.H.v. 400â‚¬ gilt in Togo, Kongo, Benin, ElfenbeinkÃ¼ste, Kenia, Kamerun, Nigeria, Senegal, Algerien, Zentralafrikanische Republik, Gambia, Ghana, Ruanda, Tunesien und UgandaDas Wochenlimit liegt in allen EU LÃ¤ndern bei 2.500â‚¬. Das Wochenlimit liegt in Frankreich bei 1.050â‚¬.ÃœberweisungenDas Tageslimit fÃ¼r MoneyBeams liegt bei 1.000â‚¬Ausgehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen: Kein LimitEingehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen: Kein LimitEingehende SEPA-EchtzeitÃ¼berwiesung: 100.000â‚¬ pro ÃœberweisungAusgehende SEPA-EchtzeitÃ¼berwiesung: 2.000â‚¬ pro ÃœberweisungCash26Das Abhebelimit betrÃ¤gt 200 â‚¬ pro Transaktion sowie 900 â‚¬ innerhalb von 24 Stunden. Es gibt jedoch keinen Mindestbetrag â€“ du kannst auch nur einen Cent mit CASH26 abheben, wenn du magst.Der Mindestbetrag fÃ¼r eine CASH26 Einzahlung ist 50 â‚¬. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden kannst du bis zu 999 â‚¬ einzahlen.ZusÃ¤tzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit fÃ¼r Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in HÃ¶he von 999â‚¬ pro 24 Stunden.

title: How to activate my card?
content: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! Youâ€™ll have to activate your card whether itâ€™s your first N26 card, a replacement card, or youâ€™ve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card youâ€™re activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction â€” in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail â€” for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card â€” you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then youâ€™ll still be able to activate that new card.

title: PerchÃ¨ il collegamento con il mio account Wise non funziona?
content: Ci dispiace che al momento non sia stato possibile collegare il tuo account Wise con quello N26.Se ti sei registrato in passato direttamente su Wise (nuova tabella), utilizzando lo stesso indirizzo email registrato sul tuo conto N26, e non hai compilato tutti i campi relativi ai tuoi dati personali, non sarÃ  possibile collegare il tuo account con quello di N26. Ecco come puoi controllare le informazioni personali che hai inserito sul tuo profilo Wise:Collegati a Wise (nuova tabella) e accedi al tuo account Assicurati che il tuo nome, cognome, data di nascita e recapiti personali siano correttiSe alcuni dati inseriti fossero mancanti o non aggiornati, ti preghiamo di correggerliSe avessi smarrito la tua password, clicca su 'Password dimenticata' e segui le istruzioniSe non ricordi di aver creato un account con Wise, dovresti comunque provare ad accedere reimpostando la password. Potresti averlo creato tramite un altro partner o qualche tempo fa.

title: What are Instant transfers?
content: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipientâ€™s bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you wonâ€™t have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49â‚¬Spain - 1,99â‚¬Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99â‚¬The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000â‚¬ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000â‚¬ per day). If youâ€™re using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If youâ€™re paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiverâ€™s details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

title: What are the benefits of N26 Smart?
content: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra Virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces (new tab): 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces (new tab): Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.You can compare N26 Smart with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these (new tab) in mind when considering N26 Smart:The N26 Smart Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay. Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Smart fee in order to receive the card.

title: Wie lade ich meine persÃ¶nlichen Daten herunter?
content: Die Datenschutzgrundverordnung (DSGVO) ist eine europÃ¤ische Verordnung zum Schutz personenbezogener Daten, die am 25. Mai 2018 in Kraft getreten ist. Wir haben daraufhin eine Funktion zum Datenexport in der WebApp (neuen Tab) hinzugefÃ¼gt, um dein Recht auf DatenÃ¼bertragbarkeit gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 20 DSGVO zu gewÃ¤hrleisten. Die Beschaffung der von dir bereitgestellten persÃ¶nlichen Daten ist transparent und einfach und somit besitzt du die vollstÃ¤ndige Kontrolle: Gehe zu ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto und PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen und klicke auf Deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten.Das Recht auf DatenÃ¼bertragbarkeit gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 20 DSGVO umfasst personenbezogene Daten, die du uns bereitgestellt hast. Art. 20 DSGVO soll dir ermÃ¶glichen, ohne groÃŸen Aufwand den Dienstleister zu wechseln fÃ¼r den Fall, dass du die von dir bereitgestellten Daten nutzen mÃ¶chtest, um ein Konto bei einer anderen Bank zu erÃ¶ffnen. Aus diesem Grund verpflichtet uns Art. 20 DSGVO dazu, dir diese Daten in einem maschinenlesbaren Format bereitzustellen. Dabei ist zu beachten, dass die Datei lediglich fÃ¼r Zwecke der DatenÃ¼bertragbarkeit zu nutzen ist und dein Computer die JSON Datei mÃ¶glicherweise nicht lesen kann. Falls du die JSON Datei Ã¶ffnen kannst, kÃ¶nnen ihre Inhalte dennoch schwierig zu verstehen sein, da die Datei fÃ¼r Maschinenlesbarkeit konzipiert ist und nicht fÃ¼r die unmittelbare Verarbeitung durch Menschen. Die Datei, die wir ausstellen, ist lediglich zur Ãœbertragung an andere Banken bestimmt.Als mobile Bank sind wir uns der Wichtigkeit der Sicherheit deiner Daten bewusst. Daher haben wir zusÃ¤tzliche SicherheitsmaÃŸnahmen installiert bevor du deine Daten herunterladen kannst. Diese MaÃŸnahmen sind im folgenden Absatz beschrieben. Wir tun dies, um sicherzustellen, dass du, der Kontoinhaber, auch derjenige bist, der die Daten herunterlÃ¤dt.Â So lÃ¤dst du deine Daten herunterDu kannst beantragen, die von dir fÃ¼r ein laufendes oder vorheriges Konto bereitgestellten personenbezogenen Daten, herunterzuladen. Du erhÃ¤ltst das Dokument in einem maschinenlesbaren Format, sodass du es mit einem Dritten teilen kannst.Bestehende KundenBitte frage deine Daten Ã¼ber unser Webformular (neuen Tab) an.Du wirst aufgefordert, ein temporÃ¤res Passwort fÃ¼r den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist nur fÃ¼r 24 Stunden gÃ¼ltig, ab dem Zeitpunkt, an dem du die E-Mail erhalten hast. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ungÃ¼ltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.Ehemalige KundenDu kannst von dir bereitgestellte personenbezogene Daten auch nach deiner KontoschlieÃŸung herunterladen. FÃ¼lle einfach das Datenanforderungsformular (neuen Tab) aus und vergewissere dich, dass deine angegebenen Informationen mit deinen vorherigen Kontoinformationen exakt Ã¼bereinstimmen. Welche persÃ¶nlichen Informationen du benÃ¶tigst:Vor- und Nachname, Lichtbildausweis (Identifikationsnummer und Ablaufdatum des Dokuments mit dem du dein Konto bestÃ¤tigt hast (Personalausweis oder Reisepass)Die registrierte E-Mail-Adresse des KontosDatum (Monat und Jahr) an dem du dein Konto erstellt und abgeschlossen hast (sieh in deiner BestÃ¤tigungsemail nach).Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden sind wir verpflichtet sicherzustellen, dass die Daten heruntergeladen wurden: Wenn du ein Feld leer lÃ¤sst oder falsch ausgefÃ¼llt hast, kann deine Anfrage nicht abgeschlossen werden.Du wirst aufgefordert, ein temporÃ¤res Passwort fÃ¼r den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist aber nur fÃ¼r 24 Stunden gÃ¼ltig. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ungÃ¼ltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.FÃ¼r weitere Informationen Ã¼ber die Erfassung, Verwendung oder Verarbeitung deiner persÃ¶nlichen Daten, schau dir bitte unsere DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung (neuen Tab)an.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Donâ€™t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you donâ€™t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while youâ€™re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We wonâ€™t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.Â

title: Come posso usare N26 come conto principale?
content: N26 ti offre una serie di servizi e vantaggi pensati appositamente per i nostri clienti in Italia. Se decidi di usare il tuo conto N26 come conto principale per ricevere il tuo stipendio ed effettuare le tue operazioni bancarie quotidiane, ti basterÃ  fornire le tue coordinate bancarie al tuo datore di lavoro.Â Quali servizi offre N26?Appena avrai aperto il tuo conto, gestibile interamente dallâ€™app mobile, potrai iniziare fin da subito a depositare e prelevare contanti con CASH26 (nuova tabella) dagli oltre 1000 punti vendita partner in tutta Italia; ti basterÃ  aprire lâ€™app N26, trovare il punto vendita CASH26 piÃ¹ vicino sulla mappa, creare un codice a barre e mostrarlo alla persona alla cassa.Â Potrai ricaricare il tuo conto tramite bonifico bancario, anche instantaneo, da un altro conto corrente, o tramite carta di debito, credito o prepagata oppure accreditando il tuo stipendio.Con il tuo conto N26 avrai inoltre la possibilitÃ  di addebitare gratuitamente i tuoi abbonamenti, dalla palestra ai servizi di streaming, domiciliare le tue utenze (acqua, luce, gas, telefonia) e pagare i bollettini postali, PagoPA, MAV/RAV, il bollo auto ed effettuare ricariche telefoniche direttamente dalla tua app mobile. Clicca qui (nuova tabella) per scoprire di piÃ¹.Con la tua Mastercard N26 Premium potrai anche prelevare denaro gratuitamente e senza limiti da tutti gli ATM in Europa (fino a 3 prelievi gratuiti mensili in Europa con N26 Standard).Ti ricordiamo, inoltre, che lâ€™imposta di bollo sul conto dovuta in caso di giacenza media (nuova tabella) superiore a 5000 â‚¬ (su base annua e salvo successive modifiche di legge) e pari a 34,20 â‚¬, sarÃ  a carico di N26 fino al 30/06/2022Â .Quali altri vantaggi offre N26?Dalla tua app N26, disponibile per iOS e Android, potrai effettuare bonifici SEPA gratuitamente e ricevere o effettuare bonifici SEPA istantanei, gratuitamente se hai un conto N26 premium (N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal) e al costo di 0.99â‚¬ se hai un conto N26 Standard. In piÃ¹, potrai impostare gratuitamente ordini permanenti sia nellâ€™area SEPA che in valuta estera e ricevere o effettuare bonifici internazionali (SWIFT).Ricorda inoltre che con lâ€™apertura del tuo conto N26, potrai iniziare ad utilizzare da subito la carta Mastercard associata al tuo conto e collegarla ad Apple o Google Pay. Con N26 Standard avrai da subito ad un Mastercard virtuale gratuita che potrai usare per i tuoi acquisti online e pagamenti contactless. La carta fisica aggiuntiva puÃ²â€™ essere richiesta in qualsiasi momento senza alcun canone mensile.Â Con un conto premium N26, potrai anche creare spazi (nuova tabella) separati dal tuo conto principale per mettere soldi da parte e condividerli (nuova tabella) con altri clienti N26 per gestire le spese in comune.Â Cosa fare se il mio IBAN non viene accettato?Ti ricordiamo che lâ€™IBAN del tuo conto N26, secondo la legge europea del 1Â° febbraio 2016 Articolo 9 del Regolamento UE 260/2012 (nuova tabella), deve essere accettato da ogni stato membro dellâ€™Area Economica Europea. Se il tuo datore di lavoro o un commerciante si rifiutasse di accettare il tuo IBAN, clicca qui (nuova tabella) per avere maggiori informazioni su come denunciare lâ€™accaduto.

title: HÃ¤ufig gestellte Fragen zum P-Konto
content:
Was kostet ein P-Konto?Die Umwandlung deines Kontos in ein P-Konto ist kostenlos und zieht keine zusÃ¤tzlichen monatlichen GebÃ¼hren nach sich. Falls du eine Premium-Mitgliedschaft hast, gilt fÃ¼r diese weiterhin die monatliche GebÃ¼hr.Wie kann ich meinen P-Konto-Freibetrag erhÃ¶hen?Â FÃ¼r die ErhÃ¶hung des Grundfreibetrags benÃ¶tigen wir eine ausgefÃ¼llte Bescheinigung von einer BehÃ¶rde oder einer nach Â§ 850k Abs. 5 Satz 2 ZPO geeigneten Stelle. AusfÃ¼llen kann solch eine Bescheinigung u. a.:eine gemeinnÃ¼tzige Schuldner- und Insolvenzberatungsstelledas Jobcenter oder Sozialamtein Vollstreckungsgericht oder VollstreckungsstelleRechtsanwÃ¤ltedein ArbeitgeberHier (neuen Tab) findest du ein Beispiel fÃ¼r eine P-Konto-Bescheinigung.Bitte sende das Original per Post an:N26 Bank
Claims
Klosterstr. 62
10179 BerlinWie wandle ich mein P-Konto wieder in ein normales Konto um?Um dein Konto zurÃ¼ck in ein normales Konto umzuwandeln, schicke eine E-Mail an support@n26.com mit folgenden Informationen:Â dein Vor- und Nachnamedeine N26 IBANeine BestÃ¤tigung, dass du dein P-Konto in ein normales Konto umwandeln willst.Bitte beachte: Falls du noch eine aktive PfÃ¤ndung hast, wird dein Konto sofort gesperrt und die Forderung an den GlÃ¤ubiger Ã¼berwiesen.Wie hoch ist der gesetzliche P-Konto-Freibetrag?Der gesetzliche P-Konto-Freibetrag liegt bei â‚¬1.340.Wenn du nicht alles davon ausgibst, steht dir der Restbetrag im Folgemonat zur VerfÃ¼gung bis zu insgesamt 3 aufeinanderfolgenden Monaten. Das bedeutet: Falls du ein monatliches Einkommen von mindestens 1340â‚¬ hast und nicht alles davon ausgibst, kann sich dein Freibetrag auf bis zu 3 x 1340â‚¬ = 4020â‚¬ summieren.Â Falls du kein Einkommen auf dein N26-Konto erhÃ¤ltst, entspricht der Freibetrag des Folgemonats dem restlichen Freibetrag des vorherigen Monats. Wenn du also deinen gesamten Freibetrag ausgegeben hast und im Folgemonat auch kein Einkommen erhÃ¤ltst, hast du keinen Freibetrag mehr Ã¼brig.Du kannst deinen aktuellen Freibetrag jederzeit in der App sehen unter: Mein Konto > Ãœbersicht zum P-Konto

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content: Direct debits returned to your account due toÂ insufficient funds* are charged a â‚¬3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9) in accordance with ourÂ Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,Â overdraftÂ interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you donâ€™t recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. You can check the list of countries below:BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland

title: Wo bleibt meine RÃ¼ckerstattung?
content: Du wartest auf eine RÃ¼ckerstattung und fragst dich, wo sie bleibt? Vielleicht ist sie schon auf deinem Konto! In einigen FÃ¤llen wird deine RÃ¼ckerstattung nÃ¤mlich am Tag der ursprÃ¼nglichen Transaktion in der N26 App angezeigt â€“ und nicht zum Zeitpunkt der Erstattung. Scrolle im Home-Bereich deiner N26 App einfach in der Transaktionsliste nach unten oder prÃ¼fe deine KontoauszÃ¼ge, um deine RÃ¼ckerstattung zu finden. So kannst du deine (vorlÃ¤ufigen und vollstÃ¤ndigen) KontoauszÃ¼ge einsehen und als PDF herunterladen:In der Web App (neuen Tab):Klicke im Home-Bereich oben links neben dem â€œGeld erhaltenâ€ Button auf das Download-Symbol (Pfeil nach unten).Â Im Download-Bereich siehst du links eine Ãœbersicht mit deinen (vorlÃ¤ufigen) KontoauszÃ¼gen.Klicke auf den jeweiligen Monat, um deine KontoauszÃ¼ge herunterzuladen.Auf deinem Smartphone:Tippe im Home-Bereich oben neben der Lupe auf die drei vertikalen Linien.WÃ¤hle â€œKontoauszÃ¼geâ€ und tippe dann in der Liste auf den jeweiligen Monat, um deine KontoauszÃ¼ge herunterzuladenWie lange dauert eine RÃ¼ckerstattung bei N26?Wenn du die RÃ¼ckerstattung nicht finden kannst, ist sie mÃ¶glicherweise noch auf dem Weg. Eine regulÃ¤re RÃ¼ckerstattung einer Kartenzahlung dauert bis zu 12 Tage. Die Kaution fÃ¼r eine Autovermietung erhÃ¤ltst du nach maximal 30 Tagen zurÃ¼ck. Wie Kartenzahlungen genau funktionieren, kannst du in unserem Artikel nachlesen.Du hast nach 12 Tagen noch keine RÃ¼ckerstattung erhalten? Dann kannst du in deiner N26 App eine Reklamation starten. Folge dazu einfach dieser Anleitung.

title: 2 Months N26 Smart Free Trial
content:
Eligibility: All EU marketsEver wanted to try out our N26 Smart account, but not sure if itâ€™s for you? Well now you can enjoy 2 whole months for free - And â€˜try before you buyâ€™ - to see if our Smart account works for you, with no commitment!If you want to take part in our N26 Smart free trial, you will have access to our premium banking features included with our Smart account. And see the value by getting more out of your everyday banking.What is included in our Smart free trial?60 day free trial: Eligible N26 customers can take advantage of our 60 day Smart free trial.Cancel at any point: At any point during your free trial, youâ€™ll be able to cancel and still enjoy the benefits for the full 60 days (you will be automatically downgraded back to Standard after 60 days)Continue with Smart: If you decide our N26 Smart account is for you, then you can take no action to continue with our Smart account and pay the monthly fee of 4,90â‚¬. If you change your mind after the free trial is over, you can always downgrade back to Standard.Enjoy the benefits of our Smart account: You can use the following benefits during your 60 day Smart free trial:Spaces (up to 10)Up to 10 Shared SpacesIBAN for Spaces (DE customers only) Up to 5 free ATM withdrawals/ monthRound-ups SavingsEnjoy partner offers and discountsPhone supportHow to access the Smart free trial?If you have been invited to a Free Trial of our Smart membership, you will be able to access it by following the instructions below. From the push notification: Tap on the push notificationWhen the N26 app opens, your invitation explaining the free trial offer will open automatically. Click on â€œcontinueâ€ to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, please read and accept the Terms and Conditions, thenClick â€œConfirm Purchaseâ€ : you are officially part of the trial now, and will see a success message! From the N26 app: Open the N26 appYou will see the Smart Free Trial offer entrypoint at the top of your home screen. Tap on â€œLearn Moreâ€ This will open the invitation screen explaining the free trial offer in detail. Click on â€œcontinueâ€ to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, read and accept the Terms and Conditions, then
Click â€œConfirm Purchaseâ€ : you are officially part of the trial now! Note: If you received an email inviting you to start the trial, we recommend opening it from your phone and clicking the â€œStart free trialâ€ button. This will automatically open the N26 app and load the invitation page. Otherwise, login to your N26 mobile app and follow the app flow above.

title: How to block a Direct Debit?
content: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as â€œDocuSignâ€.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

title: Warum prÃ¼ft N26 Transaktionen?
content:
Wir haben die Aufgabe, RoutineprÃ¼fungen von Transaktionen durchzufÃ¼hren, um die Sicherheit deines Kontos zu gewÃ¤hrleisten (sieheÂ GwG Â§ 10 (neuen Tab)). Diese ÃœberprÃ¼fungen betreffen einzelne Transaktionen und werden automatisch von unseren Systemen initiiert.Aus diesem Grund kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen. Wenn Du eine solche Anfrage erhÃ¤ltst, sende uns die angeforderten Unterlagen bitte via Nachrichten von N26. Es gibt keine Ausnahmen fÃ¼r solche ÃœberprÃ¼fungen, und sie kÃ¶nnen auch nicht umgangen werden.Â Dabei handelt es sich um Standardprozesse wie sie bei Banken Ã¼blich sind, um die Sicherheit unserer Kundenkonten zu gewÃ¤hrleisten.Der genaue PrÃ¼fvorgang und das Ergebnis werden vertraulich behandelt und nur intern verarbeitet. Hier findest du einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:Hier sind einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:In der E-Mail, die du von uns erhÃ¤ltst, werden wir dir genau erklÃ¤ren, welches spezifische Dokument wir von dir benÃ¶tigen. Du kannst uns eingescannte Dokumente, Bilder oder Screenshots zusenden (vorausgesetzt, der Originalinhalt des Dokuments ist deutlich lesbar). Bitte gib uns auch eine genaue Beschreibung Ã¼ber den Inhalt des Dokuments.Du kannst einen Beleg, eine Rechnung, einen Vertrag oder ein Ã¤hnliches Dokument einreichen, das es uns ermÃ¶glicht, die jeweilige Transaktion und deren Herkunft und Zweck eindeutig zu identifizieren. .Sei prÃ¤zise in deinen Antworten, Details und Dokumenten. Nachdem wir deine Unterlagen erhalten haben, lassen wir dich wissen, ob sie fÃ¼r die ÃœberprÃ¼fung ausreichend sind. In einigen FÃ¤llen kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach weiteren Details fragen werden, was zu VerzÃ¶gerungen fÃ¼hren kann.Antworte so frÃ¼h wie mÃ¶glich, also vor der genannten Frist, direkt auf die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast und sende deine Unterlagen mit.Â Unserem Kundendienst liegen zu diesem Thema keine weiteren Informationen vor.Du musst die je nach deiner Situation gÃ¼ltigen Dokumente vorlegen. 
Einige Beispiele:Du hast finanzielle Hilfe von deiner Familie erhalten, um Projekte abzuschlieÃŸen oder hast GrundstÃ¼cke oder Geld von Verwandten geerbt.Ein GewÃ¤hrungs-/Darlehensvertrag, ein offizielles Erbschaftsdokument oder ein offizielles Dokument Ã¼ber die Herkunft des Darlehens (z.B. Verkaufsunterlagen einer verÃ¤uÃŸerten Immobilie zur Finanzierung des Darlehens oder KontoauszÃ¼ge von Verwandten, von denen das Geld stammt).Du hast eine Immobilie verÃ¤uÃŸert oder deine Aktien an der BÃ¶rse verkauft.Den Vertrag Ã¼ber die vereinbarten GeschÃ¤fte oder notarielle Beurkundung des EigentumsÃ¼bergangs.Du hast Geld erhalten oder gesendet, um Rechnungen zu bezahlen oder ein Produkt zu kaufen.KontoauszÃ¼ge Ã¼ber die Herkunft des Geldes oder Dokumente, die die Verwendung des Geldes und seinen Zweck belegen.Du hast eine Abfindung von deinem vorherigen Arbeitgeber erhalten.Dokumente, die das Ende deines ArbeitsverhÃ¤ltnisses belegen, mit einer ZahlungsbegrÃ¼ndung und/oder einem Kontoauszug deines frÃ¼heren Arbeitgebers.

title: Pourquoi mon virement bancaire est toujours en attente dans mon application N26 ?
content: Pour procÃ©der Ã  des virements, utiliser les servicesÂ MoneyBeam,Â CASH26Â et effectuer des virements permanents, vous devez les confirmer avec votre Code de validation. Vos virements restent en attente jusquâ€™Ã  ce que vous les confirmiez ou annuliez depuis lâ€™application.Votre Code de validation est nÃ©cessaire pour confirmer vos transactions, il nâ€™a donc pas la mÃªme fonction que le codeÂ PIN de votre carte (nouvel onglet). Vous choisissez votre Code de validation lors de la crÃ©ation de votre compte, et le code PIN de la carte lors de son activation.Si vous entrez un Code de validation erronÃ© Ã  6 reprises, il sera bloquÃ© pour des raisons de sÃ©curitÃ©. Vous pouvez le restaurer en leÂ changeant (nouvel onglet)Â depuis votre application mobile en cliquant sur.

title: N26 puÃ² chiudere il mio account?
content: N26 limiterÃ  o chiuderÃ  un conto solo come ultimo provvedimento.In quanto banca in possesso di piena licenza bancaria, N26 Ã¨ tenuta a effettuare controlli tecnici di routine sui conti dei clienti. Essendo un'istituzione regolamentata, ciÃ² ci aiuta a garantire che i depositi contenuti nei conti N26 siano al sicuro.Occasionalmente, i risultati di questi controlli di routine possono determinare l'interruzione della nostra relazione commerciale con il titolare di un conto.Ogni volta che ciÃ² accade, informeremo il titolare del conto dettagliatamente in merito alla situazione tramite email. In ogni caso, N26 ti contatterÃ  solo all'indirizzo email associato al tuo conto. In questa email verranno fornite istruzioni chiare sui successivi passaggi da seguire.Fai sempre attenzione e verifica che queste email provengano da N26. Ti contatteremo solo all'indirizzo email associato al tuo conto N26 e mai per SMS o telefono e non ti chiederemo mai le coordinate bancarie del tuo conto N26, password o dati della carta.Per maggiori informazioni sui motivi per cui possiamo chiudere un conto, fare riferimento alla sezione 5.2 dei nostri Termini e Condizioni (nuova tabella)Cosa succede se il mio conto viene chiuso?Di solito informiamo per iscritto (email) i nostri clienti se intendiamo chiudere il loro conto, spiegando loro come trasferire i propri fondi ad un'altra banca.Â Qualora non riuscissi a trasferire i tuoi fondi, o se dovessimo essere obbligati a chiudere il conto con effetto immediato, e non sussistono ragioni legali per trattenere i tuoi fondi, faremo del nostro meglio per farti riavere il tuo denaro il prima possibile. Ti preghiamo di tenere d'occhio le email che riceverai da noi, che ci consentiranno di inviarti i tuoi fondi rimanenti. Quasi l'80% dei casi in cui non siamo riusciti a trasferire i fondi sono stati causati dal fatto che il cliente non ha fornito una prova dell'IBAN a proprio nome (o di un conto congiunto) aperto preferibilmente nello stesso paese in cui Ã¨ stato aperto il conto, o nelle aree UE o del Nord America.Ho ricevuto una notifica che il mio conto verrÃ  chiuso. Cosa devo fare?Se hai domande relative allo stato del tuo conto o ai tuoi fondi rimanenti, ti preghiamo di contattarci rispondendo direttamente all'email che ti ha notificato la chiusura del tuo conto. Ecco come:1. Â  Â  Effettua l'accesso nell'App N262. Â  Â  Vai a Il mio conto > Aiuto > Messaggi 3. Â  Â  Apri il messaggio in questione e premi il pulsante Rispondi in fondo al messaggio.Se non riesci piÃ¹ ad accedere al tuo conto tramite l'app N26, puoi anche rispondere direttamente dalla tua email.Ricorda che i nostri specialisti del Supporto Clienti non saranno in grado di assisterti tramite chat, poichÃ© non possiamo condividere informazioni relative a questo processo tramite un messaggio di chat per motivi legali e di protezione dei dati.

title: I was overcharged at the gas station
content: N26 operates in real-time. That means youâ€™ll receive push notifications as soon as a transaction appears on your account. However, this also means that when you make a payment at a gas station, the amount that appears to be taken from your accountâ€”i.e. the amount shown in the push notificationâ€”may not match the amount displayed at the gas pump.Â This happens because sometimes a gas station will place an authorization hold on your N26 debit card. This authorization hold blocks the maximum amount the pump can deliverâ€”usually between â‚¬100 and â‚¬150â€” as a deposit to ensure that youâ€™ve got enough funds in your account to cover the final transaction amount. But fear not! Although it appears that the full sum is being deducted from your account, this isn't actually the case.Â This is whatâ€™s known as a â€œPendingâ€ charge, and youâ€™ll only pay for the gas youâ€™ve actually purchased in the end. The real transaction amount will normally appear on your transaction list within a few hours of the purchaseâ€”and within 48 hours at maximum. If you discover that youâ€™ve been charged more than what you paid, donâ€™t hesitate to contact our Customer Support.If the transaction failed, despite appearing on your transaction list in the N26 app, the charge will expire within 12 days and the amount on the hold will be automatically refunded.

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all depositsÂ up to â‚¬100.000Â held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud?Â N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

title: Wie kann ich eine Lastschrift rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen?
content: Eine RÃ¼cklastschrift bedeutet nicht, dass dein Vertrag mit dem HÃ¤ndler gekÃ¼ndigt wurde.Du hast die MÃ¶glichkeit, eine Lastschrift in der App bis zu 8 Wochen nach der Belastung selbst rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig zu machen. Nachdem du in der App auf RÃ¼cklastschrift getippt hast, dauert es bis zu 2 Bankarbeitstage, bis Lastschriftbetrag wieder gutschrieben wird.Lastschrift in meinem Hauptkonto rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einÃ–ffne deine Umsatzliste und wÃ¤hle die entsprechende Lastschrift ausTippe auf RÃ¼cklastschriftLastschrift in einem Space mit IBAN (Unterkonto) rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen:Du kannst in der App auch eine SEPA-RÃ¼cklastschrift fÃ¼r deine Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN beantragen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einTippe auf Spaces (Unterkonten)Gehe zum Space, in dem du eine Lastschrift rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen willstWÃ¤hle die entsprechende Transaktion ausTippe auf RÃ¼cklastschrift*FÃ¼r LÃ¤nder mit einer anderen HauptwÃ¤hrung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner LandeswÃ¤hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des ZahlungsempfÃ¤ngers die GebÃ¼hren fÃ¼r den WÃ¤hrungsumtausch sowie den endgÃ¼ltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Das gilt fÃ¼r folgende LÃ¤nder: Bulgarien, Kroatien, Tschechien, DÃ¤nemark, Ungarn, Island, Liechtenstein, Norwegen, Polen, RumÃ¤nien, Schweden, Schweiz

title: Was sind IBANs fÃ¼r Spaces (Unterkonten)?
content: VerfÃ¼gbar fÃ¼r Premium-Kunden in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Belgien, DÃ¤nemark, Estland, Finnland, Griechenland, Island, Irland, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Schweden und die Schweiz.IBANs fÃ¼r Spaces-Unterkonten:Mit unserem Feature â€IBANs fÃ¼r Spacesâ€œ werden deine einzelnen Spaces noch nÃ¼tzlicher. Bisher konnten Spaces keine eingehenden Ãœberweisungen empfangen oder zur Zahlung deiner ausgehenden Lastschriften verwendet werden. Sobald du einem Space eine IBAN zuweist, kannst du aber eingehende Ãœberweisungen direkt in dem Space empfangen. Zudem kannst du einen Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN verwenden, um deine ausgehenden Lastschriften zu bezahlen. Wie funktionieren IBANs fÃ¼r Spaces?Mit dem Feature â€IBANs fÃ¼r Spacesâ€œ kÃ¶nnen Kunden mit einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft (N26 Smart, You oder Metal), die ihr N26 Konto in Deutschland erÃ¶ffnet haben und Ã¼ber eine deutsche IBAN verfÃ¼gen, einem Space eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen und somit darauf Ãœberweisungen empfangen und Lastschriften erstellen.Im Folgenden findest du eine Ãœbersicht Ã¼ber die Funktionen im Rahmen der Zuweisung einer IBAN zu deinem Space bzw. deinen Spaces:Eine IBAN zu deinen Spaces hinzufÃ¼gen: Du kannst einem bestehenden oder neu angelegten Space eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen â€“ und zwar bis zu maximal 10 Mal. Shared Spaces kann keine IBAN zugewiesen werden.Mehrere Spaces mit IBANs: Du kannst bis zu 10 Spaces erstellen, jeder mit einer eigenen individuellen IBAN, wodurch du noch mehr Kontrolle Ã¼ber deine Finanzen hast. Bitte beachte, dass nach der Zuweisung von IBANs an 3 Spaces ein Zeitlimit von 24 Stunden aktiviert wird, bis einem Space eine neue individuelle IBAN zugewiesen werden kann.Ãœberweisungen empfangen: Du kannst Ãœberweisungen direkt in einen Space mit zugewiesener IBAN empfangen.Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen: Du kannst Ãœberweisungen direkt aus einem Space, dem du eine IBAN zugewiesen hast, tÃ¤tigen. Ausgehende Zahlungen per Lastschrift tÃ¤tigen: Du kannst die individuelle IBAN deines Spaces verwenden, um ausgehende wiederkehrende Lastschriften direkt von deinem Space aus abzuwickeln. Solltest du nicht genug Guthaben auf dem Space haben, um den Betrag der Lastschrift zu decken, wird die Ãœberweisung abgelehnt und eine GebÃ¼hr von deinem Hauptkonto abgebucht.IBAN deines Spaces anzeigen: Du kannst die jeweilige IBAN deiner Spaces einsehen, mit der du Ãœberweisungen empfangen und deine Lastschriften abwickeln kannst. Logge dich dazu einfach in die mobile App oder N26 Web-App ein, Ã¶ffne den â€Spacesâ€œ-Tab und wÃ¤hle den Space aus, dessen IBAN du einsehen mÃ¶chtest. Gehe zu den Space-Einstellungen. Dort findest du die IBAN und den BIC.So fÃ¼gst du zu einem Space eine IBAN hinzu:Du kannst eine IBAN zu deinen Spaces hinzufÃ¼gen, indem du die folgenden Schritte ausfÃ¼hrst:Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein.Ã–ffne den â€œSpacesâ€-Tab.WÃ¤hle den Space, dem du eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen mÃ¶chtest.Tippe auf das Zahnrad-Symbol oben rechts im Fenster, um zu den Spaces-Einstellungen zu gelangen.Folge dem Ablauf in der App:WÃ¤hle â€IBAN erstellenâ€œLies dir die Informationen durch und tippe anschlieÃŸend auf â€IBAN hinzufÃ¼gen zu ...â€œ Nimm die AGBs anGib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN einTippe im letzten Fenster auf â€Alles klarâ€œSo lÃ¶schst du einen Space, dem eine IBAN zugewiesen wurde:Um eine IBAN aus einem Space zu entfernen, musst du den Space komplett lÃ¶schen und das verbleibende Guthaben entweder auf dein Hauptkonto oder einen anderen Space Ã¼berweisen. Um einen Space mit einer IBAN zu lÃ¶schen, gehe bitte wie folgt vor:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einTippe auf â€Spaces (Unterkonten)â€œWÃ¤hle den Space mit einer IBAN, den du lÃ¶schen willst (denke daran, dass dadurch der Space komplett gelÃ¶scht wird und jegliches verbleibende Guthaben vorher auf ein anderes Konto Ã¼berwiesen werden muss).Gehe auf â€Spaces-Einstellungenâ€œ (klicke auf das Zahnrad-Symbol oben rechts).Unter â€Verwaltenâ€œ findest du die Option â€Restguthaben auf ein anderes Konto Ã¼berweisen & Space lÃ¶schenâ€œ.Klicke auf diese Option und bestÃ¤tige, dass du den Space lÃ¶schen mÃ¶chtest.WÃ¤hle dein Hauptkonto oder einen anderen Space aus, auf das/den du das verbleibende Guthaben Ã¼berweisen mÃ¶chtest.Tippe zum Schluss zur BestÃ¤tigung im Fenster auf â€LÃ¶schenâ€œ.Du kannst von deinen Spaces, denen eine IBAN zugeordnet ist, ausgehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen durchfÃ¼hren. Befolge dazu bitte die untenstehenden Schritte:Gehe in den Space, von dem du eine Ãœberweisung durchfÃ¼hren mÃ¶chtest und tippe auf "Geld senden".WÃ¤hle "BankÃ¼berweisung" ausWÃ¤hle den Kontakt aus, an den du Geld Ã¼berweisen mÃ¶chtest.BestÃ¤tige den Betrag, den du Ã¼berweisen mÃ¶chtest und gib eine Referenz ein (optional).Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein und bestÃ¤tige, um die Ãœberweisung abzuschlieÃŸen.Ãœberweisungen empfangen: Du kannst eingehende Ãœberweisungen direkt in einem Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN empfangen. Bitte beachte, dass alle Ãœberweisungen, die an dich gerichtet sind, immer auf den Namen des Kontoinhabers lauten sollten.

title: Cosa succede se il mio saldo Ã¨ negativo?
content: Il tuo saldo puÃ² diventare negativo se devi pagare delle commissioni N26, ad es. per la nostra consegna express o la membership premium. Inoltre, il tuo saldo puÃ² diventare negativo se arrivano pagamenti offline con carta da addebitare. Questi sono, per esempio, i pagamenti effettuati su aerei o navi, che non possono essere detratti dal saldo del tuo conto nel momento in cui vengono autorizzati ma che devono comunque essere addebitati.Ai sensi dei nostri Termini e Condizioni sei tenuto a restituire la somma in essere. Riceverai un promemoria tramite email in cui ti pregheremo di compensare il saldo negativo sul tuo conto il prima possibile. Fintanto che il saldo del tuo conto rimane negativo non potrai effettuare altri pagamenti o prelievi.Che succede se il saldo del mio conto rimane negativo?Il tuo conto rimane attivo per 60 giorni da quando diventa negativo. In questo periodo:Riceverai altri due promemoria.Se hai un conto N26 You, N26 Metal o N26 Business You, tutti i servizi verranno disdetti dopo 60 giorni e il tuo conto verrÃ  tramutato in un conto standard.Se non effettui nessuna azione in questi 60 giorni, possiamo chiudere il tuo conto.

title: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
content:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest â€œSplit the billâ€ feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where youâ€™re sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on â€˜Homeâ€™ tab, tap it and choose â€˜Split the billâ€™Add the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, youâ€™ll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap â€˜Confirmâ€™ to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests canâ€™t be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

title: Bank documentsâ€”a guide to what's available
content: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reasonâ€”you can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and theyâ€™re perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Hereâ€™s how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening andâ€”if you wishâ€”it can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Hereâ€™s how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees youâ€™ve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. Youâ€™ll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipientâ€™s full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmationâ€”the PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (RelevÃ© d'IdentitÃ© Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank informationâ€”full name, legal address, IBAN and BICâ€”specific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the â€˜Add moneyâ€™ button.

title: PerchÃ© il mio bonifico non Ã¨ andato a buon fine?
content: Per ricevere un bonifico dovrai fornire al mittente il tuo nome completo (come scritto sul documento d'identitÃ  fornito per la verifica) e il tuo IBAN. Puoi trovare il tuo IBAN sui tuoi estratti conto o su ğŸ‘¤ Il mio conto (nell'app mobile o su N26 Web (nuova tabella)).Il nome del destinatario sull'ordine del bonifico Ã¨ diverso dal nome sul suo conto (deve essere quello scritto sul documento d'identitÃ ).Il nome del destinatario Ã¨ un nome aziendale invece che un nome/conto personale (valido per N26 Business).L'IBAN non Ã¨ corretto.Non ricevi la notifica push per confermare il tuo bonifico.Ãˆ stato identificato un uso improprio. N26 ha l'obbligo di eseguire controlli di routine sulle transazioni (vedi l'art. 10 del GWG, la legge tedesca sul riciclo di denaro (nuova tabella)). Di conseguenza, possiamo chiedere documenti per verificare l'origine o la fonte di queste transazioni. Questo puÃ² portare a un ritardo o alla mancata realizzazione del trasferimento del credito.Bonifici in entrata supportatiBonifici SEPABonifici SEPA istantaneiBonifici in valuta estera con WiseBonifici SWIFTBonifici in uscita supportatiBonifici SEPABonifici SEPA istantaneiBonifici in valuta estera con WiseTi preghiamo di tenere in considerazione le diverse tempistiche previste per ogni tipologia di bonifico.

title: Bank informationâ€”your N26 account ownership certificate
content: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the â€˜Add Moneyâ€™ button.

title: How to change my debit card PIN?
content: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change itâ€”you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that youâ€™ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose â€˜Cardsâ€™ from the bottom right-handTap â€˜Card Settingsâ€™ and select the relevant cardSelect â€˜Reset PINâ€™Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transactionâ€”in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequencesâ€”such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isnâ€™t accepted, simply try again a different combination.Â If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that youâ€™ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

title: Have you been victim of a fraud? Contact us.
content:
Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please help us save you time and contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If youâ€™re an N26 customer and have an authorized or unauthorized card transaction which you want to dispute, please use our dedicated and complete service in the N26 mobile app. The hotline above exclusively helps in case of transfers to a suspicious account with an N26 IBAN.Did you get a SMS followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt. This is how the fraud works:You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one (new tab) The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App> My Account> Settings >Security> Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,Â  send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comIn the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab).Iâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If youâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, youâ€™ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the â€˜Cardsâ€™ tab. You can mark the reason as â€œlostâ€ or â€œstolenâ€ based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, youâ€™ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).How can I protect my account from fraud?Â Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banksÂ Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularlyÂ Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behaviour.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.Useful links:What is phishing?What to do if my account may be compromised?

title: Warum habe ich meinen VerknÃ¼pfungscode nicht per SMS erhalten?
content: FÃ¼r iOS-Nutzer, die unsere Pairing-SMS nicht erhalten, ist evtl. eine SMS-Filter-Funktion aktiviert. Um unsere Nachricht in iMessage wiederzufinden, gehen Sie oben links auf die Option "Filter" und wÃ¤hlen Sie den Ordner Unbekannte Absender aus.Du brauchst einen VerknÃ¼pfungscode, um dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto zu verknÃ¼pfen. Falls du die SMS mit dem Code nicht erhÃ¤ltst, kannst du einen neuen bis zu fÃ¼nf Mal in der App anfordern. Bitte warte 30 Sekunden, bevor du es nochmal versuchst. Wenn du bereits alle fÃ¼nf Codes angefordert hast und die VerknÃ¼pfung noch immer nicht funktioniert, werden weitere Anfragen aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden fÃ¼r 24 Stunden blockiert. Wenn das geschieht, kannst du entweder warten, oder unseren Customer Support per Chat kontaktieren - wir helfen dir gerne weiter. Wenn deine LÃ¤ndervorwahl auÃŸerhalb der EU liegt, ist es wahrscheinlich dass du die SMS mit dem Code nicht bekommst und du uns kontaktieren musst.

title: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
content: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel itâ€”this can be done at any time (see below). Weâ€™ll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesnâ€™t affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, youâ€™ll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 monthâ€™s time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and youâ€™ll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after youâ€™ve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we havenâ€™t received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after youâ€™ve proved your identity, weâ€™ll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option youâ€™ve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee.Â You can immediately cancel your membership at any time by contacting us. If you choose this option, your N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal premium N26 Mastercard will be deactivated and we will issue you a virtual card upon downgrading to N26 Standard. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance coverage will also cease immediately.Revoke: You can revoke your membership within the 14-day period, which starts as soon as the first fee is charged. We will deactivate your premium N26 Mastercard and issue you a virtual card for use with an N26 Standard account.Can I get a refund?If you cancel your membership within the 14-days revocation period using our support chat, weâ€™ll fully refund your initial fee. If you cancel a prepaid membership after the 14-days revocation period, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months that have been prepaid.However, if you originally prepaid at a discounted price, youâ€™ll receive a refund for any remaining months as if you were subject to the full payment price. You will only get the discount if you stay subscribed through the full period of your prepayment

title: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
content: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above â‚¬150 will be charged with a 12.50â‚¬ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than â‚¬150.The maximum fee is â‚¬100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesnâ€™t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

title: Â¿Por quÃ© ha fallado mi transferencia SEPA?
content: â„¹ï¸Â VÃ¡lido en todas las regiones a excepciÃ³n del Reino UnidoPara recibir una transferencia, tienes que proporcionarle al remitente tu nombre completo (tal y como figura en el documento de identidad que nos has proporcionado para la verificaciÃ³n) y tu IBAN. Puedes encontrar tu IBAN en tus extractos y en ğŸ‘¤ Mi cuenta (en la app del mÃ³vil o la WebApp (pestaÃ±a nueva)).El nombre del beneficiario en la orden de transferencia es diferente del nombre de su cuenta (debe ser su nombre tal y como figura en su documento de identidad).El nombre del destinatario es el nombre de una empresa en lugar de un nombre particular/de cuenta (esto se aplica a N26 Business).El IBAN es incorrecto.No has recibido la notificaciÃ³n push para confirmar tu transferencia.Se ha detectado un uso indebido. N26 tiene la obligaciÃ³n de llevar a cabo inspecciones rutinarias de las transacciones (vÃ©ase el artÃ­culo 10 de la GwG (pestaÃ±a nueva)). Por ello, es posible que te pidamos documentos para verificar el origen de estas transacciones. Esto puede acarrear que la transferencia se retrase o no se ejecute.QuÃ© transferencias entrantes ofrecemosTransferencias SEPATransferencias SEPA inmediatasTransferencias en divisas extranjeras con WiseTransferencias SWIFTQuÃ© transferencias salientes ofrecemosTransferencias SEPATransferencias SEPA inmediatasTransferencias en divisas extranjeras con WiseTen en cuenta los plazos estimados para los distintos tipos de transferencia.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasnâ€™t been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you donâ€™t have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000â‚¬,Â and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500â‚¬. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you canâ€™t withdraw your daily limit at once.

content: Pagamenti con carta in negozi e onlineLimite giornaliero: 5.000 â‚¬Limite mensile: 20.000 â‚¬Prelievi ATMIl limite giornaliero di 1.000 â‚¬ si applica in: Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Lettonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Polonia, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Portogallo, Spagna, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Svezia e Svizzera.Il limite giornaliero di 400 â‚¬ si applica in: Togo, Congo, Benin, Costa dâ€™Avorio, Kenya, Camerun, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Repubblica Centrafricana, Gambia, Ghana, Ruanda, Tunisia e Uganda.Il limite settimanale di 2.500 â‚¬ si applica in tutti i paesi.
