Non c'Ã¨ un importo minimo di prelievo. Puoi anche prelevare soltanto un centesimo.Il limite combinato di prelievi e depositi Ã¨ di 999â‚¬ ogni 24 ore.I clienti con IBAN Italiano posso prelevare e depositare contanti per un massimo di 2000â‚¬ a settimana.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box â€œAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.â€All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, youâ€™ll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,Â e.g.Â MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions withoutÂ typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visibleÂ enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 usersÂ selected from your contact list.

title: What are Instant transfers?
content: All N26 customers now have the ability to send instant transfers. Unlike regular SEPA transfers which are processed within two business days, instant transfers are sent and received within seconds. Instant transfers can be beneficial if you need to send an urgent transfer (can take around 10 seconds), however, there is a fee for our Standard customers, which is shown before you confirm the transfer. So if the transfer can wait up to 2 days, then a normal SEPA transfer is more likely to be suited. Our Premium customers can use instant transfers with no fee.Although instant, these types or transfers are still able to be delayed due to processing, embargo etc. (just like regular transfers), so for important payments e.g. deposits, down payments, it is best to make these payments in advance to avoid any external financial losses due to delays.How does it work?If you want to send an instant transfer: Simply login to your N26 mobile appSelect Send Money > Bank transferYou will then be asked to enter:Recipient nameIBANAdd a message (optional) and confirm the transaction.Select Instant Bank TransferEnter your Confirmation PIN Confirm the transactionThe transfer will be processed and received within approximately 10 secondsPlease note: if the recipientâ€™s bank isn't part of the SCT Instant Scheme, you wonâ€™t have the option to send an instant transfer.Important information:**N26 Standard customers will be charged a fee for using instant transfers. The fee is charged directly after as a separate transaction and the fee is different per country:Germany and Austria - 0,49â‚¬Spain - 1,99â‚¬Italy, France and Rest of Europe - 0,99â‚¬The maximum amount you can send with an instant transfer will be 2.000â‚¬ (5 times a day for a maximum of 10.000â‚¬ per day). If youâ€™re using instant transfer for an important payment (deposit, fine, down payment), please consider sending the payment in advance in order to avoid any delay related to its possible rejection or embargo.If youâ€™re paying a good or service via instant bank transfer, always make sure to check the receiverâ€™s details and credentials before confirming the transaction. It is always best to be vigilant against scams. Please note: Not all banks are currently present in the instant transfer Scheme. If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

title: Wie kann ich einen Dispokredit anfragen?
content:
VerfÃ¼gbar in Deutschland und Ã–sterreich.Du kannst einen Dispokredit nur in der mobilen N26-App beantragen. Du erfÃ¤hrst in Echtzeit, ob du dazu berechtigt bist, ohne dass FormalitÃ¤ten zu erledigen sind. So beantragst du einen N26-Dispokredit:Melde dich bei der mobilen N26-App an.Tippe im Homescreen auf die Registerkarte â€Entdeckenâ€œ.Scrolle nach unten zu â€Finanzielle Produkteâ€œ.Wische zur Seite und tippe auf â€N26-Dispokreditâ€œ. Befolge die in der App angezeigten
Schritte.Dort kannst du auch die Limits des Dispokredits Ã¤ndern, deine anfallenden Zinsen einsehen oder deinen Dispokredit jederzeit kÃ¼ndigen. Der Zinssatz liegt bei 10,15% p.a. Die anfallenden Zinsen ziehen wir am Ende jeden Quartals von deinem Konto ab.Bei der Beantragung eines N26-Dispokredits prÃ¼fen wir Informationen zu deiner persÃ¶nlichen und finanziellen Situation. Wir entscheiden dann mit einem mathematisch-statistischen Verfahren und entsprechend unserer Risikobereitschaft zum jeweiligen Zeitpunkt automatisch, ob du Anspruch auf einen N26-Dispokredit hast und welchen Rahmen wir dir anbieten kÃ¶nnen. DiesbezÃ¼glich gilt:Wir berÃ¼cksichtigen mehrere Faktoren und bewerten die personenbezogenen Daten, die
wir Ã¼ber dich haben, um unsere Entscheidung Ã¼ber deinen N26-Dispokreditantrag zu
treffen, wie in unserer Datenschutzrichtlinie genauer beschrieben.Wenn du die automatisierte Entscheidung zu deinem Anspruch oder zu den Limits fÃ¼r
deinen N26-Dispokredit anfechten und mÃ¶chten, dass diese automatisierte Entscheidung von einem Menschen Ã¼berprÃ¼ft wird, kannst du dich mit unserem Kundenservice-Team in Verbindung setzen, entweder per Live-Chat Ã¼ber die mobile N26-App, Web-App oder Ã¼ber das N26-Support-Center. Bitte beachte, dass wir kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur von einer E-Mail-Adresse aus besprechen kÃ¶nnen, die in deinem N26-Konto registriert ist, oder Ã¼ber deinen sicheren Posteingang in der App.Wenn du beschlieÃŸt, deinen N26-Dispokredit zu aktivieren, melden wir dies der SCHUFA.Warum habe ich keinen Dispokredit bekommen?Wie oben erwÃ¤hnt, wenden wir ein mathematisch-statistisches Verfahren an, um zu beurteilen und zu entscheiden, ob wir dir einen Dispokredit anbieten kÃ¶nnen. Das Ergebnis wird automatisch in Echtzeit ermittelt.Wenn du die obigen Schritte befolgt hast und keinen Dispokredit erhalten hast, bedeutet dies, dass wir dir derzeit wahrscheinlich keinen Dispokredit anbieten kÃ¶nnen. Letzteres kann insbesondere dann der Fall sein, wenn du eine aktive PfÃ¤ndung hast oder deinen Zahlungsverpflichtungen zuvor nicht nachgekommen bist. Wenn du N26-Konto zu deinem Hauptkonto, machst, wirkt sich dies auch positiv auf deine Berechtigung aus.Wenn du in Deutschland lebst, berÃ¼cksichtigen wir bei der Entscheidung Ã¼ber deinen Anspruch auf einen N26-Dispokredit und den zugehÃ¶rigen Rahmen deinen SCHUFA-Score, der bis zu drei Jahre alt sein kann. Wenn er Ã¤lter ist, fordern wir deinen neuesten SCHUFA-Score an, nachdem du unser N26-Dispoantragsverfahren durchlaufen hast. Dies kann auf deiner SCHUFA-Auskunft erscheinen, hat jedoch keinen Einfluss auf deinen SCHUFA-Score und ist nur fÃ¼r dich sichtbar. In diesem Fall wird dir mÃ¶glicherweise kein N26-Dispokredit angeboten. Wenn du in Ã–sterreich lebst, sehen wir uns deinen CRIF-Score an.Wenn du keinen Dispokredit erhÃ¤ltst, kannst du es zu einem spÃ¤teren Zeitpunkt erneut versuchen. Wenn du keinen Anspruch auf einen N26-Dispokredit haben, werden wir dich auf jeden Fall benachrichtigen, sobald du berechtigt bist. Wenn du die automatisierte Entscheidung Ã¼ber deine Berechtigung anfechten mÃ¶chtest, siehe oben, wie du mit uns in Kontakt treten kÃ¶nnen. Bei weiteren Fragen Ã¶ffne bitte direkt in der mobilen N26-App oder deinem Online-Banking (neuen Tab) einen Live-Chat.Weitere Informationen findest du in unseren Dispokredit-Bedingungen (neuen Tab).Warum bekomme ich keinen hÃ¶heren Dispokredit bekommen?Wie oben erwÃ¤hnt, wenden wir ein mathematisch-statistisches Verfahrensmodell an, um die Betragsgrenze zu ermitteln, die wir dir fÃ¼r einen Dispokredit anbieten kÃ¶nnen. Das Ergebnis wird automatisch in Echtzeit ermittelt und hÃ¤ngt von den persÃ¶nlichen und finanziellen Informationen ab, die wir Ã¼ber dich gespeichert haben, sowie von unserer Risikobereitschaft zu dem Zeitpunkt.Wir werden dich benachrichtigen, sobald wir dir ein hÃ¶heres Limit fÃ¼r deinen N26-Dispokredit gewÃ¤hren kÃ¶nnen. Wenn du die automatisierte Entscheidung Ã¼ber das Limit das wir dir anbieten kÃ¶nnen anfechten mÃ¶chtest, siehe oben wie du mit uns in Kontakt treten kannst. Bitte setze dich in diesem Fall mit uns in Verbindung, bevor du das von uns angebotene Dispolimit akzeptierst.Warum wurde mein Ãœberziehungsrahmen reduziert oder gekÃ¼ndigt?Wir Ã¼berprÃ¼fen unsere Ãœberziehungsrahmen regelmÃ¤ÃŸig, um unseren Kunden und Kundinnen angemessenen Schutz zu bieten. Diese Ã„nderung ist nicht in jedem Falle dauerhaft und du kannst mÃ¶glicherweise zu einem spÃ¤teren Zeitpunkt eine ErhÃ¶hung deines Ãœberziehungsrahmens in der App beantragen. FÃ¼r mehr Infos kannst du dich mit unserem Kundenservice-Team per Live-Chat Ã¼ber die mobile N26-App, Web-App oder Ã¼ber das N26-Support-Center in Verbindung setzen.Kann sich mein Ãœberziehungsrahmen Ã¤ndern? Warum wurde mein Ãœberziehungsrahmen herabgesetzt?Wir Ã¼berprÃ¼fen unsere Ãœberziehungsrahmen routinemÃ¤ÃŸig, um unseren Kunden und Kundinnen angemessenen Schutz zu bieten. Wir kÃ¶nnen Ãœberziehungsrahmen Ã¤ndern oder aufheben, wenn:wir unsere Kreditrichtlinien anpassendu wiederholt vergisst, deine KontoÃ¼berziehung innerhalb von 90 Tagen auszugleichendu deine KontoÃ¼berziehung wiederholt verspÃ¤tet ausgleichstdeine KreditwÃ¼rdigkeit signifikant herabgestuft wurdedu deinen Ãœberziehungsrahmen fÃ¼r betrÃ¼gerische oder illegale AktivitÃ¤ten nutztFalls dich unsere Ã„nderungen direkt betreffen, informieren wir dich darÃ¼ber selbstverstÃ¤ndlich.Was passiert, wenn ich bei negativem Kontostand meinen Dispo kÃ¼ndige?Dein in Anspruch genommener Dispokredit sowie die angefallenen Zinsen werden sofort fÃ¤llig.Du verlierst die MÃ¶glichkeit, dir Geld zu leihen, wenn dein Kontostand auf Null steht.Um erneut einen Dispokredit in Anspruch nehmen zu kÃ¶nnen, musst du das Bewerbungsverfahren neu durchlaufen. Eine Reaktivierung kann nicht garantiert werden.Nach der KÃ¼ndigung mÃ¼ssen sowohl der in Anspruch genommene Dispokredit sowie die anfallenden Zinsen direkt bezahlt werden, um weitere Kosten gegenÃ¼ber N26 aufgrund einer verzÃ¶gerten RÃ¼ckzahlung zu vermeiden. AuÃŸerdem wirst du fortan Zahlungserinnerungen erhalten, bis dein Kontostand ausgeglichen ist.Kann ich meinen Ãœberziehungsrahmen anheben lassen?Aktuell bieten wir keine ErhÃ¶hung von Ãœberziehungsrahmen an. Jedoch arbeiten wir daran, das in Zukunft zu ermÃ¶glichen.Was kann ich tun, wenn ich die KontoÃ¼berziehung nicht innerhalb der Frist ausgleichen kann?Deine aktuelle KontoÃ¼berziehung ist von Ãœberziehungsrahmen Ã„nderung nicht betroffen. Du kannst den Ãœberziehungsbetrag weiterhin mindestens einmal alle 90 Tage zurÃ¼ckzahlen, solange dein Dispokredit unter der HÃ¶chstgrenze liegt.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content: We collaborate with many partners. Thatâ€™s why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldnâ€™t be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).Youâ€™re taxable in the United States. If so, you wonâ€™t be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.Â Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap â€œAdd moneyâ€Select â€œCard transferâ€Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per top-up, for a maximum of 450â‚¬ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap â€œAdd moneyâ€Select â€œApple Payâ€ or â€œGoogle Payâ€Choose an amountÂ Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
content: We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback toÂ ideas@n26.com (new tab). Weâ€™re always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can alsoÂ file a complaint.

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we donâ€™t charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if youâ€™re certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could helpÂ get your money back.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content: Youâ€™ll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whetherÂ MoneyBeam, standing orders, orÂ CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you eitherÂ ConfirmÂ orÂ CancelÂ it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from yourÂ card PINÂ but you can use the same number for both. Youâ€™ll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN afterÂ connecting your smartphoneÂ (whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN byÂ changing itÂ in the app.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your accountâ€™s security (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.Â As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.Â This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message youâ€™ll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.Â Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.Â Our Customer Support doesnâ€™t have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

content: Con tu Mastercard de N26 disfrutas de una cantidad determinada de retiradas en cajeros gratuitas, conforme a nuestra PolÃ­tica de Uso Justo.TambiÃ©n puedes utilizar el localizador de cajeros Mastercard (pestaÃ±a nueva) para encontrar cajeros gratuitos.Las retiradas con CASH26 siempre son gratuitas en los establecimientos afiliados.*Para clientes en EspaÃ±a: En EspaÃ±a, algunos operadores de cajeros pueden cobrar una comisiÃ³n independiente de unos 2 â‚¬. De momento, no podemos evitar que se cobre esta comisiÃ³n, pero podemos ayudarte a recuperar el dinero si nos contactas a travÃ©s del chat de la app. Mientras tanto, te dejamos una lista de todos los bancos en los que puedes utilizar gratis los cajeros automÃ¡ticos: AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Â¿TodavÃ­a te han cobrado una comisiÃ³n en un cajero?

title: Come riordinare una carta?
content: Se stai giÃ  aspettando una carta, attendi che sia trascorso il tempo di consegna stimato. Puoi controllarlo in ogni momento dalla schermata principale della tua app mobile.Puoi richiedere una nuova carta nel caso in cui la tua sia smarrita, rotta, rubata o se ci fosse un problema con l'invio della tua prima carta (nuova tabella).Se hai bisogno di riordinare la tua carta, ti consigliamo di controllare prima il tuo indirizzo di spedizione nell'app, da ğŸ‘¤ Il mio Conto > Profilo > Indirizzi > Indirizzo di spedizione. Ricorda che:L'indirizzo che indichi deve essere residenziale (i recapiti di attivitÃ  commerciali non sono accettati).Â Â Il tuo nome deve essere indicato sulla casella della posta: se fosse presente un nome diverso, aggiungilo alle informazioni sull'indirizzo nella tua app mobile.Â Inserisci il tuo codice di avviamento postale senza spazi.Â Se possibile, aggiungi il numero dell'edificio, il numero della tromba delle scale e il codice della porta alle informazioni aggiuntive sull'indirizzo nell'app mobile.Â Se il tuo indirizzo contiene caratteri speciali, contatta il nostro servizio clienti dall'app.Â Se ti trasferirai presto, considera l'opzione di consegna express e assicurati di selezionare il tuo nuovo indirizzo di residenza.Se la tua prima carta N26 non Ã¨ arrivata entro il periodo di tempo stimato, apri una chat dall'app mobile o dall'app Web e saremo felici di assisterti.Se eri giÃ  in possesso di una carta attiva, segui questi passaggi:1. Dalla schermata principale, vai su Carte.2. Seleziona Impostazioni della carta.3. Dall'elenco delle carte, scorri fino a visualizzare la carta che desideri riordinareÂ 4. Selezionare Riordina.Inizia a usare la tua carta anche prima che arriviAnche prima che la tua carta sia consegnata per posta, potrai iniziare a usarla tramite il tuo wallet digitale Apple Pay o Google Pay. In questo modo potrai effettuare acquisti con il tuo smartphone presso i commercianti che supportano questo metodo di pagamento.Â Quanto costa riordinare la mia carta?Consegna standard: N26 Standard, N26 Smart & N26 You: 10â‚¬ N26 Metal: 45â‚¬Consegna express: N26 Standard, N26 Smart & N26 You: 30â‚¬ N26 Metal: 65â‚¬Se stai aspettando la tua prima carta e il tuo indirizzo di spedizione era corretto dall'inizio, contatta per favore il nostro Servizio Clienti. (nuova tabella)

title: Pourquoi mon virement a Ã©chouÃ© ?
content: Pour recevoir un virement, vous devrez fournir Ã  lâ€™expÃ©diteur votre nom complet (tel quâ€™il est Ã©crit sur la piÃ¨ce dâ€™identitÃ© fournie pour la vÃ©rification) et votre IBAN. Vous trouverez votre IBAN sur vos relevÃ©s bancaires et dans ğŸ‘¤ Mon compte (dans lâ€™application mobile ou lâ€™espace client en ligne (nouvel onglet)).Le nom du destinataire sur lâ€™ordre de virement est diffÃ©rent du nom du destinataire sur son compte (doit Ãªtre le nom exact inscrit sur sa piÃ¨ce dâ€™identitÃ©).Le nom du destinataire est le nom de sociÃ©tÃ© plutÃ´t quâ€™un nom personnel/de compte (sâ€™applique Ã  N26 Business).Lâ€™IBAN est incorrect.Vous ne recevrez pas la notification push pour confirmer votre virement.Une utilisation inappropriÃ©e a Ã©tÃ© dÃ©tectÃ©e. N26 est chargÃ©e dâ€™effectuer des contrÃ´les de routine des transactions (voir le paragraphe 10 de la GwG, loi contre le blanchiment dâ€™argent en Allemagne (nouvel onglet)). Par consÃ©quent, nous pouvons demander des documents pour vÃ©rifier lâ€™origine ou la provenance de ces transactions. Par consÃ©quent, le crÃ©dit peut Ãªtre retardÃ© ou ne pas avoir lieu.Virements entrants pris en chargeVirements SEPAVirements SEPA instantanÃ©sVirements en devises Ã©trangÃ¨res avec WiseVirements SWIFTVirements sortants pris en chargeVirements SEPAVirements SEPA instantanÃ©sVirements en devises Ã©trangÃ¨res avec WiseVeuillez noter les dÃ©lais estimÃ©s pour les diffÃ©rents types de virement.

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.Â Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.Â 
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support canâ€™t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. Youâ€™re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)Â or Â§ 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.Â According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If youâ€™d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. Weâ€™re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you donâ€™t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We donâ€™t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

title: Comment recevoir la prime de parrainage N26 ?
content: Depuis le 1erÂ octobre, nous sommes en train d'amÃ©liorer notre programme de parrainage N26. C'est pour cette raison que nous avons supprimÃ© ces informations de lâ€™application avant dâ€™effectuer ces changements. Les invitations et les adhÃ©sions effectuÃ©es avant le 1erÂ octobre 2021 donneront toujours le droit Ã  des primes. Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de communiquer une date prÃ©cise pour la reprise des parrainages.

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: â‚¬5,000Monthly limit: â‚¬20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of â‚¬1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of â‚¬400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of â‚¬2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of â‚¬1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: â‚¬1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limitÂ Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: â‚¬2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is â‚¬200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to â‚¬900 in any 24-hour period. Thereâ€™s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is â‚¬50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to â‚¬999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999â‚¬ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000â‚¬ per week.

title: PerchÃ© il mio trasferimento Ã¨ ancora in sospeso nell'app di N26?
content: Ogni volta che invii un bonifico, dovrai completare l'operazione inserendo il tuo PIN di conferma. Il bonifico rimarrÃ  in sospeso fino a quando non lo confermerai o lo annullerai tramite un messaggio push nellâ€™app.Il PIN di conferma Ã¨ diverso dalÂ PIN della carta, ma Ã¨ possibile utilizzare lo stesso numero per entrambi. Ti verrÃ  chiesto di scegliere un PIN di conferma appenaÂ colleghi lo smartphoneÂ (invece il PIN della carta potrai selezionarlo dopo aver attivato la carta).Se inserisci il PIN di conferma in modo errato per 6 volte di seguito, il PIN verrÃ  bloccato per motivi di sicurezza. Puoi ripristinare il PINÂ cambiandoloÂ nell'app.

title: Vorauszahlung fÃ¼r Premium-Mitgliedschaften
content: Der Vertrag fÃ¼r deine Mitgliedschaft gilt fÃ¼r ein Jahr und wird danach automatisch auf unbestimmte Zeit verlÃ¤ngert, bis du ihn kÃ¼ndigst. Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft jederzeit kÃ¼ndigen (siehe unten). Wir benachrichtigen dich 2 Monate vor der VerlÃ¤ngerung auf unbestimmte Zeit.Welche Zahlungsweisen stehen mir zur VerfÃ¼gung?Du kannst dein Jahresabo monatlich bezahlen oder fÃ¼r mehrere Monate (z. B. 6 oder 12 Monate) im Voraus zahlen, um einen Rabatt zu erhalten. Das beeinflusst aber nicht die Vertragslaufzeit.Beispiel: Du entscheidest dich dafÃ¼r, 6 Monate im Voraus zu zahlen und tÃ¤tigst bei Vertragsbeginn eine einmalige Zahlung fÃ¼r die ersten 6 Monate deines Jahresabos. 6 Monate spÃ¤ter, wenn die zweite HÃ¤lfte deines Jahresvertrags beginnt, zahlst du die zweite Rate.Wie und wann kann ich zahlen?Deine Mitgliedschaft beginnt, sobald du die erste Zahlung getÃ¤tigt hast. Erst dann hast du vollen Zugriff auf deine Premiumvorteile. Du kannst die erste MitgliedsgebÃ¼hr wahlweise per Debit- oder Kreditkarte, Apple Pay oder Google Pay zahlen. So erhÃ¤ltst du sofort Zugriff auf deine Premiumvorteile (vorausgesetzt, du hast deine IdentitÃ¤t schon verifiziert). Alternativ kannst du Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen und wir heben die MitgliedsgebÃ¼hr direkt von deinem N26 Konto ab. Falls wir die GebÃ¼hr (z. B. die monatliche Zahlung oder die erste Vorauszahlung) innerhalb von 15 Tagen nach IdentitÃ¤tsprÃ¼fung nicht erhalten haben, buchen wir sie automatisch von deinem N26 Konto ab und schalten deine Premiumvorteile frei. Danach wird die MitgliedsgebÃ¼hr automatisch von deinem N26 Konto abgebucht â€“ natÃ¼rlich entsprechend der Zahlungsweise, die du ausgewÃ¤hlt hast.Wie kann ich meine N26 Mitgliedschaft kÃ¼ndigen?Automatische VerlÃ¤ngerung beenden: Du kannst die automatische VerlÃ¤ngerung deiner Mitgliedschaft jederzeit wÃ¤hrend der ersten 12 Vertragsmonate beenden, indem du uns Ã¼ber den Kundenservice-Chat kontaktierst. Wenn du dich dafÃ¼r entscheidest, die VerlÃ¤ngerung zu beenden, kannst du deine N26 Mastercard und alle Vorteile deines Premiumkontos bis zum Ablauf deiner Mitgliedschaft weiterhin nutzen. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Versicherungsschutz (bei N26 You und N26 Metal) so lange behÃ¤ltst, wie du deine MitgliedschaftsgebÃ¼hr zahlen musst.Mitgliedschaft jederzeit kÃ¼ndigen: Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft jederzeit und unmittelbar kÃ¼ndigen, indem du uns kontaktierst. Wenn du ein N26 Smart, N26 You oder N26 Metal Konto hast und diese Option wÃ¤hlst, wird deine N26 Premium-Mastercard deaktiviert, dein Konto auf ein N26 Standard Konto umgestellt und eine Virtual Card fÃ¼r dich ausgestellt. Wenn du ein N26 You oder N26 Metal Konto hast, werden auÃŸerdem unmittelbar deine Versicherungsleistungen eingestellt.Widerruf: Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der gesetzlichen 14-tÃ¤gigen Frist widerrufen. Dieser Zeitraum beginnt mit der Abbuchung der ersten monatlichen GebÃ¼hr. Deine N26 Premium-Mastercard wird deaktiviert und wir stellen dir eine Virtual Card aus, die du mit deinem N26 Standard Konto nutzen kannst.Bekomme ich mein Geld zurÃ¼ck?Falls du deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der 14-tÃ¤gigen Widerrufsfrist Ã¼ber den Chat kÃ¼ndigst, erstatten wir dir die erste GebÃ¼hr. Falls du deine im Voraus bezahlte Mitgliedschaft nach Ablauf der 14-tÃ¤gigen Widerrufsfrist kÃ¼ndigst, erstatten wir dir die restlichen, im Voraus bezahlten Monate.Falls du deine Mitgliedschaft im Voraus zu einem reduzierten Preis bezahlt hast, erstatten wir dir die restlichen Monate. Die genutzten Monate ziehen wir aber zum vollen Preis ab. Du profitierst von dem Rabatt nur, wenn deine Mitgliedschaft wÃ¤hrend der gesamten Dauer deiner Vorauszahlung bestehen bleibt.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte Ã©tranger ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ©).Complete the Cerfa nÂ° 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

title: How to block contactless payments on my card?
content: Currently only available for iOS users on the mobile app.Contactless payments are really practical. But you might prefer to deactivate this payment method to prevent unauthorised transactions on your card. This is why you can now deactivate contactless payments on your card specifically:Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Toggle Contactless payments.The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen. Keep in mind that these settings refer to your physical card. You can read our dedicated articles to manage your Google Pay and Apple Pay settings. If youâ€™re experiencing difficulties with contactless card payments, please read the following article to learn how to make them work.

title: Quali sono i vantaggi di N26 You?
content: Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratis: ordinando la carta, scegli tra cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nellâ€™app!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU aggiuntiva fisica direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) a condividere e gestire insieme i fondi.Supporto telefonico dedicata: contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti in caso di domande.Â Prelievi ATM gratuiti in tutto il mondo: paga con la tua Mastercard N26 You online e in negozi fisici, evita commissioni nascoste e approfitta di zero commissioni per transazioni allâ€™estero in tutto il mondo. In piÃ¹, puoi prelevare gratuitamente in tutto il mondo, anche in valuta estera.Pacchetto assicurativo di Allianz Global Assistance*: assicurazione che include unâ€™ampia gamma di vantaggi personali e finanziari come:Assicurazione di viaggio: rimborso di spese mediche allâ€™estero, per cancellazioni dei viaggi in seguito a unâ€™emergenza medica, spese sostenute durante ritardo di volo superiore a 4 ore, spese in caso di ritardo bagagli imbarcati di piÃ¹ di 6 ore e spese di rimpatrio medico.Salvataggio neve e montagna: ricevi una copertura per ricerca, salvataggio, costi di primo trasporto e spese mediche in caso di incidenti durante una gita in montagna.Condivisi auto, bici e scooter: copertura in caso di danni o furto di veicoli affittati da aziende di car sharing.Confronta N26 YOU con gli altri piani (nuova tabella) per vedere quale Ã¨ piÃ¹ adatto a te!Tieni presente quanto segue se prendi in considerazioneÂ N26 You (nuova tabella):La Mastercard N26 You non ha i numeri in rilievo: i dati della carta, incluso il numero, il codice CVV e il token a 10 cifre sono stampati sul retro.Se passi a N26 You, il canone mensile di 9,90 â‚¬ verrÃ  detratto direttamente dal tuo conto N26 ogni mese a partire dalla data dell'upgrade. Se sei un nuovo cliente, il primo canone sarÃ  detratto 15 giorni dopo lâ€™accertamento dell'identitÃ . Da quel momento in poi, il canone mensile verrÃ  addebitato alla data di iscrizione. CiÃ² significa che, se hai aperto il tuo conto alla fine del mese, le prime due quote mensili verranno addebitate il mese successivo.Da ora in poi puoi decidere se pagare la tua commissione premium mensilmente, oppure in anticipo per i prossimi 6 mesi o un anno di contratto. Se scegli l'opzione di pagamento anticipato, beneficerai di uno sconto sul costo mensile del tuo conto premium (Smart / You / Metal) proporzionale al periodo di fatturazione che vuoi pagareDopo aver effettuato l'iscrizione, troverai le opzioni di fatturazione con il pagamento anticipato e i costi correlati nella tua app N26.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe Ã¨ un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while youâ€™re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once youâ€™re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Donâ€™t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you donâ€™t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while youâ€™re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We wonâ€™t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.Â

title: How to use my card digitally?
content: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

title: Quali sono i vantaggi di N26 Metal?
content: â„¹ï¸Disponibile in Germania, Austria, Francia, Spagna, Italia, Belgio, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Lettonia, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Olanda, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, Norvegia, Islanda e Liechtenstein.Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratis: ordinando la carta, scegli tra tre nuovi colori: Ambra, Nero e Ardesia.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nellâ€™app!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU aggiuntiva fisica direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) a condividere e gestire insieme i fondi.Supporto telefonico dedicata: contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti in caso di domande.Â Prelievi ATM gratuiti in tutto il mondo: paga con la tua Mastercard N26 Metal online e in negozi fisici, evita commissioni nascoste e approfitta di zero commissioni per transazioni allâ€™estero in tutto il mondo. In piÃ¹, puoi prelevare gratuitamente in tutto il mondo, anche in valuta estera.Offerte partner esclusive: (nuova tabella) offerte partner premium e sconti su marchi famosi in tutto il mondoPacchetto assicurativo di Allianz Global Assistance*: assicurazione che include unâ€™ampia gamma di vantaggi personali e finanziari come:Assicurazione di viaggio: rimborso di spese mediche allâ€™estero, per cancellazioni dei viaggi in seguito a unâ€™emergenza medica, spese sostenute durante ritardo di volo superiore a 4 ore, spese in caso di ritardo bagagli imbarcati di piÃ¹ di 6 ore e spese di rimpatrio medico.Salvataggio neve e montagna: ricevi una copertura per ricerca, salvataggio, costi di primo trasporto e spese mediche in caso di incidenti durante una gita in montagna.Condivisi auto, bici e scooter: copertura in caso di danni o furto di veicoli affittati da aziende di car sharing.Puoi confrontare N26 Metal con gli altri piani (nuova tabella) per vedere quale Ã¨ piÃ¹ adatto a te!Informazioni aggiuntive suÂ N26 Metal (nuova tabella):Se sei un nuovo cliente, il primo canone sarÃ  detratto 15 giorni dopo lâ€™accertamento dell'identitÃ . Da quel momento in poi, il canone mensile verrÃ  addebitato alla data di iscrizione.Per ricevere la carta, ricorda di effettuare una ricarica dopo aver completato lâ€™apertura del conto. Il saldo dovrÃ  poter coprire il costo della prima mensilitÃ  del tuo conto Metal.Se passi a N26 Metal, il canone mensile verrÃ  detratto direttamente dal tuo conto N26 ogni mese a partire dalla data dell'upgrade.Se hai effettuato l'upgrade a N26 You, tutti gli acquisti e i viaggi prenotati con la Mastercard N26 You rimarranno assicurati.Da ora in poi puoi decidere se pagare la tua commissione premium mensilmente, oppure in anticipo per i prossimi 6 mesi o un anno di contratto. Se scegli l'opzione di pagamento anticipato, beneficerai di uno sconto sul costo mensile del tuo conto premium (Smart / You / Metal) proporzionale al periodo di fatturazione che vuoi pagare.Dopo aver effettuato l'iscrizione, troverai le opzioni di fatturazione con il pagamento anticipato e i costi correlati nella tua app N26.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe Ã¨ un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

title: Meine Karte lÃ¤uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?
content: Wenn deine N26 Mastercard abgelaufen ist oder bald ablaufen wird, erhÃ¤ltst du in diesem Artikel alle Informationen, wie du eine neue bestellst, sowie die damit verbundenen Kosten und die Versandzeiten.Â Bevor du mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte fortfahren mÃ¶chtest, empfehlen wir dir, dass deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten korrekt und auf dem neuesten Stand sind.Wenn deine Karte bald ablÃ¤uft, logge dich bitte in der App in dein N26 Konto ein, gehe zum Tab Karten und suche nach einem Banner unter der entsprechenden Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestÃ¤tigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Wir senden sie dir dann zu.Â Wenn diese Nachricht nicht erscheint, mach dir keine Sorgen. Das liegt wahrscheinlich daran, dass deine Karte noch einige Zeit gÃ¼ltig ist. Zu gegebener Zeit hast du die MÃ¶glichkeit, deine Adresse zu bestÃ¤tigen.Sobald deine Karte bei dir eintrifft, musst du diese erst aktivieren, bevor du sie nutzen kannst. Vergiss nicht, deine alte Karte zu vernichten und sie gemÃ¤ÃŸ den Ã¶rtlichen Recyclingrichtlinien zu entsorgen.Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte fÃ¼r meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

title: What are â€œMessagesâ€ ?
content:
The security of your personal data is our priority. Thatâ€™s why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. Weâ€™ll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, youâ€™ll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, youâ€™ll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.Weâ€™ll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You canâ€™t initiate a conversation, but youâ€™ll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesnâ€™t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, weâ€™ll ask you to open a chat with us.

title: Warum ist N26 sicher?
content: Zum Schutz deines Kontos verwenden wir eine dreistufige Sicherheitsarchitektur:Sichere Anmeldung:Â Die Zugangsdaten der mobilen App und derÂ WebApp (neuen Tab)Â bestehen aus einem Benutzernamen und einem Passwort oder einer Fingerabdruck-/Gesichtserkennung (abhÃ¤ngig von deinem Smartphone). Bitte wÃ¤hle einÂ sicheres PasswortÂ und gib deine Zugangsdaten nicht an Dritte weiter.BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN:Â Dies ist einÂ 4-stelliger Code, den du jedes Mal benÃ¶tigst, wenn du eine Ãœberweisung durchfÃ¼hrst oder dein Smartphone verknÃ¼pfst/trennst. Du richtest diese PIN erstmalig ein, wenn du dein Smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem Konto verknÃ¼pft hast. Danach kannst du sie in der App selbst Ã¤ndern.Push-Nachrichten:Â FÃ¼r jede eingehende und ausgehende Zahlung wird eine Push-Nachricht an dein verknÃ¼pftes Smartphone gesendet. Sie dient auch zur BestÃ¤tigung und zum Abschluss deiner Transaktionen. AuÃŸerdem haben wirÂ 3D SecureÂ eingerichtet, um dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug zu schÃ¼tzen.Jedes Mal, wenn du uns kontaktierst, werden wir dir einige Sicherheitsfragen stellen um sicherzugehen, dass wir wirklich mit dir sprechen. Aber wir werden dich nie nach deiner Kartennummer, deinem Card Verification Code (CVV), Passwort und deiner Karten- oder BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN fragen.Wir haben weitere Schritte eingefÃ¼hrt, um deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu schÃ¼tzen: Wir speichern so wenige Informationen Ã¼ber dich wie mÃ¶glich; nur so lange wie wir rechtlich dazu verpflichtet sind und lÃ¶schen diese Daten, sobald sie fÃ¼r das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung nicht mehr benÃ¶tigt werden. Du kannst deineÂ persÃ¶nlichen DatenÂ bis zu 6 Monate nach deiner KontoschlieÃŸung herunterladen. Mehr Informationen dazu findest du in unsererÂ DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung (neuen Tab).

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.Weâ€™ve made aÂ video (new tab)Â to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If youâ€™ve lost your iPhone and arenâ€™t able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card wonâ€™t be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If youâ€™re using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if youâ€™re using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: How to make a donation with N26?
content: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier.Â You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the listÂ Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

content: Voici des informations utiles et solutions aux problÃ¨mesÂ les plus frÃ©quemment rencontrÃ©sÂ lors de la vÃ©rification par appel vidÃ©o :Assurez-vous de rÃ©aliser lâ€™appel vidÃ©o dans un lieu suffisamment Ã©clairÃ©, avec une camÃ©ra de qualitÃ© et une connexion internet haut dÃ©bit.VÃ©rifiez que vous avez bien autorisÃ© l'accÃ¨s Ã  la camÃ©ra et aux services de localisation pour lâ€™appel vidÃ©o.Assurez-vous dâ€™Ãªtre la seule personne Ã  apparaÃ®tre sur la vidÃ©o.VÃ©rifiez que votre tÃ©lÃ©phone soit Ã  jour et compatible avec lâ€™application N26 (iPhone 4s avec iOS 9 minimum ou Android 5.0 ou plus rÃ©cent).
