title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content: Direct debits returned to your account due toÂ insufficient funds* are charged a â‚¬3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is â‚¬9) in accordance with ourÂ Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,Â overdraftÂ interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you donâ€™t recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and youâ€™ll be charged a â‚¬3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. You can check the list of countries below:BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland

title: Was ist das N26 Webformular fÃ¼r DSGVO-Anfragen?
content: Der Schutz der personenbezogenen und finanziellen Daten unserer NutzerInnen genieÃŸt bei uns oberste PrioritÃ¤t. Daher stellen wir unser N26 Webformular zur VerfÃ¼gung, das es allen N26 NutzerInnen, ehemaligen N26 NutzerInnen (deren Konto inzwischen geschlossen ist) und ihren BevollmÃ¤chtigten ermÃ¶glicht, uns auf einem sicheren Weg zu kontaktieren, wenn sie Fragen zu ihren personenbezogenen Daten haben.Wie funktioniert das?Das Webformular (neuen Tab) sollte verwendet werden, wenn N26 NutzerInnen oder ehemalige N26 NutzerInnen ihre Rechte gemÃ¤ÃŸ der Datenschutzgrundverordnung ("DSGVO") selbst oder durch eine bevollmÃ¤chtigte Person ausÃ¼ben mÃ¶chten.Du kannst insbesondere folgende Rechte wahrnehmen:Recht auf Zugriff der betroffenen Person nach Art. 15 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Recht auf LÃ¶schung ("Recht auf Vergessenwerden") gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 17 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Recht auf Widerspruch nach Art. 21 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Du kannst innerhalb von maximal 30 Kalendertagen mit einer Antwort von unserem zustÃ¤ndigen Team rechnen.Wenn du das Webformular ausfÃ¼llst, wirst du aufgefordert, Folgendes einzugeben:Dein WohnsitzlandDeinen N26 Status (NutzerIn, ehemalige/r NutzerIn, BevollmÃ¤chtigte/r)Deinen AntragstypName, Nachname und E-Mail AdresseMuss ich als ehemalige/r N26 NutzerIn oder als BevollmÃ¤chtigte/r noch etwas angeben?Ehemalige NutzerInnen und ihre BevollmÃ¤chtigten mÃ¼ssen weitere Unterlagen hochladen, um ihre IdentitÃ¤t nachzuweisen und sicherzustellen, dass der EmpfÃ¤nger der Daten tatsÃ¤chlich dazu berechtigt ist.Folgende Unterlagen sind erforderlich:Ehemalige NutzerInnen: Kopie des Personalausweises / ReisepassesBevollmÃ¤chtigte VertreterInnen: Kopie des Personalausweises / Reisepasses und eine unterschriebene BevollmÃ¤chtigungÂ Sobald das Formular vollstÃ¤ndig ausgefÃ¼llt ist, klicke auf Senden und sende deine Anfrage ab.Warum ist fÃ¼r ehemalige N26 KundInnen und BevollmÃ¤chtigte eine manuelle ÃœberprÃ¼fung des Personalausweises bzw. Reisepasses notwendig?Wir fragen eine Kopie des Personalausweises bzw. Reisepasses an, um die IdentitÃ¤t zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen und sicherzustellen, dass personenbezogene Daten und finanzielle Informationen nicht in falsche HÃ¤nde gelangen. Eine solche manuelle ÃœberprÃ¼fung ist erforderlich, wenn die IdentitÃ¤t einer Person Ã¼berprÃ¼ft werden muss und unser standardisiertes Verfahren zur IdentitÃ¤tsprÃ¼fung nicht angewendet werden kann. Da die Identifizierung von ehemaligen KundInnen und BevollmÃ¤chtigten nicht in der App oder der Web-App vorgenommen werden kann, da sie keinen Zugang darauf haben, mÃ¼ssen wir hier auf eine manuelle ÃœberprÃ¼fung zurÃ¼ckgreifen.Â Fragen oder Bedenken hierzu?Unser Kundenservice hilft dir gerne weiter. Schreibe uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).

title: Where is my refund?
content:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.Â For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

title: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: Â¿DÃ³nde estÃ¡ mi reembolso?
content: En la mayorÃ­a de los casos, tu reembolso aparecerÃ¡ en la app el dÃ­a de la transacciÃ³n original, no en la fecha del reembolso. Pasa el ratÃ³n por tu lista de transacciones o descarga tu extracto anterior para encontrarlo.Para ver y descargar el PDF de tu extracto bancario mensual (de un mes anterior o preliminar del mes actual), haz lo siguiente:En la Web App: desde Transacciones, haz clic en el icono de la nube en la esquina superior derecha y, una vez en Descargas, elige Extractos bancarios.En la app del mÃ³vil:Si usas iPhone, toca los tres puntos que estÃ¡n abajo del todo.Si usas Android, ve a EstadÃ­sticas y toca en los 3 puntos en la esquina superior derecha.Las cantidades bloqueadas como depÃ³sito por alquiler de un coche pueden tardar hasta 30 dÃ­as en volver a tu cuenta, mientras que el reembolso de un pago con tarjeta se acreditarÃ¡ a tu cuenta automÃ¡ticamente en un mÃ¡ximo de 14 dÃ­as.

title: How does N26 Business Metal work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs â‚¬16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate.Â Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Â Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

title: How to reorder a card?
content: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10â‚¬N26 Metal cards: 45â‚¬Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30â‚¬N26 Metal: 65â‚¬Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

title: Was tun bei Verlust oder Missbrauch meiner Karte?
content: Wenn du deine N26 Karte verloren hast oder du denkst, dass deine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden, kannst du deine Karte jederzeit in deiner N26 App sperren und wieder entsperren.Sperre die Karte vorÃ¼bergehend oder deaktiviere sie dauerhaft (je nach Fall) und beantrage eine neue in der N26 App oder der Web-App.Falls deine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden, folge diesen Schritten:Gehe auf die Registerkarte Karten.Wische so lange nach rechts, bis die Karte erscheint, die du vorÃ¼bergehend deaktivieren oder sperren mÃ¶chtest.Tippe auf Sperren.Falls du deine Karte endgÃ¼ltig sperren willst, wÃ¤hle schlieÃŸlich Karteneinstellungen und dann Eine neue Karte beantragen.So hast du die volle Kontrolle Ã¼ber deine Karte und kannst dich vor unberechtigten Transaktionen schÃ¼tzen.Du solltest deine Karte sofort sperren, wenn dir etwas verdÃ¤chtig vorkommt. Du kannst sie spÃ¤ter jederzeit wieder entsperren.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content: Tips for a successful videoÂ verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of ourÂ supported countriesÂ to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driverâ€™s licenses or residence permits canâ€™t be used). Also, the document shouldnâ€™t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'llÂ need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and deliveryÂ of your card.Â Please note that this is not a fee: yourÂ first cardÂ after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. DeliveriesÂ take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Kann ich in meinem Land ein N26 Konto erÃ¶ffnen?
content: Wir bieten unsere Konten in folgenden LÃ¤ndern an: in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich, Irland, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, den Niederlanden, Belgien, Portugal, Finnland, Luxemburg, Slowenien, Estland, Griechenland, der Slowakei, der Schweiz, Polen, Schweden, DÃ¤nemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein und Island.Um in Zukunft eine noch stÃ¤rkere Grundlage fÃ¼r unser GeschÃ¤ft zu schaffen, konzentrieren wir uns auf unser Serviceerlebnis, Produktangebote und unsere Prozesse.Angesichts der Ã¼berwÃ¤ltigenden Nachfrage nach den digitalen Banking-Produkten von N26 werden wir die Anzahl der neuen Bankkonten, die wir jeden Monat anbieten kÃ¶nnen,Â vorÃ¼bergehend limitieren.Â UPDATE: 25th Okt. 11:00 UhrMÃ¤rkte geÃ¶ffnet fÃ¼r Standard und Premium: Belgique, Danemark, Deutschland, Estonie, Finlande, Frankreich, GrÃ¨ce, Irlande, Islande, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, NorvÃ¨ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, SlovÃ©nie, Spanien, Ã–sterreich, Suisse & SuÃ¨deMÃ¤rkte geÃ¶ffnet nur fÃ¼r Premiumkonten: N/AMÃ¤rkte geschlossen fÃ¼r alle Kontotypen: N/AMÃ¤rkte geschlossen: ItalienDu kannst dein Konto erÃ¶ffnen, wenn du in einem dieser LÃ¤nder wohnst und die Voraussetzungen erfÃ¼llst. Unsere Produkte und Dienstleistungen variieren je nach Land. Solltest du bereits ein Konto bei uns haben und wirst fÃ¼r 18 Monate oder lÃ¤nger in ein nicht unterstÃ¼tztes Land ziehen, kontaktiere bitte unseren Customer Support.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content: YourÂ N26 You (new tab)Â andÂ N26 Metal (new tab)Â membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: Puis-je ouvrir un compte N26 ?
content: N26 Bank permet lâ€™ouverture de comptes N26 dans les pays suivants : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France (non disponible pour les rÃ©sidents des DOM / TOM), GrÃ¨ce, Irlande, Islande, Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, NorvÃ¨ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, SlovÃ©nie, Suisse, SuÃ¨de.Afin de construire des fondations encore plus solides pour lâ€™avenir de notre entreprise, nous mettons en ce moment lâ€™accent sur l'expÃ©rience client, nos offres de produits et nos processus internes.Compte tenu de la forte demande concernant les services bancaires numÃ©riques de N26, nous limitons de faÃ§on temporaire le nombre de nouveaux comptes que nous proposons chaque mois.Â UPDATE : 25th oct. 11h00MarchÃ©s ouverts pour comptes Standard et Premium : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, GrÃ¨ce, Irlande, Islande, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, NorvÃ¨ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, SlovÃ©nie, Suisse & SuÃ¨deMarchÃ©s ouverts pour seulement les comptes Premium : N/APays oÃ¹ l'ouverture d'un compte n'est pas possible actuellement : N/AMarchÃ©s fermÃ©s : ItalieSi vous remplissez lesÂ conditions nÃ©cessaires, vous pouvez ouvrir un compte N26. Veuillez noter que toutes les fonctionnalitÃ©s et services proposÃ©s par N26 ne sont pas disponibles dans tous les pays. Si vous avez dÃ©jÃ  un compte N26 et que vous dÃ©mÃ©nagez pour 18 mois ou plus dans un pays non supportÃ© (liste ci-dessus), veuillez contacter notre Service Client.

title: Wie kann ich einen Dispokredit anfragen?
content:
VerfÃ¼gbar in Deutschland und Ã–sterreich.Du kannst einen Dispokredit nur in der mobilen N26-App beantragen. Du erfÃ¤hrst in Echtzeit, ob du dazu berechtigt bist, ohne dass FormalitÃ¤ten zu erledigen sind. So beantragst du einen N26-Dispokredit:Melde dich bei der mobilen N26-App an.Tippe im Homescreen auf die Registerkarte â€Entdeckenâ€œ.Scrolle nach unten zu â€Finanzielle Produkteâ€œ.Wische zur Seite und tippe auf â€N26-Dispokreditâ€œ. Befolge die in der App angezeigten
Schritte.Dort kannst du auch die Limits des Dispokredits Ã¤ndern, deine anfallenden Zinsen einsehen oder deinen Dispokredit jederzeit kÃ¼ndigen. Der Zinssatz liegt bei 10,15% p.a. Die anfallenden Zinsen ziehen wir am Ende jeden Quartals von deinem Konto ab.Bei der Beantragung eines N26-Dispokredits prÃ¼fen wir Informationen zu deiner persÃ¶nlichen und finanziellen Situation. Wir entscheiden dann mit einem mathematisch-statistischen Verfahren und entsprechend unserer Risikobereitschaft zum jeweiligen Zeitpunkt automatisch, ob du Anspruch auf einen N26-Dispokredit hast und welchen Rahmen wir dir anbieten kÃ¶nnen. DiesbezÃ¼glich gilt:Wir berÃ¼cksichtigen mehrere Faktoren und bewerten die personenbezogenen Daten, die
wir Ã¼ber dich haben, um unsere Entscheidung Ã¼ber deinen N26-Dispokreditantrag zu
treffen, wie in unserer Datenschutzrichtlinie genauer beschrieben.Wenn du die automatisierte Entscheidung zu deinem Anspruch oder zu den Limits fÃ¼r
deinen N26-Dispokredit anfechten und mÃ¶chten, dass diese automatisierte Entscheidung von einem Menschen Ã¼berprÃ¼ft wird, kannst du dich mit unserem Kundenservice-Team in Verbindung setzen, entweder per Live-Chat Ã¼ber die mobile N26-App, Web-App oder Ã¼ber das N26-Support-Center. Bitte beachte, dass wir kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur von einer E-Mail-Adresse aus besprechen kÃ¶nnen, die in deinem N26-Konto registriert ist, oder Ã¼ber deinen sicheren Posteingang in der App.Wenn du beschlieÃŸt, deinen N26-Dispokredit zu aktivieren, melden wir dies der SCHUFA.Warum habe ich keinen Dispokredit bekommen?Wie oben erwÃ¤hnt, wenden wir ein mathematisch-statistisches Verfahren an, um zu beurteilen und zu entscheiden, ob wir dir einen Dispokredit anbieten kÃ¶nnen. Das Ergebnis wird automatisch in Echtzeit ermittelt.Wenn du die obigen Schritte befolgt hast und keinen Dispokredit erhalten hast, bedeutet dies, dass wir dir derzeit wahrscheinlich keinen Dispokredit anbieten kÃ¶nnen. Letzteres kann insbesondere dann der Fall sein, wenn du eine aktive PfÃ¤ndung hast oder deinen Zahlungsverpflichtungen zuvor nicht nachgekommen bist. Wenn du N26-Konto zu deinem Hauptkonto, machst, wirkt sich dies auch positiv auf deine Berechtigung aus.Wenn du in Deutschland lebst, berÃ¼cksichtigen wir bei der Entscheidung Ã¼ber deinen Anspruch auf einen N26-Dispokredit und den zugehÃ¶rigen Rahmen deinen SCHUFA-Score, der bis zu drei Jahre alt sein kann. Wenn er Ã¤lter ist, fordern wir deinen neuesten SCHUFA-Score an, nachdem du unser N26-Dispoantragsverfahren durchlaufen hast. Dies kann auf deiner SCHUFA-Auskunft erscheinen, hat jedoch keinen Einfluss auf deinen SCHUFA-Score und ist nur fÃ¼r dich sichtbar. In diesem Fall wird dir mÃ¶glicherweise kein N26-Dispokredit angeboten. Wenn du in Ã–sterreich lebst, sehen wir uns deinen CRIF-Score an.Wenn du keinen Dispokredit erhÃ¤ltst, kannst du es zu einem spÃ¤teren Zeitpunkt erneut versuchen. Wenn du keinen Anspruch auf einen N26-Dispokredit haben, werden wir dich auf jeden Fall benachrichtigen, sobald du berechtigt bist. Wenn du die automatisierte Entscheidung Ã¼ber deine Berechtigung anfechten mÃ¶chtest, siehe oben, wie du mit uns in Kontakt treten kÃ¶nnen. Bei weiteren Fragen Ã¶ffne bitte direkt in der mobilen N26-App oder deinem Online-Banking (neuen Tab) einen Live-Chat.Weitere Informationen findest du in unseren Dispokredit-Bedingungen (neuen Tab).Warum bekomme ich keinen hÃ¶heren Dispokredit bekommen?Wie oben erwÃ¤hnt, wenden wir ein mathematisch-statistisches Verfahrensmodell an, um die Betragsgrenze zu ermitteln, die wir dir fÃ¼r einen Dispokredit anbieten kÃ¶nnen. Das Ergebnis wird automatisch in Echtzeit ermittelt und hÃ¤ngt von den persÃ¶nlichen und finanziellen Informationen ab, die wir Ã¼ber dich gespeichert haben, sowie von unserer Risikobereitschaft zu dem Zeitpunkt.Wir werden dich benachrichtigen, sobald wir dir ein hÃ¶heres Limit fÃ¼r deinen N26-Dispokredit gewÃ¤hren kÃ¶nnen. Wenn du die automatisierte Entscheidung Ã¼ber das Limit das wir dir anbieten kÃ¶nnen anfechten mÃ¶chtest, siehe oben wie du mit uns in Kontakt treten kannst. Bitte setze dich in diesem Fall mit uns in Verbindung, bevor du das von uns angebotene Dispolimit akzeptierst.Warum wurde mein Ãœberziehungsrahmen reduziert oder gekÃ¼ndigt?Wir Ã¼berprÃ¼fen unsere Ãœberziehungsrahmen regelmÃ¤ÃŸig, um unseren Kunden und Kundinnen angemessenen Schutz zu bieten. Diese Ã„nderung ist nicht in jedem Falle dauerhaft und du kannst mÃ¶glicherweise zu einem spÃ¤teren Zeitpunkt eine ErhÃ¶hung deines Ãœberziehungsrahmens in der App beantragen. FÃ¼r mehr Infos kannst du dich mit unserem Kundenservice-Team per Live-Chat Ã¼ber die mobile N26-App, Web-App oder Ã¼ber das N26-Support-Center in Verbindung setzen.Kann sich mein Ãœberziehungsrahmen Ã¤ndern? Warum wurde mein Ãœberziehungsrahmen herabgesetzt?Wir Ã¼berprÃ¼fen unsere Ãœberziehungsrahmen routinemÃ¤ÃŸig, um unseren Kunden und Kundinnen angemessenen Schutz zu bieten. Wir kÃ¶nnen Ãœberziehungsrahmen Ã¤ndern oder aufheben, wenn:wir unsere Kreditrichtlinien anpassendu wiederholt vergisst, deine KontoÃ¼berziehung innerhalb von 90 Tagen auszugleichendu deine KontoÃ¼berziehung wiederholt verspÃ¤tet ausgleichstdeine KreditwÃ¼rdigkeit signifikant herabgestuft wurdedu deinen Ãœberziehungsrahmen fÃ¼r betrÃ¼gerische oder illegale AktivitÃ¤ten nutztFalls dich unsere Ã„nderungen direkt betreffen, informieren wir dich darÃ¼ber selbstverstÃ¤ndlich.Was passiert, wenn ich bei negativem Kontostand meinen Dispo kÃ¼ndige?Dein in Anspruch genommener Dispokredit sowie die angefallenen Zinsen werden sofort fÃ¤llig.Du verlierst die MÃ¶glichkeit, dir Geld zu leihen, wenn dein Kontostand auf Null steht.Um erneut einen Dispokredit in Anspruch nehmen zu kÃ¶nnen, musst du das Bewerbungsverfahren neu durchlaufen. Eine Reaktivierung kann nicht garantiert werden.Nach der KÃ¼ndigung mÃ¼ssen sowohl der in Anspruch genommene Dispokredit sowie die anfallenden Zinsen direkt bezahlt werden, um weitere Kosten gegenÃ¼ber N26 aufgrund einer verzÃ¶gerten RÃ¼ckzahlung zu vermeiden. AuÃŸerdem wirst du fortan Zahlungserinnerungen erhalten, bis dein Kontostand ausgeglichen ist.Kann ich meinen Ãœberziehungsrahmen anheben lassen?Aktuell bieten wir keine ErhÃ¶hung von Ãœberziehungsrahmen an. Jedoch arbeiten wir daran, das in Zukunft zu ermÃ¶glichen.Was kann ich tun, wenn ich die KontoÃ¼berziehung nicht innerhalb der Frist ausgleichen kann?Deine aktuelle KontoÃ¼berziehung ist von Ãœberziehungsrahmen Ã„nderung nicht betroffen. Du kannst den Ãœberziehungsbetrag weiterhin mindestens einmal alle 90 Tage zurÃ¼ckzahlen, solange dein Dispokredit unter der HÃ¶chstgrenze liegt.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content: Youâ€™ll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whetherÂ MoneyBeam, standing orders, orÂ CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you eitherÂ ConfirmÂ orÂ CancelÂ it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from yourÂ card PINÂ but you can use the same number for both. Youâ€™ll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN afterÂ connecting your smartphoneÂ (whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN byÂ changing itÂ in the app.

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs â‚¬9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if youâ€™re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Custom Audiences
content: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called â€œLookalike-Audiencesâ€ are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.Â In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called â€˜lookalike audiencesâ€™ are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (â€˜GDPRâ€™) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available.Â You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

title: How to order my extra card?
content: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: â€œAlways losing things?â€ > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs â‚¬10 for standard shipping and â‚¬25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of â‚¬10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.â„¹ï¸ The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

title: Welche Folgen hat das Urteil BGH XI ZR 26/20 fÃ¼r mich als N26 Kunden?
content: Der Bundesgerichtshof (BGH) urteilte am 27. April 2021 â€œzur Unwirksamkeit von Klauseln, die die Zustimmung des Kunden bei einer Ã„nderung der AGB der Bank fingierenâ€.Bin ich zu einer RÃ¼ckforderung berechtigt?Unter Zugrundelegung dieses Urteils sind Kunden mit einem Privatkonto (N26 Standard/Smart/YOU/Metal), das vor dem 12. MÃ¤rz 2020 erstellt wurde, zur RÃ¼ckforderung der von uns eingefÃ¼hrten und abgebuchten â€œGlÃ¼cksspiel-GebÃ¼hrâ€ berechtigt. FÃ¼r die zur RÃ¼ckforderung berechtigten Kunden gilt ferner, dass diese GebÃ¼hr (fÃ¼r die entsprechende Kundengruppe) seit dem 5. November 2021 nicht mehr erhoben wird.Kunden, die sich nach dem 12. MÃ¤rz 2020 angemeldet haben, haben den zu diesem Zeitpunkt bereits angepassten AGB mit der eingefÃ¼hrten â€œGlÃ¼cksspiel-GebÃ¼hrâ€ aktiv zugestimmt, sodass bei solchen Kunden keine Erstattung der â€œGlÃ¼cksspiel-GebÃ¼hrâ€ vorgenommen werden kann. Auch Kunden, die ein N26-Business-Konto haben (N26 Business Standard/ Business Smart/ Business You/ Business Metal) sind nicht rÃ¼ckforderungsberechtigt, da sie nicht zur vom Urteil betroffenen Kundengruppe (Verbraucher) zÃ¤hlen.RÃ¼ckforderung einreichen fÃ¼r bestehende Kunden:Zur Einreichung einer RÃ¼ckforderung (sofern berechtigt) bitten wir unsere Kunden, sich in die App einzuloggen und von dort einen verifizierten Kundendienst-Chat zu starten.RÃ¼ckforderung einreichen fÃ¼r ehemalige Kunden:Zur Einreichung einer RÃ¼ckforderung (sofern berechtigt) bitten wir unsere Kunden, eine E-Mail von ihrer registrierten E-Mail-Adresse an support@n26.com (neuen Tab) zu schreiben Â FÃ¼r eine direkte, unkomplizierte Bearbeitung bitten wir folgende Punkte zu berÃ¼cksichtigen.Betreff der E-Mail: â€œRÃ¼ckforderung gem. BGH XI ZR 26/20â€Schicke uns die E-Mail bitte von deiner registrierten E-Mail-AdresseNenne deinen vollstÃ¤ndigen Namen sowie eine alternative Bankverbindung (IBAN)FÃ¼ge im Anhang eine beidseitige Kopie/Foto deines gÃ¼ltigen Ausweisdokuments hinzu (Personalausweis oder Reisepass). Achte bitte darauf, dass auch die Kanten zu sehen sind und das Dokument deutlich zu erkennen ist.Â Bitte fÃ¼ge die folgende BestÃ¤tigung hinzu: â€œHiermit bestÃ¤tige ich, dass N26 mir meine personenbezogenen Daten an meine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse schicken darf.â€

title: Wie sperre ich den Magnetstreifen auf meiner Karte?
content: Es gibt mehrere MÃ¶glichkeiten, eine Kartenzahlung zu tÃ¤tigen: kontaktlos (durch ein Dranhalten deiner Karte an ein Zahlungsterminal), mit Chip & PIN sowie per Magnetstreifen, bei der deine Karte durch ein LesegerÃ¤t gezogen wird. Obwohl Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen immer seltener werden, verlangen einige HÃ¤ndler immer noch, dass du mit dieser Methode bezahlst.Warum sollte ich Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen sperren?Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen machen einen relativ hohen Anteil an betrÃ¼gerischen Kartentransaktionen aus. Einige HÃ¤ndler verfÃ¼gen Ã¼ber betrÃ¼gerische Systeme, um die Daten deiner Karte zu kopieren und sie anschlieÃŸend fÃ¼r betrÃ¼gerische Transaktionen zu verwenden. Dieser Vorgang wird als "Skimming" bezeichnet. Durch die Sperrung von Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen kannst du dich vor diesem Risiko schÃ¼tzen.Wie kann ich Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen sperren/entsperren?Um Magnetstreifen-Transaktionen zu deaktivieren, gehe wie folgt vor:Â Gehe auf Karten.Â Wenn du mehrere Karten hast, wische nach rechts, bis die gewÃ¼nschte Karte erscheint.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Tippe auf Magnetstreifen.Schalte die Funktion Magnetstreifen aktivieren aus.Hier kannst du auch die Sperrung des Magnetstreifens wieder aufheben. Die von dir vorgenommenen Ã„nderungen werden sofort auf die von dir gewÃ¤hlte Karte angewendet.

title: Was sind Spaces?
content:
Setze dir Ziele, erstelle, personalisiere und Ã¼berweise Geld zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces in Echtzeit. Spaces ist in deiner App undÂ WebApp (neuen Tab)Â verfÃ¼gbar.Neben deinem Hauptkonto (oder primÃ¤ren Space) kannst du beliebig oft zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces anlegen und lÃ¶schen, wobei die Anzahl der verfÃ¼gbaren aktiven Spaces von deinem Kontotyp abhÃ¤ngt: bis zu 10 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces mit N26 You, N26 Smart und N26 Metal.Die KontoauszÃ¼ge deines Hauptkontos enthalten alle Transaktionen, die an die verschiedenen Spaces Ã¼berwiesen oder empfangen wurden. Die KontoauszÃ¼ge kannst du online herunterladen.Nur dein Hauptkonto kann sich im Minus befinden (wenn du einenÂ DispokreditÂ hast). In allen anderen Spaces kann dein Kontostand nicht negativ sein. Du kannst also zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces nur BetrÃ¤ge Ã¼berweisen, die dort jeweils auch verfÃ¼gbar sind.Du kannst nur das Guthaben von deinem Hauptkonto fÃ¼r Kartenzahlungen verwenden. Beachte also, dass du eventuell erst Geld Ã¼berweisen musst, bevor du einen Kauf tÃ¤tigen kannst.Verschiebe Geld von einem zum anderen Space, indem du dein Hauptkonto gedrÃ¼ckt hÃ¤ltst und es per Drag and Drop in den anderen Space ziehst.Du kannst einen Space jederzeit sperren und wieder entsperren, direkt aus deiner App oder dem Online Banking. Dazu musst du nur deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN eingeben. Wenn ein Space gesperrt ist, kannst du noch immer Geld darauf Ã¼berweisen. Wenn du aber Geld von einem gesperrten Space entnehmen mÃ¶chtest, musst du ihn zuerst entsperren.Du kannst den Betrag in einem Space verstecken, sodass er nicht in dein Gesamt-Saldo eingerechnet wird. Gehe dafÃ¼r zum gewÃ¼nschten Space, tippe auf die drei Punkte und dann auf "Space-Saldo verstecken".Du kannst jetzt Zahlungen von einem Space sperren. Gehe einfach zu den Einstellungen des entsprechenden Space und tippe auf Zahlungen an mein Hauptkonto oder anderen Space sperren. BestÃ¤tige dann mit deiner BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN.Du kannst jetzt einen Space auch lÃ¶schen, wenn eine Karte damit verknÃ¼pft ist. Gehe dazu in die Einstellungen von deinem Space.Spaces enthÃ¤lt eine Funktion, die â€œRegelnâ€ heiÃŸt. Diese Funktion hilft dir dabei, dein Geld und deine Zeit effektiver zu verwalten.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Round-up Savings:Mit der Funktion â€Round-up Savingsâ€œ kÃ¶nnen Premiumkunden jede von ihnen getÃ¤tigte Kartentransaktion auf den nÃ¤chsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung fÃ¼hrt nicht zu einer Ãœberziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du Ã¼ber kein ausreichendes Guthaben verfÃ¼gen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt.Du kannst immer nur eine â€Round-upâ€œ-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl Ã¼berweisen.Du kannst die Funktion â€Round-upâ€œ jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schlieÃŸt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die â€Round-upâ€œ-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.IBANs fÃ¼r Spaces:Premiumkunden (N26 Smart, You und Metal), die ihr Konto in Deutschland erÃ¶ffnet haben und Ã¼ber eine deutsche IBAN verfÃ¼gen, kÃ¶nnen ihrem Space bzw. ihren Spaces nun eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen. Sobald einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen wurde, kÃ¶nnen Ã¼ber den Space bestimmte Ãœberweisungen empfangen und Lastschriften getÃ¤tigt werden. Im Folgenden findest du eine Zusammenfassung, wie du deine Spaces fÃ¼r eine noch bessere Ãœbersicht Ã¼ber deine eingehenden und ausgehenden Ãœberweisungen nutzen kannst: Ãœberweisungen empfangen: Sobald du dem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen hast, kannst du die individuelle IBAN angeben, um Ãœberweisungen zu empfangen.Ausgehende Zahlungen per Lastschrift tÃ¤tigen: Mit Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN kannst du Zahlungen per Lastschrift tÃ¤tigen.Mehrere Spaces mit IBANs: Du kannst bis zu 10 Spaces mit einer individuellen IBAN erstellen, um noch mehr Kontrolle Ã¼ber deine eingehenden und ausgehenden GeldflÃ¼sse zu haben. Du hast insgesamt 10 IBANs zur VerfÃ¼gung.Unseren speziellen Artikel mit weiteren Informationen zu IBANs fÃ¼r Spaces findest du hier.

title: Was ist ein N26 Flex Konto?
content: Unser N26-Flex-Konto ist weder ein N26-Standard-Konto (neuen Tab) noch ein Premium-Mitgliedschaftskonto (neuen Tab). Wir bieten dir das Flex-Konto an, wenn deine SCHUFA-BonitÃ¤t nicht ausreicht, um ein N26-Standard-Konto zu erÃ¶ffnen. Du kannst das N26-Flex-Konto nicht selbst auswÃ¤hlen; es wird dir am Ende der Anmeldestrecke angezeigt. Die Entscheidung, dir das Flex-Konto anzubieten erfolgt automatisch auf Grundlage deiner SCHUFA-BonitÃ¤t, die wir von der SCHUFA erhalten, wenn du versuchst, dein Konto bei uns zu erÃ¶ffnen.Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass der uns vorliegende SCHUFA Score nicht korrekt sein kann und aufgrunddessen eine menschliche ÃœberprÃ¼fung dieser automatisierten Entscheidung wÃ¼nscht, kannst du dich mit unserem Kundenservice (neuen Tab) in Verbindung setzen. Dies ist entweder per Live-Chat, Ã¼ber deine mobile N26-App oder Web-App oder Ã¼ber das N26-Support-Center mÃ¶glich. Bitte beachte, dass wir kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur von einer E-Mail-Adresse aus besprechen kÃ¶nnen, die fÃ¼r dein N26-Konto registriert ist.Nach deiner Kontaktaufnahme teilen wir dir mit, ob die uns vorliegende SCHUFA-BonitÃ¤t Grundlage fÃ¼r das Angebot eines N26 Flex Kontos war, damit du bei Bedarf die SCHUFA bezÃ¼glich deiner SCHUFA-BonitÃ¤t ansprechen kannst und mit der SCHUFA klarstellen kannst, ob der dort vorliegende Score deine KreditwÃ¼rdigkeit korrekt abbildet. Wir kÃ¶nnen dir nur dann ein N26-Standardkonto (neuen Tab) und ein Premium-Mitgliedschaftskonto (neuen Tab) anbieten, wenn und sobald deine SCHUFA-BonitÃ¤t auf einen hÃ¶heren Score geÃ¤ndert wird. Du kannst es dann erneut versuchen und wir werden erneut prÃ¼fen, ob wir dir ein N26-Standardkonto oder ein Premium-Mitgliedschaftskonto anbieten kÃ¶nnen.Wenn du eine menschliche ÃœberprÃ¼fung dieser automatisierten Entscheidung wÃ¼nscht, setze dich bitte mit uns in Verbindung, bevor du das Angebot des N26-Flex-Kontos annimmst. Bitte beachte:Das N26-Flex-Konto kostet 6â‚¬ monatlich. Ãœber die monatliche GebÃ¼hr wirst du vor ErÃ¶ffnung deines Kontos informiert. Diese GebÃ¼hr werden wir direkt von deinem Konto abbuchen. Die erste GebÃ¼hr wird berechnet, sobald dein Kontostand 6â‚¬ betrÃ¤gt, spÃ¤testens aber 15 Tage nach deiner KontoerÃ¶ffnung. Ab der ersten Abbuchung wird die GebÃ¼hr dann monatlich berechnet. Um zu vermeiden, dass Ãœberziehungszinsen berechnet werden, stelle bitte sicher, dass dein Konto Ã¼ber ausreichende Mittel zur Deckung dieser GebÃ¼hr verfÃ¼gt.Das N26-Flex-Konto kann nicht mit einem N26 Business-, N26 Business You-, N26 Business Metal-, N26 Smart-, N26 You- oder N26 Metal-Konto kombiniert werden.Bargeldabhebungen an Geldautomaten oder in einem unserer 9.000 CASH26-Partnershops (neuen Tab) kosten jeweils 2 â‚¬. Beide Auszahlungsarten werden sofort belastet.

title: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
content: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters.Â Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved?Â Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If youâ€™re asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action.Â If you have a feeling that something is off, donâ€™t ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (donâ€™t click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a senderâ€™s identity.If youâ€™ve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If youâ€™d like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

title: Pourquoi ai-je Ã©tÃ© dÃ©bitÃ© dâ€™un montant qui ne correspond pas Ã  ma transaction ?
content: N26 fonctionne en temps rÃ©el. Nous vous informons grÃ¢ce Ã  des notifications push dÃ¨s quâ€™une transaction apparaÃ®t sur votre compte.Il arrive parfois quâ€™une transaction semble suspicieuse car le montant dÃ©bitÃ© ne correspond pas au montant de la transaction. VoilÃ  les raisons pour lesquelles cela peut arriver :Le marchand a Ã©mis une empreinte bancaire pour une caution (dans une station essence, pour une location de voiture ou un hÃ´tel par exemple). Dans ce cas, le montant de cette caution sera recrÃ©ditÃ© sur votre compte dÃ¨s quâ€™elle ne sera plus nÃ©cessaire.Lâ€™Ã©volution du taux de change peut influencer lÃ©gÃ¨rement le montant des transactions faites en monnaies Ã©trangÃ¨res.Dans les deux cas, aucun frais sur la diffÃ©rence entre ces deux montants ne seront prÃ©levÃ©s.Si vous Ãªtes certain quâ€™il sâ€™agit dâ€™uneÂ transaction frauduleuse, veuillez prendre contact avec le Service Client par Livechat pour obtenir de lâ€™aide.

title: Comment annuler ma demande de crÃ©dit ?
content: Vous pouvez annuler votre demande deÂ crÃ©dit N26Â gratuitement pendant la pÃ©riode de rÃ©traction de 14 jours Ã  compter de la signature de lâ€™offre de crÃ©dit.Faites simplement votre demande en nous contactant par Livechat. Une fois votre confirmation Ã©crite reÃ§ue, nous traiterons votre demande et nous confirmerons lâ€™annulation de votre crÃ©dit par email.Veuillez vous assurer que le montant total de votre crÃ©dit est disponible sur votre compte au moment de votre rÃ©tractation et jusquâ€™Ã  ce quâ€™elle soit effective.Si votre crÃ©dit est fourni par lâ€™un de nos partenaires, veuillez les contacter directement, Auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) en Allemagne et Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) en France.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card canâ€™t be used for online purchases.

title: Why might N26 block or close my account, and what can I do about it?
content: â„¹ï¸ In the event that the business relationship must be terminated (new tab), N26 shall act in accordance with section 13* of the General Terms & Conditions (new tab) which define the relations and rights between the customer and the bank.There are several reasons why N26 may block or close an account. These reasons come from our decision as a business to act in line with our risk management policies, as well as our need to comply with relevant statutory obligations. In simple terms, this means that N26â€”as a bankâ€”needs to act in line with laws that exist to combat illegal activities such as money laundering, financing terrorism, tax fraud, and abusive or fraudulent use of the account. In these cases, access to an N26 account may be restricted, or the account may be closed.Other reasons why an account could be closed include:Â improper usage of the account,Â a serious breach of any of the Terms and Conditions, orany behavior that goes against the general rules of conduct set between the customer and the bank.We may also limit access to an account or a part of the funds within the account, if we are obliged to do so by the relevant authorities.Access to my account has been restricted. How can I contact N26 to resolve it?Because N26 is a regulated financial institution, there are many regulations that we must follow and comply with. This means that weâ€™re required to review some of our customersâ€™ transactions and account activities periodicallyâ€”and as a result of these reviews, we may limit access to your N26 account.Â Please bear in mind that this process is entirely lawfulâ€”itâ€™s a part of how we ensure that our customers and their accounts are kept safe. If you find yourself with restricted access to your N26 account, weâ€™ll send you an email to your in-app inbox to let you know of the steps that you need to take. Of course, we understand that you may have questions about this process, and weâ€™re here to help. If you wish to contact us about restricted access to your N26 account, please reply directly to the email in your in-app inbox (new tab) that you received with instructions on your next steps. Hereâ€™s how you can reply:Â Log in to your N26 AppGo to My Account > Help > Messages from N26Open the relevant message and press the Reply button at the end of the message.If you canâ€™t access your account via the N26 App anymore, you may also reply directly from your email.I received a notification that my account was closed. What should I do?If you have any questions about the status of your account or your remaining funds, please contact us by replying directly to the email that notified you of your account closure. Please note that our Customer Support specialists will not be able to assist you via chat, as we cannot share information regarding this process in a chat message due to legal and data protection reasons.Â * If you opened your account before April 17, 2019 and have an IBAN starting with DE, this information is set out in section 19 of the respective General Terms & Conditions (new tab).

title: What if my balance is negative?
content: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships.Â Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited.Â In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 YOU with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Please keep the following in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo cambiar mi PIN de confirmaciÃ³n?
content: Instrucciones paso a paso:iPhoneAndroidPaso 1Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu aplicaciÃ³n N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2DesplÃ¡zate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaciÃ³nPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³nPaso 1Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu aplicaciÃ³n N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2DesplÃ¡zate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaciÃ³nPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³nEl PIN de confirmaciÃ³n es el que usas para confirmar las transferencias o cualquier otra operaciÃ³n que hagas desde la app. Si no sabes cuÃ¡l es, quizÃ¡ te ayude a recordarlo que tÃº creas tu propio PIN de confirmaciÃ³nÂ cuando vinculas tu mÃ³vil (pestaÃ±a nueva) por primera vez.Si lo has olvidado o quieres cambiarlo, puedes hacerlo cuando quieras desde la app:Ve a ğŸ‘¤ Mi cuenta y luego Seguridad.SeleccionaÂ Cambiar PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (es un nÃºmero de 10 dÃ­gitos que aparece bajo tu nombre en la parte de delante de tu tarjeta; o por atrÃ¡s, en las tarjetas N26 Smart, You y Metal).Crea y confirma tu nuevo PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.Si introduces el PIN de confirmaciÃ³n errÃ³neamente 6 veces seguidas, tendrÃ¡s que restablecerlo antes de volver a intentarlo.Por motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ningÃºn PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, direcciÃ³n u otra combinaciÃ³n con dÃ­gitos repetidos o secuencias (como por ejemplo 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el nÃºmero que has elegido no es vÃ¡lido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinaciÃ³n diferente.Recuerda que tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n no es el mismo que el cÃ³digo PIN de tu tarjeta; (pestaÃ±a nueva) pero, si tÃº quieres, puedes elegir el mismo PIN para ambos.

title: Ricarica con carta, Apple Pay e Google Pay
content:
Adesso puoi trasferire denaro utilizzando una carta di debito o di credito oltre ad Apple e Google Pay. Questo Ã¨ il modo piÃ¹ semplice e veloce per ricaricare il tuo conto N26.Come trasferire denaro con una carta di debito o di creditoApri lâ€™app N26 e vai su â€œAggiungi denaroâ€Seleziona â€œTrasferimento da cartaâ€Scegli un importo e inserisci il tuo nome sulla carta, il numero della carta, la data di scadenza e il CVC (non memorizziamo mai i dati della tua carta)Segui i passaggi per confermare il pagamentoIl denaro Ã¨ disponibile sul tuo conto allâ€™istanteIl servizio di accredito istantaneo del Conto consente di ricaricare un importo compreso tra 20 â‚¬ e 450 â‚¬ per ogni transazione e fino a un massimo di 450 â‚¬ al mese.Come trasferire denaro con Apple o Google PayApri lâ€™app N26 e vai su â€œAggiungi denaroâ€Seleziona â€œApple Payâ€ o â€œGoogle Payâ€Scegli un importoSegui i passaggi per confermare il pagamentoIl denaro Ã¨ disponibile sul tuo conto allâ€™istanteCarte accettate:Â Carte di debito.Carte di credito (ad eccezione di America Express).Carte prepagate (solo per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni Italiani).Per saperne di piÃ¹ sulla differenza tra carte di debito, credito e carte prepagate leggi questo articolo (inglese). (nuova tabella)Costo:
Sebbene questo sia il modo piÃ¹ semplice e veloce per trasferire immediatamente fondi sul tuo conto N26, per noi, lâ€™elaborazione di queste transazioni di ricarica istantanee Ã¨ piÃ¹ costosa di altri metodi di ricarica del conto (nuova tabella) che offriamo.Per entrambi i metodi, il primo deposito Ã¨ sempre gratuito, ma per i depositi aggiuntivi viene addebitata una commissione del 3% sullâ€™importo del deposito. Caricando una carta o un portafoglio digitale, i tuoi soldi non vengono inviati immediatamente a N26 e la commissione copre i costi aggiuntivi associati alla ricarica del conto prima che i soldi vengano ricevuti, in modo che siano immediatamente disponibili per lâ€™uso.

title: PerchÃ© mi Ã¨ stata addebitata una commissione sui prelievi ATM?
content: Le commissioni bancomat possono avvenire per vari motivi:Si applica una commissione di 2â‚¬ su qualsiasi prelievo aggiuntivo oltre la nostra politica di utilizzo (solo per nuovi possessori di N26 Standard).Â Riceverai una notifica push quando stai per esaurire i prelievi gratuiti.Alcuni operatori ATM possono applicare commissioni proprie che non abbiamo modo di rifiutare o rimborsare. Prima di procedere con il prelievo, sullo sportello ATM dovrebbe essere visualizzata la commissione. Nell'elenco delle tue transazioni, la commissione viene aggiunta all'importo del prelievo. Le commissioni N26, invece, appaiono come transazioni separate. I clienti in Spagna possono trovare una soluzione qui:I prelievi ATM in valuta estera a volte includono commissioni.Â Con il conto N26 Standard e N26 Smart si applica una commissione dellâ€™1,7% dellâ€™importo del prelievo. Questa commissione non si applica ai possessori di N26 You e N26 Metal.Utilizzo della carta Maestro per i prelievi ATM.Â I prelievi nazionali o internazionali sono soggetti a una commissione di 2 â‚¬. Maestro Ã¨ disponibile solo in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi.Per evitare le commissioni, soprattutto in viaggio, puoi utilizzare ilÂ localizzatore di ATM Mastercard (nuova tabella)Â per trovare i dispositivi da cui prelevare gratuitamente nelle tue vicinanze.Trovi una panoramica delle nostre commissioni nel listinoÂ prezzi (nuova tabella).

title: Wie kann ich zu N26 Smart upgraden?

title: Pourquoi la liaison avec mon compte Wise a Ã©chouÃ© ?
content: Nous sommes navrÃ©s dâ€™apprendre quâ€™il nâ€™est actuellement pas possible de lier votre compte N26 Ã  Wise.Â La raison la plus courante est que les informations personnelles sont incomplÃ¨tes du cÃ´tÃ© de Wise.Nous ne pourrons pas lier votre compte dans N26 si, dans le passÃ©, vous aviez crÃ©Ã© un compte directement auprÃ¨s de Wise en utilisant la mÃªme adresse e-mail que celle enregistrÃ©e sur votre compte N26 et que les informations personnelles sont incomplÃ¨tes.Voici comment lier votre compte N26 Ã  Wise :Veuillez vous connecter Ã  votre compte Wise sur www.wise.com/login, ou via leur application.Assurez-vous que votre nom complet, votre adresse, votre date de naissance et votre numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone sont complets.Si vous ne vous souvenez plus de votre mot de passe ou mÃªme d'avoir crÃ©Ã© un compte avec WiseAccÃ©dez Ã  www.wise.com/loginÂ et essayez de vous connecter.SÃ©lectionnez Â« Mot de passe oubliÃ© Â» pour rÃ©initialiser votre mot de passe et accÃ©der Ã  votre compte.Il se peut qu'il ait Ã©tÃ© crÃ©Ã© via un autre partenaire ou il y a quelque temps.

title: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
content: Any app version can be used for 180 days since its release. Within this period, newer versions will be available. Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience.Â You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the AppleÂ App Store (new tab)Â or theÂ Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. These requirements are listed below:iPhone:Model 5s or newer.iOS 12 or above:(You can find your iOS version under "Settings" > "General" > "Informations").Android:Android 6.0. or above. You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).Â Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the â€œOwnerâ€, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:Â Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.Â Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.Â Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Ownerâ€™s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, theyâ€™ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.Â N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How to change my debit card PIN?
content: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change itâ€”you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that youâ€™ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose â€˜Cardsâ€™ from the bottom right-handTap â€˜Card Settingsâ€™ and select the relevant cardSelect â€˜Reset PINâ€™Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, youâ€™ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transactionâ€”in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequencesâ€”such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isnâ€™t accepted, simply try again a different combination.Â If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that youâ€™ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

title: Come modificare i limiti della mia carta?
content: Puoi impostare i limiti per le tue carte nellâ€™app mobile N26 oppure nella tua WebApp (nuova tabella). Tutte le modifiche apportate verranno applicate immediatamente alla carta che hai selezionato.Modifica dei limiti tramite lâ€™app mobile:Effettua il log-in e vai a CarteScorri lateralmente fino a che non appare la carta desiderataVai a Impostazioni carteVai a Limiti giornalieriModifica dei limiti nella WebApp:Effettua il log-in (nuova tabella) e vai su Il mio accountSotto la categoria Carte clicca sulla carta desiderataLimiti per le carteIl limite giornaliero si riferisce alle 24 ore precedenti (e non al giorno di calendario):1.000 â‚¬ per prelievi agli sportelli ATM5.000 â‚¬ per pagamenti nei negozi o onlineIl limite mensile Ã¨ fissato al mese di calendario ed Ã¨ pari a:20.000 â‚¬ per pagamenti nei negozi o onlinePreferisci vederlo tramite un video? Dai un'occhiata ai nostri tutorial (nuova tabella) sul nostro canale di assistenza YouTube (nuova tabella).

title: How does N26 Business Metal work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs â‚¬16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate.Â Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Â Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: PerchÃ© mi Ã¨ stata addebitata una commissione per lâ€™addebito diretto?
content: Agli addebiti diretti respinti sul tuo conto a causa di fondi insufficienti viene addebitata una commissione di â‚¬ 3 in conformitÃ  ai nostriÂ Termini e condizioni (nuova tabella). Puoi evitare queste commissioni assicurandoti di avere fondi sufficienti sul conto (nuova tabella) per coprire gli addebiti diretti in entrata entro le ore 18.00 dello stesso giorno lavorativo.Ti consigliamo di utilizzare i bonificiÂ SEPAÂ istantanei (nuova tabella),Â MoneyBeam,Â (tra utenti N26)Â CASH26Â (se vivi in Germania, Austria, Spagna, Grecia o Italia) o l'opzione Carta di debito, credito o prepagata (nuova tabella) per trasferire lâ€™importo dovuto. Con questi metodi, lâ€™importo sarÃ  accreditato sul conto istantaneamente.Se non riconosci un addebito diretto, puoiÂ richiedere un rimborso (nuova tabella)Â nellâ€™app.*Solo per i paesi fuori dall'Eurozona: Se stai impostando un addebito diretto nella tua valuta nazionale, sarÃ  la banca ricevente a dettare il tasso del cambio e l'importo finale che verrÃ  riscosso da noi.
