title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (â€œPSD2â€) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, youâ€™ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.Â *applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
content:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.Iâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If youâ€™ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, youâ€™ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the â€˜Cardsâ€™ tab. You can mark the reason as â€œlostâ€ or â€œstolenâ€ based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, youâ€™ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).Â Â How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Hereâ€™s a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, youâ€™ll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods donâ€™t arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercardâ€™s chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery dateÂ 
In this scenario, Mastercardâ€™s chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place.Â You received a delivery, but it doesnâ€™t correspond with what you orderedÂ 
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didnâ€™t receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Hereâ€™s some guidance on what to say:Dear XX,Â I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction:Â Amount: â‚¬{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank.Â If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can helpâ€“â€“this is the fastest way to get your money back. Hereâ€™s a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them:Â Dear XX,Â I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below:Â Merchant name: {insert merchant name}Â Amount of original, authorized transaction: â‚¬{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: â‚¬{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward.Â The merchant told me that theyâ€™ve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still havenâ€™t received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction.Â How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. Thatâ€™s why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limitsâ€“â€“all right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a â€˜Discreet Mode (new tab)â€™ option to securely access your account in public.Â Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so youâ€™re always aware of whatâ€™s happening on your account. Plus, weâ€™re always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud.Â How does card fraud occur?Â A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM thatâ€™s been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if:Â You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchaseÂ Your online shopping account is hackedÂ Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud?Â Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banksÂ Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularlyÂ Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

Cependant, vous pouvez choisir la mÃªme combinaison de chiffres pour ces deux codes.

title: Come annullare la mia sottoscrizione Premium?
content:
I contratti N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal hanno una durata iniziale di un anno con rinnovo automatico dopo i primi 12 mesi, per poi passare a un contratto a tempo indeterminato.Puoi scegliere di annullare questo rinnovo automatico in qualsiasi momento nei primi 12 mesi di contratto.Dopo questo rinnovo il contratto diventerÃ  a tempo indeterminato, ma puoi disdire la tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momento.In questo articolo troverai la differenza tra revoca e cancellazione della sottoscrizione e disdetta del rinnovo della tua sottoscrizione. Hai 3 opzioni a disposizione:Revocare la tua sottoscrizione entro il periodo di revoca pari a 14 giorni (il lasso di tempo previsto per legge, puoi richiederla contattandoci).Disdire il rinnovo della tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momento prima della scadenza del primo contratto di 12 mesi contattandoci via chat.Cancellare la tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momento (puoi terminare la tua sottoscrizione immediatamente e senza limitazioni contattandoci tramite chat).Passaggio da Premium a PremiumSe vuoi, ora puoi eseguire il passaggio ad un altro conto Premium senza dover eseguire il downgrade a N26 Standard, mantenendo cosÃ¬ tutti i tuoi Spaces, le regole di arrotondamento, la tua carta e i pagamenti esistenti.Per farlo, accedi alla tua app mobile, vai su Il mio conto e apri i dettagli della tua iscrizione. Seleziona Modifica abbonamento e potrai quindi scegliere un altro conto Premium adatto alle tue esigenze.RevocaPuoi annullare la tua sottoscrizione entro il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni. Questo periodo inizia non appena viene addebitata la prima commissione mensile. Basta contattarci per ricevere assistenza da lÃ¬. Se revochi una delle nostre sottoscrizioni Premium in futuro potrai comunque passare allo stesso conto o ad un altro conto N26 Premium.Disdire il rinnovo della tua sottoscrizioneLa tua sottoscrizione N26 premium ha un contratto iniziale di 12 mesi.Â  Alla fine dei primi 12 mesi l'abbonamento si rinnoverÃ  automaticamente e passerÃ  a un periodo di contratto indefinito, a meno che non ci contatti e richiedi di interrompere il rinnovo.Puoi richiederlo in qualsiasi momento prima della data di rinnovo di 12 mesi e ti informeremo del rinnovo via email 8 settimane prima dell'anniversario.Â Se decidi di annullare il rinnovo, potrai continuare a usare la tua Mastercard N26 e tutti i vantaggi della tua sottoscrizione premium fino a che la tua sottoscrizione non scadrÃ . CiÃ² significa che manterremo la tua copertura assicurativa (per N26 You e N26 Metal) fintanto che ti verrÃ  chiesto di pagare la commissione di sottoscrizione. DopodichÃ©, verrÃ  emessa una carta virtuale in data dell'anniversario del contratto, subito dopo il downgrade. Per ricevere la carta virtuale Ã¨ necessario avere un saldo minimo Ã¨ di 10â‚¬. Non occorre contattarci a riguardo, la richiesta verrÃ  elaborata automaticamente.Cancella la tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momentoSe in un qualsiasi momento in seguito al diritto di revoca dalla tua sottoscrizione vuoi cancellare la tua sottoscrizione premium, ti preghiamo di contattarci. Se scegli questa opzione con N26 You o N26 Metal, finiranno i tuoi vantaggi assicurativi e le tue carte premium Smart, You e Metal verranno disattivate. Se cancelli una delle nostre sottoscrizioni premium in futuro potrai sempre passare allo stesso o un altro conto premium.Disdire il rinnovo della tua sottoscrizioneLa tua sottoscrizione N26 premium ha un contratto iniziale di 12 mesi.Â  Alla fine dei primi 12 mesi l'abbonamento si rinnoverÃ  automaticamente e passerÃ  a un periodo di contratto indefinito, a meno che non ci contatti e richiedi di interrompere il rinnovo.Puoi richiederlo in qualsiasi momento prima della data di rinnovo di 12 mesi e ti informeremo del rinnovo via email 8 settimane prima dell'anniversario.Se decidi di annullare il rinnovo, potrai continuare a usare la tua Mastercard N26 e tutti i vantaggi della tua sottoscrizione premium fino a che la tua sottoscrizione non scadrÃ . CiÃ² significa che manterremo la tua copertura assicurativa (per N26 You e N26 Metal) fintanto che ti verrÃ  chiesto di pagare la commissione di sottoscrizione. DopodichÃ©, verrÃ  emessa una carta virtuale in data dell'anniversario del contratto, subito dopo il downgrade. Per ricevere la carta virtuale Ã¨ necessario avere un saldo minimo Ã¨ di 10â‚¬. Non occorre contattarci a riguardo, la richiesta verrÃ  elaborata automaticamente.Cancella la tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momentoSe in un qualsiasi momento in seguito al diritto di revoca dopo 14 giorni dalla tua sottoscrizione vuoi cancellare la tua sottoscrizione premium, ti preghiamo di contattarci. Se scegli questa opzione con N26 You o N26 Metal, finiranno i tuoi vantaggi assicurativi e le tue carte premium Smart, You e Metal verranno disattivate.Se vuoi chiudere definitivamente il tuo conto, dai un'occhiata al nostro articolo Come chiudere il mio conto N26?Domande frequenti sulla disdetta dell'abbonamento a N26 PremiumDevo chiudere il mio conto per cancellare la mia sottoscrizione premium?
No, puoi semplicemente cambiare la tua sottoscrizione nell'app N26 e il tuo nuovo conto verrÃ  creato immediatamente.Cosa succede al mio IBAN se annullo la mia sottoscrizione premium?
La modifica del tuo abbonamento non inciderÃ  sulle tue coordinate bancarie, quindi il tuo IBAN rimarrÃ  invariato.

title: Come funziona N26 Business Metal?
content: Vale per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna e Svezia.N26 Business Metal costa 16,90 â‚¬ al mese ed Ã¨ pensato per lavoratori autonomi e freelance che hanno unâ€™azienda a proprio nome. CiÃ² significa che il conto non sarÃ  in nome della tua azienda e la tua azienda non comparirÃ  sulla carta.Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratis: ordinando la carta, scegli tra cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nellâ€™app!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU aggiuntiva fisica direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) a condividere e gestire insieme i fondi.Supporto telefonico dedicata: contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti in caso di domande.Â Prelievi ATM gratuiti in tutto il mondo: paga con la tua Mastercard N26 Metal online e in negozi fisici, evita commissioni nascoste e approfitta di zero commissioni per transazioni allâ€™estero in tutto il mondo. In piÃ¹, puoi prelevare gratuitamente in tutto il mondo, anche in valuta estera.Offerte partner esclusive: (nuova tabella) offerte partner premium e sconti su marchi famosi in tutto il mondoPacchetto assicurativo di Allianz Global Assistance*: assicurazione che include unâ€™ampia gamma di vantaggi personali e finanziari come:Assicurazione di viaggio: rimborso di spese mediche allâ€™estero, per cancellazioni dei viaggi in seguito a unâ€™emergenza medica, spese sostenute durante ritardo di volo superiore a 4 ore, spese in caso di ritardo bagagli imbarcati di piÃ¹ di 6 ore e spese di rimpatrio medico.Salvataggio neve e montagna: ricevi una copertura per ricerca, salvataggio, costi di primo trasporto e spese mediche in caso di incidenti durante una gita in montagna.Condivisi auto, bici e scooter: copertura in caso di danni o furto di veicoli affittati da aziende di car sharing.Ancora non Ã¨ possibile passare da conti privati a conti business, quindi Ã¨ importante sapere se N26 Business Metal fa al caso tuo (nuova tabella).Puoi selezionare questa tipologia di conto in fase di registrazione oppure richiedere il passaggio a Metal se possiedi giÃ  un conto N26 Business.Ãˆ concepito perÂ lavoratori autonomi e liberi professionisti: non Ã¨ possibile intestare il conto nÃ© la carta a nome di un'azienda.Il canone mensile Ã¨ pari aÂ 16,90 â‚¬.La Mastercard N26 Business Metal Ã¨ destinata esclusivamente ad un uso commerciale. Ogni meseÂ ti verrÃ  rimborsato lo 0,5%Â di tutti i pagamenti effettuati con carta. Il processo inizierÃ  il 15 del mese seguente e ogni mese successivo. Passeranno fino a 7 giorni prima che questo appaia nel tuo saldo.Non Ã¨ possibile avere contemporaneamente due conti N26 ma se hai bisogno di una carta per le spese personali e apri il tuo conto N26 Business Metal in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una carta Maestro.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe Ã¨ un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

title: How to block a Direct Debit?
content: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as â€œDocuSignâ€.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

title: What is Phishing?
content: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If youâ€™d like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. Weâ€™ll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an â€˜emlâ€™ file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above.Â Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we canâ€™t use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following:Â Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone.Â Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the â€œphone spoofingâ€ technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website thatâ€™s being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps theyâ€™re offering limited-time promotional deals. Itâ€™s important to note that just because â€œN26â€ is part of the URL, this doesnâ€™t necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect youâ€™re on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesnâ€™t, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.Â

title: Â¿CÃ³mo crear y modificar transferencias programadas?
content: Crear una transferencia programada es muy fÃ¡cil y puedes hacerlo desde la app o la WebApp. Cuando haces una transferencia saliente desde tu cuenta, tienes la posibilidad de convertirla en una transferencia programada. Para ello, marca la casilla verde que aparece en la parte de abajo de la pantalla y confirma los datos del beneficiario y la cantidad. TambiÃ©n puedes elegir con quÃ© frecuencia se va repetir y hasta quÃ© fecha.Puedes consultar tus transferencias programadas desde la app:1. Ve a la lista de transacciones (o sea, la pantalla principal).2. Pulsa en los tres puntos situados en la esquina derecha superior (Android) o encima de la lista de transacciones (iOS).3. AparecerÃ¡ una ventana donde estarÃ¡n todas tus transferencias programadas.Desde esa secciÃ³n vas a poder modificar o cancelar dichas transferencias. Para cancelarla, simplemente pincha sobre la transferencia que quieres eliminar y arrÃ¡strala hasta la papelera. â„¹ï¸ Ten en cuenta que, si una transferencia no se realiza por falta de fondos en la cuenta, no habrÃ¡ otro intento automÃ¡ticamente y serÃ¡ necesario enviar la transferencia de forma manual. La siguiente transferencia ya se volverÃ¡ a emitir de forma normal.

title: What are Cards for Spaces?
content: With our new Cards for Spaces feature, your individual subaccounts acquire a brand new functionality that allows you to link your N26 Mastercard to one of your Spaces and spend directly from there.How does it work?Cards for Spaces allows N26 customers with a Premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) to link their physical or virtual Mastercard to a Space and use the funds inÂ the subaccount for personal expenses. Below you can find an overview of the features available with attaching your N26 Mastercard to a Space:Â You will be able to link your Mastercard to one of your Spaces and back to your Main Account in one clickYou can link more than one card to a Space or to different SpacesIf you link a physical card to a Space, this will automatically allow you to use Apple and Google Pay with that cardThe feature is not available for Shared Spaces yetHow can I link my card to a Space?You will be able to link your existing virtual and physical cards to your chosen Space.There are 3 ways to do it:In the Cards tab, you can find under each card the button to select your chosen Space.In Card settings, you can also select your chosen space and link it to your card.In each Space settings, you will be able to select the card to link to that specific Space.Whenever you want to relink your card to your main account or to another Space, just select â€˜Main accountâ€™ or the other Space in the dropdown menu.

title: How to request the average annual balance
content:
In the beginning of January 2022, you will receive your average annual balance for 2021 in your (new tab)Messages (new tab). You do not need to submit a request. Same thing for the average annual balance of the years 2020 and 2019.If you need your average annual balance for a year prior to 2019, please contact our Customer Service team via chat.Why do I need it?The average annual balance is used to fill out the ISEE form, report your N26 bank account with a German IBAN to the Italian tax authorities when this balance is greater than 5.000â‚¬, prove your creditworthiness, and access programs or receive special benefits from the Italian government based on your financial situation.You can request the ISEE form by filling out the DSU form, which is essential for accessing some of the tax breaks offered by the Italian government.The value of the average annual balance, which is self-certified by the bank account holder without the need for paper documentation, must be entered in the FC.2 section of the ISEE form, under â€œbank and postal accounts and depositsâ€. You should enter the type of financial asset held and the bank account balance into this field.How do I calculate it?The average annual balance is the amount obtained by dividing the sum of the daily balances of the current account by 365, regardless of the effective duration of the calendar year (leap years), and of the number of days in which the account has been active or had a positive balance, as defined by the italian Tax Authority (new tab) and in the instructions (new tab) for completing the Single Tax Declaration 2020 of the Ministry of Labor and Social Policies.FAQs on Average annual balanceIf I have an account with a German IBAN and my average balance is over â‚¬ 5,000, do I have to declare it to the tax authority?Yes, you will have to fill in the Rw part of the tax return and pay VAT, a fixed amount tax of â‚¬ 34.20. Click here (new tab) for more information on this.I would like to receive a PDF document with the value of my average annual balance. Is it possible?We remind you that there are no legal provisions that require banks to provide this type of certification.
We have decided to send the average annual balance as a private message, in order to make this data easily accessible and downloadable by all customers.
However, your bank statement is sufficient as official proof in the event of an explicit request by the authorities, therefore we are unable to provide any document signed by the bank in PDF or similar format.

content:

Si votre solde devient nÃ©gatif Ã  cause de ces frais, les taux d'intÃ©rÃªt appliquÃ©s au montant duÂ dÃ©couvertÂ (agios) s'Ã©lÃ¨veront Ã  8,9 %.Vous pouvez Ã©viter ces frais en vous assurant dâ€™avoir les fonds suffisants sur votre compte.

title: Come posso bloccare i pagamenti contactless sulla mia carta?
content: I pagamenti contactless sono davvero pratici. Ma potresti preferire la disattivazione di questo metodo di pagamento per evitare transazioni non autorizzate sulla tua carta. Per questo motivo Ã¨ ora possibile disattivare i pagamenti NFC della tua carta. Ecco come:Vai su Carte.Se possiedi piÃ¹ carte, fai swipe verso destra finchÃ© non compare la carta interessata.Tocca Impostazioni della carta.Disattiva Pagamenti contactless.Le modifiche vengono applicate istantaneamente per la carta selezionata. Ricorda che queste impostazioni riguardano la tua carta fisica. Puoi leggere i nostri articoli dedicati alla gestione delle tue impostazioni Google Pay e Apple Pay. Se hai riscontrato delle difficoltÃ  con i pagamenti con carta contactless, ti preghiamo di leggere il seguente articolo per scoprire come farli andare a buon fine.

title: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
content: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (â€œtappingâ€ your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions:Â Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen.

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customersâ€™ data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

title: Comment puis-je renvoyer un virement SEPA Ã  son expÃ©diteur ?
content: Depuis le 17 mars, les clients dâ€™autres Ã©tablissements bancaires peuvent demander Ã  leur banque le retour dâ€™un virement SEPA envoyÃ© sur un compte N26.Dans ce cas, le client N26 reÃ§oit une notification push sur son tÃ©lÃ©phone synchronisÃ© lâ€™informant de la demande de rappel de fonds. Tout comme lorsque vous effectuez un virement depuis lâ€™application N26, vous aurez le choix entre accepter le renvoi du virement, ou le refuser.Si vous acceptez le renvoi du virement, les fonds seront dÃ©bitÃ©s de votre compte et vous ne pourrez pas en demander le rappel ultÃ©rieurement.Si vous ne disposez pas des fonds suffisants sur votre compte principal (hors espaces), vous ne pourrez pas confirmer le renvoi du virement.Si la notification reste en attente, la demande sera automatiquement rejetÃ©e aprÃ¨s 15 jours.

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.Weâ€™ve made aÂ video (new tab)Â to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If youâ€™ve lost your iPhone and arenâ€™t able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card wonâ€™t be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If youâ€™re using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if youâ€™re using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: How much does an N26 account cost?
content: An N26 bank account is free (new tab).*Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:Pricing in Germany (new tab)Pricing in Austria (new tab)Pricing in France (new tab)Pricing in Spain (new tab)Pricing in Italy (new tab)Pricing in the rest of Europe (new tab)*If weâ€™re not able to offer you an N26 account based on ourÂ minimum requirements (new tab), you may be able to open anÂ N26 Flex account.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, youâ€™ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you donâ€™t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

Ein Downgrade ist aber trotzdem jederzeit mÃ¶glich.ZusÃ¤tzlich erhÃ¤ltst du nach dem Upgrade ein Angebot, deine digitale Karte einmalig kostenlos als bunte Karte nachzubestellen. Gleichzeitig behÃ¤ltst du deine transparente Karte. Bitte beachte, dass deine digitale Karte dann deaktiviert wird.Wie erhalte ich Zugriff auf die kostenlose Smart-Probemitgliedschaft?Wenn du eine Einladung fÃ¼r eine kostenlose Testversion unserer Smart-Mitgliedschaft erhalten hast, kannst du auf diese zugreifen, indem du folgende Anweisungen befolgst.Von der Push-Nachricht aus: Tippe auf die Push-Nachricht.Wenn sich die N26 App Ã¶ffnet, erscheint automatisch deine Einladung, in der das kostenlose Probemitgliedschaft erlÃ¤utert wird. Klicke auf "BestÃ¤tigen", um fortzufahren.Dir wird dann eine Zusammenfassung des Angebots angezeigt. Bitte lies dir die Allgemeinen GeschÃ¤ftsbedingungen durch und stimme diesen zu.Klicke anschlieÃŸend auf "Kauf bestÃ¤tigen": Du hast nun offiziell eine Probemitgliedschaft abgeschlossen. Eine Nachricht bestÃ¤tigt dir, dass der Abschluss erfolgreich war! Von der N26 App aus: Ã–ffne die N26 App.Der Zugangspunkt fÃ¼r die kostenlose N26 Smart-Probemitgliedschaft wird dir oben auf deinem Home Bildschirm angezeigt. Tippe auf "Mehr erfahren". Daraufhin erscheint ein Fenster mit der Einladung, in der das kostenlose Testangebot im Detail erklÃ¤rt wird. Klicke auf "BestÃ¤tigen", um fortzufahren.Dir wird dann eine Zusammenfassung des Angebots angezeigt. Bitte lies dir die Allgemeinen GeschÃ¤ftsbedingungen durch und stimme diesen zu.Klicke auf "Kauf bestÃ¤tigen": Du hast nun offiziell eine Probemitgliedschaft abgeschlossen! Anmerkung: Wenn du eine E-Mail mit einer Einladung fÃ¼r eine Probemitgliedschaft erhalten hast, empfehlen wir dir, diese von deinem Smartphone aus zu Ã¶ffnen und auf die SchaltflÃ¤che "Kostenlose Probemitgliedschaft starten" zu klicken. Dadurch wird automatisch die N26 App geÃ¶ffnet und die Einladungsseite aufgerufen. Alternativ kannst du dich in die mobile App von N26 einloggen und den obigen Schritten fÃ¼r den Zugriff von der App aus folgen.

title: Wie melde ich einen Versicherungsfall?
content: DeineÂ N26 You (neuen Tab)- undÂ N26 Metal (neuen Tab)-Mitgliedschaft umfasst eine Vielzahl von Versicherungsleistungen, die von unserem Partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe abgedeckt werden.*Um einen Versicherungsfall zu melden, logge dich in deine App ein, gehe zu ğŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > Deine Mitgliedschaft > Allianz Versicherung.Dort findest du:Einen Leitfaden, wie du einen Versicherungsfall einreichen kannst (z. B. Flug- oder GepÃ¤ckverspÃ¤tung, Handydiebstahl, GarantieverlÃ¤ngerung oder Reisestornierung)Deine N26 Kontoinformationen, sowie die Nummer deiner Allianz Versicherungspolice Die MÃ¶glichkeit, dich bei einem medizinischen Notfall direkt an die Allianz zu wendenHalte im Notfall bitte folgende Informationen bereit:Die vollstÃ¤ndige Adresse und Telefonnummer deines aktuellen AufenthaltsortesNamen aller offiziellen Ansprechpartner (Ã„rzte, KrankenhÃ¤user und/oder Polizei)Eine genaue Beschreibung der Situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist ein Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und gehÃ¶rt zur Allianz Group.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account > Personal Details > Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box â€œAllow other N26 users in my contact list to find me for easier transfers.â€All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, youâ€™ll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users?You can access to all our in-app features,Â e.g.Â MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions withoutÂ typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visibleÂ enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 usersÂ selected from your contact list.

title: Where to find your Tax ID
content: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If youâ€™re from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TINâ€™s are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben Ã¼ber die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If youâ€™re a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des ProcÃ©dures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authoritiesâ€™ database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TINâ€™s are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If youâ€™re a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TINâ€™s are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If youâ€™ve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

title: Come funziona N26 Business You?
content: Vale per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna e Svezia.N26 Business You costa 9,90 â‚¬ al mese ed Ã¨ pensato per lavoratori autonomi e freelance che hanno unâ€™azienda a proprio nome. CiÃ² significa che il conto non sarÃ  in nome della tua azienda e la tua azienda non comparirÃ  sulla carta.Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratis: ordinando la carta, scegli tra cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nellâ€™app!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU aggiuntiva fisica direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) a condividere e gestire insieme i fondi.Supporto telefonico dedicata: contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti in caso di domande.Â Prelievi ATM gratuiti in tutto il mondo: paga con la tua Mastercard N26 You online e in negozi fisici, evita commissioni nascoste e approfitta di zero commissioni per transazioni allâ€™estero in tutto il mondo. In piÃ¹, puoi prelevare gratuitamente in tutto il mondo, anche in valuta estera.Pacchetto assicurativo di Allianz Global Assistance*: assicurazione che include unâ€™ampia gamma di vantaggi personali e finanziari come:Assicurazione di viaggio: rimborso di spese mediche allâ€™estero, per cancellazioni dei viaggi in seguito a unâ€™emergenza medica, spese sostenute durante ritardo di volo superiore a 4 ore, spese in caso di ritardo bagagli imbarcati di piÃ¹ di 6 ore e spese di rimpatrio medico.Salvataggio neve e montagna: ricevi una copertura per ricerca, salvataggio, costi di primo trasporto e spese mediche in caso di incidenti durante una gita in montagna.Condivisi auto, bici e scooter: copertura in caso di danni o furto di veicoli affittati da aziende di car sharing.Ancora non Ã¨ possibile passare da conti privati a conti business, quindi Ã¨ importante sapere se N26 Business Metal fa al caso tuo (nuova tabella).Puoi selezionare questa tipologia di conto in fase di registrazione oppure richiedere il passaggio a You se possiedi giÃ  un conto N26 Business.Ãˆ concepito perÂ lavoratori autonomi e liberi professionisti: non Ã¨ possibile intestare il conto nÃ© la carta a nome di un'azienda.La Mastercard N26 Business You Ã¨ destinata esclusivamente ad un uso commerciale. Ogni meseÂ ti verrÃ  rimborsato lo 0,1%Â di tutti i pagamenti effettuati con carta. Non Ã¨ possibile avere contemporaneamente due conti N26 ma se hai bisogno di una carta per le spese personali e apri il tuo conto N26 Business You in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una carta Maestro.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe Ã¨ un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo mantener un registro de los gastos diarios?
content: Hacemos una clasificaciÃ³n automÃ¡tica deÂ tus transaccionesÂ y mostramos toda la informaciÃ³n en EstadÃ­sticas (en la esquina superior derecha de la app). EstÃ¡n ordenadas por:CategorÃ­as.Â Recopilamos informaciÃ³n sobre comercios y pagos para mejorar nuestra categorizaciÃ³n (cajeros automÃ¡ticos, alimentos y comestibles o compras, por ejemplo). Si envÃ­as unÂ MoneyBeamÂ con una etiqueta de referencia que pongaÂ Comida, automÃ¡ticamente pasarÃ¡ a ser un gasto en Bares y Restaurantes. Si ves que un gasto no concuerda con una categorÃ­a, puedes cambiarla seleccionando dicha transacciÃ³n y eligiendo otra categorÃ­a de la lista desplegable.Hashtags.Â TambiÃ©n hemos aÃ±adido hashtags predeterminados relacionados con el tiempo (#weekend), tipo de transacciÃ³n (#libros) o incluso ubicaciones donde se ha realizado la compra (#BerlÃ­n). AdemÃ¡s, puedes ordenar tus transacciones creando tus propios hashtags: pulsa en una transacciÃ³n, haz clic en el icono del lÃ¡piz para agregar una etiqueta (como #viaje_portugal o #mensualidad, por ejemplo) o bien elimina las etiquetas no deseadas.Â¿Quieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 â‚¬ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26.Â InfÃ³rmate mÃ¡s sobre este tema.

title: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
content: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times.Â Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card and weâ€™ll send it to you.Â If you donâ€™t see that message, donâ€™t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right youâ€™ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Donâ€™t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

title: How does Spaces work?
content: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile andÂ WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as youâ€™d like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, youâ€™ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a â€˜DEâ€™ IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

title: Que se passe-t-il si le solde de mon compte est nÃ©gatif ?
content: Le solde de votre compte peut Ãªtre nÃ©gatif si vous disposez dâ€™unÂ dÃ©couvert autorisÃ© (nouvel onglet)Â uniquement disponible en Allemagne et en Autriche. Le taux d'intÃ©rÃªt applicable au dÃ©couvert est de 8,9 %.Il est Ã©galement possible que vous ayez un solde nÃ©gatif si des frais chargÃ©s par N26 tels que les frais de livraison express ou dâ€™adhÃ©sion Premium sont prÃ©levÃ©s.Â Vous pouvez aussi avoir un solde nÃ©gatif lorsque des transactions offline sont transmises et doivent Ãªtre dÃ©bitÃ©es. Câ€™est le cas par exemple pour les paiements effectuÃ©s sur des avions ou des bateaux qui ne sont pas immÃ©diatement dÃ©bitÃ©s au moment de lâ€™autorisation de la transaction mais qui le seront quand mÃªme plus tard.En acceptant nos conditions gÃ©nÃ©rales, vous vous Ãªtes engagÃ© Ã  alimenter votre compte. Nous vous enverrons un rappel par email pour vous demander dâ€™alimenter votre compte aussi rapidement que possible. Tant que votre solde est nÃ©gatif, vous ne pourrez pas effectuer de nouveaux paiements ni de retraits.Que se passe-t-il si mon solde reste nÃ©gatif ?Votre compte restera actif 60 jours Ã  compter de la date Ã  laquelle le solde est devenu nÃ©gatif. Durant cette pÃ©riode :Vous recevrez 2 rappels de paiement.Si vous disposez dâ€™une autorisation de dÃ©couvert, celle-ci sera annulÃ©e aprÃ¨s le deuxiÃ¨me rappel de paiement et vous devrez rembourser le montant immÃ©diatement (ou demander un plan de remboursement).Si vous avez un compte N26 You, N26 Metal ou N26 Business You, tous les services seront annulÃ©s au bout de 60 jours et votre compte sera rÃ©trogradÃ© Ã  un compte standard.Si vous nâ€™avez pas rÃ©agi au bout de 60 jours, nous pouvons fermer votre compte.

title: How to top up my account?
content: Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways. To do so, simply go to the N26 app and select 'Add Money' to see the available options:1. SEPA Transfer (Up to 2 business days):The transfer must be in EUR and within the SEPA zone.You will need to provide your IBAN and your name as it is written on the ID you used to create your account.If you have a Business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names.Since 1st July 2020 a limit of 100.000â‚¬ for incoming SEPA instant transfers applies.No limit applies to normal incoming SEPA transfers2. Debit or Credit Card (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details from the sending account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.3. Apple Pay or Google Pay (instant):You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 450â‚¬ per calendar month.The first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 3 % of the deposit amount.Simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the Apple Pay or Google Pay account.Please note, prepaid cards and American Express credit cards are not accepted.4. Moneybeam (instant):You can receive money from other N26 users.5. CASH26 (instant):Available in Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain and Greece.Deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.6. iDEAL (instant):Available only in the Netherlands for customer with Dutch T&C and with a iDEAL accountThe first deposit is free. The following deposits charge a fee of 1.5 % of the deposit amount.7. GiroPay (instant):Only available in Germany for customers with German Terms and Conditions and a Giropay account.8. EPS (instant):Only available in Austria for customers with Austrian Terms and Conditions and an EPS account.9. Bancontact (instant):Only available in Belgium for customers with Belgian Terms and Conditions and a Bancontact account.Important reminder for SEPA Transfers:If you deposit money into your N26 account via SEPA transfer, please make sure that the recipient name corresponds to your name as it is entered on the identification document that you used for your verification when opening the account.(Especially if you have an N26 Business account - we do not accept company names.) An incoming transfer is booked in real time, as if it was made as a real time transfer, otherwise a transfer takes 1-2 working days. From July 1st, 2020, there will be a limit of â‚¬ 100,000 for incoming real-time transfers. In France, the first payment must be made to your N26 account from an account that you own. (In all other countries it is not necessary that the other bank account belongs to you.)

title: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
content: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChooseÂ RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder.Â Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details.Â 
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support canâ€™t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. Youâ€™re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)Â or Â§ 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes.Â According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If youâ€™d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. Weâ€™re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you donâ€™t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We donâ€™t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (â€œIRSâ€).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, weâ€™ll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?Â 
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being â€œsubject to taxâ€ in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that youâ€™re also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you donâ€™t end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (â€œSSNâ€) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: CRR Disclosure Report
content: What is it ?The Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) is an EU law. Among others, it states an obligation for credit institutions to publish a disclosure report on an annual basis (Art. 433 CRR).Â Â Why is the Disclosure Report not published in our Support Center or somewhere else on our website?N26 Bank GmbH is not obliged to publish the CRR report on our website. Art. 434 (new tab) CRR only requires an â€œappropriate mediumâ€ and therefore leaves the decision up to each credit institution.N26 Bank GmbH publishes its CRR in www.bundesanzeiger.de (new tab)

title: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
content: We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback toÂ ideas@n26.com (new tab). Weâ€™re always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can alsoÂ file a complaint.

title: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
content:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select â€˜Forgot Passwordâ€™ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ from the mobile app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â (if you havenâ€™t activated your card and need toÂ top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by theÂ check digitsÂ (two numbers), then ourÂ bank codeÂ 10011001 and end with your 10-digitÂ account numberÂ (start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into theÂ WebApp (new tab)Â and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner ofÂ Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.Â In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.Â One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a â€œtrusted beneficiaryâ€ so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

content: Nein, das Ablaufdatum auf deiner Karte hat eine wichtige Funktion. Du kannst deine Karte nach Ablauf des letzten GÃ¼ltigkeitsmonats nicht weiter verwenden. Du erhÃ¤ltst eine neue Karte mit einer anderen Nummer sowie einem neuen Ablaufdatum.Meine Karte lÃ¤uft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte fÃ¼r meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

content: Pas de problÃ¨me, nous sommes lÃ  pour vous aiderÂ !Â Si vous avez dÃ©jÃ  confirmÃ© votre adresse et que plus de 20Â jours se sont Ã©coulÃ©s, veuillez contacter le Service Client. Pour ce faire, consultez la rubrique Aide de lâ€™application.Â Si vous nâ€™avez pas encore confirmÃ© votre adresse, connectez-vous Ã  votre compte N26 dans lâ€™application et cherchez une banniÃ¨re sous votre carte expirÃ©e. title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content: Youâ€™ll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whetherÂ MoneyBeam, standing orders, orÂ CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you eitherÂ ConfirmÂ orÂ CancelÂ it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from yourÂ card PINÂ but you can use the same number for both. Youâ€™ll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN afterÂ connecting your smartphoneÂ (whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN byÂ changing itÂ in the app.

title: How to use my card digitally?
content: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

title: Why was I charged twice?
content: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means youâ€™re able to see whatâ€™s going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once youâ€™ve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we canâ€™t cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days.Â Sometimes youâ€™ll see both payments at the same timeâ€“the authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesnâ€™t expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab).Â Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

title: How to order my extra card?
content: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: â€œAlways losing things?â€ > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs â‚¬10 for standard shipping and â‚¬25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of â‚¬10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.â„¹ï¸ The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

title: What is my PIN number?
content:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codesâ€”your Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun factâ€”you create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. Youâ€™re the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you arenâ€™t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If youâ€™ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.
