title: Espaces partagÃ©s - BÃ©nÃ©ficiaire de confiance
content: Un bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire de confiance peut effectuer les actions suivantes dans un espace partagÃ© :effectuer un virement depuis son compte courant ou lâ€™un de ses propres espaces (y compris d'autres espaces partagÃ©s auxquels il participe) vers un espace partagÃ©Â accÃ©der aux fonds d'un espace partagÃ© et les transfÃ©rer librement Ã  tout momentquitter un espace partagÃ© lorsquâ€™il le souhaiteLes virements entre le compte courant (ou un espace) du bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire de confiance et un espace partagÃ© auquel il participe n'ont pas besoin d'Ãªtre confirmÃ©s par le biais d'une notification. Cela signifie que les participants dâ€™un espace partagÃ© peuvent glisser et dÃ©poser de l'argent instantanÃ©ment et de maniÃ¨re transparente via l'application N26 web et mobile, comme c'est dÃ©jÃ  le cas pour leurs transactions habituelles dans Espaces.Pourquoi dois-je dÃ©finir un administrateur ou un participant comme bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire de confiance ?Le droit bancaire europÃ©en rÃ©git les modalitÃ©s d'autorisation des virements bancaires.Â Dans cette loi, l'authentification forte du client (AFC) est une exigence pour rendre les paiements en ligne plus sÃ»rs.Â Une exception Ã  cette rÃ¨gle est la classification d'une personne dans un espace partagÃ© en tant que "bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire de confiance", de sorte que les virements effectuÃ©s par ou Ã  cette personne ne nÃ©cessitent pas d'AFC.Pour en savoir plus sur les Espaces partagÃ©s, visitez notre article Que sont les Espaces PartagÃ©s ?.DÃ©couvrez Ã©galement comment ajouter/supprimer des participants dans un espace partagÃ©.

title: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
content:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way.Â How does it work?Â The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide?Â Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of AttorneyÂ Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a personâ€™s identity, and itâ€™s not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework.Â As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means.Â Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

title: How to block contactless payments on my card?
content: Currently only available for iOS users on the mobile app.Contactless payments are really practical. But you might prefer to deactivate this payment method to prevent unauthorised transactions on your card. This is why you can now deactivate contactless payments on your card specifically:Go to Cards.Â If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Toggle Contactless payments.The changes you make are applied instantly to the card youâ€™ve chosen. Keep in mind that these settings refer to your physical card. You can read our dedicated articles to manage your Google Pay and Apple Pay settings. If youâ€™re experiencing difficulties with contactless card payments, please read the following article to learn how to make them work.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your accountâ€™s security (see GwG Â§ 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.Â As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.Â This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message youâ€™ll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.Â Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.Â Our Customer Support doesnâ€™t have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. Youâ€™ll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency MechanismÂ As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26â€™s public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen APIÂ  & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as â€œpendingâ€ will be classified as â€œbookedâ€ transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 Weâ€™ve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content: We collaborate with many partners. Thatâ€™s why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldnâ€™t be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).Youâ€™re taxable in the United States. If so, you wonâ€™t be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: Come cambiare il PIN della mia carta N26?
content: Al momento dellâ€™attivazione, ti verrÃ  chiesto di impostare il â€‹â€‹PIN della tua nuova carta di debito. N26 non imposta mai un codice PIN predefinito per la tua carta, quindi se lo dimentichi o vuoi semplicemente cambiarlo, puoi facilmente ripristinarlo dall'app N26.Prima di impostare o modificare il tuo PIN, assicurati che il tuo smartphone sia associato al tuo conto e di aver attivato la tua carta. Quindi segui questi passaggi:Apri l'app N26 e scegli "Carte" in basso a destraScegli la carta di tuo interesse e tocca "Impostazioni"Seleziona "Reimposta PIN"Inserisci il numero di 10 cifre che trovi sul fronte o sul retro della tua cartaScegli un nuovo codice PIN e confermaRicorda, per abilitare i pagamenti contactless (NFC) e utilizzare la carta per i tuoi acquisti online, dovrai prima effettuare una transazione con chip e codice PIN presso un negozio o uno sportello ATM.PIN errato o non validoPer ragioni di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN che contengano elementi della tua data di nascita, indirizzo o altre combinazioni con cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1111, 1234 o 4321). Se il numero scelto non Ã¨ valido, ti preghiamo di riprovare con una combinazione diversa.Se inserisci il PIN sbagliato per tre volte di seguito, la carta verrÃ  automaticamente bloccata per motivi di sicurezza. Se ti succede questo, apri una chat con il Supporto Clienti tramite app, cosÃ¬ potremo aiutarti.Il codice PIN della tua carta non Ã¨ lo stesso del tuo PIN di conferma (nuova tabella), ma se vuoi puoi scegliere lo stesso PIN per entrambi.Se hai cambiato il PIN ma riscontri un errore durante il pagamento, vedi il punto 6 sopra.

title: How to download my personal data?
content: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. Weâ€™ve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and youâ€™re in complete control: go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. Â It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.Â As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.Â Â How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. Youâ€™ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure itâ€™s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

title: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
content: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of theÂ delivery and accept the N26 MetalÂ T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering yourÂ Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If youâ€™re already a N26 You member, you donâ€™t have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.Â Â Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rulesÂ As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth.Â Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number.Â Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved.Â For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating â€œpermanent homeâ€ as a stronger form of attachment than â€œtemporary residenceâ€). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification numberÂ Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each countryâ€™s tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.Â Â The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authoritiesÂ As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France.Â Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN.Â We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information.Â Our recommendationÂ Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines.Â We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick â€œAdd new tax countryâ€, indicate whether youâ€™re a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if youâ€™re tax resident in more than one country), click â€œAdd new tax countryâ€ and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.Weâ€™re unable to advise you on your tax status. If youâ€™re unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.Â

title: How to upgrade to N26 You?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 YouÂ during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's (new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. If you upgrade to N26 You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: How to keep my banking data safe online?
content: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

title: How to keep my banking data safe online?
content: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

title: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
content: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 MetalÂ contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, youâ€™re now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and youâ€™ll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs.Â RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.Â  At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and weâ€™ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of â‚¬10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

title: How to protect my identity?
content: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
content: No problem, we got your back!Â If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app.Â If you havenâ€™t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where youâ€™d like to receive your replacement card.Â My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?

title: Comment changer mon code de validation N26 ?
content: Instructions Ã©tape par Ã©tape:iPhoneAndroidEtape 1Ouvrez votre application N26 et cliquez sur l'icÃ´ne Mon compte en haut Ã  droite de votre Ã©cranEtape 2Faites dÃ©rouler et cliquez sur SÃ©curitÃ©Etape 3Choisissez Modifier le PIN de confirmationEtape 4Entrez le token de votre carte : les 10 chiffres Ã  l'avant ou Ã  l'arriÃ¨re de votre carteEtape 5CrÃ©ez et confirmez votre nouveau PIN de confirmationEtape 1Ouvrez votre application N26 et cliquez sur l'icÃ´ne Mon compte en haut Ã  droite de votre Ã©cranEtape 2Faites dÃ©rouler et cliquez sur SÃ©curitÃ©Etape 3Choisissez Modifier le PIN de confirmationEtape 4Entrez le token de votre carte : les 10 chiffres Ã  l'avant ou Ã  l'arriÃ¨re de votre carteEtape 5CrÃ©ez et confirmez votre nouveau PIN de confirmationLe code de validation vous permet de confirmer les virements ou toute autre opÃ©ration effectuÃ©e depuis lâ€™application. Pour vous en souvenir, crÃ©ez votre propre code de validation N26 lors de la premiÃ¨re synchronisation de votre tÃ©lÃ©phone. Cependant, vous pouvez choisir la mÃªme combinaison de chiffres pour ces deux codes.

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Â Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 YOU with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Please keep the following in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.Â If youâ€™re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: How does N26 Business Smart work?
content: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs â‚¬4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&Câ€™s).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of â‚¬4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If youâ€™re a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

Shared Spaces kann keine IBAN zugewiesen werden.Mehrere Spaces mit IBANs: Du kannst bis zu 10 Spaces erstellen, jeder mit einer eigenen individuellen IBAN, wodurch du noch mehr Kontrolle Ã¼ber deine Finanzen hast. Bitte beachte, dass nach der Zuweisung von IBANs an 3 Spaces ein Zeitlimit von 24 Stunden aktiviert wird, bis einem Space eine neue individuelle IBAN zugewiesen werden kann.Ãœberweisungen empfangen: Du kannst Ãœberweisungen direkt in einen Space mit zugewiesener IBAN empfangen.Ausgehende Ãœberweisungen: Du kannst Ãœberweisungen direkt aus einem Space, dem du eine IBAN zugewiesen hast, tÃ¤tigen. Logge dich dazu einfach in die mobile App oder N26 Web-App ein, Ã¶ffne den â€Spacesâ€œ-Tab und wÃ¤hle den Space aus, dessen IBAN du einsehen mÃ¶chtest. Gehe zu den Space-Einstellungen. Dort findest du die IBAN und den BIC.So fÃ¼gst du zu einem Space eine IBAN hinzu:Du kannst eine IBAN zu deinen Spaces hinzufÃ¼gen, indem du die folgenden Schritte ausfÃ¼hrst:Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein.Ã–ffne den â€œSpacesâ€-Tab.WÃ¤hle den Space, dem du eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen mÃ¶chtest.Tippe auf das Zahnrad-Symbol oben rechts im Fenster, um zu den Spaces-Einstellungen zu gelangen.Folge dem Ablauf in der App:WÃ¤hle â€IBAN erstellenâ€œLies dir die Informationen durch und tippe anschlieÃŸend auf â€IBAN hinzufÃ¼gen zu ...â€œ Nimm die AGBs anGib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN einTippe im letzten Fenster auf â€Alles klarâ€œSo lÃ¶schst du einen Space, dem eine IBAN zugewiesen wurde:Um eine IBAN aus einem Space zu entfernen, musst du den Space komplett lÃ¶schen und das verbleibende Guthaben entweder auf dein Hauptkonto oder einen anderen Space Ã¼berweisen. Um einen Space mit einer IBAN zu lÃ¶schen, gehe bitte wie folgt vor:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einTippe auf â€Spaces (Unterkonten)â€œWÃ¤hle den Space mit einer IBAN, den du lÃ¶schen willst (denke daran, dass dadurch der Space komplett gelÃ¶scht wird und jegliches verbleibende Guthaben vorher auf ein anderes Konto Ã¼berwiesen werden muss).Gehe auf â€Spaces-Einstellungenâ€œ (klicke auf das Zahnrad-Symbol oben rechts).Unter â€Verwaltenâ€œ findest du die Option â€Restguthaben auf ein anderes Konto Ã¼berweisen & Space lÃ¶schenâ€œ.Klicke auf diese Option und bestÃ¤tige, dass du den Space lÃ¶schen mÃ¶chtest.WÃ¤hle dein Hauptkonto oder einen anderen Space aus, auf das/den du das verbleibende Guthaben Ã¼berweisen mÃ¶chtest.Tippe zum Schluss zur BestÃ¤tigung im Fenster auf â€LÃ¶schenâ€œ.Du kannst von deinen Spaces, denen eine IBAN zugeordnet ist, ausgehende SEPA-Ãœberweisungen durchfÃ¼hren. Befolge dazu bitte die untenstehenden Schritte:Gehe in den Space, von dem du eine Ãœberweisung durchfÃ¼hren mÃ¶chtest und tippe auf "Geld senden".WÃ¤hle "BankÃ¼berweisung" ausWÃ¤hle den Kontakt aus, an den du Geld Ã¼berweisen mÃ¶chtest.BestÃ¤tige den Betrag, den du Ã¼berweisen mÃ¶chtest und gib eine Referenz ein (optional).Gib deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ein und bestÃ¤tige, um die Ãœberweisung abzuschlieÃŸen.Ãœberweisungen empfangen: Du kannst eingehende Ãœberweisungen direkt in einem Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN empfangen. title: Â¿CÃ³mo puedo descargar la confirmaciÃ³n de una transferencia SEPA?
content: Si has enviado una transferencia bancaria desde tu cuenta N26 y necesitas confirmaciÃ³n del envÃ­o o recibo, puedes descargar el archivo PDF con los datos de la transacciÃ³n desde la app del mÃ³vil o la WebApp. Te explicamos cÃ³mo hacerlo:Inicia sesiÃ³n en tu app N26De la lista de transacciones, selecciona la transferencia bancaria de la que deseas descargar la confirmaciÃ³n.Haz clic en Â«Descargar confirmaciÃ³n de transferenciaÂ»En cuanto hayas escogido esta opciÃ³n, el documento se descargarÃ¡ automÃ¡ticamente en tu smartphone o PC.Â¿QuÃ© datos encontrarÃ© en la confirmaciÃ³n de la transferencia?En la confirmaciÃ³n de la transferencia encontrarÃ¡s los datos bancarios del remitente y del beneficiario de la transferencia, asÃ­ como el importe de la transacciÃ³n y la fecha en la que se realizÃ³.

title: Round-Up Savings
content: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

title: How to repay my loan early?
content: You can always repay yourÂ N26 CreditÂ loan early. Keep in mind that an early repayment fee of up to 1% applies. If your remaining credit period is less than 12 months, the fee is up to 0.5% of the prematurely repaid amount.Contact us via chat to request an early repayment and weâ€™ll provide you with an exact calculation of the early repayment fee.*The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

title: Wie aktiviere ich meine Karte?
content: Deine N26 Karte kam heute mit der Post? Bevor du sie nutzen kannst, musst du deine Karte aktivieren. Die Aktivierung deiner N26 Karte ist in wenigen Schritten erledigt. Stelle vorher jedoch sicher, dass du dein Smartphone bereits mit deinem Konto verknÃ¼pft hast.Um deine Karte in der N26 App zu aktivieren, fÃ¼hre folgende Schritte vom Startbildschirm aus:Gehe zum "Karten"-Tab.WÃ¤hle "Einstellungen" und wische so lange nach rechts, bis die Karte erscheint, die du aktivieren mÃ¶chtest.Tippe auf "Aktivieren".Gib den Token â€“ die 10-stellige Nummer auf deiner Karte â€“ ein. Du findest den Token auf der Vorderseite unter deinem Namen. Bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der RÃ¼ckseite.Um deine Karte in der Web-App zu aktivieren, klicke einfach im Startbildschirm auf "Karte aktivieren".Du willst eine neue Karte bestellen, weil deine alte verloren gegangen, gestohlen oder beschÃ¤digt worden ist? Oder hast du dir ein Upgrade auf N26 Smart, You oder Metal geholt? In allen FÃ¤llen musst du die oben genannten Schritte zur Aktivierung deiner neuen Karte wiederholen.Â Damit du mit deiner Karte online oder in GeschÃ¤ften kontaktlos (via NFC) bezahlen kannst, musst du sie an einem Geldautomaten oder in einem GeschÃ¤ft vollstÃ¤ndig aktivieren. HierfÃ¼r muss die Karte in ein KartenlesegerÃ¤t oder einen Geldautomaten eingesteckt werden und die Transaktion durch Eingabe der Karten-PIN erfolgen.Falls du mehrere Karten derselben Art hast (zum Beispiel, weil sich die Lieferung verzÃ¶gert hat und du mehr als eine Karte bestellt hast), kannst du nur die neueste Karte aktivieren. Alle Ã¤lteren Karten werden deaktiviert, wenn du eine neue bestellst. Das trifft nicht auf Zusatzkarten fÃ¼r Premiumkonten zu.

title: Due mesi di prova gratuita per Smart
content:
EleggibilitÃ : tutti i mercati europeiProva N26 Smart per due mesiTi piacerebbe provare il nostro conto N26 Smart, ma non sai se fa al caso tuo? Ora puoi usufruire gratuitamente del nostro conto Smart per due mesi e provarlo prima di acquistarlo. CosÃ¬ capirai se fa per te e senza alcun obbligo!Provando gratuitamente il nostro N26 Smart, avrai accesso a tutte le funzionalitÃ  premium di banking incluse nel nostro conto Smart. Potrai toccarne il valore con mano e ottenere di piÃ¹ dal tuo banking quotidiano.Cosa include la prova gratuita di Smart?60 giorni di prova gratuiti: se attualmente sei un cliente N26 Standard puoi approfittare della nostra prova gratuita di Smart per un mese.Annulla in qualsiasi momento: durante il periodo di prova gratuito potrai annullare la sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momento e continuare ad usufruire dei suoi vantaggi per tutti i 60 giorni (verrÃ  effettuato il recesso automatico allo scadere dei 60 giorni).Continua con Smart: se decidi che il conto N26 Smart Ã¨ quello giusto per te, non dovrai far nulla e continuerai ad avere il nostro conto N26 Smart pagando la commissione mensile di 4,90 â‚¬. Se cambi idea quando il periodo di prova Ã¨ giÃ  finito, puoi sempre tornare a Standard.Goditi i vantaggi del nostro conto Smart: durante il periodo di prova di Smart, per 30 giorni potrai usufruire dei seguenti vantaggi:Spaces (fino a 10)Fino a 10 Spazi CondivisiIBAN per SpacesFino a 5 prelievi ATM gratuiti al meseRisparmi con Spiccioli (Round-Up Savings)Offerte e sconti dei partnerSupporto telefonicoImportante:Ti preghiamo di notare che se decidi di continuare a usufruire del nostro conto N26 Smart, ti verrÃ  addebitata la commissione di 4,90 â‚¬ il primo giorno successivo alla scadenza della prova gratuita. Il recesso rimane possibile in qualsiasi momento.
Inoltre, passando a un conto premium avrai la possibilitÃ  di ordinare gratuitamente (una volta) una carta colorata al posto di quella virtuale e tenere la tua carta trasparente. Ricorda che la carta virtuale verrÃ  poi disattivata.Come accedere alla prova gratuita di Smart?Se hai ricevuto un invito per una prova gratuita della nostra sottoscrizione Smart, potrai accedervi seguendo le istruzioni qui sotto. Dalla notifica push: 
Clicca la notifica push.
Quando l'app N26 si apre, apparirÃ  automaticamente il tuo invito con la spiegazione dell'offerta di prova gratuita. Clicca su "Continua" per procedere.
Vedrai un riassunto dell'offerta, leggi e accetta i termini e le condizioni, poi
Clicca su "Conferma acquisto": ora la tua prova comincia ufficialmente e visualizzerai un messaggio di conferma! Dall'app N26: 
Apri l'app N26.
Potrai accedere all'offerta per la prova gratuita di Smart dalla parte superiore della tua schermata home. Clicca "Scopri di piÃ¹". 
Si aprirÃ  la schermata di invito che spiega in dettaglio l'offerta di prova gratuita. Clicca su "Continua" per procedere.
Visualizzerai un riassunto dell'offerta, leggi e accetta i termini e le condizioni, poi
Clicca "Conferma acquisto": la tua prova comincia ufficialmente! Nota: se hai ricevuto un'email che ti invita a iniziare la prova, ti consigliamo di aprirla dal tuo cellulare e di cliccare sul pulsante "Inizia la prova gratuita". CosÃ¬ facendo si aprirÃ  automaticamente l'app N26 e si caricherÃ  la pagina di invito. Altrimenti, accedi nella tua app mobile N26 e segui i passaggi dell'app indicati sopra.

title: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
content: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations.Â Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions.Â Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.Â

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of ourÂ Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app orÂ WebApp (new tab)Â to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isnâ€™t rewarded because the invited friend hasnâ€™t made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates theÂ Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

Puedes convertirla en una transferencia programada, seleccionando la fecha y el intervalo de repeticiÃ³n, asÃ­ como el beneficiario.Pulsa enviar y confirma la operaciÃ³n con tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n desde el dispositivo vinculado. Es necesario confirmar o cancelar a travÃ©s de la notificaciÃ³n que te llagarÃ¡ al dispositivo vinculado. Una vez que la hayas confirmado no hay forma de revertirla o de cambiar los datos del destinatario. Si no puedes confirmar una transferencia desde la app te aconsejo que revises lo siguiente:AsegÃºrate de que tienes buena conexiÃ³n a internetAsegÃºrate de que tu mÃ³vil tiene las notificaciones activadas. Solo tienes que acceder al Espacio al que le hayas asignado un IBAN, seleccionar Â«Enviar dineroÂ» y escoger Â«Transferencia bancariaÂ». Esta se efectuarÃ¡ como un pago saliente normal.

title: Quali sono i vantaggi di N26 Smart?
content: Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratuita: quando ordini la carta, scegli tra cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nellâ€™app!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU fisica aggiuntiva direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 â‚¬.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) per condividere e gestire insieme fondi in comune.Supporto telefonico dedicato: in caso di domande, contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti.Confronta N26 Smart con gli altri piani (nuova tabella) per vedere quale Ã¨ piÃ¹ adatto a te!Se stai pensando di passare a N26 Smart, considera quanto segue (nuova tabella):La Mastercard N26 Smart non ha stampe in rilievo: i dettagli della carta, inclusi numero, codice CVV e il token di 10 cifre, sono impressi sul retro.Se passi a N26 Smart, il canone mensile di 4,90 â‚¬ verrÃ  detratto direttamente dal tuo conto N26 ogni mese a partire dalla data del passaggio.Se sei un nuovo cliente che ha aperto un conto N26 Smart, la tua sottoscrizione sarÃ  attiva non appena ti verrÃ  addebitata la prima commissione. Questo succederÃ  quando avrai trasferito denaro sul tuo conto per coprire la prima commissione, comunque entro 15 giorni dopo aver comprovato la tua identitÃ . Da quel momento in poi, la commissione mensile ti verrÃ  addebitata ogni mese in quello stesso giorno.Da ora in poi puoi decidere se pagare la tua commissione premium mensilmente, oppure in anticipo per i prossimi 6 mesi o un anno di contratto. Se scegli l'opzione di pagamento anticipato, beneficerai di uno sconto sul costo mensile del tuo conto premium (Smart / You / Metal) proporzionale al periodo di fatturazione che vuoi pagare. Dopo aver effettuato lâ€™iscrizione, troverai le opzioni di fatturazione con il pagamento anticipato e i costi correlati nella tua app N26.Per ricevere la carta, subito dopo aver completato la registrazione, trasferisci sul tuo conto un importo minimo pari al canone mensile.

title: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
content: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you wonâ€™t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

Stelle sicher, dass du deine Freunde Ã¼ber diese Voraussetzung informierst.Es kann bis zu 60 Tage dauern, bis der Bonus ausgezahlt wird.N26 behÃ¤lt sich das Recht vor, den Empfehlungsbonus im Fall eines VerstoÃŸes gegen unsereÂ AGB (neuen Tab) einzubehalten.

title: Was ist ein N26 Standard-Konto?
content: Das N26 Standard-Konto ist ein sicheres und intuitives digitales Girokonto, das du in wenigen Minuten direkt von deinem Smartphone aus erÃ¶ffnen kannst. Es ist wunderbar einfach und transparent und ermÃ¶glicht es dir, Geld problemlos und sicher zu empfangen, zu senden und auszugeben. Das N26 Standard-Konto ist kostenlos* und bietet dir eine einfache und erschwingliche LÃ¶sung fÃ¼r alle deine finanziellen BedÃ¼rfnisse. Was sind die Vorteile eines ein N26 Standard-Kontos?Unser N26 Standard-Konto bietet die folgenden Vorteile und Funktionen:Kostenloses* Girokonto: Die Nutzung unseres N26 Standard-Kontos ist kostenlos (*ab einem Guthaben von 50.000 â‚¬ oder hÃ¶her kann ein Verwahrentgelt (neuen Tab) anfallen).Virtuelle Karte: Das Konto beinhaltet eine kostenlose virtuelle Karte mit einer vollstÃ¤ndigen PAN-Nummer und kann zusammen mit Apple Pay oder Google Pay online oder im GeschÃ¤ft fÃ¼r EinkÃ¤ufe verwendet werden.Physische N26 Mastercard: FÃ¼r eine zusÃ¤tzliche GebÃ¼hr von 10 â‚¬ kannst du eine physische N26 Standard-Debitkarte anfordern (bitte beachte, dass dein Konto nach der Bestellung einmalig mindestens 10 â‚¬ Guthaben aufweisen muss, um die Produktion und den Versand der Karte auszulÃ¶sen).Zahlungen und Ãœberweisungen: Du kannst SEPA-Ãœberweisungen mit der mobilen App von N26 senden und empfangen. AuÃŸerdem kannst du Ã¼ber Moneybeam sofort Geld an andere N26 Kunden senden.Weitere Finanzprodukte: Wenn sie fÃ¼r dich erhÃ¤ltlich sind, kannst du auch unsere weiteren Finanzprodukte beantragen, z. B. Overdraft, Kredit, N26 Savings usw.CASH26: Abheben und Einzahlen von Bargeld mit CASH26 (AGB fÃ¼r DE, AT und IT).Kundenservice: Du kannst dich mit unserem tollen Kundenservice-Team in Verbindung setzen, indem du die Chat-Funktion in der App nutzt oder einen Chat Ã¼ber unsere Website oder deinem Online-Banking (neuen Tab) startest.Â Eine Anleitung zur ErÃ¶ffnung eines N26 Standard-Kontos findest du in diesem Artikel.Unser neues N26 Standard-Konto ist mit einer kostenlosen virtuellen Debitkarte ausgestattet. Mit einem aktiven Standard-Konto kannst du online und im GeschÃ¤ft bezahlen. AuÃŸerdem kannst du deine virtuelle Karte zu deinem Apple oder Google Pay Wallet hinzufÃ¼gen.Â WÃ¤hrend der Registrierung werden dir 2 Optionen angezeigt:Virtuelle Karte: Du kannst eine virtuelle Karte auswÃ¤hlen, die ohne Mindestguthaben aktiviert werden kann (wenn du dich zu Beginn fÃ¼r eine virtuelle Karte entscheidest, kannst du dir fÃ¼r 10 â‚¬ spÃ¤ter immer noch eine physische N26 Debitkarte zulegen).Physische Karte: FÃ¼r denselben Preis von 10 â‚¬ kannst du dich auch von Anfang an fÃ¼r eine physische N26 Debitkarte entscheiden (bitte beachte aber, dass du bei dieser Option auch spÃ¤ter keine virtuelle Karte bekommen kannst).Â Die Details zu deiner virtuellen Karte kannst du in deiner N26 App finden, darunter deine vollstÃ¤ndige PAN-Nummer und alles, was du fÃ¼r den Online-Einkauf wissen musst.

title: La mia carta sta per scadere, cosa devo fare?
content: Se la tua Mastercard N26 Ã¨ scaduta o scadrÃ  a breve, in questo articolo troverai tutte le informazioni su come ordinarne una nuova, i relativi costi e tempi di spedizione. Prima di procedere con il riordino di una nuova carta, ti consigliamo di verificare che tutti i tuoi dati personali siano aggiornati e corretti.Se la tua carta sta per scadere, accedi al tuo conto N26 nell'app, vai alla sezione Carte e cerca un banner sotto la carta corrispondente. Segui i passaggi per confermare dove vorresti ricevere la tua carta sostitutiva e te la invieremo.Â Se questo messaggio non compare, non preoccuparti. Probabilmente Ã¨ perchÃ© la tua carta sarÃ  valida ancora per un periodo; quando sarÃ  il momento giusto vedrai lâ€™opzione per confermare il tuo indirizzo.Una volta ricevuta la tua carta, prima di poterla utilizzare la dovrai attivare. Non dimenticare di distruggere la tua vecchia carta e di buttarla via secondo le linee guida locali per il riciclo.Posso continuare a usare la mia carta dopo che Ã¨ scaduta?Quanto costa la sostituzione della mia carta scaduta o in scadenza?La mia carta Ã¨ giÃ  scaduta ma non ho mai ricevuto una sostituzione

title: What is a N26 Business Account?
content: N26 Business is a simple and affordable solution for all your daily financial business needs. The N26 Business account is a safe and intuitive digital business current account that you can sign up to in minutes. It is beautifully simple, transparent and free*; allowing you to receive payments from clients, send money and spend confidently while keeping your business finances completely separate from your personal ones.Our business accounts are designed for self-employed and freelancers doing business under their own name (meaning you canâ€™t have our company name on your account or card). It is currently not possible to switch from personal to business accounts, so make sure that this account is right for you before opening.What are the benefits of a N26 Business Account?Our N26 Business account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* business account: N26 Business is free to open online with no account management fees (*after a balance of â‚¬50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card intended for business use only. The virtual card has a full PAN number and is ready to add to your Apple or Google wallets for online and in-store purchases. You can also use contactless-enabled ATMs to withdraw money with Apple or Google pay.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional â‚¬10, you can receive a physical N26 Mastercard for business use (please note, you will need to have at least â‚¬10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Maestro card: If you also need a card for private expenses then customers with DE, AT and NL T&Câ€™s, can order a Maestro card for an additional â‚¬10.Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.What are the maximum limits for N26 Business accounts?The maximum daily payment limits for the N26 Business Mastercard (total amount within 24 hours) are:Â ATM withdrawals: â‚¬2,500	In-store or online payments: â‚¬5,000Â The monthly limit for payments is â‚¬20,000.Â You can set your limits (new tab) for ATM withdrawals and payments directly in the Cards section of the app.On top of this, if you open an N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands, you can apply for a Maestro card for your personal expensesÂ The maximum daily limits (within 24 hours) for bank transfers are:Â MoneyBeam to N26 customers: â‚¬1,000Instant transfers: â‚¬100,000Outgoing transfers: No limitsÂ N26 Business doesn't support transfers in foreign currencies (new tab) made from the app but directly from the Wise (new tab) website.Â Please note that business-to-business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.
